text: once in ghana , otte is called before the chief 's council to explain what happened .
translation: ガーナで、オッテは首長の評議会の前に呼ばれ、何が起こったのかを説明します。
back_translation: In Ghana, Otte was called before the council of chiefs to explain what had happened.

text: a terrifically deft picture about the thick line that separates movie glamour from the real world , and the thin line between common sense and paranoia .
translation: 映画の魅力と現実世界を隔てる太い線、そして常識と偏執狂の間の細い線についての素晴らしく巧妙な作品。
back_translation: A wonderfully clever work about the thick line that separates the allure of movies from the real world, and the thin line between common sense and obsession.

text: murder by numbers is like a couple of mediocre tv-movie -of-the-week films clumsily stuck together .
translation: 「マーダー・バイ・ナンバーズ」は、いくつかの平凡なテレビ映画を不器用にくっつけたような作品です。
back_translation: "Murder by Numbers" is a work that seems to awkwardly piece together several mediocre TV movies.

text: has enough gun battles and throwaway humor to cover up the yawning chasm where the plot should be .
translation: 銃撃戦と使い捨てのユーモアが十分あり、プロットがあるべき空虚な溝を埋めている。
back_translation: There is enough gunfire and disposable humor to fill the void where the plot should be.

text: forced to think fast , the producer decides to digitally create an actress `` simone `` to sub for the star -- the first totally believable synthetic actress .
translation: 急いで考えなければならなくなったプロデューサーは、スターの代わりに完全に信じられる合成女優「シモーヌ」をデジタルで作成することを決定する。
back_translation: The producer, who had to think quickly, decided to digitally create a completely believable synthetic actress named "Simone" instead of a star.

text: there 's not one decent performance from the cast and not one clever line of dialogue .
translation: キャストからのまともな演技は一つもなく、巧妙なセリフも一つもありません。
back_translation: There is not a single decent performance from the cast, nor a single clever line.

text: and finds himself in the middle of two assassination plots masterminded by the cia .
translation: そして、彼はCIAが企てた二つの暗殺計画の真ん中にいることに気づく。
back_translation: And he realizes that he is in the middle of two assassination plans orchestrated by the CIA.

text: a gem of a romantic crime comedy that turns out to be clever , amusing and unpredictable .
translation: 巧妙で楽しく予測不可能な、ロマンティック・クライム・コメディの宝石のような作品です。
back_translation: It is a cleverly crafted, entertaining, and unpredictable gem of a romantic crime comedy.

text: not since ghostbusters has a film used manhattan 's architecture in such a gloriously goofy way .
translation: ゴーストバスターズ以来、マンハッタンの建築をこんなにも素晴らしくユーモラスに使った映画はありません。
back_translation: Since Ghostbusters, no movie has used Manhattan's architecture in such a wonderfully humorous way.

text: tony gayton 's script does n't give us anything we have n't seen before , but director d . j . caruso 's grimy visual veneer and kilmer 's absorbing performance increase the gravitational pull considerably .
translation: トニー・ゲイトンの脚本は、私たちが今まで見たことのないものを提供するわけではありませんが、監督のD.J.カルーソの陰鬱なビジュアル・ベースとキルマーの引き込まれるパフォーマンスが、十分に重力を増しています。
back_translation: Tony Gayton's screenplay doesn't offer anything we've never seen before, but director D.J. Caruso's gloomy visual base and Kilmer's captivating performance add enough weight to it.

text: as fran 's requests become more peculiar , chep is thrown into increasingly bizarre situations .
translation: フランの要求がますます奇妙になるにつれて、チェップはますます奇妙な状況に投げ込まれます。
back_translation: As Fran's demands become increasingly strange, Chep finds himself thrown into more and more bizarre situations.

text: . . . with the candy-like taste of it fading faster than 25-cent bubble gum , i realized this is a throwaway movie that wo n't stand the test of time . it 's a trifle .
translation: ... そのキャンディのような味が25セントのバブルガムよりも早く消えていくのを感じながら、これは時の試練に耐えない使い捨ての映画だと気づいた。それはつまらないものだ。
back_translation: ... As I felt the candy-like flavor fading away faster than a 25-cent bubble gum, I realized that this is a disposable movie that does not stand the test of time. It is boring.

text: like the original , this version is raised a few notches above kiddie fantasy pablum by allen 's astringent wit .
translation: オリジナルと同様に、このバージョンはアレンの辛辣なウィットによって子供向けファンタジーの単調さをいくつかの段階上に引き上げています。
back_translation: Like the original, this version elevates the monotony of children's fantasy to another level with Allen's sharp wit.

text: over months of improv work in the studio , they transform a haunting holocaust legacy into a disturbing theater piece .
translation: 数ヶ月にわたるスタジオでの即興作業を経て、彼らは印象的なホロコーストの遺産を不気味な演劇作品に変貌させます。
back_translation: After several months of improvisational work in the studio, they transform their impressive Holocaust heritage into a chilling theatrical work.

text: while broomfield 's film does n't capture the effect of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture , it succeeds as a powerful look at a failure of our justice system .
translation: ブルームフィールドの映画は、これらの悲劇的な死がヒップホップ文化に与えた影響を捉えていないが、私たちの司法制度の失敗に対する力強い視点として成功している。
back_translation: Bloomfield's film does not capture the impact of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture, but it succeeds as a powerful perspective on the failures of our judicial system.

text: it questions whether we really live in a world that can be divided neatly into black hats and white hats . and anyway , it wonders , is the guy in the black hat always wrong ?
translation: それは、私たちが本当に黒い帽子と白い帽子にきれいに分けられる世界に生きているのか疑問を呈します。そして、そもそも、黒い帽子の人がいつも間違っているのか、ということを考えます。
back_translation: It raises the question of whether we live in a world that can be neatly divided into black hats and white hats. And it makes us think about whether people in black hats are always wrong to begin with.

text: josh ( anthony michael hall ) is one of those guys who ca n't navigate the shallow ny singles scene .
translation: ジョシュ（アンソニー・マイケル・ホール）は、薄っぺらなニューヨークの独身シーンをうまく乗りこなせない男の一人です。
back_translation: Josh (Anthony Michael Hall) is one of the men who struggles to navigate the superficial single scene in New York.

text: . . . a vast adventure that bristles with romance , action and heroism .
translation: ...恋愛、アクション、英雄主義に満ちた壮大な冒険。
back_translation: ...A grand adventure filled with romance, action, and heroism.

text: it recycles every clichM-i about gays in what is essentially an extended soap opera .
translation: それは本質的には拡張されたソープオペラであり、ゲイに関するあらゆるクリシェをリサイクルしています。
back_translation: It is essentially an extended soap opera that recycles every cliché about gay people.

text: like vardalos and corbett , who play their roles with vibrant charm , the film , directed by joel zwick , is heartfelt and hilarious in ways you ca n't fake .
translation: ヴァーダロスとコーベットのように、彼らは活気のある魅力で役割を演じており、ジョエル・ズウィック監督のこの映画は、心温まる心情と偽りのないユーモアで満ちています。
back_translation: Like Vardalos and Corbett, they play their roles with vibrant charm, and this film directed by Joel Zwick is filled with heartwarming emotions and genuine humor.

text: but coney island 's finest its hot dog lady , rollercoaster operator , cotton candy vendor and performing freak have their own way of doing things .
translation: しかし、コニーアイランドの素晴らしいホットドッグおばさん、ローラーコースターのオペレーター、わたあめの販売員、そしてパフォーマンスを行う奇人たちは、それぞれ自分のやり方を持っています。
back_translation: However, the wonderful hot dog lady of Coney Island, the roller coaster operator, the cotton candy vendor, and the quirky performers each have their own way of doing things.

text: ruth berman and connie kurtz first met in brooklyn in 1959 , both young married women raising their young children .
translation: ルース・バーマンとコニー・カーツは1959年にブルックリンで初めて出会いました。二人とも若い子供を育てる若い既婚女性でした。
back_translation: Ruth Berman and Connie Katz first met in Brooklyn in 1959. Both were young married women raising young children.

text: you get the feeling that the filmmakers did their homework and that they 're here to represent a harsh reality . ``
translation: 制作陣がしっかりと準備をしてきたという感覚があり、彼らは厳しい現実を描こうとしていると感じる。
back_translation: I have the sense that the production team has prepared thoroughly, and I feel that they are trying to depict a harsh reality.

text: it 's no surprise that as a director washington demands and receives excellent performances , from himself and from newcomer derek luke .
translation: 監督として、ワシントンが自身と新星デレク・ルークに優れた演技を求め、またそれを受け取るのは驚きではありません。
back_translation: As a director, it's not surprising that Washington demands excellent performances from himself and rising star Derek Luke, and also receives them.

text: medem packs it with so much stunning , wildly colorful imagery -- and so much sex -- that it transfixes you even when you 're not quite sure what 's going on .
translation: メデムは、その魅力的で色彩豊かなイメージと多くのセックスで作品を盛りだくさんにしており、何が起こっているのかよくわからなくても、あなたを釘付けにします。
back_translation: Medom captivates you with its alluring and colorful imagery, packed with plenty of sex, keeping you glued even if you don't quite understand what's going on.

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .
translation: 演技はまずまずですが、特に弱い結末のせいで、90分間の興味を持続させるだけの内容が不足しています。
back_translation: The acting is decent, but due to a particularly weak conclusion, it lacks the substance to maintain interest for the full 90 minutes.

text: an uneven film dealing with too many problems to be taken seriously .
translation: 真剣に受け取るにはあまりにも多くの問題を扱った不均衡な映画。
back_translation: An unbalanced film that deals with too many issues to be taken seriously.

text: the most ill-conceived animated comedy since the 1991 dog rover dangerfield .
translation: 1991年の犬ローバー・デンジャーフィールド以来、最も考えられていないアニメーションコメディ。
back_translation: The most underrated animated comedy since Dog Rover: Dangerous Field in 1991.

text: the galactic republic finds itself at the brink of a civil war .
translation: 銀河共和国は内戦の瀬戸際にあります。
back_translation: The Galactic Republic is on the brink of civil war.

text: the agonizing memory that has tortured him all his life -- the death of his father , a convicted murderer who was executed when vincent was just a boy -- still plagues him .
translation: 彼の人生を苦しめてきた耐え難い記憶――彼が少年だった頃に処刑された有罪判決を受けた殺人者である父の死――は今もなお彼を悩ませている。
back_translation: The unbearable memories that have tormented his life—the death of his father, a convicted murderer who was executed when he was a boy—continue to haunt him even now.

text: bernal . . . gives an ambiguous performance ; he 's a lightweight actor , but that 's a positive quality when portraying a man on whom nothing leaves a permanent mark .
translation: バーナルは曖昧な演技を見せる。彼は軽量級の俳優だが、何も永続的な印象を残さない男を描くにはそれがポジティブな特質である。
back_translation: Barnal shows ambiguous acting. He is a lightweight actor, but that is a positive trait for portraying a man who leaves no lasting impression.

text: to the outside , he is a faithful servant and a fierce protector of the organization , but inside he is full of doubt .
translation: 外見上、彼は組織の忠実な使徒であり、激しい保護者ですが、内心は疑念に満ちています。
back_translation: On the surface, he is a faithful apostle of the organization and a fierce protector, but inside he is filled with doubt.

text: after finishing the open examination for form 5 students and applying for an adult identity card , yoyo , eighteen , departs for london to meet a guy introduced by her well-meaning parents in britain .
translation: オープン試験を終えた後、成人身分証明書を申請した18歳のヨーヨーは、イギリスの優しい両親に紹介された男性に会うためにロンドンに出発します。
back_translation: After finishing her open exam, 18-year-old Yoyo, who applied for an adult ID, sets off for London to meet a man introduced by her kind parents in the UK.

text: what soured me on the santa clause 2 was that santa bumps up against 21st century reality so hard , it 's icky .
translation: 私が『サンタクロース2』を嫌いになった理由は、サンタが21世紀の現実にあまりにも激しくぶつかるため、それが不快だからです。
back_translation: The reason I came to dislike 'Santa Claus 2' is that Santa clashes too violently with the realities of the 21st century, making it uncomfortable.

text: 'the journey ' is the story of a young icelandic girl named kaja .
translation: 『旅』は、アイスランドの若い女の子カヤの物語です。
back_translation: "The Journey" is the story of a young girl named Kaya from Iceland.

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles M-^V several of them .
translation: このバラバラでお粗末な出来事から得られる唯一の楽しみは、いくつかの不意の笑いになるでしょう。
back_translation: The only joy to be gained from this disjointed and shabby event will be a few unexpected laughs.

text: although trying to balance self-referential humor and a normal ol ' slasher plot seemed like a decent endeavor , the result does n't fully satisfy either the die-hard jason fans or those who can take a good joke .
translation: 自己言及的なユーモアと普通のスラッシャープロットをバランスさせようとする試みは悪くないと思われましたが、その結果は熱心なジェイソンファンや冗談を楽しむことができる人々のどちらにも完全には満足しません。
back_translation: The attempt to balance self-referential humor with a typical slasher plot didn't seem bad, but the result leaves neither passionate Jason fans nor those who can enjoy a joke completely satisfied.

text: an extraordinary swedish film about the soul adventure of marriage -- the kind of intimate and character-driven film that bille august does best .
translation: 結婚という魂の冒険についての特別なスウェーデン映画 — ビレ・オグストが最も得意とする、親密でキャラクター主導の映画です。
back_translation: A special Swedish film about the soul's adventure of marriage — a character-driven movie that Bille August excels at.

text: they are soon off going from one strange adventure to another .
translation: 彼らはすぐに、ある奇妙な冒険から別の奇妙な冒険へと出発します。
back_translation: They soon set off from one strange adventure to another.

text: [ aniston is ] so good , she manages to overcome the occasional nuggets of preciousness and self-consciousness in the story .
translation: [アニストンは] とても素晴らしい。彼女は物語の中のたまにある貴重さや自己意識を乗り越えることができる。
back_translation: [Aniston is] very wonderful. She is able to overcome the occasional preciousness and self-awareness found in the story.

text: majandra delfino plays iris , the sheriff 's little sister , and much to his dismay , david 's love interest .
translation: マハンドラ・デルフィーノは、保安官の妹アイリスを演じており、彼の不満にもかかわらず、デイビッドの恋愛対象でもあります。
back_translation: Mahandra Delfino plays the sheriff's sister Iris, who is the love interest of David despite his frustrations.

text: nothing is what it seems , and no one will be the same again , as the truth begins to surface in very dangerous circumstances .
translation: 何もかもが見かけとは異なり、真実が非常に危険な状況で明らかになるにつれて、誰もが以前とは同じではなくなる。
back_translation: Everything is different from appearances, and as the truth is revealed in very dangerous situations, no one remains the same as before.

text: at the age of 34 , with no producing credits to his name , he landed a job as chief of production at paramount pictures .
translation: 34歳で、制作クレジットが全くない状態で、彼はパラマウント・ピクチャーズの製作責任者の職を得た。
back_translation: At 34 years old, with no production credits at all, he landed a job as the production head at Paramount Pictures.

text: along the way he picks up a pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: 彼は途中で、神の深いことを学びたいと願う牧師を拾います。
back_translation: Along the way, he picks up a pastor who wishes to learn about the deep things of God.

text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .
translation: ラムゼイとモートンは、このキャラクター研究に詩的な力と軽やかな感情を注ぎ込んでいます。
back_translation: Ramsey and Morton infuse this character study with poetic power and a light-hearted emotion.

text: she finds out that the truth about both her parents is very revealing , shocking at times , but comes to terms with her past .
translation: 彼女は両親についての真実が非常に明らかで時には衝撃的であることを知り、自分の過去を受け入れることができるようになります。
back_translation: She learns that the truth about her parents is very clear and sometimes shocking, and she is able to accept her past.

text: all the performances are top notch and , once you get through the accents , all or nothing becomes an emotional , though still positive , wrench of a sit .
translation: すべてのパフォーマンスは素晴らしく、アクセントを乗り越えれば、「オール・オア・ナッシング」は感情的でありながらもポジティブなひねりのある作品になります。
back_translation: All performances are wonderful, and if you can overcome the accents, "All or Nothing" becomes an emotionally positive piece with a twist.

text: as an exercise in stripped-down filmmaking , interview is grimly effective .
translation: 剥き出しの映画制作の演習として、インタビューは陰鬱に効果的です。
back_translation: As an exposed exercise in film production, interviews are bleakly effective.

text: john klein ( richard gere ) , a washington newspaper reporter leaves his job after his wife ( debra messing ) dies to investigate strange reports , including psychic visions ( `` prophecies `` ) and sightings of winged creatures ( `` mothmen `` ) , in a small west virginia town , that may be the signs of an alien invasion of earth . . .
translation: ジョン・クライン（リチャード・ギア）は、妻（デブラ・メッシング）が亡くなった後、ワシントンの新聞記者としての仕事を辞め、異常な報告や超能力ビジョン（「予言」）および翼のある生物（「モスマン」）の目撃情報を調査するために、西バージニアの小さな町に向かいます。この現象は、地球に対する宇宙人の侵略の兆候である可能性があります。
back_translation: John Klein (Richard Gere) quits his job as a newspaper reporter in Washington after his wife (Debra Messing) passes away and heads to a small town in West Virginia to investigate strange reports, psychic visions ("prophecies"), and sightings of winged creatures ("Mothman"). This phenomenon may be a sign of an alien invasion of Earth.

text: fame hungry roxie hart dreams of a life on the vaudville stage , and spends her nights jazzing it up in the bright lights of chicago , continually hoping that she 'll find her lucky break , and be shot into 1920 's stardom , so able to flee her boring husband amos .
translation: 名声を渇望するロキシー・ハートは、バウドビルの舞台での生活を夢見ており、毎晩シカゴの明るいライトの中でジャズを楽しんでいます。彼女は、自分のラッキーブレイクを見つけ、1920年代のスターとして一躍飛躍し、退屈な夫エイモスから逃れることを望んでいます。
back_translation: Roxie Hart, who yearns for fame, dreams of a life on the vaudeville stage and enjoys jazz every night under the bright lights of Chicago. She hopes to find her lucky break, leap into stardom in the 1920s, and escape her boring husband, Amos.

text: the principals in this cast are all fine , but bishop and stevenson are standouts .
translation: このキャストの主役たちは皆素晴らしいですが、ビショップとスティーブンソンは際立っています。
back_translation: All the main characters in this cast are wonderful, but Bishop and Stevenson stand out.

text: immediately , john q . rushes michael to the hospital 's emergency room for a transplant .
translation: すぐに、ジョン・Qはマイケルを病院の緊急治療室に移し、移植手術を受けさせる。
back_translation: Immediately, John Q moves Michael to the hospital's emergency room to undergo transplant surgery.

text: but even greater dangers lie ahead when jim discovers that his trusted friend silver is actually a scheming pirate with mutiny on his mind .
translation: しかし、ジムが彼の信頼する友人シルバーが実は陰謀を巡らす海賊であり、反乱のことを考えていることを発見した時、さらなる大きな危険が待ち受けています。
back_translation: However, when Jim discovers that his trusted friend Silver is actually a pirate plotting a conspiracy and considering rebellion, an even greater danger awaits.

text: ' . . . a great , participatory spectator sport . '
translation: 「…素晴らしい、参加型の観戦スポーツ。」
back_translation: "...wonderful, participatory spectator sport."

text: now grown up , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) calls kyle ( chaney kley ) because her little brother michael ( lee cormie ) is going through the same things he did as a boy , and wants his help .
translation: 大人になったケイトリン（エマ・コールフィールド）は、カイル（チェイニー・クレイ）に電話します。彼女の弟マイケル（リー・コーミー）が彼が少年だった頃と同じようなことを経験しているため、彼の助けを求めています。
back_translation: An adult Caitlyn (Emma Caulfield) calls Kyle (Chad Clay). She is seeking his help because her brother Michael (Lee Kormie) is experiencing something similar to what he went through when he was a boy.

text: behan himself knew how to spin a tale and one ca n't help but think he 'd appreciate this attempt to turn his life into art .
translation: ビハン自身は物語を紡ぐ方法を知っており、彼は自分の人生を芸術に変えるこの試みを評価するだろうと思わざるを得ない。
back_translation: Bihan himself knows how to weave a story, and one can't help but think that he would appreciate this attempt to transform his life into art.

text: unfortunately the third seems out of reach - the beautiful , seductive anne elise .
translation: 残念ながら、三番目は手の届かないようです - 美しく、魅惑的なアン・エリーゼ。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the third one seems out of reach - the beautiful and enchanting Anne Elise.

text: frank 's newest transport seems no different from the countless ones he 's done in the past .
translation: フランクの最新の輸送は、彼が過去に行った無数のものと何ら変わりはないようだ。
back_translation: Frank's latest transport seems no different from countless others he has done in the past.

text: a surreal fairy tale that coils in on itself like a slow-motion whirlpool and achieves an atmosphere of sublime creepiness without ever precisely making sense .
translation: ゆっくり回転する渦巻きのように自己を巻き込む超現実的な童話で、決して正確に意味を成すことはなく、崇高な不気味さの雰囲気を達成している。
back_translation: A super surreal fairy tale that wraps itself up like a slowly rotating spiral, never quite making accurate sense but achieving an ambiance of sublime eeriness.

text: a raw comedy that is intermittently hilarious as it attacks pretty much every taboo around .
translation: ほぼすべてのタブーを攻撃しながら、時折爆笑を誘う生のコメディ。
back_translation: A live comedy that attacks almost all taboos while occasionally provoking bursts of laughter.

text: the californian desert , somewhere between death valley and los angeles .
translation: カリフォルニアの砂漠、デスバレーとロサンゼルスの間のどこかで。
back_translation: Somewhere between Death Valley in the California desert and Los Angeles.

text: a living testament to the power of the eccentric and the strange . the fact that it is n't very good is almost beside the point .
translation: 奇妙で独特なものの力の生きた証です。それがあまり良くないという事実は、ほとんど問題ではありません。
back_translation: It is a living testament to the power of strange and unique things. The fact that it may not be very good is hardly a problem.

text: a dark , dull thriller with a parting shot that misfires .
translation: 暗くて dull なスリラーで、誤ったフィナーレがあります。
back_translation: A dark and dull thriller with a wrong finale.

text: oscar james takes ryan on a rollercoaster ride of mayhem and madness , but everything has a price and oscar wo n't let ryan easily escape this carnage-strewn nightmare 'til the final showdown when he reveals his real purpose .
translation: オスカー・ジェイムスはライアンを混沌と狂気のローラーコースターに連れて行くが、すべてには代償があり、オスカーはライアンがこの血まみれの悪夢から簡単に逃げられるようにはさせない。最終決戦で彼が真の目的を明らかにするまで。
back_translation: Oscar James takes Ryan on a rollercoaster of chaos and madness, but everything comes at a cost, and Oscar won't let Ryan escape this blood-soaked nightmare easily. Not until he reveals his true intentions in the final showdown.

text: [ soderbergh ] tends to place most of the psychological and philosophical material in italics rather than trust an audience 's intelligence , and he creates an overall sense of brusqueness .
translation: [ソーダバーグ]は、観客の知性を信頼するのではなく、心理的および哲学的な素材の大部分をイタリック体で表現する傾向があり、全体的にぶっきらぼうな印象を与えています。
back_translation: [Soderbergh] tends to express a large part of psychological and philosophical material in italics, rather than trusting the audience's intelligence, giving an overall brusque impression.

text: after narrow escapes from the germans and a stray mine in the channel , the two men are picked up at sea and interrogated as spies .
translation: ドイツ軍と海峡での不発弾からの狭い逃走の後、二人は海で拾われ、スパイとして尋問される。
back_translation: After a narrow escape from unexploded ordnance in the Channel with the German army, the two are picked up at sea and interrogated as spies.

text: alex enlists the aid of his old comrade father thomas ( addy ) and of a troubled artist ( sossamon ) upon whom he once performed an exorcism .
translation: アレックスは、彼の古い仲間であるトーマス神父（アディ）と、彼がかつて悪霊祓いを行った問題を抱えたアーティスト（ソッサモン）の助けを求めます。
back_translation: Alex seeks the help of his old friend, Father Thomas (Addy), and an artist (Sossamon) who had issues that he once exorcised.

text: [ screenwriter ] pimental took the farrelly brothers comedy and feminized it , but it is a rather poor imitation .
translation: [脚本家] ピメンタルはファレリー兄弟のコメディを女性化したが、残念ながらかなりの劣化模倣である。
back_translation: The screenwriter Pimental feminized the Farrelly brothers' comedy, but unfortunately, it is a significantly inferior imitation.

text: no doubt the star and everyone else involved had their hearts in the right place . where their heads were is anyone 's guess .
translation: スターや関わったすべての人々が心から正しい場所にいたことは間違いありませんが、彼らの頭がどこにあったのかは誰にもわかりません。
back_translation: It is undeniable that the stars and everyone involved were genuinely in the right place, but no one knows where their heads were at.

text: rife with the rueful , wry humor springing out of yiddish culture and language .
translation: イディッシュ文化と言語から生まれる、悲しみを伴った皮肉なユーモアにあふれています。
back_translation: It is filled with ironic humor accompanied by sadness, stemming from Yiddish culture and language.

text: the story and characters are nowhere near gripping enough .
translation: 物語とキャラクターは十分に魅力的ではありません。
back_translation: The story and characters are not sufficiently appealing.

text: the more dreams max has , the closer the fbi are in tracking down the kidnapper , but also as the case continues max discoveres the lies , corruption , and deceit of the government .
translation: マックスが夢を見るほど、FBIは誘拐犯の追跡に近づいているが、事件が進むにつれて、マックスは政府の嘘、腐敗、そして欺瞞を発見する。
back_translation: As Max dreams, the FBI is getting closer to tracking down the kidnappers, but as the case unfolds, Max uncovers the government's lies, corruption, and deception.

text: the film is predictable in the reassuring manner of a beautifully sung holiday carol .
translation: その映画は、美しく歌われたホリデーカロルのように心の安らぐ形で予測可能です。
back_translation: The movie is predictably heartwarming, like a beautifully sung holiday carol.

text: let 's issue a moratorium , effective immediately , on treacly films about inspirational prep-school professors and the children they so heartwarmingly motivate .
translation: 心温まるプレスクールの教授と彼らを感動的に動機づける子供たちに関する、甘ったるい映画に対して、即時発効の一時停止を発令しましょう。
back_translation: Let's issue an immediate suspension for those sweet movies about warm-hearted preschool teachers and the children who inspire them.

text: 'blue crush ' swims away with the sleeper movie of the summer award .
translation: 「ブルー・クラッシュ」が夏のスリーパー映画賞を獲得します。
back_translation: "Blue Crush" wins the summer sleeper movie award.

text: if you love motown music , you 'll love this documentary .
translation: モータウン音楽が好きなら、このドキュメンタリーを気に入るでしょう。
back_translation: If you like Motown music, you will enjoy this documentary.

text: this is a beautifully sensitive portrait of a unique school and , a very special teacher .
translation: これは独自の学校ととても特別な教師の美しく繊細な肖像です。
back_translation: This is a beautifully delicate portrait of a unique school and a very special teacher.

text: while on a ski trip , one of them finds passion with a beautiful girl after a random accident on the icy slopes .
translation: スキー旅行中、彼らのうちの一人が氷の斜面での偶然の事故の後、美しい女の子との情熱を見つける。
back_translation: During their ski trip, one of them finds passion with a beautiful girl after a chance accident on an icy slope.

text: chris forces mitchell to deliver guns and drugs while he hangs out on a rooftop and freaks out all day .
translation: クリスはミッチェルに銃と薬を届けさせながら、自分は屋上でぶらぶらして一日中興奮している。
back_translation: Chris is having Mitchell deliver the gun and drugs while he lounges on the rooftop, excited all day long.

text: evergon is an affectionate tragicomedy that follows francis evergon in his last days among the unemployed .
translation: エヴァーゴンは、失業者の間での彼の最後の日々を追う、愛情深い悲喜劇です。
back_translation: Evergone is a heartfelt tragicomedy that follows his final days among the unemployed.

text: john j . is a seasoned hit man sent on a job to argentina .
translation: ジョン・J・はアルゼンチンでの仕事に派遣された熟練のヒットマンです。
back_translation: John J. is a skilled hitman dispatched for work in Argentina.

text: a thoroughly awful movie -- dumb , narratively chaotic , visually sloppy . . . a weird amalgam of 'the thing ' and a geriatric 'scream . '
translation: 徹底的にひどい映画 -- 馬鹿な、物語が混沌としていて、視覚的にも雑... 「ザ・シング」と高齢者版の「スクリーム」の奇妙な混合。
back_translation: Thoroughly terrible movie -- ridiculous, with a chaotic storyline and sloppy visuals... a strange mix of "The Thing" and an elderly version of "Scream."

text: ensemble movies , like soap operas , depend on empathy . if there ai n't none , you have a problem .
translation: アンサンブル映画は、ソープオペラのように、共感に依存しています。共感がなければ、問題があります。
back_translation: Ensemble films rely on empathy, much like soap operas. Without empathy, there are problems.

text: offers a persuasive look at a defeated but defiant nation in flux .
translation: 揺れ動く敗北したが反抗的な国を説得力を持って描いています。
back_translation: It compellingly depicts a wavering, defeated yet rebellious nation.

text: katherine releases all her other clients in order to manage exclusively only her most promising talent .
translation: キャサリンは、最も有望な才能を独占的に管理するために、他のすべてのクライアントを解放します。
back_translation: Catherine releases all other clients in order to manage the most promising talent exclusively.

text: by the end of their phenomenal run , this unheralded group of musicians had played on more number ones hits than the beach boys , the rolling stones , elvis and the beatles combined - which makes them the greatest hit machine in the history of popular music .
translation: 彼らの素晴らしい活躍の終わりに、このあまり知られていない音楽家たちはビーチ・ボーイズ、ローリング・ストーンズ、エルビス、ビートルズを合わせたよりも多くのナンバーワンヒットを演奏しており、これにより彼らはポピュラー音楽の歴史における最も偉大なヒットマシンとなった。
back_translation: At the end of their remarkable achievements, these relatively unknown musicians have performed more number one hits than the Beach Boys, Rolling Stones, Elvis, and the Beatles combined, making them the greatest hit machine in the history of popular music.

text: coarse , cliched and clunky , this trifling romantic comedy in which opposites attract for no better reason than that the screenplay demands it squanders the charms of stars hugh grant and sandra bullock .
translation: 粗雑で陳腐でぎこちない、このつまらないロマンチックコメディは、反発し合う二人がただ脚本がそう求めるからという理由だけで惹かれ合い、ヒュー・グラントとサンドラ・ブロックの魅力を無駄にしています。
back_translation: This rough, clichéd, and awkward romantic comedy wastes the charm of Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock, as two opposing characters are drawn to each other simply because the script demands it.

text: he works as an illustrator at a news paper and his life is pretty okay .
translation: 彼は新聞社でイラストレーターとして働いていて、彼の生活はまあまあ良いです。
back_translation: He works as an illustrator at a newspaper, and his life is pretty good.

text: how good this film might be , depends if you believe that the shocking conclusion is too much of a plunge or not .
translation: この映画がどれほど良いかは、その衝撃的な結末があまりにも飛躍しすぎていると感じるかどうかに依存します。
back_translation: Whether or not this movie is as good as it is depends on whether you feel that its shocking ending is too far-fetched.

text: but with betts systematically eliminating anyone in his way , a further web of conspiracy unfolds and rachel and daniel are led to her old family doctor , robert barrum ( frank finlay ) .
translation: しかし、ベッツが彼の前に立ちはだかる者を体系的に排除していく中で、さらなる陰謀の網が展開し、レイチェルとダニエルは彼女の古い家族医であるロバート・バラム（フランク・フィンレイ）へと導かれます。
back_translation: However, as Betz systematically eliminates those standing in his way, a further web of conspiracy unfolds, leading Rachel and Daniel to her old family doctor, Robert Balam (Frank Finlay).

text: there are moments it can be heart-rending in an honest and unaffected ( and gentle ) way .
translation: それは、率直で無邪気（そして優しい）な方法で心を締め付けられる瞬間があります。
back_translation: There are moments that tighten your heart in a straightforward, innocent (and gentle) way.

text: lazy filmmaking , with the director taking a hands-off approach when he should have shaped the story to show us why it 's compelling .
translation: 怠惰な映画製作で、監督が物語を形作るべき時に手を抜いているため、なぜそれが魅力的なのかを私たちに示すことができていない。
back_translation: In lazy filmmaking, the director is slacking off when they should be shaping the story, failing to show us why it is engaging.

text: no good deed , based on a short story entitled 'the house on turk street ' by dashiell hammett , is about a police detective ( jack ) who , while doing a friend a favor and searching for a runaway teenager on turk street , stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery .
translation: 良い行いは、ダシール・ハメットの短編小説「タークストリートの家」に基づいており、警察の探偵（ジャック）が友人の頼みを聞いてタークストリートで行方不明のティーンエイジャーを探しているうちに、銀行強盗をしようとしている奇妙な犯罪者の一団に出くわすという話です。
back_translation: "Good Deeds" is based on Dashiell Hammett's short story "The House on Turk Street," in which a police detective named Jack is asked by a friend to search for a missing teenager on Turk Street, only to encounter a strange group of criminals planning a bank robbery.

text: meet the razor eaters : five motivated , pissed-off young men who 've launched an anarchistic crime spree against melbourne , capturing all their deeds on home video .
translation: カミソリ食いの仲間たちに会おう：メルボルンに対して無政府的な犯罪を引き起こす、やる気満々で怒りを抱えた5人の若者たちが、全ての行動をホームビデオで記録している。
back_translation: Let's meet the gang of razor-eaters: five motivated and angry young people causing anarchic crime in Melbourne, recording all their actions on home video.

text: but the day he does , he pulls one last detention duty with the toughest kids in the school .
translation: しかし、彼がその日を迎えると、学校で最も手こずる子供たちと最後の拘留業務を行う。
back_translation: However, when he faces that day, he will conduct his final detention duties with the most troublesome children at school.

text: soon she grows increasingly wary about the motives of every man with whom she has contact -- and about her own .
translation: 彼女は間もなく接触するすべての男性の動機、そして自分自身の動機についてますます警戒心を強める。
back_translation: She becomes increasingly wary of the motives of all the men she will soon come into contact with, as well as her own motives.

text: this journey awakens in ben an erotic passion that dares to destroy his tidy world as he pursues an illicit love affair , not with the administrator 's daughter , but with his wife , dori .
translation: この旅は、ベンの中に彼の整然とした世界を破壊することを恐れない官能的な情熱を呼び起こし、彼は管理者の娘ではなく、妻のドリとの不倫の関係を追い求めます。
back_translation: This journey evokes a sensual passion in Ben that is unafraid to destroy his orderly world, and he pursues an affair not with the manager's daughter, but with his wife, Dori.

text: there 's a delightfully quirky movie to be made from curling , but brooms is n't it .
translation: カーリングを題材にした、魅力的で風変わりな映画が作れるはずですが、『ブロームズ』ではありません。
back_translation: It should be possible to make an attractive and unconventional movie based on curling, but it's not 'Brooms'.

text: 'grasp ' is a darkly humorous mystery peppered with some truly surreal visuals .
translation: 「グラスプ」は、真に非現実的なビジュアルが散りばめられた暗くユーモラスなミステリーです。
back_translation: "Grasp" is a darkly humorous mystery sprinkled with truly unrealistic visuals.

text: but sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: しかし、時には私たちが子供に教えることが、教えないことと同じくらい致命的であることがあります。
back_translation: However, sometimes what we teach our children can be just as deadly as what we do not teach them.

text: sayles . . . once again strands his superb performers in the same old story .
translation: セイルズは再び彼の素晴らしいパフォーマーたちを同じ古い物語に絡ませる。
back_translation: Sails once again intertwines his magnificent performers with the same old story.

text: and in wicker park ( chicago 's answer to greenwich village ) , rachel is about to meet her cosmic match .
translation: そしてウィッカーパーク（シカゴのグリニッジビレッジに対する答え）で、レイチェルは彼女の宇宙的な相手に出会おうとしています。
back_translation: And in Wicker Park (the answer to Greenwich Village in Chicago), Rachel is trying to meet her cosmic counterpart.

text: this particular weekend strays from the usual when adam meets a girl at a party ( a simple incident which drives his best friend to the brink of a jealous rage ) .
translation: この特別な週末は通常とは異なり、アダムがパーティーで女の子に出会う（この簡単な出来事が彼の親友を嫉妬に満ちた怒りの瀬戸際に追いやる）。
back_translation: This special weekend is different from usual, as Adam meets a girl at a party (this simple event pushes his best friend to the brink of jealousy-fueled anger).

text: there he encounters dawn 's family who tie him down and put him on trail for the murder of the girl years before .
translation: そこで彼はドーンの家族に出会い、彼を縛りつけ、数年前の少女の殺人で裁判にかけることになります。
back_translation: There, he meets Dawn's family, ties him up, and puts him on trial for the murder of a girl from several years ago.

text: on an out of control train holding hostages and high-tech bio-weapons agent kristoff ( van damme ) becomes a one man army to derail the terrorists and save the lives of everyone on board !
translation: 制御不能な列車で人質を犠牲にし、高性能生物兵器を携えたクリストフ（ヴァン・ダメ）が一人で軍隊となり、テロリストを撃退し、乗車している全員の命を救う！
back_translation: Christophe (Van Damme), armed with high-performance biological weapons, becomes a one-man army, sacrificing hostages with an uncontrollable train, fighting off terrorists, and saving the lives of everyone on board!

text: the movie has very little to offer besides unintentional laughs .
translation: その映画は、意図しない笑いを除いてほとんど何も提供しません。
back_translation: That movie offers almost nothing except for unintended laughter.

text: davis ' candid , archly funny and deeply authentic take on intimate relationships comes to fruition in her sophomore effort .
translation: デイビスの率直で、皮肉を交えた面白さと深く真実な親密な関係への見解は、彼女の二作目において実を結びます。
back_translation: Davis's candid and humorously ironic perspective on deeply genuine intimate relationships comes to fruition in her second work.

text: a self-narrated , blatantly lop-sided , cocky , nonchalant , fascinating and juicily entertaining documentary .
translation: 自己語りの、あからさまに偏った、自信満々で、無頓着で、魅力的で、じっくり楽しめるドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A self-telling, overtly biased, confidently crafted, nonchalant, charming, and thoroughly enjoyable documentary.

text: a heroic tale of persistence that is sure to win viewers ' hearts .
translation: 観る者の心を必ずつかむ、忍耐の英雄的な物語。
back_translation: A heroic story of patience that will undoubtedly capture the hearts of those who watch.

text: whe he misses a dose of prozium , a mind-altering drug that hinders emotion , preston , who has been trained to enforce the strict laws of the new regime , suddenly becomes the only person capable of overthrowing it .
translation: プロズィウムという感情を抑制する精神薬の投与を失ったとき、新政権の厳しい法律を施行するよう訓練されたプレストンは、突然その政権を覆す唯一の人物となる。
back_translation: When Preston, trained to enforce the strict laws of the new regime, loses the administration of a drug called Prozium that suppresses emotions, he suddenly becomes the only person capable of overthrowing that regime.

text: the result is mesmerizing -- filled with menace and squalor .
translation: 結果は魅惑的で、危険と不潔さに満ちています。
back_translation: The results are mesmerizing, filled with danger and filth.

text: pumpkin takes an admirable look at the hypocrisy of political correctness , but it does so with such an uneven tone that you never know when humor ends and tragedy begins .
translation: 「カボチャ」は政治的正しさの偽善を称賛する視点で捉えていますが、そのトーンが非常に不均一であるため、ユーモアが終わるときと悲劇が始まるときを決して知ることができません。
back_translation: "Pumpkin" is perceived from the perspective of praising the hypocrisy of political correctness, but due to its very uneven tone, one can never tell when the humor ends and the tragedy begins.

text: they gradually find themselves drawn to each other but , as their remarkable story plays out , the obstacles to their happiness prove all but insurmountable .
translation: 彼らは徐々に互いに惹かれていくが、彼らの素晴らしい物語が展開するにつれて、幸せへの障害はほとんど克服不可能であることが明らかになる。
back_translation: They gradually become attracted to each other, but as their wonderful story unfolds, it becomes clear that the obstacles to happiness are nearly insurmountable.

text: interviews in movie houses , on the street and in the homes of the subjects tell the story of each individual .
translation: 映画館や街中、そして被写体の家庭でのインタビューが、各個人の物語を語る。
back_translation: Interviews in movie theaters, the streets, and the subjects' homes tell the stories of each individual.

text: in the end , we go back to a bedroom , one we saw in the very first scene and realize that this story was actually being told by lucy to jess , the lawyer she 's been seeing , two weeks before lucy is scheduled to leave for the writing fellowship .
translation: 結局、私たちはベッドルームに戻ります。最初のシーンで見た部屋で、この物語が実際にはルーシーがジェスに語っていたものであることを理解します。ルーシーが作家奨学金のために出発する2週間前のことです。
back_translation: In the end, we return to the bedroom. In the room we saw in the first scene, we understand that this story is actually what Lucy was telling Jess. This is two weeks before Lucy departs for the writer's fellowship.

text: john leguizamo may be a dramatic actor -- just not in this movie .
translation: ジョン・レグイザモはドラマチックな俳優かもしれませんが、この映画ではそうではありません。
back_translation: John Leguizamo may be a dramatic actor, but he is not in this movie.

text: all of them have demoted the importance of the real world , giving all of their attention to the fantasy world of the movies .
translation: 彼らは皆、現実の重要性を軽視し、映画のファンタジー世界に全ての注意を向けています。
back_translation: They all underestimate the importance of reality and focus all their attention on the fantasy world of movies.

text: so when charlie sees mallory with her new boyfriend , curtis , he goes a bit mad .
translation: チャーリーがマロリーを彼氏のカーティスと一緒に見たとき、少し狂ったようになります。
back_translation: When Charlie saw Mallory with her boyfriend Curtis, he went a little crazy.

text: it winds up moving in many directions as it searches ( vainly , i think ) for something fresh to say .
translation: それは新しいことを言うために（無駄に、私は思う）多くの方向に動き回ることになります。
back_translation: This will involve moving around in many directions (unnecessarily, I think) to say something new.

text: the film delivers what it promises : a look at the `` wild ride `` that ensues when brash young men set out to conquer the online world with laptops , cell phones and sketchy business plans .
translation: 映画は約束されたものを提供します：派手な若者たちがノートパソコン、携帯電話、そして不確かなビジネスプランを使ってオンラインの世界を征服しようとする“ワイルドライド”を描いています。
back_translation: The movie offers something promised: a "wild ride" depicting flashy young people trying to conquer the online world using laptops, mobile phones, and uncertain business plans.

text: ever notice the similarities between steve `` the crocodile hunter `` irwin and boba fett ?
translation: スティーブ・“ワニハンター”・アーウィンとボバ・フェットの間の類似点に気づいたことはありますか？
back_translation: Have you noticed the similarities between Steve "Crocodile Hunter" Irwin and Boba Fett?

text: awash with melancholy and disillusionment , it 's a tall task to love hong kong .
translation: メランコリーと幻滅に溢れていて、香港を愛するのは大変な作業です。
back_translation: Loving Hong Kong is a difficult task, filled with melancholy and disappointment.

text: a collage of clichM-is and a dim echo of allusions to other films .
translation: クリシェのコラージュと他の映画へのぼんやりとした暗示の反響。
back_translation: The echoes of cliché collages and vague hints to other films.

text: an ambitious , serious film that manages to do virtually everything wrong ; sitting through it is something akin to an act of cinematic penance .
translation: 野心的で真剣な映画だが、ほぼすべてを間違えている。これを観ることは、映画的な贖罪のようなものだ。
back_translation: It's an ambitious and serious film, but it gets almost everything wrong. Watching it feels like a cinematic atonement.

text: obviously , a lot of people wasted a lot of their time ( including mine ) on something very inconsequential .
translation: 明らかに、多くの人が非常に重要でないことに多くの時間（私も含めて）を無駄にした。
back_translation: Clearly, many people (myself included) have wasted a lot of time on things that are not very important.

text: both they and their wives ami ( meredith salenger ) and claire ( tara westwood ) are dealing with the reality that they are no longer watching mtv , but instead find themselves flipping channels to vh1 .
translation: 彼らと彼らの妻、アミ（メレディス・サレンジャー）とクレア（ターラ・ウエストウッド）は、もはやMTVを見ていない現実に直面しており、代わりにVH1のチャンネルを次々と切り替えている。
back_translation: They, along with their wives, Ami (Meredith Salenger) and Claire (Tara Westwood), are facing the reality that they no longer watch MTV, and instead, they are switching between the VH1 channels one after another.

text: larry goldberg is the owner of a second-hand bookstore in amsterdam .
translation: ラリー・ゴールドバーグはアムステルダムにある古本屋のオーナーです。
back_translation: Larry Goldberg is the owner of a used bookstore in Amsterdam.

text: ultimately eve struggles with destiny in light of her new found love , rediscovery of homeland , and her sense of life 's purpose .
translation: 最終的に、イブは新たに見つけた愛、故郷の再発見、そして人生の目的に対する感覚の中で運命と闘います。
back_translation: Ultimately, Eve battles fate amid a newfound love, the rediscovery of her hometown, and a sense of purpose in life.

text: lessons abound for the students and teacher culminating in a reunion 25 years later .
translation: 学生と教師にとって教訓が豊富にあり、25年後の再会につながります。
back_translation: There are ample lessons for both students and teachers, leading to a reunion 25 years later.

text: what we have here is an examination of fathers , sons and sibling rivalry - squared and sideways
translation: ここで扱われているのは、父親、息子、そして兄弟間の競争についての検証です - 二重に、そして横一直線に。
back_translation: What is being addressed here is an examination of the competition between fathers, sons, and brothers - in a dual manner and in a horizontal line.

text: sean penn , you owe nicolas cage an apology .
translation: ショーン・ペン、あなたはニコラス・ケイジに謝罪するべきです。
back_translation: Sean Penn, you should apologize to Nicolas Cage.

text: the next big thing 's not-so-big ( and not-so-hot ) directorial debut .
translation: 次の大きな事は、それほど大きくない（そしてそれほど人気もない）監督デビューです。
back_translation: The next big thing is a directorial debut that is not that big (and not that popular either).

text: you really have to salute writer-director haneke ( he adapted elfriede jelinek 's novel ) for making a film that is n't nearly as graphic but much more powerful , brutally shocking and difficult to watch .
translation: あなたは本当に、作家兼監督のハネケに敬意を表するべきです（彼はエルフリーデ・イェリネクの小説を адаптしました）が、彼が作った映画は、あまりグラフィックではないものの、はるかに力強く、衝撃的で見続けるのが難しいものです。
back_translation: You really should pay respect to the writer and director Haneke (who adapted a novel by Elfriede Jelinek), but the films he created are much more powerful and shocking, making them difficult to watch, even if they are not very graphic.

text: [ hayek ] does n't just act frida , she inhabits her .
translation: [ハイエク]はフリーダを演じるだけでなく、彼女を体現している。
back_translation: Hayek not only plays Frida but embodies her.

text: a powerful , absorbing and thoroughly transporting film experience .
translation: 力強く、引き込まれ、完全に没入できる映画体験。
back_translation: A powerful, immersive, and completely absorbing movie experience.

text: does paint some memorable images . . . , but makhmalbaf keeps her distance from the characters
translation: 印象的なイメージを描くが、マクマルバフはキャラクターから距離を置いている。
back_translation: Although he paints an impressive image, McMulvay keeps his distance from the characters.

text: plays less like a coming-of-age romance than an infomercial .
translation: 青春のロマンよりも、インフォマーシャルのように感じる。
back_translation: It feels more like an infomercial than a romantic youth story.

text: i can easily imagine benigni 's pinocchio becoming a christmas perennial . coal is n't as easy to come by as it used to be and this would be a worthy substitute for naughty children 's stockings .
translation: 私は簡単にベニーニの『ピノキオ』がクリスマスの定番になる姿を想像できます。石炭は昔のように手に入れやすくないので、これはいたずらっ子の靴下の素晴らしい代わりになるでしょう。
back_translation: I can easily imagine Benini's "Pinocchio" becoming a Christmas classic. Since coal is harder to come by than it used to be, this would be a wonderful substitute for mischief-makers' stockings.

text: pc stability notwithstanding , the film suffers from a simplistic narrative and a pat , fairy-tale conclusion .
translation: PCの安定性にもかかわらず、映画は単純な物語と平凡なおとぎ話の結末に悩まされています。
back_translation: Despite the stability of the PC, the film suffers from a simple story and a mundane fairy tale ending.

text: older brothers and a brother-in-law are in his way .
translation: お兄さんたちと義理の兄が彼の邪魔をしています。
back_translation: My brothers and my stepbrother are getting in his way.

text: few films capture so perfectly the hopes and dreams of little boys on baseball fields as well as the grown men who sit in the stands .
translation: 野球場での小さな男の子たちの希望と夢、そして観客席に座る大人たちの姿をこれほど完璧に捉えた映画はほとんどありません。
back_translation: There are hardly any films that capture the hopes and dreams of little boys at the baseball field and the sight of adults sitting in the stands so perfectly.

text: john takes off , his trust in the system diminishing rapidly .
translation: ジョンは立ち去る、システムへの信頼が急速に失われていく。
back_translation: John leaves, rapidly losing trust in the system.

text: things turn dark as racism , paranoia , and the mistress come into play .
translation: 物事は暗転し、人種差別、偏執病、そして愛人が関わってくる。
back_translation: Things take a turn for the worse, involving racism, paranoia, and a mistress.

text: no ten & # 237 ; a que enfrentarse con la estrategia y potencia de un ej & # 233 ; rcito enemigo , sino con el jolgorio de grandes masas que invadir & # 237 ; an el territorio con panderetas , risotadas e histeria .
translation: 敵軍の戦略や力に対処するのではなく、大きな群衆の喧騒に直面し、彼らがパンデレタを持って笑い声やヒステリーで地域を侵略するのだ。
back_translation: Instead of dealing with the enemy's strategy and power, they face the noisy chaos of a large crowd, as they invade the area with laughter and hysteria while holding pandareta.

text: this means that his superiors hold him in high regard for his unblemished reputation and excellent track record .
translation: これは、彼の上司が彼の無傷の評判と優れた実績を高く評価していることを意味します。
back_translation: This means that his boss greatly values his unblemished reputation and excellent performance.

text: manages to be diverting while never falling into a morass of battlefield clichM-is .
translation: 戦場のクリシェに陥ることなく、楽しませることができる。
back_translation: It can entertain without falling into the clichés of the battlefield.

text: the documentary also describes the deployment era of the regulus submarines ( 1958-1964 ) .
translation: そのドキュメンタリーでは、レギュラス潜水艦の配備時代（1958年～1964年）についても説明しています。
back_translation: The documentary also explains the deployment era of the Regulus submarines (1958–1964).

text: despite all the talking , by the time the bloody climax arrives we still do n't feel enough of an attachment to these guys to care one way or another .
translation: すべての会話にもかかわらず、血まみれのクライマックスが訪れる頃には、私たちはこれらのキャラクターに対して十分な愛着を感じず、どうでもよくなってしまっている。
back_translation: Despite all the conversations, by the time the bloody climax arrives, we no longer feel enough attachment to these characters and end up not caring.

text: when they fall in love for the first time , it 's an impossible situation , because you ca n't just change your life overnight .
translation: 初めて恋に落ちたとき、それは不可能な状況です。なぜなら、一晩で人生を変えることはできないからです。
back_translation: When I first fell in love, it was an impossible situation. Because you can't change your life overnight.

text: the brothers chow nunn and chow lui 's giant computer company is facing a tense crisis - a powerful computer virus is rapidly wiping out their computer network .
translation: 兄弟のチャオ・ナンとチャオ・ルイの巨大コンピューター会社は緊迫した危機に直面しています - 強力なコンピュータウイルスが迅速に彼らのコンピュータネットワークを消滅させています。
back_translation: The brothers Chao Nan and Chao Rui's giant computer company is facing a severe crisis - a powerful computer virus is rapidly destroying their computer network.

text: he talks in her voice at the dinner table and wears her fur coat to bed .
translation: 彼は夕食のテーブルで彼女の声で話し、寝るときに彼女の毛皮のコートを着ます。
back_translation: He speaks in her voice at the dinner table and wears her fur coat when he goes to bed.

text: in this way , we will find space between these to fit smaller stones , our small necessities .
translation: このようにして、私たちはこれらの間に小さな石や私たちの小さな必要品を収めるスペースを見つけることができます。
back_translation: In this way, we can find space between these for small stones or our little necessities.

text: a squad of british soldiers on training in the lonesome scottish wilderness find a wounded special forces captain and the carnaged remains of his team .
translation: スコットランドの孤独な大自然で訓練中のイギリス軍の部隊が、負傷した特殊部隊のキャプテンと彼のチームの壊滅的な残骸を発見する。
back_translation: A British Army unit training in the lonely wilderness of Scotland discovers the devastating wreckage of a special forces captain and his team.

text: the story starts with phillips and a cohort robbing a store and injuring a salesperson .
translation: 物語は、フィリップスと仲間が店を襲い、店員を傷つけるところから始まります。
back_translation: The story begins with Phillips and his companions attacking a store and injuring the clerk.

text: majidi 's direction has never been smoother or more confident .
translation: マジディの演出はこれまでで最もスムーズで自信に満ちています。
back_translation: Majidi's direction is the smoothest and most confident we've seen so far.

text: bears about as much resemblance to the experiences of most battered women as spider-man does to the experiences of most teenagers .
translation: 大多数の虐待を受けた女性の経験とは、スパイダーマンが大多数のティーンエイジャーの経験に似ているほどのものです。
back_translation: The experiences of the majority of abused women are similar to those of most teenagers, like Spider-Man.

text: a lapp woman anni gives a shelter to both of them at her farm .
translation: ラップの女性アンニは、自分の農場で彼ら二人を受け入れています。
back_translation: The female rapper Annie is welcoming both of them to her farm.

text: after some time the son and daughter-in-law must depart , leaving the old man alone with his dreams and fading breath .
translation: しばらくして、息子と嫁は去らなければならず、老父は夢と衰えゆく息を抱えて一人残される。
back_translation: After a while, the son and daughter-in-law must leave, and the elderly father is left alone, holding onto dreams and the fading breath of life.

text: fisher has bared his soul and confronted his own shortcomings here in a way . . . that feels very human and very true to life .
translation: フィッシャーはここで自分の魂をさらけ出し、自身の欠点に向き合っています。それはとても人間的で、人生にとても真実味があります。
back_translation: Fischer lays bare his soul here and confronts his own flaws. It is very human and feels very authentic to life.

text: two hard-boiled detectives ( blair brown and joe grifasi ) and an oddball pathologist ( dylan baker ) investigate a severed hand found in a laundromat - and the results are n't pretty . . .
translation: 二人のハードボイルド探偵（ブレア・ブラウンとジョー・グリファシ）と1人の変わり者の病理学者（ダイラン・ベイカー）が、コインランドリーで見つかった切断された手を調査しますが、その結果は良くありません。。。
back_translation: Two hard-boiled detectives (Blair Brown and Joe Grifasi) and one eccentric pathologist (Dylan Baker) investigate a severed hand found in a laundromat, but the results are not good...

text: it offers an important lesson about how a supposedly simple disagreement can get so far out of hand that lives are lost .
translation: それは、表面的には単純な意見の不一致がどのようにして手に負えないほど深刻になり、命が失われる事態に至るかについて重要な教訓を提供しています。
back_translation: It provides an important lesson on how a seemingly simple disagreement can escalate to an unmanageable level and lead to the loss of life.

text: there 's not a spark of new inspiration in it , just more of the same , done with noticeably less energy and imagination .
translation: 新しいインスピレーションのひらめきはまったくなく、同じことの繰り返しで、明らかにエネルギーと想像力が少なくなっています。
back_translation: I have no new bursts of inspiration at all; it feels like a repetition of the same thing, and it's clear that there is a lack of energy and imagination.

text: with some help from otis and the paddy wagon 's quirky regulars , among them an angry war vet in a parrot costume and a traveling salesman with a `` small `` problem , mark finally gets what he deserves .
translation: オーティスとパディワゴンの風変わりな常連たち、怒った退役軍人のオウムのコスチュームを着た人や「小さな」問題を抱えた行商人たちの助けを借りて、マークはついに自分が受けるべきものを手に入れる。
back_translation: With the help of the quirky regulars at Otis and Paddy Wagon, including a man dressed in a parrot costume representing an angry veteran and peddlers with "little" problems, Mark finally gets what he deserves.

text: an authentically vague , but ultimately purposeless , study in total pandemonium .
translation: 真正に曖昧で、最終的には目的のない、完全な混乱の中の研究。
back_translation: Research that is truly ambiguous and ultimately purposeless, amidst complete chaos.

text: an overly familiar scenario is made fresh by an intelligent screenplay and gripping performances in this low-budget , video-shot , debut indie effort .
translation: 過度に馴染み深いシナリオは、知的な脚本と魅力的な演技によって新鮮に生まれ変わる、この低予算のビデオ撮影によるデビューインディー作品。
back_translation: An overly familiar scenario is revitalized through an intelligent script and captivating performances in this low-budget video debut indie project.

text: living in a beach shack with three roommates including her rebellious younger sister , she is up before dawn every morning to conquer the waves and count the days until the pipe masters surf competition .
translation: 彼女は、反抗的な妹を含む3人のルームメイトと一緒にビーチ小屋に住んでおり、毎朝夜明け前に起きて波に挑み、パイプマスターズサーフコンペティションまでの日数を数えています。
back_translation: She lives in a beach hut with three roommates, including her rebellious younger sister, and gets up before dawn every morning to tackle the waves while counting down the days until the Pipe Masters Surf Competition.

text: a superbly acted and funny/gritty fable of the humanizing of one woman at the hands of the unseen forces of fate .
translation: 目に見えない運命の力によって、一人の女性が人間らしさを取り戻していくという、素晴らしい演技とユーモア/ gritty を兼ね備えた寓話。
back_translation: A wonderful fable that combines superb acting and humor/grittiness, in which a woman regains her humanity through the invisible power of fate.

text: `` my dinner with ovitz `` is a pithy , yet epicurean tale of broken dreams , broken hollywood power brokers ( and broken knees ) .
translation: 「オヴィッツとの夕食」は、壊れた夢、壊れたハリウッドの権力者たち（そして壊れた膝）についての簡潔でありながら美食的な物語です。
back_translation: "Dining with Oviitz" is a concise yet gourmet tale about broken dreams, shattered Hollywood power brokers (and broken knees).

text: despite the fact that this film was n't as bad as i thought it was going to be , it 's still not a good movie
translation: この映画は思っていたほど悪くはなかったが、それでも良い映画ではない。
back_translation: This movie wasn't as bad as I had expected, but it still isn't a good movie.

text: an interesting , if not entirely successful , biography of two extraordinary personalities .
translation: 非常に興味深い、完全に成功したとは言えない二人の卓越した人物の伝記です。
back_translation: This is a very interesting biography of two outstanding individuals who cannot be said to have completely succeeded.

text: lacking gravitas , macdowell is a placeholder for grief , and ergo this sloppy drama is an empty vessel . leave these flowers unpicked -- they 're dead on the vine .
translation: 重みを欠いたマクダウェルは悲しみの代用品であり、したがってこのずさんなドラマは空虚な器です。この花は摘まないでください -- すでに蔓の上で枯れてしまっています。
back_translation: The weightless McDowell is a substitute for sadness, and therefore this careless drama is an empty vessel. Please do not pick this flower -- it has already withered on the vine.

text: now that the tong and their drug cartel know who he is they will stop at nothing to kill robert to protect their own corrupt interests .
translation: トンと彼らの麻薬カルテルが彼が誰であるかを知った今、彼らは自分たちの腐敗した利益を守るためにロバートを殺すことを何としても諦めないだろう。
back_translation: Now that the cartel knows who he is, they will not give up on killing Robert by any means to protect their corrupt profits.

text: writer-director stephen gaghan has made the near-fatal mistake of being what the english call 'too clever by half . '
translation: 作家兼監督のスティーブン・ギャハンは、イギリス人が「半分賢すぎる」と呼ぶような致命的なミスを犯してしまった。
back_translation: The writer and director Stephen Gaghan made a fatal mistake that the British would refer to as being "half too clever."

text: there is the mother and the father , who do n't seem to have a normal marriage anymore , there 's the daughter , lena , who has a disease and will soon leave the house for medical treatment in switzerland , and her husband harry , who has a mysterious past .
translation: 母親と父親がいて、もはや通常の結婚生活を送っていないようです。娘のレナは病気を抱えており、まもなくスイスでの治療のために家を出る予定です。そして、彼女の夫ハリーは神秘的な過去を持っています。
back_translation: It seems that the mother and father are no longer leading a typical married life. Their daughter Lena is facing illness and is scheduled to leave home soon for treatment in Switzerland. Meanwhile, her husband Harry has a mysterious past.

text: lawrence should stick to his day job . he 's a better actor than a standup comedian .
translation: ローレンスは本業に専念すべきだ。彼はスタンドアップコメディアンよりも良い俳優だ。
back_translation: Lawrence should focus on his main career. He is a better actor than a stand-up comedian.

text: dildo diaries takes a lighthearted but 'probing ' approach to exploring the development of sections of the texas penal code and its effects on the adult sex toy industry .
translation: ディルド日記は、テキサス刑法の一部の発展とそれが成人向けセックスおもちゃ産業に与える影響を探るために、軽妙ながら「掘り下げる」アプローチを取っています。
back_translation: The Dildo Diary takes a lighthearted yet "in-depth" approach to exploring the development of certain aspects of Texas criminal law and its impact on the adult sex toy industry.

text: it 's almost impossible not to be moved by the movie 's depiction of sacrifice and its stirring epilogue in post-soviet russia .
translation: 映画の犠牲の描写と、ポストソビエトロシアにおける感動的なエピローグには、感動しないことがほぼ不可能です。
back_translation: It is almost impossible not to be moved by the depiction of sacrifice in the film and the touching epilogue set in post-Soviet Russia.

text: slowly but surely devolves into a fascinating , cringe-inducing portrait of cultural solipsism , climaxing in an emotional meltdown that would n't look out of place in mid-period cassavetes .
translation: ゆっくりとしかし確実に、文化的な独りよがりの魅力的で不快な肖像に進展し、ミッド・ピリオドのカサヴェテスにおいて異質に見えない感情的なメルトダウンに達する。
back_translation: Slowly but surely, it progresses into a culturally self-indulgent, captivating yet unpleasant portrait, reaching an emotionally charged meltdown that does not seem out of place in mid-period Cassavetes.

text: the first shocking thing about sorority boys is that it 's actually watchable . even more baffling is that it 's funny .
translation: ソロリティボーイの最初の衝撃的なことは、実際に見ることができるということです。さらに驚くべきことに、それが面白いということです。
back_translation: The most shocking thing about Sorority Boy is that you can actually see it. Even more surprisingly, it’s funny.

text: the hunt is on as the killers ruthlessly stalk the teacher and students through the school 's halls and classrooms , while lamb tracks them on the surveillance cameras , turning the school 's security system against his prey .
translation: 狩りが始まった。殺人者たちは容赦なく教師や生徒を学校の廊下や教室で追い詰め、ラムは監視カメラで彼らを追跡し、学校のセキュリティシステムを獲物に対して逆手に取る。
back_translation: The hunt has begun. The killers relentlessly corner teachers and students in the school hallways and classrooms, while Ram tracks them using surveillance cameras, turning the school's security system against the prey.

text: a `` home alone `` film that is staged like `` rosemary 's baby , `` but is not as well-conceived as either of those films .
translation: 「ホームアローン」を「ローズマリーの赤ちゃん」のように演出した映画ですが、どちらの映画ほどよく考えられてはいません。
back_translation: It is a movie that is styled like "Rosemary's Baby", but it is not as well thought out as either film.

text: you may feel compelled to watch the film twice or pick up a book on the subject .
translation: あなたはその映画を二度見ることに駆り立てられたり、そのテーマに関する本を手に取ったりするかもしれません。
back_translation: You may be compelled to watch that movie twice or pick up a book on its themes.

text: here , adrian lyne comes as close to profundity as he is likely to get .
translation: ここで、エイドリアン・ラインは彼が達成できるかもしれない深淵さに近づいています。
back_translation: Here, Adrian Lyne is approaching the depth he may be able to achieve.

text: then , he must take the money from the e sale to the industrial district where a drunken old gun runner makes him hide in the closet when he gets a visitor then he takes the gun to a modern day opium den where t-mon , a spaced out pimp , can not get a card trick right .
translation: それから、彼はeセールから得たお金を工業地区に持って行かなければならない。そこで酔っぱらった古い武器商人が彼をクローゼットに隠れさせる。来客があると彼はその銃を現代のアヘン窟に持って行き、そこでトン、空っぽのポン引きがカードトリックをうまくいかせない。
back_translation: After that, he has to take the money he earned from the e-sale to the industrial district. There, a drunken old arms dealer hides him in a closet. When visitors arrive, he takes the gun to a modern opium den, where Tong, the empty-minded pimp, fails to successfully pull off a card trick.

text: will amuse and provoke adventurous adults in specialty venues .
translation: 特別な場所で冒険心旺盛な大人たちを楽しませ、刺激するでしょう。
back_translation: It will entertain and stimulate adventurous adults in a special place.

text: a master at being everybody but himself he reveals to his friend and confidant saiid ( isa totah ) the truth behind his struggles .
translation: 彼は自分以外のすべての人になることが得意であり、友人であり confidant であるサイード（イーサ・トタ）に自分の苦闘の背後にある真実を明かします。
back_translation: He is skilled at becoming everyone except himself and reveals the truth behind his struggles to his friend and confidant, Saeed (Iisa Tota).

text: simon , an angel sent by god shows jordan a clear path .
translation: 神によって送られた天使サイモンは、ジョーダンに明確な道を示します。
back_translation: The angel Simon, sent by God, shows Jordan a clear path.

text: george , a handsome english knight , unsettled by the horrendous bloodletting he witnessed in palestine , desires to hang up his sword and settle down to a quiet , peaceful life .
translation: イケメンのイギリスの騎士ジョージは、パレスチナで目の当たりにした恐ろしい流血に動揺し、剣を置いて静かで平和な生活を送りたいと願っています。
back_translation: The handsome British knight George, disturbed by the terrible bloodshed he witnessed in Palestine, wishes to lay down his sword and lead a quiet, peaceful life.

text: possibly not since grumpy old men have i heard a film so solidly connect with one demographic while striking out with another .
translation: 「不機嫌な老男たち」以来、特定の層にこれほど強く結びつきながら、別の層にはまったく響かなかった映画を聞いたことがない。
back_translation: "I have never heard of a film that is so strongly connected to a specific group while not resonating at all with another group since 'The Grumpy Old Men'."

text: in the story , he is weary of being kept within the walls of his father 's ( and soon to be his ) kingdom .
translation: 物語の中で、彼は父の（そしてすぐに自分の）王国の壁の中に閉じ込められていることに疲れています。
back_translation: In the story, he is tired of being trapped within the walls of his father's (and soon his own) kingdom.

text: interacting eyeball-to-eyeball and toe-to-toe , hopkins and norton are a winning combination -- but fiennes steals 'red dragon ' right from under their noses .
translation: 目と目、つま先とつま先を合わせて交流するホプキンズとノートンは、勝利の組み合わせですが、ファインズは「レッド・ドラゴン」を彼らの目の前から奪ってしまいます。
back_translation: Hopkins and Norton, who connect with their eyes and toes, make a winning combination, but Fiennes snatches "Red Dragon" right from under their noses.

text: you 'll just have your head in your hands wondering why lee 's character did n't just go to a bank manager and save everyone the misery .
translation: あなたは、リーのキャラクターがどうして銀行の支店長に行かなかったのか、みんなを苦しみから救えたのにと、頭を抱えて不思議に思うでしょう。
back_translation: You might wonder why Lee's character didn't go to the bank branch, even though he could have saved everyone from suffering.

text: he is intelligent and has a sense of humour .
translation: 彼は知的でユーモアのセンスがあります。
back_translation: He is intelligent and has a sense of humor.

text: while being led away , some re-agent falls from his pocket where it is picked up by a young man that was camping nearby .
translation: 連れて行かれながら、彼のポケットから試薬が落ち、それを近くでキャンプをしていた若い男が拾う。
back_translation: While being taken away, a reagent falls from his pocket, and a young man who was camping nearby picks it up.

text: director nalin pan does n't do much to weigh any arguments one way or the other . he simply presents his point of view that ayurveda works . no question .
translation: 監督のナリン・パンは、どちらの主張にも多くの重みを置くことはしません。彼は単にアーユルヴェーダが効果的であるという自分の見解を示すだけです。疑いの余地はありません。
back_translation: Director Nalin Panh does not place much weight on either claim. He simply presents his view that Ayurveda is effective. There is no doubt about it.

text: caught in this battle of wills is clara 's daughter , victoria , who finds she is about to be married into the same faith that murdered her father .
translation: この意志の戦いに巻き込まれているのはクララの娘、ビクトリアであり、彼女は父を殺したのと同じ信仰に嫁ぐことになることを知ります。
back_translation: The one caught up in this battle of wills is Clara's daughter, Victoria, and she realizes that she will marry into the same faith that killed her father.

text: isabel intends for her family to go to istanbul , the only place where jews can live freely , but clara is reluctant to leave .
translation: イスラベルは家族をイスタンブールに行かせるつもりだ。そこはユダヤ人が自由に暮らせる唯一の場所だが、クララは離れることに気が進まない。
back_translation: Isabel plans to send her family to Istanbul. It is the only place where Jews can live freely, but Clara is reluctant to leave.

text: { esther buffy } a young vibrant chinese american female who desperately tries to please her strict parents along the way of trying to find herself .
translation: {エスター・バフィ } 自分を見つけようと努力しながら、厳格な親を喜ばせようと必死になる若く活気に満ちた中華系アメリカ人女性。
back_translation: Esther Buffie is a young, vibrant Chinese American woman who is desperately trying to please her strict parents while striving to find herself.

text: they carry out a sentence pronounced by rule of law .
translation: 彼らは法の支配によって言い渡された判決を執行します。
back_translation: They will enforce the judgment issued under the rule of law.

text: you have enough finely tuned acting to compensate for the movie 's failings .
translation: 映画の欠点を補うだけの細やかに調整された演技があなたにはあります。
back_translation: You have meticulously adjusted acting that compensates for the shortcomings of the film.

text: the longer one watches this determinedly ragged portrait of blue-collar teenage desperation . . . the more one gets absorbed in the utter unbridled nihilism of its 'characters . '
translation: この決意に満ちたぼろぼろのブルーカラーのティーンエイジャーの絶望の肖像を長く見れば見るほど、その「キャラクター」の全く抑制のない虚無主義に引き込まれていく。
back_translation: The longer I stare at this portrait of despair featuring a tattered blue-collar teenager filled with resolve, the more I am drawn into the completely unrestrained nihilism of this "character."

text: there are moments in this account of the life of artist frida kahlo that are among cinema 's finest this year . unfortunately , they 're sandwiched in between the most impossibly dry account of kahlo 's life imaginable .
translation: このフリーダ・カーロの人生を描いた作品には、今年の映画の中でも最高の瞬間があります。しかし、残念ながら、それはカーロの人生についての信じられないほど乾燥した説明の間に挟まれています。
back_translation: This work depicting the life of Frida Kahlo contains some of the best moments of this year's films. However, unfortunately, these are interspersed between incredibly dry explanations about Kahlo's life.

text: his search soon sends him down a dangerous path . . .
translation: 彼の探求はすぐに彼を危険な道へと導く。。。
back_translation: His quest soon leads him down a dangerous path...

text: but when those worlds collide , taking the lives of his wife and younger son , sullivan and his surviving son , michael jr . , leave their sedate home life behind and embark on a startling journey of revenge .
translation: しかし、その世界が衝突し、彼の妻と幼い息子の命を奪ったとき、サリバンと彼の生き残った息子マイケル・ジュニアは静かな家庭生活を後にし、驚くべき復讐の旅に出る。
back_translation: However, when that world collided and took the lives of his wife and young son, Sullivan and his surviving son Michael Jr. left their quiet family life behind and embarked on a remarkable journey of revenge.

text: when you find yourself rooting for the monsters in a horror movie , you know the picture is in trouble .
translation: ホラー映画でモンスターを応援している自分に気づいたとき、その作品には問題があることがわかる。
back_translation: When I realized I was rooting for the monster in a horror movie, I understood that there was something wrong with that work.

text: like its title character , this nicholas nickleby finds itself in reduced circumstances -- and , also like its hero , it remains brightly optimistic , coming through in the end .
translation: そのタイトルキャラクターのように、この『ニコラス・ニクルビー』は困難な状況に置かれていますが、主人公と同様に明るく楽観的であり、最終的には成功を収めます。
back_translation: Like the title character, this "Nicholas Nickleby" is placed in difficult situations, but is bright and optimistic just like the protagonist, and ultimately achieves success.

text: swiftly deteriorates into a terribly obvious melodrama and rough-hewn vanity project for lead actress andie macdowell .
translation: 急速にひどく明白なメロドラマと主演女優アニー・マクダウェルの粗野な自己満足プロジェクトに堕してしまう。
back_translation: It rapidly descends into a painfully obvious melodrama and a rough self-indulgent project by leading actress Andie MacDowell.

text: in addition , the detective has to deal with a serial killer who had already killed and mutilated many women .
translation: さらに、探偵はすでに多くの女性を殺害し、 mutilate した連続殺人犯に対処しなければならない。
back_translation: Furthermore, the detective must confront a serial killer who has already murdered and mutilated many women.

text: a compelling allegory about the last days of germany 's democratic weimar republic .
translation: ドイツの民主的バイマル共和国の最後の日々に関する魅力的な隠喩。
back_translation: An intriguing metaphor about the last days of Germany's democratic Weimar Republic.

text: just on the other side of thirty , dave is an unemployed sculptor clumsily going nowhere in a small town .
translation: 三十のちょうど反対側にいるデイブは、小さな町で不器用にどこにも行けない失業中の彫刻家です。
back_translation: Dave, who is exactly on the opposite side of thirty, is an unemployed sculptor in a small town who awkwardly can't go anywhere.

text: it gets bogged down by hit-and-miss topical humour before getting to the truly good stuff .
translation: それは本当に良い部分に到達する前に、当たったり外れたりするテーマのユーモアに足を取られます。
back_translation: It gets caught up in the humor of themes that hit or miss before reaching the really good parts.

text: the film boasts dry humor and jarring shocks , plus moments of breathtaking mystery .
translation: その映画はドライなユーモアと衝撃的な驚き、さらに息をのむようなミステリーの瞬間を誇っています。
back_translation: The movie features dry humor, shocking surprises, and breathtaking moments of mystery.

text: the four feathers is definitely horse feathers , but if you go in knowing that , you might have fun in this cinematic sandbox .
translation: 「四つの羽根」は確かに馬の羽毛ですが、それを理解した上で観ると、この映画のサンドボックスで楽しむことができるかもしれません。
back_translation: "The four feathers" are indeed horse feathers, but if you understand that, you might be able to enjoy playing in this movie's sandbox.

text: there 's not a fresh idea at the core of this tale .
translation: この物語の核心には新鮮なアイデアはありません。
back_translation: There are no fresh ideas at the core of this story.

text: this attractive , 30 year old successful graphic designer with a captivating personality has n't had a good date in over a year , and she 's not alone - her best friends share the same problem .
translation: 魅力的な30歳の成功したグラフィックデザイナーで、魅力的な性格を持つ彼女は、1年以上も良いデートを経験しておらず、彼女だけではない - 彼女の親友たちも同じ問題を抱えている。
back_translation: A charming 30-year-old successful graphic designer with an attractive personality, she hasn't been on a good date in over a year, and it's not just her - her close friends are facing the same issue.

text: undercover fbi agent and former marine frank castle ( jane ) is devastated when his wife and children are killed when they accidentally witness a mafia hit , and with nothing left to lose , decides to dedicate himself fully to the eradication of crime ( organized and otherwise ) from america , as an army , assassin , judge and jury all rolled up into one man ( and a whole lot of guns ) : the punisher .
translation: 潜入捜査官で元海兵隊員のフランク・キャッスル（ジェーン）は、妻と子供たちがマフィアの暗殺を偶然目撃したことで命を奪われ、何も失うものがなくなった彼は、アメリカから犯罪（組織犯罪やその他の犯罪）を根絶することに全力を尽くすことを決意する。彼は、1人の男（そして大量の銃）として、軍隊、 assassins（暗殺者）、判事、陪審員の役割を兼ね備えた存在である「ザ・パニッシャー」となる。
back_translation: Undercover officer and former Marine Frank Castle (Jane) has lost his wife and children after they accidentally witnessed a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose, he is determined to make every effort to eradicate crime (organized crime and other felonies) from America. As a one-man army (and armed with an arsenal of guns), he becomes "The Punisher," embodying the roles of military, assassins, judges, and juries.

text: it 's thoroughly entertaining and nonpatronizing , and occasionally even insightful .
translation: それは徹底的に面白く、押し付けがましくなく、時には洞察に満ちてさえいます。
back_translation: It is thoroughly interesting, not pushy, and at times even insightful.

text: a minor film with major pleasures from portuguese master manoel de oliviera . . .
translation: ポルトガルの巨匠マノエル・デ・オリベイラによる小さな映画だが、大きな喜びを与えてくれる。
back_translation: It is a small film by the Portuguese master Manoel de Oliveira, but it brings great joy.

text: vega and ulloa give strong performances as the leading lovers and there are some strong supporting turns , particularly from najwa nimri .
translation: ベガとウジョアは主演の恋人役として強い演技を見せており、特にナジワ・ニムリからは強力なサポートの演技があります。
back_translation: Vega and Ujoa deliver strong performances as the lead romantic couple, particularly with powerful supporting performances from Najwa Nimri.

text: despite the holes in the story and the somewhat predictable plot , moments of the movie caused me to jump in my chair . . .
translation: 物語の穴ややや予測可能なプロットにもかかわらず、映画の瞬間には思わず椅子から飛び跳ねてしまうような場面がありました。
back_translation: Despite the holes in the story and the somewhat predictable plot, there were moments in the movie that made me jump out of my seat.

text: when he finds out she is gay he starts to do his homework .
translation: 彼が彼女がゲイであることを知ると、彼は宿題を始める。
back_translation: When he learns that she is gay, he starts his homework.

text: it 's difficult to imagine the process that produced such a script , but here 's guessing that spray cheese and underarm noises played a crucial role .
translation: そのような脚本を生み出すプロセスを想像するのは難しいですが、スプレーチーズと脇の音が重要な役割を果たしたと推測します。
back_translation: It is difficult to imagine the process of creating such a script, but I assume that spray cheese and the sound of armpits played an important role.

text: for decades we 've marveled at disney 's rendering of water , snow , flames and shadows in a hand-drawn animated world . prepare to marvel again .
translation: 何十年もの間、私たちはディズニーの手描きアニメーションの世界における水、雪、炎、影の描写に驚嘆してきました。再び驚嘆する準備をしてください。
back_translation: For decades, we have been amazed by the depiction of water, snow, fire, and shadows in the world of Disney's hand-drawn animation. Get ready to be amazed once again.

text: whistle completes the trilogy started in from here to eternity and the thin red line .
translation: ホイッスルは、「ここから永遠へ」と「薄い赤い線」で始まった三部作を完結させます。
back_translation: The whistle concludes the trilogy that began with "From Here to Eternity" and "A Thin Red Line."

text: when anti-death-penalty activist david gale is convicted and condemned to death for the murder of a colleague , reporter bitsey bloom sets out to learn the story behind gale 's crime .
translation: 反死刑の活動家デビッド・ゲイルが同僚の murder（殺人）で有罪判決を受け、死刑が宣告されると、記者のビッツィー・ブルームはゲイルの犯罪の背後にある物語を明らかにしようとします。
back_translation: Anti-death penalty activist David Gale is sentenced to death after being convicted of the murder of a colleague, and journalist Bitzy Bloom tries to uncover the story behind Gale's crime.

text: a captivatingly quirky hybrid of character portrait , romantic comedy and beat-the-clock thriller .
translation: 魅力的で風変わりなキャラクターポートレート、ロマンティックコメディ、そして時間との闘いのスリラーのハイブリッド。
back_translation: An attractive and quirky character portrait, a romantic comedy, and a hybrid thriller battling against time.

text: they all decide to go together and they leave .
translation: 彼らはみんな一緒に行くことを決めて、出発しました。
back_translation: They all decided to go together and set off.

text: the family come from a long line of masters of disguise who are able to mask themselves as almost anyone or anything by harnessing the great power of energico .
translation: その家族は、エネルジコの大きな力を利用してほぼ誰でも何にでも変身できる変装の達人の長い系譜から来ています。
back_translation: That family comes from a long lineage of masters of disguise who can transform almost anyone into anything using the great power of Enerjiko.

text: if we do n't demand a standard of quality for the art that we choose , we deserve the trash that we get .
translation: 私たちが選ぶアートに対して品質の基準を求めなければ、私たちは手に入れるゴミにふさわしいです。
back_translation: If we do not demand quality standards for the art we choose, we deserve the garbage we end up with.

text: the corrupt wizard saruman ( christopher lee ) , under the power of the dark lord sauron , and his slimy assistant , gr & # 237 ; ma wormtongue ( brad dourif ) , have created a grand uruk-hai army bent on the destruction of man and middle-earth .
translation: 腐敗した魔法使いサルマン（クリストファー・リー）は、暗黒の君主サウロンの力のもと、彼のずる賢い助手グリーマ・ワームトング（ブラッド・ドゥーリフ）と共に、人類と中つ国の破壊を目的とした壮大なウルク＝ハイ軍を創り出しました。
back_translation: The corrupted wizard Saruman (Christopher Lee), under the power of the dark lord Sauron, created a grand army of Uruk-hai aimed at the destruction of humanity and Middle-earth, along with his cunning assistant Gríma Wormtongue (Brad Dourif).

text: everything about the quiet american is good , except its timing .
translation: 『静かなアメリカ人』に関するすべては良いが、タイミングだけは別である。
back_translation: Everything about "The Quiet American" is good, but the timing is different.

text: sandler has played weirdos for zany comic effect , and it 's interesting to finally see him play one in a relatively subdued romantic dramedy .
translation: サンドラーはコミカルな効果を狙って変わり者の役を演じてきましたが、比較的控えめなロマンティック・ドラマコメディで彼がその役を演じるのを見るのは興味深いです。
