back_translation: Sandler has played quirky characters for comedic effect, but it is interesting to see him take on that role in a relatively understated romantic dramedy.

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year . as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: デリア、グレタ、そしてポーラは、今年最も多層的で共感を呼ぶ女性キャラクターの三人としてランク付けされます。彼女たちがそれぞれ自分の居場所を探す中で、ミラーは彼女たちの心に深く入り込み、瞬きせず、欠点のある人間性を見出します。
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula are ranked as the three most multi-layered and relatable female characters of the year. As they each search for their place, Mira deeply enters their hearts, finding humanity in its flawed state without blinking.

text: little does caroline realize that this delicious parisian beauty is a modern-day vampire looking for vunerable victims .
translation: キャロラインは、この美味しいパリの美女が現代の吸血鬼で、弱い犠牲者を探していることに気づいていない。
back_translation: Caroline is unaware that this beautiful Parisian woman is a modern vampire, searching for weak victims.

text: not a bad way to spend a couple of hours .
translation: 数時間を過ごすのに悪くない方法です。
back_translation: It's not a bad way to spend a few hours.

text: nothing more than a widget cranked out on an assembly line to see if stupid americans will get a kick out of goofy brits with cute accents performing ages-old slapstick and unfunny tricks .
translation: アメリカの愚かな人々が可愛いアクセントで古典的なスラップスティックや面白くないトリックを行うイギリス人を楽しむかどうかを調べるために、組み立てラインで作られたただのウィジェットに過ぎない。
back_translation: It is just a widget made on an assembly line to see if foolish Americans enjoy British people performing classic slapstick and unfunny tricks with a cute accent.

text: just too silly and sophomoric to ensnare its target audience .
translation: あまりにもくだらなくて幼稚で、ターゲットオーディエンスを引き込むことができない。
back_translation: It's too trivial and childish, failing to engage the target audience.

text: when it 's over all that they got is a bag full of black gems which is what the man who hired them wanted .
translation: 終わったとき、彼らが手に入れたのは黒い宝石が詰まったバッグだけで、それが彼らを雇った男の望んでいたものだった。
back_translation: When it was over, all they obtained was a bag filled with black jewels, which was exactly what the man who hired them had wanted.

text: the elders hope to return home quickly but their new friend has other plans .
translation: Elderたちは早く帰りたいと願っているが、彼らの新しい友人は別の計画を持っている。
back_translation: The elders want to go home quickly, but their new friends have different plans.

text: it is survival of the fittest as the friendships are pushed to the limit .
translation: 友情が限界に押しやられる中、強者生存の法則が働いています。
back_translation: As friendship is pushed to its limits, the law of survival of the fittest is at work.

text: the film fits into a genre that has been overexposed , redolent of a thousand cliches , and yet remains uniquely itself , vibrant with originality .
translation: その映画は過剰に露出されたジャンルにフィットしており、千のクリシェを思わせるものの、独自性を保ちながら、オリジナリティに満ちています。
back_translation: The movie fits into an overly exposed genre and evokes a thousand clichés, yet it maintains its uniqueness and is full of originality.

text: una works as a supermarket cashier hating her work and everybody around : the costumers , the manager , the staff .
translation: ウナはスーパーマーケットのキャッシャーとして働いていますが、仕事や周りの人々、顧客、マネージャー、スタッフを嫌っています。
back_translation: Una works as a cashier at a supermarket, but she dislikes her job, the people around her, the customers, the manager, and the staff.

text: amerika and zed are upset that kyle is spending more time with trasha than with them .
translation: アメリカとゼッドはカイルが彼らよりもトラッシャと過ごす時間が多いことに upset しています。
back_translation: America and Zed are upset that Kyle spends more time with Trasher than with them.

text: the raw footage gives us an alternate insight to chaplin 's classic film which started production years before adolph hitler was seen as a major threat in the western world .
translation: その生の映像は、アドルフ・ヒトラーが西洋世界において主要な脅威と見なされる数年前に製作が始まったチャップリンのクラシック映画に対する別の洞察を提供します。
back_translation: The raw footage provides another insight into Chaplin's classic film, which began production a few years before Adolf Hitler was considered a major threat in the Western world.

text: the orchestra player gets known to his neighbour , a gay man having also relationship troubles , and together they are trying hard to find a way how to go on with their lifes .
translation: オーケストラの奏者は隣人であるゲイの男性と知り合い、彼もまた恋愛に問題を抱えており、二人は一緒にどのように人生を続けていくかを見つけようと奮闘しています。
back_translation: The orchestra musician becomes acquainted with his gay neighbor, who also has problems in love, and together they struggle to find a way to continue their lives.

text: roger swanson is a hopelessly cynical advertising copywriter with a razor-sharp wit who believes he has mastered the art of manipulating women .
translation: ロジャー・スワンソンは、女性を操る技術を習得したと信じている切れ味鋭いウィットを持つ絶望的に皮肉な広告コピーライターです。
back_translation: Roger Swanson is a desperately ironic advertising copywriter with a sharp wit who believes he has mastered the art of manipulating women.

text: if divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood suffers from a ploddingly melodramatic structure , it comes to life in the performances .
translation: 「ディバイン・シークレット・オブ・ザ・ヤーヤ・シスターフッド」が冗長なメロドラマ的構造に悩まされているとしても、演技によって生き生きとします。
back_translation: "Even though 'Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood' suffers from a redundant melodramatic structure, it comes alive through its performances."

text: an overblown clunker full of bad jokes , howling cliches and by-the-numbers action sequences .
translation: 悪ふざけの冗談、陳腐なクリシェ、そして型どおりのアクションシーケンスで満ちた、過剰な駄作。
back_translation: An excessive piece of junk filled with bad jokes, clichéd tropes, and formulaic action sequences.

text: she meets ian miller , a high school english teacher , wasp , and dreamboat she had made a fool of herself over at the restaurant ; they date secretly for a while before her family finds out .
translation: 彼女は高校の英語教師であるイアン・ミラーに出会い、彼に夢中になったレストランで自分を馬鹿にしてしまった。彼らはしばらく秘密裏にデートを続けたが、彼女の家族がそれを知ってしまう。
back_translation: She met Ian Miller, a high school English teacher, and became infatuated with him after he made a fool of her at a restaurant. They continued to date secretly for a while, but her family eventually found out about it.

text: a very slow , uneventful ride around a pretty tattered old carousel .
translation: とても遅く、何も起こらない、ぼろぼろの古いメリーゴーランドの周りの乗り物。
back_translation: Very slow, with nothing happening, the worn-out old carousel and its accompanying rides.

text: his first challenge is from the chinese workers , technicians , and officers , who have been trained to work under the old system and unable to function sufficiently in the new era of international competition .
translation: 彼の最初の課題は、旧体制の下で訓練を受け、新しい国際競争の時代に十分に機能できない中国の労働者、技術者、官僚から来ています。
back_translation: His first challenge comes from Chinese workers, engineers, and bureaucrats who were trained under the old regime and are unable to function adequately in the new era of international competition.

text: if your taste runs to 'difficult ' films you absolutely ca n't miss it .
translation: もしあなたの好みが「難解な」映画に向いているなら、絶対に見逃してはいけません。
back_translation: If your taste leans towards "challenging" films, you absolutely must not miss this.

text: he 's fascinated by a candy machine , and asks his mother for money , but she refuses .
translation: 彼はお菓子の自動販売機に魅了されて、母親にお金をお願いしますが、彼女は拒否します。
back_translation: He was fascinated by the candy vending machine and asked his mother for money, but she refused.

text: as violent , profane and exploitative as the most offensive action flick you 've ever seen .
translation: 最も攻撃的なアクション映画と同じくらい、暴力的で、不敬で、搾取的です。
back_translation: Just as aggressive action movies are, it is violent, disrespectful, and exploitative.

text: the film 's apocalyptic urban setting and unrelentingly icy zeitgeist is message enough without a triumphant parting shot
translation: 映画の終末的な都市設定と容赦のない冷酷な時代精神は、勝利の別れの一撃なしでも十分なメッセージを伝えている。
back_translation: The apocalyptic urban setting of the film and the ruthless, cold spirit of the era convey a sufficient message even without a triumphant farewell blow.

text: with the support of her best friend wilma watson and their draft-dodging companion will bacon , emily is able to stand by her convictions in a household dominated by the standards of a salt-of-the-earth father and an unconditionally loving mother .
translation: 彼女の親友ウィルマ・ワトソンと、徴兵を逃れた仲間ウィル・ベーコンの支援を受けて、エミリーは、真面目で地道な父親の基準と無条件に愛情深い母親のもとで、自らの信念を貫くことができる。
back_translation: With the support of her best friend Wilma Watson and her companion Will Bacon, who escaped conscription, Emily is able to uphold her beliefs under the standards of her serious and diligent father and her unconditionally loving mother.

text: well as a hero in the guise of prince charmont , whom ella falls in love with .
translation: エラが恋に落ちるチャーモント王子の姿をした英雄として。
back_translation: As a hero in the form of Prince Charmont, who falls in love with Ella.

text: after spending a year in a mental instituton , molly peters finally returns home to her mother .
translation: 精神病院で一年を過ごした後、モリー・ピーターズはついに母のもとに帰ります。
back_translation: After spending a year in a psychiatric hospital, Molly Peters finally returns to her mother.

text: content merely to lionize its title character and exploit his anger - all for easy sanctimony , formulaic thrills and a ham-fisted sermon on the need for national health insurance .
translation: 内容は単にタイトルキャラクターを持ち上げ、彼の怒りを利用するもので、簡単な道徳的優位感、型にはまったスリル、そして国民健康保険の必要性についての押し付けがましい説教のためだけです。
back_translation: The content simply lifts up the title character, exploiting his anger, and is only for the sake of a shallow sense of moral superiority, formulaic thrills, and a preachy sermon about the necessity of national health insurance.

text: undercover brother does n't go far enough . it 's just a silly black genre spoof .
translation: アンダーカバー・ブラザーは十分ではない。ただのくだらない黒人ジャンルのスプーフだ。
back_translation: Undercover Brother is not enough. It's just a silly spoof of the black genre.

text: the footage of the rappers at play and the prison interview with suge knight are just two of the elements that will grab you .
translation: ラッパーたちの遊んでいる映像とシュグ・ナイトとの刑務所でのインタビューは、あなたを引きつける2つの要素に過ぎません。
back_translation: The footage of the rappers hanging out and the interview with Suge Knight in prison are just two engaging elements.

text: takes one character we do n't like and another we do n't believe , and puts them into a battle of wills that is impossible to care about and is n't very funny .
translation: 私たちが好きではないキャラクターと、私たちが信じられないキャラクターを取り入れ、誰も気にかけることができず、あまり面白くない意志の戦いに置いています。
back_translation: We incorporate characters that we dislike and characters that we cannot believe, placing them in a struggle of will that no one cares about and is not very interesting.

text: an entertaining , grimy view of the traps of machismo tucked inside a cop thriller .
translation: 警察スリラーの中に潜むマチズモの罠に対する、娯楽的で陰鬱な視点。
back_translation: An entertaining and bleak perspective on the trap of machismo lurking within police thrillers.

text: the subject of swinging still seems ripe for a documentary -- just not this one .
translation: スウィンギングのテーマは依然としてドキュメンタリーに適しているように思えますが、ただしこの作品ではありません。
back_translation: The theme of swinging still seems suitable for a documentary, but not for this work.

text: how does it play a significant role in japanese culture , and why does it fascinate american youth ?
translation: それは日本の文化においてどのように重要な役割を果たしており、なぜアメリカの若者を魅了するのでしょうか？
back_translation: What important role does it play in Japanese culture, and why does it attract American youth?

text: even the hastily and amateurishly drawn animation can not engage .
translation: 急いで描かれ、素人のようなアニメーションでさえも、視聴者を引き込むことはできない。
back_translation: Even hasty drawings and amateur-like animations cannot capture the viewers' attention.

text: on balance , i recommend the movie both for nicholson 's performance and for the opportunity to spend some time with the kind of man that we often meet in real life , but rarely see on screen .
translation: 総合的に見て、私は映画をニコルソンの演技と、実生活でよく出会うタイプの男と過ごす機会が持てるという理由から推薦します。
back_translation: Overall, I recommend the movie because of Nicholson's performance and the opportunity it provides to encounter a type of man you often meet in real life.

text: but for the shell-shocked crew , trapped together in the sub 's narrow corridors and constricted spaces , this is about to become a journey into the sensory delusions , mental deceptions and runaway fear that lurk just below the surface of the ocean and deep inside the human psyche .
translation: しかし、艦内の狭い廊下や制約された空間に閉じ込められた衝撃を受けた乗組員にとって、これは海面のすぐ下や人間の精神の奥深くに潜む感覚的妄想、精神的錯覚、および制御の効かない恐怖への旅に変わろうとしています。
back_translation: However, for the shocked crew members trapped in the narrow corridors and confined spaces of the ship, this is about to transform into a journey of sensory delusions, mental illusions, and uncontrollable fears lurking just below the surface of the sea and deep within the human mind.

text: through time travel wells and twain team up with sir arthur conan doyle and a young jules verne and wind up in the year 2001 seeing results of their writings that help in their attempts to find dr . noah and save the world from destruction .
translation: タイムトラベルの井戸を通じて、トウェインはアーサー・コナン・ドイル卿と若きジュール・ヴェルヌとチームを組み、2001年に到着します。そこで彼らは、自分たちの著作が世界を破壊から救うためのノア博士を見つけ出す試みに役立つ結果を目にします。
back_translation: Through a time travel well, Twain teams up with Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and the young Jules Verne, arriving in the year 2001. There, they witness results that will aid in their attempt to find Dr. Noah, whose works are meant to save the world from destruction.

text: arrested and imprisoned in a juvenile detention facility , leland comes in contact with an aspiring writer and prison teacher , pearl madison ( cheadle ) .
translation: 逮捕されて少年拘置所に入れられたリーランドは、志望作家であり刑務所の教師であるパール・マディソン（チードル）と接触する。
back_translation: Leland, who was arrested and placed in a juvenile detention center, comes into contact with Pearl Madison (Cheadle), an aspiring writer and prison teacher.

text: if you 're not the target demographic . . . this movie is one long chick-flick slog .
translation: あなたがターゲットとなるデモグラフィックでなければ、この映画は長い女性向け映画の苦痛のようです。
back_translation: If you are not part of the target demographic, this movie feels like a long, painful women's film.

text: daughter from danang sticks with its subjects a little longer and tells a deeper story
translation: ダナンの娘はそのテーマにもう少し長く付き合い、より深い物語を語ります。
back_translation: The daughter of Da Nang will engage with that theme a little longer and tell a deeper story.

text: as it stands it 's an opera movie for the buffs .
translation: 現状では、それはオペラ映画愛好者のためのものです。
back_translation: Currently, it is dedicated to opera film enthusiasts.

text: ranks with such films as in the bedroom , ordinary people , and terms of endearment in the sensitivity with which it observes the effect a child 's death on the remaining members of the family .
translation: 「いとしの掟」や「普通の人々」、「愛と追憶の日々」と同様に、子供の死が残された家族に与える影響を観察する感受性において評価される。
back_translation: Like "Beloved Rules," "Ordinary People," and "Days of Love and Remembrance," it is evaluated for its sensitivity in observing the impact of a child's death on the surviving family.

text: the theme of the film simultaneously addresses the similarities between the two factions of law and crime while revealing the similarities between the two brothers .
translation: 映画のテーマは、法と犯罪という二つの派閥の類似性を同時に扱いつつ、二人の兄弟の類似性を明らかにしています。
back_translation: The theme of the movie simultaneously addresses the similarities between the two factions of law and crime while also revealing the similarities between two brothers.

text: gooding is the energetic frontman , and it 's hard to resist his enthusiasm , even if the filmmakers come up with nothing original in the way of slapstick sequences .
translation: グッディングはエネルギッシュなフロントマンであり、たとえ映画製作者たちがスラップスティックのシーケンスにおいて何も新しいものを生み出せなくても、彼の熱意を抵抗するのは難しい。
back_translation: Gooding is an energetic frontman, and even if filmmakers can't create anything new in slapstick sequences, it is hard to resist his enthusiasm.

text: when the singing veggies encounter some car trouble , they 're stranded at old , rundown seafood joint where nothing is quite as it seems .
translation: 歌う野菜たちが車のトラブルに遭い、古びた海鮮料理店に立ち往生してしまう。そこでは見かけ通りではないことが多く起こる。
back_translation: The singing vegetables encounter car trouble and end up stranded at an old seafood restaurant. There, many things happen that are not as they seem.

text: he becomes the man he always should have ( and could have ) been .
translation: 彼はいつでもなれるはずだった（そしてなれたはずだった）男になる。
back_translation: He was supposed to become the man he could always be (and should have become).

text: imax films can sometimes feel like a gimmick , but this is one subject that demands a scope as big as the imagination .
translation: IMAX映画は時には gimmick のように感じることがありますが、これは想像力の大きさに見合ったスコープを必要とするテーマです。
back_translation: IMAX movies can sometimes feel like a gimmick, but this is a theme that requires a scope that matches the magnitude of imagination.

text: unlike most teen flicks , swimming takes its time to tell its story , casts mostly little-known performers in key roles , and introduces some intriguing ambiguity .
translation: ほとんどのティーン映画とは異なり、『スイミング』は物語を語るのに時間をかけ、主要な役に主にあまり知られていないパフォーマーを起用し、いくつかの興味深い曖昧さを導入しています。
back_translation: Unlike most teen movies, "Swimming" takes its time to tell the story, casts mainly lesser-known performers in the main roles, and introduces some intriguing ambiguity.

text: can be classified as one of those 'alternate reality ' movies . . . except that it would have worked so much better dealing in only one reality .
translation: それは「オルタナティブリアリティ」映画の一つと分類できますが…ただし、それは一つの現実だけに焦点を当てていた方がずっと良かったでしょう。
back_translation: It can be classified as one of the "alternative reality" films, but... it would have been much better if it had focused on just one reality.

text: the adventure does n't contain half the excitement of balto , or quarter the fun of toy story 2 .
translation: その冒険はバルトの半分の興奮も、トイ・ストーリー2の四分の一の楽しさも含んでいません。
back_translation: That adventure lacks half the excitement of The Lion and a quarter of the fun of Toy Story 2.

text: majidi is an unconventional storyteller , capable of finding beauty in the most depressing places .
translation: マジディは型破りなストーリーテラーであり、最も悲しい場所の中に美を見出すことができる。
back_translation: Majidi is an unconventional storyteller who can find beauty even in the saddest places.

text: but he 's neglecting his work , carping at his mom , and behaving badly toward his loyal friend bobbi .
translation: しかし彼は仕事を怠り、母親に文句を言い、忠実な友人ボビーに対して悪い態度をとっています。
back_translation: However, he neglects his work, complains to his mother, and behaves poorly towards his loyal friend Bobby.

text: he follows a new suspect , huh , and eventually catches him in the act of brutally murdering a woman in a crowded techno bar .
translation: 彼は新しい容疑者を追い、結局、混雑したテクノバーで女性を残虐に殺害する現場を目撃する。
back_translation: He pursues a new suspect and ultimately witnesses the brutal murder of a woman in a crowded techno bar.

text: in the second half of the film , frei 's control loosens in direct proportion to the amount of screen time he gives nachtwey for self-analysis .
translation: 映画の後半では、フライのコントロールがナハトヴェイに自己分析のためのスクリーンタイムを与える量に直接比例して緩んでいく。
back_translation: In the second half of the movie, the control of the fry loosens directly in proportion to the amount of screen time given to Nachtwei for self-analysis.

text: . . . you can be forgiven for realizing that you 've spent the past 20 minutes looking at your watch and waiting for frida to just die already .
translation: …あなたが過去20分間時計を見ながらフリーダがもう死んでしまうのを待っていたことに気付いたとしても、許されるかもしれません。
back_translation: ...You might be forgiven for noticing that you had been watching the clock for the past 20 minutes, waiting for Frida to die.

text: another woman , diana , reads a book and is divided from the real world by fiction .
translation: 別の女性、ダイアナは本を読み、フィクションによって現実世界から隔てられています。
back_translation: Another woman, Diana, is reading a book and is separated from the real world by fiction.

text: he seeks the wisdom of his friend and confidant saiid and together their attempts to give niche his identity leads to more problems . . . in
translation: 彼は友人であり confidant のサイイドの知恵を求め、共にニッチに彼のアイデンティティを与えようとする試みは、さらなる問題へとつながります。。。
back_translation: He seeks the wisdom of his friend and confidant, Saeed, and their attempts to give him identity in the niche lead to further problems...

text: he wants to realize the dream nurtured for year by his father .
translation: 彼は父によって何年も育まれてきた夢を実現したいと考えています。
back_translation: He wants to fulfill the dream that has been nurtured by his father for many years.

text: it 's all about love is the story of two lovers and their attempts to save their relationship in a near-future world on the brink of cosmic collapse .
translation: それは愛についての物語であり、2人の恋人が宇宙の崩壊の瀬戸際にある近未来の世界で、彼らの関係を救うために奮闘する様子を描いています。
back_translation: It is a story about love, depicting two lovers struggling to save their relationship in a near-future world on the brink of the collapse of the universe.

text: as it spreads among the friends , their true feelings and personalities emerge as they struggle to survive the virus and each other .
translation: それが友人たちの間に広がるにつれて、彼らの本当の気持ちや個性が浮かび上がり、ウイルスとお互いの生存をかけて奮闘します。
back_translation: As it spreads among friends, their true feelings and personalities emerge, and they struggle for survival against the virus and each other.

text: like a tarantino movie with heart , alias betty is richly detailed , deftly executed and utterly absorbing .
translation: 心のあるタランティーノ映画のように、エイリアス・ベティは豊かに詳細が描かれ、巧みに実行され、完全に引き込まれる。
back_translation: Like a Quentin Tarantino film with heart, Alias Betty is richly detailed, skillfully executed, and completely engrossing.

text: self-congratulatory , misguided , and ill-informed , if nonetheless compulsively watchable .
translation: 自己評価が高く、誤った考え方をしており、情報が不足しているが、それでもなお衝動的に見る価値がある。
back_translation: They have a high self-evaluation, hold incorrect beliefs, lack information, yet are still impulsively worth watching.

text: the members manage to pronounce kok exactly as you think they might , thus giving the cast ample opportunity to use that term as often as possible . it 's very beavis and butthead , yet always seems to elicit a chuckle .
translation: メンバーは、あなたが思う通りに「コック」を正確に発音することができ、キャストにその用語をできるだけ頻繁に使う十分な機会を与えます。それは非常にビーバスとバッタヘッドですが、いつも笑いを引き起こすようです。
back_translation: The members can accurately pronounce "cock" as you think, giving the cast plenty of opportunities to use that term as frequently as possible. It is very Beavis and Butt-Head, but it always seems to generate laughter.

text: it 's steps , a film that draws its inspiration from the marx brother to monty python and it was done on such a shoe-string budget , it would make a studio executive blush .
translation: それは「ステップ」という映画で、マルクス兄弟からモンティ・パイソンにインスパイアを受けた作品で、非常に限られた予算で制作されたため、スタジオのエグゼクティブが赤面するでしょう。
back_translation: It's a movie called "Step," inspired by the Marx Brothers and Monty Python, and it was made on a very limited budget, so studio executives would be embarrassed.

text: bruce is a down on his luck tv news reporter .
translation: ブルースは運も悪いテレビニュースの報道記者です。
back_translation: Bruce is an unlucky television news reporter.

text: ultimately , the message of trouble every day seems to be that all sexual desire disrupts life 's stasis .
translation: 最終的に、『トラブル毎日』のメッセージは、すべての性的欲望が人生の静止状態を崩すことにあるようです。
back_translation: Ultimately, the message of "Trouble Daily" seems to be that all sexual desires disrupt the state of stagnation in life.

text: academy award nominee diane lane stars as frances mayes , a 35-year-old san francisco writer whose perfect life has just taken an unexpected detour .
translation: アカデミー賞ノミネートのダイアン・レインは、完璧な人生が予期せぬ方向転換を遂げた35歳のサンフランシスコの作家フランセス・マイエス役で主演します。
back_translation: Academy Award-nominated Diane Lane stars as Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old writer from San Francisco whose perfect life takes an unexpected turn.

text: the film 's strength is n't in its details , but in the larger picture it paints - of a culture in conflict with itself , with the thin veneer of nationalism that covers our deepest , media-soaked fears .
translation: その映画の強みは詳細にはなく、自己と対立する文化を描いた大きな絵にある。私たちの最も深い、メディアに浸された恐怖を覆う薄いナショナリズムの veneerの背後に。
back_translation: The strength of the film lies not in the details, but in the bigger picture it paints of a culture in conflict with itself. Behind the thin veneer of nationalism that covers our deepest, media-saturated fears.

text: although their characters and temperaments could n't be less alike , 19-year olds wei and jie are best friends .
translation: 性格や気質はまったく異なるが、19歳のウェイとジエは親友だ。
back_translation: Despite having completely different personalities and temperaments, 19-year-old Wei and Jie are best friends.

text: confessions is without a doubt a memorable directorial debut from king hunk .
translation: カンフー・ハンクの監督デビュー作『告白』は間違いなく記憶に残る作品です。
back_translation: Kung Fu Hank's directorial debut, "Confession," is undoubtedly a memorable work.

text: it 's like rocky and bullwinkle on speed , but that 's neither completely enlightening , nor does it catch the intensity of the movie 's strangeness .
translation: それはまるでロッキーとブルウィンクルがスピードに乗っているようだが、それは完全に啓発的でもなければ、映画の奇妙さの強度を捉えているわけでもない。
back_translation: It feels like Rocky and Bullwinkle are picking up speed, but it is neither completely enlightening nor does it capture the intensity of the movie's oddness.

text: so earnest and well-meaning , and so stocked with talent , that you almost forget the sheer , ponderous awfulness of its script .
translation: とても真剣で善意に満ちていて、才能が豊富すぎるため、その脚本の途方もないひどさをほとんど忘れてしまいます。
back_translation: They are so serious, filled with good intentions, and overwhelmingly talented that you almost forget the astonishing awfulness of the script.

text: it is late at night in a foreign land .
translation: 異国の地で深夜です。
back_translation: It is midnight in a foreign land.

text: when joe , a us navy seal , and katsuragi , a japanese detective , join forces to stop the circulation of blood heat , they are taken to an underground martial arts tournament in the muscle dome held by the yakuza and triads , where the fighters are blood heat users .
translation: ジョーというアメリカ海軍特殊部隊員と、カツラギという日本の刑事が、血熱の流通を止めるために手を組むと、彼らはヤクザとトライアドによって開催されるマッスルドームでの地下格闘技大会に連れて行かれる。そこで戦うのは、血熱を使うファイターたちだ。
back_translation: An American Navy SEAL named Joe and a Japanese detective named Katsuragi team up to stop the distribution of blood heat. They are taken to an underground fighting tournament held at the Muscle Dome, organized by the Yakuza and Triads, where fighters who use blood heat compete.

text: a sloppy , amusing comedy that proceeds from a stunningly unoriginal premise .
translation: ひどく、面白いコメディで、驚くほど独創性のない前提から進行します。
back_translation: It progresses from a premise that is shockingly unoriginal, in a terribly funny comedy.

text: instead of trying to bust some blondes , [ diggs ] should be probing why a guy with his talent ended up in a movie this bad .
translation: [ディッグス]は、なぜ彼の才能を持った男がこんなひどい映画に出演することになったのかを探るべきだ。
back_translation: [Diggs] should explore why such a talented man ended up starring in such a terrible movie.

text: a wonderful , low-key coming-of-age saga with none of that after-school special hysteria .
translation: 素晴らしく、控えめな成長物語で、あのアフタースクールスペシャルのヒステリーはありません。
back_translation: It's a wonderful, understated coming-of-age story without the hysteria of those after-school specials.

text: and what 's worse , it might be coming back to get her . . .
translation: さらに悪いことに、それが彼女を襲いに戻ってくるかもしれない。
back_translation: What's worse is that it might come back to attack her.

text: mostly , [ goldbacher ] just lets her complicated characters be unruly , confusing and , through it all , human .
translation: 主に、[ゴールドバッハ]は彼女の複雑なキャラクターが無情で、混乱を引き起こし、そのすべてを通じて人間らしいままにすることを許しています。
back_translation: Primarily, [Goldbach] allows her complex character to be ruthless, to cause confusion, and to remain human throughout it all.

text: she befriends with one of the regulars , the well known las vegas-playboy jack hiller ( eddie albert sr . ) .
translation: 彼女は常連客の一人である、著名なラスベガスのプレイボーイ、ジャック・ヒラー（エディ・アルバート・シニア）と友達になります。
back_translation: She becomes friends with one of the regular patrons, the famous Las Vegas playboy, Jack Hiller (Eddie Albert Senior).

text: through his grandmother 's boundless patience and devotion , he learns to embrace empathy , humility and the importance of family .
translation: 彼の祖母の限りない忍耐と献身を通じて、彼は共感、謙虚さ、そして家族の重要性を受け入れることを学びます。
back_translation: Through his grandmother's boundless patience and devotion, he learns to embrace empathy, humility, and the importance of family.

text: they both fall in love , but they must fight against everyone , specially renata 's rich parents , who want to stop their love by sending her to canada .
translation: 彼らは両方とも恋に落ちますが、特にレナータの裕福な両親に対抗して戦わなければなりません。彼らはレナータをカナダに送ることでこの愛を止めようとしています。
back_translation: They both fall in love, but they have to fight against Renata's wealthy parents in particular. They are trying to stop this love by sending Renata to Canada.

text: she - a person who wanted to live for ever - does however not give in .
translation: 彼女は永遠に生きたいと願っているものの、しかし降参しない。
back_translation: She wishes to live forever, but she does not give up.

text: the killer is getting closer , revealing more and more of his madness .
translation: 殺人者は近づいてきており、彼の狂気がますます明らかになってきています。
back_translation: The murderer is approaching, and his madness is becoming increasingly apparent.

text: when bernie falls for a gorgeous cocktail waitress ( maria bello ) his bad luck is thrown into reverse .
translation: バー二ーが魅力的なカクテルウェイトレス（マリア・ベロ）に恋をすると、彼の悪運は逆転します。
back_translation: When Barney falls in love with the charming cocktail waitress (Maria Bello), his bad luck turns around.

text: trapped presents a frightening and compelling 'what if ? ' scenario that will give most parents pause . . . . then , something terrible happens .
translation: 「トラップト」は、ほとんどの親が考えざるを得ない恐ろしくも魅力的な「もしも？」のシナリオを提示します……そして、恐ろしい何かが起こります。
back_translation: "Trapto" presents a terrifying yet fascinating "what if?" scenario that most parents can't help but consider... and then something horrifying happens.

text: and for her honor , it will be named 'paradise-casino ' .
translation: そして彼女の名誉のために、それは「パラダイス・カジノ」と名付けられます。
back_translation: And in honor of her, it will be named "Paradise Casino."

text: when a dozen graves are desecrated in rural texas , five young people in their 20 's investigate , eventually ending up being chased by a family of cannibals , led by a towering and insane brute , dressed in human skins , called leatherface .
translation: テキサスの田舎で12の墓が冒涜されたとき、20代の若者5人が調査を始め、最終的には人間の皮で装った背の高い狂気じみた野蛮人、レザーフェイスが率いる人食い家族に追われることになる。
back_translation: When 12 graves were desecrated in rural Texas, five young people in their 20s began an investigation, ultimately finding themselves pursued by a cannibal family led by a tall, crazed maniac known as Leatherface, who wore human skin.

text: whaley 's performance is earnest and often riveting , but he should have taken a few lessons from his peers at amateur night .
translation: ウェイリーのパフォーマンスは真剣でしばしば惹きつけられますが、彼はアマチュアナイトの仲間からいくつかのレッスンを受けるべきでした。
back_translation: Waili's performance is serious and often captivating, but he should have taken some lessons from his fellow amateur night performers.

text: he resorts to whiskey-smuggling , a traditional family occupation .
translation: 彼はウィスキー密輸に手を染める、それは伝統的な家業です。
back_translation: He became involved in whiskey smuggling; it is a traditional family business.

text: the chubbchubbs introduces the alien inhabitants of the planet glorf , including meeper , its earnest but oh so awkward hero , a singing diva , the zyzaks , 20 foot-tall red-eyed bullies , and the chubbchubbs .
translation: チューブチュブスは、惑星グローフのエイリアン住民を紹介します。そこには、真剣だけどとても気まずいヒーローのミーパー、歌うディーバ、20フィートの高さを持つ赤い目のいじめっ子ザイザク、そしてチューブチュブスが含まれています。
back_translation: Tube Tubes introduces the alien inhabitants of Planet Groof. Among them are the serious yet very awkward hero Meeper, the singing diva, the 20-foot tall red-eyed bully Zaizak, and of course, the Tube Tubes themselves.

text: august has become a real problem for some of the bosses around town , and ronnie will soon find out just what his frankenstein 's monster will cost him .
translation: 8月は町のいくつかのボスにとって本当の問題になっており、ロニーはすぐに彼のフランケンシュタインの怪物が彼にどれだけの代償をもたらすかを知ることになる。
back_translation: August has become a real problem for some of the bosses in town, and Ronnie will soon find out just how much his Frankenstein's monster will cost him.

text: there is a difference between movies with the courage to go over the top and movies that do n't care about being stupid
translation: 突飛な表現に挑戦する勇気のある映画と、バカげたことを気にしない映画には違いがあります。
back_translation: There is a difference between a film that has the courage to challenge unconventional expressions and a film that doesn't care about ridiculous things.

text: while not quite `` shrek `` or monsters , inc . `` , it 's not too bad . it 's worth taking the kids to .
translation: 「シュレック」や「モンスターズ・インク」ほどではないが、悪くはない。子供たちを連れて行く価値はある。
back_translation: It's not as good as "Shrek" or "Monsters, Inc." but it's not bad. It's worth taking the kids.

text: siddalee , a famous new york playwright , is quoted in time magazine and infuriates her dramatic , southern mother .
translation: シダリー、ニューヨークの有名な劇作家がタイム誌に引用され、彼女の劇的な南部出身の母親を激怒させる。
back_translation: Sidali, a famous playwright from New York, is quoted in Time magazine, infuriating her dramatic Southern mother.

text: a young couple is concerned about the future of their relationship as they anticipate their time apart .
translation: 若いカップルは、別々の時間を過ごすことを予想しながら、自分たちの関係の未来について心配しています。
back_translation: A young couple is worried about the future of their relationship as they anticipate spending time apart.

text: the pretense is that her father jake is dying .
translation: 彼女の父親ジェイクが dying というのは見せかけである。
back_translation: Her father Jake's dying is a facade.

text: through an unforeseeable chain of events , jack comes face to face with the boundaries of his carefully constructed existence .
translation: 予想外の一連の出来事を通じて、ジャックは彼が慎重に構築した存在の境界に直面することになります。
back_translation: Through an unexpected series of events, Jack will face the boundaries of existence that he has carefully constructed.

text: . . . the movie just seemed to be trying too hard to be something different . .
translation: 映画はただ別の何かになろうとしすぎているように感じました。
back_translation: It felt like the movie was trying too hard to become something else.

text: when the precise nature of matthew 's predicament finally comes into sharp focus , the revelation fails to justify the build-up .
translation: マシューの窮地の正確な本質がついに明らかになると、その啓示は期待に応えることができません。
back_translation: When the true nature of Matthew's predicament is finally revealed, the revelation fails to meet expectations.

text: fans of the modern day hong kong action film finally have the worthy successor to a better tomorrow and the killer which they have been patiently waiting for .
translation: 現代の香港アクション映画のファンは、彼らが長い間待ち望んでいた『男たちの挽歌』や『ザ・キラー』の有望な後継作をついに手に入れました。
back_translation: Fans of modern Hong Kong action films have finally received the long-awaited promising sequels to "A Better Tomorrow" and "The Killer."

text: his strengths are fish frying and stamp collecting , and he thinks magnum 45s are a type of ice cream .
translation: 彼の強みは魚のフライと切手収集で、彼はマグナム45がアイスクリームの一種だと思っています。
back_translation: His strengths are frying fish and stamp collecting, and he thinks a Magnum .45 is a type of ice cream.

text: melissa , who will drag him into a world of passion and crime , will soon meet him .
translation: メリッサは、彼を情熱と犯罪の世界へ引きずり込むことになるので、彼とすぐに出会うでしょう。
back_translation: Melissa will soon meet him, as she will drag him into the world of passion and crime.

text: disrespectful and selfish , sang-woo lashes out in anger , perceiving that he has been abandoned .
translation: 無礼で自己中心的なサンウは、見捨てられたと感じて怒りを爆発させる。
back_translation: The rude and self-centered San-u feels abandoned and explodes with anger.

text: schmitz takes off for new orleans with stephens , promising him a chance to meet his teen idol , all the while taking film of stephens ' cross-country exploits and pawning them off as footage of the real deal .
translation: シュミッツは、スティーブンスと共にニューオーリンズに向けて出発し、彼にティーンエイジャーのアイドルに会うチャンスを約束しながら、スティーブンスの横断国の冒険を撮影し、それを本物の映像として売りさばいている。
back_translation: Schmitz, along with Stevens, set off for New Orleans, promising him a chance to meet a teenage idol while filming Stevens' cross-country adventure and selling it as authentic footage.

text: morton is a great actress portraying a complex character , but morvern callar grows less compelling the farther it meanders from its shocking start .
translation: モートンは複雑なキャラクターを演じる素晴らしい女優ですが、『モーバーン・キャラー』はその衝撃的な始まりから離れるにつれて魅力が薄れていきます。
back_translation: Morton is a wonderful actress who plays complex characters, but "Morbane Caller" loses its charm as it moves away from its shocking beginning.

text: prosit has made a lot of enemy & # 180 ; s .
translation: プロスティは多くの敵を作りました。
back_translation: Prosti made many enemies.

text: it tries too hard , and overreaches the logic of its own world .
translation: それはやりすぎていて、自分自身の世界の論理を超えてしまっています。
back_translation: That is excessive and goes beyond the logic of your own world.

text: a 93-minute condensation of a 26-episode tv series , with all of the pitfalls of such you 'd expect .
translation: 26話のテレビシリーズを93分に凝縮したもので、そこには予想されるすべての落とし穴が含まれています。
back_translation: It is a condensed version of the 26-episode TV series into 93 minutes, including all the expected pitfalls.

text: surfing his first big break in pictures , young actor reverend heads for the big-time in hollywood .
translation: 彼は写真での初めての大きなブレークをサーフィンしながら、若い俳優の牧師はハリウッドのビッグタイムに向かっています。
back_translation: While surfing, the young actor pastor is riding his first big break in photography as he heads towards the Hollywood big time.

text: [ nM-fs ] directed the stage version of elling , and gets fine performances from his two leads who originated the characters on stage .
translation: [ nM-fs ]は舞台版の『エリング』を演出し、登場人物を舞台で演じた2人の主役から素晴らしいパフォーマンスを引き出しています。
back_translation: [nM-fs] directed the stage version of "Elling" and has drawn wonderful performances from the two main characters who played the roles on stage.

text: this new movie version of the alexandre dumas classic is the stuff of high romance , brought off with considerable wit .
translation: このアレクサンドル・デュマのクラシックの新しい映画版は、高いロマンの素材であり、かなりのウィットをもって制作されています。
back_translation: This new film version of Alexandre Dumas's classic is made with a high romantic theme and considerable wit.

text: in the film , `` wake `` , the fateful reunion of four brothers quickly dissolves into a night of drinking , deceit , perversions , and death .
translation: 映画「ウェイク」では、運命的な4人の兄弟の再会がすぐに飲酒、詐欺、倒錯、そして死の夜に溶け込んでいきます。
back_translation: In the movie "Wake," the fateful reunion of four brothers quickly dissolves into a night of drinking, fraud, perversion, and death.

text: and that 's the trick-it 's a gay cruise-liner for gay men to make out .
translation: それがコツです - それはゲイの男性がキスをするためのゲイクルーズ船です。
back_translation: That's the trick - it's a gay cruise ship for gay men to kiss.

text: sayles has an eye for the ways people of different ethnicities talk to and about others outside the group .
translation: セイルズは、異なる民族の人々がグループの外にいる他者とどのように話し、また他者についてどのように語るかに対する洞察を持っています。
back_translation: Sails has insights into how people from different ethnic groups communicate with others outside of their group and how they talk about those others.

text: the film takes the materials of human tragedy and dresses them in lovely costumes , southern california locations and star power .
translation: その映画は人間の悲劇の素材を取り上げ、素敵な衣装、南カリフォルニアのロケーション、そしてスターの力で飾り立てています。
back_translation: The movie takes human tragedy as its material and embellishes it with beautiful costumes, locations in Southern California, and the power of stars.

text: nete 's father becomes bitter and introvert , but nete insists that he come to live with her and her family the few weeks he has left .
translation: ネテの父は苦々しく内向的になりますが、ネテは彼が残りの数週間を彼女と彼女の家族と一緒に過ごすよう強く主張します。
back_translation: Nete's father becomes bitter and introverted, but Nete strongly insists that he spend the remaining weeks with her and her family.

text: it would take a complete moron to foul up a screen adaptation of oscar wilde 's classic satire .
translation: オスカー・ワイルドの古典的な風刺のスクリーン適応を台無しにするには、完全な馬鹿が必要だろう。
back_translation: It would take a complete buffoon to ruin a classic satirical adaptation of Oscar Wilde.

text: what emerges is not only an underdog v . simon bar sinister saga but a fascinating character study .
translation: 浮かび上がるのは、単なるアンダードッグ対サイモン・バー・シニスターのサーガだけでなく、魅力的なキャラクター研究でもある。
back_translation: What emerges is not just a saga of the underdog against Simon Bar Sinister, but also an intriguing character study.

text: the attorney leaves the scene of the accident and strands the salesman , causing him to miss his custody hearing .
translation: 弁護士は事故現場を離れ、営業マンを置き去りにし、彼は親権審問に遅れてしまいます。
back_translation: The lawyer leaves the accident scene, leaving the salesman behind, and he ends up being late for the custody hearing.

text: standard story of boy meets girl and girl thinks he is gay .
translation: 男の子が女の子に出会い、女の子が彼がゲイだと思うという標準的な物語。
back_translation: A story where a boy meets a girl, and the girl thinks he is gay.

text: ultimately , jane learns her place as a girl , softens up and loses some of the intensity that made her an interesting character to begin with .
translation: 最終的に、ジェーンは女の子としての自分の位置を理解し、柔らかさを持ち始め、彼女を最初に面白いキャラクターにしていた強烈さのいくつかを失ってしまいます。
back_translation: Ultimately, Jane comes to understand her position as a girl, begins to embrace softness, and loses some of the intensity that initially made her an interesting character.

text: determined not to let this opportunity slip by , she vows to act on that information right away .
translation: この機会を逃さないと決意し、彼女はその情報に基づいてすぐに行動することを誓います。
back_translation: Determined not to miss this opportunity, she vows to act immediately based on that information.

text: i know that i 'll never listen to marvin gaye or the supremes the same way again
translation: マーヴィン・ゲイやシュプリームスを今後は同じようには聞かないだろうと知っています。
back_translation: I know that I won't listen to Marvin Gaye and The Supremes in the same way anymore.

text: carlton `` niche `` james ( cory barlog ) is a man on a mission .
translation: カールトン「ニッチ」ジェイムズ（コリー・バーログ）は、使命を持った男です。
back_translation: Carlton "Niche" James (Corey Barlog) is a man on a mission.

text: seeking refuge in his past , the murderer contacts his estranged brother and falls in love with his brother 's wife , gypsy . . .
translation: 過去に refuge を求める殺人者は、疎遠になっていた兄弟に連絡を取り、兄弟の妻であるジプシーに恋をする。
back_translation: A murderer seeking refuge contacts his estranged brother and falls in love with the brother's wife, Gypsy.

text: tinke , a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness , struggles to find her unknown , rich grandparents .
translation: ティンケは、荒野から来た9歳の孤児で、未知の裕福な祖父母を探すことに奮闘しています。
back_translation: Tinke is a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness who is struggling to find her unknown wealthy grandparents.

text: eventually , he builds a successful career as a us attorney .
translation: 最終的に、彼はアメリカの弁護士として成功したキャリアを築きました。
back_translation: Ultimately, he built a successful career as an American lawyer.

text: but before he can get to him she sets out with her father to south africa .
translation: しかし、彼が彼に会う前に、彼女は父親と共に南アフリカに向かいます。
back_translation: However, before he meets him, she heads to South Africa with her father.

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: すべての要素が優れたフィルムノワールのために整っていますが、監督ジョージ・ヒッケンルーパーの素材へのアプローチはあまりにも明るすぎます。
back_translation: All the elements are in place for a great film noir, but director George Hickenlooper's approach to the material is a bit too bright.

text: adaptation is probably the ultimate writers ' film , but it 's also a brash , daring , and dynamic film -- as delicate as an orchid but as durable and malleable as the species .
translation: 「アダプテーション」はおそらく究極の作家の映画ですが、それと同時に大胆で冒険的、そしてダイナミックな映画でもあります — 蘭の花のように繊細でありながら、その種のように丈夫で柔軟性もあります。
back_translation: "Adaptation" is probably the ultimate writer's movie, but at the same time, it is also bold, adventurous, and dynamic — delicate like an orchid, yet strong and flexible like its species.

text: jordan is a mom & # 38 ; an activist who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: ジョーダンは母親であり、活動家でもあり、彼女が唯一の子供を自分が信じる不正から守ろうとしている中で、真の信仰を求める生涯をかけた探求をしています。
back_translation: Jordan is a mother and an activist, and she is on a lifelong quest for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from the injustices she believes in.

text: barbara novak ( renee zellweger ) has just come down from maine to new york after writing a book called down with love .
translation: バーバラ・ノバック（レネー・ゼルウィガー）は、「ダウン・ウィズ・ラブ」という本を書いた後、メイン州からニューヨークにやって来た。
back_translation: Barbara Novak (Renée Zellweger) came to New York from Maine after writing a book called "Down with Love."

text: griffin & co . manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: グリフィン＆カンパニーは非常に目を引く存在です。
back_translation: Griffin & Company is a very eye-catching presence.

text: it 's sobering , particularly if anyone still thinks this conflict can be resolved easily , or soon .
translation: これは冷静にさせるものであり、特にこの対立が簡単に、あるいはすぐに解決できると考えている人がまだいるならなおさらです。
back_translation: This is meant to calm things down, especially if there are still people who think that this conflict can be easily or quickly resolved.

text: an incoherent jumble of a film that 's rarely as entertaining as it could have been .
translation: 支離滅裂な映画で、もともともっと楽しめたはずなのに、それほど面白くはない。
back_translation: It's a disjointed movie that could have been more enjoyable, but it's not that interesting.

text: paramount to her world is gene , a wealthy disturbed businessman who has slowly become her benefactor over the years .
translation: 彼女の世界にとって極めて重要なのは、富裕で不安定なビジネスマン、ジーンです。彼は年を重ねるにつれて徐々に彼女の後援者となってきました。
back_translation: What is extremely important to her world is the wealthy and unstable businessman, Gene. He has gradually become her patron as he has aged.

text: without blowing the jokes we can say that , if you have found that your sense of humor fit well with christopher guest 's screen outings , you 'll find yourself in the flow with shearer as well .
translation: ジョークを台無しにすることなく言えるのは、もしクリストファー・ゲストの映画作品とあなたのユーモアがよく合うと感じているなら、シェアラーとも心地よく感じるでしょう。
back_translation: Without ruining the joke, I can say that if you feel that Christopher Guest's films resonate well with your sense of humor, you will likely feel at ease with Shareholder as well.

text: a gracious , eloquent film that by its end offers a ray of hope to the refugees able to look ahead and resist living in a past forever lost .
translation: 優雅で雄弁な映画で、終わりに差し掛かると未来を見つめ、永遠に失われた過去に生きることに抵抗できる難民たちに希望の光をもたらします。
back_translation: A graceful and eloquent film that, as it approaches its conclusion, brings a glimmer of hope to refugees struggling to resist living in a past that is eternally lost while looking toward the future.

text: highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform an icepick lobotomy with household utensils ; a cacophony of robotic voices ; and haunting stills that date back to the turn of the twentieth century .
translation: ハイライトには、家庭用器具を使ってアイスピック・ロボトミーを行う詳細な指示、ロボットの声の不協和音、20世紀初頭に遡る幽玄な静止画が含まれています。
back_translation: The highlights include detailed instructions for performing an ice pick lobotomy using household appliances, dissonant robot voices, and eerie still images dating back to the early 20th century.

text: 19-year old free spirit daphne reynolds ( amanda bynes ) , raised by her equally free-spirited mother , goes to england to meet her father , who turns out to be a wealthy aristocrat ( colin firth ) .
translation: 19歳の自由な精神を持つダフネ・レイノルズ（アマンダ・バインズ）は、同じく自由な精神を持つ母親に育てられ、父親に会うためにイギリスに行きます。彼女の父親は裕福な貴族（コリン・ファース）であることが判明します。
back_translation: 19-year-old free spirit Daphne Reynolds (Amanda Bynes) is raised by her equally free-spirited mother and travels to England to meet her father. It turns out that her father is a wealthy nobleman (Colin Firth).

text: ted ca n't turn the ladies heads like he used to - none of the scams work .
translation: テッドは以前のように女性たちの心をひきつけることができなくなった - どの手口も通用しない。
back_translation: Ted can no longer attract the hearts of women as he used to - no tactic works anymore.

text: he 's got a crush on the sexy young blonde , billy , who he met at an orgy the other night .
translation: 彼は先日のオルジーで出会ったセクシーな若い金髪のビリーに恋をしています。
back_translation: He is in love with the sexy young blonde Billy he met at the orgy the other day.

text: a fast paced and suspenseful argentinian thriller about the shadow side of play .
translation: 遊びの影の側面についての、スピード感のあるサスペンスフルなアルゼンチンのスリラー。
back_translation: A fast-paced, suspenseful Argentine thriller about the darker side of play.

text: a thoroughly unoriginal , but fast-paced and entertaining genre b-flick
translation: 全く独創性はないが、テンポが良くて楽しませてくれるジャンルのB級映画
back_translation: It has no originality at all, but it is a genre of B-movies that has good pace and entertains.

text: there are some movies that hit you from the first scene and you know it 's going to be a trip . igby goes down is one of those movies .
translation: 最初のシーンから心をつかまれる映画があり、それが旅になることがわかる。『イグビー・ゴーズ・ダウン』はそんな映画の一つだ。
back_translation: There is a movie that captures the heart from the very first scene, and you realize it will be a journey. "Igby Goes Down" is one of those movies.

text: the results of the gene therapy are passed on to his son bruce .
translation: 遺伝子治療の結果は彼の息子ブルースに受け継がれます。
back_translation: The results of gene therapy will be inherited by his son, Bruce.

text: only one person can eventually solve the crisis : stefan balsiger himself .
translation: 最終的にその危機を解決できるのは、ステファン・バルジゲル本人だけです。
back_translation: Ultimately, only Stefan Baljiger himself can resolve that crisis.

text: in a place soon to be known as the valley of death , in a small clearing called landing zone x-ray , lt . colonel hal moore ( mel gibson ) and 400 young fathers , husbands , brothers , and sons , all troopers from an elite american combat division , were surrounded by 2 , 000 north vietnamese soldiers .
translation: 死の谷として知られるようになる場所、ランディングゾーンXレイと呼ばれる小さな空き地で、ハル・ムーア中校（メル・ギブソン）と400人の若い父親、夫、兄弟、息子たち、すべてエリートアメリカ戦闘部隊の兵士たちが、2,000人の北ベトナム兵に囲まれていた。
back_translation: A place that would come to be known as the Valley of Death, in a small clearing called Landing Zone X-Ray, Colonel Hal Moore (Mel Gibson) and 400 young fathers, husbands, brothers, and sons, all soldiers of an elite American combat unit, were surrounded by 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers.

text: while peterson and her ageless alter ego keep an ironic detachment from the melodramatics , there 's no irony in the end-title dedication to price -- it obviously comes straight from the heart .
translation: ピーターソンと彼女の年齢を超えた別の自分はメロドラマから皮肉な距離を置いているが、エンドタイトルのプライスへの献辞には皮肉はない。これは明らかに心からのものである。
back_translation: Peterson and another version of herself beyond her years maintain a sarcastic distance from the melodrama, but there is no irony in the dedication to Price at the end credits. This is clearly heartfelt.

text: friday after next takes place back in the hood during the christmas season , craig and day-day are now living in a rundown apartment .
translation: 「フライデー・アフター・ネクスト」はクリスマスシーズンの裏街で行われ、クレイグとデイデイは今や廃れたアパートに住んでいます。
back_translation: "Friday After Next" takes place in the backstreets during the Christmas season, and Craig and Day-Day are now living in a run-down apartment.

text: moments of compassion and kindness circulate within a mounting concern for individual survival .
translation: 個々の生存への高まる懸念の中で、思いやりと優しさの瞬間が循環している。
back_translation: Amid rising concerns for individual survival, moments of compassion and kindness are circulating.

text: likeable thanks to its cast , its cuisine and its quirky tunes .
translation: キャスト、料理、ユニークな音楽のおかげで好感が持てます。
back_translation: Thanks to the cast, the cooking, and the unique music, it is charming.

text: but paul 's dream job turns into a nightmare of sex for hire , drugs and violence .
translation: しかし、ポールの夢の仕事は売春、麻薬、暴力の悪夢に変わってしまう。
back_translation: However, Paul's dream job turns into a nightmare of prostitution, drugs, and violence.

text: instead of a hyperbolic beat-charged urban western , it 's an unpretentious , sociologically pointed slice of life .
translation: ハイパーボリックなビート充電されたアーバンウエスタンの代わりに、遠慮のない社会学的な視点を持った生活の断片です。
back_translation: Instead of a hyperbolic beat-charged urban western, it is a fragment of life with an unreserved sociological perspective.

text: clayton is then given a special assignment , to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the agency .
translation: クレイトンは、エージェンシーに infiltrate した疑わしいスパイを見つけ出す特別任務を与えられます。
back_translation: Clayton is assigned a special mission to identify a suspicious spy who has infiltrated the agency.

text: it is fascinating to see how much work and preparation goes into stand-up comedy .
translation: スタンドアップコメディにはどれほどの労力と準備が必要なのかを見るのは魅力的です。
back_translation: It's fascinating to see how much effort and preparation is required for stand-up comedy.

text: how does one ask his wife to try something that breaks so many taboos ?
translation: どのようにして、自分の妻に多くのタブーを破ることを試してみるよう頼むのか？
back_translation: How do I ask my wife to try breaking many taboos?

text: this comedy , based on steve martin 's successful stage play concerns a fictional meeting between a young pablo picasso and a young albert einstein at a paris cafe at the turn of the 20th century .
translation: このコメディは、スティーブ・マーチンの成功した舞台劇に基づいており、20世紀の初めにパリのカフェで若きパブロ・ピカソと若きアルバート・アインシュタインが出会う架空の物語です。
back_translation: This comedy is based on Steve Martin's successful play and tells the fictional story of young Pablo Picasso and young Albert Einstein meeting in a Paris café in the early 20th century.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend . you do n't want to call the cops . you want to call domino 's .
translation: まるで家のパーティーに行って、ホストが泡を吹いた元カノに自分を守る姿を見ているようだ。警察を呼びたいわけではない。ドミノ・ピザに電話したい。
back_translation: It feels like I'm at a house party, watching the host defend himself against his ex-girlfriend who is foaming at the mouth. I don’t want to call the police. I want to call Domino's Pizza.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: 美しく作られ、 brutal に正直な「約束」は、中東の闘争の複雑さとその人々の人間性への予期せぬ窓を提供します。
back_translation: "Beautifully crafted and brutally honest, 'Promise' offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the struggles in the Middle East and the humanity of its people."

text: like the best 60 minutes exposM-i , the film ( at 80 minutes ) is actually quite entertaining .
translation: 最高の60分間の特集のように、この映画（80分間）は実際にとても楽しめます。
back_translation: This movie (80 minutes long) is really enjoyable, like a perfect 60-minute feature.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .
translation: 自分が思っているほど賢くない文化衝突コメディ。
back_translation: A culture clash comedy that isn't as smart as it thinks it is.

text: however after his son is witness to a killing he has done mike sullivan finds him self on the run trying to save the life of his son and at the same time looking for revenge on those who wronged him .
translation: しかし、彼の息子が彼の行った殺人を目撃した後、マイク・サリバンは逃亡することになり、息子の命を救うために奔走しながら、同時に彼を裏切った者たちへの復讐を求めます。
back_translation: However, after his son witnesses the murder he committed, Mike Sullivan finds himself on the run, desperately trying to save his son's life while simultaneously seeking revenge against those who betrayed him.

text: an unsentimental albeit heartfelt eulogy to the firefighters who paid the ultimate price while saving new yorkers .
translation: 感情を抑えつつも心のこもった追悼の言葉を、ニューヨーカーを救うために究極の犠牲を払った消防士たちに捧げます。
back_translation: I dedicate heartfelt words of tribute, while holding back my emotions, to the firefighters who made the ultimate sacrifice to save New Yorkers.

text: improv comedy masters the upright citizens brigade star in this absurdist comedy about an evil chinese food company and their plan to turn little girls into `` saucy `` spare ribs .
translation: 即興コメディのマスターたちであるアプライト・シティズンズ・ブリゲードが、悪の中華料理会社と彼らの小さな女の子を「ソースの効いた」スペアリブに変えようとする計画に関するこのアブサードコメディに出演します。
back_translation: The Upright Citizens Brigade, masters of improvisational comedy, stars in this absurd comedy about a plan by an evil Chinese food company to turn their little girl into "sauced" spare ribs.

text: however , when a search sets in , the people of dogville demand a better deal in exchange for the risk of harbouring poor grace and she learns the hard way that in this town , goodness is relative .
translation: しかし、捜索が始まると、ドッグビルの人々は貧しいグレースをかくまうリスクに対してより良い取引を求め、彼女はこの町では善悪が相対的であることをつらい経験を通じて学びます。
back_translation: However, when the search begins, the people of Dogville seek better deals concerning the risk of harboring the poor Grace, and through this painful experience, she learns that good and evil are relative in this town.

text: it treats us to beautiful insights and tragic struggles that swell the heart and make us feel genuine empathy for two people embracing the truth amidst a pack of lies .
translation: それは、美しい洞察と心を膨らませる悲劇的な葛藤を私たちに提供し、虚偽の群れの中で真実を受け入れる二人に対して本物の共感を感じさせてくれます。
back_translation: It provides us with beautiful insights and heart-expanding tragic conflicts, making us feel real empathy for the two who accept the truth among the crowd of falsehoods.

text: rachel is torn by her aversion to harper and her duty as an agent .
translation: レイチェルはハーパーへの嫌悪感とエージェントとしての義務に引き裂かれている。
back_translation: Rachel is torn between her aversion to Harper and her duties as an agent.

text: three stories delicately intertwined by the beauty of sadness .
translation: 悲しみの美しさによって繊細に絡み合った三つの物語。
back_translation: Three stories intricately intertwined by the beauty of sadness.

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .
translation: 多くの月の中で最高の映画は、時には私たちの最良の業績を支える情熱について、そして時には私たちを何も残さず劣った欲望だけで見捨ててしまう情熱についてです。
back_translation: The best movies among many reflect, at times, the passions that support our finest achievements, and at other times, the passions that abandon us to inferior desires, leaving us with nothing.

text: i stopped thinking about how good it all was , and started doing nothing but reacting to it - feeling a part of its grand locations , thinking urgently as the protagonists struggled , feeling at the mercy of its inventiveness , gasping at its visual delights .
translation: 私はそれがどれほど素晴らしいか考えるのをやめ、反応することだけに専念し始めました - その壮大な場所の一部であると感じ、主人公たちが苦闘する中で緊急に考え、その独創性に翻弄され、視覚的な楽しさに息を呑んでいます。
back_translation: I stopped thinking about how wonderful it was and began to focus solely on reacting – feeling like a part of that grand place, urgently thinking as the protagonists struggle, bewildered by its originality, and gasping at the visual delight.

text: it ca n't be easy starting a movie in the middle , staying in the middle , and then ending it in the middle . . .
translation: 映画の真ん中から始めて、真ん中に留まり、また真ん中で終わらせるのは簡単ではないだろう。
back_translation: It is not easy to start in the middle of a movie, stay in the middle, and end in the middle.

text: everything has taken a turn for the worse and kilo ca n't seem to stop it .
translation: すべてが悪化の一途をたどっており、キロはそれを止めることができないようです。
back_translation: Everything is on a downward spiral, and Kilo seems unable to stop it.

text: rebecca falls in love with lukas and soon feels more comfortable in the commune than she does at home .
translation: レベッカはルカスに恋をし、すぐに自宅よりもコミューンでの方が快適に感じるようになる。
back_translation: Rebecca falls in love with Lucas and soon starts to feel more comfortable at the commune than at home.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: ウォルトがスティームボート・ウィリーを描いて以来、アニメーション映画制作の最も重要で爽快な形の1つです。
back_translation: Since Walt created Steamboat Willie, it has become one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animation filmmaking.

text: the day takes some twists and turns as elder jones and elder smith ride their bikes to pick up a birthday package for elder smith .
translation: その日は、ジョーンズ長老とスミス長老がスミス長老の誕生日のプレゼントを受け取るために自転車に乗る中で、いくつかの twists and turns（曲がりくねり）がある。
back_translation: That day, as Elder Jones and Elder Smith rode their bikes to receive a birthday present for Elder Smith, there were several twists and turns.

text: the war of the ring has now begun . . .
translation: リングの戦争が今始まった。
back_translation: The war of the ring has just begun.

text: the grandfather teaches the boy a small lesson about growing up , while the boy helps the grandfather , a holocaust survivor , open up and tell his story , for the first time .
translation: 祖父は少年に成長についての小さな教えを伝え、少年はホロコーストの生存者である祖父を助けて、初めて彼の話を開いて語る。
back_translation: The grandfather shares a small lesson about growing up with the boy, and the boy helps his grandfather, a Holocaust survivor, to open up and tell his story for the first time.

text: so young , so smart , such talent , such a wise * * * .
translation: とても若くて、とても賢くて、そんな才能があって、そんなに賢い***。
back_translation: So young, so smart, with such talent, so smart.

text: as she tries to clear her name , she uncovers information that leads to more murders and more unanswered questions .
translation: 彼女が名誉を回復しようとする中で、さらなる殺人や解決されていない多くの疑問につながる情報を明らかにします。
back_translation: As she seeks to restore her honor, it reveals further murders and information that leads to many unresolved questions.

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice . here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked soufflM-i .
translation: うまく処理されれば、ワイルドの戯曲は優雅な機知と巧妙さの傑作です。しかし、ここでは残念ながら、過剰に焼かれたスフレのように崩れ落ちます。
back_translation: If handled well, Wilde's plays are masterpieces of elegant wit and cleverness. However, here they unfortunately collapse like an overcooked soufflé.

text: the roadworkers are mates from way back , and each weekend they go out to an old goldmining site hoping to strike it rich .
translation: 道路作業員たちは昔からの仲間で、毎週末に古い金鉱の場所に出かけては、一攫千金を狙っています。
back_translation: The road workers have been old friends for a long time, and every weekend they go out to an old gold mine site, aiming to strike it rich.

text: once again , the intelligence of gay audiences has been grossly underestimated , and a meaty plot and well-developed characters have been sacrificed for skin and flash that barely fizzle .
translation: 再び、ゲイの観客の知性がひどく過小評価され、肉厚なプロットとよく作り込まれたキャラクターが、ほとんど泡立たない肌や派手さのために犠牲にされています。
back_translation: Once again, the intelligence of gay audiences is severely underestimated, with thick plots and well-developed characters sacrificed for almost frothy skin and flamboyance.

text: you 'll have more fun setting fire to yourself in the parking lot . you 'll be more entertained getting hit by a bus .
translation: 駐車場で自分に火をつける方がもっと楽しいでしょう。バスにひかれる方がもっと面白いでしょう。
back_translation: It would be more fun to set yourself on fire in a parking lot. It would be more interesting to be hit by a bus.

text: often self-consciously surreal , this award-winner scores high for originality .
translation: しばしば自己意識的にシュールなこの受賞作は、独創性において高い評価を得ています。
back_translation: This award-winning work, which is often self-consciously surreal, has received high praise for its originality.

text: moore 's complex and important film is also , believe it or not , immensely entertaining , a david and goliath story that 's still very much playing itself out .
translation: ムーアの複雑で重要な映画は、信じられないかもしれませんが、非常に娯楽的でもあります。ダビデとゴリアテの物語が今もなお展開されています。
back_translation: Moore's complex and important film may seem unbelievable, but it is also highly entertaining. The story of David and Goliath is still unfolding today.

text: whether it 's the fbi swooping in to rescue us in mississippi burning or a fearless teacher storming a `` ghetto `` school to prove our youth can learn as in dangerous minds , we are often offended by such cinematic myths that are more interested in appeasing white liberal sensibilities than raising complex questions about what whites must truly sacrifice if they are sincere about ending racial injustice .
translation: ミシシッピ・バーニングで私たちを救うためにFBIが駆けつけたり、危険な心のように若者たちが学ぶことができることを証明するために「ゲットー」学校に突入する恐れ知らずの教師がいるとき、私たちはしばしばこのような映画的神話に対して不快感を覚えます。これらの物語は、白人リベラルの感受性をなだめることに興味があるだけで、白人が人種的不正を終わらせることに本気で取り組むのであれば、実際に何を犠牲にしなければならないのかという複雑な問題を提起することには無関心です。
back_translation: When there are fearless teachers who rush into "ghetto" schools to prove that young people can learn, or when the FBI comes to our rescue in Mississippi Burning, we often feel discomfort towards such cinematic myths. These stories are only interested in soothing the sensibilities of white liberals and are indifferent to the complicated question of what sacrifices white people would actually have to make if they were genuinely committed to ending racial injustice.

text: sebastien cortez is an up and coming film maker who has just gotten his big break in `` the biz . ``
translation: セバスチャン・コルテスは、映画業界での大きなチャンスを手にした新進気鋭の映画製作者です。
back_translation: Sebastian Cortez is an up-and-coming filmmaker who has seized a major opportunity in the film industry.

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues `` on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: 時には多くの「深刻な問題」を抱え込みがちですが、それでも比較的軽やかで、常に楽しませてくれ、巧みに書かれています。
back_translation: Sometimes it tends to carry a lot of "serious issues," yet it remains relatively light-hearted, always entertaining, and skillfully written.

text: the way coppola professes his love for movies -- both colorful pop junk and the classics that unequivocally qualify as art -- is giddily entertaining .
translation: コッポラが映画への愛を表現する方法、カラフルなポップなゴミから明確にアートと見なされるクラシックまで、は心躍るように楽しい。
back_translation: Coppola's way of expressing his love for cinema is thrillingly fun, ranging from colorful, poppy trash to classics that are clearly considered art.

text: ben has a way of making trouble for julie .
translation: ベンはジュリーにトラブルを引き起こす方法を持っている。
back_translation: Ben has a way of causing trouble for Julie.

text: a spellbinding african film about the modern condition of rootlessness , a state experienced by millions around the globe .
translation: 現代のルートレスな状態についての魅力的なアフリカ映画で、これは世界中の何百万もの人々が経験している状態です。
back_translation: An intriguing African film about the modern rootless state, which is a condition experienced by millions of people around the world.

text: this gently retro story of a young morman missionary in the pacific islands of tonga loses some wholesomeness points due to some smug insularity .
translation: この穏やかなレトロストーリーは、トンガの太平洋の島々にいる若いモルモン宣教師の物語であり、いくつかの自己満足的な内向性のために、いくつかの健全さのポイントを失っています。
back_translation: This gentle retro story is about a young Mormon missionary in the Pacific islands of Tonga, and due to some self-satisfied introversion, it loses a few points of soundness.

text: meanwhile , assistant chief holland , the only man in the department willing to stand up to the sis , threatens to end perry 's brand of singlehanded `` justice `` on the los angeles streets .
translation: 一方、部門で唯一SISに立ち向かう意志を持つハランド助理長は、ペリーのロサンゼルスの街での独自の「正義」を終わらせると脅迫しています。
back_translation: On the other hand, Assistant Director Harland, the only one in the department with the will to confront SIS, threatens to put an end to Perry's unique "justice" in the streets of Los Angeles.

text: tired , bruised and out of breath , they finally free the professor and arrive at the temple of faramundi scant minutes before gallo and his men .
translation: 疲れ果て、打撲と息切れの中で、彼らはようやく教授を解放し、ガロと彼の部下たちの数分前にファラムンディの神殿に到着した。
back_translation: Exhausted and out of breath from bruises, they finally freed the professor and arrived at the Temple of Pharamundi just a few minutes before Gallo and his subordinates.

text: fbi agent will graham has been called out of early retirement to catch a serial killer , known by authorities as `` the tooth fairy `` .
translation: FBIエージェントのウィル・グラハムは、連続殺人犯「歯の妖精」として知られる人物を捕まえるために早期退職から呼び戻された。
back_translation: FBI agent Will Graham was called back from early retirement to catch a serial killer known as the "Tooth Fairy."

text: the story revolves around lucy kelson ( bullock ) , a brilliant but neurotic attorney , and her client ( grant ) , who is `` charming , irresponsible and fabulously wealthy . ``
translation: 物語は、優秀だが神経質な弁護士ルーシー・ケルソン（サンドラ・ブロック）と、"魅力的で無責任で信じられないほど裕福"な彼女のクライアント（ヒュー・グラント）を中心に展開します。
back_translation: The story revolves around Lucy Kelson (Sandra Bullock), a brilliant but neurotic lawyer, and her "charming, irresponsible, and unbelievably wealthy" client (Hugh Grant).

text: zak quickly learns how to manipulate the device , and he and his quick-witted , beautiful new friend , francesca , have some real fun .
translation: ザックは素早くその装置の操作方法を学び、彼と機知に富んだ美しい新しい友人フランチェスカは本当に楽しい時間を過ごします。
back_translation: Zach quickly learns how to operate the device, and he and his witty and beautiful new friend Francesca have a really fun time together.

text: meanwhile , puteri megawati , who is very thankful to the mysterious guy that saved her , meets siti shahirah , a member of the paparazzi that as usual , is looking for sensational news .
translation: その間、神秘的な人物に救われたことに非常に感謝しているプトリ・メガワティは、いつものようにセンセーショナルなニュースを探しているパパラッチのメンバー、シティ・シャヒラと出会います。
back_translation: During that time, Putri Megawati, who is very grateful to have been saved by a mysterious figure, meets City Shakira, a member of the paparazzi who is always searching for sensational news.

text: nete is a tough woman of 35 who runs her job , husband , and teenage daughter with a firm and efficient hand .
translation: ネーテは35歳のたくましい女性で、仕事、夫、そしてティーンエイジャーの娘をしっかりと効率的に管理している。
back_translation: Nate is a strong 35-year-old woman who manages her job, husband, and teenage daughter efficiently and effectively.

text: high drama , disney-style - a wing and a prayer and a hunky has-been pursuing his castle in the sky .
translation: 高ドラマ、ディズニー風 - 翼と祈り、そして空の城を追い求めるハンサムな過去の英雄。
back_translation: High drama, Disney-style - A handsome hero from the past chasing wings, prayers, and a castle in the sky.

text: nothing but an episode of smackdown ! in period costume and with a bigger budget .
translation: ただのスマックダウンのエピソードで、時代衣装を着て、大きな予算があるだけです。
back_translation: It's just an episode of SmackDown, with period costumes and a big budget.

text: since the shoe is his , kumin is then declared the `` mr .
translation: 靴は彼のものであるため、クミンは「ミスター」と宣言されました。
back_translation: Since the shoes belong to him, Kumin was declared as "Mister."

text: a movie that ca n't get sufficient distance from leroy 's delusions to escape their maudlin influence .
translation: レイロイの妄想から十分な距離を取れず、その感傷的な影響から逃れることができない映画。
back_translation: A movie that cannot distance itself sufficiently from Leiloi's delusions and cannot escape their sentimental influence.

text: making matters worse , vince is having trouble discerning reality from memory .
translation: 事態を悪化させているのは、ヴィンスが現実と記憶を区別するのに苦労していることです。
back_translation: What is worsening the situation is that Vince is struggling to distinguish between reality and memory.

text: when every one suspects that it is him , the trio then set out to find the culprit and find out more than they bargained for : the diary of tom riddle , why hagrid was expelled and what the chamber of secrets is and why is it so feared in hogwarts .
translation: 誰もが彼だと疑うとき、三人は真犯人を見つけるために出発し、予想以上のことを発見します。それはトム・リドルの日記、ハグリッドが追放された理由、そして秘密の部屋が何であり、なぜホグワーツでそれが如此恐れられているのかです。
back_translation: When everyone doubts him, the three set out to find the real culprit and discover more than they expected. It is Tom Riddle's diary, the reason why Hagrid was expelled, and what the Chamber of Secrets is and why it is so feared at Hogwarts.

text: anyone who professes to love movies should see alexander sokurov 's russian ark .
translation: 映画を愛すると公言する人は誰でも、アレクサンダー・ソクーロフの「ロシアン・アーク」を見るべきです。
back_translation: Anyone who claims to love movies should watch Alexander Sokurov's "Russian Ark."

text: director robert rodriguez has once again caught lightning in a bottle .
translation: 監督ロバート・ロドリゲスは再び稲妻を瓶に収めました。
back_translation: Director Robert Rodriguez has captured lightning in a bottle once again.

text: dazzling in its complexity , disturbing for its extraordinary themes , the piano teacher is a film that defies categorisation . it haunts , horrifies , startles and fascinates ; it is impossible to look away . ah yes , and then there 's the music . . .
translation: その複雑さに眩いばかりで、不思議なテーマに不安を覚える「ピアノ教師」という映画は、カテゴライズを拒む作品です。観る者を取り憑かせ、恐怖を与え、驚かせ、魅了します；目を逸らすことは不可能です。ああ、そういえば、音楽もありますね…。
back_translation: The film "Piano Teacher," with its dazzling complexity, is a work that rejects categorization and evokes a sense of unease around its mysterious themes. It captivates viewers, instills fear, surprises, and enchants; it is impossible to look away. Oh, and by the way, there’s music too...

text: this has to be one of the most bizarre love stories ever to be filmed , not since nine M-= weeks has anybody done this much pampering for his 'girlfriend ' .
translation: これは、映像化された中で最も奇妙なラブストーリーの一つに違いない。9週間以来、これほどまでに「彼女」のために世話をした人はいない。
back_translation: This must be one of the strangest love stories ever portrayed on screen. No one has cared for "her" as much as this in nine weeks.

text: a compelling , gut-clutching piece of advocacy cinema that carries you along in a torrent of emotion as it explores the awful complications of one terrifying day .
translation: 感情の渦に巻き込まれ、一つの恐ろしい日の悲惨な複雑さを探る、心を揺さぶる圧倒的なアドボカシー映画。
back_translation: A heart-wrenching and overwhelming advocacy film that delves into the horrendous complexity of a single terrifying day, caught up in a whirlwind of emotions.

text: an affable but undernourished romantic comedy that fails to match the freshness of the actress-producer and writer 's previous collaboration , miss congeniality .
translation: 愛想の良いものの栄養不足なロマンティックコメディーで、女優・プロデューサー兼作家の以前のコラボレーション作『ミス・コンジェニアリティ』の新鮮さには及んでいない。
back_translation: It's a charming yet nutritionally deficient romantic comedy that doesn't quite match the freshness of the actress, producer, and writer's previous collaboration, "Miss Congeniality."

text: like carlos and mickey , sean and eddie are best friends .
translation: カーロスとミッキーのように、ショーンとエディも親友です。
back_translation: Like Carlos and Mikey, Shawn and Eddie are also best friends.

text: context is provided by those who protested against segregation and the limited franchise earlier in bermuda by authoring a `` secret document `` that analysed the social problems of the island .
translation: バミューダでの人種隔離と限られた選挙権に反対した人々は、島の社会問題を分析した「秘密文書」を作成しました。
back_translation: People who opposed racial segregation and limited voting rights in Bermuda created a "secret document" that analyzed the social issues of the island.

text: the entire movie is in need of a scented bath .
translation: 映画全体が香りのある入浴を必要としている。
back_translation: The entire movie needs a fragrant bath.

text: this is a movie that made me smile for two hours straight .
translation: これは私を2時間ずっと笑顔にさせてくれた映画です。
back_translation: This movie kept me smiling for two hours straight.

text: the film centres around three female supermodels who live and work together .
translation: その映画は、一緒に住み、働く三人の女性スーパーモデルを中心に展開します。
back_translation: The movie revolves around three female supermodels who live and work together.

text: as they become jaded by watching these brutal fights , and betting becomes boring , the bosses realize that they need to take the fights to a new limit .
translation: 彼らがこれらの brutalな戦いを見て飽きてしまい、賭けが退屈になってくると、ボスたちは戦いを新たな限界に引き上げる必要があることに気づく。
back_translation: As they grow bored watching these brutal battles and the betting becomes monotonous, the bosses realize that they need to raise the fights to a new level.

text: now i can see why people thought i was too hard on `` the mothman prophecies `` .
translation: 今、なぜ人々が私が「モスマン予言」に対して厳しすぎると思ったのかがわかります。
back_translation: Now I understand why people thought I was too harsh regarding the "Mothman Prophecies."

text: audrey tatou has a knack for picking roles that magnify her outrageous charm , and in this literate french comedy , she 's as morning-glory exuberant as she was in amM-ilie .
translation: オードリー・トトゥは彼女の魅力を引き立てる役を選ぶ才能があり、この教養あるフランスのコメディで彼女は「アメリ」の時と同様に朝顔のような活気に満ちています。
back_translation: Audrey Tautou has a talent for choosing roles that enhance her charm, and in this cultured French comedy, she is as vibrant as she was in "Amélie."

text: one of the best cat-and-mouse movies to come along in a while , leo has great fun in the role .
translation: 久しぶりに登場した最高のネコとネズミの映画のひとつで、レオはその役割を楽しんでいます。
back_translation: One of the best cat and mouse movies to make a comeback after a long time, Leo is enjoying his role.

text: provides a satisfactory overview of the bizarre world of extreme athletes as several daredevils express their own views .
translation: 極限アスリートの奇妙な世界について満足のいく概要を提供しており、いくつかのデアデビルが自分の意見を表現しています。
back_translation: It provides a satisfactory overview of the strange world of extreme athletes, with some daredevils expressing their opinions.

text: skin deep is a psychological thriller about love , sex , race , and betrayal involving an interracial couple , a black couple , and a mistress .
translation: スキン・ディープは、愛、セックス、人種、そして裏切りに関する心理的スリラーであり、異人種間のカップル、黒人カップル、そして愛人が関与しています。
back_translation: Skin Deep is a psychological thriller about love, sex, race, and betrayal, involving an interracial couple, a Black couple, and a mistress.

text: big yard operates a child smuggling ring and 'superbob ' must save dante or lose his son forever .
translation: ビッグヤードは子供の密売組織を運営しており、「スーパーボブ」はダンテを救わなければ、息子を永遠に失ってしまう。
back_translation: Big Yard runs a child trafficking organization, and if "Super Bob" doesn't save Dante, he will lose his son forever.

text: like coming into a long-running , well-written television series where you 've missed the first half-dozen episodes and probably wo n't see the next six .
translation: 長期間続いている、よく書かれたテレビシリーズに入るようなもので、最初の半ダースのエピソードを見逃し、恐らく次の6話も見ることができないような感覚です。
back_translation: It's like getting into a well-written TV series that has been going on for a long time, where you missed the first half dozen episodes and probably won't be able to watch the next six either.

text: they discover that the one sho stole them is a rival of the criminal , while they go to every single one of his associates to find who has them .
translation: 彼らは、彼らを奪った者が犯罪者のライバルであることを発見し、誰が彼らを持っているのかを見つけるために彼の全ての協力者を訪ねていきます。
back_translation: They discover that the one who kidnapped them is a rival criminal and goes to visit all of his accomplices to find out who has them.

text: both an admirable reconstruction of terrible events , and a fitting memorial to the dead of that day , and of the thousands thereafter .
translation: terribleな出来事の見事な再構築であり、その日とその後の何千人もの死者へのふさわしい追悼である。
back_translation: It is a magnificent reconstruction of a terrible event and a fitting tribute to the thousands of deaths on that day and afterward.

text: intent on exacting bloody revenge on the reunited english friends murray possesses the body of a guest and turns him into a murderer .
translation: イギリスの友人たちに血まみれの復讐を果たすことに固執するマレーは、客の体を乗っ取り、彼を殺人者に変えてしまう。
back_translation: Determined to take bloody revenge on his British friends, Murray possesses the body of a guest and turns him into a murderer.
