text: this story centers around a divorced woman in her 30 's and her daughter , who are caught up in a cat-and-mouse game inside their new new york brownstone when three burglars come looking for a hidden cache of cash .
translation: この物語は、30代の離婚した女性と彼女の娘が、新しいニューヨークのブラウンストーンで現れる3人の強盗によって隠された現金の隠し場所を探し求められる中、猫とネズミのゲームに巻き込まれる様子を描いています。
back_translation: This story depicts a divorced woman in her 30s and her daughter becoming embroiled in a cat-and-mouse game as they search for a hidden stash of cash hidden by three robbers who appear in their new brownstone in New York.

text: detective mi yun ( played by yum jung-ah ) , and her newly appointed partner , detective kang ( played by ji jin-hee ) , are assigned to the case .
translation: 刑事ミ・ユン（ユム・ジョンアが演じる）と、彼女の新しく任命されたパートナーである刑事カン（ジ・ジンヒが演じる）がこの事件に割り当てられます。
back_translation: Detective Mi Yoon (played by Yum Jung Ah) and her newly appointed partner, Detective Kang (played by Ji Jin Hee), are assigned to this case.

text: nete forces a doctor to tell her how much time he has left .
translation: ネットは医者に彼がどれくらいの時間を残しているかを告げるよう強いる。
back_translation: The internet forces the doctor to reveal how much time he has left.

text: the next morning , their friday gets freaky when tess and anna find themselves inside the wrong bodies .
translation: 翌朝、テスとアンナは間違った体の中にいることに気づき、金曜日が奇妙なことになります。
back_translation: The next morning, Tess and Anna realize they are in the wrong bodies, and Friday becomes strange.

text: a lowly thug , gigli ( ben affleck ) , is assigned to kidnap the psychologically challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor to save his mobster boss from incarceration .
translation: 低俗な暴力団員ギグリ（ベン・アフレック）は、彼のマフィアのボスを投獄から救うために、強力な連邦検察官の精神的に障害のある弟を誘拐する任務を負わされる。
back_translation: A lowlife gang member, Gigli (Ben Affleck), is tasked with kidnapping the mentally challenged brother of a powerful federal prosecutor in order to save his mafia boss from prison.

text: cinephiles will appreciate the fine camerawork and overall mise-en-scene , but people just heading out for a popcorn pleaser will likely be disappointed .
translation: 映画愛好家は優れたカメラワークと全体的なミザンセーヌを評価するでしょうが、ポップコーンをつまみに出かける人々はおそらく失望するでしょう。
back_translation: Film enthusiasts will appreciate the excellent camera work and overall mise-en-scène, but people who go out for a snack of popcorn will likely be disappointed.

text: former world-rallye-champion walter and his daughter natascha are kidnapped by arab terrorists and brought to berlin .
translation: 元世界ラリー選手権チャンピオンのウォルターと彼の娘ナターシャは、アラブのテロリストに誘拐され、ベルリンに連れて行かれます。
back_translation: Former World Rally Championship champion Walter and his daughter Natasha are kidnapped by Arab terrorists and taken to Berlin.

text: it wants to be thought of as a subversive little indie film , but it has all the qualities of a modern situation comedy .
translation: それは宗教的なインディ映画として考えられたいと思っているが、現代のシチュエーションコメディのすべての特質を持っている。
back_translation: It is intended to be considered as a religious indie film, but it possesses all the characteristics of a modern situational comedy.

text: in their new environment , the men relinquish their frat mentality and realize how hurtful they have been to women over the years .
translation: 新しい環境で、男性たちはフラットメンタリティを手放し、長年にわたって女性たちにどれほど傷を与えてきたかを理解します。
back_translation: In the new environment, the men let go of their flat mentality and understand how much harm they have caused to women over the years.

text: brian knows that tonight the evil has finally come to claim him .
translation: ブライアンは今夜、悪がついに彼を迎えに来たことを知っている。
back_translation: Brian knows that evil has finally come to take him away tonight.

text: in 1946 , tests began using nazi v-1 `` buzz bombs `` launched from the decks of american diesel submarines .
translation: 1946年、アメリカのディーゼル潜水艦の甲板から発射されたナチスのV-1「バズボム」を使用したテストが始まりました。
back_translation: In 1946, tests began using the Nazi V-1 "buzz bomb" launched from the deck of an American diesel submarine.

text: in adobo , ethnicity is not just the spice , but at the heart of more universal concerns .
translation: アドボにおいて、民族性は単なるスパイスではなく、より普遍的な関心事の中心にあります。
back_translation: In advocacy, ethnicity is not just a spice but is at the center of more universal concerns.

text: die another day is only intermittently entertaining but it 's hard not to be a sucker for its charms , or perhaps it 's just impossible not to feel nostalgia for movies you grew up with .
translation: 「ダイ・アナザー・デイ」は断続的にしか楽しめないが、その魅力に引き込まれるのは難しい。もしかしたら、成長過程で観た映画に対するノスタルジーを感じることが不可能なだけなのかもしれない。
back_translation: "Die Another Day" can only be enjoyed intermittently, but it's hard to get drawn into its charm. Perhaps it’s simply impossible to feel nostalgia for a movie watched during the growth process.

text: when one of them tells the other a rumor that he might be a homicidal maniac they are all scared of him .
translation: 一人が他の人に、彼が殺人狂かもしれないという噂を教えたとき、彼らは皆彼を怖がる。
back_translation: When one person tells others that he might be a killer, they all become afraid of him.

text: faced with a $ 10 million lawsuit , the department agrees to let producer chase renzi film mitch 's investigation for a new reality tv show , and constantly tries to make everything more `` viewer friendly `` by changing everything about mitch 's life to fit the stereotypical view of police officers -- and partners him with trey .
translation: 1000万ドルの訴訟に直面した警察署は、プロデューサーのチェイス・レンジにミッチの捜査を新しいリアリティTVショーのために撮影させることに同意し、常にミッチの人生に関するすべてを警察官のステレオタイプに合うように変更して「視聴者に優しい」ものにしようとする。そして、彼はトレイとコンビを組むことになる。
back_translation: Facing a $10 million lawsuit, the police department agrees to let producer Chase Range film Mitch's investigation for a new reality TV show, trying to alter everything about Mitch's life to fit the stereotype of a police officer and make it more "viewer-friendly." He will team up with Trey.

text: it might be the first sci-fi comedy that could benefit from a three 's company-style laugh track .
translation: それは、3人のカンパニー風の笑い声トラックの恩恵を受けることができる最初のSFコメディかもしれません。
back_translation: It may be the first sci-fi comedy that can benefit from the laughter track of a company of three.

text: so , he and a few friends , try to cover up his disability , without the studio executives or the producers knowing that he is directing the film blind .
translation: 彼と数人の友人は、スタジオの幹部やプロデューサーが彼が盲目で映画を監督していることを知らないように、彼の障害を隠そうとしています。
back_translation: He and a few friends are trying to hide his disability so that the studio executives and producers do not know that he is blind and directing the film.

text: this romantic comedy , described as an african-american when harry met sally . . . , centers on a romance between an a & # 38 ; r exec , dre ( diggs ) , at a hip-hop label and a magazine editor , sidney ( lathan ) , who have known each other since childhood .
translation: このロマンティック・コメディは、『ハリーとサリーが出会った時』のアフリカ系アメリカ人版として描かれており、ヒップホップレーベルのA&Rエグゼクティブであるドレ（ディグス）と、幼なじみの雑誌編集者シドニー（レイサン）とのロマンスを中心に展開しています。
back_translation: This romantic comedy is depicted as the African American version of "When Harry Met Sally," focusing on the romance between Dre (Diggs), an A&R executive at a hip-hop label, and his childhood friend, magazine editor Sidney (Leyshon).

text: the film actually gets to tackle some larger questions than one normally finds in the average fireball drama .
translation: その映画は、通常の火球ドラマでは見られないような大きな問題に実際に取り組んでいます。
back_translation: The movie actually addresses significant issues that are not typically seen in regular fireball dramas.

text: harnessing the explosive momentum of the internet , anime heralds a revolution in 21st century youth culture .
translation: インターネットの爆発的な勢いを活用し、アニメは21世紀の若者文化に革命をもたらします。
back_translation: By harnessing the explosive power of the Internet, anime brings about a revolution in the youth culture of the 21st century.

text: paul 's true romantic feelings soon surface and jenny finds things to be a little more than she can handle .
translation: ポールの本当のロマンチックな感情がすぐに表面化し、ジェニーは物事が彼女が対処できる以上のものになっていることに気づきます。
back_translation: Paul's true romantic feelings quickly come to the surface, and Jenny realizes that things have become more than she can handle.

text: they have to prepare for some action as the there will be a full moon tonight . . .
translation: 彼らは今夜満月があるため、何らかの行動を準備しなければならない。
back_translation: They must prepare for some kind of action because there is a full moon tonight.

text: but as she comes home , she opens a mysterious door that leads her to an artificial world : the holo-deck .
translation: しかし、彼女が帰宅すると、彼女を人工の世界へと導く神秘的な扉を開きます：ホロデッキ。
back_translation: However, when she returns home, a mysterious door opens that leads her into an artificial world: the holodeck.

text: although she came back to the house in order to sell it , things begin to take a different direction : the house itself , the furniture and other equipment in it seem to become alive for anna , recalling images of her past , her beloved parents and her friend max , who once gave her shelter from the raging policemen when she took part as a photo journalist in a political demonstration in berlin .
translation: 彼女は家を売るために戻ってきたが、物事は異なる方向に進み始める。家そのものや中の家具、その他の設備がアナにとって生きているように思え、彼女の過去や愛する両親、政治デモにフォトジャーナリストとして参加した際、暴れ回る警官から彼女を守ってくれた友人マックスの記憶を呼び起こす。
back_translation: She returned to sell the house, but things begin to take a different turn. The house itself, along with the furniture and other belongings inside, seem alive to Ana, evoking memories of her past, her beloved parents, and her friend Max, who protected her from the rampaging police during a political demonstration when she participated as a photojournalist.

text: scared of death , winnie must choose between being immortal and being with jesse or following the circle of life and dying someday .
translation: 死を恐れるウィニーは、不死でいることとジェシーと一緒にいること、または生命の循環に従っていつか死ぬことの間で選ばなければなりません。
back_translation: Winnie, who fears death, must choose between being immortal and being with Jesse, or eventually dying according to the cycle of life.

text: the writers , director wally wolodarsky , and all the actors should start their own coeducational fraternity : kappa rho alpha phi .
translation: 作家、監督のワリー・ウォロダースキー、そして全ての俳優たちは自分たちの共学のフラタニティを始めるべきです：カッパ・ロー・アルファ・ファイ。
back_translation: The writer and director Wally Wolodarsky, along with all the actors, should start their co-educational fraternity: Kappa Ro Alpha Phi.

text: it is quickly agreed however , that selling chocolates door to door , or fire powered potato guns to children , may be too complicated .
translation: しかし、チョコレートをドアからドアへ売ったり、子供たちに火力のあるじゃがいも銃を売ったりするのは、少し複雑すぎるということですぐに合意されました。
back_translation: However, it was quickly agreed that selling chocolate from door to door and selling powerful potato guns to children was a bit too complicated.

text: the minor figures surrounding [ bobby ] . . . form a gritty urban mosaic .
translation: [ボビー]の周りにいるマイナーな人物たちは、 grittyな都市のモザイクを形成している。
back_translation: The minor characters around Bobby form a gritty mosaic of the city.

text: a garden-fresh morality tale for the kids , with monty python-inspired humor .
translation: 子供たちのための新鮮な道徳的なお話で、モンティ・パイソンにインスパイアされたユーモアが満載です。
back_translation: A fresh moral story for children, filled with humor inspired by Monty Python.

text: smart , sassy interpretation of the oscar wilde play .
translation: オスカー・ワイルドの戯曲のスマートで生意気な解釈。
back_translation: A smart and cheeky interpretation of Oscar Wilde's play.

text: lan yu seems altogether too slight to be called any kind of masterpiece . it is , however , a completely honest , open-hearted film that should appeal to anyone willing to succumb to it .
translation: 「蓝宇」はあまりにも軽薄で、何らかの傑作と呼ぶには足りないように思える。しかし、これは完全に正直でオープンな心を持った映画であり、それに心を開く意欲のある人には魅力的であるべきだ。
back_translation: "Blue Universe" seems too frivolous to be called a masterpiece. However, it is a film with a completely honest and open heart, and it should be appealing to those willing to open their hearts to it.

text: this spider-woman , secretly connected to the mob , has jealously controlled patricia 's life as well as the one of her husband , casino owner francis hiller ( timothy bottoms ) .
translation: このスパイダーウーマンは、密かにマフィアとつながっており、パトリシアの人生と彼女の夫でカジノオーナーのフランシス・ヒラー（ティモシー・ボトムズ）の人生を嫉妬深く管理してきました。
back_translation: This Spider-Woman is secretly connected to the mafia and has been jealously managing Patricia's life and that of her husband, casino owner Francis Hiller (Timothy Bottoms).

text: but then the crew detects a break-in on their computer systems , and picard is captured by the romulans because shinzon needs him as his only matching supplier of genetic material .
translation: しかし、その後、乗組員はコンピュータシステムへの侵入を検知し、ピカードはロミュランに捕らえられます。シンゾンは彼を唯一の同じ遺伝物質の供給者として必要としているからです。
back_translation: However, afterwards, the crew detects an intrusion into the computer system, and Picard is captured by the Romulans. Shinzon needs him as the only source of the same genetic material.

text: a romantic comedy that operates by the rules of its own self-contained universe .
translation: 自己完結したユニバースのルールに基づいて展開するロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: A romantic comedy that unfolds based on the rules of a self-contained universe.

text: this 72-minute film does have some exciting scenes , but it 's a tad slow .
translation: この72分の映画にはいくつかの興奮するシーンがありますが、少し遅いです。
back_translation: This 72-minute movie has some exciting scenes, but it is a bit slow.

text: john was one of the first porn stars to push for aids testing in the porn industry .
translation: ジョンはポルノ業界でエイズ検査を推進する最初のポルノスターの一人でした。
back_translation: John was one of the first porn stars to advocate for AIDS testing in the porn industry.

text: the driver finds himself in a dangerous , yet highly political situation ; this time being pursued by a helicopter gunship while carrying a passenger with a suitcase . . .
translation: 運転手は危険でありながら非常に政治的な状況に置かれています。今回は、スーツケースを持った乗客を運びながらヘリコプターの攻撃機に追われています。。。
back_translation: The driver is in a very dangerous and political situation. This time, they are being chased by helicopter gunships while transporting passengers with suitcases...

text: comedic high jinks ensue as the two go on the lam and start to fall in love .
translation: コメディーなハイジャンクスが展開し、二人は逃避行をしながら恋に落ち始める。
back_translation: A comedic hijinks unfolds as the two begin to fall in love while going on the run.

text: wounded by tom 's derision , michael befriends ex-convict everette hatch , who , recognizing opportunity , exploits michael 's ideas to his advantage .
translation: トムの嘲笑に傷ついたマイケルは、元受刑者のエヴレット・ハッチと友達になります。エヴレットはチャンスを認識し、マイケルのアイデアを自分の利益のために利用します。
back_translation: Hurt by Tom's ridicule, Michael becomes friends with former inmate Everett Hatch. Everett recognizes the opportunity and exploits Michael's ideas for his own benefit.

text: but a sassy hispanic angel in a mets cap and jacket wrestles joe in an alleyway and makes him listen to the divine message of the miraculous , `` fear not . ``
translation: しかし、メッツのキャップとジャケットを着た生意気なヒスパニックの天使が路地でジョーと wrestleし、彼に神秘的なメッセージ「恐れるな」を聞かせる。
back_translation: However, a cheeky Hispanic angel wearing a Mets cap and jacket wrestles with Joe in an alley, conveying to him the mysterious message "Don't be afraid."

text: she entranced the founder of the museum of art ( masp ) where the fashion parade was being held , and her career was hence launched .
translation: 彼女は美術館（MASP）の創設者を魅了し、ファッションパレードが開催されている場所で彼女のキャリアはスタートしました。
back_translation: She captivated the founder of the museum (MASP), and her career began in a place where a fashion parade was being held.

text: about schmidt is undoubtedly one of the finest films of the year . if you 're not deeply touched by this movie , check your pulse .
translation: 「アバウト・シュミット」は間違いなく今年の最高の映画の一つです。この映画に深く感動しないなら、自分の脈を確かめてください。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" is undoubtedly one of the best films of the year. If you are not deeply moved by this movie, you might want to check your pulse.

text: what about charlotte : can pally let his heart take the lead ?
translation: シャーロットについてはどうですか：パリーは心の導きに任せることができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: What about Charlotte: Can Paris trust the guidance of her heart?

text: schnitzler does a fine job contrasting the sleekness of the film 's present with the playful paranoia of the film 's past .
translation: シュニッツラーは、映画の現在の洗練さと過去の遊び心満載のパラノイアを対比させるのがうまい。
back_translation: Schnitzler is good at contrasting the current sophistication of films with the playful paranoia of the past.

text: the only way to find out though what really happened is to enter the site itself . . .
translation: 実際に何が起こったのかを知る唯一の方法は、その場所自体に入ることです。。。
back_translation: The only way to truly know what happened is to enter the place itself...

text: mostly centered on indianapolis , this film puts this problem ( which many assume to be an urban phenomenon ) firmly in the heartland of the usa .
translation: 主にインディアナポリスを中心に、この映画は多くの人が都市現象と考えているこの問題をアメリカのハートランドにしっかりと位置づけています。
back_translation: Primarily centered around Indianapolis, this film firmly places the issue, which many consider an urban phenomenon, in the heartland of America.

text: slackers ' jokey approach to college education is disappointingly simplistic -- the film 's biggest problem -- and there are no unforgettably stupid stunts or uproariously rude lines of dialogue to remember it by .
translation: スラッカーズの大学教育に対する冗談めいたアプローチは失望するほど単純であり、映画の最大の問題です。また、記憶に残るような愚かなスタントや爆笑するほどの失礼なセリフもありません。
back_translation: The Sluggers' humorous approach to college education is disappointingly simple, and it's the film's biggest problem. Additionally, there are no memorable silly stunts or laugh-out-loud rude lines.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .
translation: 切り込んだハリウッドの風刺になるはずだったものが、代わりに先週の「バラエティ」の号と同じくらい新鮮さがない。
back_translation: What was supposed to be a sharp satire of Hollywood instead lacks the freshness of last week's issue of "Variety."

text: when an international criminal ( dacascos ) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader ( dmx ) as part of a diamond heist , it causes a city 's police to engage in an intensive search ( led by a government agent played by li ) , aided by the father 's gangsters .
translation: 国際的な犯罪者（ダカスコス）がギャングのリーダー（DMX）の娘をダイヤモンド強盗の一環として誘拐すると、それは都市の警察を集中的な捜索に巻き込む（リーが演じる政府のエージェントが主導）、父親のギャングたちの助けを借りて。
back_translation: When an international criminal (Dakasuko) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader (DMX) as part of a diamond heist, it leads to a concentrated manhunt by the city's police, led by a government agent played by Lee, with the help of the father’s gang.

text: while she is away a strange man with an axe comes into the motel room and attacks matt .
translation: 彼女がいない間、奇妙な男が斧を持ってモーテルの部屋に入り、マットを襲います。
back_translation: While she is away, a strange man enters the motel room with an axe and attacks Matt.

text: brosnan gives a portrayal as solid and as perfect as his outstanding performance as bond in die another day .
translation: ブロスナンは、「ダイ・アナザー・デイ」のボンドとしての素晴らしい演技と同様に、しっかりとした完璧な演技を披露しています。
back_translation: Brosnan delivers a solid and flawless performance, just like his wonderful portrayal as Bond in "Die Another Day."

text: for those who like quirky , slightly strange french films , this is a must !
translation: quirkyで少し変わったフランス映画が好きな人には、これは必見です！
back_translation: For those who love quirky and slightly unusual French films, this is a must-see!

text: for the most part , director anne-sophie birot 's first feature is a sensitive , extraordinarily well-acted drama .
translation: 大部分において、アン＝ソフィー・ビロの初長編映画は、繊細で extraordinarly よく演じられたドラマです。
back_translation: For the most part, Anne-Sophie Birot's debut feature film is a delicate and extraordinarily well-acted drama.

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .
translation: 良い性格のアンサンブルコメディで、豪華なキャストを最大限に活かそうと頑張っているが、いつも成功には至らない。
back_translation: It's a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries to make the most of its luxurious cast, but it always falls short of success.

text: adding to the situation is a killer hurricane bearing down on the island .
translation: 島に接近している凶悪なハリケーンが状況を悪化させている。
back_translation: A vicious hurricane approaching the island is worsening the situation.

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ``
translation: 「ライオン・キング以来の最高のディズニー映画」
back_translation: "The best Disney movie since The Lion King."

text: this is mild-mannered , been-there material given a pedestrian spin by a director who needed a touch of the flamboyant , the outrageous .
translation: これは穏やかな性格の、経験豊富な素材であり、派手さや非凡さを必要とした監督によって平凡に仕上げられています。
back_translation: This is a gentle personality, an experienced material that has been polished to mediocrity by directors who required extravagance and brilliance.

text: andrew is infatuated with sannah and fantazises about her but believes there 's no chance she will like him if she gets to know him , so he decides it 's better they never meet for real . . .
translation: アンドリューはサンナに夢中で、彼女について幻想を抱いていますが、もし彼女が彼を知ったら自分を好きになる可能性はないと信じているため、実際に会わない方がいいと決めています……。
back_translation: Andrew is infatuated with Sanna and has fantasies about her, but because he believes there is no chance she would like him if she knew him, he decides that it’s better not to meet her in person...

text: it is the first time ever that he leaves the desolate village in the balkan mountains .
translation: 彼がバルカン山脈の荒れ果てた村を離れるのは初めてのことです。
back_translation: This is the first time he is leaving the desolate village in the Balkan Mountains.

text: truth is stranger than fiction , so the old saying goes . in 'catch me if you can , ' it 's also more entertaining .
translation: 真実はフィクションより奇妙である、という古い言い回しがあります。『キャッチ・ミー・イフ・ユー・キャン』では、それはもっと面白いものでもあります。
back_translation: There is an old saying that truth is stranger than fiction. In "Catch Me If You Can," it is something even more interesting.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride . but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: 大予算にもかかわらず、この映画は今年のレーダースクリーンでは微々たる存在であり、ただそのまま楽しんでしまうのが魅力的です。しかし今回は、古いMIBのラベルは「穏やかさが良いわけではない」という意味です。
back_translation: Despite the large budget, this movie has been a barely noticeable presence on this year's radar screen, and there's something appealing about just enjoying it as it is. However, this time, the old MIB label means "being calm is not necessarily good."

text: while the topic has grown heavier here , [ moretti 's ] touch has not , and that disparity is precisely what gives the film its sustained poignancy .
translation: 話題はここで重たくなったが、モレッティのタッチは変わらず、まさにその不均衡が映画に持続的な感動を与えている。
back_translation: The conversation has become heavy here, but Moretti's touch remains unchanged; it is precisely that imbalance that gives the film a lasting emotional impact.

text: a murder in the camp gives him the chance to set a risky plan in motion .
translation: キャンプでの殺人が、彼にリスクの高い計画を実行に移すチャンスを与える。
back_translation: The murder at the camp gives him the chance to carry out a high-risk plan.

text: hot on the trail of the principle villains , bond travels to iceland where he experiences at first hand the power of an amazing new weapon before a dramatic confrontation with his main adversary back in korea where it all started . . .
translation: 主要な悪役の手がかりを追って、ボンドはアイスランドに向かい、驚くべき新兵器の力を直接体験します。そして、すべてが始まった韓国で、彼の主要な敵と劇的な対決を果たします。。。
back_translation: Following clues about the main villain, Bond heads to Iceland, where he directly experiences the power of an astonishing new weapon. Then, in South Korea, where it all began, he has a dramatic confrontation with his main enemy...

text: partly because of the severe regime of a dreadful nurse , the five decide to escape from their new home and go back to the old one under their own steam .
translation: 恐ろしい看護師の厳しい管理のために、5人は新しい家から逃げ出し、自力で古い家に戻ることを決める。
back_translation: Due to the strict control of the terrifying nurse, the five decide to escape from the new house and make their way back to the old house on their own.

text: a profoundly stupid affair , populating its hackneyed and meanspirited storyline with cardboard characters and performers who value cash above credibility .
translation: 極めて愚かな出来事で、陳腐で意地悪なストーリーラインに、キャッシュを信用よりも重視する平面的なキャラクターと演者たちが満載されている。
back_translation: It is an extremely foolish event, filled with a clichéd and spiteful storyline, featuring flat characters and performers that prioritize cash over credibility.

text: de niro looks bored , murphy recycles murphy , and you mentally add showtime to the pile of hollywood dreck that represents nothing more than the art of the deal .
translation: デ・ニーロは退屈そうで、マーフィーはマーフィーを再利用し、あなたはメンタルにショータイムをハリウッドのゴミの山に追加します。それは「取引のアート」に他ならないものを表しています。
back_translation: De Niro looks bored, Murphy recycles Murphy, and you mentally add Showtime to a mountain of Hollywood trash. It represents nothing less than "the art of the deal."

text: this fairy tale beginning freefalls from happy to disastrous as the newlyweds are besieged by emotionally challenged children , a savagily jealous ex-wife and a drunken dad .
translation: このおとぎ話の始まりは、新婚夫婦が感情的に問題を抱えた子供たち、激しく嫉妬する元妻、そして酔っ払った父親に襲われる中、幸せから悲惨へと自由落下します。
back_translation: The beginning of this fairy tale depicts a newlywed couple who are plunged from happiness to misery as they face emotionally troubled children, a fiercely jealous ex-wife, and an intoxicated father.

text: fresh out of prison , dara is on a mission to scatter her mother 's ashes in lake superior .
translation: 刑務所を出たばかりのダラは、母の遺 ashesをスーペリア湖に散骨するためのミッションに出ています。
back_translation: Dara, who has just been released from prison, is on a mission to scatter her mother's ashes in Lake Superior.

text: after discovering a passenger ship missing since 1962 floating adrift on the bering sea , salvagers claim the vessel as their own .
translation: 1962年以来行方不明だった客船がベーリング海で漂流しているのを発見した後、 Salvagers はその船を自分たちのものとして主張しています。
back_translation: After discovering a passenger ship that had been missing since 1962 drifting in the Bering Sea, salvagers are claiming the ship as their own.

text: it also touches on the encroachment of christianity brought by the missionaries , which is at odds with mepe 's tribal and traditional roots .
translation: それはまた、宣教師によってもたらされたキリスト教の侵入に触れており、これはメペの部族的および伝統的なルーツと対立しています。
back_translation: This also touches on the intrusion of Christianity brought by missionaries, which conflicts with the tribal and traditional roots of the Mepé.

text: the mushy finale turns john q into a movie-of-the-week tearjerker .
translation: 感情的な結末は「ジョンQ」を週刊映画の涙を誘う作品に変えてしまう。
back_translation: The emotional ending transforms "John Q" into a tear-jerking film for weekly cinema.

text: the story is familiar from its many predecessors ; like them , it eventually culminates in the not-exactly -stunning insight that crime does n't pay .
translation: その物語は多くの前作から馴染み深いものであり、他の作品と同様に、最終的には「犯罪は報われない」という驚くべき洞察に至ります。
back_translation: That story is familiar from many previous works, and like other pieces, it ultimately leads to the surprising insight that "crime does not pay."

text: graM-gas M-`s interaM-gM-ues entre seus personagens , o filme torna-se nM-co apenas uma histM-sria divertida sobre uma curiosa perseguiM-gM-co , mas tambM-im um belo estudo de personagens .
translation: graM-gas M-`s interaM-gM-uesの間で、映画は単なる面白い好奇心の追跡劇ではなく、同時に美しいキャラクタースタディにもなります。
back_translation: Between the interactions of graM-gas M-`s, the film is not just an entertaining chase of curiosity, but simultaneously also a beautiful character study.

text: hawn lets it all hang out in this film and i have to admire her guts . sarandon is equally bold and daring in her portrayal of a woman who has lost her way in a closet full of beige suits .
translation: ホーンはこの映画で全てをさらけ出し、その勇気を称賛せざるを得ません。サランダンも同様に、大胆で果敢に、ベージュのスーツでいっぱいのクローゼットの中で道を見失った女性を演じています。
back_translation: Horn lays everything bare in this film, and one cannot help but admire that courage. Sarandon, in a similar vein, boldly and courageously plays a woman who has lost her way in a closet full of beige suits.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: 時折一般的に楽しませてくれるとしても、『アイ・スパイ』は大多数のアクションコメディが抱える同じ問題を全く持っています。
back_translation: Although it occasionally provides general entertainment, "I Spy" has the same problem that most action comedies face.

text: it teaches the importance and understanding of life and death . it
translation: それは生命と死の重要性と理解を教えます。
back_translation: It teaches the importance and understanding of life and death.

text: sure to stir up some controversy , callous sentiment is a true depiction of how violence can affect ones psyche .
translation: 感情の冷淡さは、暴力が人の心にどのように影響を与えるかを真に描写しており、確かに物議を醸すことでしょう。
back_translation: The emotional coldness truly depicts how violence affects the human heart and will undoubtedly stir controversy.

text: reign of fire may be little more than another platter of reheated aliens , but it 's still pretty tasty .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、再加熱されたエイリアンの皿のひとつに過ぎないかもしれませんが、それでもかなり美味しいです。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" may just be one of the reheated alien dishes, but it's still quite delicious.

text: now the inmates are retaliating , with seagal and ja rule leading them .
translation: 今、囚人たちは反撃しており、スティーブン・セガールとJAルールが彼らを率いています。
back_translation: Right now, the prisoners are fighting back, led by Steven Seagal and Ja Rule.

text: concerned that his son is going to embarrass him during his campaign to become the governor of california , brad 's wealthy father and his campaign manager ( underwood ) , hire two juilliard-trained actors ( diggs and anderson ) to disguise themselves as `` real life gangstaz `` , and kidnap his son , dropping him off in the `` real hood `` in compton , in an effort to scare the ghettofied attitude and behavior out of him .
translation: カリフォルニア州知事になるためのキャンペーン中に息子が自分を恥ずかしくさせるのではないかと心配したブラッドの裕福な父親と彼のキャンペーンマネージャー（アンダウッド）は、ジュリアード卒の俳優2人（ディッグスとアンダーソン）に依頼し、彼らを「リアルなギャング」として変装させ、息子を誘拐し、コンプトンの「リアルなフッド」に連れて行くことで、彼からギャング的な態度や行動をなくそうとする。
back_translation: During the campaign to become the governor of California, Brad's wealthy father and his campaign manager (Underwood) worried that his son would embarrass him. They enlisted the help of two Juilliard-trained actors (Diggs and Anderson) to disguise themselves as "real gangsters" and kidnap the son, taking him to the "real hood" in Compton in an effort to rid him of any gang-like attitudes or behaviors.

text: after being handcuffed to new york city 's 'a ' train by his prep school friends ( keith , perabo , hayward ) , young karim ( mehta ) is forced to ride all the way to the last stop , far rockaway .
translation: 友人であるプレスクールの仲間（キーサ、ペラボ、ヘイワード）によってニューヨーク市の「A」トレインに手錠をかけられた若きカリム（メフタ）は、最後の停車駅であるファー・ロッカウェイまでずっと乗車しなければならなくなります。
back_translation: Young Karim (Mehta), who is handcuffed to the "A" train in New York City by his preschool friends (Kisa, Perabo, Hayward), has no choice but to ride all the way to the final stop, Far Rockaway.

text: the chateau cleverly probes the cross-cultural differences between gauls and yanks .
translation: シャトーはガリア人とヤンキーの間の異文化の違いを巧みに探ります。
back_translation: The author skillfully explores the cultural differences between the Gauls and the Yankees.

text: an eager young englishman is dispatched to sarawak to become part of the british colonial government , encounters some unorthodox local traditions , and finds himself faced with tough decisions of the heart involving the beautiful young selima , the unwitting object of his affections .
translation: 熱心な若いイギリス人がサラワクに派遣され、イギリス植民地政府の一員となります。彼は独特な地元の伝統に出会い、美しい若いセリマを巡る心の厳しい決断を迫られることになります。セリマは、彼の好意の無自覚な対象です。
back_translation: A passionate young Englishman is sent to Sarawak to become a member of the British colonial government. He encounters unique local traditions and is faced with a difficult emotional decision regarding the beautiful young Selima. Selima is the unconscious object of his affection.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: 他に誰か、スローモーション、ダブルピストル、弾道的火花を使った香港アクションの美学に飽きてきている人はいますか？
back_translation: Is there anyone else who is getting tired of the aesthetics of Hong Kong action featuring slow motion, double pistols, and ballistic sparks?

text: it does n't do a lot of deep thinking , but unlike many futuristic combos of sf and f/x , it does make a statement : freedom of opinion is a threat to totalitarian systems .
translation: それは深く考えることはあまりしませんが、SFとF/Xの多くの未来的な組み合わせとは異なり、意見の自由は全体主義体制に対する脅威であるという主張をしています。
back_translation: While I don't think about it too deeply, it argues that freedom of opinion poses a threat to totalitarian regimes, unlike many futuristic combinations of SF and F/X.

text: it 's impossible to duplicate the shock of the 11-year-old lambs , but the new film succeeds at creating nerve-tightening moments of suspense .
translation: 11歳の子羊の衝撃を再現することは不可能ですが、新しい映画は神経を緊張させるサスペンスの瞬間を生み出すことに成功しています。
back_translation: It is impossible to recreate the shock of an 11-year-old lamb, but the new film succeeds in generating moments of nerve-wracking suspense.

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: ホランドは物事が途中で消えていくのを許すが、特に演技が優れており、最近の黒人都市専門家に関する映画の急増するジャンルの他の作品よりもはるかに下品ではない。
back_translation: Holland allows things to fade away midway, but it is particularly well-acted and is much less vulgar than other works in the rapidly growing genre of films about recent Black urban experts.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: それはポストフェミニスト的に軽やかであるべきだが、オプラに育てられたオウムの会話のように退屈になってしまう。
back_translation: It should be light in a post-feminist way, but it ends up becoming boring like a conversation with a parrot raised by Oprah.

text: only one person has the power to save the princess , a priestess .
translation: 唯一、王女を救う力を持つのは神官の女性です。
back_translation: The only one with the power to save the princess is the female priestess.

text: the kind of women that own every room they walk into , and who think of all men as 'boys ' .
translation: 部屋に入るたびにその場を支配するような女性たちで、すべての男性を「少年」と考えるような人たち。
back_translation: Women who dominate the room every time they enter, treating all men as "boys."

text: so saccharine , i 'm not sure i 'd be able to take it under normal conditions .
translation: とても甘すぎて、普通の状況では耐えられないかもしれません。
back_translation: It might be too sweet to tolerate in a normal situation.

text: young police officer filipo ( giovanni ribisi ) descends into philippa 's life , changing her bleak outlook on existence into one in search of tranquility among corruption , as they become unlikely soul mates and lovers .
translation: 若い警察官フィリポ（ジョヴァンニ・リビシ）がフィリッパの生活に降り立ち、彼女の存在への暗い見方を腐敗の中での安らぎを求めるものに変えていく。彼らは予期せぬ魂の仲間となり、恋人同士になる。
back_translation: Young police officer Filippo (Giovanni Ribisi) arrives in Filippa's life and transforms his dark view of her existence into a quest for solace amidst corruption. They unexpectedly become kindred spirits and lovers.

text: besides the fact that he is still disliked by professor snape ( alan rickman ) and hated by draco malfoy ( tom felton ) , harry gets off to a great start with his two best friends , ron weasly ( rupert grint ) and hermione granger ( emma watson ) , and famous writer gilderoy lockhart ( kenneth branagh ) has joined the hogwarts staff and is the new defense against the dark arts teacher .
translation: 彼は依然としてスネイプ教授（アラン・リックマン）から嫌われ、ドラコ・マルフォイ（トム・フェルトン）に憎まれているという事実を除けば、ハリーは二人の親友、ロン・ウィーズリー（ルパート・グリント）とハーマイオニー・グレンジャー（エマ・ワトソン）との関係を順調にスタートさせ、著名な作家ギルデロイ・ロックハート（ケネス・ブラナー）がホグワーツのスタッフに加わり、新しい闇の魔術に対する防衛の教師となっています。
back_translation: Aside from the fact that he is still hated by Professor Snape (Alan Rickman) and is despised by Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton), Harry is off to a good start with his two best friends, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and Hermione Granger (Emma Watson), as the famous author Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) has joined the Hogwarts staff as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.

text: claude miller airs out a tight plot with an easy pace and a focus on character drama over crime-film complications .
translation: クロード・ミラーは、犯罪映画の複雑さよりもキャラクターのドラマに焦点を当てた緩やかなペースで緊張したプロットを展開しています。
back_translation: Claude Miller unfolds a tense plot at a leisurely pace, focusing more on character drama than on the complexities of crime films.

text: just teetering south of puberty , young thomas harris has discovered that instead of looking at stars , he can use his new telescope to study the beautiful woman next door .
translation: 思春期直前のトーマス・ハリスは、星を見上げる代わりに新しい望遠鏡を使って隣の美しい女性を観察できることを発見しました。
back_translation: Just before puberty, Thomas Harris discovered that instead of looking up at the stars, he could use a new telescope to observe the beautiful woman next door.

text: they call themselves d . e . b . s .
translation: 彼女たちは自分たちをD.E.B.S.と呼んでいます。
back_translation: They call themselves D.E.B.S.

text: it 's another stale , kill-by-numbers flick , complete with blade-thin characters and terrible , pun-laden dialogue .
translation: これは別の陳腐な、番号で殺す映画で、薄っぺらいキャラクターとひどいダジャレに満ちた対話が特徴です。
back_translation: This is another clichéd movie about killing with numbers, characterized by shallow characters and dialogue filled with terrible puns.

text: a light-hearted and high-spirited story , full of spice , sensuality and romance , viva zapato tells the tale of dolores , a beautiful cuban dancer who decides to leave her failing marriage and open a restaurant by the beach with her aunt from brazil .
translation: 軽やかで活気に満ちた物語、スパイス、セクシャリティ、ロマンスに溢れた「ビバ・サパト」は、失敗した結婚生活を捨て、ブラジルからの叔母と一緒にビーチにレストランを開くことを決意した美しいキューバのダンサー、ドルレスの物語を語ります。
back_translation: "Viva Zapato," a light and vibrant story filled with spice, sexuality, and romance, tells the tale of a beautiful Cuban dancer, Dolores, who decides to leave behind her failed marriage and open a restaurant on the beach with her aunt from Brazil.

text: there 's a story that goes around the town of darkness falls about her , and she 's called the tooth fairy .
translation: 町の「暗闇が落ちる」に伝わる話があり、彼女は「歯の妖精」と呼ばれています。
back_translation: There is a story told in the town of "Darkness Falls," and she is called the "Tooth Fairy."

text: if myers decides to make another austin powers movie , maybe he should just stick with austin and dr evil .
translation: マイヤーズがもう一つのオースティン・パワーズの映画を作ることに決めたら、オースティンとドクター・イーヴィルだけにした方がいいかもしれません。
back_translation: When Myers decided to make another Austin Powers movie, it might be better to stick with just Austin and Dr. Evil.

text: after tracking down the assassin , she is killed before any information can be driven out of her .
translation: 暗殺者を追跡した後、彼女は情報を引き出す前に殺されてしまう。
back_translation: After tracking the assassin, she is killed before she can extract any information.

text: beautiful , angry and sad , with a curious sick poetry , as if the marquis de sade had gone in for pastel landscapes .
translation: 美しく、怒りに満ち、悲しげで、好奇心に満ちた病的な詩のようで、まるでサド侯爵がパステル風景に取り組んでいるかのようです。
back_translation: It is like a beautiful, rage-filled, sorrowful, and curiously morbid poem, as if the Marquis de Sade were working on a pastel landscape.

text: this is lightweight filmmaking , to be sure , but it 's pleasant enough -- and oozing with attractive men .
translation: これは間違いなく軽量な映画制作ですが、十分に楽しいものであり、魅力的な男性たちが溢れています。
back_translation: This is undoubtedly a lightweight film production, but it is sufficiently enjoyable and filled with charming men.

text: the result is just enough pixie dust to get this franchise filler off the ground , provided viewers have enough faith and trust in one of the studio 's most fondly remembered titles .
translation: 結果は、このフランチャイズのフィラーを立ち上げるのに必要な十分なピクシーダストです。ただし、視聴者がスタジオの最も愛されているタイトルの一つに十分な信頼と信念を持っていることが条件です。
back_translation: The result is enough pixie dust needed to launch this franchise's filler. However, it is a condition that the audience has sufficient trust and belief in one of the studio's most beloved titles.

text: the protagonist , sally amonte , is still mourning the loss of her deceased husband and though she is young and beautiful , has resigned herself to working in the textile mill , caring for her elderly mother , and worrying about her rebellious teenage daughter .
translation: 主人公のサリー・アモンテは亡き夫の死をまだ悲しんでおり、若くて美しいにもかかわらず、繊維工場で働き、高齢の母を世話し、反抗的なティーンエイジャーの娘を心配することに resign しています。
back_translation: The protagonist, Sally Amonté, is still grieving the death of her late husband and, despite being young and beautiful, has resigned herself to working in a textile factory, caring for her elderly mother, and worrying about her rebellious teenage daughter.

text: and may bring claire face to face with her past .
translation: そして、クレアを彼女の過去と対面させるかもしれません。
back_translation: And it may confront Claire with her past.

text: the film does n't show enough of the creative process or even of what was created for the non-fan to figure out what makes wilco a big deal .
translation: 映画は、クリエイティブなプロセスや、非ファンがウィルコの重要性を理解するために必要な作品の内容を十分に示していません。
back_translation: The movie does not adequately show the creative process or the content necessary for non-fans to understand the significance of Wilco.

text: no aspirations to social import inform the movie version . this is a shameless sham , calculated to cash in on the popularity of its stars .
translation: 社会的影響力への志望はなく、映画版を通知する。これは恥知らずな詐欺であり、スターたちの人気に便乗しようとしている。
back_translation: There is no aspiration for social influence, and this notifies about the movie version. This is a shameless scam that seeks to take advantage of the popularity of the stars.

text: as he navigates this decadent new world , he meets a host of characters , including david , an older gay man who desires him , and benjamin , a young hustler from texas who has also managed to find a place among the aristocracy .
translation: 彼がこの退廃的な新しい世界を行き来する中で、デイビッドという、彼を欲する年上のゲイ男性や、テキサス出身の若いハスラー、ベンジャミンなど、さまざまなキャラクターと出会います。
back_translation: As he navigates this decadent new world, he encounters various characters, including an older gay man named David who desires him, and a young hustler from Texas named Benjamin.

text: despite its title , punch-drunk love is never heavy-handed . the jabs it employs are short , carefully placed and dead-center .
translation: タイトルとは裏腹に、『パンチドランク・ラブ』は決して押し付けがましくありません。その使われるジャブは短く、慎重に配置され、的を射ています。
back_translation: Contrary to its title, "Punch-Drunk Love" is never pushy. The jabs used are short, carefully placed, and hit the mark.

text: quite simply , a joy to watch and -- especially -- to listen to .
translation: 非常にシンプルに言えば、見るのも聴くのも喜びです。
back_translation: Simply put, both seeing and hearing are a joy.

text: there are a few chuckles , but not a single gag sequence that really scores , and the stars seem to be in two different movies .
translation: いくつかの笑いはあるが、本当に成功するギャグシークエンスは一つもなく、スターたちはまるで別々の映画にいるようだ。
back_translation: There are some laughs, but there isn't a single successful gag sequence, and the stars seem to be in completely different movies.

text: it wo n't hold up over the long haul , but in the moment , finch 's tale provides the forgettable pleasures of a saturday matinee .
translation: 長い目で見ると持ちこたえないが、その瞬間においてフィンチの物語は土曜日のマチネーの忘れがたい楽しみを提供している。
back_translation: In the long run, it may not hold up, but at that moment, Finch's story offers an unforgettable delight for Saturday matinee.

text: just like hearst 's enormous yacht , it 's slow and unwieldy and takes a long time to reach its destination .
translation: ハーストの巨大なヨットのように、それは遅く扱いにくく、目的地に到達するまでに時間がかかります。
back_translation: Like Hearst's massive yacht, it is slow to maneuver and takes a long time to reach its destination.

text: during an undercover drug buy mitch was working that trey botched by calling in for backup and drawing media attention , mitch 's partner is shot with a very exotic 12-gauge automatic weapon ; mitch then shoots the video camera out of the hands of a reporter filming the action when the cameraman refused to shut it down .
translation: ミッチが潜入薬物購入をしている最中、トレイがバックアップを呼んでメディアの注目を引き寄せたために失敗してしまった。ミッチのパートナーが非常に珍しい12ゲージの自動武器で撃たれ、ミッチはその行動を撮影している報道カメラマンがカメラを停止することを拒否したため、カメラを撃ち抜いた。
back_translation: While Mitch was in the middle of purchasing drugs undercover, he failed because Trey called for backup and attracted media attention. Mitch's partner was shot with a very rare 12-gauge automatic weapon, and Mitch shot the camera after the news photographer refused to stop filming his actions.

text: the `` easiest `` ( and most dangerous ) way to get it is working for some drug-dealers .
translation: 最も「簡単」で（そして最も危険な）方法は、何人かの麻薬密売人のために働くことです。
back_translation: The easiest (and most dangerous) way is to work for some drug dealers.

text: as comedic spotlights go , notorious c . h . o . hits all the verbal marks it should .
translation: コメディのスポットライトとしては、悪名高いC.H.O.はすべての言語的なポイントをしっかりと押さえています。
back_translation: As a spotlight in comedy, the infamous C.H.O. firmly holds onto all linguistic points.

text: a summer entertainment adults can see without feeling embarrassed , but it could have been more .
translation: 大人が恥ずかしがることなく見ることができる夏のエンターテイメントですが、もっと良くなり得たでしょう。
back_translation: It's summer entertainment that adults can watch without feeling embarrassed, but it could have been even better.

text: ( lil ' romeo plays a young dancer who has to choose between pursuing a career as a dancer and the quick money of street drug sales ; phifer plays honey 's romantic interest . )
translation: （リル・ロメオは、ダンサーとしてのキャリアを追求するか、ストリートドラッグの販売による短期的な利益を選ぶかを決めなければならない若いダンサーを演じている。ファイファーはハニーの恋人役を演じている。）
back_translation: (Lil Romeo plays a young dancer who must decide whether to pursue a career as a dancer or choose the short-term profits of selling street drugs. Pfeiffer plays Honey's love interest.)

text: in return for a small plot of land , george agrees to search for princess lunna .
translation: 小さな土地の区画の見返りに、ジョージはプリンセス・ルンナを探すことに同意します。
back_translation: In exchange for a small plot of land, George agrees to search for Princess Luna.

text: fancy a real downer ? [ leigh ] lays it on so thick this time that it feels like a suicide race .
translation: 本当に落ち込む気分になりたいですか？[レイ]は今回はとても厚く盛り付けていて、自殺レースのように感じます。
back_translation: Do you really want to feel deeply depressed? [Ray] has really piled it on this time, and it feels like a suicide race.

text: having sought and found refuge within this ancient religious society , sheldon finds himself captivated by this unusual and powerful world and the three old men who run it .
translation: この古代の宗教社会に避難を求めて入ったシェルダンは、この異様で強力な世界とそれを運営する三人の老人に魅了される。
back_translation: Sheldon, who sought refuge in this ancient religious society, is captivated by this strange and powerful world and the three old men who govern it.

text: not for all tastes . but i , for one , was hooked by this fish 's tale .
translation: 全ての人の好みに合うわけではないが、私としてはこの魚の物語に夢中になった。
back_translation: It may not suit everyone's taste, but I personally became captivated by this fish's story.

text: a very bizarre blend of reservoir dogs , fight club , unbreakable and croupier .
translation: レザーボア・ドッグス、ファイト・クラブ、アンブレイカブル、そしてクルーピアの非常に奇妙なブレンド。
back_translation: A very strange blend of Leatherface, Fight Club, Unbreakable, and Croupier.

text: shy san franciscan zoe is a twenty-something love-starved animator who spends countless hours listening to kxch cherish radio , losing herself in a syrupy romantic fantasy of '70s and '80s pop songs .
translation: 内気なサンフランシスコのゾーイは、恋に飢えた20代のアニメーターで、KXCHチェリッシュラジオを何時間も聴き、70年代と80年代のポップソングの甘美なロマンティックファンタジーに没頭しています。
back_translation: Shy Zoe from San Francisco is a love-starved 20-something animator who listens to KXCH Cherish Radio for hours, immersing herself in the sweet romantic fantasies of pop songs from the 70s and 80s.

text: if so , then this movie will touch your soul . . .
translation: もしそうなら、この映画はあなたの心に触れるでしょう。
back_translation: If that's the case, this movie will touch your heart.

text: a washed-up 80 's pop star ( ferguson ) suddenly has a new direction in life when he discovers that he has a teenage daughter , olivia , ( church ) , in cardiff , wales .
translation: かつての80年代のポップスター（ファーガソン）は、ウェールズのカーディフで思春期の娘オリビア（チャーチ）を発見したことで、突然新しい人生の方向性を見出します。
back_translation: A former pop star from the '80s, Ferguson, suddenly finds a new direction in life when he discovers his teenage daughter Olivia in Cardiff, Wales.

text: at first this encounter with his past is pleasant until julie 's ex-boyfriend ben shows up .
translation: 最初は彼の過去との出会いは心地よいものでしたが、ジュリーの元彼のベンが現れます。
back_translation: At first, his encounter with the past was a pleasant one, but then Julie's ex-boyfriend Ben appears.

text: billy is now ready to play the ultimate showman !
translation: ビリーは今、アルティメットショーマンをプレイする準備ができました！
back_translation: Billy is now ready to play the Ultimate Showman!

text: but on his latest case , the stakes are higher for vincent -- the suspect he 's investigating is his own son .
translation: しかし、彼の最新の事件では、ビンセントにとって賭けがより大きくなっています。彼が捜査している容疑者は彼自身の息子です。
back_translation: However, in his latest case, the stakes have become higher for Vincent. The suspect he is investigating is his own son.

text: amitabh ca n't believe the board of directors and his mind is filled with revenge and what better revenge than robbing the bank himself , ironic as it may sound .
translation: アミターブは取締役会を信じることができず、彼の心は復讐でいっぱいであり、自分で銀行を襲うこと以上の復讐はないと皮肉に思っています。
back_translation: Amitaabu cannot trust the board of directors, and his heart is filled with revenge, ironically thinking that there is no greater revenge than to rob the bank himself.

text: `` one hell of a christmas `` is a dark and action packed comedy that takes place in a modern city as well as in a fearful underworld .
translation: 「ワン・ヘル・オブ・ア・クリスマス」は、現代の都市と恐ろしいアンダーワールドを舞台にしたダークでアクション満載のコメディです。
back_translation: "One Hell of a Christmas" is a dark, action-packed comedy set in a modern city and a terrifying underworld.

text: splendidly illustrates the ability of the human spirit to overcome adversity .
translation: 人間の精神が逆境を克服する能力を見事に示しています。
back_translation: The human spirit remarkably illustrates its ability to overcome adversity.

text: a rigorously structured and exquisitely filmed drama about a father and son connection that is a brief shooting star of love .
translation: 厳密に構成され、見事に撮影されたドラマで、父と息子の絆についての短い愛の流星を描いています。
back_translation: A meticulously crafted and beautifully shot drama that depicts a brief love meteor about the bond between a father and son.

text: gets under the skin of a man who has just lost his wife .
translation: 妻を失ったばかりの男の心の奥深くに入り込む。
back_translation: It delves deep into the heart of a man who has just lost his wife.

text: that we are not the target and still got ninety percent of it is a compliment to director charles stone iii and screenwriters matthew cirulnick and thulani davis who whipped the original story into coherent shape .
translation: 私たちがターゲットではないにもかかわらず、90パーセントを達成したことは、原作の物語を一貫性のある形にまとめ上げた監督のチャールズ・ストーン3世と脚本家のマシュー・シルニック、スラニ・デイビスへの賛辞です。
back_translation: The achievement of 90 percent, despite not being the target, is a tribute to director Charles Stone III and screenwriters Matthew Silman and Sulani Davis for their ability to weave the original story into a cohesive narrative.

text: the problematic characters and overly convenient plot twists foul up shum 's good intentions .
translation: 問題のあるキャラクターや都合の良すぎるプロットツイストがシュムの良い意図を台なしにしています。
back_translation: Problematic characters and overly convenient plot twists are ruining Shum's good intentions.

text: tuck everlasting achieves a delicate balance of romantic innocence and philosophical depth .
translation: 『タック・エバーラスティング』は、ロマンティックな純真さと哲学的な深さの微妙なバランスを実現しています。
back_translation: "Tuck Everlasting" achieves a delicate balance of romantic innocence and philosophical depth.

text: meena , a 12-year-old living in a mining village in the english midlands in 1972 , is the daughter of indian parents who 've come to england to give her a better life .
translation: 1972年、イギリス中部の鉱山村に住む12歳のミーナは、より良い生活を与えるためにイギリスに来たインド系の両親の娘です。
back_translation: In 1972, Mina, a 12-year-old girl living in a mining village in central England, is the daughter of Indian parents who came to England for a better life.

text: overall tomfoolery like this is a matter of taste .
translation: このような全体的な馬鹿げたことは、好みの問題です。
back_translation: Such overall foolishness is a matter of personal preference.

text: unfortunately , neither sendak nor the directors are particularly engaging or articulate .
translation: 残念ながら、センダックも監督たちも特に魅力的でもなく、口才があるわけでもありません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Sendak and the directors are neither particularly charming nor eloquent.

text: the main story . . . is compelling enough , but it 's difficult to shrug off the annoyance of that chatty fish .
translation: 主なストーリーは十分に魅力的ですが、そのおしゃべりな魚のイライラを振り払うのは難しいです。
back_translation: The main story is quite engaging, but it's hard to shake off the annoyance of that chatty fish.

text: its and pieces of the hot chick are so hilarious , and schneider 's performance is so fine , it 's a real shame that so much of the movie -- again , as in the animal -- is a slapdash mess .
translation: 「ホットチック」のいくつかの部分は非常に面白く、シュナイダーのパフォーマンスも素晴らしいです。しかし、映画の多くが再び動物のように、雑然としためちゃくちゃな状態なのは本当に残念です。
back_translation: Some parts of "Hot Chick" are very interesting, and Schneider's performance is also great. However, it’s really disappointing that much of the movie is once again in a chaotic, mess-like state like an animal.

text: it 's a shame that the storyline and its underlying themes . . . finally seem so impersonal or even shallow .
translation: ストーリーラインやその根底にあるテーマが...最終的に非常に無個性または浅いものに見えるのは残念です。
back_translation: It's unfortunate that the storyline and its underlying themes ultimately seem very generic or shallow.

text: while hollywood ending has its share of belly laughs ( including a knockout of a closing line ) , the movie winds up feeling like a great missed opportunity .
translation: ハリウッドのエンディングには腹を抱えて笑えるシーンがいくつかあり（特に素晴らしい締めのセリフがあります）、映画は大きなチャンスを逃したような気持ちになります。
back_translation: The ending of Hollywood has several scenes that make you laugh out loud (especially there are some wonderful closing lines), and it feels like the movie missed a big opportunity.

text: a touching drama about old age and grief with a tour de force performance by michel piccoli .
translation: 老いと悲しみについての感動的なドラマで、ミシェル・ピコリの素晴らしい演技が光ります。
back_translation: It's an emotional drama about aging and sorrow, showcasing Michel Piccoli's outstanding performance.

text: now a chinese guy throws a monkey wrench into their plans .
translation: 今、ある中国人が彼らの計画に嫌がらせをしています。
back_translation: Right now, a certain Chinese person is harassing them about their plans.

text: the maori take on shakespeare 's 'pound of flesh ' drama is a story of deep seated social and religious prejudice , that has its revenge in a money lending deal that is bonded in a pound of the christian merchant 's flesh on forfeit .
translation: マオリのシェイクスピアの「肉の1ポンド」に関する解釈は、深く根付いた社会的および宗教的偏見の物語であり、キリスト教の商人の肉の1ポンドを罰金として担保にした金銭貸付取引において復讐を果たすものです。
back_translation: The Maori interpretation of Shakespeare's "A Pound of Flesh" is a story rooted in deep-seated social and religious prejudices, in which a Christian merchant seeks revenge through a money-lending transaction that uses a pound of flesh as collateral for a fine.

text: the romance between the leads is n't as compelling or as believable as it should be .
translation: 主役たちのロマンスは、もっと魅力的で信じられるものであるべきなのに、そうではない。
back_translation: The romance of the main characters should be more captivating and believable, but it is not.

text: as anakin is left behind to protect padm & # 233 ; , his feelings for her grow into something more than friendship .
translation: アナキンはパドメを守るために置き去りにされると、彼女に対する感情が友情以上のものに成長していく。
back_translation: When Anakin is left behind to protect Padmé, his feelings for her grow into something more than friendship.

text: comes off more like a misdemeanor , a flat , unconvincing drama that never catches fire .
translation: 軽犯罪のように見え、感情がこもらない平坦で説得力のないドラマで、決して盛り上がることがありません。
back_translation: It looks like a petty crime, a flat and unconvincing drama devoid of emotion, which never manages to get exciting.

text: novak contemplates a heartland so overwhelmed by its lack of purpose that it seeks excitement in manufactured high drama .
translation: ノバクは、目的の欠如によって圧倒され、製造されたハイドラマに興奮を求めるハートランドを考察する。
back_translation: Novak contemplates Heartland, overwhelmed by a lack of purpose, seeking excitement in the manufactured Hydrama.

text: tony stilano and trev spackneys both own , live over and work in adjoining take-away fish shops in melbourne .
translation: トニー・スティラーノとトレヴ・スパックニーは、メルボルンにある隣接するテイクアウトのフィッシュショップを所有し、そこで生活し、働いています。
back_translation: Tony Sterlino and Trev Spackney own a neighboring takeout fish shop in Melbourne, where they live and work.

text: jenny must fight to earn her scholarship and try to find a balance between the man of her faith and the man of her dreams .
translation: ジェニーは奨学金を得るために戦わなければならず、信仰の人と夢の人との間でバランスを見つけようと試みます。
back_translation: Jenny must fight to obtain a scholarship and tries to find a balance between faith-driven people and dream-driven people.

text: trust and deceit , generosity and meanness are fleshed out by a deft cast .
translation: 信頼と裏切り、寛大さとケチさが巧妙なキャストによって具体化されている。
back_translation: Trust and betrayal, generosity and stinginess are embodied through a clever cast.

text: le d & # 233 ; fi is a musical comedy , inspired by the great american tradition and set in today 's world of france 's hip hop movement .
translation: 「ル・デフィ」は音楽コメディで、アメリカの偉大な伝統に触発され、今日のフランスのヒップホップムーブメントを舞台にしています。
back_translation: "The Defi" is a musical comedy inspired by the great traditions of America and set against the backdrop of today's French hip-hop movement.

text: having arrived at hole in the wall they meet a mysterious stranger and all hell breaks loose . . .
translation: 壁の穴に到着すると、神秘的な strangersに出会い、すべてが地獄のように狂い始める。。。
back_translation: When I arrived at the hole in the wall, I encountered mysterious strangers, and everything began to go completely mad, like hell...

text: a hushed contemplation of the kind of senseless , all-too-frequent tragedy that leaves the survivors reeling and speechless .
translation: 生存者を打ちのめし、言葉を失わせるような無意味で頻繁に起こる悲劇についての静かな熟考。
back_translation: A quiet contemplation on the meaningless and frequent tragedies that devastate survivors and leave them speechless.

text: does the new all-girl group desert have anything to do with it ?
translation: 新しい女性グループ「デザート」はそれに何か関係がありますか？
back_translation: Does the new girl group "Dessert" have anything to do with it?

text: a group of british students enbark on summoning spirits on a ouija board after a night of clubbing .
translation: 英国の学生たちがクラブでの夜を終え、ウィジャボードを使って霊を呼び出すことに挑む。
back_translation: British students finish a night at the club and attempt to summon spirits using a Ouija board.

text: with fate closing in and time running out , the pressure mounts on greg to change , the only question is will it be too late ?
translation: 運命が迫り、時間がなくなっていく中、グレッグに変わるプレッシャーが高まっています。唯一の疑問は、それが遅すぎることになるのかということです。
back_translation: As fate looms and time runs out, the pressure is mounting on Greg to perform. The only question is whether it will be too late.

text: it was filmed above and below water over a two-year period .
translation: それは水上と水中で、2年の期間にわたって撮影されました。
back_translation: It was filmed on and under the water over a period of two years.

text: even with a green mohawk and a sheet of fire-red flame tattoos covering his shoulder , however , kilmer seems to be posing , rather than acting . and that leaves a hole in the center of the salton sea .
translation: 緑のモヒカンと肩を覆う炎のような赤いタトゥーのシートを持ちながらも、キルマーは演技をしているのではなく、ポーズを取っているようだ。そしてそれがソルトンシーの中心に穴を残している。
back_translation: While having a green mohawk and a red tattoo that resembles flames covering his shoulders, Kilmer seems to be posing rather than acting. And it leaves a hole in the center of Saltonsi.

text: . . . a light , yet engrossing piece . lux , now in her eighties , does a great combination act as narrator , jewish grandmother and subject M-^V taking us through a film that is part biography , part entertainment and part history .
translation: ...軽やかでありながら引き込まれる作品です。80代になったラックスは、ナレーター、ユダヤ人の祖母、そして被写体M-^Vとして素晴らしいコンビネーションを披露し、伝記の一部、娯楽の一部、そして歴史の一部である映画へと私たちを導いてくれます。
back_translation: It is a work that is light yet captivating. In his 80s, Lux presents a wonderful combination as the narrator, a Jewish grandmother, and the subject M-^V, guiding us into a film that is part biography, part entertainment, and part history.

text: the script is n't very good ; not even someone as gifted as hoffman ( the actor ) can make it work .
translation: その脚本はあまり良くない。ホフマン（俳優）のように才能のある人でも、それをうまく機能させることはできない。
back_translation: The script is not very good. Even someone talented like Hoffman (the actor) cannot make it work well.

text: prison life does not stop kilo from running his operation .
translation: 刑務所生活はキロが彼の活動を行うのを止めることはありません。
back_translation: Prison life does not stop Kilo from carrying out his activities.

text: the security housing unit houses the hardest criminals inside marquezas prison , located in the swamps of mexico 's state of cormelos .
translation: セキュリティハウジングユニットは、メキシコのコルメロス州の沼地にあるマルケサス刑務所内で最も危険な犯罪者を収容しています。
back_translation: The security housing unit houses the most dangerous criminals within the Marquezas prison located in the marshlands of Colmeros State, Mexico.

text: the plan to make enough into M-^Qan inspiring tale of survival wrapped in the heart-pounding suspense of a stylish psychological thriller ' has flopped as surely as a soufflM-i gone wrong .
translation: 「十分なものを得るための計画は、スタイリッシュなサイコスリラーの心臓が高鳴るサスペンスに包まれた感動的な生存の物語として、 soufflé が失敗するのと同じようにうまくいかなかった。」
back_translation: "The plan to obtain something sufficient did not go as well as a soufflé failing, wrapped in the heart-pounding suspense of a stylish psychological thriller, as an emotional story of survival."

text: the men are reasonably challenged with the the bizzare situation .
translation: 男性たちは奇妙な状況に合理的に挑戦しています。
back_translation: The men are rationally challenging a strange situation.

text: the film proves unrelentingly grim -- and equally engrossing .
translation: その映画は徹底して陰鬱でありながら、同様に魅惑的であることが証明されています。
back_translation: The film has been proven to be thoroughly bleak while equally captivating.

text: the title 's lameness should clue you in on how bad the movie is .
translation: タイトルのつまらなさが、その映画がどれほどひどいかを教えてくれるはずです。
back_translation: The dullness of the title should tell you how terrible the movie is.

text: behind its doors , an elderly husband and wife guard a secret so dark and complex , no one else has ever shared it .
translation: その扉の裏側で、老夫婦があまりにも暗くて複雑な秘密を守っている。他の誰にもその秘密を共有したことはない。
back_translation: Behind that door, an elderly couple is guarding a secret that is too dark and complex. They have never shared that secret with anyone else.

text: will david or matt learn the true meaning of love ?
translation: デイビッドかマットは愛の本当の意味を学ぶのでしょうか？
back_translation: Will David or Matt learn the true meaning of love?

text: hardly a nuanced portrait of a young woman 's breakdown , the film nevertheless works up a few scares .
translation: 若い女性の崩壊の微妙な肖像とは言えないが、この映画はそれでもいくつかの恐怖を生み出している。
back_translation: Though it cannot be called a subtle portrait of the collapse of young women, this film still generates some fears.

text: huh is taken into custody after kang shoots and wounds him at the scene of the crime .
translation: ハは、カンに射撃され、現場で負傷した後、拘束されました。
back_translation: Ha was shot by Kan, injured at the scene, and then was taken into custody.

text: peter must relive this brief moment at the party until he gets it right and wins jen 's heart .
translation: ピーターは、ジェンの心をつかむまで、パーティーでのこの短い瞬間を何度も繰り返さなければならない。
back_translation: Peter has to repeat this brief moment at the party many times until he captures Jen's heart.

text: jackson , a cute , lanky , blue-haired poet who works in a record store , is at the center of everett lewis ' twisted black la comedy .
translation: ジャクソンは、レコード店で働く可愛くて細長い青い髪の詩人で、エヴェレット・ルイスの歪んだブラックLAコメディの中心にいる。
back_translation: Jackson is a cute, slender poet with blue hair who works at a record store and is at the center of Everett Lewis's twisted black LA comedy.

text: the second trip took place in february 2002 in the city of herat now freed from the taliban and in the hunger stricken camp of maslakh , one of the largest in the world .
translation: 第二の旅行は、タリバンから解放された都市ヘラートで、世界最大級の飢餓に苦しむマスラークのキャンプで行われた2002年2月に起こりました。
back_translation: The second trip took place in February 2002 in the city of Herat, liberated from the Taliban, at a camp for the Maslark suffering from one of the largest famines in the world.

text: nicholas is immediately drawn to this gruesome bobby , and begins to secretly take care of the creature .
translation: ニコラスはこの gruesome bobby にすぐに引き寄せられ、そっとその生き物の世話を始める。
back_translation: Nicholas is immediately drawn to this gruesome bobby and gently begins to take care of the creature.

text: it becomes a harder choice than one might think .
translation: 思ったよりも難しい選択になる。
back_translation: It's going to be a more difficult choice than I thought.

text: to complete the deal , he must bring a young american hustler boy ( who is taken to rio not knowing that he 'll be killed in a snuff film ) .
translation: 取引を完了させるために、彼は若いアメリカのハスラーの男の子を連れて行かなければならない（その子はリオに連れて行かれ、スナフフィルムで殺されることを知らない）。
back_translation: To complete the transaction, he must take a young American hustler boy with him (the boy does not know he will be taken to Rio and killed in a snuff film).

text: it 's a much more emotional journey than what shyamalan has given us in his past two movies , and gibson , stepping in for bruce willis , is the perfect actor to take us on the trip .
translation: シヤマランが過去の2作品で私たちに与えたものよりも、はるかに感情的な旅です。そして、ブルース・ウィリスの代わりに登場したギブソンは、この旅に私たちを連れて行くのにぴったりの俳優です。
back_translation: It is a much more emotional journey than what Shyamalan gave us in his past two works. And Gibson, who has replaced Bruce Willis, is the perfect actor to take us on this journey.

text: angel presents events partly from the perspective of aurelie and christelle , and infuses the film with the sensibility of a particularly nightmarish fairytale .
translation: 『エンジェル』は、オーレリーとクリステルの視点から部分的に出来事を描き、特に悪夢のようなフェアリーテイルの感覚を映画に注ぎ込んでいます。
back_translation: "Angel" partially depicts events from the perspectives of Auryli and Christel, especially infusing the film with a nightmarish fairy tale sensation.

text: known in english at festivals as `` weightwatch , `` this title captures the essence of the film .
translation: 英語では「ウエイトウォッチ」として知られるこのタイトルは、映画の本質を捉えています。
back_translation: This title, known in English as "Weight Watch," captures the essence of the film.

text: indeed , it appears that all of his advances go unnoticed on this lovely but embittered singled mom .
translation: 確かに、彼のすべてのアプローチは、この愛らしいが苦いシングルマザーには気づかれないようです。
back_translation: Indeed, all of his approaches seem to go unnoticed by this lovable yet bitter single mother.

text: improves when it takes a more serious tone and zaza and judith develop into deeper characterizations .
translation: より真剣なトーンを持つときに改善し、ザザとジュディスのキャラクターがより深く発展します。
back_translation: When having a more serious tone, the characters of Zaza and Judith develop more deeply.

text: ourside the theatre roger might be intolerable company , but inside it he 's well worth spending some time with .
translation: 劇場の外ではロジャーは耐え難い仲間かもしれませんが、内側では彼と過ごす時間は十分に価値があります。
back_translation: Outside the theater, Roger may be an unbearable companion, but inside, the time spent with him is well worth it.

text: static , repetitive , muddy and blurry , hey arnold ! would seem to have a lock on the title of ugliest movie of the year .
translation: 静的で、繰り返しで、泥だらけで、ぼやけている「ヘイ・アーノルド！」は、今年最も醜い映画のタイトルを手に入れたようだ。
back_translation: Static, repetitive, muddy, and blurred, "Hey Arnold!" seems to have earned the title of the ugliest movie this year.

text: the grey zone gives voice to a story that needs to be heard in the sea of holocaust movies . . . but the film suffers from its own difficulties .
translation: グレーゾーンは、ホロコースト映画の海の中で聞かれるべき物語に声を与えていますが、この映画は自身の困難に苦しんでいます。
back_translation: The gray zone gives voice to stories that should be heard amidst the sea of Holocaust films, but this film struggles with its own difficulties.

text: wedding feels a bit anachronistic . still , not every low-budget movie must be quirky or bleak , and a happy ending is no cinematic sin .
translation: 結婚式は少し時代遅れに感じます。しかし、すべての低予算映画が独特であったり陰鬱である必要はなく、ハッピーエンドは映画の罪ではありません。
back_translation: Weddings feel a bit outdated. However, not every low-budget film needs to be unique or gloomy, and a happy ending is not a sin in a movie.

text: at first suspicious , then curious , and ultimately captivated , he watches as a life unknown to him unfolds before his eyes .
translation: 最初は疑い深く、次に好奇心を抱き、最終的には魅了され、彼は目の前で彼にとって未知の人生が展開するのを見守る。
back_translation: At first, he is skeptical, then he becomes curious, and ultimately he is captivated as he watches an unknown life unfold before him.

text: this becomes somewhat of a problem when all of the dead scientists come back to life in search of a snack .
translation: これは、すべての死んだ科学者がスナックを求めて生き返ると、やや問題になります。
back_translation: This becomes somewhat of a problem when all dead scientists come back to life seeking snacks.

text: it is depressing , ruthlessly pained and depraved , the movie equivalent of staring into an open wound .
translation: それは憂鬱で、容赦なく痛みと堕落に満ちており、開いた傷を見つめているのと同じ映画です。
back_translation: It is a gloomy film, mercilessly filled with pain and decay, as if staring at an open wound.

text: stevie is already five minutes pregnant by her italian footballer husband .
translation: スティービーはすでにイタリアのサッカー選手の夫によって妊娠してから5分です。
back_translation: Stevie has been pregnant for 5 minutes already by her husband, an Italian soccer player.

text: for the first two-thirds of this sparklingly inventive and artful , always fast and furious tale , kids will go happily along for the ride .
translation: このきらびやかで創造的かつ芸術的な、常に速くて激しい物語の最初の3分の2の間、子供たちは楽しんでその旅に出かけるでしょう。
back_translation: During the first two-thirds of this dazzling, creative, and artistic story, which is always fast-paced and intense, children will enjoy embarking on the journey.

text: this is a monumental achievement in practically every facet of inept filmmaking : joyless , idiotic , annoying , heavy-handed , visually atrocious , and often downright creepy .
translation: これは、ほぼすべての面で無能な映画製作において、記念碑的な成果です：喜びのない、愚かな、イライラさせる、押し付けがましい、視覚的にひどい、そしてしばしばまったく気味の悪い作品です。
back_translation: This is a monumental achievement in almost every aspect of incompetent filmmaking: a joyless, foolish, frustrating, heavy-handed, visually terrible, and often thoroughly disturbing work.

text: an earnest , roughshod document , it serves as a workable primer for the region 's recent history , and would make a terrific 10th-grade learning tool .
translation: 真剣で乱雑な文書であり、地域の最近の歴史に関する実用的な入門書として機能し、10年生の学習ツールとして素晴らしいものとなるでしょう。
back_translation: It is a serious and chaotic document that serves as a practical introduction to the recent history of the region and will be an excellent learning tool for 10th graders.

text: pistachio disguisey , a sweet-natured italian server at his father fabbrizio 's restaurant , ca n't figure out why he compulsively mimics his customers and desires to change his appearance .
translation: ピスタチオ・ディスガイジーは、父ファブリツィオのレストランで働く心優しいイタリア人のサーバーで、なぜお客の動作を無意識に真似てしまったり、自分の外見を変えたいと思っているのかがわからない。
back_translation: Pistachio Disgaizi is a kind-hearted Italian server who works at his father Fabrizio's restaurant, and he doesn't understand why he unconsciously mimics the actions of the customers or why he wants to change his appearance.

text: julia roberts , blair underwood , david duchovny , brad pitt ( cameoing as himself ) , david hyde pierce , catherine keener , and terence stamp are reason enough to see the film , which is billed as a `` movie about movies for people who love movies . ``
translation: ジュリア・ロバーツ、ブレア・アンダーウッド、デビッド・ダカバニー、ブラッド・ピット（本人役でカメオ出演）、デビッド・ハイド・ピアース、キャサリン・キーナー、テレンス・スタンプが出演していることだけでも、この映画を見る価値があります。この映画は「映画を愛する人々のための映画についての映画」として宣伝されています。
back_translation: Just the fact that Julia Roberts, Blair Underwood, David Duchovny, Brad Pitt (camo appearance as himself), David Hyde Pierce, Catherine Keener, and Terrence Stamp are involved makes this movie worth watching. This film is marketed as "a movie about movies for people who love movies."

text: lilo is a 5 year old hawaiian girl who 's quite peculiar : she has an off beat take on life and is a little obsessed about taking care of downtrodden animals .
translation: リロは5歳のハワイの女の子で、ちょっと変わったところがあります。彼女は人生を独自の視点で捉え、困っている動物たちの世話をすることに少し夢中になっています。
back_translation: Rilo is a 5-year-old girl from Hawaii, and she has a slightly unusual perspective. She views life from her unique standpoint and has become a bit obsessed with taking care of animals in need.

text: torn between his father 's dream of making a hospital ( which he can realize by marrying sonia ) and his own personal emotions for dr . neha , akash has to choose either .
translation: 父の病院を作る夢（ソニアと結婚することで実現できる）と、自身のネハ博士への個人的な感情の間で揺れ動くアカシュは、どちらかを選ばなければならない。
back_translation: Akash, who is torn between his dream of building a hospital for his father (which can be realized by marrying Sonia) and his personal feelings for Dr. Neha, must choose one or the other.

text: the master of disguise represents adam sandler 's latest attempt to dumb down the universe .
translation: 「マスター・オブ・ディスガイズ」はアダム・サンドラーの最新の試みを表しており、宇宙をよりバカらしくすることに力を入れています。
back_translation: "Master of Disguise" represents Adam Sandler's latest attempt to make the universe more ridiculous.

text: instead of being the happy father-in-law , shocked jack attempts to kill himself back in las vegas as he realizes patricia 's rejection .
translation: 幸せな義父である代わりに、ショックを受けたジャックはパトリシアの拒絶を悟り、ラスベガスで自殺を試みる。
back_translation: Instead of being a happy father-in-law, a shocked Jack realizes Patricia's rejection and attempts to commit suicide in Las Vegas.

text: would you laugh if a tuba-playing dwarf rolled down a hill in a trash can ? do you chuckle at the thought of an ancient librarian whacking a certain part of a man 's body ? if you answered yes , by all means enjoy the new guy .
translation: チューバを演奏する小人がゴミ箱に入って丘を転がり落ちたら、あなたは笑いますか？古代の図書館員がある男性の体の部分を叩いていることを思い出して笑いますか？もし「はい」と答えたなら、ぜひ新しい仲間を楽しんでください。
back_translation: If a little person playing a tuba fell into a trash can and rolled down a hill, would you laugh? Would you recall the ancient librarian striking a man's body part and laugh? If you answered "yes," then please enjoy your new companions.

text: the lightest , most breezy movie steven spielberg has made in more than a decade . and the positive change in tone here seems to have recharged him .
translation: スティーブン・スピルバーグが10年以上ぶりに作った、最も軽快で爽やかな映画です。そして、ここでのトーンのポジティブな変化は、彼を再充電させたように見えます。
back_translation: It's the most lighthearted and refreshing movie Steven Spielberg has made in over 10 years. The positive shift in tone here seems to have recharged him.

text: i do n't think i laughed out loud once . and when you 're talking about a slapstick comedy , that 's a pretty big problem .
translation: 一度も大声で笑わなかったと思います。スラップスティック・コメディについて話しているとき、それはかなり大きな問題です。
back_translation: I don't think I ever laughed out loud. When talking about slapstick comedy, that's quite a big issue.

text: what bloody sunday lacks in clarity , it makes up for with a great , fiery passion .
translation: ブラッディ・サンデーは明確さに欠けるが、素晴らしく燃え上がる情熱でそれを補っている。
back_translation: Bloody Sunday lacks clarity, but it compensates with a wonderfully blazing passion.

text: daughter from danang reveals that efforts toward closure only open new wounds . it does n't flinch from its unsettling prognosis , namely , that the legacy of war is a kind of perpetual pain .
translation: ダナン出身の娘は、解決に向けた努力が新たな傷を開くだけであることを明らかにします。それは、不安をかき立てる予測から逃げることなく、戦争の遺産が一種の永続的な痛みであることを示しています。
back_translation: The daughter from Da Nang reveals that efforts to resolve the situation only open new wounds. This indicates that the legacy of war is a kind of lasting pain, without escaping from the anxiety-inducing predictions.

text: it 's a glorious groove that leaves you wanting more .
translation: それはもっと欲しくなるような素晴らしいグルーヴです。
back_translation: It's a wonderful groove that makes you want more.

text: the film hinges on its performances , and both leads are up to the task .
translation: この映画は演技にかかっており、主役二人はその役割を果たしています。
back_translation: This movie relies on the performances, and the two lead actors fulfill their roles.

text: a stunning and overwhelmingly cogent case for kissinger as a calculating war criminal .
translation: キッシンジャーを計算された戦争犯罪者として論理的に強力に示す驚くべきケース。
back_translation: An astonishing case that logically presents Kissinger as a calculated war criminal.

text: instead of using george and lucy 's most obvious differences to ignite sparks , lawrence desperately looks elsewhere , seizing on george 's haplessness and lucy 's personality tics .
translation: ジョージとルーシーの最も明白な違いを利用して火花を散らす代わりに、ローレンスは必死に他の方法を探し、ジョージの不運さとルーシーの個性的な癖に目を付ける。
back_translation: Instead of sparking conflict by taking advantage of the most obvious differences between George and Lucy, Lawrence desperately searches for other ways and focuses on George's misfortune and Lucy's unique quirks.

text: in the end , the weight of water comes to resemble the kind of soft-core twaddle you 'd expect to see on showtime 's 'red shoe diaries . '
translation: 結局、水の重さは、ショータイムの「レッド・シュー・ダイアリーズ」で見られるようなソフトコアの戯言に似てくる。
back_translation: In the end, the weight of water resembles the softcore nonsense seen in Showtime's "Red Shoe Diaries."

text: the whole movie is simply a lazy exercise in bad filmmaking that asks you to not only suspend your disbelief but your intelligence as well .
translation: その映画全体は、単に怠惰な悪い映画製作の練習であり、あなたに信じることだけでなく、知性をも停止するよう求めている。
back_translation: The entire movie is merely a practice in lazy and poor filmmaking, demanding not just that you believe it, but also that you suspend your intelligence.

text: though it inspires some ( out-of-field ) creative thought , the film is -- to its own detriment -- much more a cinematic collage than a polemical tract .
translation: それは一部の（場外の）創造的思考を刺激しますが、その映画は、自らの損失となるように、論争的な文章よりもはるかに映画的コラージュです。
back_translation: It stimulates some creative thinking (outside the box), but that movie is much more of a cinematic collage than a controversial treatise to its own detriment.

text: it 's a very tasteful rock and roll movie . you could put it on a coffee table anywhere .
translation: とてもセンスの良いロックンロール映画です。どこにでもコーヒーテーブルに置けます。
back_translation: It's a very stylish rock 'n' roll movie. You can place it on any coffee table.

text: mason novel follows a british officer who resigns his post right before his regiment ships out to battle the rebels .
translation: メイソンの小説は、反乱軍との戦闘に出発する直前に任務を辞職するイギリスの将校を描いています。
back_translation: Mason's novel portrays a British officer who resigns from his mission just before departing to engage in battle with the rebels.

text: marker 's incredible collection of newsreel footage -- tv footage from various countries , home movies and other celluloid wonders -- eventually shapes a scattered , pinwheel idea of the era 's attitude .
translation: マーカーの驚くべきニュースリール映像のコレクション - 様々な国のテレビ映像、自宅の映画、その他のフィルムの驚異 - は、最終的にその時代の態度についての散発的な、ピンホイールのようなアイデアを形成します。
back_translation: A remarkable collection of reel footage from Markers - television footage from various countries, home movies, and other films - ultimately forms sporadic, pinwheel-like ideas about the attitudes of that era.
