text: september of 1944 , a few days before finland went out of the second world war .
translation: 1944年9月、フィンランドが第二次世界大戦から脱退する数日前。
back_translation: A few days before Finland withdrew from World War II in September 1944.

text: this is the story of their lives , their memories , their unbending habits and the films they love .
translation: これは彼らの人生の物語であり、彼らの思い出、彼らのゆるがない習慣、そして彼らが愛する映画です。
back_translation: This is the story of their lives, their memories, their unwavering habits, and the movies they love.

text: awaking , he meets manny , a mammoth who travels to the north , and decides to follow him .
translation: 目覚めると、彼は北へ旅するマンモスのマニーに出会い、彼に従うことに決める。
back_translation: When he awakens, he meets Manny the mammoth who is traveling north, and he decides to follow him.

text: the movie is dawn of the dead crossed with john carpenter 's ghosts of mars , with zombies not as ghoulish as the first and trains not as big as the second .
translation: 映画は「ショーン・オブ・ザ・デッド」とジョン・カーペンターの「マーズの亡霊」の交差点で、ゾンビは最初ほどグールのようではなく、列車は二番目ほど大きくはありません。
back_translation: The movie is at the intersection of "Shaun of the Dead" and John Carpenter's "Ghosts of Mars," where the zombies are less ghoul-like than at the beginning and the train is not as large as in the second.

text: . . . a fairly disposable yet still entertaining b picture .
translation: かなり使い捨てな割にはまだ楽しめるB級映画です。
back_translation: It's a B-movie that, despite being quite disposable, is still enjoyable.

text: whether you like rap music or loathe it , you ca n't deny either the tragic loss of two young men in the prime of their talent or the power of this movie .
translation: ラップ音楽が好きでも嫌いでも、才能の絶頂にある二人の若者の悲劇的な死や、この映画の力を否定することはできません。
back_translation: Whether you like or dislike rap music, you cannot deny the tragic death of two talented young individuals at the peak of their abilities, nor the power of this film.

text: but idle curiosity leads to a dark secret when rebecca and john cam with vera madeline , an online psychic , who initiates a deadly reign of terror over their lives .
translation: しかし、無駄な好奇心が暗い秘密につながり、レベッカとジョンがオンラインの霊媒師ヴェラ・マデリンと出会うと、彼女は彼らの生活に致命的な恐怖の支配を開始します。
back_translation: However, their needless curiosity leads to dark secrets, and when Rebecca and John encounter the online medium Vera Madeleine, she begins to instill a deadly fear into their lives.

text: quirky and understated office comedy with crispin glover as the guy who would prefer not to work , but likes to hang around .
translation: クリスピン・グローバーが働くことを好まないが、周りにいるのが好きな男を演じる、独特で控えめなオフィスコメディ。
back_translation: A unique and understated office comedy about a man, played by Crispin Glover, who dislikes working but enjoys being around others.

text: part of the draw of dance is the impossibility to define its particular joy . tavernier 's film conveys a large element of its appeal -- and more .
translation: ダンスの魅力の一部は、その特有の喜びを定義することが不可能であることです。タヴェルニエの映画は、その魅力の大きな要素を伝えており、それ以上のものも表現しています。
back_translation: Part of the charm of dance lies in its impossibility to define its unique joy. Tavernier's film conveys a significant element of that charm and expresses even more.

text: a single-minded man focused on finding the girl of his dreams the perfect vision he 's created in his mind 's eye .
translation: 夢の中で描いた理想の少女を見つけることに集中する、一途な男。
back_translation: A devoted man focused on finding the ideal girl he envisioned in his dreams.

text: the judge gives him until the end of the day to present the papers and thus begins a cat and mouse game between the proponents .
translation: 裁判官は彼に書類を提出するために今日の終わりまでの時間を与え、こうして支持者たちの間で猫とネズミのゲームが始まります。
back_translation: The judge gave him until the end of today to submit the documents, and thus the game of cat and mouse began among the supporters.

text: produced by chica luna productions , corporate dawgz is a comedic ode to white revolutionaries who understand that what they give up in privilege they gain tenfold in humanity .
translation: チカ・ルナ・プロダクションズによって制作された「コーポレート・ドッグズ」は、特権を手放すことで人間性を十倍に得ることを理解する白人革命家たちへの滑稽なオードです。
back_translation: "Corporate Dogs," produced by Chika Luna Productions, is a comedic ode to white revolutionaries who understand that relinquishing privilege allows them to gain humanity tenfold.

text: kanna is intelligent and presently doing final year mbbs in nagpur .
translation: カンナは賢く、現在ナグプールで最終年のMBBSを勉強しています。
back_translation: Kanna is intelligent and is currently studying for her final year of MBBS in Nagpur.

text: a sub-formulaic slap in the face to seasonal cheer .
translation: 季節の喜びへのサブフォーミュラ的な平手打ち。
back_translation: A sub-formulaic slap to the joy of the seasons.

text: humorless , self-conscious art drivel , made without a glimmer of intelligence or invention .
translation: ユーモアのない、自己意識過剰なアートのたわごとで、知性や創造性のかけらもない。
back_translation: It's a self-indulgent display of art that lacks humor and has no trace of intelligence or creativity.

text: what 's infuriating about full frontal is that it 's too close to real life to make sense . what 's invigorating about it is that it does n't give a damn .
translation: フルフロンタルが苛立たしいのは、現実にあまりにも近いために意味がないことです。反対に、それが生き生きとさせるのは、全く気にしていないことです。
back_translation: What is frustrating about Full Frontal is that it is meaningless because it is too close to reality. Conversely, what makes it vibrant is that it does not care at all.

text: `` some like it hot `` meets `` stir crazy `` describes the antics of the film .
translation: 「サムライ 星のハイ」という映画の騒動を描写している。
back_translation: It depicts the controversy surrounding the movie "Samurai Star High."

text: the journey is worth your time , especially if you have ellen pompeo sitting next to you for the ride .
translation: その旅はあなたの時間に値します、特に隣にエレン・ポンペオが座っているならなおさらです。
back_translation: That journey is worth your time, especially if Ellen Pompeo is sitting next to you.

text: the project honors [ dickens ' ] passionate voice , and the strong ensemble cast sees us through a few tonal shifts .
translation: このプロジェクトは、ディケンズの情熱的な声を称賛し、強力なアンサンブルキャストがいくつかのトーンの変化を私たちに伝えます。
back_translation: This project celebrates Dickens' passionate voice, with a powerful ensemble cast conveying various shifts in tone.

text: the film would have been more enjoyable had the balance shifted in favor of water-bound action over the land-based 'drama , ' but the emphasis on the latter leaves blue crush waterlogged .
translation: 映画は、陸上の「ドラマ」に対して水中アクションが優位に立ったなら、もっと楽しかったかもしれませんが、後者に重点を置いたために「ブルークラッシュ」は水浸しになっています。
back_translation: If the movie had favored underwater action over the land-based "drama," it might have been more enjoyable, but because it focused on the latter, "Blue Crush" ended up being soaked.

text: now they must run for their lives as the deluge strikes with full force at the heart of their private world .
translation: 彼らは今、自分たちの私的な世界の中心に洪水が本格的に襲いかかる中で、命をかけて逃げなければならない。
back_translation: They must risk their lives to escape as a flood seriously strikes at the center of their private world.

text: it 's one heck of a character study -- not of hearst or davies but of the unique relationship between them .
translation: それは、ハーストやデイヴィスのキャラクター研究ではなく、彼らの間の独特の関係についての素晴らしい研究です。
back_translation: It is a wonderful study about the unique relationship between Hearst and Davis, rather than a character study of either of them.

text: starts slowly , but adrien brody M-^V in the title role M-^V helps make the film 's conclusion powerful and satisfying .
translation: ゆっくりと始まりますが、アドリアン・ブロディが主役を演じることで、この映画の結論が力強く、満足のいくものになっています。
back_translation: It starts slowly, but with Adrien Brody playing the lead role, the conclusion of this film is strong and satisfying.

text: this cheery , down-to-earth film is warm with the cozy feeling of relaxing around old friends .
translation: この陽気で現実的な映画は、古い友人とリラックスして過ごす心地よい雰囲気で心が温まります。
back_translation: This cheerful and realistic movie warms the heart with its pleasant atmosphere of spending time relaxing with old friends.

text: kok pin is creative and a born artist but his parents would rather he focus on his maths and sciences .
translation: コク・ピンはクリエイティブで生まれながらのアーティストですが、彼の両親は彼に数学と科学に集中してほしいと思っています。
back_translation: Coc Pin is a creative and naturally born artist, but his parents want him to focus on mathematics and science.

text: nearly 75 years after the fact , the matter still has n't given up all its secrets , but denis ' film comes close to a definitive , deeply disturbing account .
translation: 事実からほぼ75年が経った今でも、その問題はすべての秘密を明かしてはいませんが、デニスの映画は決定的で深く不穏な物語に近づいています。
back_translation: Even nearly 75 years after the events, the issue has not revealed all its secrets, but Dennis's film approaches a definitive and profoundly unsettling narrative.

text: obsessed by the world of pool , johnny ( mars callahan ) could be one of the best .
translation: プールの世界に取り憑かれたジョニー（マーズ・キャラハン）は、最高のプレイヤーの一人になることができる。
back_translation: Johnny (Mars Callahan), who is possessed by the world of pool, is able to become one of the best players.

text: as the script progresses , layers are slowly pulled away revealing secret relationships and subversive undercurrents - the wedding shower quickly becomes a free for all .
translation: 脚本が進むにつれて、層が徐々に剥がれ、秘密の関係や潜在的な亀裂が明らかになっていく - ウェディングシャワーはすぐに無秩序な状況に変わる。
back_translation: As the script progresses, layers gradually peel away, revealing secret relationships and potential rifts - the wedding shower quickly transforms into a chaotic situation.

text: the most hopelessly monotonous film of the year , noteworthy only for the gimmick of being filmed as a single unbroken 87-minute take .
translation: 今年最も絶望的に単調な映画であり、87分の途切れない1本のテイクとして撮影されたというギミックだけが注目される。
back_translation: This is the most despairingly monotonous movie of the year, with the only noteworthy gimmick being that it was filmed as an uninterrupted single take lasting 87 minutes.

text: lucy is a wannabe writer who hides behind a dead end job in her hometown .
translation: ルーシーは、故郷の行き詰まった仕事の裏に隠れている作家志望です。
back_translation: Lucy is an aspiring writer who hides behind a stagnant job in her hometown.

text: by the standards of knucklehead swill , the hot chick is pretty damned funny .
translation: ナックルヘッドの駄作の基準で言えば、その魅力的な女の子はかなり面白い。
back_translation: By the standards of a Knucklehead's bad works, that charming girl is quite interesting.

text: but something is very wrong in single and looking land .
translation: しかし、一人でいる土地には何かとてもおかしなことがあります。
back_translation: However, there is something very strange about being alone in a place.

text: tina tyler cleverly directs five vignettes with unabashed sexual prowess .
translation: ティナ・タイラーは、遠慮のない性的な腕前で5つのヴィネットを巧みに演出しています。
back_translation: Tina Tyler skillfully directs five vignettes with her uninhibited sexual prowess.

text: as now-senator padm & # 233 ; amidala returns to coruscant to vote on an important senatorial matter , an assassination attempt on her life prompts the jedi council to send jedi knight obi-wan kenobi and his padawan anakin skywalker to protect her and find out who the assassin is .
translation: 現在、上院議員パドメ・アミダラは重要な上院の案件に投票するためにコルサントに戻りますが、彼女の命を狙った暗殺未遂が発生し、ジェダイ評議会はジェダイナイトオビ＝ワン・ケノービと彼のパダワン、アナキン・スカイウォーカーを派遣して彼女を守り、暗殺者が誰であるかを突き止めるように命じます。
back_translation: Currently, Senator Padmé Amidala is returning to Coruscant to vote on an important Senate matter, but an assassination attempt on her life occurs. The Jedi Council dispatches Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Padawan, Anakin Skywalker, to protect her and determine who the assassin is.

text: the cynicism is colossal , the casting superb : norton may be the only actor alive who could pull off a character like sherman , without making him either an idiot or a parody .
translation: 皮肉は巨大で、キャスティングは素晴らしい。ノートンは、シャーマンのようなキャラクターを馬鹿にもパロディにもせずに演じられる数少ない俳優かもしれない。
back_translation: The irony is immense, and the casting is excellent. Norton may be one of the few actors who can portray a character like Sherman without making it a joke or a parody.

text: at the same time , mickey steals money from an apartment to help himself and carlos to fulfill their ambitions - with tragic consequences .
translation: 同時に、ミッキーは自分とカルロスの野望を果たすためにアパートからお金を盗むが、悲劇的な結果を招く。
back_translation: At the same time, Mickey steals money from the apartment to fulfill his and Carlos's ambitions, which leads to a tragic outcome.

text: it 's anchored by splendid performances from an honored screen veteran and a sparkling newcomer who instantly transform themselves into a believable mother/daughter pair .
translation: 栄誉あるスクリーンのベテランと瞬時に信じられる母娘のペアに変身する輝かしい新星による素晴らしい演技によって支えられています。
back_translation: It is supported by the wonderful performance of a brilliant new star who transforms into a pair of an esteemed screen veteran and a instantly believable mother and daughter.

text: very annie-mary is familiar but winningly funny and good-hearted .
translation: 非常にアニーメリーは親しみやすく、魅力的で面白く、心優しいです。
back_translation: Annie is very friendly, charming, interesting, and kind-hearted.

text: an interesting psychological game of cat-and-mouse , three-dimensional characters and believable performances all add up to a satisfying crime drama .
translation: 興味深い心理戦のゲーム、三次元のキャラクターと信じられる演技がすべて合わさり、満足のいく犯罪ドラマが生まれています。
back_translation: An intriguing psychological battle game combines three-dimensional characters with believable performances, resulting in a satisfying crime drama.

text: teens are borrowing the family car to drive to manhattan with hopes of being picked to enter studio 54 .
translation: ティーンエイジャーたちは、マンハッタンに行くために家族の車を借りて、スタジオ54に入れることを期待しています。
back_translation: The teenagers are hoping to borrow their family's car to go to Manhattan and get into Studio 54.

text: i did n't believe for a moment in these villains or their plot .
translation: 私はこれらの悪役や彼らの陰謀を一瞬たりとも信じていませんでした。
back_translation: I never believed in these villains or their schemes for a moment.

text: the film . . . presents classic moral-condundrum drama : what would you have done to survive ? the problem with the film is whether these ambitions , laudable in themselves , justify a theatrical simulation of the death camp of auschwitz ii-birkenau .
translation: この映画はクラシックな倫理的ジレンマのドラマを提示している：生き残るためにあなたは何をしたでしょうか？映画の問題は、これらの野心が自体として称賛に値するものであっても、アウシュビッツII−ビルケナウの死のキャンプを演劇的にシミュレーションすることを正当化するのかどうかということです。
back_translation: This film presents a classic ethical dilemma drama: what would you do to survive? The issue of the film is whether these ambitions, even if commendable in themselves, justify the dramatic simulation of the death camp Auschwitz II-Birkenau.

text: it has plenty of laughs . it just does n't have much else . . . especially in a moral sense .
translation: たくさんの笑いがありますが、それ以外はあまりありません……特に道徳的な意味では。
back_translation: There are a lot of laughs, but not much else... especially not in a moral sense.

text: it 's a lovely , eerie film that casts an odd , rapt spell .
translation: それは、不思議で魅力的な呪文をかける素晴らしく不気味な映画です。
back_translation: It is a wonderfully eerie movie that casts a mysterious and enchanting spell.

text: vin diesel reunites with the director ( rob cohen ) and the producer ( neal h . moritz ) of the blockbuster the fast and the furious .
translation: ヴィン・ディーゼルが大ヒット作「ワイルドスピード」の監督（ロブ・コーエン）とプロデューサー（ニール・H・モリッツ）と再会します。
back_translation: Vin Diesel reunites with the director (Rob Cohen) and producer (Neal H. Moritz) of the blockbuster "Fast and Furious."

text: and even if the answer is `` yes , `` what then ?
translation: そして、たとえ答えが「はい」であったとしても、その後はどうなるのでしょうか？
back_translation: So, even if the answer is "yes," what happens next?

text: this is just lazy writing . even kids deserve better .
translation: これはただの怠惰な文章です。子供たちでさえもっと良いものに値します。
back_translation: This is just a lazy piece of writing. Even children deserve something better.

text: a little objectivity could have gone a long way .
translation: 少しの客観性があれば、たくさんの助けになったかもしれません。
back_translation: A little objectivity could have been a lot of help.

text: an alcoholic ex-school teacher takes a job watching security cameras in the same house .
translation: アルコール依存症の元学校教師が、同じ家の監視カメラを見守る仕事を引き受ける。
back_translation: A former school teacher with alcoholism takes on a job watching the security cameras in the same house.

text: though ganesh is successful in a midlevel sort of way , there 's nothing so striking or fascinating or metaphorically significant about his career as to rate two hours of our attention .
translation: ガネーシャは中程度に成功していますが、彼のキャリアには私たちの注意を2時間も引くほどの際立ったり魅力的だったり、比喩的に重要なものは何もありません。
back_translation: Ganesha has achieved moderate success, but there is nothing in his career that stands out, is captivating, or is metaphorically significant enough to hold our attention for two hours.

text: they do this by planning india 's biggest bank heist and then de-camping with the loot .
translation: 彼らはインド最大の銀行強盗を計画し、その後、戦利品を持って逃げることによってこれを実行します。
back_translation: They plan the largest bank robbery in India and execute it by fleeing with the loot.

text: he still lives in his new york city orphanage well after the usual age of release .
translation: 彼は通常の退所年齢を過ぎても、ニューヨーク市の孤児院にまだ住んでいます。
back_translation: He is still living in an orphanage in New York City, even though he has passed the usual age for leaving.

text: the film _boogie nights_ was loosely based on his life .
translation: 映画『ブギーナイツ』は彼の人生を loosely 基にしています。
back_translation: The movie "Boogie Nights" is loosely based on his life.

text: torn between two worlds , trey hides from his discomfort in an increasingly dangerous sexual addiction that threatens to destroy not only his new startup ideas , it may destroy his life .
translation: 二つの世界の間で引き裂かれたトレイは、新しいスタートアップのアイデアだけでなく、自身の人生をも破壊しかねない、ますます危険な性的依存症からの不快感を隠している。
back_translation: Trey, torn between two worlds, hides the discomfort of an increasingly dangerous sexual addiction that could destroy not only his new startup ideas but also his own life.

text: the best thing i can say about this film is that i ca n't wait to see what the director does next .
translation: この映画について私が言える最高のことは、監督が次に何をするのか待ちきれないということです。
back_translation: The best thing I can say about this movie is that I can't wait to see what the director does next.

text: except shaun runs into one complication after another starting when his application is rejected after his dim-witted guidance counselor sends the wrong application .
translation: ショーンは、彼の取り組みが拒否され、間違った申請書を送ったおバカな進路指導教員のせいで一つまた一つと複雑な問題に直面します。
back_translation: Sean faces one complicated problem after another due to his foolish career counselor who rejected his efforts and sent the wrong application.

text: now finding the town run by the man behind the terrible act , slaughter teams up with the mysterious gunslinger savannah starr to try and rid the west of one of it 's great evils .
translation: 今、恐ろしい行為の背後にいる男が支配する町を見つけ、スローターは謎のガンスリンガー、サバンナ・スターと手を組んで、西部の偉大な悪の一つを取り除こうとしています。
back_translation: Now, Slaughter has teamed up with the mysterious gunslinger, Savannah Star, to take down one of the great evils of the West in a town controlled by a man behind a terrifying act.

text: a somewhat crudely constructed but gripping , questing look at a person so racked with self-loathing , he becomes an enemy to his own race .
translation: やや粗雑に構築されたが、引き込まれるような、自己嫌悪に苛まれた人物を追求する視点であり、彼は自らの人種の敵となる。
back_translation: It is somewhat crudely constructed, yet it takes a captivating perspective on a character plagued by self-loathing, who becomes an enemy to his own race.

text: they all dream about finding their prince charming , and all too often settle for the frog .
translation: 彼女たちは皆、自分の理想の王子様を見つけることを夢見ていますが、あまりにも頻繁にカエルで妥協しています。
back_translation: They all dream of finding their ideal prince, but too often they compromise with a frog.

text: seeing no help forthcoming from the sheriff , she turns to the only other person who can help her , jack barone , a grieving father whose daughter , lisa , was the victim of a similar slaying ten years prior .
translation: 助けが得られないと感じた彼女は、唯一の救いを求めて、10年前に類似の殺人事件の被害者となった娘リサを持つ悲しみに暮れる父ジャック・バローネのもとに向かう。
back_translation: Feeling that she could not get help, she seeks the only solace by going to Jack Barone, a father who is engulfed in sorrow over his daughter Lisa, who was a victim of a similar murder case ten years ago.

text: for a debut film , skin of man , heart of beast feels unusually assured .
translation: デビュー作「人の皮、獣の心」は異常に自信に満ちている。
back_translation: The debut work "Human Skin, Beast's Heart" is filled with an unusually high level of confidence.

text: it 's the chemistry between the women and the droll scene-stealing wit and wolfish pessimism of anna chancellor that makes this `` two weddings and a funeral `` fun .
translation: 女性たちの間の化学反応と、アンナ・チャンセラーの面白おかしいシーンを奪うウィットとオオカミのような悲観主義が、この「二つの結婚式と一つの葬式」を楽しくしています。
back_translation: The chemical reactions among women, along with Anna Chancellor's witty and amusing scenes, infused with a wolf-like pessimism, make "Two Weddings and a Funeral" enjoyable.

text: texan director george ratliff had unlimited access to families and church meetings , and he delivers fascinating psychological fare .
translation: テキサスの監督ジョージ・ラトリフは家族や教会の集まりに無制限にアクセスし、魅力的な心理的内容を提供しています。
back_translation: Texas director George Latrieve has unlimited access to family and church gatherings, providing engaging psychological content.

text: this discovery thrusts tong into world of international intrigue and espionage and pairs him with an inexperienced partner ( hewitt ) .
translation: この発見はトンを国際的な陰謀とスパイ活動の世界に巻き込み、未熟なパートナー（ヒューイット）と組ませることになります。
back_translation: This discovery will involve Ton in a world of international conspiracy and espionage, teaming him up with an immature partner (Hewitt).

text: however , once jason realizes what freddy has done , he is infuriated .
translation: しかし、ジェイソンがフレディのしたことに気づくと、彼は激怒する。
back_translation: However, when Jason realizes what Freddy has done, he becomes furious.

text: [ t ] his slop does n't even have potential as a cult film , as it 's too loud to shout insults at the screen .
translation: このスロップはカルト映画としての可能性すらなく、スクリーンに侮辱を叫ぶにはあまりにも大声すぎる。
back_translation: This slop has no potential even as a cult film, and it is far too loud to shout insults on the screen.

text: grueling days of blue-collar construction work fund their nocturnal pursuit of becoming full-time musicians .
translation: 過酷なブルーカラーの建設作業の日々は、彼らがフルタイムのミュージシャンになるための夜の活動を支えている。
back_translation: The harsh days of blue-collar construction work support their nighttime activities to become full-time musicians.

text: heartwarming here relies less on forced air than on petter nM-fss ' delicate , clever direction . . . and a wonderful , imaginative script by axel hellstenius .
translation: 心温まるここでは、強制空気に頼るよりも、ペター・N・エフスの繊細で巧妙な演出と、アクセル・ヘルステニウスによる素晴らしく想像力豊かな脚本に依存しています。
back_translation: In this heartwarming piece, it relies more on the delicate and clever direction of Peter N. Efs than on forced air, along with the wonderfully imaginative script by Axel Helerstenius.

text: he decides to play along in order to do research for his floundering novel .
translation: 彼は自分の行き詰った小説のために調査をするため、遊びに参加することに決めた。
back_translation: He decided to join the game to do research for his stuck novel.

text: against all odds in heaven and hell , it creeped me out just fine .
translation: 天と地のすべての困難に逆らって、それは私をしっかりと不気味にさせた。
back_translation: Against all the difficulties of heaven and earth, it firmly made me feel eerie.

text: however , soon they have the cops and the anti-terror corps on their tails .
translation: しかし、すぐに彼らは警察と反テロ部隊に追われることになる。
back_translation: However, they would soon be pursued by the police and anti-terror units.

text: i 'm sure the filmmaker would disagree , but , honestly , i do n't see the point . it 's a visual rorschach test and i must have failed .
translation: 私は映画監督が反対することは確信していますが、正直なところ、その意義がわかりません。それは視覚的なロールシャッハテストで、私は失敗したに違いありません。
back_translation: I am convinced that movie directors will oppose it, but to be honest, I don't understand its significance. It is a visual Rorschach test, and I must have failed it.

text: lauren hynde ( shannyn sossamon ) is technically a virgin .
translation: ローリン・ハインド（シャニン・ソサモン）は、厳密には処女です。
back_translation: Rawlin Hind (Shannyn Sossamon) is technically a virgin.

text: as literary desecrations go , this makes for perfectly acceptable , occasionally very enjoyable children 's entertainment . you 'll forget about it by monday , though , and if they 're old enough to have developed some taste , so will your kids .
translation: 文学的冒涜としては、これは完全に許容される、時には非常に楽しめる子供向けの娯楽です。しかし、月曜日までには忘れてしまうでしょうし、もし子供たちがある程度の趣味を持つ年齢であれば、彼らもそうなるでしょう。
back_translation: As a literary blasphemy, this is completely acceptable and can sometimes be very enjoyable children's entertainment. However, by Monday, it will likely be forgotten, and if the children are of an age where they have some sense of taste, they will probably forget it too.

text: max is surrounded by treachery and can trust no one , including natalie , the dangerously beautiful cia agent assigned to watch over him .
translation: マックスは裏切りに囲まれ、ナタリーを含む誰も信じることができない。ナタリーは彼を見守るために任命された危険な美しさを持つCIAエージェントである。
back_translation: Max is surrounded by betrayal and cannot trust anyone, including Natalie. Natalie is a dangerous beauty appointed to watch over him as a CIA agent.

text: with the help of his two brothers & # 193 ; kos , a successful manager and sex maniac , and andr & # 225 ; s , a poet and complete loser , he tries to make a good impression on the american and persuade him to finance the film project .
translation: 彼は二人の兄、成功したマネージャーで性欲に溺れるコスと、詩人で完全に負け犬のアンドラスの助けを借りて、アメリカ人に良い印象を与え、映画プロジェクトの資金を提供するように説得しようとしています。
back_translation: He is trying to win a good impression from Americans and persuade them to fund a movie project with the help of his two brothers: Kost, a successful manager who is drowning in lust, and Andras, a poet and a complete loser.

text: her mother convinces gus to let her take some computer classes at college ( making him think it 's his idea ) .
translation: 彼女の母親はグスを説得して、彼女が大学でいくつかのコンピュータクラスを受けることを許可させます（彼にそれが彼のアイデアだと思わせるように）。
back_translation: Her mother persuades Gus to allow her to take some computer classes at university (making him think it was his idea).

text: . . . has a bit more going for it than just bikini babes and bitchin ' waves . but the plot is ankle deep at best .
translation: . . . はビキニの美女と素晴らしい波だけではなく、もう少し魅力がある。しかし、プロットはせいぜい足首までの深さだ。
back_translation: ... is not just about beautiful women in bikinis and wonderful waves; it has a bit more charm. However, the plot is at most ankle-deep.

text: he can not concentrate on his job nor on his studies , being continuously mindful of his girlfriend and concubine ana 's ( dolores fonzi ) whereabouts and activities .
translation: 彼は仕事にも勉強にも集中できず、彼女であるアナ（ドルレス・フォンジ）の行動や行く先を常に気にしています。
back_translation: He can't focus on either work or studying and is always worried about the actions and whereabouts of his girlfriend, Ana (Dolores Vonzi).

text: amaro soon discovers that corruption and the church are old acquaintances in los reyes .
translation: アマロはすぐに、ロス・レジェスにおいて腐敗と教会が古くからの知り合いであることを発見します。
back_translation: Amaro quickly discovers that corruption and the church have long been acquaintances in Los Reyes.

text: guy mann has been cursed since birth with blue skin .
translation: ガイ・マンは、生まれてからずっと青い肌の呪いを受けています。
back_translation: Guy Mann has been cursed with blue skin since he was born.

text: there 's suspension of disbelief and then there 's bad screenwriting . . . this film packs a wallop of the latter .
translation: その先には不信のサスペンションがあり、そして悪い脚本がある……この映画は後者の衝撃をもたらす。
back_translation: Beyond that lies a suspension of disbelief, and a bad script... this film delivers the shock of the latter.

text: toes the fine line between cheese and earnestness remarkably well ; everything is delivered with such conviction that it 's hard not to be carried away .
translation: チーズと真剣さの微妙なラインを驚くほどうまく歩んでおり、すべてが非常に強い信念を持って伝えられるため、感情に流されないのは難しい。
back_translation: It walks a surprisingly fine line between cheese and seriousness, making it difficult not to be swayed by the emotions, as everything is conveyed with a very strong conviction.

text: but unfortunately , karl lubeck has seen better days .
translation: しかし残念なことに、カール・リューベックはより良い日々を過ごしたことがあります。
back_translation: However, unfortunately, Karl Rübeck has had better days.

text: danica mckellar plays a cheerleader named lacy who lives across the street from the boy , who is obsessed with her .
translation: ダニカ・マッケラーは、向かいの家に住む彼女に夢中な男の子の向かいに住む応援団員レイシーを演じています。
back_translation: Danica McKellar stars as Lacey, a cheerleader who lives across from a boy madly in love with the girl who lives in the house opposite.

text: before he can complete his task he meets a young women d & # 218 ; a ( margr & # 233 ; t vilhj & # 225 ; lmsd & # 243 ; ttir ) who he believes might be his daughter .
translation: 彼が任務を完了する前に、彼は若い女性ダ （マーグレット・ヴィルヒャルムスドッティル）と出会い、彼女が自分の娘かもしれないと考えます。
back_translation: Before completing his mission, he meets a young woman named Da (Margret Vilhjálmsdóttir) and contemplates the possibility that she may be his daughter.

text: a hit man from the same mob is sent to kill sullivan and his family , but only kills his wife and son , peter .
translation: 同じマフィアから来た殺し屋がサリバンとその家族を殺すために派遣されるが、妻と息子のピーターだけを殺す。
back_translation: A hitman from the same mafia is sent to kill Sullivan and his family, but only kills his wife and son, Peter.

text: shows that you should not fear death , but to fear an unlived life .
translation: 死を恐れるべきではなく、生きていない人生を恐れるべきだということを示しています。
back_translation: It shows that one should not fear death, but rather fear a life not lived.

text: brad gluckman ( kennedy ) is a wannabe rap star from malibu who acts and talks like he 's from the `` 'hood . ``
translation: ブラッド・グラックマン（ケネディ）はマリブ出身のラップスターのなりたい人で、「フッド」出身のように振る舞い、話します。
back_translation: Brad Gluckman (Kennedy) is an aspiring rap star from Malibu who acts and talks as if he is from the 'hood.'

text: sparkling , often hilarious romantic jealousy comedy . . . attal looks so much like a young robert deniro that it seems the film should instead be called 'my husband is travis bickle ' .
translation: スパークリングでしばしば笑えるロマンティックな嫉妬コメディ... アタルは若いロバート・デ・ニーロにとても似ているので、映画は「私の夫はトラビス・ビックル」と呼ばれるべきのように思える。
back_translation: A sparkling and often humorous romantic jealousy comedy... since Ataru resembles a young Robert De Niro so much, it seems the movie should be called "My Husband is Travis Bickle."

text: talk to her is not the perfect movie many have made it out to be , but it 's still quite worth seeing .
translation: 「彼女に話しかける」は、多くの人が言っているほど完璧な映画ではありませんが、それでも見る価値は十分にあります。
back_translation: "Talking to Her" is not a perfect movie as many people say, but it's still more than worth watching.

text: the film runs on a little longer than it needs to -- muccino either does n't notice when his story ends or just ca n't tear himself away from the characters -- but it 's smooth and professional .
translation: 映画は必要以上に少し長く続いていますが、ムッキーノは物語が終わるのに気づいていないか、キャラクターから離れられないのでしょう。しかし、それは滑らかでプロフェッショナルです。
back_translation: The movie runs a bit longer than necessary, but Mukikino may not realize the story is ending or cannot detach from the characters. However, it is smooth and professional.

text: both the film and nachtwey 's photos hammer home the grim reality of the world 's gutters and battlefields , and will make you question what 'news ' really is .
translation: 映画とナクトウェイの写真は、世界の下水溝や戦場の厳しい現実を強く訴えかけ、私たちに「ニュース」とは一体何なのかを疑問に思わせるでしょう。
back_translation: The photos from movies and Nakutowei strongly appeal to the harsh realities of the world's sewers and battlefields, making us question what "news" really is.

text: tellis teams with henry oak , a friend of the dead narc and an aggressive cop constantly under the scrutiny of internal affairs .
translation: テリスは、死んだ麻薬捜査官の友人であり、内部監察の厳しい目にさらされ続ける攻撃的な刑事ヘンリー・オークと手を組む。
back_translation: Terrace teams up with Henry Oak, an aggressive detective constantly under the scrutiny of internal affairs, who is a friend of a deceased drug investigator.

text: the comedy death to smoochy is a rancorous curiosity : a movie without an apparent audience .
translation: コメディ映画「デス・トゥ・スムーチー」は、明らかな観客のいない恨めしい好奇心を抱えた作品です。
back_translation: The comedy film "Death to Smoochy" is a work that bears a clear audience-less resentful curiosity.

text: a voice which seems to be coming from within the walls .
translation: 壁の中から聞こえてくるような声。
back_translation: A voice that seems to be coming from within the wall.

text: in today 's world of facts and figures about smoking related illness and death , one element is greatly overlooked , the consequences that smoking has on the family .
translation: 今日の喫煙に関連する病気や死亡についての事実や数字の世界では、喫煙が家族に与える影響は大いに見落とされています。
back_translation: In the world of facts and figures related to smoking-related diseases and deaths today, the impact of smoking on families is often greatly overlooked.

text: the mood , look and tone of the film fit the incredible storyline to a t .
translation: 映画の雰囲気、見た目、トーンは、素晴らしいストーリーラインにぴったり合っています。
back_translation: The atmosphere, appearance, and tone of the movie perfectly match the wonderful storyline.

text: the story of the couple is told to a woman in a nursing home ( rowlands ) by an old man who regularly visits to read her the story from a notebook .
translation: そのカップルの物語は、老夫婦を定期的に訪ねてきてノートから物語を読み聞かせる老人によって、介護施設にいる女性（ローランズ）に語られます。
back_translation: The story of that couple is told to a woman (Rollands) in a nursing home by an old man who regularly visits an elderly couple and reads stories from a notebook.

text: a look into the underground world of bruce haack , a genius who 's past work continues to garner recognition with time .
translation: ブルース・ハックの地下世界を覗く。彼の天才的な過去の作品は、時が経つにつれて認識を集め続けている。
back_translation: Peering into Bruce Hack's underground world. His genius past works continue to gain recognition over time.

text: cho , who 's first concert film was more like a group therapy session than comedy , lightens up considerably for her second
translation: 初のコンサート映画がコメディというよりもグループセラピーのセッションのようだったチョは、2作目ではかなり明るい雰囲気を持っています。
back_translation: The first concert film, which felt more like a group therapy session than a comedy, has a much brighter atmosphere in the second installment.

text: in a small fishing village an established fishmonger , davis , starts to have his supply bought from under him by new boy alan leech .
translation: 小さな漁村で、ベテランの魚屋デイビスは、新入りのアラン・リーチに供給を奪われ始める。
back_translation: In a small fishing village, veteran fishmonger Davis begins to lose his supply to newcomer Alan Leach.

text: a guilty pleasure at best , and not worth seeing unless you want to laugh at it .
translation: せいぜい罪悪感のある楽しみであり、笑いたいと思わない限り見る価値はありません。
back_translation: It is at best a guilty pleasure, and there is no value in watching it unless you want to laugh.

text: tiger shark prowls on what should be a routine rescue mission .
translation: タイガーシャークが本来は通常の救助ミッションであるはずの場所を徘徊しています。
back_translation: The tiger shark is wandering in a location that was originally supposed to be a regular rescue mission.

text: not only must they overcome an enemy adept at technological witchery , they must overcome the curse that marks their destiny .
translation: 彼らはテクノロジーの魔法に精通した敵を乗り越えなければならないだけでなく、運命を示す呪いを克服しなければならない。
back_translation: They must not only overcome enemies well-versed in the magic of technology, but also conquer a curse that reveals their destiny.

text: what he does n't know yet is that these traits are part of the disguisey family secret legacy .
translation: 彼がまだ知らないのは、これらの特徴が変装家族の秘密の遺産の一部であるということだ。
back_translation: What he still doesn't know is that these traits are part of the secret legacy of the disguise family.

text: these devices immediately became an essential household appliance , and were advertised in nearly every women 's magazine and sewing notions catalog of the time .
translation: これらの機器はすぐに必需品の家庭用電化製品となり、当時のほとんどすべての女性誌や裁縫用品カタログで宣伝されました。
back_translation: These devices quickly became essential household appliances and were advertised in almost every women's magazine and sewing supply catalog of the time.

text: minority report is exactly what the title indicates , a report .
translation: マイノリティ・リポートは、そのタイトルが示す通り、レポートです。
back_translation: Minority Report is, as its title suggests, a report.

text: young marrieds lori and tom relocate from chicago to the country where they end up living next to carl , a right-wing radical who beats his wife , helen .
translation: 若い夫婦のローリとトムはシカゴから田舎に引っ越し、夫婦であるカールの隣に住むことになります。彼は右派過激派で、妻のヘレンを殴っています。
back_translation: The young couple, Lori and Tom, move from Chicago to the countryside and end up living next to Carl, who is a right-wing extremist and is abusive towards his wife, Helen.

text: an utterly compelling 'who wrote it ' in which the reputation of the most famous author who ever lived comes into question .
translation: まったく魅力的な「誰が書いたのか」というもので、最も有名な作家の評判が疑問視されます。
back_translation: It's absolutely fascinating to wonder "who wrote it," as the reputation of the most famous writers comes into question.

text: this movie praise the right to be different and unique .
translation: この映画は異なることやユニークである権利を称賛しています。
back_translation: This movie celebrates the right to be different and unique.

text: bullock stars as lucy kelson , chief counsel for the wade corporation , one of new york city 's top commercial real estate developers .
translation: ブルックは、ニューヨーク市のトップ商業不動産デベロッパーの一つであるウェイドコーポレーションの首席顧問ルーシー・ケルソン役を演じています。
back_translation: Brooke plays the role of Lucy Kearson, the chief advisor at Wade Corporation, one of the top commercial real estate developers in New York City.

text: all right , so it 's not a brilliant piece of filmmaking , but it is a funny ( sometimes hilarious ) comedy with a deft sense of humor about itself , a playful spirit and a game cast .
translation: まあ、素晴らしい映画製作ではありませんが、時には爆笑するような面白いコメディで、自分自身についての巧妙なユーモアを持ち、遊び心にあふれた雰囲気と魅力的なキャストがあります。
back_translation: Well, it's not a fantastic movie, but it is a hilarious comedy that sometimes makes you laugh out loud, with clever humor about itself, a playful atmosphere, and an engaging cast.

text: the film is an enjoyable family film -- pretty much aimed at any youngster who loves horses .
translation: この映画は楽しいファミリー映画で、馬が好きな若者に主に向けられています。
back_translation: This movie is a fun family film primarily aimed at young people who like horses.

text: set against the majestic landscape of canada 's bay of fundy and the highest tides in the world , black swan is a dark comedy that weaves the innocent world of childhood , against the adult world of love , betrayal and murder .
translation: カナダのファンディ湾の壮大な風景と世界で最も高い潮の満ち引きを背景に、ブラック・スワンは、子供の無邪気な世界と、愛、裏切り、殺人の大人の世界を織り交ぜたダークコメディです。
back_translation: Set against the breathtaking scenery of Canada's Fundy Bay and the world's highest tides, "Black Swan" is a dark comedy that intertwines the innocent world of childhood with the adult worlds of love, betrayal, and murder.

text: the new guy does have a heart . now , if it only had a brain .
translation: 新しい奴には心がある。でも、脳があればいいのに。
back_translation: The new one has a heart. But I wish it had a brain too.

text: the chaotic lead characters are not the sorts one will usually see in a disney film and that makes for a certain amount of unpredictability before it all returns to business as usual .
translation: 混沌とした主人公たちは、通常のディズニー映画では見られないタイプであり、それがすべてがいつものように戻る前に一定の予測不可能性を生み出しています。
back_translation: The chaotic protagonists are of a type not typically seen in regular Disney movies, which creates a certain unpredictability before everything returns to normal, as usual.

text: after running circles , dave , trudy , and jolynn find with the light of a new day the lives they been meaning to live .
translation: サークルを回った後、デイブ、トゥルーディ、そしてジョリンは、新しい日の光の中で、彼らが生きたいと思っていた人生を見つける。
back_translation: After going around the circle, Dave, Trudy, and Jorin find the life they wanted to live in the new day's light.

text: ronnie schwann , a young man regarded as `` slow , `` has affections for sarah , a young woman who stays at hope house , a facility for the mentally ill .
translation: ロニー・シュワンは「遅い」と見なされる若者で、メンタル・ヘルス施設であるホープハウスにいるサラという若い女性に恋心を抱いています。
back_translation: Ronnie Schwann is considered a "slow" young man who has romantic feelings for a young woman named Sara, who is in a mental health facility called Hope House.

text: it is 1492 , and spain has decreed that all jews must either convert to catholicism , go into exile or face trial and execution .
translation: 1492年、スペインはすべてのユダヤ人にカトリックに改宗するか、亡命するか、裁判と処刑に直面するかのいずれかを強いることを宣言しました。
back_translation: In 1492, Spain declared that all Jews must either convert to Catholicism, emigrate, or face trial and execution.

text: calvin 's barbershop is filled with an eclectic and hilarious cast of characters that share their stories , jokes , trials and tribulations .
translation: カルビンのバーバーショップは、彼らの物語、ジョーク、試練と苦難を共有する多様でユーモラスなキャラクターたちで溢れています。
back_translation: Calvin's barbershop is filled with a diverse and humorous cast of characters who share their stories, jokes, trials, and tribulations.

text: it may only be the third date , but tony knows it 's time to pop the question and make the beautiful , shy katrina his wife .
translation: まだ三回目のデートかもしれないが、トニーは美しくシャイなカトリーナを妻にするためにプロポーズする時だと知っている。
back_translation: It may still be their third date, but Tony knows that it's time to propose to the beautiful and shy Katrina to make her his wife.

text: his unemployment and the fact that there is no woman in the house to care for the children , evelyn , noel and brendan , make it clear to the authorities that his is an untenable situation .
translation: 彼の失業と、家に子供たちを世話する女性がいないという事実、エヴリン、ノエル、そしてブレンダンがいることで、当局には彼の状況が持続不可能であることが明らかである。
back_translation: His unemployment and the fact that there is no woman at home to take care of the children, along with Evelyn, Noel, and Brendan being present, make it clear to the authorities that his situation is unsustainable.

text: they think that if they rebuild it to work like it did in their youth , they might be able to communicate with their sister who died mysteriously on that beach 20 years ago .
translation: 彼らは、それを若い頃のように再建すれば、20年前にそのビーチで謎の死を遂げた妹とコミュニケーションができるかもしれないと考えている。
back_translation: They believe that if they can reconstruct it like they did in their youth, they might be able to communicate with the sister who mysteriously died on that beach 20 years ago.

text: a poignant and gently humorous parable that loves its characters and communicates something rather beautiful about human nature .
translation: 登場人物を愛し、人間の本性について非常に美しいことを伝える、感動的で穏やかにユーモラスな寓話。
back_translation: A touching and gently humorous fable that conveys something very beautiful about human nature and loves its characters.

text: his family decides to go back on a holiday to india for 2 weeks , when tina discovers the truth about pooja 's e-mails , they decide together that tina will play along with the charade .
translation: 彼の家族は2週間の休暇でインドに戻ることを決め、ティーナはプージャのメールの真実を知ったとき、ティーナはその芝居に付き合うことに二人で決めます。
back_translation: His family decided to return to India for a two-week vacation, and when Tina learned the truth about Pooja's email, she and her partner decided to go along with the act.

text: the film jolts the laughs from the audience -- as if by cattle prod .
translation: その映画は観客から笑いを引き出す - まるで牛の電気棒のように。
back_translation: The movie draws laughter from the audience - just like a cattle prod.

text: kung pow : enter the fist is a movie within a movie , created to spoof the martial arts genre .
translation: 「カン・ポー　拳を入れろ」は、武道ジャンルをパロディにするために作られた映画の中の映画です。
back_translation: "Kan-Po: Put Your Fist In" is a film within a film created to parody the martial arts genre.

text: none of these characters resembles anyone you 've ever met in real life , unless you happen to know annoyingly self-involved people who speak in glib sentences that could have only come from the pen of a screenwriter .
translation: これらのキャラクターは、実生活で出会ったことのある誰とも似ていません。自己中心的で、脚本家のペンからしか生まれないような軽薄な文章で話すような人々を知っているのでなければ、なおさらです。
back_translation: These characters resemble no one I have ever encountered in real life. Especially if you don't know people who are self-centered and speak in shallow prose that could only come from a screenwriter's pen.

text: an operatic , sprawling picture that 's entertainingly acted , magnificently shot and gripping enough to sustain most of its 170-minute length .
translation: オペラのような、広がりのある作品で、演技はエンターテインメントに満ち、見事な撮影が施され、170分のほとんどの長さを持続させるに足るほど引き込まれる。
back_translation: It's a sweeping work like an opera, with performances full of entertainment, stunning cinematography, and enough engagement to sustain its almost 170-minute length.

text: a young french journalist , marina , is writing a report on 'the next film starred by melina : the story of lilly ' .
translation: 若いフランス人ジャーナリスト、マリナが「メリナ主演の次の映画：リリーの物語」に関するレポートを書いています。
back_translation: A young French journalist, Marina, is writing a report about the next movie starring Merina: "Lily's Story."

text: despite the long running time , the pace never feels slack -- there 's no scene that screams `` bathroom break ! ``
translation: 長い上映時間にもかかわらず、テンポは決してだらけた感じにならず、「トイレ休憩！」と叫ぶシーンはありません。
back_translation: Despite the long runtime, the pace never feels sluggish, and there is no scene where someone shouts, "Time for a bathroom break!"

text: but starla soon learns that this french girl is not only smart , attractive , and naive , but quite conniving when geneviere , with no social life of her own , beings to take over starla 's , starting with stealing the affections her parents , her friends and starla 's boyfriend .
translation: しかし、スターラはすぐにこのフランスの女の子が頭が良く魅力的で無邪気であるだけでなく、かなりずる賢いことを学びます。ジェヌヴィエーヴは自分自身の社交生活がないため、スターラの生活を乗っ取り始め、最初に彼女の両親、友人、そしてスターラのボーイフレンドの心を奪います。
back_translation: However, Starla soon learns that this French girl is not only smart, charming, and innocent but also quite cunning. Since Genevieve does not have her own social life, she begins to take over Starla's life, first stealing the hearts of her parents, friends, and Starla's boyfriend.

text: robinson 's web of suspense matches the page-turning frenzy that clancy creates .
translation: ロビンソンのサスペンスの網は、クランシーが生み出すページをめくる熱狂に匹敵します。
back_translation: Robinson's web of suspense is comparable to the page-turning excitement created by Clancy.

text: dr . siddharth sinha ( amitabh bachchan ) , a philanthropist and a dedicated surgeon who has devoted his life to build a state-of-the-art hospital to treat the underprivileged patients .
translation: ドクター・シッダールト・シンハ（アミターブ・バッチャン）は、慈善活動家であり、恵まれない患者を治療するために最先端の病院を建設することに人生を捧げた献身的な外科医です。
back_translation: Dr. Siddharth Sinha (Amitabh Bachchan) is a dedicated surgeon and philanthropist who has devoted his life to building state-of-the-art hospitals to treat underprivileged patients.

text: a banker , husband , and father , mr . smith ( larry pine ) must leave it behind him .
translation: バンカーであり、夫であり、父でもあるスミス氏（ラリー・パイン）は、それを背後に置かなければなりません。
back_translation: Mr. Smith (Larry Pine), who is a banker, husband, and father, must leave that behind him.

text: technically , the film is about as interesting as an insurance commercial .
translation: 技術的には、その映画は保険のコマーシャルと同じくらい興味深いものです。
back_translation: Technically, the movie is as interesting as an insurance commercial.

text: with all this going on , gerry 's estranged wife margaret is worried for her daughter 's safety and finds herself another target in the race to find the code .
translation: すべてが進行している中で、ゲリーの疎遠になった妻マーガレットは娘の安全を心配し、コードを見つけるレースで別の標的を見つけます。
back_translation: Amidst everything that is happening, Gary's estranged wife Margaret worries for their daughter's safety and finds another target in the race to find the code.

text: a moving story of determination and the human spirit .
translation: 決意と人間の精神の感動的な物語。
back_translation: A moving story of determination and the human spirit.

text: ice cube , as usual , is an appealing presence , but the rest of the cast shines as well .
translation: アイス・キューブはいつものように魅力的な存在ですが、他のキャストも同様に輝いています。
back_translation: Ice Cube is as captivating as always, but the other cast members shine just as brightly.

text: a shrewd and splendidly volatile b movie structured around a highly original gambit of suspense .
translation: 狡猾で素晴らしく変動的なB級映画は、非常に独創的なサスペンスの策略を基に構成されている。
back_translation: Cunning and wonderfully dynamic B-movies are composed based on highly original suspense plots.

text: to the vast majority of more casual filmgoers , it will probably be a talky bore .
translation: 一般的な映画ファンの大多数にとって、これはおそらく退屈な会話劇になるでしょう。
back_translation: For the majority of general movie fans, this will probably be a boring dialogue-driven film.

text: it 's the type of film about growing up that we do n't see often enough these days : realistic , urgent , and not sugarcoated in the least .
translation: 最近ではあまり見かけない、リアルで切実で、全く甘く見せていない成長に関するタイプの映画です。
back_translation: It's a type of film about growth that is rare to see lately, very real and earnest, and doesn't sugarcoat anything at all.

text: sid , a sloth who never stops talking is left behind sleeping while everyone else begins the journey to the south .
translation: 話し続けることを止めないナマケモノのシドは、他のみんなが南への旅を始める間、寝たまま置き去りにされてしまいます。
back_translation: Sid the sloth, who never stops talking, is left behind sleeping while everyone else begins their journey south.

text: like any good romance , son of the bride , proves it 's never too late to learn .
translation: 良いロマンスのように、『花嫁の息子』は学ぶのに遅すぎることは決してないことを証明しています。
back_translation: Like a good romance, "The Bride's Son" proves that it is never too late to learn.

text: mr . jacobi 's recitation is illustrated with a rush of sensuous nature imagery , beautifully photographed by mr . cox and hans sonneveld and underscored with a lush soundtrack by paul grabowsky .
translation: ジャコビ氏の朗読は、コックス氏とハンス・ゾンネフェルドによって美しく撮影された官能的な自然のイメージの急流で彩られ、ポール・グラボウスキーによる豊かなサウンドトラックが添えられています。
back_translation: Mr. Jacobi's narration is adorned with a torrent of sensuous natural images beautifully captured by Mr. Cox and Hans Sonnefeld, accompanied by a rich soundtrack from Paul Grabowski.

text: no ill effects are immediately apparent to lena 's relatives in their spacious house on the prosperous side of town .
translation: レーナの家族には、繁栄した町の広々とした家の中で、即座に悪影響は明らかではありません。
back_translation: In Reina's family, the immediate negative effects are not apparent within their spacious home in the prosperous town.

text: it plods along methodically , somehow under the assumption that its `` dead wife communicating from beyond the grave `` framework is even remotely new or interesting .
translation: それは体系的にのろのろ進み、何とか「死んだ妻が墓場から通信している」という枠組みが新しいか面白いとでも思っているかのようです。
back_translation: It progresses sluggishly in a systematic manner, as if it somehow thinks that the framework of "the dead wife communicating from the grave" is new or interesting.

text: the tucks try to teach her how she should n't fear death , how they would give anything to die .
translation: タックスは彼女に死を恐れてはいけないこと、死ぬためなら何でも犠牲にするつもりだということを教えようとします。
back_translation: Taks tries to teach her that she should not fear death and that she is willing to sacrifice anything to die.

text: their stories of desire , talent , conviction , obsession and addiction are woven together and build up to a climactic series of events that bring them to opening night .
translation: 彼らの欲望、才能、信念、執着、そして依存の物語は絡み合い、彼らを初日の夜へと導くクライマックスの一連の出来事を築き上げます。
back_translation: The story of their desires, talents, beliefs, obsessions, and dependencies intertwines, building up to a series of events that lead them to the climax of the first night.

text: although mother and son are initially at odds , their relationship begins to change when he discovers that his bride-to-be likes his mother 's rock-n-roll lifestyle too .
translation: 母と息子は最初は対立しているが、彼が婚約者が母のロックンロールライフスタイルも好きだと知ると、二人の関係は変わり始める。
back_translation: The mother and son initially have a conflict, but when he discovers that his fiancée also likes his mother's rock and roll lifestyle, their relationship begins to change.

text: jack , a lonely driver on a desert highway , runs out of gas .
translation: ジャックは砂漠のハイウェイを走る孤独なドライバーで、ガソリンが切れてしまった。
back_translation: Jack is a lonely driver running on a desert highway, and he has run out of gas.

text: and then , did you ever let fear get in your way and keep you from having the person you 've always wanted to be with ?
translation: それでは、恐れがあなたの邪魔をして、ずっと一緒にいたかった人を手に入れることを妨げたことはありますか？
back_translation: Has fear ever gotten in your way and prevented you from getting the person you wanted to be with all along?

text: a gob of drivel so sickly sweet , even the eager consumers of moore 's pasteurized ditties will retch it up like rancid crM-hme brM- { lM-ie .
translation: あまりにも甘ったるいドリブルの塊で、ムーアの殺菌された歌を熱心に消費する人たちでさえ、腐ったクレームブリュレのように吐き出してしまうだろう。
back_translation: It's such an overly sweet lump of dribble that even those who eagerly consume Moore's sanitized songs would spit it out like rotten crème brûlée.

text: alone in a cell , she undergoes a spiritual experience similar to that of the great mystics .
translation: 彼女は独房の中で、大いなる神秘家たちと同様の精神的体験をします。
back_translation: She has a spiritual experience similar to that of great mystics in her cell.

text: if somebody was bored and . . . decided to make a dull , pretentious version of jesus ' son , they 'd come up with something like bart freundlich 's world traveler .
translation: もし誰かが退屈で、...ありふれた、 pretentiousなバージョンの「イエスの息子」を作ろうとしたら、彼らはバート・フロイントリッチの「ワールド・トラベラー」のようなものを思いつくだろう。
back_translation: If someone were to get bored and try to create a mundane, pretentious version of "Son of God," they would come up with something like Bart Freundlich's "World Traveler."

text: jeffs has created a breathtakingly assured and stylish work of spare dialogue and acute expressiveness .
translation: ジェフスは、洗練されたダイアログと鋭い表現力を持つ、息をのむほど自信に満ちたスタイルの作品を作り上げました。
back_translation: Jeffs has created works with a breathtakingly confident style characterized by refined dialogue and sharp expressiveness.

text: an effective portrait of a life in stasis -- of the power of inertia to arrest development in a dead-end existence .
translation: 停滞した人生の効果的な肖像 - 行き止まりの存在の中で発展を妨げる慣性の力。
back_translation: The effective portrait of a stagnant life - the force of inertia that hinders development in an existence at a standstill.

text: takes us on a journey toward self-awareness that is both deadpan hilarious and profoundly moving .
translation: 私たちを超乾いたユーモアと深く感動的な自己認識の旅へと導いてくれます。
back_translation: It leads us on a journey of super dry humor and deeply moving self-awareness.

text: including finding the anti-christ , who is now a 11-year-old boy .
translation: 反キリストを見つけることを含む、現在11歳の少年です。
back_translation: A currently 11-year-old boy who is involved in finding the Antichrist.

text: a senior at an elite college ( katie holmes ) , already under severe pressure to complete her thesis and land a prestigious job , must confront the sudden reappearance of her old boyfriend ( charlie hunnam ) , after his two year , unexplained absence . . .
translation: 名門大学の4年生（ケイティ・ホームズ）は、論文を完成させて名門の仕事を得るための厳しいプレッシャーにさらされている中、2年間の理由不明の不在の後に元ボーイフレンド（チャーリー・ハナム）が突然現れたことに直面しなければならない。
back_translation: A senior at a prestigious university (Katie Holmes) is faced with the sudden reappearance of her ex-boyfriend (Charlie Hunnam) after a two-year unexplained absence, all while dealing with the intense pressure of completing her thesis and securing a coveted job.

text: he can talk and drive around all by himself .
translation: 彼は一人で話したり、運転したりできます。
back_translation: He can talk and drive by himself.

text: it 's sweet , funny , charming , and completely delightful .
translation: それは甘くて、面白くて、魅力的で、完全に楽しいです。
back_translation: It is sweet, interesting, charming, and completely fun.

text: it is said that only salazar slytherin 's true descendent will be able to open it .
translation: サラザール・スリザリンの真の子孫だけがそれを開くことができると言われています。
back_translation: It is said that only the true descendants of Salazar Slytherin can open it.

text: 'brass tacks ' is a 35mm feature length , narrative drama .
translation: 「ブラスタック」は、35mmの劇映画で、ナラティブドラマです。
back_translation: "Blastack" is a 35mm feature film and a narrative drama.

text: it challenges , this nervy oddity , like modern art should .
translation: それは挑戦します、この神経質な奇妙なものが、現代アートがすべきように。
back_translation: I will take on that challenge, this nervous strange thing, as modern art should.

text: sam mendes has become valedictorian at the school for soft landings and easy ways out .
translation: サム・メンデスは、簡単に逃げるための学校で首席卒業生になりました。
back_translation: Sam Mendes graduated at the top of his class from a school for easy escapes.

text: written , flatly , by david kendall and directed , barely , by there 's something about mary co-writer ed decter .
translation: デイビッド・ケンダルによって平坦に書かれ、マリーに何かあるという共同脚本家エド・デクターによってほとんど演出された。
back_translation: Written flatly by David Kendall and mostly directed by co-writer Ed Dexter, who suggests that there is something about Marie.

text: a uniquely sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession that spends a bit too much time on its fairly ludicrous plot .
translation: セクシャル・オブセッションのユニークで官能的な比喩的ドラマ化で、やや馬鹿げたプロットに時間をかけすぎている。
back_translation: The unique and sensual metaphorical dramatization of sexual obsession spends too much time on a somewhat ridiculous plot.

text: dripping with cliche and bypassing no opportunity to trivialize the material .
translation: クリシェにあふれ、素材を軽視する機会を逃さない。
back_translation: Overflowing with clichés, it never misses an opportunity to overlook the material.

text: rife with nutty cliches and far too much dialogue .
translation: ナッティなクリシェが満載で、台詞が多すぎる。
back_translation: It's full of nutty clichés and has too many lines.

text: . . . quite good at providing some good old fashioned spooks .
translation: …昔ながらの怖さを提供するのがかなり上手です。
back_translation: They are quite skilled at providing the old-fashioned kind of fright.

text: visually fascinating . . . an often intense character study about fathers and sons , loyalty and duty .
translation: 視覚的に魅力的で、父と息子、忠誠心と義務についてのしばしば強烈なキャラクター研究です。
back_translation: It is a visually appealing and often intense character study about a father and son, loyalty, and duty.

text: this is the dark , moody tale of a neglected housewife who discovers she can escape her loneliness and recover a sense of interaction with her husband by having conversations with him . . .
translation: これは、放置された主婦が孤独から逃れ、夫との対話を通じて再び交流の感覚を取り戻すことができることを発見する、暗く陰鬱な物語です。
back_translation: This is a dark and gloomy story about a neglected housewife who discovers that she can escape loneliness and regain a sense of connection through dialogue with her husband.

text: on the set he meets movie star and ex-cello-player inga ( fabienne babe ) - and the experience is bizarre spirited uplifting a com & # 233 ; die humaine .
translation: 彼はセットで映画スターで元チェリストのインガ（ファビエンヌ・ベイブ）と出会い、その体験は奇妙で、心を高揚させるヒューマン・コメディです。
back_translation: He meets a former cellist and movie star named Inga (Fabienne Babe) in a set, and the experience is a strange and uplifting human comedy.

text: generic slasher-movie nonsense , but it 's not without style .
translation: 一般的なスラッシャー映画のナンセンスですが、スタイルは失われていません。
back_translation: It’s nonsense typical of slasher films, but the style is not lost.

text: a kinetic drama that seems to wander aimlessly , beautifully until it crashes in an odd anti-climax befitting reality itself .
translation: 目的もなく美しくさまよっているようで、現実そのものにふさわしい奇妙なアンチクライマックスで崩れ落ちる、動的なドラマ。
back_translation: A dynamic drama that seems to wander beautifully without purpose, collapsing in a strange anti-climax that is fitting for reality itself.

text: charlie is man who wakes up one morning to find that no one can see him .
translation: チャーリーはある朝目覚めて、自分が誰にも見えないことに気づく男です。
back_translation: Charlie is a man who wakes up one morning and realizes that no one can see him.

text: this fascinating look at israel in ferment feels as immediate as the latest news footage from gaza and , because of its heightened , well-shaped dramas , twice as powerful .
translation: このイスラエルの動乱に関する魅力的な視点は、ガザからの最新のニュース映像と同様に切迫感があり、緊迫感のある洗練されたドラマのおかげで、倍の力を持っています。
back_translation: The compelling perspective on the turmoil in Israel has doubled its impact thanks to the latest news footage from Gaza, which is equally urgent and intensified by a sophisticated drama.

text: the only fun part of the movie is playing the obvious game . you try to guess the order in which the kids in the house will be gored .
translation: 映画の唯一楽しい部分は明らかなゲームをプレイすることです。家の中の子供たちがどの順番で襲われるかを当てようとします。
back_translation: The only fun part of the movie is playing an obvious game. We try to guess in what order the children in the house will be attacked.

text: it is set in the fantasy world middle-earth , created by tolkien in 'the hobbit ' , 'the lord of the rings ' , and 'the silmarillion ' .
translation: それはトールキンが「ホビットの冒険」、「指輪物語」、そして「シルマリルの物語」で創造したファンタジーの世界、中つ国に設定されています。
back_translation: It is set in the fantasy world of Middle-earth created by Tolkien in "The Hobbit," "The Lord of the Rings," and "The Silmarillion."

text: area k is an israeli controlled marine zone isolating the gaza strip and preventing palestinian fishermen from entering israel , egypt and international waters .
translation: エリアKは、イスラエルが管理する海洋区域で、ガザ地区を隔離し、パレスチナの漁師がイスラエル、エジプト、国際水域に入るのを防いでいます。
back_translation: Area K is a maritime zone managed by Israel, which isolates the Gaza Strip and prevents Palestinian fishermen from entering Israeli, Egyptian, and international waters.

text: although he has feelings on the inside , he is only able to mimic the emotions around him .
translation: 彼は内心感情を抱いているが、周囲の感情を模倣することしかできません。
back_translation: He harbors inner feelings but can only mimic the emotions of those around him.

text: short and sweet , but also more than anything else slightM-^E tadpole pulls back from the consequences of its own actions and revelations .
translation: 短くて甘いが、何よりもスライムのオタマジャクシは自らの行動と明らかにしたことの結果から引き下がる。
back_translation: Short and sweet, but above all, the slime tadpole withdraws from the results revealed by its own actions.

text: succeeds very well in its primary aim of making us gasp .
translation: 私たちを驚かせるという主な目的を非常にうまく達成しています。
back_translation: You are achieving the main goal of surprising us very well.

text: me no lika da accents so good , but i thoroughly enjoyed the love story . scott baio is turning in some delightful work on indie projects .
translation: アクセントがとても良いとは思いませんが、ラブストーリーは非常に楽しみました。スコット・バイオはインディープロジェクトで素晴らしい作品を見せています。
back_translation: I don't think the accent is very good, but I really enjoyed the love story. Scott Baio is showcasing great work in the Indie project.

text: paravasu 's cousin and bitter rival yavakri ( nagarjuna ) has just returned triumphant after 10 years of practicing austerities in the jungle , with the gift of universal knowledge from the gods .
translation: パラヴァスのいとこであり、かつての激しいライバルであるヤヴァクリ（ナガールジュナ）が、10年間の厳しい修行を経てジャングルから凱旋してきた。神々から宇宙の知識を授けられたのだ。
back_translation: Yavakri (Nagarjuna), who is Paravas's cousin and once a fierce rival, has returned from the jungle after ten years of rigorous training. He has been bestowed with cosmic knowledge from the gods.

text: mitchell listens to a chilling conversation as he realizes harry 's friend is the red neck who tried to attack him earlier .
translation: ミッチェルはぞっとするような会話を聞きながら、ハリーの友人が以前に彼を襲おうとした赤neckであることに気づく。
back_translation: Mitchell realizes, while listening to a chilling conversation, that Harry's friend is the redneck who had tried to attack him before.

text: there 's no denying that burns is a filmmaker with a bright future ahead of him .
translation: バーンズが明るい未来を持つ映画製作者であることは否定できません。
back_translation: It is undeniable that Burns is a filmmaker with a bright future.

text: lydia , marco 's girlfriend and a bullfighter by profession , has been gored and is in a coma .
translation: リディアはマルコのガールフレンドで、職業は闘牛士ですが、牛に突かれて昏睡状態にあります。
back_translation: Lydia is Marco's girlfriend, and her profession is a bullfighter, but she is in a coma after being gored by a bull.

text: all the while a growing shadow falls upon middle-earth as the dark lord 's army marches on to gondor .
translation: その間、暗黒卿の軍隊がゴンドールに進軍する中、中つ国に徐々に影が落ちていく。
back_translation: During that time, as the army of the Dark Lord marches toward Gondor, a shadow gradually falls over Middle-earth.

text: this very strong cultural identity , different from the us model allows blanca li to give an original point of view on today 's melting pot of french urban youngsters .
translation: この非常に強い文化的アイデンティティは、アメリカのモデルとは異なり、ブランカ・リに今日のフランスの若者たちの多様な文化を持つ環境に対して独自の視点を提供することを可能にしています。
back_translation: This very strong cultural identity, unlike the American model, enables Blanka Lee to provide a unique perspective on the diverse cultural environment of today’s French youth.

text: a must see for all sides of the political spectrum
translation: 政治的スペクトルのすべての側にとって必見です。
back_translation: A must-see for all sides of the political spectrum.

text: the only hope against it is a new upgraded t-800 unit , the t-850 , that is sent back by the human resistance .
translation: それに対抗する唯一の希望は、人間の抵抗勢力によって送られた新しいアップグレード版T-800ユニット、T-850です。
back_translation: The only hope to counter it is the new upgraded version T-800 unit, the T-850, sent by the human resistance.

text: unaware that they 're transporting a cache ' of money , along with jimmy hoffa 's finger ( street valued at $ 25 mil ) , they find themselves thwarting pursuers as they manipulate their way out west .
translation: 彼らはジミー・ホッファの指（市場価値2500万ドル）とともにお金の隠し場所を運んでいることに気づかず、自分たちの方法で西に向かう途中、追跡者を阻止することになります。
back_translation: Unaware that they are transporting a stash of money along with Jimmy Hoffa's finger (valued at 25 million dollars), they will have to fend off pursuers on their way west, following their own path.

text: mostly , shafer and co-writer gregory hinton lack a strong-minded viewpoint , or a sense of humor .
translation: 主に、シャファーと共同執筆者のグレゴリー・ヒントンは、強い視点やユーモアのセンスが欠けています。
back_translation: Mainly, Shaffer and co-author Gregory Hinton lack a strong perspective and a sense of humor.

text: meanwhile an unspoken attraction develops between joe and ella , heightening the claustrophobic tensions in the confined space of the barge .
translation: 一方、ジョーとエラの間に言葉にされていない引力が生まれ、バージの限られた空間での閉塞感のある緊張感が高まっていく。
back_translation: On the other hand, an unspoken attraction emerges between Joe and Ella, and the sense of stagnation within the confined space of the bar intensifies.

text: [ chaiken 's ] talent lies in an evocative , accurate observation of a distinctive milieu and in the lively , convincing dialogue she creates for her characters .
translation: チャイケンの才能は、特異な環境を感情豊かに、正確に観察することと、キャラクターのために生み出す活き活きとした説得力のある対話にあります。
back_translation: The talent of Chaiken lies in the ability to observe a unique environment with rich emotions and precision, as well as creating lively and persuasive dialogues for the characters.

text: kannas brother ghisu is one aggressive and hot-tempered with who is illiterate and is slowly getting attracted towards naxalites .
translation: カンナの兄弟ギスは、攻撃的で短気な男で、文字が読めず、徐々にナクサライトに惹かれつつあります。
back_translation: Kanna's brother, Gis, is an aggressive and short-tempered man who cannot read and is gradually becoming attracted to Nakusalight.

text: in this documentary , hannah , an ex-refugee , returns with her 55 year old son to the prison where she was held for five years .
translation: このドキュメンタリーでは、元難民のハンナが、55歳の息子と共に自分が5年間拘束されていた刑務所に戻ります。
back_translation: In this documentary, former refugee Hanna returns to the prison where she was held for five years, accompanied by her 55-year-old son.

text: chicago offers much colorful eye candy , including the spectacle of gere in his dancing shoes , hoofing and crooning with the best of them .
translation: シカゴは、ダンスシューズを履いたゲールの光景を含む、多くのカラフルな目の保養を提供しています。彼は最高のパフォーマンスを披露しながら踊り、歌っています。
back_translation: Chicago offers a colorful spectacle, including the sight of a Gael in dance shoes. He is dancing and singing while delivering his best performance.

text: meanwhile , paro , on the other hand , performed her worldly duties sincerely , but inside her heart , she could never forget devdas for a moment .
translation: その間、パロは一方で、自分の世俗的な義務を誠実に果たしていたが、心の中ではデヴダスを一瞬でも忘れることは決してできなかった。
back_translation: During that time, Paro was sincerely fulfilling her worldly duties, but in her heart, she could never forget Devdas, even for a moment.

text: it 'll keep you wide awake and . . . very tense .
translation: それはあなたを目を覚まさせて、そして...非常に緊張させるでしょう。
back_translation: It will awaken you and... make you very tense.

text: . . . a mostly boring affair with a confusing sudden finale that 's likely to irk viewers .
translation: ...大部分が退屈な出来事で、視聴者をイライラさせる可能性のある混乱した突然の結末があります。
back_translation: ...mostly mundane events, with a chaotic and sudden ending that could potentially frustrate the audience.

text: the film starts out as competent but unremarkable . . . and gradually grows into something of considerable power .
translation: 映画は最初は有能だが目立たないものとして始まり、徐々にかなりの力を持つものへと成長していきます。
back_translation: The movie starts as something capable but unremarkable, gradually growing into something quite powerful.

text: when he is told that he is being considered for the position of anchorman , he goes out to do a live feed but when it is announced that evan baxter was going to be the new anchorman , and he freaks out .
translation: 彼がアンカーマンのポジションに考慮されていると告げられたとき、彼はライブ中継をしに出かけますが、エヴァン・バクスターが新しいアンカーマンになると発表されると、彼はパニックに陥ります。
back_translation: When he was told that he was being considered for the anchor position, he went out to do a live broadcast, but when it was announced that Evan Baxter would be the new anchor, he fell into a panic.

text: it reminds us that nathan lane is the best show stealer in show business .
translation: それは、ネイサン・レインがショービジネスで最高のショースティーラーであることを思い出させます。
back_translation: That reminds us that Nathan Lane is the best show-stealer in show business.

text: the two are catapulted into the chase of their lifetimes in pursuit of the kidnapped professor and the lost temple .
translation: 二人は誘拐された教授と失われた寺院を追い求める生涯の追跡に投げ込まれる。
back_translation: The two are thrown into a lifelong pursuit to find the kidnapped professor and the lost temple.

text: planet is as much sheer fun as its source material .
translation: その惑星は、その出所の素材と同じくらい純粋に楽しいです。
back_translation: That planet is as purely enjoyable as the materials from which it originated.

text: after the great success of the ring hollywood decided to take another swing at bringing another japanese film to the rest of us .
translation: 「ザ・リング」の大成功の後、ハリウッドは別の日本の映画を私たちに紹介するために再挑戦することに決めました。
back_translation: After the great success of "The Ring," Hollywood decided to make another attempt to introduce us to another Japanese film.

text: the level of maturity displayed by this 33-year-old first-time feature director is astonishing , considering her inexperience and her subject matter .
translation: この33歳の初監督が示した成熟度は驚くべきものであり、彼女の未経験とテーマを考えるとなおさらです。
back_translation: The maturity displayed by this 33-year-old first-time director is astonishing, especially considering her inexperience and the themes she tackled.

text: nemesis has a delightfully nasty villain and pumped-up action , albeit along familiar lines .
translation: 「ネメシス」は、魅力的で悪辣な悪役と盛り上がるアクションを持っており、 familiar なラインに沿っています。
back_translation: "Nemesis" features an attractive and villainous antagonist and thrilling action, following a familiar line.

text: the graphic carnage and re-creation of war-torn croatia is uncomfortably timely , relevant , and sickeningly real .
translation: 戦火にさらされたクロアチアのグラフィックな惨状と再現は、心地よくないほどのタイミングで、関連性があり、吐き気を催すほどリアルです。
back_translation: The graphic devastation of Croatia exposed to the ravages of war is relevant and alarmingly real, to the point of inducing nausea, at an uncomfortably timely moment.

text: aftermath asks the question , `` what would happen if the man on the street really did try to stop a bank robber ? ``
translation: アフターマスは「もし通りの男が本当に銀行強盗を止めようとしたらどうなるか？」という質問を投げかけます。
back_translation: Aftermath poses the question, "What would happen if the man on the street really tried to stop a bank robbery?"

text: she 's eighteen , unemployed , broke and hopelessly in love with her wannabe rockstar boyfriend matt .
translation: 彼女は18歳で、無職で、金欠で、ウィアナビー・ロックスターの彼氏マットに無惨に恋をしています。
back_translation: She is 18 years old, unemployed, broke, and hopelessly in love with her wannabe rockstar boyfriend, Matt.

text: a film worthy of comparison to truffaut 's best cinematic poems .
translation: トリュフォーの最高の映画詩と比較するに値する作品。
back_translation: A work worthy of comparison to Truffaut's greatest cinematic poetry.

text: it 's all a rather shapeless good time . . .
translation: それはすべて、かなり形のない楽しい時間です。
back_translation: It's all just a rather formless enjoyable time.

text: so putrid it is not worth the price of the match that should be used to burn every print of the film .
translation: あまりに腐っていて、フィルムのすべてのコピーを焼くために使うべきマッチの値段にも値しない。
back_translation: It's so rotten that it's not even worth the price of a match to burn all the copies of the film.

text: the film 's fly-on-the-wall technique succeeds in capturing the day-to-day existence of sister helen and the various residents of the home .
translation: 映画のフライ・オン・ザ・ウォール技術は、ヘレン姉妹とホームのさまざまな住人の日常生活を捉えるのに成功しています。
back_translation: The film's fly-on-the-wall technique successfully captures the everyday lives of the Helen sisters and various residents of the home.

text: as they sort out clues - it 's a slight person , perhaps a woman , who walks with a leg brace and rides the bus - they also find a mutual attraction .
translation: 手がかりを整理するうちに、足に装具をつけてバスに乗る痩せた人、たぶん女性がいることがわかります。そして、彼らはお互いに引かれ合う感情も見つけます。
back_translation: As they organize the clues, they realize there is a thin person, probably a woman, wearing leg braces and getting on a bus. They also find feelings of attraction between each other.

text: viewing this underdramatized but overstated film is like watching a transcript of a therapy session brought to humdrum life by some freudian puppet .
translation: この過小評価されたが過剰に誇張された映画を見ることは、フロイト的な人形によって退屈な生活に引き戻されたセラピーセッションの文字起こしを見ているようなものです。
back_translation: Watching this undervalued yet exaggerated film is like reading a transcription of a therapy session brought back into a boring life by Freudian dolls.

text: this story of a determined woman 's courage to find her husband in a war zone offers winning performances and some effecting moments .
translation: 戦争地域で夫を見つけるために奮闘する女性の勇気を描いたこの物語は、素晴らしい演技と感動的な瞬間を提供します。
back_translation: This story, depicting the courage of a woman struggling to find her husband in a war-torn area, offers wonderful performances and touching moments.

text: light years/ several warp speeds/ levels and levels of dilithium crystals better than the pitiful insurrection . which is n't to say that it 's the equal of some of its predecessors .
translation: 光年/いくつかのワープ速度/レベルとレベルのダイリチウムクリスタルは、悲惨な反乱よりも優れています。ただし、それが前作のいくつかに匹敵するというわけではありません。
back_translation: Light years/some warp speeds/the levels and levels of dilithium crystals are superior to a disastrous rebellion. However, that does not mean they are comparable to some of the previous works.

text: what a concept , what an idea , what a thrill ride . this is a more fascinating look at the future than `` bladerunner `` and one of the most high-concept sci fi adventures attempted for the screen .
translation: なんというコンセプト、なんというアイデア、なんというスリルライド。これは「ブレードランナー」よりも未来についてのより魅力的な見方であり、画面に乞われた最もハイコンセプトなSF冒険のひとつです。
back_translation: What a concept, what an idea, what a thrill ride. This offers a more captivating perspective on the future than "Blade Runner" and is one of the highest-concept sci-fi adventures ever requested on screen.

text: months on , marie finds herself alone , life having taken a dramatic turn .
translation: 数ヶ月後、マリーは孤独を感じており、人生は劇的に変わってしまった。
back_translation: A few months later, Marie felt lonely, and her life had changed dramatically.

text: i liked the original short story but this movie , even at an hour and twenty-some minutes , it 's too long and it goes nowhere .
translation: 原作の短編小説は好きでしたが、この映画は、たったの1時間20分余りでも、長すぎてどこにも行きません。
back_translation: I liked the original short story, but this movie, even though it's just over 1 hour and 20 minutes, feels too long and goes nowhere.

text: the most brilliant work in this genre since the 1984 uncut version of sergio leone 's flawed but staggering once upon a time in america .
translation: このジャンルにおける1984年のサージオ・レオーネの欠陥があるが驚異的な『アメリカの昔話』の未編集版以来の最も素晴らしい作品。
back_translation: This is the most wonderful work since the unedited version of Sergio Leone's flawed yet remarkable "Once Upon a Time in America" from 1984 in this genre.

text: so we got ten little indians meets friday the 13th by way of clean and sober , filmed on the set of carpenter 's the thing and loaded with actors you 're most likely to find on the next inevitable incarnation of the love boat .
translation: 私たちは、「十人の小さなインディアン」が「13日の金曜日」と出会い、さらに「クリーン・アンド・ソーバー」に繋がる作品を手に入れました。これはカーペンターの「ザ・シング」のセットで撮影されており、次の不可避な「ラブボート」の再演で見かけるであろう俳優たちで満載です。
back_translation: We acquired a work where "Ten Little Indians" meets "Friday the 13th," and further connects to "Clean and Sober." It was filmed on the set of Carpenter's "The Thing" and is filled with actors you will likely see in the forthcoming inevitable revival of "The Love Boat."

text: this spawn of william shakespeare and ray kroc has more fun with [ the ] thin premise than you might expect , mostly because of maura tierney .
translation: ウィリアム・シェイクスピアとレイ・クロックの子孫は、予想以上に[その]薄っぺらな前提を楽しんでいますが、主にモーラ・ティアニーのおかげです。
back_translation: The descendants of William Shakespeare and Ray Kroc enjoy the unexpectedly superficial premise, mainly thanks to Mora Tierney.

text: they 're a conveyance true , but they can also become the unlikely place for a rendezvous .
translation: 彼らは確かに移動手段ですが、同時に思いがけない待ち合わせの場所にもなることがあります。
back_translation: They are certainly a means of transportation, but at the same time, they can unexpectedly become a meeting place.

text: in `` house of 1000 corpses `` , two young couples take a misguided tour onto the back roads of america in search of a local legend known as dr . satan .
translation: 「1000の死体の家」では、2組の若いカップルがアメリカの裏道を誤ったツアーで進み、ドクター・サタンという地元の伝説を探し求めます。
back_translation: In "The House of 1000 Corpses," two sets of young couples embark on a misguided tour through the backroads of America in search of a local legend known as Doctor Satan.

text: what elevates the movie above the run-of-the-mill singles blender is its surreal sense of humor and technological finish .
translation: 映画が平凡なシングルブレンダーを超える要因は、そのシュールなユーモアと技術的な仕上がりにあります。
back_translation: The factors that elevate the film beyond an ordinary single blender are its surreal humor and technical craftsmanship.

text: like schindler 's list , the grey zone attempts to be grandiloquent , but ends up merely pretentious -- in a grisly sort of way .
translation: 「シンドラーのリスト」のように、「グレーゾーン」は壮大さを目指そうとするが、結局はただの気取ったものになってしまう - 恐ろしい方法で。
back_translation: Like "Schindler's List," "Gray Zone" attempts to strive for grandeur, but in the end, it becomes merely pretentious - in a terrifying way.

text: possesses something rare : a degree of genuine reverence in its depiction of surfing as a sport and a subculture .
translation: サーフィンをスポーツおよびサブカルチャーとして描写する際に、真の尊敬の念を持っているという珍しい特性を備えている。
back_translation: It has the rare quality of portraying surfing as a sport and subculture with genuine respect.

text: if ayurveda can help us return to a sane regimen of eating , sleeping and stress-reducing contemplation , it is clearly a good thing .
translation: アーユルヴェーダが私たちを正しい食事、睡眠、ストレスを軽減する瞑想の習慣に戻す手助けをすることができるなら、それは明らかに良いことです。
back_translation: If Ayurveda can help us return to proper habits of diet, sleep, and stress-reducing meditation, then that is clearly a good thing.

text: in this movie , de niro plays mitch preston , a hard-nosed , hardworking police detective .
translation: この映画では、ディ・ニーロがミッチ・プレストンを演じています。彼は厳格で勤勉な警察の刑事です。
