back_translation: In this movie, De Niro plays Mitch Preston. He is a strict and diligent police detective.

text: in the end , debby , beth , and virginia find , if not the relationships of their dreams , peace with each other and within themselves .
translation: 結局、デビー、ベス、そしてバージニアは、夢のような関係ではなくても、お互いと自分自身の中に平和を見つける。
back_translation: In the end, Debbie, Beth, and Virginia find peace within each other and within themselves, even if it's not a dreamlike relationship.

text: no matter how firmly director john stainton has his tongue in his cheek , the fact remains that a wacky concept does not a movie make .
translation: ジョン・スタイントン監督がどれだけ冗談めかしていても、奇抜なコンセプトだけでは映画にならないということは変わりません。
back_translation: No matter how much director John Stainton tries to be humorous, it doesn't change the fact that an unusual concept alone isn't enough to make a movie.

text: the setting is new york 's five points , the most violent part of the world at the time .
translation: 舞台はニューヨークのファイブポイント、当時世界で最も暴力的な場所です。
back_translation: The setting is Five Points in New York, the most violent place in the world at that time.

text: a brilliant pianist , a polish jew , witnesses the restrictions nazis place on jews in the polish capital , from restricted access to the building of the warsaw ghetto .
translation: 優れたピアニストであるポーランドのユダヤ人が、ワルシャワのゲットーの建物へのアクセス制限をはじめ、ナチスがポーランドの首都でユダヤ人に課す制限を目の当たりにします。
back_translation: A talented Jewish pianist from Poland witnesses the restrictions imposed by the Nazis on Jews in the capital, including access limitations to buildings in the Warsaw ghetto.

text: gran historia sobre el amor , la familia , la lealtad y la traiciM-sn que seguramente se convertirM-a en un nuevo clM-asico del gM-inero .
translation: 愛、家族、忠誠、裏切りについての素晴らしい物語で、間違いなく新しいジャンルのクラシックとなるでしょう。
back_translation: A wonderful story about love, family, loyalty, and betrayal that will undoubtedly become a classic in a new genre.

text: one of the most successful , provocative and intensely contemporary of israeli films , so much so that to watch it is to feel the country having a passionate argument with itself .
translation: イスラエル映画の中でも最も成功し、挑発的で、非常に現代的な作品の一つであり、それを見ることで国自体が情熱的な議論をしているのを感じることができます。
back_translation: It is one of the most successful, provocative, and very modern works among Israeli films, and watching it makes you feel like the country itself is engaged in passionate discussions.

text: in their brief meeting , johnny will get the chance to face his truth , but the truth is never what it seems .
translation: 彼らの短い会議で、ジョニーは自分自身の真実に向き合う機会を得るが、その真実は決して見た目通りではない。
back_translation: In their short meeting, Johnny gets the opportunity to confront his own truth, but that truth is never what it seems.

text: those who score well are recruited into a secret paramilitary academy .
translation: 成績が良い者は秘密の準軍事アカデミーに採用される。
back_translation: Those who perform well will be recruited into a secret paramilitary academy.

text: well , robert 's not a suitable chinese girl - but is he gay ?
translation: ロバートは適切な中国の女の子ではないが、彼はゲイなのか？
back_translation: Robert is not an appropriate Chinese girl, but is he gay?

text: a lyrical if sluggish excursion set in war-torn iranian kurdistan .
translation: 戦争に傷ついたイラン・クルディスタンを舞台にした、歌のようでありながらも鈍重な旅。
back_translation: A heavy journey set in war-torn Iranian Kurdistan, reminiscent of a song.

text: the mystery inc . gang have gone their separate ways and have been apart for two years , until they each receive an invitation to spooky island .
translation: ミステリー・インクの仲間たちはそれぞれの道を歩み、2年間離れ離れになっていましたが、全員がスプーキーアイランドへの招待状を受け取ります。
back_translation: The members of Mystery Inc. each went their separate ways for two years, but they all receive an invitation to Spooky Island.

text: befriended by the ship 's charismatic cyborg cook , john silver , jim blossoms under his guidance and shows the makings of a fine shipmate as he and the alien crew battle a supernova , a black hole , and a ferocious space storm .
translation: 船のカリスマ的なサイボーグ料理長ジョン・シルバーに友達になり、ジムは彼の指導の下で成長し、彼と異星人のクルーが超新星、ブラックホール、そして激しい宇宙嵐と戦う中で素晴らしい船員としての素質を見せます。
back_translation: Jim becomes friends with the charismatic cyborg ship's chef, John Silver, and under his guidance, Jim grows and shows his remarkable qualities as a crew member while he and the alien crew battle supernovas, black holes, and fierce space storms.

text: this is cruel , misanthropic stuff with only weak claims to surrealism and black comedy .
translation: これは残酷で、人間嫌いの内容で、シュールリアリズムやブラックコメディへの弱い主張しかありません。
back_translation: This is a cruel and misanthropic content that offers only a weak argument for surrealism and black comedy.

text: an ancient tablet found by famous british archaeologist professor hyde-white is believed to be a roadmap to the legendary lost temple of faramundi and its hidden treasures .
translation: 著名なイギリスの考古学者ハイド・ホワイト教授によって発見された古代の石板は、伝説の失われたファラムンディ寺院とその隠された宝物への地図であると考えられています。
back_translation: The ancient stone tablet discovered by the renowned British archaeologist Professor Hyde White is believed to be a map to the legendary lost Temple of Faramundi and its hidden treasures.

text: . . . while each moment of this broken character study is rich in emotional texture , the journey does n't really go anywhere .
translation: . . . この壊れたキャラクタースタディの各瞬間は感情的な質感に満ちていますが、物語は実際にはどこにも進んでいません。
back_translation: Each moment of this broken character study is filled with emotional texture, but the story isn't actually going anywhere.

text: those who savor well-drawn characters and exotic locales will find the touch of the mystic masseur to be most pleasurable indeed .
translation: 魅力的なキャラクターと異国情緒あふれる場所を楽しむ人々は、神秘的なマッサージ師の手による快楽を非常に心地よいと感じるでしょう。
back_translation: People who enjoy charming characters and exotic locations will find the pleasure brought by the hands of a mysterious massage therapist to be very delightful.

text: the art direction and costumes are gorgeous and finely detailed , and kurys ' direction is clever and insightful .
translation: アートディレクションと衣装は美しく、細部にわたって精緻であり、クーリスの演出は巧妙で洞察に満ちています。
back_translation: The art direction and costumes are beautiful, intricate in detail, and Koji's direction is clever and insightful.

text: durval and his mother carmita live at the back of `` durval discos `` , a record store they own in s & # 227 ; o paulo , specializing in vinyl records .
translation: ダーバルと彼の母カーミータは、サンパウロにある自分たちのレコード店「ダーバルディスコ」の裏側に住んでおり、主にヴィニールレコードを専門にしています。
back_translation: Dabarl and his mother Karmita live behind their record store "Dabarl Disco" in São Paulo, which mainly specializes in vinyl records.

text: he checks into a rehab clinic that specializes in treating law enforcement officials .
translation: 彼は法執行官の治療を専門とするリハビリクリニックに入所します。
back_translation: He will be admitted to a rehabilitation clinic that specializes in treatment for law enforcement officers.

text: de niro may enjoy the same free ride from critics afforded to clint eastwood in the lazy bloodwork . but like bruce springsteen 's gone-to-pot asbury park , new jersey , this sad-sack waste of a movie is a city of ruins .
translation: デ・ニーロは、怠惰な『ブラッドワーク』でクリント・イーストウッドに与えられた批評家からの同じような甘やかしを楽しむかもしれない。しかし、ブルース・スプリングスティーンの『ゴーン・トゥ・ポット』のアスベリー・パーク、ニュージャージーのように、この悲惨で無駄な映画は廃墟の街だ。
back_translation: De Niro might enjoy the same kind of indulgence from critics that Clint Eastwood received for the lazy "Blood Work." However, like Bruce Springsteen's "Gone to Pot," the movie is a wasteland of misery and futility, resembling Asbury Park, New Jersey.

text: now , after having an encounter with a hollywood producer who got lost in virgil grove , is asked if he would like to come back to hollywood to direct a feature movie .
translation: 現在、バージルグローブで迷ったハリウッドのプロデューサーとの出会いの後、彼はハリウッドに戻って長編映画を監督したいかどうかを尋ねられています。
back_translation: Currently, after meeting a Hollywood producer who got lost at Virgil Grove, he is being asked whether he wants to return to Hollywood and direct a feature film.

text: . . . a fascinating curiosity piece -- fascinating , that is , for about ten minutes . after that it becomes long and tedious like a classroom play in a college history course .
translation: …興味深い好奇心の作品です—興味深いのは約10分間だけです。その後は、大学の歴史の授業での教室劇のように長くて退屈になります。
back_translation: ...It's an interesting work of curiosity—it's interesting for about 10 minutes. After that, it becomes long and boring like a classroom play in a history class.

text: thomas ' wish comes true and he stays up all night watching her .
translation: トーマスの願いが叶い、彼は彼女を見ながら一晩中起きている。
back_translation: Thomas's wish has come true, and he stays awake all night watching her.

text: as a fire chief , quinn ( christian bales ) is responsable for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence .
translation: 消防署長として、クイン（クリスチャン・ベール）は獣を追い払う責任があり、コミュニティを生かし続けるためにかろうじて生計を立てています。
back_translation: As the fire chief, Quinn (Christian Bale) is responsible for driving away the beasts and barely making a living to keep the community alive.

text: the director seems to take an unseemly pleasure in [ the characters ' ] misery and at the same time to congratulate himself for having the guts to confront it .
translation: 監督は登場人物の苦痛に不適切な喜びを感じているようで、同時にそれに立ち向かう勇気があることを自ら称賛しているようだ。
back_translation: The director seems to take inappropriate pleasure in the characters' suffering, while simultaneously praising themselves for having the courage to confront it.

text: all the more disquieting for its relatively gore-free allusions to the serial murders , but it falls down in its attempts to humanize its subject .
translation: 連続殺人を比較的グロテスクな描写なしに暗示することが余計に不安を感じさせるが、そのテーマを人間味のあるものにしようとする試みは失敗している。
back_translation: Implying serial murder without relatively grotesque descriptions adds to the sense of unease, but the attempt to make that theme more human is unsuccessful.

text: this is a finely written , superbly acted offbeat thriller .
translation: これは見事に書かれ、素晴らしく演技されたユニークなスリラーです。
back_translation: This is a uniquely thrilling piece that is beautifully written and wonderfully performed.

text: a film full of vivid characters , quiet beauty and gentle grace .
translation: 鮮やかなキャラクター、静かな美しさ、そして穏やかな優雅さに満ちた映画。
back_translation: A film filled with vibrant characters, tranquil beauty, and serene elegance.

text: may be the most undeserving victim of critical overkill since town and country .
translation: おそらく「タウン＆カントリー」以来、批判的過剰反応の最も不当な犠牲者かもしれない。
back_translation: It may be the most unfair victim of critical overreaction since "Town & Country."

text: pipe dream does have its charms . the leads are natural and lovely , the pace is serene , the humor wry and sprightly .
translation: パイプドリームには魅力があります。主役たちは自然で素敵で、テンポは穏やかで、ユーモアは皮肉がありながらも活気に満ちています。
back_translation: Pipe Dream has its charm. The main characters are natural and lovely, the pace is gentle, and the humor is filled with irony yet vibrant.

text: moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought . better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: ムーアは議論を引き起こし、思考を促進することで非常に貴重なサービスを提供しています。さらに素晴らしいことに、彼はこれをすべて、そしてそれ以上のことを、ジョナサン・スウィフトのこの側にいる最も容赦ないほど面白い社会批評家の一人でありながら行っています。
back_translation: Moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought. Even more impressively, he does all of this, and more, while being one of the most relentlessly entertaining social critics on this side of Jonathan Swift.

text: lejos del paraM-mso es al mismo tiempo una fiesta para los ojos y oM-mdos y un movilizador cuadro de personajes enfrentados a sus propios deseos , miedos y prejuicios .
translation: マスマは、同時に目と耳のための祝祭であり、自己の欲望、恐れ、偏見に直面する対立するキャラクターの動機を与える作品です。
back_translation: Masuma is a celebration for the eyes and ears, and a work that provides the motivations of conflicting characters facing their own desires, fears, and prejudices.

text: the noble tradition of men in drag hits an all-time low in sorority boys , whose makers apparently believe that women 's clothing can cover up any deficiency in acting , writing or direction .
translation: 男のドラッグの高貴な伝統が、映画『ソロリティ・ボーイズ』で過去最低に達しました。制作側は、女性の服装が演技、脚本、または演出の欠点を隠すことができると考えているようです。
back_translation: The noble tradition of men's drag reached an all-time low in the movie "Sorority Boys." The production team seems to believe that women's clothing can mask shortcomings in acting, script, or direction.

text: travels a fascinating arc from hope and euphoria to reality and disillusionment .
translation: 希望と幸福感から現実と失望へと、魅力的な弧を描く旅行。
back_translation: A journey that draws an appealing arc from hope and happiness to reality and disappointment.

text: he retires from his dangerous job after his best pal kamandag was killed by a mysterious kidnapping syndicate leader .
translation: 彼は親友のカマンダグが神秘的な誘拐シンジケートのリーダーに殺された後、危険な仕事から引退します。
back_translation: He retires from his dangerous job after his best friend Kamandagu is killed by the leader of a mysterious kidnapping syndicate.

text: oliveira trusts the intelligence of his audience . . . in the life of the city he suggests the ongoing life of humanity , the context in which individual mortality must be contemplated .
translation: オリベイラは聴衆の知性を信頼しています…。都市の生活の中で、彼は人類の継続的な生を示唆し、個々の死を考慮しなければならない文脈を提供しています。
back_translation: Oliveira trusts the intelligence of the audience... In urban life, he suggests the ongoing existence of humanity and provides a context in which individual death must be considered.

text: but then roxie comes along and velma is old news .
translation: しかし、その後ロクシーが現れ、ヴェルマは古いニュースとなる。
back_translation: However, after that, Rokushi appears, and Veruma becomes old news.

text: this sort of cute and cloying material is far from zhang 's forte and it shows .
translation: このようなかわいらしくて甘ったるい素材は、張の得意分野からは程遠く、それが現れています。
back_translation: Such cute and sweet materials are far from Haru's area of expertise, and that shows.

text: it 's bright , pristine style and bold colors make it as much fun as reading an oversized picture book before bedtime .
translation: その明るく、純粋なスタイルと大胆な色使いは、寝る前に大きな絵本を読むのと同じくらい楽しいです。
back_translation: Its bright, pure style and bold use of colors are just as enjoyable as reading a large picture book before bed.

text: it puts washington , as honest working man john q . archibald , on a pedestal , then keeps lifting the pedestal higher .
translation: ワシントンは、正直な労働者ジョン・Q・アーチボルドを台座に置き、その台座をさらに高く持ち上げ続ける。
back_translation: Washington places the honest worker John Q. Archibald on a pedestal and continues to raise that pedestal even higher.

text: bolstered by an astonishing voice cast ( excepting love hewitt ) , an interesting racial tension , and a storyline that i have n't encountered since at least pete 's dragon .
translation: 驚くべき声優陣（ラブ・ヒューイットを除く）によって支えられ、興味深い人種間の緊張感と、少なくとも『ピーターパンのドラゴン』以来出会ったことのないストーリーラインがあります。
back_translation: Supported by an amazing voice cast (excluding Jennifer Love Hewitt), there is an intriguing sense of interracial tension and a storyline that we haven't encountered since "Peter Pan's Dragon."

text: the feeling of each vision changes drastically as does the way the son looks and acts .
translation: それぞれのビジョンの感覚は大きく変わり、息子の見た目や行動も大きく変わります。
back_translation: The perception of each vision changes greatly, and the appearance and behavior of the son also change significantly.

text: white has n't developed characters so much as caricatures , one-dimensional buffoons that get him a few laughs but nothing else .
translation: ホワイトはキャラクターをあまり発展させず、滑稽な一面的な道化師を描いており、彼に少しの笑いをもたらすだけで、他には何も得られません。
back_translation: White does not develop the character much, portraying a ridiculous one-dimensional clown that brings only a little laughter and nothing else.

text: she arrives with every intent of selling it all off and going back to her busy career , but in going through her grandmother 's belongings , she discovers much about her family 's past which ultimately makes her re-evaluate her life and values .
translation: 彼女はすべてを売り払って忙しいキャリアに戻るつもりで到着しますが、祖母の持ち物を整理する中で、家族の過去について多くのことを発見し、最終的には自分の人生や価値観を再評価することになります。
back_translation: She arrives intending to sell everything off and return to her busy career, but while sorting through her grandmother's belongings, she discovers many things about her family's past and ultimately reevaluates her own life and values.

text: disturbing for its unabashed honesty , our cast of characters both love and despise each other , their very actions acknowledging the pressures inherent in a tightly bonded peer group .
translation: そのあからさまな正直さが不快で、私たちのキャラクターたちはお互いを愛し、同時に憎み合い、彼らの行動そのものが緊密に結びついた仲間グループに内在する圧力を認めている。
back_translation: That blatant honesty is uncomfortable, and our characters love and simultaneously hate each other, acknowledging the pressure inherent in a closely-knit group of companions that is tightly connected to their actions themselves.

text: while mitchell gets ready for school , his mother and her friend ( lisa ) plan a murder , business as usual .
translation: ミッチェルが学校の準備をしている間、彼の母親と彼女の友人（リサ）は、殺人を計画する。いつも通りのビジネスだ。
back_translation: While Mitchell is preparing for school, his mother and her friend (Lisa) plan a murder. Just another day at the office.

text: the plot revolves around a young married woman whose mundane life takes a turn for the worse when she strikes up a passionate and illicit affair with an oddball discount-store stock boy who thinks he 's holden caulfield .
translation: 物語は、若い既婚女性の平凡な生活が、彼女が奇妙なディスカウントストアの在庫係と情熱的で不正な関係を持つことで悪化する様子を中心に展開します。その在庫係は自分がホールデン・コールフィールドだと思っています。
back_translation: The story revolves around the ordinary life of a young married woman deteriorating as she engages in a passionate and illicit relationship with a strange discount store stock clerk. This stock clerk believes he is Holden Caulfield.

text: but , things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive .
translation: しかし、物事は恐ろしい方向に進み、ゲームは生き延びて家から脱出するための奮闘に変わってしまいます。
back_translation: However, things take a terrifying turn, and the game turns into a struggle to survive and escape from the house.

text: walter hill 's pulpy , stylized boxing melodrama undisputed nearly overcomes its questionable in-the-ring match-up with solid fight choreography and gritty prison authenticity .
translation: ウォルター・ヒルのスタイライズされたボクシングメロドラマ「アンディスピューテッド」は、疑わしいリング内のマッチアップを、堅実な戦闘振付と grittyな刑務所のリアリティでほぼ克服している。
back_translation: Walter Hill's stylized boxing melodrama "Undisputed" almost overcomes its questionable in-ring matchups with solid fight choreography and gritty prison realism.

text: the problem is the needlessly poor quality of its archival prints and film footage . the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: 問題は、そのアーカイブ印刷物とフィルム映像の無駄に低品質であることです。画像はコントラストが欠けており、不明瞭で、しばしば暗すぎて判読できません。
back_translation: The problem is that the archived printed materials and film footage are unnecessarily low quality. The images lack contrast, are unclear, and are often too dark to be decipherable.

text: recently ordained a priest , 24-year-old father amaro is sent to a small parish church in los reyes , mexico to assist the aging father benito in his daily work .
translation: 最近司祭に叙任された24歳のアマロ神父は、メキシコのロス・レジェスにある小さな教区の教会に派遣され、年老いたベニート神父の日々の仕事を手伝います。
back_translation: Recently ordained at the age of 24, Father Amaro has been dispatched to a small parish church in Los Reyes, Mexico, where he assists the elderly Father Benito with his daily duties.

text: with an unflappable air of decadent urbanity , everett remains a perfect wildean actor , and a relaxed firth displays impeccable comic skill .
translation: 動じない洗練された都会的な雰囲気を持つエヴェレットは、完璧なワイルデンの俳優としての存在感を保ち、リラックスしたファースは完璧なコメディのスキルを披露しています。
back_translation: Everett, with its composed and sophisticated urban atmosphere, maintains a perfect presence as a Wilden actor, while the relaxed farce showcases impeccable comedic skills.

text: one just waits grimly for the next shock without developing much attachment to the characters .
translation: キャラクターにあまり愛着を持つこともなく、次のショックを厳かに待つだけです。
back_translation: I don't feel much attachment to the characters and simply wait solemnly for the next shock.

text: now , in the twilight of his life , emile shapes the final chapters of his mental autobiography .
translation: 今、人生の黄昏において、エミールは彼の精神的自伝の最終章を形作っています。
back_translation: Now, at the twilight of his life, Émile is shaping the final chapter of his spiritual autobiography.

text: it just goes to show , an intelligent person is n't necessarily an admirable storyteller .
translation: それはただ示しています、知的な人が必ずしも魅力的なストーリーテラーではないということです。
back_translation: It simply shows that an intelligent person is not necessarily an engaging storyteller.

text: she survives and after being in a coma for five years , she wakes to seek revenge on her co-workers and boss who had attacked her .
translation: 彼女は生き残り、5年間の昏睡状態から目覚め、自分を襲った同僚や上司に復讐を求める。
back_translation: She survives, awakens from a five-year coma, and seeks revenge on the colleagues and bosses who attacked her.

text: one of the threads follows the brand new ( unmarried ) prime minister ( grant ) of the united kingdom , who on his first day in 10 downing street falls in love with the girl ( mccutcheon ) who brings him his tea ( thompson plays his sister ; rickman plays her husband ) .
translation: 物語の一つの糸は、イギリスの新しい（未婚の）首相（グラント）が、ダウニング街10番地の初日で、彼に紅茶を持ってきた少女（マッカーチェン）に恋をするというものです（トンプソンは彼の姉を演じ、リックマンは彼女の夫を演じます）。
back_translation: One thread of the story is about a new (unmarried) Prime Minister of England (Grant) who falls in love with a girl (McCutcheon) who brings him tea on his first day at 10 Downing Street (Thompson plays his sister, and Rickman plays her husband).

text: firefighter gordon brewer is plunged into the complex and dangerous world of international terrorism after he loses his wife and child in a bombing credited to claudio `` the wolf `` perrini .
translation: 消防士ゴードン・ブリュワーは、妻と子供をクラウディオ「ザ・ウルフ」ペリーニによる爆撃で失った後、国際テロリズムの複雑で危険な世界に巻き込まれます。
back_translation: Firefighter Gordon Brewer gets caught up in the complex and dangerous world of international terrorism after losing his wife and child in an attack by Claudio "The Wolf" Perini.

text: sparkles in its deft portrait of tinseltown 's seasoned veterans of gossip , wealth , paranoia , and celebrityhood .
translation: ゴシップ、富、偏執病、そしてセレブリティの熟練者たちを描いた巧妙なポートレートで、ティンセルタウンの輝きを放つ。
back_translation: A clever portrait depicting gossip, wealth, paranoia, and seasoned celebrities, shining with the brilliance of Tinseltown.

text: a good music documentary , probably one of the best since the last waltz .
translation: 素晴らしい音楽ドキュメンタリーで、おそらく「ラスト・ワルツ」以来の最高の作品の一つです。
back_translation: A wonderful music documentary, perhaps one of the best works since "The Last Waltz."

text: two american mafiosi , gino and settimo , take refuge in the glasgow cafe owned by their scottish/italian cousin .
translation: アメリカのマフィア、ジーノとセッティーモは、スコットランド／イタリア系のいとこの経営するグラスゴーのカフェに身を寄せる。
back_translation: American mafia members Gino and Settimo take refuge in a café in Glasgow run by their Scottish-Italian cousin.

text: plans go awry when the kingpin offers $ 100 million to anyone who can free him .
translation: 計画が狂うのは、王者が自分を解放できる者に1億ドルを提供する時です。
back_translation: The plan goes awry when the champion offers 100 million dollars to someone who can free him.

text: although barbershop boasts some of today 's hottest and hippest acts from the world of television , music and stand-up comedy , this movie strangely enough has the outdated swagger of a shameless M-^Q70s blaxploitation shuck-and-jive sitcom .
translation: バーバーショップは、今日のテレビ、音楽、スタンダップコメディの中で最もホットでヒップなアクトを誇っていますが、この映画は不思議なことに、恥知らずな70年代のブラックスプロイテーションのシャック・アンド・ジャイブのシットコムの古びた威張りを持っています。
back_translation: The barber shop features the hottest and hippest acts in today's television, music, and stand-up comedy, yet this movie strangely carries the outdated swagger of shameless 70s blaxploitation, complete with shack and jive sitcom elements.

text: later , otte distributes the donations he 's collected throughout the year .
translation: 後で、オッテは彼が一年を通して集めた寄付金を配分します。
back_translation: Later, Otte will distribute the donations he has collected throughout the year.

text: once while beating up one of his foes , he sees komal ( aishwarya rai ) and is so smitten by her beauty that he starts visualizing her wherever he goes and in whatever he does .
translation: ある時、彼が敵の一人を殴っていると、コマル（アイシュワリヤ・ラーイ）を見て、その美しさに心を奪われ、どこに行っても何をしても彼女を思い描くようになる。
back_translation: At one point, while he was punching one of his enemies, he caught sight of Komal (Aishwarya Rai) and was captivated by her beauty, starting to envision her no matter where he went or what he did.

text: they plan it the way laurel and hardy might plan a bank robbery , or perhaps the marx brothers .
translation: 彼らはローレルとハーディが銀行強盗を計画するように、あるいはマルクス兄弟のようにそれを計画します。
back_translation: They plan it like Laurel and Hardy planning a bank robbery, or like the Marx Brothers.

text: he is a cop , and chances are he 's going to make some trouble for vince too .
translation: 彼は警察官であり、彼がヴィンスにも何らかの問題を引き起こす可能性が高い。
back_translation: He is a police officer, and it is likely that he will cause some trouble for Vince as well.

text: a teenager rides the same bus to school everyday .
translation: ティーンエイジャーは毎日同じバスで学校に通っています。
back_translation: The teenager takes the same bus to school every day.

text: it 's so devoid of joy and energy it makes even jason x . . . look positively shakesperean by comparison .
translation: それは喜びとエネルギーがまったくなく、ジェイソンXでさえも比較すると非常にシェイクスピア風に見える。
back_translation: It is completely devoid of joy and energy, making even Jason X look very Shakespearean by comparison.

text: so original in its base concept that you can not help but get caught up .
translation: その基本的なコンセプトが非常に独創的で、思わず引き込まれてしまいます。
back_translation: The fundamental concept is very original and compelling, drawing you in unexpectedly.

text: one thing is for sure : this movie does not tell you a whole lot about lily chou-chou .
translation: 確かなことは、この映画がリリィ・チョウチョウについてあまり多くを語っていないということです。
back_translation: One thing that is certain is that this movie doesn't talk much about Lily Chouchou.

text: the storylines are woven together skilfully , the magnificent swooping aerial shots are breathtaking , and the overall experience is awesome .
translation: ストーリーラインは巧みに織り交ぜられ、素晴らしい空中ショットは息をのむほど美しく、全体的な体験は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: The storyline is skillfully interwoven, the stunning aerial shots are breathtakingly beautiful, and the overall experience is wonderful.

text: her lover , a psychiatrist twice her age , becomes twisted in sarah 's sordid plot to kill her husband for his large inheritance .
translation: 彼女の愛人であり、彼女の2倍の年齢の精神科医は、サラの夫を殺して大きな遺産を手に入れようとする不正な計画に巻き込まれていく。
back_translation: The psychiatrist, who is her lover and twice her age, gets involved in a corrupt plan to kill Sara's husband in order to inherit a large fortune.

text: but this is lohman 's film . her performance moves between heartbreak and rebellion as she continually tries to accommodate to fit in and gain the unconditional love she seeks .
translation: しかし、これはローマンの映画です。彼女の演技は、心の痛みと反乱の間を行き来し、彼女が求める無条件の愛を得るために、常に適応しようとします。
back_translation: However, this is a Roman film. Her performance oscillates between heartache and rebellion as she constantly tries to adapt in order to obtain the unconditional love she seeks.

text: `` frida `` chronicles the life frida kahlo ( salma hayek ) shared unflichingly and openly with diego rivera ( alfred molina ) , as the young couple took the art world by storm .
translation: 「フリーダ」は、フリーダ・カーロ（セルマ・ハエック）がディエゴ・リベラ（アルフレッド・モリーナ）と共に共有した人生を、率直かつオープンに描いています。若いカップルはアート界を席巻しました。
back_translation: "Frida" candidly and openly portrays the life shared by Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) and Diego Rivera (Alfred Molina). The young couple took the art world by storm.

text: the film is beautifully mounted , but , more to the point , the issues are subtly presented , managing to walk a fine line with regard to the question of joan 's madness .
translation: 映画は美しく作られていますが、もっと重要なのは、問題が微妙に提示されており、ジョーンの狂気に関する問題の微妙なバランスを保っていることです。
back_translation: The film is beautifully made, but what is more important is that the issues are presented subtly, maintaining a delicate balance regarding Joan's madness.

text: against improbable odds , they race towards a thrilling , climactic confrontation on the mysterious isla de muerta .
translation: 信じられないような逆境に立ち向かい、彼らは神秘的なイスラ・デ・ムエルタでのスリリングなクライマックスの対決に向かって疾走する。
back_translation: Facing unbelievable adversity, they rush toward a thrilling climactic confrontation at the mysterious Isla de Muerta.

text: a very hung-over julie is also there , on a field trip with her art class .
translation: 酔いが覚めないジュリーもそこにいて、彼女の美術のクラスの遠足に参加しています。
back_translation: Julie, who hasn't sobered up, is also there participating in her art class's field trip.

text: featuring a dangerously seductive performance from the great daniel auteuil , `` sade `` covers the same period as kaufmann 's `` quills `` with more unsettlingly realistic results .
translation: 偉大なダニエル・オートゥイユの危険に魅惑されたパフォーマンスが特徴の「サド」は、カウフマンの「クィルズ」と同じ時代を描いており、より不安を呼び起こすリアルな結果を見せています。
back_translation: "Sad," characterized by the mesmerizing performance of the great Daniel Auteuil, depicts the same era as Kaufman's "Quills" and presents more unsettling and realistic outcomes.

text: [ smith ] simply celebrates the universal desire to fashion our homes for our needs and desires .
translation: [スミス]は、私たちのニーズと欲望に合わせて住まいを作りたいという普遍的な願望を祝福しています。
back_translation: [Smith] celebrates the universal desire to create homes that reflect our needs and wants.

text: billy marries his high school sweet heart , janet and they soon have a son .
translation: ビリーは高校時代の恋人ジャネットと結婚し、すぐに息子が誕生します。
back_translation: Billy marries his high school sweetheart, Janet, and soon after, they have a son.

text: each vision shows the son at a different age and at a different stage in his pursuit of his life long love , isabelle .
translation: 各ビジョンは、息子が異なる年齢と彼の人生の愛、イザベルを追い求める異なる段階にあることを示しています。
back_translation: Each vision shows that the son is at different ages and stages of his life, pursuing his love, Isabel.

text: just before easter 2001 , a semi-trailer loaded with 40 , 000 bottles of beer crashed into the tweed river on the out skirts of the northern new south wales town of murwillumbah ( known as `` murbah `` to the locals ) .
translation: 2001年のイースター直前、4万本のビールを載せたセミトレーラーがニューサウスウェールズ州北部のマーワルンバ（地元では「マーバ」として知られる）の郊外のトゥイード川に墜落しました。
back_translation: Just before Easter in 2001, a semi-trailer carrying 40,000 bottles of beer crashed into the Tweed River in the suburbs of Murwillumbah (locally known as "Maba") in northern New South Wales.

text: inside , an old man lies ill on a bed , attended by his son and daughter-in-law .
translation: 中で、老父がベッドの上で病気になり、息子と娘-in-lawに看護されています。
back_translation: Inside, an elderly father is sick in bed, being cared for by his son and daughter-in-law.

text: a quirky comedy set in newfoundland that cleverly captures the dry wit that 's so prevalent on the rock .
translation: ニューファンドランドを舞台にした風変わりなコメディで、島に普及している辛辣なユーモアを巧みに捉えています。
back_translation: It is a quirky comedy set in Newfoundland that skillfully captures the sharp humor prevalent on the island.

text: terrific as nadia , a russian mail-order bride who comes to america speaking not a word of english , it 's kidman who holds the film together with a supremely kittenish performance that gradually accumulates more layers .
translation: ナディアとして素晴らしい、英語を一言も話せないロシアの郵注文の花嫁がアメリカにやってくる中で、フィルムをまとめるのはキッドマンであり、彼女の極めて愛らしい演技は徐々に多くの層を蓄積していく。
back_translation: As Nadia, a wonderful Russian mail-order bride who cannot speak a word of English, comes to America, it is Kidman who ties the film together, and her exceedingly charming performance gradually accumulates many layers.

text: alas , the black-and-white archival footage of their act showcases pretty mediocre shtick .
translation: ああ、彼らの演技の白黒アーカイブ映像は、かなり平凡なシチックを披露しています。
back_translation: Ah, their black-and-white archival footage of performances showcases quite a mediocre shtick.

text: based on a true story about ryan dunn 's ex girlfriend , and how she cheated on him all the time , with him and his friends always having to spy on her .
translation: ライアン・ダンの元彼女に関する実際の話に基づいており、彼女がいつも彼を裏切っていたこと、そして彼と彼の友人たちが彼女を常に監視しなければならなかった様子が描かれています。
back_translation: It is based on a true story about Ryan Dunn's ex-girlfriend, depicting how she was always betraying him, and how he and his friends had to constantly keep an eye on her.

text: chan in turn , has a job donning exotic costumes as a cyber papel doll for a porn website and a sex-worker lover who has a son and a separate husband on the mainland .
translation: チャンは、ポルノウェブサイトのサイバーパペルドールとしてエキゾチックなコスチュームを着る仕事を持っており、息子と本土に別の夫を持つセックスワーカーの愛人です。
back_translation: Chan has a job as a cyber puppet doll on a pornographic website, dressing in exotic costumes, and is the lover of a sex worker who has another husband on the mainland and a son.

text: it is , by conventional standards , a fairly terrible movie . . . but it is also weirdly fascinating , a ready-made eurotrash cult object . it is also , at times , curiously moving .
translation: それは、従来の基準からすると、かなりひどい映画です。。。しかし、それは奇妙に魅力的で、出来上がったユーロトラッシュのカルトオブジェでもあります。また、時には不思議と感動的でもあります。
back_translation: It is, by conventional standards, quite a terrible movie... However, it is strangely captivating and has become a cult object of Eurotrash. At times, it is also oddly moving.

text: professionally speaking , it 's tempting to jump ship in january to avoid ridiculous schlock like this shoddy suspense thriller .
translation: プロとして言えば、このような品質の低いサスペンススリラーを避けるために、1月に辞めたくなるのはありがちなことです。
back_translation: As a professional, it's common to feel the urge to quit in January to avoid low-quality suspense thrillers like this.

text: for all its alleged youthful fire , xxx is no less subservient to bond 's tired formula of guns , girls and gadgets while brandishing a new action hero .
translation: その主張される若さの熱意にもかかわらず、xxxは新しいアクションヒーローを掲げながらも、ボンドのマンネリな銃、女性、ガジェットの formula に対してそれほど従属している。
back_translation: Despite the claimed youthful enthusiasm, xxx, while promoting a new action hero, is still quite subordinate to the formula of Bond's repetitive guns, women, and gadgets.

text: this film was shot during two trips that majid majidi took in western afghanistan in 2001 and 2002 .
translation: この映画は、マジド・マジディが2001年と2002年に西アフガニスタンで行った2回の旅行中に撮影されました。
back_translation: This movie was filmed during two trips made by Majid Majidi to western Afghanistan in 2001 and 2002.

text: queen of the damned as you might have guessed , makes sorry use of aaliyah in her one and only starring role -- she does little here but point at things that explode into flame .
translation: 「呪われた女王」は、おそらくご想像の通り、アリーヤを彼女の唯一の主演作において残念な使い方をしています。彼女はここで炎に爆発するものを指さすだけです。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen" likely uses Aaliyah in a disappointing way for her only starring role. Here, she merely points at something that is about to explode into flames.

text: a reporter , lanie kerrigan ( jolie ) , interviews a psychic homeless man ( shalhoub ) for a fluff piece about a football game 's score .
translation: 記者のラニー・ケリガン（ジョリー）は、フットボールの試合のスコアについての軽い記事のために、超能力を持つホームレスの男（シャラフ）にインタビューをします。
back_translation: Reporter Lani Kerrigan (Jolie) interviews a homeless man with supernatural abilities (Sharaff) for a light article about the score of a football game.

text: so he starts to write an expose and disguises himself as a naive astronaut named zip martin .
translation: 彼は暴露記事を書き始め、無邪気な宇宙飛行士であるジップ・マーチンに変装します。
back_translation: He starts writing an exposé and disguises himself as the innocent astronaut Zip Martin.

text: ploddy is a living car with a mind of his own !
translation: プロディは自分の意志を持った生きた車です！
back_translation: Prody is a living car with its own will!

text: here , in the smallest quietest corner of new england unfolds a disquieting tale of what happens when music meets murder . . .
translation: ここ、ニューヨークの最も静かで小さな隅で、音楽と殺人が出会ったときに起こる不安な物語が展開します。。。
back_translation: Here, in the quietest and smallest corner of New York, an uneasy story unfolds when music and murder meet...

text: with the help of another innocent prisoner ( richard harris ) , he escapes the island and proceeds to transform himself into the wealthy count of monte cristo as part of his plan to exact revenge .
translation: 無実の囚人（リチャード・ハリス）の助けを借りて、彼は島から脱出し、復讐の計画の一環として裕福なモンテ・クリスト伯爵に変身します。
back_translation: With the help of the innocent prisoner (Richard Harris), he escapes from the island and transforms into the wealthy Count of Monte Cristo as part of his plan for revenge.

text: paravasu is the elder son of the great sage raibhya ( mohan agashe ) .
translation: パラヴァスは偉大な聖者ラビュヤ（モハン・アガーシュ）の長男です。
back_translation: Paravas is the eldest son of the great saint Rabbiya (Mohan Agarsh).

text: death to smoochy tells a moldy-oldie , not-nearly -as-nasty -as-it- thinks-it-is joke . over and over again .
translation: 「デス・トゥ・スムーチー」は、古くてカビの生えた、そんなに悪くないと思っている冗談を繰り返し繰り返し語ります。
back_translation: "Death to Smoothies" repeats an old and moldy joke that it thinks isn't that bad, over and over again.

text: dawdles and drags when it should pop ; it does n't even have the virtue of enough mindless violence to break up the tedium of all its generational bonding .
translation: 待ち続けて引きずっているべきところでポップしない；そのすべての世代間の絆の退屈さを和らげるほどの無思考の暴力さえ持っていない。
back_translation: It doesn't pop where it should be dragged along while waiting; it doesn't even possess the thoughtless brutality to alleviate the boredom of all those intergenerational bonds.

text: the film 's final hour , where nearly all the previous unseen material resides , is unconvincing soap opera that tornatore was right to cut .
translation: 映画の最終時間、そこにはほぼすべての未公開素材が含まれているが、説得力のない日本のドラマであり、トルナトーレがカットするのが正しいといえる。
back_translation: The final runtime of the movie includes almost all of the unreleased material, but it is an unconvincing Japanese drama, and it can be said that it is right for Tornatore to cut it.

text: [ raimi 's ] matured quite a bit with spider-man , even though it 's one of the most plain white toast comic book films you 'll ever see .
translation: [ ライミの ] スパイダーマンでかなり成長しましたが、最も平凡なコミックブック映画の一つだと言えるでしょう。
back_translation: While Raimi's Spider-Man has grown quite a bit, it can be said to be one of the most ordinary comic book movies.

text: anime reflects both japanese culture ( pre and post wwii ) and western influences upon it , sadly evident in haunting post-apocalyptic images reminiscent of hiroshima and nagasaki .
translation: アニメは日本の文化（第二次世界大戦前後）とそれに対する西洋の影響を反映しており、残念ながら広島や長崎を思わせる haunting なポストアポカリプスのイメージに顕著に表れています。
back_translation: Anime reflects Japanese culture (before and after World War II) and the Western influence on it, and unfortunately, it is prominently manifested in haunting post-apocalyptic images reminiscent of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

text: then a young colorado woman ( beth ulrich ) moves across the hall and things look up , until he learns that she has a total backwoods quality that he does n't know how to handle .
translation: それから、コロラドの若い女性（ベス・ウルリッヒ）が向かいの部屋に引っ越してきて物事は好転するが、彼女が全く田舎臭い性質を持っていることを知り、彼はどう対処すればいいのかわからなくなる。
back_translation: Then, a young woman from Colorado (Beth Ulrich) moves into the room across from him, and things start to improve, but when he realizes that she has a completely rural personality, he doesn't know how to deal with it.

text: aimed squarely at the least demanding of demographic groups : very small children who will be delighted simply to spend more time with familiar cartoon characters .
translation: 最も要求の少ないデモグラフィックグループ、つまり馴染みのあるアニメキャラクターと過ごすだけで喜ぶ非常に小さな子供たちを対象にしています。
back_translation: We are targeting the least demanding demographic group, namely very young children who are simply happy to spend time with familiar anime characters.

text: empire ca n't make up its mind whether it wants to be a gangster flick or an art film . it does n't work as either .
translation: 帝国はギャング映画になりたいのかアート映画になりたいのか決められず、どちらとしても機能していません。
back_translation: The empire can't decide whether it wants to be a gangster film or an art film, and it doesn't function as either.

text: then a final `` test `` is made to come to a decision . . .
translation: 最後に「テスト」が行われ、決定が下されます...
back_translation: Finally, a "test" will be conducted, and a decision will be made...

text: a visual spectacle full of stunning images and effects .
translation: 美しい画像と効果に満ちた視覚的スペクタクル。
back_translation: A beautiful image filled with effective visual spectacle.

text: just as moving , uplifting and funny as ever .
translation: これまでと同じように、感動的で、心を高揚させ、面白いです。
back_translation: Just like before, it's inspiring, uplifting, and interesting.

text: now in do & # 241 ; a gracia 's care , the buddies could not believe their dream has finally come true .
translation: 今、ドゥ・ア・グラシアの世話のもと、仲間たちはついに彼らの夢が実現したことを信じることができなかった。
back_translation: Now, under the care of Do a Gracia, the companions could hardly believe that their dream had finally come true.

text: . . . works on some levels and is certainly worth seeing at least once .
translation: ...いくつかのレベルで機能しており、少なくとも一度は観る価値がある。
back_translation: ...it operates on several levels and is worth watching at least once.

text: M-^Epassable enough for a shoot-out in the o . k . court house of life type of flick . strictly middle of the road .
translation: 人生の映画のオーケー裁判所での銃撃戦に十分耐えられるタイプ。まさに中庸。
back_translation: The type that can withstand a gunfight in the courtroom of life's movie. Truly moderate.

text: the dirty jokes provide the funniest moments in this oddly sweet comedy about jokester highway patrolmen .
translation: この奇妙に甘いコメディでは、ジョーク好きなハイウェイパトロールの男たちが繰り広げる下品なジョークが最も面白い瞬間を提供します。
back_translation: In this oddly sweet comedy, the crude jokes told by the joke-loving highway patrolmen provide the funniest moments.

text: the movie is virtually without context -- journalistic or historical . what 's worse is that pelosi knows it .
translation: その映画は事実上、文脈が欠けている -- ジャーナリスティックにも歴史的にも。さらに悪いことに、ペロシはそれを知っている。
back_translation: The movie is essentially lacking in context -- both journalistically and historically. What's worse, Pelosi knows it.

text: from a special little girl , lena grows into an especially fearful adolescent .
translation: 特別な小さな女の子から、レナは特に恐れを抱く青年に成長します。
back_translation: From a special little girl, Lena grows up into a young man who harbors particular fears.

text: a good film with a solid pedigree both in front of and , more specifically , behind the camera .
translation: 前面と、より具体的には背面の両方で確かな血統を持つ良い映画。
back_translation: A good movie with a solid pedigree on both the front and, more specifically, the back.

text: through an allegorical 'fable ' that is told in parallel with joseph 's struggle , we are left to decide for ourselves in the end , who is the crow and who is the wolf . , was someone out to get joseph , was it a stroke of bad luck , or was it all in his head ?
translation: 比喩的な「寓話」を通じて、ヨセフの苦闘と並行して語られ、最終的には誰がカラスで誰がオオカミかを自分で判断しなければならない。この中で、誰かがヨセフを狙っていたのか、それとも不運の一撃だったのか、それともすべて彼の頭の中だけのことだったのか？
back_translation: Through a metaphorical "fable," it is told in parallel with Joseph's struggles, ultimately leaving it to the reader to determine who is the crow and who is the wolf. Within this, was someone targeting Joseph, or was it just a stroke of misfortune, or was it all just in his head?

text: in exchange for commuted sentences , they are sent on a covert mission to cuba in order to rescue a jailed female political prisoner on the island .
translation: 減刑の代わりに、彼らは島の女性政治 prisoners を救出するためにキューバへの秘密任務に送られる。
back_translation: Instead of a reduced sentence, they are sent on a secret mission to Cuba to rescue the female political prisoners on the island.

text: none of this is half as moving as the filmmakers seem to think .
translation: これらのどれも、映画製作者が思っているほど感動的ではありません。
back_translation: None of these are as moving as filmmakers think they are.

text: lee holloway is a smart , quirky woman in her twenties who returns to her hometown in florida after a brief stay in a mental hospital .
translation: リー・ホロウェイは、精神病院に短期間入院した後、フロリダの故郷に戻ってきた賢くて風変わりな20代の女性です。
back_translation: Lee Holloway is a smart and eccentric woman in her twenties who returned to her hometown in Florida after a brief stay in a mental hospital.

text: together they build the spectacular fire organ that inspires awe and wonder .
translation: 彼らは共に、人々に驚きと感動を与える壮大なファイアオルガンを作り上げます。
back_translation: Together, they will create a magnificent fire organ that will astonish and move people.

text: tsai may be ploughing the same furrow once too often .
translation: 蔡は同じ溝を何度も耕しているかもしれません。
back_translation: Cai may be plowing the same ditch many times.

text: although disney follows its standard formula in this animated adventure , it feels more forced than usual .
translation: ディズニーはこのアニメーションアドベンチャーでその標準的なフォーミュラに従っているが、いつもよりも無理があるように感じる。
back_translation: Disney follows its standard formula in this animated adventure, but it feels more forced than usual.

text: some body often looks like an episode of the tv show blind date , only less technically proficient and without the pop-up comments .
translation: ある体はしばしばテレビ番組「ブラインドデート」のエピソードのように見えますが、技術的には劣っていてポップアップコメントもありません。
back_translation: One body often looks like an episode of the TV show "Blind Date," but technically it is inferior and lacks pop-up comments.

text: the hot topics of the plot are relegated to the background -- a welcome step forward from the sally jesse raphael atmosphere of films like philadelphia and american beauty .
translation: プロットのホットなトピックは背景に追いやられており、フィラデルフィアやアメリカン・ビューティーのようなサリー・ジェシー・ラファエルの雰囲気から一歩進んだ歓迎すべきステップです。
back_translation: The hot topics of the plot have been pushed to the background, which is a welcome step forward from the atmosphere of Sally Jesse Raphael, akin to that of Philadelphia and American Beauty.

text: amelia is a jaded top model , nina is a midwestern innocent on her first trip , fernanda is a bisexual supermodel , ellie is the calm , sensible stylist .
translation: アメリアは疲れたトップモデルで、ニーナは初めての旅行をする中西部出身の純真な少女です。フェルナンダはバイセクシャルのスーパーモデルで、エリーは冷静で賢いスタイリストです。
back_translation: Amelia is a tired top model, and Nina is an innocent girl from the Midwest on her first trip. Fernanda is a bisexual supermodel, and Ellie is a calm and smart stylist.

text: it 's a demented kitsch mess ( although the smeary digital video does match the muddled narrative ) , but it 's savvy about celebrity and has more guts and energy than much of what will open this year .
translation: それは狂ったキッチュな混乱ですが（ぼやけたデジタルビデオは混乱した物語に合っています）、セレブリティに対して鋭い洞察を持ち、今年公開される多くの作品よりも guts とエネルギーがあります。
back_translation: It's a crazy, kitschy chaos (the blurry digital video fits the confused narrative), but it has sharp insights into celebrity and has more guts and energy than many works being released this year.

text: this peculiar love story exposes lilli 's internal bouts and her nightmarish `` bad luck `` .
translation: この奇妙なラブストーリーは、リリの内面的な葛藤と彼女の悪夢のような「不運」を明らかにします。
back_translation: This strange love story reveals Lily's inner conflicts and her nightmarish "misfortune."

text: he tries to ignor it , but he later finds out on the news that the daughter of a senator has been kidnapped and is being help ransom for $ 15m .
translation: 彼はそれを無視しようとしますが、後にニュースで上院議員の娘が誘拐され、1500万ドルの身代金が要求されていることを知ります。
back_translation: He tries to ignore it, but later finds out on the news that a senator's daughter has been kidnapped and a ransom of 15 million dollars is being demanded.

text: ( un cineasta ) para no entender del todo y para seguir esperando .
translation: （映画監督）完全に理解しないために、そして引き続き待ち続けるために。
back_translation: (In order to) completely not understand, and to continue waiting.

text: the two choose a piano from his possessions , which comes to represent the couple 's relationship as he pushes the piano 50 blocks across the city to their home .
translation: 二人は彼の所有物の中からピアノを選び、それが彼らの関係を象徴するものになります。彼はそのピアノを市内50ブロック押して家まで運びます。
back_translation: The two of them choose a piano from his belongings, and it becomes a symbol of their relationship. He pushes the piano 50 blocks through the city to take it home.

text: swept into the final moments of the ceremony , jenny must decide ; should she hurt all the people who love her by running away , or simply say `` i do `` ?
translation: 式典の最終瞬間に追い込まれたジェニーは、決断を迫られる。彼女は、彼女を愛しているすべての人を傷つけて逃げるべきなのか、それとも「はい」と言うべきなのか？
back_translation: In the final moment of the ceremony, Jenny is pushed to make a decision. Should she run away and hurt everyone who loves her, or should she say "yes"?

text: a comedy-drama of nearly epic proportions rooted in a sincere performance by the title character undergoing midlife crisis .
translation: 人生の危機を迎えた主人公の真摯な演技に根ざした、ほぼ壮大な規模のコメディドラマ。
back_translation: A comedy-drama of almost grand scale rooted in the protagonist's sincere performance facing a crisis in life.

text: an entertaining mix of period drama and flat-out farce that should please history fans .
translation: 歴史ファンを楽しませる、時代劇と完全なファルスの楽しいミックス。
back_translation: A fun mix of historical drama and complete farce that entertains history fans.

text: watching possession is a movie experience not much deeper than you 'd get on your couch watching masterpiece theater or mystery ! -- pleasant enough , but oh so soft .
translation: 『ポゼッション』を観ることは、名作劇場やミステリーをソファで見るのとあまり深くない映画体験です。心地よいですが、非常に柔らかいです。
back_translation: Watching "Possession" is not a very deep movie experience, much like watching a classic theater or a mystery on the couch. It's pleasant, but very soft.

text: arroz con mango is a light romantic comedy about people and their drives .
translation: 「マンゴー入りご飯」は、人々とその欲望についての軽やかなロマンティックコメディです。
back_translation: "Rice with Mango" is a light-hearted romantic comedy about people and their desires.

text: based on brett easton ellis 's novel , the story deals with a drug dealer at a vermont school , who becomes entangled in a love triangle with a girl whom he likes , but he sleeps with her roommate , and a guy who has a crush on him .
translation: ブレット・イーストン・エリスの小説に基づいて、物語はバーモントの学校で薬剤を売っている男を描いています。彼は好きな女の子と恋愛三角関係に巻き込まれますが、彼女のルームメイトと寝てしまい、さらに彼に恋をしている男とも関わることになります。
back_translation: Based on a novel by Bret Easton Ellis, the story depicts a man selling drugs at a school in Vermont. He gets caught up in a love triangle with the girl he likes, but ends up sleeping with her roommate and also becomes involved with a man who is in love with him.

text: the new version is n't just endless . it heightens the deeply conservative spirit of giuseppe tornatore 's fable in a surprising new way .
translation: 新しいバージョンは単なる尽きることのないものではなく、ジュゼッペ・トルナトーレの寓話の深く保守的な精神を驚くべき新しい方法で高めています。
back_translation: The new version is not merely an unending one, but it elevates the deeply conservative spirit of Giuseppe Tornatore's fable in astonishing new ways.

text: the filming began in april 1999 , when peace was still at the top of the agenda , and finished march 2001 , in month seven of the bloody al aqsa intifada .
translation: 撮影は1999年4月に始まり、まだ平和が最優先事項であった時期であり、2001年3月に終了しました。この時期は血なまぐさいアルアクサ・インティファーダの7か月目でした。
back_translation: Filming began in April 1999, during a time when peace was still a top priority, and ended in March 2001. This period was the seventh month of the bloody Al-Aqsa Intifada.

text: the only element of suspense is whether the movie will change titles or distributors again before the closing credits roll .
translation: 唯一のサスペンス要素は、映画がエンディングクレジットが流れる前にタイトルや配信元を再び変更するかどうかです。
back_translation: The only suspense element is whether the movie will change its title or distributor again before the end credits roll.

text: it 's a frightful vanity film that , no doubt , pays off what debt miramax felt they owed to benigni .
translation: それは恐ろしい虚栄の映画であり、疑いなくミラマックスがベニーニに対して抱いていた借金を返済している。
back_translation: It is a dreadful vanity film, undoubtedly paying off the debt that Miramax had towards Benigni.

text: when simone agrees to a blind date with oliver at the hottest restaurant in town , she does n't have high expectations of the evening .
translation: シモーヌが町で一番人気のあるレストランでオリバーとのブラインドデートに同意したとき、彼女はその夜に大きな期待を持っていませんでした。
back_translation: When Simone agreed to a blind date with Oliver at the town's most popular restaurant, she didn't have high expectations for that night.

text: terminally bland , painfully slow and needlessly confusing . . . the movie , shot on digital videotape rather than film , is frequently indecipherable .
translation: 端的に退屈で、痛々しいほど遅く、無意味に混乱しています…映画はフィルムではなくデジタルビデオテープで撮影されており、しばしば理解不能です。
back_translation: It is simply boring, painfully slow, and meaninglessly confusing... The movie is shot on digital videotape instead of film, and is often incomprehensible.

text: in the meantime , the british forces , back at the encampment , march off to meet the american forces for a grand battle , which will rage for hours .
translation: その間に、イギリス軍はキャンプに戻り、数時間にわたって激闘を繰り広げるアメリカ軍と出会うために行進します。
back_translation: During that time, the British army marches back to the camp to encounter the American troops who are engaged in fierce fighting for several hours.

text: on the train home from chauncey academy for the thanksgiving weekend , oscar confides in his best friend that he has plans for this vacation -- he will win the heart of his true love .
translation: 感謝祭の週末にチャウンシーアカデミーから帰る電車の中で、オスカーは親友に、自分にはこの休暇の計画があると打ち明ける——彼は真実の愛の心を勝ち取るつもりだ。
back_translation: On the train returning from Chauncey Academy during Thanksgiving weekend, Oscar confides in his best friend that he has a plan for the holiday—he intends to win the heart of his true love.

text: it is not until the story reaches its conclusion , does the old man discover the surprising truth about his son and himself .
translation: 物語が結末に達するまで、老人は息子と自分自身についての驚くべき真実を発見することはありません。
back_translation: Until the story reaches its conclusion, the old man does not discover the astonishing truth about his son and himself.

text: as an entertainment , the movie keeps you diverted and best of all , it lightens your wallet without leaving a sting .
translation: 娯楽として、この映画はあなたを楽しませ、最も良い点は、財布が軽くなることです。痛みを伴うことなく。
back_translation: As entertainment, this movie will entertain you, and the best part is that it will lighten your wallet without any pain.

text: the stripped-down dramatic constructs , austere imagery and abstract characters are equal parts poetry and politics , obvious at times but evocative and heartfelt .
translation: 削ぎ落とされたドラマティックな構造、厳格なイメージ、抽象的なキャラクターは、詩と政治の両方の要素が等しく組み合わさっており、時には明白でありながらも、心に響くものです。
back_translation: The stripped-down dramatic structure, rigid imagery, and abstract characters combine elements of both poetry and politics equally, being at times evident yet resonant.

text: one of the more irritating cartoons you will see this , or any , year .
translation: 今年、またはどの年でも、あなたが見ることになるもっとイライラするアニメの一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the most frustrating anime you will encounter this year or any other year.

text: along the way , he helps unite the once legendary country bear band for a benefit show to save the country bear concert hall .
translation: 道中、彼はかつて伝説的だったカントリーベアバンドを再結成し、カントリーベアコンサートホールを救うためのチャリティーショーを手助けします。
back_translation: Along the way, he reunites the once legendary Country Bear Band and helps with a charity show to save the Country Bear Concert Hall.

text: until one day , renata adhiswara ( rachel maryam ) came into his world .
translation: ある日、レンナータ・アディスワラ（レイチェル・マリアム）が彼の世界にやってきた。
back_translation: One day, Renata Adiswara (Rachel Mariam) came into his world.

text: the story encompasses social degradation , unemployment , racism , casual violence , excessive drink and bad sex - and how they fall into a political context .
translation: 物語は、社会の堕落、失業、人種差別、日常的な暴力、過度の飲酒、そして悪いセックスを含み、それらがどのように政治的文脈に結びつくかを描いています。
back_translation: The story depicts the decay of society, unemployment, racial discrimination, everyday violence, excessive drinking, and bad sex, and how these elements are connected to the political context.

text: what could have been a neat little story about believing in yourself is swamped by heavy-handed melodrama .
translation: 自分を信じることについての素敵な小話になり得たものが、重苦しいメロドラマに圧倒されてしまっています。
back_translation: What could have been a lovely little story about believing in oneself is overwhelmed by a heavy melodrama.

text: `` on the afternoon of july 1 , 1981 , los angeles police responded to a distress call at 8763 wonderland avenue and soon discovered a grisly quadruple homicide , later compared to the gruesome slaughter at the tate household at the hands of the charles manson family 10 years earlier .
translation: 1981年7月1日の午後、ロサンゼルス警察は8763ワンダーランドアベニューでの緊急通報に応じ、すぐに残忍な四重殺人事件を発見しました。この事件は、10年前にチャールズ・マンソン一家によってテート家で行われた恐ろしい虐殺と比較されることになりました。
back_translation: On the afternoon of July 1, 1981, the Los Angeles police responded to an emergency call at 8763 Wonderland Avenue and quickly discovered a brutal quadruple murder. This incident would come to be compared to the horrific massacre committed by the Charles Manson family at the Tate residence a decade earlier.

text: daphne , a seventeen-year-old girl from new york goes to england in search of her father , who does not know he had a child with an american girlfriend he met while working in morocco , and whose aristocratic family did not approve of the woman .
translation: ダフネは、ニューヨーク出身の17歳の少女で、父親を探すためにイギリスへ向かいます。彼女の父親は、モロッコでの仕事中に出会ったアメリカ人のガールフレンドとの間に子供がいるとは知らず、その貴族的な家族はその女性を承認しませんでした。
back_translation: Daphne is a 17-year-old girl from New York who heads to England to find her father. Her father was unaware that he had a child with his American girlfriend whom he met while working in Morocco, and his aristocratic family did not approve of that woman.

text: peckerhead try to brainwash all the gays into being heterosexuals . . .
translation: ペッカー頭はすべてのゲイを異性愛者に洗脳しようとしている。。。
back_translation: The Peckerheads are trying to brainwash all gay people into becoming heterosexuals...

text: television made him famous , but his biggest hits happened off screen .
translation: テレビは彼を有名にしたが、彼の最大のヒットはスクリーンの外で起こった。
back_translation: Television made him famous, but his biggest hit happened outside of the screen.

text: to be influenced chiefly by humanity 's greatest shame , reality shows -- reality shows for god 's sake ! -- is a crime that should be punishable by chainsaw .
translation: 人類の最大の恥、リアリティショーに主に影響を受けることは、神のために！これはチェーンソーで罰せられるべき犯罪だ。
back_translation: The greatest shame of humanity, being mainly influenced by reality shows, for the sake of God! This is a crime that should be punished with a chainsaw.

text: there ought to be a directing license , so that ed burns can have his revoked .
translation: 監督ライセンスが必要であり、そうすればエド・バーンズのライセンスを取り消すことができる。
back_translation: A coaching license is required, and doing so can revoke Ed Burns' license.

text: at the same time touching , funny and breathtaking .
translation: 同時に感動的で、面白く、息を呑むような。
back_translation: At the same time emotional, interesting, and breathtaking.

text: it has been 10 years since a 13 year old eve has left her homeland and emigrated in nyc with her parents .
translation: 彼女が13歳のときに故郷を離れ、両親と共にニューヨーク市に移住してから10年が経ちました。
back_translation: It has been ten years since she left her hometown at the age of 13 and moved to New York City with her parents.

text: elvis teams up with jack ( ossie davis ) , a fellow nursing home resident who thinks that he is actually president john f . kennedy , and the two valiant old codgers sally forth to battle an evil egyptian entity who has chosen their long-term care facility as his happy hunting grounds .
translation: エルビスは、実際にはジョン・F・ケネディ大統領だと思い込んでいる看護施設の仲間、ジャック（オッシー・デイヴィス）と手を組み、バイタルな老いぼれ二人が彼らの長期介護施設を狩猟場として選んだ邪悪なエジプトの存在と戦うために立ち上がります。
back_translation: Elvis teams up with Jack (Ossie Davis), a fellow resident of the nursing facility who believes he is actually President John F. Kennedy, as the two vital old men rise up to fight against the evil presence of an Egyptian that has chosen their long-term care facility as its hunting ground.

text: the filmmaker journeys from her birthplace , brooklyn 's hasidic community , to its origins in hungary and back .
translation: 映画製作者は、生まれ故郷のブルックリンのハシディックコミュニティから始まり、その起源であるハンガリーへ旅し、再び戻ります。
back_translation: The filmmaker starts from the Hasidic community in their hometown of Brooklyn, travels to Hungary, their place of origin, and then returns again.

text: the material could n't possibly be more engaging , the implications of a `` by marlowe `` verdict positively earth-shattering .
translation: その素材はこれ以上魅力的であることは考えられず、「マー ローによる」との評決の意味はまさに衝撃的です。
back_translation: It is hard to imagine that the material could be more appealing, and the verdict of "by Marlowe" is truly shocking.

text: it deals with fascistic pseudo-darwinism and artificial corruptability , with the makers of kulturfilm who put their avant-garde narrative , filmic and editing techniques to the service of fascism .
translation: それは、ファシスト的な擬似ダーヴィニズムと人工的な腐敗性に関するものであり、ファシズムのために彼らの前衛的な物語、映画的および編集技術を提供した文化映画の制作者たちに関わっています。
back_translation: It is about fascist pseudo-Darwinism and artificial corruption, and involves the cultural filmmakers who supplied their avant-garde narratives, cinematic, and editing techniques for fascism.

text: writer/director burr steers knows how to show irony , the trouble with kids , and new yorkers taking casual sex for granted .
translation: 作家兼監督のバーレ・スティアーズは、皮肉、子どもとのトラブル、カジュアルなセックスを当然のように受け入れるニューヨーカーの姿を見せる方法を知っています。
back_translation: Writer and director Burle Stears knows how to depict the image of a New Yorker who casually accepts irony, troubles with children, and casual sex as a matter of course.

text: almost as offensive as `` freddy got fingered . ``
translation: 「フレディは指を指された」と同じくらい攻撃的です。
back_translation: "It's as aggressive as 'Freddy was pointed at.'"

text: this may be dover kosashvili 's feature directing debut , but it looks an awful lot like life -- gritty , awkward and ironic .
translation: これはドーバー・コサシュビリの長編監督デビューかもしれませんが、まるで現実のように見えます――粗野で、ぎこちなく、皮肉に満ちています。
back_translation: This may be Dover Kosashvili's feature directorial debut, but it looks remarkably real—rough, awkward, and full of irony.

text: director chris eyre is going through the paces again with his usual high melodramatic style of filmmaking .
translation: 監督のクリス・エイヤーは、いつもの高いメロドラマスタイルの映画制作で再び手腕を発揮しています。
back_translation: Director Chris Eyre is once again showcasing his skills with his usual high melodrama style of filmmaking.

text: exposing the ways we fool ourselves is one hour photo 's real strength .
translation: 自分を騙す方法を暴露することが、「ワン・アワー・フォト」の本当の強さです。
back_translation: Revealing the method of deceiving oneself is the true strength of "One Hour Photo."

text: a charming , quirky and leisurely paced scottish comedy -- except with an outrageous central gimmick that could have been a reject from monty python 's meaning of life .
translation: 魅力的で風変わり、のんびりとしたペースのスコットランドのコメディーですが、モンティ・パイソンの「人生の意味」からの落選作かもしれないような outrageous (過激) 中心的なギミックが施されています。
back_translation: It is an attractive and quirky Scottish comedy with a relaxed pace, but it features outrageous central gimmicks that may seem like rejected ideas from Monty Python's "The Meaning of Life."

text: if it takes too many familiar steps , it is still never less than compelling as it walks the well-trod line .
translation: 多くの馴染みのあるステップを踏んでも、踏みあぐねることなく、踏み固められた道を進む限り、常に魅力的である。
back_translation: As long as you proceed along a well-trodden path without stumbling, even if you take many familiar steps, you will always remain captivating.

text: an excellent chance to learn more about one of rock and roll 's most significant bands and the struggle for freedom in the communist world .
translation: ロックンロールの最も重要なバンドの一つと、共産主義世界における自由の闘いについてさらに学ぶ素晴らしい機会です。
back_translation: It is a wonderful opportunity to learn more about one of the most important bands in rock and roll and the struggle for freedom in the communist world.

text: it 's refreshing to see a movie that embraces its old-fashioned themes and in the process comes out looking like something wholly original .
translation: 古き良きテーマを受け入れ、それによってまったく新しいものに見える映画を見るのは爽快です。
back_translation: It is refreshing to embrace classic themes and see films that appear completely new because of them.

text: unable to resist the sexual lure of the maenads ' holy eroticism , pentheus attempts to join in only to be torn , literally limb from limb , by the frenzied bacchae .
translation: 神聖なエロティシズムを持つマエナドの性的誘惑に抵抗できないペンテウスは、仲間に加わろうと試みるが、狂乱したバッカイによって文字通り四肢を引き裂かれてしまう。
back_translation: Pentheus, unable to resist the sexual seduction of the Maenads with their sacred eroticism, attempts to join them but is literally torn apart by the frenzied Bacchae.

text: labute 's careful handling makes the material seem genuine rather than pandering .
translation: ラビュートの慎重な取り扱いは、その素材を媚びるのではなく、本物のように見せている。
back_translation: The careful handling of the labute makes it look genuine rather than simply flattering its material.

text: a documentary of the true story of two american adventurers who follow mysterious clues to find the true mt .
translation: 二人のアメリカの冒険者が神秘的な手がかりを追って本物の山を見つける真実の物語のドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A documentary about the true story of two American adventurers who find a real mountain while追って mysterious clues.

text: but jesse & # 180 ; isn & # 180 ; s alone , because he & # 180 ; s accompanied by tulip , his assassin girldfriend and cassidy a drunk irish vampire .
translation: しかし、ジェシーは一人ではありません。彼には、暗殺者の恋人であるチューリップと、酔っ払いのアイルランドのバンパイアであるキャシディが同行しています。
back_translation: However, Jesse is not alone. He is accompanied by his assassin girlfriend Tulip and Cassidy, the drunk Irish vampire.

text: embarrassed myself about laughing out loud multiple times , i found myself enjoying the movie much more than i ever enjoyed the tv show . . . and these pseudo-homo-erotic stunts .
translation: 大声で何度も笑ってしまって恥をかいてしまったが、映画をテレビ番組よりもずっと楽しんでいる自分に気づいた……そしてこれらの擬似ホモエロティックなスタント。
back_translation: I couldn't help but laugh out loud repeatedly, feeling embarrassed, but I realized that I was enjoying the movie much more than the TV show... and these pseudo-homoerotic stunts.

text: seems content to dog-paddle in the mediocre end of the pool , and it 's a sad , sick sight .
translation: 平凡なプールの端で犬かきをしている様子は満足しているようですが、それは悲しく、痛ましい光景です。
back_translation: The scene of a dog paddling at the edge of an ordinary pool seems satisfied, but it is a sad and poignant sight.

text: all three actresses are simply dazzling , particularly balk , who 's finally been given a part worthy of her considerable talents .
translation: 三人の女優は皆素晴らしく、特にバルクは彼女の優れた才能にふさわしい役をやっと与えられました。
back_translation: All three actresses are wonderful, and especially Bulk has finally been given a role that befits her outstanding talent.

text: pero alargando la mano ya no consiguen dinero suficiente y salva decide aprovechar el ambiente general y hacerse pasar por un nuevo mes & # 237 ; as .
translation: しかし手を伸ばしても十分なお金を得られず、サルバは一般的な雰囲気を利用し、新しいメシアになりすますことに決める。
back_translation: However, despite reaching out, he couldn't obtain enough money, so Salva decided to take advantage of the general atmosphere and impersonate a new messiah.

text: forging a connection with the creature is easier for mac than getting his father 's attention until both man and beast need all the help they can get .
translation: 生き物とのつながりを築くのは、マックにとって父親の注意を引くよりも簡単だが、最終的に人間と獣の両方が必要な助けを求めることになる。
back_translation: Building a connection with living beings is easier for Mac than gaining his father's attention, but ultimately both humans and beasts will need to seek help.

text: as the man descends in to the afterworld , he slowly discovers the answer to the ultimate question of mankind .
translation: 男が来世に降りていくにつれて、彼は人類の究極の質問への答えを徐々に発見していく。
back_translation: As the man descends into the next life, he gradually discovers the answers to humanity's ultimate questions.

text: the humor is forced and heavy-handed , and occasionally simply unpleasant .
translation: ユーモアは強引で重苦しく、時にはただ不快であることもあります。
back_translation: Humor can be forceful and heavy, and at times, it can simply be unpleasant.

text: director alex halpern 's feature-length documentary , nine good teeth , unfolds through the stories and recollections of his 102-year-old grandmother mary mirabito , an outspoken and fiercely independent woman .
translation: 監督アレックス・ハルペルンの長編ドキュメンタリー「ナイン・グッド・ティース」は、彼の102歳の祖母メアリー・ミラビトの物語や回想を通じて展開される、率直で fiercely independent な女性です。
back_translation: Director Alex Halpern's feature documentary "Nine Good Teeth" unfolds through the story and memories of his 102-year-old grandmother, Mary Mirabito, a candid and fiercely independent woman.

text: no matter how you slice it , mark wahlberg and thandie newton are not hepburn and grant , two cinematic icons with chemistry galore .
translation: いかに切り取っても、マーク・ウォールバーグとサンディ・ニュートンは、化学反応にあふれた2人の映画のアイコン、オードリー・ヘプバーンとグレゴリー・ペックには及ばない。
back_translation: No matter how you slice it, Mark Wahlberg and Thandiwe Newton can't compare to the two film icons, Audrey Hepburn and Gregory Peck, who were full of chemical reactions.

text: M-I uma pena que , mais tarde , o prM-sprio filme abandone o tom de parM-sdia e passe a utilizar os mesmos clichM-js que havia satirizado .
translation: M-I それが残念なのは、後でその映画がパロディのトーンを放棄し、以前に風刺していたのと同じクリシェを使い始めることです。
back_translation: What's unfortunate about it is that later the movie abandons the tone of parody and starts using the same clichés it was previously satirizing.

text: straight into the hands of a man they call the lord of the wolves .
translation: 狼の主と呼ばれる男の手に直接。
back_translation: Directly in the hands of the man known as the wolf's master.

text: seagal , who looks more like danny aiello these days , mumbles his way through the movie .
translation: 最近ではダニー・アイエロに似ているシーガルは、映画の中でつぶやきながら進んでいきます。
back_translation: Recently, the seagull that resembles Danny Aiello advances while muttering in the movie.

text: sixteen years later , germany , in the ruhrpott , to be exact : orphan t & # 252 ; rlich and his friend josch are working their civil service , yet cause so much chaos that they decide to flee instead of being forced into the army .
translation: 16年後、ドイツ、ルール地方、正確には：孤児トゥーリッヒと彼の友人ヨッシュは、彼らの民間サービスを行っているが、あまりにも多くの混乱を引き起こし、軍に強制的に送られる代わりに逃げることを決める。
back_translation: Sixteen years later, in Germany, in the Ruhr area, to be precise: the orphan Turich and his friend Yosh, while performing their civil service, decide to flee instead of being forcibly sent to the military due to the chaos they have caused.

text: several of steven soderbergh 's earlier films were hailed as the works of an artist . sadly , full frontal plays like the work of a dilettante .
translation: スティーブン・ソダーバーグの初期のいくつかの映画は、アーティストの作品として高く評価されました。残念ながら、「フル・フロンタル」は素人の作品のように感じられます。
back_translation: Some of Steven Soderbergh's early films were highly regarded as works of art. Unfortunately, "Full Frontal" feels like an amateur's work.

text: matches neorealism 's impact by showing the humanity of a war-torn land filled with people who just want to live their lives .
translation: 人々がただ自分の人生を生きたいと願う戦争に荒廃した土地の人間性を示すことで、ネオリアリズムの影響を反映しています。
back_translation: It reflects the influence of neo-realism by showing the humanity of people in war-torn lands who simply wish to live their own lives.

text: a once powerful , but now ailing and remorseful father desperately seeks out his estranged son .
translation: かつては力強かったが、今は病に侵され、悔いを抱えた父が切実に疎遠な息子を探し求める。
back_translation: Once strong, now plagued by illness and burdened with regrets, a father desperately seeks his estranged son.

text: the council reluctantly admits that they are in a dire situation and they require blade 's assistance .
translation: 評議会は、苦渋の思いで自分たちが厳しい状況にあることを認め、ブレイドの助けが必要であると認めています。
back_translation: The council reluctantly acknowledges that they are in a difficult situation and recognizes that they need the help of the Blade.

text: none of his actors stand out , but that 's less of a problem here than it would be in another film : characterization matters less than atmosphere .
translation: 彼の俳優の中には際立った存在はないが、ここではそれが他の映画よりも問題ではない。キャラクターの描写よりも雰囲気の方が重要だ。
back_translation: There are no standout performances among the actors, but here it’s not an issue compared to other films. The atmosphere is more important than the character portrayal.

text: the filmmaker 's heart is in the right place . . .
translation: 映画製作者の心は正しい場所にある。
back_translation: The heart of the filmmaker is in the right place.

text: trailer park magnolia : too long , too cutesy , too sure of its own importance , and possessed of that peculiar tension of being too dense & about nothing at all .
translation: トレイラーパーク・マグノリア：長すぎ、可愛すぎ、自分の重要性を過信しすぎ、そして密度が高すぎて何もないという奇妙な緊張感を持っている。
back_translation: Trailer Park Magnolia: It's too long, too cute, overestimates its own significance, and has a strange tension of being too dense yet empty.

text: the action switches between past and present , but the material link is too tenuous to anchor the emotional connections that purport to span a 125-year divide .
translation: アクションは過去と現在の間を切り替えますが、物質的なつながりはあまりにも脆弱で、125年の隔たりを跨るとされる感情的なつながりを支えるには不十分です。
back_translation: The action switches between the past and the present, but the material connection is too fragile and insufficient to support the emotional connection that is said to span a gap of 125 years.

text: along the way to finding out how she ended up like that ( and how to get back into her own body ) , she discovers how shallow and cruel she 's always been . . .
translation: 彼女がどのようにしてあの状態になったのか（そしてどのようにして自分の体に戻るか）を探る途中で、彼女は自分がどれほど浅はかで冷酷であったかを発見する。
back_translation: In the process of exploring how she ended up in that state (and how to return to her own body), she discovers how shallow and ruthless she had been.

text: an aging yakuza returns to the park where he used to meet his long-lost girlfriend .
translation: 年老いたヤクザが、失った恋人と会っていた公園に戻ってくる。
back_translation: An elderly yakuza returns to the park where he used to meet his lost lover.

text: a sly dissection of the inanities of the contemporary music business and a rather sad story of the difficulties of artistic collaboration .
translation: 現代の音楽ビジネスの無意味さに対する狡猾な分析と、芸術的コラボレーションの困難さについてのかなり悲しい物語。
back_translation: A cunning analysis of the meaninglessness of the modern music business and a rather sad story about the difficulties of artistic collaboration.

text: leave it to the french to truly capture the terrifying angst of the modern working man without turning the film into a cheap thriller , a dumb comedy or a sappy melodrama .
translation: フランス人に任せれば、現代の労働者の恐ろしい不安を、安っぽいスリラーや愚かなお笑い、または感傷的なメロドラマにしないで見事に捉えることができる。
back_translation: If entrusted to the French, the terrifying anxieties of the modern worker can be brilliantly captured without turning them into cheap thrillers, silly comedies, or sentimental melodramas.

text: other strange events soon start happening as well , such as the appearance of old acquaintances of the crew , including some who are dead .
translation: クルーの古い知り合いが現れるなど、亡くなった人も含めて、他の奇妙な出来事がすぐに起こり始めます。
back_translation: Strange events soon begin to occur, including the appearance of an old acquaintance of the crew, even those who have passed away.

text: it 's a square , sentimental drama that satisfies , as comfort food often can .
translation: それは正方形のような、感情的なドラマであり、しばしば comfort food のように満足感を与えてくれます。
back_translation: It is an emotional drama akin to a square, often providing satisfaction like comfort food.

text: reminiscent of david mamet 's elaborate screen bluffs -- only livelier , more playful .
translation: デビッド・マメットの精巧なスクリーンへのブラフを想起させるが、より生き生きとしていて遊び心がある。
back_translation: It evokes David Mamet's intricate approach to screenwriting, but with a livelier and more playful touch.

text: this in-depth study of important developments of the computer industry should make it required viewing in university computer science departments for years to come .
translation: このコンピュータ業界の重要な進展に関する詳細な研究は、今後何年にもわたって大学のコンピュータサイエンス学部で必見の作品になるべきです。
back_translation: This detailed study on important developments in the computer industry should become a must-see work in university computer science departments for years to come.

text: they go through three days of hell , friendship , madness and hope .
translation: 彼らは友情、狂気、そして希望の3日間の地獄を体験します。
back_translation: They will experience a three-day hell of friendship, madness, and hope.

text: luster is a refreshingly funny and sexy look at unrequited love .
translation: ラスタは、報われない愛に対する新鮮で面白く、セクシーな視点を提供しています。
back_translation: Rasta offers a fresh, interesting, and sexy perspective on unrequited love.

text: she ultimately decides to pursue her lifelong dream of opening her own dance studio for inner-city youths .
translation: 彼女は最終的に、都市部の若者たちのために自分のダンススタジオを開くという生涯の夢を追いかけることに決めます。
back_translation: She ultimately decides to chase her lifelong dream of opening her own dance studio for young people in the city.

text: uplifting as only a document of the worst possibilities of mankind can be , and among the best films of the year .
translation: 人類の最悪の可能性に関する文書としてのみ高揚感を与え、今年の最高の映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the best movies of the year, providing an uplifting experience only as a document concerning the worst possibilities for humanity.

text: . . . surprisingly inert for a movie in which the main character travels back and forth between epochs .
translation: 時代を行き来する主人公が登場する映画にしては、驚くほど無気力な作品。
back_translation: For a movie featuring a protagonist who travels through time, it is surprisingly lethargic.

text: now the lives of these alberta everymen are brought to the big screen by documentarian ferral mitchener in an exploration of the depths of friendship , the fragility of life , growing up gracefully and the art and science of drinking beer like a man .
translation: 今、アルバータの普通の人々の生活がドキュメンタリー制作者フェラル・ミッチャナーによって大画面に描かれ、友情の深さ、人生の儚さ、優雅に成長すること、そして男らしくビールを飲む技術と科学の探求が行われています。
back_translation: Now, the everyday lives of ordinary people in Alberta are being portrayed on the big screen by documentary filmmaker Feral Mitchner, exploring the depths of friendship, the transience of life, the grace of growing up, and the pursuit of the art and science of drinking beer like a man.

text: although occasionally static to the point of resembling a stage play , the film delivers a solid mixture of sweetness and laughs .
translation: 時折舞台劇のように静的になるものの、この映画は甘さと笑いをしっかりとミックスして提供しています。
back_translation: Although it occasionally becomes static like a stage play, this movie firmly mixes sweetness and laughter.

text: you would n't call the good girl a date movie ( an anti-date movie is more like it ) , but when it 's good , it 's good and horrid .
translation: 良い女の子をデート映画とは呼ばない（むしろ反デート映画の方が近い）が、良いときは良いし、酷い。
back_translation: It's not really called a date movie for good girls (rather, it's closer to an anti-date movie), but when it's good, it's good, and when it's bad, it's terrible.

text: is this challenge too much for even the amazing spider-man to handle ?
translation: この挑戦は驚異的なスパイダーマンにとっても乗り越えるのが難しいのでしょうか？
back_translation: Is this challenge difficult for even the amazing Spider-Man to overcome?

text: human resources was a good , straightforward tale , but time out is better . it 's haunting . it 's like a poem .
translation: 「ヒューマンリソース」は良い、ストレートな物語でしたが、「タイムアウト」はそれよりも優れています。それは心に残ります。詩のようです。
back_translation: "Human Resource" was a good, straightforward story, but "Timeout" is even better. It stays with you. It's like poetry.

text: after steve 's job opportunity in san francisco falls through , he comes up with a plan .
translation: スティーブのサンフランシスコでの仕事の機会がダメになった後、彼は計画を立てる。
back_translation: After Steve's job opportunity in San Francisco fell through, he made plans.

text: extremes of intimacy and spectacle , tragedy and hope fuse in a tidal wave of visuals and music , giving rise to a unique , artistic experience that reflects the vision of a brave new globalized world .
