translation: 親密さとスペクタクルの極端、悲劇と希望が視覚と音楽の津波の中で融合し、勇敢な新しいグローバル化された世界のビジョンを反映した独特の芸術体験を生み出します。
back_translation: An extreme blend of intimacy and spectacle, tragedy and hope merge amidst a tsunami of visuals and music, creating a unique artistic experience that reflects a brave new vision of a globalized world.

text: not a long time ago she was a successful popstar whose life consisted in hosting tv shows and signing autographs .
translation: あまり前のことではなく、彼女はテレビ番組をホストしたり、サインをしたりすることから成り立っていた成功したポップスターでした。
back_translation: Not long ago, she was a successful pop star who hosted television shows and signed autographs.

text: because the film deliberately lacks irony , it has a genuine dramatic impact ; it plays like a powerful 1957 drama we 've somehow never seen before .
translation: この映画はあえてアイロニーを欠いているため、真摯なドラマ的影響を持っている。まるで1957年の強力なドラマを見たことがないかのように展開する。
back_translation: This film deliberately lacks irony, giving it a sincere dramatic impact. It unfolds as if one has never seen a powerful drama from 1957.

text: downright transparent is the script 's endless assault of embarrassingly ham-fisted sex jokes that reek of a script rewrite designed to garner the film a `` cooler `` pg-13 rating .
translation: まったくもって透明なこの脚本は、映画に「クールな」PG-13の評価を得るために書き直されたような、恥ずかしいほどの手法で攻撃的なセックスジョークの無限の襲撃が香ばしいです。
back_translation: This utterly transparent script seems to have been rewritten to earn a "cool" PG-13 rating for the movie, featuring an embarrassing array of aggressive sex jokes in an endless barrage.

text: your night horrors start to bleed into your day job .
translation: あなたの夜の恐怖が、日中の仕事に影響を与え始めている。
back_translation: Your night terrors are starting to affect your work during the day.

text: alice must also come to terms with her slowly-returning memories .
translation: アリスは、自らの徐々に戻ってくる記憶に向き合わなければならない。
back_translation: Alice must confront the memories that are gradually returning to her.

text: boasting the best sword-fighting sequences to hit the screen in many years , it is so enjoyably old-fashioned it even looks as if it were made in the '70s .
translation: 多年ぶりにスクリーンに登場した最高の剣技シーンを誇り、非常に楽しめる古典的なスタイルで、まるで70年代に作られたかのように見えます。
back_translation: Boasting the finest swordsmanship scenes that have appeared on screen after many years, it is highly enjoyable and has a classic style, making it look as if it were made in the 1970s.

text: murbah swamp beer is a documentary about an event that could only happen in australia .
translation: マーバスワンプビールは、オーストラリアでしか起こり得ない出来事についてのドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: "Marv's Swamp Beer" is a documentary about events that can only happen in Australia.

text: ronnie must then deal with his new life , while having to deal with missing his ex-wife that he left back home .
translation: ロニーは新しい生活に対処しなければならず、帰国した元妻を恋しく思うことにも対処しなければならない。
back_translation: Ronnie has to deal with adapting to his new life and also cope with missing his ex-wife who has returned to her home country.

text: photographed with melancholy richness and eloquently performed yet also decidedly uncinematic .
translation: メランコリックな豊かさで撮影され、雄弁に演じられたが、決して映画的ではない。
back_translation: Shot with a melancholic richness and performed eloquently, yet never cinematic.

text: it 's just hard to believe that a life like this can sound so dull .
translation: こんな生活がこんなにも退屈に聞こえるなんて、信じがたい。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that such a life could sound so boring.

text: a charming , vibrant , if under-edited adaptation of v . s . naipaul 's genially cynical novel .
translation: 魅力的で活気に満ちた、しかし編集が不十分なv・s・ナイポールの心温まる皮肉な小説の適応。
back_translation: An engaging and vibrant yet inadequately edited adaptation of V.S. Naipaul's heartwarming and ironic novel.

text: and what better place for romance than coney island ?
translation: それなら、恋愛に最適な場所はコニーアイランドですか？
back_translation: In that case, is Coney Island the best place for a romantic date?

text: inspector mo eventually discovers through a tabloid magazine that a self-proclaimed psychic named shana had phoned a radio program on the day of the kidnapping to warn of the incident .
translation: 捜査官モーは、タブロイド雑誌を通じて、自己 proclaimed の超能力者であるシャナが誘拐の日にラジオ番組に電話をかけ、その事件について警告していたことを最終的に発見します。
back_translation: Investigator Mo eventually discovers that Shana, a self-proclaimed psychic, called a radio program and warned about the incident on the day of the kidnapping through a tabloid magazine.

text: stuffy , full of itself , morally ambiguous and nothing to shout about .
translation: 息苦しく、自惚れが強く、道徳的に曖昧で、特筆することは何もない。
back_translation: It is suffocating, has a strong sense of narcissism, is morally ambiguous, and has nothing noteworthy.

text: sheridan . . . smoothes over sources of conflict that could have lent the film a bit more depth .
translation: シェリダンは、映画にもう少し深みを持たせることができたかもしれない対立の源を滑らかに処理します。
back_translation: Sheridan smoothly handles the source of the conflict that could have given the film a bit more depth.

text: not only are the film 's sopranos gags incredibly dated and unfunny , they also demonstrate how desperate the makers of this 'we 're -doing-it-for -the-cash ' sequel were .
translation: 映画『ザ・ソプラノズ』のギャグは非常に時代遅れで面白くないだけでなく、この「金儲けのためにやっている」といった続編の製作者たちの必死さも示しています。
back_translation: The jokes in the movie "The Sopranos" are not only outdated and unfunny, but they also show the desperation of the creators of the sequel who are doing it "for the sake of making money."

text: she knows that kanna is back but now she does not want to go back to him .
translation: 彼女はカンナが戻ってきたことを知っているが、今は彼の元には戻りたくないと思っている。
back_translation: She knows that Kanna has come back, but right now she doesn't want to go back to him.

text: the mystery guests soon unleash a stiff sentence of their own , without parole , teaching the judge the consequence of doing unto others as you would have done unto you .
translation: 謎の客はすぐに、自らの厳しい判決を下し、仮釈放なしで、裁判官に「他者にしてほしいように自分も行動する」という結果を教えます。
back_translation: The mysterious guest quickly delivers their harsh verdict, instructing the judge with the result to "act towards others as one would want others to act towards oneself," without the possibility of parole.

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve . but it does somehow manage to get you under its spell .
translation: 古典的なロマンティックコメディのプロットを持つこのシンデレラストーリーには、驚きの要素は全くありません。しかし、なぜかあなたをその魅力に引き込むことには成功しています。
back_translation: This Cinderella story has a classic romantic comedy plot with no surprising elements at all. However, for some reason, it succeeds in drawing you into its charm.

text: hoffman is understandably concerned about typecasting , but he is indeed the man for the job , recalling the intensity that nicholas cage brought to an oscar-winning performance in leaving las vegas .
translation: ホフマンはタイプキャスティングについて懸念を抱いているのは理解できますが、彼は確かにその仕事にふさわしい人物です。ニコラス・ケイジが『リービング・ラスベガス』でオスカー受賞のパフォーマンスに持っていた強度を思い起こさせます。
back_translation: It is understandable that Hoffman has concerns about typecasting, but he is certainly the right person for the job. He reminds me of the intensity that Nicolas Cage had in his Oscar-winning performance in "Leaving Las Vegas."

text: a young novelist , tormented by his family 's history and haunted by the specter of his long-dead , more famous ancestor , falls in love with a woman , a distant relative of his ancestor , whose friends and family begin to disappear mysteriously .
translation: 若き小説家は、自分の家族の歴史に苦しみ、長い間亡くなったより有名な先祖の亡霊に悩まされながら、先祖の遠い親戚である女性に恋をする。彼女の友人や家族は神秘的に姿を消し始める。
back_translation: A young novelist, troubled by the history of his family and haunted by the ghosts of his long-deceased, more famous ancestors, falls in love with a woman who is a distant relative of his ancestors. Her friends and family mysteriously begin to disappear.

text: montias . . . pumps a lot of energy into his nicely nuanced narrative and surrounds himself with a cast of quirky -- but not stereotyped -- street characters .
translation: モンティアスは、彼の洗練された物語に多くのエネルギーを注ぎ込み、型にはまらない奇抜なストリートキャラクターたちに囲まれています。
back_translation: Montias has poured a lot of energy into his sophisticated story and is surrounded by unconventional and extravagant street characters.

text: kudos to this first-time feature director for braiding his insider experience into something quite singular .
translation: この初めてのフィーチャー監督が自らの内部経験を独特なものに織り交ぜたことに敬意を表します。
back_translation: I pay respect to how this first-time feature director has intertwined their own internal experiences into something unique.

text: she files for divorce , and marco makes a decision that will change all their lives .
translation: 彼女は離婚を申し立て、マルコは彼らの人生を変える決断を下します。
back_translation: She filed for divorce, and Marco made a decision that would change their lives.

text: what can one say about a balding 50-year-old actor playing an innocent boy carved from a log ?
translation: 丸太から彫られた無邪気な少年を演じる50歳のはげた俳優について、何が言えるのでしょうか？
back_translation: What can be said about a 50-year-old balding actor playing an innocent boy carved from a log?

text: because of being deeply moved from the sunflowers ' beautiness , he takes one of them as a sign for his love back to the city .
translation: ひまわりの美しさに深く感動した彼は、そのうちの一つを愛の印として街に持ち帰ることにした。
back_translation: Deeply moved by the beauty of the sunflowers, he decided to take one back to the city as a token of love.

text: bret packard is rich , famous , good-looking , and set to win his fourth championship ring .
translation: ブレット・パックハードは裕福で、有名で、見た目が良く、4回目のチャンピオンリングを獲得する準備が整っています。
back_translation: Brett Packhard is wealthy, famous, good-looking, and ready to win his fourth championship ring.

text: the movie has no respect for laws , political correctness or common decency , but it displays something more important : respect for its flawed , crazy people .
translation: その映画は法律、政治的な適切さ、または一般的な礼儀に対して敬意を払っていませんが、欠点のある狂った人々に対するより重要なもの、つまり敬意を示しています。
back_translation: The movie does not show respect for the law, political correctness, or general etiquette, but rather shows respect for something more important, which is flawed, crazy people.

text: it does what good films do best ; that is to provoke us , push our buttons , make us think and maybe even entertain us in the process .
translation: それは良い映画が最も得意とすることをします。それは私たちを刺激し、怒らせ、考えさせ、そして場合によってはその過程で私たちを楽しませることです。
back_translation: It does what good movies do best. It stimulates us, angers us, makes us think, and sometimes entertains us in the process.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: 非常に小さい子供たちがこの使い古された内容に感銘を受けるとは想像しがたい。
back_translation: It is hard to imagine that very small children would be impressed by this worn-out content.

text: he led a bleak life , stuck in a boring routinity created by his ambition to become a sucessfull producer in one jakarta 's leading tv station .
translation: 彼は、ジャカルタの主要なテレビ局で成功したプロデューサーになるという野望によって作り出された退屈な日常に縛られ、暗い生活を送っていた。
back_translation: He was trapped in a boring routine created by his ambition to become a successful producer at a major television station in Jakarta, leading a dark life.

text: a nightmare date with a half-formed wit done a great disservice by a lack of critical distance and a sad trust in liberal arts college bumper sticker platitudes .
translation: 形成不完全なウィットによる悪夢のデートは、批判的な距離の欠如とリベラルアーツカレッジのバンパーステッカーの陳腐な言葉に対する悲しい信頼によって大きな害を被っている。
back_translation: The nightmare date characterized by incomplete wit is greatly harmed by a lack of critical distance and a sad reliance on the trite words of liberal arts college bumper stickers.

text: the group of best friends from their days back at east great falls high reunite for the next great sexual adventure in their lives . . .
translation: イーストグレートフォールズ高校時代の親友たちのグループが、彼らの人生で次の素晴らしいセクシャルアドベンチャーのために再会します。。。
back_translation: A group of close friends from East Great Falls High reunites for their next exciting sexual adventure in life...

text: earnest , unsubtle and hollywood-predictable , green dragon is still a deeply moving effort to put a human face on the travail of thousands of vietnamese .
translation: 真剣で露骨でハリウッド的に予測可能な『グリーンドラゴン』は、何千人ものベトナム人の苦悩に人間の顔を持たせる深く感動的な作品である。
back_translation: "Green Dragon," serious, explicit, and predictably Hollywood, is a deeply moving work that gives a human face to the suffering of thousands of Vietnamese people.

text: 20 , 000 years before , our planet is entering an ice age .
translation: 2万年前、私たちの惑星は氷河期に突入しています。
back_translation: Twenty thousand years ago, our planet entered an ice age.

text: a poignant lyricism runs through balzac and the little chinese seamstress that transforms this story about love and culture into a cinematic poem .
translation: 「バルザックと小さな中国人仕立て屋」には、愛と文化についてのこの物語を映画的な詩に変える深い叙情があります。
back_translation: "Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress" has a profound lyricism that transforms this story about love and culture into cinematic poetry.

text: soderbergh seems capable only of delivering artfully lighted , earnest inquiries that lack the kind of genuine depth that would make them redeemable .
translation: ソダーバーグは、救済可能な本物の深みが欠けた、芸術的に照明された真剣な探求しか提供できないように思える。
back_translation: Soderbergh seems to only provide a serious exploration that lacks a redeemable real depth, illuminated artistically.

text: kamel , a young man from the french ghetto , near paris , is coming back to france .
translation: カメルは、パリ近郊のフランスのゲットー出身の若者で、フランスに帰ってきます。
back_translation: Kamel is a young man from a ghetto near Paris, and he is coming back to France.

text: becomes a bit of a mishmash : a tearjerker that does n't and a thriller that wo n't .
translation: 少しごちゃ混ぜになってしまう：感動的なはずの作品なのに涙が出ず、サスペンスなのに緊張感がない。
back_translation: It gets a bit confusing: it's supposed to be an emotional work, yet it fails to bring tears, and despite being suspenseful, there's no tension.

text: a publication that documents their culture and demonstrates how the real world can both destroy and enhance their idealistic one .
translation: 彼らの文化を記録し、現実世界が彼らの理想主義的な世界をどのように破壊し、または強化することができるかを示す出版物。
back_translation: Publications that record their culture and show how the real world can either destroy or enhance their idealistic world.

text: the film narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images to seduce .
translation: この映画は、イメージを操作し、イメージを使って魅了する無限の可能性を、豊かな詳細と連想的なモンタージュで語ります。
back_translation: This film tells the infinite possibilities of manipulating images and captivating through their use, with rich details and associative montage.

text: `` what 's more important your experiences or your memories of them ? ``
translation: `` 経験とそれに対する記憶のどちらが重要ですか？ ``
back_translation: "Which is more important, experience or the memory of it?"

text: a group of hard core female inmates are trained by the military .
translation: 一群のハードコア女性受刑者が軍隊によって訓練されている。
back_translation: A group of hardcore female inmates are being trained by the military.

text: keeping her mind diligently focused on dance proves harder than she expected as she finds herself falling in love with david schrader , a dark and mysterious new york musician .
translation: 彼女はダンスに心を集中させることが彼女が思っていたよりも難しいことを証明し、ダークで神秘的なニューヨークのミュージシャン、デイヴィッド・シュレーダーに恋に落ちてしまう。
back_translation: She proves that concentrating on dance is more difficult than she thought, and falls in love with the dark and mysterious New York musician, David Schrader.

text: . . . just a big mess of a movie , full of images and events , but no tension or surprise .
translation: ただの大混乱の映画で、画像や出来事が満載だが、緊張感や驚きはない。
back_translation: It's just a chaotic movie, full of images and events, but lacks tension and surprise.

text: reign of fire is hardly the most original fantasy film ever made -- beyond road warrior , it owes enormous debts to aliens and every previous dragon drama -- but that barely makes it any less entertaining .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は決して最もオリジナルなファンタジー映画ではないが、ロード・ウォリアーを超えて、「エイリアン」やそれ以前のすべてのドラゴンものに多大な影響を受けている。しかし、それが娯楽性を減少させることはほとんどない。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" is not necessarily the most original fantasy film, but beyond "The Road Warrior," it is heavily influenced by "Alien" and all dragon-related films that came before it. However, this hardly reduces its entertainment value.

text: he hired angel . com to kill lui because lui opposed nunn 's business plans , and also because nunn is carrying on a secret affair with lui 's wife .
translation: 彼はルイがナンのビジネスプランに反対しているため、またナンがルイの妻と秘密の不倫をしているため、エンジェル・ドットコムを雇ってルイを殺させました。
back_translation: He hired Angel Dot Com to have Louis killed because Louis opposed Nan's business plan and because Nan was having a secret affair with Louis's wife.

text: the homespun musician could n't have done it without the support of his family , friends , lovers and the neighborhood kids he called 'starchildren ' , all of whom paint the big picture of bruce 's life legacy and 'dimension of imagination ' .
translation: 素朴な音楽家は、家族、友人、恋人、そして彼が「スターチルドレン」と呼ぶ近所の子供たちの支えなしでは成し遂げることができなかった。彼ら全員がブルースの人生の遺産と「想像の次元」の大きな絵を描いている。
back_translation: The simple musician could not have achieved anything without the support of his family, friends, lover, and the neighborhood children he calls "star children." All of them contribute to painting the larger picture of the legacy of blues and the "imagined dimension."

text: jack has a history with charlie , a transient who portrays a typical image of the homeless : rough , unshaven and always looking for the next drink .
translation: ジャックはチャーリーとの歴史があり、チャーリーは典型的なホームレスのイメージを持つ浮浪者であり、粗野でひげを生やしており、常に次の飲み物を探しています。
back_translation: Jack has a history with Charlie, who has the typical image of a homeless person—a rough, bearded drifter always searching for his next drink.

text: it 's predictable , but it jumps through the expected hoops with style and even some depth .
translation: 予測可能ですが、期待された段階をスタイルと深みをもって進んでいきます。
back_translation: It is predictable, but we will progress through the expected stages with style and depth.

text: back in france , werner recovers a taste for life and adrien returns to his solitary lifestyle .
translation: フランスに戻ったウェルナーは、人生の味を取り戻し、エイドリアンは孤独なライフスタイルに戻ります。
back_translation: Upon returning to France, Werner regains a taste for life, while Adrian returns to his lonely lifestyle.

text: together , they develop a criminal energy that knows no boundaries and leads them to cold-blooded murder . . .
translation: 共に、彼らは境界を知らない犯罪のエネルギーを発展させ、冷酷な殺人へと導かれる。
back_translation: Together, they develop an energy of crime that knows no boundaries and is led to ruthless murder.

text: built in 1926 , the mansion resides on an indian burial ground and was the site of countless hangings at the hands of north georgia law enforcement , the kkk , and anyone else col . samuel tate wanted out of the way .
translation: 1926年に建設されたこの邸宅はインディアンの埋葬地に位置し、ノースジョージアの法執行機関、KKK、そしてサミュエル・テート大佐が排除したいと思ったその他の人々の手によって無数の絞首刑が行われた場所です。
back_translation: This mansion, built in 1926, is located on an Indian burial ground and is the site where numerous hangings were carried out by North Georgia law enforcement, the KKK, and others whom Colonel Samuel Tate wanted to eliminate.

text: as debby tries to parlay what was essentially a casual fling into possible marriage with an indifferent rick , her mother virginia wonders if her affair with widower nick is the real thing .
translation: デビーが本質的にはカジュアルな浮気を無関心なリックとの結婚の可能性に変えようとする中、彼女の母親バージニアは未亡人ニックとの関係が本物なのかを考えています。
back_translation: While Debbie is trying to transform her fundamentally casual affair into a possibility of marriage with the indifferent Rick, her mother Virginia is contemplating whether her relationship with the widower Nick is genuine.

text: ivan , a captain of the soviet army , arrested by the front secret police 'smersh ' , has a narrow escape .
translation: ソビエト軍の大尉イワンは、前線の秘密警察「スマーシュ」に逮捕され、危ういところで逃げ延びます。
back_translation: Captain Ivan of the Soviet Army is arrested by the front-line secret police "Smersh" and narrowly manages to escape.

text: if you value your time and money , find an escape clause and avoid seeing this trite , predictable rehash .
translation: 時間とお金を大切にするなら、この陳腐で予測可能な再利用を避けるために逃げ道を見つけてください。
back_translation: If you value your time and money, find a way to escape this clichéd and predictable reuse.

text: overall , the film misses the brilliance of jelinek 's novel by some way . it settles for being merely grim .
translation: 全体として、この映画はジェリネクの小説の素晴らしさを失ってしまっています。ただ単に陰鬱さに留まっています。
back_translation: Overall, this movie loses the greatness of Jelinek's novel. It simply remains in a state of gloom.

text: hale bopp is the story of just such a woman ; her name is rachel .
translation: ヘール・ボップはそのような女性の物語です；彼女の名前はレイチェルです。
back_translation: Hale-Bopp is the story of such a woman; her name is Rachel.

text: 'a fresh-faced , big-hearted and frequently funny thrill ride for the kiddies , with enough eye candy and cheeky wit to keep parents away from the concession stand . '
translation: 「新鮮な顔立ちで大きな心を持ち、頻繁に笑えるスリル満点の子供向け作品で、目を楽しませる要素とちょっぴり生意気なユーモアで親たちを売店から遠ざける十分な魅力があります。」
back_translation: "With a fresh look and a big heart, this thrilling children's show is filled with frequent laughs, offering delightful visual elements and a touch of cheeky humor that keeps parents away from the concession stand."

text: it 's halloween season , and while ghost ship ca n't hold a candle to the ring for true primal scares , it 'll probably stay respectably afloat until at least most of the candy is gone .
translation: ハロウィンの季節で、ゴーストシップは真の原始的な恐怖に関してはリングには敵わないが、少なくともほとんどのキャンディがなくなるまで、そこそこ浮かんでいるだろう。
back_translation: During Halloween season, the ghost ship may not rival the true primal fear of the ring, but at least it will probably stay afloat until most of the candy is gone.

text: ethan , a confident young architect and seeming 'perfect guy ' has invested himself , and his heart , in women like rachel before - and he is sure he has learned his lesson .
translation: イーサンは、自信に満ちた若い建築家で、完璧な男のように見えるが、レイチェルのような女性に心を奪われたことがあり、彼は自分の教訓を学んだと確信している。
back_translation: Ethan is a confident young architect who seems like the perfect man, but he has been captivated by a woman like Rachel, and he is sure that he has learned his lesson.

text: frank ( played by sal mazzotta ) , family under-bossman vito lupo ( played by leo rossi ) , and consigliori danny defino ( played by johnny williams ) try to find out who is responsible for usurping the family 's power before they implode from their own internal strife .
translation: フランク（サル・マゾッタ演）と、ファミリーのアンダーボスのヴィト・ルーポ（レオ・ロッシ演）、そして顧問のダニー・デフィーノ（ジョニー・ウィリアムズ演）は、内部分裂で家族が崩壊する前に、誰がファミリーの権力を奪ったのかを突き止めようとしています。
back_translation: Frank (played by Sal Mazzotta), Vito Luppo, the family's underboss (played by Leo Rossi), and advisor Danny DeFino (played by Johnny Williams) are trying to uncover who has taken power from the family before internal division leads to its collapse.

text: a series of surprise events further obstructs their relationship , but tobias perseveres .
translation: 一連の予期せぬ出来事が彼らの関係をさらに妨げるが、トバイアスは貫き通す。
back_translation: A series of unexpected events further hinders their relationship, but Tobias perseveres through it all.

text: he soon realizes that he is being hunted and takes off with marie on a search to find out who he is and why he is being hunted .
translation: 彼はすぐに自分が狙われていることに気づき、マリーと共に自分が誰なのか、そしてなぜ狙われているのかを調べる旅に出ます。
back_translation: He quickly realizes that he is being targeted and sets out on a journey with Marie to discover who he is and why he is being hunted.

text: his father , aglanar , was happy at his birth that he would have a strong and honorable son to carry on the traditions of the valley .
translation: 彼の父、アグラナールは、谷の伝統を受け継ぐ強く名誉ある息子が生まれたことを喜んでいました。
back_translation: His father, Agranaar, was delighted that a strong and honorable son had been born to carry on the traditions of the valley.

text: nobody chooses to come here , this where they end up .
translation: 誰もここに来ることを選びません、ここが彼らの終着点です。
back_translation: No one chooses to come here; this is their final destination.

text: however , on her second day , celia goes away leaving a 5-year-old child behind , kiki , and a note promising to be back in a couple of days .
translation: しかし、彼女の2日目に、セリアは5歳の子供キキを置いて去り、数日中に戻るという約束のメモを残しました。
back_translation: However, on her second day, Celia left 5-year-old Kiki behind and left a note promising to return in a few days.

text: the second coming of harry potter is a film far superior to its predecessor . a movie that successfully crushes a best selling novel into a timeframe that mandates that you avoid the godzilla sized soda .
translation: ハリー・ポッターの第二の到来は、その前作よりもはるかに優れた映画です。ベストセラー小説をうまく圧縮し、ゴジラサイズのソーダを避けなければならないタイムフレームに収めた映画です。
back_translation: The second arrival of Harry Potter is a far superior movie to its predecessor. It is a film that successfully compresses a bestselling novel into a timeframe that must avoid soda the size of Godzilla.

text: then she buys a bar of chocolate from the neighborhood store . . .
translation: それから彼女は近所の店でチョコレートバーを買います。
back_translation: Then she buys a chocolate bar at a nearby store.

text: at the same time , william has become the object of wrath by a popular but pompous and pridefilled christian radio commentator who brands william as a false prophet and seeks to destroy him .
translation: 同時に、ウィリアムは人気がありながらも傲慢で誇り高いクリスチャンラジオのコメンテーターから怒りの標的となり、ウィリアムを偽の預言者として烙印を押され、彼を破壊しようとしています。
back_translation: At the same time, William has become the target of anger from a popular yet arrogant and proud Christian radio commentator, who has branded William as a false prophet and is trying to destroy him.

text: anyone who welcomes a dash of the avant-garde fused with their humor should take pleasure in this crazed , joyous romp of a film .
translation: 前衛的な要素とユーモアが融合したものを歓迎する誰もが、この狂気に満ちた喜びの映画を楽しむべきです。
back_translation: Anyone who welcomes a fusion of avant-garde elements and humor should enjoy this movie filled with mad joy.

text: while philippa does not want to elude the justice she deserves for the four innocent deaths , filippo discovers he fell in love with the beautiful woman .
translation: フィリッパは自分が受けるべき正義から逃れたいとは思っていないが、フィリッポは美しい女性に恋してしまったことを発見する。
back_translation: Philippa does not wish to escape the justice she deserves, but she discovers that Filippo has fallen in love with a beautiful woman.

text: the one obstacle he is n't expecting is the screenwriter 's assistant , screenwriter 4 . 0 's animated helper who 's annoyed bob left her to sit around so long .
translation: 彼が予期していない唯一の障害は、脚本家4.0のアニメーション助手である脚本家のアシスタントで、ボブが彼女を長い間放置したことに苛立っている。
back_translation: The only unexpected obstacle he faces is the assistant of the screenwriter, who is a Scriptwriter 4.0 animation assistant, and she is frustrated that Bob has left her for a long time.

text: he dies alone at the hospital , and apparently everything nete planned went wrong .
translation: 彼は病院で一人で亡くなり、どうやらネテが計画したことはすべてうまくいかなかったようです。
back_translation: He died alone in the hospital, and it seems that everything Nethe planned did not go well.

text: the casting of von sydow . . . is itself intacto 's luckiest stroke .
translation: フォン・シドーのキャスティングは、インタクターの最も幸運な一撃そのものである。
back_translation: The casting of Fon Shido is the very epitome of the most fortunate strike from the Interactor.

text: an engaging and specific portrait of a culture in transition , even as it evokes humanity 's most universal and timeless values .
translation: 変化の過程にある文化の魅力的で具体的な肖像を描きつつ、人類の最も普遍的で時を超えた価値観を呼び起こします。
back_translation: While depicting an attractive and concrete portrait of a culture in the process of change, it evokes humanity's most universal and timeless values.

text: he has become an inconvenient obstacle to his work-a-holic son , and lost all remaining freedoms , except the valued time he spends with his grandson .
translation: 彼は働きすぎの息子にとって厄介な障害となり、孫との貴重な時間を除いてすべての自由を失った。
back_translation: He became a troublesome obstacle for his overworked son, losing all freedom except for precious time with his grandchildren.

text: a young father amaro arrives at his new church post on the orders of the bishop .
translation: 若い父アマロは、司教の命令で新しい教会の職務に着任します。
back_translation: Young Father Amaro begins his new duties at the church at the behest of the bishop.

text: the far future may be awesome to consider , but from period detail to matters of the heart , this film is most transporting when it stays put in the past .
translation: 遥か遠い未来は考えるには素晴らしいかもしれませんが、時代の詳細から心の問題に至るまで、この映画は過去に留まっているときに最も感動的です。
back_translation: Thinking about a distant future may be wonderful, but this movie is most moving when it remains in the past, from the details of the era to the problems of the heart.

text: a drug lord who pretends to overthrow the mexican government .
translation: メキシコ政府を打倒しようと偽る麻薬王。
back_translation: A drug lord pretending to overthrow the Mexican government.

text: jim must make it back to his wedding in time , and finch must find the location of stifler 's mom 's wedding ( ending in 'the graduate ' style ) .
translation: ジムは結婚式に間に合って戻ってこなければならず、フィンチはスティフラーのママの結婚式の場所を見つけなければならない（「卒業」のスタイルで終わる）。
back_translation: Jim must return in time for the wedding, and Finch has to find the location of Stifler's mom's wedding (ending in the style of "American Pie").

text: he has returned as a ghost , but he can do nothing but passively observe as the police stand clueless to the murder .
translation: 彼は幽霊として戻ってきたが、殺人事件に対して警察が無知なまま立ち尽くしているのを受動的に観察することしかできない。
back_translation: He returned as a ghost, but could only passively observe as the police stood idly by, still ignorant of the murder case.

text: unfortunately , heartbreak hospital wants to convey the same kind of haughtiness in its own sketchy material but this territory has already been explored previously with better aplomb and sardonic wit .
translation: 残念ながら、ハートブレイクホスピタルは、自身の曖昧な素材に同じような傲慢さを伝えようとしているが、この領域は以前により優れた自信と皮肉な機知で探求されている。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Heartbreak Hospital tries to convey a similar arrogance with its ambiguous material, but this territory has been explored before with greater confidence and ironic wit.

text: this little film is so slovenly done , so primitive in technique , that it ca n't really be called animation .
translation: この短い映画は非常にずぼらに作られていて、技術的にも原始的なので、本当にアニメーションとは呼べません。
back_translation: This short film is made very sloppily and is technically primitive, so it can't really be called animation.

text: try as he might , the roguishly handsome cliff starkey , just ca n't keep out of trouble .
translation: どんなに頑張っても、いかにも魅力的なクリフ・スターキーは、どうしてもトラブルから抜け出せない。
back_translation: No matter how hard he tries, the undeniably charming Cliff Starkey just can't seem to escape from trouble.

text: when he was a young boy , kyle ( chaney kley ) claimed that while he was sleeping , he accidentally woke up and saw the tooth fairy , who tried to kill him .
translation: 若い頃、カイル（チェイニー・クレイ）は、寝ている間に偶然目を覚まし、彼を殺そうとした歯の妖精を見たと主張した。
back_translation: When he was young, Kyle (Cheney Clay) claimed that he accidentally woke up while sleeping and saw the Tooth Fairy trying to kill him.

text: the movie 's biggest offense is its complete and utter lack of tension .
translation: 映画の最大の欠点は、緊張感がまったくないことです。
back_translation: The biggest flaw of the movie is that there is absolutely no tension.

text: the latter part of the film examines the forces both political and religious , that led to otte 's unusual appointment .
translation: 映画の後半では、オッテの異例の任命につながった政治的および宗教的な力について考察しています。
back_translation: In the second half of the film, it explores the political and religious powers that led to Otte's unusual appointment.

text: to the horror of her friends and pumpkin 's overprotective mother , carolyn falls in love , becoming an outcast in the process .
translation: 友達やかぼちゃの過保護な母親の恐怖に、キャロリンは恋に落ち、過程で孤立者になってしまう。
back_translation: Carolyn falls in love, becoming isolated in the process due to the fear of her friends and her overprotective mother.

text: jaglom . . . put [ s ] the audience in the privileged position of eavesdropping on his characters
translation: ジャグロムは観客を彼のキャラクターの盗み聞きができる特権的な位置に置く。
back_translation: Jagrum places the audience in a privileged position where they can eavesdrop on his character.

text: lati , however , wants to return to school and finish her studies .
translation: ラティは、しかし、学校に戻って学業を終えたいと考えています。
back_translation: Lati, however, wants to go back to school and finish her studies.

text: hill looks to be going through the motions , beginning with the pale script .
translation: 丘は淡い脚本から始まり、ただやり過ごしているように見えます。
back_translation: The hill begins with a pale script, seeming to simply let things pass by.

text: the chM-bteau would have been benefited from a sharper , cleaner script before it went in front of the camera . not to mention a sharper , cleaner camera lens .
translation: chM-bteauは、カメラの前に出る前に、より明確でクリーンな脚本から利益を得たことでしょう。さらに、より鮮明でクリーンなカメラのレンズも必要でした。
back_translation: chM-bteau benefited from a clearer and cleaner script before stepping in front of the camera. Additionally, a sharper and cleaner camera lens was also needed.

text: the stunt work is top-notch ; the dialogue and drama often food-spittingly funny .
translation: スタントワークは一流で、セリフやドラマはしばしば食べ物を吹き出すほど面白い。
back_translation: The stunt work is top-notch, and the dialogue and drama are often so funny that you'll spit out your food.

text: all the actors are good in pauline & paulette but van der groen , described as 'belgium 's national treasure , ' is especially terrific as pauline .
translation: ポーリンとポーレットのすべての俳優は素晴らしいですが、ベルギーの国宝と称されるファン・デル・グルーンは、ポーリン役として特に素晴らしいです。
back_translation: All the actors in "Pauline" and "Poulette" are wonderful, but Jan De Groote, acclaimed as a national treasure of Belgium, is especially outstanding in the role of Pauline.

text: in the ensuing chaos , inez discovers the thorny side of true love and that finding one 's soul mate is never quite what you 'd expect .
translation: 混乱の中で、イネスは真実の愛の thorny（複雑で困難な）側面を発見し、運命の相手を見つけることは決して期待通りではないことを知ります。
back_translation: In the midst of chaos, Ines discovers the thorny (complex and difficult) aspects of true love and learns that finding her destined partner is never as expected.

text: a bad day becomes worse by the hour and to top it off , the toilet wo n't flush .
translation: 悪い日が時間が経つにつれて悪化し、最後にはトイレが流れない。
back_translation: A bad day worsens with time, and in the end, the toilet won't flush.

text: their race against the clock to find the precious stones ultimately unravels a plot to distribute a deadly new weapon of war .
translation: 彼らの貴重な宝石を見つけるための時間とのレースは、最終的に致命的な新兵器を配布する陰謀を暴露する。
back_translation: The race against time to find their precious jewels ultimately exposes a conspiracy to distribute a deadly new weapon.

text: chon then travels to new york for roy o'bannon ( owen wilson ) .
translation: チョンはロイ・オバノン（オーウェン・ウィルソン）のためにニューヨークに旅行します。
back_translation: Chon travels to New York for Roy O'Banion (Owen Wilson).

text: r xmas offers a poetic and profane ambiguity that 's vintage ferrara .
translation: r xmasは、ヴィンテージフェラーラの詩的で冒涜的な曖昧さを提供します。
back_translation: r xmas offers a poetic and blasphemous ambiguity of vintage Ferrari.

text: peter parker must now juggle three things in his life ; his new job at the local newspaper under a perpetually on-edge employer , his battle against the evil green goblin , and his fight to win the affections of beautiful classmate mary jane watson , against none other than his best friend harry osborn , son of norman osborn !
translation: ピーター・パーカーは今、人生の中で三つのことを両立させなければなりません。地元の新聞社での新しい仕事、常にピリピリした雇い主の下での働きに加えて、邪悪なグリーン・ゴブリンとの戦い、そして美しいクラスメート、メリー・ジェーン・ワトソンの好意を勝ち取るための戦いです。それは他でもない、ノーマン・オズボーンの息子であり親友のハリー・オズボーンとの競争です！
back_translation: Peter Parker now has to balance three things in his life. In addition to his new job at the local newspaper and working under a constantly tense employer, he is fighting against the evil Green Goblin and competing for the affection of his beautiful classmate, Mary Jane Watson. This is none other than the competition with his best friend, Harry Osborn, who is the son of Norman Osborn!

text: salma goes native and she 's never been better in this colorful bio-pic of a mexican icon .
translation: サルマはネイティブになり、このメキシコのアイコンのカラフルなバイオピックで今までにないほど素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Salma is a native and absolutely stunning in this colorful biopic of the Mexican icon like never before.

text: seldom has a movie so closely matched the spirit of a man and his work .
translation: 映画がある男とその作品の精神にこれほど密接に一致したことはめったにない。
back_translation: It is rare for a film to align so closely with the spirit of its creator.

text: lapd detective sergeant mitch preston cares only about doing his job and nailing crooks .
translation: LAPDの刑事巡査部長ミッチ・プレストンは、自分の仕事を果たし、犯罪者を捕まえることだけに関心を持っています。
back_translation: LAPD Detective Sergeant Mitch Preston is only concerned with doing his job and catching criminals.

text: a cautionary tale about the folly of superficiality that is itself endlessly superficial .
translation: 表面的な愚かさについての警告の物語であり、それ自体が果てしなく表面的である。
back_translation: It is a story about a warning regarding superficial foolishness, which in itself is endlessly superficial.

text: as a singular character study , it 's perfect . it 's also the year 's sweetest movie .
translation: 単独のキャラクター研究としては完璧です。また、今年の最も甘い映画でもあります。
back_translation: It is perfect as a standalone character study. It is also the sweetest movie of the year.

text: the trappings of i spy are so familiar you might as well be watching a rerun .
translation: 「アイ・スパイ」の特徴は非常に馴染み深いので、再放送を見ているかのようです。
back_translation: The characteristics of "I Spy" are very familiar, so it feels like watching a rerun.

text: . . . a good film that must have baffled the folks in the marketing department .
translation: . . . マーケティング部門の人々を困惑させたに違いない良い映画。
back_translation: It must have been a good movie that confused the people in the marketing department.

text: . . . a poignant and powerful narrative that reveals that reading writing and arithmetic are not the only subjects to learn in life .
translation: . . . 感動的で力強い物語は、読書、書き込み、算数だけが人生で学ぶべき科目ではないことを明らかにしています。
back_translation: ... The moving and powerful story makes it clear that reading, writing, and arithmetic are not the only subjects one should learn in life.

text: this will cause tremendous natural disasters , wiping out life as we know it .
translation: これは、私たちが知っている生命を一掃する巨大な自然災害を引き起こすでしょう。
back_translation: This will trigger a massive natural disaster that will wipe out life as we know it.

text: told from the point of view from archie ( qualls ) , a comic book collector , this is the story of a rivalry between two comic book shop owners .
translation: アーチー（クオールズ）の視点から語られるこの物語は、2人のコミックショップオーナーの間のライバル関係を描いています。
back_translation: Told from Archie's ( quals) perspective, this story depicts the rivalry between two comic shop owners.

text: she meets a mysterious man ( mark wahlberg ) , who tells her that the money was really his , and he wants it back , seemingly convinced that she 's hiding the cash .
translation: 彼女は謎の男（マーク・ウォールバーグ）と出会い、彼はそのお金が実は彼のものであり、取り戻したいと言い、彼女が現金を隠していると確信しているようです。
back_translation: She meets a mysterious man (Mark Wahlberg), who claims that the money actually belongs to him and that he wants it back, indicating that he is convinced she is hiding cash.

text: when the predatory couple manipulates a `` legal `` real estate transaction that turns into a hostile possession of the manor house , he temporarily loses his mind , leaving his family but not the farm .
translation: 捕食者のカップルが「合法的な」不動産取引を操り、それが館の敵対的な占有に変わると、彼は一時的に正気を失い、家族を残してしまうが、農場は残す。
back_translation: A couple of predators manipulates a "legal" real estate deal, which turns into a hostile takeover of the mansion, causing him to temporarily lose his sanity and leave his family behind, but he decides to leave the farm.

text: the comet hale-bopp is shooting across the sky for the last time in 4000 years .
translation: ハレー・ボップ彗星は、4000年ぶりに最後のチャンスで空を横切っています。
back_translation: Halley’s Comet is crossing the sky for the last chance in 4,000 years.

text: the film `` mnemosyne `` is based on the ancient poem `` thunder , perfect mind `` , a visual journey of the human race , exploring where we have been and what we can become .
translation: 映画「ムネモシュネ」は、古代の詩「雷、完璧なる心」に基づいており、人類の旅を視覚的に探求し、私たちがどこにいたのか、そして何になれるのかを考察しています。
back_translation: The film "Munemoshune" is based on the ancient poem "Thunder, Perfect Mind," and visually explores the journey of humanity, reflecting on where we have been and what we can become.

text: impresses as a skillfully assembled , highly polished and professional adaptation . . . just about as chilling and unsettling as 'manhunter ' was .
translation: 巧みに組み立てられた、非常に洗練されたプロフェッショナルな適応で印象的です。。。『マンハンター』と同じくらいぞっとするような、不安を抱かせる作品です。
back_translation: It is impressively constructed with a highly sophisticated and professional adaptation... A work that is as chilling and unsettling as "Manhunter."

text: suk , a korean martial artist , brought up by the organization since early childhood , is the man they trust to fight these 'special ' matches .
translation: 韓国の武道家であるスックは、幼少期からその組織に育てられ、彼らがこれらの「特別な」試合を戦うことを信頼する男です。
back_translation: Suk, a martial artist from Korea, was raised by the organization since childhood and is a man they trust to fight in these "special" matches.

text: sidney is a writer who 's just left her l . a . times music review gig to edit new york hip-hop magazine xxl .
translation: シドニーは、ロサンゼルス・タイムズの音楽レビューの仕事を辞めて、ニューヨークのヒップホップ雑誌「XXL」の編集を担当している作家です。
back_translation: Sidney is a writer who resigned from his job at the music review section of the Los Angeles Times and is now in charge of editing the hip-hop magazine "XXL" in New York.

text: there is a knock on the door and harry forces mitchell to 'wait ' in the closet , and not to make a sound .
translation: ドアをノックする音が聞こえ、ハリーはミッチェルに「待ってろ」とクローゼットに押し込んで、音を立てないように指示する。
back_translation: Hearing a knock on the door, Harry shoved Mitchell into the closet, telling him to "wait" and instructing him to be quiet.

text: when they try to collect a debt from the boss of a rival gang , a fight erupts and jie shoots the gang-boss .
translation: rival gangのボスから借金を取り立てようとしたとき、戦いが勃発し、ジエがギャングのボスを撃ちます。
back_translation: When trying to collect a debt from the boss of a rival gang, a fight breaks out, and Jie shoots the gang boss.

text: lucky break is perfectly inoffensive and harmless , but it 's also drab and inert .
translation: ラッキーブレイクは全く無害で攻撃的ではありませんが、同時に地味で無気力です。
back_translation: Lucky Break is completely harmless and non-aggressive, but at the same time, it is dull and lethargic.

text: a malediction passed from generation to generation has it that any woman in her family who sings will die .
translation: 代々受け継がれてきた呪いによれば、その家系の女性が歌うと必ず死んでしまう。
back_translation: According to a curse that has been passed down through generations, whenever a woman from that family sings, she will surely die.

text: it includes practical advice for success in the world of freelance office support from dana clark , peoplemovin . com 's
translation: フリーランスのオフィスサポートの世界で成功するための実践的なアドバイスが、ダナ・クラークのpeoplemovin.comから提供されています。
back_translation: Practical advice for succeeding in the world of freelance office support is provided by Dana Clark from peoplemovin.com.

text: the plot convolutions ultimately add up to nothing more than jerking the audience 's chain .
translation: プロットの複雑さは結局、観客を振り回すことにしかなりません。
back_translation: The complexity of the plot ultimately only serves to confuse the audience.

text: the colorful masseur wastes its time on mood rather than riding with the inherent absurdity of ganesh 's rise up the social ladder .
translation: カラフルなマッサージ師は、ガネーシャの社会的地位の上昇に内在する不条理と共に楽しむのではなく、ムードに時間を無駄にしている。
back_translation: The colorful massage therapist is wasting time on mood instead of enjoying the absurdity inherent in the rise of Ganesha's social status.

text: maybe it is formula filmmaking , but there 's nothing wrong with that if the film is well-crafted and this one is .
translation: おそらくこれは定型的な映画制作かもしれませんが、もし映画が上手く作られているのなら、それには何の問題もありません。これもその一つです。
back_translation: This might be a typical film production, but if the movie is well-made, there is no problem at all. This is one of those.

text: martin van zandt ( victor garber ) is assigned the unenviable task of investigating the crime and finding someone to hold responsible .
translation: マーティン・ヴァン・ザント（ビクター・ガーバー）は、犯罪を調査し、責任を負わせるべき人物を見つけるという厄介な任務に任命されます。
back_translation: Martin Van Zandt (Victor Garber) is assigned a troublesome task of investigating a crime and finding those responsible.

text: weaves a spell over you , with its disturbingly close-up look at damaged psyches and its subtle undercurrents of danger . but its awkward structure keeps breaking the spell .
translation: あなたに魔法をかける、それは損なわれた精神に対する不気味なクローズアップの視点と微妙な危険の流れを持っています。しかし、その不器用な構造が魔法を何度も壊してしまいます。
back_translation: "I will cast a spell on you; it has an eerie close-up perspective on the damaged spirit and a subtle flow of danger. However, its clumsy structure breaks the magic time and again."

text: dense and enigmatic . . . elusive . . . stagy and stilted
translation: 密で謎めいている . . . つかみどころがない . . . 演技じみていて不自然な
back_translation: Dense and mysterious... elusive... theatrical and unnatural.

text: unless you come in to the film with a skateboard under your arm , you 're going to feel like you were n't invited to the party .
translation: スケートボードを腕に抱えて映画に入らない限り、パーティーに招待されていないように感じるでしょう。
back_translation: You might feel like you're not invited to the party unless you bring your skateboard under your arm into the movie.

text: the action-packed caper revolves around a 12-year old girl who , with the help of two friends , robs the state-of-the-art bank where her mother works to acquire the cash needed for a costly operation to save her dying father .
translation: アクション満載のストーリーは、12歳の少女が二人の友達と共に、母親が働く最先端の銀行を襲って、病に倒れた父親を救うための高額な手術に必要な現金を手に入れるという内容です。
back_translation: The action-packed story revolves around a 12-year-old girl who, along with her two friends, robs a cutting-edge bank where her mother works to get the cash needed for an expensive surgery to save her ailing father.

text: it 's a rosy coming-of-age romp that refuses to see the horror even in the severed heads from the guillotine .
translation: それは、ギロチンからの切断された頭の中にさえ恐怖を見ようとしない、明るい成長物語の冒険です。
back_translation: It is an adventure of a bright coming-of-age story that even tries not to see the fear in a severed head from a guillotine.

text: offers a pleasant , challenging and quirky puzzle well worth working out .
translation: 心地よく、挑戦的で風変わりなパズルを提供しており、取り組む価値があります。
back_translation: They offer comfortable, challenging, and quirky puzzles that are worth engaging with.

text: the fetid underbelly of fame has never looked uglier .
translation: 有名の腐臭を放つ裏側は、これまでになく醜く見える。
back_translation: The back side, giving off a famous stench of decay, appears more ugly than ever.

text: remember when bond had more glamour than clamor ? no more .
translation: ボンドが騒がしさよりも魅力を持っていた頃を覚えていますか？もうそんな時代ではありません。
back_translation: Do you remember when Bond had more charm than noise? Those times are no longer here.

text: a historical epic with the courage of its convictions about both scope and detail .
translation: その範囲と詳細の両方において自らの信念の勇気を持った歴史的な叙事詩。
back_translation: A historical epic that embodies the courage of one's beliefs in both scope and detail.

text: three friends get together and bury a box making a pact to open it at midnight at their high school graduation .
translation: 三人の友達が集まり、箱を埋めて、高校の卒業式の真夜中に開けるという約束を交わします。
back_translation: Three friends gather and make a promise to bury a box and open it at midnight on their high school graduation day.

text: after spending the night in the wilderness , sarah runs into peter , a survivalist type dressed in full combat gear , who promises to lead her out of the woods .
translation: 野生の中で一晩過ごした後、サラは完全な戦闘装備を身にまとったサバイバリストタイプのピーターに出会い、彼はサラを森の外に導くことを約束します。
back_translation: After spending a night in the wild, Sara meets Peter, a survivalist type clad in full combat gear, who promises to lead her out of the forest.

text: a year after her long time boyfriend showed up at his surprise birthday party with an uninvited date , laura hits rock bottom and decides to try her luck at a dating agency .
translation: 長年の彼氏がサプライズ誕生日パーティーに招待されていないデート相手を連れて現れた1年後、ローラはどん底に落ち込み、デートエージェンシーで運試しをすることに決める。
back_translation: A year later, after her long-term boyfriend showed up with a date who wasn’t invited to the surprise birthday party, Laura hit rock bottom and decided to try her luck at a dating agency.

text: given the circumstances , kyle might have been acquitted on the grounds of temporary insanity or perhaps even convicted of the lesser charge of manslaughter , but the fact that a federal policeman was also killed in the shooting , albeit accidentally , sent kyle to marquezas .
translation: 状況を考慮すると、カイルは一時的な精神障害を理由に無罪とされるか、あるいは過失致死の軽い罪で有罪判決を受ける可能性がありましたが、事件で連邦警官も亡くなったこと（偶発的にとはいえ）がカイルをマルケザスに送る結果となりました。
back_translation: Considering the circumstances, Kyle could have been found not guilty due to temporary mental incapacity, or received a light conviction for negligent manslaughter. However, the fact that a federal officer also died in the incident (albeit accidentally) led to Kyle being sent to Marquess.

text: a beautiful story of love , loss and unexpected reunions , unravels in one weekend .
translation: 愛、喪失、そして予期しない再会の美しい物語が、週末の間に展開します。
back_translation: A beautiful story of love, loss, and an unexpected reunion unfolds over the weekend.

text: you do n't know whether to admire the film 's stately nature and call it classicism or be exasperated by a noticeable lack of pace . or both .
translation: 映画の荘厳な性質を称賛して古典主義と呼ぶべきか、それとも明らかなテンポの欠如にイライラすべきか、あるいは両方か、あなたには分からない。
back_translation: You can't decide whether to praise the majestic nature of the film and call it classicism, or to be frustrated by its obvious lack of tempo, or perhaps both.

text: after two years seperated , they are mysteriously joined together to solve a case on spooky island .
translation: 二年間離れていた彼らは、スプーキーアイランドで事件を解決するために神秘的に再会します。
back_translation: After two years apart, they mysteriously reunite to solve a case on Spooky Island.

text: a romantic comedy , yes , but one with characters who think and talk about their goals , and are working on hard decisions .
translation: ロマンティックコメディ、はい、しかし目的について考え、話し合い、難しい決断に取り組んでいるキャラクターたちの物語です。
back_translation: It's a romantic comedy, yes, but it's a story about characters who think about, discuss, and grapple with difficult decisions regarding their goals.

text: and yet , as we discover , these kids are smarter than their actions would let on . . .
translation: しかし、私たちが発見するように、これらの子供たちは彼らの行動が示すよりも賢いのです。。。
back_translation: However, as we discover, these children are smarter than their behavior suggests...

text: ripped of her humanity , testud 's christine becomes a working stiff of greek proportions .
translation: 人間性を奪われたテスタウドのクリスティーヌは、ギリシャの規模の働き者になる。
back_translation: Christine, the Testaudo who lost her humanity, becomes a hardworking individual on a Greek scale.

text: it 's the kind of pigeonhole-resisting romp that hollywood too rarely provides .
translation: これは、ハリウッドがあまりにも稀に提供する、型にはまらない楽しい作品です。
back_translation: This is an unconventional and fun piece that Hollywood rarely offers.

text: despite juliet stevenon 's attempt to bring cohesion to pamela 's emotional roller coaster life , it is not enough to give the film the substance it so desperately needs .
translation: ジュリエット・スティーヴンソンのパメラの感情のジェットコースターのような人生に一貫性をもたらそうとする試みにもかかわらず、それは映画に切実に必要な本質を与えるには不十分である。
back_translation: Despite Juliet Stevenson’s attempts to bring consistency to Pamela's emotionally tumultuous life, it is insufficient to provide the essence that the film desperately needs.

text: more of the same from taiwanese auteur tsai ming-liang , which is good news to anyone who 's fallen under the sweet , melancholy spell of this unique director 's previous films .
translation: 台湾の著者ツァイ・ミンリャンからの同様の作品が続いており、これはこの独特な監督の以前の映画の甘美でメランコリックな魅力に惹かれた誰にとっても良いニュースです。
back_translation: Similar works from Taiwanese author Tsai Ming-liang continue, which is good news for anyone drawn to the sweet and melancholic charm of this unique director's previous films.

text: after an assassination attempt on the life of senator padme amidala ( natalie portman ) , jedi obi-wan kenobi ( ewan mcgregor ) and his padawan learner anakin skywalker ( hayden christensen ) are sent to investigate .
translation: 上院議員パドメ・アミダラ（ナタリー・ポートマン）に対する暗殺未遂事件の後、ジェダイのオビ＝ワン・ケノービ（ユアン・マクレガー）と彼のパダワンであるアナキン・スカイウォーカー（ヘイデン・クリステンセン）が調査のために派遣される。
back_translation: After the assassination attempt on Senator Padmé Amidala (Natalie Portman), Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi (Ewan McGregor) and his Padawan Anakin Skywalker (Hayden Christensen) are dispatched to investigate.

text: when a depressed marketing executive goes to a psychiatrist for help , he discovers the doctor is crazier than he is .
translation: うつ病のマーケティングエグゼクティブが助けを求めて精神科医のところに行くと、医者は彼よりももっとクレイジーであることに気づく。
back_translation: When a marketing executive with depression goes to see a psychiatrist seeking help, he realizes that the doctor is even crazier than he is.

text: although melodramatic and predictable , this romantic comedy explores the friendship between five filipino-americans and their frantic efforts to find love .
translation: メロドラマ的で予測可能ではありますが、このロマンティックコメディは5人のフィリピン系アメリカ人の友情と、愛を見つけるための彼らの必死の努力を探求しています。
back_translation: While it is melodramatic and predictable, this romantic comedy explores the friendship of five Filipino Americans and their desperate efforts to find love.

text: throughout this time , their lives have been entwined with the fate of aboriginal people during times of war , disease and controversial government removalist policies .
translation: この間、彼らの生活は戦争、疾病、そして物議を醸す政府の移住政策の時期における先住民の運命と絡み合ってきました。
back_translation: Recently, their lives have been intertwined with the fate of indigenous peoples during times of war, disease, and controversial government relocation policies.

text: it 's all gratuitous before long , as if schwentke were fulfilling a gross-out quota for an anticipated audience demographic instead of shaping the material to fit the story .
translation: しばらくすると、それはすべて無駄に感じられ、シュヴェントケが物語に合わせて素材を形作るのではなく、予想される観客層のためにグロテスクなクオータを満たしているかのようです。
back_translation: After a while, it all feels pointless, as if Schventke is not shaping the material to fit the story, but rather is fulfilling a grotesque quota for the expected audience.

text: sillier , cuter , and shorter than the first ( as best i remember ) , but still a very good time at the cinema .
translation: 最初のものよりも愚かで、かわいく、短いですが（私の記憶が正しければ）、それでも映画館ではとても良い時間を過ごせました。
back_translation: It's foolish, cute, and shorter than the first one, but (if my memory serves me right), I still had a very good time at the theater.

text: but a fictitious geoffrey buonardi , with the same paintings and an inventive back story , can become the darling of the art world .
translation: しかし、架空のジェフリー・ブオナールディが同じ絵画と独自のバックストーリーを持つことで、アート界の人気者になることができる。
back_translation: However, the fictional Jeffrey Buonardi can become a popular figure in the art world by having the same painting and a unique backstory.

text: although the level of the comedy declines as the movie proceeds , there 's no denying the fun of watching de niro and crystal having fun .
translation: 映画が進むにつれてコメディのレベルは低下するが、デ・ニーロとクリスタルが楽しんでいる様子を見ることの楽しさは否定できない。
back_translation: As the movie progresses, the level of comedy decreases, but it is undeniable that there is joy in seeing De Niro and Crystal having fun.

text: resident evil is n't a product of its cinematic predecessors so much as an mtv , sugar hysteria , and playstation cocktail .
translation: バイオハザードは、その映画の先駆者たちの産物というよりも、MTV、砂糖のヒステリー、そしてプレイステーションのカクテルと言える。
back_translation: Resident Evil can be said to be a cocktail of MTV, sugar hysteria, and PlayStation rather than a product of the pioneers of the movie.

text: an undistinguished attempt to make a classic theater piece cinematic .
translation: 平凡な試みでクラシックな劇作品を映画化しようとしたもの。
back_translation: It was an ordinary attempt to adapt a classic theatrical work into a film.

text: clearly in over his head with both assignments , landon is forced to ask jamie for help .
translation: 両方の課題で明らかに手に負えなくなったランドンは、ジェイミーに助けを求めることを余儀なくされる。
back_translation: Landon, clearly overwhelmed by both challenges, is forced to seek help from Jamie.

text: a quirky noir film crammed full of wonderful characters made memorable by excellent acting .
translation: 素晴らしい演技によって印象的なキャラクターでいっぱいの、奇妙なノワール映画。
back_translation: A strange noir film full of impressive characters created by outstanding performances.

text: `` lovely and amazing is a story about real people . these people are insecure about their lives . they are n't convinced that there 's some inner beauty about them . they see themselves as i suspect most people do , mostly for the flaws . however , these are still
translation: 素敵で驚くべき物語は、実際の人々についてです。彼らは自分の人生に自信がありません。彼らは自分の内面的な美しさについて確信が持てないのです。彼らは、自分自身をほとんど欠点のために見ると私は疑っています。しかし、それでも彼らはまだ
back_translation: The wonderful and remarkable stories are about real people. They lack confidence in their own lives. They are unsure about their inner beauty. I doubt that they see themselves mostly for their flaws. Yet, even so, they still...

text: adolescents will be adequately served by the movie 's sophomoric blend of shenanigans and slapstick , although the more lascivious-minded might be disappointed in the relative modesty of a movie that sports a 'topless tutorial service . '
translation: 思春期の若者たちは、映画の幼稚なドタバタとスラップスティックの融合によって十分楽しめるだろうが、より淫らな心を持つ人々は「トップレスチュートリアルサービス」を掲げる映画の相対的な慎ましさに失望するかもしれない。
back_translation: While adolescents may thoroughly enjoy the movie's childish chaos and slapstick, those with a more lascivious mindset might feel disappointed by the film's relative modesty, which promotes "Topless Tutorial Service."

text: their only solid lead seems to be joanne , a young prostitute , whose own baby provides a link .
translation: 彼らの唯一の確かな手がかりは、若い売春婦であるジョアンにあるようで、彼女の赤ちゃんがつながりを提供しています。
back_translation: Their only certain lead seems to lie with a young prostitute named Joan, whose baby provides the connection.

text: even as i valiantly struggled to remain interested , or at least conscious , i could feel my eyelids . . . getting . . . very . . . heavy . . .
translation: 興味を持ち続けようと必死に奮闘し、少なくとも意識を保とうとしていたが、まぶたが……非常に……重く……なっていくのを感じた……
back_translation: I was desperately struggling to maintain my interest and at least trying to stay conscious, but I could feel my eyelids... becoming... very... heavy...

text: stefan balsiger is a congenial , average councillor to the swiss embassy in havanna .
translation: ステファン・バルシガーはハバナのスイス大使館の気さくで平均的なカウンセラーです。
back_translation: Stefan Balsiger is a friendly and average counselor at the Swiss Embassy in Havana.

text: once you have walked into april 's shower you can never leave .
translation: 一度4月のシャワーに入ったら、決して出られない。
back_translation: Once you step into the April shower, you can never leave.

text: a cruelly funny twist on teen comedy packed with inventive cinematic tricks and an ironically killer soundtrack
translation: 若者のコメディに対する残酷で面白いひねりが施され、独創的な映画技法と皮肉なまでに魅力的なサウンドトラックが満載です。
back_translation: It features a cruel yet humorous twist on youth comedy, packed with innovative filmmaking techniques and an ironically captivating soundtrack.

text: the experience of watching blobby old-school cgi animation in this superlarge format is just surreal enough to be diverting .
translation: この超大型フォーマットで昔のCGIアニメーションを観る体験は、十分に非現実的で楽しいものです。
back_translation: The experience of watching old CGI animations in this ultra-large format is sufficiently unrealistic and enjoyable.

text: critics need a good laugh , too , and this too-extreme-for-tv rendition of the notorious mtv show delivers the outrageous , sickening , sidesplitting goods in steaming , visceral heaps .
translation: 批評家も笑いが必要であり、このテレビにはあまりにも過激な有名なMTVショーの解釈は、 outrageous（信じられないほどの）、 sickening（吐き気を催す）、 sidesplitting（腹を抱えて笑う）な要素を、蒸し上がり、肉体的な塊のように提供しています。
back_translation: Critics also need laughter, and this television interpretation of the extremely outrageous famous MTV show offers elements that are outrageous, sickening, and sidesplitting, serving them up like a steaming, physical lump.

text: still , as the camp 's highest-ranking american officer , he commands his fellow inmates , keeping a sense of honor alive in a place where honor is easy to destroy , all under the dangerous , ever-watchful eye of ss major wilhelm visser .
translation: それでも、キャンプで最も高い階級のアメリカの将校として、彼は仲間の囚人たちを指揮し、名誉が簡単に破壊される場所で名誉の感覚を生かし続けている。すべては危険で常に見守るSSのヴィルヘルム・ビッサー大尉の目の下で行われている。
back_translation: Even so, as the highest-ranking American officer in the camp, he commands his fellow prisoners and continues to uphold a sense of honor in a place where honor can be easily destroyed. Everything is taking place under the watchful eye of Captain Wilhelm Bisser of the SS, who is always vigilant and in danger.

text: an amalgam of several edgar allan poe stories , and a mixture of comedy , horror and musical genres .
translation: エドガー・アラン・ポーのいくつかの物語の混合と、コメディ、ホラー、ミュージカルのジャンルの組み合わせ。
back_translation: A mixture of several stories by Edgar Allan Poe, combined with the genres of comedy, horror, and musical.

text: eddie is investigated and forced to exile himself from his family until the matter is dealt with .
translation: エディは調査され、この問題が解決されるまで家族から追放されることを強いられています。
back_translation: Eddie is being investigated and is forced to be expelled from his family until this issue is resolved.

text: re-formed by a coded message to their web site , a group of animal rights activists set off to free an imprisoned colleague from a terrifying ordeal .
translation: 暗号化されたメッセージによって再結成された動物権利活動家のグループは、恐ろしい苦境から囚われた同僚を解放するために出発しました。
back_translation: A group of animal rights activists, reformed by an encrypted message, set out to free their colleagues trapped in a terrible predicament.

text: the situation brews to a head when a sneak collector , conan ( masterson ) discovers a large collection of perfectly-preserved classic comics , leading the two shops to vie to acquire them , along with a `` villain `` ( elwes ) who hopes to steal them first .
translation: 状況は、スニークコレクターのコナン（マスタースン）が完全に保存されたクラシックコミックの大コレクションを発見することで頂点に達し、2つのショップがそれを手に入れようと競い合う中、最初にそれを盗もうとする「悪役」（エルウェス）が現れる。
back_translation: The situation reaches its peak when the sneak collector Conan (Master Sun) discovers a perfectly preserved classic comic collection, and as two shops compete to acquire it, a "villain" (Elvis) emerges, trying to steal it first.

text: with terry in the corner office , you 'll never be late for the morning meeting again .
translation: テリーがコーナーオフィスにいるので、朝のミーティングに遅れることはもうありません。
back_translation: Since Terry is in the corner office, there won't be any delays for the morning meeting anymore.

text: then the trouble it & # 180 ; s only stars , with betrayals , bounty killers , hostile indians and the mystery ghost who guard the gold mine .
translation: その後のトラブルは、裏切り者、賞金稼ぎ、敵対的なインディアン、そして金鉱を守る神秘的な幽霊など、ただ星だけです。
back_translation: Subsequent troubles include traitors, bounty hunters, hostile Indians, and mysterious ghosts guarding the gold mine, all just stars.

text: a tour de force drama about the astonishingly pivotal role of imagination in the soulful development of two rowdy teenagers .
translation: 二人のやんちゃなティーンエイジャーの心の成長における想像力の驚くべき重要な役割についての力強いドラマ。
back_translation: A powerful drama about the astonishingly important role of imagination in the emotional growth of two mischievous teenagers.

text: the movie weighs no more than a glass of flat champagne .
translation: その映画は、平らなシャンパンのグラスよりも重くない。
back_translation: The movie is not heavier than a flat champagne glass.

text: suffers from over-familiarity since hit-hungry british filmmakers have strip-mined the monty formula mercilessly since 1997 .
translation: 1997年以降、ヒットを求めるイギリスの映画製作者たちがモンティのフォーミュラを容赦なく掘り尽くして以来、過度な親しみが生じている。
back_translation: Since 1997, there has been excessive familiarity as British filmmakers in search of hits have relentlessly mined Monty’s formula.

text: the tabloids go crazy for the new girl on the cell block , and roxie finally becomes a star .
translation: タブロイドは房の新しい女の子に夢中になり、ロクシーはついにスターになります。
back_translation: The tabloids are obsessed with the new girl in the room, and Roxy finally becomes a star.

text: the end of the journey leaves no-one capable of going back to where they started from .
translation: 旅の終わりは、誰もが出発点に戻ることができなくなる。
back_translation: At the end of the journey, no one can return to the starting point.

text: but if these are just tricks of the mind , how do these encounters leave georgia with physical manifestations ?
translation: しかし、これらが単なる心のトリックだとしたら、なぜこれらの遭遇がジョージアに身体的な兆候を残すのでしょうか？
back_translation: However, if these are just tricks of the mind, why do these encounters leave physical signs on Georgia?

text: [ moore 's ] better at fingering problems than finding solutions . but though he only scratches the surface , at least he provides a strong itch to explore more .
translation: ムーアは問題の指摘には優れているが、解決策を見つけるのは苦手だ。しかし、彼は表面的な理解にとどまるものの、深く探求したくなる強い欲求を提供している。
back_translation: Moore excels at pointing out problems, but he struggles to find solutions. However, while he remains at a superficial understanding, he provides a strong desire to delve deeper.

text: and a good portion of them were caught on film .
translation: そして、その多くは映像に収められました。
back_translation: And many of them were captured on film.

text: this is the first full scale wwii flick from hong kong 's john woo . he 's not good with people .
translation: これは香港のジョン・ウーによる初のフルスケールの第二次世界大戦映画です。彼は人付き合いが得意ではありません。
back_translation: This is John Woo's first full-scale World War II film set in Hong Kong. He is not good at socializing.

text: it 's hard to believe that something so short could be so flabby .
translation: こんなに短いものがそんなにダラっとしているとは信じがたい。
back_translation: It's hard to believe that something so short could be so lazy.

text: loss is a film eulogy for six firefighters who died in the collapse of the world trade center , sept 11 2001 .
translation: 「ロス」は、2001年9月11日にワールドトレードセンターの崩壊で亡くなった6人の消防士への映画的追悼です。
back_translation: "Loss" is a cinematic tribute to the six firefighters who died in the collapse of the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.

text: i am more offended by his lack of faith in his audience than by anything on display here .
translation: 彼の観客に対する信頼の欠如に、ここにある何よりもむしろ腹を立てています。
back_translation: I am more upset about his lack of trust in the audience than anything else here.

text: will grab your children by the imagination and amaze them and amuse them .
translation: あなたの子供たちの想像力を掴み、彼らを驚かせ、楽しませるでしょう。
back_translation: It will capture your children's imagination and surprise and entertain them.

text: a group of kids are driving to new mexico to get drugs when their car breaks down in front of a slaughterhouse where a family of cannibals live .
translation: 子供たちのグループがドラッグを手に入れるためにニューメキシコに向かって運転していると、スローターショップの前で車が故障します。そこにはカニバル一家が住んでいます。
back_translation: A group of children driving toward New Mexico to get drugs breaks down in front of a slaughter shop, where a cannibal family lives.

text: no dogs is a cool metaphor with a twist .
translation: 犬がいないというのはひねりのあるクールなメタファーです。
back_translation: The absence of a dog is a clever and cool metaphor.

text: babe , a television tabloid reporter , poses as an innocent small-town girl to do an expos & # 233 ; on deeds .
translation: ベイブは、テレビのタブロイドリポーターであり、無邪気な小さな町の女の子として装い、悪行を暴露するための取材を行う。
back_translation: Babe is a tabloid reporter on TV, disguising herself as an innocent little girl from a small town to conduct investigations that expose wrongdoing.

text: the story may not be new , but australian director john polson , making his american feature debut , jazzes it up adroitly .
translation: その物語は新しいものではないかもしれませんが、オーストラリアの監督ジョン・ポルソンは、アメリカでの長編デビュー作として巧みにそれを盛り上げています。
back_translation: The story may not be new, but Australian director John Polson skillfully elevates it as his feature film debut in America.

text: using this violence as a springboard , bret begins a new game , a game where only he knows the rules .
translation: この暴力を踏み台にして、ブレットは新しいゲームを始める。彼だけがルールを知っているゲームだ。
back_translation: Using this violence as a stepping stone, Brett starts a new game. It’s a game only he knows the rules to.

text: in a post communist eastern european country in 1996 the food prices are outrageous and times are tough .
translation: 1996年の共産主義後の東欧の国では、食料価格が非常に高く、時代は厳しい。
back_translation: In the post-communist Eastern European countries of 1996, food prices were very high, and times were tough.

text: in a letter to winston churchill , king explains their intention to invade france and fight the germans .
translation: ウィンストン・チャーチルへの手紙で、国王はフランスに侵攻しドイツと戦う意向を説明しています。
back_translation: In a letter to Winston Churchill, the king explains the intention to invade France and fight against Germany.

text: john holmes was considered the link between eddie nash and the home in which the massacre took place .
translation: ジョン・ホームズは、エディ・ナッシュと虐殺が起きた家との繋がりと見なされていました。
back_translation: John Holmes was seen as connected to Eddie Nash and the house where the massacre took place.

text: bogs down badly as we absorb jia 's moody , bad-boy behavior which he portrays himself in a one-note performance .
translation: ジアの気まぐれで悪党の行動を吸収する中で、彼は単調な演技を見せており、物語はひどく停滞してしまいます。
back_translation: As he absorbs the actions of the villain at Gia's whim, he displays a monotonous performance, causing the story to come to a terrible standstill.

text: the movie is a meditation on the love and envy that russia has always felt toward europe , and i wo n't pretend i got more than 30 percent of what was going on .
translation: その映画は、ロシアが常にヨーロッパに抱いていた愛と嫉妬についての瞑想であり、私は何が起こっているのか30パーセント以上理解できたとは思わない。
back_translation: The movie is a meditation on the love and jealousy that Russia has always felt towards Europe, and I don't think I understood more than 30 percent of what was happening.

text: the story begins with the discovery that otte 's visa is being withheld by the ghana embassy in holland due to a controversy in the press .
translation: 物語は、オッテのビザがオランダのガーナ大使館によって、メディアの論争のために保留されていることが発覚するところから始まります。
back_translation: The story begins when it is revealed that Otte's visa is being held by the Ghanaian embassy in the Netherlands due to a media controversy.

text: as the story unfolds , blake realizes that the master seduces young devotees including melinda and ariel into ritualistic acts of sex .
translation: 物語が進むにつれて、ブレイクはマスターが若い信者たちをメリンダやアリエルを含む儀式的なセックス行為に誘惑していることに気づく。
back_translation: As the story progresses, Blake realizes that the master is tempting young followers, including Melinda and Ariel, into ritualistic sexual acts.

text: it 's got the brawn , but not the brains .
translation: 力はあるが、頭はない。
back_translation: Strong but lacks intelligence.

text: now ten years later , his hope in life now is to find line , an ideal woman lost in his imagination .
translation: 今から10年後、彼の人生の希望は、彼の想像の中に失われた理想の女性、ラインを見つけることです。
back_translation: Ten years from now, his hope in life is to find a woman, the ideal one lost in his imagination, named Line.

text: alex bernier ( ledger ) is a member of an arcane order of priests known as carolingians .
translation: アレックス・バーニエ（レジャー）は、カロリング派として知られる神秘的な修道士の一団のメンバーです。
back_translation: Alex Burnier (Leisure) is a member of a mysterious group of monks known as the Carolingians.

text: an absurd comedy about a parking enforcement officer , who - despite constant abuse from the public - finds truth , honour and serenity in the act of ticketing .
translation: 公共からの絶え間ない虐待にもかかわらず、駐車監視員がチケットを切る行為の中に真実、名誉、そして静けさを見出すという滑稽なコメディ。
back_translation: A ridiculous comedy in which parking attendants find truth, honor, and peace amidst the constant abuse from the public while issuing tickets.

text: a sad , superior human comedy played out on the back roads of life .
translation: 人生の裏道で繰り広げられる悲しい、優越感に満ちた人間のコメディ。
back_translation: A sad, superior-filled human comedy unfolds on the backroads of life.

text: director kapur is a filmmaker with a real flair for epic landscapes and adventure , and this is a better film than his earlier english-language movie , the overpraised elizabeth .
translation: カプール監督は壮大な風景と冒険に対する真の才能を持つ映画制作者であり、これは彼の以前の英語作品「過大評価されたエリザベス」よりも優れた映画です。
back_translation: Director Kapoor is a filmmaker with a genuine talent for grand landscapes and adventure, and this is a better film than his previous English work, "Overrated Elizabeth."

text: unfolds in a series of achronological vignettes whose cumulative effect is chilling .
translation: 冷 chills chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling craps cool cool cool calm calm calm crash crash crash crash crash crash crash crash crash .
back_translation: Cold chills chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling chilling craps cool cool cool calm calm calm crash crash crash crash crash crash crash crash crash.

text: he speaks villon 's poet `` i fell in love with your red hair `` .
translation: 彼はヴィヨンの詩「あなたの赤い髪に恋をしました」と言います。
back_translation: He says, "I fell in love with your red hair," in the poem by Villon.

text: it never quite makes it to the boiling point , but manages to sustain a good simmer for most of its running time .
translation: それは決して沸点には達しないが、ほとんどの上映時間の間、良い煮立ちを維持することに成功している。
back_translation: It never quite reaches the boiling point, but it manages to maintain a good simmer for most of the run time.

text: john may have been an unfortunate victim forced to watch the brutal murders .
translation: ジョンは残酷な殺人を見せられた不幸な犠牲者だったかもしれない。
back_translation: John may have been an unfortunate victim who witnessed a brutal murder.

text: it 's a terrific american sports movie and dennis quaid is its athletic heart .
translation: 素晴らしいアメリカのスポーツ映画で、デニス・クエイドがそのアスレチックな心です。
back_translation: A wonderful American sports film where Dennis Quaid showcases his athletic spirit.

text: a classy item by a legend who may have nothing left to prove but still has the chops and drive to show how its done .
translation: 証明するものは何も残っていないかもしれないレジェンドによる洗練されたアイテム。しかし、彼にはそれを見せるための腕前と意欲がまだあります。
back_translation: There may be no proof left of the refined items from the legends. However, he still has the skill and desire to show it.

text: contrived , maudlin and cliche-ridden . . . if this sappy script was the best the contest received , those rejected must have been astronomically bad .
translation: 作り物めいていて、涙を誘い、使い古された表現だ。。。もしこの感傷的な脚本がコンテストで受け取った最良のものであったなら、却下されたものは天文学的にひどかったに違いない。
back_translation: It feels artificial, evokes tears, and is a worn-out expression... If this sentimental script was the best one received in the contest, then the rejected ones must have been astronomically terrible.

text: set in malaya during the japanese occupation in the 1940s , this film tells the story of a girl , embun , who 's thrown into the forefront of the struggle against the japanese when her freedom-fighter brother , bayu , and father are detained by the japanese .
translation: 1940年代の日本占領下のマラヤを舞台にしたこの映画は、自由戦士の兄バユと父が日本軍に拘束されたとき、エンブンという少女が日本に対する闘争の最前線に投げ込まれる物語を描いています。
back_translation: Set in Malaya under Japanese occupation in the 1940s, this film tells the story of a girl named Embun, who is thrown into the front lines of the struggle against Japan when her freedom fighter brother Bayu and father are detained by the Japanese army.

text: a disfigured pop star confronts the phenomenal devotion of her biggest fan . . .
translation: 容姿に障害を持つポップスターが、彼女の最大のファンの並外れた献身に直面する…
back_translation: A pop star with a disability in her appearance faces the extraordinary devotion of her biggest fan...

text: a competent , unpretentious entertainment destined to fill the after-school slot at shopping mall theaters across the country .
translation: 競技的で控えめなエンターテイメントで、全国のショッピングモールの映画館の放課後の時間帯を埋める運命にある。
back_translation: It is competitive and modest entertainment, destined to fill the after-school time slots of movie theaters in shopping malls across the country.

text: . . . perhaps the heaviest , most joyless movie ever made about giant dragons taking over the world .
translation: . . . おそらく、巨大なドラゴンが世界を支配することについて作られた最も重苦しく、喜びのない映画。
back_translation: ... probably the most dark and joyless movie made about a giant dragon ruling the world.

text: fessenden has nurtured his metaphors at the expense of his narrative , but he does display an original talent .
translation: フェッセンデンは彼のメタファーを物語の犠牲に育んできたが、彼には独自の才能があることを示している。
back_translation: Fessenden has nurtured his metaphors at the expense of his stories, but this shows that he has a unique talent.

text: prancing his way through the tailor-made part of a male hooker approaching the end of his vitality , jagger obviously relishes every self-mocking moment .
translation: 活力の終わりに近づく男性の売春婦の仕立てられた部分を弾むように進みながら、ジャガーは明らかに自己嘲笑の瞬間を楽しんでいる。
back_translation: As the male prostitute, nearing the end of his vitality, hops forward, the jaguar clearly enjoys a moment of self-mockery.

text: two lost couples find themselves stranded for the night in an old dark house where they are set upon by the family in residence that dabbles in murder , witchcraft , and cannibalism which are just a few of the 1 , 000+ secrets buried in the field behind their house .
translation: 二組の失ったカップルが、古く暗い家に一夜中取り残され、そこに住む家族に襲われる。彼らは殺人、魔女術、カニバリズムに手を染めており、これらは家の裏の畑に埋まっている1,000以上の秘密のほんの一部に過ぎない。
back_translation: Two lost couples are trapped in an old, dark house all night, only to be attacked by the family that lives there. They are engaged in murder, witchcraft, and cannibalism, which are just a small part of the over 1,000 secrets buried in the field behind the house.

text: morrissette has performed a difficult task indeed - he 's taken one of the world 's most fascinating stories and made it dull , lifeless , and irritating .
translation: モリセットは実に難しい仕事を成し遂げました - 彼は世界で最も魅力的な物語の一つを退屈で無生気でイライラさせるものにしてしまったのです。
back_translation: Morisette accomplished a truly difficult task - he turned one of the most captivating stories in the world into something boring, lifeless, and frustrating.

text: after the murder of his beloved wife , danny parker ( val kilmer ) is set adrift in a world where nothing is as it seems .
translation: 妻を殺されたダニー・パーカー（バル・キルマー）は、すべてが見かけ通りでない世界で放浪している。
back_translation: Danny Parker (Val Kilmer), whose wife was murdered, is wandering in a world where nothing is as it seems.

text: bloody sunday has the grace to call for prevention rather than to place blame , making it one of the best war movies ever made . it 's a movie that accomplishes so much that one viewing ca n't possibly be enough .
translation: ブラッディ・サンデーは責任を追及するのではなく予防を呼びかける優雅さを持っており、これが史上最高の戦争映画の一つにしています。この映画は非常に多くのことを成し遂げており、一度見ただけでは絶対に足りません。
back_translation: Bloody Sunday has an elegance that calls for prevention rather than pursuing responsibility, which makes it one of the greatest war films of all time. This film accomplishes so much that one viewing is absolutely not enough.

text: [ denis ] might be off her nut , but she can sure make an interesting film , a la davids lynch and cronenberg .
translation: [デニス]はちょっと頭がおかしいかもしれないが、デヴィッド・リンチやクローネンバーグのように、興味深い映画を作ることができる。
back_translation: Dennis might be a little crazy, but he can make interesting movies like David Lynch and Cronenberg.

text: he can do anything but when he discovers others in buffalo who are praying , he learns that maybe this job of being god is n't really that easy .
translation: 彼は何でもできますが、バッファローで祈っている他の人々を発見したとき、神でいることが本当にそれほど簡単ではないことを学びます。
back_translation: He can do anything, but when he discovers other people praying in Buffalo, he learns that being God is not really that easy.
