back_translation: As a form of social exposure, Skins rightly identifies the state of mind, but that alone is not enough to sustain a soap opera.

text: oedekerk mugs mercilessly , and the genuinely funny jokes are few and far between .
translation: オーデケルクは容赦なく笑わせ、真に面白いジョークはほとんどない。
back_translation: Oudekerk ruthlessly makes you laugh, but there are hardly any truly funny jokes.

text: responsM-avel direto pelo fracasso 'artM-mstico ' de doce lar , o roteirista c . jay cox nM-co consegue sequer aproveitar os pouquM-mssimos momentos em que escapa da mediocridade .
translation: 責任を直接負うのは、「甘い家」の芸術的失敗によるもので、脚本家のC・ジェイ・コックスは、平凡さから逃れる数少ない瞬間すら活かすことさえできていません。
back_translation: The responsibility lies directly with the artistic failure of "Sweet Home," as screenwriter C. Jay Cox is unable to even make the most of the few moments that escape mediocrity.

text: it 's too self-important and plodding to be funny , and too clipped and abbreviated to be an epic .
translation: それは自己重要感が強すぎて遅すぎて面白くなく、切り詰められすぎて叙事詩にはなり得ない。
back_translation: It is too self-important, too late, not interesting, and cut down too much to be an epic.

text: but who is the one doing it , malfoy , gamekeeper hagrid ( robbie coltrane ) , or , even , harry ?
translation: しかし、それを行っているのは誰ですか、マルフォイ、キーパーのハグリッド（ロビー・コルトレーン）、それとも、ハリーさえも？
back_translation: But who is doing that, Malfoy, Keeper Hagrid (Robbie Coltrane), or even Harry?

text: this big screen caper has a good bark , far from being a bow-wow .
translation: この大きなスクリーンのキャペルは良い声を持っており、全くのボウワウではない。
back_translation: This large screen's capel has a good voice and is not at all a bowwow.

text: this is unusual , food-for-thought cinema that 's as entertaining as it is instructive .
translation: これは珍しく、考えさせられる映画で、娯楽としても教育的としても楽しめます。
back_translation: This is a rare film that makes you think, and you can enjoy it both as entertainment and educationally.

text: as an adult , bruce has repressed all memories of his parents do to some horrible event that occured when he was 4 . bruce krensler ( as he uses his adoptive parent 's name ) is working in the same field as his father when a freak lab accident triggers the dormant dna in his body .
translation: 大人になったブルースは、4歳の時に起こった恐ろしい出来事のために両親の記憶を抑圧している。ブルース・クレンスラー（養親の名前を使っている）は、父親と同じ分野で働いているが、突発的な研究室の事故が彼の体内に眠っていたDNAを引き起こす。
back_translation: As an adult, Bruce suppresses the memories of his parents due to a terrible event that happened when he was four years old. Bruce Krenzler (using his adoptive parents' name) works in the same field as his father, but a sudden laboratory accident triggers the DNA that was dormant within him.

text: they do n't see eye-to-eye on clothes , hair , music , and certainly not in each other 's taste in men .
translation: 彼らは服、髪型、音楽、そしてもちろんお互いの男性の好みに関しても意見が合わない。
back_translation: They don't agree on clothing, hairstyles, music, and of course each other's tastes in men.

text: parker can not sustain the buoyant energy level of the film 's city beginnings into its country conclusion
translation: パーカーは、映画の都市の始まりから田舎の結末へと至る浮遊エネルギーレベルを維持することができない。
back_translation: Parker is unable to maintain the floating energy level that moves from the beginning of the city's film to the conclusion in the countryside.

text: they continue with all the same characteristics trademarks of the shin-hyun serial killings .
translation: 彼らは新-ヒョン連続殺人事件のすべての特徴的な商標を持ち続けています。
back_translation: They continue to possess all the characteristic trademarks of the Shin-Hyun serial murder case.

text: diego , one of the tigers that attacked the humans , comes also claiming the baby .
translation: 人間を襲ったトラの一頭、ディエゴが赤ちゃんを奪おうとやって来る。
back_translation: One of the tigers that attacked a human, Diego, comes to try to take the baby.

text: it 's a drawling , slobbering , lovable run-on sentence of a film , a southern gothic with the emotional arc of its raw blues soundtrack .
translation: それは、引き延ばされた、よだれを垂らす、愛らしいリズムで続いていく映画であり、生のブルースサウンドトラックの感情的な弧を持つ南部ゴシックです。
back_translation: It is a film that continues with a drawn-out, drooling, adorable rhythm, embodying the emotional arc of a live blues soundtrack within a Southern Gothic setting.

text: while the two are falling for each other , the syndicate boss coincidentally sees sienna and hires her as his personal dancer .
translation: 二人が互いに惹かれ合っている間に、シンジケートのボスが偶然シエナを見かけ、彼女を自分の個人的なダンサーとして雇う。
back_translation: While the two are mutually attracted to each other, the boss of the syndicate happens to see Siena and hires her as his personal dancer.

text: when john klein , a washington post journalist , and his wife mary finally find the house of their dreams , they just ca n't believe their luck .
translation: ワシントン・ポストのジャーナリスト、ジョン・クラインと彼の妻メアリーがついに夢の家を見つけたとき、彼らは自分たちの運に信じられない思いを抱きます。
back_translation: When Washington Post journalist John Klein and his wife Mary finally found their dream home, they were filled with disbelief at their luck.

text: conflict enters their relationship when anthony expresses to victoria that their sex life is practically non-existent .
translation: アントニーがビクトリアに彼らの性生活がほとんど存在しないことを伝えると、彼らの関係に対立が生じる。
back_translation: When Anthony tells Victoria that their sex life is almost nonexistent, conflict arises in their relationship.

text: starting off small , dealing to the high school and college market , kilo discovers the drug business to be very profitable .
translation: 小規模に始めて、高校や大学市場に対応する中で、キロは薬物ビジネスが非常に利益を上げることを発見する。
back_translation: Starting on a small scale and addressing the high school and university market, Kilo discovers that the drug business is very profitable.

text: julie davis is the kathie lee gifford of film directors , sadly proving once again ego does n't always go hand in hand with talent .
translation: ジュリー・デイビスは映画監督のキャシー・リー・ギフォードであり、残念ながらエゴが常に才能と共存するわけではないことを再び証明しています。
back_translation: Julie Davis is directed by Kathy Lee Gifford, and unfortunately, she proves once again that ego does not always coexist with talent.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks ( at least during their '70s heyday ) comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .
translation: ウディ・アレンやメル・ブルックスの手によっては（少なくとも彼らの70年代の全盛期には）非常に面白い狂気として登場したかもしれないものが、このデビューインディー作品では陳腐で幼稚に映る。
back_translation: What might have appeared as very funny madness in the hands of Woody Allen or Mel Brooks (at least during their heyday in the 1970s) comes across as clichéd and juvenile in this debut indie work.

text: two brothers along with an ensemble of fresh talent made all this possible and were brought into the light .
translation: 二人の兄弟と新しい才能のアンサンブルが全てを可能にし、光の中に引き出されました。
back_translation: The two brothers and the ensemble of new talents made everything possible and were brought into the light.

text: light , silly , photographed with colour and depth , and rather a good time .
translation: 軽やかでおかしみがあり、色と深さで撮影され、なかなか楽しい時間です。
back_translation: It is light-hearted and amusing, captured in color and depth, making for quite an enjoyable time.

text: [ reno ] may have a few grating gaps in logic and feels as if a good chunk of its story ended up on the cutting room floor , but there is just enough charm and humor peppered throughout to make it feel as if it was n't a complete waste of time to sit through .
translation: [レノ] はいくつかの論理的な不整合があり、一部のストーリーがカットされたように感じるかもしれませんが、その中には魅力とユーモアがちりばめられていて、見る価値が全くなかったわけではないと感じさせます。
back_translation: [Leno] There might be some logical inconsistencies and it may feel like some parts of the story were cut, but it contains charm and humor, making it feel like it wasn't completely worthless to watch.

text: purports to be a hollywood satire but winds up as the kind of film that should be the target of something deeper and more engaging . oh , and more entertaining , too .
translation: ハリウッドのパロディを装っているが、結局はもっと深くて魅力的なものの標的になるべき映画になってしまっている。ああ、もっと面白くもね。
back_translation: It masquerades as a Hollywood parody, but in the end, it turns into a movie that should target something much deeper and more captivating. Oh, and it's more interesting as well.

text: worth seeing once , but its charm quickly fades .
translation: 一度見る価値はあるが、その魅力はすぐに薄れてしまう。
back_translation: It is worth seeing once, but its appeal fades quickly.

text: this is the story of honey ( alba ) , a tough sexy dancer from the inner city , who becomes a successful music video choreographer , a career which is threatened when her mentor makes him either sleep with him . . .
translation: これは、内市出身のタフでセクシーなダンサー、ハニー（アルバ）の物語です。彼女は成功したミュージックビデオの振付師になりますが、彼女のメンターが彼女に睡眠を共にするように迫ったことで、そのキャリアが脅かされます。
back_translation: This is the story of Honey (Alba), a tough and sexy dancer from Uchi City. She becomes a successful choreographer for music videos, but her career is threatened when her mentor pressures her to sleep with him.

text: involving at times , but lapses quite casually into the absurd .
translation: 時には関与しますが、かなりカジュアルに不条理に陥ります。
back_translation: Sometimes I'm involved, but it tends to fall into absurdity in a rather casual way.

text: however , this task is going to be more difficult than he could ever have imagined .
translation: しかし、この仕事は彼が想像していた以上に難しくなるだろう。
back_translation: However, this job is likely to be more difficult than he imagined.

text: john `` eagle eye `` pennell travels the country collecting his former b-17 crewmen in order to fulfill a pact made many years ago in the heat of battle .
translation: ジョン「イーグルアイ」ペンネルは、戦闘の熱気の中で交わした約束を果たすために、かつてのB-17の乗組員たちを集めるために国中を旅しています。
back_translation: John "Eagle Eye" Pennell is traveling across the country to gather the former B-17 crew members to fulfill a promise made amidst the heat of battle.

text: a grimly competent and stolid and earnest military courtroom drama .
translation: 厳しく有能で無表情で真剣な軍事裁判ドラマ。
back_translation: A strict, capable, expressionless, and serious military court drama.

text: after many years of sleeping in his coffin , the vampire lestat awakens only to find that the world has changed and he wants to be a part of it .
translation: 多くの年を棺の中で眠っていたヴァンパイア・レスターは目覚めると、世界が変わっていることに気づき、それに参加したいと思う。
back_translation: The vampire Lester, who had slept for many years in a coffin, awakens to find that the world has changed, and he wishes to take part in it.

text: it 's a hoot watching the rock chomp on jumbo ants , pull an arrow out of his back , and leap unscathed through raging fire !
translation: 岩が巨大なアリをむしゃむしゃ食べたり、背中から矢を引き抜いたり、猛火をものともせずに飛び跳ねたりするのを見るのは面白い！
back_translation: It's interesting to see a rock munching on giant ants, pulling arrows out of its back, and bouncing around without fear of the fierce flames!

text: in the tradition of storytelling , the filmmaker creates a visual parable about the hasidic community that she left as a teenager .
translation: 物語の伝統において、映画製作者は彼女がティーンエイジャーの頃に離れたハシディズムのコミュニティについての視覚的寓話を作り出します。
back_translation: In the tradition of storytelling, the filmmaker creates a visual allegory about the Hasidic community she left during her teenage years.

text: tavernier shows us , in more ways than one , that le cinM-i ma de qualitM-i lives on .
translation: タヴェルニエは、さまざまな方法で、レ・シネマ・エ・ド・クオリテが生き続けていることを私たちに示しています。
back_translation: Tavernier shows us in various ways that Le Cinéma et de Qualité continues to thrive.

text: there 's a heavy stench of 'been there , done that ' hanging over the film . it 's everything you 'd expect -- but nothing more .
translation: 映画には「やったことがある」という重い悪臭が漂っている。期待通りのもので、しかしそれ以上の何ものでもない。
back_translation: The movie has a heavy stench of having "been done before." It is exactly what you would expect, but nothing more than that.

text: unfortunately , her plan goes wrong , and she actually kills herself .
translation: 残念ながら、彼女の計画はうまくいかず、実際に彼女は自殺します。
back_translation: Unfortunately, her plan did not go well, and in fact, she commits suicide.

text: born in eastern europe , tobias grew up in poverty , the son of a thief , beggar and prostitute .
translation: 東ヨーロッパで生まれたトビアスは、泥棒、物乞い、売春婦の息子として貧困の中で育ちました。
back_translation: Tobias, born in Eastern Europe, grew up in poverty as the son of a thief, a beggar, and a prostitute.

text: uzumaki 's interesting social parallel and defiant aesthetic seems a prostituted muse . . .
translation: うずまきの興味深い社会的平行性と反抗的な美学は、売春されたミューズのように見えます。。。
back_translation: The interesting social parallels and rebellious aesthetics of the spiral seem like a prostituted muse...

text: emma agrees to bret 's plan and the thefts are go smoothly , resulting in enough money for the lovers to go away , but emma wants more .
translation: エマはブレットの計画に同意し、盗みは順調に進み、二人の恋人が旅立つのに十分なお金が手に入る。しかし、エマはもっと欲しいと思っている。
back_translation: Emma agrees to Brett's plan, and the theft goes smoothly, providing enough money for the two lovers to depart. However, Emma desires more.

text: a morose little soap opera about three vapid , insensitive people who take turns hurting each other . it 's a feature-length adaptation of one of those `` can this marriage be saved ? `` columns from ladies home journal . . .
translation: 陰気な小さなサスペンスドラマで、無神経で無感情な3人の人々が交互にお互いを傷つけ合う物語です。これは「この結婚は救えるか？」という、レディースホームジャーナルに載っていたコラムの長編映画版です。
back_translation: It's a gloomy little suspense drama about three insensitive and emotionless people who take turns hurting each other. This is a feature film adaptation of a column titled "Can This Marriage Be Saved?" that appeared in Ladies' Home Journal.

text: it is really quite ironic then that the one guy putting out consistently good comedy is hollywood 's most serious actor .
translation: それなら、常に良いコメディを提供しているのがハリウッドで最も真剣な俳優であることは本当に皮肉ですね。
back_translation: In that case, it’s really ironic that the most serious actor in Hollywood is the one who always provides good comedy.

text: heavily pregnant , and wanting to terminate her pregnancy , she 's on the run from the future parents , searching for sophie 's old flame , ken .
translation: 重い妊娠をしていて、妊娠を終わらせたい彼女は、未来の親から逃げて、ソフィーの昔の恋人ケンを探している。
back_translation: She is going through a difficult pregnancy and wants to end it; she is running away from her future parents and searching for Sophie’s old boyfriend, Ken.

text: this is a film version of the play they wrote based on more than 200 interviews they conducted in laramie .
translation: これは、ララミーで行った200以上のインタビューに基づいて彼らが書いた戯曲の映画版です。
back_translation: This is the film adaptation of the play they wrote based on over 200 interviews conducted in Laramie.

text: club le monde follows an evening out at a seedy nightspot .
translation: クラブ・ル・モンドは、薄暗いナイトスポットでの夜の外出を追っています。
back_translation: Club Le Monde is pursuing a night out at a dimly lit nightlife spot.

text: this is more a case of 'sacre bleu ! ' than 'magnifique ' .
translation: これは「サクレ・ブルー！」というより「マニフィック！」のケースです。
back_translation: This is more of a case of "Magnificent!" than "Sacre Bleu!"

text: a great ending does n't make up for a weak movie , and crazy as hell does n't even have a great ending .
translation: 素晴らしい結末は弱い映画を補うことはできず、「クレイジー・アズ・ヘル」はさえ、素晴らしい結末すら持っていない。
back_translation: A wonderful ending cannot compensate for a weak movie, and "Crazy As Hell" doesn't even have a great ending.

text: this is a movie where the most notable observation is how long you 've been sitting still .
translation: これは、あなたがどれくらい長くじっと座っているかが最も注目される映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie where how long you can sit still is the most important.

text: on the way there , he sees a sports car that just hit a tree .
translation: 行く途中、彼は木にぶつかったスポーツカーを見かけた。
back_translation: On his way, he spotted a sports car that had collided with a tree.

text: apparently designed as a reverie about memory and regret , but the only thing you 'll regret is remembering the experience of sitting through it .
translation: 明らかに記憶と後悔についての夢想としてデザインされていますが、あなたが後悔する唯一のことは、それを見ている経験を思い出すことです。
back_translation: It is clearly designed as a contemplation on memory and regret, but the only thing you regret is recalling the experience of watching it.

text: trying to avoid jail time from credit card fraud , price ( patrick mcknight ) , at the advice of his cousin , hides out at a college fraternity .
translation: クレジットカード詐欺での刑務所行きを避けようと、パトリック・マクナイトは、いとこの助言を受けて大学のフラタニティに身を隠す。
back_translation: To avoid going to prison for credit card fraud, Patrick McKnight hides out in a college fraternity on the advice of his cousin.

text: we are taken on this journey through the voice and body of mnemosyne , mother of memory .
translation: 私たちは記憶の母メモシーヌの声と身体を通じて、この旅に連れて行かれます。
back_translation: We are taken on this journey through the voice and body of Memory, the mother of memory.

text: the soundtrack alone is worth the price of admission .
translation: サウンドトラックだけで入場料の価値があります。
back_translation: The soundtrack alone is worth the admission fee.

text: michael rooker plays a guard , fisher stevens , john seda , and master p co star .
translation: マイケル・ルーカーがガードを演じ、フィッシャー・スティーブンス、ジョン・セダ、マスターPが共演しています。
back_translation: Michael Rooker plays the role of Guard, with Fischer Stevens, Jon Seda, and Master P co-starring.

text: horace and colt , a fifty-something married couple , are divided - they have lost the key , to their room and to each other .
translation: ホレースとコルト、50代の夫婦は、部屋の鍵とお互いの心を失い、分かれてしまっています。
back_translation: Horace and Colt, a couple in their 50s, have lost the keys to their room and each other's hearts, and have ended up separating.

text: conveniently numbed and estranged from her surroundings , lillian sleepwalks through life .
translation: 便利に麻痺し、周囲から疎外されたリリアンは、人生を夢遊病のように歩んでいる。
back_translation: Lilian, numbed by convenience and isolated from those around her, walks through life as if in a state of sleepwalking.

text: although some viewers will not be able to stomach so much tongue-in-cheek weirdness , those who do will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime .
translation: 多少の視聴者はこれほどの皮肉的な奇妙さを受け入れられないかもしれませんが、受け入れられる人々は、一生楽しめるカルト的なお気に入りを見つけるでしょう。
back_translation: Some viewers may not be able to accept such ironic strangeness, but those who can will find a cult favorite that they can enjoy for a lifetime.

text: blake now starts to sink into the scary , twisted world of the master where sharing , sacrifice and loyalty take on bizarre and dangerous new meanings .
translation: ブレイクは今、シェア、犠牲、忠誠が奇妙で危険な新しい意味を持つ主の恐ろしい歪んだ世界に沈んでいきます。
back_translation: Break is now sinking into a terrifyingly distorted world of the Lord where sharing, sacrifice, and loyalty hold strange and dangerous new meanings.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: あまりにも長引き、キャラクターや不必要なサブプロットが多すぎて停滞してしまう。
back_translation: It drags on for too long and gets bogged down by too many characters and unnecessary subplots.

text: it 's somewhat clumsy and too lethargically paced -- but its story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities offers a solid build-up , a terrific climax , and some nice chills along the way .
translation: ややぎこちなく、ペースが鈍いですが、サイキック能力を持つ謎の生き物に関する物語は、しっかりとした盛り上がり、素晴らしいクライマックス、そして途中でいくつかの良い恐怖を提供しています。
back_translation: Although it's somewhat awkward and the pace is slow, the story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities provides a solid buildup, a wonderful climax, and several good scares along the way.

text: his comedy premises are often hackneyed or just plain crude , calculated to provoke shocked laughter , without following up on a deeper level .
translation: 彼のコメディの前提はしばしば使い古されたものであったり、単純に粗野であり、深いレベルでのフォローアップなしに、ショックを与える笑いを引き起こすことを意図している。
back_translation: His comedic premises are often cliched or simply crude, intended to provoke shocking laughter without any deeper level of follow-up.

text: the weakest of the four harry potter books has been transformed into the stronger of the two films by the thinnest of margins .
translation: 四冊のハリー・ポッターシリーズの中で最も弱い本は、二本の映画の中で最も強いものに、わずかな差で変身しました。
back_translation: The weakest book in the four-volume Harry Potter series has transformed into the strongest one among the two films, albeit by a slight margin.

text: the result of an old cia mind-control experiment gone bad , felice quick is on the loose and headed for junior-high school teacher sam blacker .
translation: 古いCIAのマインドコントロール実験の失敗の結果、フェリス・クイックは逃げ出し、中学校の教師サム・ブラッカーに向かっています。
back_translation: As a result of the failure of an old CIA mind control experiment, Ferris Quick has escaped and is heading towards middle school teacher Sam Bracker.

text: love , politics and intrigue intermingle in this taut retelling of graham greene 's classic tale of a disillusioned british journalist , an idealistic young american and the beautiful vietnamese woman that comes between them in 1950s saigon .
translation: 愛、政治、そして陰謀が絡み合う、グレアム・グリーンの古典的な物語を緊張感を持って再現したこの作品は、1950年代のサイゴンで幻滅した英国のジャーナリスト、理想主義的な若いアメリカ人、そして彼らの間に立ちはだかる美しいベトナム女性の物語です。
back_translation: This work, which faithfully recreates Graham Greene's classic story filled with love, politics, and conspiracy, tells the tale of a disillusioned British journalist in 1950s Saigon, an idealistic young American, and the beautiful Vietnamese woman who stands between them.

text: the water game is a teen action drama following a group of graduating high school students as they embark on playing a spy vs . spy type game three weeks prior to graduation .
translation: 「ウォーターゲーム」は、高校の卒業を控えた学生たちが卒業式の3週間前にスパイ対スパイのようなゲームを始める様子を描いたティーンアクションドラマです。
back_translation: "Water Game" is a teen action drama that depicts high school students starting a spy vs. spy game three weeks before graduation.

text: a documentary seven years in the making about women in the film business and how they balance , children , love lives and career -- or how they do n't .
translation: 映画業界で働く女性たちについて、子供、恋愛、キャリアをどのように両立させているか、あるいはどうできていないかを描いた、7年をかけて制作されたドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A documentary that took seven years to produce, depicting how women working in the film industry balance children, romance, and their careers, or how they are unable to do so.

text: in spite of his incarceration , west has been continuing his re-animation research , using rats and mice for subjects , and electrocuting them with a special jerry-rigged apparatus .
translation: 彼の収監にもかかわらず、ウエストはラットやマウスを対象にして再生研究を続けており、特別に改造した装置で彼らを電撃している。
back_translation: Despite his incarceration, West continues to conduct regeneration research on rats and mice, using specially modified devices to electrocute them.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: 私は「フレイティー」がビル・パクストンをAリストの監督に変えるかどうかわかりませんが、彼は少なくとも素晴らしいホラー映画を1本作ったということを知って安心していることでしょう。
back_translation: I don't know if "Frighty" will turn Bill Paxton into an A-list director, but at least I can rest assured that he has made at least one great horror film.

text: playwright siddalee walker , on the verge of opening a new play , gives a magazine interview in which she discusses her unhappy childhood .
translation: 劇作家シダリー・ウォーカーは、新しい劇の初演を控えた中、雑誌のインタビューで自身の不幸な子供時代について語ります。
back_translation: Playwright Sidali Walker speaks about his unhappy childhood in a magazine interview as he prepares for the premiere of his new play.

text: children may not understand everything that happens -- i 'm not sure even miyazaki himself does -- but they will almost certainly be fascinated , and undoubtedly delighted .
translation: 子供たちは起こるすべてのことを理解できないかもしれませんが、宮崎自身も確信が持てないかもしれませんが、彼らはほぼ間違いなく魅了され、確実に喜ぶことでしょう。
back_translation: Children may not understand everything that is happening, and even Miyazaki himself might not be certain, but they will almost certainly be captivated and definitely delighted.

text: set against the picturesque landscape of the mississippi delta in the 1940 's , `` the rising place `` follows the close friendship of two young women , each of a different race , and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war .
translation: 1940年代のミシシッピデルタの美しい風景を背景に、"ザ・ライジング・プレイス"は、異なる人種の二人の若い女性の親しい友情と、社会的不正義と世界大戦の時代において自分たちの人生の目的を見出そうとする彼女たちの苦闘を描いています。
back_translation: Set against the beautiful landscape of the Mississippi Delta in the 1940s, "The Rising Place" depicts the close friendship of two young women of different races and their struggles to find their purpose in life amid social injustice and the era of world war.

text: ram dass fierce grace moulds itself as an example to up-and-coming documentarians , of the overlooked pitfalls of such an endeavour .
translation: ラム・ダスの「フィアス・グレース」は、これからのドキュメンタリー製作者に対して、そのような試みにおける見過ごされがちな落とし穴の例として形作られています。
back_translation: Ram Dass's "Fearless Grace" serves as an example of the often-overlooked pitfalls in such endeavors for documentary filmmakers going forward.

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .
translation: あのような素晴らしい映画から、こんなにひどい映画が生まれるとは、今年の最悪の映画的悲劇の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the worst cinematic tragedies of the year that such a terrible movie has come from such a wonderful film.

text: this documentary of cameroon 's repressive political realities begins with the 1990 publication of an open letter to president biya calling for a national conference and the immediate arrest of the letter 's author and publisher .
translation: このカメルーンの抑圧的な政治現実に関するドキュメンタリーは、1990年にビヤ大統領に宛てた公開書簡の発表から始まり、その中で国民会議の開催と書簡の著者および出版者の即時逮捕を求めています。
back_translation: This documentary about the oppressive political reality in Cameroon begins with the announcement of an open letter addressed to President Biya in 1990, in which it calls for the convening of a national conference and the immediate arrest of the author and publisher of the letter.

text: the film covers the life of young patricia ( jolie jackunas ) who longs for a career as a singer and songwriter .
translation: この映画は、歌手兼ソングライターとしてのキャリアを望む若きパトリシア（ジョリー・ジャクナス）の人生を描いています。
back_translation: This movie depicts the life of young Patricia (Jolie Jaknas), who aspires to have a career as a singer-songwriter.

text: an entertaining , surprisingly well-written and often rowdily amusing picture .
translation: 楽しませてくれる、驚くほどよく書かれた、しばしば騒がしく面白い作品です。
back_translation: It's an entertaining, surprisingly well-written, and often noisy and interesting piece of work.

text: after having christmas present and rent money stolen by someone posing as santa , they get jobs working as unarmed security guards in the local mall , they get threatened with eviction , pick up girls , get drunk , take drugs and need quick cash .
translation: クリスマスプレゼントと家賃のお金をサンタのふりをした誰かに盗まれた後、彼らは地元のショッピングモールで無防備な警備員として働くことになります。彼らは立ち退きの脅迫を受け、女の子を口説き、酒を飲み、ドラッグを使用し、早急にお金が必要になります。
back_translation: After their Christmas presents and rent money were stolen by someone pretending to be Santa, they end up working as defenseless security guards at the local shopping mall. They face threats of eviction, try to flirt with girls, drink alcohol, use drugs, and urgently need money.

text: a well-made but emotionally scattered film whose hero gives his heart only to the dog .
translation: よく作られたが感情的に散漫な映画で、主人公は犬にだけ心を捧げる。
back_translation: A well-made but emotionally scattered film where the protagonist dedicates their heart only to a dog.

text: madison , the `` new girl in town , `` quickly sets her sights on the impressionable ben .
translation: マディソン、「町の新しい女の子」は、すぐに影響を受けやすいベンに目を付けます。
back_translation: Madison, the "new girl in town," quickly sets her sights on the easily influenced Ben.

text: believing his parent 's dead , bruce is raised by adoptive parents .
translation: 両親が亡くなったと信じているブルースは、養父母に育てられます。
back_translation: Bruce, who believes his parents have died, is raised by foster parents.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a cinema-verite film following seven russian teenagers who have come to america to become country music stars .
translation: 「ベーリング海峡のバラード」は、カントリー音楽のスターになるためにアメリカにやってきた7人のロシアの十代の若者たちを追ったシネマ・ヴェリテ映画です。
back_translation: "Ballad of the Bering Strait" is a cinema verité film that follows seven Russian teenagers who came to America to become country music stars.

text: cold and scattered , minority report commands interest almost solely as an exercise in gorgeous visuals . that 's not vintage spielberg and that , finally , is minimally satisfying .
translation: 冷たく散発的な『マイノリティ・リポート』は、ほとんど完全に美しいビジュアルの演習として興味を引く。これは往年のスピルバーグとは言えず、結局のところ、最小限の満足感しか与えない。
back_translation: The cold, sporadic "Minority Report" captivates as an almost entirely beautiful visual exercise. It cannot be compared to Spielberg's earlier works and ultimately offers only minimal satisfaction.

text: so the hunt begins as ted delivers a first round of come-ons and invitations for his object of desire to become entangled , but nothing works .
translation: 狩りが始まる。テッドは、自分の欲望の対象に絡まるよう最初の誘いと招待を送るが、何もうまくいかない。
back_translation: The hunt begins. Ted sends the first invitation and seduction, entangling himself with the object of his desire, but nothing goes well.

text: in his role of observer of the scene , lawrence sounds whiny and defensive , as if his life-altering experiences made him bitter and less mature .
translation: シーンの観察者としての役割において、ローレンスは不満を言っているようで、防御的な音を出している。まるで彼の人生を変えるような経験が、彼を bitter にし、成熟が欠けているかのようだ。
back_translation: In his role as an observer of the scene, Lawrence seems to be complaining and making defensive sounds. It's as if an experience that could change his life has made him bitter and lacking in maturity.

text: culled from nearly two years of filming , the documentary 's candid interviews , lyric moments of grim beauty , and powerful verite footage takes us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of tislam milliner , a struggling rapper who 's ambitious to make it out of the `` hood `` .
translation: 約2年の撮影から編纂されたドキュメンタリーは、率直なインタビュー、厳しい美しさの歌詞の瞬間、そして強力なヴェリテ映像を通じて、ラップ界の通常のステレオタイプを超え、成功を目指して「フッド」から抜け出そうとする苦境にあるラッパー、ティスラム・ミリナーの生活に迫ります。
back_translation: The documentary, compiled from about two years of filming, delves into the life of rapper Tislam Milliner, who is striving to break free from the challenges of the 'hood' in pursuit of success. It goes beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap scene through candid interviews, moments of harshly beautiful lyrics, and powerful vérité footage.

text: however , jane , wendy 's 12-year-old daughter , sees it all as make believe and refuses to believe in the tales .
translation: しかし、ジェーン、ウェンディの12歳の娘は、すべてを作り話だと見なし、その話を信じようとしません。
back_translation: However, Jane, Wendy's 12-year-old daughter, considers it all to be a fabrication and refuses to believe the story.

text: ( king plays a `` russian mob princess `` ; roden plays an evil kung fu master who is seeking the scroll ) based on the very underground comic book , an immortal tibetan monk ( chow ) finds a mentor in a young street kid ( scott ) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scroll he 's been guarding for the last sixty years .
translation: （キングは「ロシアのマフィアの姫」を演じ、ローデンは巻物を求める邪悪なカンフーマスターを演じる）非常にアンダーグラウンドなコミックブックを基にしたこの作品で、不死のチベット僧（チャウ）は、過去60年間守ってきた古代の巻物を守るために教えることができる若いストリートキッド（スコット）をメンターとして見つける。
back_translation: (King plays the "Princess of the Russian Mafia," while Roden portrays an evil kung fu master seeking ancient scrolls.) In this work based on a very underground comic book, an immortal Tibetan monk (Chow) finds a young street kid (Scott), who he can mentor to protect the ancient scrolls he has guarded for the past 60 years.

text: the controversial bad-boy of comedy delivers a piercing look at his life , lifting the metaphorical smokescreen that he feels has clouded the public view , commenting on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of relationships , and unleashing a nonstop litany of raucous anecdotes , stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about life .
translation: 物議を醸すコメディの悪党が、自らの人生を鋭い視点で捉え、公共の見解を曇らせていると感じる比喩的な煙幕を取り払います。喫煙の危険性から人間関係の試練まで、あらゆることについてコメントし、騒々しい逸話、鋭い社会批評、そして人生についての非常に個人的な反省を繰り広げます。
back_translation: A controversial comedic villain captures his own life with a sharp perspective, feeling as though he is clearing away a metaphorical smoke screen that obscures public opinion. He comments on everything from the dangers of smoking to trials in human relationships, unfolding noisy anecdotes, sharp social criticism, and highly personal reflections on life.

text: bow 's best moments are when he 's getting busy on the basketball court because that 's when he really scores .
translation: ボウの最高の瞬間は、バスケットボールコートで忙しくしているときで、それが本当に得点を挙げるときだからです。
back_translation: The best moment of a bow is when it's busy on the basketball court, because that's when it really scores points.

text: a colorful , joyous celebration of life ; a tapestry woven of romance , dancing , singing , and unforgettable characters .
translation: 色彩豊かで喜びに満ちた生活の祝賀；ロマンス、ダンス、歌、そして忘れられないキャラクターで織り成されたタペストリーです。
back_translation: A celebration of a colorful and joyful life; a tapestry woven with romance, dance, song, and unforgettable characters.

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors ( dawson leery did what ? ! ? ) , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: 若いテレビ俳優たちの裏側に興味があるなら（ドーソン・リーリーは何をしたの！？）、あるいは興味深いストーリーテリングの手法を見たいなら、チェックしてみるといいかもしれませんが、この映画には特に魅力的なものはありません。
back_translation: If you're interested in the behind-the-scenes of young TV actors (What did Dawson Leery do!?), or if you want to see intriguing storytelling techniques, it might be worth checking out, but there's nothing particularly captivating about this movie.

text: but hamilton high is about to become an all too real battleground when a well-organized group of killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives invade the supposedly deserted school after hours to use it as an operating base for meticulously planned armored car robbery .
translation: しかし、ハミルトン高校は、よく組織された自動小銃や爆発物で武装した殺し屋の集団が、午後の学校を襲撃して綿密に計画された装甲車の強盗のための作戦基地として使用するために侵入することで、あまりにも現実的な戦場になる寸前です。
back_translation: However, Hamilton High School is on the verge of becoming an all too realistic battlefield, as a well-organized group of assassins armed with automatic rifles and explosives is about to infiltrate the school to use it as a base of operations for a meticulously planned armored vehicle heist during the afternoon school hours.

text: undecided about his future , yun fei , an unknown young poet , goes to visit an old university friend in the suburbs of beijing to seek his advice .
translation: 将来に悩む若き詩人のユン・フェイは、北京の郊外にいる大学の友人を訪ねてアドバイスを求める。
back_translation: The young poet Yun Fei, troubled about the future, seeks advice by visiting a university friend who lives in the suburbs of Beijing.

text: in this bittersweet slice of working class single new jersey life , best friends debby and beth ( both pushing thirty ) go looking for love in the wrong place - namely their favorite bar , oliver 's .
translation: このほろ苦い労働者階級のシングル・ニュージャージー生活の中で、親友のデビーとベス（ともに30代目前）は、彼女たちのお気に入りのバー、オリバーズで間違った場所に愛を求めに行く。
back_translation: In this bittersweet working-class single life in New Jersey, best friends Debbie and Beth (both nearing their 30s) go to their favorite bar, Oliver's, to seek love in all the wrong places.

text: when a chinese rebel murders chon 's estranged father and escapes to england , chon and roy make their way to london with revenge on their minds .
translation: 中国の反乱者がチョンの疎遠な父を殺害し、イギリスに逃げると、チョンとロイは復讐を胸にロンドンに向かう。
back_translation: Chinese rebels kill Cheong's estranged father and flee to England, prompting Cheong and Roy to head to London with revenge in their hearts.

text: this does n't go down well with his superiors and they decide that rajput is now a liability to the bank and they sack him .
translation: これは彼の上司たちに好意的に受け入れられず、彼らはラージプトが銀行にとって負担であると決定し、彼を解雇することにします。
back_translation: He was not favorably received by his superiors, and they decided that Rajput was a burden to the bank, leading them to decide to dismiss him.

text: armed with $ 20 dollars and a backpack pastor william sets off on an adventure across the united states in an adventure that would change the lives of millions and test him beyond measure .
translation: 20ドルとバックパックを持ったウィリアム牧師は、アメリカ全土を冒険し、何百万もの人々の人生を変えるだけでなく、彼自身を計り知れないほど試す冒険に出発します。
back_translation: With 20 dollars and a backpack, Pastor William sets out on an adventure across America, not only changing the lives of millions but also embarking on an immeasurable adventure that tests himself in countless ways.

text: M-^Ethe story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: その物語は広がりがあり、論理的ではなく、単に愚かです。
back_translation: The story is expansive, illogical, and simply foolish.

text: most of them realize it is counterfeit , but too late to take action .
translation: ほとんどの人がそれが偽造品であることに気付いていますが、行動を起こすには遅すぎます。
back_translation: Most people realize that it is a counterfeit, but it is too late to take action.

text: the work of an exhausted , desiccated talent who ca n't get out of his own way .
translation: 疲れ果て、乾燥した才能の仕事で、自己の足を引っ張っている。
back_translation: Exhausted and held back by my own shortcomings in a dry, talentless job.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though . . . you will likely enjoy this monster .
translation: 血や内臓、銃を持った男を襲う狂った獣が好きなら、あなたはこのモンスターを楽しむでしょう。
back_translation: If you like crazy beasts that attack men with blood, guts, and guns, you will enjoy this monster.

text: enigma is anything but enigmatic about affairs of the heart , and is well worth seeing for its elective affinities alone .
translation: エニグマは心の問題に関しては謎めいているわけではなく、その選択的親和性だけでも見る価値があります。
back_translation: Enigma is not mysterious when it comes to issues of the heart; it is worth noting its selective affinity alone.

text: a full world has been presented onscreen , not some series of carefully structured plot points building to a pat resolution .
translation: 画面上には完全な世界が提示されており、整然と構成されたプロットポイントの連続ではなく、単なるきれいな解決に至るようなものではありません。
back_translation: The screen presents a complete world, not just a series of neatly structured plot points leading to a simple resolution.

text: upon his arrival he hears talk about monroe hutchen ( snipes ) who is the top ranked prison boxing champ 10 years running .
translation: 彼が到着すると、10年間連続でトップランクの刑務所ボクシングチャンピオンであるモンロー・ハッチン（スナイプス）についての話を耳にします。
back_translation: When he arrives, he hears talk about Monroe Hutchins (Snipes), the top-ranked prison boxing champion for ten consecutive years.

text: an offbeat horror tale about a group of five college friends on vacation at a remote mountain cabin when one contracts a flesh-eating virus .
translation: 奇妙なホラー物語で、遠くの山の山小屋で休暇を過ごす5人の大学の友人グループが、一人が肉食ウイルスに感染する。
back_translation: In a strange horror story, a group of five college friends spending a vacation at a cabin in the distant mountains find that one of them is infected with a carnivorous virus.

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .
translation: 異なるものを求める人々にとって、ウエンディゴは本当に身の毛もよだつ物語です。
back_translation: For those seeking something different, the Wendigo is truly a hair-raising tale.

text: part of the film 's cheeky charm comes from its vintage schmaltz .
translation: 映画の少し生意気な魅力は、そのビンテージな甘ったるさから来ている。
back_translation: The slightly cheeky charm of the movie comes from its vintage sweetness.

text: though he tried to maintain a life of solitude , he is soon entangled with an artist who is struggling with a personal tragedy and an overly-friendly cuban hot dog vendor .
translation: 彼は孤独な生活を維持しようとしたが、すぐに個人的な悲劇に苦しむアーティストと、過度にフレンドリーなキューバのホットドッグ販売人と絡み合ってしまう。
back_translation: He tried to maintain a solitary life but soon became entangled with a suffering artist enduring personal tragedy and an overly friendly Cuban hot dog vendor.

text: a powerful , compelling and intelligent if imperfect work . . . a film of enormous ambition which realizes its aims more often than not .
translation: 強力で、魅力的で、知的ではあるが不完全な作品。。。その目標を達成することが多い、巨大な野心を持った映画です。
back_translation: A powerful, captivating, and intelligent yet imperfect work... It is a film with immense ambition that often achieves its goals.

text: this is not a retread of `` dead poets ' society . ``
translation: これは『優雅な世界』の再演ではありません。
back_translation: This is not a revival of "The Elegant World."

text: ritchie may not have a novel thought in his head , but he knows how to pose madonna .
translation: リッチーは頭の中に新しい考えがないかもしれませんが、マドンナのポーズをとる方法を知っています。
back_translation: Richie may not have any new ideas in his head, but he knows how to strike a Madonna pose.

text: when carlitos is released after doing 2 years of `` hard time `` , he attempts to redeem himself and sets an example for his 5 year-old son .
translation: カリトスは2年間の「ハードタイム」を終えて出所した後、自身を改めようとし、5歳の息子のために模範を示そうとします。
back_translation: After completing two years of "hard time," Carlitos is determined to turn his life around and set an example for his 5-year-old son.

text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .
translation: リッチーの映画はヴェルトミューラーの論争的な寓意よりも飲み込みやすいが、自己矛盾的に礼儀正しい。
back_translation: Richie's movies are more accessible than Wertmüller's controversial allegories, but are self-contradictorily polite.

text: viewed on its own terms , treasure planet is better-than-average family entertainment , but true fans of the stevenson 's novel will likely prefer disney 's more faithful 1950 live-action swashbuckling classic .
translation: 独自の基準で見ると、『トレジャープラネット』は平均以上のファミリーエンターテインメントですが、スティーヴンソンの小説の真のファンは、ディズニーのより忠実な1950年の実写版スワッシュバッカリングクラシックを好むでしょう。
back_translation: From a unique perspective, "Treasure Planet" is above average family entertainment, but true fans of Stevenson's novel would likely prefer Disney's more faithful live-action adaptation from 1950, the swashbuckling classic.

text: it has been a year since johnny and wayne created the ultimate bra for samantha 's company .
translation: ジョニーとウェインがサマンサの会社のために究極のブラを作ってから1年が経ちました。
back_translation: It has been a year since Johnny and Wayne created the ultimate bra for Samantha's company.

text: however , when novak 's book is a complete success , catcher finds himself being blown off by her !
translation: しかし、ノバクの本が大成功を収めたとき、キャッチャーは彼女に無視されることになります！
back_translation: However, when Novak's book becomes a huge success, the catcher will be ignored by her!

text: been there , done that , liked it much better the first time around - when it was called the professional .
translation: そこにいたし、やったことがあるが、最初の時（プロフェッショナルと呼ばれていた時）の方がずっと良かった。
back_translation: I was there and have done it before, but the first time (when it was called professional) was much better.

text: characterisation has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle .
translation: キャラクターの描写はスペクタクルのために犠牲にされてしまった。
back_translation: The depiction of the characters has been sacrificed for the sake of spectacle.

text: just as steven spielberg directed stanley kubrick 's 'a . i . ' ,
translation: スティーブン・スピルバーグがスタンリー・キューブリックの『A.I.』を監督したように、
back_translation: Just as Steven Spielberg directed Stanley Kubrick's "A.I.",

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: セクシーで独特、そして常に楽しませてくれるコスチュームドラマがルネサンス時代のスペインを舞台にしており、実際の出来事に基づいているという事実が、さらに魅力を増しています。
back_translation: The fact that the sexy and unique costume drama, which always entertains, is set in Renaissance Spain and is based on real events adds to its appeal.

text: these two facts cause a chain of events that changes not only her life , but also that of her friends in a brutal way . . .
translation: これらの二つの事実は、彼女の人生だけでなく、友人たちの人生も brutal な方法で変える一連の出来事を引き起こします。。。
back_translation: These two facts trigger a series of events that change not only her life but also the lives of her friends in a brutal way...

text: while the subject 's appeal is limited and the film 's 106-minute running time excessive , viewers who do respond to the pic will find it raw , real and cathartic .
translation: テーマの魅力は限られており、映画の106分の上映時間は長すぎるが、この作品に反応する視聴者は、生々しく、リアルで、カタルシスを感じることができるだろう。
back_translation: The appeal of the theme is limited, and the film's 106-minute runtime is too long, but viewers who respond to this work will be able to feel it vividly, realistically, and experience a catharsis.

text: speaks eloquently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life .
translation: アートと生活の共生関係について雄弁に語る。
back_translation: He speaks eloquently about the symbiotic relationship between art and life.

text: it picked me up , swung me around , and dropped me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film .
translation: それは私を拾い上げ、振り回し、最近の映画の中でこれ以上の感情的な力で私を席に戻しました。
back_translation: It lifted me up, swung me around, and brought me back to my seat with even more emotional power than recent films.

text: if you 're able to go , relax and lower your expectations , you might be carried away by it .
translation: 行けるのであれば、リラックスして期待を下げれば、その場に流されるかもしれません。
back_translation: If you can go, you might just relax and lower your expectations, and end up going with the flow.

text: land , people and narrative flow together in a stark portrait of motherhood deferred and desire explored .
translation: 土地、人々、そして物語が一体となり、先延ばしにされた母性と探求される欲望の鮮明な肖像が浮かび上がります。
back_translation: The land, people, and stories come together to form a vivid portrait of postponed motherhood and explored desires.

text: less about shakespeare than the spawn of fools who saw quentin tarantino 's handful of raucous gangster films and branched out into their own pseudo-witty copycat interpretations .
translation: シェイクスピアについてよりも、クエンティン・タランティーノの騒々しいギャング映画の数本を見て、自分たちの擬似的なウィットに富んだ模倣解釈に着手した愚者たちの子孫についての方が少ない。
back_translation: There are fewer descendants of fools who embark on their mockingly witty interpretative imitations after watching a few of Quentin Tarantino's noisy gangster films than about Shakespeare.

text: as asked in the first movie , what sort of people name their son gay m . focker ?
translation: 最初の映画で尋ねられたように、どんな人々が息子を「ゲイ・M・フォッカー」と名付けるのでしょうか？
back_translation: What kind of people would name their son "Gay M. Focker," as was asked in the first movie?

text: set in 1989 , during the historical week in which the berlin wall came tumbling down .
translation: 1989年、ベルリンの壁が崩壊した歴史的な週を背景にしています。
back_translation: It is set against the historical week of 1989, when the Berlin Wall fell.

text: so mind-numbingly awful that you hope britney wo n't do it one more time , as far as movies are concerned .
translation: 映画に関しては、あまりにもつまらなくて、ブリトニーがもう一度そんなことをしないことを願っています。
back_translation: Regarding the movie, it was so boring that I hope Britney never does something like that again.

text: the young man keeps searching and finds an oasis of freedom in a sunflower field .
translation: 若い男は探し続け、ひまわり畑で自由のオアシスを見つけます。
back_translation: The young man continues to search and finds an oasis of freedom in a sunflower field.

text: mitch ( michael paloma ) , our leading man , is an ex-desert storm hero with a lot of bad luck .
translation: ミッチ（マイケル・パロマ）は、私たちの主役で、運の悪い元砂漠の嵐の英雄です。
back_translation: Mitch (Michael Paloma) is our main character, an unlucky former hero of the desert storm.

text: at the end of the movie , my 6-year-old nephew said , `` i guess i come from a broken family , and my uncles are all aliens , too . `` congrats disney on a job well done , i enjoyed it just as much !
translation: 映画の終わりに、6歳の甥が「俺は壊れた家族から来たんだと思うし、俺のおじさんたちもみんなエイリアンなんだ」と言いました。ディズニー、お疲れ様、素晴らしい仕事でした、私も同じくらい楽しみました！
back_translation: At the end of the movie, my 6-year-old nephew said, “I think I come from a broken family, and all my uncles are aliens.” Disney, great job, I enjoyed it just as much!

text: this is the kind of movie during which you want to bang your head on the seat in front of you , at its cluelessness , at its idiocy , at its utterly misplaced earnestness .
translation: これは、無邪気さやばかげたこと、まったく場違いな真剣さに対して、前の席に頭をぶつけたくなるような映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie that makes you want to hit your head against the seat in front of you in response to innocence, absurdity, and completely out-of-place seriousness.

text: [ fiji diver rusi vulakoro and the married couple howard and michelle hall ] show us the world they love and make us love it , too .
translation: [フィジーダイバーのルシ・ヴラカロと結婚したカップル、ハワードとミシェル・ホール]は、彼らが愛する世界を見せてくれ、それを私たちも愛させてくれます。
back_translation: The couple, Howard and Michelle Hall, who are married to freediver Lucía Bracero, show us the world they love, allowing us to love it as well.

text: when the fire burns out , we 've only come face-to-face with a couple dragons and that 's where the film ultimately fails .
translation: 火が消えたとき、私たちはいくつかのドラゴンと向き合っただけで、そこが映画の最終的な失敗の原因です。
back_translation: When the fire went out, we only faced a few dragons, and that was the ultimate cause of the movie's failure.

text: jolynn is convinced her clock is ticking and is dead set on making dave hear it -- and on making dave do the laundry .
translation: ジョリンは自分の時計が鳴っていると確信しており、デイブにそれを聞かせること、そしてデイブに洗濯をさせることに固執しています。
back_translation: Jolin is convinced that her clock is ringing and is insistent on making Dave listen to it and have him do the laundry.

text: his intricate paintings of the devil and his elaborate journal entries depicting encounters with him led sigmund freud to diagnose him as one of the first known schizophrenics .
translation: 彼の複雑な悪魔の絵画と、悪魔との遭遇を描いた詳細な日記の記録は、ジークムント・フロイトに彼を最初の知られた統合失調症患者の一人として診断させました。
back_translation: His intricate paintings of demons and the detailed diary entries documenting his encounters with demons led Sigmund Freud to diagnose him as one of the first known patients with schizophrenia.

text: awara paagal deewana is an action comedy , which revolves around a dentist who accidentally gets trapped into underworld and goes in for a roller coaster ride .
translation: アワラ・パーガル・ディーワーナーはアクションコメディで、歯科医が偶然アンダーワールドに巻き込まれ、ジェットコースターのような冒険に出かける物語です。
back_translation: Awara Pargal Diwana is an action-comedy about a dentist who accidentally gets caught up in the underworld and embarks on a rollercoaster-like adventure.

text: and so he does , at the risk of exposing the ugly truth beneath his false facade .
translation: そして彼はそうする、彼の偽りの外観の裏にある醜い真実が明らかになる危険を冒して。
back_translation: And he does so, risking the danger of the ugly truth behind his false appearance being revealed.

text: assigned to the vicious in-club slaying of a promising young rap act , the two detective delve into the recording industry where they hope to find answers - ideally ones that also come with property buyers or auditions .
translation: 有望な若手ラップアクトの無慈悲なクラブ内殺人事件を担当する二人の探偵は、録音業界に踏み込み、答えを見つけることを望んでいる—理想的には、物件購入者やオーディションも伴う答えを。
back_translation: Two detectives assigned to a brutal club murder involving a promising young rap act are delving into the recording industry, hoping to find answers—ideally, answers that come with property buyers and auditions as well.

text: it 's endearing to hear madame d . refer to her husband as 'jackie ' -- and he does make for excellent company , not least as a self-conscious performer .
translation: マダムDが夫を「ジャッキー」と呼ぶのを聞くのは愛らしいことであり、彼は自己意識の強いパフォーマーとしても素晴らしい仲間となります。
back_translation: Hearing Madame D call her husband "Jackie" is endearing, and he also makes a wonderful companion as a performer with strong self-awareness.

text: could use a little more humanity , but it never lacks in eye-popping visuals .
translation: もう少し人間味があっても良いが、視覚的な魅力には欠けていない。
back_translation: It could be a bit more human-like, but it is not lacking in visual appeal.

text: more concerned with sade 's ideas than with his actions . the movie achieves as great an impact by keeping these thoughts hidden as . . . [ quills ] did by showing them .
translation: サドの行動よりも彼の思想により関心を持っている。この映画は、これらの思考を隠すことで、クイルズがそれらを示すことで達成したのと同じくらいの影響を与えている。
back_translation: I am more interested in his thoughts than his actions. This film has an impact comparable to that achieved by "Quills" by hiding these thoughts while also showcasing them.

text: talk to her is so darned assured , we have absolutely no idea who the main characters are until the film is well under way -- and yet it 's hard to stop watching .
translation: 「彼女に話しかける」は非常に自信に満ちており、映画が進行するまで主要なキャラクターが誰なのか全くわかりません。しかし、それでも見るのを止めるのは難しいです。
back_translation: "Talking to her" is very confident, and until the movie progresses, you have no idea who the main characters are. However, it's still hard to stop watching.

text: if there was any doubt that peter o'fallon did n't have an original bone in his body , a rumor of angels should dispel it .
translation: ピーター・オファロンにオリジナルな部分が一つもないという疑いがあるなら、天使の噂がそれを払拭するはずです。
back_translation: If there is any suspicion that Peter O'Fallon has no original parts, the rumors of angels should dispel that.

text: a mawkish , implausible platonic romance that makes chaplin 's city lights seem dispassionate by comparison .
translation: 感傷的で信じがたいプラトニックなロマンスで、チャップリンの「街の明かり」が比べ物にならないほど冷淡に思える。
back_translation: A sentimental and unbelievable platonic romance that makes Chaplin's "City Lights" seem overwhelmingly cold in comparison.

text: peralta captures , in luminous interviews and amazingly evocative film from three decades ago , the essence of the dogtown experience .
translation: ペラルタは、光り輝くインタビューと30年前の驚くほど感情を喚起する映画を通じて、ドッグタウンの体験の本質を捉えています。
back_translation: Peralta captures the essence of the Dogtown experience through shining interviews and an incredibly emotional film from 30 years ago.

text: film ca n't quite maintain its initial momentum , but remains sporadically funny throughout .
translation: 映画は最初の勢いを維持することはできませんが、全体を通して時折面白さを保っています。
back_translation: The movie cannot maintain its initial momentum, but it occasionally keeps its interest throughout.

text: years after escaping to the wastelands outside the city , claire , one of the few people left who is not an addict , returns looking for the one man who still matters to her .
translation: 街の外の荒地に逃げてから数年後、麻薬中毒者ではない数少ない人々の一人であるクレアは、今でも彼女にとって重要な一人の男性を探しに戻ってくる。
back_translation: A few years after fleeing to the wasteland outside the city, Claire, one of the few people who is not a drug addict, returns to search for an important man in her life.

text: they then took over a pub in glenrowan , where they basically held a party , waiting for a train full of police to derail at a part of the track that they tore up .
translation: 彼らはその後、グレンローワンのパブを占拠し、実質的にパーティーを開催し、彼らが引き裂いた線路の部分で警官を乗せた列車が脱線するのを待っていました。
back_translation: They then occupied the Glenrothes pub, effectively throwing a party while waiting for a train carrying police to derail on the section of track they had torn apart.

text: it is a timely film and a transporting one .
translation: それはタイムリーな映画であり、観客を引き込む作品です。
back_translation: It is a timely movie that captivates the audience.

text: unlike his directorial efforts , la femme nikita and the professional , the transporter lacks besson 's perspective as a storyteller .
translation: 彼の監督作品である「ニキータ」、「レオン」に対して、「トランスポーター」にはベッソンのストーリーテラーとしての視点が欠けている。
back_translation: In his directed works "Nikita" and "Léon," "Transporter" lacks Besson's perspective as a storyteller.

text: an unintentional parody of every teen movie made in the last five years .
translation: 過去5年間に制作されたすべてのティーン映画の意図しないパロディ。
back_translation: An unintended parody of all teen movies made in the past five years.

text: martha is rich in contradictions , her tightly wound personality running counter to the sensual pleasure she offers others through her art .
translation: マルタは矛盾に富んでおり、彼女の固く結束された性格は、彼女が芸術を通じて他者に提供する官能的な喜びに逆らっています。
back_translation: Malta is rich in contradictions, and her tightly bonded personality stands in contrast to the sensuous pleasure she offers others through her art.

text: having never been a huge fan of dickens ' 800-page novel , it surprised me how much pleasure i had watching mcgrath 's version .
translation: ディケンズの800ページの小説の大ファンではなかった私ですが、マクグラスのバージョンを観ることでどれほどの楽しみを得たのか、驚きました。
back_translation: I was not a big fan of Dickens' 800-page novels, but I was surprised at how much enjoyment I gained from seeing McGrath's version.

text: [ while the last metro ] was more melodramatic , confined to a single theater company and its strategies and deceptions , while tavernier is more concerned with the entire period of history .
translation: 「ラスト・メトロ」はよりメロドラマチックで、単一の劇団とその戦略や欺瞞に限定されているのに対し、タヴェルニエはその時代全体の歴史により関心を持っている。
back_translation: "Last Metro" is more melodramatic and is limited to a single theater troupe and its strategies and deceptions, while Tavernier has a broader interest in the history of the entire era.

text: . . . comes alive only when it switches gears to the sentimental .
translation: . . . 感情的な部分に切り替わるときにだけ生き生きとします。
back_translation: It comes alive only when it switches to the emotional part.

text: by candidly detailing the politics involved in the creation of an extraordinary piece of music , [ jones ] calls our attention to the inherent conflict between commerce and creativity .
translation: 優れた音楽作品の制作に関わる政治を率直に詳述することで、[ ジョーンズ ] は商業と創造性の間にある内在的な対立に私たちの注意を呼び寄せています。
back_translation: By candidly detailing the politics involved in the creation of outstanding musical works, [Jones] draws our attention to the inherent conflict between commerce and creativity.

text: in the early years , mitra is repeatedly punished as the warden tries to break her .
translation: 初期の頃、ミトラは看守が彼女を打ち破ろうとする中で繰り返し罰せられています。
back_translation: In the early days, Mitra was repeatedly punished as the guards tried to break her.

text: levi , is an ex-navy man and an animal rights activist who returns home to find the war at home harder to fight than anything he 's ever encountered , but what and who is he fighting for ?
translation: レヴィは元海軍兵士で動物の権利活動家であり、帰国してみると、故郷での戦いは彼が今まで遭遇したどんな戦いよりも困難であることを知る。しかし、彼は何のために、誰のために戦っているのか？
back_translation: Levi is a former Navy soldier and an animal rights activist, and upon returning home, he discovers that the battle in his hometown is more challenging than any fight he has ever encountered. However, for what purpose and for whom is he fighting?

text: enter stella ( theron ) , a beautiful nerves-of-steel safecracker , who joins charlie and his former gang when they follow the backstabber to california , where they plan to re-steal the gold by tapping into los angeles ' traffic control system , manipulating signals and creating one of the biggest traffic jams in la history .
translation: 美しい神経の鈴なりの金庫破り、ステラ（テロン）が登場し、チャーリーと彼の元ギャングに加わる。彼らは裏切り者を追ってカリフォルニアに向かい、ロサンゼルスの交通制御システムに侵入し、信号を操作してロサンゼルス史上最も大きな交通渋滞を引き起こすことで金を再び奪う計画を立てる。
back_translation: The beautiful nerve-wracking heist starring Stella (Teron) joins Charlie and his former gang. They head to California in pursuit of the traitor, infiltrate the traffic control system in Los Angeles, and plan to manipulate the signals to create the biggest traffic jam in Los Angeles history, allowing them to steal money once again.

text: but his mentor and `` trainer `` joe ( chazz palminteri ) , a shady hustler who decides how and who johnny plays , is holding him back from his dream .
translation: しかし、彼のメンターであり「トレーナー」であるジョー（チャズ・パルミンテリ）は、アダルトなハスラーであり、ジョニーがどうプレイするかを決めているため、彼の夢を妨げている。
back_translation: However, his mentor and "trainer," Joe (Chazz Palminteri), is an adult hustler who decides how Johnny plays, thus hindering his dreams.

text: a quirky family parks its trailer on a texas desert and tries to build the golf course of the father 's dreams .
translation: 風変わりな家族がテキサスの砂漠にトレーラーを停め、父の夢のゴルフコースを作ろうと奮闘します。
back_translation: A quirky family stops their trailer in the Texas desert and struggles to create a golf course that fulfills the father's dream.

text: no film could possibly be more contemptuous of the single female population .
translation: どの映画も独身女性層にこれほどまでに軽蔑的なものはありえないだろう。
back_translation: There could be no movie that is this contemptuous towards single women.

text: and could going through with it destroy their marriages and friendships ?
translation: それを実行することで、彼らの結婚や友情が壊れる可能性があるのだろうか？
back_translation: Would it be possible that by doing so, their marriage or friendship could be damaged?

text: the limited sets and small confined and dark spaces also are homages to a classic low-budget film noir movie .
translation: 限られたセットや小さく暗い狭い空間も、クラシックな低予算フィルムノワール映画へのオマージュです。
back_translation: Limited settings and small, dark, narrow spaces are also a homage to classic low-budget film noir movies.

text: crazy jones is the story of finnigan jones , a depressed , semi-suicidal leaf-blower with tourette 's syndrome ( t . s . ) .
translation: クレイジー・ジョーンズは、抑鬱状態で半自殺的なトゥレット症候群（T.S.）の葉っぱ吹きのお話です。
back_translation: Crazy Jones is a story about a leaf blower with a semi-suicidal Tourette syndrome (T.S.) in a depressive state.

text: harris commands the screen , using his frailty to suggest the ravages of a life of corruption and ruthlessness .
translation: ハリスは画面を支配し、彼の虚弱さを利用して腐敗と冷酷さの人生がもたらす荒廃を暗示している。
back_translation: Harris dominates the screen, suggesting the devastation brought by a life of corruption and ruthlessness, exploiting his own fragility.

text: . . . a ho-hum affair , always watchable yet hardly memorable .
translation: …。退屈な出来事で、常に視聴可能でありながら、ほとんど記憶に残らない。
back_translation: ...A boring event that is always available to watch, yet hardly leaves a memory.

text: shows that jackie chan is getting older , and that 's something i would rather live in denial about
translation: ジャッキー・チェンが年を取っていることを示しており、それは私が denial に住み続けたいことです。
back_translation: It shows that Jackie Chan is getting older, and it's something I want to continue living in denial about.

text: in this vivid , emotionally complex ensemble piece , korean writer-director jeong jae-eun portrays this extraordinary turning point in every woman 's life .
translation: この鮮烈で感情的に複雑なアンサンブル作品において、韓国の脚本家・監督チョン・ジェウンは、すべての女性の人生におけるこの特別な転機を描いています。
back_translation: In this vivid and emotionally complex ensemble piece, South Korean writer-director Jeong Jae-eun depicts this special turning point in the lives of all women.

text: haruna passes her days looking at the sea , her beautiful face is bandaged .
translation: 春菜は海を見つめながら日々を過ごしており、彼女の美しい顔には包帯が巻かれています。
back_translation: Haruna spends her days gazing at the sea, and her beautiful face is wrapped in bandages.

text: just about all of the film is confusing on one level or another , making ararat far more demanding than it needs to be .
translation: 映画のほとんどは、何らかのレベルで混乱を招くため、『アララト』は必要以上に難解な作品になっている。
back_translation: Most films create confusion on some level, making "Ararat" an unnecessarily complicated work.

text: huppert 's superbly controlled display of murderous vulnerability ensures that malice has a very human face .
translation: ユペールの見事に制御された殺人的な脆さの演技は、悪意に非常に人間的な顔を与える。
back_translation: The brilliantly controlled performance of Yuper's murderous fragility gives a very human face to malice.

text: after a drastic confrontation with the 'normal ' outside world that results in fighting and panic , the group breaks up .
translation: 外の「普通の」世界との劇的な対立の後、戦いとパニックが巻き起こり、グループは解散します。
back_translation: After a dramatic confrontation with the "ordinary" world outside, battles and panic ensue, and the group disbands.

text: one is found in the city 's landfill site , and the other is horrifically murdered on a public bus .
translation: 一つは市の埋立地で見つかり、もう一つは公共バスで恐ろしい方法で殺される。
back_translation: One was found in the city's landfill, and the other was horrifically murdered on a public bus.

text: she tells him , and they go to the sonogram appointment together .
translation: 彼女は彼に伝え、二人は一緒に超音波検査の予約に行きます。
back_translation: She tells him, and the two of them go together to make an appointment for the ultrasound.

text: it helps in establishing connections , for instance between the strangely german kulturfilm and the film avant-garde of la sarraz .
translation: それは、奇妙なドイツの文化映画とラ・サラズの映画アヴァンギャルドの間のように、関係を築くのに役立ちます。
back_translation: It helps to build relationships, much like the strange German cultural films and the avant-garde cinema of La Sarraz.

text: a little judicious editing would have helped a lot , but the talented cast matches the film 's ambitions and compensates for its modest budget .
translation: 少し賢明な編集があれば大いに助けられたでしょうが、才能あるキャストが映画の野心に応え、控えめな予算を補っています。
back_translation: A bit of wise editing would have helped greatly, but the talented cast compensates for the film's ambitions and modest budget.

text: the aaa of action , xxx is a blast of adrenalin , rated eee for excitement . and vin diesel is the man .
translation: アクションのAAA、XXXはアドレナリンのバーストで、興奮のためにEEEに評価されています。そして、ヴィン・ディーゼルはその男です。
back_translation: Action AAA, XXX is rated EEE for its adrenaline bursts and excitement. And Vin Diesel is that man.

text: chep 's growing love for fran makes him willing to prowl the dark streets at night in search of items for her .
translation: チェップのフランに対する愛が育まれるにつれて、彼は彼女のためにアイテムを探すために夜の暗い通りを徘徊することを厭わなくなります。
back_translation: As Chep's love for Fran grows, he does not hesitate to wander the dark streets at night in search of items for her.

text: brings awareness to an issue often overlooked -- women 's depression .
translation: 見過ごされがちな問題、女性のうつ病への意識を高めます。
back_translation: We will raise awareness of the often overlooked issue of women's depression.

text: the whole thing plays like a tired tyco ad .
translation: 全体的に疲れたタイコの広告のように感じる。
back_translation: It feels overall like an advertisement for a tired taiko.

text: he indeed is douglas ( timothy bottoms ) , a perfect look-a-like .
translation: 彼は本当にダグラス（ティモシー・ボトムズ）で、完璧な二重です。
back_translation: He is really Douglas (Timothy Bottoms) and is a perfect double.

text: as his friends , family and representatives come to his aid , scotty 's inability to write propels his life into a direction from which he may not be able to regain control .
translation: 彼の友人や家族、代表者たちが彼を助ける中で、スコッティの書くことができないという無力感が彼の人生を制御不能な方向に押しやる。
back_translation: As his friends, family, and representatives help him, the feeling of helplessness that Scottie cannot write pushes his life in an uncontrollable direction.

text: it 's clear why deuces wild , which was shot two years ago , has been gathering dust on mgm 's shelf .
translation: なぜ2年前に撮影された「デューシーズ・ワイルド」がMGMの棚で埃をかぶっているのかは明らかです。
back_translation: It is clear why "Duchess and the Dirtwater Fox," filmed two years ago, is gathering dust on MGM's shelf.

text: it will take a strong stomach for the ordinary viewer to maintain an appetite for pinochet apologetics after this litany of suffering .
translation: この苦しみの列の後では、普通の視聴者がピノチェト弁護に対して食欲を保つには強い胃が必要でしょう。
back_translation: After this series of suffering, an ordinary viewer would need a strong stomach to maintain their appetite for the defense of Pinochet.

text: but things did not work as he planned , until . . .
translation: しかし、物事は彼が計画した通りには進みませんでした、まで。。 .
back_translation: However, things did not go as he had planned.

text: en este ambiente de violencia y pesimismo , salva y & # 193 ; ngel , dos p & # 237 ; caros de barrio , se ganan la vida mendigando en el metro para sus patatas bravas y sus verm & # 250 ; s de grifo .
translation: この暴力と悲観の環境の中で、サルバとアンヘル、二人の街のピカロたちは、メトロで物乞いをして彼らのパタタス・ブラバスとビールを手に入れて生計を立てている。
back_translation: In this environment of violence and pessimism, Salva and Angel, the two rogues of the city, make a living by begging in the metro to obtain their patatas bravas and beer.

text: after a glamorous -- but short-lived -- career as a movie star , evans tried out producing .
translation: 華やかで短命な映画スターとしてのキャリアの後、エバンズはプロデューサーに挑戦しました。
back_translation: After a glamorous but short-lived career as a movie star, Evans challenged herself as a producer.

text: the chase is on - the russians , whose dna code it is that mattie has in her backpack , and a group of terrorists compete to get the code from the person they all assume has it , gerry .
translation: 追跡が続いている - マティがバックパックに持っているDNAコードの持ち主であるロシア人たちと、コードを持っていると考えられているジェリーからそのコードを手に入れようとするテロリストのグループが競い合っている。
back_translation: The chase continues - a group of terrorists is competing to obtain the DNA code that Mati has in her backpack, which belongs to the Russians, and from Jerry, who is believed to have the code.

text: munnabhai starts wooing komal but she is in love with raja ( ajay devgan ) , a local vagabond doing nothing except working in a bowling alley as a bouncer .
translation: ムンナバイはコーマルにアプローチを始めるが、彼女は地元の放浪者ラジャ（アジャイ・デヴガン）に恋をしている。ラジャはボウリング場でバウンサーとして働いている以外は何もしていない。
back_translation: Munna Bhai starts to approach Komal, but she is in love with a local drifter named Raja (Ajay Devgn). Raja does nothing except work as a bouncer at a bowling alley.

text: i complain all the time about seeing the same ideas repeated in films over and over again , but the bourne identity proves that a fresh take is always possible .
translation: 私は映画で同じアイデアが何度も繰り返されることに常に不満を言っていますが、「ボーン・アイデンティティ」は新しい視点が常に可能であることを証明しています。
back_translation: I always complain about the same ideas being repeated in movies, but "The Bourne Identity" proves that a new perspective is always possible.

text: after being arrested , a young street-racing addict attempts to avoid the pitfalls of his illegal pastime .
translation: 逮捕された後、若いストリートレーシング中毒者が自分の違法な趣味の落とし穴を避けようと試みる。
back_translation: After being arrested, a young street racing addict tries to avoid the pitfalls of his illegal hobby.

text: upon sighting a small , previously not there , diner , he pulls in to find help .
translation: 彼は小さな、以前は存在しなかったダイナーを見つけて、助けを求めるために車を寄せた。
back_translation: He found a small diner that hadn't existed before and pulled over to seek help.

text: underachieves only in not taking the shakespeare parallels quite far enough .
translation: シェイクスピアの類似点を十分に掘り下げていないことで、期待以下の成果を出している。
back_translation: The results are below expectations due to not sufficiently exploring the similarities in Shakespeare.

text: with his signature sense of angry humour , activist filmmaker michael moore sets out to explore the roots of this bloodshed .
translation: 彼の独特な怒りのユーモアを持つ活動家映画監督マイケル・ムーアは、この血の流れの根源を探るために出発します。
back_translation: Activist filmmaker Michael Moore, known for his unique brand of angry humor, sets out to explore the roots of this bloodshed.

text: the kind of history lesson that you would n't mind seeing again and again , no matter the format .
translation: 何度でも見たいと思うような歴史の授業、フォーマットは問わず。
back_translation: A history class that makes you want to watch it over and over again, regardless of the format.

text: a well-crafted film that is all the more remarkable because it achieves its emotional power and moments of revelation with restraint and a delicate ambiguity .
translation: 感情的な力と啓示の瞬間を抑制と微妙なあいまいさで達成しているため、なおさら素晴らしい巧妙に作られた映画です。
back_translation: It is a wonderfully cleverly crafted film that achieves emotional power and moments of revelation through restraint and subtle ambiguity.

text: smart and fun , but far more witty than it is wise .
translation: スマートで楽しいが、賢いというよりは遥かに機知に富んでいる。
back_translation: It's smart and fun, but it's far more witty than it is clever.

text: it 's as if a bored cage spent the duration of the film 's shooting schedule waiting to scream : `` got aids yet ? ``
translation: まるで退屈な檻が映画の撮影スケジュールの間ずっと待っていて、「エイズにかかった？」と叫びたがっているかのようだ。
back_translation: It feels like a boring cage has been waiting the entire time during the movie shooting schedule, wanting to scream, "Did you get AIDS?"

text: feels a little too carefully crafted to be absolutely truthful , but nonetheless yields rich food for thought about the pains of the creative process and the insecurities of the artistic temperament .
translation: 絶対的な真実とは少し慎重に作られすぎているように感じるが、それでも創造的プロセスの苦しみや芸術的気質の不安についての豊かな考察を提供している。
back_translation: While it feels that the absolute truth is crafted with a bit too much caution, it nonetheless offers rich insights into the struggles of the creative process and the anxieties of artistic temperament.

text: she falls in love with a successful magician , whose life she has destroyed just by doing her job .
translation: 彼女は成功したマジシャンに恋をし、その人生を仕事をするだけで台無しにしてしまった。
back_translation: She fell in love with a successful magician, and her life was ruined just by doing her job.

text: with so many movies out there trying and failing to produce a single honest thrill , it 's so nice to see one come along that 's packed from start to finish with 'em .
translation: 数多くの映画が正直なスリルを生み出そうと試みては失敗する中、最初から最後までそのスリルで満たされた映画に出会えるのはとても嬉しいことです。
back_translation: It is very gratifying to encounter a movie that is filled with genuine thrills from start to finish, especially when so many films try and fail to create honest suspense.

text: cho 's latest comic set is n't as sharp or as fresh as i 'm the one that i want . . . but it 's still damn funny stuff .
translation: choの最新のコミックセットは、「I'm the One That I Want」ほど鋭くも新鮮でもありませんが、それでもとても面白い内容です。
back_translation: Cho's latest comic set may not be as sharp or fresh as "I'm the One That I Want," but it is still very interesting.

text: along the way , he encounters some strange characters , one of which is a cow trained in the martial arts .
translation: 彼は旅の途中でいくつかの奇妙なキャラクターに出会い、その中の一つは武道に訓練された牛です。
back_translation: He encounters several strange characters on his journey, one of whom is a martial arts-trained cow.

text: mindless yet impressively lean spinoff of last summer 's bloated effects fest the mummy returns .
translation: 昨夏の肥大化したエフェクト祭り「ザ・マミー リターンズ」の無思考ながら見事にスリムなスピンオフ。
back_translation: A beautifully slim spin-off of last summer's inflated effect festival "The Mummy Returns," despite its lack of thought.

text: another useless recycling of a brutal mid-'70s american sports movie .
translation: 無駄な再生の別の例、1970年代中頃のアメリカのスポーツ映画の残酷なリメイク。
back_translation: Another example of unnecessary revival is the brutal remake of an American sports movie from the mid-1970s.

text: to ease their roommate ( selma blair ) through a relationship-induced depression , cameron diaz and christina applegate take her out on the town .
translation: ルームメイトのセルマ・ブレアが恋愛による鬱を乗り越えられるように、キャメロン・ディアズとクリスティナ・アプルゲイトが彼女を町に連れ出す。
back_translation: Cameron Diaz and Christina Applegate take Selma Blair, her roommate, out in the town to help her overcome depression from a romantic relationship.

text: she must stand trial to seek freedom from a life of imprisonment .
translation: 彼女は自由を求めて、監禁生活から解放されるために裁判を受けなければならない。
back_translation: She must go to trial to seek freedom and to be released from her life of confinement.

text: with a shower like this , what could go wrong with the wedding ?
translation: こんなシャワーがあれば、結婚式で何がうまくいかないというのでしょうか？
back_translation: With a shower like this, what could possibly go wrong at the wedding?

text: shainberg weaves a carefully balanced scenario that is controlled by neither character , is weirdly sympathetic to both and manages to be tender and darkly comic .
translation: シャインバーグは、どちらのキャラクターにも支配されず、奇妙に両方に共感しつつ、優しさと暗いユーモアを併せ持つ注意深くバランスの取れたシナリオを織り成しています。
back_translation: Shineberg weaves a carefully balanced scenario that is neither dominated by either character, yet curiously empathizes with both, combining kindness and dark humor.

text: by abstracting and showing extreme details and connecting routines with themes and emotions , liesbeth worm gives a whole new perspective on day to day life .
translation: リースベス・ウォームは、極端な詳細を抽象化して示し、日常生活のルーチンをテーマや感情と結びつけることで、日常生活に新たな視点を与えています。
back_translation: Lizbeth Warm presents extreme details in an abstract manner and connects daily life routines to themes and emotions, offering a new perspective on everyday life.

text: an invaluable historical document thanks to the filmmaker 's extraordinary access to massoud , whose charm , cultivation and devotion to his people are readily apparent .
translation: マスードへの映画製作者の並外れたアクセスのおかげで、この歴史的な文書は非常に貴重なものとなっています。彼の魅力、教養、そして人々への献身が明らかです。
back_translation: Thanks to the filmmaker's extraordinary access to Masood, this historical document has become immensely valuable. His charm, erudition, and dedication to people are clearly evident.

text: even if you have no interest in the gang-infested , east-vs . -west coast rap wars , this modern mob music drama never fails to fascinate .
translation: ギャングに浸った東西のラップ戦争に興味がなくても、この現代のマフィア音楽ドラマは常に魅了されること間違いなしです。
back_translation: Even if you're not interested in the East Coast-West Coast rap feud steeped in gang culture, this modern mafia music drama is sure to captivate you.

text: arliss howard 's ambitious , moving , and adventurous directorial debut , big bad love , meets so many of the challenges it poses for itself that one can forgive the film its flaws .
translation: アーリス・ハワードの野心的で感動的、冒険心あふれる監督デビュー作『ビッグ・バッド・ラブ』は、自ら設定した多くの課題をクリアしているため、その欠点を許すことができる。
back_translation: Aris Howard's ambitious, moving, and adventurous directorial debut "Big Bad Love" overcomes many challenges it sets for itself, allowing for the forgiveness of its flaws.

text: [ seagal 's ] strenuous attempt at a change in expression could very well clinch him this year 's razzie .
translation: [シーガルの] 表現を変えようとする必死の試みは、今年のラズベリー賞を確実に獲得することになるかもしれません。
back_translation: The desperate attempt to change the expression of the seagull may very well secure a win at this year's Razzie Awards.

text: much like its easily dismissive take on the upscale lifestyle , there is n't much there here .
translation: 高級なライフスタイルに対する軽視した見方と同様に、ここにはあまり何もない。
back_translation: Just as there is a dismissive view toward a luxurious lifestyle, there is not much here.

text: a great cast and a wonderful but sometimes confusing flashback movie about growing up in a dysfunctional family .
translation: 優れたキャストと、時に混乱を招く素晴らしいフラッシュバック映画で、不完全な家族の中での成長を描いています。
back_translation: It depicts growth within an imperfect family with an excellent cast and at times confusing, wonderful flashbacks.

text: a true story set in modern times to bring people closer to the knowledge that there is a better way .
translation: 現代を舞台にした真実の物語で、人々により良い方法があることへの理解を深める。
back_translation: A true story set in modern times that deepens people's understanding that there are better ways.

text: watch as the archetypal stories of life and death , love and renewal , and battles between good and evil cross lines of culture and class to speak in the language of raw human emotion .
translation: 人生と死、愛と再生、善と悪の戦いの典型的な物語が、文化と階級の境界を越えて生の人間の感情の言語で語り合う様子を見てください。
back_translation: Watch a typical story of life and death, love and rebirth, and the struggle between good and evil, told in the language of human emotions that transcends cultural and class boundaries.

text: cube 's charisma and chemistry compensate for corniness and cliche .
translation: キューブの魅力と化学は、陳腐さやクリシェを補って余りある。
back_translation: The charm of the cube and its chemistry more than compensate for any clichés or banality.

text: it 's not that waiting for happiness is a bad film , because it is n't . it 's just incredibly dull .
translation: 「幸せを待つことが悪い映画だというわけではない。そうではない。ただ非常に退屈なだけだ。」
back_translation: "Waiting for happiness is not that it is a bad movie. It's not that. It's just very boring."

text: though tom shadyac 's film kicks off spookily enough , around the halfway mark it takes an abrupt turn into glucose sentimentality and laughable contrivance .
translation: トム・シャディアックの映画は不気味な雰囲気で始まるが、途中から急にグルコースの感傷と笑える装置に変わってしまう。
back_translation: Tom Shadyac's movie starts with a creepy atmosphere, but suddenly shifts to a sentimental and humorous tone halfway through.

text: there seems to be no clear path as to where the story 's going , or how long it 's going to take to get there .
translation: 物語がどこに向かっているのか、またそこに到達するのにどれくらいの時間がかかるのか、明確な道筋はないようです。
back_translation: It seems there is no clear path to where the story is heading or how much time it will take to get there.

text: while other kids buy into countless hours of studying just so they can get a mark in some teacher 's report book , handsome davis sees it as nothing more than a system of control over your mind .
translation: 他の子供たちが教師の成績表に印をつけるためだけに数えきれない時間を勉強に費やす一方で、ハンサム・デイビスはそれを自分の心を支配するためのシステムに過ぎないと見なしている。
