back_translation: That's dirty. It's sexism. And it's very amusing for the adult audience who enjoy Lawrence's vulgar approach and perfect timing.

text: matters are complicated still further when beckinsale finds herself falling in love with oldman 's character .
translation: ベッキンセイルがオールドマンのキャラクターに恋に落ちることで、事態はさらに複雑になります。
back_translation: The situation becomes even more complicated when Beckinsale falls in love with the old man's character.

text: challenged to stop an alien force , the friends must first prevent the slaughter of innocent civilians by a military vigilante , then overcome a threat to the bond between them .
translation: 異星の力を止めるために挑戦する友人たちは、まず軍事的自警団による無実の市民の虐殺を防ぎ、その後で彼らの絆に対する脅威を克服しなければならない。
back_translation: Friends who challenge to stop the power of an alien force must first prevent the massacre of innocent civilians by a military vigilante group, and afterwards, they must overcome the threats to their bonds.

text: sumo is not only the national sport of japan but a centuries-old cultural treasure that is literally part of the shinto religion .
translation: 相撲は日本の国技であるだけでなく、文字通り神道の一部である何世紀にもわたる文化的な宝です。
back_translation: Sumo is not only the national sport of Japan, but also a cultural treasure that has been part of Shinto for centuries.

text: now , all the mutants need to fight together against an enemy in common : general william stryker , who is planning to destroy them all .
translation: 今、すべてのミュータントは共通の敵、ウィリアム・ストライカー将軍に対して一緒に戦う必要があります。彼は彼らを全て消し去ろうとしています。
back_translation: Now, all mutants need to fight together against a common enemy, General William Stryker. He is trying to wipe them all out.

text: if you 're the kind of parent who enjoys intentionally introducing your kids to films which will cause loads of irreparable damage that years and years of costly analysis could never fix , i have just one word for you -M-^V decasia
translation: もしあなたが子供たちに意図的に大量の取り返しのつかないダメージを与える映画を紹介することを楽しむタイプの親なら、私からはただ一言だけ言いたい - M-^V デカシア
back_translation: If you are the type of parent who enjoys introducing movies that intentionally inflict irreparable damage on children, I have just one thing to say - M-^V Dekasia.

text: solid . is n't as groundbreaking as shiri , but has its moments .
translation: ソリッドはシリほど画期的ではありませんが、素晴らしい瞬間があります。
back_translation: Solid may not be as groundbreaking as Siri, but it has its wonderful moments.

text: bernal 's transformation from naive priest to tortured adulterer to hard-nosed careerist is riveting .
translation: バーンアルの無邪気な神父から苦悩する不倫者、そして冷酷なキャリア主義者への変化は魅力的です。
back_translation: The transformation from the innocent priest of Barnal to the suffering adulterer, and then to the ruthless careerist, is fascinating.

text: bobby and susan have found in each other what most only dream of finding , their soul mate .
translation: ボビーとスーザンは、お互いに多くの人が夢見るもの、運命の相手を見つけました。
back_translation: Bobby and Susan found what many people dream of: their destined partner.

text: it does n't seem like it 's following a fixed path to the finish . unlike so many movies , it feels alive .
translation: それはフィニッシュに向かって固定された道を進んでいるようには見えません。多くの映画とは違って、それは生きているように感じます。
back_translation: It doesn't seem like it's following a fixed path towards the finish line. Unlike many movies, it feels alive.

text: he sells them the drugs , they teach him how to smoke a joint .
translation: 彼は彼らに薬を売り、彼らは彼にジョイントの吸い方を教える。
back_translation: He sells drugs to them, and they teach him how to smoke a joint.

text: after healing a woman of a stroke , william picks up another pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: 脳卒中から回復した女性を癒した後、ウィリアムは神の深いことを学びたいと望む別の牧師を迎えます。
back_translation: After healing a woman who recovered from a stroke, William welcomes another pastor who wishes to learn about God's depth.

text: can henrik win the competition and elena 's heart , and what will happen with the magic shoes ?
translation: ヘンリクは競技に勝ち、エレナの心をつかむことができるのか、そして魔法の靴はどうなるのか？
back_translation: Will Henrik win the competition and capture Elena's heart, and what will happen to the magical shoes?

text: it 's disappointing when filmmakers throw a few big-name actors and cameos at a hokey script .
translation: 監督たちが陳腐な脚本にいくつかの大物俳優やカメオ出演を投げ込むと、失望感が漂います。
back_translation: When directors throw in a few big-name actors or cameo appearances into a clichéd script, a sense of disappointment looms.

text: this is a man 's man , a ladies man , a super-hero : he 's ted davis : `` bachelorman `` when the woman of his dreams , `` heather `` moves in next door , ted 's ordeal begins .
translation: これは男の中の男、レディーズマン、スーパーヒーロー：彼の名前はテッド・デイビス。「バチェラーマン」。彼の夢の女性「へザー」が隣に引っ越してくると、テッドの試練が始まる。
back_translation: This is a man's man, a ladies' man, a superhero: his name is Ted Davis. "Bachelor Man." When the woman of his dreams, "Heather," moves in next door, Ted's trials begin.

text: lovingly photographed in the manner of a golden book sprung to life , stuart little 2 manages sweetness largely without stickiness .
translation: 愛情を込めて撮影された、まるで黄金の本が生き返ったかのように、スチュワート・リトル2は主にべたつかずに甘さを実現しています。
back_translation: Shot with affection, Stuart Little 2 brings sweetness to life like a golden book revived, primarily without being overly sticky.

text: sometimes being honest and truthful is all you need . . . sometimes .
translation: 時には正直で真実でいることが必要な場合もあります…時には。
back_translation: Sometimes it is necessary to be honest and truthful... sometimes.

text: some , like the inmate philosopher , 451 , see the evil of their ways and repent , doing the best to keep their humanity .
translation: 囚人哲学者のように、451のように、一部は自らの過ちを見て悔い改め、人間性を保つために最善を尽くしている。
back_translation: Like a prisoner philosopher, like in Fahrenheit 451, some recognize their own mistakes and repent, doing their best to preserve their humanity.

text: the backyard battles you staged with your green plastic army men were more exciting and almost certainly made more sense .
translation: あなたが緑色のプラスチック製軍人で演じた裏庭の戦いは、より興奮し、ほぼ確実にもっと理にかなっていました。
back_translation: The backyard battle you played with green plastic soldiers was more exciting and almost certainly made more sense.

text: a distant , even sterile , yet compulsively watchable look at the sordid life of hogan 's heroes star bob crane .
translation: 遠く、さらには無機質でありながら、どうしても目が離せないホガンの英雄たちのスター、ボブ・クレーンの陰惨な生活を描いた作品。
back_translation: A work depicting the grim life of Bob Crane, a star of Hogan's Heroes, who is distant and yet inorganically captivating, making it impossible to look away.

text: . . . the best movie featuring the next generation cast , and a movie that 's ( almost ) every bit as great as [ treks ] ii and vi .
translation: 次世代キャストが出演する最高の映画であり、[スタートレック] II と VI に匹敵するほど素晴らしい映画です。
back_translation: It is the best movie featuring the next-generation cast, and it's as wonderful as [Star Trek] II and VI.

text: the christ allegory does n't work because there is no foundation for it
translation: キリストの比喩は、それを支える基盤がないため機能しません。
back_translation: The metaphor of Christ does not function because it lacks a supporting foundation.

text: it 's a setup so easy it borders on facile , but keeping the film from cheap-shot mediocrity is its crack cast .
translation: それは簡単すぎておそらく平凡に近いセッティングですが、映画が安易な凡庸さから脱却できているのは、その優れたキャストのおかげです。
back_translation: It's a setting that is probably too simple and close to being ordinary, but the film is able to escape from easy mediocrity thanks to its excellent cast.

text: klein ischgl actually turns out to be a stone-age-like townlet ( 9 inhabitants ) up the mountain , and t & # 252 ; rlichs grandfather , who runs the place , even resists to electricity and indoor plumbing .
translation: クライン・イシュグルは実際には山の上にある石器時代のような小さな町（住民は9人）で、場所を運営しているトゥルヒの祖父は、電気と屋内配管にさえ抵抗しています。
back_translation: Klein Ischgl is actually a small town that resembles the Stone Age, located on a mountain, with a population of nine residents. The grandfather of Truh, who runs the place, even resists electricity and indoor plumbing.

text: hundert 's challenge is to change this young man while maintaining his integrity .
translation: ハンドレッドの挑戦は、この若者の誠実さを保ちながら彼を変えることです。
back_translation: The challenge of the Hundred is to change this young man while preserving his integrity.

text: however , tania , his wife , tries to push him away from his criminal life , with no success .
translation: しかし、彼の妻タニアは、彼を犯罪の生活から遠ざけようとするが、成功しない。
back_translation: However, his wife Tania tries to keep him away from a life of crime, but she fails.

text: methodical , measured , and gently tedious in its comedy , secret ballot is a purposefully reductive movie -- which may be why it 's so successful at lodging itself in the brain .
translation: 手法的で、計量的であり、穏やかに退屈なコメディである『秘密投票』は、意図的に単純化された映画であり、それが脳に深く刻まれる理由かもしれません。
back_translation: "The Secret Ballot," which is methodical, quantitative, and gently dull in its comedy, is a deliberately simplified film, and that may be the reason it is deeply etched in the mind.

text: ruthie & # 38 ; connie demonstrates the wit and wisdom , heartache and joy of these two wonderfully funny and deeply complex women who live their private lives in public and with passion .
translation: ルーシーとコニーは、プライベートな生活を公に、情熱を持って生きる、この二人の素晴らしく面白く、深く複雑な女性の機知と知恵、心の痛みと喜びを示しています。
back_translation: Lucy and Connie passionately live their private lives publicly, showcasing the wit and wisdom, as well as the heartache and joy, of these two wonderfully interesting and deeply complex women.

text: even people clueless about skateboarding can enjoy dogtown and z-boys .
translation: スケートボードに詳しくない人でも『ドッグタウンとZボーイズ』を楽しむことができます。
back_translation: Even those who are not knowledgeable about skateboarding can enjoy "Dogtown and Z-Boys."

text: but now there is a new threat , matt addison has fully mutated into a seemingly unstoppable creature , code named nemesis , who will stop at nothing until everything around it is dead , but it also has another agenda .
translation: しかし、今や新たな脅威が存在します。マット・アディソンは完全に変異し、止めることができないように見えるクリーチャー、ネメシスと名付けられた存在になってしまいました。彼は周囲のすべてを殺すまで決して止まることはありませんが、別の目的も持っています。
back_translation: However, a new threat now exists. Matt Addison has completely mutated into a creature known as Nemesis, which seems unstoppable. He will never stop until he kills everything around him, but he has another purpose as well.

text: the film might have been more satisfying if it had , in fact , been fleshed out a little more instead of going for easy smiles .
translation: 映画は、実際にもっと肉付けされていれば、簡単な笑いを取るのではなく、もっと満足できるものになったかもしれません。
back_translation: If the movie had been more developed, it might have been more satisfying instead of relying on easy laughs.

text: thoughtless , random , superficial humour and a lot of very bad scouse accents
translation: 無思慮でランダムな表面的なユーモアと、非常にひどいスカウスアクセントがたくさん。
back_translation: Thoughtless, random superficial humor and a lot of very terrible Scouse accents.

text: this astounding documentary puts reality tv to shame and reminds us of just how unreal that prefabricated situation-based dreck really is .
translation: この驚くべきドキュメンタリーはリアリティテレビを恥じらせ、私たちにその製造された状況に基づくくだらなさがどれほど非現実的であるかを思い出させます。
back_translation: This amazing documentary puts reality television to shame and reminds us how unrealistic the absurdity based on its manufactured situations really is.

text: the daughter of italian immigrants born in s & # 227 ; o paulo , she had to overcome traumas , among these , the suicide of her parents .
translation: サンパウロで生まれたイタリア系移民の娘として、彼女はトラウマを克服しなければなりませんでした。その中には、両親の自殺も含まれています。
back_translation: Born in São Paulo as the daughter of Italian immigrants, she had to overcome trauma, including the suicide of her parents.

text: with its dogged hollywood naturalism and the inexorable passage of its characters toward sainthood , windtalkers is nothing but a sticky-sweet soap .
translation: 『ウィンドトーカーズ』は、しつこいハリウッドのナチュラリズムと、キャラクターたちが聖人へと不可避的に向かう中で、ただのべたついた甘いソープオペラに過ぎません。
back_translation: "Windtalkers" is nothing more than a sticky sweet soap opera, plagued by relentless Hollywood naturalism, as the characters inevitably move towards sainthood.

text: excellent performances from jacqueline bisset and martha plimpton grace this deeply touching melodrama .
translation: ジャクリーヌ・ビセットとマルタ・プリンプトンの優れた演技が、この深く感動的なメロドラマを彩っています。
back_translation: The excellent performances of Jacqueline Bisset and Martha Plimpton illuminate this deeply moving melodrama.

text: he no longer recognizes his wife isabelle nor his young son antoine nor his best friend fred .
translation: 彼はもう妻のイザベルも、幼い息子のアントワーヌも、親友のフレッドも認識できなくなっている。
back_translation: He can no longer recognize his wife Isabel, his young son Antoine, or his best friend Fred.

text: tells the humorous and touching story of six former creative anarchists who lived as house squatters in berlin during its heyday in the 80s when berlin was still an island in the middle of the former eastern germany .
translation: 1980年代のベルリンの全盛期、ベルリンが旧東ドイツの真ん中にある島であった頃に、家を不法占拠していた6人の元クリエイティブアナキストたちのユーモラスで感動的な物語を語っています。
back_translation: It tells the humorous and touching story of six former creative anarchists who were squatting in a house during the heyday of Berlin in the 1980s, when Berlin was an island in the middle of East Germany.

text: there 's plenty of footage here of some of the world 's best djs at work , and it 's impressive , even for someone uninterested in the genre .
translation: ここには、世界最高のDJたちの仕事ぶりを捉えた映像がたくさんあり、ジャンルに興味がない人でさえも感銘を受けるほど印象的です。
back_translation: Here, there are many videos capturing the work of the world's best DJs, so impressive that even those who are not interested in the genre are impressed.

text: talkiness is n't necessarily bad , but the dialogue frequently misses the mark .
translation: おしゃべりが必ずしも悪いわけではありませんが、対話はしばしば的外れです。
back_translation: Chatting is not necessarily a bad thing, but dialogue is often off target.

text: intriguing documentary which is emotionally diluted by focusing on the story 's least interesting subject .
translation: 興味深いドキュメンタリーですが、物語の最もつまらないテーマに焦点を当てることで感情が薄れてしまっています。
back_translation: It's an interesting documentary, but it loses emotional impact by focusing on the most boring theme of the story.

text: these human encyclopedias of cinema see two to five films a day , and from 600 to 2 , 000 films per year .
translation: これらの映画の人間エンサイクロペディアは、一日に2本から5本の映画を観ており、年間で600本から2,000本の映画を見ています。
back_translation: These human encyclopedias of movies watch between 2 to 5 films a day, totaling between 600 to 2,000 films a year.

text: in a coastal north carolinian small town in the mid 1990 's , a boy from the popular but troubled undirected group of students gets busted , and for punishment , you guessed it , has to do community service activities which include the high school 's spring play .
translation: 1990年代中頃のノースカロライナ州の小さな海岸の町で、人気があるが問題を抱えた方向性のない生徒たちのグループに所属する少年が捕まり、罰として予想通り地域奉仕活動を行わなければならなくなり、その活動には高校の春の劇が含まれています。
back_translation: In a small coastal town in North Carolina in the mid-1990s, a boy belonging to a popular yet troubled group of aimless students gets caught and, as a punishment, is required to perform community service, which includes participating in the high school spring play.

text: this is as lax and limp a comedy as i 've seen in a while , a meander through worn-out material .
translation: これはしばらく見た中で最も緩くてだらしないコメディで、使い古された素材を散策している。
back_translation: This is the loosest and most slovenly comedy I've seen in a while, wandering through well-worn material.

text: your stomach for heaven depends largely on your appetite for canned corn .
translation: あなたの天国への胃は、缶詰のコーンに対する食欲によって大きく左右されます。
back_translation: Your appetite for canned corn greatly influences your journey to heaven.

text: stealing harvard does n't care about cleverness , wit or any other kind of intelligent humor .
translation: 『ハーバードを盗む』は、機知、ウィット、またはその他の種類の知的ユーモアを気にしない。
back_translation: "Stealing Harvard" is indifferent to wit, cleverness, or any other kind of intellectual humor.

text: a virus has escaped in a secret facility called `` the hive , `` turning the staff into hungry zombies and releasing the mutated lab `` animals `` that they were studying .
translation: ウイルスが「ハイブ」と呼ばれる秘密施設から逃げ出し、職員を飢えたゾンビに変え、彼らが研究していた変異した「動物」を解き放ちました。
back_translation: A virus escaped from a secret facility called "Hive," turning the staff into hungry zombies and unleashing the mutated "animals" they had been researching.

text: he discovers a dark side to the circus and decides to leave , but finds he is caught between his love of a circus girl and the dark hand of the boss who is determined he stays .
translation: 彼はサーカスの暗い側面を発見し、離れることを決意しますが、サーカスの女の子への愛と、彼が留まることを決意したボスの暗い手の間に挟まれていることに気づきます。
back_translation: He discovers the dark side of the circus and decides to leave, but he realizes that he is caught between his love for the circus girl and the dark hands of the boss, which make him resolve to stay.

text: the two friends devise a plan to dress up in drag , commit a minor felony , get caught and then sent to the same prison in order to retrievie the ticket .
translation: 二人の友人は、ドラッグに扮装し、軽犯罪を犯し、捕まって同じ刑務所に送られ、チケットを取り戻すための計画を立てる。
back_translation: Two friends disguise themselves as drug dealers, commit a minor crime, get caught, and are sent to the same prison where they plan to retrieve their tickets.

text: a woman stands on the shore , looking off into the flooded valley where her friends and neighbors once lived .
translation: 女性は浜辺に立ち、かつて友人や隣人が住んでいた浸水した谷を見つめています。
back_translation: A woman stands on the beach, gazing at the flooded valley where her friends and neighbors once lived.

text: [ denis ' ] bare-bones narrative more closely resembles an outline for a '70s exploitation picture than the finished product .
translation: デニスの基本的なストーリーは、完成品というよりも70年代のエクスプロイテーション映画のための概略により近い。
back_translation: Dennis's basic story is closer to an outline for a 70s exploitation film than a finished product.

text: the unexplored story opportunities of `` punch-drunk love `` may have worked against the maker 's minimalist intent but it is an interesting exercise by talented writer/director anderson .
translation: 「パンチドランク・ラブ」の未開拓のストーリーの可能性は、制作のミニマリスト的な意図に逆効果だったかもしれませんが、才能ある作家/監督アンダーソンによる興味深い試みです。
back_translation: The unexplored story potential of "Punch-Drunk Love" may have been counterproductive to the minimalist intentions of the production, but it is an interesting attempt by the talented writer/director Anderson.

text: triple x is a double agent , and he 's one bad dude . when you 've got the wildly popular vin diesel in the equation , it adds up to big box office bucks all but guaranteed .
translation: トリプルXはダブルエージェントで、彼は一筋縄ではいかない男だ。非常に人気のあるヴィン・ディーゼルが加わることで、ほぼ確実に大ヒットすることになる。
back_translation: Triple X is a double agent, and he is a man who is not easy to deal with. With the very popular Vin Diesel joining, it is almost certain to become a big hit.

text: spurning her mother 's insistence that she get on with her life , mary is thrown out of the house , rejected by joe , and expelled from school as she grows larger with child .
translation: 母親の「人生を前に進めなさい」という言葉に反発し、メアリーは家を追い出され、ジョーに拒絶され、妊娠が進むにつれて学校からも退学させられます。
back_translation: Mary rebels against her mother's words, "Move your life forward," and ends up being kicked out of her house, rejected by Joe, and eventually expelled from school as her pregnancy progresses.

text: when she is discovered stealing money from the hotel , she turns to her friend zidanes for help .
translation: 彼女がホテルからお金を盗んでいるところを見つかったとき、彼女は友人のジダンに助けを求める。
back_translation: When she was caught stealing money from the hotel, she asked her friend Zidane for help.

text: there are some fairly unsettling scenes , but they never succeed in really rattling the viewer .
translation: かなり不快なシーンがいくつかありますが、視聴者を本当に動揺させることには成功していません。
back_translation: There are several quite unpleasant scenes, but it hasn't really succeeded in disturbing the audience.

text: principle photography began in july 1999 when the band , bering strait , entered the united states and began recording their first album in nashville .
translation: 主な撮影は1999年7月に始まり、バンドのベーリング・ストレイトがアメリカに入国し、ナッシュビルで最初のアルバムの録音を始めました。
back_translation: Principal photography began in July 1999 when the band Bering Strait entered the United States and started recording their first album in Nashville.

text: [ d ] oes n't bother being as cloying or preachy as equivalent evangelical christian movies -- maybe the filmmakers know that the likely audience will already be among the faithful .
translation: [d] は、同等の福音派クリスチャン映画のように甘ったるくも説教じみてもいない。おそらく製作者たちは、観客がすでに信者の中にいることを知っているのだろう。
back_translation: [d] is neither overly sweet nor preachy like other equivalent evangelical Christian films. Perhaps the producers know that the audience is already made up of believers.

text: in the next town over , desiree perry has returned to visit and show off her new anesthesiologist husband , reggie .
translation: 隣町で、デザイリー・ペリーは、新しい麻酔科医の夫レッジを連れて帰ってきて、自慢をしています。
back_translation: In the neighboring town, Desirée Perry came back with her new anesthesiologist husband, Reg, and is bragging about him.

text: significant for the chilling moments when the children echo the very sentiments that continue to fuel the middle east conflict .
translation: 中東の紛争を引き起こし続ける感情を子供たちがまさに反響させるその冷やりとした瞬間において、重要です。
back_translation: It is important in that chilling moment when children are precisely echoing the emotions that continue to provoke conflicts in the Middle East.

text: but throughout these years , she keeps in touch with her mother via letters to prison .
translation: しかし、これらの年の間、彼女は母親と監獄への手紙を通じて連絡を取り続けます。
back_translation: However, during these years, she kept in touch with her mother through letters to prison.

text: the careful compositions in the taiwanese what time is it there ? give us plenty of time to search for meaning and to wonder what the movie is trying to say .
translation: 台湾の「今、何時ですか？」の緻密な構成は、意味を探求し、この映画が何を伝えようとしているのかを考えるための十分な時間を私たちに与えてくれます。
back_translation: The meticulous structure of "What Time Is It Now?" from Taiwan gives us enough time to explore its meaning and consider what the film is trying to convey.

text: living hermit-like and existing on a strict alcohol diet , mudd 's world has collapsed .
translation: 隠者のように暮らし、厳格なアルコールダイエットで生きるマッドの世界は崩壊しました。
back_translation: The world of Mad, who lived like a hermit and survived on a strict alcohol diet, has collapsed.

text: a sobering and powerful documentary about the most severe kind of personal loss : rejection by one 's mother .
translation: 母親による拒絶という最も深刻な個人的喪失についての厳粛で力強いドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A solemn and powerful documentary about the most profound personal loss due to rejection by a mother.

text: the film first relates the journey of afghans refugees fleeing the bombing and war around herat and other cities to take refuge in ill-equipped camps .
translation: 映画はまず、ヘラートや他の都市周辺での爆撃と戦争から逃れるアフガニスタンの難民たちの旅を描いており、彼らは装備の整っていないキャンプに避難します。
back_translation: The film primarily depicts the journey of Afghan refugees escaping the bombings and war around Herat and other cities, as they seek refuge in poorly equipped camps.

text: it sounds sick and twisted , but the miracle of shainberg 's film is that it truly is romance
translation: それは悪趣味で歪んでいるように聞こえますが、シャインバーグの映画の奇跡は、それが本当にロマンスであるということです。
back_translation: It may sound tasteless and distorted, but the miracle of Shainberg's films is that they are truly about romance.

text: anna is the jewish daughter of a spanish mother and a greek father .
translation: アンナはスペイン人の母親とギリシャ人の父親を持つユダヤ人の娘です。
back_translation: Anna is a Jewish girl with a Spanish mother and a Greek father.

text: most folks with a real stake in the american sexual landscape will find it either moderately amusing or just plain irrelevant .
translation: アメリカの性的風景に本当に関心のあるほとんどの人々は、それを適度に面白いと感じるか、単に無関係だと感じるでしょう。
back_translation: Most people who are really interested in the sexual landscape of America will find it moderately interesting or simply irrelevant.

text: isidor 's tortilla heaven is the best restaurant in new mexico maybe even the world .
translation: イシドールのトルティーヤヘブンはニューメキシコで最高のレストランであり、世界でも最高かもしれません。
back_translation: Isidor's Tortilla Heaven is the best restaurant in New Mexico and may be the best in the world.

text: portrait of immigrant youth in two european countries , france and norway , where violence and illegal activity have become a part of everyday life , and where the search for identity can quickly take a dangerous turn .
translation: 移民の若者の肖像、フランスとノルウェーの二つの欧州国において、暴力や違法行為が日常生活の一部となり、アイデンティティの探求が迅速に危険な方向に進むことがある場所。
back_translation: Portrait of immigrant youth, in two European countries, France and Norway, where violence and illegal activities become a part of daily life, and the quest for identity can quickly take a dangerous turn.

text: it 's difficult to conceive of anyone who has reached puberty actually finding the characters in slackers or their antics amusing , let alone funny .
translation: 思春期に達した誰かが、スラッカーズのキャラクターや彼らの行動を面白いと感じることができるとは考えにくいです。
back_translation: It is hard to believe that someone who has reached puberty would find the characters and actions of the Slakkers interesting.

text: . . . if you 're just in the mood for a fun -- but bad -- movie , you might want to catch freaks as a matinee .
translation: もし楽しいけれども悪い映画を観たい気分なら、マニエの「フリークス」を見に行くことをお勧めします。
back_translation: If you're in the mood for a fun yet bad movie, I recommend going to see Marnie's "Freaks."

text: birot 's directorial debut ( she co-wrote the script with christophe honorM-i ) is n't so much bad as it is bland .
translation: ビロットの監督デビュー（彼女はクリストフ・オノレと共に脚本を共著した）は、悪いというよりは平凡です。
back_translation: Bilott's directorial debut (she co-wrote the script with Christophe Honoré) is more mediocre than bad.

text: price has to pretend he is also gay in order to stay hidden .
translation: プライスは隠れるために自分もゲイであるふりをしなければならない。
back_translation: Price has to pretend to be gay in order to hide.

text: two pairs , each married for quite a long time , are living in a small east german town .
translation: 二組のカップルが、かなり長い間結婚しており、東ドイツの小さな町に住んでいます。
back_translation: Two couples have been married for quite a long time and live in a small town in East Germany.

text: a strong and confident work which works so well for the first 89 minutes , but ends so horrendously confusing in the final two
translation: 最初の89分間はとても良く機能する強力で自信に満ちた作品ですが、最後の2分間は非常に混乱して終わってしまいます。
back_translation: The first 89 minutes are a very well-functioning, powerful, and confident work, but the last 2 minutes end very confusingly.

text: explores the question of whether it 's ever too late to say 'i love you ' .
translation: 「愛してる」と言うのが決して遅すぎることはないのかという問いを探求します。
back_translation: I will explore the question of whether it is ever too late to say "I love you."

text: through intimate conversations with top japanese artists , scholars and devotees from all cultures and walks of life , we reveal the multi-faceted appeal of the anime world .
translation: 日本のトップアーティストや学者、さまざまな文化や立場の愛好者との親密な会話を通じて、アニメの世界の多面的な魅力を明らかにします。
back_translation: Through intimate conversations with top Japanese artists, scholars, and enthusiasts from various cultures and backgrounds, we unveil the multifaceted charm of the world of anime.

text: well-written , nicely acted and beautifully shot and scored , the film works on several levels , openly questioning social mores while ensnaring the audience with its emotional pull .
translation: よく書かれ、演技も素晴らしく、美しく撮影され、音楽も素晴らしいこの映画は、いくつかのレベルで機能しており、社会的規範に対してオープンに疑問を投げかけながら、観客を感情的に引き込んでいます。
back_translation: This movie, well-written, with amazing performances, beautifully shot, and with wonderful music, works on several levels, openly questioning social norms while emotionally engaging the audience.

text: will she get it , or will death get her first ?
translation: 彼女はそれを手に入れるのか、それとも死が彼女を先に奪ってしまうのか？
back_translation: Will she obtain it, or will death take her first?

text: enter nick , charlie 's best friend , who does his best to help the only way he knows how : distracting charlie with parties and girls .
translation: ニックが登場する。チャーリーの親友で、彼の知っている唯一の方法でチャーリーを助けようと最善を尽くしている。パーティーや女の子でチャーリーの気を紛らわせることだ。
back_translation: Nick appears. He is Charlie's best friend and is doing his best to help Charlie in the only way he knows how. That is to distract Charlie with parties and girls.

text: de niro cries . you 'll cry for your money back .
translation: デ・ニーロが泣く。あなたはお金を返してもらうために泣くだろう。
back_translation: De Niro cries. You would cry to get your money back.

text: a long slog for anyone but the most committed pokemon fan .
translation: 最も熱心なポケモンファンを除いて、誰にとっても長い苦難です。
back_translation: For everyone except the most passionate Pokémon fans, it has been a long hardship.

text: no dia em que aceitou dirigir esta continuaM-gM-co , harold ramis deve ter saM-mdo da cama com o pM-i esquerdo . e aqueles que decidiram assistir a este filme tambM-im .
translation: ハロルド・ラミスがこの作品の監督を引き受けた日、彼は左足からベッドを出たに違いない。そして、この映画を見ることに決めた人々も同様だ。
back_translation: On the day Harold Ramis took on the direction of this work, he must have gotten out of bed with his left foot. The same goes for the people who decided to watch this movie.

text: scenes in which the band grooves with modern musicians montell jordan and joan osborne singing covers are spectacular .
translation: バンドがモダンなミュージシャンであるモンテル・ジョーダンとジョーン・オズボーンと共にカバーを歌いながらグルーヴするシーンは素晴らしいです。
back_translation: The scene where the band grooves while singing a cover with modern musicians Montell Jordan and Joan Osborne is fantastic.

text: director barry sonnenfeld and company retain much of the rubbery alien slapstick humor .
translation: バリー・ソネンフェルド監督とそのスタッフは、多くのゴムのようなエイリアンのスラップスティック・ユーモアを保持しています。
back_translation: Director Barry Sonnenfeld and his staff maintain a lot of rubbery alien slapstick humor.

text: it 's endlessly inventive , consistently intelligent and sickeningly savage .
translation: それは果てしなく創造的で、一貫して知的で、非常に残酷です。
back_translation: It is endlessly creative, consistently intellectual, and very cruel.

text: a passionately inquisitive film determined to uncover the truth and hopefully inspire action .
translation: 真実を突き止め、希望的に行動を促すことを決意した情熱的な探究心のある映画。
back_translation: A passionate and inquisitive film that is determined to uncover the truth and encourage hopeful action.

text: daughter from danang tells the dramatic story of one of these children , heidi bub ( a . k . a . mai thi hiep ) , and her vietnamese mother , mai thi kim , separated at the war 's end and reunited 22 years later .
translation: ダナンの娘は、これらの子供の一人であるハイディ・バブ（別名マイ・ティ・ヒエップ）と彼女のベトナム人の母、マイ・ティ・キムのドラマティックな物語を語ります。彼女たちは戦争の終わりに別れ、22年後に再会します。
back_translation: The daughter from Da Nang tells the dramatic story of one of these children, Haidi Babu (also known as Mai Thi Hiep), and her Vietnamese mother, Mai Thi Kim. They were separated at the end of the war and reunited 22 years later.

text: the romantic triangle leads to a surprising conclusion as the young man 's secret motive has explosive consequences .
translation: ロマンチックな三角関係は、若者の隠された動機が爆発的な結果をもたらすことで驚くべき結論に至ります。
back_translation: The romantic love triangle reaches an astounding conclusion as the hidden motives of the young people lead to explosive results.

text: it 's a pleasurable revelation to see foster feel out a role , both emotively and physically , with the well-marshaled gusto that she does here .
translation: 彼女がここで示すように、感情的にも肉体的にも役割を見つけ出すフォスターの、巧みに操られた熱意を見ることは、心地よい啓示です。
back_translation: Seeing Foster's skillfully manipulated enthusiasm as she discovers her role, both emotionally and physically, here is a pleasant revelation.

text: she has an emotional bond with a casino owner ( deepak tijori ) .
translation: 彼女はカジノのオーナー（ディーパック・ティジョリ）との感情的な絆を持っています。
back_translation: She has an emotional bond with the casino owner (Deepak Tijori).

text: drumline ably captures the complicated relationships in a marching band .
translation: ドラムラインは、マーチングバンドの複雑な人間関係を巧みに捉えています。
back_translation: The drumline cleverly captures the complex relationships within a marching band.

text: rarely has skin looked as beautiful , desirable , even delectable , as it does in trouble every day .
translation: 皮膚がこれほど美しく、魅力的で、さらには美味しそうに見えることは、日々のトラブルの中ではめったにない。
back_translation: It is rare to see skin that looks so beautiful, attractive, and even delicious amidst the troubles of everyday life.

text: the last ones , in denial of the inevitable , have waited too long in the security of their own homes .
translation: 最後の者たちは、避けられないことを否定し、自分たちの家の安全な場所であまりにも長く待ってしまった。
back_translation: The last ones denied the unavoidable and waited too long in the safety of their home.

text: real women may have many agendas , but it also will win you over , in a big way .
translation: 本物の女性は多くの目的を持っているかもしれませんが、それはまた、大きな形であなたを魅了するでしょう。
back_translation: A real woman may have many purposes, but that will also attract you in a significant way.

text: with the help of a sexy and elusive young woman named bad girl ( king ) , they come together to do battle with the kung fu master who 'll stop at nothing to get the scroll .
translation: セクシーでつかみどころのない若い女性「バッドガール（キング）」の助けを借りて、彼らはその巻物を手に入れるためにあらゆる手段を講じる功夫の達人と戦うために力を合わせる。
back_translation: With the help of a sexy and elusive young woman known as "Bad Girl (King)," they join forces to take on a kung fu master using all means necessary to obtain the scroll.

text: the crime matters less than the characters , although the filmmakers supply enough complications , close calls and double-crosses to satisfy us .
translation: 犯罪はキャラクターほど重要ではないが、映画製作者は私たちを満足させるために十分な複雑さ、危機一髪、裏切りを提供している。
back_translation: Crime is not as important as the characters, but the filmmakers provide enough complexity, close calls, and betrayals to satisfy us.

text: alex has replaced former roommate nicole ; the ex-best-friend , ex-girlfriend who in true clich & # 233 ; form screwed carrie , andy and an a-list director .
translation: アレックスは元ルームメイトのニコールを置き換えました。元親友であり元彼女でもあるニコールは、真のクリシェの形でキャリー、アンディ、そしてAリストの監督を裏切りました。
back_translation: Alex replaced her former roommate Nicole. Nicole, who was both a former best friend and ex-girlfriend, betrayed Carrie, Andy, and the A-list director in a true cliché fashion.

text: set in the colourful world of horseracing , horseplay follows the chaotic life of a wannabe horse trainer as he deals with the turf , the ladies and everyone else out to get him .
translation: 競馬の色とりどりの世界を舞台にした「ホースプレイ」は、 Turf（芝生）や女性たち、そして彼を狙う人々と向き合いながら、馬のトレーナーになりたいという夢を抱く主人公の混沌とした生活を描いています。
back_translation: "Horse Play," set against the colorful world of horse racing, portrays the chaotic life of the protagonist, who dreams of becoming a horse trainer, as they confront Turf (grass), women, and those who seek to target them.

text: judging from the strength of this superbly enigmatic film , oliveira himself seems far from ready to go home .
translation: この素晴らしく謎めいた映画の力から判断すると、オリベイラ自身はまだ家に帰る準備ができていないようだ。
back_translation: Judging by the power of this wonderfully mysterious film, it seems that Oliveira himself is still not ready to go home.

text: she drags along her best friend marie ( jenny ) , and marie 's boyfriend sean ( john ) and kid brother scott ( jonathan ) .
translation: 彼女は親友のマリー（ジニー）と、マリーのボーイフレンドのショーン（ジョン）、そして弟のスコット（ジョナサン）を引き連れて行きます。
back_translation: She will bring her best friend Marie (Ginny), Marie's boyfriend Sean (John), and her brother Scott (Jonathan) along.

text: it 's everything you do n't go to the movies for .
translation: 映画を見に行かない理由のすべてです。
back_translation: All the reasons for not going to see a movie.

text: based on an acclaimed 1935 novel about the war of liberation ( 1918-1920 ) that ensured estonia 's independence , the film tells about a group of young schoolboys heading to the front to fight the army of soviet russia .
translation: 1935年の称賛された小説に基づくこの映画は、エストニアの独立を確保した解放戦争（1918-1920）について語っています。物語は、ソビエト・ロシア軍と戦うために前線へ向かう若い少年たちのグループを描いています。
back_translation: Based on the acclaimed novel from 1935, this film tells the story of the War of Independence (1918-1920) that secured Estonia's independence. The narrative depicts a group of young boys heading to the front lines to fight against the Soviet Russian army.

text: he - rugged , handsome , the independent outdoor type - is hitching a ride back to la and knows a good bet when he sees one .
translation: 彼は無骨でハンサムで、独立したアウトドアタイプであり、LAに戻るためにヒッチハイキングをしていて、良い賭けを見抜く目を持っている。
back_translation: He is ruggedly handsome, an independent outdoor type, hitchhiking to return to LA, and has a knack for spotting a good bet.

text: stranded on hawaii , experiment # 626 ca n't actually do much harm : water all around , no big cities and two well-equipped representatives of the galactic federation already following close behind to catch him again .
translation: ハワイに取り残された実験#626は、実際にはあまり害を及ぼすことができない：水が周りにあり、大きな都市もなく、銀河連邦の2人の装備の整った代表者がすでに彼の後ろに密着して再び捕まえるために追ってきている。
back_translation: Experiment #626, left behind in Hawaii, is actually not capable of causing much harm: there is water all around, there are no large cities, and two well-equipped representatives of the Galactic Federation are already closely behind him, chasing him to capture him again.

text: maudlin and melodramatic we expected . boring we did n't .
translation: 私たちは感傷的でメロドラマチックであることを予想していましたが、退屈であるとは思っていませんでした。
back_translation: We expected it to be sentimental and melodramatic, but we didn't think it would be boring.

text: fired in disgrace , kids show host randolph smiley finds himself out on the street , while his replacement sheldon mopes , finds himself on the fast track to success with a new hit show as the proud purple rhino smoochy .
translation: 不名誉に解雇された子供向け番組のホスト、ランドルフ・スマイリーは路上に放り出される。一方、彼の後任シェルドンは落ち込んでいるが、新しいヒット番組「誇り高き紫のサイ、スムーチー」で成功への早道を歩んでいる。
back_translation: Randolph Smiley, the host of a children's program who was fired in disgrace, is thrown out onto the street. Meanwhile, his successor Sheldon is feeling down, but he is on the fast track to success with his new hit show, "Proud Purple Rhino, Smoochie."

text: his wife , katharine ross , tries to mediate .
translation: 彼の妻、キャサリン・ロスは調停しようとします。
back_translation: His wife, Catherine Ross, tries to mediate.

text: a once-in-a-lifetime chance to experience the free-thinking lifestyle of the '70s .
translation: 一生に一度の機会として、70年代の自由なライフスタイルを体験することができます。
back_translation: You can experience the free lifestyle of the 1970s as a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

text: in some cases love means actual love , in other cases it means sex , and in one case it means losing one 's virginity .
translation: 愛は場合によっては本当の愛を意味し、別の場面ではセックスを意味し、ある場合には処女を失うことを意味します。
back_translation: Love can mean true love in some cases, sex in others, and in certain situations, it means losing one's virginity.

text: it 's dark but has wonderfully funny moments ; you care about the characters ; and the action and special effects are first-rate .
translation: 薄暗いが、素晴らしく面白い瞬間があり、キャラクターに対して感情移入でき、アクションや特殊効果は一流である。
back_translation: It's dark, but there are wonderfully interesting moments, you can empathize with the characters, and the action and special effects are top-notch.

text: the lousy john q all but spits out denzel washington 's fine performance in the title role .
translation: ひどい作品の「ジョン・Q」は、デンゼル・ワシントンのタイトルロールにおける素晴らしい演技をほとんど吐き出してしまっている。
back_translation: The terrible film "John Q" almost completely squanders Denzel Washington's outstanding performance in the title role.

text: on a trip through texas to mexico , a group of teens pick up the survivor of a massacre that took place the night before .
translation: テキサスからメキシコへの旅行中、ティーンエージャーのグループは、前晩に発生した大虐殺の生存者を拾います。
back_translation: During their trip from Texas to Mexico, a group of teenagers picks up a survivor of a massacre that occurred the night before.

text: human nature is a goofball movie , in the way that malkovich was , but it tries too hard .
translation: 「ヒューマン・ネイチャー」はマルコビッチのようなコメディ映画ですが、やりすぎています。
back_translation: "Human Nature" is a comedy movie like "Being John Malkovich," but it goes too far.

text: a rebellious misfit , she is sent to summer camp by her frustrated parents .
translation: 反抗的なはぐれ者である彼女は、イライラした両親によってサマーキャンプに送られます。
back_translation: She, a rebellious outcast, is sent to summer camp by her frustrated parents.

text: in auteil 's less dramatic but equally incisive performance , he 's a charismatic charmer likely to seduce and conquer .
translation: オーテイユのドラマティックさは少ないが同様に鋭いパフォーマンスでは、彼は魅力的なチャーマーであり、誘惑して征服する可能性のある人物である。
back_translation: While the dramatic quality of Oteyue is limited, his equally sharp performance makes him a captivating charmer, someone who has the potential to seduce and conquer.

text: the film is a verbal duel between two gifted performers .
translation: その映画は、二人の才能あるパフォーマーの間の言葉の戦いです。
back_translation: The movie is a battle of words between two talented performers.

text: as he returns to moscow he finds a new world ruled by underworld bosses , criminal clans fighting each other and utter chaos on the desperately keeping appearances streets of russian capital .
translation: 彼がモスクワに戻ると、裏社会のボスたちに支配された新しい世界、互いに争う犯罪集団、そしてロシアの首都の外見を必死に保とうとする混沌とした街が広がっている。
back_translation: When he returns to Moscow, a new world dominated by the bosses of the underworld unfolds, a chaotic city where rival crime groups compete, and which desperately tries to maintain the appearance of the Russian capital.

text: dennis clegg is in his thirties and lives in a halfway house for the mentally ill in london .
translation: デニス・クレッグは30代で、ロンドンの精神障害者のための中間施設に住んでいます。
back_translation: Dennis Craig is in his 30s and lives in a halfway house for individuals with mental disabilities in London.

text: but when the substitute institutes some strange redefinitions of naughty and nice , putting christmas at risk , it 's up to scott to return with a new bag of magic to try to save christmas .
translation: しかし、代役が「悪い」と「良い」の奇妙な再定義を行い、クリスマスが危険にさらされると、スコットが新しい魔法の袋を持って戻り、クリスマスを救おうとするのが彼の役割です。
back_translation: However, when the substitute performs a strange redefinition of "bad" and "good," and Christmas is put in danger, it is Scott's role to return with a new magical bag and try to save Christmas.

text: the catholic church and the irish courts decide the doyle children put into church-run orphanages .
translation: カトリック教会とアイルランドの裁判所は、ドイルの子供たちを教会運営の孤児院に入れることを決定しました。
back_translation: The Catholic Church and the Irish courts decided to place Doyle's children in a church-run orphanage.

text: the tale of ancanar is an original fantasy story inspired by the author j . r . r . tolkien .
translation: アンカナールの物語は、著者J.R.R.トールキンにインスパイアされたオリジナルのファンタジー物語です。
back_translation: The story of Ankanar is an original fantasy tale inspired by the author J.R.R. Tolkien.

text: and the conclusion of the story is how the four attempt to pull off their master plan , this well-thought-out bank robbery .
translation: そして物語の結末は、4人がどのようにして彼らの熟考された銀行襲撃計画を実行しようとするかです。
back_translation: And the conclusion of the story is how the four try to execute their carefully considered bank robbery plan.

text: the problem with the bread , my sweet is that it 's far too sentimental .
translation: パンの問題は、私の愛しい人、それがあまりにも感傷的すぎることです。
back_translation: The problem with bread, my dear, is that it is just too sentimental.

text: a static and sugary little half-hour , after-school special about interfaith understanding , stretched out to 90 minutes .
translation: インターフェイス理解についての静かで甘い30分の放課後スペシャルが、90分に引き延ばされた。
back_translation: A quiet and sweet 30-minute after-school special on understanding interfaces was prolonged to 90 minutes.

text: ben rubin , a young israeli internist vying for the position of surgeon , learns that his internship has been terminated and he has been chosen to accompany abraham lazar , the hospital administrator and his wife , dori on a trip to india .
translation: ベン・ルビンは、外科医のポジションを求める若いイスラエル人内科医で、インターンシップが終了したことを知らされ、病院の管理者アブラハム・ラザールと彼の妻ドリと共にインドへの旅行に選ばれた。
back_translation: Ben Rubin is a young Israeli internist seeking a position as a surgeon. He was informed that his internship had finished and was chosen to travel to India with the hospital administrator Abraham Lazar and his wife Dori.

text: epic battles , spectacular effects and multiple story lines make the two towers a most excellent middle chapter in the lord of the rings film trilogy .
translation: 壮大な戦い、壮観なエフェクト、そして複数のストーリーラインが、「ロード・オブ・ザ・リング」映画トリロジーの中で「二つの塔」を非常に優れた中間章にしています。
back_translation: The grand battles, spectacular effects, and multiple storylines make "The Two Towers" an outstanding middle chapter in "The Lord of the Rings" film trilogy.

text: throughout their journey they survive gun battles , vicious hand to hand fighting , vision blurring car chases and a heart stopping train wreck hundreds of feet above a rocky gorge .
translation: 彼らの旅の中で、彼らは銃撃戦、 viciousな徒手格闘、視界をぼやけさせる車のチェイス、そして岩の峡谷の数百フィート上での心臓が止まるような列車の脱線を生き延びます。
back_translation: During their journey, they survive gunfights, vicious hand-to-hand combat, blinding car chases, and heart-stopping train derailments high above the rocky canyons.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: それはカフェインの効いた、乱雑な輝きがあり、もっと丁寧に発展されてほしいと思うアイデアで輝いていますが、より規律正しく成績を気にする学生たちの努力を恥じさせるようなエネルギーに満ちています。
back_translation: It shines with a chaotic brilliance fueled by caffeine, an idea that I hope will be more carefully developed, but it is filled with an energy that makes the more disciplined, grade-conscious students feel ashamed of their efforts.

text: evokes a little of the fear that parents have for the possible futures of their children -- and the sometimes bad choices mothers and fathers make in the interests of doing them good .
translation: 親が子供の可能な未来に抱く恐れの一端を呼び起こし、子供のために良かれと思って母親や父親がする時々の悪い選択を暗示しています。
back_translation: It evokes a part of the fears parents have about their children's possible futures and suggests the occasional poor choices that mothers and fathers make, thinking they are doing what's best for their children.

text: portentous and pretentious , the weight of water is appropriately titled , given the heavy-handedness of it drama .
translation: 前触れを感じさせ、わざとらしい『水の重さ』は、その劇の重苦しさを考慮すると、適切なタイトルと言える。
back_translation: The deliberately heavy 'Weight of Water' suggests a foreshadowing, and considering the gravity of the play, it can be said that it is an appropriate title.

text: two badly interlocked stories drowned by all too clever complexity .
translation: 二つの悪く組み合わさった物語が、あまりにも巧妙な複雑さに溺れている。
back_translation: Two poorly combined stories are drowning in an overly clever complexity.

text: what makes how i killed my father compelling , besides its terrific performances , is fontaine 's willingness to wander into the dark areas of parent-child relationships without flinching .
translation: 「父を殺した方法」が魅力的な理由は、その素晴らしい演技だけでなく、フォンテーヌが親子関係の暗い側面に躊躇せずに踏み込む姿勢です。
back_translation: The reason "How I Killed My Father" is captivating is not only because of its wonderful performances, but also due to Fontaine's willingness to delve into the dark aspects of parent-child relationships without hesitation.

text: trapped in a lovers triangle and ruthless game of lust , greed , and betrayal we follow one woman 's hypnotic journey to discover her true self . . .
translation: 愛の三角関係と冷酷な欲望、貪欲、裏切りのゲームに囚われた一人の女性が、本当の自分を発見するための催眠的な旅を追います……
back_translation: A woman trapped in a love triangle and a ruthless game of desire, greed, and betrayal embarks on a hypnotic journey to discover her true self...

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: 処方されるべきであり、推奨されるべきではない映画 -- 歯医者の待合室のように視覚的に退屈で、落ち着く音楽と予測可能な物語のリズムのクッションが完備されている。
back_translation: Movies that should be prescribed but not recommended -- visually dull like a dentist's waiting room, equipped with soothing music and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythm.

text: after returning home from a two week trial in chicago , rachel bishop ( rachel nord ) finds her sister emily bishop ( nancy walters ) missing .
translation: シカゴでの2週間の裁判から帰宅したレイチェル・ビショップ（レイチェル・ノード）は、妹のエミリー・ビショップ（ナンシー・ウォルターズ）が行方不明になっていることに気づく。
back_translation: Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord), returning home from a two-week trial in Chicago, realizes that her sister Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) is missing.

text: this event leads to deep thoughts about marriage , friendship , relationships and last not least life itself .
translation: この出来事は、結婚、友情、関係、そして最後に人生そのものについての深い考えを促します。
back_translation: This event prompts deep thoughts about marriage, friendship, relationships, and ultimately life itself.

text: ( hamlet ) privilege seeks to produce a subliminal confrontation with its ever-shifting subject matter , much as the body is reputed to create vortexes of healing and repose in response to traumas .
translation: （ハムレット）特権は、その絶えず変化する主題に対して潜在意識的な対立を生み出そうとし、身体がトラウマに反応して癒しと安息の渦を生み出すとされるように。
back_translation: (Hamlet) Privilege is said to create a latent conflict against its constantly changing subject, as the body responds to trauma and generates a whirlpool of healing and rest.

text: and suddenly , she spots her beloved , wandering over sand dunes and brings the exhausted patricia to his oasis called 'shangri-la ' . . .
translation: そして突然、彼女は愛する人を見つけ、砂丘をさまよいながら、疲れ果てたパトリシアを「シャングリラ」と呼ばれる彼のオアシスに連れていく。
back_translation: And suddenly, she finds the person she loves, and while wandering through the sand dunes, she takes the exhausted Patricia to his oasis called "Shangri-La."

text: no such thing may be far from perfect , but those small , odd hartley touches help you warm to it .
translation: 完璧からはほど遠いかもしれませんが、その小さな奇妙なハートリーのタッチが、あなたがそれに親しみを感じる手助けをしてくれます。
back_translation: It may be far from perfect, but that little peculiar Hartley touch helps you feel a familiarity with it.

text: to worsen things , during the holidays aksel gets teamed up with the two girls , fatima and annika , to perform a song to the local youth club 's song contest , melodi grand prix .
translation: 状況が悪化することに、休日中にアクセルはファティマとアニカという2人の女の子とチームを組んで、地元のユースクラブの歌コンテスト「メロディ・グランプリ」に出場することになった。
back_translation: As the situation worsened, during the holidays, Axel teamed up with two girls named Fatima and Anika to participate in the local youth club's singing contest, "Melody Grand Prix."

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: ディケンズの言葉と、脚本・監督のダグラス・マクグラスの穏やかな演出によって、すばらしいお話が語られています。
back_translation: Through the words of Dickens and the gentle direction of screenwriter and director Douglas McGrath, a wonderful story is being told.

text: from the trembling fury of gheorgiu 's tosca to the penetrating stare of raimondi 's scarpia , this tosca blazes with passion . at its best , it 's sublime .
translation: ゲオルギウのトスカの震える怒りから、ライモンディのスカピアの鋭い視線まで、このトスカは情熱で燃えています。最良の時には、それは崇高です。
back_translation: From the trembling fury of Giorgi’s Tosca to the sharp gaze of Raimondi’s Scarpia, this Tosca is ablaze with passion. At its best, it is sublime.

text: some of the featured art events include `` burial in space `` by woodpussy ( a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who blast their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own creation ) ; `` nebulous entity `` and `` futura deluxe `` ( two large , roving installation pieces engineered using mathematics derived from fields of neural networks , ecological systems and fractals ) ; and a performance artist dea million who stages her `` wedding `` to america .
translation: 特集されているアートイベントには、ウッドパッシーによる「宇宙の埋葬」（自身の創造したロケットで故郷の創設者を宇宙に打ち上げる音楽家と花火技師のグループ）；「曖昧な存在」と「フューチュラ・デラックス」（神経ネットワーク、生態系、フラクタルの分野から導き出された数学を用いて設計された2つの大型移動式インスタレーションピース）；そしてアメリカとの「結婚式」を演じるパフォーマンスアーティスト、ディア・ミリオンが含まれています。
back_translation: The featured art events include "Burial in Space" by Wood Pasi, a group of musicians and pyrotechnicians launching the founder of their hometown into space with a rocket they created; "Ambiguous Existence" and "Futura Deluxe," two large mobile installation pieces designed using mathematics derived from the fields of neural networks, ecosystems, and fractals; and performance artist Dear Million, who performs a "wedding" with America.

text: . . . one big laugh , three or four mild giggles , and a whole lot of not much else .
translation: …一つの大きな笑い、三・四回の軽い笑い、そして他にはあまり何もない。
back_translation: ...one big laugh, three or four light laughs, and not much else.

text: bold , imaginative , rational and persuasive an account of the lethally dangerous world we live in , the sum of all fears is an international spy drama with visceral impact .
translation: 大胆で創造的、合理的かつ説得力のある、本当に危険な世界についての物語である「恐怖の総体」は、強烈な影響を持つ国際スパードラマです。
back_translation: "The Totality of Fear" is a bold, creative, rational, and compelling story about a truly dangerous world, and it is an international spy drama with a powerful impact.

text: continually challenges perceptions of guilt and innocence , of good guys and bad , and asks us whether a noble end can justify evil means .
translation: 絶えず罪と無罪、善人と悪人の認識に挑戦し、高貴な目的が邪悪な手段を正当化することができるのかと私たちに問いかけます。
back_translation: It constantly challenges our perceptions of guilt and innocence, good and evil, and questions whether noble purposes can justify wicked means.

text: but does she realize , that this version of francis , douglas and henry is in reality her grown up son alan ( timothy bottoms ) . . . ?
translation: しかし、彼女はこのフランシス、ダグラス、ヘンリーのバージョンが実際には彼女の成長した息子アラン（ティモシー・ボトムズ）であることに気づいているのでしょうか？
back_translation: However, does she realize that this version of Francis, Douglas, and Henry is actually her grown son Alan (Timothy Bottoms)?

text: the other members of the po-boys - peter , joseph and guy , are also facing a musician 's mid-life crisis in a business that the age 30 is seen as over the hill .
translation: ポーボーイズの他のメンバー、ピーター、ジョセフ、ガイも、30歳が限界と見なされるビジネスの中で、ミュージシャンの中年危機に直面しています。
back_translation: The other members of the Po Boys, Peter, Joseph, and Guy, are also facing a mid-life crisis as musicians in a business where 30 is considered the limit.

text: he lures her back to las vegas to continue her career .
translation: 彼は彼女をラスベガスに誘い、キャリアを続けさせる。
back_translation: He invites her to Las Vegas and lets her continue her career.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: その映画は感染するような熱意を持っており、私たちはその場所、その時、そのスポーツを中心にしたすべての生命に対する映画の確信に感動します。
back_translation: The movie has an infectious enthusiasm, and we are moved by its conviction about all life centered around that place, that time, and that sport.

text: about as satisfying and predictable as the fare at your local drive through .
translation: 地元のドライブスルーのメニューと同じくらい満足で予測可能です。
back_translation: It is as satisfying and predictable as the menu at the local drive-thru.

text: a new reality-style game show , `` treasure hunt `` has invited a cast of contestants , including a los angeles cop who 's joined to try and make up for an earlier pr blunder , to a tropical island to hunt for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars .
translation: 新しいリアリティスタイルのゲームショー「トレジャーハント」が、ロサンゼルスの警官を含むコンテスタントたちを招待しました。彼は以前の広報の失敗を挽回するために参加しており、10百万ドルの価値の埋蔵宝を探すためにトロピカルアイランドに向かいます。
back_translation: The new reality-style game show "Treasure Hunt" has invited contestants, including a police officer from Los Angeles. He is participating to make up for a previous PR failure and is heading to a tropical island to search for buried treasure worth ten million dollars.

text: it takes viewers on an intimate road trip across north america - from a polyamory conference in the catskills , a swingers ' convention in las vegas , to long-term multipartner families in california .
translation: 北アメリカを横断する親密なロードトリップへ視聴者を連れて行きます。キャッツキルのポリアモリー会議、ラスベガスのスウィンガーズコンベンション、カリフォルニアの長期的なマルチパートナーファミリーまで。
back_translation: We take viewers on an intimate road trip across North America, from the Polyamory Conference in the Catskills, to the Swingers Convention in Las Vegas, to long-term multi-partner families in California.

text: eight year old maria has her bicycle stolen , and like a lightning from the clear sky ploddy the policicar comes to the rescue !
translation: 8歳のマリアの自転車が盗まれ、晴天の青空から稲妻のようにプラディ警官が助けに来ます！
back_translation: Eight-year-old Maria's bicycle is stolen, and Police Officer Prady comes to help like a flash of lightning from the clear blue sky!

text: [ haynes ' ] homage to such films as `` all that heaven allows `` and `` imitation of life `` transcends them . simply put , `` far from heaven `` is a masterpiece .
translation: [ヘインズの]「天に許されたすべて」や「人生の模倣」といった映画へのオマージュは、それらを超えています。簡単に言うと、「ファー・フロム・ヘブン」は傑作です。
back_translation: The homage to films such as "[Haynes's] 'All That Heaven Allows' and 'Imitation of Life' goes beyond them. In simple terms, 'Far from Heaven' is a masterpiece."

text: if you go to attic town you 'll find a place where the streets have no names and you can never turn back .
translation: 屋根裏の町に行くと、名前のない道があり、二度と戻れない場所が見つかります。
back_translation: When you go to the town in the attic, there is a nameless road where you will find a place you can never return to.

text: all very stylish and beautifully photographed , but far more trouble than it 's worth , with fantasy mixing with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion .
translation: すべて非常にスタイリッシュで美しく撮影されていますが、それに見合う以上の手間がかかり、幻想と現実が混ざり合い、俳優が混乱を加えるために1人以上の役を演じています。
back_translation: Everything is shot in a very stylish and beautiful way, but it involves more effort than it deserves, blending fantasy and reality, with actors playing more than one role to add to the confusion.

text: what 's most memorable about circuit is that it 's shot on digital video , whose tiny camera enables shafer to navigate spaces both large . . . and small . . . with considerable aplomb .
translation: 回路で最も記憶に残るのは、それがデジタルビデオで撮影されていることであり、その小さなカメラによってシャファーは広い空間と狭い空間の両方を見事に移動できることです。
back_translation: What stands out the most about the circuit is that it is being filmed in digital video, and that the shaffer can elegantly move through both wide and narrow spaces with that small camera.

text: becoming fast friends , they soon both moved with their families near coney island , where they became active community leaders .
translation: 親友になった彼らはすぐに家族と共にコニーアイランドの近くに引っ越し、そこで地域のリーダーとして活動するようになりました。
back_translation: Having become close friends, they quickly moved near Coney Island with their families and began working as community leaders there.

text: watching haneke 's film is , aptly enough , a challenge and a punishment . but watching huppert , a great actress tearing into a landmark role , is riveting .
translation: ハネケの映画を観ることは、適切にも、挑戦であり罰です。しかし、偉大な女優であるユペールが重要な役を演じるのを見ることは、心を奪われます。
back_translation: Watching a Haneke film is, appropriately, both a challenge and a punishment. However, seeing the great actress Huppert perform an important role is captivating.

text: ramsay succeeds primarily with her typical blend of unsettling atmospherics , delivering a series of abrasive , stylized sequences that burn themselves upon the viewer 's memory .
translation: ラムゼイは、典型的な不穏な雰囲気のブレンドによって主に成功し、視聴者の記憶に焼き付く一連の刺激的でスタイライズされたシークエンスを提供します。
back_translation: Ramsey primarily succeeds through a typical blend of unsettling atmosphere, providing a series of exciting and stylized sequences that leave a lasting impression on the audience's memory.

text: upon getting together on their spring break , they realize that they are bored in their small suburban connecticut hometown .
translation: 春休みに集まった彼らは、コネチカット州の小さな郊外の故郷で退屈していることに気づく。
back_translation: During spring break, they realize they are bored in their small suburban hometown in Connecticut.

text: kidd deals with lust and egoism the way a surgeon is interested in a tumor . he exposes ugly attitudes but maintains compassion for his mean-spirited subject .
translation: キッドは欲望とエゴイズムに対し、外科医が腫瘍に興味を持つように接します。彼は醜い態度を明らかにしますが、意地悪な対象に対しては思いやりを持っています。
back_translation: Kid approaches desire and egoism as a surgeon would with a tumor. He reveals an ugly attitude but shows compassion towards those who are the target of his spite.

text: what if your most controversial act turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world ?
translation: もしあなたの最も物議を醸す行動が世界で最も伝統的なことであると判明したらどうしますか？
back_translation: What would you do if your most controversial action turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world?

text: the country bears wastes an exceptionally good idea . but the movie that does n't really deliver for country music fans or for family audiences
translation: カントリー・ベアーズは非常に良いアイデアです。しかし、この映画はカントリー音楽ファンやファミリー向けにはあまり満足できません。
back_translation: The Country Bears is a very good idea. However, this movie may not be very satisfying for country music fans or families.

text: this is a movie filled with unlikable , spiteful idiots ; whether or not their friendship is salvaged makes no difference in the least .
translation: これは好かれない、意地悪な馬鹿たちに満ちた映画であり、彼らの友情が修復されるかどうかはまったく重要ではありません。
back_translation: This is a movie filled with unlikable, mean-spirited fools, and whether their friendship is repaired is not important at all.

text: it 's a good thing that woolly mammoths are extinct , because this movie will have every kid in the schoolyard wishing for their very own .
translation: ウーリーマンモスが絶滅しているのは良いことです。この映画を見たら、学校の校庭の全ての子供たちが自分だけのウーリーマンモスを欲しがることでしょう。
back_translation: It is a good thing that the woolly mammoth is extinct. If they watch this movie, all the children in the schoolyard will want their own woolly mammoth.

text: someone killed legendary porn king fat guy , and detectives moose & # 38 ; squirrel must go deep undercover ( literally ) to find the murderer with the help of their `` special `` homicide unit .
translation: 伝説のポルノ王である太った男が殺され、探偵のムースとスクイレルは、彼らの「特別な」殺人課の助けを借りて、殺人者を見つけるために深く潜入しなければなりません（文字通り）。
back_translation: A legendary fat porn king is murdered, and detectives Moose and Squirrel must dig deep (literally) with the help of their "special" homicide unit to find the killer.

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: 全体として、これは非常に娯楽的で考えさせられる映画で、シンプルなメッセージがあります：神は愛です。
back_translation: Overall, this is a very entertaining and thought-provoking film with a simple message: God is love.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a two and a half year epic that follows bering strait 's amazing cultural fusion-coming of age journey in america .
translation: 「ベーリング海峡のバラード」は、ベーリング海峡の素晴らしい文化融合とアメリカでの成長の旅を描いた2年半にわたる壮大な物語です。
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is an epic story spanning two and a half years that depicts the wonderful cultural fusion of the Bering Strait and the journey of growth in America.

text: it is a look into one of the major social issues of the 21st century , inmigration .
translation: これは21世紀の主要な社会問題のひとつ、移民に関するものです。
back_translation: This is about one of the major social issues of the 21st century: immigration.

text: anyone who can count to five ( the film 's target market ? ) can see where this dumbed-down concoction is going .
translation: 五まで数えられる誰でも（映画のターゲット市場？）この単純化された作品がどこへ向かっているかを見て取ることができる。
back_translation: Anyone who can count up to five (the movie's target audience?) can see where this simplified work is headed.

text: about as enjoyable , i would imagine , as searching for a quarter in a giant pile of elephant feces . . . positively dreadful .
translation: 象の糞の巨大な山の中で25セントを探すのと同じくらい楽しいだろうと思います...まったく恐ろしい。
back_translation: I think it would be as fun as searching for a quarter in a gigantic pile of elephant dung... absolutely horrifying.

text: but there is indie rock , a restless entrepreneurial spirit , and carly , morgan and chuck , three optimistic post college grads , ready to make their splash in the world .
translation: しかし、インディーロックがあり、落ち着かない起業家精神があり、カーリー、モーガン、チャックという3人の楽観的な大学卒業生が、世界に自分たちの足跡を残す準備をしています。
back_translation: However, there is indie rock, an uneasy entrepreneurial spirit, and three optimistic college graduates named Carly, Morgan, and Chuck who are ready to make their mark on the world.

text: before they can win some money , a local mob boss , frank finnigan , sees the horse and steals it as payment for the gambling debt of tony , a local jockey and single parent .
translation: 彼らがお金を稼ぐ前に、地元のマフィアのボス、フランク・フィニガンが馬を見て、地元の騎手でありシングルペアレントのトニーのギャンブルの借金の支払いとしてそれを奪います。
back_translation: Before they could make money, the local mafia boss, Frank Finnegan, looks at the horse and takes it as payment for the gambling debts of the local jockey and single parent, Tony.

text: aside from minor tinkering , this is the same movie you probably loved in 1994 , except that it looks even better .
translation: 小さな手直しを除けば、これはおそらく1994年にあなたが愛したのと同じ映画ですが、さらに見栄えが良くなっています。
back_translation: Aside from some minor adjustments, this is probably the same movie you loved in 1994, but it's looking even better.

text: a year later , strange things start to happen , as each person that was connected to the hit and run incident is being killed . . . one
translation: 1年後、奇妙なことが起こり始める。ひき逃げ事件に関わった各人が次々と殺されていく。。 . 一人
back_translation: A year later, strange things begin to happen. One by one, everyone involved in the hit-and-run incident is being killed... one by one.

text: our america is the true story of two bright and ambitious chicago teenagers who , living in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country , get a chance to become reporters for npr .
translation: 私たちのアメリカは、国の最悪のインナーシティーの一つで暮らす二人の明るく野心的なシカゴのティーンエイジャーが、NPRのレポーターになるチャンスを得る真実の物語です。
back_translation: Our America is a true story about two bright and ambitious Chicago teenagers living in one of the country's worst inner cities who get a chance to become NPR reporters.

text: when it comes to entertainment , children deserve better than pokemon 4ever .
translation: エンターテインメントに関して言えば、子供たちは『ポケモン4ever』よりももっと良いものに値します。
back_translation: When it comes to entertainment, children deserve better than "Pokémon 4ever."

text: geordie ( thom fitzgerald ) , a visiting canadian pornographer , bogdan ( mihai calota ) , a reluctant city dog-catcher , and nathalie ( alberta watson ) , a lonely diplomat 's wife - each risks losing everything as they become embroiled in the struggles of bucharest 's abandoned children , gypsies , dogs and beggars .
translation: ジョーディ（トム・フィッツジェラルド）、カナダからの訪問者であるポルノ映画制作者、ボグダン（ミハイ・カロタ）、渋々市の犬捕獲者、そしてナタリー（アルバータ・ワトソン）、孤独な外交官の妻 - 彼らはそれぞれ、ブカレストの捨てられた子供たち、ジプシー、犬、そして乞食たちの闘争に巻き込まれ、全てを失う危険を冒している。
back_translation: Jordy (Tom Fitzgerald), a visitor from Canada and a porn film producer; Bogdan (Mihai Carota), a reluctant dog catcher; and Natalie (Alberta Watson), the lonely wife of a diplomat - each of them becomes entangled in the struggles of the abandoned children, gypsies, dogs, and beggars of Bucharest, risking everything they have to lose.

text: there are now two signs that m . night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: 現在、M・ナイト・シャマランのデビュー作が映画の神秘的ジャンルに彼が与えるすべてを吸収してしまったという2つの兆候があります：『アンブレイカブル』と『サイン』です。
back_translation: Currently, there are two signs that M. Night Shyamalan's debut work has absorbed everything he contributes to the mystical genre of film: "Unbreakable" and "Signs."

text: jonathan parker 's bartleby should have been the be-all-end-all of the modern-office anomie films .
translation: ジョナサン・パーカーの『バートルビー』は、現代のオフィスの無気力を描いた映画の決定版となるべきだった。
back_translation: Jonathan Parker's "Bartleby" should have been the definitive film depicting the apathy of the modern office.

text: her struggle for freedom and a sense of identity culminates in a conflict where the one love may not be the one you can trust and the habits with which one sleepwalks through life are not easily broken .
translation: 彼女の自由とアイデンティティのための闘いは、唯一の愛が信頼できるものではないかもしれないという対立に culminates し、人生を夢遊病のように歩む習慣は簡単には壊れない。
back_translation: Her struggle for freedom and identity culminates in the conflict that true love may not be something one can rely on, and the habit of walking through life like a sleepwalker is not easily broken.

text: if the plot seems a bit on the skinny side , that 's because panic room is interested in nothing more than sucking you inM-^Eand making you sweat .
translation: プロットが少し薄いように見えるのは、パニックルームがあなたを引き込んで緊張させること以外には何も興味がないからです。
back_translation: The plot seems a bit thin because the panic room only draws you in and keeps you tense, with nothing else of interest.

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: 映画の大半の時間は無目的に感じられ、物語の後半になってようやくプロットの大波が押し寄せ、疑問を残します。
back_translation: Much of the movie feels aimless, and only in the second half does a wave of plot come crashing in, leaving questions behind.

text: this sade is hardly a perverse , dangerous libertine and agitator -- which would have made for better drama . he 's just a sad aristocrat in tattered finery , and the film seems as deflated as he does .
translation: このサイドは、ほとんど歪んだ危険な自由主義者や扇動者ではなく、それがより良いドラマになったかもしれません。彼はただのぼろぼろの華やかさを持つ悲しい貴族で、映画は彼と同じように盛り下がっているようです。
back_translation: This side is not so much a distorted, dangerous liberal or provocateur, but it might have made for a better drama. He is just a sad nobleman with tattered glamour, and the movie seems to be dwindling just like him.

text: despite its good nature and some genuinely funny moments , super troopers suffers from a bad case of arrested development .
translation: その良い性質といくつかの本当に面白い瞬間にもかかわらず、『スーパートゥルーパーズ』は停滞の悪化に苦しんでいる。
back_translation: Despite its good qualities and some truly interesting moments, "Super Troopers" suffers from a decline in stagnation.

text: a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric north london jewish old age home , paradise grove revolves around a dysfunctional family comprising 79-year-old izzie goldberg , determined to die with dignity , his daughter dee perry , a mixture of traditional jewish mother and child of the sixties , and her teenage son keith , who 's half-black and half-jewish , and understandably undergoing an identity crisis .
translation: 北ロンドンの風変わりなユダヤ人老齢ホームを舞台にしたダークで風変わりなコメディ「パラダイスグローブ」は、79歳のイズィー・ゴールドバーグ、尊厳をもって死ぬことを決意した彼、伝統的なユダヤ人母と60年代の子供が混ざり合った娘ディー・ペリー、そしてハーフ黒人でハーフユダヤ人のティーンエイジャーの息子キースで構成される機能不全の家族を描いています。キースは当然のことながらアイデンティティ危機を抱えています。
back_translation: "Paradise Grove," a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric Jewish retirement home in North London, depicts a dysfunctional family consisting of 79-year-old Izzy Goldberg, who is determined to die with dignity; his daughter Dee Perry, a mix of a traditional Jewish mother and a child of the '60s; and his teenage son Keith, who is half Black and half Jewish. Naturally, Keith is struggling with an identity crisis.

text: it 's a celebration of self-confidence and a slap in the face of a society that cherises impossibly unnatural physical perfection .
translation: それは自己信頼の祝福であり、非現実的な身体的完璧さを持ち上げる社会への痛烈な反発です。
back_translation: It is a blessing of self-confidence and a sharp rebuke to a society that elevates unrealistic physical perfection.

text: and what dark secret does the house harbour that leaves them feeling as though they 're being watched by more than just a million pairs of eyes ?
translation: その家には、彼らがただの100万の目以上に見られているように感じさせる暗い秘密が隠されている。
back_translation: That house holds a dark secret that makes them feel as if they are being watched by more than just a million eyes.

text: none of this sounds promising and , indeed , the first half of sorority boys is as appalling as any 'comedy ' to ever spill from a projector 's lens .
translation: これらのどれも期待できそうには聞こえず、実際、ソロリティ・ボーイズの前半はプロジェクターのレンズから出てくるどんな「コメディ」よりもひどいです。
back_translation: None of these sound promising, and in fact, the first half of Sorority Boys is worse than any "comedy" that comes from a projector lens.

text: a corrupt cop is more interested in the money on the criminals he catches than justice ; a young woman discovers she 's pregnant , and her boyfriend is unfeeling ; and a young man calls a prostitute it 's the first time for both , and neither can go through with it .
translation: 腐敗した警官は、捕まえた犯罪者の金銭に興味があり、正義には無関心である。若い女性は妊娠していることに気づき、彼女のボーイフレンドは無神経だ。そして、若い男性は売春婦を呼び、二人にとって初めての経験だが、どちらもそれを実行できない。
back_translation: Corrupt police officers are interested in the money of captured criminals and are indifferent to justice. A young woman realizes she is pregnant, and her boyfriend is insensitive. Meanwhile, a young man calls a prostitute, and although it is their first experience for both, neither of them is able to go through with it.

text: a newscaster for the channel 7 eyewitness news complains about how god has only made his life a total waste .
translation: チャンネル7アイウィットネスニュースのニュースキャスターが、神が自分の人生をまったく無駄にしてしまったと不満を述べています。
back_translation: A news anchor from Channel 7 Eyewitness News is expressing dissatisfaction that God has completely wasted their life.

text: twists of fate along the way test and strain their relationship even further .
translation: 道中の運命のいたずらが、彼らの関係をさらに試し、緊張させる。
back_translation: The twists of fate along the way further test and strain their relationship.

text: desta vez , columbus capturou o pomo de ouro .
translation: 今回は、コロンバスが黄金のリンゴを捕まえました。
back_translation: This time, Columbus caught the golden apple.

text: at his request , she puts him to death to end his suffering and is subsequently charged with murder .
translation: 彼の要望に応じて、彼女は彼の苦しみを終わらせるために彼を死に至らしめ、その結果、殺人の罪に問われる。
back_translation: At his request, she brings about his death to end his suffering, and as a result, is charged with murder.

text: will they be able to finally destroy the tall man for good ?
translation: 彼らはついにその背の高い男を完全に destroy 殺すことができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Will they finally be able to completely destroy that tall man?

text: legendary irish writer brendan behan 's memoir , borstal boy , has been given a loving screen transferral .
translation: 伝説的なアイルランドの作家ブレンダン・ビハンの回想録『ボーストル・ボーイ』が、愛情を込めて映画化された。
back_translation: The legendary Irish writer Brendan Behan's memoir "Borstal Boy" has been lovingly adapted into a film.

text: any intellectual arguments being made about the nature of god are framed in a drama so clumsy , there is a real danger less sophisticated audiences will mistake it for an endorsement of the very things that bean abhors .
translation: 神の本質についてなされる知的な議論は、あまりにも不器用なドラマの中に位置づけられており、より洗練されていない聴衆がそれをビーンが嫌悪するものへの支持と誤解する危険性がある。
back_translation: The intellectual discussions about the essence of God are positioned within a clumsy drama, leading to the risk that a less refined audience may misunderstand it as support for what Bean finds distasteful.

text: an inexplicable crack in the pyrenees mountains provokes excitement and scientific curiosity .
translation: ピレネー山脈にある説明のつかないひび割れが興奮と科学的好奇心を引き起こしています。
back_translation: Unexplained cracks in the Pyrenees are provoking excitement and scientific curiosity.

text: on this tricky topic , tadpole is very much a step in the right direction , with its blend of frankness , civility and compassion .
translation: この難しいテーマについて、オタマジャクシは率直さ、礼儀、そして思いやりの融合を持ち、確かに正しい方向への一歩です。
back_translation: On this difficult topic, the fusion of straightforwardness, courtesy, and compassion in tadpoles is certainly a step in the right direction.

text: impressed by his extravagant lifestyle and prowess , his young son kilo yearns to follow in his footsteps .
translation: 彼の華やかなライフスタイルとスキルに感銘を受けた若い息子キロは、彼の後を追いたいと切望している。
back_translation: His young son Kiro, impressed by his glamorous lifestyle and skills, yearns to follow in his footsteps.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: オフセンターユーモアは常に存在しており、アンサンブルはそれを浮遊感のある演出で届けています。
back_translation: Off-center humor always exists, and the ensemble delivers it with a sense of buoyancy.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: 最も記憶に残る瞬間は、グリーンが医療機器を窓に投げた時でした。特に面白かったからではなく、私の通路の端に座っていたおばあさんの歩行器を取り上げて、イライラして画面に投げつけたいという真剣な衝動があったからです。
back_translation: The most memorable moment was when Green threw the medical device out of the window. It wasn't particularly funny; it was because I had a serious urge to pick up the walker of the grandmother sitting at the end of my aisle and throw it at the screen in frustration.

text: 'loosely based on a true love story ' is a romantic comedy starring kate hudson as emma and luke wilson as alex . alex is an author whose writer 's block and gambling debts have landed him in a jam .
translation: 「実際のラブストーリーをゆるく基にした」とは、ケイト・ハドソンがエマ役、ルーク・ウィルソンがアレックス役を演じるロマンティックコメディです。アレックスは作家で、作家としての行き詰まりとギャンブルの借金が彼を困難な状況に陥れています。
back_translation: "It is a romantic comedy loosely based on a real love story, featuring Kate Hudson as Emma and Luke Wilson as Alex. Alex is a writer, and his writer's block and gambling debts have put him in a difficult situation."

text: when kanna comes back from nagpur both the persons he loved the most rupi and ghisu are not there for him .
translation: カンナがナグプールから戻ると、彼が最も愛していた2人、ルピとギスは彼のそばにいません。
back_translation: When Kanna returned from Nagpur, the two people he loved the most, Rupi and Gisu, were not by his side.

text: the gripping story of the dutch bettien martens , based on true facts .
translation: オランダのベッティン・マーテンスの gripping な物語、実際の事実に基づいています。
back_translation: The gripping story of Bettin Martens from the Netherlands is based on actual facts.

text: ben 's rock-solid , promising future and romance with amy are turned upside-down with the arrival of madison bell .
translation: ベンの揺るぎない約束された未来とエイミーとのロマンスは、マディソン・ベルの到来によってひっくり返される。
back_translation: Ben's unwavering promised future and his romance with Amy are turned upside down by the arrival of Madison Bell.

text: naxalites are becoming more and more popular among tribles because of their capacity to give instant justice and more and more youths are joining them .
translation: ナクサライトは、即座の正義を提供する能力のおかげで、部族の間でますます人気が高まっており、ますます多くの若者が彼らに参加しています。
back_translation: Naxalite is gaining popularity among tribes due to its ability to provide instant justice, and more and more young people are joining them.

text: former maintenance man gary fitch becomes the least likely candidate for mayor of santa monica , california , when he teams up with the wackiest `` dream-team `` imaginable : glory , a former high-priced call-girl ; his homeless buddy foster edwards , iii ; and shane martinez , a gay delivery boy .
translation: 元メンテナンス技師のゲイリー・フィッチは、カリフォルニア州サンタモニカの市長候補として最もあり得ない候補者となる。彼は、元高級コールガールのグローリー、ホームレスの友人フォスター・エドワーズ三世、ゲイの配達少年シェーン・マルティネスという最も奇妙な「ドリームチーム」を結成する。
back_translation: Former maintenance technician Gary Fitch becomes the most unlikely candidate for mayor in Santa Monica, California. He forms the most unusual "dream team" with former high-class escort Glory, his homeless friend Foster Edwards III, and gay delivery boy Shane Martinez.

text: eric has married his high school sweetheart , has a good job , his first house , yet he jokes about all the things he 's missed in life .
translation: エリックは高校の恋人と結婚し、良い仕事を持ち、初めての家を手に入れましたが、彼は人生で見逃したすべてのことについて冗談を言います。
back_translation: Eric married his high school sweetheart, has a good job, and got his first house, but he jokes about everything he missed in life.

text: a movie that 's just plain awful but still manages to entertain on a guilty-pleasure , so-bad-it's-funny level .
translation: ただひたすらひどい映画でありながら、罪悪感を感じるほど楽しませてくれる、いわゆる「悪いけど面白い」レベルの作品。
back_translation: It is simply an awful movie, yet it entertains to the point of feeling guilty, a work that can be described as "bad but fun."
