text: but harper himself is a suspect in several bomb attacks , one of which killed rachel 's partner and friend .
translation: しかし、ハーパー自身は複数の爆弾攻撃の容疑者であり、そのうちの一つでレイチェルのパートナーであり友人を殺しました。
back_translation: However, Harper himself is a suspect in multiple bomb attacks, one of which killed Rachel's partner and friend.

text: a disaster of a drama , saved only by its winged assailants .
translation: 翼のある襲撃者たちによってのみ救われた、惨めなドラマ。
back_translation: A miserable drama saved only by winged assailants.

text: this is n't an original film , but it is an effective one .
translation: これはオリジナルの映画ではありませんが、効果的な作品です。
back_translation: This is not an original film, but it is an effective work.

text: poets concentrates on locations and issues within the uk and in an oblique way referencing poetry to the topography , at first seemingly random and esoterical , slowly and ultimately questioning the very nature of our british culture and heritage .
translation: 詩人は英国の場所や問題に集中し、最初は一見無関係で秘教的に思える詩を風景に関連付けながら、徐々にそして最終的には私たちの英国文化と遺産の本質を問いかけています。
back_translation: The poet focuses on places and issues in the UK, initially associating seemingly unrelated and esoteric poems with the landscape, gradually and ultimately questioning the essence of our British culture and heritage.

text: perhaps no picture ever made has more literally showed that the road to hell is paved with good intentions .
translation: おそらく、今まで作られた映画の中で、地獄への道が善意で舗装されていることを最も文字通りに示した作品は存在しないでしょう。
back_translation: Perhaps there has never been a work that illustrates more literally that the road to hell is paved with good intentions than any movie made so far.

text: dance teacher ramu leaves india to go to america and join his cousin who is rich and successful .
translation: ダンス教師のラマはインドを離れ、成功している裕福な従兄弟の元へアメリカに行きます。
back_translation: Dance teacher Rama leaves India and goes to America to visit his successful and wealthy cousin.

text: an un-relentless action film that will attract , through word of mouth , all those hooked on gaming on their pc 's and drag them back into the cinema auditoriums .
translation: 容赦のないアクション映画で、口コミを通じてPCゲームに夢中なすべての人々を惹きつけ、再び映画館に引き戻すでしょう。
back_translation: It's a relentless action movie that will attract everyone who is obsessed with PC games through word of mouth and bring them back to the theaters.

text: how do a man who has never loved and a woman who refused to ever love again deal with the fact that they are meant to be together ?
translation: 愛したことのない男性と、二度と愛することを拒んだ女性は、二人が一緒にいる運命であるという事実にどのように対処するのか？
back_translation: How do a man who has never been loved and a woman who has vowed never to love again deal with the fact that they are destined to be together?

text: francophiles will snicker knowingly and you 'll want to slap them .
translation: フランス好きな人たちはニヤリと笑い、あなたは彼らを叩きたくなるでしょう。
back_translation: Those who love France will smirk, and you will want to hit them.

text: it is story of an innocent boy ( krishna ) .
translation: 無邪気な少年（クリシュナ）の物語です。
back_translation: It is the story of an innocent boy (Krishna).

text: kirshner and monroe seem to be in a contest to see who can out-bad-act the other . ( kirshner wins , but it 's close . )
translation: キルシュナーとモンローは、お互いにどちらがより悪い演技をするかを競っているようだ。（キルシュナーが勝つが、僅差だ。）
back_translation: Kirshner and Monroe seem to be competing to see who can perform worse. (Kirshner wins, but it's by a narrow margin.)

text: a film at once depressing and uplifting -- depressing in terms of the sad , often horrifying subjects of nachtwey 's photographs but uplifting in terms of his commitment and integrity .
translation: 悲しく、しばしば恐ろしいナハトウェイの写真のテーマに関しては落ち込ませるものでありながら、彼の献身と誠実さに関しては高揚感を与える、同時に憂鬱でありながらも励ましを与える映画です。
back_translation: It is a film that, while depressing regarding the often sad and terrifying themes of Nachtwey's photography, simultaneously evokes a sense of upliftment through his devotion and sincerity, offering encouragement even amidst melancholy.

text: on the surface , their exchanges are trivial and stilted .
translation: 表面的には、彼らのやり取りは些細でぎこちない。
back_translation: Superficially, their interactions are trivial and awkward.

text: passing himself as a single father , he starts to meet a string of single mums , confident in his ability to leave them behind when they start to ask for a commitment .
translation: 彼はシングルファザーとして自分を装い、シングルマザーたちと出会い始める。彼女たちが関係の約束を求め始めても、彼は彼女たちを置き去りにする自信があった。
back_translation: He pretended to be a single father and began to meet single mothers. Even when they started to seek commitment in their relationships, he was confident that he could leave them behind.

text: gibney and jarecki just want to string the bastard up .
translation: ギブニーとジャレッキはただその野郎を吊るしたいだけだ。
back_translation: Gibney and Jarecki just want to hang that guy.

text: though ronnie works at hope house he does n't follow procedure when he finds sarah wandering outside the confines .
translation: ロンはホープハウスで働いているが、サラが外をうろついているのを見つけたとき、手順に従わない。
back_translation: Ron works at Hope House, but he does not follow the procedures when he finds Sarah wandering outside.

text: rachel soon finds herself involved with the playground and on the killers hitlist .
translation: レイチェルはすぐに遊び場に関与し、殺人者のヒットリストに載ることになります。
back_translation: Rachel quickly gets involved in the playground and will end up on the killer's hit list.

text: the question is , will their lives change forever with the riches that come along with professional sports , or will they be destined to live a life in their home country , asking forever , what if ?
translation: 彼らの生活はプロスポーツによってもたらされる富で永遠に変わるのか、それとも故郷で「もしも？」と永遠に問い続ける運命なのか？
back_translation: Will their lives be forever changed by the riches brought by professional sports, or are they destined to eternally question "what if?" in their hometown?

text: after three rowdy guys get booted from their frat house , they dress up as women and pledge the `` ugly girl `` sorority , where they figure they 'll blend right in .
translation: 3人の騒がしい男たちが兄弟寮から追い出された後、彼らは女性に扮し、「ブスの女の子」ソロリティに参加することに決めました。彼らはそこで自分たちがすぐに溶け込めるだろうと考えました。
back_translation: After being thrown out of the brother dormitory, three noisy men decided to disguise themselves as women and join the "Ugly Girl" sorority. They thought they would easily fit in there.

text: . . . a fluffy , flaky croissant of a culture clash comedy , barely substantial enough for a feature but just light and tasty enough to satisfy .
translation: …ふわふわでサクサクのクロワッサンのようなカルチャー・クラッシュ・コメディで、作品としてはほとんど実質がないが、軽やかで美味しさが十分に満たしてくれる。
back_translation: It's like a fluffy and crispy croissant, a culture clash comedy that has almost no substance as a work, but is light and satisfies enough with its deliciousness.

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: 「コリンズウッドへようこそ」がうまくいかないことはほぼすぐに分かる。
back_translation: "It's almost immediately clear that 'Welcome to Collinswood' is not going well."

text: anxious to use artificial life to improve the world , rosetta stone , ( tilda swinton ) , a bio-geneticist creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own dna in order to breed three self replicating automatons , part human , part computer named ruby , olive and marine ( also played by tilda swinton ) .
translation: 世界を改善するために人工生命を使うことに熱心なロゼッタ・ストーン（ティルダ・スウィントン）は、バイオ遺伝学者としてサイボーグのレシピを作成し、自らのDNAを使用して人間とコンピュータの一部を持つ三体の自己複製オートマトン、ルビー、オリーブ、マリン（こちらもティルダ・スウィントンが演じる）を育てる。
back_translation: Rosetta Stone (Tilda Swinton), eager to use artificial life to improve the world, creates a recipe for cyborgs as a bio-geneticist and raises three self-replicating automatons, Ruby, Olive, and Marine (also portrayed by Tilda Swinton), who possess parts of both human and computer DNA.

text: beginning with the world trade center 's north tower afire and billowing dense smoke , and ending on the vast expanse of ash-brown debris the following morning , the first 24 hours documents `` ground zero `` in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks on september 11 , 2001 .
translation: ワールドトレードセンターの北塔が燃え上がり、濃い煙が立ち上るところから始まり、翌朝には広がる灰色の瓦礫の広がりで終わるこの最初の24時間は、2001年9月11日のテロ攻撃直後の「グラウンドゼロ」を記録しています。
back_translation: The first 24 hours, which begin with the North Tower of the World Trade Center engulfed in flames and thick smoke rising, and end with a spread of gray rubble the following morning, document "Ground Zero" immediately after the terrorist attacks on September 11, 2001.

text: it is a dark comedy that challenges the traditional ideas of marriage and questions the societal values of money and sex .
translation: それは伝統的な結婚観に挑戦し、お金やセックスの社会的価値を問い直すダークコメディです。
back_translation: It is a dark comedy that challenges traditional views on marriage and questions the social values of money and sex.

text: george discovers both the princess and the truth behind her strange disappearance .
translation: ジョージは王女と彼女の奇妙な失踪の背後にある真実を発見します。
back_translation: George uncovers the truth behind the princess and her strange disappearance.

text: the film sounds like the stuff of lurid melodrama , but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from paul 's perspective .
translation: その映画は鮮烈なメロドラマのように聞こえるが、キャラクター研究として面白いのは、物語がポールの視点から語られているという事実である。
back_translation: The movie sounds like a vivid melodrama, but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from Paul's perspective.

text: now , it 's up to kimberly , along with the help of flight 180 junkie thomas burke , clear rivers , and the mortician william bloodworth , kimberly must find a way to stop death before it 's to late . . .
translation: 今、キンバリーはフライト180の中毒者トーマス・バーク、クリア・リバーズ、そして葬儀屋ウィリアム・ブラッドワースの助けを借りて、死を止める方法を見つけなければなりません。もう遅すぎる前に…。
back_translation: Now, Kimberly must find a way to stop death with the help of Flight 180 survivors Thomas Burke, Clear Rivers, and mortician William Bludworth. Before it's too late...

text: after losing his and young son to divorce , he finds no alternative but to kidnap the boy inevitably dragging him through a harrowing journey of grief and as he learns to accept himself .
translation: 離婚によって息子と若い息子を失った彼は、少年を誘拐する以外の選択肢を見出せず、避けられない悲しみの旅へと彼を引きずり込みながら、自分自身を受け入れることを学んでいく。
back_translation: Having lost his son and young son due to divorce, he finds no choice but to kidnap the boy, dragging him into an inevitable journey of sadness while learning to accept himself.

text: from the late master filmmaker krzysztof kieslowski comes 'heaven ' , the first installment of a trilogy .
translation: 偉大な映画製作者クリスチャン・キェスロフスキーからの作品『天国』は、三部作の第一部です。
back_translation: The work "Heaven" by the great filmmaker Krzysztof Kieślowski is the first part of a trilogy.

text: the plot is very clever , but boyd weighs it down with too many characters and events , all intertwined and far too complicated to keep track of .
translation: プロットは非常に巧妙ですが、ボイドはあまりにも多くのキャラクターや出来事を絡ませてしまっており、追跡するには複雑すぎます。
back_translation: The plot is very clever, but the void intertwines too many characters and events, making it too complicated to follow.

text: her constant groans and howls of amorous pleasure turn ted 's domain of conquest and libidinous triumph into a nightmare world of bachelorman-interruptus .
translation: 彼女の絶え間ないうめき声と愛の歓喜の悲鳴は、テッドの征服と肉欲の勝利の領域を、独身男性の中断という悪夢の世界に変えてしまう。
back_translation: Her continuous moans and cries of love's ecstasy transform Ted's realm of conquest and carnality into a nightmare world interrupted by single men.

text: in 8 minutes we go into the life of a little boy who tries to get away with not doing his task .
translation: 8分後、私たちは自分の課題をやらずに済ませようとする小さな男の子の生活に入ります。
back_translation: Eight minutes later, we enter the life of a little boy who is trying to avoid doing his homework.

text: under the pressure of her psychological assaults , sam 's do-gooder vaneer cracks and his true nature is revealed .
translation: 彼女の心理的攻撃の圧力の下で、サムの善人の veneer がひび割れ、彼の真の性質が明らかになる。
back_translation: Under the pressure of her psychological attacks, Sam's veneer of goodness cracks, revealing his true nature.

text: offers a gentle summer fantasy for both grown-ups and little ones .
translation: 大人と子供の両方に優しい夏のファンタジーを提供します。
back_translation: We offer a summer fantasy that is gentle for both adults and children.

text: an empty exercise , a florid but ultimately vapid crime melodrama with lots of surface flash but little emotional resonance .
translation: 空虚な演習、華やかだが最終的には無味乾燥な犯罪メロドラマで、表面的な派手さはあるが感情的な共鳴はほとんどない。
back_translation: A hollow exercise, glamorous yet ultimately tasteless crime melodrama, it exhibits superficial flashiness but has almost no emotional resonance.

text: . . . if it had been only half-an-hour long or a tv special , the humor would have been fast and furious -- at ninety minutes , it drags .
translation: もしそれが30分だけの作品か特別番組だったら、ユーモアは速く激しかったろう。しかし90分では、だらだらと進む。
back_translation: If it were a 30-minute piece or a special program, the humor would have been quick and intense. However, at 90 minutes, it drags on.

text: the x potion gives the quickly named blossom , bubbles and buttercup supernatural powers that include extraordinary strength and laser-beam eyes , which unfortunately do n't enable them to discern flimsy screenplays .
translation: Xポーションは、急いで名付けられたブロッサム、バブルス、バターカップに超自然的な力を与え、その力には並外れた強さとレーザービームの目が含まれていますが、残念ながら彼女たちは薄っぺらな脚本を見抜くことができません。
back_translation: The X Potion gives supernatural powers to Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup, who were hastily named, and these powers include exceptional strength and laser beam eyes; however, unfortunately, they are unable to see through a shallow script.

text: however , the enemy terrorists learn of his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancee ( gabriel macht ) .
translation: しかし、敵のテロリストたちは彼の秘密の身分を知り、彼のガールフレンド/婚約者（ガブリエル・マクト）を誘拐します。
back_translation: However, the enemy terrorists discover his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancé (Gabrielle Macht).

text: the ridiculed home secretary is slowly coming to life , but in his way stands a paranoid defense secretary .
translation: 嘲笑された内務大臣は徐々に活気を取り戻しているが、その前には偏執病的な国防大臣が立ちはだかっている。
back_translation: The mocked Minister of Internal Affairs is gradually regaining his vitality, but in front of him stands a paranoid Minister of Defense.

text: what better place for a writer to pick up a girl ?
translation: 作家が女の子をナンパするのにこれ以上良い場所はないでしょうか？
back_translation: Is there a better place for a writer to hit on a girl?

text: . . . while dark water is n't a complete wash ( no pun intended ) , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: …ダークウォーターは完全な洗濯物ではない（言葉遊びではありません）が、リングと並べて見ると、最終的には淡白な後継作として受け取られます。
back_translation: ...Dark Waters is not a complete work (this is not a wordplay), but when viewed alongside The Ring, it will ultimately be received as a bland successor.

text: chelsea walls is a case of too many chefs fussing over too weak a recipe .
translation: チェルシー・ウォールズは、あまりにも多くのシェフが弱すぎるレシピのために過剰に手を加えているケースです。
back_translation: Chelsea Walls is a case where too many chefs are overly manipulating recipes that are too weak.

text: what if hitler did n't die in berlin at the end of the war ?
translation: もしヒトラーが戦争の終わりにベルリンで死ななかったらどうなっていたでしょうか？
back_translation: What would have happened if Hitler had not died in Berlin at the end of the war?

text: too restrained to be a freak show , too mercenary and obvious to be cerebral , too dull and pretentious to be engaging . . . the isle defies an easy categorization .
translation: あまりにも抑制されていてフreakショーにはなれず、あまりにも金儲け的で明白であって知的でもなく、あまりにも鈍くて気取っていて魅力的でもない...その島は簡単に分類することを拒絶している。
back_translation: It is too subdued to become a freak show, too commercially driven and obvious to be intellectual, and too dull and pretentious to be appealing... that island refuses to be easily classified.

text: the adventures of pluto nash is a whole lot of nada .
translation: 『プルート・ナッシュの冒険』はまったく何もない。
back_translation: "Pluto Nash's Adventure" has absolutely nothing.

text: welcoming the challenge , roger guides nick through the city 's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course , only to realize that he -- the adult -- still has something to learn about what women , and men , really want .
translation: 挑戦を歓迎するロジャーは、ニックを市内のワイルドなナイトライフへ案内し、オールナイトの特訓を行うが、彼自身—大人であるはずの彼—も女性と男性が本当に求めているものについてまだ学ぶべきことがあることに気付く。
back_translation: Roger, who welcomes challenges, takes Nick into the wild nightlife of the city and conducts an all-night training session, but he realizes that he himself — who is supposed to be an adult — still has things to learn about what women and men truly desire.

text: i have a confession to make : i did n't particularly like e . t . the first time i saw it as a young boy . that is because - damn it ! - i also wanted a little alien as a friend !
translation: 告白があります。子供の頃に初めて「E.T.」を見たとき、特に好きではありませんでした。それは、くそ！私も小さなエイリアンを友達にしたかったからです！
back_translation: I have a confession. When I first watched "E.T." as a child, I didn't particularly like it. That’s because, damn it! I wanted a little alien as my friend too!

text: the crew traveled with the band to their homes in obninsk , russia and to their music conservatories in moscow , documenting how these two girls and five boys became so adept at playing american country music .
translation: クルーはバンドと共にロシアのオブニンスクにある彼らの家やモスクワの音楽院を訪れ、これらの2人の女の子と5人の男の子がどのようにしてアメリカのカントリーミュージックを巧みに演奏できるようになったかを記録しました。
back_translation: The crew visited their home in Obninsk, Russia, and the Moscow Conservatory with the band, documenting how these two girls and five boys became skilled at performing American country music.

text: nice balance between real emotions and cute movie moments with a hilarious love scene .
translation: リアルな感情と可愛い映画の瞬間の絶妙なバランスに、面白いラブシーンが加わっています。
back_translation: The perfect balance of realistic emotions and cute movie moments is enhanced by amusing love scenes.

text: louiso lets the movie dawdle in classic disaffected-indie-film mode , and brother hoffman 's script stumbles over a late-inning twist that just does n't make sense .
translation: ルイーゾは映画を典型的な無関心なインディー映画のスタイルでだらだら進め、ホフマン兄の脚本は後半のどんでん返しで意味を成さないところにつまずいてしまう。
back_translation: Luiso drags the film along in a typical indifferent indie film style, and the script by the Hoffman brothers stumbles in the second half where it loses its meaning due to a twist.

text: the venezuelans say things like `` si , pretty much `` and `` por favor , go home `` when talking to americans . that 's muy loco , but no more ridiculous than most of the rest of `` dragonfly . ``
translation: ベネズエラの人々は、アメリカ人と話すときに「はい、ほぼそうです」とか「お願いだから、帰って」と言います。それはとてもクレイジーですが、「ドラゴンフライ」の他の部分と比べてそれほど ridiculoso ではありません。
back_translation: When Venezuelans talk to Americans, they say things like "Yes, almost" or "Please, go back." It's very crazy, but compared to other parts of "Dragonfly," it's not that ridiculous.

text: his plan goes awry , however , when the group is forced to work for a drug ring .
translation: しかし、グループが麻薬組織のために働かざるを得なくなると、彼の計画は狂ってしまう。
back_translation: However, when the group has no choice but to work for a drug organization, his plan goes awry.

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .
translation: その大胆な野心は自惚れによって妨げられ、スティーブン・ソダーバーグのスペースオペラは鈍感なほど退屈な体験として現れた。
back_translation: That bold ambition was hindered by arrogance, and Steven Soderbergh's space opera emerged as an insufferably dull experience.

text: when she begins to question his sanity , she decides to take her chances on her own , only to run into another pair , who on the surface appear to be escaped prisoners on the run .
translation: 彼女が彼の正気を疑い始めると、彼女は自分でチャンスを掴もうと決心するが、表面上は逃げた囚人のように見える別のペアに出くわす。
back_translation: As she starts to doubt his sanity, she decides to seize the opportunity for herself, but encounters another pair that appears to be like escaped prisoners on the surface.

text: he must fend off beings that seek to gain control over the mysterious black mass .
translation: 彼は神秘的な黒い塊を支配しようとする存在から身を守らなければならない。
back_translation: He must protect himself from the being that seeks to dominate the mysterious black mass.

text: samira makhmalbaf 's new film blackboards is much like the ethos of a stream of consciousness , although , it 's unfortunate for the viewer that the thoughts and reflections coming through are torpid and banal
translation: サミラ・マフマルバフの新しい映画『ブラックボード』は、意識の流れの精神に非常に似ていますが、視聴者にとって残念なことに、出てくる思考や反映は鈍くて平凡です。
back_translation: Samira Makhmalbaf's new film "Blackboard" is very similar in spirit to the stream of consciousness, but unfortunately for the audience, the thoughts and reflections that emerge are dull and mundane.

text: but when fred is fired , the well runs dry , and our heroes come up with a new plan : make their own `` adult `` film .
translation: しかし、フレッドが解雇されると、泉は枯れ、英雄たちは新しい計画を考え出す。それは、自分たちで「アダルト」映画を作ることだ。
back_translation: However, when Fred is fired, the well runs dry, and the heroes come up with a new plan. It is to make their own "adult" movie.

text: capitalizing on his fame as the star of `` hogan 's heroes , `` bob crane ( greg kinnear ) dove into the freewheeling spirit of the 60s and 70s with relish , having affairs with numerous women .
translation: 「ホーガンズ・ヒーローズ」のスターとしての名声を活かして、ボブ・クレイン（グレッグ・キニア）は60年代と70年代の自由な精神に楽しんで飛び込み、数多くの女性と不倫をしていました。
back_translation: Leveraging his fame as a star of "Hogan's Heroes," Bob Crane (Greg Kinnear) plunged into the free-spirited culture of the 60s and 70s, engaging in numerous affairs with women.

text: an intelligently made ( and beautifully edited ) picture that at the very least has a spark of life to it -- more than you can say for plenty of movies that flow through the hollywood pipeline without a hitch .
translation: 知性に富み（美しく編集された）画像は、少なくともその中に生命の芽生えを感じさせるものであり、ハリウッドのパイプラインを問題なく流れていく多くの映画には言えないことです。
back_translation: Images rich in intelligence (beautifully edited) at least evoke a sense of the budding of life within them, which cannot be said for many movies that flow smoothly through the Hollywood pipeline.

text: this is a third-person story now , told by hollywood , and much more ordinary for it .
translation: これは現在、ハリウッドによって語られる三人称の物語であり、より普通のものとなっています。
back_translation: This is currently a third-person story being told by Hollywood, and it has become more ordinary.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: たとえあなたがエルヴィスファンであっても、このDVDで興奮するようなものは見つからないでしょう。
back_translation: Even if you are an Elvis fan, you probably won't find anything exciting on this DVD.

text: but when he realizes that he has to deal with what has got to be god 's most arduous task , listening and answering prayers .
translation: しかし、彼が神の最も困難な仕事である、祈りを聞き、応えることに対処しなければならないことに気づいたとき。
back_translation: However, when he realized that he must deal with God's most difficult task, which is listening to and responding to prayers.

text: bravely explores the psychic damage inflicted on jean-luc by a withholding , then absent parent .
translation: 控えめで不在の親によってジャン＝リュックに与えられた精神的な傷を勇敢に探求する。
back_translation: Bravely exploring the emotional wounds inflicted on Jean-Luc by his absent and distant parents.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie . . . that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: 季節のホリデー子供向け映画には何か怪しいところがある……最も説得力のある感情的な重みを、大人にプレゼントを渡すサンタのシーンから引き出している。
back_translation: There is something suspicious about seasonal holiday children's movies... they draw the most compelling emotional weight from the scene of Santa delivering presents to adults.

text: after gruelling training sessions , the three succeed in robbing the bank , but things go haywire .
translation: 厳しいトレーニングセッションの後、三人は銀行を襲うことに成功するが、物事は思わぬ方向に進んでしまう。
back_translation: After a tough training session, the three successfully rob a bank, but things take an unexpected turn.

text: movie fans , get ready to take off . . . the other direction .
translation: 映画ファンの皆さん、出発の準備をしてください…別の方向に。
back_translation: Movie fans, get ready to depart... in another direction.

text: she 's telling her story because she wants to set the record straight , to correct the lies in natalie 's book , which became a bestseller .
translation: 彼女は自分の話をしているのは、ナタリーの本の中の嘘を正すため、そして事実を明らかにするためです。その本はベストセラーになりました。
back_translation: She is telling her story to correct the lies in Natalie's book and to reveal the truth. That book became a bestseller.

text: the film intercuts between two days , two years apart .
translation: 映画は、二年間隔で二日を行き来します。
back_translation: The movie alternates between two days every two years.

text: phillip noyce and all of his actors -- as well as his cinematographer , christopher doyle -- understand the delicate forcefulness of greene 's prose , and it 's there on the screen in their version of the quiet american .
translation: フィリップ・ノイスと彼の俳優たち、そして彼の撮影監督であるクリストファー・ドイルは、グリーンの文章の微妙な力強さを理解しており、それは彼らの『コーィ・アメリカン』の版に画面上で表れています。
back_translation: Philip Noyce and his actors, along with his cinematographer Christopher Doyle, understand the subtle strength of Green's writing, which is reflected on-screen in their version of "The Quiet American."

text: he awakes to what appears to be the next morning only to find that he is one year into the future and is an escaped convict for the murder of his fianc & # 233 ; e .
translation: 彼は翌朝のように目を覚まし、気がつくと自分が1年後の未来にいて、婚約者の殺人で逃亡中の囚人になっていることを発見する。
back_translation: He wakes up the next morning and realizes that he is in the future, one year later, and has become a fugitive prisoner wanted for the murder of his fiancée.

text: thirty years ago he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursuit his dream of success .
translation: 30年前、彼は夢の成功を追求するために彼女を置いていった貧しい労働者でした。
back_translation: Thirty years ago, he was a poor worker who left her behind to pursue his dream of success.

text: big-shot executive robert stiles ' car is damaged when parked at the lodge .
translation: 大物幹部のロバート・スタイルズの車がロッジに駐車している間に損傷を受ける。
back_translation: Robert Stiles, a major executive, suffered damage to his car while it was parked at the lodge.

text: as the boyfriend also becomes obsessed , it becomes apparent that something more is happening .
translation: 彼氏も obsesion 化していく中で、何かもっと大きなことが起こっていることが明らかになります。
back_translation: As the boyfriend becomes more obsessive, it becomes clear that something much bigger is happening.

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .
translation: 庇護所の素材は引き込まれるものであり、彼の家族とのジアのシーンも同様です。
back_translation: The materials of the shelter are captivating, and the scene with his family is similarly so.

text: the pair wave farewell in the airport and yoyo returns to hong kong to further her studies , while cheung continues to write his unfinished dissertation .
translation: 二人は空港で別れを告げ、ヨーヨーは香港に戻り、学業を続けます。一方、チョンは未完成の論文を書き続けます。
back_translation: The two said their goodbyes at the airport, and Yoyo returned to Hong Kong to continue her studies. Meanwhile, Chung continued to write his unfinished thesis.

text: when fowler introduces pyle to his beautiful young vietnamese mistress phuong ( hai yen ) the three become swept up in a tempestuous love triangle that leads to a series of startling revelations and finally - murder .
translation: ファウラーが美しい若いベトナム人愛人のフォン（ハイ・イェン）をパイルに紹介すると、三人は激動の恋の三角関係に巻き込まれ、驚くべき真実が次々と明らかになり、ついには殺人に至る。
back_translation: When Fowler introduces his beautiful young Vietnamese lover Phuong (Hai Yen) to Pyle, the three become embroiled in a tumultuous love triangle, with astonishing truths being revealed one after another, ultimately leading to murder.

text: nevertheless , carlos puts his artistic aspirations on hold to take over the store and care for his father .
translation: それにもかかわらず、カルロスは芸術的な願望を一時的に保留し、店を引き継ぎ父親の世話をする。
back_translation: Nevertheless, Carlos temporarily sets aside his artistic aspirations, takes over the shop, and looks after his father.

text: wanders all over the map thematically and stylistically , and borrows heavily from lynch , jeunet , and von trier while failing to find a spark of its own .
translation: テーマやスタイル的にマップ全体をさまよい、リンチ、ジュネ、フォン・トリアの影響を強く受けながらも、自らの輝きを見出せていない。
back_translation: Thematically and stylistically, it wanders throughout the entire map, heavily influenced by Lynch, Genet, and von Trier, yet unable to find its own brilliance.

text: it is that rare combination of bad writing , bad direction and bad acting -- the trifecta of badness .
translation: それは、悪い脚本、悪い演出、悪い演技という珍しい組み合わせであり、悪のトライフェクタです。
back_translation: It is a rare combination of bad writing, bad direction, and bad acting, a trifecta of evil.

text: behind in rent , losing any real day jobs they have , they plan a bank robbery .
translation: 家賃の支払いが遅れ、持っている仕事を失いそうな彼らは、銀行強盗を計画する。
back_translation: Facing delays in rent payments and on the verge of losing their jobs, they plan a bank robbery.

text: believing himself capable of understanding people from the other side of the track , michael fails to recognize that the ex-con is manipulating him and so sets off a catastrophic chain of events in the community .
translation: 自分が向こう側の人々を理解できると思っているマイケルは、元受刑者が自分を操っていることに気づかず、コミュニティで壊滅的な連鎖反応を引き起こしてしまう。
back_translation: Michael, who believes he can understand the people on the other side, unwittingly triggers a catastrophic chain reaction within the community without realizing that a former inmate is manipulating him.

text: working in secret , the progressive group organised the 1959 theatre boycott to end segregation in movie theatres in hamilton .
translation: 秘密裏に活動し、進歩的なグループは1959年にハミルトンの映画館での人種隔離を終わらせるために劇場ボイコットを組織しました。
back_translation: In secret, progressive groups organized a theater boycott in 1959 to end racial segregation at a cinema in Hamilton.

text: the soviet union has collapsed and armenia is on the verge of her independence .
translation: ソビエト連邦は崩壊し、アルメニアは独立の瀬戸際にあります。
back_translation: The Soviet Union has collapsed, and Armenia is on the verge of independence.

text: as charming , humorous and heimisch as its nomadic subjects .
translation: 魅力的でユーモラス、そしてその遊牧民の対象と同様に居心地の良い。
back_translation: Charming, humorous, and just as cozy as the nomadic subjects themselves.

text: a film within a film , this is a contemporary story of the making of a historical epic about the armenian holocaust between 1915 and 1918 .
translation: 映画の中の映画。これは、1915年から1918年にかけてのアルメニア大虐殺についての歴史的な叙事詩の制作に関する現代の物語です。
back_translation: A film within a film. This is a modern tale about the production of a historical epic regarding the Armenian genocide from 1915 to 1918.

text: the result is solemn and horrifying , yet strangely detached .
translation: 結果は厳かで恐ろしいが、奇妙に無関心でもある。
back_translation: The result is solemn and terrifying, yet strangely indifferent.

text: beautiful , gentle people of all color of skin surround her and care about her .
translation: 美しく、優しい肌の色を持つ人々が彼女を囲み、彼女を大切にしています。
back_translation: People with beautiful, gentle skin colors surround her and cherish her.

text: as janice , eileen walsh , an engaging , wide-eyed actress whose teeth are a little too big for her mouth , infuses the movie with much of its slender , glinting charm .
translation: ジャニス役のアイリーン・ウォルシュは、目を輝かせた魅力的な女優で、口には少し大きすぎる歯を持っており、映画にその slender な輝きの魅力を多く与えている。
back_translation: Eileen Walsh, who plays Janice, is a captivating actress with sparkling eyes and slightly oversized teeth, which add a lot of slender charm to the film.

text: the angst-ridden , affluent slacker characters are more grating than engaging .
translation: 悩み多き裕福なスラッカーのキャラクターは、魅力的というよりもむしろうざい。
back_translation: The character of a wealthy slacker with many problems is more annoying than charming.

text: a beguiling splash of pastel colors and prankish comedy from disney .
translation: 魅力的なパステルカラーの splash とディズニーの mischievous コメディ。
back_translation: An attractive pastel-colored splash and Disney's mischievous comedy.

text: there 's no denying how nice it is to see veteran actors bob hoskins , michael caine and helen mirren interacting with each other on screen .
translation: ベテラン俳優のボブ・ホスキンス、マイケル・ケイン、ヘレン・ミレンが画面上で互いに交流しているのを見るのは、否定できないほど素晴らしいです。
back_translation: It is undeniably wonderful to see veteran actors Bob Hoskins, Michael Caine, and Helen Mirren interacting with each other on screen.

text: sinks so low in a poorly played game of absurd plot twists , idiotic court maneuvers and stupid characters that even freeman ca n't save it .
translation: ひどく演じられたゲームで、ばかげたプロットのひねりや愚かな法廷での策略、馬鹿なキャラクターによって、あまりにも低く沈んでしまい、フリーマンですら救えない。
back_translation: A poorly performed game, with ridiculous plot twists, foolish courtroom schemes, and foolish characters, has sunk too low to even be saved by Freeman.

text: for the most part , the film does hold up pretty well .
translation: 全体的に見て、その映画はかなり良く保たれています。
back_translation: Overall, the movie is quite well preserved.

text: soon , they discover that their x-laced escapades are to be interrupted by zombies and monsters that attack them on the ground , from the air , and in the sea , ruled by an evil entity in the house of the dead . . .
translation: すぐに、彼らは自分たちのXラベルの冒険が、地上、空中、海中で襲いかかるゾンビやモンスターによって中断されることになると発見する。それは死の家にいる悪の存在に支配されている。
back_translation: Soon, they discover that their adventure with the X label will be interrupted by zombies and monsters attacking them on land, in the air, and underwater. It is dominated by an evil presence in the house of death.

text: if the movie is finally stuck halfway been cinema and prose , miller proves that it 's not an unfertile place to linger .
translation: もし映画が最終的に映画と散文の途中で立ち往生しているなら、ミラーはそれが留まるには不毛な場所ではないことを証明しています。
back_translation: If movies are ultimately stuck somewhere between films and prose, Miller proves that it is not a barren place for them to remain.

text: beautifully shot sequences episodically shift back and forth from the past to the present .
translation: 美しく撮影されたシークエンスは、エピソードごとに過去と現在を行き来します。
back_translation: The beautifully filmed sequences alternate between the past and the present in each episode.

text: guru gulab is married to vikrant 's stepsister preeti ( preeti jhangiani ) .
translation: グル・グラブはヴィクランの義理の妹プリーティ（プリーティ・ジャンギアニ）と結婚しています。
back_translation: Guru Grab is married to Vikran's sister-in-law, Preeti (Preeti Jangiani).

text: once there , she finds more than she expected .
translation: そこに着くと、彼女は予想以上のものを見つけます。
back_translation: When she arrives there, she finds something beyond her expectations.

text: a waterlogged version of 'fatal attraction ' for the teeny-bopper set . . . a sad , soggy potboiler that wastes the talents of its attractive young leads .
translation: ティーニーバッパー向けの「致命的な魅力」の水浸し版…魅力的な若手主演の才能を無駄にした悲しくてぬれている駄作。
back_translation: A waterlogged version of "Fatal Attraction" aimed at teenagers... a sad and wet failure that wastes the talent of an attractive young lead.

text: a period story about a catholic boy who tries to help a jewish friend get into heaven by sending the audience straight to hell .
translation: カトリックの少年が、ユダヤ人の友達を天国に導こうとする物語で、観客を直接地獄に送る。
back_translation: A story about a Catholic boy trying to lead his Jewish friend to heaven, which directly sends the audience to hell.

text: certain that there 's only one way to find out the truth , rachel returns to the hospital .
translation: 真実を知る方法はただ一つだと確信し、レイチェルは病院に戻る。
back_translation: Convinced that there is only one way to know the truth, Rachel returns to the hospital.

text: their letter has been received in whitehall and merton corroborates their heroic story .
translation: 彼らの手紙はホワイトホールで受け取られ、マートンが彼らの英雄的な物語を裏付けています。
back_translation: Their letter was received at Whitehall, and Marton corroborates their heroic story.

text: when rodney is hired to kill a blackmailer who has dirt on a u . s . congressional candidate , it 's just another dead body for a fat wad of cash .
translation: ロドニーがアメリカの国会議員候補に関する弱みを握る脅迫者を殺すために雇われたとき、それはただの現金のためのもう一つの死体に過ぎなかった。
back_translation: When Rodney was hired to kill the blackmailer who had information on a candidate for the U.S. Congress, it was just another body for cash.

text: for all its brilliant touches , dragon loses its fire midway , nearly flickering out by its perfunctory conclusion .
translation: 素晴らしい要素があるにもかかわらず、「ドラゴン」は途中で火を失い、形式的な結末に向かうにつれてほぼ消えかかってしまいます。
back_translation: Despite having wonderful elements, "Dragon" loses its fire halfway through and nearly fades away as it heads towards a formal conclusion.

text: however due to roxie 's new found fame , velma is forgotten about .
translation: しかし、ロキシーの新たに得た名声のため、ヴェルマは忘れられてしまう。
back_translation: However, due to Roxy's newly gained fame, Verma is forgotten.

text: purely propaganda , a work of unabashed hero worship , it is nonetheless -- and likely inadvertently -- a timely and invaluable implicit reminder of the role that u . s . foreign policy has played in the rise of castro .
translation: 純粋なプロパガンダであり、公然とした英雄崇拝の作品であるが、それでもなお、（おそらく意図せずに）アメリカの外交政策がカストロの台頭に果たした役割についてのタイムリーで貴重な暗黙のリマインダーである。
back_translation: It is pure propaganda and a work of open hero worship, yet it still serves as a timely and valuable implicit reminder of the role that American foreign policy played in the rise of Castro, perhaps unintentionally.

text: so riddled with unanswered questions that it requires gargantuan leaps of faith just to watch it plod along .
translation: 未解決の疑問に満ちているため、それを見るためには巨大的な信念の leap が必要です。
back_translation: It requires a giant leap of faith to see it, as it is filled with unresolved questions.

text: the best of the pierce brosnan james bond films to date .
translation: 現在までのピアース・ブロスナン版007映画のベスト。
back_translation: Best Pierce Brosnan 007 movies to date.

text: the title trapped turns out to be a pretty fair description of how you feel while you 're watching this ultra-manipulative thriller .
translation: 「トラップされた」というタイトルは、この非常に操作的なスリラーを観ている間に感じる気持ちをかなり正確に表現しています。
back_translation: The title "Trapped" quite accurately expresses the feelings experienced while watching this highly manipulative thriller.

text: gangster no . 1 is solid , satisfying fare for adults .
translation: ギャングスター No. 1 は、大人にとってしっかりとした、満足のいく作品です。
back_translation: Gangster No. 1 is a solid and satisfying work for adults.

text: in late summer 1973 , michael skid , the son of a well-to-do judge , returns home and rents a dilapidated farm .
translation: 1973年の夏の終わりに、裕福な裁判官の息子マイケル・スキッドが帰郷し、荒れ果てた農場を借りる。
back_translation: At the end of the summer of 1973, Michael Skid, the son of a wealthy judge, returned to his hometown and rented a run-down farm.

text: brosnan 's finest non-bondish performance yet fails to overcome the film 's manipulative sentimentality and annoying stereotypes .
translation: ブロスナンの最も優れたボンド以外のパフォーマンスであるが、映画の扱う操作的なセンチメンタリズムと迷惑なステレオタイプを克服することはできない。
back_translation: It is Brosnan's best performance outside of Bond, but it cannot overcome the manipulative sentimentality and annoying stereotypes that the movie deals with.

text: as well as a study of mepe 's demise ; an american made dam that stopped the flow of the river which fishermen depended on for survival .
translation: メペの死に関する研究と、漁師が生き残るために依存していた川の流れを止めたアメリカ製のダム。
back_translation: Research on the death of the mepe and the American-made dam that stopped the river flow, which fishermen depended on to survive.

text: the film follows haris , a hip , handsome afghan-american artist who shows his work at a downtown manhattan art gallery .
translation: この映画は、ダウンタウンのマンハッタンのアートギャラリーで作品を展示する、ヒップでハンサムなアフガン系アメリカ人アーティスト、ハリスを追っています。
back_translation: This movie follows Harris, a hip and handsome Afghan-American artist who exhibits his work at an art gallery in downtown Manhattan.

text: an exhaustive investigation into the roots and after-effects of the revolutions and counter-revolutions that rocked france , the u . s . , china , latin america and czechoslovakia in 1967 and 1968 .
translation: 1967年と1968年にフランス、アメリカ、中国、ラテンアメリカ、チェコスロバキアを揺るがした革命と反革命の根源とその影響についての徹底的な調査。
back_translation: A thorough investigation into the roots and influences of the revolutions and counter-revolutions that shook France, the United States, China, Latin America, and Czechoslovakia in 1967 and 1968.

text: they are living eye-witnesses of the end of an era : 800 years of the death penalty in europe .
translation: 彼らは時代の終焉の生きた証人です：ヨーロッパにおける死刑の800年。
back_translation: They are living witnesses to the end of an era: 800 years of the death penalty in Europe.

text: crush could be the worst film a man has made about women since valley of the dolls .
translation: ク crush は、バレー・オブ・ザ・ドールズ以来、男性が女性について作った最悪の映画かもしれない。
back_translation: Crush might be the worst movie made by men about women since Valley of the Dolls.

text: the filmmakers wisely decided to let crocodile hunter steve irwin do what he does best , and fashion a story around him .
translation: 映画製作者たちは賢明にも、クロコダイルハンターのスティーブ・アーウィンに彼が最も得意とすることをさせ、その周りに物語を作ることに決めました。
back_translation: The filmmakers wisely decided to let Steve Irwin, the Crocodile Hunter, do what he does best and to build a story around it.

text: a few months later , both parties realize their mistake and find out that 'getting back what you had ' is not so easy .
translation: 数ヶ月後、双方は自分たちの過ちに気づき、「かつて持っていたものを取り戻す」ことがそんなに簡単ではないことを知ります。
back_translation: A few months later, both sides realize their mistakes and come to understand that "regaining what they once had" is not so easy.

text: as alex begins to dictate his tale of a romantic love triangle to the charming yet somewhat opinionated stenographer , emma challenges his ideas at every turn .
translation: アレックスが魅力的でありながらやや意見を持つ速記者エマに恋愛の三角関係についての物語を語り始めると、エマはあらゆる場面で彼の考えに挑戦します。
back_translation: As Alex begins to tell a story about a love triangle to the charming yet somewhat opinionated reporter Emma, she challenges his thoughts at every turn.

text: he stays at the guesthouse without accepting any lodgers and has created his own world avoiding contact with others .
translation: 彼は宿泊客を受け入れず、ゲストハウスに滞在しており、他人との接触を避けて自分の世界を作り出しています。
back_translation: He does not accept guests, stays in a guesthouse, and is creating his own world while avoiding contact with others.

text: although olivier assayas ' elegantly appointed period drama seems , at times , padded with incident in the way of a too-conscientious adaptation . . . its three-hour running time plays closer to two .
translation: オリビエ・アサヤスの優雅に装飾された時代劇は、時折過度に細心の注意を払った適応のように事件で詰め込まれているように見えるが、その3時間の上映時間は2時間に近い。
back_translation: Olivier Assayas's elegantly decorated period drama appears to be packed with events, at times seeming like an excessively meticulous adaptation, but its three-hour running time feels closer to two hours.

text: an ingenious and often harrowing look at damaged people and how families can offer either despair or consolation .
translation: 損傷を受けた人々に対する巧妙でしばしば辛辣な視点と、家族がいかに絶望や慰めを提供できるかについての考察。
back_translation: A clever and often harsh perspective on people who have suffered damage, along with reflections on how families can provide despair and comfort.

text: life , love , and the fear of failing . . .
translation: 人生、愛、そして失敗の恐れ。。。
back_translation: Life, love, and the fear of failure...

text: like `` this is spinal tap `` , only with more pathetic protagonists- and funnier !
translation: 「これはスパイナル・タップ」のように、もっと哀れな主人公たちで、しかももっと面白い！
back_translation: "This is like Spinal Tap, but with even more pitiful protagonists, and it's funnier!"

text: this only leads to increased anxiety and fear in nicholas .
translation: これはニコラスの不安と恐怖を増すだけです。
back_translation: This only increases Nicholas's anxiety and fear.

text: they 're visiting regularly , some of them even daily , to see the movies of their youth .
translation: 彼らは定期的に、日によっては毎日、若い頃の映画を観るために訪れています。
back_translation: They regularly visit, sometimes even every day, to watch movies from their youth.

text: lieutenant hart must then defend the black pilot against charges before an obviously racist american tribunal ; unaware that the trial itself is only a front for the real secret of the prison camp .
translation: ハート中尉は次に、明らかに人種差別的なアメリカの法廷で黒人パイロットを告発から弁護しなければならない；その裁判自体が実際には捕虜収容所の真の秘密のための表向きに過ぎないことを知らずに。
back_translation: Lieutenant Hart must next defend a black pilot against charges in an obviously racially biased American court; unaware that the trial itself is merely a facade for the true secrets of the prisoner of war camp.

text: a near perfect fusion of computer and cel animation .
translation: コンピュータアニメーションとセルアニメーションのほぼ完璧な融合。
back_translation: A nearly perfect fusion of computer animation and cel animation.

text: shot as a `` behind-the-scenes `` look at how a fictional kung-fu movie is made , the film is basically a movie about the making of a movie .
translation: フィクションのカンフー映画がどのように作られるかを「裏舞台」として描いたこの映画は、基本的に映画の制作過程をテーマにした映画です。
back_translation: This film, depicted as a "behind-the-scenes" look at how fictional kung fu movies are made, is essentially a film centered around the process of movie production.

text: as a feature-length film , it wears out its welcome as tryingly as the title character .
translation: 長編映画として、それはタイトルキャラクターと同様に、退屈さを感じさせる。
back_translation: As a feature film, it feels as dull as the title character.

text: but lulu is newly single and the last thing she needs is a man in her life .
translation: しかし、ルルは最近独り身であり、彼女が必要としている最後のものは人生に男性です。
back_translation: However, Lulu is currently single, and the last thing she needs in her life is a man.

text: the film is undone by anachronistic quick edits and occasional jarring glimpses of a modern theater audience watching the events unfold .
translation: その映画は、時代錯誤の素早い編集と、事件が展開するのを見守る現代の観客の時折衝撃的な映像によって台無しにされている。
back_translation: The movie is ruined by its rapid editing that feels anachronistic and by the occasionally shocking imagery that modern audiences witness as the events unfold.

text: two women , one spoiled and clinging , the other unawakened but formidable .
translation: 2人の女性、一人は甘やかされて依存している、もう一人は目覚めていないが formidable。
back_translation: Two women, one is spoiled and dependent, while the other is formidable but not yet awakened.

text: a standard police-oriented drama that , were it not for de niro 's participation , would have likely wound up a tnt original .
translation: デ・ニーロの参加がなければ、TNTオリジナルになっていたであろう、標準的な警察志向のドラマ。
back_translation: Without De Niro's participation, it would have been just a standard police-oriented drama that could have been an original TNT.

text: the longer the movie goes , the worse it gets , but it 's actually pretty good in the first few minutes .
translation: 映画が進むにつれてどんどん悪くなっていくが、最初の数分は実際にかなり良かった。
back_translation: As the movie progresses, it keeps getting worse, but the first few minutes were actually quite good.

text: likely to expertly drum up repressed teenage memories in any viewer .
translation: 視聴者の心に抑圧された思春期の思い出を見事に呼び起こす可能性が高い。
back_translation: It is highly likely to beautifully evoke the suppressed memories of adolescence in the hearts of the viewers.

text: the union , however , faces its own internecine battles as factions inside the organization , one led by james p . hoffa ( son of the infamous jimmy hoffa ) , vie for power .
translation: しかし、組合は内部の派閥間の抗争に直面しており、そのうちの一つは悪名高いジミー・ホッファの息子、ジェームス・P・ホッファが率いており、権力を争っています。
back_translation: However, the union is facing conflicts between internal factions, one of which is led by the notorious Jimmy Hoffa's son, James P. Hoffa, who is vying for power.

text: a modestly comic , modestly action-oriented world war ii adventure that , in terms of authenticity , is one of those films that requires the enemy to never shoot straight .
translation: 控えめにコメディタッチで、控えめにアクション指向の第二次世界大戦の冒険であり、リアリズムの観点から見ると、敵が決して真っ直ぐに弾を撃たないことが求められるような作品です。
back_translation: It's a WWII adventure with a modest comedic touch and a subtle action-oriented approach, where, from a realism standpoint, it's expected that the enemy never shoots straight.

text: however , she also finds links to a foundation that runs a shelter for battered women , paradiset .
translation: しかし、彼女は虐待を受けた女性のためのシェルターを運営する団体、パラダイセットへのリンクも見つけます。
back_translation: However, she also finds a link to an organization called Paradise Set that operates shelters for abused women.

text: desperate ) ones who undergo sexually-charged secret rituals and become the 'the chosen few ' .
translation: 絶望的な者たちは、性的に充満した秘密の儀式を受け、「選ばれし者たち」となる。
back_translation: The despairing individuals undergo a sexually saturated secret ritual to become the "chosen ones."

text: anmol comes to india with his father-in- law ( paresh rawal ) and the moment they step into india they are picked up by choto chhatri ( johny lever ) , who takes them to a local goon , eaida anna ( sunil shetty ) .
translation: アンモルは義理の父（パレッシュ・ラワル）と共にインディアに到着し、彼らがインディアに足を踏み入れると、チョト・チャトリ（ジョニー・レバー）に拾われ、地元のゴーン、アイダ・アンナ（スニル・シェッティ）のところへ連れて行かれます。
back_translation: Amol arrives in India with his father-in-law (Paresh Rawal), and as they step into India, they are picked up by Chhotu Chhatri (Johnny Lever) and taken to the local goon, Aida Anna (Sunil Shetty).

text: it would n't be my preferred way of spending 100 minutes or $ 7 . 00 .
translation: 100分や7ドルを使うのに私の好ましい方法ではありません。
back_translation: It's not my preferred way to spend 100 minutes or 7 dollars.

text: the problem with the mayhem in formula 51 is not that it 's offensive , but that it 's boring .
translation: フォーミュラ51の混乱の問題は、それが攻撃的であることではなく、退屈であることです。
back_translation: The problem with Formula 51's chaos is not that it is aggressive, but that it is boring.

text: and it seems that the only thing that he ca n't do , is alter a person 's free will , so if he wants her back , he has to do it the hard way .
translation: 彼ができない唯一のことは、人の自由意志を変えることのようです。だから、彼女を取り戻したいのであれば、彼は難しい方法でやらなければなりません。
back_translation: The only thing he seems unable to do is change a person's free will. So, if he wants to get her back, he has to do it the hard way.

text: what you end up getting is the vertical limit of surfing movies - memorable stunts with lots of downtime in between .
translation: 最終的に得られるのは、サーフィン映画の垂直の限界です - 大量のダウンタイムの合間に記憶に残るスタントがあるというものです。
back_translation: What ultimately is obtained is the vertical limit of surfing films - it's about having memorable stunts interspersed with a lot of downtime.

text: all the firefighters who participated in the film were friends and collegues of the six firemen who lost their lives .
translation: 映画に参加したすべての消防士は、命を落とした6人の消防士の友人であり同僚でした。
back_translation: All the firefighters who participated in the movie were friends and colleagues of the six firefighters who lost their lives.

text: blisteringly rude , scarily funny , sorrowfully sympathetic to the damage it surveys , the film has in kieran culkin a pitch-perfect holden .
translation: 痛烈に失礼で、恐ろしく面白く、調査する被害に対して悲しげに同情的なこの映画は、キーラン・カルキンが完璧なホールデンを演じています。
back_translation: This film is strikingly rude, terrifyingly funny, and sadly sympathetic towards the victims of its investigation, with Kieran Culkin perfectly portraying Holden.

text: he is a homeless street performer who brings shakespeare 's soliloquies to life each afternoon on various street corners around the city of denver .
translation: 彼はデンバー市の様々な街角で、毎日シェイクスピアの独白を生き生きと演じるホームレスのストリートパフォーマーです。
back_translation: He is a homeless street performer who vividly portrays Shakespearean monologues at various street corners in the city of Denver every day.

text: nakata 's technique is to imply terror by suggestion , rather than the overuse of special effects .
translation: 中田の技法は、特撮の多用ではなく、暗示によって恐怖をほのめかすことです。
back_translation: Nakada's technique is not the extensive use of special effects, but rather suggesting fear through implications.

text: the problem is n't that the movie hits so close to home so much as that it hits close to home while engaging in such silliness as that snake-down-the-throat business and the inevitable shot of schwarzenegger outrunning a fireball .
translation: 問題は、その映画が私たちにとってどれだけ身近であるかというよりも、スネークを喉に通すような馬鹿げたことをしながら、それが身近に感じられることです。そして、シュワルツェネッガーが火の玉を追い越すという避けられないシーンもあります。
back_translation: The problem is not how close that movie is to us, but rather the fact that it feels close while doing something as ridiculous as swallowing a snake. There is also the inevitable scene where Schwarzenegger outruns a fireball.

text: the problem with all of this : it 's not really funny .
translation: これらすべての問題：それは本当に面白くない。
back_translation: All these issues: they're really not interesting at all.

text: two american tourists on a romantic camping trip are brutally murdered .
translation: 二人のアメリカ人観光客がロマンティックなキャンプ旅行中に虐殺される。
back_translation: Two American tourists are massacred during a romantic camping trip.

text: he takes a job as a 4th grade substitute teacher at an uptight private school where his attitude and hijinx have a powerful effect on his students .
translation: 彼は堅苦しい私立学校で4年生の代用教員の職を得て、彼の態度やいたずらが生徒たちに強い影響を与える。
back_translation: He got a job as a substitute teacher for the fourth grade at a strict private school, and his attitude and pranks have a strong influence on the students.

text: the film is darkly atmospheric , with herrmann quietly suggesting the sadness and obsession beneath hearst 's forced avuncular chortles .
translation: その映画は暗い雰囲気が漂っており、ハーマンはハーストの無理に優しい笑い声の背後にある悲しみや執着を静かに示唆しています。
back_translation: The movie has a somber atmosphere, and Herman quietly suggests the sadness and obsession behind Hearst's forced cheerful laughter.

text: the film is so bad it does n't improve upon the experience of staring at a blank screen .
translation: その映画はとてもひどく、真っ白なスクリーンを見つめている経験を改善することすらありません。
back_translation: That movie was so terrible that it didn't even improve the experience of staring at a blank white screen.

text: moody , heartbreaking , and filmed in a natural , unforced style that makes its characters seem entirely convincing even when its script is not .
translation: 陰気で心を打つ、そして自然で無理のないスタイルで撮影されており、脚本がそうでないときでさえキャラクターが全く説得力を持つように見える。
back_translation: It's gloomy and poignant, and filmed in a natural and effortless style, making the characters appear completely convincing even when the script does not support them.

text: each of the principals has a radically different way of dealing with it .
translation: 各校長はそれに対処する方法がまったく異なります。
back_translation: Each principal handles it in completely different ways.

text: a thoughtful look at a painful incident that made headlines in 1995 .
translation: 1995年に見出しを飾った痛ましい出来事についての思慮深い考察。
back_translation: A thoughtful reflection on the tragic events that made headlines in 1995.

text: even though the film runs a brief 71 minutes -- finishing off with footage of reno talking with new yorkers on the street in the aftermath of 9/11 -- reno shows enough gusto to make you a fan .
translation: 映画はわずか71分と短いが、9/11の後、通りでニューヨーカーと話すレノの映像で締めくくられ、レノは十分な熱意を見せており、あなたをファンにさせる。
back_translation: The film is only 71 minutes long, but it concludes with footage of Leno talking to New Yorkers on the street after 9/11, where Leno shows enough enthusiasm to make you a fan.

text: the main characters are dr . kanna ( sharad kapoor ) , his fianc & # 233 ; e rupi ( ms . nandita das ) , rajayya ( makrand deshpande ) as naxalite commander , inspector despande ( sayaji shinde ) , ghisu ( vijay raj ) and dattu ( rajpal yadav ) .
translation: 主要な登場人物は、ドクター・カンナ（シャラド・カプール）、彼の婚約者ルピ（ナンディタ・ダス）、ナクサライトの指揮官ラジャヤ（マカランド・デシュパーデ）、インスペクター・デシュパーデ（サヤジ・シンデ）、ギス（ビジャイ・ラージ）、そしてダットゥ（ラジャン・ヤーダブ）です。
back_translation: The main characters are Dr. Kanna (Sharad Kapoor), his fiancée Rupi (Nandita Das), Naxalite commander Rajya (Makrand Deshpande), Inspector Deshpande (Sayaji Shinde), Giss (Vijay Raaz), and Dattu (Rajan Yadav).

text: effectively feeds our senses with the chilling sights and sounds from within the camp to create a completely numbing experience .
translation: キャンプ内のぞっとするような光景や音で私たちの感覚を効果的に刺激し、まったく麻痺した体験を生み出します。
back_translation: The chilling sights and sounds within the camp effectively stimulate our senses, creating a completely numbing experience.

text: chris , a radio dj , and his wife , katrin , who works at a truck stop , are friends with uwe , who owns a snack bar , and his wife , ellen , who sells perfume .
translation: クリスというラジオDJと彼の妻カトリン（トラックストップで働いている）は、スナックバーのオーナーであるウーヴェと彼の妻エレン（香水を売っている）と友達です。
back_translation: Chris, a radio DJ, and his wife Katrin (who works at a truck stop) are friends with Uwe, the owner of a snack bar, and his wife Ellen (who sells perfume).

text: but with little hope of breaking the game 's vicious cycle of money , dark deeds and long spells of incarceration , mel 's life represents everything tiz is trying to escape .
translation: しかし、金、暗い行為、長期の投獄の悪循環から抜け出す希望はほとんどなく、メルの人生はティズが逃れようとしている全てを表しています。
back_translation: However, there is little hope of breaking free from the cycle of money, dark deeds, and long-term imprisonment, and Mel's life represents everything Tiz is trying to escape.

text: is the history of two workers of the trains , a professor and a little child that decide to sequester an old train that has been sold to usa for a movie production .
translation: 2人の鉄道作業員、教授と幼い子供が、映画制作のためにアメリカに売却された古い列車を誘拐することを決めた歴史です。
back_translation: The story is about two railroad workers, a professor, and a young child, who decide to hijack an old train that was sold to America for the purpose of making a movie.

text: it did to paul strang , an ex-high school teacher drinking his life away after being nearly killed by a student .
translation: それはポール・ストラングに起こった。彼は元高校教師で、生徒にほぼ殺されかけた後、人生を飲み干している。
back_translation: That happened to Paul Strang. He was a former high school teacher who almost got killed by his students and is now drinking away his life.

text: for all the charm of kevin kline and a story that puts old-fashioned values under the microscope , there 's something creepy about this movie .
translation: ケビン・クラインの魅力と、古き良き価値観を顕微鏡で見つめるストーリーがある一方で、この映画には何か気味の悪さがある。
back_translation: While there is a story that focuses on Kevin Kline's charm and examines old-fashioned values through a microscope, there is also something eerie about this movie.

text: how often do you see a movie about a subject that truly frightens you ?
translation: 本当に恐ろしいと思うテーマの映画をどれくらいの頻度で観ますか？
back_translation: How often do you watch movies on themes that you truly find terrifying?

text: but when their simple robbery explodes into a bloody ambush , the ruthless killers realize that one of them is a cop .
translation: しかし、彼らの単純な強盗が血まみれの待ち伏せに発展すると、無慈悲な殺し屋たちはそのうちの一人が警官であることに気づく。
back_translation: However, when their simple robbery develops into a bloody ambush, the ruthless killers realize that one of them is a police officer.

text: crudup 's screen presence is the one thing that holds interest in the midst of a mushy , existential exploration of why men leave their families .
translation: クルダップのスクリーンプレゼンスは、男性が家族を去る理由についての感情的で存在論的な探求の中で、唯一の興味を引く要素です。
back_translation: The screen presence of Kurudapp is the only captivating element in an emotional and existential exploration of the reasons why men leave their families.

text: about amy 's cuteness , amy 's career success ( she 's a best-selling writer of self-help books who ca n't help herself ) , and amy 's neuroses when it comes to men .
translation: エイミーのかわいさ、エイミーのキャリアの成功（彼女は自分自身を助けられないベストセラーの自己啓発書作家です）、そして男性に関するエイミーの神経症について。
back_translation: Amy's cuteness, Amy's career success (she is a bestselling self-help author who can't help herself), and Amy's neuroses regarding men.

text: it 's the movie equivalent of a sweaty old guy in a rain coat shopping for cheap porn .
translation: それは、安いポルノを買いに行く雨合羽を着た汗をかいた年寄りのような映画の相当するものです。
back_translation: It is akin to a movie that resembles a sweaty old man in a raincoat going to buy cheap porn.

text: there 's only one way to kill michael myers for good : stop buying tickets to these movies .
translation: マイケル・マイヤーズを完全に倒す唯一の方法は、これらの映画のチケットを買うのをやめることです。
back_translation: The only way to completely defeat Michael Myers is to stop buying tickets to these movies.

text: the film is surprisingly well-directed by brett ratner , who keeps things moving well -- at least until the problematic third act .
translation: 映画は驚くほどブレット・ラトナーによってよく演出されており、物事はうまく進んでいる――少なくとも問題のある第3幕までは。
back_translation: The film is astonishingly well-directed by Brett Ratner, and things are going smoothly—at least until the problematic third act.

text: superbly photographed and staged by mendes with a series of riveting set pieces the likes of which mainstream audiences have rarely seen .
translation: メンデスによって見事に撮影され、演出されたこの作品は、主流の観客がほとんど目にしたことのない素晴らしいシーンの連続で構成されています。
back_translation: This work, beautifully captured and directed by Mendes, consists of a series of wonderful scenes that mainstream audiences have rarely seen.

text: a film that presents an interesting , even sexy premise then ruins itself with too many contrivances and goofy situations .
translation: 興味深く、さらにはセクシーな前提を提示する映画だが、あまりにも多くの策や不自然な状況で台無しになってしまう。
back_translation: It’s an intriguing and even sexy premise for a movie, but it is ruined by too many contrivances and unnatural situations.

text: the film follows 17-year-old cassandra mortmain ( romola garai ) , and the fortunes of her eccentric family , struggling to survive in a decaying english castle .
translation: この映画は17歳のカサンドラ・モートメイン（ロモラ・ガライ）と、衰退しているイギリスの城で生き延びるために奮闘する彼女の風変わりな家族の物語を描いています。
back_translation: This movie tells the story of 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain (Romola Garai) and her quirky family's struggle to survive in a declining English castle.

text: sharp , lively , funny and ultimately sobering film .
translation: 鋭く、活気があり、面白く、最終的には考えさせられる映画です。
back_translation: It’s a sharp, lively, and interesting film that ultimately makes you think.

text: julie is a smart and spunky fifteen year old who lost her family to syndicate killers .
translation: ジュリーは、家族をシンダケートの殺し屋に失った、賢くて元気な15歳の少女です。
back_translation: Julie is a smart and lively 15-year-old girl who lost her family to a Syndicate hitman.

text: ted norwood summons all his resistance to finally quit his seemingly successful carreer , only to be outmaneuvered by a powerful executive who barely even notices that she 's in a test of wills .
translation: テッド・ノーウッドは、成功しているように見えるキャリアをついに辞めるために全ての抵抗を振り絞るが、まるで自分が意志の試練にいることに気づかない強力な幹部に巧妙に出し抜かれてしまう。
back_translation: Ted Norwood gathers all his resistance to finally quit what appears to be a successful career, but he is cleverly outmaneuvered by a powerful executive who is oblivious to the fact that he is in a trial of will.

text: in depression-era chicago hitman michael sullivan is known to friends and enemies alike as the angel of death .
translation: depression時代のシカゴで、ヒットマンのマイケル・サリバンは、友人にも敵にも「死の天使」として知られています。
back_translation: In Depression-era Chicago, hitman Michael Sullivan is known to both friends and enemies as the "Angel of Death."

text: davis has energy , but she does n't bother to make her heroine 's book sound convincing , the gender-war ideas original , or the comic scenes fly .
translation: デイビスはエネルギーを持っているが、彼女のヒロインの本を説得力のあるものにしたり、ジェンダー戦争のアイデアを独創的にしたり、コメディのシーンを盛り上げたりすることを気に掛けていない。
back_translation: Davis has energy, but she doesn't care about making her heroine's story convincing, creating original ideas about the gender wars, or elevating the comedic scenes.

text: after another drunken night they are soon parted from all their accumulated cash .
translation: 別の酔った夜の後、彼らはすぐに蓄えた現金をすべて手放すことになる。
back_translation: After another drunken night, they will soon part with all the cash they have saved up.

text: but what exactly is good & # 38 ; what exactly is evil ?
translation: しかし、善とは正確には何ですか？そして、悪とは正確には何ですか？
back_translation: But what exactly is good? And what exactly is evil?

text: several former state and party functionaries interfere in the filmmaking in the hopes of manipulating katerina 's confessions for their own purposes .
translation: いくつかの元省庁および政党の役人が、カテリーナの告白を自分たちの目的のために操作しようと、映画製作に干渉しています。
back_translation: Some officials from former ministries and political parties are interfering with the film production in an attempt to manipulate Katerina's confession for their own purposes.

text: when [ reno ] lets her radical flag fly , taking angry potshots at george w . bush , henry kissinger , larry king , et al . , reno devolves into a laugh-free lecture .
translation: レノが激しい旗を掲げて、ジョージ・W・ブッシュ、ヘンリー・キッシンジャー、ラリー・キングなどに対して怒りのある攻撃をすると、レノは笑いのない講義に変わってしまう。
back_translation: When Leno waves a fierce banner and launches an angry attack against figures like George W. Bush, Henry Kissinger, and Larry King, it transforms into a lecture devoid of laughter.

text: the latest installment in the pokemon canon , pokemon 4ever is surprising less moldy and trite than the last two , likely because much of the japanese anime is set in a scenic forest where pokemon graze in peace .
translation: ポケモンの最新作『ポケモン4ever』は、前作2作よりも驚くほど陳腐さが少なく、むしろ新鮮です。これは、日本のアニメの大部分がポケモンが平和に草を食む風光明媚な森の中で設定されているためだと思われます。
back_translation: The latest Pokémon installment, "Pokémon 4ever," is impressively less clichéd than the previous two entries and feels rather fresh. This seems to be due to the fact that much of the Japanese anime is set in picturesque forests where Pokémon peacefully graze.

text: the inside story sees dean olsen ( curry ) finding a mysterious book in the cellar of his uncle 's ( tingwell ) old house .
translation: 内側の物語では、ディーン・オルセン（カリー）が叔父（ティングウェル）の古い家の地下室で謎の本を見つける。
back_translation: In the inner story, Dean Olsen (Curry) discovers a mysterious book in the basement of his uncle (Tingwell)'s old house.

text: ultimately , in the history of the academy , people may be wondering what all that jazz was about `` chicago `` in 2002 . zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: 最終的に、アカデミーの歴史の中で、人々は2002年の「シカゴ」の騒ぎが何だったのかを疑問に思うかもしれません。ゼルウィガーの泣き言を言うような口元とひょろひょろとした若い女性役の演技は、彼女の最優秀女優賞へのノミネートをさらに意味不明なものにしています。
back_translation: Ultimately, in the history of the Academy, people may wonder what the fuss over "Chicago" in 2002 was all about. Zellweger's whiny expression and her performance as a frail young woman render her nomination for Best Actress even more puzzling.

text: set in the los angeles police department in april 1992 , dark blue is a dramatic thriller that takes place just days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black motorist rodney king and the subsequent l . a . riots .
translation: 1992年4月、ロサンゼルス警察署を舞台にした『ダークブルー』は、黒人運転手ロドニー・キングへの暴行で4人の白人警官が無罪となる数日前と、その後のロサンゼルス暴動を描いたドラマティックなスリラーです。
back_translation: In April 1992, "Dark Blue," set in the Los Angeles Police Department, is a dramatic thriller that depicts the days leading up to the acquittal of four white police officers for the assault on Black driver Rodney King and the subsequent Los Angeles riots.

text: even with harris 's strong effort , the script gives him little to effectively probe lear 's soul-stripping breakdown .
translation: ハリスの強い努力にもかかわらず、脚本は彼にリアの魂をむしり取る崩壊を効果的に探るための余地をほとんど与えていない。
back_translation: Despite Harris's strong efforts, the script leaves him with little room to effectively explore the unraveling that strips away Rhea's soul.

text: billy crystal and robert de niro sleepwalk through vulgarities in a sequel you can refuse .
translation: ビリー・クリスタルとロバート・デ・ニーロは、拒否できる続編の中で下品な言葉を呟きながら夢遊病のように演じる。
back_translation: Billy Crystal and Robert De Niro perform like they are in a stupor, muttering vulgarities in a sequel they can't refuse.

text: the film belongs to the marvelous verdu , a sexy slip of an earth mother who mourns her tragedies in private and embraces life in public
translation: その映画は素晴らしいヴェルデュに属し、彼女は私的には悲劇を悲しみ、公共の場では人生を抱きしめるセクシーな大地の母のような存在です。
back_translation: The movie belongs to a wonderful Verdure, and she is privately a tragic figure mourning her sorrow, while in public, she embodies a sexy Mother Earth embracing life.

text: gorgeous to look at but insufferably tedious and turgid . . . a curiously constricted epic .
translation: 見た目は美しいが、耐え難いほど退屈で膨張した…奇妙に制約のある叙事詩。
back_translation: It looks beautiful, but it is unbearably dull and bloated... a strangely constrained epic.

text: fourteen-year-old misfit farm boy duncan midge ( hirsch ) is trying to cope with his mother 's death .
translation: 14歳の不良農場少年ダンカン・ミッジ（ハーシュ）は、母親の死に対処しようとしています。
back_translation: 14-year-old delinquent farm boy Duncan Midge (Hirsch) is trying to cope with the death of his mother.

text: graffiti removal has subverted the common obstacles blocking creative expression and become one of the more intriguing and important art movements of our time .
translation: グラフィティの除去は、創造的表現を妨げる一般的な障害を覆し、私たちの時代のより興味深く重要なアートムーブメントの一つとなっています。
back_translation: The removal of graffiti has become one of the more interesting and significant art movements of our time, overturning the common obstacles that hinder creative expression.

text: there 's plenty to enjoy -- in no small part thanks to lau .
translation: 楽しむべきことはたくさんあります — ラウのおかげでかなりの部分です。
back_translation: There are many things to enjoy—thanks to Rau, a significant part of it.

text: while navigating through the tumultuous neighborhoods of south central l . a . , perry and keough must track down cold-blooded killers and face their own demons , which prove to be more ruthless than the criminals they pursue .
translation: 南中央ロサンゼルスの tumultuous な地域を探索する中で、ペリーとキューは冷酷な殺人者を追跡し、自らの悪霊に立ち向かわなければならず、それは追い立てる犯罪者よりも無慈悲であることが証明される。
back_translation: While exploring the tumultuous area of South Central Los Angeles, Perry and Q must track down a ruthless killer and confront their own demons, which prove to be more merciless than the criminals they are chasing.

text: new york fashion designer melanie carmichael suddenly finds herself engaged to the city 's most eligible bachelor .
translation: ニューヨークのファッションデザイナー、メラニー・カーマイケルは突然、都市で一番モテるバチェラーと婚約してしまう。
back_translation: New York fashion designer Melanie Carmichael suddenly gets engaged to the city's most eligible bachelor.

text: 'while you were waiting ' explores the complex relationship between cigarette addiction and its effects on family members .
translation: 「あなたが待っている間」は、タバコ依存症とそれが家族に与える影響との複雑な関係を探求しています。
back_translation: "While You Wait" explores the complex relationship between smoking addiction and its impact on families.

text: charlie beck is a handsome british charmer , he arrives in a vintage sports car and woos sally until he sweeps her off her feet .
translation: チャーリー・ベックはハンサムなイギリスの魅力的な男性で、クラシックなスポーツカーで到着し、サリーを魅了して彼女を夢中にさせる。
back_translation: Charlie Beck is a handsome, charming British man who arrives in a classic sports car, captivating and enchanting Sally.

text: the attempt is courageous , even if the result is wildly uneven .
translation: その試みは勇敢であり、結果が極端に不均一であっても。
back_translation: That attempt is brave, even if the results are extremely uneven.

text: in the shop we find eddie ( the entertainer ) , an old barber with strong opinions and no customers .
translation: 店には、強い意見を持ち顧客がいない古い理髪師エディ（エンターテイナー）がいます。
back_translation: In the shop, there is an old barber named Eddie (an entertainer) who has strong opinions but no customers.

text: with the help of the sulty nina , sitting alone in the center of the restaurant , simone gets caught up in the flirting , fighting and food and discovers that sometimes , the best things may not be on the menu .
translation: セクシーなニナの助けを借りて、レストランの中央で一人座っているシモーヌは、 flirt（ふざけた道理での愛情表現）、戦い、そして食事に巻き込まれ、時には最高のものはメニューに載っていないことを発見します。
back_translation: With the help of sexy Nina, Simone, sitting alone in the center of the restaurant, gets caught up in flirting, fighting, and dining, and sometimes discovers that the best things are not on the menu.

text: sensitive , insightful and beautifully rendered film . one of the best of the year .
translation: 敏感で洞察に満ち、美しく表現された映画。今年の最高の作品の一つ。
back_translation: A sensitive and insightful film, beautifully expressed. One of the best works of the year.

text: the problem with movies about angels is they have a tendency to slip into hokum . a rumor of angels does n't just slip -- it avalanches into forced fuzziness .
translation: 天使についての映画の問題は、しばしばおかしな方向に進んでしまうことです。天使に関する噂は、ただ流れるだけではなく、強制的なあいまいさへと雪崩れ込んでしまいます。
back_translation: The problem with movies about angels is that they often take a strange turn. Rumors about angels do not just flow; they cascade into forced ambiguity.

text: his motives are plain and simple , to meet a woman .
translation: 彼の動機は明確で単純です、女性に会うためです。
back_translation: His motive is clear and simple: to meet women.

text: she 's a troubled young woman who takes off on a journey with a hitchhiker after a strange , fateful encounter on a new york street .
translation: 彼女は、ニューヨークの街での奇妙で運命的な出会いの後、ヒッチハイカーと共に旅に出る問題を抱えた若い女性です。
back_translation: She is a young woman with a problem who sets off on a journey with a hitchhiker after a strange and fateful encounter in the streets of New York.

text: a dark contemporary gangster drama set in chicago , shut-eye derives its edgy chemistry from conflicted loyalties .
translation: シカゴを舞台にしたダークな現代ギャングドラマ「シャット・アイ」は、対立する忠誠心から生まれる鋭い化学反応を基にしています。
back_translation: The dark modern gangster drama "Shut Eye," set in Chicago, is based on the sharp chemical reactions arising from conflicting loyalties.

text: when the chemical sisters , montreal 's fabulous club kid duo find an unconscious naked boy on their way out from yet another jetset event , they decide to bring him home and take matters into their own glittery hands .
translation: 化学の姉妹、モントリオールの素晴らしいクラブキッドデュオが、また別のジェットセットイベントから出てくる途中で意識を失った裸の少年を見つけると、彼女たちは彼を家に連れて帰り、自らのグリッターな手で事態を収拾することに決める。
back_translation: Sisters of Chemistry, the fabulous club kid duo from Montreal, come across a naked boy who has passed out on the way back from another jet-set event, and they decide to take him home and handle the situation with their glittery hands.

text: essentially , this is abel fererra 's it 's a wonderful life .
translation: 本質的に、これはアベル・フェレラの「素晴らしき人生」です。
back_translation: Essentially, this is Abel Ferrara's "Beautiful Life."

text: he tells her to keep fighting for her goals but still to compromise .
translation: 彼は彼女に目標のために戦い続けるように言いますが、妥協することも忘れないように言います。
back_translation: He tells her to keep fighting for her goals, but also reminds her not to forget to compromise.

text: cal is an unpleasantly shallow and immature character with whom to spend 110 claustrophobic minutes .
translation: キャルは、不快に浅く未熟なキャラクターであり、110分間の閉塞感に満ちた時間を過ごすのは辛い。
back_translation: Cale is an unpleasantly shallow and immature character, making the experience of spending 110 minutes filled with a sense of stagnation painful.

text: as she makes her way through the dazed world of the city 's junkies , only one person seems able to provide any help : the obsessive and self-destructive miles , the last of the city 's security officers .
translation: 彼女が街の薬物中毒者たちの混乱した世界を進む中、唯一助けを提供できるのは、偏執的で自己破壊的なマイルズ、街の最後の警備員だけのようだった。
back_translation: As she navigated the chaotic world of the city's drug addicts, it seemed that the only one who could offer her help was the paranoid and self-destructive Miles, the last security guard of the city.

text: feelings he interprets with his five senses reflect the emotions of others , not his own .
translation: 彼が五感で解釈する感情は、彼自身のものではなく、他人の感情を反映している。
back_translation: The emotions he interprets through his five senses are not his own, but reflect the feelings of others.

text: the major problem with windtalkers is that the bulk of the movie centers on the wrong character .
translation: ウィンドトーカーズの主な問題は、映画の大部分が間違ったキャラクターに焦点を当てていることです。
back_translation: The main issue with Windtalkers is that a large part of the movie focuses on the wrong characters.

text: a strange film employing old home movies and newly shot footage in an effort to expose one hungarian family and their mutiple problems from the 1940s to current .
translation: 古いホームムービーと新たに撮影された映像を使用して、1940年代から現在にかけての一つのハンガリー家族とその複数の問題を暴露しようとする奇妙な映画。
back_translation: A strange film that attempts to expose a Hungarian family and their various issues from the 1940s to the present, using old home movies and newly shot footage.

text: wanker goths are on the loose ! run for your lives !
translation: ウィンカー・ゴスたちが暴れてる！命が危ない！
back_translation: The winkers and gos are rampaging! Our lives are in danger!

text: 'murder by numbers ' is a psychological suspense-thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective , cassie mayweather ( sandra bullock ) and her new partner sam kennedy ( ben chaplin ) who become pitted against two malevolently brilliant young men ( ryan gosling and michael pitt ) in an ingenious battle of wits as they try to solve a murder case .
translation: 「マーダー バイ ナンバーズ」は、執念深い殺人捜査官キャッシー・メイウェザー（サンドラ・ブロック）と彼女の新しいパートナー、サム・ケネディ（ベン・チャップリン）が、巧妙な頭脳戦で二人の邪悪にして優秀な若者（ライアン・ゴズリングとマイケル・ピット）と対峙しながら殺人事件を解決しようと奮闘する心理的サスペンススリラーです。
back_translation: "Murder by Numbers" is a psychological suspense thriller in which the tenacious murder investigator Cassie Mayweather (Sandra Bullock) and her new partner, Sam Kennedy (Ben Chaplin), strive to solve a murder case while confronting two evil and brilliant young men (Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt) in a clever battle of wits.

text: the story line follows how making the film transforms the life of an 18-year-old man hired as a driver on the production .
translation: この物語は、制作にドライバーとして雇われた18歳の男の人生が映画制作を通じてどのように変わっていくかを追っています。
back_translation: This story follows the life of an 18-year-old man who was hired as a driver during production and how his life changes through the process of filmmaking.

text: two friends purchase a winning lottery ticket , only to have it stolen by a woman while she is robbing the cafe in which they are having lunch .
translation: 二人の友人が当選した宝くじの券を購入するが、昼食を取っているカフェで女性に強盗されてしまう。
back_translation: Two friends purchase a winning lottery ticket, but while they are having lunch at a café, they are robbed by a woman.

text: beresford nicely mixes in as much humor as pathos to take us on his sentimental journey of the heart . it really is a shame that more wo n't get an opportunity to embrace small , sweet 'evelyn . '
translation: ベレスフォードは、ユーモアと悲しみをうまく組み合わせて、私たちを心の感情的な旅に連れて行きます。もっと多くの人が、小さくて甘い「エブリン」を受け入れる機会を得ないのは本当に残念です。
back_translation: Beresford skillfully combines humor and sorrow, taking us on an emotional journey. It's truly unfortunate that more people aren't given the chance to embrace the small and sweet "Evelyn."

text: mexican crimelord beno gildemontes has stolen classified intelligence data .
translation: メキシコの犯罪組織のボス、ベノ・ギルデモンテスが機密情報を盗んだ。
back_translation: The boss of the Mexican crime organization, Beno Gildemonte, stole confidential information.

text: the widow 's teenage daughter wants to be a professional gambler and she convinces her mother to date a british man whose new in town .
translation: その未亡人のティーンエイジャーの娘はプロのギャンブラーになりたいと思っており、母親を町に新しく来たイギリス人男性とデートさせるよう説得します。
back_translation: The widow's teenage daughter wants to become a professional gambler and persuades her mother to date a newly arrived British man in town.

text: in order to appease the lord of gods indra ( amitabh bachchan ) , custodian of rain , a grand fire sacrifice is being conducted at the palace under the guidance of the chief priest , paravasu ( jackie shroff ) .
translation: 神々の王インドラ（アミターブ・バッチャン）をなだめるために、雨の守護者であるインドラを満足させるために、宮殿で大規模な火の儀式が行われており、主祭司パラヴァス（ジャッキー・シュロフ）の指導のもと進行されています。
back_translation: To appease Indra, the king of the gods (Amitabh Bachchan), a grand fire ritual is being conducted in the palace to satisfy him, the protector of rain, under the guidance of the chief priest Paravas (Jackie Shroff).

text: throughout all the tumult , a question comes to mind : so why is this so boring ?
translation: すべての混乱の中で、一つの疑問が浮かぶ：なぜこれはこんなに退屈なのだろう？
back_translation: Amid all the chaos, one question arises: why is this so boring?

text: two young mormon missionaries wake up to find themselves evicted from the house , where they had been renting rooms from a now deceased widow .
translation: 二人の若いモルモンの宣教師は、今は亡き未亡人から部屋を借りていた家から追い出されていることに気づいて目を覚まします。
