back_translation: Two young Mormon missionaries wake up to realize they have been kicked out of the house where they were renting a room from a deceased widow.

text: the values that have held the enterprise crew together through previous adventures and perils do so again-courage , self-sacrifice and patience under pressure .
translation: 以前の冒険や危険を通じて企業のクルーを結びつけてきた価値観、すなわち勇気、自己犠牲、そしてプレッシャーの中での忍耐が再び働いています。
back_translation: The values that have connected the crew of the company through past adventures and dangers, namely courage, self-sacrifice, and perseverance under pressure, are at work once again.

text: muccino seems to be exploring the idea of why human beings long for what they do n't have , and how this gets us in trouble . but even while his characters are acting horribly , he is always sympathetic .
translation: ムッチーノは、人間が持っていないものを渇望する理由と、それがどのように私たちを困難な状況に陥れるのかを探求しているようです。しかし、彼のキャラクターがひどい行動をしている間でも、彼は常に同情的です。
back_translation: Mucchino seems to explore the reasons why humans crave what they do not have and how it can lead us into difficult situations. However, even when his characters engage in terrible behavior, he remains empathetic.

text: his older brother junnie offers to coach him on how to be a player , promising martin that within two weeks , she 'll be his .
translation: 彼の兄ジュニは、彼にプレーヤーになる方法を教えることを提案し、マーティンに2週間以内に彼女が彼のものになると約束します。
back_translation: His brother Juni suggested teaching him how to become a player and promised Martin that she would be his within two weeks.

text: at the beginning , the cast assembles for a seemingly traditional wedding shower .
translation: 最初に、キャストは一見伝統的なウェディングシャワーのために集まります。
back_translation: At first, the cast gathers for what seems to be a traditional wedding shower.

text: feeling like a dope has rarely been more fun than it is in nine queens .
translation: 「ナイン・クイーンズ」でバカみたいな気分になることは、これまでで最も楽しいことのひとつだ。
back_translation: Getting a silly feeling while watching "Nine Queens" is one of the most enjoyable things ever.

text: a sham construct based on theory , sleight-of-hand , and ill-wrought hypothesis .
translation: 理論、マジックのトリック、そして不十分に構築された仮説に基づく虚構の構造。
back_translation: The structure of fiction based on theory, magic tricks, and inadequately constructed hypotheses.

text: with nothing to go on but his dreams and gut instinct , vince launches into his own search for ellen . . . or is he really searching for sara ?
translation: 何も手がかりがないまま、夢と直感だけを頼りに、ヴィンスはエレンを探し始める…それとも、彼は本当にサラを探しているのだろうか？
back_translation: With no clues at all, relying only on dreams and intuition, Vince begins to search for Ellen... or is he really searching for Sarah?

text: . . . delivers few moments of inspiration amid the bland animation and simplistic story .
translation: . . . 平凡なアニメーションと単純なストーリーの中で、いくつかのインスピレーションをもたらします。
back_translation: Amidst the mundane animation and simple storyline, it brings some inspiration.

text: terri ( eve ) is a hard-edged woman who ca n't seem to leave her two-timing boyfriend .
translation: テリ（イヴ）は、二股をかける彼氏をどうしても手放せない、厳しい性格の女性です。
back_translation: Teri (Eve) is a strong-willed woman who just can't let go of her boyfriend, even though he is cheating on her.

text: before long , pazuzu , the demon from the movies , fully possesses the boy and father merrin is the only one who can stop pazuzu 's evil plan of world domination .
translation: やがて、映画の悪魔パズズが少年を完全に支配し、父メリンだけがパズズの世界支配の邪悪な計画を止めることができる。
back_translation: Eventually, the movie's demon Pazuzu completely takes over the boy, and only his father, Merrin, can stop Pazuzu's evil plan for world domination.

text: to my taste , the film 's comic characters come perilously close to being amoses and andys for a new generation .
translation: 私の好みに言わせてもらえば、その映画のコメディキャラクターは新しい世代のアモスとアンディになりそうなほど危険な香りがします。
back_translation: In my opinion, the comedic characters in that movie have a dangerously reminiscent vibe of a new generation of Amos and Andy.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us . if horses could fly , this is surely what they 'd look like .
translation: 真剣なドラマが足かせになりそうなとき、渦巻く急流を突き抜けるような高揚感のあるビジュアルシーケンスや、頂点から頂点への跳躍が私たちを奮い立たせます。もし馬が空を飛べるなら、間違いなくこう見えるでしょう。
back_translation: When serious drama seems to be a hindrance, a visual sequence with an exhilarating feeling that pierces through swirling rapids and leaps from peak to peak invigorates us. If horses could fly, they would undoubtedly look like this.

text: caught in an intrigue of baby-snatching , a bounty hunter and diaper-changing , dave and ruby spend a hilarious , unexpected and wild night together .
translation: 赤ちゃんをさらう陰謀に巻き込まれたダヴとルビーは、賞金稼ぎとおむつ替えをしながら、予想外で笑えるワイルドな夜を共に過ごします。
back_translation: Dove and Ruby, caught up in a conspiracy to kidnap a baby, spend an unexpectedly funny and wild night together while bounty hunting and changing diapers.

text: as the girls begin to bond , laura gradually begins to find herself abandoning the safety of the fantasy and falling into her first real friendship .
translation: 女の子たちが絆を深めるにつれて、ローラは徐々に幻想の安全な世界を手放し、初めての本当の友情に落ち入っていくことに気づく。
back_translation: As the girls deepen their bonds, Laura gradually realizes that she is letting go of the safe world of fantasy and falling into her first true friendship.

text: a counterfeit 1000 tomin bank note is passed in a bazaar .
translation: バザールで偽の1000トミン札が流通しています。
back_translation: Fake 1000 tomin bills are circulating in the bazaar.

text: this stuck pig of a movie flails limply between bizarre comedy and pallid horror .
translation: このひどい映画は、奇妙なコメディと淡白なホラーの間でぐったりと挣扎している。
back_translation: This terrible movie is languidly struggling between bizarre comedy and bland horror.

text: paralyzed by the discovery he is only capable of leaving with a stupid excuse , trying to hide from ana the anguish that barely lets him breath .
translation: 発見に麻痺し、愚かな言い訳でしか逃げられない彼は、ほとんど息ができないほどの anguish をアナから隠そうとしている。
back_translation: He, paralyzed by discovery and unable to escape with anything but foolish excuses, is trying to hide the almost suffocating anguish from Anna.

text: it seems that vince 's sister , sara , has shown up too , about 22 years after she was abducted and murdered .
translation: ヴィンスの妹サラが、誘拐されて殺害されてから約22年後に現れたようです。
back_translation: It seems that Vince's sister Sara has appeared about 22 years after being kidnapped and murdered.

text: despite the inexperience of the director and his cast , there 's rarely a false moment .
translation: 監督とキャストの未熟さにもかかわらず、ほとんど偽りの瞬間はありません。
back_translation: Despite the inexperience of the director and cast, there are hardly any moments of falseness.

text: absurdities and clichM-is accumulate like lint in a fat man 's navel .
translation: 不条理やクリシェは太った男のへそにほこりのようにたまっていく。
back_translation: Absurdity and clichés accumulate like dust on the belly button of a fat man.

text: it 's all very cute , though not terribly funny if you 're more than six years old .
translation: すべてとても可愛いですが、6歳以上だとあまり面白くはありません。
back_translation: Everything is very cute, but it's not very interesting for those over 6 years old.

text: ca n't get enough of libidinous young city dwellers ? try this obscenely bad dark comedy , so crass that it makes edward burns ' sidewalks of new york look like oscar wilde .
translation: 肉欲に満ちた若い都市住民が足りないですか？それならこの過激に悪いダークコメディを試してみてください。あまりにも下品で、エドワード・バーンズの『ニューヨークの歩道』がオスカー・ワイルドに見えるほどです。
back_translation: Are you lacking in lustful young urban dwellers? If so, then try this outrageously bad dark comedy. It is so vulgar that Edward Burns' "Sidewalks of New York" would look like Oscar Wilde in comparison.

text: but they 're also so much more , as you 'll find out in deborah dickson 's powerful and intimate documentary .
translation: しかし、彼らはそれ以上の存在であり、デボラ・ディクソンの力強く親密なドキュメンタリーでそのことがわかるでしょう。
back_translation: However, they are more than that, and you will see this in Deborah Dixon's powerful and intimate documentary.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: 自動小銃の発砲の合間に、この物語は資本主義に対する鋭い批評を提供します。
back_translation: In between the gunfire of automatic rifles, this story provides a sharp critique of capitalism.

text: it will probably prove interesting to ram dass fans , but to others it may feel like a parody of the mellow , peace-and-love side of the '60s counterculture .
translation: これはおそらくラム・ダスのファンにとって興味深いものになるでしょうが、他の人々には1960年代のカウンターカルチャーの穏やかで平和と愛の側面のパロディのように感じられるかもしれません。
back_translation: This may be interesting for fans of Ram Dass, but for others, it might feel like a parody of the peaceful and love-filled aspects of the 1960s counterculture.

text: jacki resolves to play this one last gig and then throw in the towel if she does not find success .
translation: ジャッキーはこの最後のギグを演奏して成功しなければ、引退する決意を固めている。
back_translation: Jackie has made up her mind to retire if she doesn't succeed in playing this final gig.

text: when max 's performance is no competition for producers ' nephews and bigger `` names , `` his only option is to cripple the competition - literally .
translation: マックスのパフォーマンスは、プロデューサーの甥やより大きな「名前」と競争にならないとき、彼の唯一の選択肢は競争相手を文字通り打倒することです。
back_translation: Max's performance, when it is not competing against the producer's nephew or bigger "names," his only option is to literally defeat the competition.

text: edi is wrongly accused of having raped the girl whose brothers have got the control over one of the city areas .
translation: エディは、兄弟が市内のある地域を支配している女の子をレイプしたとして誤って非難されている。
back_translation: Eddie has been falsely accused of raping a girl whose brothers control a certain area of the city.

text: lapd patrol officer trey sellars joined the force as a day job until his acting career took off .
translation: LAPDの巡査トレイ・セラーズは、演技キャリアが軌道に乗るまで日中の仕事として警察官に加わりました。
back_translation: LAPD officer Trey Sellers joined the police force as a daytime job until his acting career took off.

text: this formulaic chiller will do little to boost stallone 's career .
translation: この定型的なスリラーはスタローンのキャリアを向上させることはほとんどないだろう。
back_translation: This formulaic thriller is unlikely to enhance Stallone's career.

text: provides the kind of 'laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending . after seeing 'analyze that , ' i feel better already .
translation: 映画のコメディから必要な「笑いのセラピー」を提供してくれる -- 異彩を放つユーモア、面白いキャラクター、そしてハッピーエンド。『アナライズ・ザット』を見た後、私はすでに気分が良くなった。
back_translation: The movie provides the necessary "laughter therapy" from comedy -- with its distinctive humor, interesting characters, and happy ending. After watching "Analyze That," I already felt better.

text: this roller coaster tale teams a young man , will turner , with an unlikely ally in rogue pirate jack sparrow .
translation: このローラーコースターの物語は、若者ウィル・ターナーと、裏切り者の海賊ジャック・スパロウという意外な仲間が組むことになります。
back_translation: The story of this roller coaster features the young man Will Turner and the unlikely ally, the treacherous pirate Jack Sparrow.

text: of course , this is n't the best idea , since it involves sneaking into gun-nut carl 's house in the middle of the night .
translation: もちろん、これは最善のアイデアではありません。なぜなら、夜中に銃マニアのカールの家に忍び込むことを含んでいるからです。
back_translation: Of course, this is not the best idea, because it involves sneaking into the house of Carl, the gun enthusiast, in the middle of the night.

text: what if fate intervened and hitler was forced into hiding in post-war london ?
translation: もし運命が介入し、ヒトラーが戦後のロンドンで隠れることを余儀なくされたらどうなるのか？
back_translation: What would happen if fate intervened and Hitler was forced to hide in post-war London?

text: i did n't find much fascination in the swinging . what they 're doing is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games , of no erotic or sensuous charge . but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: 私はスウィングにあまり魅力を感じませんでした。彼らがしていることは配管の配置や心理的なゲームの問題であり、官能的な興奮や魅力はありません。しかし、彼らがそれを行っていることは考えさせられます。
back_translation: I didn't find much appeal in swinging. What they're doing is more about the arrangement of pipes and psychological game issues, and there's no sensual excitement or allure. However, it does make you think about it.

text: an edgy indie-psychological drama about an alluring but mixed-up l . a . girl who flip-flops between facing life 's uncertainty under her own direction or `` the good life `` provided by a wealthy , disturbing middle-aged benefactor .
translation: 魅力的だが混乱したロサンゼルスの少女についての尖ったインディー心理ドラマで、彼女は自分自身の指導の下で人生の不確実性に直面するか、「良い生活」を提供する裕福で不穏な中年の後援者のもとで生きるかを揺れ動く。
back_translation: A sharp indie psychological drama about a charming yet confused girl in Los Angeles, as she oscillates between facing the uncertainties of life under her own guidance or living under the care of a wealthy and unsettling middle-aged benefactor who provides a "good life."

text: as before , the resistance was able to send another t-800 as a protector for john , and its still a question of which one will reach him first . . .
translation: 以前と同様に、レジスタンスはジョンのための保護者として別のT-800を送り出すことができ、どちらが先に彼に辿り着くかはまだ疑問です……。
back_translation: As before, the Resistance is able to send another T-800 as a protector for John, and it remains to be seen which one will reach him first...

text: when his only friend and co-worker dies , a young man born with dwarfism moves to an abandoned train depot in rural new jersey .
translation: 彼の唯一の友人であり同僚が亡くなったとき、先天性の小人症を持つ若者はニュージャージー州の田舎にある廃駅に引っ越します。
back_translation: When his only friend and colleague passed away, the young man with congenital dwarfism moved to an abandoned station in the rural countryside of New Jersey.

text: many have no physical sex lives , living instead in a world of romance with stars like james dean or audrey hepburn .
translation: 多くの人々は肉体的な性生活を持たず、代わりにジェームズ・ディーンやオードリー・ヘプバーンのようなスターとのロマンの世界に生きています。
back_translation: Many people do not have a physical sex life and instead live in a world of romance with stars like James Dean and Audrey Hepburn.

text: he 's sixteen and lives with his younger sister , mother cheryl and her boyfriend john , in a modest house in bakersfield , california .
translation: 彼は16歳で、カリフォルニア州ベイカーズフィールドの控えめな家に、妹、母シャーリル、そして母のボーイフレンドであるジョンと一緒に住んでいます。
back_translation: He is 16 years old and lives in a modest house in Bakersfield, California, with his younger sister, his mother Sheryl, and his mother's boyfriend, John.

text: he seems impossible to stop as when the possessed guest is killed , murray passes into the killer to continue his mission of murdering all nine of them .
translation: 彼は止めることが不可能なようです。憑依された客が殺されると、マレーは殺人者に移り変わり、彼ら全員を殺すという使命を続けます。
back_translation: It seems impossible for him to stop. When a possessed guest is killed, Malay transitions into the murderer and continues the mission to kill them all.

text: to spite the hated infidel ways of her father , she has settled into a complacent relationship and is struggling ( not too hard ) with issues of fidelity to her kind but unexciting husband .
translation: 彼女は父親の憎むべき異教徒のやり方に対抗するために、満足した関係に落ち着き、親切だが刺激のない夫に対する忠誠心の問題に苦しんでいる（あまり努力はしていない）。
back_translation: She is struggling with her loyalty to a kind but mundane husband, having settled into a satisfied relationship in order to oppose her father's despicable pagan ways (not putting in much effort).

text: willy , on impulse , takes her captive and murders her .
translation: ウィリーは衝動的に彼女を捕らえ、殺してしまう。
back_translation: Willy impulsively captures and kills her.

text: the tone shifts abruptly from tense to celebratory to soppy .
translation: トーンが緊張感から祝賀的、そしてしんみりとしたものへと急激に変わる。
back_translation: The tone shifts rapidly from one of tension to celebration, and then to a reflective mood.

text: the story follows a visit to bobby by his mother .
translation: 物語は、ボビーの母親がボビーを訪ねる様子を追っています。
back_translation: The story follows Bobby's mother as she visits Bobby.

text: 'you 'll laugh for not quite and hour and a half , but come out feeling strangely unsatisfied . you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter . . . '
translation: 「あなたは1時間半ほど笑うでしょうが、なんとも言えない不満を感じて出てくるでしょう。まるでピーナッツバター抜きのリースのチョコレートを食べたかのような気分になるでしょう…。」
back_translation: "You will laugh for about an hour and a half, but you will feel an indescribable dissatisfaction afterwards. It will feel like you ate chocolate without the peanut butter..."

text: as a young man , walter t . shaw jr . saw his father go unaccredited for his remarkable work and set out on his ironically celebrated career in crime .
translation: 若いころ、ウォルター・T・ショー・ジュニアは父がその素晴らしい業績に対して評価されないのを見て、皮肉にも犯罪のキャリアを築くことを決意しました。
back_translation: When he was young, Walter T. Shaw Jr. decided, somewhat ironically, to build a career in crime after seeing his father go unrecognized for his remarkable achievements.

text: if the last man were the last movie left on earth , there would be a toss-up between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and another night of delightful hand shadows .
translation: もし最後の男が地球上に残された最後の映画であれば、私たちが知る映画の終わりを見守るか、もう一晩楽しい手影絵を楽しむかの選択になるでしょう。
back_translation: If the last man was the last movie left on Earth, it would come down to choosing between watching the end of the movies we know or enjoying another night of fun shadow puppets.

text: but early on there are signs of trouble , and lena is prey to suspicions no one else need consider : a new face may be a new kid in town-or a face from the grave .
translation: しかし初めのうちは問題の兆候があり、レナは他の誰も考慮しなくてもよい疑念に悩まされる：新しい顔は町に来た新参者か、あるいは墓からの顔かもしれない。
back_translation: However, at first, there are signs of trouble, and Rena is troubled by doubts that no one else needs to consider: the new faces might belong to newcomers to the town, or they could be faces from the grave.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: 上海ゲットーはロマン・ポランスキーの「戦場のピアニスト」ほどドラマチックではないかもしれませんが、その思いやりのある精神は同じように高く舞い上がります。
back_translation: The Shanghai Ghetto may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's "The Pianist," but its spirit of compassion soars just as high.

text: in an isolated town named raccoon city , the largest corporate supplier of healthcare , medical supplies , and defense technology has a secret research facility located half a mile underground called the hive .
translation: 孤立した町、ラクーンシティには、医療、医療用品、防衛技術の最大手企業があり、地下半マイルの場所に「ハイブ」と呼ばれる秘密の研究施設があります。
back_translation: In the isolated town of Raccoon City, there is a major company in medical, medical supplies, and defense technology, and there is a secret research facility called "The Hive" located half a mile underground.

text: it 's a shame that pokemon 4ever 's dialogue is so trite and flatly delivered because the tale itself presents serious ideas worthy of more poetic language .
translation: ポケモン4everの対話があまりにも陳腐で平坦に演じられているのは残念です。なぜなら、この物語自体はもっと詩的な言語に値する深刻なアイディアを示しているからです。
back_translation: It's disappointing that the dialogue in Pokémon 4ever is portrayed in such a clichéd and flat manner, because the story itself presents serious ideas that deserve more poetic language.

text: tor loves jessica but his life has got stuck in a rut .
translation: トールはジェシカを愛しているが、彼の人生は停滞している。
back_translation: Tor loves Jessica, but his life is stagnant.

text: an interview with rick rescorla , head of security for morgan stanley dean witter , filmed in his office on the 44th floor of the world trade center in 1998 .
translation: 1998年にワールドトレードセンターの44階にあるオフィスで撮影された、モルガン・スタンレー・ディーン・ウィッターのセキュリティ責任者リック・レスコーラとのインタビュー。
back_translation: An interview with Rick Rescorla, the security director of Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, filmed in an office on the 44th floor of the World Trade Center in 1998.

text: bittersweet comedy/drama full of life , hand gestures , and some really adorable italian guys .
translation: 人生に満ちたビタースイートなコメディ／ドラマで、手のジェスチャーや本当に魅力的なイタリアの男性たちが登場します。
back_translation: A bittersweet comedy/drama full of life, featuring hand gestures and truly charming Italian men.

text: a beyond-lame satire , teddy bears ' picnic ranks among the most pitiful directing debuts by an esteemed writer-actor .
translation: 非常につまらない風刺である「テディベアのピクニック」は、名高い作家・俳優による最も惨めな監督デビューの一つにランクインしている。
back_translation: The extremely dull satire "Teddy Bear's Picnic" ranks as one of the most miserable directorial debuts by a renowned writer and actor.

text: but her stepmother bitch was to ruin it all .
translation: しかし、彼女の継母がすべてを台無しにしようとしていた。
back_translation: However, her stepmother was trying to ruin everything.

text: . . . the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: ...その全ては私をぼんやりさせるだけの結果となった。
back_translation: ...All of that only resulted in making me feel hazy.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: その際立ったポイントは、同時に作家兼監督ロジャー・エイヴァリーの過剰によって埋められ、溺れ、押しつぶされています。
back_translation: The prominent point is that it is filled, drowned, and crushed by the excesses of writer-director Roger Avary at the same time.

text: . . . a boring parade of talking heads and technical gibberish that will do little to advance the linux cause .
translation: . . . リナックスの目的をほとんど前進させることのない、退屈なトークヘッドと技術的な難解さの行進。
back_translation: A boring march of talk heads and technical obscurity that hardly advances the purpose of Linux.

text: but zamindar narayan mukherjee ( vijay crishna ) , devdas ' father , met paro 's mother sumitra 's ( kiran kher ) marriage proposal with condescending arrogance .
translation: しかし、ザミンダールのナラヤン・ムクherjee（ビジャイ・クリシュナ）は、デヴダスの父として、パロの母であるスミトラ（キラン・ケール）の結婚の申し出に対して、見下した傲慢さで応じました。
back_translation: However, Zamindar Narayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna) looked down with arrogance in response to the marriage proposal from Simitra (Kiran Kher), the mother of Paro, as the father of Devdas.

text: it 's hard not to like a film that has sky divers jumping out of helicopters to catch flying dragons in a big net .
translation: ヘリコプターから飛び降りるスカイダイバーが大きな網で飛ぶドラゴンを捕まえる映画を好きにならないのは難しい。
back_translation: It's hard not to like a movie where a skydiver jumps out of a helicopter to catch a dragon flying with a big net.

text: an endearingly offbeat romantic comedy with a great meet-cute gimmick .
translation: 愛らしく風変わりなロマンティックコメディで、素晴らしい出会いのギミックがあります。
back_translation: It's a charming and quirky romantic comedy with a wonderful meet-cute gimmick.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b . s . one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: 中年やそれ以上の男性が過度に飲み、木に小便をし、互いに冗談を言い合い、ドラッグでショーをするのを見ることは、非常に面白くなく、楽しませてくれません。
back_translation: It is not very interesting or entertaining to see middle-aged or older men drinking excessively, urinating on trees, joking with each other, and putting on a show with drugs.

text: a brutal and funny work . nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: 残酷でありながら面白い作品。洞察に満ちた作家・監督のニコール・ホロフセンターが手がけたこの光をもたらすコメディは、話をきちんとまとめることはしませんが、アイデアが美しく結びついています。
back_translation: A cruel yet interesting work. This illuminating comedy, created by the insightful writer and director Nicole Holofcener, doesn't neatly tie up the story, but its ideas are beautifully interconnected.

text: it 's like every bad idea that 's ever gone into an after-school special compiled in one place , minus those daytime programs ' slickness and sophistication ( and who knew they even had any ? ) .
translation: まるで今までのすべての悪いアイデアがアフタースクールスペシャルにまとめられたようなもので、あの昼間の番組の洗練さや sophistication が欠けている（彼らにさえそんなものがあるなんて誰が知っていた？）。
back_translation: It's as if all the worst ideas up to now have been compiled into an after-school special, lacking the refinement and sophistication of those daytime shows (who knew they even had such things?).

text: when sara ( elizabeth hurley ) is served divorce papers while she is in new york , she is stunned .
translation: サラ（エリザベス・ハーリー）がニューヨークにいるときに離婚届を受け取ったとき、彼女は驚愕します。
back_translation: When Sarah (Elizabeth Hurley) receives the divorce papers while in New York, she is shocked.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: 遅婚についてわかったと思った時、必ず思いがけないことが起こります。
back_translation: Just when you think you understand late marriage, something unexpected happens.

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: 全体の結果は、境界を試す知的で現実的な描写です。
back_translation: The overall result is an intelligent and realistic portrayal that tests boundaries.

text: they wander around japan in panda outfits , wreak havoc on a once civilized golf court , they even do stunts involving live alligators , and so on .
translation: 彼らはパンダのコスチュームを着て日本をさまよい、かつて文明的だったゴルフコースで混乱を引き起こし、生きたワニを使ったスタントさえも行います。
back_translation: They wander around Japan in panda costumes, causing chaos on once-civilized golf courses and even performing stunts using live crocodiles.

text: 4 friends , 2 couples , 2000 miles , and all the pabst blue ribbon beer they can drink - it 's the ultimate redneck road-trip .
translation: 4人の友達、2組のカップル、2000マイル、そして飲むだけのパブスト・ブルーリボンビール - これは究極のレッドネック・ロードトリップです。
back_translation: Four friends, two couples, 2000 miles, and just drinking Pabst Blue Ribbon beer - this is the ultimate redneck road trip.

text: it 's a decent glimpse into a time period , and an outcast , that is no longer accessible , but it does n't necessarily shed more light on its subject than the popular predecessor .
translation: それはもはやアクセスできない時代とアウトサイダーへのまあまあの洞察を提供するが、必ずしもそのテーマについて先行の人気作品よりも多くの光を当てるわけではない。
back_translation: It provides a fairly good insight into an era that is no longer accessible and into outsiders, but it does not necessarily shed more light on the theme than previous popular works.

text: a sweet , tender sermon about a 12-year-old welsh boy more curious about god than girls , who learns that believing in something does matter .
translation: 神よりも女の子に興味があるのではなく、神についてより多くの好奇心を抱く12歳のウェールズの少年に関する、甘くて優しい説教。彼は、何かを信じることが大切であることを学びます。
back_translation: A sweet and gentle sermon about a 12-year-old boy from Wales who is more curious about God than interested in girls. He learns the importance of believing in something.

text: when danny 's beloved grandfather dies , does his greed overcome his love ?
translation: ダニーの愛する祖父が亡くなったとき、彼の欲望は愛を上回るのでしょうか？
back_translation: When Danny's beloved grandfather passed away, did his desires surpass his love?

text: three mischevious employees ( paulo costanzo , woody harrelson , alicia silverstone ) of a bank in a small deserted town all make plans to rob at the same time , however none of them knows about the others .
translation: 小さな人里離れた町の銀行で、三人のいたずら好きな従業員（パウロ・コスタンゾ、ウディ・ハレルソン、アリシア・シルバーストーン）が同時に強盗を計画しますが、誰も他の人のことを知りません。
back_translation: In a small, remote town bank, three mischievous employees (Paulo Costanzo, Woody Harrelson, and Alicia Silverstone) simultaneously plan a robbery, but none of them are aware of the others.

text: the performances are strong , though the subject matter demands acting that borders on hammy at times .
translation: 演技は素晴らしいですが、テーマによっては時折大げさな演技が求められることがあります。
back_translation: The acting is wonderful, but depending on the theme, exaggerated performances may occasionally be required.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: ボースタル・ボーイは、情熱的で真実であるふりをしながら、実際には非常に臆病で湿った、最悪の種類の映画製作を代表しています。
back_translation: Boastal Boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking, pretending to be passionate and genuine while actually being very cowardly and uninspired.

text: there 's something about a marching band that gets me where i live .
translation: マーチングバンドには、私の心に響く何かがあります。
back_translation: There is something that resonates in my heart about the marching band.

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: 誰のためにも書かれたようには思えない珍しい映画の一つだが、なぜかほぼ全ての人を納得させるように画面に映し出されている。
back_translation: It seems to be one of those rare films that doesn't appear to be made for anyone in particular, yet for some reason, it captivates almost everyone displayed on the screen.

text: to confirm his worst fears , thomas sprints outside and discovers that it is not just a terrible dream - his vision may never be the same .
translation: 彼の最悪の恐怖を確認するために、トーマスは外に飛び出し、それが単なるひどい夢ではなく、彼の視力が二度と同じではないかもしれないことを発見します。
back_translation: To confront his worst fear, Thomas dashed outside and discovered that it was not just a terrible dream, but that his vision might never be the same again.

text: two tedious acts light on great scares and a good surprise ending .
translation: 二つの退屈な行為は、大きな恐怖と良い驚きの結末に乏しい。
back_translation: Two boring activities lack a conclusion full of great fear and pleasant surprises.

text: for sokurov , the hermitage -- home to generations of romonovs and repository of so much russian history -- is the ark of the russian soul , guarding it affectionately until the world sees better days .
translation: ソクーロフにとって、エルミタージュ美術館はロマノフ家の世代にわたる住処であり、多くのロシアの歴史の宝庫である。彼にとってそれは、ロシアの魂の箱舟であり、世界がより良い日々を迎えるまで、愛情を持ってそれを守っている。
back_translation: For Sokurov, the Hermitage Museum is a residence that spans the generations of the Romanov family and is a treasure trove of much of Russian history. For him, it is the ark of the Russian soul, lovingly preserved until the world welcomes better days.

text: a dopey movie clothed in excess layers of hipness .
translation: 多重のヒップな層に包まれたおバカな映画。
back_translation: A silly movie wrapped in multiple layers of hipness.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: まるで映画が私たちを楽しませるよりも、自分自身を楽しませることに興味を持っているかのように感じられる。
back_translation: It feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in entertaining us.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: 残念ながら、映画、テレビ、演劇の有能な出演者たちが、統一感のあるリズムやビジュアルスタイルもなく、様々なニューヨーク市の場所に漂流させられています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, talented performers in film, television, and theater are adrift in various locations around New York City, without a cohesive rhythm or visual style.

text: jack valento has the goods on the da and casts a mean shadow over his hand-picked micro-community of indentured employees .
translation: ジャック・ヴァレンタは検察官についての情報を持っており、彼が選んだマイクロコミュニティの拘束されている従業員たちの上に厳しい影を落としている。
back_translation: Jack Valenta has information about the prosecutor, and he casts a harsh shadow over the employees detained in the microcommunity he has chosen.

text: the truly independent film , the after school special , was a simple story that said so much and touched people in so many ways .
translation: 真の独立系映画である「アフタースクールスペシャル」は、シンプルな物語でありながら、多くのことを語り、多くの人々の心に触れる作品でした。
back_translation: The truly independent film "After School Special" is a work that, while having a simple story, speaks volumes and touches the hearts of many people.

text: strong filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose , and in that oh-so-important category , the four feathers comes up short .
translation: 力強い映画制作には明確な目的意識が必要であり、その非常に重要なカテゴリにおいて、「四つの羽根」は不足しています。
back_translation: Powerful filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose, and in that very important category, "Four Feathers" falls short.

text: charly comes off as emotionally manipulative and sadly imitative of innumerable past love story derisions .
translation: チャーリーは感情的に操作的であり、悲しいことに無数の過去の恋愛物語の揶揄を真似しているように見えます。
back_translation: Charlie seems to be emotionally manipulative and, sadly, appears to mimic the mockery of countless past love stories.

text: the you-are-there style ultimately enhances abc africa 's ability to get inside the soul of uganda , and of the viewer .
translation: その「そこにいる」スタイルは、最終的にabcアフリカがウガンダの魂、そして視聴者の魂に迫る力を高める。
back_translation: That "being there" style ultimately enhances abc Africa's power to reach the soul of Uganda and the soul of the viewers.

text: thus , it is only natural that kyle begins a steady decline towards becoming one of the monsters he despises .
translation: したがって、カイルが彼が嫌悪するモンスターの一つになるための緩やかな下降を始めるのは自然なことです。
back_translation: Therefore, it is natural for Kyle to begin a gradual descent into becoming one of the monsters he despises.

text: as his agent pushes him to be bigger , and valerie , the bakery owner , adds a surprise of her own , stan begins to strain under the pressures of mass production while simultaneously trying to create hand painted masterpieces . . .
translation: 彼のエージェントが彼にもっと大きくなるよう促し、ベーカリーのオーナーであるヴァレリーが自分自身のサプライズを加える中、スタンは大量生産のプレッシャーの下に悩みながら、同時に手描きの傑作を作り出そうと奮闘し始める…。
back_translation: As his agent urges him to grow bigger, Stan struggles under the pressure of mass production while trying to simultaneously create hand-drawn masterpieces, all while Valerie, the owner of the bakery, adds her own surprise.

text: documentary about brazil 's best surfers , doing their thing on the best beaches around the world , located in hawaii , indonesia , brazil , south africa and california .
translation: ブラジルの最高のサーファーに関するドキュメンタリーで、ハワイ、インドネシア、ブラジル、南アフリカ、カリフォルニアの世界中の最高のビーチで彼らが活躍する様子を映し出しています。
back_translation: This documentary about Brazil's best surfers showcases their performances at some of the world's top beaches in Hawaii, Indonesia, Brazil, South Africa, and California.

text: based on nick hornby 's popular british novel , about a boy is a comedy-drama starring hugh grant as will , a rich , child-free and irresponsible londoner in his thirties who , in search of available women , invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parent meetings .
translation: ニック・ホーンビーの人気のある英国小説に基づいており、『アバウト・ア・ボーイ』は、ヒュー・グラントが演じる、独身で無責任なロンドン在住の30代の金持ちウィルが、利用可能な女性を探すために架空の息子を作り上げ、シングルペアレントの集まりに参加し始めるコメディドラマです。
back_translation: Based on the popular British novel by Nick Hornby, "About a Boy" is a comedy-drama in which Hugh Grant plays Will, a wealthy, irresponsible, single man in his 30s living in London, who creates a fictional son to find available women and starts attending single parent gatherings.

text: together , miller , kuras and the actresses make personal velocity into an intricate , intimate and intelligent journey .
translation: ミラー、クラッス、そして女優たちは、「パーソナル・ベロシティ」を複雑で親密かつ知的な旅に仕立て上げます。
back_translation: Miller, Krass, and the actresses turn "Personal Velocity" into a complex, intimate, and intellectual journey.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: この映画が女性を愛しているとは思えません。
back_translation: I can't believe this movie loves women.

text: the pace and the visuals are so hyped up that a curious sense of menace informs everything .
translation: ペースとビジュアルが非常に盛り上がっているため、好奇心をそそる危険感が全てに影響を与えています。
back_translation: The pace and visuals are very exciting, creating a sense of intriguing danger that impacts everything.

text: a broad , melodramatic estrogen opera that 's pretty toxic in its own right .
translation: 広範でメロドラマティックなエストロゲンオペラで、独自にかなり毒性がある。
back_translation: A sprawling and melodramatic estrogen opera that is uniquely quite toxic.

text: delia is a spirited , working-class woman from a small town in new york who leaves her abusive husband and sets out on a journey to reclaim the power she has lost .
translation: デリアはニューヨークの小さな町出身の元気な労働者階級の女性で、虐待する夫を捨て、自分が失った力を取り戻すための旅に出ます。
back_translation: Delia is a spirited working-class woman from a small town in New York who leaves her abusive husband and embarks on a journey to regain the strength she has lost.

text: jim and michelle are getting married , and need to do it quickly because jim 's grandmother is sick and wants to see jim walk down the aisle .
translation: ジムとミッシェルは結婚することになり、ジムの祖母が病気で早く結婚式を挙げたいと考えています。祖母はジムがバージンロードを歩く姿を見たいのです。
back_translation: Jim and Michelle are going to get married, and Jim's grandmother, who is sick, is hoping to have the wedding as soon as possible. The grandmother wants to see Jim walking down the aisle.

text: it just might all be bearable , somehow possible to live through , if it were n't for those damned 'monsters ' that keep trying to kill him .
translation: それは、あのくそったれの「モンスター」が彼を殺そうとし続けているのでなければ、なんとか耐えられるかもしれない、どうにか生き延びることができるかもしれない。
back_translation: If it weren't for that damn "monster" continuing to try to kill him, maybe he could somehow endure it, maybe he could somehow survive.

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget . but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: フェッセンデンは興味深い作品を作り続けており、彼が適正な予算でどんなものを作るのか見てみたいところです。しかし、効果的な瞬間があるにもかかわらず、「ウェンディゴ」における問題は、実際にはリソースの問題ではありません。
back_translation: Fessenden continues to create interesting works, and I would like to see what he can produce with an appropriate budget. However, despite having effective moments, the issue in "Wendigo" is not actually a matter of resources.

text: will you go ape over this movie ? well , it probably wo n't have you swinging from the trees hooting it 's praises , but it 's definitely worth taking a look .
translation: この映画に夢中になりますか？ まあ、すぼんでいる声でその素晴らしさを叫びながら木から swinging することはないでしょうが、確かに見る価値はあります。
back_translation: Will you be fascinated by this movie? Well, you probably won't be swinging from trees while shouting about its greatness in a hushed voice, but it is certainly worth watching.

text: ruled by instant gratification and material desires , they plot to steal a napoleon collection from one of their parents ' homes .
translation: 瞬時の満足と物質的欲望に支配され、彼らは親の家の一つからナポレオンのコレクションを盗む計画を立てる。
back_translation: Controlled by instant gratification and material desires, they plan to steal a collection of Napoleon from one of their parents' houses.

text: an improvement on the feeble examples of big-screen poke-mania that have preceded it .
translation: それ以前の貧弱な大画面ポケモンブームの例を改善したものです。
back_translation: This is an improvement over the previous poor examples of the large-screen Pokémon craze.

text: the plot has a number of holes , and at times it 's simply baffling .
translation: プロットにはいくつかの穴があり、時には単純に混乱させられます。
back_translation: There are some holes in the plot, and at times it can simply be confusing.

text: edgar gets wind inez is up to something and blows his cool , beating her and making her a prisoner in their own home .
translation: エドガーはイネズが何かを企んでいることを察知し、冷静さを失い、彼女を殴り、自宅で彼女を囚人にしてしまう。
back_translation: Edgar senses that Inez is plotting something, loses his composure, punches her, and keeps her imprisoned at his home.

text: taken seriously , it 's not much to think about , but taken as a dirtier version of other girlie films . . . it 's at least entertaining and sexy fun .
translation: 真剣に受け止めると、考えることはあまりないが、他の女の子向け映画の汚いバージョンとして見るなら...少なくとも楽しめてセクシーな楽しみだ。
back_translation: If you take it seriously, there's not much to think about, but if you see it as a dirty version of other girl movies... at least it's enjoyable and a sexy fun.

text: bM-iart and berling are both superb , while huppert . . . is magnificent .
translation: bM-iartとberlingはどちらも素晴らしいですが、huppertは素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Both bM-iart and berling are wonderful, but huppert is outstanding.

text: after five years of research and shooting , this unique film is now completed .
translation: 5年間の研究と撮影を経て、このユニークな映画が完成しました。
back_translation: After five years of research and filming, this unique movie has been completed.

text: in the pianist , polanski is saying what he has long wanted to say , confronting the roots of his own preoccupations and obsessions , and he allows nothing to get in the way .
translation: 「ピアニスト」において、ポランスキーは彼が長い間言いたかったことを語り、自身の懸念や執着の根元に立ち向かい、何も彼の邪魔をさせることはありません。
back_translation: In "The Pianist," Polanski expresses what he has wanted to say for a long time, confronts the roots of his concerns and obsessions, and lets nothing stand in his way.

text: in imax in short , it 's just as wonderful on the big screen .
translation: IMAXでは、短く言えば、大画面でも同じように素晴らしいです。
back_translation: In short, IMAX is just as amazing on a big screen.

text: aloof and lacks any real raw emotion , which is fatal for a film that relies on personal relationships .
translation: 冷淡で、実際の生の感情が欠けており、個人関係に依存する映画にとっては致命的です。
back_translation: It is fatal for a movie that relies on personal relationships to be cold, lacking genuine emotions.

text: a member of a vigilante group , fields decides to go undercover with a hidden camera and cross with a group of undocumented immigrants .
translation: 自警団のメンバーであるフィールズは、隠しカメラを使って潜入し、無許可移民のグループと接触することに決める。
back_translation: Fields, a member of the militia, decides to infiltrate using a hidden camera and make contact with a group of unauthorized immigrants.

text: she 's saving money for a ticket to rome to get out of her life and visit an italian with whom she had a one night stand several months ago .
translation: 彼女は自分の人生から抜け出し、数か月前に一夜の関係を持ったイタリア人を訪れるためにローマ行きのチケットを買うためにお金を貯めています。
back_translation: She is saving money to buy a ticket to Rome to escape her life and visit the Italian man she had a one-night stand with a few months ago.

text: director jay russell weighs down his capricious fairy-tale with heavy sentiment and lightweight meaning .
translation: 監督のジェイ・ラッセルは、その気まぐれな童話に重い感情をのせ、軽薄な意味を与えている。
back_translation: Director Jay Russell infuses heavy emotions into the whimsical fairy tale, giving it a superficial meaning.

text: tsai ming-liang 's ghosts are painfully aware of their not-being .
translation: ツァイ・ミンリャンの幽霊は、自らの存在しなさを痛感している。
back_translation: Tsai Ming-liang's ghost is acutely aware of its own non-existence.

text: big fat liar is little more than home alone raised to a new , self-deprecating level .
translation: ビッグ・ファット・ライアーは、ホーム・アローンを新たな自己卑下のレベルに引き上げたものである。
back_translation: Big Fat Liar raises Home Alone to a new level of self-deprecation.

text: a woozy , roisterous , exhausting mess , and the off-beat casting of its two leads turns out to be as ill-starred as you might expect .
translation: ふらふらで、騒がしく、疲れ果てた混乱であり、主演の二人の異色なキャスティングは予想通り不運なものとなっている。
back_translation: It is a chaotic state that is dizzying, noisy, and completely exhausted, and the unconventional casting of the two lead actors has turned out to be unfortunate, just as anticipated.

text: it has something of the aura of four weddings and a funeral about it , mixed in with a bit of bridget jones 's diary , but the movie 's just too different , too risky for huge popularity .
translation: それは「四つの結婚と一つの葬儀」の雰囲気を持っていて、少し「ブリジット・ジョーンズの日記」のエッセンスも混ざっているが、映画はただあまりにも異なり、巨大な人気を得るにはリスクが大きすぎる。
back_translation: It has the atmosphere of "Four Weddings and a Funeral" and mixes in a bit of the essence of "Bridget Jones's Diary," but the film is just too different, and the risks of gaining massive popularity are too great.

text: an indelible and ultimately moving vision of humanity buffeted by the elements and by international political tides .
translation: 要素や国際的な政治潮流に翻弄される人類の消えない、そして最終的には感動的なビジョン。
back_translation: An indelible and ultimately moving vision of humanity, tossed about by elements and international political currents.

text: during the course of the night each of the friends comes to terms with their lives and relationships and how they are not whom they thought each other was .
translation: 夜の間に、それぞれの友人が自分の人生や関係性について受け入れ、互いに思っていた人物像とは異なることに気づきます。
back_translation: During the night, each friend comes to accept their own life and relationships, realizing that they are different from the images they had of each other.

text: the stakes are high and the characters have to face their fears , their futures and their fellow grads as the game , and their lives , advance towards the climactic ending .
translation: 賭けは高く、キャラクターたちは恐れや未来、仲間の卒業生たちと向き合わなければならず、ゲームと彼らの人生はクライマックスに向かって進んでいきます。
back_translation: The stakes are high, and the characters must confront their fears, the future, and their fellow graduates, as the game and their lives move toward a climax.

text: this sensitive , smart , savvy , compelling coming-of-age drama delves into the passive-aggressive psychology of co-dependence and the struggle for self-esteem .
translation: このセンシティブで賢く、機転の利いた、説得力のある成長ドラマは、共依存の受動的攻撃性心理と自尊心を求める闘いを掘り下げています。
back_translation: This sensitive, intelligent, quick-witted, and compelling coming-of-age drama explores the psychology of codependency, passive aggression, and the struggle for self-esteem.

text: the film focuses on the relationships between each of the four people and what happens when an affair takes place between two of them who are not married to each other and logically betraying the two remaining characters .
translation: この映画は、4人のそれぞれの関係に焦点を当てており、結婚していない2人の間で不倫が発生したとき、その結果2人の残りのキャラクターを理論的に裏切る様子を描いています。
back_translation: This movie focuses on the relationships of four individuals and depicts how an affair occurs between two of them who are not married, resulting in a theoretical betrayal of the other two characters.

text: through trial and failures , she teaches him to use the power of eternal souls to solve both his professional and personal problems .
translation: 試行錯誤を通じて、彼女は彼に永遠の魂の力を使って、彼の職業上の問題と個人的な問題の両方を解決する方法を教えます。
back_translation: Through trial and error, she teaches him how to use the power of the eternal soul to solve both his professional and personal problems.

text: impossible as it may sound , this film 's heart is even more embracing than monty , if only because it accepts nasty behavior and severe flaws as part of the human condition .
translation: 不可能に聞こえるかもしれませんが、この映画の心はモンティ以上に包容力があります。それは、厳しい欠点や嫌な行動を人間の条件の一部として受け入れているからです。
back_translation: It may sound impossible, but the heart of this movie has more inclusiveness than Monty. This is because it accepts harsh flaws and unpleasant behaviors as part of the human condition.

text: my oh my , is this an invigorating , electric movie .
translation: なんてことだ、これは刺激的でエネルギッシュな映画だ。
back_translation: What a thing, this is an exciting and energetic movie.

text: the latest vapid actor 's exercise to appropriate the structure of arthur schnitzler 's reigen .
translation: 最新の無味乾燥な俳優のエクササイズは、アーサー・シュニッツラーの『レイゲン』の構造を適切に利用することです。
back_translation: The latest dull exercise for actors is to properly utilize the structure of Arthur Schnitzler's "Reigen."

text: in stunning color film noir , with munich germany , as the backdrop , this is the amazing story of one man and one woman against the odds .
translation: 驚くべきカラー・フィルムノワールで、背景にはドイツのミュンヘンがあり、これは一人の男と一人の女が逆境に立ち向かう素晴らしい物語です。
back_translation: An astonishing color film noir set against the backdrop of Munich, Germany, this is a wonderful story of a man and a woman facing adversity.

text: nM-co encanta como 'o rei leM-co ' nem diverte como 'a nova onda do imperador ' , mas ao menos nM-co cansa como 'atlantis : o reino perdido ' .
translation: nM-coは「王様のレモネード」のようには楽しませてくれず、「皇帝の新しい服」のようにも楽しくありませんが、少なくともnM-coは「アトランティス：失われた王国」のようには疲れさせません。
back_translation: nM-co doesn't entertain like "The King’s Lemonade" nor is it enjoyable like "The Emperor’s New Clothes," but at least it doesn't tire you out like "Atlantis: The Lost Kingdom."

text: too sincere to exploit its subjects and too honest to manipulate its audience .
translation: 対象を搾取するにはあまりにも誠実で、観客を操作するにはあまりにも正直である。
back_translation: Too honest to exploit the subject, too sincere to manipulate the audience.

text: only a little later , johnathan 's life is already in extreme danger as well as those of his friends and teammates .
translation: ほんの少し後、ジョナサンの命はすでに極度の危険にさらされており、彼の友人やチームメイトの命も同様である。
back_translation: Just a little later, Jonathan's life was already in extreme danger, and the lives of his friends and teammates were likewise at risk.

text: for those who are intrigued by politics of the '70s , the film is every bit as fascinating as it is flawed .
translation: 1970年代の政治に興味がある人にとって、この映画は欠点がある一方で非常に魅力的です。
back_translation: For those interested in 1970s politics, this film is very appealing despite its flaws.

text: the whole thing feels like a ruse , a tactic to cover up the fact that the picture is constructed around a core of flimsy -- or , worse yet , nonexistent -- ideas .
translation: 全体的に、それは策略のように感じられ、絵が脆弱な、あるいはもっと悪いことに存在しないアイデアの中心を中心に構築されているという事実を隠すための戦術となっています。
back_translation: Overall, it feels like a strategy, serving as a tactic to hide the fact that the story is built around a weak idea that is, at worst, non-existent.

text: mickey kilpatrick is the sweet-natured superintendent of their building , whose loopy dreams of becoming a professional bowler are met with only derision and confusion by his father sean .
translation: ミッキー・キルパトリックは、彼らの建物の心優しい管理者であり、プロボウラーになるという彼の夢は、父親のショーンによって冷笑と混乱でしか受け入れられません。
back_translation: Mickey Kilpatrick is a kind-hearted manager of their building, and his dream of becoming a professional bowler is met with nothing but scorn and confusion from his father, Shawn.

text: that dogged good will of the parents and 'vain ' jia 's defoliation of ego , make the film touching despite some doldrums .
translation: 親のしつこい善意と「虚栄心」であるジャの自己中心的な特徴が、いくつかの停滞感にもかかわらず、映画を感動的にしています。
back_translation: The persistent kindness of the parents and Ja's self-centered traits driven by "vanity" make the film moving despite some feelings of stagnation.

text: well-shot but badly written tale set in a future ravaged by dragons .
translation: ドラゴンに荒廃された未来を舞台にした、よく撮影されているが悪く書かれた物語。
back_translation: A well-shot but poorly written story set in a future devastated by dragons.

text: the woods have n't been this creepy since the blair witch project .
translation: 森はブレア・ウィッチ・プロジェクト以来、こんなに不気味ではなかった。
back_translation: The forest has never been so eerie since the Blair Witch Project.

text: . . . devastatingly direct to the heart of the matter , demonstrating that there is no easy walk toward peace in a region with such strong conflicting traditions
translation: . . . 問題の核心に devastingly 直接向かい、強い対立する伝統を持つ地域で平和に向かう容易な道はないことを示しています。
back_translation: It shows that there is no easy path towards peace in a region that directly confronts the core of the problem with devastatingly strong opposing traditions.

text: everything that 's worthwhile about collision course can already be seen on television .
translation: 衝突コースの価値あるすべては、すでにテレビで見ることができます。
back_translation: Everything valuable about the collision course can already be seen on television.

text: shiner can certainly go the distance , but is n't world championship material
translation: シャイナーは確かに距離を稼ぐことができるが、世界選手権の素材ではない。
back_translation: Shainer can certainly gain distance, but he is not material for the World Championship.

text: it cuts to the core of what it actually means to face your fears , to be a girl in a world of boys , to be a boy truly in love with a girl , and to ride the big metaphorical wave that is life -- wherever it takes you .
translation: それは、恐怖に立ち向かうことの本質、男ばかりの世界で女であること、本当に女を愛する男であること、そして人生という大きな比喩的な波に乗ることの核心に切り込んでいる。それがどこに連れて行くとしても。
back_translation: It cuts to the heart of the essence of facing fear, being a woman in a male-dominated world, being a man who truly loves women, and riding the big metaphorical waves of life, wherever that may lead.

text: into this mix is thrown jed , jackson 's hunky cousin , which leads jackson to seriously contemplate the technicalities of incest .
translation: その混合にジェド、ジャクソンの魅力的ないとこが加わり、それがジャクソンに近親相姦の技術的な問題を真剣に考えさせることになります。
back_translation: In that mix, Jed and Jackson's charming cousin joins, prompting Jackson to seriously contemplate the technical issues of incest.

text: yes , 4ever is harmless in the extreme and it 'll mute your kids for nearly 80 minutes , but why not just treat the little yard apes to the real deal and take them to spirited away ?
translation: はい、4everは極めて無害で、子供たちをほぼ80分間静かにさせることができますが、なぜ本物を見せて「千と千尋の神隠し」に連れて行かないのでしょうか？
back_translation: Yes, 4ever is extremely harmless and can keep children quiet for almost 80 minutes, but why not show them the real thing and take them to see "Spirited Away"?

text: . . . a visually seductive , unrepentantly trashy take on rice 's second installment of her vampire chronicles .
translation: ...視覚的に魅力的で、後ろめたさのないトラッシュな米の吸血鬼クロニクル第2弾の解釈。
back_translation: ...a visually appealing and guilt-free interpretation of the trashy vampire chronicles of rice, Volume 2.

text: painfully bleak and disheartening . . . brilliantly made and uncompromising
translation: 痛々しく暗く、心が折れるような… 素晴らしく作られており、妥協のない。
back_translation: Painfully dark and heart-wrenching... wonderfully crafted and uncompromising.

text: a vampire so consumed with an insatiable bloodlust that they prey on vampires as well as humans , transforming victims who are unlucky enough to survive into reapers themselves .
translation: 血に対する止まることのない欲望に取り憑かれた吸血鬼が、人間だけでなく吸血鬼までをも餌食にし、不運にも生き残った犠牲者を自らも死神に変えてしまう。
back_translation: A vampire, possessed by an insatiable desire for blood, preys not only on humans but also on other vampires, turning the unfortunate survivors into reapers themselves.

text: granted , much of the marlovian argument is patently ridiculous ( was ben johnson really part of a massive cover-up ? ) but it 's good fun .
translation: 確かに、マーラビアンの主張の多くは明らかに馬鹿げています（ベン・ジョンソンは本当に大規模な隠蔽の一員だったのでしょうか？）が、それは楽しいことです。
back_translation: Indeed, many of Mehrabian's claims are clearly ridiculous (was Ben Johnson really part of a massive cover-up?), but it's amusing.

text: a film of empty , fetishistic violence in which murder is casual and fun .
translation: 殺人が気軽で楽しい、空虚でフェティッシュな暴力の映画。
back_translation: A movie where murder is casual and enjoyable, a hollow and fetishistic violence.

text: if you thought tom hanks was just an ordinary big-screen star , wait until you 've seen him eight stories tall .
translation: トム・ハンクスがただの普通の大画面スターだと思っていたなら、彼が8階建ての大きさで登場するのを見てから考え直してください。
back_translation: If you thought Tom Hanks was just an ordinary big-screen star, think again after seeing him appear at the size of an eight-story building.

text: his daughter has been kidnapped by the man who owns the stones , and wants them back .
translation: 彼の娘はその石を持っている男に誘拐され、彼女はその石を取り戻そうとしています。
back_translation: His daughter was kidnapped by a man who has the stone, and she is trying to get the stone back.

text: the boarders between life and stage merge and makes him to the mockery of his follow human beings .
translation: 人生と舞台の境界が融合し、彼を周囲の人間たちの嘲笑の的にする。
back_translation: The boundary between life and the stage merges, making him the target of ridicule from those around him.

text: hardly makes the kind of points egoyan wanted to make , nor does it exist as the kind of monument he wanted to build , to victims whose voices have never gained the ears of the world .
translation: エゴヤンが伝えたかったポイントにはほとんど触れておらず、彼が世界に届かない声を持つ犠牲者たちのために築きたかったような記念碑としても存在していません。
back_translation: The points that Egoyan wanted to convey are hardly addressed, and it doesn't exist as a monument that he seemed to want to build for the victims who have voices that cannot reach the world.

text: but our wet hero is n't dead , and soon finds himself in zurich .
translation: しかし、私たちの湿った英雄は死んでいなく、すぐにチューリッヒにいることがわかります。
back_translation: However, our damp hero is not dead, and it will soon be clear that he is in Zurich.

text: add to the mix a sob sister , roxie 's hapless husband amos , and a warm prison matron who watches out for her girls ( if there 's something in it for her ) , and you have chicago .
translation: そこに、悲劇の女ソブシスター、ロキシーの無力な夫エイモス、そして彼女の女の子たちを見守る温かい刑務所のマトロン（彼女にとって何か特別な利益がある場合）、が加わると、シカゴが完成します。
back_translation: There, the tragic woman sob sister, Roxy, her powerless husband Amos, and the warm matron of the prison watching over her girls (if there's something special in it for her) come together, completing Chicago.

text: the problem is that rather than dramatizing this premise , mr . desplechin is content to state it .
translation: 問題は、この前提を劇的に展開するのではなく、デスプレシャン氏がそれを述べることに満足していることです。
back_translation: The problem is that Mr. Despres is content to simply state this premise rather than dramatically elaborate on it.

text: the film makes a tragic error by going on for too long , trying to mirror every subsequent event in chinese history : war , revolution , communism , etc .
translation: 映画は、戦争、革命、共産主義など、中国の歴史におけるあらゆるその後の出来事を模倣しようとするあまり、長すぎる時間を費やすという悲劇的な誤りを犯しています。
back_translation: Movies make the tragic mistake of spending too much time trying to imitate all subsequent events in Chinese history, such as war, revolution, and communism.

text: at the end of the second world war , 38 year-old career soldier gian singh resigns his commission with the british indian army and returns to his childhood village , near the border with pakistan .
translation: 第二次世界大戦の終結時、38歳の職業軍人ジャン・シンはイギリスインド軍の委員を辞し、パキスタンとの国境近くの故郷の村に帰る。
back_translation: At the end of World War II, 38-year-old professional soldier Jean Shin resigned from his position as a commissioner in the British Indian Army and returned to his hometown village near the border with Pakistan.

text: it 's not a great monster movie . but if you 've paid a matinee price and bought a big tub of popcorn , there 's guilty fun to be had here . chomp chomp !
translation: これは素晴らしいモンスタームービーではありません。しかし、もし午前中の料金を支払い、大きなポップコーンを買ったなら、ここには罪悪感を感じる楽しさがあります。チョンプチョンプ！
back_translation: This is not a great monster movie. However, if you pay for a morning session and buy a large popcorn, there is a guilty pleasure to be had here. Chomp chomp!

text: too clumsy in key moments . . . to make a big splash .
translation: 重要な瞬間にあまりにも不器用で。。。大きな影響を与えることができない。
back_translation: I am too clumsy in important moments... I am unable to make a significant impact.

text: off the ramp , however , they are sexy , yet alone , in a male dominated society .
translation: ランプを離れて、しかし、彼女たちはセクシーであり、男性主導の社会の中で孤独です。
back_translation: They are away from the lamp, yet they are sexy and lonely in a male-dominated society.

text: but sam decker still has a few tricks to teach the kids , and he 's got some thingfs to learn from them .
translation: しかしサム・デッカーはまだ子供たちに教えるべきいくつかのトリックを持っており、彼自身も子供たちから学ぶべきことがある。
back_translation: However, Sam Decker still has a few tricks to teach the children, and he himself has things to learn from them.

text: owners who will do almost anything to keep them running .
translation: 動かし続けるためにほとんど何でもするオーナーたち。
back_translation: Owners who will do almost anything to keep things moving.

text: an enterprising jokester is a member of a local bowling club purely for the purpose of renting out his car park space to nearby workers .
translation: 進取的なジョークメーカーは、近くの労働者に駐車場スペースを貸し出す目的で、地元のボウリングクラブのメンバーになっています。
back_translation: A progressive joke maker has become a member of the local bowling club with the intention of renting out parking spaces to nearby workers.

text: with a stolen police cruiser ( the red one ) , the destructive being races towards a little and already doomed planet : earth .
translation: 盗まれた警察のパトカー（赤い方）で、破壊的な存在は小さく既に運命づけられた惑星、地球へと突進していく。
back_translation: A stolen police car (the red one) rushes towards the destructive, already doomed planet, Earth.

text: i 'm going to give it a marginal thumbs up . i liked it just enough .
translation: まあまあの評価を与えます。ちょうど満足できる程度でした。
back_translation: I give it a fair evaluation. It was just satisfactory enough.

text: the movie , while beautiful , feels labored , with a hint of the writing exercise about it .
translation: 映画は美しいが、労力を感じさせ、執筆の練習のような一抹の気配を感じる。
back_translation: The movie is beautiful, but it also feels laborious and has a hint of practice-like writing.

text: it 's crap on a leash -- far too polite to scale the lunatic heights of joe dante 's similarly styled gremlins .
translation: それはリードをつけたクズだ -- ジョー・ダンテの同様のスタイルの「グレムリン」の狂気の高みにはほど遠く、あまりにも礼儀正しい。
back_translation: It's a piece of junk with a leash on it -- far from the madness of Joe Dante's similarly styled "Gremlins," and way too polite.

text: the hours of life snatched from death lead them in a wild chase across romania , looking for the truth .
translation: 死から奪われた命の時間が、彼らをルーマニア全土で真実を求める狂った追跡へと導く。
back_translation: The time of life stolen from death leads them on a frantic pursuit for truth across all of Romania.

text: besides a few survivors , the only two who know about freddy 's plans are teenagers lori ( monica keena ) and will ( jason ritter ) .
translation: 数人の生存者を除いて、フレディの計画を知っているのはティーンエイジャーのローリ（モニカ・キーナ）とウィル（ジェイソン・リッター）だけです。
back_translation: Apart from a few survivors, the only ones who know about Freddy's plan are the teenagers Laurie (Monica Keena) and Will (Jason Ritter).

text: the miseducation of mitchell is a gritty , inner-city drama that covers one day in the life of mitchell , a quiet ten-year-old boy who lives with his crack-head mother ( nayomi ) in a roach infested downtown l . a . motel .
translation: ミッチェルの教育の誤りは、内市の厳しいドラマで、ローチがはびこるロサンゼルスのダウンタウンのモーテルで、クラック中毒の母（ナヨミ）と一緒に住む静かな10歳の少年ミッチェルの一日を描いています。
back_translation: Mitchell's education error depicts a day in the life of a quiet 10-year-old boy, Mitchell, who lives with his crack-addicted mother (Naomi) in a motel in downtown Los Angeles, where roaches thrive, as part of a harsh drama in the inner city.

text: red dragon is less baroque and showy than hannibal , and less emotionally affecting than silence . but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .
translation: レッド・ドラゴンはハンニバルよりもバロック的ではなく派手さもなく、サイレンスよりも感情的な影響は少ない。しかし、サイレンスのように、あなたの心に入り込む映画である。
back_translation: Red Dragon is less baroque and flashy than Hannibal, and has less emotional impact than Silence. However, like Silence, it is a film that gets under your skin.

text: in the shadow of the casinos , is a world of backroom deals that can end a life over less money than the price of a bus ticket home .
translation: カジノの影には、帰りのバスのチケット代よりも少ない金額で命を奪うことができる裏取引の世界が広がっている。
back_translation: Behind the casino, there exists a world of under-the-table deals where lives can be taken for a sum less than the cost of a bus ticket home.

text: thinking this will be his chance to go out on top victor soon finds out that he has been double crossed and his last option is to get revenge .
translation: 自分がトップに立つチャンスだと思っていたビクターは、裏切られていたことに気づき、最後の選択肢は復讐を果たすことになる。
back_translation: Victor, who thought he had a chance to be at the top, realized he had been betrayed, and his last option would become to seek revenge.

text: flounders due to the general sense that no two people working on the production had exactly the same thing in mind .
translation: 制作に関わる二人の人間が全く同じことを考えているわけではないという一般的な感覚のために、混乱が生じる。
back_translation: Confusion arises due to the general sense that the two people involved in the production do not think the same thing at all.

text: a riveting profile of law enforcement , and a visceral , nasty journey into an urban hades .
translation: 法執行機関の心を打つプロフィール、そして都市の冥界への生々しく、陰鬱な旅。
back_translation: A gripping profile of law enforcement agencies, and a vivid, gloomy journey into the urban underworld.

text: adaptation 's success in engaging the audience in the travails of creating a screenplay is extraordinary .
translation: 脚本作成の苦労を観客に引き込むことにおける適応の成功は並外れています。
back_translation: The success of adapting the struggles of scriptwriting to engage the audience is extraordinary.

text: dignified ceo 's meet at a rustic retreat and pee against a tree . can you bear the laughter ?
translation: 威厳のあるCEOたちが素朴なリトリートで出会い、木に向かって用を足します。あなたはその笑いを耐えられますか？
back_translation: Dignified CEOs meet at a rustic retreat and relieve themselves facing a tree. Can you endure that laughter?

text: the tale unfolds as a group of hustlers encounter `` the dean `` and pull off a successful sting that results in their pursuit by a vengeful gangster .
translation: 物語は、一群の詐欺師が「学長」と遭遇し、成功した詐欺を実行することで展開し、それによって復讐を誓ったギャングに追われることになる。
back_translation: The story unfolds as a group of con artists encounters the "president" and executes a successful scam, which leads them to be pursued by a gang that vows vengeance.

text: a few days later , during the ancient festival of samhain , a group of american university students moves in a beautiful cottage , surrounded by a lush forest and a majestic lake they are here to learn about the rituals of the ancient druids and other celtic legends .
translation: 数日後、古代のサムハイン祭りの期間中、アメリカの大学生のグループが美しい小屋に移り住む。そこは緑豊かな森と壮大な湖に囲まれている。彼らは古代ドルイドの儀式や他のケルトの伝説について学ぶためにここに来た。
back_translation: A few days later, during the ancient Samhain festival, a group of American college students moves into a beautiful cabin surrounded by lush forests and a majestic lake. They have come here to learn about ancient Druid rituals and other Celtic legends.

text: joe enders , a decorated marine who is by-the-book to a fault , is just coming back on duty ( by cheating on his medical tests ) .
translation: ジョー・エンダーズは、欠陥のあるほど真面目な勲章を持つ海兵隊員で、医療検査を不正に通過して勤務に復帰しようとしています。
back_translation: Joe Enders is a Marine with a seriously defective medal who is trying to fraudulently pass a medical examination to return to duty.

text: through intimate vignettes of the milliner family , tiz 's close-knit crew , his pregnant girlfriend , his overzealous manager , and his mentor , the legendary kool g rap , tiz 's hopes and the quiet despair of his `` book of life filled with pain `` gradually emerge .
translation: ミリナー家の親密なエピソードを通じて、ティズの親しい仲間たち、妊娠中のガールフレンド、過剰な熱意を持つマネージャー、そして伝説的なクール・G・ラップというメンターが登場し、ティズの希望と「痛みで満ちた人生の本」の静かな絶望が徐々に浮かび上がります。
back_translation: Through the intimate episodes of the Milner family, Tiz's close friends, his pregnant girlfriend, an overly enthusiastic manager, and the legendary mentor Cool G Rap emerge, gradually revealing Tiz's hopes and the quiet despair of a "life filled with pain."

text: slight , but colorful and forward-moving . . . wasabi has the cheeky verve and heart of a shaggy dog movie that is aiming to please its owner , nothing more , nothing less .
translation: ほんの少し、しかしカラフルで前向きな… わさびは、オーナーを喜ばせることだけを目指す、ふわふわした犬の映画のような生意気な活力と心を持っています。それ以上でもそれ以下でもありません。
back_translation: A little bit, but colorful and positive... Wasabi has a cheeky energy and spirit reminiscent of a fluffy dog movie, aiming solely to please its owner. Nothing more, nothing less.

text: his reins in the countryside around the happy forest surpassed the sporadic attacks by the evil knight .
translation: 幸せな森の周りの田舎で彼の手綱は、邪悪な騎士による時折の襲撃を超えていました。
back_translation: His reins in the happy countryside around the forest had surpassed the occasional attacks by the evil knight.

text: time out plays out slowly , but vincent 's disconnectedness creates odd suspense and black humor .
translation: タイムアウトは徐々に進行するが、ビンセントの切断された感覚が奇妙なサスペンスとブラックユーモアを生み出している。
back_translation: The timeout progresses gradually, but Vincent's severed sense creates a strange suspense and dark humor.

text: the fake `` attack `` turns into a bloodbath .
translation: 偽の「攻撃」は血の海に変わる。
back_translation: The fake "attack" will turn into a sea of blood.

text: kids will love its fantasy and adventure , and grownups should appreciate its whimsical humor .
translation: 子供たちはそのファンタジーと冒険を楽しむでしょうし、大人たちはその幻想的なユーモアを評価するはずです。
back_translation: Children will enjoy the fantasy and adventure, while adults will appreciate the whimsical humor.

text: a remake of the danish blockbuster `` klatretosen , `` catch that girl is described as `` ocean 's 11 `` or `` mission : impossible `` for kids .
translation: デンマークの大ヒット作「クレトロセン」のリメイク「キャッチ・ザット・ガール」は、「オーシャンズ11」や「ミッション：インポッシブル」の子供向け版として説明されています。
back_translation: The remake of Denmark's hit "Kletrosen," titled "Catch That Girl," is described as a children's version of "Ocean's Eleven" and "Mission: Impossible."

text: they fight with glass plates , staple guns , light bulbs , fire and other homemade weapons .
translation: 彼らはガラスの皿、ホッチキス、電球、火、その他の手作りの武器で戦います。
back_translation: They fight with glass plates, staplers, light bulbs, fire, and other handmade weapons.

text: the balance of the movie shows the revenge of the various wronged parties .
translation: 映画の残りは、さまざまな被害者の復讐を描いています。
back_translation: The remainder of the movie depicts the revenge of various victims.

text: soon the evil boss learns about sienna 's affair with kilabot and kidnaps her to exact revenge .
translation: 悪徳なボスはすぐにシエナとキラボットの不倫を知り、復讐を果たすために彼女を誘拐する。
back_translation: The corrupt boss quickly learns of the affair between Siena and Kirabot, and he kidnaps her to take revenge.

text: three families , living in a three storey building , leave for their summer vacations .
translation: 三家族が三階建ての建物に住んでおり、夏休みに出かけます。
back_translation: Three families live in a three-story building and are going on a trip during summer vacation.

text: picard and the enterprise can escape , only to find themselves battling shinzons completely cloaked warbird , who is after the complete destruction of earth .
translation: ピカードとエンタープライズは脱出できるが、完全に隠れたシンゾンの戦鳥と戦うことになり、彼は地球の完全な破壊を狙っている。
back_translation: Picard and the Enterprise can escape, but they will have to fight the completely hidden Shinzon's warbird, which is aiming for the total destruction of Earth.

text: director of photography benoit delhomme shot the movie in delicious colors , and the costumes and sets are grand .
translation: 撮影監督のブノワ・デルホムは映画を美しい色合いで撮影し、衣装やセットは壮大です。
back_translation: Cinematographer Benoît Debie shot the film in beautiful colors, and the costumes and sets are magnificent.

text: bartleby is a one-joke movie , and a bad joke at that .
translation: バートルビーは一つのジョークの映画で、しかもそのジョークは悪い。
back_translation: "Bartleby" is a movie with a single joke, and that joke is bad.

text: like mike is a harmlessly naM-ove slice of b-ball fantasy , fit for filling in during the real nba 's off-season .
translation: 「ライク・マイク」は、NBAのオフシーズンに観るのにぴったりな、無害で心温まるバスケットボールファンタジーの作品です。
back_translation: "Like Mike" is a perfect, harmless, and heartwarming basketball fantasy to watch during the NBA offseason.

text: susie is obsessed about losing weight , thus being `` bonita `` and not `` gorda `` - the two keywords in the original spanish title .
translation: スージーは体重を減らすことに obsesしており、そのために「ボニータ」であり、「ゴルダ」ではないことにこだわっています - 元のスペイン語のタイトルの2つのキーワードです。
back_translation: Susie is obsessed with losing weight, and she is fixated on being "bonita" rather than "gorda" - the two key terms from the original Spanish title.

text: a young man is struggling to get over harmful memories from his childhood , but while doing so discovers a technique that allows him to travel back in time and occupy his childhood body changing his history forever .
translation: 若い男性は幼少期の有害な記憶を克服しようと奮闘していますが、その過程で過去に戻り、自分の幼少期の体を占めることができる技術を発見し、自らの歴史を永遠に変えてしまいます。
back_translation: A young man is struggling to overcome harmful memories from his childhood, but in the process, he discovers a technique that allows him to go back in time and inhabit his younger self, forever changing his own history.

text: ms . rampling , still beautiful well into her 50s , has an earth-bound weariness and lively spirit that convey a life fully and tragically lived .
translation: ラムプリングさんは、50代に入ってもなお美しさを保ち、地に足をつけた疲れと生き生きとした精神を持っており、それは完全かつ悲劇的に生きた人生を伝えています。
back_translation: Mr. Rampling maintains her beauty even in her 50s, possessing a grounded weariness and a vibrant spirit, which conveys a life lived fully and tragically.

text: he has orchestrated a perverse sport where prisoners fight , sometime to the death for the entertainment and profit of he and his cronies .
translation: 彼は囚人たちが戦い、時には死に至ることもある歪んだスポーツを組織し、それを楽しみと利益のために彼自身と彼の仲間たちのために行っています。
back_translation: He organizes a twisted sport in which prisoners fight, sometimes to their death, and he does this for his own enjoyment and profit, as well as for his comrades.

text: she 's answering questions about how she became the speed queen , one of the sonic killers how mainlining speed with her husband , lamont , and her lover , natalie , grew into dealing , how dealing turned into robbery , and robbery into mass murder .
translation: 彼女は、自分がスピードクイーンになった経緯、ソニックキラーの一人として、夫ラモントと愛人ナタリーとともにスピードを常用することがどのようにドラッグ密売に発展し、そのドラッグ密売が強盗へと、そして強盗が大虐殺へと変わっていったのかについて質問に答えています。
back_translation: She answers questions about how she became a speed queen, how her regular use of speed, along with her husband Lamont and lover Natalie, evolved into drug trafficking, which in turn escalated to robbery and then to a massacre.

text: meanwhile in india , vikrant announces grand prize money to those who tell him the whereabouts of guru .
translation: 一方、インドでは、ヴィクラントがグルの居所を教えた者に対して、豪華な賞金を発表しました。
back_translation: On the other hand, in India, Vikrant announced a lavish reward for anyone who could reveal the whereabouts of the guru.

text: he 's also still got a murder to solve , in addition to the blackmail and framing of an innocent bystander being orchestrated by the man they were chasing .
translation: 彼は、追いかけていた男が orchestrate している恐喝と無実の通行人を陥れることに加えて、まだ解決しなければならない殺人事件も抱えている。
back_translation: In addition to the extortion being orchestrated by the man he was chasing and framing innocent passersby, he also has a murder case that still needs to be resolved.

text: adam miauczynski , the character known from director marek koterski 's previous films , is a 44 year-old teacher , who reads poetry during school lessons and later goes home swearing and calling his neighbours ' names .
translation: アダム・ミアウチンスキーは、監督マレク・コテrskiの以前の映画で知られるキャラクターで、44歳の教師です。学校の授業中に詩を読み、後で家に帰ると罵り声を上げて隣人たちを悪く言います。
back_translation: Adam Miauchinski is a 44-year-old teacher known for a character from director Marek Koterski's previous films. During school classes, he reads poetry, and later, when he returns home, he raises his voice in anger and speaks ill of his neighbors.

text: this curious figure gives nicholas the impression he is pressing his young son closer to the girls in his life and away from bobby .
translation: この好奇心旺盛な人物は、ニコラスに彼が自分の若い息子を人生の女の子たちにより近づけ、ボビーから遠ざけている印象を与えます。
back_translation: This curious person gives the impression to Nicholas that he is bringing his young son closer to the girls in life and distancing him from Bobby.

text: a seasoned call girl is offered a way out of the business if she uncovers a blackmail ring in a house of prostitution .
translation: 経験豊富なコールガールは、売春宿で恐喝リングを暴露すればビジネスから抜け出す道が与えられる。
back_translation: An experienced call girl is given the opportunity to escape the business if she exposes the extortion ring at the brothel.

text: he is increasingly tormented by his conscience as the new order of the day is revealed .
translation: 彼は新しい日常が明らかになるにつれて、ますます良心に苦しめられている。
back_translation: As the new normal becomes clearer, he is increasingly tormented by his conscience.

text: broomfield 's style of journalism is hardly journalism at all , and even those with an avid interest in the subject will grow impatient .
translation: ブルームフィールドのジャーナリズムのスタイルはほとんどジャーナリズムとは言えず、主題に熱心な関心を持つ人々でさえもイライラするだろう。
back_translation: Bloomfield's style of journalism can hardly be called journalism, and it would likely frustrate even those with a passionate interest in the subject.

text: the corpse count ultimately overrides what little we learn along the way about vicarious redemption .
translation: 最終的に死体の数が、私たちが途中で学ぶわずかな代償の贖いについてのことを上回ります。
back_translation: Ultimately, the number of corpses will surpass the little cost of redemption we learn along the way.

text: the unluckiest man in vegas ( william h . macy ) - a guy whose bad luck is contagious - is used by the last of the old time mob run casinos to kill high rollers ' action .
translation: ラスベガスで最も不運な男（ウィリアム・H・メイシー） - 悪運が感染する男 - 昔ながらのマフィアが運営するカジノの最後の一人によって、高額賭けをする客のアクションを排除するために利用される。
back_translation: The most unlucky man in Las Vegas (William H. Macy) - A man whose bad luck is contagious - utilized by the last remaining operator of an old-fashioned mafia-run casino to eliminate the actions of high-stakes betting customers.

text: the best way to hope for any chance of enjoying this film is by lowering your expectations . then lower them a bit more .
translation: この映画を楽しむ可能性を期待する最良の方法は、期待を下げることです。それから、もう少し下げてください。
back_translation: The best way to maximize your chances of enjoying this movie is to lower your expectations. Then lower them a little more.

text: if you love reading and/or poetry , then by all means check it out . you 'll probably love it .
translation: もし読書や詩が好きなら、ぜひチェックしてみてください。きっと気に入るでしょう。
back_translation: If you enjoy reading or poetry, be sure to check it out. You'll definitely like it.

text: might be one of those vanity projects in which a renowned filmmaker attempts to show off his talent by surrounding himself with untalented people .
translation: 著名な映画監督が才能のない人々に囲まれて自分の才能を誇示しようとする、そんな見栄のためのプロジェクトの一つかもしれません。
back_translation: It might be one of those projects where a famous film director tries to showcase their talent surrounded by untalented people, just for the sake of vanity.

text: fly along with skilled helicopter crews as they carry out sea and mountain rescues , apprehend drug smugglers , repair high voltage lines , save endangered animals , deliver humanitarian aid , and undertake a reconnaissance mission .
translation: 熟練したヘリコプター乗組員と共に、海や山での救助活動を行い、麻薬密輸業者を逮捕し、高圧線を修復し、絶滅危惧種を救い、人道的支援を提供し、偵察ミッションに従事する様子を体験してください。
back_translation: Experience working with skilled helicopter crews in rescue operations at sea and in the mountains, arresting drug smugglers, repairing high-voltage power lines, saving endangered species, providing humanitarian aid, and engaging in reconnaissance missions.

text: the moral shrapnel and mental shellshock will linger long after this film has ended .
translation: この映画が終わった後も、道徳的な破片や精神的なショックは長く残るでしょう。
back_translation: Even after this movie ends, the moral fragments and emotional shock will linger for a long time.

text: the storytelling may be ordinary , but the cast is one of those all-star reunions that fans of gosford park have come to assume is just another day of brit cinema .
translation: ストーリーテリングは平凡かもしれませんが、キャストはゴスフォード・パークのファンが、英国映画の日常の一部として当然視するオールスター再結集の一つです。
back_translation: Storytelling may be ordinary, but the cast is one of the all-star reunions that fans of Gosford Park take for granted as part of the everyday experience of British cinema.

text: the man who kidnapped his daughter is also doing what he can to find them .
translation: 娘を誘拐した男は、彼女たちを見つけるためにできる限りのことをしている。
back_translation: The man who kidnapped the girl is doing everything he can to find them.

text: worth a salute just for trying to be more complex than your average film .
translation: 平均的な映画よりも複雑になろうとするだけで敬意を表する価値がある。
back_translation: It is worth respecting just for trying to be more complex than an average movie.

text: underachieving misfits pete and lanny are wannabe `` gangsta rappers , `` who find the constraints of suburbia stifling to their artistic goals .
translation: 成果を上げられないミスフィットのピートとラニーは、芸術的な目標に対する郊外の制約が窮屈だと感じる「ギャングスタラッパー」を目指す存在です。
back_translation: Pete and Lani, who can't achieve results, are aspiring "gangsta rappers" who feel that the suburban constraints on their artistic goals are too restrictive.

text: . . . nothing scary here except for some awful acting and lame special effects .
translation: ここには悪い演技とつまらない特殊効果を除いて、何も怖いものはありません。
back_translation: There is nothing scary here except for the bad acting and dull special effects.

text: ordinary melodrama that is heavy on religious symbols but wafer-thin on dramatic substance
translation: 宗教的なシンボルが重視されるが、ドラマの内容は非常に薄い普通のメロドラマ
back_translation: Religious symbols are emphasized, but the content of the drama is very thin and resembles a typical melodrama.

text: obviously a socialist commentary , poets is in turn informative , witty and thought-provoking .
translation: 明らかに社会主義的なコメントであり、詩は逆に情報提供、機知に富み、考えさせられるものです。
back_translation: It is clearly a socialist comment, while the poem is, on the contrary, informative, witty, and thought-provoking.

text: after being rejected for the perfect job , the aspiring animator faces an impending interview for a receptionist position at the same firm .
