translation: 完璧な仕事に拒否された後、志望するアニメーターは同じ会社での受付のポジションの面接を控えています。
back_translation: After being rejected for a perfect job, the aspiring animator has an interview for a receptionist position at the same company.

text: the four reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending ice age .
translation: 彼らは迫りくる氷河期の危険な要素に立ち向かいながら、人間の子供を父親に返すために渋々一緒になります。
back_translation: They reluctantly team up to return the human child to his father while facing the dangerous elements of the impending ice age.

text: nothing 's at stake , just a twisty double-cross you can smell a mile away -- still , the derivative nine queens is lots of fun .
translation: 何も危険はない、ただ遠くからでも匂いがわかる捻じれた裏切りがあるだけだ。それでも、派生のナイン・クイーンズはとても楽しい。
back_translation: There is no danger, just a twisted betrayal that can be sensed even from afar. Nevertheless, the derivative Nine Queens is very enjoyable.

text: former criminal investigator , major korenev , nicknamed fox is released from prison .
translation: 元刑事捜査官のコレネフ大尉、通称フォックスが刑務所を出所します。
back_translation: Former detective officer Captain Korenev, also known as Fox, is being released from prison.

text: a fanciful drama about napoleon 's last years and his surprising discovery of love and humility .
translation: ナポレオンの晩年と彼の驚くべき愛と謙虚さの発見を描いた空想的なドラマ。
back_translation: A fictional drama depicting Napoleon's later years and his remarkable love and humility.

text: the first hour is tedious though ford and neeson capably hold our interest , but its just not a thrilling movie .
translation: 最初の1時間は退屈ですが、フォードとニーソンは私たちの興味をしっかりと引きつけています。しかし、刺激的な映画ではありません。
back_translation: The first hour is boring, but Ford and Neeson are keeping our interest firmly. However, it's not an exciting movie.

text: long before the first exorcist , we are taken to the birth of the demon pazuzu , and follow him through his life , eventually bringing us to the middle east where he waits for a victim to use as a vehcile to destroy the world with .
translation: 最初のエクソシストのずっと前に、私たちは悪魔パズズの誕生を目撃し、彼の人生を追いかけます。そして、最終的には彼が世界を破壊するための手段として犠牲者を待つ中東へと導かれます。
back_translation: Long before the first Exorcist, we witness the birth of the demon Pazuzu and follow his life. Ultimately, he is led to the Middle East, waiting for victims as a means to destroy the world.

text: he 's dead ; and all their money is gone .
translation: 彼は死んだ；そして彼らの全てのお金も失われた。
back_translation: He died; and all their money was lost as well.

text: plodding , poorly written , murky and weakly acted , the picture feels as if everyone making it lost their movie mojo .
translation: のろのろとした、下手に書かれた、曖昧で弱々しい演技が目立ち、この作品は制作に関わった全員が映画の魔力を失ったかのように感じられます。
back_translation: The slow, poorly written, vague, and weak performances stand out, making it feel as if everyone involved in this production has lost the magic of cinema.

text: not only does this musical documentary showcase a band that 's at the top of its form . . . it also serves as indictment of the ridiculously shallow , pre-fab music industry in general .
translation: この音楽ドキュメンタリーは、最高のパフォーマンスを発揮しているバンドを紹介するだけでなく、全体として非常に浅はかで、事前に作られた音楽業界への非難としても機能しています。
back_translation: This music documentary not only showcases bands delivering their best performances but also functions as a very shallow critique of the music industry, crafted in advance.

text: when their less-than-stunning female forms earn them an invite to a `` dog catcher `` party at their old frat , they decide to brave the harassment so they can grab the rest of their belongings from the house and make a clean break .
translation: 彼女たちの目を引かない女性の姿が、旧友のフラットで行われる「犬捕獲者」パーティーへの招待をもたらすと、彼女たちはそこでの嫌がらせに立ち向かうことを決意し、家から残りの持ち物を回収してきっぱりと別れを告げることにします。
back_translation: The unremarkable appearance of the women catches their attention and leads to an invitation to the "Dog Catcher" party at an old friend's flat, where they resolve to confront the harassment they face, deciding to collect the remaining belongings from home and firmly say their goodbyes.

text: what starts off as a potentially incredibly twisting mystery becomes simply a monster chase film .
translation: 最初は信じられないほどのひねりのあるミステリーとして始まりますが、単なるモンスター追跡映画になってしまいます。
back_translation: It starts as an incredibly twisted mystery, but ends up becoming just a monster hunting movie.

text: director lee has a true cinematic knack , but it 's also nice to see a movie with its heart so thoroughly , unabashedly on its sleeve .
translation: リー監督は本当に映画に対する才能を持っていますが、心がこれほど徹底的に、遠慮なく表現された映画を見るのも素晴らしいことです。
back_translation: Director Lee truly has a talent for movies, and it is wonderful to see a film where the heart is expressed so thoroughly and without reservation.

text: with the help of their gay hairdresser ( pop star jordan chan ) and some friends inside the company , the girls become `` irresistibly `` beautiful , and secretly get rehire under new identities .
translation: 彼女たちはゲイの美容師（ポップスターのジョーダン・チャン）と会社の友人たちの助けを借りて、「抗えない」ほど美しくなり、新しい身分で秘密裏に再雇用される。
back_translation: With the help of their gay hairstylist (pop star Jordan Chang) and their company friends, they become "irresistibly" beautiful and are secretly rehired under new identities.

text: a psychological thriller with a genuinely spooky premise and an above-average cast , actor bill paxton 's directing debut is a creepy slice of gothic rural americana .
translation: 本当に不気味な前提を持つ心理的スリラーで、平均以上のキャストを備えた俳優ビル・パクストンの監督デビューは、不気味なゴシックアメリカの田舎を切り取った作品です。
back_translation: A psychological thriller with a truly eerie premise, actor Bill Paxton's directorial debut features an above-average cast and captures the unsettling Gothic rural America.

text: this is a visually stunning rumination on love , memory , history and the war between art and commerce .
translation: これは愛、記憶、歴史、そして芸術と商業の間の戦争についての視覚的に素晴らしい考察です。
back_translation: This is a visually stunning exploration of love, memory, history, and the war between art and commerce.

text: faced with its aftermath , angela flees town , unaware that she has put into motion a dramatic and intense string of events that will forever change the course of their lives .
translation: その余波に直面し、アンジェラは町を逃げ出すが、彼女が自分の人生の軌道を永遠に変える一連の劇的で強烈な出来事を引き起こしたことに気づいていない。
back_translation: Facing the aftermath, Angela escapes the town, unaware that she has triggered a series of dramatic and intense events that will forever change the course of her life.

text: makes one thing abundantly clear . american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun's-sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .
translation: アメリカのミュージカルコメディは、イディッシュ劇場の先例がなければ存在しなかったことが明らかです。その楽しく、楽しむための共同体の精神はブロードウェイの本質に通じています。
back_translation: It is clear that American musical comedy would not have existed without the precedents of Yiddish theater. The spirit of community that is fun and meant for enjoyment is inherent to the essence of Broadway.

text: the talented and clever robert rodriguez perhaps put a little too much heart into his first film and did n't reserve enough for his second .
translation: 才能と賢さを持つロバート・ロドリゲスは、おそらく彼の初映画にあまりにも多くの心を注ぎすぎて、2作目のために十分に残さなかった。
back_translation: Robert Rodriguez, with his talent and intelligence, perhaps poured too much of his heart into his first film, leaving not enough for the second.

text: the film gets close to the chimps the same way goodall did , with a serious minded patience , respect and affection .
translation: その映画は、グッドールがしたのと同じように、真剣な思いやりと敬意、愛情をもってチンパンジーに寄り添います。
back_translation: The movie embraces chimpanzees with serious compassion, respect, and love, just as Goodall did.

text: the story really has no place to go since simone is not realM-^Wshe ca n't provide any conflict .
translation: その物語は本当に行く場所がありません。なぜならシモーヌは実在しないからです。彼女は何の対立も提供できません。
back_translation: That story really has nowhere to go. Because Simone does not exist. She cannot offer any conflict.

text: they team up and live their lives in the fast lane on the run .
translation: 彼らはチームを組み、逃げながらスピード感あふれる生活を送ります。
back_translation: They form a team and live a thrilling life while escaping.

text: after confining herself in her home for two months , to rehabilitate , physically and mentally , she is persuaded by friends and family to get out of her inner prison and face the world .
translation: 彼女は自宅に2ヶ月間閉じ込められ、心身のリハビリを行った後、友人や家族に説得されて内なる牢獄から出て、世界に向き合うことに決めた。
back_translation: After being confined at home for two months and undergoing physical and mental rehabilitation, she was persuaded by her friends and family to emerge from her inner prison and decided to confront the world.

text: a pleasant ramble through the sort of idoosyncratic terrain that errol morris has often dealt with . . . it does possess a loose , lackadaisical charm .
translation: エロル・モリスがしばしば扱ってきた独特な地形を通る心地よい散策…それはゆるやかで無頓着な魅力を持っています。
back_translation: A pleasant walk through the unique landscapes that Errol Morris often explores... it has a gentle and indifferent charm.

text: the story remarks the difference between social classes in mexico city , and their characters risk everything just to save their love .
translation: 物語はメキシコシティの社会階級の違いを描いており、登場人物たちは愛を守るために全てを賭ける。
back_translation: The story depicts the differences in social classes in Mexico City, with the characters betting everything to protect their love.

text: a go ! ! ! `` and the paper is dated with the year 2003 .
translation: 行くぞ！！！`` そして、その紙は2003年の日付が入っています。
back_translation: Let's go!!! And that paper has a date from 2003.

text: but this hope is quickly jeopardized when it becomes revealed that his comforting visitations may be being made from beyond the grave .
translation: しかし、この希望は彼の慰めの訪問が霊界からなされている可能性が明らかになると、すぐに危険にさらされます。
back_translation: However, this hope is soon jeopardized when it becomes clear that his comforting visit may be taking place from the spirit world.

text: valento feels the heat and turns the table : he makes the dupe into one of his own and rubs the da 's nose in it .
translation: ヴァレンティは熱を感じ、状況を逆転させる。彼は騙された者を自分の仲間にして、ダＡの鼻をそれにこすりつける。
back_translation: Valenti feels the heat and turns the situation around. He makes those who have been deceived his allies and rubs Da A's nose in it.

text: mike leigh mainstay timothy spall deftly shades in the designated goner , fellow still crazy alum bill nighy is sweetly wispy as the capable fop , and anger-management counselor olivia williams trembles pleasantly as usual .
translation: マイク・リーの常連であるティモシー・スポールは、指定された死者を巧みに演じ、同じく「まだクレイジー」の卒業生であるビル・ナイは、優雅な気取り屋を甘美に演じ、怒り管理カウンセラーのオリビア・ウィリアムズは、いつものように心地よく震えています。
back_translation: Timothy Spall, a regular collaborator of Mike Leigh, skillfully plays the designated deceased, while fellow "Still Crazy" alum Bill Nighy elegantly portrays the refined snob, and anger management counselor Olivia Williams is, as always, delightfully trembling.

text: when he kills a butterfly , he unknowingly sets off a chain reaction that will erase humanity from existence .
translation: 彼が蝶を殺すと、彼は知らず知らずのうちに人類を存在から消し去る連鎖反応を引き起こします。
back_translation: When he kills a butterfly, he unknowingly triggers a chain reaction that erases humanity from existence.

text: when she understands that the killer is very intelligent and organized , she elaborates a strategy to arrest him .
translation: 彼女は殺人者が非常に知的で組織的であることを理解したとき、彼を逮捕するための戦略を練ります。
back_translation: When she understood that the murderer was very intelligent and organized, she devised a strategy to arrest him.

text: or does kip just want to destroy the planet ?
translation: それともキップはただ地球を壊したいだけなのか？
back_translation: Or does Kip just want to destroy the Earth?

text: [ majidi ] makes us think twice about immigrants we see around us every day .
translation: [マジディ]は、私たちが毎日周りで見る移民について再考させてくれます。
back_translation: [Majidi] makes us reconsider the immigrants we see around us every day.

text: a very good film sits in the place where a masterpiece should be .
translation: とても良い映画が名作があるべき場所に位置しています。
back_translation: A very good movie is positioned where a masterpiece should be.

text: goyer 's screenplay and direction are thankfully understated , and he has drawn excellent performances from his cast .
translation: ゴイヤーの脚本と演出は幸運にも控えめであり、彼はキャストから素晴らしい演技を引き出しています。
back_translation: Goyard's script and direction are fortunately understated, allowing him to draw outstanding performances from the cast.

text: a film that 's flawed and brilliant in equal measure .
translation: 欠点がありながらも同時に素晴らしい映画。
back_translation: A wonderful movie with its flaws.

text: also , a conservative judge and the attorney general become suspicious of his early release and it 's relation to the murdered prisoner .
translation: また、保守派の裁判官と検事総長は、彼の早期釈放が殺された囚人と関係していることに疑いを持つようになります。
back_translation: Additionally, conservative judges and the attorney general will begin to harbor doubts that his early release is connected to the murdered prisoner.

text: that enemy has developed a `` micro-device `` that can be injected into victims in order to kill them at will .
translation: その敵は、犠牲者に注入して意のままに殺すことができる「マイクロデバイス」を開発しました。
back_translation: The enemy has developed a "microdevice" that can be injected into victims to kill them at will.

text: a dream cast of solid female talent who build a seamless ensemble . there is n't a weak or careless performance amongst them .
translation: シームレスなアンサンブルを作り上げる優れた女性キャストの夢のような組み合わせです。彼女たちの中には弱い演技や手を抜いた演技はありません。
back_translation: It's a dream combination of exceptional female cast members who create a seamless ensemble. None of them deliver weak or half-hearted performances.

text: in the process they have tortured villagers and something dreadful happens and rupi disappears .
translation: その過程で彼らは村人を拷問し、何か恐ろしいことが起こり、ルピは姿を消します。
back_translation: In that process, they torture the villagers, something terrible happens, and Rupi disappears.

text: the sinister inspiration that fuelled devito 's early work is confused in death to smoochy into something both ugly and mindless .
translation: デビートの初期作品を刺激した不気味なインスピレーションは、『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』の中で混乱し、醜く無心なものに変わってしまった。
back_translation: The eerie inspiration that stimulated Debeat's early works became confused and transformed into something ugly and mindless in "Death to Smootchy."

text: his only-way-out is to create for himself a new identity franklin mann one without the doubt , pain or guilt .
translation: 彼の唯一の脱出方法は、疑念や痛み、罪悪感のない新しいアイデンティティを自分のために作ることです。フランクリン・マン。
back_translation: His only way of escape is to create a new identity for himself, free from doubt, pain, and guilt. Franklin Mann.

text: esha and rahul start a letter based friendship that blossoms into love .
translation: エシャとラフールは手紙を通じた友情を始め、それが愛に育っていきます。
back_translation: Esha and Rahul begin a friendship through letters, which grows into love.

text: writer/director steve oedekerk uses contemporary characters and splices them into a 1970s kung-fu film , weaving the new and old together .
translation: ライター/監督のスティーブ・オデケルは、現代のキャラクターを使い、1970年代のカンフー映画に組み込み、新旧を織り交ぜています。
back_translation: Writer/director Steve Oedekerk incorporates modern characters into 1970s kung fu films, blending the old and the new.

text: i did n't laugh . i did n't smile . i survived .
translation: 私は笑わなかった。私は微笑まなかった。私は生き延びた。
back_translation: I did not laugh. I did not smile. I survived.

text: mitch does n't particular like the idea , especially working with his new partner trey sellars ( eddie murphy ) , a cop who spends much of his time mugging for the cameras mounted inside the car he shares with mitch .
translation: ミッチはこのアイデアが特に好きではなく、新しいパートナーのトレイ・セラーズ（エディ・マーフィ）と一緒に働くことが特に嫌だ。トレイは、自分がミッチと共有する車に取り付けられたカメラに対してカメラ目線でポーズをとることに多くの時間を費やしている警官だ。
back_translation: Mitch is not particularly fond of this idea and especially dislikes working with his new partner, Trey Sellers (Eddie Murphy). Trey is a cop who spends a lot of time posing for the camera mounted in the car he shares with Mitch, always looking directly at it.

text: a young couple moves into a neighborhood obsessed with the frightening silent movie history that took place 80 years before .
translation: 若いカップルが、80年前に起こった恐ろしいサイレント映画の歴史に夢中な地区に引っ越してくる。
back_translation: A young couple moves to a neighborhood that is captivated by the terrifying history of a silent film that happened 80 years ago.

text: with an expressive face reminiscent of gong li and a vivid personality like zhang ziyi 's , dong stakes out the emotional heart of happy .
translation: ゴン・リを彷彿とさせる表情豊かな顔と、チャン・ツィイーのような鮮やかな個性を持つドンは、ハッピーの感情的な核を押し出している。
back_translation: Don, with a face full of expression reminiscent of Gon Li and a vibrant personality like Zhang Ziyi, conveys the emotional core of happiness.

text: ice age is the first computer-generated feature cartoon to feel like other movies , and that makes for some glacial pacing early on .
translation: 『アイスエイジ』は、他の映画のように感じる最初のコンピュータ生成の長編アニメーションであり、そのため初めの方はペースが非常にゆっくりと感じられます。
back_translation: "Ice Age" is the first computer-generated feature-length animation that feels different from other movies, and because of that, the beginning feels very slow-paced.

text: the film favors the scientific over the spectacular ( visually speaking ) .
translation: この映画は視覚的に言えば、壮大さよりも科学を重視している。
back_translation: This movie places more emphasis on science rather than grandeur, visually speaking.

text: bennett 's dramatization of her personal descent into post-breakup perdition has a morbid appeal that 's tough to shake .
translation: ベネットの個人的な別れの地獄への堕落の dramatization は、手放し難い不気味な魅力がある。
back_translation: Bennett's personal descent into the hell of parting is dramatized with an unsettling allure that is hard to resist.

text: emerging from the human psyche and showing characteristics of abstract expressionism , minimalism and russian constructivism , graffiti removal has secured its place in the history of modern art while being created by artists who are unconscious of their artistic achievements .
translation: 人間の精神から生まれ出た、抽象表現主義、ミニマリズム、ロシア・コンストラクティビズムの特徴を示すグラフィティ除去は、アーティストが自らの芸術的成果を意識していない中で現代アートの歴史に名を刻んでいる。
back_translation: The graffiti removal, which shows the features of abstract expressionism, minimalism, and Russian constructivism born from the human spirit, marks its place in the history of contemporary art even as the artists remain unaware of their own artistic achievements.

text: does an impressive job of relating the complicated history of the war and of filling in the background .
translation: 戦争の複雑な歴史を関連付け、背景を補完する印象的な仕事をしています。
back_translation: You are doing an impressive job of connecting the complex history of war and complementing the background.

text: chabrol ratchets up such a level of suspense -- and huppert gives such a mesmerizingly deadpan performance -- that merci pour le chocolat turns out to be as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate .
translation: シャブロはそのサスペンスのレベルを高め、ユペールは魅惑的なほど無表情な演技を見せることで、『チョコレートに感謝』はまるでビターチョコレートのように抗うことのできない作品になっています。
back_translation: Shabrol raises the level of suspense, and Yeper delivers a wonderfully expressionless performance, making "Thank You for the Chocolate" an irresistible work, much like dark chocolate.

text: when his sister meets a grisly death in san francisco , he goes there to hunt her killer .
translation: 彼の妹がサンフランシスコで残酷な死を迎えたとき、彼は彼女の殺人者を追うためにそこへ行く。
back_translation: When his sister met a cruel death in San Francisco, he went there to pursue her killer.

text: in 19th-century new mexico , a father ( tommy lee jones ) comes back home , hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter maggie ( cate blanchett ) .
translation: 19世紀のニューメキシコで、父親（トミー・リー・ジョーンズ）が帰郷し、大人の娘マギー（ケイト・ブランシェット）との和解を望んでいます。
back_translation: In 19th century New Mexico, a father (Tommy Lee Jones) returns home and wishes to reconcile with his adult daughter Maggie (Cate Blanchett).

text: never mind whether you buy the stuff about barris being a cia hit man . the kooky yet shadowy vision clooney sustains throughout is daring , inventive and impressive .
translation: バリスがCIAのヒットマンであるという話を信じるかどうかは気にしなくていい。クルーニーが貫く風変わりでありながらも影のあるビジョンは、大胆で独創的かつ印象的です。
back_translation: You don't need to worry about whether to believe the story that Baris is a CIA hitman. Clooney's quirky yet shadowy vision is bold, original, and impressive.

text: an arrested drug kingpin is transported by a los angeles police department swat team led by jackson 's character out of the city and into federal custody .
translation: 逮捕された麻薬王は、ジャクソンのキャラクターが指揮するロサンゼルス市警のSWATチームによって、市外へ移送され、連邦の保護下に置かれます。
back_translation: The arrested drug lord will be transported outside the city by the SWAT team of the Los Angeles Police Department, led by Jackson's character, and placed under federal protection.

text: matt , a city boy , island hopping to take in the festival of fire , hears that she has been tricked ; for jake is not dying .
translation: マットは都会の少年で、火の祭りを楽しむために島を渡り歩いている。彼は、ジェイクが死にかけているのではなく、彼女が騙されていると聞いた。
back_translation: Matt is a city boy wandering the islands to enjoy the fire festival. He heard that Jake is not dying, but that she is being deceived.

text: lanie 's professional success means she must be a failure at life , because she 's driven by ambition and does n't know how to have fun .
translation: ラニーの職業的成功は、彼女が人生において失敗者であることを意味します。なぜなら、彼女は野心に駆り立てられ、楽しむ方法を知らないからです。
back_translation: Rani's professional success means that she is a failure in life. This is because she is driven by ambition and does not know how to enjoy herself.

text: sam leads the kids in a running battle with the gunmen throughout the school .
translation: サムは学校中で子供たちを銃撃者との激しい戦いに導きます。
back_translation: Sam leads the children throughout the school in a fierce battle against the shooter.

text: there 's a disreputable air about the whole thing , and that 's what makes it irresistible .
translation: 全体に不名誉な雰囲気が漂っていて、それがこの魅力を際立たせている。
back_translation: There is an overall atmosphere of dishonor that accentuates this charm.

text: unable to get time off work his mother leaves him outside in their garden to avoid him causing trouble .
translation: 彼の母親は、彼がトラブルを起こさないように、仕事の時間を取れない彼を庭に外に置いておきます。
back_translation: His mother keeps him outside in the garden so that he doesn't cause any trouble, as he cannot take time off from work.

text: this compelling undercover documentary is not for the faint of heart , taking you deep into a world where very often pain and blood are the price of glory .
translation: この説得力のある潜入ドキュメンタリーは、心の弱い人には向いておらず、栄光の代償として痛みと血がしばしば求められる世界に深く入り込んでいきます。
back_translation: This compelling undercover documentary delves deeply into a world where pain and blood are often demanded as the price of glory, and it is not suited for the faint of heart.

text: the movie has lots of dancing and fabulous music . there are slow and repetitive parts , but it has just enough spice to keep it interesting .
translation: この映画にはたくさんのダンスと素晴らしい音楽があります。遅い部分や繰り返しの部分もありますが、興味を引き続けるための適度なスパイスがあります。
back_translation: This movie has a lot of dancing and wonderful music. There are slow parts and repetitive sections, but there is just the right amount of spice to keep your interest.

text: frank and his sister caroline arrive in mystical attic town where the great syndicate is ruling and robbing the citizens .
translation: フランクと彼の妹キャロラインは、大 Syndicate が市民を支配し、略奪している神秘的な屋根裏町に到着します。
back_translation: Frank and his sister Caroline arrive in a mysterious attic town where the Syndicate rules over and plunders the citizens.

text: no one can guess who the next killer will be or how to break the chain .
translation: 誰が次の殺人者になるか、またはその連鎖をどうやって断ち切るかを誰も予測できない。
back_translation: No one can predict who will be the next murderer or how to break the chain.

text: that is , until the villainous captain hook mistakes her for wendy and abducts her to never land in an attempt to lure and capture peter pan .
translation: つまり、悪役のフック船長が彼女をウェンディと間違え、ピーターパンをおびき寄せ捕まえる試みとして、彼女をネバーランドに誘拐するまでのことです。
back_translation: In other words, it is about the evil Captain Hook mistaking her for Wendy and attempting to lure and capture Peter Pan by kidnapping her to Neverland.

text: this familiar rise-and-fall tale is long on glamour and short on larger moralistic consequences , though it 's told with sharp ears and eyes for the tenor of the times .
translation: この親しみやすい興隆と衰退の物語は、華やかさに長けている一方で、より大きな道徳的結果に関しては短いですが、時代の雰囲気を敏感に捉えた鋭い耳と目で語られています。
back_translation: This approachable story of rise and fall excels in glamour, although it falls short on greater moral implications, and is told with a keen ear and eye that敏感に captures the atmosphere of the era.

text: it 's an exhilarating blast that makes good use of the large-format screen .
translation: それは大画面を活かした爽快な体験です。
back_translation: It's a refreshing experience that makes the most of the big screen.

text: when their house is robbed on christmas eve they team up to track him down .
translation: クリスマスイブに家が襲われたとき、彼らは犯人を追跡するために協力します。
back_translation: When their house was attacked on Christmas Eve, they cooperate to track down the culprit.

text: ao sair do cinema , eu estava feliz e com saudades de um tempo em que , para mim , a existM-jncia de papai noel era um fato inquestionM-avel .
translation: 映画館を出たとき、私は幸せで、サンタクロースの存在が私にとって疑いようのない事実だった頃を懐かしく思っていました。
back_translation: When I left the movie theater, I felt happy and nostalgic for the time when the existence of Santa Claus was an undeniable fact for me.

text: isabel ( rica ) and clara ( maui ) , two childhood friends separated by fate .
translation: イザベル（リカ）とクララ（マウイ）、運命に引き裂かれた二人の幼馴染。
back_translation: Isabelle (Rika) and Clara (Maui), childhood friends torn apart by fate.

text: he is almost to school when a red neck attacks him .
translation: 彼は学校にほぼ到着するところで、赤い首の男に襲われる。
back_translation: He is almost arriving at school when he is attacked by a man with a red neck.

text: an ambitious , guilt-suffused melodrama crippled by poor casting .
translation: 野心的で罪悪感に満ちたメロドラマだが、キャスティングの不備によって台無しになっている。
back_translation: It's an ambitious and guilt-ridden melodrama, but it is ruined by casting deficiencies.

text: stiles takes red green and the other lodge members to court , forcing them to come up with $ 10 , 000 in damages in ten days - or else lose their beloved possum lodge .
translation: スタイルズはレッド、グリーン、その他のロッジのメンバーを裁判にかけ、10日以内に10,000ドルの賠償金を支払うように強制します。さもなければ、彼らの愛するオポッサム・ロッジを失うことになります。
back_translation: Styles is suing the members of the Red, Green, and other lodges, forcing them to pay a $10,000 compensation within 10 days. Otherwise, they will lose their beloved Opossum Lodge.

text: their timing and desperate behavior trigger a horror so powerful , no six-shooter can put a dent in it .
translation: 彼らのタイミングと desesperate な行動は、非常に強力な恐怖を引き起こし、どんな六連発ピストルもそれに傷をつけることはできない。
back_translation: Their timing and desperate actions evoke an extremely powerful fear that no six-shooter can undermine.

text: he falls in love with christine and wants her for his own , but she only has eyes for raoul viscount de chagny .
translation: 彼はクリスティーヌに恋をし、彼女を自分のものにしたいと思っていますが、彼女はただラウル・ド・シャニィ子爵しか見ていません。
back_translation: He has fallen in love with Christine and wants to make her his own, but she only has eyes for Count Raoul de Chagny.

text: a frustrated businessman , jeffery goldman ( john pankow ) tries to end his hopeless marriage to wife , ellen ( rebecca pidgeon ) by asking his local rabbi ( eli wallach ) to place a curse on her .
translation: フラストレーションを抱えたビジネスマン、ジェフリー・ゴールドマン（ジョン・パンクウ）は、妻エレン（レベッカ・ピジオン）との絶望的な結婚生活を終わらせるために、地元のラビ（エリ・ウォラック）に彼女に呪いをかけるよう頼む。
back_translation: Frustrated businessman Jeffrey Goldman (John Pankow) turns to the local rabbi (Eli Wallach) to ask for a curse on his wife Ellen (Rebecca Pidgeon) in order to end their desperate marriage.

text: now pistachio must make the most of his inherited power in an attempt to track down devilin and save his parents .
translation: 今、ピスタチオは彼に受け継がれた力を最大限に活かして、デビリンを追跡し、両親を救おうとしています。
back_translation: Now, Pistachio is making the most of the power passed down to him to track down Devlin and try to save his parents.

text: woo 's fights have a distinct flair . his warriors collide in balletic explosion that implies an underlying order throughout the chaos .
translation: ウーの戦いには独特のスタイルがあります。彼の武士たちは、混沌の中に潜む秩序を示唆するバレエのような爆発的な衝突を繰り広げます。
back_translation: The battle of Woo has a unique style. His warriors engage in explosive clashes reminiscent of ballet, suggesting an order that lies hidden within chaos.

text: there are plot holes big enough for shamu the killer whale to swim through .
translation: シャムーのようなシャチが泳げるほどの大きなプロットホールがあります。
back_translation: There is a large plot hole where a whale like Shamu can swim.

text: we never truly come to care about the main characters and whether or not they 'll wind up together , and michele 's spiritual quest is neither amusing nor dramatic enough to sustain interest .
translation: 私たちは決して主なキャラクターたちに本当に関心を持たず、彼らが一緒になるかどうかも気にしません。また、ミシェルの精神的な探求は、興味を持続させるほど面白くもドラマチックでもありません。
back_translation: We never really care about the main characters, nor do we care whether they end up together. Additionally, Michelle's spiritual quest is neither interesting nor dramatic enough to maintain our interest.

text: toula portokalos is 30 , greek , and works in her family 's restaurant , dancing zorba 's , in chicago .
translation: トゥーラ・ポルトカロスは30歳で、ギリシャ人で、シカゴにある家族のレストラン「ダンシング・ゾルバ」で働いています。
back_translation: Toula Portokalos is 30 years old, Greek, and works at her family's restaurant "Dancing Zorba" in Chicago.

text: birthday girl does n't try to surprise us with plot twists , but rather seems to enjoy its own transparency .
translation: 誕生日の女の子は私たちを驚かせるためにプロットのひねりを試みることはなく、むしろその透明性を楽しんでいるようです。
back_translation: The birthday girl seems to enjoy the transparency rather than trying to plot a twist to surprise us.

text: lost and stranded , they are set upon by a bizarre family of psychotics .
translation: 失って取り残された彼らは、異常な精神障害者の家族に襲われる。
back_translation: They are attacked by the family of an abnormal mentally ill person, having lost everything and been left behind.

text: their only common bond is the vague promise of riches at the end of their journey as they try to stay one step ahead of santiago , a violent gangster out for their blood and gaining on them all the time .
translation: 彼らの唯一の共通点は、サンティアゴという、彼らの血を求める暴力的なギャングに常に迫られながら旅の終わりに富が待っているという漠然とした約束で、一歩先を行こうとすることです。
back_translation: Their only commonality lies in the vague promise that wealth awaits them at the end of their journey, always pursued by the violent gang Santiago that seeks their blood, as they strive to stay one step ahead.

text: shane bradley , who is fixated on ideas of luck and destiny , tries to win the girl of his dreams .
translation: 運と運命のアイデアにとらわれているシェーン・ブラッドリーは、夢の女の子を手に入れようとしています。
back_translation: Shane Bradley, who is caught up in the ideas of luck and destiny, is trying to get the girl of his dreams.

text: surrounded by a bevy of adoring but completely wrong for her men ( and one dead girl from manchester ) , chance has to pick her way through her messy life in order to figure out which guy is `` it `` .
translation: 彼女にぴったりではない男たち（そしてマンチェスターからの1人の死んだ少女）に囲まれたチャンスは、自分の混乱した人生の中を歩きながら、どの男性が「それ」なのかを見極めなければなりません。
back_translation: Surrounded by men who are not quite right for her (and a dead girl from Manchester), Chance must navigate her chaotic life and figure out which man is the "one."

text: a recent favourite at sundance , this white-trash satire will inspire the affection of even those unlucky people who never owned a cassette of def leppard 's pyromania .
translation: 最近のサンダンスでのお気に入りであるこのホワイトトラッシュ風刺は、デフ・レパードの「パイロマニア」のカセットを持っていない不運な人々でさえも、愛情を抱かせることでしょう。
back_translation: This white trash satire, which is a favorite from the recent Sundance, will surely evoke affection even from those unfortunate enough not to have a cassette of Def Leppard's "Pyromania."

text: si el siglo xxi necesita de hM-iroes , el hombre araM-qa parece haber llegado para quedarse .
translation: もし21世紀がヒーローを必要としているなら、マンアラクは定着するためにやってきたようです。
back_translation: If the 21st century needs heroes, it seems that Manarak has come to stay.

text: cho 's fans are sure to be entertained ; it 's only fair in the interest of full disclosure to say that -- on the basis of this film alone -- i 'm not one of them .
translation: チョのファンはきっと楽しめるでしょう；完全な開示の観点から言うと、この映画だけを基にすると、私はそのファンではないと言わざるを得ません。
back_translation: Chō's fans will surely enjoy it; from the perspective of complete disclosure, I have to say that based solely on this movie, I am not one of those fans.

text: not even steven spielberg has dreamed up such blatant and sickening product placement in a movie .
translation: スティーヴン・スピルバーグでさえ、映画の中でこれほど露骨で不快なプロダクトプレースメントを思いつくことはない。
back_translation: Even Steven Spielberg wouldn't come up with such blatant and unpleasant product placement in a movie.

text: hoping to win prize money offered by a local band contest , dewey forms a rock band with the kids in the class .
translation: 地元のバンドコンテストで提供される賞金を獲得することを期待して、デューイはクラスの子供たちとロックバンドを結成します。
back_translation: Hoping to win the prize money offered in the local band contest, Dewey forms a rock band with the kids in his class.

text: the documentary weaves verite rehearsal , interviews , rare holocaust footage , and performances into a revelation of the creative process .
translation: ドキュメンタリーは、ヴェリテのリハーサル、インタビュー、希少なホロコーストの映像、そしてパフォーマンスを織り交ぜて、創造的なプロセスの啓示を明らかにします。
back_translation: The documentary reveals the creative process by interweaving rehearsals, interviews, rare Holocaust footage, and performances.

text: he moves around the urban landscape from park bench to bus bench with his best friend , an aging dog named bones .
translation: 彼は、老犬のボーンズという親友と一緒に、公園のベンチからバスのベンチへと都市の風景を移動する。
back_translation: He moves from a park bench to a bus bench across the urban landscape with his old dog Bones, his close friend.

text: she sets out to strike down her once fellow assassins , leaving bill for last .
translation: 彼女はかつての仲間の暗殺者たちを打倒するために出発し、ビルを最後に残す。
back_translation: She sets out to defeat the assassins who were once her comrades, leaving Bill for last.

text: benigni 's pinocchio is extremely straight and mind-numbingly stilted , its episodic pacing keeping the film from developing any storytelling flow .
translation: ベニーニの「ピノッキオ」は非常に直線的で、頭が麻痺するほど不自然であり、そのエピソード的なペース配分が映画に物語の流れを発展させることを妨げています。
back_translation: Benigni's "Pinocchio" is very linear and so unnatural that it numbs the mind, and its episodic pacing hinders the development of the story's flow in the film.

text: it certainly wo n't win any awards in the plot department but it sets out with no pretensions and delivers big time .
translation: ストーリーの面では賞を受賞することはないでしょうが、 pretensions なしに始まり、非常に良い成果を上げています。
back_translation: It may not win any awards in terms of story, but it starts without pretensions and achieves very good results.

text: though an important political documentary , this does not really make the case the kissinger should be tried as a war criminal .
translation: 重要な政治ドキュメンタリーではありますが、これはキッシンジャーが戦争犯罪者として起訴されるべきであるという主張にはなっていません。
back_translation: While it is an important political documentary, it does not make the argument that Kissinger should be prosecuted as a war criminal.

text: benefits from a strong performance from zhao , but it 's dong jie 's face you remember at the end .
translation: 趙の強力なパフォーマンスから得られる利益がありますが、結局あなたが思い出すのは董潔の顔です。
back_translation: There are profits to be gained from Zhao's strong performance, but ultimately, what you remember is Dong Jie’s face.

text: the story follows a year in the life of the hemples , a family that takes home schooling to an extreme - and has for generations .
translation: この物語は、世代を超えて極端なホームスクーリングを行っているヘンプル一家の一年を追っています。
back_translation: This story follows a year in the life of the Hemple family, who practice extreme homeschooling across generations.

text: until now , zak gibbs ' greatest challenge has been finding a way to buy a car .
translation: これまで、ザック・ギブスの最大の課題は車を買う方法を見つけることでした。
back_translation: So far, Zack Gibbs' biggest challenge has been finding a way to buy a car.

text: and while ingrid 's gift is to give astrid the power to survive , astrid 's gift is to teach her mother about love .
translation: イングリッドの贈り物がアストリッドに生き残る力を与えることである一方、アストリッドの贈り物は母に愛について教えることです。
back_translation: Ingrid's gift gives Astrid the power to survive, while Astrid's gift teaches her mother about love.

text: the bottom line with nemesis is the same as it has been with all the films in the series : fans will undoubtedly enjoy it , and the uncommitted need n't waste their time on it .
translation: ネメシスの結論は、シリーズのすべての映画と同様です：ファンは間違いなく楽しむでしょうし、興味のない人は時間を無駄にする必要はありません。
back_translation: The conclusion of Nemesis is the same as all the movies in the series: fans will undoubtedly enjoy it, while those who are not interested need not waste their time.

text: raimi crafted a complicated hero who is a welcome relief from the usual two-dimensional offerings .
translation: ライミは、通常の二次元的なキャラクターから歓迎される解放となる複雑なヒーローを作り上げました。
back_translation: Raimi has created a complex hero that represents a welcomed liberation from the usual two-dimensional characters.

text: igby slocumb , a rebellious and sarcastic seventeen year-old boy , is at war with the oppressive world of his east coast `` old money `` family .
translation: イグビー・スロカムは、反抗的で皮肉な17歳の少年で、東海岸の「古き良き金持ち」家族の抑圧的な世界と戦っています。
back_translation: Igby Slocum is a rebellious and sarcastic 17-year-old boy who is struggling against the oppressive world of a "good old wealthy" family on the East Coast.

text: if you liked the 1982 film then , you 'll still like it now .
translation: 1982年の映画が好きだったら、今でも好きなはずです。
back_translation: If you liked the movie from 1982, you should still like it now.

text: as fate would have it , they realize how close they all are from the other side ; of life , of love , and of losing it .
translation: 運命のいたずらか、彼らは人生、愛、そしてそれを失うことの裏側がどれほど近いかを実感する。
back_translation: By a twist of fate, they realize how close they are to the other side of life, love, and losing it.

text: britney spears ' phoniness is nothing compared to the movie 's contrived , lame screenplay and listless direction .
translation: ブリトニー・スピアーズの不自然さは、映画の仕込みすぎでダサい脚本や活気のない演出に比べれば何者でもない。
back_translation: Britney Spears' unnaturalness is nothing compared to the overly scripted and cheesy writing or the lifeless direction of the movie.

text: . . . the first 2/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices ( cool visual backmasking ) , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor . . .
translation: 映画の最初の2/3は信じられないほど魅力的で、非常に面白いです。その理由の一部は、興味深い映画技法（クールなビジュアルバックマスキング）、しっかりとしたキャスト、そして悪趣味でねじれたユーモアのおかげです。
back_translation: The first two-thirds of the movie are incredibly captivating and very entertaining. Part of the reason is due to the interesting filmmaking techniques (cool visual back masking), a solid cast, and the tasteless and twisted humor.

text: the real reason to see runteldat is to watch lawrence deploy his deep and wide powers of empathy to depict such diverse experiences as childbirth , breast-feeding and recovering from illness .
translation: runteldatを見る本当の理由は、ローレンスが出産、授乳、病気からの回復といった多様な経験を描写するために、彼の深く幅広い共感力を発揮する様子を見ることです。
back_translation: The real reason to watch runteldat is to see how Lawrence showcases his deeply broad empathy through the depiction of diverse experiences such as childbirth, breastfeeding, and recovery from illness.

text: that all changes when a teammate is mysteriously stabbed during a ball field brawl .
translation: それが、仲間が野球場での乱闘中に神秘的に刺されると変わります。
back_translation: However, it changes when a companion is mysteriously stabbed during a brawl at the baseball stadium.

text: go for la salle 's performance , and make do as best you can with a stuttering script .
translation: ラサールのパフォーマンスに取り組み、吃音のスクリプトでできる限り頑張ってください。
back_translation: Work on Lasalle's performance and do your best with the stuttering script.

text: deacon , matt and fred will do anything for even a glimpse of sex and spend their mornings pirating porno movies from fred 's after school job at the video store .
translation: ディーコン、マット、そしてフレッドは、セックスの一瞥さえも得るために何でもするつもりで、フレッドがビデオ店の放課後の仕事から海賊版のポルノ映画をダウンロードして朝を過ごします。
back_translation: Deacon, Matt, and Fred are willing to do anything, even just to catch a glimpse of sex, as Fred spends the morning downloading pirated porn films from his after-school job at the video store.

text: despite its dry wit and compassion , the film suffers from a philosophical emptiness and maddeningly sedate pacing .
translation: その乾いたウィットと同情にもかかわらず、映画は哲学的な空虚さと苛立たしいほどの静かなペースに悩まされている。
back_translation: Despite its dry wit and sympathy, the film suffers from philosophical emptiness and an irritatingly quiet pace.

text: he is sensitive and compassionate , speaks french fluently , is passionate about voltaire , and thinks the feature that tells the most about a woman is her hands .
translation: 彼は繊細で思いやりがあり、フランス語を流暢に話し、ヴォルテールに情熱を注ぎ、女性について最も語る特徴は彼女の手だと考えています。
back_translation: He is delicate and compassionate, speaks French fluently, has a passion for Voltaire, and believes that the most telling feature about a woman is her hands.

text: seemingly a vehicle to showcase the canadian 's inane ramblings , stealing harvard is a smorgasbord of soliloquies about nothing delivered by the former mr . drew barrymore .
translation: カナダ人の無意味な ramblings を見せるための手段のように思える「ハーバードを盗む」は、元ミスター・ドリュー・バリモアによって何もないことについて語られる独白のビュッフェです。
back_translation: "Stealing Harvard," which seems like a means to showcase the meaningless ramblings of Canadians, is a buffet of monologues about nothing spoken by former Mr. Drew Barrymore.

text: while awaiting trial , zoe is confined to house arrest , where she alternates falling in love with her frequent visitor and parole officer , daly , and trying to prove her innocence to regain her life and freedom .
translation: 裁判を待っている間、ゾーイは自宅軟禁にされており、頻繁に訪れる保釈担当官ダリーに恋をしては、自分の無実を証明して人生と自由を取り戻そうと奮闘しています。
back_translation: While waiting for her trial, Zoey is under house arrest and has fallen in love with her frequently visiting bail officer, Dally. She is struggling to prove her innocence and reclaim her life and freedom.

text: heartwarming and gently comic even as the film breaks your heart .
translation: 心温まるやさしいコメディでありながら、映画はあなたの心を引き裂く。
back_translation: It's a heartwarming and gentle comedy, yet the movie will tear your heart apart.

text: the film uses chapman 's own unseen personal papers and unpublished memoirs in order to recreate his years at cambridge university , medical school , the monty python years , his struggles with alcohol , his ground-breaking stance on homosexuality , his exploits with john cleese , keith moon , harry nilsson , ringo starr , and his untimely death at age 48 , of cancer .
translation: この映画は、チャップマン自身の未公開の個人文書や未発表の回顧録を使用して、ケンブリッジ大学での年月、医学部、モンティ・パイソンの時代、アルコールとの闘い、同性婚に対する先駆的な立場、ジョン・クリーズ、キース・ムーン、ハリー・ニルソン、リンゴ・スターとの exploits、そして48歳でがんにより早逝するまでの彼の人生を再現しています。
back_translation: This film recreates his life using previously unreleased personal documents and unpublished memoirs of Chapman himself, covering his years at Cambridge University, his time in medical school, the Monty Python era, his battle with alcohol, his pioneering stance on same-sex marriage, his exploits with John Cleese, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, Ringo Starr, and his early death from cancer at the age of 48.

text: insomnia does not become one of those rare remakes to eclipse the original , but it does n't disgrace it , either .
translation: 不眠症はオリジナルを超えるような稀なリメイクの一つにはならないが、それを貶めることもない。
back_translation: Insomnia may not be one of those rare remakes that surpass the original, but it is also not something to belittle.

text: blue crush follows the formula , but throws in too many conflicts to keep the story compelling .
translation: ブルークラッシュは定番のフォーマットに従っているが、物語を魅力的に保つための対立が多すぎる。
back_translation: Blue Crush follows a standard format, but there are too many conflicts to keep the story engaging.

text: however tina disregards him and chooses not to respond to his first e-mail , in turn pooja decides to keep in touch with him but signs under tina 's name .
translation: しかし、ティナは彼を無視し、彼の最初のメールには応答しない。その代わりにプージャは彼と連絡を取り続けることにし、ティナの名前でサインする。
back_translation: However, Tina ignores him and does not respond to his first email. Instead, Pooja decides to continue communicating with him and signs Tina's name.

text: it 's hard not to feel you 've just watched a feature-length video game with some really heavy back story .
translation: まるで重厚なバックストーリーを持つ長編ビデオゲームを見たかのように感じてしまうのは難しい。
back_translation: It's hard not to feel as if you've experienced a lengthy video game with a rich backstory.

text: he makes all efforts to bring ghisu back but does not succeed .
translation: 彼はギスを戻すためにあらゆる努力をするが、成功しない。
back_translation: He makes every effort to return the guises but is unsuccessful.

text: bogdanovich taps deep into the hearst mystique , entertainingly reenacting a historic scandal .
translation: ボグダノビッチはハーストの神秘に深く迫り、歴史的なスキャンダルを楽しく再現しています。
back_translation: Bogdanovich delves deeply into Hearst's mystery and recreates historical scandals with enjoyment.

text: there is a secret test hidden with in the sat .
translation: SATの中に隠された秘密のテストがあります。
back_translation: There is a secret test hidden within the SAT.

text: `` it 's said that only love can save them from disgrace , but that 's crap .
translation: 愛だけが彼らを恥から救うことができると言われていますが、それはクソです。
back_translation: It is said that only love can save them from shame, but that's nonsense.

text: among the drove is a pair of con men , on a decadent road trip as santa and his elf .
translation: 群れの中には、サンタと彼のエルフとしてデカダントなロードトリップをしている一対の詐欺師がいる。
back_translation: Among the group, there is a pair of con artists who are having a decadent road trip as Santa and his elf.

text: a film that takes you inside the rhythms of its subject : you experience it as you watch .
translation: その主題のリズムの内側にあなたを引き込む映画 : 視聴することでそれを体験します。
back_translation: A movie that draws you into the rhythm of its theme: You experience it by watching.

text: here she encounters the menacing dennis betts ( clive russell ) and in an attempt to flee from him , she & # 237 ; s forced to hide in a car belonging to daniel stone ( douglas henshall ) , a hospital porter .
translation: ここで彼女は脅威的なデニス・ベッツ（クライヴ・ラッセル）と出会い、彼から逃れようとする中で、病院のポーターであるダニエル・ストーン（ダグラス・ヘンシャル）の車に隠れることを余儀なくされます。
back_translation: Here she encounters the menacing Denis Betts (Clive Russell) and, in her attempt to escape him, is forced to hide in the car of Daniel Stone (Douglas Henshal), a hospital porter.

text: . . . an enjoyably frothy 'date movie ' . . .
translation: ...楽しませてくれる軽快な「デートムービー」...
back_translation: ...a light and enjoyable "date movie"...

text: daria 's boys are : dante , who owns some of the hottest clubs in the city and believes monogamy is a dirty word , unless he 's being cheated on .
translation: ダリアの男たち：ダンテは街で最もホットなクラブのいくつかを所有しており、一夫一婦制は汚らわしい言葉だと信じています。ただし、自分が浮気されている場合を除いて。
back_translation: The Men of Dahlia: Dante owns some of the hottest clubs in town and believes that monogamy is a filthy word. However, that is only unless he is the one being cheated on.

text: quietly pulls you into its sun drenched style of american gothic in the heartland
translation: 静かにあなたを心の奥にあるアメリカンゴシックの太陽に照らされたスタイルへと引き込む。
back_translation: Gently drawing you into a style illuminated by the American Gothic sun deep within your heart.

text: now , johnny and lena ( wayne 's girlfriend ) are asked to make the ultimate baby product , called mighty baby .
translation: 今、ジョニーとレナ（ウェインのガールフレンド）は、「マイティベビー」と呼ばれる究極のベビー製品を作るように求められています。
back_translation: Now, Johnny and Lena (Wayne's girlfriend) are being asked to create the ultimate baby product called "Mighty Baby."

text: for the first time in several years , mr . allen has surpassed himself with the magic he 's spun with the hollywood empress of ms . leoni 's ellie .
translation: 数年ぶりに、アレン氏はレオニさんのエリーとの魔法で自らを超えました。
back_translation: After several years, Mr. Allen surpassed himself with the magic of Ellie from Leonie.

text: it 's all going well for the very single eleanor , until she realizes it 's all a ruse .
translation: 非常に独り身のエレノアにとってすべてがうまくいっていたが、彼女はそれがすべて策略であることに気づく。
back_translation: Everything was going well for the very lonely Eleanor, but she realizes that it is all a scheme.

text: the characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer needs sex to reproduce , a world that is changing and is populated with people who use provisional identities and are seen through virtual selves and a world where love is the only thing that makes things real .
translation: 登場人物たちは、もはやセックスによって繁殖する必要のない世界で愛を見つけるために苦闘しています。変化し、人々は仮のアイデンティティを使い、バーチャルな自分を通して見られる世界で、愛だけが物事をリアルにする唯一のものです。
back_translation: The characters are struggling to find love in a world where there is no longer a need to reproduce through sex. As things change, people use temporary identities, and in a world where they are seen through a virtual self, love is the only thing that makes things real.

text: talk to her is excellent movie-making and much of it is wondrous , but my conscience wo n't allow me to be devoted to unconditionally singing its praises .
translation: 「トーク・トゥ・ハー」は素晴らしい映画制作であり、その多くは驚くべきものですが、私の良心は無条件にその賞賛を唱えることを許してくれません。
back_translation: "Talk to Her" is a wonderful piece of filmmaking, and much of it is remarkable, but my conscience does not allow me to unconditionally praise it.

text: the story of two lads from belfast as they stumble their way through the london gay underworld in search of 'gainful employment ' .
translation: ベルファスト出身の2人の青年が、"有益な雇用"を求めてロンドンのゲイアンダーワールドをさまよう物語。
back_translation: A story about two young men from Belfast wandering through London's gay underworld in search of "meaningful employment."

text: as a revenge thriller , the movie is serviceable , but it does n't really deliver the delicious guilty pleasure of the better film versions .
translation: 復讐スリラーとしては十分ですが、より優れた映画版のような美味しい罪悪感のある楽しみを本当には提供していません。
back_translation: While it is sufficient as a revenge thriller, it doesn't truly provide the delicious, guilty pleasure that a better film version might offer.

text: another in-your-face wallow in the lower depths made by people who have never sung those blues .
translation: 実際にそのブルースを歌ったことのない人々によって作られた、もう一つの露骨に下層をうろつく作品。
back_translation: Another blatantly lower-class work created by people who have never actually sung that blues.

text: when the switchblade , the most sophisticated prototype stealth fighter created yet , is stolen from the u . s . government , one of the united states ' top spies , alex scott ( owen wilson ) , is called to action .
translation: スイッチブレード、今までに作られた中で最も洗練されたプロトタイプのステルスファイターが米国政府から盗まれると、アメリカ合衆国のトップスパイの一人、アレックス・スコット（オーウェン・ウィルソン）が行動を呼ばれます。
back_translation: When the switchblade, the most sophisticated prototype of a stealth fighter ever created, is stolen from the U.S. government, one of the top spies in the United States, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), is called into action.

text: as they used to say in the 1950s sci-fi movies , signs is a tribute to shyamalan 's gifts , which are such that we 'll keep watching the skies for his next project .
translation: 1950年代のSF映画でよく言われていたように、『サイン』はシャマランの才能への賛辞であり、彼の次のプロジェクトを楽しみに空を見上げ続けることになるでしょう。
back_translation: As often said in 1950s sci-fi movies, "Signs" is a tribute to Shyamalan's talent, and we will continue to look up at the sky in anticipation of his next project.

text: spellbound by the rich and mysterious world manuela has shown him , his idyll is shattered when the reality of why he 's there comes crashing down around him .
translation: マヌエラが見せてくれた豊かで神秘的な世界に魅了されていた彼の夢は、彼がそこにいる理由の現実が彼の周りで崩れ落ちるときに打ち砕かれます。
back_translation: His dream of being captivated by the rich and mystical world that Manuela showed him is shattered when the reality of why he is there crumbles around him.

text: during the course of the story we also learn that his father died at age 40 ; and now , as jones approaches his 40th birthday , he suffers from `` survivor 's guilt . ``
translation: 物語の過程で、彼の父が40歳で亡くなったことも分かります。そして今、ジョーンズが40歳の誕生日を迎えようとしているとき、彼は「生存者の罪」を抱えています。
back_translation: Throughout the story, it is revealed that his father died at the age of 40. Now, as Jones is about to celebrate his 40th birthday, he is grappling with "survivor's guilt."

text: her stalker looks threatening but his manner seems to suggest that he is just a confused social outcast , trapped in an obsessive , repetitive rut that revolves around anna .
translation: 彼女のストーカーは威圧的に見えるが、彼の態度は彼がただの混乱した社会的なはぐれ者であり、アンナを中心にした執着的で繰り返しのパターンに閉じ込められていることを示唆しているようだ。
back_translation: Her stalker appears intimidating, but his behavior suggests that he is just a confused social misfit trapped in an obsessive, repetitive pattern centered around Anna.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: 映画の累積的な効果は忌まわしく、落ち込ませるものです。
back_translation: The cumulative effect of movies is ghastly and depressing.

text: insomnia is one of the year 's best films and pacino gives one of his most daring , and complicated , performances .
translation: 不眠は今年の最高の映画の一つであり、パチーノは彼の最も大胆で複雑な演技の一つを見せています。
back_translation: Insomnia is one of the best films of the year, and Pacino delivers one of his most daring and complex performances.

text: the heart of the film is the drop dead sexy drea de matteo who , as the mother and real head of the family , commands every scene .
translation: 映画の中心は、母親であり実際の家族の頭であるドレア・デ・マッテオであり、彼女は全てのシーンを支配する魅力的な存在です。
back_translation: The focus of the movie is Drea de Matteo, the mother and the actual head of the family, who is a captivating presence dominating every scene.

text: he is under the impression that rupi is dead .
translation: 彼はルピが亡くなったと思っています。
back_translation: He thinks that Lupi has died.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: 「マンハッタンの愛しのメイド」で、ジェニファー・ロペスは映画界を席巻するための最も積極的で真摯な試みを行い、彼女は巧みに一流のキャストを周囲に配置しています。
back_translation: In "Maid in Manhattan," Jennifer Lopez makes one of the most active and sincere attempts to take the film industry by storm, and she skillfully surrounds herself with a top-notch cast.

text: what makes blade 2 marginally better than blade , especially if you thought the first was a hollow spectacle ? it has a plot .
translation: ブレイド2がブレイドよりわずかに優れている理由は何ですか、特に最初の作品が空虚な見せ物だと思った場合？それはプロットがあるからです。
back_translation: Why is Blade 2 slightly better than Blade, especially if you think the first work was an empty spectacle? It's because it has a plot.

text: each weekend they come back with nothing but a hangover .
translation: 彼らは毎週末、ただ二日酔いだけを抱えて戻ってくる。
back_translation: They come back every weekend just with a hangover.

text: she wants justice and will do anything to get it .
translation: 彼女は正義を求めており、それを得るためには何でもするつもりです。
back_translation: She is seeking justice and is willing to do anything to obtain it.

text: after a chance encounter at a theater , two men , benigno and marco , meet at a private clinic where benigno works .
translation: 劇場での偶然の出会いの後、二人の男、ベニーニョとマルコは、ベニーニョが働いている私立クリニックで再会します。
back_translation: After an unexpected encounter at the theater, two men, Benigno and Marco, reunite at the private clinic where Benigno works.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: ヘインズが彼のジャンルとキャラクターが構築するファサードを維持し、解体することができるというのは、真実性と物語の優雅さの素晴らしい成果です。
back_translation: The fact that Haynes is able to maintain and deconstruct the facade created by his genre and characters is a remarkable achievement of authenticity and narrative elegance.

text: police and investigators believed the murders were in retaliation for a robbery days prior to the murders .
translation: 警察と捜査官は、殺人事件は犯罪の数日前に行われた強盗への報復であると信じていました。
back_translation: The police and investigators believed that the murder was a retaliation for a robbery that occurred a few days before the crime.

text: a canny , derivative , wildly gruesome portrait of a london sociopath who 's the scariest of sadists .
translation: 巧妙で、派生的で、狂気的に残酷なロンドンの社会病質者の肖像で、最も恐ろしいサディストです。
back_translation: A clever, derivative, and madly cruel portrait of a sociopath in London, the most terrifying sadist.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: よく作られているが没入感がない、『ブラッドワーク』はひどい映画ではないが、驚くほど明白な作品であり、ミステリーのための報われない作品である。
back_translation: "Well made but lacking immersion, 'Blood Work' is not a terrible movie, but it is an astonishingly obvious piece of work and a thankless effort for a mystery."

text: like it or not , anne marie starts losing her balance - and finding it - as she falls for matt .
translation: 好きでも嫌いでも、アン・マリーはマットに惹かれるにつれてバランスを失い、そして再び見つけていく。
back_translation: Whether she loves or hates him, Anne Marie loses her balance as she is drawn to Matt, and then finds it again.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: これは不格好な映画で、膝のあるべきところに肘が突き出ているような不適合な作品です。
back_translation: This is a clumsy movie, an inappropriate work where elbows jut out where knees should be.

text: jason must get back , therefore he gets a new and unique mask , and goes after the kids of elm street .
translation: ジェイソンは戻らなければならないので、新しくてユニークなマスクを手に入れ、エルム通りの子供たちを追いかけます。
back_translation: Jason must return, so he gets a new and unique mask and chases the children of Elm Street.

text: tam & # 225 ; s is a young , budapest-based director of video clips and commercials who dreams of directing his first feature film with the title 'the guilty city ' .
translation: タム・アンド・#225;スは、ハンガリーのブダペストを拠点とする若いビデオクリップやコマーシャルの監督で、「罪の街」というタイトルの初の長編映画を監督することを夢見ています。
back_translation: Tamás is a young director based in Budapest, Hungary, who specializes in video clips and commercials, and dreams of directing his first feature film titled "The City of Sin."

text: try as you might to scrutinize the ethics of kaufman 's approach , somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling , sensitive , intelligent and almost cohesive piece of film entertainment .
translation: どんなにカウフマンのアプローチの倫理を精査しようとしても、結局のところそれがすべて結びついて非常に魅力的で、繊細で、知的で、ほぼ一貫性のある映画エンターテインメントを生み出しています。
back_translation: No matter how much one tries to scrutinize Kaufman's approach to ethics, ultimately it all comes together to create a very engaging, nuanced, intellectual, and almost consistent form of cinematic entertainment.

text: a young great gatsbyish hip hopper named summer g falls for a middle to upper class sister while in college .
translation: 若き「グレート・ギャツビー」のようなヒップホッパー、サマー・Gは大学で中流から上流階級の姉妹に恋をする。
back_translation: A young hip-hop artist like the "Great Gatsby," Summer G falls in love with a sister from the middle to upper class at university.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: ホフマンの強力な演技クリニックに加えて、これは誰もが感じたことのある、あるいはいつか感じるであろう心の痛みを考えさせ、満足感を与えてくれる稀なドラマです。
back_translation: In addition to Hoffman’s powerful acting clinic, this is a rare drama that makes you reflect on the emotional pain that everyone has felt or will one day feel, and provides a sense of satisfaction.

text: and with the birth of tiz 's son , it becomes unavoidably evident that tiz 's fate and his hopes for success involve far more than just his own happiness .
translation: そしてティズの息子の誕生により、ティズの運命と彼の成功への希望は彼自身の幸福だけではなく、避けられないほど明らかになります。
back_translation: And with the birth of Tiz's son, Tiz's fate and his hopes for success become inevitably clear, not just for his own happiness.

text: imamura 's delight in the infinite oddity of men and women is goofy ; it 's also , at heart , reverent .
translation: 今村の男性と女性の無限の奇妙さへの喜びはおかしなものであり、同時に心の底では敬意を表しています。
back_translation: The joy of the infinite weirdness of men and women in Imamura is peculiar, and at the same time, it expresses a deep respect.

text: halpern and rolov follow three young men : 23-year old straight-laced circuit virgin , brandon ; 21-year old party boy with a drug problem , tone ; and sensitive but strong-willed 19-year old , jon .
translation: ハルパーンとロロフは、23歳の真面目なサーキットの処女、ブランドン；21歳のパーティーボーイで薬物問題を抱えるトーン；そして敏感だが意志の強い19歳のジョンという3人の若者を追っています。
back_translation: Harpoon and Roloff are following three young men: Brandon, a serious 23-year-old circuit virgin; Tone, a 21-year-old party boy with drug problems; and John, a sensitive yet strong-willed 19-year-old.

text: the fight scenes are fun , but it grows tedious .
translation: 戦闘シーンは楽しいですが、徐々に飽きてきます。
back_translation: Combat scenes are fun, but they gradually become boring.

text: guns , money , and a chance at paradise . . .
translation: 銃、金、そして楽園へのチャンス。。。
back_translation: Guns, money, and a chance at paradise...

text: its weighty themes are too grave for youngsters , but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers .
translation: その重いテーマは若者にはあまりにも深刻ですが、物語はおとぎ話や他の子供じみた要素に浸りすぎており、ティーンエイジャーにはあまり魅力的ではありません。
back_translation: That heavy theme is too serious for young people, but the story is too immersed in fairy tale and other childish elements, making it not very appealing to teenagers.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen . . . his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: すべての同情、共感、そして哀れみが画面を曇らせながら……彼の秘密の生活は、意図しないメロドラマと疲れるような恋愛トライアングルの世界に足を踏み入れる。
back_translation: Amid all the sympathy, empathy, and pity clouding the screen... his secret life steps into a world of unintentional melodrama and exhausting love triangles.

text: beneath clouds is the story of lena , the light-skinned daughter of an aboriginal mother and irish father and vaughn , a murri boy doing time in a minimum security prison in north west nsw .
translation: 「雲の下」は、アボリジニの母とアイルランド人の父を持つ肌の白い娘レーナと、ニュースウィールズ州北西部の最低限度のセキュリティの刑務所で服役しているマリー族の少年ボーンの物語です。
back_translation: "Beneath the Clouds" is a story about Lena, a white-skinned girl with an Aboriginal mother and an Irish father, and Bone, a boy from the Mori tribe serving time in a low-security prison in northwestern New South Wales.

text: bright seems alternately amused and disgusted with this material , and he ca n't help throwing in a few of his own touches .
translation: ブライトはこの素材に対して交互に楽しんでいるようであり、嫌悪感を抱いているようでもあり、いくつかの自分のタッチを加えずにはいられません。
back_translation: Bright seems to be alternately enjoying and feeling a sense of distaste toward this material, and can't help but add some of his own touch.

text: when raj 's family move to england to get involved in an internet business , raj promises tina that he will keep in touch with her and that their friendship will always be forever .
translation: ラージの家族がインターネットビジネスに関与するためにイングランドに引っ越すとき、ラージはティナに連絡を取り続けると約束し、彼らの友情は永遠であると誓います。
back_translation: When Raji's family moves to England to get involved in the internet business, Raji promises to keep in touch with Tina and vows that their friendship will last forever.

text: when wei is promoted from the rank of nightclub parking valet to the rank of debt-collector in brother gu 's gang , he persuades his boss to hire jie to work alongside him .
translation: 魏がナイトクラブの駐車係から兄グのギャングの借金取りに昇進すると、彼は上司を説得してジェイを一緒に働くように雇う。
back_translation: When Wei is promoted from a nightclub parking attendant to a debt collector for Brother Gu's gang, he persuades his boss to hire Jay to work with him.

text: a perplexing example of promise unfulfilled , despite many charming moments .
translation: 多くの魅力的な瞬間にもかかわらず、約束が果たされなかった複雑な例。
back_translation: A complex example where a promise was not fulfilled despite many captivating moments.

text: a path that will lead to the day in and day out drudgery of a soul-less survival or a path that will lead them down the road in pursuit their dreams .
translation: 魂のない生存の毎日の苦労へと導く道か、夢を追い求める道へと導く道か。
back_translation: A path that leads to the daily struggles of a soulless existence, or a path that leads to pursuing one's dreams.

text: when he loses his power the bully becomes victim and blames everyone else for his demise .
translation: 彼が力を失うと、いじめっ子は被害者になり、自分の没落を他の誰かのせいにします。
back_translation: When he loses his power, the bully becomes the victim and blames his downfall on someone else.

text: chomsky places the terrorist attacks in the context of american foreign intervention throughout the postwar decades -- in vietnam , central america , the middle east , and elsewhere .
translation: チョムスキーは、テロ攻撃を戦後の数十年間にわたるアメリカの対外介入の文脈で位置付けています - ベトナム、中米、中東、その他の地域で。
back_translation: Chomsky places terrorism attacks in the context of American foreign interventions over several decades since the war - in Vietnam, Central America, the Middle East, and other regions.

text: all these games of chasing , rejecting and seducing are played out in an economically and spiritually depressed hong kong , without much gusto .
translation: これらの追いかけ、拒絶、誘惑のゲームは、経済的および精神的に落ち込んだ香港であまり盛り上がることなく展開されている。
back_translation: These games of pursuit, rejection, and temptation are unfolding in financially and mentally depressed Hong Kong without much excitement.

text: the ultimate forms of hell are about to be unleashed on earth once again .
translation: 究極の地獄の形態が再び地球に解き放たれようとしている。
back_translation: The ultimate form of hell is about to be unleashed on Earth once again.

text: a punch line without a premise , a joke built entirely from musty memories of half-dimensional characters .
translation: 前提のないパンチライン、半次元キャラクターの古びた記憶だけから構築されたジョーク。
back_translation: A punchline without a premise, a joke constructed solely from the faded memories of a half-dimensional character.

text: despite what anyone believes about the goal of its makers , the show . . . represents a spectacular piece of theater , and there 's no denying the talent of the creative forces behind it .
translation: 誰がその制作者の目的について何を信じていようとも、このショーは…素晴らしい演劇の一部を表しており、それを裏付けるクリエイティブな力の才能を否定することはできない。
back_translation: Regardless of what anyone believes about the creator's intentions, this show represents a wonderful piece of theater, and one cannot deny the creative talent that supports it.

text: dizzy harrison is an unpopular , high school geek going through a hellish senior year .
translation: ディジー・ハリソンは、不人気な高校のオタクで、地獄のような最後の年を過ごしている。
back_translation: Dizzy Harrison is an unpopular high school nerd, having a hellish final year.

text: according to wendigo , 'nature ' loves the members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves .
translation: ウィンディゴによれば、「自然」は上流階級の人々を彼ら自身が愛するほどにほぼ同じくらい愛している。
back_translation: According to Windigo, "nature" loves the upper class almost as much as they love themselves.

text: they all collide during the course of a typical no thrills weekend an urban fairy tale-romantic comedy , in which nola , an aspiring songwriter , leaves an abusive kansas home and journeys to new york to find her biological father .
translation: 彼らは典型的な刺激のない週末の間に全て衝突します。都市のフェアリーテール・ロマンティック・コメディで、ノーラという作曲家志望の女性が、虐待的なカンザスの家を離れ、生物学的な父親を見つけるためにニューヨークへ旅立つ物語です。
back_translation: They all collide during a typical unexciting weekend. It’s a city fairytale romantic comedy about a woman named Nora, an aspiring composer, who leaves her abusive home in Kansas to travel to New York in search of her biological father.

text: when she hears about her plan going awry , she collapses .
translation: 彼女は計画がうまくいかないと聞くと、倒れ込む。
back_translation: When she hears that the plan is not going well, she collapses.

text: a women from holland returns to indonesia , the country of her roots .
translation: オランダの女性が彼女のルーツであるインドネシアに帰る。
back_translation: A Dutch woman returns to Indonesia, her roots.

text: often hilarious , well-shot and , importantly , entertaining , hell house is a fascinating document of an event that has to be seen to be believed .
translation: しばしば面白く、よく撮影され、重要なことに、楽しい「ヘルハウス」は、信じるには見なければならない出来事の魅力的な記録です。
back_translation: Often amusing, well-shot, and importantly, fun, "Hell House" is a captivating record of an event that must be seen to be believed.

text: ziyad and maryam are a happy young couple in lebanon , yet after three years of marriage they remain childless .
translation: ズヤードとマリアムはレバノンの幸せな若いカップルですが、結婚して三年が経っても子供がいません。
back_translation: Zuyard and Mariam are a happy young couple from Lebanon, but even after three years of marriage, they do not have any children.

text: the name refers to the green mountains they felt they were being pushed into ( out of their new homes ) .
translation: その名前は、彼らが新しい家から押し出されるように感じていた緑の山々を指しています。
back_translation: The name refers to the green mountains that they felt were pushing them out of their new home.

text: paco ( debora falabella ) and tonho ( roberto bomtempo ) are illegal brazilian immigrants in new york .
translation: パコ（デボラ・ファラベラ）とトーニョ（ロベルト・ボンテンポ）は、ニューヨークにいる不法移民のブラジル人です。
back_translation: Paco (Deborah Falabella) and Tonho (Roberto BonTempo) are Brazilian undocumented immigrants in New York.

text: the police investigation that followed - led by detectives sam nico ( ted levine ) , louis cruz ( frankie g . ) and mike peters ( m . c .
translation: その後の警察の捜査 - サム・ニコ（テッド・レビン）、ルイ・クルーズ（フランキー・G）、マイク・ピーターズ（M.C.）による捜査。
back_translation: Subsequent police investigation - Investigation by Sam Nico (Ted Levin), Louis Cruz (Frankie G), and Mike Peters (M.C.).

text: because eight legged freaks is partly an homage to them , tarantula and other low- budget b-movie thrillers of the 1950s and '60s , the movie is a silly ( but not sophomoric ) romp through horror and hellish conditions .
translation: 「エイトレッグド・フリークス」は彼らへの一部オマージュであり、タランチュラや1950年代と60年代の他の低予算B級映画のスリラーを取り入れたもので、この映画は恐怖と地獄のような状況を通じたバカバカしい（しかし、幼稚ではない）遊びです。
back_translation: "Eight-Legged Freaks" is a part homage to them, incorporating tarantulas and other low-budget B-movie thrillers from the 1950s and 60s, and the film is a silly (but not childish) romp through fear and hellish situations.

text: williams has n't been this creepy since his starring role in popeye .
translation: ウィリアムズは、『ポパイ』での主演以来、こんなにも不気味ではなかった。
back_translation: Williams has never been this eerie since his starring role in "Popeye."

text: pryor lite , with half the demons , half the daring , much less talent , many fewer laughs .
translation: プライヤー・ライト、悪魔は半分、大胆さも半分、才能はずっと少なく、笑いもずっと少ない。
back_translation: Player Light, half devil, half boldness, with much less talent and much less laughter.

text: there are times when a rumor of angels plays like an extended episode of touched by an angel -- a little too much dancing , a few too many weeping scenes -- but i liked its heart and its spirit .
translation: 時には、天使の噂が「天使にタッチ」の延長エピソードのように感じられることがあります ― ダンスが少し多すぎたり、涙を流すシーンが少し多すぎたりしますが、私はその心と精神が好きでした。
back_translation: Sometimes, rumors of angels can feel like an extended episode of "Touching the Angel"—there might be a bit too much dancing or too many tearful scenes, but I liked the heart and spirit of it.

text: this `` hitchcockian `` thriller tells the story of a young new york investment banker ( hartnett ) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a cafe , believing her to be his long-lost love , following her home to her apartment , where he waits for her , going so far as to put his engagement on hold .
translation: この「ヒッチコック風」のスリラーは、若いニューヨークの投資銀行家（ハートネット）の物語です。彼はカフェで見かけた女性に夢中になり、彼女が失われた愛の人であると信じ込み、彼女のアパートまでついていき、彼女を待つために婚約を保留にするまでの行動をします。
back_translation: This "Hitchcock-style" thriller tells the story of a young New York investment banker (Hartnett) who becomes infatuated with a woman he sees in a café. He believes she is the lost love of his life, follows her to her apartment, and even puts his engagement on hold in order to wait for her.

text: unhappy father of a draining family he has no controls whatsoever over his life .
translation: draining family の不満を抱える父親は、自分の人生に対するコントロールがまったくありません。
back_translation: A father who has complaints about a draining family has no control over his life at all.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .
translation: 新しいインスomniaは、その冷たい前作を驚くほど忠実にリメイクしています。そして、自らの方向に進むことを選んだ時には、商業的感覚のために強いられたものではなく、それに適した変更を採用しています。
back_translation: The new Insomnia remarkably faithful to its cold predecessor. And when it chooses to follow its own direction, it adopts changes that suit it rather than those forced by commercial sensibilities.

text: if you saw it on tv , you 'd probably turn it off , convinced that you had already seen that movie .
translation: もしあなたがテレビでそれを見たら、すでにその映画を見たと確信して、たぶんそれを消すでしょう。
back_translation: If you saw it on TV, you would probably be convinced that you have already seen that movie and might just switch it off.

text: this mistaken-identity picture is so film-culture referential that the final product is a ghost .
translation: この誤認識の画像は映画文化を参照しすぎて、最終的な作品は幽霊のようになっています。
back_translation: This misrecognized image references movie culture too much, resulting in the final work resembling a ghost.

text: a thoroughly entertaining comedy that uses grant 's own twist of acidity to prevent itself from succumbing to its own bathos .
translation: グラント自身の酸味のひねりを使って、自らの感傷に屈しないようにしている、徹底的に面白いコメディ。
back_translation: A thoroughly funny comedy that uses Grant's own twist of acidity to avoid succumbing to his own sentimentality.

text: `` austin powers in goldmember `` has the right stuff for silly summer entertainment and has enough laughs to sustain interest to the end .
translation: 「オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバー」は、ばかげた夏のエンターテインメントにぴったりの作品で、最後まで興味を維持するのに十分な笑いがあります。
back_translation: "Austin Powers: Goldmember" is a perfect piece of ridiculous summer entertainment, with enough laughs to keep you engaged until the end.

text: the only hope is the veritas project , a highly trained investigative team working undercover to expose the truth .
translation: 唯一の希望は、真実を暴露するために秘密裏に活動する高訓練の調査チームであるヴェリタスプロジェクトです。
back_translation: The only hope is the Veritas Project, a highly trained investigative team that operates secretly to expose the truth.

text: the painter visually depicts the life of a lonely immigrant woman who seeks companionship with the window repairman .
translation: 画家は、孤独な移民女性の生活を視覚的に描き、窓の修理屋との交流を求めています。
back_translation: The painter visually depicts the life of a lonely immigrant woman and seeks interaction with the window repairman.

text: `` nicholas nickleby `` is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol `` out in the theaters this year . charlie hunnam has the twinkling eyes , repressed smile and determined face needed to carry out a dickensian hero .
translation: 「ニコラス・ニクルビー」は、今年の劇場に新しい「クリスマスキャロル」がないので、家族全員を連れて行くのに最適なファミリーフィルムです。チャーリー・ハナムは、ディケンズのヒーローを演じるために必要なきらきらした目、抑えられた笑み、そして決意に満ちた顔を持っています。
back_translation: "Nicholas Nickleby" is the perfect family film to take the whole family to this year since there is no new "A Christmas Carol" in theaters. Charlie Hunnam has the twinkling eyes, subdued smile, and determined face needed to play Dickens' hero.

text: tykwer 's surface flash is n't just a poor fit with kieslowski 's lyrical pessimism ; it completely contradicts everything kieslowski 's work aspired to , including the condition of art .
translation: ティクヴァの「サーフェス・フラッシュ」は、キェシロフスキの詩的な悲観主義とは単に合わないだけでなく、芸術の条件を含む、キェシロフスキの作品が目指したすべてに完全に矛盾しています。
back_translation: Tykwer's "Surface Flash" not only simply does not align with Kieslowski's poetic pessimism, but it also completely contradicts everything that Kieslowski's works aimed for, including the conditions of art.

text: it 's gruesome violence combined with tongue-in-cheek humor . . . fans of this genre will flock to fulltime killer , and they 'll be blown away .
translation: それは grisly（グロテスクな）暴力と皮肉混じりのユーモアの組み合わせです... このジャンルのファンは『フルタイム・キラー』に集まり、彼らは圧倒されるでしょう。
back_translation: It's a combination of grisly violence and ironic humor... Fans of this genre will be drawn to "Full Time Killer," and they will be overwhelmed.

text: george `` ice man `` chambers ( rhames ) is a top ranked heavyweight boxer .
translation: ジョージ「アイスマン」チェンバース（レイモンド）は、トップランクのヘビー級ボクサーです。
back_translation: George "Iceman" Chambers (Raymond) is a top-ranked heavyweight boxer.

text: time literally stops on a dime in the tries-so-hard-to-be-cool `` clockstoppers , `` but that does n't mean it still wo n't feel like the longest 90 minutes of your movie-going life .
translation: 時間はまさに「時計止め屋」でクールになろうとする中でピタッと止まりますが、それでも映画鑑賞人生の中で最も長い90分のように感じないわけではありません。
back_translation: Time certainly comes to a halt as one tries to become "cool" in the work of "The Clock Stopper," yet it doesn't feel entirely like the longest 90 minutes in a movie-watching life.

text: wonder of wonders -- a teen movie with a humanistic message .
translation: 驚くべきことに -- 人間的なメッセージを持つティーン映画。
back_translation: Surprisingly -- a teen movie that carries a human message.

text: . . . a somber film , almost completely unrelieved by any comedy beyond the wistful everyday ironies of the working poor .
translation: ... 哀愁に満ちた映画で、働く貧しい人々の日常的な皮肉を除けば、ほとんど全く笑いの要素がありません。
back_translation: It is a poignant film that, aside from the everyday irony of the working poor, contains almost no elements of humor at all.

text: based on a devilishly witty script by heather mcgowan and niels mueller , the film gets great laughs , but never at the expense of its characters
translation: ヘザー・マクガワンとニールス・ミューラーによる悪魔的に機知に富んだ脚本に基づき、この映画は素晴らしい笑いを提供しますが、そのキャラクターを犠牲にすることはありません。
back_translation: Based on the devilishly witty script by Heather McGowan and Niels Mueller, this film delivers great laughs without sacrificing its characters.

text: the problem , amazingly enough , is the screenplay .
translation: 驚くべきことに、問題は脚本です。
back_translation: Surprisingly, the problem lies with the script.

text: the entertaining new film version of robert ludlum 's 1980 spy thriller , the bourne identity , adds a crisp , tangy autumnal feel to the hot dog days of summer moviegoing .
translation: ロバート・ラドラムの1980年のスパイスリラー「ボーン・アイデンティティ」のエンターテイメントに富んだ新しい映画版は、夏の映画鑑賞の暑い日々に爽やかで辛口な秋の雰囲気を加えています。
back_translation: The entertaining new film adaptation of Robert Ludlum's 1980 spy thriller "The Bourne Identity" adds a refreshing and spicy autumn atmosphere to the hot days of summer movie-watching.

text: about the only thing to give the movie points for is bravado -- to take an entirely stale concept and push it through the audience 's meat grinder one more time .
translation: 映画にポイントを与える唯一のものは大胆さであり、全く新鮮味のないコンセプトを再び観客のミートグラインダーに押し込むことです。
back_translation: The only thing that gives points to a movie is boldness, and it is about pushing completely unoriginal concepts back into the audience's meat grinder.

text: the mothman prophecies , which is mostly a bore , seems to exist only for its climactic setpiece .
translation: モスマンの予言は、ほとんど退屈であり、クライマックスの見せ場だけのために存在するように思える。
back_translation: The prophecies of Mothman seem almost tedious, existing only for the sake of the climax's spectacle.

text: like brosnan 's performance , evelyn comes from the heart .
translation: ブロズナンの演技のように、エヴリンは心から来ています。
back_translation: Like Brosnan's acting, Evelyn comes from the heart.

text: the news of the assault causes a public outcry against the mutants , including renewed support for the mutant registration act , and william stryker , a military leader rumored to have experimented on mutants ( possibly including wolverine ) , is among the most vocal supporters of the legislation .
translation: 襲撃のニュースはミュータントに対する公の抗議を引き起こし、ミュータント登録法への再度の支持を含んでいます。また、ミュータントに対して実験を行ったという噂のある軍の指導者ウィリアム・ストライカーが、この法律の最も vocal な支持者の一人となっています（おそらくウルヴァリンも含む）。
