back_translation: The news of the attack has sparked public protests against mutants, including renewed support for the Mutant Registration Act. Additionally, military leader William Stryker, rumored to have conducted experiments on mutants, has become one of the most vocal supporters of this law (possibly including Wolverine as well).

text: . . . familiar and predictable , and 4/5ths of it might as well have come from a xerox machine rather than ( writer-director ) franc . reyes ' word processor .
translation: . . . 親しみやすく予測可能で、その4/5は（脚本・監督の）フラン・レイエスのワードプロセッサーからではなく、コピー機から出てきたかのようである。
back_translation: It is approachable and predictable, and it seems that 4/5 of it came not from the word processor of (screenwriter/director) Fran Reyes, but rather from a copy machine.

text: a story of love and enchantment set in the coldest of winters , it explores the issues , dilemmas and barriers facing the lucky and unlucky in love in the 21st century , based on the novel of the same name by pullitzer prize-winning author carol shields .
translation: 愛と魅力の物語は、最も寒い冬に設定されており、21世紀における恋愛において幸運な人々と不幸な人々が直面する問題、ジレンマ、障害を探求しています。この物語は、ピューリッツァー賞受賞作家キャロル・シールズの同名小説に基づいています。
back_translation: The story of love and charm is set in the coldest winter, exploring the problems, dilemmas, and obstacles faced by both fortunate and unfortunate people in love in the 21st century. This story is based on the novel of the same name by Pulitzer Prize-winning author Carol Shields.

text: merely as a technical , logistical feat , russian ark marks a cinematic milestone .
translation: 単なる技術的かつ物流的な偉業として、『ロシアの箱舟』は映画のマイルストーンを示しています。
back_translation: As a mere technical and logistical feat, "Russian Ark" signifies a milestone in cinema.

text: and to make matters worse , he 's been replaced by a man with a moustache !
translation: さらなる厄介なことに、彼はヒゲを生やした男に替わってしまった！
back_translation: To make matters worse, he turned into a man with a beard!

text: that rara avis : the intelligent romantic comedy with actual ideas on its mind .
translation: その珍しい鳥：実際のアイデアを持つ知的なロマンティックコメディ。
back_translation: That rare bird: An intellectual romantic comedy with actual ideas.

text: nick is about to discover , true love can be found in the strangest of places . . .
translation: ニックは、真実の愛が最も奇妙な場所に見つけられることを発見しようとしています……。
back_translation: Nick is trying to discover that true love can be found in the most unusual places...

text: they are under the impression that models have more beauty than brains and are not capable of much more than looking good .
translation: 彼らは、モデルが美しさが知性よりも上回っており、見た目が良い以上のことはできないという印象を持っています。
back_translation: They have the impression that models surpass intelligence in beauty and that they cannot do anything beyond looking good.

text: fourth generation war hero col . william mcnamara is imprisoned in a brutal german pow camp .
translation: 第四世代戦争の英雄、ウィリアム・マクナマラ大佐は、過酷なドイツの捕虜収容所に収監されています。
back_translation: Colonel William McNamara, a hero of the Fourth Generation War, is imprisoned in a harsh German POW camp.

text: evans is such a capable storyteller that you find yourself liking him even though he 's not exactly likeable .
translation: エバンスは非常に優れたストーリーテラーで、彼は必ずしも好かれるタイプではないにもかかわらず、つい彼を好きになってしまいます。
back_translation: Evans is an exceptionally great storyteller, and even though he is not necessarily the type to be liked by everyone, you can't help but end up liking him.

text: what we have here is n't a disaster , exactly , but a very handsomely produced let-down .
translation: ここにあるのは、正確には災害ではなく、非常に立派に制作された期待外れです。
back_translation: What is here is not exactly a disaster, but rather a very well-made disappointment.

text: when siti starts her `` siapa mr cinderella `` show , kumin is among the hundreds of fake mr cinderella that participates in the show to collect the reward .
translation: シティが「シパ マスター・シンデレラ」ショーを始めると、クミンは報酬を得るために参加する数百人の偽のマスター・シンデレラの中にいます。
back_translation: When the city begins the "Sipa Master Cinderella" show, Kumin is among the hundreds of fake Master Cinderellas participating to earn rewards.

text: a generation x artifact , capturing a brief era of insanity in the sports arena that surely can not last .
translation: 世代Xの遺物であり、スポーツの舞台における短い狂気の時代を捉えたもので、確かに長くは続かないだろう。
back_translation: It is a relic of Generation X, capturing a brief era of madness on the sports stage, and it certainly won't last long.

text: move over bond ; this girl deserves a sequel .
translation: バンドをどけて；この女の子には続編がふさわしい。
back_translation: Move the band; this girl deserves a sequel.

text: the pitch must have read like a discarded house beautiful spread .
translation: そのプレゼンテーションは、捨てられた「ハウス・ビューティフル」の特集のように思えたに違いない。
back_translation: The presentation likely felt like a discarded feature of "House Beautiful."

text: after leoncio 's death , robert feels terribly sorry for annie especially when he discovers that she is suffering from schizophrenia .
translation: レオンシオの死後、ロバートはアニーに対してひどく申し訳なく思い、特に彼女が統合失調症に苦しんでいることを知ったときはそう感じる。
back_translation: After Leoncio's death, Robert felt terribly sorry for Annie, especially when he learned that she was suffering from schizophrenia.

text: linked to her only by cell phone , the driver narrows in on her location in a desperate race against time and tide .
translation: 携帯電話で彼女とだけつながっている運転手は、時間と潮の差と戦いながら彼女の場所を絞り込んでいく。
back_translation: The driver, connected only to her via his mobile phone, narrows down her location while battling time and tide.

text: though this film can be clumsy , its ambitions are equally -- and admirably -- uncommercial .
translation: この映画は不器用な部分もあるが、その野心は同様に、そして賞賛すべきことに、商業的ではない。
back_translation: This movie has its awkward moments, but its ambition is similarly, and commendably, non-commercial.

text: serry perfectly captures the peculiar climate , creating uncanny echoes with today 's situation .
translation: セリーは独特の気候を完璧に捉え、今日の状況と不気味な響きを生み出しています。
back_translation: Ceri perfectly captures the unique climate, creating a sense of today's situation and an eerie resonance.

text: one of those based-on-truth stories that persuades you , with every scene , that it could never really have happened this way .
translation: 真実に基づいた物語の一つで、すべてのシーンがそれが本当にこうなるはずがないと説得します。
back_translation: One of the stories based on truth, where every scene convinces you that it really shouldn't be happening like this.

text: this examination of aquatic life off the shores of the baja california peninsula of mexico offers an engrossing way to demonstrate the virtues of the imax format .
translation: メキシコのバハカリフォルニア半島の海岸での水生生物の調査は、IMAXフォーマットの特性を示す魅力的な方法を提供します。
back_translation: The survey of aquatic organisms along the coast of the Baja California Peninsula in Mexico offers an engaging way to showcase the characteristics of the IMAX format.

text: stan lee discusses the origins of the industry ; neil gaiman and john byrne speak on superheroes as modern mythology ; frank miller and bill sienkewicz discuss the relationship of politics and comics ; peter david tells the story of the meanest thing he has ever done to a fan ; and much more .
translation: スタン・リーが業界の起源について語り、ニール・ゲイマンとジョン・バーンがスーパーヒーローを現代の神話として語り、フランク・ミラーとビル・シンケビッチが政治とコミックの関係について議論し、ピーター・デビッドがファンに対して行った最も意地悪なことの話を語り、さらに多くのことが展開されます。
back_translation: Stan Lee talks about the origins of the industry, Neil Gaiman and John Byrne discuss superheroes as modern mythology, Frank Miller and Bill Sienkiewicz debate the relationship between politics and comics, Peter David shares stories of the meanest things he did to fans, and much more unfolds.

text: it 's not so much a movie as a joint promotion for the national basketball association and teenaged rap and adolescent poster-boy lil ' bow wow .
translation: 映画というよりも、ナショナルバスケットボールアソシエーションとティーンエイジャーのラップ、そして青年のアイドルであるリル・バウワウの共同プロモーションのようなものです。
back_translation: It is more like a joint promotion between the National Basketball Association, teenage rap, and the youth idol Lil' Bow Wow than a movie.

text: but when the cockettes flew to new york city to appear off broadway^ & # 197 ; well , you 'll just have to see what happened when new yorkers took a look at them .
translation: しかし、コケットたちがオフ・ブロードウェイに出演するためにニューヨーク市に飛んだとき、ニューヨーカーたちが彼らを見た時に何が起こったのかは、あなた自身で見るしかありません。
back_translation: However, when the Coquettes flew to New York City to perform Off-Broadway, you'll have to see for yourself what happened when the New Yorkers saw them.

text: a very long movie , dull in stretches , with entirely too much focus on meal preparation and igloo construction .
translation: 非常に長い映画で、伸び伸びとした退屈な部分があり、食事の準備やイグルーの建設に過度に焦点を当てています。
back_translation: It is a very long movie with lengthy and boring parts that overly focus on meal preparation and igloo construction.

text: mark , fresh from college , returns to his boring hometown to work off his gambling debts .
translation: 大学を卒業したばかりのマークは、ギャンブルの借金を返すために退屈な故郷に戻る。
back_translation: Mark, who has just graduated from university, returns to his boring hometown to pay off his gambling debts.

text: macbeth . mcdonald 's . how far apart these poles of popular culture seemed until billy morrissette 's sly mcshakespeare crime comedy .
translation: マクベス。マクドナルド。ビリー・モリセットのひねりの効いたマクシェイクスピア犯罪コメディが出るまでは、ポピュラー文化のこの2つの極はどれほど離れているように見えたのでしょうか。
back_translation: Macbeth. McDonald's. How far apart did these two extremes of popular culture seem before the release of Billie Morissette's twisted MacShake-spear crime comedy?

text: this unique short film follows the night of a young british insomniac named jack , narrated almost hour by hour from a first hand perspective .
translation: このユニークな短編映画は、ジャックという名の若いイギリスの不眠症者の夜を、ほぼ時間ごとに第一人称の視点から語ります。
back_translation: This unique short film tells the story of a young British insomniac named Jack, narrating his night almost hour by hour from a first-person perspective.

text: when spain and portugal physically separate from the continent , the detached iberian peninsula aimlessly floats off to sea , becoming home to a group of god-like humans .
translation: スペインとポルトガルが大陸から物理的に分離すると、切り離されたイベリア半島は無目的に海へ漂流し、神のような人々の住処となる。
back_translation: When Spain and Portugal are physically separated from the continent, the detached Iberian Peninsula drifts aimlessly into the sea, becoming a dwelling for god-like people.

text: beautiful , sophisticated women are all over oscar grubman .
translation: 美しく洗練された女性たちがオスカー・グラブマンの周りにいます。
back_translation: Beautifully refined women surround Oscar Grabman.

text: goldmember has none of the visual wit of the previous pictures , and it looks as though jay roach directed the film from the back of a taxicab .
translation: ゴールドメンバーは前作の視覚的な機知がまったくなく、ジェイ・ローチがタクシーの後部座席から映画を監督しているように見える。
back_translation: Goldmember lacks any of the visual wit of its predecessor, appearing as if Jay Roach is directing the film from the back seat of a taxi.

text: 3 beautiful agents try to find the treasure , but they must fight the evil datuk azmi , an old enemy of madame x . it has been four years since the alien-seeking agents averted an intergalactic disaster of epic proportions .
translation: 3人の美しいエージェントが宝を探そうとしますが、彼女たちはマダムXの古い敵である邪悪なダトゥク・アズミと戦わなければなりません。エイリアンを探すエージェントたちが大規模な宇宙災害を防いでから、すでに4年が経過しました。
back_translation: Three beautiful agents attempt to search for treasure, but they must fight against the evil Datuk Azumi, an old enemy of Madam X. It has already been four years since the agents searched for aliens and prevented a massive space disaster.

text: if you 're as happy listening to movies as you are watching them , and the slow parade of human frailty fascinates you , then you 're at the right film .
translation: もし映画を見るのと同じくらい映画を聴くことに幸せを感じ、自分の弱さのゆっくりとした行進に魅了されるのなら、あなたは正しい映画にいます。
back_translation: If you find happiness in listening to movies just as much as watching them, and you are captivated by the slow march of your own weaknesses, then you are in the right movie.

text: he tries , with his family 's support , to find a job and live a normal life .
translation: 彼は家族の支援を受けて、仕事を見つけて普通の生活を送ろうとしています。
back_translation: He is receiving support from his family and is trying to find a job and lead a normal life.

text: `` on guard ! `` wo n't be placed in the pantheon of the best of the swashbucklers but it is a whole lot of fun and you get to see the one of the world 's best actors , daniel auteuil , have a whale of a good time .
translation: 「オン・ガード！」は、傑作の剣士映画の中には入らないかもしれませんが、非常に楽しい作品で、世界最高の俳優の一人であるダニエル・オートゥイユが素晴らしい時間を過ごす姿を見ることができます。
back_translation: "On Guard!" may not be included among the masterpieces of swordsman films, but it is a very enjoyable work, and you can see one of the world's best actors, Daniel Auteuil, having a wonderful time.

text: against their better judgment , dara and noble agree to deliver the body to duluth and hope that will be the end of it .
translation: ダラとノーブルは、自分たちの判断に反して、遺体をデュルースに届けることで合意し、それが全ての終わりになることを願っています。
back_translation: Darla and Noble agreed to deliver the body to Duluth against their better judgment, hoping that it would bring everything to an end.

text: while introducing his film mockery , he receives a phone call from his producer lying in intensive care at a hospital .
translation: 彼は映画『モッカリー』を紹介している最中、病院で集中治療を受けているプロデューサーから電話を受けます。
back_translation: While introducing the film "Mokkari," he receives a call from a producer who is receiving intensive care in the hospital.

text: combine the paranoid claustrophobia of a submarine movie with the unsettling spookiness of the supernatural -- why did n't hollywood think of this sooner ?
translation: 潜水艦映画のパラノイア的な閉所恐怖症と超自然的な不気味さを組み合わせる -- なぜハリウッドはこれをもっと早く思いつかなかったのか？
back_translation: Combining the paranoid claustrophobia of submarine movies with supernatural eeriness – why didn't Hollywood think of this sooner?

text: all of her hard work pays off when she is accepted to a prominent dance program in new york .
translation: 彼女のすべての努力が報われ、ニューヨークの著名なダンスプログラムに受け入れられる。
back_translation: All her efforts are rewarded, and she is accepted into a prestigious dance program in New York.

text: unfortunately this film will not satisfy if you are looking to discover the missing link , but if you are simply interested in humor and some 'interesting ' footage , to say the least , you will not be disappointed .
translation: 残念ながら、この映画は失われたリンクを発見したい人には満足できるものではありませんが、もし単にユーモアや「興味深い」と言える映像に興味があるのなら、失望することはないでしょう。
back_translation: Unfortunately, this movie may not satisfy those who want to discover lost links, but if you are simply interested in humor or visuals that can be described as "interesting," you will not be disappointed.

text: there 's no mistaking the fact that this hybrid misses the impact of the disney classic , and even that of the excellent 1934 mgm version .
translation: このハイブリッドがディズニーのクラシックや、優れた1934年のMGM版のインパクトを欠いているということは間違いありません。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this hybrid lacks the impact of Disney classics or the excellent 1934 MGM version.

text: shae powell , a successful single mom , wakes up rattled from a horrible dream .
translation: 成功したシングルマザーのシャエ・パウエルは、ひどい夢から目を覚まし、動揺している。
back_translation: Successful single mother Shae Powell wakes up from a terrible dream, feeling shaken.

text: a movie version of a paint-by-numbers picture . we can tell what it is supposed to be , but ca n't really call it a work of art .
translation: 番号で塗り絵の映画版です。何であるべきかはわかりますが、真の芸術作品とは呼べません。
back_translation: It's a movie version of a coloring book. I know what it should be, but I can't call it a true work of art.

text: `` the mothman prophecies `` is a difficult film to shake from your conscience when night falls .
translation: 「モスマン・プロフェシーズ」は、夜が訪れるとあなたの意識から拭い去るのが難しい映画です。
back_translation: "The Mothman Prophecies" is a film that is difficult to erase from your consciousness once night falls.

text: now a new terminaor whos has power over all machines , has been sent back to kill him , the terminatrix or t-x ( kristanna loken ) who does n't require weapons as she has a laser cannon on her hand and is capable of turning herself into machinery .
translation: 今、新しいターミネーターがすべての機械を支配する力を持って送られ、彼を殺すために送り込まれた。そのターミネーターはターミネトリックス（T-X）で、クリスタンナ・ロケンが演じており、武器を必要とせず、手にレーザーキャノンを装備していて、自身を機械に変える能力を持っている。
back_translation: Now, a new Terminator has been sent with the power to control all machines and is dispatched to kill him. This Terminator is the T-X, played by Kristanna Loken, who does not need weapons, is equipped with a laser cannon in her hand, and has the ability to transform herself into machinery.

text: the fact that he owns the gun of a popular man , who got killed , from that town makes him prime suspect .
translation: 彼がその町の人気のある男の銃を所有しているという事実は、彼を主要な容疑者にしています。
back_translation: The fact that he owns the popular man's gun in that town makes him the main suspect.

text: [ a ] smarter and much funnier version of the old police academy flicks .
translation: 旧ポリスアカデミー映画の賢くて、はるかに面白いバージョン。
back_translation: A clever and much funnier version of the old Police Academy movies.

text: it 's unnerving , stimulating , likely to provoke anger and sorrow on both political sides -- and , above all , it 's extremely funny .
translation: それは不安を感じさせ、刺激的であり、両方の政治的立場から怒りや悲しみを引き起こす可能性が高いですが、何よりも非常に面白いです。
back_translation: It evokes anxiety, is exciting, and is likely to provoke anger and sadness from both political perspectives, but above all, it is very interesting.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard ( which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog ) is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: ハーバードを盗むという作品について言える最も良いことは（「フレディが犬に襲われる」と呼ばれることもあったかもしれません）トム・グリーンの「フレディが指される」ほど不快ではないということです。
back_translation: The best thing that can be said about the work "Stealing Harvard" (which might have also been referred to as "Freddy Gets Attacked by a Dog") is that it is not as unpleasant as Tom Green's "Freddy Got Fingered."

text: but her marriage is loveless and she suffers from the loss of her baby in childbirth .
translation: しかし、彼女の結婚は愛のないもので、出産で赤ちゃんを失ったことに苦しんでいます。
back_translation: However, her marriage is one without love, and she is suffering from the loss of her baby during childbirth.

text: viewers of `` the ring `` are more likely to remember the haunting images than the plot holes .
translation: 「ザ・リング」の視聴者は、ストーリーの穴よりも不気味な映像を覚えている可能性が高い。
back_translation: Viewers of "The Ring" are more likely to remember the eerie visuals than the plot holes.

text: sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of their lives .
translation: スリープウォーキングは、人生のとても異なる3つの段階にいる3人の友人の物語を語っています。
back_translation: Sleepwalking tells the story of three friends who are in very different stages of life.

text: he soon escapes and runs into a woman who has recently had a car accident and is suffering with amnesia .
translation: 彼はすぐに逃げ出し、最近自動車事故に遭った女性と出会います。彼女は記憶喪失に苦しんでいます。
back_translation: He quickly runs away and meets a woman who was recently involved in a car accident. She is suffering from amnesia.

text: while some of the subplots are very sketchy and the motivations of some of the characters are not clear , it is a journey worth taking because of the wondrous imagery .
translation: 一部のサブプロットは非常にあいまいで、一部のキャラクターの動機が明確でないものの、素晴らしい映像のために、価値のある旅です。
back_translation: Some of the subplots are quite vague, and the motivations of some characters are not clear, but it is a worthwhile journey for the stunning visuals.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: ドキュメンタリーがそのテーマに完全に魅了されながらも、ほとんど理解していないということはあり得ますか？
back_translation: Is it possible to be completely fascinated by the theme of a documentary while hardly understanding it?

text: her cathexis was rapid and she formed an intense attachment to her young doctor , who seems to have reciprocated .
translation: 彼女のカテクシスは急速で、彼女は若い医者に強い愛着を形成し、医者もそれに応えているようです。
back_translation: Her cathexis is rapid, and she is forming a strong attachment to the young doctor, who seems to be reciprocating.

text: along the way , ash continues to mature into the unstoppable pok & # 233 ; mon trainer he will become in the future .
translation: その過程で、アッシュは将来なる止まらないポケモントレーナーへと成長し続けます。
back_translation: In that process, Ash continues to grow into an unstoppable Pokémon Trainer in the future.

text: a muckraking job , the cinematic equivalent of a legal indictment , and a fairly effective one at that .
translation: リークした情報を追求する仕事であり、法的起訴の映画的な同等物であり、かなり効果的なものである。
back_translation: It is a job to pursue leaked information, akin to a cinematic equivalent of legal prosecution, and it is quite effective.

text: this is standard crime drama fare . . . instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .
translation: これは標準的な犯罪ドラマの内容です . . . 一瞬で忘れられ、徹底的に退屈です。
back_translation: This is the content of a standard crime drama... instantly forgettable and thoroughly boring.

text: first time director sam jones documents the making of wilco 's fourth studio album , yankee hotel foxtrot .
translation: 初監督のサム・ジョーンズは、ウィルコの4枚目のスタジオアルバム『ヤンキー・ホテル・フォックストロット』の制作を記録しました。
back_translation: First-time director Sam Jones documented the making of Wilco's fourth studio album, "Yankee Hotel Foxtrot."

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: 我々は耽美さが喜劇とぶつかり合い、思慮深い対話がワンライナーに押しのけられ、さらには特に理由もなく、ただ見た目が neat だからという理由でロトスコープアニメーションを取り入れたビジュアルスタイルを持っています。
back_translation: We have a visual style where aesthetics collide with comedy, thoughtful dialogues are pushed aside for one-liners, and we incorporate rotoscope animation simply because it looks neat, without any particular reason.

text: his mother persuades a renowned entomologist to take them on a trip to the jungle to search for the butterfly , leading to an adventure that will transform their lives .
translation: 彼の母親は著名な昆虫学者を説得して、バタフライを探しにジャングルへの旅行に連れて行ってもらいます。これにより、彼らの人生を変える冒険が始まります。
back_translation: His mother convinces a renowned entomologist to take him on a trip to the jungle to search for butterflies. This marks the beginning of an adventure that will change their lives.

text: a martial artist , afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him , goes on a suicide mission to find true love anyway .
translation: 美しい女性に殺されたいという病気に悩む武道家が、それでも真実の愛を見つけるために自殺行為に出る。
back_translation: A martial artist suffering from a disease that makes him want to be killed by a beautiful woman resorts to self-destructive behavior in order to find true love.

text: terry and dean are lifelong friends who have grown-up together : shotgunning their first beers , forming their first garage band , and growing the great canadian mullet known as `` hockey hair `` .
translation: テリーとディーンは一生の友人で、共に育ってきました：初めてビールを飲み干し、最初のガレージバンドを結成し、「ホッケーヘア」として知られる素晴らしいカナダのマレットを育て上げました。
back_translation: Terry and Dean are lifelong friends who grew up together: they drank their first beer, formed their first garage band, and grew an amazing Canadian mullet known as "hockey hair."

text: the low-key direction is pleasingly emphatic in this properly intense , claustrophobic tale of obsessive love .
translation: この適切に強烈で密閉された強迫的な愛の物語では、控えめな方向性が心地よく強調されています。
back_translation: In this appropriately intense and tightly sealed story of compulsive love, the understated direction is pleasantly emphasized.

text: everyone thinks that it 's him that has opened the chamber of secrets because that is what slytherin was famous for .
translation: みんなは、スリザリンが有名だったことから、彼が秘法の間を開けたのだと思っています。
back_translation: Everyone thinks that he opened the Chamber of Secrets because Slytherin was famous.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: ワールドトラベラーにおいて、そして彼の以前の映画において、フロインドリヒは父親に対して深刻でありながら曖昧な不満を抱えているようで、それを執拗に回り続け、接触を持つことはない。
back_translation: In World Traveler, as well as in his previous films, Freundlich seems to harbor a serious yet vague dissatisfaction towards his father, persistently circling around it without ever making contact.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: その明るい外見が信じさせるよりも、はるかに多次元で複雑です。
back_translation: Its bright appearance is far more multidimensional and complex than it makes one believe.

text: it 's push-the-limits teen comedy , the type written by people who ca n't come up with legitimate funny , and it 's used so extensively that good bits are hopelessly overshadowed .
translation: 限界を押し広げるティーンクOMedyで、正当な面白さを思いつけない人たちによって書かれたタイプです。そして、それは非常に広範囲に使用されているため、良い部分が絶望的に影に隠れてしまっています。
back_translation: It is a type of teen comedy that pushes the limits, written by those who can't come up with genuine humor. And because it is so widely used, the good parts are desperately overshadowed.

text: writer-director steven soderbergh follows up ocean 's 11 with the low-budget 'full frontal ' , his first digitally shot film .
translation: 作家・監督のスティーブン・ソダーバーグは、『オーシャンズ11』に続いて、彼の初のデジタル撮影作品である低予算映画『フル・フロンタル』を制作しました。
back_translation: Writer and director Steven Soderbergh produced the low-budget film "Full Frontal," his first work shot digitally, following "Ocean's 11."

text: the movie features veteran horror heroines leslie culton and jenny wallace , and actors john saenz and jonathan tabor .
translation: この映画にはベテランホラーヒロインのレスリー・カルツォンとジェニー・ウォレス、そして俳優のジョン・サエンズとジョナサン・テイバーが出演しています。
back_translation: This movie features veteran horror heroines Leslie Calzone and Jenny Wallace, as well as actors John Sayens and Jonathan Tabor.

text: here the love scenes all end in someone screaming . maybe there 's a metaphor here , but figuring it out would n't make trouble every day any better .
translation: ここでは愛のシーンはすべて誰かが叫ぶことで終わります。もしかしたらここには比喩があるのかもしれませんが、それを理解しても毎日が悪化することはありません。
back_translation: Here, every scene of love ends with someone shouting. Perhaps there is a metaphor here, but understanding it does not make every day any better.

text: an entertaining and topical adventure drama which responds to our society 's fascination with doomsday cults , survivalist sects and their messianic leaders .
translation: 現代社会の終末カルト、サバイバリスト教団、そして彼らのメシア的指導者たちへの魅力に応じた、娯楽性のある時事的な冒険ドラマ。
back_translation: A captivating contemporary adventure drama reflecting the allure of end-of-the-world cults, survivalist sects, and their messianic leaders in modern society.

text: [ t ] he film is never sure to make a clear point M-^V even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .
translation: この映画は、あいまいな表現に頼ろうとしても、明確なポイントを示すことに決して自信を持っていない。
back_translation: This movie tries to rely on ambiguous expressions, but it is never confident in clearly indicating its points.

text: on the road to lake tahoe , a stressed out young executive meets a woman who forever changes his life .
translation: 湖タホへの道で、ストレスを抱えた若いエグゼクティブが、彼の人生を永遠に変える女性と出会う。
back_translation: On the road to Lake Tahoe, a stressed young executive meets a woman who will change his life forever.

text: the primitive force of this film seems to bubble up from the vast collective memory of the combatants . it 's like watching a nightmare made flesh .
translation: この映画の原始的な力は、戦闘者たちの広大な collective memory から湧き上がってくるようだ。まるで肉体化した悪夢を見ているかのようだ。
back_translation: The primitive power of this movie seems to arise from the vast collective memory of the warriors. It feels as if one is experiencing a corporeal nightmare.

text: the dialogue is very choppy and monosyllabic despite the fact that it is being dubbed .
translation: 対話は非常にぎこちなく、一言二言の単調なものであり、吹き替えされているにもかかわらずそうなっています。
back_translation: The dialogue is very awkward, consisting of monotonous exchanges of only a word or two, and it feels that way even though it has been dubbed.

text: who needs mind-bending drugs when they can see this , the final part of the 'qatsi ' trilogy , directed by godfrey reggio , with music by philip glass ?
translation: 誰がこの神秘を解き明かす薬を必要とするのでしょうか、ゴッドフリー・レッジオ監督による「カッツィ」三部作の最後の部分で、フィリップ・グラスの音楽が付いています。
back_translation: Who needs the medicine to unravel this mystery, in the final part of the "Koyaanisqatsi" trilogy directed by Godfrey Reggio, accompanied by music by Philip Glass?

text: but ralph 's got a special talent - an ability to impersonate any hollywood celebrity - the perfect disguise to hide his stutter . . .
translation: しかし、ラルフには特別な才能がある - どんなハリウッドのセレブにも扮する能力 - それは彼の吃音を隠すための完璧な変装だ...
back_translation: However, Ralph has a special talent - the ability to impersonate any Hollywood celebrity - which serves as the perfect disguise to hide his stutter...

text: in gleefully , thumpingly hyperbolic terms , it covers just about every cliche in the compendium about crass , jaded movie types and the phony baloney movie biz .
translation: 喜びに満ち、ドスンドスンとした誇張表現で、陳腐な映画のタイプや偽物の映画ビジネスに関するコンペンディウムのほぼすべてのクリシェを扱っています。
back_translation: Filled with joy and exaggeratedly boisterous, it deals with nearly all the clichés of trite movie types and the fake film business in a compendium.

text: how has the `` excitement `` of the 70 's turned into the `` blandness `` of today ?
translation: 70年代の「興奮」はどのように今日の「平凡さ」に変わったのか？
back_translation: How did the "excitement" of the 1970s transform into today's "ordinariness"?

text: the action of the story derives from the collision of these two competing worlds .
translation: 物語の行動は、これら二つの競合する世界の衝突から生じます。
back_translation: The actions of the story arise from the conflict between these two competing worlds.

text: what could and should have been biting and droll is instead a tepid waste of time and talent .
translation: 本来は biting（辛辣）で droll（ユーモラス）であるべきものが、代わりにぬるくて時間と才能の無駄になっています。
back_translation: What should originally be biting and droll has instead become lukewarm and a waste of time and talent.

text: but , sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: しかし、時には私たちが子供たちに教えることが、教えないことと同じくらい致命的であることもあります。
back_translation: However, sometimes what we teach our children can be just as detrimental as what we do not teach them.

text: writer-director debrauwer does manage to wrap things up in an * * * -pleasing 78 minutes . it 's is n't much , but it 's a lot more than callous callie khouri did with that `` ya-ya `` mess . also , there are no irritating hats .
translation: 脚本・監督のデブラウワーは、* * * に満足できる78分で物事をまとめることに成功しています。それは多くはありませんが、「ヤヤ」の混乱に対して冷酷なカリ・クーリがしたことよりはずっと多いです。また、イライラさせる帽子もありません。
back_translation: Screenwriter and director Debra Hower has succeeded in wrapping things up in a satisfying 78 minutes. It's not a lot, but it’s certainly more than what the ruthless Kali Kuri did against the confusion of “Yaya.” Plus, there are no frustrating hats.

text: to say analyze that is de niro 's best film since meet the parents sums up the sad state of his recent career .
translation: 「分析するに、これはデ・ニーロの『ミート・ザ・ペアレンツ』以来の最高の映画だということは、彼の最近のキャリアの悲しい状態を示している。」
back_translation: "Upon analysis, this shows that this is the best movie since De Niro's 'Meet the Parents,' which reflects the sad state of his recent career."

text: and the detective is n't convinced that this will be the last . . .
translation: そして、探偵はこれが最後になるとは思っていない。
back_translation: And the detective does not think this will be the last.

text: it suggests the wide-ranging effects of media manipulation , from the kind of reporting that is done by the supposedly liberal media . . . to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartache of maverick individuals like hatfield and hicks .
translation: それは、いわゆるリベラルメディアによる報道の種類から、ハットフィールドやヒックスのような型破りな個人の親密で最終的に悲劇的な心痛まで、メディア操作の広範な影響を示唆しています。
back_translation: It suggests the broad influence of media manipulation, ranging from the types of reports by so-called liberal media to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartaches of unconventional individuals like Hatfield and Hicks.

text: based on an attraction at disneyland , the country bear jamboree , `` the country bears `` ( 2002 ) is one in a long line of live action disney family films .
translation: ディズニーランドのアトラクション「カントリーベアジャムボリー」に基づく「カントリーベアーズ」（2002年）は、ディズニーの実写ファミリーフィルムの長いラインの一つです。
back_translation: "The Country Bears" (2002), based on the Disneyland attraction "Country Bear Jamboree," is one of the long line of Disney live-action family films.

text: on her deathbed , candice klein accidentally asks the question , `` what did i ever do to deserve this ? ``
translation: 彼女の死の床で、キャンディス・クラインは思わず「私は何をしてこんな目に遭うのだろう？」と尋ねました。
back_translation: On her deathbed, Candice Klein inadvertently asked, "What have I done to deserve this?"

text: chao was chen kaige 's assistant for years in china . he has not learnt that storytelling is what the movies are about .
translation: チャオは中国で陳凱歌の助手を何年も務めていましたが、彼は物語を語ることが映画の本質であることを学んでいません。
back_translation: Chao served as an assistant to Chen Kaige in China for many years, but he has not learned that storytelling is the essence of filmmaking.

text: stephen rea , aidan quinn , and alan bates play desmond 's legal eagles , and when joined by brosnan , the sight of this grandiloquent quartet lolling in pretty irish settings is a pleasant enough thing , 't is .
translation: スティーブン・リア、エイダン・クイン、アラン・ベイツがデズモンドの法律の鷲たちを演じ、そこにブロスナンが加わると、この気取った四重奏が美しいアイルランドの風景でくつろいでいる光景は、なかなか心地よいものです。
back_translation: Seeing Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn, and Alan Bates playing the legal eagles of Desmond, with Brosnan joining them, is quite a pleasant sight as this pretentious quartet relaxes in the beautiful Irish landscape.

text: watching queen of the damned is like reading a research paper , with special effects tossed in .
translation: 「ダムド・クイーン」を見るのは、特別効果が盛り込まれた研究論文を読むようなものです。
back_translation: Watching "Damned Queen" is like reading a research paper filled with special effects.

text: shaun brumder is a local surfer kid from orange county who dreams of going to stanford to become a writer and to get away from his disfunctional family household .
translation: ショーン・ブルムダーはオレンジ郡出身の地元のサーフィン少年で、スタンフォード大学に行って作家になることを夢見ており、機能不全の家族から離れたいと考えています。
back_translation: Sean Blumdar is a local surfing boy from Orange County who dreams of going to Stanford University and becoming a writer, and he wants to escape from his dysfunctional family.

text: new best friend should n't have gone straight to video ; it should have gone straight to a mystery science theater 3000 video .
translation: 新しい親友は直接ビデオに行くべきではなかった；ミステリーサイエンスシアター3000のビデオに直接行くべきだった。
back_translation: My new best friend shouldn't have gone straight to the video; they should have gone straight to the Mystery Science Theater 3000 video.

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent . . . could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: エニグマの謎は、豊かな歴史的テーマがこれほどの一流の才能と組み合わさっていながら、なぜこんなに平坦で鈍重な作品になったのかということです。
back_translation: The mystery of Enigma is why, despite its rich historical themes being combined with such top-notch talent, it turned out to be such a flat and dull work.

text: craig is an older , average-looking man who is n't handling aging well .
translation: クレイグは年を取った、普通の見た目の男性で、老化にうまく対処できていません。
back_translation: Craig is an aging, ordinary-looking man who is struggling to cope with aging.

text: in this cinematic concert , mesmerizing images are plucked from everyday reality , then visually altered with state-of-the-art digital techniques .
translation: このシネマティックコンサートでは、魅惑的な映像が日常の現実から引き出され、最先端のデジタル技術で視覚的に変化させられます。
back_translation: In this cinematic concert, captivating visuals are drawn from everyday reality and transformed visually using cutting-edge digital technology.

text: his destiny lies in the shadows of a black rose - the symbol of decayed innocence .
translation: 彼の運命は、腐敗した無邪気さの象徴である黒いバラの影の中にあります。
back_translation: His fate lies within the shadow of the black rose, a symbol of corrupt innocence.

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .
translation: 奇妙にも、荒々しいより穏やかな王国のように感じられます。
back_translation: Strangely, it feels like a calmer kingdom rather than a wild one.

text: gambling and throwing a basketball game for money is n't a new plot -- in fact toback himself used it in black and white . but toback 's deranged immediacy makes it seem fresh again .
translation: ギャンブルと金のためにバスケットボールの試合を投げるというストーリーは新しいものではありません。実際、トバック自身が白黒の作品で用いました。しかし、トバックの狂気じみた即時性がそれを再び新鮮に感じさせます。
back_translation: The story of throwing a basketball game for gambling and money is not a new one. In fact, Toback himself used it in his black-and-white work. However, Toback's maniacal immediacy makes it feel fresh again.

text: smith examines the intimate , unguarded moments of folks who live in unusual homes -- which pop up in nearly every corner of the country .
translation: スミスは、国内のほぼすべての地域に現れる異常な家に住む人々の親密で無防備な瞬間を考察しています。
back_translation: Smith explores the intimate and vulnerable moments of people living in unusual houses that appear in almost every region of the country.

text: two college grads land an entry level mafia job driving a retiring don 's car cross country .
translation: 大学を卒業した二人が、引退するドンの車を国を横断して運転するエントリーレベルのマフィアの仕事を得る。
back_translation: Two graduates land an entry-level mafia job driving the retiring don's car across the country.

text: screenwriter maureen tilyou , director martin duffy and an extremely competent cast handle the controversial aspects of the topic in an even-handed manner .
translation: 脚本家モーリーン・ティリュー、監督マーティン・ダフィ、および非常に有能なキャストは、このテーマの論争のある側面を公平に扱っています。
back_translation: Screenwriter Maureen Tilieu, director Martin Duffy, and an exceptionally talented cast handle the controversial aspects of this theme fairly.

text: katie 's father 's injury comes back to haunt him and he finds himself paralyzed from the neck down .
translation: ケイティの父の怪我が再び彼を悩ませ、彼は首から下が麻痺してしまう。
back_translation: Katie's father's injury has troubled him again, and he has become paralyzed from the neck down.

text: he is imprisoned , awaiting the death sentence for his crimes .
translation: 彼は犯罪のために死刑を待ちながら、投獄されています。
back_translation: He is imprisoned while awaiting the death penalty for his crimes.

text: now the chinese man shows up wanting the gems .
translation: 今、中国人が宝石を求めて現れました。
back_translation: Now, Chinese people have appeared seeking gemstones.

text: the whole mess boils down to a transparently hypocritical work that feels as though it 's trying to set the women 's liberation movement back 20 years .
translation: 全体の混乱は、まるで女性解放運動を20年後退させようとしているかのような、明らかに偽善的な作品に集約されます。
back_translation: The overall chaos seems to be encapsulated in a clearly hypocritical work that appears to be trying to set back the women's liberation movement by 20 years.

text: after selling the shop to a local loan shark , calvin slowly begins to see his father 's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out .
translation: 地元の高利貸しに店を売却した後、カルビンは徐々に父のビジョンと遺産を理解し始め、自分がそれを売り渡してしまったという考えに苦しむ。
back_translation: After selling the store to a local loan shark, Calvin gradually begins to understand his father's vision and legacy, struggling with the idea that he has sold it away.

text: simultaneously devastating and hilarious , the film manages to capture the daily rituals and mundanities of life in such engrossing proximity that everything becomes drama .
translation: 同時に破壊的でありながら面白く、映画は日常の儀式や平凡さを非常に魅力的な近さで捉え、すべてがドラマになる。
back_translation: At the same time destructive yet interesting, the film captures the everyday rituals and ordinariness with an incredibly appealing proximity, where everything becomes drama.

text: adam sandler 's heart may be in the right place , but he needs to pull his head out of his butt
translation: アダム・サンドラーの心は正しい場所にあるかもしれないが、彼は自分の頭を引き抜く必要がある。
back_translation: Adam Sandler's heart may be in the right place, but he needs to get his head out of his own way.

text: that the e-graveyard holds as many good ideas as bad is the cold comfort that chin 's film serves up with style and empathy .
translation: 電子墓場が多くの良いアイデアを持っていると同時に悪いアイデアも持っているというのは、チンの映画がスタイルと共感を持って提供する冷静な慰めです。
back_translation: The idea that the digital graveyard contains many good ideas as well as bad ones is a calm comfort that Chin's films provide with style and empathy.

text: when virginia visits her aunt millie at christmas , she discovers a stack of handwritten letters over half a century old , and unlocks the story of her aunt 's youthful days as a young woman living in hamilton , mississippi , during the second world war .
translation: バージニアがクリスマスに叔母のミリーを訪れると、彼女は50年以上前の手書きの手紙の束を見つけ、第二次世界大戦中にミシシッピ州ハミルトンで若い女性として過ごした叔母の若き日の物語を解き明かします。
back_translation: When Virginia visits her Aunt Millie for Christmas, she discovers a bundle of handwritten letters from over 50 years ago, unraveling the story of her aunt's youth as a young woman in Hamilton, Mississippi during World War II.

text: ultimately engages less for its story of actorly existential despair than for its boundary-hopping formal innovations and glimpse into another kind of chinese 'cultural revolution . '
translation: 結局、俳優の実存的絶望の物語よりも、境界を越えた形式上の革新ともう一つの種類の中国の「文化革命」が垣間見えることにより、あまり関与しない。
back_translation: In the end, it is less involved than the story of the actor's existential despair, instead revealing a glimpses of formal innovation that transcends boundaries and another kind of Chinese "cultural revolution."

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .
translation: 数人の非信者は、この信条に対するキャラクターたちの喜びを見て自分の態度を再考するかもしれませんが、懐疑的な人々は劇場に足を運ぶことはないでしょう。
back_translation: Some non-believers may reconsider their attitudes after seeing the characters' joy in this creed, but skeptical individuals are unlikely to attend the theater.

text: and although billy does n't want jackson , two other guys do : derek , a clean-cut record store customer , and sam , the straight record store owner .
translation: ビリーがジャクソンを欲しがっていないのに、二人の他の男たちが彼を欲しがっています：デレクという整った印象のレコード店の客と、サムという真面目なレコード店のオーナーです。
back_translation: Billy doesn't want Jackson, but the two other men do: Derek, a good-looking customer at the record store, and Sam, the serious owner of the record store.

text: i walked away not really know who `` they `` were , what `` they `` looked like . why `` they `` were here and what `` they `` wanted and quite honestly , i did n't care .
translation: 私は彼らが誰なのか、彼らがどんな姿をしているのか、なぜ彼らがここにいて、彼らが何を望んでいるのか、よく分からないまま立ち去りました。正直言って、私は気にもしませんでした。
back_translation: I left without really knowing who they were, what they looked like, why they were here, or what they wanted. To be honest, I didn't care.

text: with the machine they travel across the country ( uruguay ) traing to escape to brazil .
translation: 機械で彼らは国を横断して（ウルグアイ）ブラジルに逃げるために旅をしています。
back_translation: They are traveling across the country (Uruguay) to escape to Brazil by machine.

text: in the spirit of voltaire and moliM-hre , on guard volleys great wit and deadly gestures in a milieu of lush apparel , landscapes , captivating music and 18th-century lacy sleeves .
translation: ヴォルテールとモリエールの精神において、『オン・ガード』は豪華な服装、風景、魅力的な音楽、18世紀のレースの袖の中で、優れた知恵と致命的なジェスチャーを繰り広げます。
back_translation: In the spirit of Voltaire and Molière, "On Guard" unfolds excellent wit and fatal gestures amid luxurious costumes, landscapes, enchanting music, and 18th-century lace sleeves.

text: exonerated of lying , king and cuthbertson are nevertheless reprimanded by the court for their behaviour , but receive an invitation to tea with the prime minister should they ever be in whitehall .
translation: 嘘をついていた罪を免れたキングとカスバートソンは、それでも彼らの行動について法廷から reprimanded されるが、ホワイトホールにいる際に首相のティー会への招待を受ける。
back_translation: King and Cuthbertson, who escaped the罪 of lying, were still reprimanded by the court for their actions, but while at Whitehall, they received an invitation to the Prime Minister's tea party.

text: the kind of sweet-and-sour insider movie that film buffs will eat up like so much gelati .
translation: 映画ファンがジェラートのように夢中で楽しむような、甘酸っぱいインサイダー映画。
back_translation: An insider movie that film fans get passionately absorbed in like gelato, with a sweet and sour taste.

text: [ it 's ] a clever thriller with enough unexpected twists to keep our interest .
translation: それは、私たちの興味を引き続けるための十分な予測できない展開を持った巧妙なスリラーです。
back_translation: It is a clever thriller with enough unpredictable developments to keep our interest.

text: the word that comes to mind , while watching eric rohmer 's tribute to a courageous scottish lady , is painterly .
translation: エリック・ローマーが勇敢なスコットランドの女性に捧げた作品を見ていて思い浮かぶ言葉は「絵画的」です。
back_translation: The word that comes to mind when looking at the works dedicated by Eric Rohmer to brave Scottish women is "pictorial."

text: three fraternal bank robbers languishing in jail , discover a profitable ( if not dodgy ) way to spend their time .
translation: 刑務所で苦しむ三人の兄弟の銀行強盗は、時間を過ごすための利益のある（もし怪しいなら）方法を発見する。
back_translation: The three brothers suffering in prison discover a profitable (if questionable) way to pass the time through bank robbery.

text: noyce films it more as a shocking history lesson than as drama .
translation: ノイスはそれをドラマよりも衝撃的な歴史の教訓として撮影している。
back_translation: Nois is capturing it as a shocking historical lesson rather than as a drama.

text: a fourteen year old lad discovers his first love at the point of his pencil whilst drawing the portrait of a sickly but coquettish fifteen year old girl .
translation: 十四歳の少年が、病弱で愛らしい十五歳の少女の肖像を描く際に、鉛筆の先で初恋を発見する。
back_translation: A fourteen-year-old boy discovers first love at the tip of his pencil while drawing the portrait of a frail yet charming fifteen-year-old girl.

text: a young professional discovers the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest .
translation: 若いプロフェッショナルが企業の巣を離れる難しさを発見する。
back_translation: Young professionals discover the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest.

text: a demand for money is made and the men wait for payment .
translation: お金の要求がなされ、男たちは支払いを待っています。
back_translation: The demand for money has been made, and the men are waiting for payment.

text: but their cultural difference further separates them as lando ( antonio aquitania ) , isabel 's boyfriend , enters into the picture .
translation: しかし、彼らの文化的な違いは、イザベルの彼氏ランド（アントニオ・アキタニア）が登場することで、さらに彼らを隔てます。
back_translation: However, their cultural differences are further emphasized by the appearance of Isabel's boyfriend, Rand (Antonio Akitania).

text: rarely has so much money delivered so little entertainment .
translation: これほど多くの金がほとんど楽しみをもたらさなかったことは珍しい。
back_translation: It is rare for so much money to bring almost no enjoyment.

text: especially one girl , isa , has to choose between two boys who are fighting against each other .
translation: 特に一人の女の子、イザは、互いに戦っている二人の男の子の間で選ばなければなりません。
back_translation: Especially a girl named Iza has to choose between two boys who are fighting each other.

text: the fictional film `` the dragon `` tells the story of how a young boy , who 's master is killed by a group of thugs , grows up to avenge his teacher 's murder .
translation: 架空の映画「ドラゴン」は、師匠を一群の暴徒に殺された若い少年が、師匠の復讐を果たすために成長する物語を描いています。
back_translation: The fictional movie "Dragon" depicts the story of a young boy whose master is killed by a group of rioters, and his journey to grow and avenge his master.

text: michael , sr . and michael , jr . then set out to get revenge on the man who killed peter and mrs . sullivan .
translation: マイケル・シニアとマイケル・ジュニアは、ピーターとサリバン夫人を殺した男に復讐するために出発しました。
back_translation: Michael Senior and Michael Junior set out to take revenge on the man who killed Peter and Mrs. Sullivan.

text: lukas and his friends live in a commune out in the woods .
translation: ルーカスと彼の友達は森の中の共同体に住んでいます。
back_translation: Lucas and his friends live in a community in the forest.

text: when his affair with a young troubled janitor ( kidman ) is uncovered , the secret silk had harbored for over fifty years from his wife , his children and colleague , writer nathan zuckerman , fast explodes in a conflagration of devastating consequences .
translation: 彼の若い問題を抱えた清掃員（キッドマン）との不倫が発覚すると、彼が妻や子供、同僚である作家ネイサン・ザッカーマンから五十年以上隠してきた秘密は、壊滅的な結果をもたらす大火事のように急速に広がる。
back_translation: When the affair with the young, troubled janitor (Kidman) is revealed, the secret he has hidden from his wife, children, and colleague, the writer Nathan Zuckerman, for over fifty years spreads rapidly like a devastating fire, leading to catastrophic consequences.

text: the most impressive quality of this charming movie is the way the characters , who are all recognizable 'types , ' refuse to behave the way we expect .
translation: この魅力的な映画の最も印象的な特徴は、すべてが認識できる「タイプ」のキャラクターが、私たちが期待する行動を拒む方法です。
back_translation: The most striking characteristic of this captivating film is how the characters, who are all recognizable "types," refuse to behave in the ways we expect.

text: after one gets the feeling that the typical hollywood disregard for historical truth and realism is at work here , it 's a matter of finding entertainment in the experiences of zishe and the fiery presence of hanussen .
translation: 典型的なハリウッドの歴史的真実とリアリズムへの無関心がここに存在しているという感覚を持った後は、ジシェの経験とハヌッセンの情熱的な存在の中に楽しみを見出すことになります。
back_translation: After feeling the presence of a typical Hollywood indifference to historical truth and realism, one finds enjoyment in Gisé's experiences and Hannussen's passionate existence.

text: it 's a movie -- and an album -- you wo n't want to miss .
translation: 見逃したくない映画とアルバムです。
back_translation: Movies and albums I don't want to miss.

text: jolie 's performance vanishes somewhere between her hair and her lips .
translation: ジョリーのパフォーマンスは、彼女の髪と唇の間のどこかで消えてしまう。
back_translation: Jolie's performance disappears somewhere between her hair and her lips.

text: what 's most unusual about beijing bicycle in terms of recent chinese history is that any form of class conflict is depicted at all .
translation: 最近の中国の歴史において北京の自転車が最も奇妙なのは、どんな形の階級闘争が描かれていることです。
back_translation: In recent Chinese history, the most peculiar aspect of bicycles in Beijing is the depiction of class struggle in various forms.

text: in present-day london , twelve-year-old quinn watches as his mother , a construction engineer , inadvertently wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its century-long slumber .
translation: 現代のロンドンで、12歳のクインは、彼の母親である建設技師が、100年もの間眠っていた巨大な火を吐く獣を知らずに目覚めさせるのを見ています。
back_translation: In modern London, 12-year-old Quinn witnesses his mother, a construction engineer, unknowingly awaken a giant fire-breathing beast that has been sleeping for a century.

text: the story suffers a severe case of oversimplification , superficiality and silliness .
translation: 物語は大幅な単純化、表面的な浅薄さ、そしてばかばかしさに苦しんでいる。
back_translation: The story suffers from significant simplification, superficiality, and absurdity.

text: a criminal mastermind has set in motion a plan to infiltrate a high tech prison in order to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $ 200 million worth of gold .
translation: 犯罪の天才が、高度なテクノロジーを駆使した刑務所に潜入する計画を進めており、死刑囚に200百万ドル相当の金の所在を明かすよう促そうとしています。
back_translation: A genius of crime is advancing a plan to infiltrate a high-tech prison and is trying to urge a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of gold worth 200 million dollars.

text: helmut busch ( now bruno ) will fall in love with adela , one of the activists , and that faces him into a dilema because he has orders to kill the head of the group where the young woman serves as a militant .
translation: ヘルムート・ブッシュ（現在の名はブルーノ）は、活動家の一人アデラに恋をするが、それが彼をジレンマに直面させる。というのも、彼はその若い女性が戦士として活動しているグループの指導者を殺す命令を受けているからだ。
back_translation: Helmut Busch (now known as Bruno) falls in love with an activist named Adela, but this puts him in a dilemma. This is because he has been given orders to kill the leader of the group in which the young woman is active as a warrior.

text: a poky and pseudo-serious exercise in sham actor workshops and an affected malaise .
translation: 狭苦しく、いかにも真剣ぶった偽の演技者ワークショップと、影響を受けた不快感の演習。
back_translation: A cramped, serious-looking workshop for fake performers, and exercises in the discomfort of being influenced.

text: the trail is strewn with corpses and everything points to them as the killers .
translation: 道は死体で散らばっており、すべてが彼らを犯人として示しています。
back_translation: The road is scattered with corpses, and everything points to them as the perpetrators.

text: this time nick is `` getting out ! `` . . . or
translation: 今回はニックが「出るぞ！」です。。。それとも
back_translation: This time Nick is saying, "I'm coming out!" ... Or maybe...

text: the talk-heavy film plays like one of robert altman 's lesser works .
translation: 会話が重視されたこの映画は、ロバート・アルトマンのいくつかの劣った作品のように感じられる。
back_translation: This movie, which emphasizes dialogue, feels similar to some of Robert Altman's lesser works.

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and . . . often misconstrued as weakness .
translation: 「帰り道」は、すべてを見てきた年月から得られた無条件の愛と慈悲への賛歌であり、それは老いた者だけが知る条件であり…しばしば弱さと誤解される。
back_translation: "The 'way home' is a hymn to unconditional love and compassion gained from years of experience, a condition known only to the elderly... often misunderstood as weakness."

text: semi-improvised on the streets of liverpool , dan reed 's drama brings the true face of britain 's underworld to light .
translation: リバプールの街で半即興的に展開されるダン・リードのドラマは、イギリスの裏社会の真実の姿を明らかにします。
back_translation: Dan Reed's drama, which unfolds semi-improvised in the city of Liverpool, reveals the true nature of the British underworld.

text: there 's a sweetness to it that 's disarming and diverting -- mostly thanks to performances of slater , richard dreyfuss as his partner in crime , and portia di rossi as dreyfuss ' daughter .
translation: それには心を和ませ、気をそらす甘さがあり、主にスレイター、彼の相棒リチャード・ドレイファス、そしてドレイファスの娘ポーシャ・デ・ロッシの演技のおかげです。
back_translation: It has a sweetness that soothes the heart and distracts the mind, largely thanks to the performances of Slater, his partner Richard Dreyfuss, and Dreyfuss's daughter Portia de Rossi.

text: suffers from unlikable characters and a self-conscious sense of its own quirky hipness .
translation: 好感の持てないキャラクターと自意識過剰な自らの独特なヒップさに悩まされている。
back_translation: I am troubled by a character that I find unlikable and my own excessive self-consciousness about my unique hipness.

text: the zany search for the shoes begins , as she follows the footsteps through the lively streets of havana , running into the quirky , colorful characters that bring viva zapato and dolore 's dream .
translation: 靴を求めるバカげた冒険が始まる。彼女はハバナの賑やかな通りを通り、靴の足跡をたどりながら、ヴィバ・ザパトとドローレの夢を彩る奇抜でカラフルなキャラクターたちと出会う。
back_translation: A ridiculous adventure in search of shoes begins. She walks through the lively streets of Havana, following the footprints of shoes and encountering quirky and colorful characters that decorate the dreams of Viva Zapato and Dolores.

text: a nicely constructed film with an unusual , though not unheard-of theme for chinese cinema .
translation: 中国映画にとって珍しくはないが、ユニークなテーマを持つ、よく構成された映画。
back_translation: It is a well-structured film with a unique theme, which is not uncommon for Chinese cinema.

text: it is a journey that will take both carol and charlie to the edge of reality .
translation: それはキャロルとチャーリーを現実の境界へ連れて行く旅です。
back_translation: It is a journey that takes Carol and Charlie to the boundary of reality.

text: bisset still commands the screen as the graceful and outspoken frances .
translation: ビセットは、優雅で率直なフランシスとして画面を支配し続けています。
back_translation: Bisset continues to dominate the screen as the elegant and frank Frances.

text: chomsky 's voice may be unpopular , but his incisive arguments , based on decades of research and analysis , are heard and considered in this chronicle comprised of interview footage , and various talks he 's given .
translation: チョムスキーの声は不人気かもしれませんが、何十年にもわたる研究と分析に基づく彼の鋭い議論は、このインタビュー映像や彼が行ったさまざまな講演から構成されたこの記録の中で聞かれ、考慮されています。
back_translation: Chomsky's voice may be unpopular, but his sharp arguments, based on decades of research and analysis, are heard and considered in this record composed of this interview footage and various lectures he has given.

text: it 's a mystery how the movie could be released in this condition .
translation: この状態で映画が公開されたのは謎です。
back_translation: It's a mystery that the movie was released under these circumstances.

text: they are soon caught up in the erotic nature of the chat sessions they host , changing both their lives .
translation: 彼らは自らがホストするチャットセッションのエロティックな性質にすぐに引き込まれ、両方の人生が変わる。
back_translation: They are quickly drawn into the erotic nature of the chat sessions they host, changing both of their lives.

text: liman , of swingers and go , makes his big-budget action film debut something of a clunker as he delivers a long , low-heat chase , interrupted by a middling car chase .
translation: リーマンは、「スウィンガーズ」と「ゴー」の監督として、大予算のアクション映画デビューを果たすが、長く低温の追跡シーンが続き、平凡な車の追跡で中断されるため、いささか残念な作品となっている。
back_translation: Lehman makes his big-budget action film debut as the director of "Swingers" and "Go," but it ends up being somewhat disappointing due to long, cold chase scenes that are interrupted by mundane car chases.

text: never engaging , utterly predictable and completely void of anything remotely interesting or suspenseful .
translation: 全く関与せず、まったく予測可能で、何か面白いことや緊張感の少しも欠けている。
back_translation: Completely uninvolved, entirely predictable, and lacking any element of interest or tension.

text: michael , an obessive compulsive real estate dealer who enjoys `` the younger set . ``
translation: マイケルは「若い世代」を楽しむ強迫性障害の不動産業者です。
back_translation: Michael is a real estate agent with obsessive-compulsive disorder who enjoys "younger generations."

text: hardly a masterpiece , but it introduces viewers to a good charitable enterprise and some interesting real people .
translation: 傑作とは言えないが、視聴者に良い慈善事業と興味深い実在の人物たちを紹介している。
back_translation: Although it can't be called a masterpiece, it introduces the audience to good charitable causes and interesting real people.

text: because the intelligence level of the characters must be low , very low , very very low , for the masquerade to work , the movie contains no wit , only labored gags .
translation: キャラクターの知能レベルが低く、非常に低く、非常に非常に低くなければならないため、マスカレードが機能するのです。この映画には機知がなく、ただ労力をかけたギャグしかありません。
back_translation: The character's intelligence level must be low, very low, and extremely low for the masquerade to work. This movie lacks wit and only contains gags that require effort.

text: he has to learn to accept ian ; ian has to learn to accept toula 's huge family , and toula has to learn to accept herself .
translation: 彼はイアンを受け入れることを学ばなければならず、イアンはトゥーラの大きな家族を受け入れることを学ばなければならず、トゥーラは自分自身を受け入れることを学ばなければならない。
back_translation: He must learn to accept Ian, Ian must learn to accept Tula's large family, and Tula must learn to accept herself.

text: obstacles pop up left and right , as the adventure gets wilder and wilder .
translation: 冒険がますます激しくなるにつれて、障害物が左右に現れます。
back_translation: As the adventure intensifies, obstacles appear on the left and right.

text: hank azaria and vincent d'onofrio also star as does screenwriter/comedienne heather morgan as the canine wife .
translation: ハンク・アザリアとヴィンセント・ドノフリオも出演しており、脚本家/コメディアンのヘザー・モーガンが犬の妻役を演じています。
back_translation: Hank Azaria and Vincent D'Onofrio also appear, with writer/comedian Heather Morgan playing the role of the dog’s wife.

text: you have to pay attention to follow all the stories , but they 're each interesting . the movie is well shot and very tragic , and one to ponder after the credits roll .
translation: すべてのストーリーに注意を払う必要がありますが、それぞれが興味深いです。映画はよく撮影されており非常に悲劇的で、クレジットが流れた後に考えさせられる作品です。
back_translation: Every story deserves attention, and each one is intriguing. The film is well shot and very tragic, leaving you with thoughts after the credits roll.

text: on the heels of the ring comes a similarly morose and humorless horror movie that , although flawed , is to be commended for its straight-ahead approach to creepiness .
translation: リングの後に続くのは、同様に陰鬱でユーモアのないホラー映画であり、欠点はあるものの、恐怖をストレートに表現したアプローチは評価されるべきである。
back_translation: What follows the ring is similarly a bleak and humorless horror film, which has its flaws, but the approach of expressing fear in a straightforward manner should be appreciated.

text: mr . soderbergh 's direction and visual style struck me as unusually and unimpressively fussy and pretentious .
translation: ソーダーバーグ氏の演出と視覚スタイルは、異常にこだわりすぎていて、印象的ではなく、気取っているように感じました。
back_translation: Mr. Soderbergh's direction and visual style felt overly meticulous, unremarkable, and pretentious.

text: this definitely delivers a remarkable mixture of explosive drama with wickedly ironical humor as you follow this eclectic story surrounding this tide-dyed , free spirited couple 's showdown with a mysterious faberge ' egg and a seedy , well-woven cast of criminals that will both trill and amuse .
translation: これは、潮染めの自由な精神を持ったカップルが神秘的なファベルジェ卵と出会い、刺激的なドラマと皮肉なユーモアの見事な混合を提供します。巧妙に編まれた犯罪者たちのキャストが、スリルと楽しさを同時に提供するエキレクティックな物語を追いかける中で。
back_translation: This presents a captivating blend of thrilling drama and ironic humor as a free-spirited couple encounters a mysterious Fabergé egg. A cleverly woven cast of criminals chases an eclectic story that simultaneously offers excitement and fun.

text: . . . could easily be called the best korean film of 2002 .
translation: 2002年の最高の韓国映画と呼ばれても不思議ではない。
back_translation: It wouldn't be surprising if it were called the best Korean movie of 2002.

text: he 's your standard adrenaline junkie with no fear and a lousy attitude .
translation: 彼は恐れもなく、態度も悪い典型的なアドレナリン中毒者です。
back_translation: He is a typical adrenaline junkie, fearlessly having a bad attitude.

text: remember the kind of movie we were hoping `` ecks vs . sever `` or `` xxx `` was going to be ? this is it .
translation: 私たちが「エックス対セヴァー」や「トリプルX」がなることを期待していた映画の種類を覚えていますか？これがそれです。
back_translation: Do you remember the type of movie that we were expecting to become "XX vs. Sever" or "Triple X"? This is it.

text: as things become increasingly more complicated in the small community , the walls around father amaro begin to crumble .
translation: 小さなコミュニティで物事がますます複雑になるにつれて、アマロ神父の周りの壁が崩れ始める。
back_translation: As things become increasingly complicated in the small community, the walls around Father Amaro begin to crumble.

text: moretti . . . is the rare common-man artist who 's wise enough to recognize that there are few things in this world more complex -- and , as it turns out , more fragile -- than happiness .
translation: モレッティは、幸せよりも複雑で、実際にはより壊れやすいものはこの世にほとんどないと認識する賢い普通の人々の稀なアーティストです。
back_translation: Moretti is a rare artist among wise ordinary people who recognize that there is hardly anything in this world more complex and, in fact, more fragile than happiness.

text: a young man is found bruised , beaten and stumbling down a secluded road .
translation: 若い男性があざだらけで打撲を受け、ひっそりとした道をよろよろと歩いているのが見つかる。
back_translation: A young man, covered in bruises and injuries, is found unsteadily walking on a quiet path.

text: and having been with one woman his whole life , he loves to make silly jokes about how he , ami , steve , and claire should `` swap `` .
translation: そして、一生を一人の女性と共に過ごしてきた彼は、アミ、スティーブ、クレアと「交換」すべきだというおかしな冗談を言うのが大好きです。
back_translation: And he loves to joke that he should "swap" with Ami, Steve, and Claire, having spent his whole life with just one woman.

text: plummer steals the show without resorting to camp as nicholas ' wounded and wounding uncle ralph . it 's a great performance and a reminder of dickens ' grandeur .
translation: プラマーは、キャンプに頼らずにニコラスの傷ついた叔父ラルフを演じてショーを引き立てます。素晴らしいパフォーマンスであり、ディケンズの壮大さを思い出させてくれます。
back_translation: The plumber elevates the show by playing Nicholas's injured uncle Ralph without relying on the camp. It's a wonderful performance that reminds us of Dickens's grandeur.

text: they board the boat that is to carry them to the isles of the blessed .
translation: 彼らは、祝福の島々へと彼らを運ぶ船に乗り込む。
back_translation: They board the ship that will take them to the islands of blessings.

text: the true story of revolutionary war leader ethan allen ( 1738-1789 ) and his group of fighters , the green mountain boys , who fought for the freedom of vermont before the war officially started .
translation: 革命戦争の指導者イーサン・アレン（1738-1789）と彼の戦士グループ、グリーンマウンテンボーイズの真実の物語。彼らは戦争が正式に始まる前にバーモントの自由のために戦った。
back_translation: The true story of Ethan Allen (1738-1789), the leader of the Revolutionary War, and his group of warriors, the Green Mountain Boys. They fought for the freedom of Vermont before the war officially began.

text: documentary feature about the traditional viennese cinema `` bellaria `` , which is specialised in german cinema from the 20s , 30s and 40s and its regular customers , whose idols are stars like zarah leander or karl sch & # 246 ; nb & # 246 ; ck .
translation: 20、30、40年代のドイツ映画を専門とした伝統的なウィーンの映画館「ベラリア」についてのドキュメンタリー作品で、その常連客はザラ・レアンダーやカール・シェンクなどのスターをアイドルとしています。
back_translation: This is a documentary about the traditional Vienna cinema "Belaria," which specializes in German films from the 20s, 30s, and 40s, where regular patrons idolize stars like Zarah Leander and Karl Schönk.

text: [ the kid 's ] just too bratty for sympathy , and as the film grows to its finale , his little changes ring hollow .
translation: [その子供は]同情するにはあまりにも生意気であり、映画がクライマックスに達するにつれて、彼の小さな変化は空虚に響く。
back_translation: The child is too cheeky to be pitied, and as the movie reaches its climax, his small changes sound hollow.

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris . but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .
translation: いずれにせよ、私は1995年の「フォゲット・パリ」以来彼女を待ち望んでいたウィンガーのファンにのみ「ビッグ・バッド・ラブ」を勧めます。しかし、それでも私はDVDを待って彼女のシーンだけをスキップすることをお勧めします。
back_translation: In any case, I would only recommend "Big Bad Love" to fans of Winger who have been looking forward to her since "Forget Paris" in 1995. However, I still recommend waiting for the DVD and skipping to her scenes only.

text: glizty but formulaic and silly . . . cagney 's 'top of the world ' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel .
translation: 華やかだが形式的で滑稽な…ケグニーの「世界の頂点」は、今や最下層に置き換えられた。
back_translation: Bright yet formal and ridiculous... Kegney's "The Pinnacle of the World" has now been replaced by the lowest tier.

text: too loud , too long and too frantic by half , die another day suggests that the bond franchise has run into a creative wall that 007 can not fly over , tunnel under or barrel through .
translation: あまりにも大きすぎて、長すぎて、半端に狂った「007 ダイ・アナザー・デイ」は、ボンドシリーズが007が飛び越えたり、地下道を掘ったり、突進したりできない創造的な壁にぶつかっていることを示唆している。
back_translation: "Die Another Day," which is too big, too long, and somewhat insane, suggests that the Bond series has hit a creative wall where 007 can no longer jump over, dig through, or charge through obstacles.

text: back home , he encounters a place which no longer exists .
translation: 帰宅すると、彼はもう存在しない場所に出会う。
back_translation: When he returns home, he encounters a place that no longer exists.

text: it 's a smart , funny look at an arcane area of popular culture , and if it is n't entirely persuasive , it does give exposure to some talented performers .
translation: それはポピュラー文化の奥深い領域に対する賢く、面白い視点であり、完全に説得力があるわけではありませんが、いくつかの才能あるパフォーマーを紹介しています。
back_translation: It offers a clever and interesting perspective on the deep realms of popular culture, and while it may not be entirely convincing, it showcases several talented performers.

text: as both marly and desiree grapple with the sometimes overwhelming weight of family history and family expectations , and wrestle with questions of love , duty and responsibility , the tale offers a portrait of two women , two families , and two communities standing on the brink of change .
translation: マリーとデジレが時には圧倒的な家族の歴史や期待の重さに苦しみ、愛、義務、責任の問題に取り組む中で、この物語は変革の瀬戸際に立つ二人の女性、二つの家族、二つのコミュニティの肖像を描いています。
back_translation: Amid the heavy burdens of overwhelming family history and expectations, Marie and Désirée struggle with issues of love, duty, and responsibility, painting a portrait of two women, two families, and two communities standing on the brink of transformation.

text: any one episode of the sopranos would send this ill-conceived folly to sleep with the fishes .
translation: 「ザ・ソプラノズ」のエピソードのいずれかは、この愚かな妄想を魚の餌に送ってしまうだろう。
back_translation: One of the episodes of "The Sopranos" might send this foolish delusion to feed the fish.

text: the reason this picture works better than its predecessors is that myers is no longer simply spoofing the mini-mod-madness of '60s spy movies .
translation: この写真が前作よりも優れている理由は、マイヤーズがもう単に1960年代のスパイ映画のミニ・モッド・マッドネスをパロディにしているだけではないからです。
back_translation: The reason this photo is superior to the previous work is that Myers is no longer simply parodying the mini-mod madness of 1960s spy movies.

text: at its best early on as it plays the culture clashes between the brothers .
translation: 兄弟間の文化的対立を描くことで、初期には最高の状態を持っています。
back_translation: By depicting the cultural conflicts between brothers, it initially has the best condition.

text: like a fish that 's lived too long , austin powers in goldmember has some unnecessary parts and is kinda wrong in places .
translation: 長生きしすぎた魚のように、『オースティン・パワーズ：ゴールドメンバー』には不必要な部分があり、ところどころ間違っている。
back_translation: Like a fish that has lived too long, "Austin Powers: Goldmember" has unnecessary parts and is incorrect in certain places.

text: helmer devito . . . attempts to do too many things in this story about ethics , payola , vice , murder , kids ' tv and revenge .
translation: ヘルマー・デヴィトは、倫理、賄賂、悪行、殺人、子供向けテレビ、復讐に関するこの物語であまりにも多くのことを試みています。
back_translation: Helmar David attempts to tackle too many issues in this story concerning ethics, bribery, evil deeds, murder, children's television, and revenge.

text: based on a short story by bengali writer prafulla roy , the central idea developed by director dasgupta , tells the story of a girl , lati , whose mother rajani is a prostitute living and working in a brothel in rural india .
translation: ベンガルの作家プラフッラ・ロイによる短編小説を基に、ダスグプタ監督が展開した中央のアイデアは、母親ラジャニがインドの田舎の売春宿で暮らし働いている娼婦である少女ラティの物語です。
back_translation: Based on a short story by the Bengali writer Prabhat Roy, the central idea developed by director Dasgupta is the story of a girl named Rathi, whose mother Rajani is a prostitute living and working in a brothel in rural India.

text: dramatic events throw them together on a journey with no money and no transport .
translation: 劇的な出来事が彼らをお金も交通手段もない旅に引き合わせます。
back_translation: A dramatic event brings them together on a journey with no money and no means of transportation.

text: looks more like a travel-agency video targeted at people who like to ride bikes topless and roll in the mud than a worthwhile glimpse of independent-community guiding lights .
translation: 独立したコミュニティの指導者たちを垣間見る価値のあるものというよりは、服を脱いでバイクに乗ったり泥の中で転がったりするのが好きな人々をターゲットにした旅行代理店の動画のように見える。
back_translation: It looks more like a travel agency video targeting people who enjoy stripping down, riding motorcycles, and rolling around in the mud, rather than something worth catching a glimpse of the leaders of independent communities.

text: it 's not a classic spy-action or buddy movie , but it 's entertaining enough and worth a look .
translation: それはクラシックなスパイアクション映画やバディムービーではありませんが、十分に楽しく、見る価値があります。
back_translation: It's not a classic spy action movie or a buddy film, but it's enjoyable enough and worth watching.

text: racial bigotry , violence and corruption thrive in places like marquezas .
translation: 人種的偏見、暴力、腐敗はマルケーザスのような場所で蔓延しています。
back_translation: Racial prejudice, violence, and corruption are rampant in places like Marquezas.

text: his loyal assistant is killed and he is framed with the evidence at the chinese border by the chinese military and u . s . drug enforcement agency .
translation: 彼の忠実な助手が殺され、彼は中国の国境で中国軍とアメリカ薬物取締局によって証拠をもってはめられる。
back_translation: His loyal assistant is killed, and he is framed with evidence by the Chinese military and the American Drug Enforcement Administration at the Chinese border.

text: somewhere inside the mess that is world traveler , there is a mediocre movie trying to get out .
translation: 世界旅行者という混乱の中に、 mediocreな映画が出ようとしている。
back_translation: Amidst the chaos of world travelers, a mediocre movie is about to be released.

text: shae is about to return to bed when she hears water running in the bathroom .
translation: シャエはベッドに戻ろうとしていると、バスルームで水が流れる音が聞こえます。
back_translation: Shae hears the sound of water running in the bathroom as she tries to return to bed.

text: when she gets into trouble with the police simon represses his death wish and decides to help her out .
translation: 彼女が警察とトラブルになると、サイモンは死への願望を抑え、彼女を助けることに決める。
back_translation: When she gets into trouble with the police, Simon suppresses his desire for death and decides to help her.

text: bullock 's complete lack of focus and ability quickly derails the film
translation: ブルックの完璧な集中力の欠如と能力は、映画をすぐに狂わせる。
back_translation: Brook's complete lack of concentration and ability drives the movie crazy right away.

text: elsa keeps her head above water through several badly paid jobs and occasional criminal offences with her friends walter , laura and toni .
translation: エルサは、ウォルター、ローラ、トニと一緒に幾つかの低賃金の仕事や時折の犯罪行為を通じて、なんとか生活しています。
back_translation: Elsa is somehow making a living through various low-wage jobs and occasional criminal activities alongside Walter, Laura, and Toni.

text: things really heat up when sparks sizzle between her and her new colleague at work , tiago , an irresistible , compulsive womanizer .
translation: 彼女と新しい同僚ティアゴとの間に火花が散ると、物事は本当に加熱します。ティアゴは魅力的で衝動的な女たらしです。
back_translation: Things really heat up when she starts to spark with her new colleague Thiago. Thiago is a charming and impulsive womanizer.

text: it 's too interested in jerking off in all its byzantine incarnations to bother pleasuring its audience .
translation: それは、聴衆を楽しませることを気にかけることなく、あらゆる複雑な形でオナニーをすることに夢中になりすぎている。
back_translation: It is too immersed in engaging in masturbation in all its complex forms without caring about entertaining the audience.

text: hired to take mr . brown to a rendezvous with the devil ( gary oldman ) , the driver soon finds himself entangled in fiendish plans .
translation: 悪魔（ゲイリー・オールドマン）との rendezvous にミスター・ブラウンを連れて行くために雇われたドライバーは、すぐに悪魔のような計画に巻き込まれてしまう。
back_translation: The driver hired to take Mr. Brown to a rendezvous with the devil (Gary Oldman) soon gets caught up in a demonic scheme.

text: in the end , the film feels homogenized and a bit contrived , as if we 're looking back at a tattered and ugly past with rose-tinted glasses .
translation: 結局、この映画は均一化されていて少し作り物めいている感じがし、私たちが傷んだ醜い過去をバラ色のメガネ越しに振り返っているように思えます。
back_translation: In the end, this movie feels homogenized and somewhat artificial, as if we are looking back at our painful and ugly past through rose-colored glasses.

text: when she 's approached one day by a handsome stranger while trying to hail a taxi , she becomes obsessed with him and eventually starts an affair .
translation: ある日、タクシーを呼ぼうとしているときにハンサムな見知らぬ人に声をかけられ、彼に obsession を抱き、最終的に不倫関係が始まる。
back_translation: One day, while trying to call a taxi, I was approached by a handsome stranger, became obsessed with him, and ultimately began an affair.

text: lynn and yan shared an unspoken love in the past which is now rekindled in the open , and lynn begins to question whether she wants to continue to be an assassin .
translation: リンとヤンは過去に言葉にされない愛を共有しており、それは今公に再燃しています。そしてリンは、自分が暗殺者として続けたいのかどうかを疑問に思い始めます。
back_translation: Lin and Yan share a love that was unspoken in the past, and it has now been reignited publicly. Lin begins to question whether she wants to continue as an assassin.

text: his story explores the ramifications of leaving afghanistan and living as a refugee in america .
translation: この物語は、アフガニスタンを離れ、アメリカで難民として暮らすことの影響を探ります。
back_translation: This story explores the impact of leaving Afghanistan and living as a refugee in America.

text: when the professor turns up missing , one of his students , jake whitcomb , finds the professor 's journal , inside of which is a copy of the map .
translation: 教授が行方不明になると、彼の学生であるジェイク・ウィットコムは、教授の日記を見つけ、その中に地図のコピーがあることを発見します。
back_translation: When the professor goes missing, his student Jake Whitcomb finds the professor's diary and discovers a copy of a map inside it.

text: a film that will be best appreciated by those willing to endure its extremely languorous rhythms , waiting for happiness is ultimately thoughtful without having much dramatic impact .
translation: 非常にゆったりとしたリズムに耐え、幸せを待つことを厭わない人々に最も評価される映画であり、考えさせられる作品ですが、劇的なインパクトはあまりありません。
back_translation: It is a film that is highly appreciated by people who can endure a very relaxed rhythm and do not mind waiting for happiness. While it is thought-provoking, it does not have much dramatic impact.

text: set in san francisco , this is the story of a mysterious immortal tibetan kung fu master ( yun-fat ) , who has spent the last 60 years traveling around the world protecting an ancient scroll , who is now mentoring a street kid ( scott ) in the wonders of his ancient ways . . .
translation: サンフランシスコを舞台にしたこの物語は、神秘的な不死のチベット拳法の達人（ユンファ）が、60年間世界を旅して古代の巻物を守ってきた後、ストリートキッズ（スコット）に彼の古代の教えの素晴らしさを教えているというものです。
back_translation: Set in San Francisco, this story follows a mysterious immortal Tibetan kung fu master (Yunfa) who, after traveling the world for 60 years to protect ancient scrolls, teaches a street kid (Scott) the wonders of his ancient teachings.

text: nights feels more like a quickie tv special than a feature film . . . it 's not even a tv special you 'd bother watching past the second commercial break .
translation: 夜は特別な番組というよりも短いテレビ特番のように感じられます。。。2回目のコマーシャルブレイクを過ぎてまで見る価値のあるテレビ特番ですらありません。
back_translation: The night feels more like a short television special rather than a special program. It's not even worth watching as a television special after the second commercial break.

text: it is no coincidence that funding for `` anti-graffiti `` campaigns often outweighs funding for the arts .
translation: 「反落書き」キャンペーンの資金が芸術のための資金をしばしば上回るのは偶然ではありません。
back_translation: It is no coincidence that the funding for the "anti-graffiti" campaign often exceeds the funding for the arts.

text: the characters seem one-dimensional , and the film is superficial and will probably be of interest primarily to its target audience .
translation: キャラクターは一面的に見え、映画は表面的で、おそらく主にターゲットオーディエンスに興味を持たれるでしょう。
back_translation: The characters appear one-dimensional, the movie is superficial, and it will likely primarily attract the interest of the target audience.

text: aside from being the funniest movie of the year , simone , andrew niccol 's brilliant anti-hollywood satire , has a wickedly eccentric enchantment to it .
translation: 今年の最も面白い映画の一つである「シモーヌ」は、アンドリュー・ニコルの素晴らしい反ハリウッド風刺であり、奇妙な魅力を持っています。
back_translation: One of the most interesting movies of this year, "Simone," is a brilliant anti-Hollywood satire by Andrew Niccol, and it has a strange charm.

text: reinforces the often forgotten fact of the world 's remarkably varying human population and mindset , and its capacity to heal using creative , natural and ancient antidotes .
translation: 世界の人間の人口と心の驚くほどの多様性、そして創造的で自然な古代の解毒剤を使って癒す能力を忘れがちな事実を強調しています。
back_translation: It emphasizes the astonishing diversity of the world's human population and minds, as well as the often overlooked ability to heal using creative and natural ancient detoxifiers.

text: soon it 's not just harry who is worried about survival , as dreadful things begin to happen at hogwarts .
translation: やがて、ハリーだけでなくホグワーツでも恐ろしいことが起こり始め、誰もが生き残ることを心配するようになります。
back_translation: Soon, not only Harry but also at Hogwarts, terrible things began to happen, and everyone started to worry about surviving.
