text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: この種の最大限に商品化された映画の多くと同様に、プレイリストのために適切なバンドを集めることやスターの衣装に多くの時間がかけられたようで、脚本にはスマートなジョークがいくつかあるだけで、あまり他に見どころはありません。
back_translation: Like many of this kind of highly commercialized films, it seems that a lot of time was spent gathering the right bands for the playlist and on the stars' costumes, while the script has only a few clever jokes and not much else to recommend it.

text: in his sleepy home town on the english coast , nothing much inspires him . . . apart from bowls .
translation: 彼のイギリスの海岸の眠そうな故郷では、彼を刺激するものはほとんどありません……ボウルを除いて。
back_translation: In his sleepy hometown on the English coast, there is hardly anything to stimulate him... except for the bowl.

text: beneath the uncanny , inevitable and seemingly shrewd facade of movie-biz farce . . . lies a plot cobbled together from largely flat and uncreative moments .
translation: 映画業界の茶番劇の不気味で不可避に見える巧妙な外見の下には、主に平坦で創造性に乏しい瞬間から寄せ集められたプロットが横たわっている。
back_translation: Beneath the eerie and inevitably clever facade of the farce in the film industry lies a plot primarily assembled from flat and creatively lacking moments.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter a precocious 8-year old that teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: 良い気分を広めるのではなく、二人の動機は各店舗を襲うことです。この戦略は、彼らがクリスマスの本当の意味を教えてくれる早熟な8歳の子供に出会うと複雑になります。
back_translation: Rather than spreading good feelings, the two's motive is to attack each store. This strategy becomes complicated when they encounter a precocious 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: serry does a fine job of capturing the climate of the times and , perhaps unwittingly , relating it to what is happening in america in 2002 . but hard-to-believe plot twists force the movie off track in its final half hour .
translation: セリーは時代の雰囲気をうまく捉え、もしかしたら無意識のうちに2002年のアメリカで起きていることと関連づけています。しかし、信じがたいプロットのひねりが映画の最後の30分でストーリーを脱線させます。
back_translation: Sery captures the atmosphere of the times well and may unconsciously relate it to what is happening in America in 2002. However, an unbelievable plot twist derails the story in the last 30 minutes of the film.

text: transforms one of [ shakespeare 's ] deepest tragedies into a smart new comedy .
translation: シェイクスピアの最も深い悲劇の一つを、賢い新しいコメディに変える。
back_translation: Transform one of Shakespeare's deepest tragedies into a clever new comedy.

text: during his skyrocketing career , johnathan has to experience what alexi has found out : blood brings more viewing pleasure to the audience .
translation: ジョナサンは彼の急成長するキャリアの中で、アレキシが発見したことを経験しなければなりませんでした：血が観客により多くの視覚的快楽をもたらすのです。
back_translation: Jonathan had to experience what Alexi discovered in his rapidly growing career: that blood brings more visual pleasure to the audience.

text: ghisu and rupi are now promoted as commanders of their new dalam .
translation: ギスとルピは、新しいダラムの指揮官に昇進しました。
back_translation: Gisu and Rupi have been promoted to the new commander of the Dalum.

text: with no option , joe and katsuragi must use their martial arts skills to fight in the muscle dome .
translation: 選択肢がない中、ジョーと葛城は筋肉ドームで武道のスキルを使って戦わなければなりません。
back_translation: With no options available, Joe and Kazuragi must use their martial arts skills to fight in the Muscle Dome.

text: it 's an often-cute film but either needs more substance to fill the time or some judicious editing .
translation: かわいい映画ですが、時間を埋めるためにもっと内容が必要ですし、あるいは適切な編集が必要です。
back_translation: It's a cute movie, but it needs more content to fill the time or proper editing.

text: the film presents a brief but intriguing biography of its subject .
translation: その映画は、テーマの簡潔だが興味深い伝記を提示しています。
back_translation: The movie presents a concise yet interesting biography of the theme.

text: veteran film director matty bonkers ( bob rafelson ) , a hollywood legend , arrives in berlin for an honorary retrospective tribute .
translation: ベテラン映画監督マッティ・ボンカーズ（ボブ・ラフェルソン）、ハリウッドの伝説が、ベルリンでの名誉回顧展のために到着します。
back_translation: Veteran film director Matty Bonkers (Bob Rafelson), a Hollywood legend, arrives for a prestigious retrospective in Berlin.

text: da primeira seqM-|M-jncia de luta M-` piada que encerra a histM-sria , o espectador jamais desgruda os olhos da tela , saindo do cinema com a sensaM-gM-co de que gastou bem seu dinheiro .
translation: 戦闘の最初のシーンから物語を締めくくるジョークまで、観客は決してスクリーンから目を離すことなく、映画館を出るとお金を十分に使ったという感覚を抱きます。
back_translation: From the first scene of the battle to the joke that concludes the story, the audience never takes their eyes off the screen and leaves the theater feeling that they have spent their money well.

text: with a cast of non-actors , drawn from the very world which the film portrays , 'shooters ' is not just another british genre gangster film - it 's a film about real british gangsters .
translation: 非俳優のキャストを使い、映画が描く世界から選ばれた「シューティング」は、単なる英国のジャンルのギャング映画ではなく、実際の英国のギャングたちについての映画です。
back_translation: Using a cast of non-actors, the "shooting" chosen from the world depicted in the film is not just a British genre gangster movie, but a film about real British gangsters.

text: this 'blonde goddess ' , however , left her career at its peak to devote herself to a life of meditation and religious devotion , in the mountains of rio de janeiro .
translation: この「ブロンド・ゴッデス」は、リオデジャネイロの山々で瞑想と宗教的献身の生活を捧げるために、キャリアのピークでその道を離れました。
back_translation: This "Blonde Goddess" left her career at its peak to dedicate her life to meditation and religious devotion in the mountains of Rio de Janeiro.

text: holofcener sees all of her characters as loving and amazing and she spreads the love to each .
translation: ホロフセナーは彼女のすべてのキャラクターを愛しい素晴らしい存在として見ており、その愛をそれぞれに広めています。
back_translation: Holofusena sees all of her characters as beloved and wonderful beings, spreading that love to each of them.

text: they 're also neighbours , living with widower fathers and problem siblings in the suburbs of taipei .
translation: 彼らは台北の郊外で、未亡人の父親と問題を抱えた兄弟姉妹と一緒に暮らしている隣人でもあります。
back_translation: They are also neighbors living in the suburbs of Taipei with a widowed father and siblings who have issues.

text: the boys ' sparring , like the succession of blows dumped on guei , wears down the story 's more cerebral , and likable , plot elements .
translation: 少年たちのスパーリングは、ゲイに浴びせられる攻撃の連続のように、物語のより知的で好感の持てるプロット要素を弱めてしまう。
back_translation: The boys' sparring weakens the more intellectual and likable plot elements of the story, like a series of attacks directed at a gay person.

text: winnie falls inlove with one of the tucks , jesse , a `` 17 `` year old boy who shares the same feelings for her .
translation: ウィニーはタックスの一人、ジェシーに恋をする。ジェシーは彼女と同じ気持ちを抱く17歳の男の子である。
back_translation: Winnie falls in love with Jesse, one of the Tax members. Jesse is a 17-year-old boy who shares the same feelings for her.

text: in the 1800 's there was a woman that little children would take their old teeth ( ones they had recently lost ) to in exchange for a gold coin .
translation: 1800年代には、小さな子供たちが抜けた古い歯を持って行き、金貨と交換してもらう女性がいました。
back_translation: In the 1800s, there was a woman who would take the lost old teeth of small children and exchange them for gold coins.

text: may lack the pungent bite of its title , but it 's an enjoyable trifle nonetheless .
translation: そのタイトルの鋭い刺激が欠けているかもしれませんが、それでも楽しい小品です。
back_translation: It may lack the sharp stimulation of that title, but it is still an enjoyable piece.

text: soon discovering that they 're in a strange fourth dimension where our laws of physics do n't apply , they have to unravel the secrets of the `` hypercube `` in order to survive . . .
translation: 彼らは、物理法則が適用されない奇妙な第四の次元にいることをすぐに発見し、生き残るために「ハイパーキューブ」の秘密を解明しなければなりません…。
back_translation: They soon discover that they are in a strange fourth dimension where the laws of physics do not apply, and they must unravel the secrets of the "hypercube" in order to survive...

text: a zippy , enormously entertaining heist movie that , with a kind heart at its core , encompasses the styles of yesterday , today , and if we 're lucky , maybe even tomorrow .
translation: 心温まる要素を核に持ち、昨日、今日、そして運が良ければ明日までもスタイルを取り入れた、非常に面白くて活気のある強奪映画です。
back_translation: It's a very interesting and lively heist movie that carries heartwarming elements at its core, incorporating styles from yesterday, today, and hopefully tomorrow.

text: urban ground squirrels is the hilarious tale of love , friendship , and experiences set against the battlefield of a modern college campus .
translation: 「アーバン・グラウンド・スカイラルズ」は、現代の大学キャンパスという戦場を背景にした愛、友情、そして経験の面白い物語です。
back_translation: "Urban Ground Skylarks" is an interesting story about love, friendship, and experiences set against the backdrop of the battlefield of a modern university campus.

text: with this masterful , flawless film , [ wang ] emerges in the front ranks of china 's now numerous , world-renowned filmmakers .
translation: この卓越した完璧な映画で、[ワン]は中国の現在数多くいる世界的に有名な映画監督の中で最前線に立ちました。
back_translation: In this outstanding perfect film, [Wang] stands at the forefront among the many world-famous directors from China today.

text: meanwhile , dre is growing increasingly restless with his company 's focus on profit over artistry , which leads to signing the gimmicky duo ren and ten while ignoring the talented chris .
translation: 一方、ドクター・ドレーは、会社が芸術性よりも利益に焦点を当てることにますます苛立ちを感じており、その結果、才能あるクリスを無視して gimmicky なデュオ、レンとテンとの契約を結ぶことになります。
back_translation: On the other hand, Dr. Dre is increasingly frustrated with the company focusing more on profit than artistry, and as a result, he ends up signing a contract with the gimmicky duo Ren and Ten, ignoring the talented Chris.

text: the picture seems uncertain whether it wants to be an acidic all-male all about eve or a lush , swooning melodrama in the intermezzo strain .
translation: その絵は、酸味のある全男性の「イヴのすべて」になりたいのか、贅沢でうっとりするメロドラマの中間にしたいのか、どちらか不確かに見えます。
back_translation: The painting seems uncertain whether it wants to embody the "All of Eve" of all men with a tang, or be situated in the midst of a luxurious and enchanting melodrama.

text: the submarine 's crew , led by the unyielding captain alexi vostrikov , races against time to prevent a chernobyl-like nuclear disaster which threatens not only the lives of his crew , but has the potential to ignite a world war between the super powers .
translation: 潜水艦の乗組員は、揺るぎないキャプテン・アレクシー・ヴォストリコフの指導のもと、彼の乗組員の命だけでなく、超大国間の世界大戦を引き起こす可能性のあるチェルノブイリのような核災害を防ぐために時間との競争を繰り広げている。
back_translation: The crew of the submarine, under the unwavering leadership of Captain Alexei Vostrikov, is in a race against time not only to save the lives of his crew but also to prevent a nuclear disaster akin to Chernobyl, which could trigger a world war between superpowers.

text: jenny even turns to the flower girl - who is n't much help .
translation: ジェニーは花売り娘にさえ頼りますが、あまり役に立ちません。
back_translation: Jenny even relies on the flower-selling girl, but it doesn't help much.

text: one year later , in los angeles , the surviving team members create a smart and devious plan to steal back the gold and get their revenge on the traitor .
translation: 1年後、ロサンゼルスで、生き残ったチームメンバーは金を取り戻し、裏切り者に復讐するための賢く狡猾な計画を立てる。
back_translation: One year later, in Los Angeles, the surviving team members devise a clever and cunning plan to reclaim their money and take revenge on the traitor.

text: the pied piper production penned by christian otjen concerns a 36-year-old man ( brian wimmer ) who returns to his hometown to confront the harsh reality of his father 's supposed suicide .
translation: クリスチャン・オトジェンが脚本を手がけた『ハタリウム』は、36歳の男（ブライアン・ウィマー）が故郷に帰り、父の自殺とされる厳しい現実に立ち向かう物語です。
back_translation: "Hatarium," written by Christian Otjen, is a story about a 36-year-old man (Brian Wiemer) who returns to his hometown and confronts the harsh reality of his father's alleged suicide.

text: the brass are convinced this is a serial killer chosing victims at random , but sam and buckley discover a pattern involving health personnel who work in neonatal intensive care .
translation: 警察はこれがランダムに犠牲者を選ぶ連続殺人者であると確信していますが、サムとバックリーは新生児集中治療室で働く医療関係者に関わるパターンを発見します。
back_translation: The police are convinced that this is a serial killer who randomly selects victims, but Sam and Buckley discover a pattern involving medical personnel working in the neonatal intensive care unit.

text: zhang . . . has done an amazing job of getting realistic performances from his mainly nonprofessional cast .
translation: 張は主に素人のキャストからリアルな演技を引き出す素晴らしい仕事をしました。
back_translation: Zhang did a remarkable job of drawing out realistic performances from the mainly amateur cast.

text: it 's a beautifully accomplished lyrical meditation on a bunch of despondent and vulnerable characters living in the renown chelsea hotel . . .
translation: それは、名高いチェルシー・ホテルに住む絶望的で脆弱なキャラクターたちについての、美しく完成された詩的な瞑想です。。。
back_translation: It is a beautifully crafted poetic meditation on the desperate and fragile characters living in the famous Chelsea Hotel...

text: you see what he sees , you feel what he feels , you experience the horrible delusions and the verge of insanity as he struggles to find the thinning line between reality and the subconscious .
translation: あなたは彼が見ているものを見、彼が感じているものを感じ、彼が現実と無意識の間の薄れた境界を見つけようと奮闘する中での恐ろしい妄想と狂気の瀬戸際を体験します。
back_translation: You experience the horrific delusions and the brink of madness as you see what he sees, feel what he feels, and struggle to find the blurred boundary between reality and the unconscious.

text: part way through the filming , stevie is arrested and charged with a serious crime that tears his family apart .
translation: 撮影の途中、スティービーは逮捕され、家族を引き裂く重大な犯罪で起訴される。
back_translation: During the filming, Stevie was arrested and charged with a serious crime that tore his family apart.

text: riveting when it focuses on the challenges of crossing a generational divide .
translation: 世代のギャップを越える挑戦に焦点を当てるとき、心を引きつける。
back_translation: It is captivating when focusing on the challenge of bridging the generational gap.

text: the impact of the armenian genocide is diluted by too much stage business in the modern day .
translation: アルメニア genocide の影響は、現代において過度な舞台演出によって希薄化されている。
back_translation: The impact of the Armenian genocide is being diluted in modern times by excessive theatrical presentations.

text: windtalkers is shapelessly gratifying , the kind of movie that invites you to pick apart its faults even as you have to admit that somehow it hit you where you live .
translation: ウインドトーカーズは形のない満足感を与える映画であり、その欠点を分析したくなる一方で、なぜか自分の心に響いていることを認めざるを得ない作品です。
back_translation: Windtalkers is a movie that provides an intangible sense of satisfaction; while I want to analyze its shortcomings, I cannot help but acknowledge how it resonates with my heart.

text: a young boy is devastated when the planned vacation with his father is cancelled due to an emergency salvage mission at a remote canadian lake .
translation: 若い男の子は、遠くのカナダの湖での緊急救助ミッションのために父親との計画された休暇がキャンセルされてしまい、打ちひしがれています。
back_translation: A young boy is devastated because his planned vacation with his father has been canceled due to an emergency rescue mission at a distant lake in Canada.

text: a coming of age dramatic comedy dealing with the effect that two `` summers `` have on the lives of several teenagers .
translation: 数人のティーンエイジャーの人生における二つの「夏」がもたらす影響を描いた成長をテーマにしたドラマティック・コメディ。
back_translation: A coming-of-age dramatic comedy that portrays the impact of two "summers" on the lives of several teenagers.

text: what really makes it special is that it pulls us into its world , gives us a hero whose suffering and triumphs we can share , surrounds him with interesting characters and sends us out of the theater feeling we 've shared a great adventure .
translation: 本当に特別なのは、それが私たちをその世界に引き込んでくれ、私たちが共有できる主人公の苦悩と勝利を与えてくれることです。そして、彼を興味深いキャラクターたちに囲ませ、私たちが素晴らしい冒険を共有したという感覚を持って劇場を後にさせてくれます。
back_translation: What is truly special is that it pulls us into that world and provides us with the struggles and victories of the protagonist that we can share. It surrounds him with interesting characters and leaves us with a sense that we shared an amazing adventure as we exit the theater.

text: she is really hiding her true emotional motivation behind a mask .
translation: 彼女は本当の感情的な動機を仮面の裏に隠している。
back_translation: She hides her true emotional motives behind a mask.

text: it showcases carvey 's talent for voices , but not nearly enough and not without taxing every drop of one 's patience to get to the good stuff .
translation: それはカーヴィーの声の才能を示していますが、良い部分にたどり着くまでに忍耐を試されるほどではありません。
back_translation: It shows Curvy's vocal talent, but it doesn't test your patience to the point where you struggle to reach the good parts.

text: though the film is well-intentioned , one could rent the original and get the same love story and parable .
translation: 映画は善意で作られているとはいえ、オリジナルをレンタルすれば同じ愛の物語と寓話を楽しむことができます。
back_translation: Although movies are made with good intentions, by renting the original, you can enjoy the same stories of love and fables.

text: harry potter is in his second year of hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry .
translation: ハリー・ポッターはホグワーツ魔法魔術学校の2年生です。
back_translation: Harry Potter is a second-year student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

text: as the girls foil this threat and defeat an army of superpowered monkeys , the powerpuff girls learn that with great power comes great responsibility .
translation: ガールズがこの脅威を打ち砕き、超能力を持つ猿の軍隊を defeat する中で、パワーパフガールズは大きな力には大きな責任が伴うことを学びます。
back_translation: As the Girls crush this threat and defeat the army of superpowered monkeys, the Powerpuff Girls learn that with great power comes great responsibility.

text: the actors improvise and scream their way around this movie directionless , lacking any of the rollicking dark humor so necessary to make this kind of idea work on screen .
translation: 俳優たちは即興で叫びながら、方向性のないままこの映画を進めており、この種のアイデアを画面で成功させるために必要な痛快なダークユーモアが欠けています。
back_translation: The actors are progressing through this movie by improvising and shouting without direction, and it lacks the thrilling dark humor necessary to successfully convey this kind of idea onscreen.

text: usually when i get this much syrup , i like pancakes to go with it .
translation: 通常、これだけのシロップをもらうと、パンケーキと一緒に食べるのが好きです。
back_translation: Usually, when I get this much syrup, I like to eat it with pancakes.

text: it is then that they discover the myth of 'the bread in the bed ' - a huge bed full of money .
translation: それは彼らが「ベッドの中のパン」という神話を発見する時である - お金でいっぱいの巨大なベッド。
back_translation: It is the time when they discover the myth of "bread in bed" - a giant bed filled with money.

text: no , the dangerous lives of altar boys does not exist in a state of perfect grace . however , its sins are forgivably venial , because its virtues are palpably human .
translation: いいえ、聖職者の少年たちの危険な生活は完全な恵みの状態には存在しません。しかし、その罪は容赦できる軽微なものであり、なぜならその美徳は明らかに人間的だからです。
back_translation: No, the dangerous lives of the clerical boys do not exist in a state of complete grace. However, their sins are minor and forgivable because their virtues are clearly human.

text: a coming-of-age film that avoids the cartoonish clichM-is and sneering humor of the genre as it provides a fresh view of an old type -- the uncertain girl on the brink of womanhood .
translation: アニメーションのようなクリシェやジャンルの冷笑的なユーモアを避けつつ、女性への道を歩む不確かな女の子という古典的なタイプに新しい視点を提供する成長物語の映画。
back_translation: A coming-of-age film that offers a new perspective on the classic type of the uncertain girl walking the path to womanhood while avoiding cliched and genre-specific cynical humor typical of animation.

text: like being trapped inside a huge video game , where exciting , inane images keep popping past your head and the same illogical things keep happening over and over again .
translation: 巨大なビデオゲームの中に閉じ込められているようで、刺激的で無意味な映像が次々と頭の中を通り過ぎ、同じ非論理的なことが繰り返し起こり続ける。
back_translation: It feels like being trapped inside a massive video game, with exciting yet meaningless images continuously flashing through my mind, and the same illogical things keep happening over and over.

text: his house , container of lives and memories , is closed and locked .
translation: 彼の家は、人生と思い出の容器であり、閉じられ鍵がかけられています。
back_translation: His house is a container of life and memories, sealed and locked up.

text: the case gets more complicated , when even the police themselves appear to become suspects in the murders .
translation: 事件がさらに複雑になるのは、警察自身が殺人事件の容疑者に見えるようになるときです。
back_translation: The situation becomes even more complicated when the police themselves start to appear as suspects in the murder case.

text: watching spirited away is like watching an eastern imagination explode .
translation: 「千と千尋の神隠し」を観ることは、東洋の想像力が爆発するのを見るようなものです。
back_translation: Watching "Spirited Away" is like witnessing the explosion of Eastern imagination.

text: strong setup and ambitious goals fade as the film descends into unsophisticated scare tactics and b-film thuggery .
translation: 強力な設定と野心的な目標は、映画が未熟な恐怖戦術とB級映画の暴力に陥るにつれて薄れていく。
back_translation: The powerful setting and ambitious goals fade as the film falls into immature fear tactics and the violence of B-movies.

text: devoid of any of the qualities that made the first film so special .
translation: 初作を特別なものにした要素が全く欠けている。
back_translation: The elements that made the first work special are completely lacking.

text: in comparison to his earlier films it seems a disappointingly thin slice of lower-class london life ; despite the title . . . amounts to surprisingly little .
translation: 彼の以前の映画と比較すると、期待外れのほど薄い下層階級のロンドン生活の一断片に見える; タイトルにもかかわらず…驚くほど少ない。
back_translation: Compared to his previous films, it appears to be disappointingly thin; a glimpse of working-class life in London, despite the title... surprisingly little.

text: in order to preserve her art and also herself , beyond death , for all posterity , she has herself cloned .
translation: 彼女は自身の芸術と自分自身を死後も全ての後世のために保存するために、自らクローンを作った。
back_translation: She created a clone of herself to preserve her art and herself for all future generations after her death.

text: it 's a mindless action flick with a twist -- far better suited to video-viewing than the multiplex .
translation: これはひねりのある無神経なアクション映画で、 multiplex よりもビデオ視聴に適しています。
back_translation: This is a twisty, insensitive action movie that is more suitable for video viewing than for a multiplex.

text: it 's excessively quirky and a little underconfident in its delivery , but otherwise this is the best 'old neighborhood ' project since christopher walken kinda romanced cyndi lauper in the opportunists .
translation: それは過剰に奇抜で、提供に少し自信がないが、それ以外はクリストファー・ウォーケンが「オポチュニスト」でシンディ・ローパーにロマンを捧げた以来、最高の「旧い近所」プロジェクトだ。
back_translation: It's excessively extravagant, and I'm a bit unsure about the offering, but other than that, it's the best "old neighborhood" project since Christopher Walken dedicated a romance to Cyndi Lauper in "Opportunist."

text: april 's shower is a comedy about love , romance and expectation .
translation: 4月の雨は恋、ロマンス、期待についてのコメディです。
back_translation: April Showers is a comedy about love, romance, and anticipation.

text: kilo is now a free man and a new father with a drug franchise covering both coasts .
translation: キロは今、自由の身で新しい父親となり、両海岸をカバーするドラッグフランチャイズを持っています。
back_translation: Kilo is now free, has become a new father, and has a drug franchise that covers both coasts.

text: hitting the road in a brand-new suv , they 're having the time of their lives until something funny happens on the way to the monster truck show in reno .
translation: 真新しいSUVで出発し、彼らは人生の最高の時を過ごしていますが、リノのモンスタートラックショーへ向かう途中で面白いことが起こります。
back_translation: They set off in a brand new SUV and are having the time of their lives, but something interesting happens on their way to the monster truck show in Reno.

text: as laughable is his vanity fair interview , incriminating of `` the gay mafia `` for his fall , `` my dinner with ovitz `` is even funnier as it rams the actual interview headlong into coppola 's `` godfather . ``
translation: 彼のバニティ・フェアのインタビューが笑えるように、彼の失墜の原因として「ゲイ・マフィア」を非難するその内容は、さらに面白く、「オヴィッツとの夕食」が実際のインタビューをコッポラの「ゴッドファーザー」に思いっきりぶつける様子が描かれています。
back_translation: His Vanity Fair interview is amusing as it blames the "gay mafia" as the cause of his downfall, and the content is even more entertaining, depicting the "dinner with Ovitz" colliding with Coppola's "The Godfather" in the actual interview.

text: peter pan 's quest to return jane safely home is jeopardized until she can begin to believe in the magic of imagination .
translation: ピーターパンのジェーンを無事に家に帰すための冒険は、彼女が想像の魔法を信じ始めるまで危険にさらされています。
back_translation: The adventure to safely return Jane from Peter Pan home is threatened until she begins to believe in the magic of imagination.

text: a literate presentation that wonderfully weaves a murderous event in 1873 with murderous rage in 2002 .
translation: 1873年の殺人事件と2002年の殺人の怒りを見事に織り交ぜた読みごたえのあるプレゼンテーション。
back_translation: A compelling presentation that skillfully interweaves the murder case of 1873 with the anger surrounding the murder in 2002.

text: based on a david leavitt story , the film shares that writer 's usual blend of observant cleverness , too-facile coincidence and slightly noxious preciousness .
translation: デイビッド・リーヴィットの物語に基づくこの映画は、作家のいつもの観察力のある賢さ、あまりにも簡単な偶然、そしてわずかに嫌悪感を覚える上品さを組み合わせています。
back_translation: This film, based on the story of David Levithan, combines the writer's usual observant wit, overly simple coincidences, and a touch of distasteful elegance.

text: it 's not a film to be taken literally on any level , but its focus always appears questionable .
translation: それはどのレベルでも文字通りに受け取るべき映画ではありませんが、その焦点は常に疑問に思えるものです。
back_translation: It is not a film that should be taken literally at any level, but its focus always seems to be on what is questionable.

text: in this sense it is merely a travelogue , yet there is so much more , spanning from the traditional to the avant-garde , from the sublime to the ridiculous , very different , highly original and with a unique zeitgeist narrative structure .
translation: この意味では単なる旅行記に過ぎませんが、伝統からアバンギャルド、崇高さから滑稽さまで、非常に異なり、非常に独創的で、独特の時代精神の物語構造を持つ、もっと多くのものがあります。
back_translation: In this sense, it is merely a travelogue, but it encompasses much more, with a narrative structure that is very different, highly original, and unique to the spirit of the times, ranging from tradition to avant-garde, and from nobility to absurdity.

text: one day , a girl walks into his store , who looks like larry 's lost love from morocco .
translation: ある日、女の子が彼の店に入ってくる。彼女はラリーのモロッコの失われた愛のように見える。
back_translation: One day, a girl walks into his shop. She looks like Larry's lost love from Morocco.

text: gradually we learn of joe 's past relationship with the dead woman .
translation: 徐々にジョーの故人との過去の関係が明らかになってきます。
back_translation: Gradually, Joe's past relationship with the deceased is revealed.

text: the secrets of time travel will have been discovered , indulged in and rejected as boring before i see this piece of crap again .
translation: タイムトラベルの秘密は、私がこのクソみたいなものを再び見る前に、発見され、楽しませられ、退屈だと拒否されるだろう。
back_translation: The secret to time travel will be discovered before I have to see this crappy thing again, allowing me to be entertained and to reject boredom.

text: my little eye is the best little `` horror `` movie i 've seen in years .
translation: 私の小さな目は、私がここ数年で見た最高の小さな「ホラー」映画です。
back_translation: My little eyes have seen the best little "horror" movie in the past few years.

text: `` in that sleep of death what dreams may come . . ``
translation: その死の眠りの中に、どんな夢が訪れるのか。。。
back_translation: What kind of dreams will come to visit in that deathly sleep...?

text: now , along with other surviors , jill valentine , claire redfield and carlos oliviera , they must fight to survive , to escape the nightmare that has plauged raccoon city .
translation: 現在、他の生存者と共にジル・バレンタイン、クレア・レッドフィールド、カルロス・オリベイラは、ラクーンシティを襲った悪夢から逃れるために生き残るための戦いを繰り広げなければなりません。
back_translation: Currently, along with other survivors, Jill Valentine, Claire Redfield, and Carlos Oliveira must fight to survive and escape the nightmare that struck Raccoon City.

text: the dramatic scenes are frequently unintentionally funny , and the action sequences -- clearly the main event -- are surprisingly uninvolving .
translation: ドラマチックなシーンはしばしば意図せず面白く、アクションシーケンスは明らかにメインイベントですが、驚くほど没入感を欠いています。
back_translation: Dramatic scenes are often unintentionally amusing, and while the action sequences are clearly the main event, they surprisingly lack immersion.

text: the merchant-ivory team continues to systematically destroy everything we hold dear about cinema , only now it 's begun to split up so that it can do even more damage .
translation: マーチャント・アイヴォリーのチームは、私たちが映画に抱く大切なものを体系的に破壊し続けており、今ではさらに多くの損害を与えるために分裂し始めています。
back_translation: The Merchant Ivory team continues to systematically destroy the important things we hold dear in cinema, and now they have also begun to split apart to cause even more damage.

text: when the movie mixes the cornpone and the cosa nostra , it finds a nice rhythm .
translation: 映画がコーンポンとコーサ・ノストラを組み合わせると、心地よいリズムが生まれます。
back_translation: When movies combine Cornpone and Cosa Nostra, a pleasant rhythm is created.

text: when his father decides that it 's time for tough love , he does n't pay his tuition .
translation: 彼の父親が厳しい愛の時間だと決めたとき、彼は授業料を払わない。
back_translation: When his father decided it was time for tough love, he did not pay for the tuition.

text: the deeper matt runs into the forest the farther his mind is lost to the blackwoods .
translation: マットが森の奥深くに走り込むほど、彼の心はブラックウッズにさらに失われていく。
back_translation: The deeper Matt runs into the forest, the more his mind gets lost in the Blackwoods.

text: erin , who we discover is a master manipulator of the men in the gang , reveals another side to jack - a melancholy romantic who could have been a classical pianist .
translation: エリンは、ギャングの男たちを巧みに操る達人であることが分かり、ジャックのもう一つの側面を明らかにします。それは、クラシック音楽のピアニストになれたかもしれない、メランコリックなロマンティストです。
back_translation: Erin reveals that she is a master at skillfully manipulating gang men, uncovering another side of Jack. He is a melancholic romantic who might have become a classical music pianist.

text: the milieu is wholly unconvincing . . . and the histrionics reach a truly annoying pitch .
translation: その環境はまったく説得力がなく、演技が本当にイライラさせるレベルに達しています。
back_translation: The environment is completely unconvincing, and the acting has reached a truly frustrating level.

text: plot , characters , drama , emotions , ideas -- all are irrelevant to the experience of seeing the scorpion king .
translation: プロット、キャラクター、ドラマ、感情、アイデア -- すべては「スコーピオン・キング」を見る体験にとって無関係です。
back_translation: Plot, characters, drama, emotions, ideas -- everything is irrelevant to the experience of watching "The Scorpion King."

text: considering his profession could be a very dangerous occupation .
translation: 彼の職業を考えると、とても危険な職業かもしれません。
back_translation: Considering his profession, it might be a very dangerous job.

text: she scorned him for not standing by her and they parted forever with a heart-broken paro entering into a chaste marriage with a wealthy , much older man , zamindar bhuvan ( vijayendra ghagte ) , while a shattered devdas walked towards anguish , alcoholism & # 38 ; chandramukhi ( madhuri dixit ) .
translation: 彼女は彼が自分のそばにいてくれなかったことを軽蔑し、心が壊れたパロは裕福でずっと年上の男、ザミンダール・ブバン（ビジャイエンドラ・ガフテ）との純粋な結婚に入った。壊れたデヴダスは苦悩、アルコール依存、そしてチャンドラムキ（マドゥリ・ディクシット）へと歩んでいった。
back_translation: She despised him for not being by her side, and heartbroken, Paro entered into a pure marriage with a wealthy and much older man, Zamindar Buban (Vijayendra Ghatge). The broken Devdas fell into despair, alcoholism, and wandered towards Chandramukhi (Madhuri Dixit).

text: if they get caught cheating again stark will make a note in their permanent records and possibly kill their chances of getting into college .
translation: もし再びカンニングが見つかった場合、スタークは彼らの永久記録にメモを残し、大学への進学の可能性を潰すことになるかもしれません。
back_translation: If cheating is found again, Stark may leave a note on their permanent records, potentially crushing their chances of attending college.

text: a moving portrait of a man who has lost his place in the world .
translation: 世界での自分の居場所を失った男の感動的な肖像。
back_translation: An emotional portrait of a man who has lost his place in the world.

text: the guilt that he feels has altered his sense of reality , making matt 's life a mystery full of shadows and phantoms .
translation: 彼が感じる罪悪感は、彼の現実感を変え、マットの生活を影や幻で満ちた謎にしています。
back_translation: The guilt he feels changes his sense of reality and fills Matt's life with shadows and mysteries.

text: 'in this poor remake of such a well loved classic , parker exposes the limitations of his skill and the basic flaws in his vision . '
translation: 「この愛されているクラシックの貧弱なリメイクにおいて、パーカーは自らの技術の限界と彼のビジョンの基本的な欠陥をさらけ出しています。」
back_translation: "In this poorly executed remake of the beloved classic, Parker exposes the limitations of his own skills and the fundamental flaws in his vision."

text: though frodo 's quest remains unfulfilled , a hardy group of determined new zealanders has proved its creative mettle .
translation: フロドの quest は未達成のままであるが、決意の固いニュージーランド人の強靭なグループがその創造力を証明した。
back_translation: Frodo's quest remains unfulfilled, but a determined group of resilient New Zealanders has proven their creativity.

text: but he strongly believed testing was needed for all actors & # 38 ; actresses in the porn industry .
translation: 彼はポルノ業界のすべての俳優と女優に対してテストが必要だと強く信じていました。
back_translation: He strongly believed that all actors and actresses in the porn industry should be tested.

text: the story unveils three high school seniors who dress and live by the philosophy of `` goth , `` good friends and great rebels : digger , noisy , and dvd .
translation: その物語は、「ゴス」と呼ばれる哲学を持ち、強い友人関係と偉大な反逆者として生きる3人の高校3年生を明らかにします：ディガー、ノイジー、そしてDVDです。
back_translation: The story reveals three high school seniors who live as strong friends and great rebels, adhering to a philosophy called "Goth": Digger, Noisy, and DVD.

text: there 's ushi , harry 's lawyer , who knows something about harry lena does n't know , eddie , a friend of harry and his new girlfriend pol , and at last , there are two policemen who are in fact unwelcome .
translation: うし、ハリーの弁護士で、ハリーのことをレナが知らない何かを知っている、ハリーの友人エディと彼の新しい彼女ポル、そして最後に、実際には歓迎されていない二人の警官がいます。
back_translation: There is a lawyer for Harry named Ushi, who knows something that Lena doesn’t know about Harry, a friend of Harry's named Eddie and his new girlfriend Pol, and lastly, there are two police officers who are actually not welcome.

text: though howard demonstrates a great eye as a director , this southern gothic drama is sadly a tough sit , with an undeveloped narrative and enough flashbacks and heavy-handed metaphors to choke a horse -- or at least slow him down to a canter .
translation: ハワードは監督として素晴らしい目を持っているものの、このサザン・ゴシックドラマは残念ながら観るのがつらい作品で、発展途上の物語と、馬を窒息させるほどのフラッシュバックや重過ぎるメタファーが豊富で、少なくとも馬場走行に減速させることになっている。
back_translation: Although Howard has a great eye as a director, this Southern Gothic drama is unfortunately a difficult watch, filled with an underdeveloped story and an abundance of flashbacks and overly heavy metaphors that at least slow down the pace of the narrative.

text: more intimate than spectacular , e . t . is carried less by wow factors than by its funny , moving yarn that holds up well after two decades .
translation: 壮大さよりも親密さが際立つ『E.T.』は、驚きの要素よりも感情豊かでユーモラスな物語に支えられており、20年経っても色あせることはありません。
back_translation: "E.T." stands out more for its intimacy than its grandeur, supported by an emotionally rich and humorous story rather than elements of surprise, and it has not faded even after 20 years.

text: his exciting and stylish life as a drug lord seems to have come to a halt .
translation: 彼の薬物王としての刺激的でスタイリッシュな生活は、停滞しているようです。
back_translation: His exciting and stylish life as a drug lord seems to be stagnant.

text: a smart comedy about a day in the life of a barbershop on the south side of chicago .
translation: シカゴ南側のバーバーショップでの一日の生活を描いたスマートなコメディ。
back_translation: A smart comedy depicting a day in the life at a barbershop on the south side of Chicago.

text: crumbling yerba city stands empty , except for its drug-parlors , where the remnants of the population cluster , drifting towards oblivion .
translation: 崩れかけた耶爾バシティは空っぽで、麻薬パーラーだけが残り、そこに人口の残りが集まり、忘却へと漂っています。
back_translation: The crumbling Yalbashiti is empty, with only a drug parlor remaining, where the rest of the population gathers, drifting into oblivion.

text: nobody seems to have cared much about any aspect of it , from its cheesy screenplay to the grayish quality of its lighting to its last-minute , haphazard theatrical release .
translation: 誰もそのどの側面にもあまり気を使っていないようで、安っぽい脚本から灰色がかった照明の質、そして最後の瞬間に慌ただしく公開された劇場版まで。
back_translation: It seems that no one is paying much attention to any aspect of it, from the cheap script to the grayish quality of the lighting, and even to the hurried release of the movie version at the last moment.

text: especially one of them , holo tokyo boy , was designed to be her lover .
translation: 特にその中の一人、ホロ東京ボーイは、彼女の恋人としてデザインされました。
back_translation: In particular, one of them, Holo Tokyo Boy, was designed as her boyfriend.

text: on the case , he soon deducts that the killer , who staged the murder to look like a random robbery , may actually be a serial killer terry was trailing for years in the fbi .
translation: 事件を調査する中で、彼はすぐに、殺人をランダムな強盗のように見せかけた殺人者が、実際にはFBIでテリーが数年間追っていたシリアルキラーである可能性があることを推測します。
back_translation: While investigating the case, he quickly speculates that the murderer, who made the murder appear to be a random robbery, could actually be a serial killer that Terry had been追踪 for several years with the FBI.

text: time changer may not be the most memorable cinema session but its profound self-evaluation message about our fragile existence and the absence of spiritual guidance should at least invade an abundance of mindsets
translation: 「タイムチェンジャー」は最も記憶に残る映画のセッションではないかもしれませんが、私たちの脆弱な存在と精神的な導きの欠如についての深い自己評価メッセージは、少なくとも多くの心に浸透するべきです。
back_translation: "Time Changer" may not be the most memorable film session, but its deep self-reflective message about our fragile existence and the lack of spiritual guidance should resonate in the hearts of many.

text: aka birdseye is the saga of an obsessive colorado sheriff and his trusting teenage son , who risk it all when their twisted reconstruction of a mysterious kidnapping case escalates into a dangerous hunt for a mythical swiss criminal .
translation: エイカバードアイは、執着するコロラドの保安官と彼の信頼するティーンエイジャーの息子の物語で、彼らは神秘的な誘拐事件の歪んだ再構築が危険な神話のスイスの犯罪者を追う冒険に発展する際にすべてを賭ける。
back_translation: A Cabot is a story about a Colorado sheriff obsessed with a mysterious kidnapping case and his trusted teenage son, as they risk everything in an adventure that unfolds into a dangerous myth while pursuing a Swiss criminal.

text: with virtually no interesting elements for an audience to focus on , chelsea walls is a triple-espresso endurance challenge .
translation: 興味を引く要素がほとんどないため、チェルシー・ウォールズはトリプルエスプレッソの持久力チャレンジです。
back_translation: Chelsea Walls is a test of endurance for triple espresso, as it has almost no elements to attract interest.

text: a delightful fable about the enduring value of literature .
translation: 文学の永続的な価値についての楽しい寓話。
back_translation: A fun fable about the enduring value of literature.

text: little more than a stylish exercise in revisionism whose point . . . is no doubt true , but serves as a rather thin moral to such a knowing fable .
translation: スタイリッシュな修正主義の運動に過ぎないもので、その要点は確かに真実ですが、そうした知的な寓話に対してはやや薄っぺらい道徳として機能しています。
back_translation: It is merely a stylish movement of revisionism, and while its main points are certainly true, it functions somewhat as a superficial morality against such intellectual parables.

text: the film focuses on a morally conscious assassin called quinn .
translation: 映画は、倫理的な意識を持つ暗殺者クインに焦点を当てています。
back_translation: The movie focuses on Quinn, an assassin with a sense of ethical awareness.

text: together they flee to the city of hamburg and smuggle with them what used to be the greatest export of the vikings , an icelandic falcon .
translation: 彼らは一緒にハンブルクの街に逃げ、かつてバイキングの最大の輸出品であったアイスランドのハヤブサを密輸します。
back_translation: They escape to the city of Hamburg together and smuggle Icelandic falcons, which were once the Vikings' greatest export.

text: henrik , the young cook , is hopelessly in love with enchanting elena , but lacks the courage to dance with her .
translation: 若き料理人ヘンリックは魅力的なエレナに hopelessly 愛しているが、彼女と踊る勇気がない。
back_translation: The young chef Henrik is hopelessly in love with the enchanting Elena, but he lacks the courage to dance with her.

text: the second : a saturday two years later , where charlotte and cecil now a couple , fight , break-up and finally reunite .
translation: 2年後の土曜日、シャーロットとセシルはカップルとなり、喧嘩し、別れ、そして最終的に再会する。
back_translation: Two years later on a Saturday, Charlotte and Cecil become a couple, fight, break up, and eventually reunite.

text: flashy gadgets and whirling fight sequences may look cool , but they ca n't distract from the flawed support structure holding equilibrium up .
translation: 派手なガジェットや回転する戦闘シーンはクールに見えるかもしれませんが、均衡を支えている欠陥のあるサポート構造から目を逸らすことはできません。
back_translation: While flashy gadgets and spinning battle scenes may look cool, one cannot ignore the flawed support structure that underpins the balance.

text: he has a vast knowledge of modern photography and develops photos for various customers at the sav-mart .
translation: 彼は現代の写真に関する広範な知識を持ち、サヴマートでさまざまな顧客のために写真を現像しています。
back_translation: He has extensive knowledge of modern photography and develops photographs for various clients at Savmart.

text: the worst pain for him is the next 5 minutes of living .
translation: 彼にとって最悪の痛みは、これからの5分間の生きていることだ。
back_translation: The worst pain for him is being alive for the next five minutes.

text: the two men ( anthony and michael ) are successful in the high tech world of silicon valley , and have known each other since childhood .
translation: 二人の男（アンソニーとマイケル）はシリコンバレーのハイテク界で成功を収めており、子供の頃からの知り合いです。
back_translation: Two men (Anthony and Michael) have succeeded in the high-tech industry of Silicon Valley and have known each other since childhood.

text: she 's at a dead end , married to edgar ( henry thomas ) , a petty thief who had his shot and missed long ago , but is too dense to realize it .
translation: 彼女は行き詰まりにいて、エドガー（ヘンリー・トーマス）という小悪党と結婚している。彼は昔チャンスを掴んだが失敗し、それを理解するには鈍感すぎる。
back_translation: She is stuck and married to a petty villain named Edgar (Henry Thomas). He had a chance in the past but failed, and he is too oblivious to understand that.

text: not exaggerated enough to be a parody of gross-out flicks , college flicks , or even flicks in general . it merely indulges in the worst elements of all of them .
translation: それは、グロテスクな映画や大学の映画、さらには映画一般のパロディになりきれていないほど誇張されていない。ただ単に、それらすべての最悪の要素に耽溺している。
back_translation: It is not exaggerated enough to be a parody of grotesque movies, university films, or movies in general. It simply indulges in all the worst elements of them.

text: one thing has been made very clear -- being john malkovich was n't a fluke .
translation: 一つのことは非常に明確になった - ジョン・マルコビッチになったのは偶然ではなかった。
back_translation: One thing has become very clear - it was not by chance that I became John Malkovich.

text: when eliza discovers that poachers in africa 's serengeti desert plan to kill an elephant herd with an electrified fence , she and her chimpanzee friend darwin must somehow find a way to stop them .
translation: エリザがアフリカのセレンゲティ砂漠で密猟者たちが象の群れを電気フェンスで殺そうとしていることを発見したとき、彼女と彼女のチンパンジーの友達ダーヴィンは、なんとか彼らを止める方法を見つけなければなりません。
back_translation: When Eliza discovered that poachers were trying to kill a herd of elephants with electric fences in the Serengeti Desert in Africa, she and her chimpanzee friend Darwin had to find a way to stop them.

text: anna strikes a deal with vikrant that he 'll kill guru and acquire the prize money offered by him .
translation: アンナはヴィクランと取引し、彼がグルを殺して賞金を獲得することに同意します。
back_translation: Anna makes a deal with Vikran, agreeing that he will kill the guru and earn the bounty.

text: there are problems with this film that even 3 oscar winners ca n't overcome , but it 's a nice girl-buddy movie once it gets rock-n-rolling .
translation: この映画には、3人のオスカー受賞者でも克服できない問題がありますが、ロックンロールが始まると素敵な女友達映画になります。
back_translation: This movie has a problem that even three Oscar winners cannot overcome, but once the rock and roll starts, it becomes a wonderful female friend movie.

text: a clash between the artificial structure of the story and the more contemporary , naturalistic tone of the film . . .
translation: 物語の人工的な構造と、より現代的で自然主義的な映画のトーンとの対立。
back_translation: The contradiction between the artificial structure of the narrative and the more modern, naturalistic tone of the film.

text: lightbulbs , fire , barbed wire , mousetraps , staple guns , thumbtacks and glass are weapons of choice in the backyard .
translation: 庭では、電球、火、バーブドワイヤー、ネズミ捕り、ホチキス、画鋲、そしてガラスが好まれた武器です。
back_translation: In the garden, light bulbs, fire, barbed wire, mouse traps, staplers, push pins, and glass were preferred weapons.

text: there 's nothing more satisfying during a summer of event movies than a spy thriller like the bourne identity that 's packed with just as much intelligence as action .
translation: 夏のイベント映画の中で、アクションと同じくらい知性に満ちたスパイスリラー「ボーン・アイデンティティ」のような作品ほど満足感のあるものはありません。
back_translation: There is nothing as satisfying as a summer event movie that is as rich in intelligence as it is in action, like the spicy thriller "The Bourne Identity."

text: out of money and out of luck ambitious sophie pressures marie into accepting a lucrative job as surrogate mother .
translation: お金も運もない野心的なソフィーは、マリーに代理母としての有利な仕事を受け入れるよう圧力をかける。
back_translation: Sophie, who is ambitious but has neither money nor luck, pressures Marie to accept a profitable job as a surrogate.

text: eventually moves and stirs you , even if it often resembles those steamy mexican tv dramas/soap operas called telenovelas .
translation: 最終的にはあなたを動かし、感動させます。それはしばしばメキシコのテレビドラマやソープオペラであるテレノベラに似ているとしても。
back_translation: In the end, it will move you and touch your heart, even if it often resembles the telenovelas found in Mexican television dramas and soap operas.

text: the trouble with making this queen a thoroughly modern maiden is that it also makes her appear foolish and shallow rather than , as was more likely , a victim of mental illness .
translation: この女王を完全に現代的な乙女にすることの問題は、彼女を愚かで浅はかに見せることであり、むしろ彼女が精神的な疾患の犠牲者である可能性が高いということです。
back_translation: The problem with turning this queen into a completely modern young woman is that it makes her appear foolish and shallow, rather than highlighting the likelihood that she is more a victim of mental illness.

text: sands also convinces jorge ramirez ( retired-fbi , has old scores to settle with barrillo ) to come out of retirement and take out barrillo and dr . guevera ( personal dr . to barrillo , killed jorge 's partner a long time ago ) , who brutally tortured and killed ramirez ' fbi partner .
translation: サンズはジョルヘ・ラミレス（引退したFBI、バリーロと古い因縁がある）を引退から引き戻し、バリーロとドクター・ゲベラ（バリーロの個人医師で、昔ジョルヘのパートナーを殺した）を排除するように説得します。ゲベラはラミレスのFBIパートナーを残虐に拷問して殺しました。
back_translation: Sands brings Jorge Ramirez (a retired FBI agent with a long-standing feud with Balirro) back from retirement and persuades him to eliminate Balirro and Dr. Guevara (Balirro's personal physician, who once killed Jorge's partner). Guevara brutally tortured and killed Ramirez's FBI partner.

text: welles groupie/scholar peter bogdanovich took a long time to do it , but he 's finally provided his own broadside at publishing giant william randolph hearst .
translation: ウェルズの熱心なファンであり学者でもあるピーター・ボグダノヴィッチは、長い時間をかけてついに出版大手ウィリアム・ランドルフ・ハーストに対する自身の反論を提供しました。
back_translation: Peter Bogdanovich, an avid fan and scholar of Wells, has finally provided his rebuttal to the major publisher William Randolph Hearst after a long time.

text: connor and murphy are quite content with this `` natural `` life and their pasts begin to seem faded and worn .
translation: コナーとマーフィーは、この「自然な」生活に満足しており、彼らの過去は薄れて古びたものに思え始めている。
back_translation: Connor and Murphy are satisfied with this "natural" life, and their past is starting to feel faded and outdated.

text: nine good teeth reveals many of the common truths hidden away in all our families , as well as the unexpected - late night visits from jack kerouac , illicit love affairs and the occasional murder .
translation: 「九の良い歯は、私たちの家族に隠された多くの一般的な真実や、ジャック・ケルアックの深夜の訪問、違法な恋愛、時折の殺人といった予期せぬ出来事を明らかにします。」
back_translation: "The good teeth of nine reveal many common truths hidden within our family, as well as unexpected events such as Jack Kerouac's late-night visits, illegal romances, and occasional murders."

text: very well made , but does n't generate a lot of tension .
translation: 非常によく作られていますが、多くの緊張感を生み出していません。
back_translation: It is very well made, but it does not generate a lot of tension.

text: red and the boys embark on a road trip across the country , en route to a duct tape festival in the usa , where they intend to win first prize by creating a sculpture made of at least 50 % duct tape .
translation: レッドと彼の仲間たちは、アメリカのダクトテープフェスティバルに向けて国中を旅するロードトリップに出発します。彼らは、少なくとも50％のダクトテープで作られた彫刻を作ることで最優秀賞を獲得するつもりです。
back_translation: Red and his friends set off on a road trip across the country heading to the American Duct Tape Festival. They plan to win the grand prize by creating a sculpture made of at least 50% duct tape.

text: it will definitely keep you on the edge of your seat because of the blood and gore or the good looking babes .
translation: 血と gore、あるいは魅力的な美女のために、あなたを確実に興奮させ続けるでしょう。
back_translation: Blood and gore, or for the sake of alluring beauties, will surely keep you constantly excited.

text: as his circle of friends keeps getting smaller one of the characters in long time dead says 'i 'm telling you , this is f * * * ed ' . maybe he was reading the minds of the audience .
translation: 彼の友人の輪がどんどん狭まっていく中で、「長い間死んでいる」の登場人物の一人が「言っているだろ、これは最悪だ」と言います。もしかしたら、彼は観客の思いを読んでいたのかもしれません。
back_translation: As his circle of friends continues to shrink, one of the characters in "Long-Time Dead" says, "You see, this is the worst." Perhaps he was reading the audience's feelings.

text: a movie so bad that it quickly enters the pantheon of wreckage that includes battlefield earth and showgirls .
translation: あまりにも悪すぎて、「バトルフィールド・アース」や「ショーガールズ」を含む荒廃の殿堂にすぐに入る映画。
back_translation: So bad that it will soon be inducted into the hall of shame that includes "Battlefield Earth" and "Showgirls."

text: it 's hard to fairly judge a film like ringu when you 've seen the remake first . many of the effective horror elements are dampened through familiarity , [ yet ] are worthwhile .
translation: リングのような映画を公平に評価するのは、リメイクを先に見てしまうと難しいです。多くの効果的なホラー要素は親しみを感じることで薄れてしまいますが、それでも価値があります。
back_translation: Fairly evaluating a movie like "The Ring" becomes difficult if you've seen the remake first. Many effective horror elements lose their impact due to familiarity, but it is still worthwhile.

text: may be far from the best of the series , but it 's assured , wonderfully respectful of its past and thrilling enough to make it abundantly clear that this movie phenomenon has once again reinvented itself for a new generation .
translation: シリーズの中で最高からは遠いかもしれませんが、確実に過去を尊重し、新しい世代のために再び生まれ変わったことを明確に示すほど十分に刺激的です。
back_translation: It may be far from the best in the series, but it is certainly stimulating enough to clearly show that it respects the past and has been reborn for a new generation.

text: an instantly forgettable snow-and-stuntwork extravaganza that likely will be upstaged by an avalanche of more appealing holiday-season product .
translation: 瞬時に忘れ去られる雪とスタントの大作で、魅力的なホリデーシーズンの作品の雪崩に埋もれる可能性が高い。
back_translation: It is likely to be buried under an avalanche of captivating holiday season works in a momentarily forgotten masterpiece of snow and stunts.

text: he 's lost his super powers , and it will take all of bachelorman 's skill and cunning to get his lois lane back .
translation: 彼は超能力を失ってしまい、ロイス・レインを取り戻すためには、バチェラーマンのすべての技術と狡猾さが必要になる。
back_translation: He has lost his superpowers, and to regain Lois Lane, he will need all the skills and cunning of a bachelor.

text: american and european cinema has amassed a vast holocaust literature , but it is impossible to think of any film more challenging or depressing than the grey zone .
translation: アメリカとヨーロッパの映画は膨大なホロコースト文学を蓄積してきましたが、「グレーゾーン」よりも挑戦的で抑圧的な映画を考えることは不可能です。
back_translation: American and European films have accumulated a vast body of Holocaust literature, but it is impossible to think of a more challenging and oppressive film than "The Grey Zone."

text: the film includes victim discussion therapy sessions , phone councilling , conversations between police and abusers , arrests , debates and discussion between the workers at the refuge , trying to decide what should be done about certain cases .
translation: この映画には、被害者のディスカッションセラピーセッション、電話カウンセリング、警察と加害者の会話、逮捕、避難所のスタッフ間の議論や討論が含まれており、特定のケースについて何をすべきかを決定しようとしています。
back_translation: This movie includes discussions from the victim's therapy sessions, phone counseling, conversations between the police and the perpetrator, arrests, and discussions and debates among the shelter staff, all trying to decide what to do about a specific case.

text: blueberry is stationed in the little town of palomito as sheriff .
translation: ブルーベリーは小さな町パロミトに保安官として駐在しています。
back_translation: Blueberry is stationed as a sheriff in the small town of Palomito.

text: a subtle , poignant picture of goodness that is flawed , compromised and sad .
translation: 欠点があり、妥協し、悲しみを帯びた善の微妙で感動的な描写。
back_translation: A delicate and emotionally touching depiction of good that has flaws, compromises, and a tinge of sadness.

text: tess and her daughter anna are always fighting and they think each other do n't see how hard their life is .
translation: テスと彼女の娘アンナはいつも争っています。お互いがどれだけ大変な生活をしているかを理解していないと思っています。
back_translation: Tess and her daughter Anna are always arguing. They think that each does not understand how difficult the other's life is.

text: this version 's no classic like its predecessor , but its pleasures are still plentiful .
translation: このバージョンはその前作のようなクラシックではありませんが、それでも楽しみは豊富です。
back_translation: This version may not be a classic like its predecessor, but it still offers plenty of enjoyment.

text: cul de sac is a story about a man who tries to end his life unsuccessfully .
translation: 「カール・デ・サック」は、自分の命を絶とうとするも成功しない男の物語です。
back_translation: "Carrefour" is the story of a man who attempts to take his own life but fails.

text: though clearly well-intentioned , this cross-cultural soap opera is painfully formulaic and stilted .
translation: 明らかに善意に満ちているが、このクロスカルチュラル・ソープオペラは痛々しいほど定型的でぎこちない。
back_translation: While clearly filled with good intentions, this cross-cultural soap opera is painfully stereotypical and awkward.

text: kar is an unlikely candidate , a streetwise young man whose only interest is himself .
translation: カールはありそうもない候補者で、自分だけに興味を持つストリートスマートな若者です。
back_translation: Karl seems like an unlikely candidate and is a street-smart young man who is only interested in himself.

text: julian , a young heroin addict tattoos a ouija board on his back to communicate with a spirit he has known .
translation: ジュリアンは、若いヘロイン中毒者で、彼が知っている精霊とコミュニケーションをとるために、自分の背中にウィジャボードのタトゥーを入れます。
back_translation: Julian is a young heroin addict who gets a Ouija board tattoo on his back to communicate with the spirits he knows.

text: the wild thornberrys movie has all the sibling rivalry and general family chaos to which anyone can relate .
translation: ワイルド・ソーンベリーズ・ムービーには、誰もが共感できる兄弟間の対立や一般的な家族の混乱がすべて詰まっています。
back_translation: The Wild Thornberrys Movie is packed with sibling conflicts that everyone can relate to and the typical chaos of family life.

text: carol miller is a psychologist with a dark secret that prevents her making physical contact with other people .
translation: キャロル・ミラーは、他の人と物理的接触を持つことを妨げる暗い秘密を抱えた心理学者です。
back_translation: Carol Miller is a psychologist with a dark secret that prevents her from having physical contact with others.

text: their calendar became a worldwide sensation , out-selling even of britney spears and cindy crawford .
translation: 彼らのカレンダーは世界的なセンセーションとなり、ブリトニー・スピアーズやシンディ・クロフォードをも上回る売上を記録しました。
back_translation: Their calendar became a worldwide sensation, surpassing sales even of Britney Spears and Cindy Crawford.

text: much of the lady and the duke is about quiet , decisive moments between members of the cultural elite as they determine how to proceed as the world implodes .
translation: 「レディ・アンド・ザ・デューク」の多くは、文化エリートのメンバー間での静かで決定的な瞬間についてであり、彼らが世界が崩壊する中でどのように進むべきかを決定する様子を描いています。
back_translation: Much of "The Lady and the Duke" depicts quiet yet decisive moments among members of the cultural elite, illustrating how they determine how to proceed as the world around them crumbles.

text: it 's not just the vampires that are damned in queen of the damned -- the viewers will feel they suffer the same fate .
translation: 『呪われた女王』では、吸血鬼だけでなく、視聴者も同じ運命を味わうことになるだろう。
back_translation: In "The Cursed Queen," not only vampires but also the viewers will experience the same fate.

text: moore 's performance impresses almost as much as her work with haynes in 1995 's safe .
translation: ムーアのパフォーマンスは、1995年の『セーフ』でのヘインズとの仕事と同じくらい感銘を与える。
back_translation: Moore's performance is as impressive as his work with Haynes in the 1995 film "Safe."

text: harsh , effective documentary on life in the israeli-occupied palestinian territories .
translation: 厳しく、効果的なドキュメンタリーで、イスラエル占領下のパレスチナ地域での生活を描いています。
back_translation: It is a harsh and effective documentary that depicts life in the Palestinian territories under Israeli occupation.

text: it 's lost the politics and the social observation and become just another situation romance about a couple of saps stuck in an inarticulate screenplay .
translation: それは政治と社会的観察を失い、無口な脚本に閉じ込められた二人の愚か者についての状況ロマンスのただの別の作品になってしまった。
back_translation: It has become just another work of situational romance about two fools trapped in a silent script, losing sight of political and social observation.

text: she also has an ulcer and does n't get much sleep .
translation: 彼女は潰瘍もあり、あまり眠れません。
back_translation: She has ulcers and doesn't sleep very well.

text: a documentary to make the stones weep -- as shameful as it is scary .
translation: 石が涙を流すようなドキュメンタリー -- 恥ずかしいほど恐ろしい。
back_translation: A documentary so horrifying that it brings stones to tears - it's embarrassingly terrifying.

text: this story of unrequited love does n't sustain interest beyond the first half-hour .
translation: この片思いの物語は、最初の30分を過ぎると興味を維持しません。
back_translation: This unrequited love story fails to maintain interest after the first 30 minutes.

text: bobby quickly learns however , that smith is no regular john , and their meeting has unintended consequences that neither of them is prepared to afford .
translation: ボビーはすぐに、スミスが普通の男ではないことに気づき、彼らの出会いにはどちらも予期していない結果が伴うことになる。
back_translation: Bobby quickly realizes that Smith is not an ordinary man, and their meeting will lead to unexpected results for both of them.

text: on the whole , the movie lacks wit , feeling and believability to compensate for its incessant coarseness and banality .
translation: 全体として、この映画は絶え間ない粗野さと平凡さを補うための機知、感情、信憑性に欠けている。
back_translation: Overall, this film lacks the wit, emotion, and authenticity needed to compensate for its constant coarseness and mediocrity.

text: this is pretty dicey material . but some unexpected zigs and zags help .
translation: これはかなり危険な内容ですが、予期しない展開が助けになります。
back_translation: This is quite a dangerous situation, but an unexpected development can be helpful.

text: her in-laws , who are tired of eva interfering in their lives , decide to set her up with someone so she can leave them alone .
translation: 彼女の義両親は、エヴァが彼らの生活に干渉することに疲れてしまい、彼女が彼らを放っておくために誰かと引き合わせることを決める。
back_translation: Her in-laws get tired of Eva interfering in their lives and decide to set her up with someone so that she can leave them alone.

text: carion relies on a gesture or passages of silence to get his point across ; it 's a technique that packs a greater emotional punch than a tidy , hollywood-style monologue ever would .
translation: カリオンは、自分の意見を伝えるためにジェスチャーや沈黙の時間を利用する; それは、整然としたハリウッドスタイルの独白よりも大きな感情的なインパクトを持つ技法である。
back_translation: Karyon uses gestures and moments of silence to convey her opinions; it is a technique that has a greater emotional impact than a neatly organized Hollywood-style monologue.

text: however when her doodles of a spiralling forest continue to draw themselves it is only the start of a creative process that will see her removed from her dull form .
translation: しかし、彼女の渦巻く森の落書きが自ら描き続けると、それは彼女が退屈な形から解放される創造的プロセスの始まりに過ぎない。
back_translation: However, as she continues to doodle in the swirling forest, it is merely the beginning of a creative process that liberates her from mundane shapes.

text: after a confrontation with a house elf named dobby , harry escapes to the weasley house with ron weasley ( rupert grint ) in a flying car .
translation: ハリーは家のエルフ、ドビーとの対立の後、ロン・ウィーズリー（ルパート・グリント）と一緒に空飛ぶ車でウィーズリー家に逃げ込みます。
back_translation: After his confrontation with the house-elf Dobby, Harry escapes to the Weasley family home with Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) in a flying car.

text: it is a film that will have people walking out halfway through , will encourage others to stand up and applaud , and will , undoubtedly , leave both camps engaged in a ferocious debate for years to come .
translation: それは、多くの観客が途中で退席することになり、他の人々が立ち上がって拍手を送るよう促し、間違いなく両方の陣営を数年にわたる激しい議論に巻き込む映画です。
back_translation: It is a film that will lead many audience members to leave partway through, encourage others to stand up and applaud, and undoubtedly involve both camps in intense debates for years to come.

text: martin and barbara are complex characters -- sometimes tender , sometimes angry -- and the delicate performances by sven wollter and viveka seldahl make their hopes and frustrations vivid .
translation: マーティンとバーバラは複雑なキャラクターであり、時には優しく、時には怒りを抱いています。そして、スヴェン・ヴォルテルとヴィヴェカ・セルダールによる繊細な演技が彼らの希望や挫折を鮮やかに描き出しています。
back_translation: Martin and Barbara are complex characters, sometimes kind and at other times filled with anger. The delicate performances by Sven Wolter and Viveca Serder show their hopes and frustrations vividly.

text: even tere 's final schizoid moment ca n't dilute the hopefulness of guillen 's bittersweet saga .
translation: たとえテレの最後の分裂的な瞬間がギレンのほろ苦いサガの希望を薄めることはできない。
back_translation: Even the final moment of Tele's divisive nature cannot dilute the bittersweet hope of Ghiren's saga.

text: tempest productions journeys to the heart of the anime subculture in search of answers .
translation: テンペスト・プロダクションズは、答えを求めてアニメサブカルチャーの中心に旅をします。
back_translation: Tempest Productions embarks on a journey to the heart of anime subculture in search of answers.

text: yoyo and cheung promise to get marry in order to please their mothers .
translation: ヨーヨーとチョンは母親を喜ばせるために結婚することを約束します。
back_translation: Yoyo and Chong promise to get married to make their mother happy.

text: but when evil marauders steal their mothers & # 180 ; s body in an attempt to trick their way into the island , the brothers join forces to deliver their dead mother to be buried with their father .
translation: しかし、邪悪な襲撃者たちが母の遺体を奪い、島に入り込もうとする中、兄弟たちは力を合わせて亡き母を父と共に埋葬するために運ぶことになります。
back_translation: However, as the evil attackers try to seize their mother's body and invade the island, the brothers join forces to carry her and bury her with their father.

text: he reluctantly agrees to protect a child , pinta balletto ( fanning ) , whose parents are threatened by a rash of kidnappings .
translation: 彼は、誘拐の激増によって親が脅かされている子供、ピンタ・バレット（ファニング）を保護することに渋々同意します。
back_translation: He reluctantly agrees to protect the child, Pinta Barret (Fanning), who is being threatened by parents due to the dramatic increase in kidnappings.

text: instead of admitting his guilt , the detective is given an unexpected alibi , but this `` solution `` only multiplies the emotional complexity and guilt over his partner 's death .
translation: 彼の罪を認める代わりに、探偵には予期しないアリバイが与えられるが、この「解決策」は彼のパートナーの死に対する感情的な複雑さと罪悪感を増幅させるだけである。
back_translation: Instead of admitting his guilt, an unexpected alibi is provided to the detective, but this "solution" only amplifies the emotional complexity and guilt related to his partner's death.

text: lovable rogue max mackendrick dreams about winning big on the melbourne cup .
translation: 愛すべき悪党マックス・マッケンドリックは、メルボルンカップで大勝ちすることを夢見ています。
back_translation: The lovable rogue Max McKendrick dreams of winning big at the Melbourne Cup.

text: it takes this never-ending confusion and hatred , puts a human face on it , evokes shame among all who are party to it and even promotes understanding .
translation: それは終わりのない混乱と憎しみを取り上げ、そこに人間の顔を与え、関わるすべての人々に恥を呼び起こし、さらには理解を促進します。
back_translation: It takes the never-ending chaos and hatred, gives it a human face, evokes shame in all those involved, and even promotes understanding.

text: since then , he was considered crazy by everyone in town , except for his childhood girlfriend , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) , and her younger brother .
translation: それ以来、彼は町の誰からも狂っていると見なされていたが、幼馴染のガールフレンドであるケイトリン（エマ・コールフィールド）と彼女の弟だけは彼を理解していた。
back_translation: Since then, he was considered crazy by everyone in town, but only his childhood friend and girlfriend, Kaitlyn (Emma Caulfield), and her brother understood him.

text: `` politics are murder `` is a `` film noir `` comedy mixing dry martinis with politics and murder .
translation: 「政治は殺人」とは、ドライマティーニと政治、そして殺人を混ぜ合わせたフィルム・ノワール・コメディです。
back_translation: "Politics is Murder" is a film noir comedy that blends dry martinis, politics, and murder.

text: there is no solace here , no entertainment value , merely a fierce lesson in where filmmaking can take us .
translation: ここには慰めもなく、楽しさもなく、ただ映画製作が私たちをどこへ連れて行くことができるかの厳しい教訓だけが存在します。
back_translation: Here, there is no comfort, no joy; only the harsh lesson of where filmmaking can take us exists.

text: against the background of an australian desert landscape , so much space and so few people , sandy , a geologist , and hiromitsu , a japanese businessman , play out a story of human inconsequence in the face of the blistering universe .
translation: オーストラリアの砂漠の風景を背景に、広大な空間にほとんど人がいない砂地で、地質学者と日本の実業家であるヒロミツが、灼熱の宇宙に対する人間の無意味さの物語を繰り広げる。
back_translation: Against the backdrop of the Australian desert landscape, in a vast space of mostly empty sandy land, a geologist and a Japanese businessman named Hiromitsu unfold a story about the absurdity of humanity in the blazing universe.

text: one of the film 's most effective aspects is its tchaikovsky soundtrack of neurasthenic regret .
translation: 映画の最も効果的な側面の一つは、神経衰弱的な後悔を表現したチャイコフスキーのサウンドトラックです。
back_translation: One of the most effective aspects of the film is Tchaikovsky's soundtrack, which expresses a neurotic sense of regret.

text: like rudy yellow lodge , eyre needs to take a good sweat to clarify his cinematic vision before his next creation and remember the lessons of the trickster spider .
translation: ルディ・イエローロッジのように、アイアーは次の作品を作る前に自分の映画的ビジョンを明確にするためにしっかりと汗をかく必要があり、トリックスターのクモの教訓を思い出さなければならない。
back_translation: Like Rudy Yellowlodge, Ayer needs to work hard to clarify his cinematic vision before creating his next work, and he must remember the lessons of the trickster spider.

text: thus , christina spends the rest of the movie searching for him with her best friend courtney .
translation: そのため、クリスティーナは映画の残りの時間を親友のコートニーと一緒に彼を探して過ごします。
back_translation: For that reason, Christina spends the rest of the movie looking for him with her best friend Courtney.

text: this eruption of bloody violence becomes the catalyst for the unleashing of dark forces with terrifying results .
translation: この血の暴力の噴火は、恐ろしい結果をもたらす暗い力の解放の触媒となります。
back_translation: The eruption of this blood violence serves as a catalyst for the release of dark forces that bring terrible consequences.

text: one day in the life of a hit man , ronnie , who spends it trying to save the life of fellow hit man , august , who he had brought into the business three years ago .
translation: 殺し屋のロニーの一日、彼は三年前に自分がこの仕事に引き込んだ仲間の殺し屋オーガストの命を救うために尽力している。
back_translation: One day in the life of assassin Ronny, he is working hard to save the life of his fellow assassin August, whom he had pulled into this job three years ago.

text: the film 's thoroughly recycled plot and tiresome jokes . . . drag the movie down .
translation: 映画の徹底的に再利用されたプロットと退屈なジョークが映画を引きずり下ろしている。
back_translation: The thoroughly recycled plot and boring jokes drag the movie down.

text: he is an aspiring writer struggling with these : endless nights marked by creative block , memories of a childhood rotten with abuse , and the thirst of unspeakable sexual desires .
translation: 彼は、創造的なブロックによって特徴付けられた終わりのない夜、虐待で腐敗した幼少期の記憶、そして言葉にできない性的欲求の渇望に苦しむ、志を持った作家です。
back_translation: He is an aspiring writer suffering from an endless night characterized by creative block, memories of a childhood tainted by abuse, and an inexpressible yearning for sexual desire.

text: ~a contract brings them together in bucharest : a rigged attack on a romanian general standing for election , an attack during which they will let themselves be killed .
translation: ブカレストで契約によって彼らは結びつく：選挙に立候補しているルーマニアの将軍に対する不正な攻撃、彼らはその攻撃中に自ら死を迎えることになる。
back_translation: They are bound by a contract in Bucharest: an unlawful attack against a Romanian general running for election, during which they will meet their own death.

text: a bonanza of wacky sight gags , outlandish color schemes , and corny visual puns that can be appreciated equally as an abstract frank tashlin comedy and as a playful recapitulation of the artist 's career .
translation: 風変わりな視覚的ギャグ、奇抜な色使い、そして素朴なビジュアルパンクの豊富な供給があり、これは抽象的なフランク・タシュリンのコメディとしても、アーティストのキャリアの遊び心ある再キャップとしても等しく楽しむことができます。
back_translation: With its quirky visual gags, flamboyant use of color, and abundant supply of naive visual punk, this can be enjoyed equally as an abstract comedy by Frank Tashlin and as a playful recap of the artist's career.

text: run , do n't walk , to see this barbed and bracing comedy on the big screen .
translation: 走って、この鋭くて刺激的なコメディを大画面で見に行くべきです。
back_translation: You should rush to see this sharp and exciting comedy on the big screen.

text: no matter what people tried , nothing could stop the water .
translation: 人々がどんなに努力しても、水を止めることはできなかった。
back_translation: No matter how hard people tried, they could not stop the water.

text: during the hunt fedot meets his love marusya - the magical bird-woman .
translation: 狩りの最中、フェドットは彼の愛するマルースヤ、魔法の鳥の女性に出会います。
back_translation: During the hunt, Fedot meets his beloved Marusya, the magical bird woman.

text: the story is timeless , but when adapted to the modern age , it makes for a wrenching film -- never preachy or sentimental , and refreshingly non-judgmental about the fundamental and contradictory issues it raises .
translation: その物語は時代を超えており、現代に適応されると感動的な映画になります。それは決して説教的でもなく、感傷的でもなく、提起される基本的かつ矛盾する問題について新鮮な非判断的視点を持っています。
back_translation: The story transcends time and, when adapted to the modern era, becomes an emotional film. It is neither preachy nor sentimental, and it offers a fresh, non-judgmental perspective on the fundamental and conflicting issues that are raised.

text: an amusing , even joyful second take on e . b . white 's beloved children 's book .
translation: E.B. ホワイトの愛される子供向け書籍に対する面白く、喜びに満ちた再解釈。
back_translation: A humorous and joyful reinterpretation of E.B. White's beloved children's books.

text: you 've seen it before : the ex-con who stumbles while striving to assimilate back into society . but writer-director joe maggio and his able cast makes you care about this man 's sorry journey in virgil bliss .
translation: 以前にも見たことがある：社会に再適応しようと奮闘する元受刑者。しかし、作家兼監督のジョー・マッジオと彼の優れたキャストは、この男性の悲しい旅に対してあなたが関心を持つようにさせてくれる『バージル・ブリス』。
back_translation: I've seen it before: a former inmate struggling to readjust to society. However, writer-director Joe Maggio and his outstanding cast make you care about this man's tragic journey in "Virgil Bliss."

text: waiting for godard can be fruitful : 'in praise of love ' is the director 's epitaph for himself .
translation: ゴダールを待つことは実りあるものになり得る: 「愛の賛歌」は監督自身の墓碑銘である。
back_translation: Waiting for Godard can be fruitful: "La Chanson de l'amour" is the director's own epitaph.

text: this is a movie so insecure about its capacity to excite that it churns up not one but two flagrantly fake thunderstorms to underscore the action .
translation: これは、その興奮させる力に自信がないため、アクションを強調するために、あからさまに偽の雷雨を1つではなく2つも発生させる映画です。
back_translation: This is a movie that, lacking confidence in its ability to excite, explicitly generates not one but two fake thunderstorms to emphasize the action.

text: however , as simone 's fame skyrockets , he can not bear to admit his fraud to himself or the world .
translation: しかし、シモーヌの名声が急上昇するにつれて、彼は自分自身や世界に対して自分の詐欺を認めることができなくなってしまう。
back_translation: However, as Simone's fame skyrockets, he finds himself unable to admit his deceit to himself or to the world.

text: his old friends and family members have changed , almost beyond recognition .
translation: 彼の古い友人や家族は、ほとんど認識できないほど変わってしまった。
back_translation: His old friends and family have changed so much that they are barely recognizable.

text: while investigating a career-making cover story about a mysterious billionaire ( jason priestley ) , she finds herself accused of murder .
translation: 神秘的な億万長者（ジェイソン・プリーストリー）に関するキャリアを作るための特集記事を調査している間、彼女は殺人の罪をかけられてしまう。
back_translation: While researching a feature article to build a career about a mysterious billionaire (Jason Priestley), she finds herself accused of murder.

text: i walked away from this new version of e . t . just as i hoped i would -- with moist eyes .
translation: 私は、この新しいバージョンのE.T.から期待通りに歩き去りました。目には涙が浮かんでいました。
back_translation: I walked away from this new version of E.T. as expected, with tears in my eyes.

text: but instead of broadway or movies , her appearances have been limited to industrials and infomercials .
translation: しかし、ブロードウェイや映画ではなく、彼女の出演は産業やインフォマーシャルに限られています。
back_translation: However, her appearances are limited to industries and infomercials, rather than Broadway or movies.

text: but he does n't plan on the long line of other houseguests that try to keep him from his mission .
translation: しかし、彼は自分のミッションを妨げようとする他の多くの家のゲストの長い列を計画していません。
back_translation: However, he does not plan a long line of guests from many other houses trying to hinder his mission.

text: who 'd want to hang out in hef 's grotto with james caan and three dozen playmates , when you can grow up with reaganomics and rock hudson 's declining health ? ``
translation: 誰がジェームズ・カーンと3ダースのプレイメイトと共にヘフのグロットで過ごしたいと思うだろうか、レイガノミクスとロック・ハドソンの衰退する健康と共に成長できるのに？
back_translation: Who would want to spend time in Hef's grotto with James Caan and three dozen playmates when they could thrive alongside Reaganomics and Rock Hudson's declining health?

text: this means that he is able to speak/understand snakes .
translation: これは彼が蛇を話したり理解したりできることを意味します。
back_translation: This means that he can talk to or understand snakes.

text: by the end , it becomes clear that the patient is the woman in the story and the narrator is her suitor .
translation: 最後には、患者が物語の中の女性であり、語り手が彼女の求婚者であることが明らかになります。
back_translation: In the end, it is revealed that the patient is the woman in the story and the narrator is her suitor.

text: it captures the spirit of a small , country town as its citizens discover that beer definitely tastes better when it 's free .
translation: それは、小さな田舎町の精神を捉えており、市民たちがビールは確かに無料のときにより美味しいことを発見する様子を描いています。
back_translation: It captures the spirit of a small rural town and depicts how the citizens discover that beer is certainly more delicious when it's free.

text: rodriguez . . . was unable to reproduce the special spark between the characters that made the first film such a delight .
translation: ロドリゲスは、初めての映画をそんなに楽しいものにしたキャラクター間の特別なスパークを再現することができませんでした。
back_translation: Rodriguez was unable to recreate the special spark between the characters that made the first movie such a fun experience.

text: perhaps the most remarkable aspect of murderous maids is how restrained and sensitive french director jean-pierre denis keeps his film .
translation: おそらく、殺人メイドの最も注目すべき側面は、フランスの監督ジャン＝ピエール・デニが映画をどれほど抑制的で敏感に保っているかということです。
back_translation: Perhaps the most notable aspect of the murder maid is how restrained and sensitive French director Jean-Pierre Denis keeps the film.

text: to escape their troubles and find women , they book a trip on board a cruise-liner , unaware the travel agent has just played a horrid trick on them in retaliation for nick offending his secret gay lover .
translation: 彼らはトラブルから逃れ、女性を見つけるためにクルーズ船の旅を予約しますが、その旅行代理店がニックが彼の秘密のゲイの恋人を侮辱したことで彼らにひどい仕返しをしたことを知らないのです。
back_translation: They escape trouble and book a cruise to find women, but they are unaware that the travel agency has taken terrible revenge on them because Nick insulted his secret gay lover.

text: set in a future britain , this black comedy revolves around one day in the life of a drug dealer .
translation: 未来のイギリスを舞台にしたこのブラックコメディは、麻薬ディーラーの一日の生活を描いています。
back_translation: Set in a future Britain, this black comedy depicts the daily life of a drug dealer.

text: a fascinating , unnerving examination of the delusions of one unstable man .
translation: 一人の不安定な男の妄想を魅力的で不気味に検証した作品。
back_translation: A work that compellingly and eerily examines the delusions of an unstable man.

text: a famous psychiatrist ( ty adams ) takes on the job of trying to cure patients at the sedah state hospital , run by it 's folksy doctor ( sam delazo ) .
translation: 有名な精神科医（タイ・アダムス）が、素朴な医師（サム・デラゾ）が運営するセダ州立病院で患者を治療しようとする仕事を引き受ける。
back_translation: A famous psychiatrist (Ty Adams) takes on the job of treating patients at a state hospital run by a simple doctor (Sam Delazo).

text: a renowned plastic surgeon with a serious gambling problem owes a huge sum of money to the mafia .
translation: 著名な美容外科医が深刻なギャンブル問題を抱えており、マフィアに巨額の借金を負っています。
back_translation: A renowned plastic surgeon is facing a severe gambling problem and has a massive debt to the mafia.

text: this is the story of a pot-smoking , free-wheeling los angeles record producer ( mcdormand ) , with a rock star boyfriend ( nivola ) , whose straight-laced son ( bale ) comes back home after graduation from harvard medical school with his rich fianc & # 233 ; ( beckinsale ) , who 's working on a book .
translation: これは、ロサンゼルスのレコードプロデューサー（マクドーマンド）が、ロックスターのボーイフレンド（ニヴォラ）とともに、ハーバード医科大学を卒業したストレートリacedな息子（ベール）が、彼の裕福なフィアンセ（ベッキンセール）と一緒に帰ってくる話です。フィアンセは本の執筆に取り組んでいます。
back_translation: This is a story about a record producer in Los Angeles (McDormand), who, along with his rockstar boyfriend (Nivola), has a straight-laced son (Bale) who graduated from Harvard Medical School, and is returning home with his wealthy fiancée (Beckinsale), who is working on writing a book.

text: juliette binoche 's sand is vivacious , but it 's hard to sense that powerhouse of 19th-century prose behind her childlike smile .
translation: ジュリエット・ビノシュの砂は活気に満ちていますが、彼女の子どもらしい笑顔の背後にある19世紀の文豪の力強さを感じるのは難しいです。
back_translation: Juliette Binoche's sand is lively, but it is difficult to sense the strength of a 19th-century literary giant behind her childlike smile.

text: so they hire the lesbian carpet cleaners to rid the evil bitch trasha once and for all .
translation: 彼らは邪悪なビッチ・トラシャを一掃するために、レズビアンのカーペットクリーナーを雇う。
back_translation: They hire a lesbian carpet cleaner to get rid of the evil bitch Trasha.
