text: charles ' entertaining film chronicles seinfeld 's return to stand-up comedy after the wrap of his legendary sitcom , alongside wannabe comic adams ' attempts to get his shot at the big time .
translation: チャールズのエンターテイニングな映画は、伝説のシットコムが終了した後のサインフェルドのスタンダップコメディへの復帰と、ビッグタイムを目指すコメディアン志望のアダムスの奮闘を描いています。
back_translation: Charles' entertaining film depicts Seinfeld's return to stand-up comedy after the legendary sitcom ended, as well as the struggles of aspiring comedian Adams who aims for big time success.

text: chan 's stunts are limited and so embellished by editing that there 's really not much of a sense of action or even action-comedy .
translation: チャンのスタントは限られており、編集によって派手に装飾されているため、実際にはアクションやアクションコメディの感覚がほとんどありません。
back_translation: Chan's stunts are limited and are heavily adorned by editing, so there is hardly any sense of action or action-comedy in reality.

text: dre is an executive with a hip-hop record company based in new york .
translation: ドレはニューヨークに本社を置くヒップホップレコード会社の幹部です。
back_translation: Dore is an executive at a hip-hop record company based in New York.

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .
translation: 物語としてはあまりにも厳しいが、知的な演習としては、これは不快な議論が物語の推進力を与えられ、演じられたものであり、信者は挑発的な作品以外の何ものでもない。
back_translation: As a story, it is far too harsh, but as an intellectual exercise, it is a disquieting argument that provides the driving force of the narrative, and the believer is nothing more than a provocative work.

text: the five main characters are 20-year-olds who are close friends and always hang out together at each others ' homes and at their favorite coffeehouse .
translation: 5人の主要なキャラクターは20歳で、親しい友人同士であり、常にお互いの家やお気に入りのカフェで一緒に過ごしています。
back_translation: The five main characters are 20 years old, are close friends, and always spend time together at each other's homes or at their favorite café.

text: schefberg has the courage to make the story messily un-formulaic .
translation: シェフベルクは物語を散らかった非定型的にする勇気を持っています。
back_translation: Chef Berg has the courage to make the story messy and atypical.

text: the film , explores the human relationships through fully identifiable human beings , taking also into account the prejudices , the lust of life and all those everyday defeats .
translation: その映画は、完全に同一視できる人間を通じて人間関係を探求し、偏見や生への欲望、そして日常の敗北すべてを考慮に入れています。
back_translation: The film explores human relationships through completely identical individuals, taking into account prejudice, the desire for life, and all the everyday failures.

text: steers turns in a snappy screenplay that curls at the edges ; it 's so clever you want to hate it . but he somehow pulls it off .
translation: 尖ったスクリーンプレイで曲がりくねった展開を指導する；あまりにも巧妙で憎みたくなるが、彼はなんとか成功させる。
back_translation: A sharp screenplay guides a twisted development; it's so clever that you want to hate it, but he somehow makes it work.

text: the night of graduation , they open the box and they strike up a conversation .
translation: 卒業の夜、彼らは箱を開けて会話を始める。
back_translation: On graduation night, they open the box and start a conversation.

text: the color sense of stuart little 2 is its most immediate and most obvious pleasure , but it would count for very little if the movie were n't as beautifully shaped and as delicately calibrated in tone as it is .
translation: 『スチュアート・リトル2』の色彩感覚は、最も即座で明白な喜びですが、映画がこれほど美しく形作られ、トーンが繊細に調整されていなければ、それはあまり重要ではないでしょう。
back_translation: The sense of color in "Stuart Little 2" is the most immediate and obvious delight, but it wouldn't matter as much if the film weren't so beautifully crafted and the tones finely tuned.

text: like to think of the film as local hero for kids , as the boy has to adapt from his urban kid lifestyle to the slow , simple ways of generations before . will he do it ? will it work out ? can love overcome ?
translation: 子供たちのための映画として『ローカルヒーロー』を考えたいと思います。少年は都会の子供のライフスタイルから、前の世代のゆっくりとした素朴な生活様式に適応しなければなりません。彼はそれができるのか？うまくいくのか？愛は克服できるのか？
back_translation: I would like to consider "Local Hero" as a movie for children. The boy must adapt from an urban child's lifestyle to the slower, simpler way of life of the previous generation. Can he do it? Will it work out? Can love overcome it?

text: even though many at the time believed it was a violation of their civil rights to privacy .
translation: 当時、多くの人々がそれが彼らのプライバシーに対する市民権の侵害であると信じていたにもかかわらず。
back_translation: At that time, many people believed that it was an infringement of their civil rights to their privacy.

text: once he starts learning to compromise with reality enough to become comparatively sane and healthy , the film becomes predictably conventional .
translation: 彼が現実と妥協することを学び、比較的健全で正気を保つようになると、映画は予測可能にありふれたものとなる。
back_translation: As he learns to compromise with reality and starts to maintain a relatively healthy and sane mindset, the film becomes predictably ordinary.

text: it 's valentines day , sweets are currency , and new yorkers ca n't seem to get enough of their favorite moses donuts .
translation: バレンタインデーです。お菓子が通貨で、ニューヨーカーたちはお気に入りのモーゼスドーナツに満足できないようです。
back_translation: It's Valentine's Day. Candy serves as currency, and it seems that New Yorkers are not satisfied with their favorite Moses donuts.

text: a time where all fantasies can come true - unfortunately , it is no longer the '70s .
translation: すべての幻想が実現できる時代 - 残念ながら、もはや70年代ではありません。
back_translation: An era where all fantasies can come true - Unfortunately, it is no longer the 1970s.

text: together , they team up on an adventure that would take them to some very unexpected places and people .
translation: 彼らは一緒に、非常に予想外な場所や人々に連れて行く冒険に挑む。
back_translation: They embark on adventures that take them to very unexpected places and people together.

text: it measures a students ability to lie , cheat , fight and kill .
translation: それは学生の嘘をつく能力、 cheating、戦うこと、そして殺すことを測ります。
back_translation: It measures a student's ability to lie, cheat, fight, and kill.

text: but dr . jookiba and the earth expert pleakley never could have guessed that earth girl lilo adopts the experiment as dog , gives him the name stitch and actually causes an emotional development in the little beast .
translation: しかし、ドクター・ジュキバと地球の専門家プリークリーは、地球の少女リロが実験体を犬として養子にし、彼にスティッチという名前を付け、実際にその小さな獣に感情の成長をもたらすとは思いもしなかった。
back_translation: However, Dr. Jukiba and Earth expert Pleakley never imagined that the Earth girl Lilo would adopt the experimental creature as a dog, name him Stitch, and actually lead to the emotional growth of that little beast.

text: there are wonderful moments of humor , and demonstrations of humanity , strength , and the resilience of the human spirit .
translation: 素晴らしいユーモアの瞬間や、人間性、強さ、そして人間の精神のレジリエンスを示す場面があります。
back_translation: There are wonderful moments of humor, as well as scenes that show humanity, strength, and the resilience of the human spirit.

text: mattei is tiresomely grave and long-winded , as if circularity itself indicated profundity .
translation: マッテイはうんざりするほど真面目で長ったらしく、まるで円環そのものが深遠さを示しているかのようです。
back_translation: Mattei is annoyingly serious and lengthy, as if the circle itself is indicating depth.

text: steeped in lore and unabashedly surreal , the film is just charming enough for children and just bizarre enough for adults -- a perfect balance .
translation: 伝説に浸り、あからさまに超現実的なこの映画は、子供にはちょうど魅力的で、大人にはちょうど奇妙な、完璧なバランスを持っています。
back_translation: This movie, steeped in legend and starkly surreal, has the perfect balance of being just fascinating for children and just strange for adults.

text: wiseman is patient and uncompromising , letting his camera observe and record the lives of women torn apart by a legacy of abuse .
translation: 賢者は忍耐強く譲歩せず、カメラを通して虐待の遺産に引き裂かれた女性たちの生活を観察し記録します。
back_translation: The wise observe and document the lives of women torn by the legacy of abuse through the camera, patiently refusing to yield.

text: a biopic of an artist that actually looks artistic .
translation: 実際に芸術的に見えるアーティストの伝記映画。
back_translation: A biographical film about an artist that looks truly artistic.

text: a set of grisly murders brings fbi agent will graham ( norton ) out of retirement and puts him in search of an atrocious killer ( fiennes ) who 's driven by the image of a painting .
translation: 一連の残虐な殺人事件がFBI捜査官ウィル・グレアム（ノートン）を引退から呼び戻し、絵画のイメージに駆り立てられた atrociousな殺人者（ファインズ）を追うことになります。
back_translation: A series of brutal murder cases calls FBI agent Will Graham (Norton) out of retirement as he pursues an atrocious killer (Fiennes) driven by images in paintings.

text: taken outside the context of the current political climate ( see : terrorists are more evil than ever ! ) , the sum of all fears is simply a well-made and satisfying thriller .
translation: 現在の政治的気候の文脈を外して考えると（参照：テロリストはかつてないほど悪化している！）、『すべての恐怖の合計』は単にうまく作られた満足のいくスリラーです。
back_translation: When considered outside the context of the current political climate (see: terrorists are worse than ever!), "The Sum of All Fears" is simply a well-crafted, satisfying thriller.

text: a peruvian film that tells the story of the bank robberies ' legend , orlando gonz & # 225 ; les best known as django .
translation: ペルーの映画で、銀行強盗の伝説であるオルランド・ゴンザレス、通称ジャンゴの物語を描いています。
back_translation: The film from Peru depicts the story of Orlando Gonzalez, known as Django, a legend of bank robbery.

text: the ultimate hell is about to be raised on earth .
translation: 究極の地獄が地球に現れようとしている。
back_translation: The ultimate hell is about to appear on Earth.

text: `` washington heights `` tells the story of carlos ramirez , a young illustrator burning to escape the latino neighborhood of the same name to make a splash in new york city 's commercial downtown comic book scene .
translation: 「ワシントンハイツ」は、若いイラストレーターのカルロス・ラミレスが、同名のラティーノ地区から逃れ、ニューヨーク市の商業ダウンタウンのコミックシーンで成功を収めようと奮闘する物語です。
back_translation: "Washington Heights" is a story about a young illustrator, Carlos Ramirez, who struggles to escape from the Latino neighborhood of the same name and achieve success in the comic scene of New York City's commercial downtown.

text: terry , a spoilt brat is just too lazy a student .
translation: テリーは甘やかされた子供で、ただの怠け者の学生です。
back_translation: Terry is a spoiled child and just a lazy student.

text: when his wayward sister , kassie ( kerry washington ) , goes missing eddie burns finds himself subjected to a fiendish and ingenious campaign of revenge by the mysterious charlie strom ( gary oldman ) .
translation: 彼の放蕩な妹、カッシー（ケリー・ワシントン）が行方不明になると、エディ・バーンズは神秘的なチャーリー・ストローム（ゲイリー・オールドマン）による残忍で巧妙な復讐キャンペーンに巻き込まれる。
back_translation: When his reckless sister Cassie (Kerry Washington) goes missing, Eddie Burns becomes embroiled in a brutal and cunning revenge campaign led by the mysterious Charlie Strom (Gary Oldman).

text: if . . . you 're the adventurous sort , check it out .
translation: もしあなたが冒険好きなタイプなら、チェックしてみてください。
back_translation: If you're the adventurous type, check it out.

text: it 's exactly what you 'd expect : no more and no less .
translation: 期待通りのものです。それ以上でもそれ以下でもありません。
back_translation: It is exactly as expected. Neither more nor less.

text: however a school teacher warned the train , so the gang and all the others in the pub ended up in a shootout with scores of policemen .
translation: しかし、学校の教師が列車を警告したため、ギャングとパブにいた他の人たちは多くの警官との銃撃戦に巻き込まれました。
back_translation: However, because a school teacher warned about the train, the gang and others in the pub got caught up in a gunfight with many police officers.

text: the game 's mastermind has stolen his identity , put him on the fbi 's most wanted list , and is blackmailing him to take a part in a real twisted plan of world destruction .
translation: ゲームの黒幕は彼の身分を奪い、FBIの最も指名手配されたリストに載せ、彼を恐喝して世界破壊の真の歪んだ計画に参加させている。
back_translation: The mastermind of the game has taken away his identity, placed him on the FBI's most wanted list, and is blackmailing him to participate in the true, twisted plan for world destruction.

text: like a can of 2-day old coke . you can taste it , but there 's no fizz .
translation: まるで2日前のコーラの缶のようだ。味はするけれど、シュワシュワ感はない。
back_translation: It feels just like a can of cola from two days ago. It has flavor, but there's no fizz.

text: you 'd be hard put to find a movie character more unattractive or odorous [ than leon ] .
translation: レオンよりも魅力がなく、臭い映画キャラクターを見つけるのは難しいでしょう。
back_translation: It would be hard to find a movie character that is less attractive and smells worse than Leon.

text: first-time writer-director dylan kidd also has a good ear for dialogue , and the characters sound like real people .
translation: 初めての脚本・監督を務めるディラン・キッドは、会話に対する感覚も優れており、キャラクターは実際の人々のように聞こえます。
back_translation: Dylan Kidd, making his debut as a screenwriter and director, has an excellent sense of dialogue, and the characters sound like real people.

text: it never hurts to have the aid of a mind-reading squirrel - too bad adam does n't know any !
translation: 心を読むリスの助けがあるといいのに - アダムは誰も知らないのが残念だ！
back_translation: I wish I had the help of a squirrel that could read minds - it's a shame that no one knows!

text: only the android attendants are still capable of action , mindlessly maintaining and administering the 'drip ' .
translation: 唯一のアンドロイドの attendants は、まだ行動を起こすことができ、無心で「点滴」を維持し、管理しています。
back_translation: The only android attendants are still able to take action, mindlessly maintaining and managing the "drip."

text: but can handsome convince his pals to pull off one last , great cheat with him and outsmarting stark and the system , even if it means possibly destroying their friendships ?
translation: しかし、ハンサムは彼の仲間たちに最後の大きな詐欺を一緒にやるように説得できるのだろうか？ストークとシステムを出し抜くために、友情を壊す可能性があっても。
back_translation: But can Hansom convince his companions to do one last big con together? Even if it means risking their friendship to outsmart Stokes and the system.

text: the film is a hoot , and is just as good , if not better than much of what 's on saturday morning tv especially the pseudo-educational stuff we all ca n't stand .
translation: その映画はとても面白く、土曜日の朝のテレビで放送されている多くのもの、特に私たちがみんな耐えられない擬似教育的なものと同じくらい良い、いやそれ以上です。
back_translation: The movie is very interesting and just as good, if not better, than many things broadcast on Saturday morning television, especially the pseudo-educational ones that we all can’t stand.

text: for as god watches we live , some according to his will and some not .
translation: 神が見守る中、私たちは生きています。ある者は彼の意志に従い、ある者は従いません。
back_translation: We live under the watch of God. Some follow His will, while others do not.

text: the film creates an effective sense of time and place , though sheridan is not above hitting us over the head with obvious stylistic contrivances .
translation: この映画は時間と場所の効果的な感覚を生み出しているが、シェリダンは明らかなスタイリスティックな策略で私たちを打ちのめすことをためらわない。
back_translation: This film creates an effective sense of time and place, but Sheridan does not hesitate to overwhelm us with obvious stylistic tricks.

text: the talents of the actors helps `` moonlight mile `` rise above its heart-on-its-sleeve writing .
translation: 俳優たちの才能が「ムーンライトマイル」を単純な感情表現を超えた作品にする。
back_translation: The talent of the actors elevates "Moonlight Mile" to a work that goes beyond simple emotional expression.

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .
translation: ニュージーランドの成長物語で、酔っぱらったゆったりとした雰囲気が豊かなビジュアルの明瞭さと、全体にわたる深く感じられる演技によってバランスを取られています。
back_translation: The growth story of New Zealand is balanced by the rich visual clarity of a relaxed atmosphere filled with drunkenness and deeply felt performances throughout.

text: a steroid of sorts , it drives whoever takes the drugs to kill .
translation: 一種のステロイドであり、それを服用した者を殺人に駆り立てる。
back_translation: It is a type of steroid that drives those who take it to commit murder.

text: several years after his release , his drug-using father manny comes back into his life and kilo reluctantly welcomes him back with a job overseeing all of his drug runners .
translation: 数年後、彼の解放後、麻薬を使っていた父マンニーが彼の人生に戻ってきて、キロは渋々彼を迎え入れ、彼の全ての麻薬の運び屋を監督する仕事を与えます。
back_translation: A few years later, after his release, his father Manny, who had been using drugs, comes back into his life, and Kilo reluctantly welcomes him, giving him the job of overseeing all his drug shipments.

text: this film is based on `` our sunshine `` by robert drew , a novel based on the life of australian bushranger and icon , ned kelly .
translation: この映画はロバート・ドリューの『オー・サンシャイン』に基づいており、オーストラリアのバッシャレンジャーであり象徴的存在であるネッド・ケリーの生涯を描いた小説です。
back_translation: This movie is based on Robert Drew's "Oh, Sunshine" and depicts the life of Ned Kelly, the iconic figure and bushranger from Australia.

text: she is forced to approach roxie with an offer of a part in her vaudville act ( filling the gap left by her murdered sister ) , but roxie turns down her offer flat , thinking she needs no support in topping the bill .
translation: 彼女は、殺された姉の穴を埋めるために、ロキシーにバラエティーショーの一部のオファーを持ちかけるために近づかざるを得ませんが、ロキシーは自分が主演するためにサポートは必要ないと考え、彼女のオファーをきっぱりと断ります。
back_translation: She has no choice but to approach Roxy with an offer to be part of a variety show to fill the void left by her murdered sister, but Roxy firmly declines her offer, believing that she does not need support to star on her own.

text: a team of scientists is recruited in a crash project to send a ship and bomb into the center of the earth to prevent the catastrophe .
translation: 科学者のチームが、 catastrophe を防ぐために地球の中心に船と爆弾を送る緊急プロジェクトに招集される。
back_translation: A team of scientists is summoned for an emergency project to send a ship and a bomb to the center of the Earth to prevent a catastrophe.

text: jimmy sees the tv proposal and returns to town convinced that he can change her mind , however he faces formidable opposition from almost every side .
translation: ジミーはテレビの提案を見て、彼女の気持ちを変えられると確信して町に戻りますが、ほとんどすべての側から厳しい反対に直面します。
back_translation: Jimmy returns to town confident that he can change her feelings after seeing a proposal on television, but he faces strong opposition from almost every side.

text: ferrara directs the entire film with the kind of detachment that makes any given frame look like a family 's custom-made christmas card .
translation: フェッララは、どのフレームも家族のオーダーメイドのクリスマスカードのように見えるような距離感を持って映画全体を監督している。
back_translation: Ferrara directs the entire film with a sense of distance that makes each frame look like a custom-made Christmas card for the family.

text: a modest pleasure that accomplishes its goals with ease and confidence .
translation: 目標を簡単かつ自信を持って達成する控えめな喜び。
back_translation: A modest joy in achieving goals easily and with confidence.

text: the friends may listen , but when do they learn maybe never or only when the journey begins with you .
translation: 友達は聞くかもしれないが、彼らはいつ学ぶのだろうか？もしかしたら決して学ばないか、あなたとの旅が始まったときだけかもしれない。
back_translation: Friends may ask, but when will they learn? Perhaps they will never learn, or maybe only when your journey with them begins.

text: de oliveira seems not only to have read john berger 's famous essay on looking , but also to have taken it as his personal instruction manual for filmmaking .
translation: デオリベイラは、ジョン・バーガーの有名なエッセイ「見ることについて」を読んだだけでなく、それを映画制作のための個人的な指導マニュアルとして受け取ったように思える。
back_translation: De Oliveira not only read John Berger's famous essay "About Seeing," but it seems he also received it as a personal guidebook for filmmaking.

text: to honestly address the flaws inherent in how medical aid is made available to american workers , a more balanced or fair portrayal of both sides will be needed .
translation: アメリカの労働者に医療援助がどのように提供されるかに内在する欠陥を正直に対処するためには、両側面をよりバランスの取れた、または公平な描写が必要です。
back_translation: To honestly address the inherent flaws in how medical assistance is provided to American workers, a more balanced or fair depiction of both sides is necessary.

text: a chilling tale of one of the great crimes of 20th century france : the murder of two rich women by their servants in 1933 .
translation: 20世紀フランスの偉大な犯罪の一つ、1933年に執事により富裕な女性二人が殺害された、身の毛もよだつ物語。
back_translation: One of the great crimes of 20th-century France, a chilling story in which two wealthy women were murdered by their butler in 1933.

text: a shy aristocratic english woman falls in love with a dashing younger artist and then rejects him fearing what society may think .
translation: 控えめな貴族のイギリス女性が魅力的な若いアーティストに恋をするが、社会がどう思うかを恐れて彼を拒絶する。
back_translation: A modest noblewoman from England falls in love with a charming young artist but rejects him for fear of what society will think.

text: they renege , but a legitimate kidney becomes available for transplant .
translation: 彼らは約束を破るが、移植のために正当な腎臓が利用可能になる。
back_translation: They break their promise, but a suitable kidney becomes available for transplantation.

text: would make an excellent companion piece to the similarly themed 'the french lieutenant 's woman . '
translation: 「フレンチ・リューテン・ウーマン」と同じテーマの素晴らしい相手になるでしょう。
back_translation: It would be a wonderful match with the same theme as "French Luten Woman."

text: the trouble is , something is already waiting for them inside - something that does n't want them to leave .
translation: 問題は、何かがすでに彼らを中で待っているということだ - 彼らに出て行ってほしくない何かが。
back_translation: The problem is that something is already waiting for them inside - something that doesn't want them to go out.

text: it is just too bad the film 's story does not live up to its style .
translation: 映画のストーリーがスタイルに見合っていないのは残念だ。
back_translation: It's a shame that the movie's story doesn't match its style.

text: hear commentary by some of the top stars of no-holds-barred including rorion gracie , mark kerr , keith hackney and bas rutten .
translation: ロリオン・グレイシー、マーク・カー、キース・ハックニー、バス・ルッテンなど、ノーホールドバーのトップスターたちの解説を聞いてください。
back_translation: Listen to the commentary of top stars of no-holds-barred like Rorian Gracie, Mark Kerr, Keith Hackney, and Bas Rutten.

text: derailed by bad writing and possibly also by some of that extensive post-production reworking to aim the film at young males in the throes of their first full flush of testosterone .
translation: 悪い脚本や、若い男性が初めてのテストステロンの全盛期を迎えていることを目指した extensive post-production の再作業によって脱線した可能性もあります。
back_translation: It is possible that the poor script or the extensive post-production rework aimed at young men experiencing their first peak of testosterone caused a derailment.

text: the movie is a satire of behind the music rock & # 38 ; roll bands .
translation: その映画は、音楽の裏側にあるロックバンドを風刺しています。
back_translation: The movie satirizes the rock band behind the music.

text: as she is questioned after the events by the subtle and manipulative dr . cleave , we learn how she found love only by losing any contact with respectable life and any semblance of propriety .
translation: 彼女が微妙で操り上手なドクター・クリーブに質問される中で、私たちは彼女がどのようにして尊敬される生活や礼儀のいかなる形も失うことで愛を見つけたのかを知ることができます。
back_translation: Through her interaction with the subtle and masterful Dr. Cleave, we learn how she found love by losing any form of a respected life or manners.

text: fifteen years later , and their friendship has blossomed via e-mail , raj believing that he 's getting to know tina when it 's really pooja .
translation: 15年後、彼らの友情はメールを通じて育まれ、ラージはティナを知りつつあると信じているが、実際にはプージャである。
back_translation: Fifteen years later, their friendship has grown through emails, and Raj believes he is getting to know Tina, but in reality, it is Pooja.

text: britney 's performance can not be faulted . lucy 's a dull girl , that 's all .
translation: ブリトニーのパフォーマンスには欠点がありません。ルーシーは退屈な女の子です、それだけです。
back_translation: Britney's performance has no flaws. Lucy is just a boring girl, that's all.

text: bret owns a small but successful art gallery , balancing aesthetics and business deftly .
translation: ブレットは小規模ながら成功したアートギャラリーを運営しており、芸術性とビジネスを巧みに両立させています。
back_translation: Brett runs a successful small-scale art gallery, skillfully balancing artistry and business.

text: but he has his reasons , as there is a chance that his teen love hillevi will show up .
translation: しかし、彼には理由があります。彼のティーンエイジャーの恋人ヒレヴィが現れる可能性があるのです。
back_translation: However, he has his reasons. There is a possibility that his teenage girlfriend, Hilevi, will appear.

text: from her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her illicit and controversial affair with leon trotsky , to her provocative and romantic entanglements with women , frida kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political , artistic , and sexual revolutionary .
translation: 彼女の複雑で長続きするメンターであり夫である人との関係から、レオン・トロツキーとの不正規で物議を醸す情事、さらには女性との挑発的でロマンチックな絡み合いに至るまで、フリーダ・カーロは政治的、芸術的、性的革命家として、大胆で妥協のない人生を送りました。
back_translation: From her complex and long-lasting relationship with her mentor and husband, to her irregular and controversial affair with Leon Trotsky, as well as her provocative and romantic entanglements with women, Frida Kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political, artistic, and sexual revolutionary.

text: set 10 years after the events in `` the phantom menace `` .
translation: 「ファントム・メナス」の事件から10年後の設定。
back_translation: Set ten years after the events of "The Phantom Menace."

text: this film is a prequel to all of the the house of the dead video games .
translation: この映画は「ハウス・オブ・ザ・デッド」シリーズのすべてのビデオゲームの前日譚です。
back_translation: This movie is a prequel to all the video games in the "House of the Dead" series.

text: supreme chancellor palpatine moves for a vote for a republic army to protect the republic , as there has not been a full-scale war since the formation of the republic .
translation: 最高 Chancellor パルパティーンは、共和国を守るための共和国軍の投票を求めます。共和国が形成されてから大規模な戦争は起こっていません。
back_translation: Supreme Chancellor Palpatine calls for a vote on the Republic Army to protect the Republic. There have been no large-scale wars since the formation of the Republic.

text: ratliff deserves high marks for his restraint and willingness not to try and shape or mold our opinion regarding what is being shown .
translation: ラトリフは、見せられている内容について私たちの意見を形成したり、操ったりしないという彼の抑制と意欲に対して高い評価を受けるべきです。
back_translation: Ratcliffe should be highly praised for his restraint and willingness not to shape or manipulate our opinions about the content being presented.

text: samantha noble ( elizabeth berkley ) is a high-profile magazine editor .
translation: サマンサ・ノーブル（エリザベス・バークレー）は、高名な雑誌の編集者です。
back_translation: Samantha Noble (Elizabeth Berkley) is a renowned magazine editor.

text: wishing to free himself more firmly he locks himself into d & # 233 ; pendance and lack of power .
translation: 彼は自分自身をよりしっかりと解放したいと願い、依存と力の欠如に自らを閉じ込めます。
back_translation: He wishes to liberate himself more fully, yet he confines himself in dependency and a lack of power.

text: there 's nothing provocative about this film save for the ways in which it studiously avoids provoking thought .
translation: この映画には、考えさせることを避ける方法を丁寧に取り入れている以外に、挑発的な要素は何もありません。
back_translation: This movie contains no provocative elements other than the careful incorporation of ways to avoid deep thinking.

text: it 's not like having a real film of nijinsky , but at least it 's better than that eponymous 1980 biopic that used soap in the places where the mysteries lingered .
translation: それはニジンスキーの本当の映画を持っているわけではありませんが、少なくとも神秘が漂う場所で石鹸を使った1980年の同名のバイオピックよりはマシです。
back_translation: It doesn't have the real movie about Nijinsky, but it's at least better than the 1980 biopic of the same name that used soap in a place filled with mystery.

text: `` the french came and bruoght the gun and the coyote took away the sleepiness `` .
translation: 「フランス人が来て銃を持ってきた、そしてコヨーテは眠気を奪った。」
back_translation: "A Frenchman came and brought a gun, and the coyote stole the sleep."

text: cassavetes thinks he 's making dog day afternoon with a cause , but all he 's done is to reduce everything he touches to a shrill , didactic cartoon .
translation: カサヴェテスは、原因を持って「犬の日の午後」を作っていると思っているが、彼が手を触れるすべてを耳障りで教訓的な漫画に還元してしまっただけだ。
back_translation: I think Cassavetes created "Dog Day Afternoon" with a purpose, but he merely reduced everything he touched to an annoying and didactic comic.

text: the elders bikes are unfortunately backed over at the post office and they end up bumming a ride with an older but kindly man .
translation: 残念ながら年配者のバイクは郵便局でひかれてしまい、優しい年配の男性に一緒に乗せてもらうことになります。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the elderly person's bike got hit by a postal truck, and they ended up having to ride together with a kind elderly man.

text: his dream had vanished , so he went home and got a job at his fathers gas station in virgil grove , population 28 .
translation: 彼の夢は消え去ったので、彼は家に帰り、人口28人のバージルグローブにある父のガソリンスタンドで仕事を得た。
back_translation: His dream had vanished, so he returned home and got a job at his father's gas station in Virgil Grove, which has a population of 28.

text: are the experiences of the main character profound , or simply routine ?
translation: 主人公の経験は深いものですか、それともただのルーチンですか？
back_translation: Is the protagonist's experience profound, or is it just a routine?

text: it 's almost as if it 's an elaborate dare more than a full-blooded film .
translation: まるで完全な映画というよりも、精巧な挑戦のようです。
back_translation: It feels more like a sophisticated challenge than a completely perfect movie.

text: naturally , our boys band together and go for the bronze !
translation: 当然、私たちの男の子たちは団結し、ブロンズメダルを目指します！
back_translation: Of course, our boys will unite and aim for the bronze medal!

text: for almost the first two-thirds of martin scorsese 's 168-minute gangs of new york , i was entranced .
translation: マーティン・スコセッシの168分の『ギャング・オブ・ニューヨーク』の最初の約2/3の間、私は魅了されていました。
back_translation: For the first roughly two-thirds of Martin Scorsese's 168-minute "Gangs of New York," I was captivated.

text: and a lyrical portrait of the ever-present guardians who preserve life 's natural harmony .
translation: そして、生命の自然な調和を守る常に存在する守護者たちの詩的な肖像。
back_translation: And the poetic portrait of the ever-present guardians who protect the natural harmony of life.

text: it 's incredibly enjoyable to watch derrida pick apart , and fight against , the very process and premise of making a film about someone , particularly him .
translation: デリダが自分自身を対象にした映画を作るというプロセスと前提を分解し、抵抗する様子を見るのは非常に楽しい。
back_translation: It is very enjoyable to see Derrida deconstruct the process and assumptions of making a film about himself and to witness his resistance.

text: five office workers are taken hostage by shy colleague neil ( ned dennehy ) , and his evil hand puppet morgan .
translation: 5人のオフィスワーカーが内気な同僚ニール（ネッド・デネヒー）と彼の邪悪な手袋人形モーガンによって人質に取られる。
back_translation: Five office workers are taken hostage by their shy colleague Neil (Ned Dennehy) and his evil glove puppet Morgan.

text: . . . `` bowling for columbine `` remains a disquieting and thought-provoking film . . .
translation: 「コロンバインのためのボウリング」は、今なお不安を覚えさせ、考えさせられる映画です。
back_translation: "Bowling for Columbine" is a movie that still evokes unease and provokes thought.

text: a movie in which two not very absorbing characters are engaged in a romance you ca n't wait to see end .
translation: あまり魅力的でない二人のキャラクターが恋愛を繰り広げる映画で、その結末が待ちきれない。
back_translation: It's a movie where two not-so-attractive characters engage in a romance, and I can't wait to see how it ends.

text: a portrait of a generation that has evolved into individuals and lost respect for the gift of love .
translation: 愛の贈り物に対する敬意を失い、個々の存在へと進化した世代の肖像。
back_translation: A portrait of a generation that has lost respect for the gift of love and has evolved towards individual existence.

text: women craved him and men wanted to be him .
translation: 女性は彼を求め、男性は彼になりたがった。
back_translation: Women sought him, and men wanted to become him.

text: down on the shore , a boat is slowly being loaded with the personal possessions from the dying man 's home .
translation: 岸辺で、死にかけている男の家から個人的な所持品がゆっくりと船に積み込まれている。
back_translation: On the shore, personal belongings are slowly being loaded onto a boat from the house of a man who is on the verge of death.

text: its impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and stacks of dead bodies are undermined by the movie 's presentation , which is way too stagy .
translation: 火葬場の煙突火災や死体の山の印象的な映像は、映画の演出によって台無しにされており、あまりにも舞台的すぎる。
back_translation: The impressive images of crematorium chimney fires and piles of corpses are ruined by the film's direction, being overly theatrical.

text: as the death toll mounts , it falls to detective maria delgado - mistrusted outsider from madrid ( played by mira sorvino ) - to stop the bizarre killings .
translation: 死者数が増加する中、マドリードからの信頼されない外部者である刑事マリア・デルガド（ミラ・ソルヴィーノが演じる）が奇妙な殺人を止める任務を負う。
back_translation: As the death toll rises, detective Maria Delgado, an unreliable outsider from Madrid (played by Mira Sorvino), is tasked with stopping the bizarre murders.

text: privileged and popular , deanna differs dramatically from the alienated alicia .
translation: 特権を持ち人気のあるディアナは、孤立したアリシアとは大きく異なる。
back_translation: The privileged and popular Diana is very different from the isolated Alicia.

text: the filmmakers lack the nerve . . . to fully exploit the script 's potential for sick humor .
translation: filmmakersは脚本の病的なユーモアの潜在能力を十分に活かす勇気がない。
back_translation: Filmmakers lack the courage to fully harness the potential of the script's pathological humor.

text: though the bosses killed his father , he is loyal to them and is considered family .
translation: 彼の父を殺したにもかかわらず、彼は彼らに忠誠を誓い、家族と見なされています。
back_translation: Despite killing his father, he swore loyalty to them and is considered part of the family.

text: though it is by no means his best work , laissez-passer is a distinguished and distinctive effort by a bona-fide master , a fascinating film replete with rewards to be had by all willing to make the effort to reap them .
translation: 決して彼の最高の作品ではないものの、『レッセ・パッセ』は本物の巨匠による卓越した独自の作品であり、努力するすべての人に報われる魅力的な映画です。
back_translation: Although it is definitely not his best work, "Laissez-Passer" is an outstanding and unique piece by a true master, and it is a captivating film that rewards all those who strive.

text: their assignment : using equal parts skill and humor , catch arnold gundars , one of the world 's most successful illegal arms dealers , and foil his treacherous plans for the plane .
translation: 彼らの任務：技巧とユーモアを同じくらい使って、世界で最も成功した違法武器商人の一人、アーノルド・グンダースを捕まえ、彼の危険な飛行機の計画を阻止すること。
back_translation: Their mission: To capture one of the world's most successful illegal arms dealers, Arnold Gundars, using equal parts skill and humor, and to thwart his dangerous aircraft plans.

text: what might have been acceptable on the printed page of iles ' book does not translate well to the screen .
translation: ilesの本の印刷されたページで許容されるかもしれないものは、画面ではうまく翻訳されません。
back_translation: What may be acceptable on printed pages of files does not translate well on screen.

text: calvin ( cube ) , who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father , views the shop as nothing but a burden and waste of his time .
translation: カルビン（キューブ）は、亡き父から苦しんでいるビジネスを引き継ぎ、その店をただの負担であり時間の無駄と見なしています。
back_translation: Calvin (Cube) inherited a struggling business from his late father and sees the shop as nothing more than a burden and a waste of time.

text: failing cartoon writer , millard mudd , has sunk deep into one .
translation: 失敗した漫画作家ミラード・マッドは、その深い闇に没頭してしまった。
back_translation: The failed manga artist Millard Mudd became engulfed in that deep darkness.

text: . . . an hour-and-a-half of inoffensive , unmemorable filler .
translation: 無害で印象に残らない filler が1時間半続く。
back_translation: A harmless and unmemorable filler goes on for an hour and a half.

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer ( jeremy renner ) and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .
translation: 映画がタイトルキャラクターの理解に懸命に取り組む一方で、映画の不気味で清潔感のあるダーマー（ジェレミー・レナー）と、どれほど真剣に教科書的な心理学が試みても埋まらない巨大なギャップが残る。
back_translation: While the movie strives to understand its titular character, a huge gap remains between the eerie, pristine Dharma (Jeremy Renner) and the textbook psychology that attempts to bridge it, no matter how earnest the effort may be.

text: for those with the stomach and stamina for its heartbeat-quickening intensity and body-slamming action , rollerball delivers exactly what it promises : a people 's hero you can really get behind .
translation: 心臓が疾走するような激しさと体を打ち付けるアクションに耐えられる人々のために、ローラーボールは約束通りのものを提供します。あなたが本当に応援できるヒーロー。
back_translation: For those who can endure the intensity that makes your heart race and the action that slams your body, Rollerball delivers on its promise. A hero that you can truly cheer for.

text: goes some way towards explaining how the tragedy occurred and its enduring legacy today .
translation: この悲劇がどのように起こったかと、その今日までの enduringな遺産を説明する手助けになります。
back_translation: It will assist in explaining how this tragedy occurred and its enduring legacy up to today.

text: focuses on joan 's raging hormones and sledgehammers the audience with spanish inquisitions about her `` madness `` so much that i became mad that i wasted 123 minutes and $ 9 . 50 on this 21st century torture device .
translation: ジョーンの激しいホルモンに焦点を当て、彼女の「狂気」についてのスペイン宗教裁判のような質問で観客を叩きつけるので、私はこの21世紀の拷問装置に123分と9.50ドルを無駄にしたことに狂いそうになった。
back_translation: Focusing on Joan's intense hormones and throwing questions at the audience reminiscent of a Spanish Inquisition about her "madness," I was driven to madness myself for wasting 123 minutes and $9.50 on this 21st-century torture device.

text: in visual fertility treasure planet rivals the top japanese animations of recent vintage .
translation: ビジュアルの面で「トレジャープラネット」は最近の日本のアニメーションのトップと肩を並べています。
back_translation: In terms of visuals, "Treasure Planet" stands shoulder to shoulder with the top of recent Japanese animation.

text: danny , who gets paranoid and makes a scene while they watch `` der lift `` ( a black & # 38 ; white german horror movie ) and hallucinates about being the actor in the film ( ricardo mamood ) , has not the courage to face a girl half his age .
translation: ダニーは「デア・リフト」（白黒のドイツのホラー映画）を見ている間に偏執病になり、大騒ぎし、映画の中の役者（リカルド・マムード）になってしまった妄想を抱いているが、自分の半分の年齢の女の子に対峙する勇気がない。
back_translation: Danny becomes paranoid while watching "Der Riff" (a black-and-white German horror film), causing a commotion and harboring delusions that he has become the actor in the movie (Ricardo Mahmoud), yet he lacks the courage to confront a girl half his age.

text: brad , an art student hoping to win a prestigious fellowship , finds his life and career turned upside down when he falls for a faculty member at his college , lisa ducharme , who just happens to be his girlfriend 's thesis adviser . . .
translation: ブラッドは名門の奨学金を獲得しようとする美術学生で、彼の人生とキャリアは、彼の大学の教員であるリサ・デュシャームに恋をしたときにひっくり返ってしまいます。彼女はちょうど彼のガールフレンドの論文指導教員でもあります…。
back_translation: Brad is an art student trying to obtain a prestigious scholarship, and his life and career are turned upside down when he falls in love with Lisa Duchamp, a faculty member at his university. She is also the thesis advisor for his girlfriend...

text: from then on , patricia rises immediately to stardom .
translation: それ以来、パトリシアは瞬く間にスターの座に昇りつめます。
back_translation: Since then, Patricia quickly rose to stardom.

text: samantha is then forced to question her own place in the shark-eat-shark world of ambition and power where truth is ever elusive , enemies wear a friend 's face and the stakes are nothing less than life or death .
translation: サマンサは、野心と権力のサメのような世界における自分の立場を疑わざるを得なくなり、そこでは真実は常に得難く、敵は友の顔を持ち、賭けられているのは命か死かという他ない。
back_translation: Samantha finds herself forced to question her position in a world that resembles a shark-infested realm of ambition and power, where truth is always hard to come by, enemies wear the faces of friends, and what is at stake is nothing less than life or death.

text: certainly no biopic , nijinsky is short on facts , but long on expression .
translation: 確かに伝記映画ではないが、『ニジンスキー』は事実には欠けているものの、表現には富んでいる。
back_translation: Certainly not a biographical film, "Nijinsky" is rich in expression, although it lacks in factuality.

text: little ella 's birthright is the gift - and curse - of obedience .
translation: リトルエラの生まれつきの権利は、従順という贈り物—そして呪い—である。
back_translation: Little Ella's innate right is a gift—and a curse—of obedience.

text: . . . hopefully it 'll be at the dollar theatres by the time christmas rolls around . wait to see it then .
translation: ...クリスマスが近づく頃には、ドルシアターで上映されるといいですね。その時に見るのを楽しみにしています。
back_translation: I hope it will be screened at the Dorsey Theater around Christmas time. I am looking forward to watching it then.

text: a former eastern germany secret agent runs away fron his past and lands in m & # 233 ; xico under a fake identity .
translation: 元東ドイツの秘密工作員が過去から逃れ、偽の身分でメキシコにたどり着く。
back_translation: A former East German secret agent escapes from the past and arrives in Mexico under a false identity.

text: it 's too long , too repetitive , and takes way too many years to resolve to be a total winner .
translation: それは長すぎて、繰り返しが多すぎて、解決するのにあまりにも多くの年を要するため、完全な勝者とは言えません。
back_translation: It is too long, has too many repetitions, and takes too many years to resolve, so it cannot be said to have a complete victor.

text: there is simply not enough of interest onscreen to sustain its seventy-minute running time .
translation: 画面上には、70分の上映時間を維持するのに十分な興味が単純に不足しています。
back_translation: There is simply a lack of sufficient interest to sustain a 70-minute run time on screen.

text: by the time its otherwise paint-by-numbers story reaches a finale , drumline has made band seem cool -- no small feat in the wake of american pie 2 .
translation: ストーリーが最終章に達する頃には、「ドラマー」がバンドをクールに見せることに成功している。これは「アメリカン・パイ2」の後では簡単なことではない。
back_translation: By the time the story reaches its final chapter, the "drummer" has succeeded in making the band look cool. This is not an easy task after "American Pie 2."

text: the characters . . . are paper-thin , and their personalities undergo radical changes when it suits the script .
translation: キャラクターは紙のように薄っぺらであり、脚本に合わせて性格が根本的に変わることがあります。
back_translation: Characters can be as flat as paper, and their personalities may fundamentally change to fit the script.

text: a young idealistic priest in northern ireland has his faith put to the test when he is faced with the ultimate moral dilemma .
translation: 北アイルランドの若い理想主義的な神父は、究極の道徳的ジレンマに直面したときに彼の信仰が試される。
back_translation: A young idealistic priest in Northern Ireland faces a test of his faith when confronted with the ultimate moral dilemma.

text: an efficient , exceedingly likable family film about orphans and sports that comes with equal doses of sentimentality , corny jokes and life lessons .
translation: 効率的で非常に好感の持てる家族向け映画で、孤児とスポーツをテーマにしており、感傷的な要素、陳腐なジョーク、そして人生の教訓が均等に盛り込まれています。
back_translation: An efficient and very likable family movie, centered around orphans and sports, with sentimental elements, clichéd jokes, and life lessons incorporated evenly.

text: as bob the tomato and the kids settle in to wait for a tow truck to help get their van back on the road , the `` pirates who do n't do anything `` share a little story about a guy named jonah .
translation: ボブ・ザ・トマトと子供たちが、トラックがバンを路上に戻すのを待つ間、何もしない海賊たちがジョナという名の男についての小さな物語を共有します。
back_translation: While Bob the Tomato and the children wait for the truck to return the van to the road, the idle pirates share a little story about a man named Jonah.

text: while treating a homicide detective for smoking , hypnotherapist michael strother has a telepathic vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a stream .
translation: 殺人探偵の喫煙治療を行っている催眠療法士マイケル・ストロザーは、川の水面下で浮かんでいる若い少女の透視を持つ。
back_translation: Michael Strozer, a hypnotherapist conducting smoking cessation therapy for a murder detective, possesses a vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a river.

text: the case is re-opened when two more bodies are discovered , both pregnant women .
translation: 事件は2体の遺体が発見され、どちらも妊娠している女性であることがわかり、再調査されることになる。
back_translation: The incident involves the discovery of two bodies, both of which are found to be pregnant women, leading to a re-investigation.

text: young is a tribute to the nobility of those men under fire , their common acts of uncommon valor , and their loyalty to and love for one another .
translation: 若き者たちは、戦火の中にいる男たちの高貴さ、彼らの並外れた勇気の共通の行動、そしてお互いへの忠誠と愛に対する賛辞です。
back_translation: The young people are a tribute to the nobility of the men in the midst of war, their extraordinary courage in common action, and their loyalty and love for one another.

text: six of the nations brightest spoken word artists came together in new orleans on september 2 , to begin a life transforming journey to new york city for the memorial anniversary of september 11 .
translation: 9月2日に、6人の国家的に優れたスピーキングワードアーティストがニューオーリンズに集まり、9月11日の記念日を迎えるためのニューヨーク市への人生を変える旅を始めました。
back_translation: On September 2, six nationally recognized spoken word artists gathered in New Orleans to embark on a life-changing journey to New York City in anticipation of the anniversary on September 11.

text: both lead performances are oscar-size . quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: 両方の主演パフォーマンスはオスカー級です。クエイドは、苦痛な嘘を抱える苦悩の夫として全く恐れを知らず、ムーアは、ジェーン・ワイマンとジューン・クリーバーの間にある動じない50年代の品位を持った長い間耐え忍ぶヒロインを見事に抑えた演技をしています。
back_translation: Both lead performances are Oscar-worthy. Quaid is utterly fearless as the tormented husband carrying the painful lie, and Moore delivers a stunning portrayal of a long-suffering heroine with the unshakeable dignity of the 1950s, reminiscent of Jane Wyman and June Cleaver.

text: they 're jewish , they 're grandmothers , and they 're lesbians .
translation: 彼らはユダヤ人で、祖母で、レズビアンです。
back_translation: They are Jewish, a grandmother, and lesbians.

text: i wo n't argue with anyone who calls 'slackers ' dumb , insulting , or childish . . . but i laughed so much that i did n't mind .
translation: 「怠け者」を「愚か」「侮辱的」「子供じみている」と呼ぶ人とは議論しませんが、あまりにも笑ったので気になりませんでした。
back_translation: "I don't engage in discussions with those who call 'lazy' 'foolish,' 'insulting,' or 'childish,' but I couldn't help but be amused."

text: a well-done film of a self-reflexive , philosophical nature .
translation: 自己反射的で哲学的な性質を持つ、よくできた映画。
back_translation: A well-made film with self-reflective and philosophical qualities.

text: as they try to keep one step ahead of peter , it becomes clear that there is someone else in the woods , someone who is watching them all .
translation: 彼らがピーターの一歩先を行こうとする中で、森には彼ら全員を見守っている誰か別の存在がいることが明らかになってきます。
back_translation: As they try to stay one step ahead of Peter, it becomes clear that there is someone else in the forest watching over all of them.

text: the two leads , nearly perfect in their roles , bring a heart and reality that buoy the film , and at times , elevate it to a superior crime movie .
translation: 二人の主役は、役割においてほぼ完璧で、映画に心と現実感をもたらし、時にはそれを優れたクライム映画へと高めます。
back_translation: The two main characters are almost perfect in their roles, bringing heart and a sense of reality to the film, sometimes elevating it to an excellent crime movie.

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .
translation: ラム・ダスが内なる意識についてのように、明確で信頼できる権威であるかどうかはともかく、『フィアス・グレース』は彼が再び正直で愛に満ちた存在であることを私たちに安心させてくれます。
back_translation: Whether or not Ram Dass is a clear and trustworthy authority on inner consciousness, "Fearless Grace" reassures us that he is again an honest and loving being.

text: when starla is forced to quit the cheerleading squad after getting some bad grads , genevieve moves in to take her place .
translation: スターラが成績が悪くてチアリーディング部を退部させられると、ジェネビーが彼女の代わりに入部する。
back_translation: When Starla gets kicked out of the cheerleading squad for poor grades, Geneviève joins in her place.

text: when jack rebuffs charlie 's alcoholic advances , an enemy is born .
translation: ジャックがチャーリーのアルコールに対する誘惑を拒否した時、敵が生まれる。
back_translation: When Jack refused Charlie's temptation of alcohol, an enemy was born.

text: then from 1983 to 1984 , the `` stander gang `` ( stander , alan heyl & # 38 ; patrick mccall ) rob as many as four banks a day .
translation: 1983年から1984年まで、``スタンダーギャング``（スタンダー、アラン・ヘイル& # 38 ; パトリック・マッコール）は、1日に最大4つの銀行を襲いました。
back_translation: From 1983 to 1984, the "Stander Gang" (Stander, Alan Hale & Patrick McCall) robbed up to four banks a day.

text: it 's one of the most honest films ever made about hollywood .
translation: それはハリウッドについて作られた最も正直な映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the most honest movies made about Hollywood.

text: the entire movie is filled with deja vu moments .
translation: 映画全体がデジャヴの瞬間に満ちています。
back_translation: The entire movie is filled with moments of déjà vu.

text: joe is beaten up by some of johnny 's buddies as a sign to leave him alone , and with this final act of freedom , johnny leaves the world of pool-sharking .
translation: ジョーはジョニーの仲間たちに殴られ、彼を放っておくようにというサインを受け、最後の自由の象徴として、ジョニーはプールシャーキングの世界を去る。
back_translation: Joe was beaten by Johnny's allies and received the signal to leave him alone, and as a symbol of his final freedom, Johnny leaves the world of pool sharking.

text: a dark , quirky road movie that constantly defies expectation .
translation: 期待を常に裏切る暗くて奇妙なロードムービー。
back_translation: A dark and strange road movie that always betrays expectations.

text: even with all those rough edges safely sanded down , the american insomnia is still pretty darned good .
translation: すべての粗い部分が安全に削り取られても、アメリカの不眠症はまだかなり良い。
back_translation: Even with all the rough edges safely smoothed away, America's insomnia is still quite good.

text: we weave in and out of eight defective lives and go for a turbulent mental ride where lilli 's reality spirals out of control and we 're lead to an unforgettable climax where some fall apart and some piece themselves together .
translation: 私たちは八つの欠陥のある人生を行き来し、リリの現実が制御を失う激しい精神的な旅に出かけます。そして、私たちは一部の人が崩れ落ち、一部が自分自身を再構築する忘れられないクライマックスへと導かれます。
back_translation: We navigate through eight flawed lives, embarking on an intense psychological journey where Lily's reality spins out of control. We are led to an unforgettable climax where some people collapse and others reconstruct themselves.

text: filmmaker tian zhuangzhuang triumphantly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually masterful work of quiet power .
translation: 映画監督の田壮壮は、視覚的に卓越した静かな力の作品で物語映画制作に壮大に復帰しました。
back_translation: Film director Tian Zhuangzhuang made a grand return to narrative filmmaking with a visually outstanding work of quiet power.

text: a slick new york publicist ( farrell ) who picks up a ringing receiver in a phone booth is told that if he hangs up , he 'll be killed . . .
translation: ニューヨークの洗練された広報担当者（ファレル）が公衆電話の受話器を取ると、電話の向こうから「電話を切ったらお前は殺される」と言われる。
back_translation: A sophisticated public relations officer from New York (Pharrell) picks up a payphone, and on the other end of the line, he hears, "If you hang up, you'll be killed."

text: sam and ash become good friends as they fight to save celebi from the new team rocket villain , the iron-masked marauder and his darkball , which turns pok & # 233 ; mon evil and augments their powers to the maximum .
translation: サムとアッシュは、新しいロケット団の悪役アイアンマスクの略奪者とそのダークボールからセレビィを救うために戦う中で仲良くなります。そのダークボールはポケモンを悪に変え、彼らの力を最大限に増幅させます。
back_translation: Sam and Ash become friends while fighting to save Celebi from the new Team Rocket villain Iron Mask's raider and his Dark Ball. The Dark Ball turns Pokémon evil and amplifies their powers to the maximum.

text: 'enigma ' is the kind of engaging historical drama that hollywood appears to have given up on in favor of sentimental war movies in the vein of 'we were soldiers . '
translation: 「エニグマ」は、ハリウッドが「私たちは兵士だった」のような感傷的な戦争映画に代わって放棄してしまった、興味深い歴史ドラマの一種です。
back_translation: "Enigma" is a type of interesting historical drama that Hollywood has abandoned in favor of sentimental war movies like "We Were Soldiers."

text: a turkish fortune-teller predicts that the girl will convalesce if somebody sacrifices his life for her .
translation: トルコの占い師は、誰かが彼女のために命を犠牲にすれば、その少女は回復すると予言します。
back_translation: The fortune teller in Turkey predicts that if someone sacrifices their life for her, the girl will recover.

text: the trinity assembly approaches the endeavor with a shocking lack of irony , and george ratliff 's documentary , hell house , reflects their earnestness M-^W which makes for a terrifying film .
translation: トリニティアセンブリは、この試みを驚くほどのアイロニーの欠如で進めており、ジョージ・ラトリフのドキュメンタリー『ヘルハウス』は彼らの真剣さを反映しており、恐ろしい映画となっています。
back_translation: The Trinity Assembly is pursuing this endeavor with a remarkable lack of irony, and George Ratliff's documentary "Hell House" reflects their seriousness and has become a horrifying film.

text: this is especialy true when he makes a special connection at a hollywood industry party .
translation: これは、彼がハリウッドの業界パーティーで特別なつながりを持つときに特に当てはまります。
back_translation: This is especially true when he has special connections at Hollywood industry parties.

text: a triumph , a film that hews out a world and carries us effortlessly from darkness to light .
translation: 勝利の作品であり、闇から光へと私たちを難なく導いてくれる世界を切り開く映画です。
back_translation: It is a work of victory, a film that effortlessly guides us from darkness to light, opening up a world.

text: the originally noble motive rapidly degenerated into an orgy of bloodletting and terror .
translation: 元々崇高な動機は急速に流血と恐怖の乱痴気騒ぎに堕ちていった。
back_translation: Originally noble intentions quickly descended into a chaotic frenzy of bloodshed and fear.

text: as this bizarro weekend unfolds , we see exactly what adam has to do to preserve his sanity and his friendships .
translation: この奇妙な週末が進むにつれて、私たちはアダムが自分の精神と友情を守るために何をしなければならないかを正確に見ることができます。
back_translation: As this strange weekend progresses, we can clearly see what Adam must do to protect his mind and friendships.

text: despite its flaws . . . belinsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing at almost every turn .
translation: 欠点があっても、ベリンスキーは依然としてほぼすべての展開であなたを推測させる魅力的な物語を作り出すことができる。
back_translation: Despite its shortcomings, Verlynsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing throughout almost every development.

text: when taraneh discovers she is pregnant she decides against all advice and intense social pressure , to keep the baby .
translation: タラネが妊娠したことを知ったとき、彼女はすべてのアドバイスや強い社会的圧力に反して、赤ちゃんを産むことを決心します。
back_translation: When Tarane learned that she was pregnant, she decided to have the baby against all advice and strong social pressure.

text: he begins to spread the gospel of communal ideals , which he has absorbed during his travels in india .
translation: 彼はインドでの旅行中に吸収した共同体の理想の福音を広め始める。
back_translation: He begins to spread the gospel of the ideals of community that he absorbed during his travels in India.

text: where the trail ends , terror begins soft-spoken 15-year old leland fitzgerald ( gosling ) commits a seemingly senseless murder that shocks his community , affecting both his victim 's family and his own .
translation: 小道の終わりに、恐怖が始まる。穏やかな口調の15歳のレランド・フィッツジェラルド（ゴズリング）は、彼のコミュニティを衝撃に陥れる一見無意味な殺人を犯し、被害者の家族と彼自身の家族の両方に影響を与える。
back_translation: At the end of the path, terror begins. Fifteen-year-old Leland Fitzgerald (Gosling), with his calm demeanor, commits what seems to be a senseless murder that shocks his community, affecting both the victim's family and his own.

text: but tongue-in-cheek preposterousness has always been part of for the most part wilde 's droll whimsy helps `` being earnest `` overcome its weaknesses and parker 's creative interference . . .
translation: しかし、皮肉的な不条理さは常にワイルドの滑稽な気紛れの一部であり、「真面目であること」がその弱点やパーカーの創造的干渉を克服するのに役立っています。
back_translation: However, the ironic absurdity is always a part of Wild's ridiculous whims, and "being serious" helps to overcome his weaknesses and Parker's creative interference.

text: it 's supposed to be a romantic comedy - it suffers from too much norma rae and not enough pretty woman .
translation: それはロマンティックコメディのはずなのに、ノーマ・レイが多すぎてプリティ・ウーマンが足りない。
back_translation: It should be a romantic comedy, but there’s too much Norma Rae and not enough Pretty Woman.

text: if you 're an extreme sports fan , this is probably a must own dvd .
translation: もしあなたがエクストリームスポーツのファンなら、これはおそらく必携のDVDです。
back_translation: If you are a fan of extreme sports, this is probably a must-have DVD.

text: a playful iranian parable about openness , particularly the need for people of diverse political perspectives to get along despite their ideological differences .
translation: 様々な政治的視点を持つ人々がイデオロギーの違いにもかかわらず仲良くする必要性についての、開かれた心を持つことに関する遊び心のあるイランの寓話。
back_translation: A whimsical Iranian fable about the necessity for people with various political perspectives to get along, despite their ideological differences, emphasizing an open mind.

text: arriving in the us with a phony passport , she was imprisoned by the ins for one year while her asylum case was being tried .
translation: 虚偽のパスポートでアメリカに到着した彼女は、難民申請が審理されている間、入国管理局によって一年間拘留されました。
back_translation: She arrived in America with a fake passport and was detained by immigration authorities for a year while her asylum application was being reviewed.

text: nadine works there as a prostitute though she is married with children , hannah keeps the appointment book , christie is an actress who has been cast as a prostitute and must learn the ins and outs , and josephine is a student who is forced into it for economical reasons .
translation: ナディーンは結婚して子供がいるにもかかわらず、そこで売春婦として働いています。ハンナは予約帳を管理しており、クリスティは売春婦としてキャスティングされた女優で、やり方を学ばなければなりません。ジョセフィーヌは経済的理由からそれを強いられている学生です。
back_translation: Nadine, despite being married and having children, works there as a prostitute. Hannah manages the booking diary, and Christy is an actress cast as a prostitute who must learn the ropes. Josephine is a student who is forced into it for economic reasons.

text: `` sumo east and west `` takes us into this world through the story of wayne vierra of hawaii , aka kamakiiwa , a former professional sumo wrestler in japan whose pro career was cut short by injury , but who rebounded to become a champion in the growing world of amateur sumo .
translation: 「相撲の東と西」は、ハワイ出身のウェイン・ヴィエラ、別名カマキイワの物語を通じてこの世界へと私たちを導きます。彼は日本で元プロの相撲レスラーであり、怪我によってプロキャリアは短くなりましたが、再起し、成長するアマチュア相撲の世界でチャンピオンとなりました。
back_translation: "Sumo's East and West" takes us into this world through the story of Wayne Vieira, also known as Kamaki Iwa, who hails from Hawaii. He was a former professional sumo wrestler in Japan, and although his professional career was cut short due to injury, he made a comeback and became a champion in the world of amateur sumo, growing along the way.

text: as `` daddy day care `` starts to catch on , it launches them into a comedic rivalry with the chapman academy tough-as-nails director , ms . harridan ( anjelica huston ) .
translation: 「ダディ・デイケア」が人気を博し始めると、彼らはチャップマンアカデミーの厳格なディレクター、ハリダン女史（アンジェリカ・ヒューストン）とのコメディーの対立に突入します。
back_translation: As "Daddy Day Care" starts to gain popularity, they find themselves in a comedic clash with the strict director of Chapman Academy, Ms. Halliday (played by Anjelica Huston).

text: stupid , infantile , redundant , sloppy , over-the-top , and amateurish . yep , it 's `` waking up in reno . `` go back to sleep .
translation: 愚かで、幼稚で、冗長で、不器用で、やりすぎで、素人っぽい。それが「レノで目覚める」だ。寝なおせ。
back_translation: Foolish, childish, redundant, clumsy, excessive, amateurish. That's "Awakening with Leno." Go sleep again.

text: this is pure , exciting moviemaking . you wo n't exactly know what 's happening but you 'll be blissfully exhausted .
translation: これは純粋で刺激的な映画制作です。何が起こっているのか正確にはわからないでしょうが、幸せに疲れ切ることでしょう。
back_translation: This is pure and exhilarating filmmaking. You may not know exactly what's happening, but you will tire yourself out with happiness.

text: john , and world-famous ice skating star , elena , are about to sign divorce papers when they realise that , in spite of everything happening around them , their love is worth fighting for .
translation: ジョンと世界的に有名なフィギュアスケートスター、エレナは、離婚届に署名しようとしているときに、周囲で起こっているすべてのことにもかかわらず、彼らの愛は戦う価値があることに気づきます。
back_translation: John and the world-famous figure skating star, Elena, realize that their love is worth fighting for, despite everything happening around them as they try to sign the divorce papers.

text: ( e . t . ) stands as a perfect movie-going experience that i do n't believe will ever show signs of age .
translation: （E.T.）は、私が決して古くなる兆しを見せることはないと信じる完璧な映画体験として存在しています。
back_translation: (E.T.) exists as a perfect movie experience that I believe will never show signs of aging.

text: documentarians weissman and weber have expertly crafted a record of a wondrous time and a wild group in the cockettes , and you wo n't want to miss a minute of it .
translation: ドキュメンタリー作家のワイスマンとウェーバーは、「コケット」たちの素晴らしい時代とワイルドなグループの記録を巧妙に作り上げており、その一瞬も見逃したくないでしょう。
back_translation: Documentary filmmakers Wiseman and Weber have skillfully crafted a record of the wonderful era of the "coquettes" and the wild group, and you won't want to miss a single moment of it.

text: bruce nolan is a television reporter , who is currently assigned what he considers to be undignified assignments , that has him being the butt of a joke .
translation: ブルース・ノーランはテレビのリポーターで、彼が不名誉な任務と見なしている仕事に現在割り当てられており、彼はジョークの対象になっています。
back_translation: Bruce Nolan is a television reporter who is currently assigned to a job that he considers to be an undesirable assignment, and he has become the subject of jokes.

text: too stagey , talky -- and long -- for its own good .
translation: あまりにもステージっぽくて、会話が多く、そして長すぎる。
back_translation: It's too much like a stage, with too many conversations and they're too long.

text: eventually , crane teamed up with video technician john carpenter to document his exploits , an association that may very well have led to his murder in a scottsdale , arizona motel room in 1978 , which remains officially unsolved to this day .
translation: 最終的に、クレーンはビデオ技術者ジョン・カーペンターとチームを組んで彼の活動を記録しました。この協力関係は、1978年にアリゾナ州スコッツデールのモーテルで彼の殺害につながった可能性が高く、今日まで公式に未解決のままとなっています。
back_translation: Ultimately, Crane teamed up with video technician John Carpenter to document his activities. This collaboration likely led to his murder in a motel in Scottsdale, Arizona in 1978, which remains officially unsolved to this day.

text: ultimately the project comes across as clinical , detached , uninvolving , possibly prompting audience members to wonder , 'what 's the point ? '
translation: 最終的に、このプロジェクトは冷淡で、距離感があり、関与していないように思われ、観客が「何のため？」と疑問に思うかもしれません。
back_translation: Ultimately, this project may seem cold, distant, and disengaged, leaving the audience wondering, "What's the point?"

text: it 's a love story in havana at the begining of the 19th century , between a young women from hait & # 237 ; and a german man .
translation: それは19世紀初頭のハバナで、ハイチの若い女性とドイツ人男性との間のラブストーリーです。
back_translation: It is a love story between a young woman from Haiti and a German man in Havana in the early 19th century.

text: thomas narrowly escapes when his brother sean finds a wishbone , and suggests that they make a wish .
translation: トーマスは、兄のショーンがウィッシュボーンを見つけて願い事をしようと提案したとき、危うく逃れる。
back_translation: Thomas narrowly escapes when his brother Sean suggests finding a wishbone and making a wish.

text: no one else , that is , until an extra-ordinary group of six outlaws lands on their front porch .
translation: 誰もいなかった、つまり、特別な6人の無法者たちが彼らの前のポーチに現れるまで。
back_translation: No one was there, until the special six outlaws appeared on the porch in front of them.

text: a canny franchise escapade ; it gets the job done .
translation: 狡猾なフランチャイズの冒険; それは仕事をこなす。
back_translation: The cunning franchise adventure; it gets the job done.

text: my wife is an actress works as well as it does because [ the leads ] are such a companionable couple .
translation: 私の妻は女優で、[主役たち]がとても仲の良いカップルなので、彼女はうまくやっています。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and since the [lead actors] are a very close couple, she is doing well.

text: even if the ring has a familiar ring , it 's still unusually crafty and intelligent for hollywood horror .
translation: たとえそのリングが馴染みのあるものであっても、ハリウッドホラーにしては異常に巧妙で知的です。
back_translation: Even if the ring is something familiar, it is unusually clever and intellectual for a Hollywood horror.

text: the end of innocence has already begun and a new path , dark and hopeful , stands waiting like the ships beyond her window .
translation: 無垢の終わりはすでに始まっており、新しい道が暗くも希望に満ちた形で、彼女の窓の向こうにある船のように待っている。
back_translation: The end of innocence has already begun, and a new path waits beyond her window like a ship, dark yet filled with hope.

text: the film just might turn on many people to opera , in general , an art form at once visceral and spiritual , wonderfully vulgar and sublimely lofty -- and as emotionally grand as life .
translation: この映画は多くの人々をオペラに引き込むかもしれません。オペラは一面的に肉体的で精神的なアートフォームであり、素晴らしく下品でありながら、崇高な高尚さを持ち、人生と同じくらい感情的に壮大です。
back_translation: This film may draw many people into opera. Opera is a one-dimensional art form that is both physical and mental, wonderfully vulgar yet possessing a sublime nobility, and as emotionally grand as life itself.

text: at the same time , scientist and businessman norman osborn , after exposure to an experimental nerve gas , develops an alternate personality himself ; the super-strong , psychotic green goblin !
translation: 同時に、科学者であり実業家のノーマン・オズボーンは、実験的な神経ガスに曝露した後、自ら別の人格を持つようになる。それは、超人的な力を持つ精神的に異常なグリーンゴブリンだ！
back_translation: At the same time, Norman Osborn, a scientist and businessman, develops another personality after being exposed to an experimental nerve gas. This is the mentally unstable Green Goblin, who possesses superhuman strength!

text: joseph just broke up with his girlfriend and is not taking it very well .
translation: ジョセフは彼女と別れたばかりで、あまりうまく対処できていません。
back_translation: Joseph has just broken up with his girlfriend and is not dealing with it very well.

text: the nightmare isnt over , william birkin ordered the hive to be reopened , and in doing so contaminated all of raccoon city , a city of the daed , with alice stuck right in the middle .
translation: 悪夢は終わっていない。ウィリアム・バーキンはハイブの再開を命じ、その結果、アリスが真ん中に取り残されているまま、全てのラクーンシティを汚染してしまった。
back_translation: The nightmare is not over. William Birkin ordered the reopening of the Hive, and as a result, Alice was left stranded in the middle, contaminating all of Raccoon City.

text: one day , he came to her and asked her to have dinner and drive her home .
translation: ある日、彼は彼女のところに来て、夕食を一緒に食べて彼女を家まで送ってくれるよう頼みました。
back_translation: One day, he came to her and asked if she could have dinner together and take her home afterwards.

text: a `` film poem `` which is a 2002 updated version of the famous 1936 general post office film 'night mail ( 1936 ) ' .
translation: 「フィルム詩」は、1936年の有名な一般郵便局のフィルム『ナイトメール（1936）』の2002年の改訂版です。
back_translation: "Film Poetry" is the 2002 revised edition of the famous general post office film "Night Mail (1936)" from 1936.

text: what if he escaped with the intention of joining all those other nazi evil-geniuses in sun-soaked south america ?
translation: 彼が南米の日差しを浴びた場所で、他のナチスの悪の天才たちと合流する意図で逃げたらどうなるだろう？
back_translation: What would happen if he escaped to a place in South America soaked in sunlight with the intention of joining other evil geniuses of the Nazis?

text: he uses radical methods to get some mation from magneto , and plans an attack to prof . xavier 's mutant school when there is only wolverine and the young students ( jean grey and storm are looking for a new mutant , nightcrawler , and xavier and clycops are in magneto 's plastic prison ) .
translation: 彼はマグネトから情報を得るために過激な手段を使い、ウルヴァリンと若い生徒たち（ジーン・グレイとストームは新しいミュータント、ナイトクロウラーを探していて、シャイア教授とサイクロップスはマグネトのプラスチック刑務所にいる）しかいない時に、シャイア教授のミュータント学校への攻撃を計画します。
back_translation: He uses extreme measures to obtain information from Magneto and plans an attack on Professor Xavier's mutant school when only Wolverine and the young students (Jean Grey and Storm are searching for the new mutant, Nightcrawler, while Professor Xavier and Cyclops are in Magneto's plastic prison) are present.

text: the writer creates a story of a elderly man who seeks happiness because of the recent lose of his wife .
translation: 作家は、最近妻を失ったために幸せを求める年老いた男性の物語を描いています。
back_translation: The writer depicts the story of an elderly man seeking happiness after recently losing his wife.

text: curling may be a unique sport but men with brooms is distinctly ordinary .
translation: カーリングはユニークなスポーツかもしれませんが、ほうきを持った男性は明らかに普通です。
back_translation: Curling may be a unique sport, but a man with a broom is clearly ordinary.

text: a generic bloodbath that often becomes laughably unbearable when it is n't merely offensive .
translation: しばしば単に攻撃的でないときに滑稽に耐え難くなる一般的な血の海。
back_translation: A general sea of blood that often becomes unbearably funny when not simply aggressive.

text: the entire point of a shaggy dog story , of course , is that it goes nowhere , and this is classic nowheresville in every sense .
translation: シャギー・ドッグ・ストーリーの全てのポイントは、それがどこにも行かないということであり、これはあらゆる意味で典型的な無意味な話です。
back_translation: The point of a shaggy dog story is that it goes nowhere, and it is, in every sense, a quintessentially meaningless tale.

text: kyle 's decline into a `` living hell `` is part of a journey to that thing we all battle within our selves .
translation: カイルの「生き地獄」への堕落は、私たち全員が内なる自己と戦うその旅の一部です。
back_translation: Kyle's descent into "hell on earth" is part of the journey we all face in battling our inner selves.

text: when he tries to grant everybody what they want , turmoil ensues .
translation: 彼が皆が欲しいものを与えようとすると、混乱が生じる。
back_translation: When he tries to give everyone what they want, confusion arises.

text: what they soon discover is that they are n't alone . . . and it is n't a german soldier that 's hunting them down .
translation: 彼らがすぐに発見するのは、彼らが一人ではないということです。。。そして、彼らを追っているのはドイツの兵士ではありません。
back_translation: What they will soon discover is that they are not alone... and that it is not German soldiers who are pursuing them.

text: the drama was so uninspiring that even a story immersed in love , lust , and sin could n't keep my attention .
translation: そのドラマは非常に刺激がなく、愛、欲望、罪に満ちたストーリーでさえ私の注意を引くことができませんでした。
back_translation: The drama was so unexciting that even a story filled with love, desire, and sin couldn't capture my attention.

text: will rachel be able to protect harper and prove who has really been planting the bombs ?
translation: レイチェルはハーパーを守り、誰が本当に爆弾を仕掛けていたのか証明できるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Will Rachel be able to protect Harper and prove who really planted the bomb?

text: the mismatch between whitey 's good heart and never-ending optimism and davey 's constant troublemaking soon have them both wondering if going to jail would n't have been easier !
translation: ホワイティの優しい心と終わりのない楽観主義と、デイビーの常にトラブルを起こす性格との不一致は、二人とも「刑務所に行く方が楽だったのでは？」と考えさせることになる。
back_translation: The mismatch between Whity's gentle heart and endless optimism and Davey's constant troublemaking nature makes both of them wonder, "Wouldn't it have been easier to just go to prison?"

text: a new york city oil company troubleshooter is brought to a remote b . c .
translation: ニューヨーク市の石油会社のトラブルシューティング担当者が、遠隔地のブリティッシュコロンビアに派遣される。
back_translation: A troubleshooting representative from an oil company in New York City is dispatched to remote British Columbia.

text: very much a home video , and so devoid of artifice and purpose that it appears not to have been edited at all .
translation: 非常に家庭的なビデオで、人工的なものや目的がまったくなく、まったく編集されていないように見えます。
back_translation: It appears to be a very homey video, completely devoid of anything artificial or purposeful, and looks completely unedited.

text: . . . expands the horizons of boredom to the point of collapse , turning into a black hole of dullness , from which no interesting concept can escape .
translation: 退屈の地平を崩壊に至るまで拡張し、面白い概念が逃れられない退屈のブラックホールに変わってしまう。
back_translation: Expanding the horizon of boredom until it collapses into a black hole of unescapable dullness, where interesting concepts are drawn in.

text: produced by 20th century fox , ice age falls short of classic status . but it 's one of the best such features not to wear the disney or dreamworks banner .
translation: 20世紀フォックス制作の『アイスエイジ』は、クラシックの地位には達していません。しかし、ディズニーやドリームワークスのブランドを持たない中では、最も優れた作品の一つです。
back_translation: The 20th Century Fox production "Ice Age" has not reached the status of a classic. However, it is one of the best works among those without the Disney or DreamWorks brand.

text: even through its flaws , revolution # 9 proves to be a compelling , interestingly told film .
translation: 欠点があっても、レボリューション #9 は魅力的で興味深いストーリーが語られる映画である。
back_translation: Even with its flaws, Revolution #9 is a film that tells an intriguing and captivating story.

text: both flawed and delayed , martin scorcese 's gangs of new york still emerges as his most vital work since goodfellas .
translation: 欠点があり遅れもあるマーティン・スコセッシの「ニュー・ヨークの激情」は、それでも彼の「グッドフェローズ」以来の最も重要な作品として浮かび上がる。
back_translation: Despite its flaws and delays, Martin Scorsese's "New York, New York" stands out as his most significant work since "Goodfellas."

text: martyr gets royally screwed and comes back for more .
translation: 殉教者はひどい目に遭い、再び戻ってくる。
back_translation: Martyrs go through terrible experiences and return once again.

text: a horror movie with seriously dumb characters , which somewhat dilutes the pleasure of watching them stalked by creepy-crawly bug things that live only in the darkness .
translation: 暗闇にのみ生息する不気味な虫たちに追いかけられる様子を見る楽しみを若干薄めてしまう、非常に愚かなキャラクターたちが登場するホラー映画。
back_translation: A horror movie featuring very foolish characters that somewhat diminishes the enjoyment of watching the creepy bugs that only inhabit the darkness chase after them.

text: not one moment in the enterprise did n't make me want to lie down in a dark room with something cool to my brow .
translation: その事業のどの瞬間も、冷たいものを額に当てながら暗い部屋に横になりたいという気持ちにさせなかったことはありませんでした。
back_translation: There has never been a moment in that business where I didn’t feel like lying down in a dark room with something cold pressed to my forehead.

text: hamilton high is no place for a teacher who cares .
translation: ハミルトン高校は、思いやりのある教師にはふさわしくない場所です。
back_translation: Hamilton High School is not a suitable place for compassionate teachers.

text: the direction occasionally rises to the level of marginal competence , but for most of the film it is hard to tell who is chasing who or why .
translation: 方向性は時折、限界的な能力のレベルに達しますが、映画のほとんどの間、誰が誰を追いかけているのか、またその理由がわかりにくいです。
back_translation: At times, the direction reaches a borderline level of ability, but for most of the movie, it is unclear who is chasing whom and why.

text: in a futuristic world , a strict regime has eliminated war by suppressing emotions : books , art and music are strictly forbidden and feeling is a crime punishable by death .
translation: 未来の世界では、厳格な体制が感情を抑制することで戦争を排除しています。書籍、アート、音楽は厳しく禁止されており、感情を持つことは死刑に値する犯罪です。
back_translation: In the world of the future, a strict regime eliminates war by suppressing emotions. Books, art, and music are strictly prohibited, and having emotions is a crime punishable by death.

text: after battling an attack by robbers with her amazing martial arts skills , she tells yan her family 's history .
translation: 強盗の襲撃との戦いの後、彼女は素晴らしい武道のスキルを駆使して、ヤンに彼女の家族の歴史を語る。
back_translation: After battling against a robbery attack, she uses her incredible martial arts skills to share her family's history with Yan.

text: the film has the high-buffed gloss and high-octane jolts you expect of de palma , but what makes it transporting is that it 's also one of the smartest , most pleasurable expressions of pure movie love to come from an american director in years .
translation: その映画はデ・パルマらしい高光沢な仕上がりとハイオクタンの興奮を持っていますが、心を奪われるのは、それが近年アメリカの監督から生まれた純粋な映画愛の最もスマートで快適な表現の一つでもあるからです。
back_translation: The movie has a glossy finish and high-octane excitement typical of De Palma, but what captivates the heart is that it is also one of the smartest and most comfortable expressions of pure love for cinema that has emerged from American directors in recent years.

text: soon after , christin returns as a fierce ghost , and begins to kill all in her path at the hotel as a means for revenge .
translation: その後すぐに、クリスティンは凶悪な幽霊として戻り、復讐の手段としてホテルで彼女の道にいるすべての人を殺し始めます。
back_translation: Soon after, Christine returns as a malevolent ghost and begins to kill everyone in her way at the hotel as a means of revenge.

text: after the death of a `` mucker `` and two others opposing her sect , the local authorities decide to act against her and her followers .
translation: 「ムッカー」と他の二人が彼女の宗派に反対して死亡した後、地元当局は彼女と彼女の信者に対して行動を起こすことを決定する。
back_translation: After "Mukka" and two others died opposing her sect, local authorities decided to take action against her and her followers.

text: he tells mitchell that he is now in debt .
translation: 彼はミッチェルに自分が今、借金を抱えていると伝えます。
back_translation: He tells Mitchell that he is currently in debt.

text: i felt sad for lise not so much because of what happens as because she was captured by this movie when she obviously belongs in something lighter and sunnier , by rohmer , for example .
translation: 私はリースのことを悲しく感じました。起こったことよりも、彼女がこの映画に捕らえられてしまったからです。彼女は明らかにロメールのような、もっと軽やかで陽の当たるものに属するべきなのに。
back_translation: I felt sad about Lisa. It's not so much what happened, but that she got trapped in this movie. She clearly belongs in something more light and sunny, like Rohmer's films.

text: his new worldliness and ideas go over well with impoverished siblings madonna and silver brassaurd and the hopelessly na & # 239 ; ve carrie .
translation: 彼の新しい世俗性とアイデアは、貧しい兄弟姉妹のマドンナとシルバー・ブラサール、そして絶望的にナイーブなキャリーに受け入れられています。
back_translation: His new secularism and ideas are embraced by the poor siblings Madonna and Silver Brawler, as well as the desperately naive Carrie.

text: but things go terribly wrong for the honest bank manager when he finds one of his own employees trying to con the customers .
translation: 誠実な銀行のマネージャーにとって、事態はひどく悪化します。彼は自分の従業員の一人が顧客を騙そうとしているのを見つけるのです。
back_translation: For the honest bank manager, the situation deteriorates horribly. He discovers that one of his employees is trying to deceive a customer.

text: that rare movie that works on any number of levels -- as a film of magic and whimsy for children , a heartfelt romance for teenagers and a compelling argument about death , both pro and con , for adults .
translation: 子供向けの魔法と whimsy の映画として、ティーンエイジャー向けの心温まるロマンスとして、そして大人向けの死についての賛否を問う説得力のある議論として、あらゆるレベルで機能する珍しい映画です。
back_translation: It is a rare film that works on every level: as a magical and whimsical movie for children, as a heartwarming romance for teenagers, and as a compelling discussion that questions the pros and cons of death for adults.

text: colorful , energetic and sweetly whimsical . . . the rare sequel that 's better than its predecessor .
translation: カラフルでエネルギッシュで甘く幻想的な…前作を上回る珍しい続編。
back_translation: Colorful, energetic, sweet, and fantastical... a rare sequel that surpasses the previous work.

text: moves in such odd plot directions and descends into such message-mongering moralism that its good qualities are obscured .
translation: 奇妙なプロットの方向に進み、メッセージを押し付けるような道徳主義に陥ることで、その良い特質が隠れてしまっています。
back_translation: It hides its good qualities by heading in a strange plot direction and falling into a preachy moralism.

text: it is most of the things costner movies are known for ; it 's sanctimonious , self-righteous and so eager to earn our love that you want to slap it .
translation: それはコスナー映画が知られているほとんどのものです；それは偽善的で、自己中心的で、私たちの愛を得ることに非常に熱心で、それに対して叩きたくなります。
