back_translation: That is what most of Costner's movies are known for; they are hypocritical, self-centered, and very eager to win our affection, making us want to criticize them.

text: johnny knoxville and his crazy friends appear on the big screen for the very first time in jackass : the movie .
translation: ジョニー・ノックスビルと彼のクレイジーな友達が、映画『ジャッカス：ザ・ムービー』で初めて大スクリーンに登場します。
back_translation: Johnny Knoxville and his crazy friends make their big-screen debut in the movie "Jackass: The Movie."

text: a gracefully acted , unsentimental , quite likable little coming-of-age movie .
translation: 優雅に演じられた、感傷的でない、非常に好感の持てる小さな成長物語の映画。
back_translation: A gracefully performed, non-sentimental, very likable little coming-of-age film.

text: johnathan accepts and learns the ropes of rollerball : the players are on rollerblades , trying to bring a heavy metal ball into a high goal .
translation: ジョナサンは受け入れ、ローラーボールのコツを学びます：選手たちはローラーブレードを履き、重い金属製のボールを高いゴールに入れようとしています。
back_translation: Jonathan accepts and learns the tricks of rollerball: players wear rollerblades and try to get a heavy metal ball into a high goal.

text: resort to an all-night crime spree that nets them a ten thousand dollar reward for their own crimes , thanks to a bizarre twist of fate .
translation: 奇妙な運命の巡り合わせのおかげで、自らの犯罪によって一万ドルの報酬を得るために、一晩中の犯罪スプリーに身を投じる。
back_translation: Thanks to a strange twist of fate, I immerse myself in an all-night crime spree to earn a reward of ten thousand dollars from my own crimes.

text: while van wilder may not be the worst national lampoon film , it 's far from being this generation 's animal house .
translation: バン・ワイルダーはナショナル・ランプーンの映画の中で最悪ではないかもしれませんが、今の世代のアニマルハウスとは程遠いです。
back_translation: Van Wilder may not be the worst in the National Lampoon movies, but it is far from being the Animal House of the current generation.

text: the driver races to locate a kidnapped victim locked in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere on the water 's edge .
translation: ドライバーは水辺のどこかにある放置された車のトランクに閉じ込められた誘拐された犠牲者を見つけるために急いでいます。
back_translation: The driver is in a hurry to find a kidnapped victim who is trapped in the trunk of an abandoned car somewhere by the water.

text: sean 's a drug dealer , owes a lot of money to `` fellow `` dealer rupert guest ( clifton collins , jr . ) , and sleeps with nearly half of the female population on campus .
translation: ショーンは麻薬の売人で、同業者ルパート・ゲスト（クリフトン・コリンズ・ジュニア）に多額の金を借りており、キャンパスの女性のほぼ半分と関係を持っています。
back_translation: Sean is a drug dealer who owes a large amount of money to fellow dealer Rupert Guest (Clifton Collins Jr.) and has been involved with almost half of the women on campus.

text: . . . a b-movie-and-proud-of-it thrill ride , probably the best of its kind since tremors .
translation: ...B級映画であることを誇りに思うスリル満点の乗り物で、おそらく「トレマーズ」以来の最高の作品です。
back_translation: ...a thrilling ride that proudly embraces being a B-movie, and perhaps the best since "Tremors."

text: in awe of seductive club singer velma kelly ( who is subsequantly arrested for the murder of her husband and sister - after discovering their affair ) , roxie meets fred cassely a man who convinces her he can 'make her showbiz career take off ' .
translation: 魅惑的なクラブ歌手ヴェルマ・ケリー（彼女はその後、夫と妹の不倫を発見し、彼らの殺人で逮捕される）に驚嘆し、ロキシーはフレッド・キャセリーという男に出会う。彼は彼女に「ショービズのキャリアを活かすことができる」と納得させる。
back_translation: Amazed by the captivating club singer Velma Kelly (who later discovers her husband and sister's affair and is arrested for their murder), Roxy meets a man named Fred Casely. He convinces her that she can "make the most of her showbiz career."

text: everything is pegged into the groove of a new york dating comedy with 'issues ' to simplify .
translation: すべては、問題を単純化するためのニューヨークのデーティングコメディの流れに組み込まれています。
back_translation: Everything is integrated into the flow of a New York dating comedy to simplify the problem.

text: a beautiful meditation on the life force and redemptive power of literature -- for writers and readers alike -- and on what it means to be fully alive , navigating the rocky terrain between vision and execution .
translation: 文学の生命力と救済力についての美しい瞑想 -- 作家と読者のために -- そして、視覚と実行の間の険しい地形をナビゲートしながら、完全に生きるとはどういうことか。
back_translation: A beautiful meditation on the life force and redemptive power of literature -- for writers and readers -- and what it means to live fully while navigating the rugged terrain between vision and execution.

text: the word in las vegas is that he is dead .
translation: ラスベガスでは彼が亡くなったという噂が広まっています。
back_translation: There are rumors spreading that he has died in Las Vegas.

text: the real draw , though , is the performance by dunst that is , alone , worth the price of admission .
translation: しかし、真の魅力はダンスツのパフォーマンスであり、それだけでも入場料の価値があります。
back_translation: However, the true appeal lies in the dance duo's performance, which is worth the entrance fee on its own.

text: after a decade of hidden feelings , divorces and failed relationships , they both finally reveal their true feelings for one another - to find out they both are in love with the other .
translation: 十年の隠された感情、離婚、そして失敗した関係の後、彼らはついに互いへの本当の気持ちを明らかにする - 互いに愛し合っていることを知るために。
back_translation: After ten years of hidden emotions, divorce, and failed relationships, they finally reveal their true feelings for each other - to discover that they love each other.

text: they threw loads of money at an idea that should 've been so much more even if it was only made for teenage boys and wrestling fans .
translation: 彼らは、たとえそれがティーンエイジャーの男の子やレスリングファンのためだけに作られたとしても、もっと大きなものであるべきアイデアに大量の金を投じた。
back_translation: They invested a lot of money in the idea that it should be something bigger, even if it was made only for teenage boys or wrestling fans.

text: credit director ramsay for taking the sometimes improbable story and making it feel realistic .
translation: ラムジー監督に、時には信じがたい物語をリアルに感じさせる手腕を評価したい。
back_translation: I would like to commend Director Ramsey for his ability to make sometimes incredible stories feel real.

text: enter four months later , when it seems reasonable to say that charlie should be feeling better .
translation: 4ヶ月後に入ります。チャーリーが気分が良くなっていると言えるのが妥当なようです。
back_translation: It seems reasonable to say that Charlie will be feeling better in four months.

text: if the man from elysian fields is doomed by its smallness , it is also elevated by it -- the kind of movie that you enjoy more because you 're one of the lucky few who sought it out .
translation: エリジアン・フィールズの男がその小ささによって運命づけられているなら、それは同時にその小ささによって高められてもいる — 自分がそれを探し求めた幸運な少数派の一人だからこそ、より楽しめるような映画です。
back_translation: If the man from Elysian Fields is destined by his smallness, he is simultaneously elevated by that same smallness — it's a movie that one can enjoy more because one is fortunate enough to be part of the lucky minority that sought it out.

text: amanda is faced with making right decisions amidst trying circumstances .
translation: アマンダは厳しい状況の中で正しい決断を下すことに直面しています。
back_translation: Amanda is facing the challenge of making the right decision in a difficult situation.

text: new york serves as a backdrop for a cast of characters in search of love , lust or lucre including a woman who makes awkward moves on the man renovating her soho loft , an embezzler , a sleazy artist and a phone psychic .
translation: ニューヨークは、愛、欲望、または利益を求めるキャラクターたちの背景として機能します。そこには、自分のソーホーのロフトを改装している男性にぎこちないアプローチをする女性、横領者、いやらしいアーティスト、電話の霊媒師が含まれています。
back_translation: New York serves as a backdrop for characters seeking love, desire, or profit. It includes a woman awkwardly approaching a man who is renovating his loft in SoHo, embezzlers, sleazy artists, and a telephone medium.

text: in the end , we are left with something like two ships passing in the night rather than any insights into gay love , chinese society or the price one pays for being dishonest .
translation: 結局、私たちはゲイの愛、中国社会、または不誠実であることの代償についての洞察ではなく、夜に通り過ぎる二隻の船のようなものを残されている。
back_translation: In the end, we are left not with insights about gay love, Chinese society, or the cost of dishonesty, but rather like two ships passing in the night.

text: the following things are not at all entertaining : the bad sound , the lack of climax and , worst of all , watching seinfeld ( who is also one of the film 's producers ) do everything he can to look like a good guy .
translation: 次のことは全く面白くありません：悪い音、クライマックスの欠如、そして最悪なのは、セインフェルド（彼はこの映画の製作者の一人でもあります）が良い人に見えるようにありとあらゆることをするのを見ていることです。
back_translation: The following things are not interesting at all: bad sound, lack of climax, and worst of all, watching Seinfeld (who is also one of the producers of this film) do everything to appear to be a good person.

text: one ca n't shake the feeling that crossroads is nothing more than an hour-and-a-half-long commercial for britney 's latest album .
translation: クロスロードは、ブリトニーの最新アルバムのための1時間半の長さのコマーシャルに過ぎないという感覚を拭い去ることはできません。
back_translation: I can't shake the feeling that Crossroad is nothing more than a 90-minute commercial for Britney's latest album.

text: all these developments and challenges facing santa weigh down the plot so heavily that they drain all the film of its energy and needlessly strain credibility .
translation: これらの展開とサンタが直面する課題は、プロットを非常に重くし、映画からすべてのエネルギーを奪い、信頼性を不必要に損ないます。
back_translation: These developments and the challenges Santa faces weigh down the plot significantly, draining all the energy from the film and unnecessarily undermining its credibility.

text: the good girl is a film in which the talent is undeniable but the results are underwhelming .
translation: 「ザ・グッド・ガール」は、才能は否定できないが結果は期待外れな映画です。
back_translation: "The Good Girl" is a film that cannot deny its talent, but the results are disappointing.

text: when all but one of mi5 's top agents are killed in an explosion .
translation: MI5のトップエージェントのうち1人を除いて全員が爆発で殺されるとき。
back_translation: When all but one of the top MI5 agents are killed in an explosion.

text: the whole of sunshine state is less than the sum of its parts , but the parts are often lovely , and always true .
translation: サンシャインステート全体はその構成要素の合計よりも劣りますが、部分部分はしばしば美しく、常に真実です。
back_translation: The Sunshine State as a whole is less than the sum of its parts, but each part is often beautiful and always true.

text: treats a potentially explosive set-up with adult reflection and thoughtfulness .
translation: 大人の反省と思慮をもって、潜在的に爆発的な状況に対処します。
back_translation: We will handle potentially explosive situations with adult reflection and consideration.

text: though not as tightly focused or as well-performed as malkovich , human nature has its own absurdist flair .
translation: マルコビッチほどピンポイントではなく、パフォーマンスも優れてはいないが、『人間の本性』には独自の不条理な魅力がある。
back_translation: Although it is not as precise as "Being John Malkovich" and its performance is not outstanding, "Human Nature" has a unique and absurd charm.

text: in a surrealistic approach typical of the director , a clumsy cat and an intelligent monkey are also present in the film .
translation: 監督に典型的なシュールレアリスムのアプローチで、映画には不器用な猫と賢い猿も登場します。
back_translation: In the film, there is a clumsy cat and a clever monkey, presented in a typical surrealist approach by the director.

text: it 's deep-sixed by a compulsion to catalog every bodily fluids gag in there 's something about mary and devise a parallel clone-gag .
translation: それは「メリーに首ったけ」の中のありとあらゆる体液のギャグをカタログ化する強迫観念によって深く沈められ、平行なクローンギャグを考案する何かがあります。
back_translation: It is deeply submerged by an obsession to catalog every bodily fluid gag from "There's Something About Mary," and there is something that devises parallel clone gags.

text: a kilted jackson is an unsettling sight , and indicative of his , if you will , out-of-kilter character , who rambles aimlessly through ill-conceived action pieces .
translation: キルトを身にまとったジャクソンは不安を感じさせる光景であり、彼の、もしそう呼ぶならば、調和の取れないキャラクターを象徴しています。彼はあまり考えられていないアクションシーンを無目的に彷徨いています。
back_translation: Jackson, draped in a quilt, presents a disconcerting sight, symbolizing his, if one might call it that, disharmonious character. He aimlessly wanders through action scenes that seem poorly thought out.

text: less an examination of neo-nazism than a probe into the nature of faith itself .
translation: ネオナチズムの調査というよりも、信仰そのものの本質を探る試みである。
back_translation: It is an attempt to explore the essence of faith itself rather than a study of Neo-Nazism.

text: despite impeccable acting . . . and a script that takes some rather unexpected ( even , at times , preposterous ) turns , love is just too , too precious in the end .
translation: 完璧な演技や、時には予想外で（さらには不条理とも言える）展開を見せる脚本にもかかわらず、結局のところ愛はあまりにも貴重すぎる。
back_translation: Despite the perfect performances and sometimes unexpected (and even absurd) developments in the script, in the end, love is simply too precious.

text: vincent gallo is right at home in this french shocker playing his usual bad boy weirdo role .
translation: ヴィンセント・ギャロは、このフランスのショッカーでいつもの悪役の変わり者の役を演じており、まさに自分の家にいるようなものだ。
back_translation: Vincent Gallo plays the eccentric role of the usual villain in this French shocker, and it's like he's right at home.

text: director roger kumble offers just enough sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counter the crudity . and there 's the inimitable diaz , holding it all together .
translation: 監督のロジャー・クンブルは、粗野さに対抗するためにちょうど十分な甘くて伝統的なロマンティックコメディを提供している。そして、すべてをまとめているのは比類のないダイアナである。
back_translation: Director Roger Kumble delivers just the right amount of sweet and traditional romantic comedy to counteract the roughness. And holding everything together is the incomparable Diana.

text: after a long inventory of break-up mishaps , nick enlists the help of his best friend to plan the perfect escape from his overbearing girlfriend .
translation: 長い別れのトラブルを経て、ニックは自分の過干渉な彼女から完璧に逃げるために、親友の助けを借りることにした。
back_translation: After going through a long separation trouble, Nick decided to enlist the help of his best friend to perfectly escape from his overly intrusive girlfriend.

text: < em > the crocodile hunter : collision course < /em > is one of the most unusual movies i 've ever seen , but it remains faithful to irwin 's appeal , and therefore it works .
translation: < em > クロコダイル・ハンター: 衝突コース < /em > は、私が見た中で最も異常な映画の一つですが、アーウィンの魅力に忠実であるため、成功しています。
back_translation: "Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course" is one of the most unusual movies I have seen, but it succeeds by staying true to Irwin's charm.

text: nemesis suffers from a paunchy midsection , several plodding action sequences and a wickedly undramatic central theme .
translation: ネメシスは、だぶだぶした腹部、いくつかのだるいアクションシーン、そして悪名高いほど非ドラマティックな中央テーマに苦しんでいます。
back_translation: Nemesis suffers from a baggy midsection, several lackluster action scenes, and a notoriously undramatic central theme.

text: he dies before he gets a chance to communicate with the spirit and his dead body with the ouija board is left to the devices to his strung out friends .
translation: 彼は霊とコミュニケーションをとる機会がないまま死に、その死体はウィジャボードと共に、彼の堕落した友人たちに任せられる。
back_translation: He died without having the opportunity to communicate with spirits, and his corpse was entrusted to his corrupt friends along with the Ouija board.

text: only nurse bloom knows the spells to ensure that the child will see benevolent spirits , not evil ones , but she has n't bargained for lena 's mother , who scoffs at 'old time ideas ' and discreetly disposes of the special tea the nurse has brewed .
translation: 看護師ブルームだけが、その子供が悪霊ではなく善良な精霊を見るための呪文を知っていますが、彼女は「古い考え」を嘲笑するレナの母親に対処していません。母親は看護師が作った特別なお茶をこっそり処分してしまいます。
back_translation: Only Nurse Bloom knows the spell to see that the child is not a bad spirit but a good spirit, but she does not deal with Lena's mother, who scoffs at the "old ideas." The mother secretly disposes of the special tea made by the nurse.

text: the warden 's attitude starts to change after 8 years , when mitra tries to protect a new inmate from rape at the hands of her older cellmates .
translation: 8年後、ミトラが新しい受刑者を年上のセルメイトからの強姦から守ろうとすると、看守の態度が変わり始める。
back_translation: Eight years later, when Mitra tries to protect a new inmate from being raped by an older cellmate, the guards' attitude begins to change.

text: if you think it 's a riot to see rob schneider in a young woman 's clothes , then you 'll enjoy the hot chick .
translation: ロブ・シュナイダーが若い女性の服を着ているのを見るのが面白いと思うなら、「ホット・チック」を楽しめるでしょう。
back_translation: If you think it's funny to see Rob Schneider wearing young women's clothes, then you'll likely enjoy "Hot Chick."

text: there 's enough melodrama in this magnolia primavera to make pta proud yet director muccino 's characters are less worthy of puccini than they are of daytime television .
translation: このマグノリア・プリマヴェーラには、PTAを誇りに思わせるほどのメロドラマが詰まっているが、監督のムッチーノのキャラクターはプッチーニよりも昼ドラマにふさわしい。
back_translation: This Magnolia Primavera is filled with enough melodrama to make the PTA proud, but director Muccino's characters are more suited for daytime soap operas than for Puccini.

text: wise , cruelly observant of human nature and hysterically funny .
translation: 賢く、人間の本性を冷酷に観察し、非常に面白い。
back_translation: Smart, coldly observing human nature, and very interesting.

text: it 's the kind of film where the villain even gives an evil look for his passport photo . how can you resist that ?
translation: それは、悪役がパスポート写真のためにさえ悪い目をしているような映画です。それにどうやって抵抗できますか？
back_translation: It’s a movie where the villain even looks bad for their passport photo. How can you possibly resist that?

text: pascale bailly 's rom-com provides amM-ilie 's audrey tautou with another fabuleux destin -- i . e . , a banal spiritual quest .
translation: パスカル・バイリーのロマンティックコメディは、アムリーのオドレイ・トトゥにまた別の素晴らしい運命を提供します。すなわち、平凡な精神的探求です。
back_translation: Pascal Baïley's romantic comedy offers Audrey Tautou from Amélie another wonderful fate, namely, an ordinary spiritual quest.

text: astonishing is n't the word -- neither is incompetent , incoherent or just plain crap . indeed , none of these words really gets at the very special type of badness that is deuces wild .
translation: 驚くべきことではなく、無能でもなく、支離滅裂でもなく、単にひどいわけでもありません。実際、これらの言葉のどれも「デューシーズワイルド」という非常に特別な種類の悪さを的確に表現してはいません。
back_translation: It's not surprising, nor incompetent, nor incoherent, and it's not simply terrible either. In fact, none of these words accurately express the very special kind of badness that is "deuce is wild."

text: when two african american pilots become the first non-white soldiers in the camp , one turns up murdered and the other accused of killing a white sergeant .
translation: 二人のアフリカ系アメリカ人パイロットがキャンプで初めての非白人兵士となったとき、一人が殺され、もう一人は白人軍曹の殺人容疑をかけられる。
back_translation: When two African American pilots became the first non-white soldiers at camp, one was killed, and the other was accused of murdering a white sergeant.

text: as a result , sarah embarks upon a journey of discovery that leads to danger , heartbreak and romance in the far corners of the world .
translation: その結果、サラは世界の遥か隅々で危険、心の痛み、そしてロマンスへと導く発見の旅に乗り出します。
back_translation: As a result, Sarah embarks on a journey of discovery that leads her to danger, heartache, and romance in far corners of the world.

text: the two animals decide to search for the father and return the baby to him .
translation: 二つの動物は父親を探し、赤ちゃんを彼に返すことに決めました。
back_translation: The two animals decided to search for their father and return the baby to him.

text: at least it 's a fairly impressive debut from the director , charles stone iii .
translation: 少なくとも、監督チャールズ・ストーン3世にとってはかなり印象的なデビューです。
back_translation: At least for director Charles Stone III, it is quite an impressive debut.

text: and he also has to deal with the daughter 's older brother , who 's on the run from local drug dealers .
translation: 彼はまた、地元の麻薬ディーラーから逃げている娘の兄とも対処しなければなりません。
back_translation: He also has to deal with the brother of a girl who is on the run from a local drug dealer.

text: john has become not just a full fledged phenomenon and household word , but a critics darling and social enigma as well .
translation: ジョンは単なる完全な現象や家庭内の言葉になっただけでなく、批評家のお気に入りであり、社会的な謎でもある。
back_translation: John has become not just a complete phenomenon or a household name, but also a favorite of critics and a social mystery.

text: they must begin a journey , avoiding the mysterious detective mr barlow and the terrifying inhuman jack , to uncover the dark truth to charlie 's life .
translation: 彼らは神秘的な探偵バーロー氏と恐ろしい非人間的なジャックを避けながら、チャーリーの人生に隠された暗い真実を明らかにする旅を始めなければならない。
back_translation: They must embark on a journey to uncover the dark truth hidden in Charlie's life while avoiding the mysterious detective Mr. Barlow and the terrifying inhuman Jack.

text: the film is rich with colorful characters and enlivened by its strong , convincing picture of rural trinidad .
translation: 映画は色彩豊かなキャラクターで満ち、トリニダードの田舎を鮮やかに描いています。
back_translation: The movie is filled with colorful characters and vividly portrays the countryside of Trinidad.

text: together [ time out and human resources ] establish mr . cantet as france 's foremost cinematic poet of the workplace .
translation: [タイムアウトと人事]は、ミスター・カンテのフランスにおける職場の映画詩人としての地位を確立しています。
back_translation: [Timeout and Personnel] establishes Mr. Kanté's status as a workplace poet in France.

text: suddenly , going to church becomes much more appealing .
translation: 突然、教会に行くことがずっと魅力的になります。
back_translation: Suddenly, going to church becomes very appealing.

text: such an incomprehensible mess that it feels less like bad cinema than like being stuck in a dark pit having a nightmare about bad cinema .
translation: 理解不能な混乱で、それは悪い映画というよりも、暗い穴に閉じ込められて悪い映画についての悪夢を見ているような感じだ。
back_translation: It feels like being trapped in a dark hole, having a nightmare about a bad movie, rather than just watching a bad movie filled with incomprehensible confusion.

text: lillard and cardellini earn their scooby snacks , but not anyone else .
translation: リラードとカーデリーニは自分たちのスクービースナックを手に入れますが、他の誰も得られません。
back_translation: Lillard and Cardellini get their Scooby snacks, but no one else does.

text: the result , however well-intentioned , is ironically just the sort of disposable , kitchen-sink homage that illustrates why the whole is so often less than the sum of its parts in today 's hollywood .
translation: 結果は、懐かしい意図を持っていても、皮肉なことに、今日のハリウッドで全体がしばしば部分の合計よりも劣る理由を示す、使い捨てのキッチンシンク的なオマージュそのものです。
back_translation: The result is, ironically, a disposable kitchen-sink homage that illustrates the reason why, even with a nostalgic intent, the whole often falls short of the sum of its parts in today's Hollywood.

text: the trick when watching godard is to catch the pitch of his poetics , savor the pleasure of his sounds and images , and ponder the historical , philosophical , and ethical issues that intersect with them .
translation: ゴダールを観る際のコツは、彼の詩的表現の緊張感を把握し、彼の音と画像の楽しさを味わい、それらと交差する歴史的、哲学的、倫理的な問題について考えることです。
back_translation: A tip for watching Godard is to grasp the tension of his poetic expressions, enjoy the pleasure of his sound and images, and contemplate the intersecting historical, philosophical, and ethical issues.

text: with no known family , he leave his california roots for middle america in search of what may be a distant cousin .
translation: 家族がいない彼は、カリフォルニアのルーツを離れ、遠い親戚を求めて中西部へ向かう。
back_translation: Having no family, he leaves his roots in California and heads to the Midwest in search of distant relatives.

text: soul is what 's lacking in every character in this movie and , subsequently , the movie itself .
translation: この映画のすべてのキャラクターに欠けているのは魂であり、その結果、映画自体にも魂が欠けています。
back_translation: What all the characters in this movie lack is a soul, and as a result, the movie itself also lacks a soul.

text: in order to protect his sister , eddie - disabled , betrayed and alone - journeys into the heart of his own darkness : where he discovers that the reason for his ordeal lies in his own past sins and those of his adversary charlie strom .
translation: 彼の妹を守るために、エディは - 障害を持ち、裏切られ、一人で - 自分の闇の中心へと旅をする。そして、彼は自らの苦難の理由が自分の過去の罪と敵であるチャーリー・ストロームの罪にあることを発見する。
back_translation: To protect his sister, Eddie embarks on a journey into the heart of his own darkness—burdened with disabilities, betrayed, and alone. He discovers that the reason for his suffering lies in his past sins and the sins of his enemy, Charlie Strom.

text: less cinematically powerful than quietly and deeply moving , which is powerful in itself .
translation: 静かで深く感動的であり、それ自体が力強いものであるため、映画的な力は少ない。
back_translation: It is quiet, deeply moving, and powerful in itself, therefore it has little cinematic power.

text: sharkey , part of the sinister world of child trade , picks up vlado , an orphan of war , dreaming of freedom and a better life .
translation: シャーキーは、子供の取引の陰惨な世界の一部で、自由とより良い生活を夢見る戦争孤児のヴラドを引き取ります。
back_translation: Sharky takes in Vlad, a war orphan who dreams of freedom and a better life, as part of the grim world of child trafficking.

text: it gets onto the screen just about as much of the novella as one could reasonably expect , and is engrossing and moving in its own right .
translation: それは、短編小説の画面化としては合理的に期待できるほどのものであり、それ自体でも心を引きつけ、感動的です。
back_translation: It is something that can be reasonably expected as an adaptation of a short story, and it is captivating and moving in itself.

text: after he arrives , things seem to go smoothly at first , but eventually , life becomes very complicated for the young father as he spends more time in the community .
translation: 彼が到着した後、最初は物事が順調に進んでいるように見えますが、やがて、若い父親にとって生活は非常に複雑になります。コミュニティで過ごす時間が増えるにつれて。
back_translation: After he arrives, things initially seem to be going smoothly, but eventually, life becomes very complicated for the young father as he spends more time in the community.

text: the film 's plot may be shallow , but you 've never seen the deep like you see it in these harrowing surf shots .
translation: 映画のプロットは浅いかもしれませんが、これらの痛ましいサーフショットで見るような深さは見たことがありません。
back_translation: The plot of the movie may be shallow, but I've never seen such depth as in these painful surf shots.

text: a fascinating examination of the joyous , turbulent self-discovery made by a proper , middle-aged woman .
translation: 適切な中年女性による喜びに満ちた激動の自己発見を魅力的に探求した作品。
back_translation: A captivating exploration of joyful and tumultuous self-discovery by a suitable middle-aged woman.

text: raimi and his team could n't have done any better in bringing the story of spider-man to the big screen .
translation: ライミと彼のチームは、スパイダーマンの物語を大スクリーンに持ってくる上でこれ以上のことはできなかった。
back_translation: Raimi and his team could not have done more to bring the story of Spider-Man to the big screen.

text: if deuces wild had been tweaked up a notch it would have become a camp adventure , one of those movies that 's so bad it starts to become good . but it was n't .
translation: もし「デューシーズ・ワイルド」が一段階盛り上がっていたら、キャンプアドベンチャーになっていたでしょう。そういう映画は、非常に悪くて逆に良くなるものです。しかし、そうではありませんでした。
back_translation: If "Dude, Where's My Car?" had been one notch more exciting, it would have turned into a camp adventure. Movies like that often end up being so bad that they become good. However, that wasn't the case.

text: while johnny knoxvile and his pals put their life at risk , they are entertaining people at the same time .
translation: ジョニー・ノックスヴィルと彼の仲間たちは命を危険にさらしながら、同時に人々を楽しませています。
back_translation: Johnny Knoxville and his friends are risking their lives while simultaneously entertaining people.

text: tiz 's best friend mel is a veteran of the `` drug game `` and has spent some part of every year in prison since he was twelve .
translation: ティズの親友メルは「ドラッグゲーム」のベテランで、12歳から毎年の一部を刑務所で過ごしてきました。
back_translation: Tiz's best friend Mel is a veteran of "drug games" and has spent part of every year in prison since he was 12 years old.

text: being a sayles film , this has a way of looking at things with more patience and maturity than a plot summary might lead us to expect .
translation: セイレスの映画であるため、これはプロットの要約が期待させるよりも、より忍耐強く成熟した視点で物事を見つめる方法を持っています。
back_translation: Because it is a Seires movie, this has a way of looking at things with a more patient and mature perspective than what the plot summary might suggest.

text: toss in david 's best friends a dying pre-op transsexual best friend and an aging , bitter , fag-hag journalist .
translation: デイビッドの親友たち、亡くなりかけている手術前のトランスセクシャルの親友と、年老いて苦々しいホモフォビックなジャーナリストを加えよう。
back_translation: Let's add David's friends, his transgender best friend who is on the verge of death before surgery, and an aging and bitter homophobic journalist.

text: during the heist , they have to work together to overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , a nasty head of security , and a bank vault that is suspended 30 feet above ground .
translation: 強盗計画中、彼らはハイテクのセキュリティシステム、警備犬、厄介なセキュリティ責任者、地上30フィートの高さに吊るされた銀行の金庫を克服するために協力しなければなりません。
back_translation: During the robbery plan, they must work together to overcome high-tech security systems, guard dogs, a troublesome security manager, and a bank vault suspended 30 feet in the air.

text: it manages to squeeze by on angelina jolie 's surprising flair for self-deprecating comedy .
translation: アンジェリーナ・ジョリーの自己卑下的なコメディセンスのおかげで、なんとかやりくりできる。
back_translation: Thanks to Angelina Jolie's self-deprecating sense of humor, I somehow manage to get by.

text: lars von trier re-explores the concept of goodness , but this in an idiom very different from that of his gold heart trilogy ( breaking the waves , the idiots and dancer in the dark ) .
translation: ラース・フォン・トリアは善の概念を再探求しますが、これは彼の「ゴールドハート三部作」（『ダンス・イン・ザ・ダーク』、『愚か者たち』、『はるかなる大地』）のものとは非常に異なる表現です。
back_translation: Lars von Trier reexamines the concept of good, but this is a very different expression from his "Golden Heart Trilogy" ("Dancer in the Dark," "The Idiots," and "Breaking the Waves").

text: banks is a hit man , the best , usually working for latin american drug cartels .
translation: バンクスはヒットマンで、最高の腕を持っており、通常はラテンアメリカの麻薬カルテルのために働いています。
back_translation: Banks is a hitman with top-notch skills, and usually works for Latin American drug cartels.

text: the son winds up re-creating his father 's elusive life in a series of legends and myths inspired by the few facts he knows .
translation: 息子は、彼が知っているわずかな事実に触発された一連の伝説や神話の中で、父の捉えきれない人生を再現することになります。
back_translation: The son will recreate his father's elusive life through a series of legends and myths inspired by the scant facts he knows.

text: in `` the hill `` , director kurt burk brings us on a voyage through dreams of a lost childhood , to the emptiness of a normal , conditioned life , into a fantastic , surreal dream world that echoes of the past .
translation: 「ザ・ヒル」において、監督カート・バークは私たちを失われた子供時代の夢を通じて、通常の条件づけられた生活の虚しさ、そして過去のエコーが響く幻想的で超現実的な夢の世界へと導きます。
back_translation: In "The Hill," director Kurt Burk takes us through the lost dreams of childhood, leading us to the emptiness of a conventional conditioned life and into a fantastical and surreal dream world where echoes of the past resonate.

text: sam and the kids band together and manage to combat the armed thugs and foil lamb 's perfectly planned crime .
translation: サムと子供たちは団結し、武装した悪党と戦い、ラムの完璧に計画された犯罪を阻止します。
back_translation: Sam and the children unite to fight against armed villains and thwart Ram's perfectly planned crime.

text: the film is ultimately about as inspiring as a hallmark card .
translation: この映画は最終的にはハローマークカードと同じくらい感動的です。
back_translation: This movie is ultimately as touching as a Hello Mark card.

text: a heartfelt , understated and occasionally heavy-handed slice of heartland .
translation: 心のこもった控えめで、時折強引な田舎の一片。
back_translation: A heartfelt and modest piece of the countryside, occasionally assertive.

text: together , tok and o orchestrate a buoyant , darkly funny dance of death . in the process , they demonstrate that there 's still a lot of life in hong kong cinema .
translation: トークとオーケストレートは、活気に満ちた、暗くて面白い死のダンスを共に演出します。過程の中で、彼らは香港映画にはまだ多くの生命が残っていることを示しています。
back_translation: Talk and orchestrate a vibrant, dark, and amusing dance of death together. In the process, they show that there is still much life left in Hong Kong cinema.

text: in the meantime , josh applies some of his newly acquired wisdom coupled with his own honest approach on doreen ( marlo marron ) - a woman his two buddies have deemed out of his league .
translation: その間、ジョシュは新たに得た知恵と彼自身の誠実なアプローチをドリーン（マーロ・マロン）に適用します。彼の二人の友人は、ドリーンはジョシュには手の届かない存在だと判断しています。
back_translation: During that time, Josh applies his newly gained wisdom and his own sincere approach to Doreen (Marlo Marlon). His two friends conclude that Doreen is out of Josh's league.

text: as in his other searingly intelligent docs , dong presents the facts in an admirably clear-eyed way .
translation: 彼の他の鋭く知的なドキュメンタリーと同様に、ドンは事実を見事に冷静に提示しています。
back_translation: Like his other sharp and intellectual documentaries, Don presents the facts remarkably calmly.

text: so exaggerated and broad that it comes off as annoying rather than charming .
translation: あまりにも誇張されていて広範囲にわたるため、魅力的というよりはうざい印象を与える。
back_translation: It gives an impression of being more annoying than attractive due to being excessively exaggerated and extensive.

text: watching e . t now , in an era dominated by cold , loud special-effects-laden extravaganzas , one is struck less by its lavish grandeur than by its intimacy and precision .
translation: 今、E.T.を観ているが、冷たく大きな特殊効果に満ちた壮大な作品が支配する時代の中で、豪華さよりもその親密さと精緻さに驚かされる。
back_translation: I am currently watching E.T., and in an era dominated by grand works filled with cold, large special effects, I am more amazed by its intimacy and intricacy than its lavishness.

text: they find him guilty and he is sent back into the forest to be hunted down by the family .
translation: 彼らは彼に有罪の判決を下し、彼は家族に狩られるために森に送り返される。
back_translation: They found him guilty and sent him back to the forest to be hunted by his family.

text: visually engrossing , seldom hammy , honorably mexican and burns its kahlories with conviction .
translation: 視覚的に魅力的で、あまり大袈裟ではなく、誇り高いメキシコのものであり、自信を持ってカロリーを燃焼させます。
back_translation: Visually appealing, not overly extravagant, and proudly Mexican, it confidently burns calories.

text: it 's exactly the kind of movie toback 's detractors always accuse him of making .
translation: それは、トバックの批判者たちが彼が作ると常に非難するような映画そのものです。
back_translation: It is the very movie that the critics of Toback always accuse him of making.

text: fbi agent cheryl hammer , arrives in a small california town to catch an elusive killer .
translation: FBIエージェントのシェリル・ハマーは、狡猾な殺人者を捕まえるために小さなカリフォルニアの町に到着します。
back_translation: FBI agent Cheryl Hammer arrives in a small California town to catch a cunning murderer.

text: a forceful drama of an alienated executive who re-invents himself .
translation: 自らを再創造する疎外されたエグゼクティブの力強いドラマ。
back_translation: A powerful drama of an alienated executive reinventing himself.

text: for the little hope that is left , frodo and sam march on into mordor , unprotected .
translation: 残された小さな希望のために、フロドとサムは無防備でモルドールへと突き進む。
back_translation: For the small hope that remains, Frodo and Sam bravely push forward into Mordor, unprotected.

text: a warm but realistic meditation on friendship , family and affection .
translation: 友情、家族、そして愛情に関する温かくも現実的な瞑想。
back_translation: A warm yet realistic meditation on friendship, family, and affection.

text: amongst these are a middle-aged couple who met through the classified ads in a newspaper , a call-girl who keeps her daughter and her sister , a retired actor , an ex-football player , and a janitor who suspects that his adopted father , whom he dreams about every night , is his real father .
translation: その中には、新聞の求人広告を通じて出会った中年夫婦、娘と妹を養っているコールガール、引退した俳優、元サッカー選手、そして毎晩夢に見る養父が実父ではないかと疑っている清掃員がいます。
back_translation: Among them are a middle-aged couple they met through a newspaper job advertisement, a call girl who supports her daughter and sister, a retired actor, a former soccer player, and a janitor who suspects that the foster father he dreams about every night might not be his biological father.

text: the entire town begins to look for ellen when she fails to appear at home that night .
translation: 町全体が、その夜エレンが家に帰らなかったために彼女を探し始める。
back_translation: The entire town begins to search for her because Ellen did not come home that night.

text: there are just too many characters saying too many clever things and getting into too many pointless situations . where 's the movie here ?
translation: あまりにも多くのキャラクターが賢いことを言い過ぎて、無意味な状況に巻き込まれています。ここに映画はありますか？
back_translation: Too many characters are saying clever things, getting caught up in meaningless situations. Is there a movie here?

text: breen 's script has deadpan wit , though it becomes a little labored as it goes along .
translation: ブリーンのスクリプトはデッドパンのウィットがあり、進むにつれて少し苦しくなっていく。
back_translation: Breen's script has deadpan wit and becomes a bit more painful as it progresses.

text: as for the music world , history 's future king is coming from the past .
translation: 音楽の世界について言えば、歴史の未来の王は過去からやって来ます。
back_translation: In the world of music, the future king of history comes from the past.

text: the course of their experiences ultimately involves with sammy boi , an aggressive rapper caught in a bad contract while on of his songs is a major radio hit ; joan vicks , a devious a & # 38 ; r executive for viewpointe records , randy tigge , a drug addicted , cross-dressing rock star ; and michael dileo , the chairman of viewpointe record , who some simply call satan .
translation: 彼らの経験の過程には、悪い契約に巻き込まれた攻撃的なラッパー、サミー・ボーイが含まれます。彼の曲のひとつは主要なラジオヒットです。また、ビューＰointeレコードのずる賢いA&Rエグゼクティブ、ジョーン・ヴィックス、ドラッグに依存し、跨ぎスタイルのロックスター、ランディ・ティッゲ、そしていくつかの人々にサタンと呼ばれる、ビューＰointeレコードの会長マイケル・ディレオも含まれます。
back_translation: Their experiences include the aggressive rapper Sammy Boy, who got caught up in a bad contract. One of his songs is a major radio hit. It also includes Joan Vicks, the cunning A&R executive at View Pointe Records, Randy Tig, a drug-dependent, cross-dressing rockstar, and Michael DiLeo, the president of View Pointe Records, who is referred to as Satan by some people.

text: but what if it 's lord voldemort trying to make his evil return ?
translation: しかし、それが悪の復活を試みるヴォルデモート卿だったらどうしますか？
back_translation: But what will you do if it is Lord Voldemort trying to resurrect evil?

text: there ai n't a lot more painful than an unfunny movie that thinks it 's hilarious .
translation: 面白くないのに自分が面白いと思っている映画よりも、もっと痛々しいものはない。
back_translation: There is nothing more painful than a movie that is not funny but thinks it is.

text: soulless and -- even more damning -- virtually joyless , xxx achieves near virtuosity in its crapulence .
translation: 魂のない、そしてさらにもっと厳しいことに、ほぼ喜びのないxxxは、その酷さにおいてほぼ卓越性を達成しています。
back_translation: Devoid of soul, and even more critically, almost devoid of joy, xxx achieves a near excellence in its harshness.

text: one day there is an ordinary row in the local saloon , but one of the trouble makers , called prosit , shows up to be baron werner amadeus von luckner .
translation: ある日、地元のサロンで普通の騒動が起きているが、トラブルメーカーの一人であるプロスィットが現れ、バロン・ヴェルナー・アマデウス・フォン・ルックナーであることが明らかになる。
back_translation: One day, a usual commotion is happening at the local salon, when one of the troublemakers, Prosit, appears, revealing that he is Baron Werner Amadeus von Luckner.

text: i thought my own watch had stopped keeping time as i slogged my way through clockstoppers .
translation: 時計を止めたかと思ったら、自分の時計が時間を刻んでいないと気づきました。
back_translation: I thought I had stopped the clock, only to realize that my own clock wasn't ticking.

text: a story of faith , family relations , and finding yourself .
translation: 信仰、家族の関係、そして自分を見つける物語。
back_translation: A story of faith, family relationships, and finding oneself.

text: a young woman ( thandie newton ) in paris is about to divorce her husband when she discovers . . .
translation: パリの若い女性（タンディ・ニュートン）は、夫と離婚する直前に発見する…
back_translation: A young woman in Paris (Thandi Newton) discovers right before she divorces her husband...

text: gangs of new york is an unapologetic mess , whose only saving grace is that it ends by blowing just about everything up .
translation: 『ギャング・オブ・ニューヨーク』は非の打ちどころのない混乱であり、その唯一の救いはほぼすべてを吹き飛ばして終わることです。
back_translation: "Gang of New York" is an impeccable chaos, and its only salvation is that it ends by blowing almost everything away.

text: let 's face it , even vin 's fake tats have more charisma than pierce brosnan .
translation: 認めざるを得ませんが、ヴィンの偽のタトゥーでさえピアース・ブロスナンより魅力があります。
back_translation: I have to admit that even Vin's fake tattoo is more attractive than Pierce Brosnan.

text: . . . captures the pain and desperation of adolescent powerlessness and humiliation with powerful intimacy . . .
translation: 思春期の無力さと屈辱の痛みと絶望を、力強い親密さで捉えている。
back_translation: It captures the powerlessness, humiliation, and despair of adolescence with a strong intimacy.

text: it 's mildly sentimental , unabashedly consumerist . . . studiously inoffensive and completely disposable .
translation: 控えめに感傷的で、あからさまに消費主義的です……注意深く無害で、完全に使い捨てです。
back_translation: Modestly sentimental and overtly consumeristic... carefully harmless and completely disposable.

text: exudes the fizz of a busby berkeley musical and the visceral excitement of a sports extravaganza .
translation: バズビー・バークリーのミュージカルの泡立ちとスポーツの壮大さの生々しい興奮を放っています。
back_translation: It exudes the bubbly excitement of Busby Berkeley musicals and the grandeur of sports.

text: suffocated at conception by its munchausen-by-proxy mum . punish the vehicle to adore the star .
translation: 代理ミュンヒハウゼンの母親によって受胎時に窒息させられた。星を愛するために乗り物を罰する。
back_translation: The surrogate Münchhausen was suffocated by his mother at the time of conception. Punish the vehicle for loving the stars.

text: convinced that peter is tracking her , she turns to them for help .
translation: ピーターが彼女を追跡していると確信した彼女は、彼らに助けを求める。
back_translation: She, convinced that Peter was chasing her, asks them for help.

text: along the way , their political spirit resurfaces , leading to their fight against the new york city board of education for domestic partner benefits , and their establishment of a pflag chapter for retirees in florida .
translation: その過程で、彼らの政治意識が再び表面化し、ニューヨーク市教育委員会に対してパートナーシップ特典を求めて闘うことになり、フロリダ州に退職者のためのPFLAG支部を設立しました。
back_translation: In the process, their political consciousness resurfaced, leading them to fight for partnership benefits from the New York City Board of Education and establish a PFLAG chapter for retirees in Florida.

text: a malaysian government agency led by madame x , try to get the lost treasure on a sunken ship ( `` mendam berahi `` ) in sulu sea .
translation: マレーシアの政府機関がマダムXの指導のもと、スルー海に沈んだ船（「メンダム・ベラヒ」）にある失われた宝を手に入れようとしています。
back_translation: A Malaysian government agency is trying to recover the lost treasure from the ship "Mendam Berahi," which sank in the Straits of Malacca, under the guidance of Madame X.

text: 'i capture the castle ' is based on the dodie smith novel which was published in 1948 , before she wrote 101 dalmatians .
translation: 『私が城を捕まえる』は、1948年に出版されたダディ・スミスの小説に基づいており、彼女が『101匹わんちゃん』を書く前のものです。
back_translation: "Catch the Castle" is based on the novel by Dodie Smith published in 1948, which was written before she penned "101 Dalmatians."

text: an off-beat and fanciful film about the human need for monsters to blame for all that is amiss in the world .
translation: 世界のすべての不満の原因を責めるためのモンスターへの人間の必要性についての、少し変わった空想的な映画。
back_translation: A slightly unusual fantasy film about human need for a monster to blame for all the world's grievances.

text: a pathetically inane and unimaginative cross between xxx and vertical limit .
translation: 悲惨で無意味で想像力のない、xxxとバーティカル・リミットの間のクロス。
back_translation: A crossover between xxx and Vertical Limit that is tragic, meaningless, and lacks imagination.

text: yes , i have given this movie a rating of zero . but fans of the show should not consider this a diss . consider it 'perfection . '
translation: はい、私はこの映画にゼロの評価をつけました。しかし、番組のファンはこれを侮辱と考えるべきではありません。それを「完璧」と考えてください。
back_translation: Yes, I gave this movie a rating of zero. However, fans of the show should not consider this an insult. Think of it as "perfect."

text: shot perhaps 'artistically ' with handheld cameras and apparently no movie lights by joaquin baca-asay , the low-budget production swings annoyingly between vertigo and opacity .
translation: おそらく「芸術的」に手持ちカメラで撮影され、明らかに映画用の照明は使用されていないホアキン・バカ＝アサイによるこの低予算の制作は、めまいと不透明さの間でうっとおしく揺れ動いています。
back_translation: This low-budget production by Joaquín Bacalao-Asai, presumably shot "artistically" with a handheld camera and clearly not using any cinematic lighting, sways uncomfortably between dizziness and obscurity.

text: those who managed to avoid the deconstructionist theorizing of french philosopher jacques derrida in college can now take an 85-minute brush-up course with the documentary derrida . or , you can do something fun tonight .
translation: 大学でフランスの哲学者ジャック・デリダの脱構築主義的理論を避けることができた人は、今、ドキュメンタリー「デリダ」で85分の復習コースを受けることができます。さもなければ、今夜は何か楽しいことをすることができます。
back_translation: Those who managed to avoid the deconstructionist theories of French philosopher Jacques Derrida in university can now take an 85-minute review course through the documentary "Derrida." Otherwise, you can do something fun tonight.

text: he works as a photocopy clerk under the close watch of his sexy boss sabine , who uses him to his libido 's advantage .
translation: 彼は魅力的な上司サビーヌの厳しい監視のもと、複写 clerk として働いており、彼女は彼を自分の性欲の利点に利用しています。
back_translation: He works as a copy clerk under the strict supervision of his attractive boss Sabine, and she exploits him for her own sexual desires.

text: the techno tux is good for a few laughs , as are chan and hewitt , but when such a good design turns out to be a cheap knockoff , we ca n't recommend anything but a rental for the tuxedo .
translation: テクノタキシードは何度か笑えますし、チャンやヒューイットも同様ですが、そんなに良いデザインが安っぽい偽物だと判明したときには、タキシードはレンタル以外をおすすめできません。
back_translation: The techno tuxedo can be amusing at times, and the same goes for Chan and Hewitt, but when it turns out that such a good design is actually a cheap imitation, I cannot recommend anything other than renting a tuxedo.

text: a small gem of a movie that defies classification and is as thought-provoking as it is funny , scary and sad .
translation: 分類を超え、考えさせられると同時に面白く、怖く、悲しい、貴重な映画の小さな宝石です。
back_translation: It is a small treasure of a film that transcends categories, prompting reflection while being interesting, frightening, and sad, yet precious.

text: unlike conventional movies , kill bill is told in chapter format making the narrative flow more like a book than a film .
translation: 従来の映画とは異なり、「キル・ビル」は章立てで語られており、物語の流れは映画というよりも本のようになっています。
back_translation: Unlike traditional movies, "Kill Bill" is told in chapters, and the flow of the story resembles that of a book more than a film.

text: an incredibly thoughtful , deeply meditative picture that neatly and effectively captures the debilitating grief felt in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks .
translation: テロ攻撃の直後に感じられる深刻な悲しみを、巧みに、効果的に捉えた、非常に思慮深く、深く瞑想的な絵。
back_translation: A highly thoughtful and deeply meditative painting that skillfully and effectively captures the profound sorrow felt immediately after a terrorist attack.

text: one of the most splendid entertainments to emerge from the french film industry in years .
translation: ここ数年、フランス映画業界から生まれた最も素晴らしいエンターテインメントの一つ。
back_translation: One of the most wonderful entertainments that has emerged from the French film industry in recent years.

text: this is the story of ryan , a thirty-something office worker , persecuted by his supervisor angela and under-appreciated his fianc & # 233 ; e jo .
translation: これは、30代のオフィスワーカー、ライアンの物語です。彼は上司のアンジェラから迫害され、婚約者のジョーからは評価されていません。
back_translation: This is the story of Ryan, a 30-something office worker. He is persecuted by his boss, Angela, and is not appreciated by his fiancé, Joe.

text: although a sympathetic judge assures desmond that when his financial situation reverses , he will be able to get his children back ; money is hard to come by .
translation: 同情的な裁判官はデズモンドに、彼の経済状況が改善されたときには子供たちを取り戻せると確約するが、金銭は得るのが難しい。
back_translation: The sympathetic judge assures Desmond that he can regain custody of his children when his financial situation improves, but money is difficult to come by.

text: family ties and mob allegiances become confused as betrayals , reprisals , and changes of heart set the stage for an unexpected climax .
translation: 家族の絆とマフィアの忠誠心が混乱し、裏切り、報復、心変わりが予期しないクライマックスの舞台を整えます。
back_translation: The bonds of family and the loyalty of the mafia intertwine, setting the stage for betrayal, revenge, and changes of heart that lead to an unexpected climax.

text: johnathan cross , a lover of extreme sports , is recruited by alexi petrovich to star in his sportive invention , rollerball .
translation: 極限スポーツの愛好者であるジョナサン・クロスは、アレクシ・ペトロビッチにリクルートされ、彼のスポーツの発明「ローラーボール」に出演することになります。
back_translation: Jonathan Cross, an extreme sports enthusiast, is recruited by Alexi Petrovich to star in his invented sport, "Rollerball."

text: seymour 'sy ' parrish has been doing photo development for 20 years .
translation: セイモア・「シー」・パリッシュは、20年間写真の現像を行っています。
back_translation: Seymour "Sea" Parrish has been developing photographs for 20 years.

text: but everyone 's plans do n't go according to schedule . . .
translation: しかし、誰の計画も予定通りには行きません。
back_translation: However, no one's plans go as scheduled.

text: buy is an accomplished actress , and this is a big , juicy role .
translation: バイは実力派の女優であり、これは大きくて魅力的な役です。
back_translation: Bai is a talented actress, and this is a big and appealing role.

text: aimed at a new age audience , but its subject 's sincerity and gentle , self-deprecating nature translate well to a general audience .
translation: 新しい世代の観客を対象としていますが、そのテーマの誠実さと優しい、自己卑下的な性質は一般の観客にもよく伝わります。
back_translation: It targets a new generation of viewers, but the sincerity of the theme and its gentle, self-deprecating nature resonate well with general audiences as well.

text: missteps take what was otherwise a fascinating , riveting story and send it down the path of the mundane .
translation: ミスステップは、そうでなければ魅力的で引き込まれる物語を、ありふれた道へと送り込んでしまう。
back_translation: Missteps can send an otherwise captivating and engaging story down a mundane path.

text: outside , another man sits by the door keeping vigil .
translation: 外では、別の男がドアのそばに座り、見張りをしています。
back_translation: Outside, another man is sitting by the door, keeping watch.

text: 'nine dead gay guys ' is the outrageous but hilarious result of the ensuing caper as the lads begin the search for the elusive bed .
translation: 「ナイン・デッド・ゲイ・ガイズ」は、若者たちが手に入れるのが難しいベッドを探し始める中で展開される、おどけたけれど笑える結果です。
back_translation: "Nine Dead Gay Guys" is a quirky yet hilarious outcome that unfolds as young people begin their quest for a bed that is difficult to acquire.

text: with her as a mentor he gains confidence and strength of character .
translation: 彼女をメンターに持つことで、彼は自信と強い個性を得る。
back_translation: By having her as a mentor, he gains confidence and a strong personality.

text: what resulted is a stirring and emotional reflection of that day and his experience .
translation: その結果、彼の経験を通じて、その日の感動的で心を揺さぶる反映が生まれました。
back_translation: As a result, an emotional and heart-stirring reflection emerged from his experience that day.

text: this is one of those rare docs that paints a grand picture of an era and makes the journey feel like a party .
translation: これは時代の壮大な絵を描き、旅を祭りのように感じさせる珍しいドキュメントの一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the rare documents that paints a grand picture of the era and makes the journey feel like a festival.

text: he gathers a following and becomes a rock star only to find that his music awakens the ancient queen akasha and she wants him to become her king . . .
translation: 彼はフォロワーを集めてロックスターになり、彼の音楽が古代の女王アカーシャを目覚めさせることに気づく。そして彼女は彼に王になるように求める。
back_translation: He gathers followers and becomes a rock star, realizing that his music awakens the ancient queen Akasha. And she asks him to become a king.

text: a faction of political separatists , led by count dooku , attempts to assassinate her .
translation: 政治的分離主義者の一派が、ドゥークー伯爵の指導のもと、彼女を暗殺しようとします。
back_translation: A faction of political separatists attempts to assassinate her under the leadership of Count Dooku.

text: two angels realize that the babies have been switched , and decide to try and find the antichrist and prevent the end of the world .
translation: 二人の天使は赤ん坊が取り替えられたことに気づき、反キリストを見つけて世界の終わりを防ごうと決意します。
back_translation: The two angels notice that the baby has been switched and decide to find the Antichrist in order to prevent the end of the world.

text: his determination is turned to desperation by a personal tragedy that now drives him to want to change the past .
translation: 彼の決意は、今や過去を変えたいという思いに駆り立てる個人的な悲劇によって絶望に変わっている。
back_translation: His determination has now turned into despair, driven by a personal tragedy that compels him to want to change the past.

text: she gives frode a small monster puppet , which frode throws in the closet in his bedroom .
translation: 彼女はフローデに小さなモンスターの人形を渡し、フローデはそれを寝室のクローゼットに投げ入れます。
back_translation: She hands a small monster doll to Forde, who throws it into the bedroom closet.

text: confronted with the reality that jazz has limited commercial appeal , the story focuses on the band 's battles with the music industry and one another to find respect and recognition without 'selling out ' .
translation: ジャズが限られた商業的な魅力を持つ現実に直面し、物語はバンドが音楽業界や互いとの闘いを通じて、"売り出す"ことなく尊敬と認知を得ようとする様子に焦点を当てています。
back_translation: Faced with the reality that jazz has limited commercial appeal, the story focuses on the band’s struggle to gain respect and recognition without "selling out" through their battles within the music industry and with each other.

text: the small daily routines of everyday life are not as clear and obvious as one might think .
translation: 日常生活の小さなルーチンは、思っているほど明確で obvious ではありません。
back_translation: The small routines of everyday life are not as clear and obvious as we think.

text: an energetic and engaging film that never pretends to be something it is n't .
translation: 決して何かであるふりをしない、エネルギッシュで魅力的な映画。
back_translation: A vibrant and captivating film that never pretends to be anything else.

text: barney has created a tour de force that is weird , wacky and wonderful .
translation: バーニーは、奇妙で風変わりで素晴らしい力作を作り上げました。
back_translation: Barney has created a strange, quirky, and wonderful masterpiece.

text: best of all is garcia , who perfectly portrays the desperation of a very insecure man .
translation: 最高なのはガルシアで、彼は非常に不安定な男の絶望感を完璧に表現しています。
back_translation: The best part is Garcia, who perfectly embodies the sense of despair of a very unstable man.

text: the unceasing sadism is so graphically excessive , the director just ends up exposing his own obsession .
translation: 絶え間ないサディズムはあまりにも過剰で、監督自身の執着をさらけ出してしまう。
back_translation: The relentless sadism is excessive and exposes the director's own obsession.

text: like an exotic , endangered species , these colorful cars roam around this island paradise trapped in a 1950 's time warp .
translation: エキゾチックで絶滅危惧種のように、これらのカラフルな車は1950年代のタイムワープに囚われたこの島の楽園を走り回っています。
back_translation: Like exotic and endangered species, these colorful cars roam the paradise of this island, trapped in a time warp from the 1950s.

text: nha fala ( my voice ) , a musical comedy , is the story of vita , a young african woman who must never sing .
translation: 「ナ・ファラ（私の声）」は、若いアフリカ女性ビタの物語で、彼女は決して歌ってはいけないというミュージカルコメディです。
back_translation: "Na Fara (My Voice)" is a story about a young African woman named Vita, who is in a musical comedy where she must never sing.

text: when a storm leaves the two shipwrecked on a deserted island , however , the tables suddenly turn . . .
translation: 嵐が二人を無人島に難破させたとき、状況は突然逆転する...
back_translation: When the storm stranded the two on a deserted island, the situation suddenly turned upside down...

text: is this love or is it masochism ? binoche makes it interesting trying to find out .
translation: これは愛なのか、それともマゾヒズムなのか？ビノシュはその答えを見つけるのを面白くしてくれます。
back_translation: Is this love, or is it masochism? Binoche makes it interesting to find the answer.

text: every time you look , sweet home alabama is taking another bummer of a wrong turn .
translation: 見るたびに、スウィートホームアラバマはまた別の残念な間違った方向に進んでいる。
back_translation: Every time I see it, Sweet Home Alabama seems to be heading in another disappointing wrong direction.

text: he grew up in the lush village of taj sonapur , where he spent his childhood , indulged by his lovely playmate paro ( aishwarya ) .
translation: 彼はタージ・ソナプールの緑豊かな村で育ち、愛らしい遊び相手のパロ（アイシュワリヤ）に甘やかされながら子供時代を過ごしました。
back_translation: He grew up in the lush village of Taj Sonapur, spending his childhood pampered by his adorable playmate, Paro (Aishwarya).

text: a moving essay about the specter of death , especially suicide .
translation: 死の幽霊、特に自殺についての感動的なエッセイ。
back_translation: An emotional essay about the ghost of death, particularly concerning suicide.

text: personal velocity ought to be exploring these women 's inner lives , but it never moves beyond their surfaces .
translation: 個人の速度はこれらの女性の内面を探求するべきだが、決してその表面を超えることはない。
back_translation: The individual's speed should explore the inner selves of these women, but should never exceed the surface.

text: he comes to the terrible realization that he has never held his mothers right hand .
translation: 彼は母の右手を一度も握ったことがないという恐ろしい現実に気づく。
back_translation: He realizes the terrifying reality that he has never held his mother's right hand even once.

text: based on a true story , the blue butterfly tells the story of a terminally ill 10-year-old boy whose dream is to catch the most beautiful butterfly on earth , the mythic and elusive blue morpho .
translation: 実際の物語に基づいている『青い蝶』は、地球上で最も美しい蝶である神秘的で捉えにくいブルーモルフォを捕まえることを夢見る末期の病を抱えた10歳の少年の物語です。
back_translation: Based on a true story, "The Blue Butterfly" tells the tale of a terminally ill 10-year-old boy who dreams of capturing the elusive and mysterious Blue Morpho, the most beautiful butterfly on Earth.

text: as the sisters approach the end of an era , and the end of an order , they search their souls in an examination of their life 's work .
translation: 姉妹たちは時代の終わりと秩序の終わりに近づく中、自らの人生の仕事を振り返ることで魂を探求します。
back_translation: The sisters explore their souls by reflecting on the work of their lives as they approach the end of an era and the end of order.

text: making such a tragedy the backdrop to a love story risks trivializing it , though chouraqui no doubt intended the film to affirm love 's power to help people endure almost unimaginable horror .
translation: そのような悲劇を愛の物語の背景にすることは、それを軽視するリスクがあるが、シュラキは間違いなくこの映画が愛の力によって人々がほとんど想像を絶する恐怖を耐え忍ぶ手助けをすることを確認することを意図していた。
back_translation: Using such a tragedy as the backdrop for a love story carries the risk of trivializing it, but Shuraki undoubtedly intended to ensure that this film demonstrates how the power of love helps people endure horrors that are almost unimaginable.

text: blessed encompasses the lives of four women who are inescapably involved in a brothel at the centre of the plot .
translation: 「祝福」は、物語の中心にある売春宿に不可避的に関与する4人の女性の人生を描いています。
back_translation: "Blessing" depicts the lives of four women who are inevitably involved with a brothel that lies at the heart of the story.

text: this is a fragmented film , once a good idea that was followed by the bad idea to turn it into a movie .
translation: これは断片的な映画で、一度は良いアイデアだったが、それを映画にするという悪いアイデアが続いた。
back_translation: This is a fragmented film that was once a good idea, but the bad idea of turning it into a movie followed.

text: [ gosling 's ] combination of explosive physical energy and convincing intelligence helps create a complex , unpredictable character .
translation: ゴスリングの爆発的な身体エネルギーと説得力のある知性の組み合わせが、複雑で予測不可能なキャラクターを生み出す手助けをしています。
back_translation: Gosling's explosive physical energy and compelling intelligence help create a complex and unpredictable character.

text: august -- a pupil of ingmar bergman 's -- manages to tell a tragic tale while avoiding the heavy-laden angst of a bergman film .
translation: オーガスト — イングマール・ベルイマンの弟子 — は、ベルイマン映画の重苦しい不安を避けながら、悲劇的な物語を語ることに成功している。
back_translation: August - a disciple of Ingmar Bergman - has managed to tell tragic stories while avoiding the heavy anxiety characteristic of Bergman's films.

text: marjorie standiford sits on oklahoma 's death row , hours away from execution , speaking into a tape recorder , telling her life story .
translation: マージョリー・スタンディフォードは、オクラホマ州の死刑囚房に座り、執行まで数時間のところで、テープレコーダーに向かって自分の人生の物語を語っています。
back_translation: Marjorie Standiford sits in a death row cell in Oklahoma, just hours away from her execution, telling the story of her life into a tape recorder.

text: the locale . . . remains far more interesting than the story at hand .
translation: その場所は…扱っている物語よりもはるかに興味深い。
back_translation: That place is far more interesting than the story being told.

text: it 's sweet and romantic without being cloying or melodramatic .
translation: 甘くてロマンチックですが、うんざりするほどではなく、メロドラマチックでもありません。
back_translation: It's sweet and romantic, but not to the point of being tiresome, nor is it melodramatic.

text: so , in addition to curing him she 's also trying to get him married off to a `` good , strong , responsible `` woman .
translation: そのため、彼を治すだけでなく、彼を「良い、強い、責任感のある」女性と結婚させようともしています。
back_translation: Therefore, we are trying not only to heal him but also to get him married to a "good, strong, responsible" woman.

text: the actors pull out all the stops in nearly every scene , but to diminishing effect . the characters never change .
translation: 俳優たちはほぼすべてのシーンで全力を尽くしているが、その効果は次第に薄れている。キャラクターは決して変わらない。
back_translation: The actors give their all in almost every scene, but the effect gradually diminishes. The characters never change.

text: the deuces are determined to do whatever is necessary to keep drugs off their block even if that means dying .
translation: デューサーズは、自分たちのブロックからドラッグを排除するために、死ぬことさえ厭わずに必要なことを何でもする決意を固めている。
back_translation: The Deucers are determined to do whatever it takes to eliminate drugs from their block, even if it means risking their lives.

text: this film tells the true story of fraudulent washington , d . c . journalist stephen glass ( christensen ) , who rose to meteoric heights as a young writer in his 20s , becoming a staff writer at `` the new republic `` for three years ( 1995-1998 ) , where 27 of his 41 published stories were either partially or completely made up .
translation: この映画は、ワシントンD.C.の詐欺師ジャーナリスト、スティーブン・グラス（クリステンセン）の真実の物語を語っています。彼は20代の若い作家として急速に成功を収め、「ザ・ニュー・リパブリック」のスタッフライターとして3年間（1995-1998）勤務し、彼の公開された41の物語のうち27が部分的または完全に捏造されていました。
back_translation: This movie tells the true story of Steven Glass (played by Christensen), a con artist journalist in Washington D.C. He quickly achieved success as a young writer in his 20s, working as a staff writer for The New Republic for three years (1995-1998), during which 27 of his published 41 stories were partially or completely fabricated.

text: as carolyn 's `` perfect life `` falls apart , pumpkin teaches her that perfect is n't always perfect after all .
translation: キャロリンの「完璧な人生」が崩れ落ちる中で、パンプキンは完璧が必ずしも完璧ではないことを教えてくれます。
back_translation: As Carolyn's "perfect life" crumbles, Pumpkin teaches us that perfection is not necessarily perfect.

text: it 's often faintly amusing , but the problems of the characters never become important to us , and the story never takes hold .
translation: それはしばしば微妙に面白いですが、キャラクターの問題は私たちにとって重要にならず、物語は決して掴むことがありません。
back_translation: It's often subtly interesting, but the character issues don't become important to us, and the story never really engages.

text: not that any of us should be complaining when a film clocks in around 90 minutes these days , but the plotting here leaves a lot to be desired .
translation: 最近90分程度の映画が多い中、私たちが文句を言うべきではないとはいえ、ここでのプロットは物足りないものがあります。
back_translation: Recently, with many movies being around 90 minutes long, it may not be appropriate for us to complain, but the plot here feels somewhat lacking.

text: all of a sudden , one brings up the topic of her going to los angeles for a record contract audition .
translation: 突然、彼女がロサンゼルスでレコード契約のオーディションを受ける話題が出た。
back_translation: Suddenly, the topic came up about her auditioning for a record deal in Los Angeles.

text: a little weak -- and it is n't that funny .
translation: 少し物足りない -- それほど面白くない。
back_translation: A little unsatisfying -- not that interesting.

text: the movie is saved from unbearable lightness by the simplicity of the storytelling and the authenticity of the performances .
translation: 映画は物語のシンプルさと演技の真実性によって耐え難い軽さから救われている。
back_translation: The film is saved from unbearable lightness by the simplicity of its story and the authenticity of its performances.

text: the harrowing rescue of the young woman opens the door to a dark history hidden below the surface , revealing the true identity of the killer and answering the mystery of who killed jack 's daughter .
translation: 若い女性の恐ろしい救出劇は、隠された暗い歴史への扉を開き、殺人者の真の正体を明らかにし、ジャックの娘を殺したのは誰なのかという謎に答えを出します。
back_translation: The terrifying rescue of the young woman opens the door to a hidden dark history, reveals the true identity of the murderer, and provides answers to the mystery of who killed Jack's daughter.

text: josch now has to convince t & # 252 ; rlich about the evil intentions of dump fast , only has there just been quite a fight between the two lifelong friends .
translation: ジョシュは今、ダンプ・ファストの悪意をティルヒに納得させなければならないが、ちょうどその二人の生涯の友人の間でかなりの喧嘩があったばかりだ。
back_translation: Josh now has to convince Tilki of Dump Fast's malice, but there has just been quite a fight between those two lifelong friends.

text: a tale of three women who have reached a turning point in their lives .
translation: 人生の転機に達した三人の女性の物語。
back_translation: The story of three women who have reached a turning point in their lives.

text: armed with twenty dollars and a backpack , pastor william sets off on an unusual call from god to walk across the country preaching the gospel .
translation: 二十ドルとバックパックを持って、ウィリアム牧師は神からの異例の呼びかけを受けて、国中を歩き回りながら福音を布教する旅に出ます。
back_translation: With twenty dollars and a backpack, Pastor William embarks on a journey to spread the gospel, walking across the country in response to an extraordinary calling from God.

text: once he leaves his chinese prison cell robert would rather enjoy his freedom back in the u . s . and keep his past behind him , but the tong catches up to him and threatens not only his life but that of his wife .
translation: ロバートは中国の刑務所の独房を出ると、アメリカで自由を楽しみ、過去を忘れたいと思っているが、トンが彼を追い詰め、彼自身だけでなく妻の生命まで脅かしてくる。
back_translation: Robert, after leaving the solitary confinement of a Chinese prison, wants to enjoy freedom in America and forget his past, but Tong corners him and threatens not only his life but also his wife's.

text: femme fatale offers nothing more than a bait-and-switch that is beyond playing fair with the audience . are we dealing with dreams , visions or being told what actually happened as if it were the third ending of clue ?
translation: ファム・ファタールは観客に対してフェアなプレイを超えた、バイト・アンド・スイッチ以上のものを提供していません。私たちは夢やビジョン、あるいはまるで「クルー」の第三の結末のように実際に起こったことを語られているのでしょうか？
back_translation: The femme fatale offers the audience something beyond fair play, more than just a bait-and-switch. Are we being told dreams and visions, or something that actually happened, like a third ending to "The Crew"?

text: and the moment they touch each other for a first time , the fortune-teller 's prophesy comes true .
translation: そして、彼らが初めて触れ合った瞬間、占い師の予言が現実となります。
back_translation: And then, the moment they first touched, the fortune teller's prophecy became reality.

text: he began a film , a search , to discover not only what had happened to stevie over the past ten years but to understand the forces that had shaped his entire life .
translation: 彼は映画を始め、スティービーが過去十年間に何が起こったのかを探求するだけでなく、彼の人生全体を形作った力を理解しようとしました。
back_translation: He began the film not only to explore what had happened to Stevie over the past decade but also to understand the forces that shaped his entire life.

text: while the ensemble player who gained notice in guy ritchie 's lock , stock and two smoking barrels and snatch has the bod , he 's unlikely to become a household name on the basis of his first starring vehicle .
translation: ガイ・リッチーの「ロック、ストック&トゥー・スモーキング・バレルズ」や「スナッチ」で注目を浴びたアンサンブルプレイヤーは、体格はあるものの、初めての主演作だけでは家庭名になることは難しいだろう。
back_translation: The ensemble player who gained attention in Guy Ritchie's "Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels" and "Snatch" has a solid build, but it is likely difficult to become a household name with just a first leading role.

text: all the movie 's narrative gymnastics ca n't disguise the fact that it 's inauthentic at its core and that its story just is n't worth telling .
translation: すべての映画の narrative gymnastics は、それが本質的に偽物であり、そのストーリーが語る価値がないという事実を隠すことができません。
back_translation: The narrative gymnastics of all films cannot hide the fact that it is essentially fake and that the story it tells has no value.

text: ziyad repeatedly reassures her of his undying love , but family and social pressure , particularly his evil , meddling mother , gradually poison their happy relationship until the love , enthusiasm and humour of their early days soon take a tragic turn .
translation: ズヤードは彼女に対する変わらぬ愛を繰り返し保証するが、家族や社会の圧力、特に彼の邪悪で干渉的な母親が、次第に彼らの幸せな関係を毒していく。やがて、初期の頃の愛情、熱意、ユーモアは悲劇的な方向へと転じてしまう。
back_translation: Zuyard repeatedly assures her of his unwavering love, but the pressure from family and society, especially from his wicked and intrusive mother, gradually poisons their happy relationship. Eventually, the affection, passion, and humor they once shared take a tragic turn.

text: only an epic documentary could get it all down , and spike lee 's jim brown : all american at long last gives its subject a movie worthy of his talents .
translation: 壮大なドキュメンタリーだけがすべてを捉えることができ、スパイク・リーの「ジム・ブラウン：オールアメリカン」は遂に彼の才能にふさわしい映画を提供している。
back_translation: Only grand documentaries can capture everything, and Spike Lee's "Jim Brown: All-American" finally offers a film worthy of his talent.

text: one of the most incoherent features in recent memory .
translation: 最近の記憶の中で最も不条理な特徴の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most absurd characteristics in my recent memory.

text: set on an island off the coast of florida , a techno rave party attracts a diverse group of college coeds and a coast guard officer .
translation: フロリダの海岸沿いの島で開催されるテクノレイブパーティーは、多様な大学生のグループと海上保安官を惹きつけます。
back_translation: The techno rave party held on the coastal islands of Florida attracts a diverse group of college students and coast guard officers.

text: it 's a great american adventure and a wonderful film to bring to imax .
translation: これは素晴らしいアメリカの冒険であり、IMAXに持っていくのにぴったりな素晴らしい映画です。
back_translation: This is a wonderful American adventure and a fantastic movie perfect for taking to IMAX.

text: what we have is a character faced with the possibility that her life is meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance , in a movie that is definitely meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance .
translation: 私たちが持っているのは、彼女の人生が無意味で、空虚で、実体のない可能性に直面したキャラクターであり、これは確かに無意味で、空虚で、実体のない映画です。
back_translation: What we have is a character who faces a life that is meaningless, empty, and filled with intangible possibilities, and this is certainly a meaningless, empty, and intangible film.

text: coral reef adventure is a heavyweight film that fights a good fight on behalf of the world 's endangered reefs -- and it lets the pictures do the punching .
translation: コーラルリーフアドベンチャーは、世界の絶滅危惧種のサンゴ礁のために善戦するヘビー級の映画であり、映像がその闘いを担っています。
back_translation: Coral Reef Adventure is a heavyweight film that fights valiantly for the world's endangered coral reefs, with visuals that carry that struggle.

text: nothing more than an amiable but unfocused bagatelle that plays like a loosely-connected string of acting-workshop exercises .
translation: 友好的だが焦点の定まらないバガテールに過ぎず、演技ワークショップの緩やかに繋がった一連の演習のように展開する。
back_translation: It is merely a friendly yet unfocused bagatelle, unfolding like a loosely connected series of exercises in an acting workshop.

text: an unusual and compelling chinese film about the loving interventions of a father and mother whose oldest son is a drug addict .
translation: 薬物中毒の長男を持つ父母の愛情あふれる介入を描いた、異例で魅力的な中国映画。
back_translation: An unusual and captivating Chinese film depicting the loving intervention of parents with a drug-addicted eldest son.

text: the taxi driver is a serial killer who picks up innocent women but not all of his victims are as innocent as he thinks .
translation: タクシー運転手は連続殺人犯で、無邪気な女性を乗せますが、彼の考えるほどすべての犠牲者が無邪気ではありません。
back_translation: The taxi driver is a serial killer, and he picks up innocent women, but not all of his victims are as innocent as he thinks.

text: the government sends in an elite military task force lead by alice ( jovovich ) and rain ( rodriguez ) to contain the virus in three hours before it escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: 政府はエリート軍の特殊部隊を派遣し、アリス（ジョボビッチ）とレイン（ロドリゲス）が指揮をとり、ウイルスが世界中に広がる前に3時間以内に封じ込めることを目指します。
back_translation: The government sends an elite military special forces unit, led by Alice (Jovovich) and Rain (Rodriguez), with the aim of containing the virus within 3 hours before it spreads around the world.

text: unwilling to disappoint his proud mother , morales wastes no time in looking for a job to pay his way through school .
translation: 誇り高い母親を失望させたくないモラレスは、学校に通うための費用を稼ぐ仕事を探すことに時間を無駄にしません。
back_translation: Morales doesn't waste time looking for a job to earn money for school, as he doesn't want to disappoint his proud mother.

text: scott calvin ( tim allen ) has been santa claus for the past eight years , and his loyal elves consider him the best santa ever .
translation: スコット・カルビン（ティム・アレン）は、過去8年間サンタクロースを務めており、彼の忠実なエルフたちは彼を史上最高のサンタだと考えています。
back_translation: Scott Calvin (Tim Allen) has been Santa Claus for the past eight years, and his loyal elves consider him the greatest Santa of all time.

text: douglas mcgrath 's nicholas nickleby does dickens as it should be done cinematically .
translation: ダグラス・マグラスの「ニコラス・ニクルビー」は、ディケンズを映画的に正しく表現している。
back_translation: Douglas McGrath's "Nicholas Nickleby" faithfully represents Dickens in a cinematic way.

text: the story is so light and sugary that were it a macy 's thanksgiving day parade balloon , extra heavy-duty ropes would be needed to keep it from floating away .
translation: その物語はとても軽やかで甘美なので、もしそれがメイシーズの感謝祭パレードのバルーンであれば、浮かんでしまわないように特別に頑丈なロープが必要になるだろう。
back_translation: The story is so light and sweet that if it were a balloon in the Macy's Thanksgiving Parade, it would need a specially sturdy rope to prevent it from floating away.

text: the assembled team includes local guide clayton tyne ( russel ferrier ) , renowned wilderness expert and author winston burg ( phil granger ) and the beautiful marla lawson ( andrea roth ) .
translation: 集まったチームには、地元のガイドであるクレイトン・タイネ（ラッセル・フェリア）、著名な wilderness の専門家で作家のウィンストン・バーグ（フィル・グレンジャー）、美しいマルラ・ローソン（アンドレア・ロス）が含まれています。
back_translation: The assembled team includes local guide Clayton Tyne (Russell Faria), renowned wilderness expert and writer Winston Burg (Phil Granger), and the beautiful Marla Lawson (Andrea Ross).

text: uneven performances and a spotty script add up to a biting satire that has no teeth .
translation: 不均一な演技とばらつきのある脚本が組み合わさり、歯がない鋭い風刺となっている。
back_translation: The combination of uneven performances and a variable script results in a sharp satire that lacks teeth.

text: a perfectly respectable , perfectly inoffensive , easily forgettable film .
translation: 完全に尊重される、全く無害で、簡単に忘れられる映画。
back_translation: A movie that is completely respected, entirely harmless, and easily forgotten.

text: gangs , despite the gravity of its subject matter , is often as fun to watch as a good spaghetti western .
translation: ギャングは、そのテーマの重さにもかかわらず、良いスパゲッティ・ウェスタンと同じくらい楽しんで観ることができる。
back_translation: Despite the heaviness of its theme, "Gang" can be enjoyed just as much as a good spaghetti western.

text: although initially repelled by simon , rose is determined to make him fall in love with her and succeeds .
translation: 最初はサイモンに拒絶されていたローズですが、彼に恋をさせる決意をし、成功します。
back_translation: At first, Rose was rejected by Simon, but she made a resolution to make him fall in love with her, and she succeeded.

text: at the eleventh hour king and cuthbertson are saved by the arrival of major merton ( derek jacobi ) , churchill 's chief intelligence advisor .
translation: 最後の瞬間、キングとカスバートソンはチャーチルの首席情報顧問であるマートン大尉（デレク・ジャコビー）の到着によって救われる。
back_translation: In the final moments, King and Cuthbertson are saved by the arrival of Captain Martin (Derek Jacobi), Churchill's chief information advisor.

text: . . . a quietly introspective portrait of the self-esteem of employment and the shame of losing a job . . .
translation: …雇用の自己尊重と仕事を失うことの恥についての静かに内省的な肖像…
back_translation: ...a quietly introspective portrait of self-respect in employment and the shame of losing a job...

text: but when sy begins spying on the yorkins , he begins to feel that he wants to be in the yorkin 's life .
translation: しかし、サイがヨーキンズをスパイし始めると、彼はヨーキンの人生に入りたいと感じ始める。
back_translation: However, as Sai begins to spy on Yawkins, he starts to feel a desire to become a part of Yawkin's life.

text: some will fall in love , one will change his life , another will be out for whatever and whomever she can get .
translation: 誰かは恋に落ち、誰かは人生を変え、また別の誰かは手に入るものや人のために行動するだろう。
back_translation: Someone will fall in love, someone will change their life, and yet another person will take action for the things or people they can obtain.

text: a real step forward for the digital video revolution .
translation: デジタルビデオ革命への真の前進。
back_translation: A true advancement towards the digital video revolution.

text: when your subject is illusion versus reality , should n't the reality seem at least passably real ?
translation: あなたの主題が幻想と現実であるとき、現実は少なくともそれなりにリアルに見えるべきではないでしょうか？
back_translation: When your subject is fantasy and reality, shouldn't reality at least look somewhat real?

text: this is dicaprio 's best performance in anything ever , and easily the most watchable film of the year .
translation: これはディカプリオのこれまでのどの作品よりも素晴らしいパフォーマンスであり、今年最も観やすい映画です。
back_translation: This is a more outstanding performance than any of DiCaprio's previous works, and it's the most enjoyable movie to watch this year.

text: then the next day he finds out that the previous night his mother actually died in a car crash .
translation: 翌日、彼は前の晩に母親が実際に車の事故で亡くなったことを知る。
back_translation: The next day, he learned that his mother had actually died in a car accident the previous night.

text: two brothers inherit an old , broken down carousel on an abandoned boardwalk in new jersey .
translation: 二人の兄弟は、ニュージャージーの廃墟となったボードウォークにある古くて壊れたメリーゴーランドを相続します。
back_translation: Two brothers inherit an old and broken carousel located on a dilapidated boardwalk in New Jersey.

text: pitted against steroid-taking competitors and the biggest sports-nutrition company in the world , he is up against odds and enemies who want to destroy him .
translation: ステロイドを使用する競争相手や世界最大のスポーツ栄養会社と対峙し、彼は彼を破壊しようとする敵や困難に直面しています。
back_translation: Facing rivals who use steroids and the world's largest sports nutrition companies, he encounters enemies and challenges that seek to destroy him.

text: now escaped from prison , mel begins his quest for vengeance .
translation: 今、刑務所から脱出したメルは復讐の旅を始める。
back_translation: Now, Mel, who has escaped from prison, begins a journey of revenge.

text: alice is a cleaning lady at the nearby hospital and she sells the books that the patients leave behind .
translation: アリスは近くの病院で清掃員として働いており、患者が置き忘れた本を販売しています。
back_translation: Alice works as a janitor at a nearby hospital and sells books left behind by patients.

text: the story starts with hakimi , a freelance scriptwriter who is on his way to send his 7-year-old daughter , imelda , to his ex-wife 's house on one stormy night .
translation: 物語は、フリーランスの脚本家ハキミが、嵐の夜に7歳の娘イメルダを元妻の家に送る途中から始まります。
back_translation: The story begins with freelance screenwriter Hakimi on a stormy night, taking his 7-year-old daughter Imelda to his ex-wife's house.
