text: akash has a soft corner for his fellow doctor neha mathur , a suave and self-assured woman who will never let her personal life get in the way of her profession .
translation: akashは、自信に満ちた洗練された女性である同僚の医師ネハ・マトゥールに特別な思いを抱いています。彼女は、決して私生活が職業の妨げにならないようにします。
back_translation: Akash has special feelings for his confident and sophisticated colleague, Dr. Neha Mathur. She ensures that her personal life never interferes with her profession.

text: simone is not a bad film . it just does n't have anything really interesting to say .
translation: シモーヌは悪い映画ではないが、実際に面白いことは何も言っていない。
back_translation: Simone is not a bad movie, but it doesn't actually say anything interesting.

text: one stormy night , they go to get the shoes when calvin and the shoes are struck by lightning .
translation: 嵐の夜、カルビンは靴を取りに行くと、靴とともに雷に打たれます。
back_translation: On a stormy night, Calvin goes to get his shoes and gets struck by lightning along with the shoes.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .
translation: ヒップホップのインディーなスナイプの物語を理解しようとするのは、頭を悩ませるだけで、その見返りはわずかです。
back_translation: Trying to understand the story of indie hip-hop snipes is just a headache, and the rewards are minimal.

text: the da sends the dupe into valento-land in hopes of getting the sociopath off his back .
translation: DAは、社会病質者のしつこさを解消するために、デュープをヴァレンタランドに送ります。
back_translation: DA sends Dupe to Valenland to resolve the tenacity of social pathology.

text: edi is severely punished for that but he accepts his fate taking care of the girl 's child .
translation: エディはそれに対して厳しく罰せられますが、彼は運命を受け入れ、女の子の子供の世話をします。
back_translation: Eddie is severely punished for that, but he accepts his fate and takes care of the girl's child.

text: after military service in the gulf war and the former yugoslavia , he returned to his inner city neighborhood to teach at the toughest school in town .
translation: 湾岸戦争と旧ユーゴスラビアでの軍務を終えた後、彼は故郷の内陸都市の近隣に戻り、町で最も厳しい学校で教えることになりました。
back_translation: After finishing his service in the Gulf War and in the former Yugoslavia, he returned to a neighborhood near his hometown's inland city and began teaching at the toughest school in town.

text: the gang quickly grab the publics ' allegiance by targeting members of our community we 'd all like to see 'get nailed ' .
translation: ギャングは、私たちのコミュニティのメンバーを標的にして、迅速に公衆の「忠誠」を勝ち取る。私たち全員が「捕まってほしい」と思う人たちを狙って。
back_translation: Gangs quickly target members of our community to win public "loyalty." They aim at those of us who all want to be "caught."

text: 3 years after retiring from the fbi because of a near-fatal encounter with hannibal lecter , who was helping him catch the `` chesapeake ripper `` , only to reveal it was hannibal himself , will graham is asked by his ex-partner jack crawford to come solve one last case - 2 slaughtered families every full moon .
translation: ハンニバル・レクターとの致命的な遭遇のためにFBIを退職してから3年、ハンニバルは「チェサピーク・リッパー」を捕まえる手助けをしていたが、結局それが彼自身であることを明らかにされたウィル・グレアムは、元パートナーのジャック・クラウフォードに頼まれ、最後の一件を解決するために呼ばれる - 満月ごとに二つの家族が虐殺される事件が発生している。
back_translation: Three years after resigning from the FBI due to his deadly encounter with Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham, who had been helping to catch the "Chesapeake Ripper," discovers that he is actually the Ripper himself. He is called in by his former partner Jack Crawford to help solve one last case - a series of massacres occurring every full moon where two families are killed.

text: such a good-looking picture deserved to have more depth and unpredictability in its story . but it does stand out as a personal and unique entry in a time-worn genre , and that may be good enough .
translation: そのように美しい写真は、ストーリーにもっと深みと予測不可能性が必要です。しかし、時代遅れのジャンルの中で個人的でユニークな作品として際立っており、それが十分良いかもしれません。
back_translation: Such beautiful photographs need more depth and unpredictability in their story. However, they stand out as personal and unique works within an outdated genre, and that might be good enough.

text: may is a young strange girl who had a very disturbed childhood and does not still know the meaning of true friendship or love .
translation: メイは非常に乱れた幼少期を過ごした若くて奇妙な女の子で、真の友情や愛の意味をまだ理解していません。
back_translation: May is a young and peculiar girl who had a very troubled childhood and does not yet understand the meaning of true friendship or love.

text: and does he feel the same way about daniel ?
translation: 彼もダニエルに対して同じ気持ちを抱いているのでしょうか？
back_translation: Does he have the same feelings for Daniel?

text: pacino is the best he 's been in years and keener is marvelous .
translation: パチーノは素晴らしく、彼は何年ぶりかの最高のパフォーマンスを見せており、キーナーも素晴らしいです。
back_translation: Pacino is wonderful, and he delivers one of his best performances in years, and Keener is also fantastic.

text: years of guilt and sorrow tumble over each other as vince struggles to retain his sanity and understand who it is he is hoping to find alive .
translation: 罪悪感と悲しみの数年が重なり合い、ヴィンスは正気を保ち、彼が生きていることを望んでいるのが誰なのかを理解しようともがいている。
back_translation: Years of guilt and sadness overlap, and Vince struggles to maintain his sanity as he tries to understand who it is that wants him to keep living.

text: it lacks the compassion , good-natured humor and the level of insight that made [ eyre 's ] first film something of a sleeper success .
translation: それは、[エアー]の最初の映画を何かの隠れた成功にした思いやり、良い性格のユーモア、そして洞察のレベルが欠けている。
back_translation: It lacks the compassion, good-natured humor, and level of insight that made [Air]’s first movie a hidden success.

text: immigrant worker tobias horvath gets up at 5 : 00 a . m . , washes , shaves , has some breakfast , and runs to the main square .
translation: 移民労働者のトビアス・ホルヴァートは午前5時に起き、洗面し、ひげを剃り、朝食を取り、メインスクエアに向かって走ります。
back_translation: Immigrant worker Tobias Horváth wakes up at 5 AM, washes his face, shaves, has breakfast, and runs towards the main square.

text: proof that a newcomer indie filmmaker can infuse some new life into the downtrodden loser character study .
translation: 新顔のインディーフィルムメーカーが、苦境に立たされた負け犬キャラクターの研究に新しい命を吹き込むことができる証拠。
back_translation: Evidence that a new indie filmmaker can breathe new life into the study of an underdog character in a difficult situation.

text: ted runs next door to attest his true feelings for the only woman he could ever love - and sure enough - it works !
translation: テッドは隣の家に走り、彼が愛することができる唯一の女性への本当の気持ちを証明します。そして、確かにそれはうまくいきます！
back_translation: Ted runs to the house next door and proves his true feelings to the only woman he can love. And indeed, it works out well!

text: young cop kong yat hong ( karen mok ) and her partner mark are put on the case .
translation: 若き警官コン・ヤットホン（カレン・モク）と彼女のパートナー、マークはその事件に取り組むことになる。
back_translation: Young police officer Con Yat-hung (Karen Mok) and her partner, Mark, will take on the case.

text: the santa clause 2 proves itself a more streamlined and thought out encounter than the original could ever have hoped to be .
translation: サンタの法則2は、オリジナルが決して望むことができなかったほど、より洗練され考え抜かれた体験であることを証明しています。
back_translation: The Law of Santa 2 proves to be a more refined and thought-out experience than the original could have ever hoped for.

text: the movie 's ripe , enrapturing beauty will tempt those willing to probe its inscrutable mysteries .
translation: 映画の成熟した、心を奪う美しさは、その計り知れない謎を探ろうとする者たちを魅了するだろう。
back_translation: The mature and captivating beauty of film will enchant those who seek to explore its unfathomable mysteries.

text: in 1931 , in chicago , michael sullivan ( tom hanks ) , a hit man working for john rooney ( paul newman ) , and irish mob boss , faces a dilemma when what he does his witnessed by his twelve-year-old son .
translation: 1931年、シカゴで、マイケル・サリバン（トム・ハンクス）は、ジョン・ルーニー（ポール・ニューマン）というアイルランド系マフィアのボスのために働くヒットマンですが、彼の行動が12歳の息子に目撃されるというジレンマに直面します。
back_translation: In 1931, in Chicago, Michael Sullivan (Tom Hanks) is a hitman working for an Irish mob boss named John Rooney (Paul Newman), but he faces a dilemma when his actions are witnessed by his 12-year-old son.

text: the film has a terrific look and salma hayek has a feel for the character at all stages of her life .
translation: その映画は素晴らしい視覚効果を持っており、サルマ・ハエックは彼女の人生のすべての段階においてキャラクターの感覚をつかんでいます。
back_translation: The movie has amazing visual effects, and Salma Hayek captures the essence of her character at every stage of her life.

text: a film about two intelligent , romantic people who ultimately have to 'earn ' each other .
translation: 二人の知的でロマンチックな人々が最終的にお互いを「獲得」しなければならない映画。
back_translation: A movie where two intellectual and romantic people ultimately have to "win" each other.

text: this lively klasky csupo production is a convincing amplification of the popular nickelodeon series .
translation: この活気あるクラスキー・クーポ制作は、人気のニコロデオンシリーズを convincingly 拡大したものです。
back_translation: This vibrant Classy Koopa production convincingly expands on the popular Nickelodeon series.

text: living in a hidden illegal migrant camp in southern california with her brother and sister , evelia becomes a witness to murder involving international spies .
translation: カリフォルニア南部の隠れた不法移民キャンプで兄と妹と共に暮らすエヴェリアは、国際的なスパイが関与する殺人の目撃者となる。
back_translation: Everia, who lives with her brother and sister in a hidden illegal immigrant camp in Southern California, becomes a witness to a murder involving international spies.

text: this weekend-sized slice of college life follows the amusing escapades of adam parker and his three closest friends .
translation: この週末サイズの大学生活の一幕では、アダム・パーカーと彼の3人の親友たちの楽しい冒険が描かれています。
back_translation: This weekend-sized episode of college life depicts the fun adventures of Adam Parker and his three best friends.

text: as the police investigate and suspect is arrested , we discover that joe knows more than he is letting on .
translation: 警察が調査を進め、容疑者が逮捕されるにつれて、私たちはジョーが言っている以上のことを知っていることに気づきます。
back_translation: As the police continue their investigation and the suspect is arrested, we realize that we know more than what Joe is saying.

text: the only way to tolerate this insipid , brutally clueless film might be with a large dose of painkillers .
translation: この味気なく、残酷に無知な映画を耐える唯一の方法は、大量の痛み止めを服用することかもしれません。
back_translation: The only way to endure this tasteless, brutally ignorant movie might be to take large amounts of painkillers.

text: even when he 's not at his most critically insightful , godard can still be smarter than any 50 other filmmakers still at work .
translation: 批評的に洞察力が最も高くない時でも、ゴダールは現在活動中の他の50人の映画製作者よりもまだ賢いことができる。
back_translation: Even at his least critically insightful moments, Godard can still be smarter than 50 other active filmmakers.

text: this real-life hollywood fairy-tale is more engaging than the usual fantasies hollywood produces .
translation: この実際のハリウッドのフェアリーテイルは、ハリウッドが生み出す通常のファンタジーよりも魅力的です。
back_translation: This real Hollywood fairytale is more captivating than the usual fantasies created by Hollywood.

text: josh also gets fixated on sex , though he has no clear idea what it 's all about , and in particular on nadine ; to mike 's chagrin , she seems more interested in josh than in him .
translation: ジョッシュはセックスに執着するが、それが何かをよく理解していない。そして特にナディーンに対してだ。マイクの不満にもかかわらず、彼女は彼よりもジョッシュに興味を持っているようだ。
back_translation: Josh is obsessed with sex, but he doesn't really understand what it is. And especially with Nadine. Despite Mike's complaints, she seems to be more interested in Josh than in him.

text: billy is more a showbiz p . r agent than a legal lawyer and minipulates the tabloids into thinking roxie is no more than an innocent 'good time girl ' who took the wrong path , than a scheming murderess .
translation: ビリーは法的弁護士というよりもショービズの広報エージェントであり、タブロイドを操って、ロクシーが陰謀を巡らす殺人者ではなく、間違った道を選んだ無邪気な「楽しみ女」と思わせる。
back_translation: Billy is more of a showbiz public relations agent than a legal lawyer, manipulating the tabloids to make Roxie appear not as a scheming murderer, but as an innocent "fly girl" who chose the wrong path.

text: once the transformation is complete , he 's ready to take on the evil perpetrators of operation whitewash -- mr feather , penelope snow aka white she devil , and , ultimately , the man .
translation: 変身が完了すると、彼はオペレーションホワイトウォッシュの悪党たち、ミスター・フェザー、ペネロペ・スノー（別名ホワイト・シーデビル）、そして最終的にはその男に立ち向かう準備が整う。
back_translation: Once the transformation is complete, he will be ready to confront the villains of Operation Whitewash: Mr. Feather, Penelope Snow (also known as White Sea Devil), and ultimately that man.

text: reggio falls victim to relying on the very digital technology that he fervently scorns , creating a meandering , inarticulate and ultimately disappointing film .
translation: レッジオは、彼が熱心に軽蔑するデジタル技術に依存することで犠牲となり、曲がりくねった、明瞭さに欠け、最終的には期待外れの映画を生み出してしまった。
back_translation: Reggio fell victim to his reliance on digital technology, which he passionately despises, resulting in a convoluted, lacking in clarity, and ultimately disappointing film.

text: his best friend , daria knows just what to do and invites sebastien to a dinner party to meet `` the boys . ``
translation: 彼の親友ダリアは、どうすればよいかをわかっていて、セバスチャンをディナーパーティーに招待して「男たち」に会わせます。
back_translation: His close friend Daria knows what to do and invites Sebastian to a dinner party to introduce him to "the guys."

text: the problem is that for the most part , the film is deadly dull .
translation: 問題は、ほとんどの場合、その映画が非常につまらないということです。
back_translation: The problem is that, in most cases, the movie is extremely boring.

text: the gang breaks their leader out of jail , killing the policemen in the process .
translation: ギャングはリーダーを囚人として脱出させ、その過程で警官を殺します。
back_translation: The gang breaks out their leader from prison and kills a policeman in the process.

text: looking aristocratic , luminous yet careworn in jane hamilton 's exemplary costumes , rampling gives a performance that could not be improved upon .
translation: ジェーン・ハミルトンの模範的な衣装で、貴族的でありながら輝き、疲れた印象を持つランピングは、改善の余地のないパフォーマンスを披露しています。
back_translation: The exemplary costume of Jane Hamilton, noble yet radiant, presents a performance that conveys a tired impression, with no room for improvement.

text: but when his lab assitant , a monkey named jojo , causes the accidental addition of chemical x to the mix , the professor ends up with not one but 3 perfect , powerful little girls .
translation: しかし彼の研究助手である、ジョジョという名の猿が化学薬品Xを混合物に誤って追加してしまったため、教授は1人ではなく3人の完璧で強力な少女たちを持つことになった。
back_translation: However, because his research assistant, a monkey named Jojo, accidentally added chemical X to the mixture, the professor ended up with not one but three perfect and powerful girls.

text: together writer-director danny verete 's three tales comprise a powerful and reasonably fulfilling gestalt .
translation: 共同で、脚本家兼監督のダニー・ヴェレテの三つの物語は、力強く、かなり満足のいく全体像を構成しています。
back_translation: Together, the three stories of the writer-director Danny Verete form a powerful and quite satisfying whole.

text: this is the question posed to john wesley after a heavy night of drinking .
translation: これは、ジョン・ウェスレーに重い飲酒の夜の後に投げかけられた質問です。
back_translation: This is a question posed to John Wesley after a heavy night of drinking.

text: in life , there 's silver , and there 's lead , says rikki ortega , as he moves to be king of the street in `` & # 193 ; nglio , `` l . a . 's east side .
translation: 人生には銀と鉛がある、とリッキー・オルテガは言う。そして彼は「Ánglio」でストリートの王になるために動いている。ロサンゼルスのイーストサイドで。
back_translation: "There is silver and lead in life," says Ricky Ortega. And he is moving to become the king of the street in "Ánglio." In the East Side of Los Angeles.

text: but someone breaks the link before they have finished and now a demon is trapped in their world and the only way to banish it , is for all the people who summoned it to die .
translation: しかし、誰かがリンクを完成させる前に壊してしまい、今や悪魔が彼らの世界に閉じ込められており、それを追放する唯一の方法は、それを召喚したすべての人が死ぬことです。
back_translation: However, before someone could complete the link, it was broken, and now the demons are trapped in their world, with the only way to banish them being for everyone who summoned them to die.

text: jason x has cheesy effects and a hoary plot , but its macabre , self-deprecating sense of humor makes up for a lot .
translation: 『ジェイソンX』は安っぽい効果と古臭いプロットを持っていますが、陰惨で自己卑下的なユーモアが多くを補っています。
back_translation: "Jason X" has cheap effects and an outdated plot, but its dark and self-deprecating humor makes up for a lot.

text: jack and agent hammer turn to father patrick , a catholic priest , for help .
translation: ジャックとエージェント・ハンマーは、カトリックの神父パトリックに助けを求める。
back_translation: Jack and Agent Hammer seek help from a Catholic priest named Patrick.

text: the decision gets complicated when old secrets , false hope , and personal tragedies threaten to break up the band .
translation: 古い秘密、偽りの希望、そして個人的な悲劇がバンドを壊す脅威となると、決断は複雑になる。
back_translation: As old secrets, false hopes, and personal tragedies become threats that could break the band, the decisions become complicated.

text: [ kline 's ] utterly convincing -- and deeply appealing -- as a noble teacher who embraces a strict moral code , and as a flawed human being who ca n't quite live up to it .
translation: [klineの]完全に説得力があり、深く魅力的である -- 厳格な道徳規範を受け入れる高貴な教師として、そしてそれに完全には従うことができない欠陥のある人間として。
back_translation: Completely convincing and deeply captivating -- as a noble teacher who embraces strict moral standards, and as a flawed human who cannot fully adhere to them.

text: with one exception , every blighter in this particular south london housing project digs into dysfunction like it 's a big , comforting jar of marmite , to be slathered on crackers and served as a feast of bleakness .
translation: 一つの例外を除いて、この特定の南ロンドンの住宅プロジェクトにいる全員は、機能不全に飛び込み、それを大きくて心地良いマーマイトの瓶のように扱い、クラッカーに塗りたくって、厳しい現実の饗宴として提供している。
back_translation: With one exception, everyone in this particular South London housing project is diving into dysfunction, treating it like a large and comforting jar of Marmite, slathering it on crackers and serving it up as a feast of harsh reality.

text: on the verge of judgement day , the most advanced terminator unit ever , the t-x , arrives from the future to ensure the rise of the machines .
translation: 審判の日の瀬戸際で、最も進化したターミネーターユニットであるT-Xが未来から到着し、機械の台頭を確実にします。
back_translation: At the brink of Judgment Day, the most advanced Terminator unit, T-X, arrives from the future, ensuring the rise of machines.

text: evokes the frustration , the awkwardness and the euphoria of growing up , without relying on the usual tropes .
translation: 成長することのフラストレーション、居心地の悪さ、そして幸福感を呼び起こしながら、従来のトロープに頼ることはありません。
back_translation: While evoking the frustration, discomfort, and happiness of growth, it does not rely on traditional tropes.

text: using their immense skills , max and charisse track rausch , a brilliant international arms dealer , around the globe .
translation: 彼らの卓越したスキルを駆使して、マックスとシャリスは世界中で優れた国際武器商人ラウシュを追跡します。
back_translation: Using their exceptional skills, Max and Sharis track down the outstanding international arms dealer Laush around the world.

text: reign of fire looks as if it was made without much thought -- and is best watched that way .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、あまり考えられずに作られたように見え、そうやって見るのが一番良い。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" seems to have been made without much thought, and that's the best way to view it.

text: this is the true story of real ira bombers during the peak of the troubles in northern ireland , 1981 .
translation: これは、1981年の北アイルランドのトラブルの最高潮における本物のIRA爆弾犯の真実の物語です。
back_translation: This is the true story of a real IRA bomber at the height of the Northern Ireland troubles in 1981.

text: those who want to be jolted out of their gourd should drop everything and run to ichi .
translation: 頭がぶっ飛びたい人は、すべてを置いてイチに駆け込むべきだ。
back_translation: Anyone who wants to have their mind blown should rush to Ichii, leaving everything behind.

text: the script falls back on too many tried-and-true shenanigans that hardly distinguish it from the next teen comedy .
translation: 脚本はあまりにも多くの定番の茶番に頼りすぎており、次のティーンコメディとはほとんど区別がつかない。
back_translation: The script relies too heavily on too many standard clichés, making it difficult to distinguish it from the next teen comedy.

text: the film is enriched by an imaginatively mixed cast of antic spirits , headed by christopher plummer as the subtlest and most complexly evil uncle ralph i 've ever seen in the many film and stage adaptations of the work .
translation: この映画は、クリストファー・プラマーが今まで見た中で最も微妙で複雑に悪役のラルフ叔父を演じる、想像力豊かに混ざり合ったキャストによって豊かにされています。
back_translation: This film is enriched by a vividly blended cast, featuring Christopher Plummer in the most subtle and complex portrayal of the villainous Uncle Ralph that he has ever seen.

text: at the same time , sanitarian doctor oswaldo cruz comes back to brazil after three years in paris , where he had studied in the pasteur institute .
translation: 同時に、衛生学者オズワルド・クルーズ博士は、パリのパスツール研究所で学んでいた3年後にブラジルに戻ります。
back_translation: At the same time, epidemiologist Dr. Oswald Cruz returned to Brazil three years after studying at the Pasteur Institute in Paris.

text: the movie barely makes sense , with its unbelievable naM-ovetM-i and arbitrary flashbacks .
translation: 映画は信じられないような名前の人物や恣意的なフラッシュバックがあって、ほとんど意味不明です。
back_translation: The movie has unbelievable character names and arbitrary flashbacks, making it almost incomprehensible.

text: there 's . . . tremendous energy from the cast , a sense of playfulness and excitement that seems appropriate .
translation: キャストからは素晴らしいエネルギーが感じられ、遊び心や興奮の感覚が適しているようです。
back_translation: The cast exudes wonderful energy, and there seems to be a sense of playfulness and excitement that fits well.

text: the film engages with the divergent paths taken , linked by childhood friendship and a mewling kitten , but a third act event is presented so abruptly it confuses the viewer until it rebounds somewhat with a satisfying closure .
translation: 映画は、子供時代の友情と鳴く子猫に結びつけられた異なる道を辿ることに関与していますが、第三幕の出来事が非常に突然に提示されるため、観客を混乱させますが、結局は満足のいく結末へと戻ります。
back_translation: The film involves different paths intertwined with childhood friendship and a mewing kitten, but the events of the third act are presented so suddenly that they confuse the audience, ultimately returning to a satisfying conclusion.

text: once his products become good enough , he has to face severe competition , and , in some cases , humiliations , from well-established foreign companies .
translation: 彼の製品が十分に良くなると、彼は確固たる外国企業からの厳しい競争や、場合によっては屈辱に直面することになります。
back_translation: When his product becomes good enough, he will face fierce competition from established foreign companies and, in some cases, humiliation.

text: the evening after his father 's funeral , he meets the lovely paula , runs into her the next day , but is sure she 'll never look twice at him .
translation: 父の葬儀の夕方、彼は魅力的なポーラに出会い、翌日また彼女に出くわすが、彼女が自分に二度見することはないだろうと確信している。
back_translation: On the evening of his father's funeral, he meets the charming Paula, and the next day, he runs into her again, convinced that she will never look at him twice.

text: the only thing i laughed at were the people who paid to see it .
translation: 私が笑った唯一のことは、それを見るためにお金を払った人々でした。
back_translation: The only thing that made me laugh was the people who paid to see it.

text: the rules - if one person leaves , everyone loses .
translation: ルール - 1人が去れば、みんなが失う。
back_translation: Rule - If one person leaves, everyone loses.

text: quiet , sexual , disturbing , often beautifully melancholic .
translation: 静かで、性的で、不気味で、しばしば美しいメランコリーに満ちている。
back_translation: It is quiet, sexual, eerie, and often filled with beautiful melancholy.

text: all or nothing is set on a london working-class housing estate over a long weekend , and also tells the stories of a range of phil and penny 's neighbors , some of whom become involved in the family 's lives , and all of whom experience an emotional journey .
translation: 「オール・オア・ナッシング」は、ロンドンの労働者階級の住宅地を舞台にした長い週末の物語であり、フィルとペニーの隣人たちのさまざまな物語も描かれています。隣人の中には家族の生活に関わる者もおり、全員が感情的な旅を経験します。
back_translation: "All or Nothing" is a long weekend story set in a working-class neighborhood of London, featuring various tales of Phil and Penny's neighbors. Among the neighbors are those involved in family life, and all of them undergo an emotional journey.

text: she confronts him , but the smooth talking mackenheim seduces her into a romantic dinner at his house .
translation: 彼女は彼に立ち向かうが、口の上手いマッケンハイムは彼女を誘惑して自宅でのロマンチックなディナーに誘い込む。
back_translation: She confronts him, but the smooth-talking McKenheim seduces her and invites her to a romantic dinner at his home.

text: reeboir varies between a sweet smile and an angry bark , while said attempts to wear down possible pupils through repetition . it has no affect on the kurds , but it wore me down .
translation: リーボワーは甘い笑顔と怒った吠え声の間で変わり、サイドは反復を通じて可能な生徒を疲れさせようとします。それはクルド人には影響を与えませんが、私を疲れさせました。
back_translation: Lebower shifts between a sweet smile and an angry bark, while the side tries to wear down possible students through repetition. It doesn't affect the Kurds, but it wore me out.

text: diana seeks to escape the wasteland of lies she ca n't stop telling .
translation: ダイアナは、自分が止められない嘘の荒野から逃れようとしています。
back_translation: Diana is trying to escape from a wilderness of lies that she cannot stop.

text: a thinly veiled excuse for wilson to play his self-deprecating act against murphy 's well-honed prima donna shtick .
translation: ウィルソンがマーフィーの洗練されたプライマドンナ的な演技に対して自己卑下の演技をするための薄い隠れた口実。
back_translation: A thinly veiled excuse for Wilson to perform a self-deprecating act in response to Murphy's sophisticated prima donna-like performance.

text: it might be 'easier ' to watch on video at home , but that should n't stop die-hard french film connoisseurs from going out and enjoying the big-screen experience .
translation: 自宅で動画を見る方が「簡単」かもしれませんが、それが熱心なフランス映画ファンが外に出て大画面の体験を楽しむことを妨げるべきではありません。
back_translation: Watching videos at home may be "easier," but that shouldn't prevent enthusiastic French film fans from going out and enjoying the experience on the big screen.

text: the five protagonists of my film are women who have not been able to organize the large `` stones `` in their lives .
translation: 私の映画の5人の主人公は、自分たちの人生における大きな「石」を整理できない女性たちです。
back_translation: The five protagonists in my movie are women who cannot organize the big "stones" in their lives.

text: disney again ransacks its archives for a quick-buck sequel .
translation: ディズニーは再びアーカイブを掘り起こして、手っ取り早い利益のための続編を制作しています。
back_translation: Disney is digging up its archives once again to produce sequels for quick profits.

text: the documentary follows otte from holland to ghana , where he 's set to celebrate his fifth anniversary as the leader of mepe , the region of 300 , 000 people who installed him .
translation: このドキュメンタリーはオッテがオランダからガーナに向かう様子を追い、彼が30万人の住民によって選ばれたメペのリーダーとしての5周年を祝いに行く設定になっています。
back_translation: This documentary follows Otte as he travels from the Netherlands to Ghana to celebrate his fifth anniversary as the leader of Mepe, chosen by 300,000 residents.

text: in scope , ambition and accomplishment , children of the century . . . takes kurys ' career to a whole new level .
translation: この世紀の子供たちの範囲、野望、達成は、クーリスのキャリアを全く新しいレベルへと引き上げます。
back_translation: The range, ambitions, and achievements of the children of this century elevate Curis's career to an entirely new level.

text: it wraps up a classic mother/daughter struggle in recycled paper with a shiny new bow and while the audience can tell it 's not all new , at least it looks pretty .
translation: それは、再利用された紙に新しいリボンをつけた、古典的な母と娘の葛藤をまとめており、観客はそれがすべて新しいものでないことがわかるものの、少なくとも見た目は美しいです。
back_translation: It encapsulates a classic mother-daughter conflict with a new ribbon on recycled paper, and while the audience can tell that it’s not all new, at least it looks beautiful.

text: done in mostly by a weak script that ca n't support the epic treatment .
translation: 主に壮大な表現を支えきれない弱い脚本によって台無しにされています。
back_translation: It is mainly ruined by a weak script that cannot support the grand expressions.

text: 90 punitive minutes of eardrum-dicing gunplay , screeching-metal smashups , and flaccid odd-couple sniping .
translation: 耳をつんざくような銃撃戦、金属がかき乱れる衝突、そして無気力な異色カップルの小競り合い。90分間の罰のような戦慄。
back_translation: A deafening gunfight, the clash of metal in disarray, and a lethargic, unconventional couple's squabble. A 90-minute terror that feels like punishment.

text: were dylan thomas alive to witness first-time director ethan hawke 's strained chelsea walls , he might have been tempted to change his landmark poem to , 'do not go gentle into that good theatre . '
translation: ダイラン・トーマスが初監督のイーサン・ホークの緊張したチェルシー・ウォールズを目撃することができたなら、彼は自らの名作詩を「その良い劇場に優しく行くな」と改訂したくなったかもしれません。
back_translation: If Dylan Thomas had witnessed Ethan Hawke's tense Chelsea Walls, he might have wanted to revise his masterpiece poem to read, "Do not go gentle into that good theater."

text: when four kids stop for gas at a strange gas station/freak show/chicken stand on halloween eve , they get directions to a spooky local site from a very strange attendant whose intentions arent that clear , and the story begins from there .
translation: 4人の子供たちがハロウィンの前夜に奇妙なガソリンスタンド/フreakショー/チキンスタンドでガソリンを止めると、彼らは非常に不思議な店員から不気味な地元の場所への道案内を受ける。その店員の意図は明確ではなく、そこから物語が始まる。
back_translation: Four children stop for gas at a strange gas station/freak show/chicken stand on Halloween Eve, and they receive directions to a creepy local spot from a very mysterious clerk. The clerk's intentions are unclear, and from there, the story begins.

text: with the recent release of full-length features like `` princess mononoke `` and the 2001 dvd release of the classic `` akira , `` japanese animation is fast becoming a leading force in the american entertainment industry .
translation: 「もののけ姫」や2001年のクラシック「AKIRA」のDVDリリースなど、最近のフルレングス作品の公開により、日本のアニメーションはアメリカのエンターテインメント業界で急速に主要な力となりつつあります。
back_translation: With recent releases of full-length works such as "Princess Mononoke" and the 2001 classic "AKIRA" on DVD, Japanese animation is rapidly becoming a major force in the American entertainment industry.

text: . . . manages to deliver a fair bit of vampire fun .
translation: . . . かなりの量のバンパイアの楽しさを提供することに成功しています。

text: lando , frustrated with isabel 's conservatism and idealism , turns his attention to clara , which irked isabel .

back_translation: Rand was irritated by Isabel's conservatism and idealism, and turned his attention to Clara, which annoyed Isabel.

text: edgar , duncan 's sixty year old , distant father , does n't understand the strange manifestations of his son 's mourning .
translation: エドガー、ダンカンの60歳の遠い父は、息子の喪の奇妙な現れを理解していません。

text: amongst the excitement of rediscovering old friendships , no one minds that a snowstorm has cut them off from the rest of the outside world .

text: the leads we are given here are simply too bland to be interesting .

text: during this time he becomes wracked by horrific and surreal visions that begin to fuel his work .
translation: この期間中、彼は恐ろしい幻想によって苦しみ、それが彼の作品を刺激し始めます。

text: care deftly captures the wonder and menace of growing up , but he never really embraces the joy of fuhrman 's destructive escapism or the grace-in-rebellion found by his characters .
translation: ケアは成長することの驚きと脅威を巧妙に捉えていますが、フールマンの破壊的な逃避行の喜びや、彼のキャラクターたちが見出す反抗の中の優雅さを本当に受け入れることはありません。
back_translation: Care cleverly captures the surprise and threat of growth, but it does not truly embrace the joy of Foolman's destructive escape or the elegance found in the rebellion of his characters.

text: chuck - the songwriting leader of the po'boys , is discouraged and facing writer 's block .

back_translation: Chuck, the songwriting leader of the Po' Boys, is feeling discouraged and facing a writer's block.

text: this first film , a deliberately allegorical visual fantasy , focuses on the 30-something generation in china , who have to adapt to a materialistic society very different from the political utopia of their childhood .
translation: この最初の映画は、意図的に寓話的な視覚ファンタジーであり、彼らの幼少期の政治的ユートピアとは非常に異なる物質主義社会に適応しなければならない中国の30代世代に焦点を当てています。
back_translation: This first film is a deliberately allegorical visual fantasy that focuses on the generation of Chinese people in their 30s who have to adapt to a materialistic society that is very different from the political utopia of their childhood.

text: star trek : nemesis meekly goes where nearly every star trek movie has gone before . wince-inducing dialogue , thrift-shop costumes , prosthetic makeup by silly putty and kmart blue-light-special effects all conspire to test trekkie loyalty .
translation: スタートレック：ネメシスは、ほぼすべてのスタートレック映画が行った場所へと meekly 進んでいく。思わず顔をしかめたくなるセリフ、古着屋の衣装、シリコンゴムのようなプロテーゼメイク、Kマートのブルーライトセールのような特効がすべて、トレッキーの忠誠心を試そうとしている。
back_translation: Star Trek: Nemesis meekly moves towards the same places that almost all Star Trek films have gone. Lines that make you want to grimace, costumes from a thrift store, prosthetic makeup that looks like silicone rubber, and special effects reminiscent of a Kmart blue light sale all seem to be testing the loyalty of Trekkies.

text: the lively appeal of the last kiss lies in the ease with which it integrates thoughtfulness and pasta-fagioli comedy .
translation: 最後のキスの生き生きとした魅力は、思慮深さとパスタ・ファジョーリのコメディを簡単に統合することにあります。
back_translation: The vibrant charm of the final kiss lies in its ability to seamlessly integrate thoughtfulness and the comedy of pasta e fagioli.

text: there are some wonderfully fresh moments that smooth the moral stiffness with human kindness and hopefulness .
translation: 人間の優しさと希望に満ちた瞬間が、道徳的な硬さを和らげる素晴らしい瞬間があります。
back_translation: There are wonderful moments when human kindness and hope soften moral rigidity.

text: mcgrath has deftly trimmed dickens ' wonderfully sprawling soap opera , the better to focus on the hero 's odyssey from cowering poverty to courage and happiness .
translation: マグラスはディケンズの素晴らしく広がるソープオペラを巧みに編集し、主人公の貧困から勇気と幸福への旅に焦点を当てることに成功しました。
back_translation: Maglass skillfully edited Dickens' wonderfully sprawling soap opera, successfully focusing on the protagonist's journey from poverty to courage and happiness.

text: it 's a fine , focused piece of work that reopens an interesting controversy and never succumbs to sensationalism .
translation: それは興味深い論争を再び浮き彫りにし、決してセンセーショナリズムには屈しない、優れた集中した作品です。
back_translation: It brings to light an intriguing debate once again and is an excellent, focused work that never succumbs to sensationalism.

text: packed with spectacular special effects and martial arts action , the monk , kar , and a sexy russian mob princess called bad girl must struggle to find , face , and fight the ultimate enemy .
translation: 壮大な特殊効果と武道アクションが満載のこの映画では、僧侶カールとセクシーなロシアのマフィアのプリンセス、バッドガールが究極の敵を見つけて対峙し、戦うために奮闘します。
back_translation: In this movie, filled with grand special effects and martial arts action, the monk Karl and the sexy Russian mafia princess, the bad girl, struggle to find and confront their ultimate enemy.

text: through the guidance of his doctor , he confronts his painful past and begins a quest to find the family he never knew .
translation: 医師の指導のもと、彼は痛みのある過去に向き合い、自分が知らなかった家族を見つけるための旅を始めます。
back_translation: Under the guidance of a physician, he embarks on a journey to confront his painful past and discover a family he never knew existed.

back_translation: Watching a movie is like reading a portrait of an era of sadness that continues to shift the focus to the journalist who wrote it.

text: the most excruciating 86 minutes one might sit through this summer that do not involve a dentist drill .

text: god bless crudup and his aversion to taking the easy hollywood road and cashing in on his movie-star gorgeousness .

back_translation: I thank God for blessing Klyupa and that he is avoiding the easy path of Hollywood and making money by leveraging the beauty of being a movie star.

text: strong stuff , minus the upbeat sentimentality of last year 's oscar-winner . in that respect , it may be an even more important film .

text: [ a ] wonderfully loopy tale of love , longing , and voting .
translation: 愛、渇望、そして投票に関する素晴らしくおかしな物語。

translation: 彼女は終身刑にされ、アストリッドは里親ホームを転々としなければならなくなる。

text: 300 years of russian history and culture compressed into an evanescent , seamless and sumptuous stream of consciousness .

text: he gets fired , beaten up , and so on .

text: james regards the cia 's mission as an intriguing alternative to an ordinary life , but before he becomes an ops officer , james has to survive the agency 's secret training ground , where green recruits are molded into seasoned veterans .
translation: ジェームズはCIAのミッションを普通の生活に対する興味深い代替手段として考えているが、オペレーションオフィサーになる前に、ジェームズはエージェンシーの秘密訓練施設を生き抜かなければならない。そこで新人は熟練のベテランに鍛えられる。
back_translation: James sees a CIA mission as an intriguing alternative to ordinary life, but before becoming an operations officer, he must survive the agency's secret training facility. There, newcomers are trained by seasoned veterans.

text: a love for films shines through each frame and the era is recreated with obvious affection , scored to perfection with some tasty boogaloo beats .
translation: 映画への愛が各フレームに輝き、時代が明らかな愛情で再現されており、美味しいブガルーのビートで完璧にスコアされています。
back_translation: The love for cinema shines through in every frame, the era is depicted with clear affection, and it is perfectly scored with delicious boogaloo beats.

text: there 's a great deal of corny dialogue and preposterous moments . and yet , it still works .
translation: 陳腐な対話やばかげた瞬間がたくさんありますが、それでもなおうまくいっています。

text: a sumptuous showcase for ian holm , who delivers not one but two great performances .

text: his own colleagues after him , john follows a very small trace that might hold the key to his innocence , a strange unsolved yet predicted murder and a so-called `` minority report `` , a documentation of one of the rare events in which a precog sees something different than the other two .
translation: 彼自身の同僚たちの後を追って、ジョンは彼の無実を証明する鍵を握るかもしれない非常に小さな手がかりを追いかけます。それは、奇妙な未解決の予測された殺人事件と、「マイノリティ・リポート」と呼ばれる、予知能力者のうちの一人が他の二人とは異なるものを見た稀な出来事の文書です。
back_translation: Following in the footsteps of his own colleagues, John chases after a very small clue that may hold the key to proving his innocence. It is a document detailing a strange, unresolved predicted murder case, and a rare occurrence in which one of the precogs in "Minority Report" saw something different from the other two.

text: that is , until he falls in love with a cocktail waitress ( maria bello ) and gets `` lady luck , `` which throws the situation into reverse .
translation: つまり、彼がカクテルウェイトレス（マリア・ベロ）に恋をし、「レディ・ラック」を手に入れたことで、状況が逆転する。
back_translation: In other words, he falls in love with the cocktail waitress (Maria Bello) and turns the situation around by getting "Lady Luck."

text: and he 's found the perfect patsy to evoke such fear .
translation: そして彼はそのような恐怖を呼び起こす完璧な犠牲者を見つけた。

text: an inventive , absorbing movie that 's as hard to classify as it is hard to resist .
translation: 分類するのが難しく、魅力的な映画で、抵抗するのも難しい。

text: it all leads to more tragedy and the movie jumps to 12 years later .
translation: すべてがさらなる悲劇につながり、映画は12年後に飛びます。

text: ' . . . the film 's considered approach to its subject matter is too calm and thoughtful for agitprop , and the thinness of its characterizations makes it a failure as straight drama . '
translation: 映画のテーマに対する考慮されたアプローチは、アジテプロップにはあまりにも穏やかで思慮深く、キャラクターの描写が薄いため、ストレートなドラマとしては失敗している。
back_translation: The considered approach to the film's theme is too gentle and thoughtful for agitprop, and the character portrayal is superficial, resulting in a failure as a straightforward drama.

text: now the assassin and the cop must join forces - so sue can avenge her sister 's death and hong can prove her innocence in a spectacular confrontation at chow nunn 's headquarters . . .
translation: 今、暗殺者と警官は力を合わせなければならない - スーが妹の死を復讐し、ホンが自身の無実を証明するために、チャウ・ナンの本拠地での壮絶な対決で。
back_translation: Now, the assassin and the police officer must join forces – Su to avenge her sister's death, and Hong to prove his innocence, in a fierce confrontation at Chow Nan's stronghold.

text: with only a high school diploma , thomas became a leading cardiac pioneer and educator of two generations of the united states ' premiere heart surgeons .
translation: 高校の卒業証書だけで、トーマスはアメリカの一流心臓外科医の二世代の先駆者で教育者となりました。
back_translation: With just a high school diploma, Thomas became a pioneer and educator in America's top heart surgery, a second-generation leader in the field.

text: a baffling subplot involving smuggling drugs inside danish cows falls flat , and if you 're going to alter the bard 's ending , you 'd better have a good alternative .
translation: デンマーク牛の中にドラッグを密輸するという困惑させるサブプロットは失敗し、バードの結末を変更するなら、良い代替案を用意しておいた方がいい。
back_translation: The confusing subplot of smuggling drugs inside Danish cows fails, and if you're going to change Bird's ending, it's best to have a good alternative ready.

text: this charming , thought-provoking new york fest of life and love has its rewards .

text: but someone has been watching , and they 've had enough . . .

text: [ i ] t 's certainly laudable that the movie deals with hot-button issues in a comedic context , but barbershop is n't as funny as it should be .
translation: 映画が重要な問題をコメディの文脈で扱っているのは確かに賞賛に値するが、「バーバーショップ」はそれほど面白くない。

text: it is life affirming and heartbreaking , sweet without the decay factor , funny and sad .

text: in 1999 , after one of their husbands became ill with leukemia , the women came up with a more commercial concept : discreet photos of these bare wi lasses .

back_translation: In 1999, after one of their husbands became ill with leukemia, the women came up with a more commercial concept. It was modest photographs of these nude women.

text: watching this film , one is left with the inescapable conclusion that hitchens ' obsession with kissinger is , at bottom , a sophisticated flower child 's desire to purge the world of the tooth and claw of human power .
translation: この映画を見ていると、ヒッチェンズのキッシンジャーへの執着は、根本的には洗練されたヒッピーの世界から人間の権力の牙と爪を取り除きたいという欲求であるという避けられない結論に至る。

text: you emerge dazed , confused as to whether you 've seen pornography or documentary .
