back_translation: You appear to be dazed and confused about whether you watched pornography or a documentary.

text: tim , who had scoffed at nick 's idea and passed on an opportunity to get in on the deal , can only watch as nick 's fortune -- and tim 's own envy -- grow to equally outrageous proportions .
translation: ティムはニックのアイデアを嘲笑し、その取引に参加する機会を逃したため、ニックの富とティム自身の嫉妬が同じく途方もない規模に成長していくのをただ見守ることしかできない。
back_translation: Tim mocked Nick's idea and missed the opportunity to participate in the deal, so he could only watch as both Nick's wealth and Tim's own jealousy grew to an equally immense scale.

text: the movie 's accumulated force still feels like an ugly knot tightening in your stomach . but is that knot from dramatic tension or a symptom of artistic malnutrition ?
translation: 映画の蓄積された力は、まだあなたの胃の中で締まっていく醜い結び目のように感じられます。しかし、その結び目はドラマの緊張から来ているのか、それとも芸術的な栄養失調の兆候なのでしょうか？
back_translation: The accumulated power of the movie feels like an ugly knot tightening in your stomach. But is that knot a result of the tension in the drama, or a sign of artistic malnutrition?

text: open-ended and composed of layer upon layer , talk to her is a cinephile 's feast , an invitation to countless interpretations .
translation: オープンエンドで層を成す「彼女に話しかける」は、映画愛好家の饗宴であり、無限の解釈への招待です。
back_translation: "The open-ended 'Talking to Her' is a feast for film lovers and an invitation to infinite interpretations."

text: charlie decides it 's time to take action to recover his lost love : he secretly befriends her new boyfriend and attempts to sabotage their relationship by introducing temptation , mistrust - and jennifer . . .
translation: チャーリーは失った愛を取り戻すために行動を起こすことに決めた：彼は彼女の新しいボーイフレンドと秘密裏に友達になり、誘惑や不信感を持ち込んで彼らの関係を妨害しようとするのだ。そして、ジェニファーも…
back_translation: Charlie decided to take action to regain the love he lost: he secretly became friends with her new boyfriend, trying to introduce temptation and distrust to disrupt their relationship. And Jennifer too...

text: the movie is amateurish , but it 's a minor treat .
translation: その映画は素人っぽいですが、小さな楽しみです。
back_translation: The movie feels amateurish, but it's a small pleasure.

text: as he struggles for his humanity , he fights his oppressors and is quickly sent to `` the shu `` where his unbridled rage catapults him to the victor 's circle .
translation: 彼は人間性を求めて奮闘し、抑圧者と戦い、すぐに「シュ」に送られ、彼の抑えきれない怒りが彼を勝者のサークルへと押し上げる。
back_translation: He struggles to seek humanity, fights against the oppressors, and is soon sent to "Shu," where his uncontrollable anger pushes him into the circle of victors.

text: insomnia loses points when it surrenders to a formulaic bang-bang , shoot-em-up scene at the conclusion . but the performances of pacino , williams , and swank keep the viewer wide-awake all the way through .
translation: 不眠症は、結末で型にはまったバンバンシーンに屈服すると評価を失う。しかし、パチーノ、ウィリアムズ、スワンクの演技は観客を終始目を覚ませておく。
back_translation: Insomnia loses its impact when it succumbs to a formulaic ending filled with action scenes. However, the performances by Pacino, Williams, and Swank keep the audience awake throughout.

text: his two buddies , sean and tim never have trouble in that department , and they set out to help in their own way .
translation: 彼の二人の友人、ショーンとティムは、その面で問題を抱えることはなく、彼らなりの方法で助けようとします。
back_translation: His two friends, Sean and Tim, do not have any problems in that regard and try to help in their own way.

text: rebuffed in love and uncertain of life , simon is the story of a young englishman 's physical and spiritual journey during algeria 's battle for independence from france .
translation: 愛に拒まれ、人生に不安を抱えるサイモンは、アルジェリアのフランスからの独立を巡る戦いの最中に、若きイギリス人の肉体的かつ精神的な旅の物語です。
back_translation: Simon, who is rejected by love and carries anxiety about life, is a story of a young British man's physical and mental journey amidst the struggle for Algeria's independence from France.

text: the pain , loneliness and insecurity of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully brought to slovenly life in this self-deprecating , biting and witty feature written by charlie kaufman and his twin brother , donald , and directed by spike jonze .
translation: この自己卑下的で辛辣かつウィットに富んだ作品は、チャーリー・カウフマンと彼の双子の兄弟ドナルドが脚本を手がけ、スパイク・ジョーンズが監督したもので、スクリーンライティングプロセスの痛み、孤独、そして不安定さが生々しく、痛ましいほどに描き出されています。
back_translation: This self-deprecating, sharp, and witty work, written by Charlie Kaufman and his twin brother Donald, and directed by Spike Jonze, vividly and painfully depicts the pain, loneliness, and instability of the screenwriting process.

text: the boy gets a shock when he comes to know that the job involves spying sharad 's wife .
translation: 少年は、その仕事がシャラドの妻をスパイすることを含んでいると知ってショックを受ける。
back_translation: The boy is shocked to discover that the job involves spying on Sharad's wife.

text: the brittle containment of the surface is no match for the volatile eruptions from the unspoken interior - a harrowing and erotic underworld of need and confession that permits the release of all that has been silenced .
translation: 表面のもろい封じ込めは、言葉にされない内部からの揺らめく噴出に敵うものではない。静められてきたすべてを解放することを許す、欲望と告白の恐ろしいかつ官能的なアンダーワールドである。
back_translation: The fragile confinement of the surface cannot withstand the wavering eruption from within that remains unspoken. It is a terrifying yet sensual underworld that allows the release of everything that has been subdued, driven by desire and confession.

text: 451 tries to help kyle adjust to this unfamiliar and violent world but kyle is a man destined to fight his own battles .
translation: 451はカイルがこの未知で暴力的な世界に適応するのを助けようとするが、カイルは自らの戦いを戦う運命にある男である。
back_translation: 451 tries to help Kyle adapt to this unknown and violent world, but Kyle is a man destined to fight his own battles.

text: this is a children 's film in the truest sense . it 's packed with adventure and a worthwhile environmental message , so it 's great for the kids . parents , on the other hand , will be ahead of the plot at all times , and there is n't enough clever innuendo to fil
translation: これは真に子供向けの映画です。冒険が詰まっており、価値のある環境メッセージがあるため、子供たちにとって素晴らしい作品です。一方で、親たちは常にプロットを先読みできるため、十分な巧妙な暗喩がありません。
back_translation: This is truly a children's movie. It is filled with adventure and has a valuable environmental message, making it a wonderful piece for kids. On the other hand, parents can always predict the plot, so there are not enough clever metaphors.

text: nayomi and lisa walk in , and pick up the gun that mitchell just dropped off and leave .
translation: ナヨミとリサが入ってきて、ミッチェルがちょうど置いていった銃を拾って出て行く。
back_translation: Nayomi and Lisa walked in, picked up the gun that Mitchell had just left behind, and walked out.

text: it all plays out . . . like a high-end john hughes comedy , a kind of elder bueller 's time out .
translation: すべては展開していく . . . 高級なジョン・ヒューズのコメディのように、いわばエルダー・ビュラーの休息のようだ。
back_translation: Everything unfolds... It is like a luxurious John Hughes comedy, akin to a respite for Elder Bueller.

text: to cure their boredom , they decide to ( inspired after watching the movie , `` the sure thing `` ) go on various road trips looking for love .
translation: 退屈を癒すために、彼らは（映画「ザ・シュア・シング」を見た後にインスピレーションを受けて）愛を求めて様々なロードトリップに出かけることに決めた。
back_translation: To cure their boredom, they decided to embark on various road trips in search of love, inspired after watching the movie "The Sure Thing."

text: chilling but uncommercial look into the mind of jeffrey dahmer , serial killer .
translation: ジェフリー・ダーマー、連続殺人者の心の中を chilling だが商業的ではない視点で探る。
back_translation: Exploring the mind of Jeffrey Dahmer, a serial killer, from a chilling yet non-commercial perspective.

text: blake falls in love with melinda but the master compels blake to marry ariel against his will to keep him away from melinda his kept woman .
translation: ブレイクはメリンダに恋をするが、主人はブレイクを無理矢理アリエルと結婚させ、彼をメリンダから引き離そうとする。メリンダは彼の愛人だ。
back_translation: Blake falls in love with Melinda, but his master forces Blake to marry Ariel, trying to separate him from Melinda. Melinda is his mistress.

text: . . . manages to fall closer in quality to silence than to the abysmal hannibal .
translation: …沈黙に近い質に落ち着くことに成功し、ひどいハンニバルには及ばない。
back_translation: ...I have succeeded in settling into a state close to silence, which does not reach the level of terrible Hannibal.

text: the filmmakers needed more emphasis on the storytelling and less on the glamorous machine that thrusts the audience into a future they wo n't much care about .
translation: 映画制作者は、物語の対策にもっと重点を置き、観客があまり気にしない未来に押し込む華やかな機械にあまり重点を置かない必要がありました。
back_translation: Filmmakers needed to focus more on the narrative strategies and place less emphasis on flashy machines that audiences are unlikely to care about in the future.

text: when the three precogs , who only work together , floating connected in a tank of fluid , have a vision , the names of the victim and the perpetrator as well as video imagery of the crime and the exact time it will happen , are given out to the special cops who then try to prevent the crime from happening .
translation: 3人の予知能力者が浮遊してつながった状態で液体のタンクの中にいるとき、彼らがビジョンを受け取ると、被害者と加害者の名前、犯罪の映像、およびその事件が発生する正確な時間が特別な警官に伝えられ、彼らはその犯罪が起こらないようにしようとします。
back_translation: When three psychics are floating and connected in a liquid tank, they receive visions that reveal the names of the victim and the perpetrator, the imagery of the crime, and the exact time the incident will occur, which is communicated to special police officers who try to prevent the crime from happening.

text: marly temple is living her father 's dream of running a motel , only it has become her nightmare .
translation: マーリー・テンプルは父親の夢であるモーテルを経営しているが、それは彼女の悪夢に変わってしまった。
back_translation: Marley Temple runs a motel, which is her father's dream, but it has turned into her nightmare.

text: in the end , they confront an unparalleled horror , with the fate of the world in the balance .
translation: 最終的に、彼らは比類のない恐怖に直面し、世界の運命が危険にさらされます。
back_translation: In the end, they face unparalleled terror, and the fate of the world is in danger.

text: thomas , the studious and responsible brother , creates a better life for himself through education and hard , honest work .
translation: トーマス、勉強熱心で責任感のある兄は、教育と努力、誠実な仕事を通じて自分自身のより良い人生を築いています。
back_translation: Thomas, the diligent and responsible older brother, is building a better life for himself through education, effort, and honest work.

text: director duncan roy impressively presents aka through three simultaneous frames rather than one , offering the audience a deeper and more complex perspective through which to view dean 's engrossing story .
translation: ダンカン・ロイ監督は、同時に3つのフレームを通して「AKA」を印象的に提示し、観客にディーンの魅力的な物語を見るためのより深く複雑な視点を提供します。
back_translation: Director Duncan Roy presents "AKA" impressively through three frames simultaneously, offering the audience a deeper and more complex perspective to view Dean's captivating story.

text: the film explores the cultural differences between a north american mother and a mexican father in the face of death .
translation: その映画は、死に直面した北米の母親とメキシコの父親の間の文化的な違いを探求しています。
back_translation: The movie explores the cultural differences between a mother from North America facing death and a father from Mexico.

text: hands down the year 's most thought-provoking film . but it pays a price for its intricate intellectual gamesmanship .
translation: 間違いなく今年で最も考えさせられる映画ですが、その緻密な知的策略のために代償を払うことになります。
back_translation: Without a doubt, this is the most thought-provoking movie of the year, but you will pay a price for its intricate intellectual strategies.

text: his plans go awry , however , when his older brother , keith , returns from prison .
translation: しかし、彼の計画は、兄のキースが刑務所から戻ってくると狂ってしまう。
back_translation: However, his plan goes awry when his brother Keith returns from prison.

text: `` a sound of thunder `` is about a game hunter ( burns ) who goes on a time-traveling safari owned and operated by kingsley 's character to hunt dinosaurs in the prehistoric era .
translation: 「雷の音」は、王族のキャラクターが運営するタイムトラベルサファリに出かけ、恐竜を狩るゲームハンター（バーンズ）についての物語です。
back_translation: "Sound of Thunder" is a story about a time travel safari run by a royal character, where a game hunter (Barnes) goes out to hunt dinosaurs.

text: now faced with the discovery of a bloodied body , a flaming liquor store just off native land that sells millions of cans of beer a year to the native population , and his brother 's ongoing self-destruction , rudy goes on a quest to avenge himself , his family , and his culture and to seek justice .
translation: 血まみれの遺体の発見、先住民の土地のすぐそばで燃えている酒屋、年間何百万本のビールを先住民に販売している店、そして彼の兄の自己破壊が続く中、ルディは自己、家族、文化を守り、正義を求めるために復讐の旅に出る。
back_translation: The discovery of a bloodied corpse, a liquor store burning right next to Indigenous land, a shop that sells millions of bottles of beer to Indigenous people each year, and while his brother's self-destruction continues, Rudy embarks on a journey of revenge to protect himself, his family, and his culture, seeking justice.

text: in its ragged , cheap and unassuming way , the movie works .
translation: そのぼろぼろで安っぽく控えめなやり方で、この映画は成功している。
back_translation: In its shabby, cheap, and understated manner, this film succeeds.

text: it irritates and saddens me that martin lawrence 's latest vehicle can explode obnoxiously into 2 , 500 screens while something of bubba ho-tep 's clearly evident quality may end up languishing on a shelf somewhere .
translation: マーティン・ローレンスの最新作が2,500スクリーンで嫌に派手に公開される一方で、ババ・ホテップの明らかな質の作品がどこかの棚に眠ってしまうのは、私を苛立たせ、悲しくさせます。
back_translation: While Martin Lawrence's latest work is being flamboyantly released on 2,500 screens, the obvious quality of Bubba Ho-Tep is left to collect dust on some shelf, which frustrates and saddens me.

text: it has the requisite faux-urban vibe and hotter-two-years-ago rap and r & b names and references .
translation: それには必要なフェイク・アーバンの雰囲気と、2年前に流行したホットなラップやR&Bの名前や言及があります。
back_translation: It includes the necessary fake urban atmosphere and references to hot rap and R&B names that became popular two years ago.

text: the tonal shifts are jolting , and though wen 's messages are profound and thoughtfully delivered , more thorough transitions would have made the film more cohesive .
translation: トーンの変化は突然であり、ウェンのメッセージは深く、思慮深く届けられているものの、より徹底した移行があれば映画はより一貫性を持ったものになっただろう。
back_translation: The change in tone is abrupt, and although Wen's message is delivered deeply and thoughtfully, the film would have been more coherent with a more thorough transition.

text: she bets ( against all logic ) to be able to build a new palace for caesar within three months .
translation: 彼女は（すべての論理に反して）シーザーのために3ヶ月以内に新しい宮殿を建設できると賭けています。
back_translation: She is betting that she can build a new palace for Caesar within three months, contrary to all logic.

text: yet , while all this is going on , sauron 's troops mass toward the city of gondor , for the war of the ring is about to begin .
translation: しかし、これらすべてが進行している間、サウロンの軍隊はゴンドールの都市に集結している。指輪の戦争が始まろうとしているのだ。
back_translation: However, while all of this is happening, Sauron's army is gathering in the city of Gondor. The war of the Ring is about to begin.

text: the movie straddles the fence between escapism and social commentary , and on both sides it falls short .
translation: その映画はエスケープ主義と社会的コメントの間で揺れ動いており、どちらの側でも失敗しています。
back_translation: The movie wavers between escapism and social commentary, failing on both sides.

text: no amount of good acting is enough to save oleander 's uninspired story .
translation: どんなに良い演技をしても、オレアンダーの無気力なストーリーを救うことはできない。
back_translation: No matter how great the performance is, it cannot save the lackluster story of Oleander.

text: a superfluous sequel . . . plagued by that old familiar feeling of 'let 's get this thing over with ' : everyone has shown up at the appointed time and place , but visible enthusiasm is mighty hard to find .
translation: 余計な続編 . . . 「これを終わらせよう」という古くからの馴染みのある感情に悩まされている：皆、指定された時間と場所に集まったが、目に見える熱意は非常に見つけにくい。
back_translation: Unnecessary sequels... I am troubled by the familiar old feeling of "let's just end this": Everyone gathered at the designated time and place, but visible enthusiasm is very hard to find.

text: one whom he could never love and one whom he could never stop loving . . .
translation: 愛することは決してできない人と、愛し続けることが決してできない人と…
back_translation: Those who can never love, and those who can never continue to love...

text: why sit through a crummy , wannabe-hip crime comedy that refers incessantly to old movies , when you could just rent those movies instead , let alone seek out a respectable new one ?
translation: なぜ古い映画にしきりに言及する質の悪い、気取りの犯罪コメディを見続けるのか？そんなことをするくらいなら、その映画をレンタルするか、きちんとした新作を探した方がいいのでは？
back_translation: Why do you keep watching this low-quality, pretentious crime comedy that frequently references old movies? Wouldn't it be better to rent those films or look for a proper new release instead?

text: little do they know that these pirates are cursed .
translation: 彼らはこれらの海賊が呪われていることをほとんど知らない。
back_translation: They hardly know that these pirates are cursed.

text: when johnny and lena are stumped , they turn to wayne . . . but
translation: ジョニーとレーナが行き詰まったとき、彼らはウェインに頼りますが……
back_translation: When Johnny and Lena find themselves at a dead end, they rely on Wayne...

text: a tough go , but leigh 's depth and rigor , and his skill at inspiring accomplished portrayals that are all the more impressive for their lack of showiness , offsets to a notable degree the film 's often-mined and despairing milieu .
translation: 厳しい展開ではあるが、リーの深さと厳格さ、そして装飾のないにもかかわらず印象深い表現を引き出すスキルは、しばしば掘り起こされ絶望的な雰囲気を持つこの映画の要素をかなりの程度上回っている。
back_translation: Although the development is harsh, Lee's depth and rigor, along with the skill to elicit an unembellished yet powerful expression, often surpass the elements of this film, which are often unearthed and possess a desperate atmosphere.

text: it looks closely , insightfully at fragile , complex relationships .
translation: それは脆弱で複雑な関係を詳細に、洞察深く見つめています。
back_translation: It examines the fragile and complex relationship in detail, with deep insights.

text: tabloid journalist annika bengtzon is writing about a murder in the port of stockholm and she suspects that the yugoslav mafia is involved .
translation: タブロイドジャーナリストのアンニカ・ベングトソンはストックホルムの港で発生した殺人事件について執筆しており、ユーゴスラビアのマフィアが関与しているのではないかと疑っています。
back_translation: Tabloid journalist Annika Bengtsson is writing about a murder that occurred in the port of Stockholm and suspects that the Yugoslavian mafia may be involved.

text: `` dreamcatcher `` tells the story of four young friends who perform a heroic act - and are changed forever by the uncanny powers they gain in return .
translation: `` ドリームキャッチャー `` は、英雄的な行為を行う四人の若い友人たちの物語であり、彼らがその見えない力を得ることで永遠に変わってしまいます。
back_translation: "DREAM CATCHER" is a story about four young friends who perform heroic acts and are forever changed by gaining an invisible power.

text: his dog is missing and he suspects the people at work might be behind it .
translation: 彼の犬が行方不明で、彼は職場の人々が背後にいるのではないかと疑っています。
back_translation: His dog is missing, and he suspects that people at his workplace might be behind it.

text: an undercover narc dies , the investigation stalls , so the detroit p . d .
translation: 潜入捜査官が死亡し、捜査が行き詰まるため、デトロイト市警が
back_translation: A narcotics officer has died, and the investigation has hit a dead end, so the Detroit Police Department...

text: a simple , sometimes maddeningly slow film that has just enough charm and good acting to make it interesting , but is ultimately pulled under by the pacing and lack of creativity within .
translation: シンプルで、時にはイライラするほど遅い映画で、魅力と良い演技が十分にあり興味を引くが、最終的にはペースの遅さとクリエイティビティの欠如によって引きずり込まれてしまう。
back_translation: A simple movie that is sometimes frustratingly slow, filled with charm and good performances that capture interest, but ultimately gets dragged down by its slow pace and lack of creativity.

text: even if you 've seen `` stomp `` ( the stage show ) , you still have to see this !
translation: たとえ「ストンプ」（ステージショー）を見たことがあっても、これを見るべきです！
back_translation: Even if you have seen "Stomp" (the stage show), you should still see this!

text: they swore to have their unborn babies get married when they grew up .
translation: 彼らは、まだ生まれていない赤ちゃんが大きくなったときに結婚することを誓った。
back_translation: They vowed to marry when the unborn baby grows up.

text: the volatile dynamics of female friendship is the subject of this unhurried , low-key film that is so off-hollywood that it seems positively french in its rhythms and resonance .
translation: 女性の友情の変わりやすいダイナミクスは、こののんびりとした控えめな映画のテーマであり、そのリズムや響きが非常にフランス的であるため、まるでハリウッドとはかけ離れた作品のように感じられます。
back_translation: The changing dynamics of female friendship are the theme of this laid-back, understated film, and its rhythm and resonance feel distinctly French, making it seem like a work far removed from Hollywood.

text: the ring is worth a look , if you do n't demand much more than a few cheap thrills from your halloween entertainment .
translation: リングは、一晩のハロウィーンの楽しみからあまり多くを求めないのであれば、見る価値があります。
back_translation: If you're not expecting too much from a night's Halloween fun, the ring is worth watching.

text: by providing a dynamic expression of the struggles and celebrations of the expatriate lifestyle , leela has the potential to be a crossover film - popular among expatriate south asians and mainstream english speaking audiences the world over .
translation: リラは、海外生活の苦悩や喜びをダイナミックに表現することで、海外在住の南アジア人や、世界中の主流英語を話す観客に人気のあるクロスオーバー映画になる可能性を秘めています。
back_translation: Rira has the potential to become a popular crossover film among South Asians living abroad and mainstream English-speaking audiences around the world by dynamically expressing the struggles and joys of living overseas.

text: after all , she is the woman of his dreams .
translation: 結局、彼女は彼の夢の女性です。
back_translation: In the end, she is the woman of his dreams.

text: depressive , slow , darkly funny , unyielding in its formal rigor , and unsettlingly beautiful .
translation: 抑うつ的で、ゆっくりとした、暗いユーモアを持ち、形式の厳格さに妥協せず、 unsettlingly 美しい。
back_translation: Depressive, slow, with dark humor, uncompromising in the rigor of form, and unsettlingly beautiful.

text: it 's a talking head documentary , but a great one .
translation: それはトーキングヘッドのドキュメンタリーですが、素晴らしいものです。
back_translation: It's a documentary about Talking Heads, and it's wonderful.

text: in 1975 , as the vietnam war was ending , thousands of orphans and amerasian children were brought to the united states as part of `` operation babylift . ``
translation: 1975年、ベトナム戦争が終結する中、数千人の孤児やアメリカ人との混血の子供たちが「ベビリフト作戦」の一環としてアメリカに連れてこられました。
back_translation: In 1975, as the Vietnam War came to an end, thousands of orphans and children of mixed American and Vietnamese parentage were brought to the United States as part of Operation Babylift.

text: `` brown sugar `` admirably aspires to be more than another `` best man `` clone by weaving a theme throughout this funny film .
translation: 「ブラウンシュガー」は、この面白い映画を通じてテーマを織り交ぜることで、ただの「ベストマン」クローン以上のものを目指しています。
back_translation: "Brown Sugar" aims to be more than just a "Best Man" clone by weaving themes throughout this interesting film.

text: nothing can detract from the affection of that moral favorite : friends will be friends through thick and thin .
translation: その道徳的なお気に入りへの愛情を損なうものは何もありません：友は良い時も悪い時も友である。
back_translation: Nothing diminishes the love for that moral favorite: a friend is a friend in good times and bad.

text: incredibly , dionysus ' unarmed women defeat pentheus ' formidable royal army .
translation: 驚くべきことに、ディオニュソスの武装しない女性たちがペンテウスの formidable royal army を打ち負かします。
back_translation: Amazingly, the unarmed women of Dionysus defeat Pentheus's formidable royal army.

text: if you 've grown tired of going where no man has gone before , but several movies have - take heart . this is the best star trek movie in a long time .
translation: もしあなたが「誰も行ったことのない場所に行くこと」に疲れてしまったなら、しかしいくつかの映画がその場所に行ったので、心配しないでください。これは長い間の中で最高のスタートレック映画です。
back_translation: If you're tired of "going to places no one has been before," don't worry because some movies have already gone there. This is one of the best Star Trek movies of all time.

text: will lightman is a hip londoner who one day realizes that his friends are all involved with the responsibilities of married life and that leaves him alone in the cold .
translation: ウィル・ライトマンはロンドンのヒップな若者で、ある日友人たちが皆結婚生活の責任に関わっていることに気づき、彼だけが寒さの中に取り残されていることを実感します。
back_translation: Will Riteman is a hip young man in London who one day realizes that all his friends are involved in the responsibilities of married life, and he feels that he is the only one left out in the cold.

text: it seems like a perfect opportunity for kilo to get back to his family , but this job leads to a world of trouble for kilo after his release .
translation: それはキロが家族に戻るための完璧な機会のように見えますが、この仕事はキロの解放後に多くのトラブルを引き起こします。
back_translation: It seems like the perfect opportunity for Kiro to return to his family, but this job will cause a lot of trouble after Kiro's release.

text: finds a way to tell a simple story , perhaps the simplest story of all , in a way that seems compelling and even original .
translation: 最もシンプルな物語、あるいはすべての中で最もシンプルな物語を、魅力的かつ独創的に見える方法で語る方法を見つける。
back_translation: Find a way to tell the simplest story, or perhaps the simplest story of all, in a way that appears engaging and original.

text: sunk by way too much indulgence of scene-chewing , teeth-gnashing actorliness .
translation: シーンをかじりまくり、歯を食いしばるような演技に過度に indulgence して沈んだ。
back_translation: I bit down on the scene and sunk into an excessively indulgent performance that made me grit my teeth.

text: until she leaves to the kitchen and he finds out that under the bed a male shoe that does not belong to him is carefully hidden by a male hand , under his own eyes .
translation: 彼女が台所に行くまで、彼は自分の目の前で、彼には属さない男性の靴が、男性の手によって注意深くベッドの下に隠されているのを発見する。
back_translation: Until she goes to the kitchen, he discovers in front of his eyes that a man's shoes, belonging to a man, are being carefully hidden under the bed by a man's hands.

text: tired of his constant fixation on drinking and television , herk 's wife anna and daughter jenny decide to find new love interests in divorced dad eliot arnold and his son matt .
translation: 飲酒とテレビへの彼の絶え間ない執着に疲れたハークの妻アンナと娘ジェニーは、離婚した父親エリオット・アーノルドと彼の息子マットに新しい恋の相手を見つけることに決める。
back_translation: Tired of her husband Hark's constant obsession with drinking and television, his wife Anna and daughter Jenny decide to find new romantic partners for her divorced father Elliott Arnold and his son Matt.

text: a positively thrilling combination of ethnography and all the intrigue , betrayal , deceit and murder of a shakespearean tragedy or a juicy soap opera .
translation: エスノグラフィーとシェイクスピアの悲劇や魅力的なソープオペラのような陰謀、裏切り、欺瞞、殺人が組み合わさった、正にスリリングな体験。
back_translation: A thrilling experience that combines ethnography with the tragic elements and intriguing plots of Shakespeare's plays, filled with conspiracy, betrayal, deception, and murder.

text: cannon 's confidence and laid-back good spirits are , with the drumming routines , among the film 's saving graces .
translation: キャノンの自信とリラックスした良い雰囲気は、ドラム演奏のルーチンとともに、映画の救いの要素の一つです。
back_translation: Canon's confidence and relaxed good atmosphere, along with the drumming routine, are one of the elements that save the movie.

text: when she ventures to vietnam to meet her mother , she unknowingly embarks on an emotional pilgrimage that spans decades and distance .
translation: 彼女が母に会うためにベトナムに旅立つとき、彼女は知らず知らずのうちに何十年もの時間と距離を超えた感情的な巡礼に出ることになります。
back_translation: When she departs for Vietnam to see her mother, she unknowingly embarks on an emotional pilgrimage that transcends decades of time and distance.

text: scared and confused , frank and caroline must find their way back home , all the while avoiding danger at every turn .
translation: 怖くて混乱しながら、フランクとキャロラインは家への帰り道を見つけなければならず、その間にもあらゆる危険を避けなければならない。
back_translation: Feeling scared and confused, Frank and Caroline must find their way home while avoiding all sorts of dangers along the way.

text: the importance of being earnest resonates and inspires rapid-fire bouts of laughter , perhaps even a few giggles from the author himself , whom posterity has rewarded the last laugh .
translation: 『真面目が肝心』の重要性は共鳴し、急速な笑いの波を引き起こし、さらには著者自身からの笑い声も聞こえるかもしれません。そして、後世は彼に最後の笑いを贈りました。
back_translation: The importance of "seriousness is essential" resonates, causing a rapid wave of laughter, and you may even hear laughter from the author himself. And in later years, the world has given him the final laugh.

text: harrison 's flowers puts its heart in the right place , but its brains are in no particular place at all .
translation: 「ハリソンの花」は心は正しい場所にあるが、頭はどこにもない。
back_translation: "Harrison's Flowers" has its heart in the right place, but the head is nowhere to be found.

text: as adapted by kevin molony from simon leys ' novel `` the death of napoleon `` and directed by alan taylor , napoleon 's journey is interesting but his parisian rebirth is stillborn
translation: ケビン・モロニーがサイモン・レイズの小説「ナポレオンの死」から適応し、アラン・テイラーが監督したナポレオンの旅は興味深いが、彼のパリでの復活は未成熟である。
back_translation: Kevin Moroney's adaptation of Simon Leys' novel "The Death of Napoleon," directed by Alan Taylor, is intriguing, but his resurrection in Paris is underdeveloped.

text: the movie is a lumbering load of hokum but . . . it 's at least watchable .
translation: その映画は鈍重なホクムの塊ですが…少なくとも見る価値はあります。
back_translation: That movie is a hefty lump of dullness, but at least it's worth watching.

text: . . . ambition is in short supply in the cinema , and egoyan tackles his themes and explores his characters ' crises with seriousness and compassion .
translation: 映画界では野心が不足しており、エゴヤンは真剣さと同情を持ってテーマに取り組み、キャラクターの危機を探求しています。
back_translation: In the film industry, there is a lack of ambition, and Egoyan approaches themes with seriousness and empathy, exploring the crises of characters.

text: a documentary examining the december 2nd , 1999 assassination of microsoft ceo bill gates in los angeles , and the group of key players seeking to unravel the mystery of his alleged assassin as well as the circumstances surrounding his death .
translation: 1999年12月2日にロサンゼルスでマイクロソフトCEOビル・ゲイツが暗殺された事件を検証するドキュメンタリーで、彼の名目上の暗殺者や彼の死を取り巻く状況の謎を解明しようとする重要な関係者たちのグループを描いています。
back_translation: The documentary investigates the assassination of Microsoft CEO Bill Gates in Los Angeles on December 2, 1999, depicting a group of key individuals trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his alleged assassins and the circumstances of his death.

text: this orange has some juice , but it 's far from fresh-squeezed .
translation: このオレンジには少し果汁がありますが、新鮮に絞られたものとは程遠いです。
back_translation: This orange has a little juice, but it is far from freshly squeezed.

text: director dan verete uses his camera as the metaphoric needle , and his cast in each segment as his thread , to form a sweeping tapestry of mis-explanation and contention .
translation: 監督ダン・ヴェレテは、カメラを比喩的な針として、各セグメントのキャストを糸として使い、誤解と対立の広がるタペストリーを形成します。
back_translation: Director Dan Velety uses the camera as a metaphorical needle, using the cast of each segment as thread to form a tapestry woven with misunderstandings and conflicts.

text: it centers on inez macbeth ( dominique swain ) , a wisp of a girl just a shade over twenty , who may lack a formal education , but has already been taught plenty by life .
translation: それは、正式な教育は欠いているかもしれないが、すでに人生から多くを学んだ、20歳を少し過ぎた少女、イネズ・マクベス（ドミニク・スウェイン）を中心に展開します。
back_translation: It revolves around a girl named Inez Macbeth (Dominique Swain), who is just past 20 and may lack formal education, but has already learned a lot from life.

text: if you like quirky , odd movies and/or the ironic , here 's a fun one .
translation: もしあなたが奇妙で奇抜な映画やアイロニックなものが好きなら、これは楽しい作品です。
back_translation: If you enjoy bizarre and quirky movies or ironic content, this is a fun piece.

text: a fine documentary can be distinguished from a mediocre one by the better film 's ability to make its subject interesting to those who are n't part of its supposed target audience . judging by those standards , 'scratch ' is a pretty decent little documentary .
translation: 優れたドキュメンタリーは、平均的なものと区別されるのは、対象となる視聴者に含まれない人々にもそのテーマを興味深く感じさせる能力です。この基準で判断すると、『スクラッチ』はかなりまともなドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: An excellent documentary is distinguished from an average one by its ability to make the theme interesting even to those who are not part of the intended audience. Judged by this standard, "Scratch" is quite a decent documentary.

text: a very funny look at how another culture handles the process of courting and marriage .
translation: 異文化が求愛と結婚のプロセスをどのように扱うかを非常に面白く描いています。
back_translation: It depicts in a very interesting way how different cultures handle the processes of courtship and marriage.

text: at the last minute a cyber-friend arrives to join the battle .
translation: 最後の瞬間に、サイバーの友人が戦いに参加するために到着する。
back_translation: At the last moment, a cyber friend arrives to join the fight.

text: even if you do n't think [ kissinger 's ] any more guilty of criminal activity than most contemporary statesmen , he 'd sure make a courtroom trial great fun to watch .
translation: たとえあなたが[キッシンジャー]を現代の政治家たちよりも犯罪行為に対して罪がないと思っていても、彼の裁判は見るのが非常に楽しいものになるでしょう。
back_translation: Even if you believe that [Kissinger] is less culpable for crimes than modern politicians, his trial will be very enjoyable to watch.

text: when sang-woo 's mother finds work and finally returns for him , sang-woo has become a different boy .
translation: サンウの母が仕事を見つけて彼のために戻ってくると、サンウは以前とは違う男の子になっている。
back_translation: When Sunwoo's mother finds a job and comes back for him, Sunwoo has become a different boy than before.

text: women prisoners strike up a friendship with a young law student who works as a part-time prison guard .
translation: 女性囚人たちは、アルバイトの刑務官として働く若い法律学生と友情を結びます。
back_translation: Female prisoners form friendships with young law students working part-time as prison guards.

text: soledad , the desert artist who accompanies hilary home , hopes this trip will be the start of their new life together .
translation: ソレダードは、ヒラリーを家まで伴ってきた砂漠のアーティストであり、この旅行が二人の新しい人生の始まりになることを願っています。
back_translation: Soledad is a desert artist who accompanied Hillary home, hoping that this trip will mark the beginning of a new life for both of them.

text: consider the title 's clunk-on-the-head that suggests the overtime someone put in to come up with an irritatingly unimaginative retread concept .
translation: 「頭に響くようなタイトルは、うんざりするほど想像力に欠けたリメイクコンセプトを思いつくために誰かが費やした超過勤務を暗示している。」
back_translation: "A title that resonates in the mind suggests the overtime someone spent to come up with a thoroughly uninspired remake concept."

text: the people may be drawn comically , but the animals are rendered with skill and grace and the action scenes achieve true excitement .
translation: 人々はコミカルに描かれているかもしれませんが、動物は巧妙かつ優雅に表現されており、アクションシーンは本当の興奮を達成しています。
back_translation: While people may be depicted comically, the animals are expressed in a clever and elegant manner, and the action scenes achieve a real sense of excitement.

text: edgar becomes intent on laying down some new rules and turning his coddled son into someone who can take on the family farm .
translation: エドガーは新しいルールを制定し、甘やかされた息子を家族農場を継ぐことができるような人物に育てることに決意します。
back_translation: Edgar decides to establish new rules and to raise his spoiled son to be a person capable of taking over the family farm.

text: the trail twists and turns until the squad uncovers more than anyone would have ever given them credit for .
translation: トレイルは曲がりくねり、チームは誰もが彼らに予想しなかった以上のことを明らかにするまで続きます。
back_translation: The trail winds and continues until the team reveals more than anyone expected.

text: the underworld urban angst is derivative of martin scorsese 's taxi driver and goodfellas , but this film speaks for itself .
translation: アンダーワールドの都市のアンガストはマーティン・スコセッシの「タクシードライバー」と「グッドフェローズ」に派生していますが、この映画は自らを語っています。
back_translation: The city of Angust in the underworld is derived from Martin Scorsese's "Taxi Driver" and "Goodfellas," but this film tells its own story.

text: when he meets a beauty , renee ( izabella miko ) , who says she 's reincarnated he must confront his beliefs .
translation: 彼が美しい女性、ルネ（イザベラ・ミコ）に出会ったとき、彼女は自分が転生したと言い、彼は自分の信念と向き合わなければならなくなる。
back_translation: When he met the beautiful woman, Rune (Isabella Miko), she told him that she had been reincarnated, and he had to confront his beliefs.

text: and keeping their heads on their necks will become their main concern . . .
translation: そして、彼らの首に頭を乗せておくことが主な懸念となるでしょう……
back_translation: And the main concern will be to keep your head resting on their necks...

text: if you enjoy being rewarded by a script that assumes you are n't very bright , then blood work is for you .
translation: もしあなたが自分があまり賢くないと前提としたスクリプトによって報酬を得ることを楽しむのであれば、血液検査はあなたにぴったりです。
back_translation: If you enjoy earning rewards from a script that assumes you are not very smart, blood tests are perfect for you.

text: an entertaining documentary that freshly considers arguments the bard 's immortal plays were written by somebody else .
translation: バードの不朽の劇が他の誰かによって書かれたという論争を新たな視点で考察する、楽しいドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A fun documentary that explores the debate surrounding whether Bird's timeless play was written by someone else from a new perspective.

text: we open on the main character alex , a chef , put out by her effort for the shower and struggling with her desire to make things `` picture-perfect . ``
translation: 私たちは、主役のシェフであるアレックスが、シャワーの準備に疲れ果て、完璧なものを作りたいという欲望と格闘している場面から始まります。
back_translation: We begin with the scene where our main chef, Alex, is exhausted from preparing for the shower and is struggling with the desire to create something perfect.

text: city by the sea is the cinematic equivalent of defensive driving : it 's careful , conscientious and makes no major mistakes . but what saves lives on the freeway does not necessarily make for persuasive viewing .
translation: 海辺の街は防御運転の映画的な equivalent です。それは慎重で、良心的で、大きなミスを犯しません。しかし、高速道路で命を救うものが、必ずしも説得力のある鑑賞を提供するわけではありません。
back_translation: The seaside town is the cinematic equivalent of defensive driving. It is cautious, conscientious, and does not make big mistakes. However, what saves lives on the highway does not necessarily provide a compelling viewing experience.

text: it may be an easy swipe to take , but this barbershop just does n't make the cut .
translation: それは簡単に選べるかもしれませんが、この理髪店はただ満足できません。
back_translation: It may be easy to choose, but this barbershop just doesn't satisfy.

text: tim plans to spend his 21st birthday at his scottish estate with eight of his closest friends .
translation: ティムは、彼のスコットランドの邸宅で親しい友人8人と一緒に21歳の誕生日を過ごす予定です。
back_translation: Tim is scheduled to celebrate his 21st birthday with 8 close friends at his estate in Scotland.

text: as the police try to piece together what happened , the convoluted relationship between a young woman and her two suitors gradually emerges .
translation: 警察が何が起こったのかを解明しようとしている間、若い女性と彼女の二人の求婚者との複雑な関係が徐々に明らかになっていく。
back_translation: As the police try to uncover what happened, the complex relationship between a young woman and her two suitors gradually becomes clear.

text: it 's been 13 months and 295 preview screenings since i last walked out on a movie , but resident evil really earned my indignant , preemptive departure .
translation: 最後に映画を観て出て行ったのは13ヶ月と295回の試写会前でしたが、『バイオハザード』は本当に私の憤慨した先行退場を正当化しました。
back_translation: The last time I watched a movie and left was before 13 months and 295 preview screenings, but "Resident Evil" truly justified my indignant early exit.

text: he needs their help , figuring out why the vacationers are leaving mellow and sober .
translation: 彼は休暇を楽しんでいる人々が落ち着いていて酔っていない理由を見つけるために彼らの助けが必要です。
back_translation: He needs their help to find out why the people enjoying their vacation are calm and not drunk.

text: the plot goes on with a lot of action scenes and many revelations , following the comic books .
translation: プロットは、漫画本に従い、多くのアクションシーンと多くの真実が明らかになる形で進んでいきます。
back_translation: The plot progresses in accordance with the comic book, featuring many action scenes and revealing many truths.

text: in all , this is a watchable movie that 's not quite the memorable experience it might have been .
translation: 全体として、これは見る価値のある映画ですが、それが持つべき思い出深い体験ではありません。
back_translation: Overall, this is a movie worth watching, but it is not a memorable experience it should have.

text: his surrounding is a peaceful dreamplace called `` shangri-la `` .
translation: 彼の周りは「シャングリラ」と呼ばれる平和な夢の場所です。
back_translation: Around him is a peaceful, dream-like place called "Shangri-La."

text: adam sandler is to gary cooper what a gnat is to a racehorse .
translation: アダム・サンドラーはゲイリー・クーパーに対して、ノミは競走馬に対するようなものだ。
back_translation: Adam Sandler said that a nomi is like a racehorse to Gary Cooper.

text: but all their training could n't have prepared them for what they were going to encounter . . .
translation: しかし、彼らのすべての訓練は、彼らが直面することになるものに備えることはできなかっただろう。
back_translation: However, all of their training would not have been able to prepare them for what they would face.

text: grief is awkward and funny and strange sometimes . so is moonlight mile .
translation: 悲しみは時に気まずく、面白く、奇妙なものです。ムーンライト・マイルもそうです。
back_translation: Sadness can sometimes be awkward, amusing, and strange. The same goes for Moonlight Mile.

text: henceforth , he will meet with unexpected situations that give him the idea for the perfect counterpoint in his plot of the absurd .
translation: 今後、彼は彼の不条理なプロットの完璧な対位法のアイデアを与える予期しない状況に出会うことになります。
back_translation: In the future, he will encounter unexpected circumstances that will give him ideas for the perfect counterpoint to his absurd plot.

text: the fate of the earth depends on the tournaments outcome .
translation: 地球の運命はトーナメントの結果にかかっています。
back_translation: The fate of the Earth rests on the outcome of the tournament.

text: however , ruby 's encounters suffer from impotence and unexplained rashes .
translation: ただし、ルビーの遭遇は無力感と説明のつかない発疹に悩まされています。
back_translation: However, Ruby is struggling with feelings of helplessness and an unexplained rash.

text: christin has been working at a hotel owned by budcasso , her friend 's fianc & # 233 ; .
translation: クリスティンは友人の婚約者であるバドカッソの所有するホテルで働いています。
back_translation: Kristin works at a hotel owned by Budcasso, who is her friend's fiancé.

text: van wilder does n't bring anything new to the proverbial table , but it does possess a coherence absent in recent crass-a-thons like tomcats , freddy got fingered , and slackers .
translation: ヴァン・ワイルダーは比喩的なテーブルに新しいものを持ち込まないが、『トムキャッツ』や『フレディの指を突っ込む』、そして『スラッカーズ』のような最近の下品な映画には欠けている一貫性を持っている。
back_translation: Van Wilder doesn’t bring anything new to the metaphorical table, but he has a consistency that is lacking in recent vulgar films like "Tomcats," "Freddy Got Fingered," and "Slacker."

text: although they do n't even exchange glances he tells his friend of a love at first sight relationship between himself and the beautiful veronique .
translation: 彼らはお互いに目を合わせることもないが、彼は友人に自分と美しいヴェロニクとの一目惚れの関係について語る。
back_translation: They don’t even make eye contact with each other, but he tells his friends about his love at first sight with the beautiful Véronique.

text: the creators of visas and virtue ( 1997 academy award winner , best live action short film ) have embarked on a new journey - the production of independence day .
translation: 「ビザと美徳」のクリエイター（1997年アカデミー賞受賞、最優秀ライブアクション短編映画）が新たな旅に乗り出しました - 「インデペンデンス・デイ」の制作です。
back_translation: The creator of "Visa and Virtue" (winner of the 1997 Academy Award for Best Live Action Short Film) has embarked on a new journey - the production of "Independence Day."

text: chasm is a black comedy , set in a time when trading body parts has become commonplace and blinding light and torrential rain overpower the land .
translation: 「キャズム」はブラックコメディであり、身体の部位を取引することが一般的になった時代を舞台にしており、眩い光と豪雨が土地を圧倒しています。
back_translation: "Chasm" is a black comedy set in an era where trading body parts has become commonplace, and dazzling light and heavy rain overwhelm the land.

text: everything was as superficial as the forced new jersey lowbrow accent uma had .
translation: すべては、ウマが持っていた強制的なニュージャージーの低俗なアクセントと同じように表面的でした。
back_translation: Everything was superficial, just like the forced vulgar accent that the horse had from New Jersey.

text: if this movie belonged to a sorority , it would be called beta alpha delta .

text: `` garmento `` tells the other side of the story , with a dark and satirical look at new york 's wholesale garment industry , where shady deals are made for a buck and ruthlessness is a prerequisite for career success .
translation: 「ガーメント」は、ニューヨークの卸売衣料業界の別の側面を描いており、暗く風刺的な視点で、金のために不正な取引が行われ、キャリア成功のためには冷酷さが必須とされる世界を描いています。
back_translation: "Garment" depicts another aspect of the wholesale clothing industry in New York, portraying a darkly satirical view of a world where unethical dealings are conducted for money and ruthlessness is deemed essential for career success.

text: warren is the outrageous gay hairdresser , alex the shy assistant , steven - the smarmy client and gary , the photographer on the verge of a nervous breakdown .
translation: ウォーレンは派手なゲイの美容師、アレックスは内気なアシスタント、スティーブンはぺこぺこのお客さん、そしてゲイリーは神経の崩壊寸前のカメラマンです。
back_translation: Warren is a flamboyant gay hairdresser, Alex is a shy assistant, Stephen is an overly eager customer, and Gary is a photographer on the verge of a nervous breakdown.

text: the characters search for meaning in capricious , even dangerous sexual urges . the irony is that the only selfless expression of love may be the failure to consummate it .
translation: キャラクターたちは気まぐれで、時には危険な性的欲望の中で意味を探しています。皮肉なことに、愛の唯一の無私の表現は、それを成就させないことかもしれません。
back_translation: The characters are whimsical and sometimes search for meaning in dangerous sexual desires. Ironically, the only selfless expression of love may be not fulfilling it.

text: william baldwin and jodi lyn o'keefe of 'halloween : h20 ' fame are both set to star in a new movie playing as brother and sister who travel to their family 's ancestral mansion after their father 's death .
translation: 『ハロウィン：H20』で名を馳せたウィリアム・ボールドウィンとジョディ・リン・オキーフが、父の死後に家族の祖先のマンションに向かう兄妹を演じる新しい映画に出演することが決定しました。
back_translation: William Baldwin and Jodi Lyn O'Keefe, known for their roles in "Halloween: H20," have been confirmed to star in a new film where they play siblings heading to their family's ancestral mansion after their father's death.

text: but though his tortillas are scrumptious , his enchiladas devine , isidor has never made a dime .
translation: しかし、彼のトルティーヤは美味しく、エンチラーダは絶品ですが、イシドロは一銭も稼いだことがありません。
back_translation: However, his tortillas are delicious, and the enchiladas are exquisite, but Isidoro has never made a single penny.

text: comes off like a bad imitation of the bard .

text: this ecologically minded , wildlife friendly film teaches good ethics while entertaining with its unconventionally wacky but loving family
translation: この環境に配慮した野生動物に優しい映画は、変わったユーモアを持ちながらも愛情深い家族を通じて、良い倫理を教えてくれます。

text: he encounters woody , a tow truck driver who sends him down a dead-end that is the black road .

text: soon after , however , his ex loses her tv show , and comes back home , looking to reunite .

text: diaz , applegate , blair and posey are suitably kooky which should appeal to women and they strip down often enough to keep men alert , if not amused .
translation: ディアズ、アプレゲート、ブレア、そしてポージーは適度にクールなキャラクターであり、女性にアピールするはずです。また、男性の注意を引くために十分に脱衣することもありますが、必ずしも面白がらせるわけではありません。
back_translation: Diaz, Applegate, Blair, and Posey are moderately cool characters who should appeal to women. They also occasionally undress enough to attract the attention of men, but that doesn't necessarily make them entertaining.

text: the guy really wants this girl named christina who has a similar number so samantha decides she 'd better track this chick down before the guy does .
translation: その男はクリスティーナという名前の女の子を本当に気に入っていて、クリスティーナの電話番号が似ているので、サマンサはその女の子を男より先に見つけた方がいいと思うことにします。
back_translation: The man really likes a girl named Cristina, and since Cristina's phone number is similar, Samantha thinks it would be better for her to find the girl before the man does.

text: glib , satirical documentary that fudges facts , makes facile points and engages in the cinematic equivalent of tabloid journalism .
translation: 軽薄で皮肉的なドキュメンタリーで、事実を曲げ、安易な主張をし、タブロイドジャーナリズムの映画的な同等物に従事しています。
back_translation: It is a superficial and ironic documentary that distorts facts, makes easy claims, and engages in the cinematic equivalent of tabloid journalism.

text: amid the new populist comedies that underscore the importance of family tradition and familial community , one would be hard-pressed to find a movie with a bigger , fatter heart than barbershop .
translation: 家族の伝統と家族コミュニティの重要性を強調する新しいポピュリストコメディの中で、バーバーショップよりも大きく、太い心を持つ映画を見つけるのは難しいだろう。
back_translation: It would be hard to find a movie that emphasizes the importance of family traditions and community with a bigger, bolder heart than a barbershop in the new populist comedy.

text: the pacing is often way off and there are too many bona fide groaners among too few laughs .
translation: ペースはしばしばずれており、笑いが少ない中で本物のつまらないシーンが多すぎます。
back_translation: The pace is often off, and there are too many genuinely boring scenes with little laughter.

text: grant is certainly amusing , but the very hollowness of the character he plays keeps him at arms length
translation: グラントは確かに面白いですが、彼が演じるキャラクターの非常に空虚さが彼を距離を置かせています。
back_translation: Grant is certainly interesting, but the very emptiness of the character he portrays keeps him at a distance.

text: `` the true story of holmes and his young lover 's involvement in the scandalous laurel canyon murders which shook hollywood in the early 1980 's `` .
translation: `` ホームズと彼の若い愛人が1980年代初頭にハリウッドを揺るがした物議を醸すローレルキャニオン殺人事件に関与した真実の物語 ``
back_translation: "The true story of Holmes and his young lover involved in the controversial Laurel Canyon murder case that shook Hollywood in the early 1980s."

text: human nature talks the talk , but it fails to walk the silly walk that distinguishes the merely quirky from the surreal .
translation: 人間の本性は言葉で語るが、単なる風変わりなものと超現実的なものを区別するばかげた歩き方を歩むことには失敗する。
back_translation: The nature of humans speaks through words, but it fails in the ridiculous way of distinguishing between mere eccentricities and the surreal.

text: carlos works in the east village as an inker of comics , but is developing his own project he hopes to sell to a well-known publisher .
translation: カーロスはイーストビレッジで漫画のインカーとして働いていますが、著名な出版社に売り込むことを希望する自身のプロジェクトを進めています。
back_translation: Carlos is working as a comic inker in the East Village, but he is pursuing his own project that he hopes to pitch to a prominent publisher.

text: . . . while certainly clever in spots , this too-long , spoofy update of shakespeare 's macbeth does n't sustain a high enough level of invention .
translation: 部分的には確かに巧妙ですが、この長すぎるシェイクスピアのマクベスのスプーフィーな更新版は、十分な創造性を維持できていません。
back_translation: While it is certainly clever in parts, this overly long spoof update of Shakespeare's Macbeth fails to maintain enough creativity.

text: her mother , ingrid , is a beautiful , free-spirited poet .
translation: 彼女の母、イングリッドは、美しく自由な精神の詩人です。

text: what lifts the film high above run-of-the-filth gangster flicks is its refusal to recognise any of the signposts , as if discovering a way through to the bitter end without a map .
translation: その映画がありふれたギャング映画を超えて高く持ち上げるのは、道しるべを一切認めないという拒絶であり、まるで地図なしで苦い結末への道を見つけ出すかのようです。
back_translation: What elevates the film beyond an ordinary gangster movie is its rejection of any signposts, as if it’s discovering the bitter path to its conclusion without a map.

text: the plot mechanics of read my lips eventually kind of spin into a fairly conventional thriller , but the wildly talented cassel and the unconventionally alluring devos give this movie a unique feel .
translation: 『リード・マイ・リップス』のプロットメカニクスは最終的にはかなり伝統的なスリラーに展開しますが、非常に才能のあるカッセルと、独特の魅力を持つデヴォスがこの映画に独自の雰囲気を与えています。
back_translation: The plot mechanics of "Read My Lips" ultimately unfold into a rather traditional thriller, but the very talented Cassel and the uniquely charismatic Devos give the film its own distinct atmosphere.

text: but god knows of this evil and sends a protector , an unlikely angel to watch over her .
translation: しかし神はこの悪を知っており、彼女を見守るために保護者、予期せぬ天使を送りました。
back_translation: However, God knew about this evil and sent a guardian, an unexpected angel, to watch over her.

text: divan follows the filmmaker 's effort to retrieve a turn-of-the-century family heir loom - a couch .
translation: ディヴァンは、20世紀初頭の家族の宝物であるソファを取り戻そうとする映画制作者の努力を追います。

text: they are all confronted with the consequences of their selfish actions .

translation: 自分の世界を恐れている男だけが、それを変える装置を作ることができる。

text: if a horror movie 's primary goal is to frighten and disturb , then they works spectacularly well . . . a shiver-inducing , nerve-rattling ride .
translation: 恐怖映画の主な目的が恐怖と不安を引き起こすことであれば、それは見事に成功しています。…ぞっとするような、神経をもみほぐすような体験です。
back_translation: If the main purpose of horror movies is to evoke fear and anxiety, then it succeeds brilliantly. It is a chilling, nerve-wracking experience.

text: not a moment will go by when he is n't on camera , whether at work or at home .
translation: 仕事中でも自宅でも、彼がカメラに映っていない瞬間はありません。

text: we live in world of sorrow and pain but all it takes is one person unafraid to make a difference .

text: belleza , magia , poder , amor , misterio , y gran gran mM-zsica y visuales . . . M- ? quM-i mM-as se puede pedir ? . . .

text: narrative may be looser than baby teeth , but amy 's orgasm is such a verbosely in-depth exploration of female sensuality and identity .

text: a puzzle whose pieces do not fit . some are fascinating and others are not , and in the end , it is almost a good movie .
translation: 合わないピースのパズル。魅力的なものもあればそうでないものもあり、最終的にはほぼ良い映画になっている。

text: 'divertida , enternecedora , universal y profundamente sincera , es una de las mejores comedias romM-anticas en mucho tiempo . una verdadera delicia . '

back_translation: "Fun, heartwarming, universal, and deeply sincere; this is one of the best romantic comedies in a long time. It's truly a wonderful piece of work."

text: a smart , provocative drama that does the nearly impossible : it gets under the skin of a man we only know as an evil , monstrous lunatic .
translation: 賢く挑発的なドラマで、ほぼ不可能なことを成し遂げています。それは、私たちが悪で怪物のような狂人としてしか知らない男の心の奥深くに迫ることです。
back_translation: It is a clever and provocative drama that achieves what seems almost impossible. It delves deep into the heart of a man whom we only know as evil and a monstrous madman.

text: its story about a young chinese woman , ah na , who has come to new york city to replace past tragedy with the american dream is one that any art-house moviegoer is likely to find compelling .
translation: 若い中国の女性、アナが過去の悲劇をアメリカンドリームで置き換えるためにニューヨーク市にやって来るという物語は、アートハウス映画の観客が魅力を感じる可能性のあるものです。
back_translation: The story of a young Chinese woman, Anna, who comes to New York City to replace her past tragedy with the American Dream, is something that art house film audiences might find appealing.

text: though lan yu lacks a sense of dramatic urgency , the film makes up for it with a pleasing verisimilitude .

text: horace seeks the repair of his masculine identity damaged by a partner who wo n't make love to him .

text: ricky rides her motorcycle among real and imagined dangers , to arrive unscathed , but unalterably changed , at the end of summer .
translation: リッキーは、現実と想像上の危険の中をバイクで走り抜け、無傷で夏の終わりにたどり着くが、変わることなくはない。

text: it 's like an all-star salute to disney 's cheesy commercialism .

text: audiences can be expected to suspend their disbelief only so far -- and that does not include the 5 o'clock shadow on the tall wooden kid as he skips off to school .
translation: 観客は、不信を一時的にでも引き延ばすことができると期待されますが、それには背の高い木製の子供が学校へ跳ねていく際の5時の影は含まれていません。
back_translation: The audience is expected to temporarily prolong their disbelief, but this does not include the 5 o'clock shadow of a tall wooden child bouncing off to school.

text: not a film to rival to live , but a fine little amuse-bouche to keep your appetite whetted .
translation: 生きるに匹敵する映画ではないが、食欲をそそるための素晴らしい小さなアミューズブーシュである。

text: thekids will probably stay amused at the kaleidoscope of big , colorful characters . mom and dad can catch some quality naptime along the way .
translation: 子供たちはおそらく、大きくてカラフルなキャラクターの万華鏡に夢中になるでしょう。お父さんとお母さんは、その間に質の高い昼寝をすることができます。
back_translation: The children will probably be fascinated by the large, colorful character kaleidoscope. Meanwhile, dad and mom can enjoy a quality nap.

text: the end is n't just being yourself all it takes to find your niche ?

translation: このテストは、読むこと、書くこと、または算数の能力を測定するものではありません。

text: on the day of the trial someone intends to blow up the courthouse and kill harper in the process .
translation: 裁判の日、誰かが裁判所を爆破し、その過程でハーパーを殺すつもりです。

text: a retired american emerald smuggler must go to rio to find and save his daughter , unknown to him from an affair 15 years earlier , and finish off a smuggling deal with a ruthless child-torturing drug lord .
translation: 退職したアメリカのエメラルド密売人は、15年前の不倫から生まれた娘を見つけて救うためにリオに向かう。そして、無慈悲な子供を拷問する麻薬王との密売契約を終わらせなければならない。
back_translation: A retired American emerald smuggler heads to Rio to find and save the daughter he fathered 15 years ago through an affair. He must also terminate a smuggling contract with a ruthless drug lord who tortures children.

text: a special kind of movie , this melancholic film noir reminded me a lot of memento . . .
translation: 特別な種類の映画で、このメランコリックなフィルム・ノワールは「メメント」を非常に思い出させました。
back_translation: It's a special kind of film, and this melancholic film noir strongly reminded me of "Memento."

text: because he is in debt , dewey poses as his roommate , a substitute teacher , and gets a job teaching a 4th grade class .
translation: デューイは借金を抱えているため、ルームメイトとして偽りの身分を名乗り、代替教師として4年生のクラスを教える仕事を得る。
back_translation: Dewey, burdened with debt, assumes a false identity as a roommate and manages to secure a job teaching a fourth-grade class as a substitute teacher.

text: birot creates a drama with such a well-defined sense of place and age -- as in , 15 years old -- that the torments and angst become almost as operatic to us as they are to her characters .
translation: birotは、15歳という年代と場所の感覚が非常に明確に定義されたドラマを作り上げており、その苦悩や不安は登場人物たちにとってだけでなく、私たちにとってもほとんどオペラのようなものになります。
back_translation: birot creates a drama where the sense of age and place at 15 years old is very clearly defined, and the struggles and anxieties become almost operatic, not just for the characters but for us as well.

text: and the date of his life turns out to be more than tony bargained for .
translation: 彼の人生の日付は、トニーが予想していた以上のものであることがわかる。
back_translation: It is clear that the dates of his life exceed what Tony had anticipated.

text: < p class= `` plotpar `` > for close to 20 years < a href= `` /name ? holmes , % 20john `` > john
translation: < p class= `` plotpar `` > 約20年間 < a href= `` /name ? holmes , % 20john `` > ジョン
back_translation: About 20 years John

text: how this one escaped the lifetime network i 'll never know .
translation: これはどうしてライフタイムネットワークから逃れたのか、私には全くわかりません。
back_translation: I have no idea why this escaped from the Lifetime Network.

text: also henry coville , an inscrutable professional whiskey-runner , and rat kinneson , quebec bill 's perpetually disconsolate hired man .
translation: ヘンリー・コヴィル、不可解なプロのウイスキー密売人と、クベック・ビルの常に悲しげな雇われ人ラット・キネソン。
back_translation: Henry Cobble, the enigmatic professional whiskey smuggler, and Rat Kinison, the perpetually melancholic hired hand in Quebec Bill.

text: the movie 's vision of a white american zealously spreading a puritanical brand of christianity to south seas islanders is one only a true believer could relish .
translation: 映画の中で、白人アメリカ人が南海の島々に清教徒的なキリスト教を熱心に広める姿は、真の信者でなければ楽しめないものです。
back_translation: In the movie, the portrayal of white Americans zealously spreading Puritan Christianity in the South Sea islands is something that only true believers can enjoy.

text: first good , then bothersome . excellent acting and direction .
translation: 最初は良かったが、その後は煩わしくなった。素晴らしい演技と演出。
back_translation: It was good at first, but then it became bothersome. Wonderful performance and direction.

text: eddie is a `` normal `` dad , who loves life , his job and most of all family .
translation: エディは「普通の」父親で、人生、仕事、そして何より家族を愛しています。
back_translation: Eddie is a "normal" father who loves life, work, and above all, his family.

text: this dreadfully earnest inversion of the concubine love triangle eschews the previous film 's historical panorama and roiling pathos for bug-eyed mugging and gay-niche condescension .
translation: このひどく誠実な愛妾のラブトライアングルの逆転は、前作の歴史的なパノラマや波乱に満ちた悲しみを避け、目を大きく見開いた表情とゲイニッチに対する軽蔑的な態度に置き換えている。
back_translation: The reversal of this terribly sincere mistress's love triangle avoids the historical panorama and tumultuous sorrow of the previous work, replacing them with wide-eyed expressions and a contemptuous attitude toward the gay niche.

text: astonishingly skillful and moving . . . it could become a historically significant work as well as a masterfully made one .
translation: 驚くほど巧妙で感動的です……これは歴史的に重要な作品になる可能性があり、かつ見事に作られたものでもあります。
back_translation: It is incredibly clever and moving... This has the potential to become a historically significant work, and it is also beautifully crafted.

text: [ reno ] delivers a monologue that manages to incorporate both the horror and the absurdity of the situation in a well-balanced fashion .
translation: [リノ]は状況の恐怖と不条理をうまくバランスをとって組み込んだモノローグを披露します。
back_translation: [Reino] presents a monologue that skillfully balances the fears and absurdities of the situation.

text: as each wait for a bus to new york city it is soon clear they are both hiding dark secrets while running from the past .
translation: それぞれがニューヨーク行きのバスを待っていると、二人が過去から逃げながら暗い秘密を抱えていることがすぐに明らかになる。
back_translation: As they wait for the bus to New York, it quickly becomes clear that the two of them are running away from the past while harboring dark secrets.

text: transcends its agenda to deliver awe-inspiring , at times sublime , visuals and offer a fascinating glimpse into the subculture of extreme athletes whose derring-do puts the x into the games .
translation: そのアジェンダを超え、驚くべき、時には崇高なビジュアルを提供し、極限のアスリートのサブカルチャーの魅力的な一端を覗き見ることができる。彼らの大胆不敵さは、ゲームに「x」をもたらす。
back_translation: Beyond that agenda, it offers remarkable, sometimes sublime visuals, providing a glimpse into the captivating side of the extreme athlete subculture. Their audacity brings an "x" factor to the game.

text: the only problem is that `` the tooth fairy `` is getting inside information about graham and his family from none other than dr . lecter .
translation: 唯一の問題は「歯の妖精」がグレアムと彼の家族についての内部情報を、他でもないハンニバル・レクター博士から得ていることだ。
back_translation: The only problem is that the "tooth fairy" has obtained insider information about Graham and his family from none other than Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

text: the affectionate loopiness that once seemed congenital to demme 's perspective has a tough time emerging from between the badly dated cutesy-pie mystery scenario and the newfangled hollywood post-production effects .
translation: デメの視点に先天的に見えた愛情深いユーモアは、時代遅れの可愛らしいミステリーシナリオと新しいハリウッドのポストプロダクション効果の間から浮かび上がるのが難しい。
back_translation: The affectionate humor that seemed inherently present in the demon's perspective struggles to emerge between the outdated cute mystery scenarios and the new Hollywood post-production effects.

text: a delicate balance of nostalgia and contemporary themes win out over scripting pregnant with cinematic schmaltz .
translation: ノスタルジアと現代的テーマの微妙なバランスが、映画的な陳腐さに満ちた脚本を凌駕する。
back_translation: The delicate balance of nostalgia and modern themes surpasses a screenplay filled with cinematic clichés.

text: as a young teenager , he finds out who his father is .
translation: 若いティーンエイジャーとして、彼は自分の父親が誰であるかを知ります。
back_translation: As a young teenager, he learns who his father is.

text: the film is a poignant story about a unique relationship between a grandfather and his grandson before the boys bar mitzvah .
translation: その映画は、男の子のバルミツバの前におじいさんと孫の間にある特別な関係についての感動的な物語です。
back_translation: The movie is an emotional story about the special relationship between a grandfather and his grandson before the boy's Bar Mitzvah.

text: the story of mitchell , a ten-year-old african american who lives with his mom in a crack-infested hotel in downtown l . a . mitchell misses the school bus one day and quickly becomes the property of chris ; a suicidal drug dealer who might be losing his mind .
translation: 物語は、ロサンゼルスの中心部にある薬物まみれのホテルに母親と住む10歳のアフリカ系アメリカ人のミッチェルについてです。ある日、ミッチェルはスクールバスを逃し、すぐに自殺願望を抱えるドラッグディーラーのクリスの所有物になってしまいます。クリスは自分の精神が崩壊しているかもしれません。
back_translation: The story is about a 10-year-old African American boy named Mitchell who lives with his mother in a drug-infested hotel in downtown Los Angeles. One day, Mitchell misses the school bus and soon becomes the possession of Chris, a drug dealer with suicidal tendencies. Chris may be on the verge of a mental breakdown.

text: an art whose medium is one of flesh and bone .
translation: 肉体と骨を媒介とする芸術。
back_translation: Art mediated by flesh and bone.

text: here , they return stateside on a hospital ship , each with their own wounds , and the movie follows their intertwined and separate destinies .
translation: ここで、彼らは自分の傷を抱えたまま病院船で国内に戻り、その映画は彼らの絡み合った個々の運命を追っています。
back_translation: Here, they return to the country on a hospital ship while carrying their wounds, and the film follows their intertwined individual fates.

text: but it seems they are brought back as one for more than just solving a case .
translation: しかし、彼らは単に事件を解決するためだけでなく、より大きな目的のために一つに戻されたようです。
back_translation: However, it seems that they were brought back together not just to solve the incident, but for a greater purpose.

text: it 's unfortunate that wallace , who wrote gibson 's braveheart as well as the recent pearl harbor , has such an irrepressible passion for sappy situations and dialogue .
translation: ウォレスはギブソンの『ブレイブハート』や最近の『パールハーバー』を書いたが、彼が感傷的な状況や対話に対して抑えきれない情熱を持っているのは残念だ。
back_translation: Wallace wrote Gibson's "Braveheart" and the recent "Pearl Harbor," but it's unfortunate that he has an uncontrollable passion for sentimental situations and dialogues.

text: these efforts lead inez to concoct a desperate scheme involving murder , betrayal , and escape .
translation: これらの努力は、イネスが殺人、裏切り、そして逃避を伴う絶望的な計画を考案することにつながった。
back_translation: These efforts led Ines to devise a desperate plan involving murder, betrayal, and escape.

text: recoing 's fantastic performance does n't exactly reveal what makes vincent tick , but perhaps any definitive explanation for it would have felt like a cheat .
translation: レコイングの素晴らしいパフォーマンスは、ヴィンセントの本質を明らかにするものではありませんが、それに対する決定的な説明があるとすれば、それは cheat のように感じられたかもしれません。
back_translation: The wonderful performance of Reckoning does not reveal the essence of Vincent, but if there is a definitive explanation for it, it may have felt like a cheat.

text: you might not buy the ideas . but you 'll definitely want the t-shirt .
translation: あなたはそのアイデアを買わないかもしれませんが、Tシャツは確実に欲しくなるでしょう。
back_translation: You may not buy into the idea, but you will definitely want the T-shirt.

text: the terrorist must destroy any genetic remains on the junkie to keep the key to her code a secret .
translation: テロリストは、コードの鍵を秘密に保つために、ジャンキーの遺伝的な痕跡をすべて消さなければならない。
back_translation: The terrorist must eliminate all genetic traces of the junkie to keep the code key a secret.

text: it 's as raw and action-packed an experience as a ringside seat at a tough-man contest .
translation: それはタフマンコンテストのリングサイドの席と同じくらい、生々しくてアクション満載の体験です。
back_translation: It is a raw and action-packed experience, just like sitting ringside at a Toughman contest.

text: a well-made and often lovely depiction of the mysteries of friendship .
translation: 友情の神秘を見事かつしばしば美しく描いた作品。
back_translation: A work that beautifully portrays the mystery of friendship in a remarkable and often beautiful way.

text: one of the best films of the year with its exploration of the obstacles to happiness faced by five contemporary individuals . . . a psychological masterpiece .
translation: 現代の五人の個人が直面する幸福への障害を探求した今年の最高の映画の一つ . . . 心理的な傑作。
back_translation: One of this year's best films exploring the obstacles to happiness faced by five individuals in modern times... a psychological masterpiece.

text: 'rare birds ' tries to force its quirkiness upon the audience .
translation: 『レアバード』は、その独自性を観客に押し付けようとします。
back_translation: "Rare Bird" tries to impose its uniqueness on the audience.

text: the script , like the character danny , is complex and needs your attention . . .
translation: その脚本は、キャラクターのダニーのように複雑で、あなたの注意が必要です。。。
back_translation: That script is as complex as the character Danny, and it requires your attention...

text: not only is his business booming , he is also hired by the governor to kill another inmate in return for an early release .
translation: 彼のビジネスは繁盛しているだけでなく、彼は知事に雇われて別の囚人を殺すことになり、その代わりに早期釈放を得ることになっている。
back_translation: His business is thriving, but he has been hired by the governor to kill another prisoner in exchange for an early release.

text: if i have to choose between gorgeous animation and a lame story ( like , say , treasure planet ) or so-so animation and an exciting , clever story with a batch of appealing characters , i 'll take the latter every time .
translation: 美しいアニメーションとつまらないストーリー（例えば『トレジャープラネット』のような）を選ばなければならない場合、私はいつでも後者、つまり平凡なアニメーションだけれども、刺激的で賢いストーリーと魅力的なキャラクターたちのいる方を選びます。
back_translation: If I have to choose between beautiful animation and a boring story (like in "Treasure Planet"), I will always choose the latter, meaning I prefer mediocre animation but with an exciting and clever story and captivating characters.

text: what he does n't expect is to get teamed up with a cocky civilian , world class boxing champion kelly robinson ( eddie murphy ) , on a dangerous top secret espionage mission .
translation: 彼が予期していないのは、危険な極秘スパイ任務で、お調子者の民間人で世界クラスのボクシングチャンピオンであるケリー・ロビンソン（エディ・マーフィ）とチームを組むことです。
back_translation: What he doesn't expect is to team up with Kelly Robinson (Eddie Murphy), a world-class boxing champion and a jokester civilian, on a dangerous top-secret spy mission.

text: a skillfully made example of your typical schwarzenegger action film .
translation: 典型的なシュワルツェネッガーのアクション映画の巧妙に作られた例です。
back_translation: This is a cleverly crafted example of a typical Schwarzenegger action movie.

text: the colorful cast of characters includes the addlepated cafe owner , freddy , picasso 's sexy young femme dujour , his pompous art dealer , and a mysterious visitor from the future .
translation: カラフルなキャラクターたちには、ボケたカフェのオーナー・フレディ、ピカソのセクシーな若い女性・デュジュール、彼の気取り屋なアートディーラー、そして未来からの神秘的な訪問者が含まれています。
back_translation: The colorful characters include Freddy, the forgetful cafe owner, Dujour, the sexy young woman from Picasso, his pretentious art dealer, and a mysterious visitor from the future.

text: this is riveting stuff , especially in its account of how refugee culture and community spring up almost overnight .
translation: これは非常に魅力的な内容であり、特に難民文化やコミュニティがほぼ一晩でどのように形成されるかについての説明が興味深いです。
back_translation: This is a very compelling topic, and the explanation of how refugee cultures and communities are formed almost overnight is particularly interesting.

text: the combination of lightness and strictness in this instance gives italian for beginners an amiable aimlessness that keeps it from seeming predictably formulaic .
translation: この場合の軽やかさと厳格さの組み合わせは、『初心者のためのイタリア語』に友好的な無目的さを与え、予測可能な定型的であるようには見えなくしています。
back_translation: In this case, the combination of lightness and rigor gives "Italian for Beginners" a friendly aimlessness, making it seem not predictably formulaic.

text: things begin to go wrong when they are given a handgun to reward their success in the new job .
translation: 彼らが新しい仕事での成功を祝うために handgun を与えられると、物事は次第にうまくいかなくなる。
back_translation: Things gradually start to go wrong when they are given handguns to celebrate their success in the new job.

text: the viewer takes great pleasure in watching the resourceful molly stay a step ahead of her pursuers .
translation: 視聴者は、機転の利くモリーが追跡者たちより一歩先を行く様子を楽しんでいる。
back_translation: Viewers are enjoying watching the quick-witted Molly stay one step ahead of her pursuers.

text: the film follows the story of duncan , a fourteen-year old misfit farm boy trying to fill the void and alleviate the numbness left by his mother 's passing .
translation: この映画は、母親の死によって生じた空虚感を埋め、麻痺した感覚を和らげようとする14歳の不適合者の農場少年ダンカンの物語を追っています。
back_translation: This film follows the story of Duncan, a 14-year-old misfit farm boy, who tries to fill the void created by his mother's death and alleviate his numbed feelings.

text: good for a few unintentional laughs , `` extreme ops `` was obviously made for the `` xxx `` crowd , people who enjoy mindless action without the benefit of decent acting , writing , and direction .
translation: いくつかの意図しない笑いには良いですが、「エクストリーム・オプス」は明らかに「xxx」層のために作られたもので、まともな演技、脚本、演出の恩恵なしに無心のアクションを楽しむ人々向けです。
back_translation: Some unintended laughter is good, but "Extreme Ops" is clearly made for the "xxx" audience, designed for those who enjoy mindless action without the benefits of decent acting, script, or direction.

text: works as another uncompromisingly adult movie that assumes its audience is intelligent and does n't have to cut narrative corners to make viewers feel safe .
translation: 観客が知的であり、安全に感じさせるために物語の手を抜く必要がないと想定した、妥協のない大人の映画として機能している。
back_translation: It functions as an uncompromising adult film, assuming that the audience is intelligent and that there is no need to compromise the story to make them feel safe.

text: it all starts to smack of a hallmark hall of fame , with a few four letter words thrown in that are generally not heard on television .
translation: それはすべて、テレビでは一般的に聞かれないいくつかの四文字の言葉が散りばめられた、ハローマークの名作のように思えてきます。
back_translation: It all seems like a masterpiece of the Hello Mark, sprinkled with some four-letter words that are not commonly heard on television.

text: after making an incredible career in the international narcotics world during 1984-1992 , bettien was arrested at piazza navona in rome as one of the targets of the international police operation `` green ice `` .
translation: 1984年から1992年にかけて国際麻薬の世界で素晴らしいキャリアを築いた後、ベッティエンはローマのナボーナ広場で国際警察作戦「グリーンアイス」の標的の一人として逮捕されました。
back_translation: After building a remarkable career in the international drug world from 1984 to 1992, Bettien was arrested as one of the targets of the international police operation "Green Ice" in Rome's Navona Square.

text: its juxtaposition of overwrought existentialism and stomach-churning gore will have you forever on the verge of either cracking up or throwing up .
translation: その過剰な実存主義と胃がひっくり返るようなグロテスクさの対比は、あなたを常に笑い崩れるか吐きそうになるかのギリギリのところに置くでしょう。
back_translation: The contrast between that excessive existentialism and the stomach-churning grotesqueness will constantly leave you teetering on the edge of either laughing uncontrollably or feeling like you might throw up.

text: but career pressure , burned toast and dirty laundry erode any feelings of tenderness , and they never seem to find enough time for their six-year-old son , benny .
translation: しかし、キャリアのプレッシャー、焦げたトースト、そして汚れた洗濯物が優しさの感情を徐々に削り取ってしまい、彼らは6歳の息子ベニーのために十分な時間を見つけられないようです。
back_translation: However, the pressures of career, burnt toast, and dirty laundry gradually chip away at their feelings of kindness, making it seem like they can't find enough time for their 6-year-old son, Benny.

text: the pianist is the film roman polanski may have been born to make .
translation: 「ピアニスト」は、ロマン・ポランスキーが作るために生まれた映画かもしれません。
back_translation: "The Pianist" may be a film that was born for Roman Polanski to create.

text: based on the 1997 john king novel of the same name with a rather odd synopsis : `` a first novel about a seasoned chelsea football club hooligan who represents a disaffected society operating by brutal rules .
translation: 1997年のジョン・キングの同名小説に基づいており、かなり奇妙なあらすじです。「洗練されたチェルシー・フットボール・クラブのフーリガンについての初めての小説で、冷酷なルールに従って活動する疎外された社会を描いています。」
back_translation: Based on the novel of the same name by John King from 1997, it has a rather strange plot. "It is the first novel about the sophisticated Chelsea Football Club hooligans, depicting a marginalized society that operates according to ruthless rules."

text: the performances are amiable and committed , and the comedy more often than not hits the bullseye .
translation: パフォーマンスは親しみやすく、真剣であり、コメディはほとんどの場合的を射ています。
back_translation: The performance is approachable, serious, and the comedy is mostly on point.

text: but roger 's seemingly foolproof world of smooth talk and casual sex begins to unravel when he is paid a surprise visit by his teenager nephew , nick .
translation: しかし、ロジャーの一見完璧に思えるスムーズな会話とカジュアルなセックスの世界は、彼の十代の甥ニックの突然の訪問によって崩れ始める。
back_translation: However, Roger's seemingly perfect, smooth conversations and casual sex life begin to unravel with the sudden visit of his teenage nephew, Nick.

text: it has the charm of the original american road movies , feasting on the gorgeous , ramshackle landscape of the filmmaker 's motherland .
translation: それは、映画製作者の母国の美しくてボロボロの風景を堪能しながら、オリジナルのアメリカのロードムービーの魅力を持っています。
back_translation: It has the charm of an original American road movie while savoring the beautiful yet dilapidated landscapes of the filmmaker's homeland.

text: her building 's doorman ( newhart ) quickly shows her the ways and workings of our nation 's capital .
translation: 彼女のビルのドアマン（ニューハート）がすぐに彼女に私たちの国の首都の仕組みと働き方を教えます。
back_translation: The doorman of her building (New Heart) will quickly teach her how our country's capital is structured and how it works.

text: joe hickley thinks he 's got a great scheme : kidnap the child of rich parents , hold it for 24 hours , keeping the mother under his control while an accomplice gets the ransom from the father , who is on a trip .
translation: ジョー・ヒクリーは素晴らしい計画を持っていると考えている：裕福な両親の子供を誘拐し、母親を自分のコントロール下に置きながら、共犯者が旅行中の父親から身代金を得るために24時間保持するというものだ。
back_translation: Joe Hickley has a brilliant plan: to kidnap the child of wealthy parents, keeping the mother under his control while an accomplice holds the child for 24 hours to extract a ransom from the father who is traveling.

text: the story follows mirabelle , a disenchanted salesgirl and aspiring artist who sells gloves and accessories at neiman marcus .
translation: 物語は、ネイマン・マーカスで手袋やアクセサリーを販売している、幻滅した販売員であり、アーティストを志すミラベルを追います。
back_translation: The story follows Mirabelle, a disillusioned sales associate selling gloves and accessories at Neiman Marcus, who aspires to be an artist.

text: pretension , in its own way , is a form of bravery . for this reason and this reason only -- the power of its own steadfast , hoity-toity convictions -- chelsea walls deserves a medal .
translation: こだわりは、その独自の方法で勇気の一形態である。この理由、そしてこの理由だけで、自己の揺るがない、気取った信念の力により、チェルシー・ウォールズはメダルに値する。
back_translation: Commitment is a form of courage in its own unique way. For this reason, and this reason alone, the unwavering power of one's earnest beliefs makes Chelsea Wools deserving of a medal.

text: often demented in a good way , but it is an uneven film for the most part .
translation: しばしば良い意味で狂っているが、全体的には不均一な映画である。
back_translation: It is often delightfully insane, but overall it is an uneven movie.

text: after john anderton lost his son to a crime a six years ago , he took up drugs , and works the precog division like nobody else .
translation: ジョン・アンダートンは6年前に息子を犯罪で失った後、薬物に手を出し、他の誰よりも優れた能力で予知能力部門で働いている。
back_translation: John Anderton, after losing his son to a crime six years ago, turned to drugs and now works in the precognition division with abilities superior to anyone else.

text: christian taylor , a writer on hit tv series six feet under , is being profiled by a british documentary crew when he 's sacked , though he does n't know they 've overheard the firing .
