translation: クリスチャン・テイラーは、ヒットテレビシリーズ『シックス・フィート・アンダー』のライターであり、英国のドキュメンタリー隊によって特集されている最中に解雇されますが、彼はその解雇の様子を彼らが聞いていることを知りません。
back_translation: Christian Taylor, a writer for the hit television series "Six Feet Under," is fired while being featured by a British documentary crew, but he is unaware that they are hearing about his dismissal.

text: an annoying orgy of excess and exploitation that has no point and goes nowhere .
translation: 無意味でどこにも行かない、煩わしい過剰と搾取の乱交。
back_translation: Meaningless, going nowhere, a troublesome excess and exploitation orgy.

text: kat and shaun are both bandleaders struggling to make a name for themselves in the contemporary music industry .
translation: カットとショーンは、現代音楽業界で自分たちの名前を確立しようと奮闘しているバンドリーダーです。
back_translation: Cut and Shawn are band leaders struggling to establish their names in the contemporary music industry.

text: he returns with his wife , mercedes , an argentinean he met in spain , and his two adolescent children , mateo and cayetana , born in the same country and forced into a land they know only throught the biased tales of their parents .
translation: 彼は妻のメルセデス、スペインで出会ったアルゼンチン人と、同じ国で生まれた二人の思春期の子供、マテオとカジャタナと共に戻ってきます。彼らは親の偏った物語を通じてしか知らない土地に強いられています。
back_translation: He returns with his wife Mercedes, an Argentine he met in Spain, and their two teenage children, Mateo and Kajatana, who were born in the same country. They are forced into a land they only know through their parents' biased stories.

text: if the very concept makes you nervous . . . you 'll have an idea of the film 's creepy , scary effectiveness .
translation: その概念自体があなたを不安にさせるなら…映画の不気味で恐ろしい効果を感じ取ることができるでしょう。
back_translation: If the concept itself makes you anxious... you will be able to perceive the eerie and terrifying effects of the movie.

text: watching les destinM-ies , whose pace may not be for everyone , is to be virtually part of the creative process .
translation: 「レ・デスティーヌ」を観ることは、そのペースが誰にでも合うわけではないが、創造的なプロセスの一部を実質的に体験することだ。
back_translation: Watching "Les Destinées" might not suit everyone's pace, but it is essentially an experience of part of the creative process.

text: dizzy then gets noticed by the head cheerleader , danielle , and helps the school football team gain self-respect to win games .
translation: ディズィーはチアリーダーのヘッド、ダニエルに注目され、学校のアメリカンフットボールチームが自尊心を取り戻して試合に勝つ手助けをします。
back_translation: Dizzy catches the attention of the cheerleading head, Daniel, and helps the school's American football team regain their self-esteem and win the game.

text: with a completely predictable plot , you 'll swear that you 've seen it all before , even if you 've never come within a mile of the longest yard .
translation: 完全に予測可能なプロットで、あなたはこれまでにすべてを見たと思うでしょう。たとえあなたが「ロング・ヤード」まで1マイルも近づいたことがなくても。
back_translation: With a completely predictable plot, you would think you have seen everything before, even if you have never been within a mile of the "Long Yard."

text: unfortunately , the insurance would not cover his son 's transplant .
translation: 残念ながら、保険は彼の息子の移植をカバーしませんでした。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the insurance did not cover his son's transplant.

text: franco agonizaba y el pr & # 237 ; ncipe , jefe de estado en funciones , se encontraba en una posici & # 243 ; n dif & # 237 ; cil para afrontar un problema fundamental .
translation: フランコは苦しんでおり、実権を掌握している王子は根本的な問題に対処するために難しい立場に置かれていた。
back_translation: Franco was suffering, and the prince who held the real power was in a difficult position to deal with the fundamental issues.

text: when warren secretly discovers a wedding dress hidden in toni 's closet , he realizes he has some serious decisions to make .
translation: ウォーレンがトニのクローゼットに隠されたウェディングドレスを秘密に発見したとき、彼は深刻な選択をしなければならないことに気づく。
back_translation: When Warren secretly discovers the wedding dress hidden in Toni's closet, he realizes he must make a serious choice.

text: as a film director , labute continues to improve .
translation: 映画監督として、ラビュートは引き続き成長しています。
back_translation: As a film director, Labute continues to grow.

text: watching the so-called powerful falling on their own petards is a venal pleasure , yet it also serves as a life lesson .
translation: 自称の力強い者たちが自らの手によって転落するのを見ているのは、醜悪な快楽ですが、それはまた人生の教訓にもなります。
back_translation: Watching those who claim to be strong fall by their own hands is a grotesque pleasure, but it also serves as a lesson in life.

text: the film flat lines when it should peak and is more missed opportunity and trifle than dark , decadent truffle .
translation: 映画はピークに達するべきところでフラットになり、ダークでデカダンなトリュフよりも、見逃された機会と些細なものに過ぎない。
back_translation: The movie flattens at what should be its peak, and is merely a missed opportunity and trivial compared to dark and decadent truffles.

text: ryan plays a lonely new york woman who discovers the darker side of passion after becoming involved with a tough homicide detective who is investigating a series of murders in her neighborhood .
translation: ライアンは、殺人事件が彼女の近所で発生している捜査を行っているたくましい殺人探偵と関わることで、情熱の暗い側面を発見する孤独なニューヨークの女性を演じます。
back_translation: Ryan plays a lonely woman in New York who discovers the dark side of passion by getting involved with a tough murder detective investigating a murder case happening in her neighborhood.

text: though a capable thriller , somewhere along the way k-19 jettisoned some crucial drama .
translation: 能力のあるスリラーではあるが、K-19 の途中でいくつかの重要なドラマを放棄してしまった。
back_translation: It is a capable thriller, but it abandoned some important drama halfway through K-19.

text: the task of stopping them falls to young detective danny berdan , a man not afraid of bending rules to apprehend his prey .
translation: 彼らを止める任務は、若き探偵ダニー・バーダンに託される。彼は獲物を捕まえるためにルールを曲げることを恐れない男だ。
back_translation: The mission to stop them is entrusted to the young detective Danny Burdan. He is a man who is unafraid to bend the rules to catch his prey.

text: ranging from funny to shattering and featuring some of the year 's best acting , personal velocity gathers plenty of dramatic momentum .
translation: 面白いものから衝撃的なものまで、今年の最高の演技をフィーチャーしながら、『パーソナル・ベロシティ』は多くのドラマチックな勢いを集めています。
back_translation: From interesting to shocking, "Personal Velocity" gathers a lot of dramatic momentum while featuring the best performances of the year.

text: deserves high marks for political courage but barely gets by on its artistic merits .
translation: 政治的勇気において高評価に値するが、芸術的な価値ではかろうじて合格点に達する。
back_translation: It is highly regarded for its political courage, but barely meets the passing mark in terms of artistic value.

text: likely to give up their first born before they give up their lodge , the crowd puts their heads together and come up with not one , but three methods of raising the money .
translation: 彼らはロッジを手放す前に第一子を手放す可能性が高く、群衆は頭を突き合わせてお金を集めるための方法を一つではなく、三つ考え出します。
back_translation: They are more likely to part with their first child before letting go of the lodge, and the crowd thinks of not one, but three ways to raise money.

text: the movie understands like few others how the depth and breadth of emotional intimacy give the physical act all of its meaning and most of its pleasure .
translation: その映画は、感情的な親密さの深さと広がりが肉体的な行為にすべての意味とほとんどの喜びを与えることを、他の映画のように理解しています。
back_translation: That movie understands, like few others, that the depth and breadth of emotional intimacy give all meaning and nearly all joy to physical acts.

text: human nature initially succeeds by allowing itself to go crazy , but ultimately fails by spinning out of control .
translation: 人間の本質は最初、自分自身を狂わせることによって成功しますが、最終的には制御を失って失敗します。
back_translation: The essence of humans begins by achieving success through driving themselves crazy, but ultimately, they lose control and fail.

text: waydowntown just like most large cities , is n't somewhere you 'll want to spend the rest of your life , but it sure is a fun place to visit for a while .
translation: ウェイダウンタウンは、多くの大都市と同様に、一生を過ごしたい場所ではありませんが、しばらくの間訪れるには楽しい場所です。
back_translation: Way Downtown, like many major cities, is not a place where you would want to spend your entire life, but it is a fun place to visit for a while.

text: faced with the obstacle of needing `` ten large `` to finance a studio recording session , the bros .
translation: スタジオ録音セッションを資金調達するために「10万ドル」が必要な障害に直面している兄弟たち。
back_translation: The brothers are facing the challenge of needing $100,000 to fund their studio recording session.

text: nikola , the director , and his friends have to make the choice - whether to compromise with their consciences and their art , ( as normally happens here in the balkans ) , or whether to preserve katerina 's message .
translation: ニコラ、監督、そして彼の友人たちは、妥協するのか、カテリナのメッセージを守るのかという選択をしなければなりません（ここバルカンでは通常のことですが）。
back_translation: Nicola, the director, and his friends must choose whether to compromise or uphold Katerina's message (which is usually the case here in the Balkans).

text: the movie is loaded with good intentions , but in his zeal to squeeze the action and our emotions into the all-too-familiar dramatic arc of the holocaust escape story , minac drains his movie of all individuality .
translation: その映画は良い意図に満ちていますが、ホロコーストの脱出物語というありふれたドラマティックなアークにアクションと私たちの感情を押し込もうとする熱意の中で、ミナクは映画の個性をすべて奪ってしまいました。
back_translation: The movie is filled with good intentions, but in the zeal to pack action and our emotions into the cliché dramatic arc of a Holocaust escape story, Minaku ends up stripping the film of all its individuality.

text: looking for a short cut to fame , glass concocted sources , quotes and even entire stories , but his deception did not go unnoticed forever , and eventually , his world came crumbling down . . .
translation: 名声への近道を求め、ガラスで作られた情報源、引用、さらには全体の物語をねじ曲げたが、彼の欺瞞は永遠に気づかれないわけではなく、最終的には彼の世界は崩れ落ちた。。。
back_translation: In his pursuit of a shortcut to fame, he twisted information sources, quotes, and even the entire story made of glass, but his deceit would not go unnoticed forever, and ultimately his world collapsed...

text: ki-duk kim has created a provocatively violent and sexual film with an oddly idyllic sensibility . it 's a mysterious but ultimately rewarding experience .
translation: キム・キドクは、奇妙に理想的な感性を持つ挑発的で暴力的かつ性的な映画を作り上げました。それは神秘的ですが、最終的には満足のいく体験です。
back_translation: Kim Ki-duk created provocative, violent, and sexual films with a strangely idealistic sensibility. They are mysterious but ultimately satisfying experiences.

text: however , the job his army buddy promised does n't materialize , and he ca n't escape his past .
translation: しかし、彼の軍の仲間が約束した仕事は実現せず、彼は過去から逃れることができません。
back_translation: However, the promised work by his comrades in the army did not come to fruition, and he cannot escape from the past.

text: witty and often surprising , a dark little morality tale disguised as a romantic comedy .
translation: ウィットに富み、しばしば驚きに満ちた、ロマンティック・コメディに隠された暗い小さな道徳物語。
back_translation: A witty and often surprising dark little moral tale hidden within a romantic comedy.

text: but later that year she was gunned down by assasins hired by the same criminal drug lords she exposed .
translation: しかし、その年の後半、彼女は暴露した同じ犯罪的麻薬王によって雇われた assassins によって銃撃されました。
back_translation: However, in the latter half of that year, she was shot by assassins hired by the same criminal drug lord she had exposed.

text: it 's not a bad plot ; but , unfortunately , the movie is nowhere near as refined as all the classic dramas it borrows from .
translation: 悪くないプロットですが、残念ながら映画は借りているすべてのクラシックドラマほど洗練されていません。
back_translation: It's not a bad plot, but unfortunately the movie is not as refined as all the classic dramas it's borrowing from.

text: has all the poignancy of a hallmark card and all the comedy of a gallagher stand-up act .
translation: ハローマークカードのような感傷と、ギャラガーのスタンドアップコメディのようなコメディを持っている。
back_translation: It has a sentiment similar to a Hello Mark card and a comedy like Gallagher's stand-up.

text: during the course of the story we follow our hero as he attempts to single-handedly save the country from falling into the hands of a despot .
translation: 物語の中で、私たちは主人公が独力で国を専制君主の手に落ちるのを救おうと奮闘する姿を追います。
back_translation: In the story, we follow the protagonist as they struggle to save their country from falling into the hands of a tyrannical ruler.

text: forced with the ultimatum , keith launches himself on a day of reclamation .
translation: 最後通告に追い込まれたキースは、再生の日に自らを投じる。
back_translation: Keith, cornered by the final ultimatum, throws himself into the day of resurrection.

text: `` auto focus `` works as an unusual biopic and document of male swingers in the playboy era
translation: ``オートフォーカス``は、プレイボーイ時代の男性スウィンガーに関する珍しい伝記とドキュメンタリーとして機能します。
back_translation: "Autofocus" serves as a rare biography and documentary about male swingers from the Playboy era.

text: adaptation is intricately constructed and in a strange way nails all of orlean 's themes without being a true adaptation of her book .
translation: 適応は巧妙に構築されており、奇妙な方法でオーレンのテーマをすべて捉えていますが、彼女の本の真の適応ではありません。
back_translation: The adaptation is cleverly constructed and captures all the themes of Oren in a strange way, but it is not a true adaptation of her book.

text: kissing jessica stein is your standard romantic comedy , only better : twice the chicks and half the guys .
translation: 「ジェシカ・スタインにキス」は標準的なロマンティックコメディでありながら、より優れています：女性二倍、男性半分。
back_translation: "Kissing Jessica Stein" is a standard romantic comedy, yet it is superior: twice the women, half the men.

text: their only resources , tenacity , determination , ingenuity and each other .
translation: 彼らの唯一の資源は、粘り強さ、決意、独創性、そして互いである。
back_translation: Their only resources are perseverance, determination, originality, and each other.

text: the story is about a woman who works in some sort of facility and one night while she is on late shift the computers go crazy because they have been possesed by a spirit .
translation: その物語は、ある施設で働く女性についてです。彼女が深夜勤務をしているとき、コンピュータが狂い始めます。それは、何か霊に取り憑かれたためです。
back_translation: The story is about a woman who works at a certain facility. When she is on the night shift, the computer starts to go haywire. This is because it has been possessed by some spirit.

text: steve quickly discovers that burt can not even provide temporary lodging , but an administrator at his new high school directs him to a shelter for runaway kids where he soon learns to navigate his way .
translation: スティーブはすぐにバートが一時的な宿泊先さえ提供できないことに気づきますが、新しい高校の職員が彼を家出少年のためのシェルターに案内してくれます。そこで彼はすぐに道を見つける方法を学ぶことになります。
back_translation: Steve soon realizes that Bart cannot even provide a temporary place to stay, but a new high school staff member guides him to a shelter for runaway youth. There, he will quickly learn how to find his way.

text: but as the roles get bigger , the competition gets stronger , the stakes get higher , and now with an undercover thespian cop on his trail , max must struggle with his ongoing road to success and the choices he 's made .
translation: しかし、役割が大きくなるにつれて、競争は激化し、リスクは高まり、今や彼の後を追う undercover の演技派警官がいる中で、マックスは成功への道と自らの選択と向き合わなければならない。
back_translation: However, as his role becomes larger, competition intensifies, risks increase, and now, with undercover acting police officers following in his footsteps, Max must confront the path to success and his own choices.

text: jaunty fun , with its celeb-strewn backdrop well used .
translation: 陽気で楽しい、セレブが散らばる背景がうまく活用されています。
back_translation: The cheerful and fun atmosphere effectively utilizes a background scattered with celebrities.

text: set during the cull of the stray dogs in the city of bucharest , the wild dogs weaves together a week in the lives of several citizens of and visitors to the hauntingly beautiful city .
translation: ブカレストの野良犬の駆除を背景にした「ワイルド・ドッグ」は、心惹かれる美しい街に住む市民や訪問者の一週間の生活を織り交ぜています。
back_translation: "Wild Dog," set against the backdrop of the stray dog extermination in Bucharest, intertwines a week in the lives of citizens and visitors living in a captivatingly beautiful city.

text: the faithful will enjoy this sometimes wry adaptation of v . s . naipaul 's novel , but newcomers may find themselves stifling a yawn or two during the first hour .
translation: 信者たちは、このヴィ・エス・ナイポールの小説の時折皮肉を交えた適応を楽しむでしょうが、新参者は最初の1時間であくびを我慢することになるかもしれません。
back_translation: Believers may enjoy the occasionally ironic adaptation of this V.S. Naipaul novel, but newcomers might find themselves stifling yawns during the first hour.

text: a heartening tale of small victories and enduring hope .
translation: 小さな勝利と持続する希望の心温まる物語。
back_translation: A heartwarming story of small victories and enduring hope.

text: death to smoochy is often very funny , but what 's even more remarkable is the integrity of devito 's misanthropic vision .
translation: 「デス・トゥ・スムーチー」は非常に面白いですが、より注目すべきはデヴィートの人間嫌いのビジョンの誠実さです。
back_translation: "Death to Smoochy" is very interesting, but what is more noteworthy is the sincerity of DeVito's misanthropic vision.

text: manages in two minutes what malcolm lee 's cousin spike 's bamboozled could n't in over two hours .
translation: マルコム・リーのいとこスパイクの「バンブーズルド」が2時間以上かけてもできなかったことを、2分で管理する。
back_translation: Manage what Spike, Malcolm Lee's cousin, took over two hours to do in just two minutes.

text: this movie is about the worst thing chan has done in the united states .
translation: この映画は、チャンがアメリカ合衆国で行った最悪のことについてです。
back_translation: This movie is about the worst thing that Chang did in the United States.

text: as well , another priest in the diocese , father natalio , is suspected of assisting guerilla troops in the highlands .
translation: また、教区内の別の神父であるナタリオ神父は、高地でゲリラ部隊を支援している疑いを持たれています。
back_translation: Additionally, Father Natalio, another priest in the parish, is suspected of supporting guerrilla troops in the highlands.

text: however , there just might be more to him than meets the eye .
translation: しかし、彼には見た目以上の何かがあるかもしれません。
back_translation: However, he may have something beyond appearances.

text: the movie slides downhill as soon as macho action conventions assert themselves .
translation: 映画はマッチョなアクションの定番が現れるとすぐに滑り落ちてしまう。
back_translation: As soon as the movie features the standard macho action elements, it quickly goes downhill.

text: solid , lump-in-the-throat family entertainment that derives its power by sticking to the facts .
translation: 事実に忠実であることで力を得る、しっかりとした、喉に塊があるような家族向けのエンターテイメント。
back_translation: A family-oriented entertainment that gains strength by being true to facts, solid, and has a lump in the throat.

text: keith discovers a new man and a new attitude .
translation: キースは新しい男性と新しい態度を発見する。
back_translation: Keith discovers a new man and a new attitude.

text: the sequel drops the adult aspects of the story in favor of talking reindeer and a life-size , plastic santa replacement ( also played by allen ) that is strongly reminiscent of that creepy family from the duracell commercials .
translation: 続編は物語の大人向けの要素を排除し、話すトナカイと、意図的に不気味なダイレクトなサンタの代わり（アレンが演じる）を採用しています。これはダイレクトセルのCMに出てくる不気味な家族を強く思い起こさせます。
back_translation: The sequel eliminates the adult elements of the story and features a talking reindeer, along with a deliberately creepy direct Santa (played by Allen). This strongly reminds one of the eerie family seen in the Direct Cell commercials.

text: ca n't kick about the assembled talent and the russos show genuine promise as comic filmmakers . still , this thing feels flimsy and ephemeral .
translation: 集まった才能について文句は言えませんし、ルッソ兄弟はコメディ映画製作者としての真の可能性を示しています。それでも、この作品は脆弱で一時的な感じがします。
back_translation: I can't complain about the gathered talents, and the Russo brothers are showing their true potential as comedy filmmakers. Still, this work feels fragile and temporary.

text: a greek film maker ( the narrator ) has his film banned by the military government in his own country .
translation: ギリシャの映画製作者（ナレーター）は、自国の軍事政権によって自分の映画を禁止される。
back_translation: A Greek filmmaker (narrator) has his films banned by his country's military regime.

text: as expected , sayles ' smart wordplay and clever plot contrivances are as sharp as ever , though they may be overshadowed by some strong performances .
translation: 予想通り、セイルズの巧妙な言葉遊びと賢いプロットの仕掛けは相変わらず鋭いが、いくつかの強力な演技に影が薄くなることもある。
back_translation: As expected, Sells' clever wordplay and smart plot twists remain sharp, but they can sometimes be overshadowed by some powerful performances.

text: due to intense family pressure , they try everything they can but eventually learn that maryam is infertile .
translation: 強い家族のプレッシャーのため、彼らはできる限りのことを試みますが、最終的にはマリヤムが不妊であることを知ります。
back_translation: Due to the strong pressure from the family, they try everything they can, but ultimately, they find out that Mariam is infertile.

text: the will factor vertically splits the gang in two .
translation: 意志の要因はギャングを二つに分けます。
back_translation: The factors of will divide the gang into two.

text: by the time the plot grinds itself out in increasingly incoherent fashion , you might be wishing for a watch that makes time go faster rather than the other way around .
translation: プロットがますます意味不明な形で進行するにつれて、あなたは時間を早める時計を願うようになるかもしれません。
back_translation: As the plot progresses in an increasingly incomprehensible manner, you may find yourself wishing for a clock that speeds up time.

text: director oliver parker labors so hard to whip life into the importance of being earnest that he probably pulled a muscle or two .
translation: オリバー・パーカー監督は『真面目が一番』の重要性に命を吹き込むために懸命に働いたため、おそらく筋肉を何本か痛めたことでしょう。
back_translation: Director Oliver Parker worked hard to bring the importance of "Seriousness is Key" to life, so he probably strained some muscles in the process.

text: things got out of hand and led to a tragic ending .
translation: 物事が手に負えなくなり、悲劇的な結末を迎えました。
back_translation: Things became uncontrollable, leading to a tragic ending.

text: sound the trumpets : for the first time since desperately seeking susan , madonna does n't suck as an actress .
translation: トランペットを鳴らせ : 「デスパレート・シーキング・スーザン」以来、マドンナは女優としてクソ役ではない。
back_translation: Blow the trumpet: Since "Desperately Seeking Susan," Madonna is no longer a terrible actress.

text: guy gets girl , guy loses girl , audience falls asleep .
translation: 男が女を手に入れる、男が女を失う、観客が眠りに落ちる。
back_translation: A man gains a woman, a man loses a woman, and the audience falls asleep.

text: father benito has been receiving financial help from the region 's drug lord for the construction of a new health clinic .
translation: ベニト神父は、新しい医療クリニックの建設のために地域の麻薬王から経済的支援を受けています。
back_translation: Father Benito is receiving financial support from the local drug lord for the construction of a new medical clinic.

text: payne constructs a hilarious ode to middle america and middle age with this unlikely odyssey , featuring a pathetic , endearing hero who is all too human .
translation: ペインは、この意外な旅を通じて、アメリカ中部と中年に対する面白おかしいオードを作り上げています。そこには、情けなくも愛らしい、極めて人間らしい英雄が登場します。
back_translation: Pain creates a humorous ode to the Midwest and middle age through this unexpected journey. It features a pitifully charming, deeply human hero.

text: using surveillance , bribery and conspiracy , han 's blonde and busty investigative reporter , fallopia wigglesworth spins a bizarre web of deceit to net her young and vulnerable prey .
translation: 監視、賄賂、陰謀を駆使して、ハンの金髪で胸の大きい調査報道記者、ファロピア・ウィグルズワースは、若くて無防備な獲物を捕らえるための奇妙な欺瞞の網を張ります。
back_translation: Using surveillance, bribery, and conspiracy, the blonde and voluptuous investigative journalist Falopia Wigglesworth sets a strange web of deceit to capture her young and defenseless prey.

text: as night falls , the terrified group of young athletes must fight their own fears and prejudices and come together in a seemingly hopeless struggle asainst a winged nightmare , hellbent on stockpiling as many victims as it can on the ultimate night of its grizzly , ritual feast .
translation: 夜が訪れると、恐れおののく若いアスリートたちのグループは、自らの恐怖と偏見と戦いながら、翼のある悪夢に対抗するために一つにならなければならない。それは、最も恐ろしい儀式的な feast の夜に、できるだけ多くの犠牲者を蓄えようと必死になっている。
back_translation: As night falls, a group of young athletes, trembling in fear, must unite to fight against their own fears and prejudices in order to confront a winged nightmare. They are desperately trying to gather as many victims as possible for the most terrifying ritual feast night.

text: though the material sounds complex and potentially sleep-inducing , director robert j . siegel paints his portrait of boredom and discontent with deft strokes .
translation: 材料は複雑で眠気を誘う可能性があるが、監督のロバート・J・シーゲルは退屈と不満の肖像を巧みに描き出している。
back_translation: The material is complex and may induce drowsiness, but director Robert J. Siegel skillfully depicts the portrait of boredom and dissatisfaction.

text: the movie suffers from two fatal ailments -- a dearth of vitality and a story that 's shapeless and uninflected .
translation: その映画は致命的な２つの欠陥に苦しんでいる。活力の欠如と、形のない、感情のないストーリーだ。
back_translation: The movie suffers from two fatal flaws: a lack of vitality and a shapeless, emotionless story.

text: the animation merely serves up a predictable , maudlin story that swipes heavily from bambi and the lion king , yet lacks the emotional resonance of either of those movies .
translation: そのアニメーションは、予測可能で感傷的なストーリーを提供するだけで、「バンビ」と「ライオン・キング」から多くの要素を盗んでいますが、どちらの映画の感情的な共鳴も欠けています。
back_translation: The animation only provides a predictable and sentimental story, stealing many elements from "Bambi" and "The Lion King," but lacks the emotional resonance of either film.

text: but billy still has memories of a wife who cheated on him .
translation: しかしビリーは、彼を裏切った妻の記憶をまだ持っています。
back_translation: However, Billy still has the memory of his wife who betrayed him.

text: irish eyes are crying explores the relationship between two irish-american brothers in boston born to immigrant parents and raised in a rough , working class irish neighborhood .
translation: アイリッシュ・アイズ・アー・クライングは、ボストンで移民の両親のもとに生まれ、厳しい労働者階級のアイルランド人の地域で育った二人のアイルランド系アメリカ人兄弟の関係を探ります。
back_translation: "Irish Eyes Are Crying" explores the relationship between two Irish-American brothers born to immigrant parents in Boston and raised in a tough working-class Irish neighborhood.

text: this is as respectful a film as byatt fans could hope for , though lovers of the book may wonder why it 's necessary .
translation: これは、バイアットのファンが期待できる限り敬意を表した映画ですが、本の愛好者はなぜそれが必要なのか疑問に思うかもしれません。
back_translation: This is a movie that pays as much respect as the fans of Biat can expect, but book lovers may wonder why it is necessary.

text: soon , annie 's condition helps leoncio 's children realize the essence of a family .
translation: すぐに、アニーの状態がレオンシオの子供たちに家族の本質を理解させる。
back_translation: Soon, Annie's condition will help Leoncio's children understand the essence of family.

text: the movie is so contrived , nonsensical and formulaic that , come to think of it , the day-old shelf would be a more appropriate location to store it .
translation: その映画は非常に強引で、ばかげていて、型にはまっているので、考えてみると、古くなった棚に保管する方が適切な場所だと思います。
back_translation: That movie is very forceful, ridiculous, and formulaic, so upon reflection, I think the appropriate place for it is on an old shelf.

text: the girl 's lover thinks she 's been kidnapped , and goes looking for her .
translation: その少女の恋人は彼女が誘拐されたと思い、彼女を探しに行く。
back_translation: The girl's boyfriend thinks she has been kidnapped and goes to look for her.

text: giving birth to her first child should be a time of happiness for rachel ( emily woof ) , but the dream is shattered when she learns that her newborn baby has died during the night .
translation: 初めての子供を出産することはレイチェル（エミリー・ウーフ）にとって幸せな時間であるべきですが、彼女は生まれたばかりの赤ちゃんが夜の間に亡くなったことを知り、その夢は粉々になってしまいます。
back_translation: Giving birth to her first child should be a happy time for Rachel (Emily Woof), but when she learns that her newborn baby has died during the night, her dream is shattered.

text: as a young writer , her fun loving , witty and kind personality represent everything that rio is not .
translation: 若い作家として、彼女の楽しい性格、機知に富んだ面、そして優しい人格は、リオが全く持っていないものを表しています。
back_translation: As a young writer, her fun personality, witty side, and gentle character represent things that Rio completely lacks.

text: behind every suicide bombing there is at least one human story that ends , the story of the suicide bomber .
translation: すべての自爆テロの背後には、少なくとも一つの人間の物語が終わる、その物語は自爆テロリストのものです。
back_translation: Behind every suicide bombing, there ends at least one human story, and that story belongs to the suicide bomber.

text: kitchen scenes playing as obvious and light-hearted metaphors for states of mind and relationships , mostly martha leaves a few elements hanging that it probably should have tidied .
translation: キッチンのシーンは、心の状態や人間関係の明白で軽妙なメタファーとして展開されますが、ほとんどの場合、マーサは整理すべきいくつかの要素を残しています。
back_translation: The kitchen scene unfolds as an obvious and lighthearted metaphor for the state of mind and human relationships, but in most cases, Martha leaves behind several elements that need to be organized.

text: faced with cold , hunger and death , afghan children still try to learn , play and enjoy whatever life offers them .
translation: 寒さ、飢え、死に直面しながらも、アフガニスタンの子供たちはそれでも学び、遊び、人生が提供するものを楽しもうとします。
back_translation: Despite facing cold, hunger, and death, children in Afghanistan continue to learn, play, and try to enjoy what life has to offer.

text: the film serves as a valuable time capsule to remind us of the devastating horror suffered by an entire people .
translation: この映画は、全ての人々が被った壊滅的な恐怖を私たちに思い出させる貴重なタイムカプセルとして機能しています。
back_translation: This movie serves as a valuable time capsule that reminds us of the catastrophic fears experienced by all people.

text: surprisingly , considering that baird is a former film editor , the movie is rather choppy .
translation: 驚くべきことに、ベアードは元映画編集者であるにもかかわらず、この映画はかなり途切れ途切れです。
back_translation: Surprisingly, despite being a former film editor, Baird's movie is quite disjointed.

text: the movie introduces us to frankie ( played by david eigenberg ) a would-be romeo who will put himself though great pains to find his juliet .
translation: 映画はフランキー（デイビッド・アイゲンバーグが演じる）を紹介します。彼はジュリエットを見つけるために大きな苦痛を伴うことを厭わないロミオになりたいと思っています。
back_translation: The movie introduces Frankie (played by David Eigenberg). He wants to be a Romeo who is unafraid of great pain in order to find Juliet.

text: when a harvard-educated cia agent is killed during an operation , the secret agency recruits his twin brother ( chris rock ) , an african-american street-wise hustler with no idea what 's coming for him .
translation: ハーバード大学教育を受けたCIAエージェントが任務中に殺害され、秘密機関は彼の双子の兄弟（クリス・ロック）をリクルートする。彼はアフリカ系アメリカ人のストリートスマートなハスラーで、何が彼を待ち受けているのかわからない。
back_translation: A Harvard-educated CIA agent is killed during a mission, and the agency recruits his twin brother (Chris Rock). He is a street-smart hustler from the African American community, unaware of what awaits him.

text: an affectionately goofy satire that 's unafraid to throw elbows when necessary . . .
translation: 愛情を込めたおかしな風刺で、必要なときには遠慮なく肘を使うことを恐れない。。。
back_translation: With love and a humorous satire, I am not afraid to use my elbows when necessary.

text: stitch as the new family member brings quite some action into all their lifes , and after a while , not even pleakley and dr . jookiba can recognize their former target .
translation: 新しい家族のメンバーとしてのスティッチは、彼らの生活に多くのアクションをもたらし、しばらくすると、プリークリーもドクター・ジョーカイバも彼らの以前のターゲットを認識できなくなります。
back_translation: As a new member of the family, Stitch brings a lot of action to their lives, and before long, Pleakley and Dr. Jumba no longer recognize their previous targets.

text: a retired emerald smuggler , robert , is convinced by his contact in brazil to come to rio and assist him with a lucrative deal .
translation: 引退したエメラルド密売人のロバートは、ブラジルの連絡先に説得されてリオに来て、彼の利益のある取引を手伝うことになります。
back_translation: Robert, a retired emerald trafficker, is persuaded by his contacts in Brazil to come to Rio and help with his lucrative dealings.

text: fate deals young orphan matt murdock a strange hand when he is doused with hazardous waste .
translation: 運命は若い孤児マット・マードックに奇妙な運命をもたらす。彼は有害廃棄物を浴びてしまう。
back_translation: Fate brings a strange destiny to the young orphan Matt Murdock. He is exposed to hazardous waste.

text: scorsese does n't give us a character worth giving a damn about .
translation: スコセッシは、気にする価値のあるキャラクターを私たちに与えてくれない。
back_translation: Scorsese doesn't give us characters worth caring about.

text: boasts a handful of virtuosic set pieces and offers a fair amount of trashy , kinky fun .
translation: 見事なセットピースがいくつかあり、軽薄でキンキーな楽しさも程よく提供しています。
back_translation: There are several magnificent set pieces, and it also provides a moderate amount of light-hearted and kinky fun.

text: yet ridiculed on his views toward aids testing by fellow actors and actresses .
translation: 同じく俳優や女優たちにエイズ検査に関する彼の見解を嘲笑された。
back_translation: His views on AIDS testing were also ridiculed by the same actors and actresses.

text: one thing you have to give them credit for : the message of the movie is consistent with the messages espoused in the company 's previous video work .
translation: 彼らに認めるべきことの一つは、映画のメッセージが会社の以前のビデオ作品で掲げられたメッセージと一貫していることです。
back_translation: One thing that should be acknowledged about them is that the message of the movie is consistent with the message presented in the company's previous video works.

text: a movie that amply delivers on the epic promise of its title , entertaining , enlightening , and emboldening viewers with its deceptively simple premise and execution .
translation: そのタイトルの壮大な約束を十分に果たす映画であり、エンターテインメント性が高く、啓発的で、あたかもシンプルに見える前提と実行によって観客を勇気づける。
back_translation: It is a movie that fully fulfills the grand promise of its title, highly entertaining, enlightening, and encourages the audience through what appears to be simple premises and execution.

text: the film is complex , intricate , interesting and almost hypnotizing , till charlie gets stuck ( the screenplay he 's writing is the one you 're watching ) . glad he had the gonads to do what he did then , but it subtracts from the overall entertainment value .
translation: その映画は複雑で、入り組んでいて、面白く、ほとんど催眠的ですが、チャーリーが行き詰まるまで（彼が書いている脚本はあなたが見ているものです）。彼が当時やったことに対して勇気があったことは嬉しいですが、全体のエンターテインメント価値は減少します。
back_translation: The movie is complex, intricate, interesting, and almost hypnotic, but it reaches a dead end with Charlie (the script he is writing is what you are watching). I'm glad he had the courage to do what he did at the time, but the overall entertainment value diminishes.

text: it 's simply delightful to watch an actor like michel serrault do his stuff .
translation: ミシェル・セラウのような俳優が自分の演技をするのを見るのは、本当に楽しいです。
back_translation: It's really enjoyable to watch an actor like Michel Serrault perform.

text: stripped almost entirely of such tools as nudity , profanity and violence , labute does manage to make a few points about modern man and his problematic quest for human connection .
translation: ヌード、侮辱語、暴力といったツールをほとんど完全に排除しているが、ラビュートは現代人と彼の人間的なつながりを求める問題のある探求についていくつかのポイントを伝えることができている。
back_translation: Although it almost completely eliminates tools like nudity, insults, and violence, "Labyuto" can convey some points about the problematic exploration of modern individuals and their search for human connection.

text: it is unclear on how he contracted the virus .
translation: 彼がウイルスに感染した方法は不明です。
back_translation: It is unclear how he became infected with the virus.

text: there 's a bit of thematic meat on the bones of queen of the damned , as its origins in an anne rice novel dictate , but generally , it 's a movie that emphasizes style over character and substance .
translation: 「呪われた女王」には、アン・ライスの小説に起源があるため、テーマ的な肉付けが少しありますが、一般的にはキャラクターや内容よりもスタイルを強調した映画です。
back_translation: "The Cursed Queen" has its origins in Anne Rice's novels, so there is some thematic development, but generally, it is a film that emphasizes style more than character or content.

text: captures that perverse element of the kafkaesque where identity , overnight , is robbed and replaced with a persecuted `` other . ``
translation: アイデンティティが一夜にして奪われ、迫害される「他者」と置き換えられるというカフカ的な正体不明の要素を捉えています。
back_translation: It captures the Kafkaesque element of identity being snatched away overnight and being replaced by the persecuted "other."

text: the boy 's obsessive compulsive parents are played by wendie malick and stephen root .
translation: その少年の強迫観念的な親はウェンディ・マリックとスティーブン・ルートによって演じられています。
back_translation: The boy's obsessive parents are played by Wendy Malick and Stephen Root.

text: 77 minutes of pokemon may not last 4ever , it just seems like it does . my only wish is that celebi could take me back to a time before i saw this movie and i could just skip it .
translation: 77分のポケモンは永遠には続かないかもしれないが、そう感じるだけだ。私の唯一の願いは、セレビィが私をこの映画を見る前の時間に連れて行ってくれて、ただスキップできることだ。
back_translation: The Pokémon of 77 minutes may not last forever, but that's just how it feels. My only wish is for Celebi to take me back to the time before I watched this movie, so that I can simply skip it.

text: filippo , the official translator , believes in her innocence , and conceives a plan for her escape .
translation: フィリッポ、公式の翻訳者は彼女の無実を信じており、彼女の脱出計画を考えています。
back_translation: Filippo believes in her innocence and is planning her escape.

text: journeying from the vietnam war to pulaski , tennessee and back to vietnam , daughter from danang tensely unfolds as cultural differences and the years of separation take their toll in a riveting film about longing and the personal legacy of war .
translation: ベトナム戦争からテネシー州プラスキーへ、そして再びベトナムへ旅するダナン出身の娘が、文化の違いや長年の隔たりが影響を及ぼしながら緊張感を持って展開する、切望と戦争の個人的遺産についての魅力的な映画です。
back_translation: An intriguing film about a daughter from Da Nang who travels from the Vietnam War to Pulaski, Tennessee, and then back to Vietnam, unfolding with tension as it explores personal legacies of longing and war, influenced by cultural differences and years of separation.

text: joanna , a young wife and mother , moves from manhattan to the upper-class suburb of stepford , connecticut .
translation: ジョアンナは、若い妻で母親であり、マンハッタンからコネチカット州の上流階級の郊外ステップフォードに引っ越します。
back_translation: Joanna is a young wife and mother who moves from Manhattan to the upper-class suburb of Stepford in Connecticut.

text: this movie is more fun than many of those tall tales that hollywood calls feature films .
translation: この映画は、ハリウッドがフィーチャーフィルムと呼ぶ多くの大げさな物語よりもさらに楽しいです。
back_translation: This movie is even more fun than many of the elaborate stories that Hollywood calls feature films.

text: skip work to see it at the first opportunity .
translation: 最初の機会にそれを見るために仕事を休む。
back_translation: I will take a day off from work to see it at the first opportunity.

text: it comes off as so silly that you would n't be surprised if ba , murdock and rest of the a-team were seen giving chase in a black and red van .
translation: それはとてもおバカに思えるので、バに、マードックやAチームの他のメンバーが黒と赤のバンで追いかけているのを見ても驚かないでしょう。
back_translation: That seems very silly, so you wouldn't be surprised to see Murdoch and the other members of the A-Team chasing after you in a black and red van.

text: they try real deal get rich quick schemes but nothing pans out .
translation: 彼らは本気で金持ちになるための手っ取り早い方法を試みるが、何も成果が出ない。
back_translation: They seriously try quick methods to become rich, but nothing works.

text: denied political-prisoner-of-war status , he initiates a hunger strike .
translation: 政治的な戦争捕虜としての地位を否定された彼は、ハンガーストライキを始める。
back_translation: Denied his status as a political prisoner of war, he begins a hunger strike.

text: and that 's what you get when sampling the wonderful idiosyncrasies in this love story on espresso .
translation: そして、それはエスプレッソでこのラブストーリーの素晴らしい特異性をサンプリングしたときに得られるものです。
back_translation: And that is what can be obtained when sampling the wonderful uniqueness of this love story with espresso.

text: victor ( leguizamo ) , is trying to escape his life as a drug dealer in the south bronx .
translation: ビクター（レギザモ）は、サウスブロンクスでの麻薬ディーラーの生活から逃げようとしています。
back_translation: Victor (Legizamo) is trying to escape the life of a drug dealer in the South Bronx.

text: high crimes works to keep us involved and make us care .
translation: 高犯罪は私たちを巻き込み、関心を持たせるために働きかけています。
back_translation: High crimes are working to involve us and draw our attention.

text: he gives t-mon the gun , while t-mon tries to get the trick right .
translation: 彼はTモンに銃を渡し、Tモンはそのトリックをうまく決めようとします。
back_translation: He hands the gun to T-Mon, and T-Mon tries to pull off the trick successfully.

text: the contents of which will decide the fate of a nation .
translation: その内容が国の運命を決定する。
back_translation: The content determines the fate of the nation.

text: has no reason to exist , other than to employ hollywood kids and people who owe favors to their famous parents .
translation: 存在する理由がないのは、ハリウッドの子供たちや有名な親に恩を受けている人々を雇うためだけである。
back_translation: The only reason for their existence is to hire Hollywood kids and people who have benefited from famous parents.

text: secretary `` is owned by its costars , spader and gyllenhaal . maggie g . makes an amazing breakthrough in her first starring role and eats up the screen .
translation: 「セクレタリー」はその共演者であるスぺイダーとジレンホールに所有されています。マギー・Gは初めての主演作で素晴らしいブレイクスルーを果たし、スクリーンを圧倒します。
back_translation: "The Secretary" is owned by its co-stars Spader and Gyllenhaal. Maggie G achieves a remarkable breakthrough in her first leading role, dominating the screen.

text: a delightful surprise because despite all the backstage drama , this is a movie that tells stories that work -- is charming , is moving , is funny and looks professional .
translation: 舞台裏のドラマがあっても、この映画は機能するストーリーを語っているため、素晴らしい驚きです。魅力的で、感動的で、面白く、プロフェッショナルに見えます。
back_translation: Even with the drama behind the scenes, this movie tells a functional story, making it a wonderful surprise. It is captivating, moving, interesting, and looks professional.

text: second in a three-part anthology on relationships between humans and aliens .
translation: 人間と異星人の関係に関する三部作の第二部。
back_translation: The second part of a trilogy about the relationship between humans and aliens.

text: it is best appreciated as an immersion in a three-dimensional toyland outfitted with enough whimsical gadgetry to fill a thousand playrooms .
translation: それは、千の遊び部屋を満たすのに十分な whimsical なガジェットで装備された三次元のおもちゃの世界への没入として最も評価されます。
back_translation: It is most appreciated as an immersive 3D toy world equipped with whimsical gadgets enough to fill a thousand playrooms.

text: a distinctly mixed bag , the occasional bursts of sharp writing alternating with lots of sloppiness and the obligatory moments of sentimental ooze .
translation: 明らかに混ざり合った内容で、鋭い文章が時折現れる一方で、多くの雑な部分や必然的な感傷的な部分が交互に続いています。
back_translation: The content is clearly intertwined, with sharp writing occasionally emerging, while many rough parts and inevitably sentimental sections alternate.

text: somewhere short of tremors on the modern b-scene : neither as funny nor as clever , though an agreeably unpretentious way to spend ninety minutes .
translation: 現代のB級シーンにおける地震の少し手前：あまり面白くもなく、また巧妙でもないが、90分を過ごすのに不器用さがなく好ましい方法である。
back_translation: Just before the earthquake in the modern B-movie scene: not particularly interesting or clever, but a clumsy yet pleasant way to pass 90 minutes.

text: as their adopted identity grows , the gang tumbles into a downward spiral of excitement , excess and fun .
translation: 彼らの養子としてのアイデンティティが成長するにつれ、ギャングは興奮、過剰、楽しさの下降スパイラルに陥ります。
back_translation: As their identity as adoptees grows, the gang descends into a downward spiral of excitement, excess, and fun.

text: the movie is beautiful to behold and engages one in a sense of epic struggle -- inner and outer -- that 's all too rare in hollywood 's hastier productions .
translation: その映画は美しく目を引き、内外の壮大な闘いという感覚に人を引き込むもので、ハリウッドの急ぎすぎた作品にはあまり見られないものです。
back_translation: The movie is stunningly eye-catching and draws viewers into a sense of grand battles both inside and out, something that is rarely seen in the rushed productions of Hollywood.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .
translation: それは、素人じみた印象を与えるような気取ったものである。
back_translation: It gives off a pretentious impression that seems amateurish.

text: in the end , ted bundy 's only justification is the director 's common but unexplored fascination with the frustrated maniac ; there 's no larger point , and little social context .
translation: 結局、テッド・バンディの唯一の正当化は、監督が持つ一般的だが未探求の失望した狂人への魅力である。大きな意義はなく、社会的文脈もほとんどない。
back_translation: In the end, Ted Bundy's only justification is the director's common yet unexplored fascination with the disillusioned madman. It holds little significance and has almost no social context.

text: she is married to henry bauford ( linus roache ) son of a wealthy british industrialist , when she encounters nick callahan ( clive owen ) a renegade doctor , whose impassioned plea for help to support his relief efforts in war-torn africa moves her deeply .
translation: 彼女は裕福な英国の実業家の息子、ヘンリー・ボーフォード（ライナス・ローチ）と結婚していますが、戦争で荒廃したアフリカでの救援活動を支援するための彼の情熱的な助けを求める訴えに深く心を動かされる放浪者の医師、ニック・キャラハン（クライヴ・オーウェン）と出会います。
back_translation: She is married to Henry Beaufort (Linus Roache), the son of a wealthy British businessman, but she is deeply moved by the passionate plea for help from Nick Callahan (Clive Owen), a wandering doctor seeking to support relief efforts in war-torn Africa.

text: it 's dumb fun slapped silly , a new franchise inspired by the bond films that 's not far from the porn its title promises ; the film is a veritable orgy of outrageous stunts .
translation: それは無邪気な楽しみであり、バカげたものであり、タイトルが約束するポルノにそれほど遠くない、ボンド映画に触発された新しいフランチャイズです；この映画は途方もないスタントの真のオルギーです。
back_translation: It is an innocent pleasure, a silly thing, and a new franchise inspired by Bond movies that is not too far from the porn promised by the title; this film is a genuine orgy of incredible stunts.

text: discovering the hard way that their involved in witchcraft .
translation: 魔女術に関与していることを嫌でも理解する。
back_translation: I reluctantly come to understand that I am involved in witchcraft.

text: danny is antagonized by undercover narcotics agents ( anthony lapaglia and doug hutchison ) and sadistic dealer pooh bear ( vincent d'onfronio ) .
translation: ダニーは、潜入 narcotics エージェント（アンソニー・ラパリアとダグ・ハッチソン）と、サディスティックなディーラーのプー・ベア（ヴィンセント・ドノフリオ）によって苦しめられています。
back_translation: Danny is being tormented by undercover narcotics agents (Anthony LaPaglia and Doug Hutchison) and the sadistic dealer Pooh Bear (Vincent D'Onofrio).

text: evergon is ultimately a compelling story about the human condition , exploring a young man 's search for love , steady employment and self-respect .
translation: エバーゴンは最終的に、人間の状態についての魅力的な物語であり、若者の愛、安定した雇用、自己尊重を求める探求を探ります。
back_translation: "Evergone" ultimately explores a captivating story about the human condition, focusing on the quest for young love, stable employment, and self-respect.

text: with `` ichi the killer `` , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman . . .
translation: 「イチ　ザ　キラー」において、タカシ・ミイケは、日本の最も過激な映画監督が、バットマン以上に感情的な荷物を背負った犯罪者を描いています。
back_translation: In "Ichi the Killer," Takashi Miike portrays a criminal who carries emotional baggage even heavier than Batman, as one of Japan's most radical filmmakers.

text: a handsome and talented college student , david morales , is devastated when a bum knee causes him to lose his scholarship to the university of san diego .
translation: 大学生のデイビッド・モラレスは、格好良く才能にあふれていますが、膝の怪我によってサンディエゴ大学の奨学金を失ったことで絶望しています。
back_translation: College student David Morales is cool and talented, but he is in despair after losing his scholarship to San Diego University due to a knee injury.

text: stir in some language barriers , cultural faux pas and a bright , young japanese female undergrad , and the intensity of the experience heightens to comical proportions .
translation: 言語の障壁、文化的な失礼、そして明るい若い日本人女性の学部生を絡めると、経験の緊張感はコメディ的なプロポーションに高まります。
back_translation: The tension of the experience reaches comedic proportions when language barriers, cultural misunderstandings, and bright young Japanese female college students are involved.

text: a vile , incoherent mess . . . a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant 'videodrome . '
translation: ひどい、一貫性のない混乱…デヴィッド・クローネンバーグの素晴らしい『ビデオドローム』の悪臭を放つ盗作。
back_translation: Horrible, inconsistent chaos… a stinking rip-off of David Cronenberg's brilliant "Videodrome."

text: a number of new allies join with aragorn , gimli , legolas , pippin and merry .
translation: アラゴルン、ギムリ、レゴラス、ピピン、メリーと共に、多くの新しい同盟者が加わる。
back_translation: Along with Aragorn, Gimli, Legolas, Pippin, and Merry, many new allies will join.

text: a documentary , this film , co-produced by several countries finally became reality .
translation: このドキュメンタリー映画は、数か国によって共同制作され、ついに現実となりました。
back_translation: This documentary film was co-produced by several countries and has finally become a reality.

text: when possum lodge is taken to court by big-shot executive robert stiles ( richard fitzpatrick ) , whose limousine was damaged while parking at the lodge , the boys are ordered to pay $ 10 , 000 in damages within ten days - or their beloved lodge will become property of the town .
translation: ポッサムロッジが高級な経営者ロバート・スタイルズ（リチャード・フィッツパトリック）に訴えられると、彼のリムジンがロッジで駐車中に損傷を受けたため、男たちは10日以内に10,000ドルの損害賠償を支払うよう命じられる。さもなければ、彼らの愛するロッジは町のものになってしまう。
back_translation: When Possum Lodge is sued by the wealthy businessman Robert Stiles (Richard Fitzpatrick), the men are ordered to pay $10,000 in damages within ten days because his limousine was damaged while parked at the lodge. Otherwise, their beloved lodge will become the property of the town.

text: the lead character of bruce is a tribute to the late great martial arts legend and portrays many of the stereotypical characteristics and ideosyncrasies that distinguished his illustrious career .
translation: ブルースの主役キャラクターは、故偉大な武道の伝説へのトリビュートであり、彼の栄光あるキャリアを特徴づけた多くの典型的な特性や奇癖を描写しています。
back_translation: The main character of the blues is a tribute to the late great legend of martial arts, depicting many of the typical traits and quirks that characterized his glorious career.

text: `` the ring `` is pretty much an english-language copy of the film that inspired it , and it carries the same strengths and flaws .
translation: 「ザ・リング」は、それに影響を与えた映画のほぼ英語版であり、同じ強みと欠点を持っています。
back_translation: "The Ring" is almost the English version of the movie that influenced it, possessing the same strengths and weaknesses.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly . she allows each character to confront their problems openly and honestly .
translation: ナイアは問題を軽視しません。彼女は各キャラクターが自分の問題に対して率直に、正直に向き合わせます。
back_translation: Naya does not underestimate problems. She confronts each character with their issues frankly and honestly.

text: told in five parts to represent each of the five senses , the sheltered 25-year-old learns to understand his own senses and those around him .
translation: 五感を表す五つの部分で語られたこの物語では、保護された25歳の若者が自分自身の感覚と周囲の感覚を理解する方法を学びます。
back_translation: In this story, told through five parts representing the five senses, a sheltered 25-year-old learns how to understand his own senses and the senses of his surroundings.

text: but this is 1960 's england , and when the neighbours start to make life difficult for the new arrivals , david 's family are caught in the middle , and he has to choose between fitting in and standing up for the new friends who have turned his world upside down .
translation: しかし、これは1960年代のイングランドであり、隣人たちが新しい住民たちの生活を困難にし始めると、デビッドの家族はその中に巻き込まれ、彼は馴染むことと、自分の世界をひっくり返した新しい友達のために立ち上がることの間で選ばなければなりません。
back_translation: However, this is 1960s England, and as the neighbors begin to make life difficult for the new residents, David's family gets caught in the middle, and he must choose between fitting in and standing up for his new friends who have upended his world.

text: it helps that lil bow wow . . . tones down his pint-sized gangsta act to play someone who resembles a real kid .
translation: リル・バウ・ワウが本物の子供に似たキャラクターを演じるために、彼の小さなギャングスタの演技を抑えているのが助けになっています。
back_translation: Lil Bow Wow's ability to hold back his little gangster persona helps him to portray a character that resembles a real child.

text: the planet however is populated by murderous psychopaths who kill two of the astronauts right away .
translation: しかし、その惑星は殺人狂に満ちており、すぐに2人の宇宙飛行士を殺します。
back_translation: However, that planet is filled with murderers, and soon it kills two astronauts.

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude . it makes sense that he went back to school to check out the girls -- his film is a frat boy 's idea of a good time .
translation: 映画的な花火を除けば、アヴァリーが気にしている唯一のことは、とげのある笑いと美しさです。彼が女の子たちを見るために学校に戻ったのは理解できます—彼の映画はフラット・ボーイの良い時間のアイデアです。
back_translation: Aside from the cinematic fireworks, the only thing Avaly cares about is sharp laughter and beauty. It's understandable that he returned to school to see the girls—his movie is a good time idea for Flat Boy.

text: the script , the gags , the characters are all direct-to-video stuff , and that 's where this film should have remained .
translation: 脚本、ギャグ、キャラクターはすべて直接ビデオ用のものであり、この映画はそこで留まるべきでした。
back_translation: The script, gags, and characters are all directly intended for video, and this movie should have stayed there.

text: if you love the music , and i do , its hard to imagine having more fun watching a documentary . . .
translation: 音楽が好きなら、私もそうですが、ドキュメンタリーを見ながらもっと楽しい時間を過ごすのは想像しづらいです。
back_translation: If you like music, I do too, but it's hard to imagine having a more enjoyable time while watching a documentary.

text: the script is a disaster , with cloying messages and irksome characters .
translation: 脚本はひどいもので、くどいメッセージとうんざりするキャラクターで構成されています。
back_translation: The script is terrible, consisting of tedious messages and frustrating characters.

text: fresh out of a long-term relationship in which she lost custody of a dog , janey passes the end of day on her stoop .
translation: 長期的な関係から抜け出したばかりで、犬の親権を失ったジャニーは、家の前の階段に座って一日の終わりを過ごしている。
back_translation: Just out of a long-term relationship and having lost custody of his dog, Johnny is sitting on the stairs in front of his house, spending the end of the day.

text: just a kiss wants desperately to come off as a fanciful film about the typical problems of average people . but it is set in a world that is very , very far from the one most of us inhabit .
translation: ジャスト・ア・キスは、平均的な人々の典型的な問題についての空想的な映画として必死にアピールしようとしています。しかし、それは私たちのほとんどが住んでいる世界とは非常に、非常に遠い世界を舞台にしています。
back_translation: Just a Kiss is desperately trying to appeal as a fanciful film about the typical problems of average people. However, it is set in a world that is very, very far from the one most of us live in.

text: part travelogue , part road picture , part meditation on class , mortality and intimacy , this extraordinary little movie might be the perfect harbinger of summer , as astute as it is steamy .
translation: 旅行記の一部、ロードムービーの一部、階級、死、親密さについての瞑想の一部であるこの驚異的な小さな映画は、鋭敏でありながらも蒸し暑く、夏の完璧な予兆かもしれません。
back_translation: This astonishing little film, which is part travelogue, part road movie, and part meditation on class, death, and intimacy, may be both sharp and steamy, making it a perfect harbinger of summer.

text: a woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of angelo , a major mafia boss , decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman .
translation: 最近、彼女が大物マフィアボスのアンジェロの娘であることを発見した女性は、ヒットマンによって彼が殺されたときに復讐を決意します。
back_translation: Recently, a woman who discovered that she is the daughter of the powerful mafia boss Angelo decides to seek revenge when he is killed by a hitman.

text: the two jedi are then sent on two different missions , anakin is sent to naboo with padme and obi-wan is sent to the planet of kamino where he will investigate the assassination attempts .
translation: 2人のジェダイはそれぞれ異なる任務に派遣され、アナキンはパドメと共にナブーへ、オビ＝ワンはカミーノの惑星に送られ、そこで暗殺未遂事件を調査することになります。
back_translation: Two Jedi are dispatched on different missions; Anakin goes to Naboo with Padmé, while Obi-Wan is sent to the planet Kamino to investigate an assassination attempt.

text: one day , his own name arrives in the `` perpetrator `` chute , and the precogs predict that he will kill a man he never knew in less than 36 hours .
translation: ある日、彼自身の名前が「加害者」のシュートに届き、予知能力者たちは彼が36時間以内に知らない男を殺すと予測します。
back_translation: One day, a shootout reaches him bearing his own name as "the perpetrator," and the seers predict that he will kill an unknown man within 36 hours.

text: . . . unlikable , uninteresting , unfunny , and completely , utterly inept .
translation: …好かれない、興味を引かない、面白くない、そして完全に、まったく無能です。
back_translation: ...not liked, uninteresting, not funny, and completely, utterly incompetent.

text: a young african american man , quickly closing in on the much sought after american dream , comes to terms with the fact that no amount of success can shield him from the ills that face our society .
translation: 成功を追い求める若いアフリカ系アメリカ人男性は、アメリカンドリームに近づいていく中で、成功の量が社会が抱える悪から彼を守ることはできないという事実を受け入れる。
back_translation: A young African American man pursuing success comes to accept the reality that the amount of success cannot protect him from the evils that society faces as he approaches the American Dream.

text: when perry fists a bull at the moore farm , it 's only a matter of time before he gets the upper hand in matters of the heart .
translation: ペリーがムーア農場で牛を殴ると、彼が心の問題で優位に立つのは時間の問題だ。
back_translation: When Perry punches a cow at Moore Farm, it's only a matter of time before he gains the upper hand with his mental issues.

text: the clues are few and time is running out for the students of rogers high school .
translation: 手がかりは少なく、ロジャー高校の生徒たちの時間は迫っている。
back_translation: Clues are scarce, and time is running out for the students of Roger High School.

text: few films this year have been as resolute in their emotional nakedness .
translation: 今年、感情の裸さにおいてこれほど決然とした映画はほとんどありません。
back_translation: This year, there are hardly any films as resolute in their emotional bare-nakedness as this one.

text: for his drug is not dope or crack or smack . . .
translation: 彼の薬はドラッグでもクラックでもスラングでもない。
back_translation: His drug is neither a drug, crack, nor slang.

text: i do n't even care that there 's no plot in this antonio banderas-lucy liu faceoff . it 's still terrible !
translation: このアントニオ・バンデラスとルーシー・リューの対決にはプロットがないことはどうでもいいですが、それでもひどいです！
back_translation: It doesn't matter that there is no plot in this showdown between Antonio Banderas and Lucy Liu, but it's still terrible!

text: lynn tells sue she wants to stop their criminal life and get married ^ & # 214 ; she wo n't accept chow nunn 's order for the second killing .
translation: リンはスーに、彼女の犯罪生活をやめて結婚したいと言います。彼女はチャウ・ナンの二度目の殺人の命令を受け入れません。
back_translation: Rin tells Su that she wants to quit her life of crime and get married. She refuses to accept Chow Nan's order for a second murder.

text: to define 'family ' , guy must seek beyond what he can see , touch , taste , smell or hear .
translation: 「家族」を定義するために、男は目に見えるもの、触れるもの、味わうもの、嗅ぐもの、聞くものを超えて探求しなければならない。
back_translation: To define "family," one must explore beyond what can be seen, touched, tasted, smelled, and heard.

text: tian emphasizes the isolation of these characters by confining color to liyan 's backyard .
translation: 天は、色をリヤンの裏庭に制限することで、これらのキャラクターの孤立を強調しています。
back_translation: The heavens emphasize the isolation of these characters by limiting color to Rian's backyard.

text: meanwhile the kids find a stray dog who needs a home .
translation: その間、子供たちは家を必要とする捨て犬を見つけます。
back_translation: During that time, the children find a stray dog that needs a home.

text: in fact a blueprint : a blueprint of her mother .
translation: 実際、設計図です：彼女の母親の設計図。
back_translation: In fact, it's a blueprint: her mother's blueprint.

text: clara has gone wild after her mother runs off with another man .
translation: クララは母親が他の男と駆け落ちした後、野生化しています。
back_translation: Clara has been wild since her mother ran away with another man.

text: his songs are no longer seen as top grade .
translation: 彼の曲はもはや一流とは見なされなくなった。
back_translation: His music is no longer considered to be top-notch.

text: retired nfl linebacker , `` terrible `` terry tate enforces the office rules at the felcher and sons ' headquarters the only way he knows how : with bone-crushing tackles and hard-core trash-talk .
translation: 引退したNFLラインバッカーの「テリブル」テリー・テイトは、フェルチャー＆サンズの本社でオフィスのルールを彼が知っている唯一の方法で強制します：骨を砕くタックルとハードコアな trash-talk で。
back_translation: Retired NFL linebacker "Terrible" Terry Tate enforces the office rules at Felcher & Sons in the only way he knows how: with bone-crunching tackles and hardcore trash-talk.

text: a strong first quarter , slightly less so second quarter , and average second half .
translation: 強い第1四半期、やや劣る第2四半期、そして平均的な下半期。
back_translation: Strong first quarter, somewhat weaker second quarter, and an average second half.

text: 'the war of the roses , ' trailer-trash style . entertaining but like shooting fish in a barrel .
translation: 「バラ戦争」、トレーラーごみスタイル。面白いけれど、的が外れた魚を撃つようなもの。
back_translation: "War of the Roses," trailer garbage style. It's interesting, but it's like shooting at fish that miss the target.

text: as a kind of colorful , dramatized pbs program , frida gets the job done . but , for that , why not watch a documentary ?
translation: 色とりどりでドラマチックなPBSの番組として、フリーダは仕事を成し遂げます。しかし、それならなぜドキュメンタリーを観ないのでしょうか？
back_translation: As a colorful and dramatic PBS program, Frida gets the job done. But then, why not just watch a documentary?

text: all in all , it 's a pretty good execution of a story that 's a lot richer than the ones hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own .
translation: 全体的に見て、これはハリウッドのアクション脚本家が通常自分たちで考え出す物語よりも遥かに豊かなストーリーの良い実行例です。
back_translation: Overall, this is a good example of a richly developed story that is far beyond what Hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own.

text: a loyal british drummer , one of the thousands of british soldiers stationed in america , accidently drops his canteen into a stream while trying to fill it with water .
translation: 忠実なイギリスのドラマー、アメリカに駐留する何千人ものイギリス兵の一人が、水を入れようとして水流の中に水筒をうっかり落としてしまう。
back_translation: A faithful British drummer, one of the thousands of British soldiers stationed in America, accidentally drops his canteen into the stream while trying to fill it with water.

text: can the three dons outwit them and not get bluffed by their obvious charms ?
translation: 三人のドンたちは彼らの明らかな魅力に騙されず、出し抜くことができるだろうか？
back_translation: Will the three dons be able to outsmart them without being deceived by their obvious charm?

text: as a result of one of his liaisons , he meets marcus , an odd 12-year-old boy with problems at school .
translation: 彼の関係の結果、学校で問題を抱えた奇妙な12歳の少年マーカスと出会う。
back_translation: He meets a strange 12-year-old boy named Marcus who has problems at school as a result of his relationship.

text: fails to satisfactorily exploit its gender politics , genre thrills or inherent humor .
translation: その性別政治、ジャンルのスリル、または内在するユーモアを満足に活用することができない。
back_translation: It is unable to adequately utilize the politics of gender, the thrill of the genre, or the inherent humor.

text: vile and tacky are the two best adjectives to describe ghost ship .
translation: ゴーストシップを表現するのに最も適した形容詞は「不快で安っぽい」です。
back_translation: The most suitable adjective to describe a ghost ship is "unpleasant and cheap."

text: . . . very funny , very enjoyable . . .
translation: とても面白い、とても楽しい。。。
back_translation: Very interesting, very fun...

text: it understands , in a way that speaks forcefully enough about the mechanisms of poverty to transcend the rather simplistic filmmaking .
translation: 貧困のメカニズムについて力強く語る方法で理解されており、やや単純な映画制作を超越しています。
back_translation: It is understood in a way that powerfully discusses the mechanics of poverty, transcending somewhat simplistic filmmaking.

text: spanning from post world war ii during the late 1950 's through the irish mob wars of the 1970 's and culminating in their adulthood in the 1990 's , the story is set to the backdrop of backroom politics and the realities of the irish mob and it 's gang wars .
translation: 第二次世界大戦後の1950年代後半から1970年代のアイルランド系マフィアの抗争を経て、1990年代の彼らの成人期に至るまでの物語は、裏政治とアイルランド系マフィアの現実、そしてそのギャング戦争を背景に展開されます。
back_translation: The story spans from the late 1950s to the 1970s, covering the conflict of the Irish mob after World War II, and leads into their adulthood in the 1990s, unfolding against the backdrop of underground politics, the realities of the Irish mob, and the gang wars.

text: in the vein of raiders of the lost ark , this action packed thriller takes us on a roller coaster ride from the bone chilling cold of moscow to the mystical beauty of india .
translation: 「レイダース 失われたアークの謎」の雰囲気を受け継いだこのアクション満載のスリラーは、モスクワの骨の髄まで凍るような寒さからインドの神秘的な美しさへと、私たちを絶叫マシンのような旅へと導きます。
back_translation: This action-packed thriller, which inherits the atmosphere of "Raiders of the Lost Ark," takes us on a rollercoaster journey from the bone-chilling cold of Moscow to the mysterious beauty of India.

text: he comes back , calling himself the master , and becomes a charismatic spiritual leader , running a teen shelter in hollywood .
translation: 彼は戻ってきて、自分をマスターと呼び、ハリウッドでティーンシェルターを運営するカリスマ的な精神的指導者となります。
back_translation: He comes back, calls himself the Master, and becomes a charismatic spiritual leader running a teen shelter in Hollywood.

text: not really bad so much as distasteful : we need kidnapping suspense dramas right now like we need doomsday thrillers .
translation: 悪くはないけれど、嫌悪感を抱かせるものです：今、私たちが必要としているのは、終末論スリラーのように、誘拐サスペンスドラマです。
back_translation: It's not bad, but it evokes a sense of disgust: what we need now is a kidnapping suspense drama like an apocalyptic thriller.

text: the beatle fan is a drama about albert , a psychotic prisoner who is a devoted fan of john lennon and the beatles .
translation: ビートルファンは、ジョン・レノンとビートルズの熱心なファンである精神的に不安定な囚人アルバートについてのドラマです。
back_translation: The story is about Albert, a mentally unstable prisoner who is an enthusiastic fan of John Lennon and the Beatles.

text: scherfig 's light-hearted profile of emotional desperation is achingly honest and delightfully cheeky .
translation: シャーフィックの軽快な感情的絶望のプロフィールは、痛々しいほど正直で魅力的に cheeky です。
back_translation: Shafiq's buoyant emotional despair is painfully honest and charmingly cheeky.

text: accompanied by his assistant bough ( ben miller ) , johnny bungles his way through one scrape after another .
translation: 彼の助手バウ（ベン・ミラー）に付き添われ、ジョニーはあちこちで失敗を繰り返します。
back_translation: Accompanied by his assistant Bowe (Ben Miller), Johnny repeatedly makes mistakes here and there.

text: all ms . jovovich , as the sanctified heroine , has to do is look radiant , grimly purposeful and mildly alarmed while forcing open doors , wielding wrenches and fleeing monsters .
translation: すべてのミラ・ジョヴォヴィッチは、神聖なヒロインとして、扉をこじ開け、レンチを振るい、モンスターから逃げる中で、輝かしく、厳しい目的意識を持ち、やや警戒した表情を見せるだけでよい。
back_translation: All of Mira Jovovich should do is shine with a brilliant, intense sense of purpose, prying doors open, swinging wrenches, and escaping from monsters, while showing a somewhat cautious expression as a sacred heroine.

text: by the end of the day , everybody is nervous and tensions gets high .
translation: 一日の終わりには、皆が緊張して高まっていきます。
back_translation: At the end of the day, everyone gets tense and excited.

text: it is a story about finding yourself when you did n't even know you were looking .
translation: 自分を探していることすら知らなかったときに、自分を見つける話です。
back_translation: This is a story about finding oneself when I didn't even know I was searching for myself.

text: if you can keep your eyes open amid all the blood and gore , you 'll see del toro has brought unexpected gravity to blade ii .
translation: 血と死体の中で目を開けていられれば、デル・トロが「ブレイド II」に予想外の重みをもたらしたことがわかるだろう。
back_translation: If you can keep your eyes open amidst the blood and corpses, you'll realize that Del Toro brought unexpected weight to "Blade II."

text: it was only a matter of time before some savvy producer saw the potential success inherent in the mixture of bullock bubble and hugh goo .
translation: それは、いくつかの賢いプロデューサーがブルックバブルとヒューグーの組み合わせに内在する成功の可能性を見出すのが時間の問題に過ぎなかった。
back_translation: It was only a matter of time before some clever producers discovered the potential for success inherent in the combination of Brook Bubble and Hugoo.

text: juwanna mann follows the story of jamal jeffries ( miguel a . nunez , jr . ) , the reigning 'bad boy ' of basketball , whose undisciplined on-court antics land him out of the league and without any prospects .
translation: 『ジュワナ・マン』は、ジャマール・ジェフリーズ（ミゲル・A・ヌネス・ジュニア）の物語を追っています。彼はバスケットボール界の「悪童」として君臨していますが、その自制心のないコート上での行動が原因でリーグから追放され、将来の見通しもなくなってしまいます。
back_translation: "Juwana Man" follows the story of Jamal Jeffries (played by Miguel A. Nunez Jr.). He reigns as the "bad boy" of the basketball world, but his out-of-control behavior on the court leads to his expulsion from the league, leaving him with no prospects for the future.

text: in india , with ben 's help , the couple intends to retrieve their ailing sick daughter , who is stuck in a buddhist monastery in a far off and remote village .
translation: インドで、ベンの助けを借りて、そのカップルは遠く離れた村の仏教寺院にいる病気の娘を取り戻すつもりです。
back_translation: In India, with Ben's help, the couple intends to bring back their sick daughter from a Buddhist temple in a distant village.

text: 'stages ' is the story of a day in the life of brad and scott , two actors who starred in a tv series twenty years ago .
translation: 「ステージ」は、20年前にテレビシリーズに出演した俳優ブラッドとスコットの一日の物語です。
back_translation: "Stage" is a story about a day in the life of actors Brad and Scott, who appeared in a television series 20 years ago.

text: [ n ] o matter how much good will the actors generate , showtime eventually folds under its own thinness .
translation: いくら俳優たちが良い意志を生み出しても、ショータイムは最終的にその薄さに耐えられなくなる。
back_translation: No matter how much good will the actors generate, Showtime will ultimately be unable to withstand its thinness.

text: being author wells ' great-grandson , you 'd think filmmaker simon wells would have more reverence for the material . but this costly dud is a far cry from either the book or the beloved film .
translation: 著者ウェルズの曾孫であるサイモン・ウェルズ監督は、素材に対してもっと敬意を持っていると思うかもしれません。しかし、この高額な失敗作は、原作や愛されている映画とはまったく異なります。
back_translation: You might think that director Simon Wells, the great-grandson of author Wells, has more respect for the source material. However, this expensive failure is completely different from the original work and the beloved film.

text: this is a poster movie , a mediocre tribute to films like them !
translation: これは映画のポスターで、彼らのような映画への平凡な賛辞です！
back_translation: This is a movie poster, a mundane tribute to movies like theirs!

text: to his surprise , he makes it , but now the real challenge begins - to cease being jamal and start new life as juwanna .
translation: 彼は驚いたことに成功したが、今や本当の挑戦が始まる - ジャマールをやめてジュワンナとして新しい人生を始めることだ。
back_translation: To his surprise, he succeeded, but now the real challenge begins - starting a new life as Juana instead of Jamal.

text: watching the chemistry between freeman and judd , however , almost makes this movie worth seeing . almost .
translation: フリーマンとジャッドの間の化学反応を見ることは、ほぼこの映画を見る価値がある。ほぼ。
back_translation: Seeing the chemical reaction between Freeman and Judd is almost worth watching this movie. Almost.

text: dale desperately tries everything to try and calm him down , until the horrors in the dark make him realize brian had good reason to be so afraid !
translation: デールは彼を落ち着かせるために必死になってあらゆる手段を試みるが、暗闇の恐怖が彼にブライアンがそんなに恐れる理由があることを気づかせる！
back_translation: Dale desperately tries various means to calm him down, but the fear of darkness makes him realize that Brian has a reason to be so afraid!

text: the obligatory break-ups and hook-ups do n't seem to have much emotional impact on the characters .
translation: 必然的な別れやフックアップは、キャラクターにあまり感情的な影響を与えないようです。
back_translation: Inevitably, separations and hookups seem to have little emotional impact on the characters.

text: the entire movie is so formulaic and forgettable that it 's hardly over before it begins to fade from memory .
translation: 映画全体があまりにも型にはまっていて忘れられないほどで、始まるや否や記憶から薄れていく。
back_translation: The entire film is so formulaic that it's easily forgettable, fading from memory as soon as it begins.

text: peter and martin - the two chefs - want to get him out and soon father and son meet for the first time in their lives .
translation: ピーターとマーティン - その2人のシェフ - は彼を早く外に出そうとしています。そして、父と息子は人生で初めて出会います。
back_translation: Peter and Martin - the two chefs - are trying to get him outside quickly. And, for the first time in their lives, the father and son meet.

text: an intelligent and sobering look at a person 's self worth , and the measures he or she will take to restore it .
translation: 人の自己価値を見つめ直し、それを回復するために彼または彼女が講じる手段についての知的で深く考えさせられる視点。
back_translation: An intellectual and thought-provoking perspective on reexamining a person's self-worth and the means by which he or she seeks to restore it.

text: accompanying them is jon 's `` soulmate , `` todd , a 35-year old businessman recklessly reliving his adolescence , plus other `` circuit friends `` the boys make along the way .
translation: 彼らに同行しているのは、ジョンの「ソウルメイト」であるトッドで、35歳のビジネスマンであり、あやふやに青春時代を再現している。そして、道中で少年たちが出会う他の「サーキットの友達」もいる。
back_translation: Accompanying them is Todd, John's "soulmate," a 35-year-old businessman who is vaguely recreating his youth. There are also other "circuit friends" that the boys meet along the way.

text: fred , daphne , velma , shaggy and scooby soon realize that they can not solve this mystery without help from each other .
translation: フレッド、ダフネ、ヴェルマ、シャギー、そしてスクービーは、お互いの助けなしではこの謎を解決できないことをすぐに理解します。
back_translation: Fred, Daphne, Velma, Shaggy, and Scooby quickly realize that they cannot solve this mystery without each other's help.

text: miller tells this very compelling tale with little fuss or noise , expertly plucking tension from quiet .
translation: ミラーは、静けさから緊張感を巧みに引き出し、余計な騒ぎもなく非常に魅力的な物語を語ります。
back_translation: The mirror skillfully draws tension from stillness and tells a very captivating story without any unnecessary fuss.

text: will raja be able to convince the doctor and munnabhai about his love ?
translation: ラジャはドクターとムンナバイに自分の愛を納得させることができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Can Raja convince the doctor and Munna Bhai of his love?

text: in order get loan sharks off his back , he must finish his novel in 30 days or wind up dead .
translation: 彼は小説を30日以内に完成させなければならず、そうしなければ死んでしまうため、融資業者から逃れることができない。
back_translation: He must complete the novel within 30 days, and if he doesn't, he will die, so he cannot escape from the lenders.

text: but his yearning for expression , love and devotion stays unsatisfied .
translation: しかし、彼の表現、愛、献身への渇望は満たされないままです。
back_translation: However, his expression, desire for love, and dedication remain unfulfilled.

text: not one to be left behind , munnabhai also follows them and all beans are spilled when the doctor comes to know about raja and komal 's affair and munnabhai 's intentions .
translation: 置いてけぼりにされたくないムンナバイも彼らを追いかけ、医者がラジャとコマルの affair とムンナバイの意図を知ったとき、すべての秘密が明らかになります。
back_translation: Munna Bhai, who doesn't want to be left behind, chases after them, and when the doctor learns about the affair between Raja and Komal and Munna Bhai's intentions, all the secrets come to light.

text: perfectly enjoyable , instantly forgettable , nothing to write home about .
translation: 完璧に楽しめるが、すぐに忘れてしまう、特筆すべきことはない。
back_translation: It can be enjoyed perfectly, but is quickly forgotten; there's nothing noteworthy about it.

text: the story is set in a place called attic town , where the great syndicate robs and kills anyone who stands in their way .
translation: 物語はアティックタウンという場所に設定されており、そこでは大 Syndicate が彼らの邪魔をする誰にでも略奪や殺害を行います。
back_translation: The story is set in a place called Attic Town, where a large Syndicate plunders and murders anyone who gets in their way.

text: she may not be real , but the laughs are .
translation: 彼女は本物ではないかもしれませんが、笑いは本物です。
back_translation: She may not be real, but the laughter is real.

text: an energizing , intoxicating documentary charting the rise of hip-hop culture in general and the art of scratching ( or turntablism ) in particular .
translation: ヒップホップ文化の台頭、特にスクラッチング（ターンテーブリズム）の技術を追った、活気に満ち、魅惑的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A vibrant and captivating documentary that traces the rise of hip-hop culture, particularly the technique of scratching (turntablism).

text: i have two words to say about reign of fire . great dragons !
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」について二言言えば、素晴らしいドラゴンです！
back_translation: If I had to say two things about "Reign of Fire," it's a wonderful dragon!

text: this film puts wang at the forefront of china 's sixth generation of film makers .
translation: この映画は、中国の第六世代の映画製作者の最前線にワンを立たせています。
back_translation: This film places Wang at the forefront of China's sixth-generation filmmakers.

text: a high-spirited buddy movie about the reunion of berlin anarchists who face arrest 15 years after their crime .
translation: 犯罪から15年後に逮捕の危機に直面するベルリンのアナーキストたちの再会を描いた、活気に満ちたバディムービー。
back_translation: A lively buddy movie depicting the reunion of anarchists in Berlin facing the crisis of arrest 15 years after committing a crime.

text: kilo decides to learn how to prosper in the drug world and his new life as a dealer begins .
translation: キロは薬の世界で成功する方法を学ぶことを決め、ディーラーとしての新しい生活が始まる。
back_translation: Kilo decides to learn how to succeed in the world of drugs, and a new life as a dealer begins.

text: these four robbed a bank and hijacked an entire town for 3 days .
translation: この四人は銀行を襲い、町全体を3日間占拠しました。
back_translation: These four people robbed a bank and occupied the entire town for three days.

text: to show these characters in the act and give them no feelings of remorse -- and to cut repeatedly to the flashback of the original rape -- is overkill to the highest degree .
translation: これらのキャラクターを行動中に示し、悔いの感情を持たせず、元の強姦のフラッシュバックに繰り返し切り替えることは、極度のやりすぎです。
back_translation: Showing these characters in action, without conveying feelings of regret, and repeatedly switching back to the original flashbacks of the assault is extremely excessive.

text: five screenwriters are credited with the clichM-i-laden screenplay ; it seems as if each watered down the version of the one before .
translation: 5人の脚本家がありきたりな脚本にクレジットされていますが、各自が前の脚本のバージョンを薄めたように思えます。
back_translation: Five screenwriters are credited for a conventional script, but it seems each diluted the previous version of the script.

text: a team of professional thieves are hired to rob a jewelry exchange .
translation: プロの泥棒チームが宝石交換所を襲うよう雇われる。
back_translation: A professional robbery team is hired to raid a jewel exchange.

text: at the end a 50-foot high , neon-lit , wooden effigy is burned , igniting a wild , tribal , all-night celebration .
translation: 最後に、50フィートの高さのネオンで照らされた木製の像が燃やされ、野性的で部族的な一晩中の祝祭が始まる。
back_translation: Finally, a 50-foot tall wooden statue illuminated by neon is burned, marking the beginning of a wild and tribal festival that lasts all night.

text: when petty thief cosimo ( luis guzman ) is given the plan for the perfect heist from a lifer in prison - the kind of job you dream about - he has to get out of jail , fast .
translation: petty thiefコジモ（ルイス・グズマン）は、刑務所の終身刑を受けた囚人から完璧な強盗の計画を聞かされます - 夢に描くような仕事です - 彼は急いで脱獄しなければなりません。
back_translation: Petty thief Cosimo (Luis Guzmán) hears about a perfect robbery plan from a prisoner serving a life sentence - a dream job - and he must quickly escape from prison.

text: as with too many studio pics , plot mechanics get in the way of what should be the lighter-than-air adventure .
translation: 多くのスタジオ作品と同様に、プロットの仕組みが本来は軽やかな冒険であるはずのものを妨げている。
back_translation: Like many studio works, the structure of the plot hinders what should originally be a light-hearted adventure.

text: while there prove to be a lot of pitches to be thrown before he makes it off the mound , big-league dreams are revived , and there 's no telling where he could go .
translation: 彼がマウンドを離れる前に投げなければならない球はたくさんありますが、メジャーリーグの夢は復活し、彼がどこに行くかは誰にもわかりません。
back_translation: He has to throw a lot of pitches before leaving the mound, but the dream of the Major Leagues has been revived, and no one knows where he will go.
