text: great trash , one of those mediocre movies that in its own crass way is more enjoyable than most things that get nominated for oscars .
translation: 大したゴミだ、そんな平凡な映画の一つで、その砕けた方法でオスカーにノミネートされるものよりもずっと楽しめる。
back_translation: It's a real piece of garbage, just one of those mediocre movies, and it's much more enjoyable than something that gets nominated for an Oscar in that broken way.

text: makes an aborbing if arguable case for the man 's greatness .
translation: 男性の偉大さについて、議論の余地はあるものの、魅力的な主張を展開している。
back_translation: While there is room for debate about the greatness of men, it presents an intriguing argument.

text: anything anyone tells her to do , she must obey .
translation: 彼女は誰が何を言っても従わなければならない。
back_translation: She must obey whatever anyone says.

text: familiar stranger chronicles stacy krebbs , a 19-year-old college student : who is viciously attacked one night in her home by a mysterious stalker .
translation: 親しい見知らぬ人の軌跡：19歳の大学生ステイシー・クレブス。彼女はある晩、自宅で謎のストーカーに viciously attacked (激しく襲われる)。
back_translation: The trajectory of a close stranger: 19-year-old college student Stacy Krebs. One night, she was viciously attacked by a mysterious stalker at her home.

text: he 's got the rap , the charm and his little black book weighs several pounds .
translation: 彼はラップの才能と魅力を持ち、彼の小さな黒い本は数ポンドの重さがあります。
back_translation: He has talent and charm for rap, and his small black book weighs a few pounds.

text: one of the best films that showcase a romance within the context of an artistic movement
translation: 芸術運動の文脈の中でロマンスを描いた最高の映画の一つ
back_translation: One of the greatest films depicting romance within the context of an artistic movement.

text: the story follows a university of texas professor , dr . david gale , an advocate for the abolishment of capital punishment , who is falsly convicted of rape and murder of another activist .
translation: 物語は、テキサス大学の教授であるデイビッド・ゲイル博士が、死刑制度廃止の支持者である彼が、別の活動家の強姦と殺人で誤って有罪判決を受ける様子を追っています。
back_translation: The story follows Dr. David Gale, a professor at the University of Texas, who is a supporter of the abolition of the death penalty and finds himself mistakenly convicted of the rape and murder of another activist.

text: it offers little beyond the momentary joys of pretty and weightless intellectual entertainment .
translation: それは、美しく軽快な知的エンターテインメントの一時的な喜び以上のものをほとんど提供しません。
back_translation: It offers little more than a temporary pleasure of beautiful and light intellectual entertainment.

text: in the end family , good friends , and a supportive community rally to help him once again find joy .
translation: 最終的に、家族や良い友人、そして支え合うコミュニティが再び彼が喜びを見つける手助けをします。
back_translation: Ultimately, family, good friends, and a supportive community will help him find joy again.

text: you 're not merely watching history , you 're engulfed by it .
translation: あなたは単に歴史を見ているのではなく、歴史に飲み込まれているのです。
back_translation: You are not just looking at history; you are being engulfed by it.

text: as the story unfolds , the real intentions of the little devil become clear .
translation: 物語が進むにつれて、小さな悪魔の本当の意図が明らかになっていく。
back_translation: As the story progresses, the true intentions of the little demon become clear.

text: spencer meets paula in a hairsalon where he is getting his hair cut .
translation: スペンサーは美容院で髪を切っているときにパウラと出会います。
back_translation: Spencer meets Paula while getting a haircut at the salon.

text: john , a computer whiz on the rebound from a disastrous break-up , starts an adult internet site with his roommate , moe .
translation: ジョンは、ひどい別れから立ち直りつつあるコンピュータの達人で、ルームメイトのモーと一緒に大人向けのインターネットサイトを始めます。
back_translation: John, a computer expert who is recovering from a terrible breakup, starts an adult-oriented website with his roommate Mo.

text: colt seeks the repair of a femininity damaged by an earlier incest .
translation: コルトは、以前の近親相姦によって傷つけられた女性らしさの修復を求めています。
back_translation: Colt is seeking to restore femininity that has been damaged by previous incest.

text: it 's mired in a shabby script that piles layer upon layer of action man clichM-i atop wooden dialogue and a shifting tone that falls far short of the peculiarly moral amorality of [ woo 's ] best work .
translation: それは、木製の対話の上に行動マンのクリシェを重ねたみすぼらしい脚本にまみれており、[ウーの] 最高の作品が持つ特有の道徳的非道徳性には遠く及ばない移り変わるトーンになっています。
back_translation: It is mired in a shabby script that layers the clichés of action heroes on a wooden dialogue, and it falls far short of the unique moral immorality that is characteristic of [Wu's] greatest works, resulting in a fluctuating tone.

text: winds up being both revelatory and narcissistic , achieving some honest insight into relationships that most high-concept films candy-coat with pat storylines , precious circumstances and beautiful stars .
translation: 結果的に啓発的かつ自己陶酔的であり、多くのハイコンセプト映画が単純なストーリーライン、貴重な状況、美しいスターたちで美化する関係性についての誠実な洞察を達成しています。
back_translation: Ultimately, it is both enlightening and self-indulgent, achieving sincere insight into relationships that many high-concept films embellish with simple storylines, precious situations, and beautiful stars.

text: far from a bad film , and at least two of its central trio of performances provide moments of disarming grace , but do n't be surprised if a whiff of self-congratulation emanates from the screen .
translation: 悪い映画とは程遠く、中央のトリオのパフォーマンスのうち少なくとも2つは心を打つ瞬間を提供しているが、画面から自己満足の香りが漂ってきても驚かないでほしい。
back_translation: Far from being a bad movie, at least two of the performances from the central trio provide emotionally impactful moments, but don't be surprised if a scent of self-satisfaction wafts from the screen.

text: as the day unfolds , the decisions become clearer and yet more difficult to make as the characters question what the true meaning of their lives are .
translation: 日が進むにつれて、決断は明確になりつつあるが、それと同時にキャラクターたちは自分たちの人生の本当の意味について疑問を抱き、より難しい決断を下すことになる。
back_translation: As the days go by, the decisions are becoming clearer, but at the same time, the characters begin to question the true meaning of their lives and face more difficult choices.

text: dead bodies are being found in the new york harbor .
translation: ニューヨーク港で死体が発見されています。
back_translation: A corpse has been discovered in New York Harbor.

text: the man 's life is thrown into jeopardy when a teenage boy escapes with the only key to the dealer 's merchandise , leaving him little time to finish the deal , find his daughter and make it out of the country alive .
translation: 男の人生は、ティーンエイジャーの少年がディーラーの商品の唯一の鍵を持って逃げ出したことで危険な状況に追い込まれる。彼は取引を終わらせ、娘を見つけ、無事に国を出るための時間がほとんどない。
back_translation: A man's life is thrown into a dangerous situation when a teenage boy escapes with the only key to the dealer's goods. He has little time to finish the deal, find his daughter, and safely leave the country.

text: during quinn 's surveillance of tasha , planning for the perfect moment to make his kill , he becomes infatuated with her beauty and pure innocence .
translation: クインはタシャの監視中、完璧な瞬間を狙って殺す計画を立てていたが、彼女の美しさと純粋な無垢さに魅了されてしまう。
back_translation: Quinn was watching Tasha, planning to kill her at the perfect moment, but he became captivated by her beauty and pure innocence.

text: enlisted for a dangerous covert mission , he must combat a clever , organized , and ruthless enemy far beyond the scope of his experience .
translation: 危険な極秘任務に従事することになり、彼は自分の経験を遥かに超えた巧妙で組織的、かつ容赦ない敵と戦わなければならない。
back_translation: He is tasked with a dangerous top-secret mission, where he must fight against a cunning, organized, and relentless enemy that far exceeds his own experience.

text: . . . with `` the bourne identity `` we return to the more traditional action genre .
translation: 「ボーン・アイデンティティ」で、私たちはより伝統的なアクションジャンルに戻ります。
back_translation: In "The Bourne Identity," we return to a more traditional action genre.

text: she and her daughter flee to find sylvie 's first love in the countryside .
translation: 彼女と彼女の娘は田舎でシルビーの初恋を探すために逃げる。
back_translation: She and her daughter escape to the countryside to search for Sylvie's first love.

text: exhausted and physically drained , they slowly pack up their equipment as the dawn light gradually builds and the emotional impact of the night 's events deepens .
translation: 疲れ果て、肉体的に消耗した彼らは、夜の出来事の感情的な影響が深まる中、徐々に移り行く夜明けの光に合わせて道具をゆっくりと片付けていく。
back_translation: Exhausted and physically drained, they slowly start to put away their tools in sync with the gradually advancing dawn light, as the emotional impact of the night’s events deepens.

text: interview with the assassin is structured less as a documentary and more as a found relic , and as such the film has a difficult time shaking its blair witch project real-time roots .
translation: 「アサシンとのインタビュー」は、ドキュメンタリーというよりも発見された遺物のように構成されており、そのためこの映画はブレア・ウィッチ・プロジェクトのリアルタイムなルーツから抜け出すのが難しい。
back_translation: "The Interview with the Assassin" is structured more like a discovered artifact than a documentary, which makes it difficult for this film to escape the real-time roots of the Blair Witch Project.

text: nicklas lives a pretty normal teenage life , until one day , not far from graduation , when a gangster from his school beats him up .
translation: ニクラスはかなり普通のティーンエイジャーの生活を送っていたが、卒業まであまり遠くないある日、学校のギャングに襲われてしまう。
back_translation: Niklas was leading a pretty normal teenager's life, but one day, not too far from graduation, he was attacked by a school gang.

text: the movie does n't think much of its characters , its protagonist , or of us .
translation: その映画は登場人物や主人公、そして私たちをあまり重視していません。
back_translation: The movie does not emphasize the characters, the protagonist, or us very much.

text: chon lin follows rathbone to london to kill him , while sending chon a letter telling him of the murder .
translation: チョン・リンはラズボーンをロンドンまで追いかけて彼を殺そうとし、同時にチョンに殺人を知らせる手紙を送っています。
back_translation: Chong Lin追 follows Razborn to London in an attempt to kill him while simultaneously sending a letter to Chong to inform him about the murder.

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: 映画が早く終わるために登場人物の死を待ち望むのは悪い兆候ですが、それはこの映画がどれほど魅力に欠けているかを示しています。特定の興味のある分野を扱っていない限り。
back_translation: It is a bad sign to look forward to the death of characters in order for the movie to end sooner, but it shows just how lacking in charm this film is, unless it deals with specific areas of interest.

text: neighbor 's dog operates at a consistent chuckle pitch that frequently gives way to guffaws .
translation: 隣の犬は、一貫したクスクスという音を出し、その後頻繁に大笑いに変わる。
back_translation: The neighbor's dog makes a consistent "kuskus" sound, which then frequently turns into loud barking.

text: it 's a terrible movie in every regard , and utterly painful to watch .
translation: あらゆる点でひどい映画で、見るのが本当に苦痛です。
back_translation: It's a terrible movie in every way, and it’s really painful to watch.

text: a mysterious video tape is killing off anyone who watches it .
translation: 謎のビデオテープが、それを見た人を次々と殺していく。
back_translation: A mysterious video tape continues to kill those who watch it, one after another.

text: to help him complete his manuscript he hires stenographer emma .
translation: 彼が原稿を完成させるのを手伝うために、彼は速記者エマを雇います。
back_translation: To help him complete the manuscript, he hires the stenographer Emma.

text: clarissa vaughn , a modern woman living in present times is throwing a party for her friend richard , a famous author dying of aids .
translation: クラリッサ・ヴォーンは、現代に生きる女性で、エイズで亡くなりつつある有名な作家リチャードのためにパーティーを開いています。
back_translation: Clarissa Vaughn is a modern woman who is throwing a party for the famous writer Richard, who is dying of AIDS.

text: for all its failed connections , divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood is nurturing , in a gauzy , dithering way .
translation: 失敗したつながりにもかかわらず、『ヤヤ姉妹の神秘』は、ぼんやりとした優しさの中で育まれています。
back_translation: Despite the failed connections, "The Mystery of the Yaya Sisters" is nurtured within a vague tenderness.

text: you 'd think by now america would have had enough of plucky british eccentrics with hearts of gold . yet the act is still charming here .
translation: 今やアメリカは、金の心を持つ勇気あるイギリスの風変わりな人々には飽きていると思うかもしれません。しかし、この演技は依然として魅力的です。
back_translation: Now, you might think that America is tired of the quirky people of Britain with their golden hearts. However, this act is still captivating.

text: by halfway through this picture i was beginning to hate it , and , of course , feeling guilty for it . . . . then , miracle of miracles , the movie does a flip-flop .
translation: この映画の途中で、私はそれを嫌い始めていましたが、もちろん、それに対して罪悪感も感じていました……すると、驚くべきことに、映画がひっくり返ります。
back_translation: During the movie, I started to dislike it, but of course, I also felt guilty about that... Then, surprisingly, the film takes a turn.

text: as this sacrifice draws to its close , our story begins .
translation: この犠牲が終わりを迎えるとき、私たちの物語が始まります。
back_translation: When this sacrifice comes to an end, our story will begin.

text: returning aggressively to his formula of dimwitted comedy and even dimmer characters , sandler , who also executive produces , has made a film that makes previous vehicles look smart and sassy .
translation: 彼の愚かなコメディとさらに愚かなキャラクターの公式に攻撃的に戻ったサンドラーは、エグゼクティブプロデューサーも務めており、これまでの作品を賢くておしゃれに見せるような映画を作った。
back_translation: Sandler, who aggressively returned to his foolish comedy and even more foolish characters, also served as an executive producer and created a film that makes his previous works look clever and stylish.

text: you 'll laugh at either the obviousness of it all or its stupidity or maybe even its inventiveness , but the point is , you 'll laugh .
translation: あなたはそのすべての明白さや愚かさ、あるいはその独創性に笑うでしょうが、要するに、あなたは笑うということです。
back_translation: You may laugh at all its obviousness and foolishness, or its originality, but in essence, you are laughing.

text: just another combination of bad animation and mindless violence . . . lacking the slightest bit of wit or charm .
translation: ただの悪いアニメーションと無意味な暴力の組み合わせに過ぎない……少しの機知や魅力も欠けている。
back_translation: It's just a combination of poor animation and meaningless violence... lacking even a bit of wit or charm.

text: about nowhere kids who appropriated turfs as they found them and become self-made celebrity athletes -- a low-down version of the american dream .
translation: どこにもいない子供たちが自分たちの見つけた土地を奪い取り、自己流で有名なアスリートになった話 -- アメリカン・ドリームの低俗なバージョン。
back_translation: A story about children who are nowhere to be found, taking the land they discovered and becoming famous athletes in their own way -- a vulgar version of the American Dream.

text: as he struggles to achieve social success , he discovers his darker side .
translation: 彼は社会的成功を収めようと奮闘する中で、自身の暗い側面を発見する。
back_translation: In his struggle to achieve social success, he discovers his own dark side.

text: faced with endless dead-end gigs and his own loss of passion for the music he once thought was his life , he finds himself returning home to the three generations of women that he left behind .
translation: 終わりのない行き詰まりの仕事と、かつて自分の人生だと思っていた音楽への情熱を失った彼は、彼が置き去りにした三世代の女性たちの元へ帰ることになる。
back_translation: Having lost his passion for music, which he once thought was his life's purpose, he finds himself returning to the three generations of women he left behind, after being stuck in an endless dead-end job.

text: unfortunately , it 's also not very good . especially compared with the television series that inspired the movie .
translation: 残念ながら、それもあまり良くありません。特に、その映画のインスピレーションとなったテレビシリーズと比べると。
back_translation: Unfortunately, that's not very good either, especially compared to the television series that inspired the movie.

text: watching `` ending `` is too often like looking over the outdated clothes and plastic knickknacks at your neighbor 's garage sale . you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: 「エンディング」を観ることは、近所のガレージセールで古くなった服やプラスチックの小物を眺めるのとあまり変わりません。本当に誰かがこんなものを買うなんて信じられません。
back_translation: Watching the "ending" is not much different from looking at old clothes and plastic trinkets at a neighborhood garage sale. I really can't believe someone would actually buy something like this.

text: as long as vincent lives in the protection of the present , he does n't have to deal with the pain of his past -- or his sorrow over his broken relationship with joey .
translation: ヴィンセントが現在の保護の中で生きている限り、彼は過去の痛みやジョーイとの壊れた関係に対する悲しみに向き合う必要はない。
back_translation: As long as Vincent is living under the current protection, he doesn't have to confront the pain of the past or the sadness regarding his broken relationship with Joey.

text: deep in the blue ridge mountains , just outside of a small , quiet town , lives willy , an animalistic , southern rebel .
translation: ブルーリッジ山脈の奥深く、小さな静かな町のすぐ外に、動物的なサザンリベラル、ウィリーが住んでいます。
back_translation: Deep in the Blue Ridge Mountains, just outside a small quiet town, lives a beastly Southern liberal named Willie.

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: タッチは一般的に軽やかで、パフォーマンスはほとんど信頼できるものです。
back_translation: The touch is generally light, and the performance is almost reliable.

text: lynn runs into yan , the cousin of an old friend who died .
translation: リンは亡くなった旧友のいとこであるヤンと出会う。
back_translation: Lin meets Yan, the cousin of her late friend.

text: in theory , a middle-aged romance pairing clayburgh and tambor sounds promising , but in practice it 's something else altogether -- clownish and offensive and nothing at all like real life .
translation: 理論的には、中年のロマンスでクレーバーとタンボールを組み合わせるのは期待が持てるが、実際には全く別のもので、滑稽で攻撃的であり、現実とは何の関係もない。
back_translation: In theory, combining cleverness and tambourine in a midlife romance seems promising, but in reality, it is entirely different, absurd, and aggressive, having nothing to do with reality.

text: set in present-day hollywood , the story concerns a script which does not exist , but nonetheless draws praise and bids from the creative community .
translation: 現代のハリウッドを舞台にしたこの物語は、存在しない脚本について描かれており、それでもなおクリエイティブなコミュニティから称賛と入札を引き寄せています。
back_translation: Set in modern-day Hollywood, this story depicts a non-existent screenplay, yet still attracts praise and bids from the creative community.

text: as it stands , there 's some fine sex onscreen , and some tense arguing , but not a whole lot more .
translation: 現状では、画面上には素晴らしいセックスシーンと緊迫した議論が少しあるが、それ以上はあまりない。
back_translation: Currently, there are some great sex scenes and intense discussions on screen, but not much beyond that.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: 「セクレタリー」は、倒錯、コメディ、ロマンスの花を束ねて、奇妙に魅力的な映画のブーケを作り出す巧妙な技を管理しています。
back_translation: "Secretary" masterfully intertwines elements of perversion, comedy, and romance to create a strangely captivating bouquet of film.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: 中学2年生の女の子でない皆さんは、おそらくこの話の間に寝てしまうでしょう。
back_translation: Those who are not second-year junior high school girls will probably fall asleep during this story.

text: while they think they are driving out the rojas , a local gang that runs the meth trade for bosses in cabo san lucas , rikki is running an elaborate double-cross on his own family .
translation: 彼らがカボサンルーカスのボスのためにメタンフェタミンの取引を行っている地元のギャング「ロハス」を追い出していると思っている間、リッキーは自分の家族に対して巧妙な裏切りを企てている。
back_translation: While they believe they are driving out the local gang "Rojas," who are dealing methamphetamine for the boss in Cabo San Lucas, Ricky is plotting a clever betrayal against his own family.

text: it 's like a rap rashomon . there 's a million different stories here .
translation: それはラップの羅生門のようだ。ここには百万通りの異なる物語がある。
back_translation: It is like the Rashomon of rap. Here, there are a million different stories.

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4everはポケモンビデオと同じくらいのインパクトを持っていますが、スクリーンで見るとより息を吹き返し、頭痛をよりゆっくりと引き起こします。
back_translation: 4ever has as much impact as Pokémon videos, but it comes to life more vividly on screen and causes headaches more gradually.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains . . . crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: セロファンポップによるパンククラシック「レディース・アンド・ジェントルメン、ザ・ファビラス・ステインズ」のリメイク…クロスロードは、平凡より悪くなることはほとんどなく、重要性を超えることもない。
back_translation: The remake of the punk classic "Ladies and Gentlemen, The Fabulous Stains" by Cellophane Pop... Crossroad hardly ever becomes worse than mediocre, nor does it surpass its significance.

text: cameroon and its peoples are the lark , its feathers plucked first by colonialism and then by native strong-men : `` alouette , je te plumerai . ``
translation: カメルーンとその人々はひばりであり、その羽は最初に植民地主義によって、次に地元の強者たちによって引き抜かれました：「ひばりよ、私はあなたの羽をむしり取ります。」
back_translation: Cameroon and its people are like a lark, and their wings were initially plucked by colonialism, and then by local strongmen: "Oh lark, I will pluck your wings."

text: he then goes to paris where he prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of repression in his native land .
translation: 彼はその後、パリに行き、自国の抑圧状態を批判する政治映画を作る準備をします。
back_translation: He then goes to Paris and prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of oppression in his home country.

text: like a documentary version of fight club , shorn of social insight , intellectual pretension and cinematic interest .
translation: 社会的洞察、知的な虚栄心、映画的な興味を欠いたフィルムクラブのドキュメンタリー版のようです。
back_translation: It seems like a documentary version of a film club lacking social insight, intellectual vanity, and cinematic interest.

text: the film is an earnest try at beachcombing verismo , but it would be even more indistinct than it is were it not for the striking , quietly vulnerable personality of ms . ambrose .
translation: この映画は、ビーチコーミング・ヴェリズモへの真摯な試みですが、アンブローズさんの印象的で静かに脆弱な個性がなければ、さらに曖昧なものになっていたでしょう。
back_translation: This film is a sincere attempt at beachcombing verismo, but without Mr. Ambrose's impressive and quietly fragile personality, it would have become even more ambiguous.

text: true to its animatronic roots : . . . as stiff , ponderous and charmless as a mechanical apparatus . . . 'the country bears ' should never have been brought out of hibernation .
translation: そのアニマトロニクスのルーツに忠実であり、機械的な装置のように硬く、重苦しく、魅力がない... 'カントリーベアーズ'は冬眠から決して目覚めるべきではなかった。
back_translation: Staying true to the roots of that animatronics, stiff and heavy like a mechanical device, lacking charm... the 'Country Bears' should never have woken from their hibernation.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: フライは、彼が目撃したすべてにもかかわらず、驚くほど理想主義的であり、周囲の世界の真実を伝える画像の力に対する並外れた信念を保持している、深く人間的なアーティストの魅力的なプロフィールを描いています。
back_translation: Fly portrays an engaging profile of a deeply human artist who, despite everything he has witnessed, remains astonishingly idealistic and holds an extraordinary belief in the power of images to convey the truth of the surrounding world.

text: the crossing , even after a hard year of hiding , was to be a hardship : three months in a makeshift vessel with two thousand other fugitives , the victims not only of disease , hunger , and death , but primarily of the british navy and intelligence services .
translation: 越境は、厳しい一年間の隠れ続けた後でも困難であった：仮設の船で千人の他の亡命者たちと共に三ヶ月過ごすことは、病気や飢餓、死の犠牲者であるだけでなく、主にイギリス海軍と情報機関の犠牲者でもあった。
back_translation: Crossing borders was difficult even after a year of hiding: spending three months on a makeshift boat with a thousand other refugees was not only a victim of illness, hunger, and death, but primarily at the hands of the British Navy and intelligence agencies.

text: the circles cause a media frenzy and test hess 's faith as he journeys to find out the truth behind the crop circles .
translation: サークルはメディアの熱狂を引き起こし、ヘスの信念を試す。彼は作物のサークルの背後にある真実を知るために旅をする。
back_translation: The circle generates media frenzy and tests Hess's beliefs. He embarks on a journey to discover the truth behind the crop circles.

text: this is , not to put too fine a point on it , a swashbuckler , a costume drama . if you love that old story form , you will be in old-fogy heaven , as it is nearly a perfect example of a genre that died out years ago .
translation: これはあえて言わせてもらうと、冒険活劇のコスチュームドラマです。古い物語の形式が好きなら、あなたは老舗の天国にいることでしょう。これは、何年も前に消えたジャンルのほぼ完璧な例です。
back_translation: This, I must say, is a costume drama of an adventure story. If you like the old-fashioned form of storytelling, you are surely in heaven. This is almost a perfect example of a genre that disappeared years ago.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: 監督のシェーカー・カプールと脚本家のマイケル・シファー、ホセイン・アミニは、物事を現代化し再構築しようと懸命に努力しましたが、最終的には障壁があまりにも大きいことが証明されました。
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Schiffer and Hossein Amini worked hard to modernize and restructure things, but ultimately it proved that the barriers were too great.

text: arrests of his posse are piling up and profits are plummeting .
translation: 彼の一味の逮捕が増え、利益が急落している。
back_translation: The arrests of his gang members are increasing, and profits are plummeting.

text: in the not-too-distant future , movies like ghost ship will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds . right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: 遠くない未来、ゴーストシップのような映画は過剰刺激を受けた心のための鎮痛剤のように使われるだろう。今は単に、想像力の遅く、 lingeringな死を示す標識に過ぎない。
back_translation: In the near future, movies like Ghost Ship will be used as painkillers for overstimulated minds. For now, they are merely signs indicating the slow and lingering death of imagination.

text: a ragbag of promising ideas and failed narrative , of good acting and plain old bad filmmaking .
translation: 期待できるアイデアと失敗した物語の寄せ集め、良い演技と単純な悪い映像制作の混在。
back_translation: A mix of promising ideas and stories of failure, good performances, and simply bad video production.

text: who , exactly , is fighting whom here ? ah , yes , that would be me : fighting off the urge to doze .
translation: ここで、正確に誰が誰と戦っているのか？ああ、そうです、私です：うとうとしたい衝動と戦っています。
back_translation: Here, who exactly is fighting whom? Ah, yes, it's me: I am fighting the urge to doze off.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work . though haynes ' style apes films from the period . . . its message is not rooted in that decade .
translation: あなたは、ヘインズの作品の感情的な深さを理解するために、50年代の社会学、ポップカルチャーや映画の伝説に詳しくある必要はありません。ヘインズのスタイルはその時代の映画を模倣していますが、そのメッセージはその十年に根ざしているわけではありません。
back_translation: You do not need to be familiar with 1950s sociology, pop culture, or the legends of cinema to understand the emotional depth of Haynes' work. While Haynes' style mimics the films of that era, his message is not rooted in that decade.

text: an action comedy prequel to spang olsen 's box office hit in china they eat dogs .
translation: スパン・オルセンの中国のボックスオフィスヒット「犬を食べる」に続くアクションコメディの前日譚。
back_translation: A prequel to Span Olsen's Chinese box office hit "Dog Eating," this action-comedy.

text: but as each retreats into their private worlds of fantasy , a much more lively story unfolds - a story of confrontations that should have happened , of secrets that need to be revealed .
translation: しかし、各々が幻想のプライベートな世界に退くにつれ、はるかに活気ある物語が展開されます。それは、起こるべき対立や、明らかにされるべき秘密の物語です。
back_translation: However, as each retreats into their private world of illusions, a much more vibrant story unfolds. It is a tale of conflicts that should occur and secrets that should be revealed.

text: emory , a former governor of his tribe , is reunited with his son larry , via the help of a friend , sky montgomery , who invites larry to travel from the old pueblo to the new `` big city `` to join his father at a photo-art exhibition hosted by sky .
translation: エモリー、彼の部族の元知事は、友人スカイ・モンゴメリーの助けを借りて息子ラリーと再会します。スカイはラリーを古いプエブロから新しい「ビッグシティ」へ旅させ、写真芸術展で父親と再会するよう招待します。
back_translation: Emory, the former governor of his tribe, reunites with his son Larry with the help of his friend Sky Montgomery. Sky takes Larry on a journey from the old pueblo to the new "big city," inviting him to meet his father at a photography art exhibition.

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: その平凡な英語のタイトルが信じさせると思われるよりも、はるかに優れたドキュメンタリーであり、より明らかで、より感情的で、より驚くべき内容です。
back_translation: It is a far superior documentary than the ordinary English title might suggest, more revealing, more emotional, and more astonishing.

text: it 's the brilliant surfing photography bringing you right inside the massive waves that lifts blue crush into one of the summer 's most pleasurable movies .
translation: それは、巨大な波の中にあなたを引き込む素晴らしいサーフィンの写真が『ブルークラッシュ』を夏の最も楽しい映画の一つに引き上げている。
back_translation: The incredible surfing photos that draw you into the huge waves elevate "Blue Crush" as one of the most fun movies of summer.

text: this latest installment of the horror film franchise that is apparently as invulnerable as its trademark villain has arrived for an incongruous summer playoff , demonstrating yet again that the era of the intelligent , well-made b movie is long gone .
translation: このホラーフィルムフランチャイズの最新作が、明らかにそのトレードマークである悪役と同様に無敵な状態で、不釣り合いな夏のプレイオフのために到着しました。これは、知的でよく作られたB級映画の時代はとっくに終わったことを再び示しています。
back_translation: The latest installment of this horror film franchise has arrived in a state of invincibility, much like its trademark villain, for an out-of-place summer playoff. This once again demonstrates that the era of intelligent and well-made B-movies has long since ended.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: 全体的な効果は畏敬と愛情であり、奇妙なボードに乗って、えっと、シュレッドしたいという衝動です、 dude。
back_translation: The overall effect is a mix of awe and affection, and a strange impulse to shred while riding on a board, dude.

text: toledo ( daniel hendler ) , 25 years old , future architect , suffers from an acute jealousy .
translation: トレド（ダニエル・ヘンドラー）、25歳、未来の建築家、激しい嫉妬に悩まされている。
back_translation: Toledo (Daniel Handler), 25 years old, a future architect, troubled by intense jealousy.

text: then after rumers spread that he was a communist he was blacklisted from hollywood forever .
translation: その後、彼が共産主義者であるという噂が広まると、彼は永遠にハリウッドからブラックリストに載せられました。
back_translation: After that, when rumors spread that he was a communist, he was blacklisted from Hollywood forever.

text: 'cq may one day be fondly remembered as roman coppola 's brief pretentious period before going on to other films that actually tell a story worth caring about
translation: 「CQ」は、ロマン・コッポラが実際に心を寄せる価値のある物語を語る他の映画に進む前の短い気取りの時期として、いつの日か好意的に記憶されるかもしれません。
back_translation: "CQ" may one day be fondly remembered as a brief period of pretense before Roman Coppola moved on to tell more meaningful stories in other films.

text: hawn and sarandon hit the ground running , and are so funny and goofy that they distract and delight us .
translation: ホーンとサランドンは活気にあふれ、非常に面白くておかしいので、私たちを楽しませ、気を逸らさせます。
back_translation: Horne and Sarandon are lively, incredibly entertaining, and funny, so they keep us amused and distracted.

text: the title not only describes its main characters , but the lazy people behind the camera as well .
translation: そのタイトルは、主なキャラクターだけでなく、カメラの後ろにいる怠惰な人々も描写しています。
back_translation: The title depicts not only the main characters but also the lazy people behind the camera.

text: at dinner , his father asks him about his new telescope .
translation: 夕食の時、彼の父は彼に新しい望遠鏡について尋ねます。
back_translation: During dinner, his father asks him about the new telescope.

text: it feels like an after-school special gussied up with some fancy special effects , and watching its rote plot points connect is about as exciting as gazing at an egg timer for 93 minutes .
translation: まるで豪華な特効が施されたアフタースクールスペシャルのようで、決まりきったプロットポイントがつながるのを見ているのは、93分間卵タイマーを見つめるのと同じくらい退屈です。
back_translation: It's like a luxurious after-school special with lavish special effects, and watching the predictable plot points connect is as boring as staring at an egg timer for 93 minutes.

text: jordan must decide if simon 's answers are good or evil as the paths become intertwined into each other and the lives of the four friends are eopardized as one falls victim to society 's views and the other three bond together to carry out a friends promise .
translation: ジョーダンは、サイモンの答えが善か悪かを決めなければならない。道が絡み合い、4人の友達の命が危険にさらされる中、一人が社会の観念の犠牲になり、残りの3人が友情の約束を果たすために団結する。
back_translation: Jordan must decide whether Simon's answer is good or bad. As the paths intertwine and the lives of the four friends are put at risk, one becomes a victim of societal notions, while the remaining three unite to fulfill their promise of friendship.

text: has a shambling charm . . . a cheerfully inconsequential diversion .
translation: よろめくような魅力があり、気楽で重要でない気晴らしです。
back_translation: It has a charmingly unsteady allure and is a casual and non-essential distraction.

text: when they get there , strange happenings invade the school .
translation: 彼らがそこに着くと、奇妙な出来事が学校を襲います。
back_translation: When they arrive there, strange events strike the school.

text: brutally honest and told with humor and poignancy , which makes its message resonate .
translation: 残酷なまでに正直で、ユーモアと感傷を交えて語られ、メッセージが響く。
back_translation: Brutally honest, interwoven with humor and sentiment, the message resonates.

text: this is the story of `` johnny `` , a struggling blues musician estranged from both his family and the country roots he left behind .
translation: これは「ジョニー」の物語です。彼は苦労しているブルースミュージシャンで、家族と彼が置き去りにした故郷のルーツから疎遠になっています。
back_translation: This is the story of "Johnny." He is a struggling blues musician who has become distant from his family and the roots of his hometown that he left behind.

text: this is christmas future for a lot of baby boomers .
translation: これは多くのベビーブーマーにとってのクリスマスの未来です。
back_translation: This is the future of Christmas for many baby boomers.

text: soon after , his wife passes away and he must come to terms with his daughter 's marriage to a man he does not care for and the failure that his life has become .
translation: その後すぐに、彼の妻が亡くなり、彼は娘の結婚相手である自分が気に入らない男との折り合いをつけなければならず、人生が失敗に終わったことを受け入れなければならなくなる。
back_translation: Shortly after that, his wife passed away, and he had to come to terms with a man he did not like who was his daughter's fiancé, and he had to accept that his life had ended in failure.

text: . . . an agreeable time-wasting device -- but george pal 's low-tech 1960 version still rules the epochs .
translation: ... 賛同できる時間浪費の道具ですが、ジョージ・パルの低技術1960年版はまだ時代を支配しています。
back_translation: ... It is a tool for wasting time that can be agreed upon, but George Pal's low-tech version from 1960 still dominates the era.

text: manages to be wholesome and subversive at the same time .
translation: 健全でありながら同時に反体制的であることに成功しています。
back_translation: It successfully achieves being both sound and simultaneously anti-establishment.

text: secret ballot is too contemplative to be really funny .
translation: 秘密投票は本当に面白くなるには考えすぎています。
back_translation: Secret voting is overthinking to really become interesting.

text: the man from elysian fields is a cold , bliss-less work that groans along thinking itself some important comment on how life throws us some beguiling curves .
translation: エリジアンフィールドの男は、冷たく、幸せのない作品であり、自分が人生がどのように魅力的な曲線を投げかけてくるかについて重要なコメントであると思いながらうめき声を上げています。
back_translation: The man in the Elizian Field is cold, a work devoid of happiness, and moans while believing that it is an important commentary on how life throws charming curves.

text: irene is about to experience all new ways of romance .
translation: アイリーンは全く新しいロマンスの方法を体験しようとしています。
back_translation: Eileen is trying to experience a completely new way of romance.

text: less funny than it should be and less funny than it thinks it is .
translation: あるべきよりも面白くなく、自分が思っているよりも面白くない。
back_translation: Less interesting than it should be, and less interesting than I think it is.

text: this nickleby thing might have more homosexual undertones than an eddie murphy film . and just when you think it ca n't get any more gay , in pops nathan lane .
translation: このニクルビーのことは、エディ・マーフィの映画よりももっとホモセクシュアルなニュアンスがあるかもしれません。そして、これ以上ゲイにはならないと思った瞬間、ネイサン・レインが登場します。
back_translation: This Niclebee might have even more homosexual nuances than an Eddie Murphy movie. And just when you think it can't get any gayer, Nathan Lane shows up.

text: it 's hard to quibble with a flick boasting this many genuine cackles , but notorious c . h . o . still feels like a promising work-in-progress .
translation: このように多くの本物の笑いを持つ映画に文句を言うのは難しいが、悪名高いC.H.O.はまだ進行中の有望な作品のように感じる。
back_translation: It is difficult to complain about a movie that has so much genuine laughter, but the notorious C.H.O. still feels like a promising work in progress.

text: what is unique about his secret life is that an assumption of intelligence , tolerance , and acceptance is already made , and thus the movie can focus on telling a compelling story .
translation: 彼の秘密の生活のユニークな点は、知性、寛容性、受容の仮定がすでに行われていることであり、そのため映画は魅力的な物語を語ることに集中できるということです。
back_translation: The unique aspect of his secret life is that the assumptions of intelligence, tolerance, and acceptance have already been made, allowing the film to focus on telling an engaging story.

text: as of then , bettien became a `` pentita `` and now is a guest of the `` witness protection program `` .
translation: その時点で、ベッティンは「ペンティタ」となり、現在は「証人保護プログラム」のゲストです。
back_translation: At that time, Bettin became "Pentita" and is now a guest of the "Witness Protection Program."

text: perceptive in its vision of nascent industrialized world politics as a new art form , but far too clunky , didactic and saddled with scenes that seem simply an ill fit for this movie .
translation: 新興の工業化された世界の政治を新しい芸術形式として鋭く捉えているが、あまりにも不格好で教訓的であり、この映画には単に不適切に思えるシーンに重荷を負わされている。
back_translation: It sharply captures the politics of the newly industrialized world as a new art form, but it is overly clumsy and didactic, burdened by scenes that simply feel inappropriate for the film.

text: the rookie feels like baseball itself : sort of boring , sort of stately , yet possessed of an ineffable poetry that speaks to the young heart of old men and their sons .
translation: ルーキーは野球そのものであるように感じられる：少し退屈で、少し威厳がありながらも、古い男たちとその息子たちの若い心に語りかける言葉で表現しきれない詩を持っている。
back_translation: Rookies feel like baseball itself: a little boring, a little dignified, yet possessing a poetry that cannot be fully expressed in words, speaking to the young hearts of old men and their sons.

text: at the same time , there are rumors that the romulans are ready to begin peace talks with the federation .
translation: 同時に、ロミュランが連邦との平和交渉を始める準備が整っているという噂もあります。
back_translation: At the same time, there are rumors that the Romulans are prepared to begin peace negotiations with the Federation.

text: the film tries too hard to be funny and tries too hard to be hip . the end result is a film that 's neither .
translation: その映画は面白くなろうとしすぎていて、若者に受けようとしすぎています。その結果、どちらでもない映画になってしまいました。
back_translation: The movie tries too hard to be interesting and to appeal to young people. As a result, it ended up being a movie that doesn't really achieve either.

text: some of his most popular work was when he played `` johnny wadd `` private detective .
translation: 彼の最も人気のある作品のいくつかは、彼が「ジョニー・ワッド」という私立探偵を演じたときのものでした。
back_translation: Some of his most popular works were when he played the private detective "Johnny Wad."

text: the only way around this is using illegal simulated identity implants ( sims ) .
translation: この問題を回避する唯一の方法は、違法なシミュレートされたアイデンティティインプラント（シム）を使用することです。
back_translation: The only way to avoid this problem is to use an illegal simulated identity implant (sim).

text: a pretty funny movie , with most of the humor coming , as before , from the incongruous but chemically perfect teaming of crystal and de niro .
translation: かなり面白い映画で、ユーモアの大部分は以前と同様に、クリスタルとデニーロの奇妙だが完璧に化学的な組み合わせから生まれています。
back_translation: It's a quite interesting movie, and much of the humor, as before, comes from the strange yet perfectly chemical combination of Crystal and De Niro.

text: john , completely devastated , soon finds some sketches his wife made after the accident .
translation: ジョンは完全に打ちひしがれ、事故の後に妻が描いたいくつかのスケッチを見つける。
back_translation: John, completely devastated, comes across some sketches his wife drew after the accident.

text: a great ensemble cast ca n't lift this heartfelt enterprise out of the familiar .
translation: 素晴らしいキャストがこの心温まる作品を馴染みのあるものから引き上げることはできません。
back_translation: An amazing cast cannot elevate this heartwarming piece from its familiarity.

text: after their relationship falters , shane begins to think he might be unlucky and turns to gambling as an outlet for his obsession .
translation: 彼らの関係が揺らぎ始めると、シェインは自分が運が悪いのかもしれないと考え、執着のはけ口としてギャンブルに手を出し始める。
back_translation: As their relationship starts to waver, Shane begins to think that he might be unlucky and starts to resort to gambling as an outlet for his obsession.

text: it aimlessly and unsuccessfully attempts to fuse at least three dull plots into one good one .
translation: それは無目的に、そして成功せずに、少なくとも3つの退屈なプロットを1つの良いプロットに結び付けようと試みます。
back_translation: It attempts to connect at least three boring plots into one good plot without purpose and without success.

text: not a cozy or ingratiating work , but it 's challenging , sometimes clever , and always interesting , and those are reasons enough to see it .
translation: 心地よいとは言えないし、気に入られるような作品でもありませんが、挑戦的で、時には巧妙で、常に興味深いものであり、それを観る十分な理由です。
back_translation: It's not something that can be called comfortable, nor is it a work that is likely to be liked, but it is challenging, sometimes clever, and always intriguing, which is more than enough reason to watch it.

text: adroit but finally a trifle flat , mad love does n't galvanize its outrage the way , say , jane campion might have done , but at least it possesses some .
translation: 巧妙ではあるが、最終的には少し平凡で、「狂気の愛」は、例えばジェーン・カンピオンがやったように、その怒りを刺激することはないが、少なくともいくらかのそれを持っている。
back_translation: It is clever, but ultimately a bit mundane, and while "mad love" does not invoke anger as Jane Campion did, it at least possesses some of it.

text: she 'll just have to remember everything for the both of them .
translation: 彼女は二人分のすべてを覚えておかなければならないでしょう。
back_translation: She has to remember everything for both of them.

text: this film is full of rabbits . brimful . but like most rabbits , it seems to lack substance .
translation: この映画はウサギでいっぱいです。満杯です。しかし、ほとんどのウサギのように、何かが欠けているようです。
back_translation: This movie is full of rabbits. Overflowing. However, like most rabbits, something seems to be missing.

text: this is presumably a somewhat true story , as charlie kaufman is the real life screenwriter of adaptation .
translation: これはおそらくやや真実の物語であり、チャーリー・カウフマンは実際の映画「アダプテーション」の脚本家です。
back_translation: This is probably a somewhat true story, and Charlie Kaufman is the actual screenwriter of the movie "Adaptation."

text: there are only three u . s . states left .
translation: 残っているアメリカの州はたったの3つです。
back_translation: There are only three states left in America.

text: [ janey ] forgets about her other obligations , leading to a tragedy which is somehow guessable from the first few minutes , maybe because it echoes the by now intolerable morbidity of so many recent movies .
translation: [ジャニー] は他の義務を忘れてしまい、その結果として悲劇が生じる。その悲劇は、最初の数分間でどうにかして推測できるかもしれない。おそらく、それは最近の映画のあまりにも耐え難い病理を反映しているからだ。
back_translation: [Johnny] forgets other obligations, and as a result, a tragedy occurs. This tragedy may somehow be inferred in the first few minutes. Perhaps it reflects the unbearably difficult pathology of recent films.

text: those who are n't put off by the film 's austerity will find it more than capable of rewarding them .
translation: 映画の厳格さに気を取られない人々は、それが彼らに十分な報いをもたらすことを見つけるでしょう。
back_translation: People who are not distracted by the strictness of the movie will find that it brings them sufficient rewards.

text: their one song rarely - if ever - gets played on the radio .
translation: 彼らの1曲は、ラジオではほとんど、いやまったく流れない。
back_translation: One of their songs hardly, if ever, gets played on the radio.

text: in event of death of any of the inheritors ' death , a death certificate has to be produced to the bank .
translation: 相続人のいずれかが死亡した場合、銀行に死亡証明書を提出する必要があります。
back_translation: If one of the heirs has died, it is necessary to submit a death certificate to the bank.

text: an excellent date movie , because you and your date will likely be clinging on to each other within 10 minutes .
translation: 素晴らしいデートムービーで、あなたとあなたのデートは10分以内にお互いにしがみついていることでしょう。
back_translation: It's a wonderful date movie, and you and your date will probably be clinging to each other within 10 minutes.

text: rarely does such high-profile talent serve such literate material .
translation: このような著名な才能が、これほど文芸的な素材に携わることはめったにありません。
back_translation: It is rare for such a prominent talent to be involved in such literary material.

text: at the right time of day , in the right frame of mind , baran can and should be appreciated as a work of delicate and unmistakable beauty .
translation: 適切な時間帯と心の状態で、バランは繊細で明確な美しさを持つ作品として評価されるべきです。
back_translation: In the appropriate time frame and state of mind, Bali should be appreciated as a work of delicate and clear beauty.

text: meanwhile , more people end up dead . . .
translation: その間に、より多くの人々が死ぬ結果となる。
back_translation: As a result, more people will die during that time.

text: rio danisworo ( marcellius siahaan ) is a rigid `` all about business `` young profesional .
translation: リオ・ダニスウォロ（マルセリウス・シアハン）は、厳格な「ビジネス一筋」の若手プロフェッショナルです。
back_translation: Rio DaniSworo (Marcilius Ciahan) is a strict "business-focused" young professional.

text: maggie 's father , yayo , runs a successful bakery , steve is a politician , elena is a fashion designer , ms . al seeks love , conrado is a bashful deliveryman , and mateo is looking for a chance in life .
translation: マギーの父親であるヤヨは成功したベーカリーを経営しており、スティーブは政治家で、エレナはファッションデザイナーです。ミス・アルは愛を求めており、コンラドは内気な配達員で、マテオは人生のチャンスを探しています。
back_translation: Maggie's father, Yayo, runs a successful bakery, Steve is a politician, and Elena is a fashion designer. Miss Al is seeking love, Conrad is a shy delivery person, and Mateo is looking for a chance in life.

text: after an uncertain start , murder hits and generally sustains a higher plateau with bullock 's memorable first interrogation of gosling .
translation: 不確かなスタートの後、殺人はヒットし、一般的にブルックのゴスリングに対する印象的な最初の尋問でより高い水準を維持します。
back_translation: After an uncertain start, the murder hits, generally maintaining a higher standard in Brook's impressive initial interrogation of Gosling.

text: seven-year-old sang-woo is left with his grandmother in a remote village while his mother looks for work .
translation: ７歳のサンウは、母親が仕事を探している間、遠い村で祖母と一緒に過ごしています。
back_translation: Seven-year-old San-u is spending time with his grandmother in a distant village while his mother is looking for a job.

text: a witty coming-of-middle-age comedy with hilarious performances by first-time director tony shalhoub and wife brooke adams .
translation: 初めて監督を務めるトニー・シャルフーと妻のブルック・アダムスによる、ウィットに富んだ中年期のコメディで、素晴らしいパフォーマンスが楽しめます。
back_translation: In this witty midlife comedy directed for the first time by Tony Scherff and featuring his wife, Brooke Adams, you can enjoy wonderful performances.

text: not a stereotype is omitted nor a clichM-i left unsaid .
translation: ステレオタイプも省かれず、クリシェも語られていない。
back_translation: Stereotypes are not excluded, and clichés are not mentioned.

text: a directorial tour de force by bernard rose , ivans xtc . is one of this year 's very best pictures .
translation: バーナード・ローズによる監督の傑作『イヴァンのXTC』は、今年の最高の映画の一つです。
back_translation: Bernard Rose's masterpiece "Ivan's XTC" is one of the best films of the year.

text: a profoundly moving document . . . the filmmakers ' refusal to downplay the situation 's intractability makes the glimmer of hope the film offers that much more powerful .
translation: 深く感動的なドキュメント... 映画制作者が状況の解決困難さを軽視しないことで、映画が提供する希望の光が一層強力になります。
back_translation: A profoundly moving documentary... By not underestimating the difficulty of the situation, the filmmakers enhance the powerful light of hope that the film offers.

text: seducing ben is only beginning ; she becomes his biggest `` fan `` and most unexpected nightmare , as her obsessions quickly spiral out of control into betrayal , madness and , ultimately , murder .
translation: ベンを誘惑することは始まりに過ぎない；彼女は彼の最大の「ファン」と最も予期せぬ悪夢となり、彼女の執着は急速に裏切り、狂気、最終的には殺人へと制御を失っていく。
back_translation: Tempting Ben is just the beginning; she becomes his biggest "fan" and his most unexpected nightmare, as her obsession swiftly spirals out of control into betrayal, madness, and ultimately murder.

text: a haunting , rich film . . . [ fraser ] and caine blend beautifully with their sweet-and-sour mix of acting .
translation: hauntingで、豊かな映画… [フレーザー]とケインは、甘酸っぱい演技のブレンドで美しく融合しています。
back_translation: A haunting and richly cinematic experience... [Fraser] and Cain beautifully blend their performances with a bittersweet quality.

text: it says a lot about a filmmaker when he can be wacky without clobbering the audience over the head and still maintain a sense of urgency and suspense .
translation: 観客を押しつぶすことなく、ユーモラスでありながらも緊迫感やサスペンスを維持できる監督については、それ自体が多くを物語っています。
back_translation: The fact that a director can maintain humor while also preserving tension and suspense without overwhelming the audience speaks volumes on its own.

text: after the short encounter , they separated and go their on ways .
translation: 短い出会いの後、彼らは別れ、それぞれの道を進んだ。
back_translation: After a brief encounter, they parted ways and went their separate paths.

text: the film is delicately narrated by martin landau and directed with sensitivity and skill by dana janklowicz-mann .
translation: この映画はマーチン・ランドーによって繊細に語られ、ダナ・ヤンクロウィッツ＝マンによって感受性と技術をもって監督されています。
back_translation: This film is delicately narrated by Martin Landau and directed with sensitivity and skill by Dana Yanklowitz-Man.

text: who knows what exactly godard is on about in this film , but his words and images do n't have to add up to mesmerize you .
translation: この映画でゴダールが何について語っているのか正確に知っている人は誰もいませんが、彼の言葉やイメージは、あなたを魅了するために一致する必要はありません。
back_translation: No one knows exactly what Godard is talking about in this film, but his words and images do not need to match to captivate you.

text: refusing at first to open up , the young man eventually breaks down and reveals a horrific childhood .
translation: 最初は心を開こうとしなかった若者だが、最終的には崩れ落ちて恐ろしい幼少期を明かす。

text: features nonsensical and laughable plotting , wooden performances , ineptly directed action sequences and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory .

back_translation: It features a meaningless and laughable plot, emotionless acting, poorly directed action sequences, and some of the worst dialogue in recent memory.

text: definitely a crowd-pleaser , but then , so was the roman colosseum .

text: essentially , the film is weak on detail and strong on personality

text: the jokes are telegraphed so far in advance they must have been lost in the mail .

text: there is a knock at the door and mitchell hears his mother asking for t-mon .
translation: ドアをノックする音があり、ミッチェルは母親がティー・モンを呼んでいるのを聞いた。

text: tins is a glamour doll who is the one person who can help arjun get what he wants .

text: if hill is n't quite his generation 's don siegel ( or robert aldrich ) , it 's because there 's no discernible feeling beneath the chest hair ; it 's all bluster and clichM-i .
translation: もしヒルが彼の世代のドン・シーゲル（またはロバート・オルドリッチ）ではないとすれば、それは胸毛の下に感じられるものがないからで、すべてが虚勢とクリシェで満ちているからだ。
back_translation: If Hill is not the Don Siegel (or Robert Aldrich) of his generation, it is because there is nothing felt beneath the chest hair, and everything is filled with bravado and clichés.

text: has not so much been written as assembled , frankenstein-like , out of other , marginally better shoot-em-ups .
translation: 他のマージナルに優れたシューティングゲームから、フランケンシュタインのように組み立てられたため、あまり多くは書かれていない。
back_translation: Not much has been written about it because it was constructed like Frankenstein from excellent shooting games of other margins.

text: at 78 minutes it just zings along with vibrance and warmth .
translation: 78分で、鮮やかさと温かさを持ってただ進んでいきます。

text: i wish i could say `` thank god it 's friday `` , but the truth of the matter is i was glad when it was over .
translation: 「金曜日だと言えるといいのですが、実際のところ、終わってホッとしました。」
back_translation: "I wish I could say it's Friday, but to be honest, I'm just relieved it's over."

text: he stands at the window and struggles to understand why his mother will not stop smoking , even after being diagnosed with emphysema .
translation: 彼は窓のところに立ち、母親が肺気腫と診断された後も喫煙をやめない理由を理解しようと苦しんでいる。
back_translation: He stands by the window, struggling to understand why his mother continues to smoke even after being diagnosed with emphysema.

text: this is the true story of molly craig , a young black australian girl who leads her younger sister and cousin in an escape from an official government camp , set up as part of an official government policy to train them as domestic workers and integrate them into white society .
translation: これは、若い黒人オーストラリア人少女モリー・クレイグの真実の物語です。彼女は、政府の政策に基づいて、家事労働者として訓練し白人社会に統合するために設立された公式の政府キャンプから、妹といとこを連れて脱出します。
back_translation: This is the true story of a young black Australian girl named Molly Craig. She escapes from an official government camp established to train her as a domestic worker and integrate her into white society, taking her sister and cousin with her.

text: the couch - considered holy because certain hasidic rabbis had slept on it - survived wwii and is in the filmmaker 's great grandfather 's house in rohod , a northeast hungarian town .
translation: ソファは、特定のハシディックのラビたちがそれの上で眠っていたため神聖視されており、第二次世界大戦を生き延び、ハンガリーの北東部にあるロホドにある映画製作者の曾祖父の家に今も存在しています。
back_translation: The sofa is regarded as sacred because specific Hasidic rabbis slept on it, and it has survived World War II, still existing in the home of a filmmaker's great-grandfather in Rohod, located in northeastern Hungary.

text: the film sometimes flags . . . but there is enough secondary action to keep things moving along at a brisk , amusing pace .
translation: 映画は時々だらけることがあるが、楽しませるペースで物事を進めるためのサブのアクションが十分にある。
back_translation: Sometimes the movie can get a bit sluggish, but there are enough secondary actions to keep things moving at an entertaining pace.

text: the film is exhilarating to watch because sandler , liberated from the constraints of formula , reveals unexpected depths as an actor .
translation: その映画は見るのがとても刺激的で、サンドラーが型にはまった制約から解放され、俳優として予期しない深みを見せるからです。
back_translation: That movie is very exciting to watch because Sandler is freed from the constraints of his usual roles and shows unexpected depth as an actor.

text: a film centering on a traditional indian wedding in contemporary new delhi may not sound like specialized fare , but mira nair 's film is an absolute delight for all audiences .
translation: 現代のニューデリーを舞台にした伝統的なインドの結婚式を中心にした映画は特別なジャンルに聞こえないかもしれませんが、ミーラ・ナイールの映画はすべての観客にとって絶対の喜びです。
back_translation: A movie set in modern New Delhi centered around a traditional Indian wedding may not sound like a special genre, but Mira Nair's films are an absolute delight for all audiences.

text: jonah is sunday school lite . but it 's told with a comic edge usually associated with the devilish act of laughter .
translation: ヨナは日曜学校のライト版ですが、通常は悪魔的な笑いの行為に関連付けられるコミックの要素で語られています。
back_translation: Yona is a lighter version of Sunday School, but is usually told with comic elements associated with devilish laughter.

text: everyone is wishing for a miracle to happen this summer .
translation: 皆がこの夏に奇跡が起こることを願っています。
back_translation: I hope a miracle happens for everyone this summer.

text: one of the funniest motion pictures of the year , but . . . also one of the most curiously depressing .
translation: 今年の最も面白い映画の一つだが……同時に最も奇妙に憂鬱な映画の一つでもある。
back_translation: It's one of the most interesting movies of the year, but… at the same time, it's also one of the strangest and most melancholic movies.

text: this time out , [ sade ] is an unsettlingly familiar figure -- in turns loyal and deceitful , responsible and reckless , idealistically selfless and coldly self-interested .
translation: 今回の登場人物、[サーデ]は不気味なほど馴染みのある存在で、忠実でありつつ裏切り、責任感がある一方で無謀で、理想的に無私でありながら冷酷に自己中心的です。
back_translation: The character [Sarde] who appears this time is unsettlingly familiar, loyal yet treacherous, responsible yet reckless, ideally selfless yet coldly selfish.

text: it 's a sci-fi , time travel , action adventure , comedy , drama mystery all rolled into one as mark twain on the way home from one of his last speaking tours in 1906 , is jostled on a train by 2 men , one in pursuit of the other , twain picks up a newspaper that one of them drops and the headline reads `` manned mars mission . . . .
translation: それは、SF、タイムトラベル、アクションアドベンチャー、コメディ、ドラマミステリーが一つにまとまった作品です。1906年、マーク・トウェインが最後の講演ツアーから帰る途中、列車で2人の男性に押しのけられます。1人がもう1人を追いかけているのです。トウェインは、1人が落とした新聞を拾い、見出しには「有人火星ミッション」と書かれています。
back_translation: It is a work that combines science fiction, time travel, action-adventure, comedy, and drama mystery into one. In 1906, Mark Twain is pushed aside by two men on a train while returning from his final speaking tour. One man is chasing the other. Twain picks up a newspaper dropped by one of them, and the headline reads "Manned Mission to Mars."

text: this time , the hype is quieter , and while the movie is slightly less successful than the first , it 's still a rollicking good time for the most part .
translation: 今回は、期待感は quieter であり、映画は前作よりもわずかに成功度は低いものの、全体としてはまだ楽しい時間を過ごせる作品です。
back_translation: This time, the expectation is quieter, and while the movie is slightly less successful than its predecessor, it is still an enjoyable experience overall.

text: turns a potentially interesting idea into an excruciating film school experience that plays better only for the film 's publicists or for people who take as many drugs as the film 's characters
translation: 潜在的に興味深いアイデアを、映画の広報担当者や映画のキャラクターと同じくらい多くの薬を摂取する人々にしか楽しめない、苦痛を伴う映画学校の体験に変えてしまう。
back_translation: Transforming potentially intriguing ideas into a painful film school experience that can only be enjoyed by people consuming as many drugs as movie publicists or film characters.

text: where this was lazy but enjoyable , a formula comedy redeemed by its stars , that is even lazier and far less enjoyable .
translation: これは怠惰ではあるが楽しめるもので、スターたちによって救われた公式的なコメディであり、さらに怠惰でずっと楽しめないものです。
back_translation: This is something that is lazy but enjoyable, an official comedy saved by the stars, and moreover, it is lazy and not enjoyable at all.

text: problem is , 18-year-old christina lombardo does n't want her help .
translation: 問題は、18歳のクリスティナ・ロンバルドが彼女の助けを欲しがっていないことです。

text: it gets old quickly . watch barbershop again if you 're in need of a cube fix -- this is n't worth sitting through .

back_translation: I get bored quickly. If the cube needs fixing, take a look at the barber shop again. It's not worth sitting and watching.

translation: おめでとうございます、イディッシュ舞台での家族の喜びに満ちた生活を描いた映画に。

text: has just enough charm ( not to mention a sense of its own ridiculousness ) to stay afloat .

text: amazing ? not quite . but this film sure is lovely .
translation: 素晴らしい？そんなことはない。でもこの映画は確かに素敵です。
back_translation: Wonderful? Not really. But this movie is definitely lovely.

text: in the aftermath of the fall of the talibans , the film explores the city of herat where it captures the reactions of the city dwellers expressing their memories and their hopes .
translation: タリバンの崩壊後、映画は都市ヘラートを探求し、そこに住む人々の反応を捉え、彼らの思い出と希望を表現しています。
back_translation: After the collapse of the Taliban, the film explores the city of Herat, capturing the reactions of the people living there and expressing their memories and hopes.

text: to do so , he decides to ape her behaviors , right down to wearing her fur coat to bed .

translation: 彼は再び妻を見てショックを受けている。彼女はディクシャだ。

text: the paradiso 's rusted-out ruin and ultimate collapse during the film 's final ( restored ) thirdM-^Eemotionally belittle a cinema classic . sometimes shorter is better .
translation: 映画の最後の（復元された）部分でのパラディーソの錆びついた廃墟と究極の崩壊は、シネマクラシックを感情的に貶めることがある。時には短い方が良い。
back_translation: The rusty ruins of Paradiso and the ultimate collapse at the end of the film can sometimes emotionally undermine the cinematic classic. Sometimes, less is more.

text: boy , has this franchise ever run out of gas .
translation: このフランチャイズは、ほんとうにガスが切れたことがあるのか。

translation: それは人生を肯定するものではなく、下品で意地悪だけど、私はそれが好きでした。

text: by the miserable standards to which the slasher genre has sunk , . . . actually pretty good . of course , by more objective measurements it 's still quite bad .
translation: スラッシャージャンルが陥った悲惨な基準によれば、...実際にはまあまあ良い。ただし、もっと客観的な尺度で測れば、まだかなり悪い。
back_translation: According to the disastrous standards that the slasher genre has fallen into, it is actually quite good. However, when measured by a more objective scale, it is still fairly bad.

text: on the other side of town a woman named jill valentine tries to escape from the city while battling zombies and matt adison , now transformed into a monster called `` the nemesis `` who is bent on destroying all who live .
translation: 町の反対側で、ジル・バレンタインという女性がゾンビと、すべての人を滅ぼそうとする「ネメシス」というモンスターに変身したマット・アディソンと戦いながら、街からの脱出を試みている。
back_translation: On the other side of the town, a woman named Jill Valentine is trying to escape the city while fighting against zombies and Matt Addison, who has transformed into a monster called "Nemesis" that seeks to destroy everyone.

text: told as if reading the pages of a diary , along with a stunning visual style , quiet illustrates that beyond the brink of madness lies one man 's sanity .
translation: 日記のページを読むかのように語られ、見事なビジュアルスタイルと共に、狂気の淵の向こうには一人の男の正気があることを静かに描写しています。
back_translation: It narrates as if reading the pages of a diary, quietly depicting that beyond the brink of madness lies the sanity of one man, along with a magnificent visual style.

text: holmes < /a > was the worlds best known male actor in the adult industry .
translation: ホルムズは、成人業界で最も知られた男性俳優でした。

text: in the process , quinn discovers secrets from his past and battles with the inner demons that made him the man he is today .
translation: その過程で、クインは自分の過去の秘密を発見し、今日の彼を形作った内なる悪魔と戦います。
back_translation: In the process, Quinn discovers the secrets of his past and battles the inner demons that have shaped him into who he is today.

text: directed by rob bowman ( `` the x-files `` ) , `` reign of fire `` fuses a medieval past with a post-apocalyptic future in this exciting tale of adventure and survival .
translation: ロブ・ボウマン（「ザ・Xファイル」）が監督した「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、中世の過去とポストアポカリプスの未来を融合させた、冒険とサバイバルの刺激的な物語です。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire," directed by Rob Bowman (of "The X-Files"), is an exciting story of adventure and survival that blends a medieval past with a post-apocalyptic future.

text: [ o ] ften a capable documentary on an interesting subject , even if it does n't probe as deeply as it could .
translation: 興味深い主題に関する有能なドキュメンタリーであることが多いが、深く掘り下げていない場合もある。
back_translation: It is often a competent documentary on an interesting subject, but it may not delve deeply into the topic.

text: regulus : the first nuclear missile submarine is a documentary about the navy 's struggle , in the era immediately following wwii , to develop and deploy a submarine-launched nuclear missile .
translation: レグルス：最初の核ミサイル潜水艦は、第二次世界大戦直後の時代に、潜水艦発射核ミサイルを開発・配備しようとした海軍の葛藤を描いたドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: Regulus: The first nuclear missile submarine is a documentary that depicts the Navy's struggles to develop and deploy submarine-launched nuclear missiles in the post-World War II era.

text: however , price discovers a life lesson he never thought possible in the mistaken identity comedy from raw dawg films .
translation: しかし、プライスはロウドッグフィルムズの間違ったアイデンティティコメディの中で、かつては考えられない人生の教訓を発見します。

text: 'arroz con mango ' is a spanish phrase which means 'what a mess ! '
translation: 「アロス・コン・マンゴー」は、スペイン語のフレーズで「なんてめちゃくちゃ！」という意味です。
back_translation: "Arroz con mango" is a Spanish phrase that means "what a mess!"

text: now he is out , to finally get his cut of the money and reunite with his family , or at least avenge the damage done .
translation: 彼は今出てきて、ついにお金を手に入れ、家族と再会するか、少なくとも被害に対する復讐を果たそうとしています。
back_translation: He has finally emerged now, gotten money in hand, and is either reuniting with his family or at least trying to take revenge for the harm done.

text: all analyze that proves is that there is really only one movie 's worth of decent gags to be gleaned from the premise .
translation: すべての分析が証明するのは、実際にはその前提から得られる良いギャグは一つの映画分しかないということです。
back_translation: What all the analysis proves is that, in fact, there is only one good joke that can be derived from that premise, which is equivalent to one movie's worth.

text: the first half bursts with a goofy energy previous disney films only used for a few minutes here and there .
translation: 前半は、これまでのディズニー映画が少しずつしか使わなかった goofyなエネルギーであふれています。
back_translation: The first half is filled with a goofy energy that previous Disney movies have only used sparingly.

text: wendigo wants to be a monster movie for the art-house crowd , but it falls into the trap of pretention almost every time .
translation: ウェンディゴはアートハウスの観客向けのモンスター映画になりたいが、ほぼ毎回、気取りの罠に陥ってしまう。
back_translation: Wendigo wants to be a monster movie for art house audiences, but almost every time, it falls into the trap of pretentiousness.

text: testud is the burning center of a clinically dispassionate film .
translation: テストゥードは臨床的に冷静な映画の燃える中心です。
back_translation: "Testudo is the burning center of a clinically cool movie."

text: passion , melodrama , sorrow , laugther , and tears cascade over the screen effortlessly . . .
translation: 情熱、メロドラマ、悲しみ、笑い、そして涙が画面上に effortlessly に溢れ出る。。。
back_translation: Passion, melodrama, sadness, laughter, and tears effortlessly overflow on the screen...

text: an epic journey across an unforgiving landscape that will test their very will to survive .
translation: 過酷な土地を横断する壮大な旅が、彼らの生き残る意志を試す。
back_translation: An epic journey across a harsh land tests their will to survive.

text: all hell breaks loose when otis tries to help mark outwit his sleazy bookie , setting into play a strange turn of events .
translation: オーティスがマークを助けてずるいブッカーを出し抜こうとすると、すべてが混乱し、不思議な出来事が展開される。
back_translation: When Otis tries to help Mark outsmart the sneaky Booker, everything becomes chaotic, and strange events unfold.

text: red dragon makes one appreciate silence of the lambs .
translation: レッド・ドラゴンは「羊たちの沈黙」の静けさを感じさせてくれる。
back_translation: Red Dragon conveys the tranquility of "The Silence of the Lambs."

text: the only surprise is that heavyweights joel silver and robert zemeckis agreed to produce this ; i assume the director has pictures of them cavorting in ladies ' underwear .
translation: 驚きなのは、ヘビー級のジョエル・シルバーとロバート・ゼメキスがこれを制作することに同意したことだけだ；監督が彼らが女性用下着で楽しんでいる写真を持っていると仮定している。
back_translation: What’s surprising is that heavyweight Joel Silver and Robert Zemeckis agreed to produce this; the director assumes they have photos of themselves enjoying women's lingerie.

text: outrageousness is all plympton seemed to be going for this time . we miss the quirky amazement that used to come along for an integral part of the ride .
translation: 今回のプレンプトンは outrageousness を追求しているようですが、かつては旅の重要な一部として付いてきた独特の驚きが恋しいです。
back_translation: This time, it seems that Plenpton is pursuing outrageousness, but I miss the unique surprises that used to come as an important part of the journey.

text: `` die another day `` is a worthy entry in the pantheon of james bond movies .
translation: 「ダイ・アナザー・デイ」は、ジェームズ・ボンド映画の中でも価値のある作品です。
back_translation: "Die Another Day" is a valuable entry in the James Bond film series.

text: this is n't a good movie ; this is n't a bad movie . this is a movie that dispenses with the whole good/bad paradigm and exists on its own plane of reality .
translation: これは良い映画ではない；これは悪い映画でもない。これは良い/悪いという枠組みを超えて独自の現実の次元に存在する映画だ。
back_translation: This is not a good movie; it is not a bad movie either. It exists in a unique dimension of reality that transcends the framework of good/bad.

text: you can fire a torpedo through some of clancy 's holes , and the scripters do n't deserve any oscars . but the nerve-raked acting , the crackle of lines , the impressive stagings of hardware , make for some robust and scary entertainment .
translation: クランシーの穴を通して魚雷を発射することはできるし、脚本家たちはオスカーに値しない。しかし、神経をすり減らすような演技、セリフの弾むような迫力、機器の印象的な演出が、力強く恐ろしい娯楽を生み出している。
back_translation: You can launch torpedoes through Clancy's hole, and the screenwriters do not deserve an Oscar. However, the nerve-wracking performances, the impactful dialogue, and the impressive staging of the equipment create a powerful and terrifying entertainment experience.

text: shot on location in the williamsburgh and flatbush neighborhoods of brooklyn , hung-up is a 35mm short story in the tradition of happy gilmore and taxi driver .
translation: ウィリアムズバーグとフラットブッシュのブルックリン地区で撮影された「ハングアップ」は、ハッピー・ギルモアやタクシードライバーの伝統を受け継ぐ35mmの短編ストーリーです。
back_translation: "Hang Up," shot in the Williamsburg and Flatbush neighborhoods of Brooklyn, is a 35mm short story that continues the tradition of Happy Gilmore and Taxi Driver.

text: she went on to be in brazil 's first-ever fashion parade/show .
translation: 彼女はブラジル初のファッションパレード/ショーに出ることになりました。
back_translation: She is going to participate in Brazil's first fashion parade/show.

text: arjun ( akshay kumar ) is a high profile vigilante who soon encounters a problem when his mother ( raakhee ) becomes terribly ill .
translation: アージュン（アクシャイ・クマール）は高プロフィールの自警団で、母親（ラキー）がひどく病気になってしまうと、すぐに問題に直面します。
back_translation: Arjun (Akshay Kumar) is part of a high-profile vigilante group, and when his mother (Lakshmi) falls gravely ill, he soon faces challenges.

text: a full experience , a love story and a murder mystery that expands into a meditation on the deep deceptions of innocence .
translation: 完全な体験、愛の物語、そして無邪気さの深い欺瞞についての瞑想に広がる殺人ミステリー。
back_translation: A murder mystery that expands into a meditation on a complete experience, a love story, and the deep deception of innocence.

text: an unpredictable blend of gal-pal smart talk , romantic comedy and dark tragedy that bites off considerably more than writer/director john mckay can swallow .
translation: 女友達同士の賢い会話、ロマンティックコメディ、そして暗い悲劇が予測不可能に混ざり合い、ライター兼監督のジョン・マッケイが飲み込むにはかなりの量を噛み砕いてしまっている。
back_translation: A smart conversation among female friends, romantic comedy, and dark tragedy unpredictably intertwine, leaving writer-director John McKay to chew through quite a bit of it to digest.

text: a virus has scaped in a secret facility called `` the hive `` turning all researchers into hungry zombies and releasing their mutated lab `` animals `` that they were studying .
translation: 秘密の施設「ハイブ」でウイルスが漏れ、すべての研究者が飢えたゾンビに変わり、彼らが研究していた変異した実験「動物」たちが解き放たれました。
back_translation: A virus leaked from the secret facility "Hive," turning all the researchers into hungry zombies, and the mutated experiments known as "animals" that they were studying were unleashed.

text: it may sound like a mere disease-of- the-week tv movie , but a song for martin is made infinitely more wrenching by the performances of real-life spouses seldahl and wollter .
translation: それは週ごとの病気を題材にしたテレビ映画のように聞こえるかもしれませんが、「マーティンのための歌」は、実際の夫婦であるセルダールとウォルターの演技によって無限に心を打つものになっています。
back_translation: It may sound like a TV movie about weekly illnesses, but "A Song for Martin" is made infinitely moving through the performances of the real-life couple Seldahl and Walter.

text: his peace is shattered in august 1947 , however , when india is granted independence .
translation: 彼の平和は1947年8月に壊れるが、その時インドが独立を果たす。
back_translation: His peace is broken in August 1947, but at that time, India achieves independence.

text: in those short time , rio learn about the things he missed all this time .
translation: その短い時間の中で、リオはこれまでの時間に見逃していたことについて学びました。
back_translation: During that short time, Rio learned about the things he had missed until then.

text: paul does n't see any other way but to commit suicide .
translation: ポールは自殺する以外に道がないと感じている。
back_translation: Paul feels there is no way out except to commit suicide.

text: both will fight to the death not to give it to each other .
translation: どちらもお互いにそれを渡さないために死闘を繰り広げるだろう。
back_translation: Both sides will engage in a fierce battle to prevent each other from delivering it.

text: people often will blame the world for keeping them from being able to live their dreams .
translation: 人々はしばしば、夢を追うことを妨げる世界を非難します。
back_translation: People often blame the world for hindering their pursuit of dreams.

text: so this race to reach the diamonds becomes deadlier and all three powers - vikrant , guru and anna clash .
translation: このダイヤモンドを手に入れるためのレースはますます危険になり、3つの勢力 - ヴィクラン、グル、そしてアンナが衝突します。
back_translation: The race to obtain this diamond becomes increasingly dangerous, with three factions - Vikran, Guru, and Anna - clashing with each other.

text: leviticus , a navy veteran returns home after serving his country to find the war at home is harder than anything he 's ever encountered , but exactly what & # 38 ; who is he fighting for ?
translation: レビティクス、海軍の退役軍人は、国に仕えた後に帰宅しますが、家での戦争は彼がこれまでに遭遇したどのようなことよりも困難であることに気づきます。しかし、彼は正確に何のために、そして誰と戦っているのでしょうか？
back_translation: Revetix, a retired Navy veteran, returns home after serving his country but realizes that the war at home is more difficult than anything he has encountered before. However, exactly what is he fighting for, and who is he fighting against?

text: mariachi is recruited by sands to take out gen . marquez ( has a huge score to settle with the mariachi ) , who has major beef with mariachi to begin with .
translation: マリアッチは砂に雇われて、マルケス大佐を仕留めることになる（彼はマリアッチに対して確執を抱えている）、そもそもマルケスはマリアッチと大きな対立がある。
back_translation: The mariachi is hired by the sand to take down Colonel Marquez (who harbors a grudge against the mariachi), and to begin with, Marquez has a major conflict with the mariachi.

text: opens as promising as any war/adventure film you 'll ever see and dissolves into a routine courtroom drama , better suited for a movie titled `` glory : a soldier 's story . ``
translation: 映画は、見ることができるどの戦争/冒険映画にも劣らない期待感を持って始まり、ルーチンな法廷ドラマに変わってしまいます。そのため、「栄光：兵士の物語」といったタイトルの映画の方が適しているでしょう。
back_translation: The movie begins with an anticipation that is on par with any war/adventure film you can watch, but it ends up transforming into a routine courtroom drama. Therefore, a title like "Glory: A Soldier's Story" would be more appropriate.

text: william winslow `` ( ron perlman ) , the chief psychiatrist at brookdale .
translation: ウィリアム・ウィンズロー（ロン・パールマン）、ブルックデールの主任精神科医。
back_translation: William Winslow (Ron Perlman), the chief psychiatrist at Brookdale.

text: their task is now cut out for them : plan a - get into the fashion extortion business plan b - stage india 's biggest bank robbery to get the diamonds back plan c - decamp with the loot .
translation: 彼らの任務は今や明確になった：プランA - ファッション恐喝ビジネスに参入する プランB - インドの最大の銀行強盗を計画してダイヤモンドを取り戻す プランC - 戦利品と共に逃げる。
back_translation: Their mission has now become clear: Plan A - Enter the fashion extortion business. Plan B - Plan the biggest bank robbery in India to recover the diamonds. Plan C - Escape with the loot.

text: look , this is a terrific flick replete with dazzling camera-work , dancing and music .
translation: 見てください、これは素晴らしい映画で、眩しいカメラワーク、ダンス、音楽が満載です。
back_translation: Look, this is a wonderful movie filled with dazzling camera work, dance, and music.

text: rayne johnson is a shrewd investment company assistant who turns a mob slaying into a golden opportunity for a new improved lifestyle , managing to outsmart the crooked cops who are very eager to see her disappear .
translation: レイン・ジョンソンは、ギャングの殺人事件を新しい改善されたライフスタイルのための黄金の機会に変える抜け目のない投資会社のアシスタントであり、彼女を消し去りたがる不正な警官たちを巧みに出し抜くことに成功します。
back_translation: Rain Johnson is a shrewd investment firm assistant who turns a gang-related murder case into a golden opportunity for a new and improved lifestyle, successfully outsmarting corrupt police officers who want to eliminate her.

text: an old-fashioned but emotionally stirring adventure tale of the kind they rarely make anymore .
translation: 古風で感情を揺さぶる冒険物語で、今ではめったに作られない類のものです。
back_translation: It's an old-fashioned adventure story that stirs emotions, a type that is rarely created nowadays.

text: the movie sticks much closer to hornby 's drop-dead confessional tone than the film version of high fidelity did .
translation: その映画は、ハイフィデリティの映画版よりも、ホーンビーの衝撃的な告白調にずっと近い。
back_translation: The movie is much closer to Hornby's shocking confessional style than the film version of High Fidelity.

text: wilco fans will have a great time , and the movie should win the band a few new converts , too .
translation: ウィルコのファンは素晴らしい時間を過ごし、映画はバンドに新しいファンをもたらすべきです。
back_translation: Wilco's fans had a wonderful time, and the movie should bring new fans to the band.

text: he tries other legal approaches , which also fail .
translation: 彼は他の法的手段を試みますが、それも失敗します。
back_translation: He will try other legal means, but that will also fail.

text: knowing that the legend of the temple describes ancient mystical music as the key to unlock its secrets , jake enlists the help of samantha `` sam `` kincaid , an expert musicologist .
translation: 神殿の伝説が古代の神秘的な音楽をその秘密を解く鍵として描いていることを知ったジェイクは、音楽学の専門家であるサマンサ「サム」キンケイドの助けを借りる。
back_translation: Jake, having learned that the legend of the temple portrays ancient mystical music as the key to unlocking its secrets, seeks the help of Samantha "Sam" Kincaid, an expert in musicology.

text: the film is just a big , gorgeous , mind-blowing , breath-taking mess .
translation: その映画はただの大きくて美しく、心を吹き飛ばす、息を呑むような混沌です。
back_translation: The movie is just a big and beautiful, mind-blowing, breathtaking chaos.

text: an atonal estrogen opera that demonizes feminism while gifting the most sympathetic male of the piece with a nice vomit bath at his wedding .
translation: フェミニズムを悪魔化しながら、作品の中で最も同情を引く男性に結婚式で素敵な嘔吐のバスを贈る無調エストロゲンオペラ。
back_translation: An unorthodox estrogen opera that demonizes feminism while giving the most sympathetic male character a lovely vomiting bath at his wedding.

text: many years have passed since the secret knight avenged his family by slaying the evil knight .
translation: 多くの年が経ち、秘密の騎士は悪の騎士を倒すことで家族の復讐を果たしました。
back_translation: Many years have passed, and the secret knight fulfilled the revenge of his family by defeating the evil knight.

text: he does n't accept himself and even everyday contacts with others cause his aggression .
translation: 彼は自分を受け入れず、日常の他者との接触さえも彼の攻撃性を引き起こします。
back_translation: He cannot accept himself, and even daily interactions with others trigger his aggression.

text: provided with a blurry picture of william the media turns his ministry into a human interest story that spans the country in a massive media hunt for this `` miracle man `` .
translation: ぼやけたウィリアムの写真が提供されると、メディアは彼の奉仕活動を全国に広がる人間的関心を持つストーリーに変え、この「奇跡の男」の大規模なメディア捜索を行います。
back_translation: When a blurry photo of William is provided, the media transforms his service activities into a story of human interest that spreads nationwide, leading to a large-scale media search for this "miracle man."

text: bad . very bad . stultifyingly , dumbfoundingly , mind-numbingly bad .
translation: 悪い。非常に悪い。愚かで、驚くほど、意識を麻痺させるほど悪い。
