back_translation: Bad. Extremely bad. Foolish and astonishingly, numbly bad.

text: max finally decides to help the fbi by describing his constant dreams about the kidnapping .
translation: マックスはついにFBIを助けることに決め、誘拐に関する彼の絶え間ない夢について説明します。
back_translation: Max finally decides to help the FBI and explains his relentless dreams about the kidnapping.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: ナレーターと他のキャラクターは、演じることがエスターを変えると私たちを納得させようとしますが、彼女がステージで話しているのを見たことはありません。欺かれた気がして、エスターは変わらぬ退屈な人物のままのように感じられます。
back_translation: The narrator and other characters try to convince us that performing changes Esther, but we have never seen her speaking on stage. It feels deceptive, and she seems to remain the same dull character.

text: after he 's dumped on valentine 's day by mallory , his girlfriend of three years , charlie finds himself obsessed and unable to live a normal life without her .
translation: 彼は3年間付き合った彼女マロリーにバレンタインデーに振られた後、チャーリーは彼女なしでは普通の生活を送ることができず、彼女に対する obsesión に囚われてしまう。
back_translation: After being dumped by his girlfriend Mallory on Valentine's Day after dating for three years, Charlie becomes unable to lead a normal life without her and becomes trapped in an obsession with her.

text: many a parent and their teen ( or preteen ) kid could bond while watching a walk to remember . so could young romantics out on a date .
translation: 多くの親とそのティーン（またはプレティーン）の子供は、「ウォーク・トゥ・リメンバー」を見ながら絆を深めることができる。デート中の若いロマンティストたちもそうだ。
back_translation: Many parents and their teenage (or pre-teen) children can deepen their bond while watching "A Walk to Remember." This is also true for young romantics on dates.

text: amongst these , ruth , a girl of 17 , writes a diary on the journey they are to undertake on the atlantic .
translation: その中で、17歳の女の子ルースは、彼らが大西洋で行う旅についての日記を書いています。
back_translation: Among them, a 17-year-old girl named Ruth is writing a diary about their journey across the Atlantic.

text: it made me want to wrench my eyes out of my head and toss them at the screen .
translation: それは私の目を引き裂いて画面に投げつけたくなるほどでした。
back_translation: It was so captivating that I wanted to tear my eyes away and throw them at the screen.

text: collapses after 30 minutes into a slap-happy series of adolescent violence .
translation: 30分後には slap-happy な若者の暴力のシリーズに崩壊します。
back_translation: In 30 minutes, it will collapse into a series of slap-happy young people's violence.

text: it all drags on so interminably it 's like watching a miserable relationship unfold in real time .
translation: それは永遠に続くかのように引き延ばされており、まるで悲惨な関係がリアルタイムで展開されているのを見ているようだ。
back_translation: It feels as if it is being extended endlessly, like watching a disastrous relationship unfold in real time.

text: jacobi , the most fluent of actors , is given relatively dry material from nijinsky 's writings to perform , and the visuals , even erotically frank ones , become dullingly repetitive .
translation: ジャコビは最も流暢な俳優であり、ニジンスキーの著作から与えられた比較的ドライな素材を演じていますが、視覚的には、性的に率直なものでも退屈に繰り返されるだけになります。
back_translation: Jacobi is the most fluent actor, performing relatively dry material given from Nijinsky's works, but visually, it becomes merely boringly repetitive, even when it is sexually explicit.

text: as [ the characters ] get more depressed , the story gets more tiresome , especially as it continues to mount a conspicuous effort to be profound .
translation: キャラクターたちがますます憂鬱になるにつれて、物語はますますうんざりするものになり、特に深遠であろうと顕著な努力を続けるにつれてそうなります。
back_translation: As the characters grow increasingly melancholic, the story becomes more and more frustrating, especially as it continues to make notable efforts to be profound.

text: but this murder investigation is drawing vincent home to long beach , the self-proclaimed city by the sea , where the past has been waiting for him to return .
translation: しかし、この殺人事件の捜査がビンセントをロングビーチに引き寄せており、自己宣言した海の街で、過去が彼の帰りを待っている。
back_translation: However, the investigation into this murder case is pulling Vincent back to Long Beach, where the past is waiting for his return in the self-proclaimed coastal city.

text: a story about a troubled genius who attempts to build a magnetic engine in hopes of greatly reducing the worlds consumption of fossil fuels and electricity .
translation: 困難を抱えた天才が、世界の化石燃料と電力の消費を大幅に削減することを望んで、磁気エンジンを作ろうとする物語。
back_translation: A story about a genius facing difficulties who aims to significantly reduce the world's fossil fuel and electricity consumption by creating a magnetic engine.

text: the dons have their own hierarchal manipulations - chotte baba ( jackie shroff ) , medium baba ( gulshan grover ) and bade baba ( amitabh bachchan ) .
translation: ドンたちはそれぞれ独自のヒエラルキーを持つ操作を行っている - チョッテババ（ジャッキー・シュロフ）、ミディアムババ（グルシャン・グローバー）、バーデババ（アミターブ・バッチャン）。
back_translation: Don and the others are performing operations with their own unique hierarchies - Chotte Babu (Jackie Shroff), Medium Babu (Gulshan Grover), and Bade Babu (Amitabh Bachchan).

text: one of those movies that catches you up in something bigger than yourself , namely , an archetypal desire to enjoy good trash every now and then .
translation: 自分より大きな何かに引き込まれるような映画の一つであり、言わば時々良いゴミを楽しむという原型的な欲望です。
back_translation: It is one of those movies that draws you into something larger than yourself, representing a primal desire to occasionally enjoy good junk.

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .
translation: たとえ何が起こっているのか全く理解できなくても、これは視聴後に数時間の議論を刺激する映画です。なぜなら、誰が誰に何をしたのか、そしてその理由を思い出すためだけでも話し合う価値があるからです。
back_translation: Even if you completely don't understand what's happening, this is a movie that sparks discussions for hours after watching. Because it's worth talking about who did what to whom and the reasons behind it.

text: [ grant 's ] bumbling magic takes over the film , and it turns out to be another winning star vehicle .
translation: グラントの不器用な魔法が映画を支配し、結果的にまた別の成功したスターの車両となった。
back_translation: Grant's clumsy magic dominated the film, ultimately becoming yet another successful vehicle for a star.

text: the doctor also finds he has an attraction to her , despite their age difference .
translation: 医者は年の差にもかかわらず、彼女に惹かれていることに気づきます。
back_translation: The doctor realizes that he is attracted to her despite the age difference.

text: an exciting debut from promising , and fairly disturbed , young director/screenwriter dylan kidd .
translation: 期待の若手監督/脚本家ダイラン・キッドによる刺激的なデビュー作品。
back_translation: An exciting debut work by the promising young director/screenwriter, Dylan Kidd.

text: the editing is chaotic , the photography grainy and badly focused , the writing unintentionally hilarious , the direction unfocused , the performances as wooden .
translation: 編集は混沌としており、写真は粒子が粗くぼやけていて、ライティングは意図せず滑稽で、演出は焦点を欠き、演技もぎこちない。
back_translation: The editing is chaotic, the photographs are grainy and blurry, the lighting unintentionally comedic, the direction lacks focus, and the acting is awkward.

text: in this age of soulless , fx-driven action franchises raimi anachronistically emphasizes character development .
translation: 魂のないFX駆動のアクションフランチャイズの時代において、ライミは時代遅れのようにキャラクターの成長を強調している。
back_translation: In an era of soulless, FX-driven action franchises, Raimi emphasizes character development in a way that seems outdated.

text: the only excitement comes when the credits finally roll and you get to leave the theater .
translation: 唯一の興奮は、クレジットがようやく流れ始めて劇場を出られる時だけです。
back_translation: The only excitement is when the credits finally start to roll and I can leave the theater.

text: nothing makes this woman happy , including her wealthy but passive husband ( tony ) , a pharmaceutical kingpin .
translation: 何もこの女性を幸せにしない、裕福だが受動的な夫（トニー）を含めて、製薬キングピンである。
back_translation: Nothing makes this woman happy, including her wealthy but passive husband (Tony), who is a pharmaceutical kingpin.

text: in the bank vault the young man discovers his name , jason bourne .
translation: 銀行の金庫で、若者は自分の名前を発見する。「ジェイソン・ボーン」。
back_translation: In the bank vault, the young man discovers his name. "Jason Bourne."

text: ultimately , the film amounts to being lectured to by tech-geeks , if you 're up for that sort of thing .
translation: 結局、この映画はテックオタクたちに説教されることになるので、その手のことが好きな人には合っているかもしれません。
back_translation: In the end, this movie will end up being preached to by tech enthusiasts, so it might be suitable for those who enjoy that sort of thing.

text: she 's aided by her sister sue ( zhao wei ) , who operates the pair 's world panorama surveillance system , which allows them to tap into any video security system in the world .
translation: 彼女は妹のスー（趙薇）によって助けられており、スーは二人の世界的パノラマ監視システムを操作しています。このシステムによって、彼女たちは世界中のどの映像監視システムにもアクセスできるようになります。
back_translation: She is being assisted by her sister Sue (Zhao Wei), who operates a global panoramic surveillance system for the two of them. This system allows them to access any video surveillance system in the world.

text: just a collection of this and that -- whatever fills time -- with no unified whole .
translation: ただの雑多な集まり -- 時間を埋めるためのもので -- 統一された全体はない。
back_translation: Just a miscellaneous gathering -- something to fill time -- there is no unified whole.

text: a lot can happen when an honest , young , naive japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time .
translation: 正直で若くて素朴な日本の男性が初めて外国を訪れると、多くのことが起こる。
back_translation: When an honest, young, and naive Japanese man visits a foreign country for the first time, many things happen.

text: eva dandridge is a very uptight young woman who constantly meddles in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands .
translation: エヴァ・ダンドリッジは非常に堅苦しい若い女性で、常に妹たちとその夫の事に干渉しています。
back_translation: Eva Dandridge is a very stiff young woman who is always meddling in the affairs of her sisters and their husbands.

text: suddenly , fields realizes that he has more in common with the migrants and their search for home , family and freedom than he thought .
translation: 突然、フィールズは移民たちと彼らの家族、自由、そして帰る場所を求める姿勢に自分が思っていた以上に共通点が多いことに気づく。
back_translation: Suddenly, Fields realizes that he has more in common with the immigrants and their families, their quest for freedom, and their desire for a place to return to than he had previously thought.

text: . . . in the pile of useless actioners from mtv schmucks who do n't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes .
translation: . . . ストーリーを4分以上語る方法を知らないMTVのシュムクたちからの無意味なアクション映画の山の中で。
back_translation: ... in the midst of a mountain of meaningless action films from MTV's Shumuk and others who don't know how to tell a story for more than four minutes.

text: lilli black , battling her painful memories and the secrets surrounding her dying father , collides into the complicated and obsessive life of morrison wiley on the streets of new york city .
translation: リリ・ブラックは、苦しい記憶と死にゆく父親を取り巻く秘密と戦いながら、ニューヨーク市の街でモリソン・ワイリーの複雑で執着的な生活に衝突する。
back_translation: Lily Black, while battling painful memories and the secrets surrounding her dying father, collides with the complex and obsessive life of Morrison Wiley in the streets of New York City.

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .
translation: 字幕付きのコスチュームドラマは、携帯電話、銃、内燃機関が存在しない遥か昔のアフリカの帝国を舞台にしていますが、その中で展開される政治は明日にも通じるものです。
back_translation: The costume drama with subtitles is set in an ancient African empire where there are no mobile phones, guns, or internal combustion engines, yet the politics that unfold within it are relevant to tomorrow.

text: after being trapped in hell for quite some time , freddy krueger meets up with jason voorhees after jason is sent to hell by creighton duke ( forget part x ; rewind to friday the 13th part ix ) .
translation: しばらく地獄に閉じ込められた後、フレディ・クルーガーはクレイトン・デュークによって地獄に送られたジェイソン・ボーヒーズと出会う（パートXは忘れて、フライデー・ザ・13th パートIXに巻き戻す）。
back_translation: After being trapped in hell for a while, Freddy Krueger meets Jason Voorhees, who has been sent to hell by Clayton Duke (forget about Part X and rewind to Friday the 13th Part IX).

text: rajani plans to offer her daughter to an older man , a rich husband and protector to her daughter .
translation: ラジャニは娘を年上の男性に、娘のための裕福な夫であり守護者に提供することを計画しています。
back_translation: Rajani is planning to provide her daughter to an older man, who would be a wealthy husband and protector for her daughter.

text: sunshine state is sayles at his most robert altman-ish , purposefully juggling about a dozen narrative balls in the air , and letting the mundanity and smallish drama of everyday life tell a larger story .
translation: サンシャイン・ステートは、セイルズが最もロバート・アルトマンらしい作品を作り出しており、意図的に約1ダースの物語の要素を同時に扱い、日常生活の平凡さと小さなドラマがより大きな物語を語るのを許しています。
back_translation: The Sunshine State is where Salles creates his most Robert Altman-esque work, deliberately handling about a dozen narrative elements simultaneously, allowing the ordinariness of everyday life and its small dramas to tell a larger story.

text: the story revolves around a dying father and his son , who is trying to learn more about his dad by piecing together the stories he has gathered over the years .
translation: 物語は、死にゆく父親と彼の息子を中心に展開し、息子は長年にわたって集めた話をつなぎ合わせることで父親についてもっと知ろうとしています。
back_translation: The story revolves around a dying father and his son, who is trying to learn more about his father by piecing together stories he has collected over the years.

text: 'all in all , reign of fire will be a good ( successful ) rental . '
translation: 全体として、『レイン・オブ・ファイア』は良い（成功する）レンタル作品になるでしょう。
back_translation: Overall, "Reign of Fire" will be a good (successful) rental.

text: an unusual family and a staff of two are preparing a party on their cosy mansion .
translation: 珍しい家族と二人のスタッフが彼らの快適なマンションでパーティーの準備をしています。
back_translation: A rare family and two staff members are preparing for a party in their comfortable apartment.

text: cac & # 225 ; , a vj who works for s & # 227 ; o paulo mtv , comes to rio de janeiro to make a report about a new band , whose members are poor and live in a slum called morro do alem & # 227 ; o .
translation: カク・ア・ヴィジェイがサンパウロMTVで働いており、新しいバンドについてのレポートを作成するためにリオデジャネイロに来ます。そのバンドのメンバーは貧しく、モーロ・ド・アレマォンというスラムで生活しています。
back_translation: Kaku A.Vijay works at MTV São Paulo and is coming to Rio de Janeiro to create a report on a new band. The members of that band are poor and live in a slum called Morro do Alemão.

text: the filmmaker ascends , literally , to the olympus of the art world , but he would have done well to end this flawed , dazzling series with the raising of something other than his own cremaster .
translation: 映画作家は文字通り芸術の世界のオリンポスへと昇りますが、彼は自分のクレマスター以外の何かを引き上げることで、この欠点のある眩しいシリーズを終わらせるべきだったでしょう。
back_translation: Filmmakers literally ascend to the Olympus of the world of art, but he should have concluded this flawed yet dazzling series by elevating something other than his own cremaster.

text: maybe it 's the star power of the cast or the redundant messages , but something aboul `` full frontal `` seems , well , contrived .
translation: キャストのスター性か、冗長なメッセージのせいかもしれないが、「フルフロンタル」には、何かしら、まあ、作為的なものを感じる。
back_translation: Whether it's due to the star power of the cast or the redundant message, I feel there's something somewhat contrived about "Full Frontal."

text: charlotte contacts the perfect life saver to thank him , but everything is n't what it seems .
translation: シャーロットは完璧な救助者に感謝の連絡をするが、すべてが見かけ通りではない。
back_translation: Charlotte contacts the perfect rescuer to express her gratitude, but not everything is as it seems.

text: impostor does n't do much with its template , despite a remarkably strong cast .
translation: インポスターは、非常に強力なキャストにもかかわらず、そのテンプレートをあまり活かしていません。
back_translation: Despite being a very powerful cast, the Imposter does not make much use of its template.

text: works better in the conception than it does in the execution . . . winds up seeming just a little too clever .
translation: 実行においては概念よりも劣っており…少しばかり賢すぎる印象を与えてしまう。
back_translation: In execution, it is inferior to the concept... giving a slight impression of being too clever.

text: based on euripides ' immortal drama of the same name , the bacchae ( bahk-ai ' ) is an intense and contemporary retelling of the classic myth in which dionysus , son of zeus , seeks vengeance on thebes , the city of his birth and site of his mortal mother semele 's cruel and horrible death .
translation: ユリピデスの同名の不朽のドラマに基づく『バッカイ』は、ゼウスの息子ディオニュソスが、自らの誕生の地であり、彼の人間の母セメレーの残酷で恐ろしい死の舞台であるテーベに復讐を求めるという古典的な神話を、強烈で現代的に再解釈した作品です。
back_translation: "Bacchae," based on the timeless play of the same name by Euripides, is a work that intensely and modernly reinterprets the classic myth of Dionysus, the son of Zeus, seeking revenge in Thebes, the place of his birth and the site of the cruel and horrific death of his human mother, Semele.

text: blade then tenuously enters into an alliance with the bloodpack , an elite team of vampires trained in all modes of combat to defeat the reaper threat .
translation: ブレイドは、その後、死神の脅威を打破するためにあらゆる戦闘スタイルで訓練されたエリートの吸血鬼チーム、ブラッドパックと tenuously 連携を結びます。
back_translation: Blade then forms a tenuous alliance with an elite vampire team trained in every combat style, known as the Bloodpack, to combat the threat of the Grim Reaper.

text: as they encounter ranger megan it turns out that werewolves are active in the region .
translation: 彼らがレンジャーのメーガンに出会ったところ、地域でオオカミ男が活動していることが判明しました。
back_translation: When they met Ranger Megan, it became clear that a werewolf was active in the area.

text: it is bad , but certainly not without merit as entertainment .
translation: 悪いですが、娯楽としての価値は確かにあります。
back_translation: I’m afraid it definitely has entertainment value.

text: but he meets cac & # 225 ; 's brother , nando , who tries to convince him to take part in a scam .
translation: しかし彼はカックの兄、ナンドに出会い、彼は彼を詐欺に参加させようと説得しようとします。
back_translation: However, he meets Kaku's brother, Nando, who tries to persuade him to participate in a scam.

text: documentary about robert mcnamara , secretary of defense in the kennedy and johnson administrations , who subsequently became president of the world bank .
translation: ロバート・マクナマラに関するドキュメンタリーで、彼はケネディとジョンソン政権の国防長官を務め、その後世界銀行の総裁になった。
back_translation: In a documentary about Robert McNamara, he served as the Secretary of Defense under the Kennedy and Johnson administrations, and later became the president of the World Bank.

text: `` pink-loving , blonde-haired harvard law school graduate elle woods ( witherspoon ) returns in this sequel , as she turns her legal and fashion-savvy know-how towards getting a bill passed through congress , relocating a second time , after adapting her beverly hills ways to harvard , and now . . .
translation: ピンクを愛する金髪のハーバード法科大学院卒業生エル・ウッズ（リース・ウィザースプーン）がこの続編に帰ってきます。彼女は法律とファッションの知識を駆使して、議会で法律案を通過させるための活動を始めます。ビバリーヒルズの生活からハーバードに適応した後、再び引っ越すことになります。
back_translation: Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon), a Harvard Law School graduate who loves pink, returns in this sequel. She utilizes her knowledge of law and fashion to begin campaigning for a bill to pass in Congress. After adapting from her life in Beverly Hills to Harvard, she finds herself relocating once again.

text: when gene returns , lillian finds herself caught in the middle of a triangle .
translation: ジーンが戻ってくると、リリアンは三角関係の真ん中にいることに気づく。
back_translation: When Jean comes back, Lilian realizes that she is in the middle of a love triangle.

text: the lord of the vampires is about some 20 something kids getting into trouble and then stepping into even bigger trouble when they happen upon a peculiar home .
translation: 吸血鬼の主は、20代の子供たちがトラブルに巻き込まれ、奇妙な家に出くわしてさらに大きなトラブルに突入するという物語です。
back_translation: The story is about a master vampire and a group of young people in their twenties who get caught up in trouble and encounter a strange house, leading them into even greater trouble.

text: even by dumb action-movie standards , ballistic : ecks vs . sever is a dumb action movie .
translation: たとえバカなアクション映画の基準でさえ、バリスティック：エックス対セバーはバカなアクション映画です。
back_translation: Even by the standards of a silly action movie, Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever is a silly action movie.

text: in the end , the film is less the cheap thriller you 'd expect than it is a fairly revealing study of its two main characters M-^W damaged-goods people whose orbits will inevitably and dangerously collide .
translation: 結局、この映画はあなたが期待するような安っぽいスリラーというよりも、むしろその2人の主要キャラクターの非常に明らかな研究です。彼らは傷ついた存在であり、運命的かつ危険に満ちた衝突が避けられない人々です。
back_translation: In the end, this movie is more of a very clear study of its two main characters rather than a cheap thriller that you might expect. They are wounded beings, people whose fateful and dangerous collision is inevitable.

text: one tragic night , john rescues angela from a wicked act of betrayal .
translation: ある悲劇的な夜、ジョンはアンジェラを裏切りの悪行から救います。
back_translation: On a tragic night, John saves Angela from an act of betrayal.

text: kung pow is oedekerk 's realization of his childhood dream to be in a martial-arts flick , and proves that sometimes the dreams of youth should remain just that .
translation: クン・ポウはオーデカーケルクの子供の頃の夢を武道映画に出ることを実現したものであり、時には若い頃の夢はただの夢のままであるべきだということを証明しています。
back_translation: Kun-Pou's childhood dream of appearing in a martial arts film has come true, and it sometimes proves that youthful dreams should remain just dreams.

text: avary 's film never quite emerges from the shadow of ellis ' book .
translation: アヴァリーの映画は、エリスの本の影から決して抜け出すことはありません。
back_translation: The movie of Avari never escapes from the shadow of Ellis's book.

text: the movie is too cute to take itself too seriously , but it still feels like it was made by some very stoned college students .
translation: その映画はあまりにもかわいくて自分自身を真剣に受け止めるには過ぎるが、それでも非常にハイな大学生たちによって作られたように感じる。
back_translation: The movie is too cute to take myself seriously, yet it still feels like it was made by very high college students.

text: hayek is stunning as frida and . . . a star-making project .
translation: ハイエックはフリーダとして素晴らしく、そして…スターを生み出すプロジェクトです。
back_translation: Hayek is a fantastic project that creates stars as Frida.

text: like a comedian who starts off promisingly but then proceeds to flop , comedian runs out of steam after a half hour .
translation: 約束されたスタートを切ったかのようなコメディアンだが、その後は失敗に終わる。コメディアンは30分後に勢いを失ってしまう。
back_translation: The comedian seemed to have made a promised start, but afterward, it ended in failure. The comedian lost momentum after 30 minutes.

text: a film with almost as many delights for adults as there are for children and dog lovers .
translation: 大人にとっての喜びが子供や犬好きのための喜びと同じくらい多い映画。
back_translation: A movie that brings as much joy to adults as it does to children and dog lovers.

text: in order to continue giving therapy without leaving his home he gives it over the internet .
translation: 自宅を離れずに治療を続けるために、彼はインターネットで治療を行っています。
back_translation: In order to continue treatment without leaving home, he is receiving therapy online.

text: not about to lose the fortune she amassed with her self-serving texas husband , she makes an offer to her process server , joe ( matthew perry ) that sets them off on a wild trip across the country .
translation: 彼女は自己中心的なテキサスの夫と共に築いた財産を失うわけにはいかないので、彼女はプロセスサーバーであるジョー（マシュー・ペリー）に提案をし、二人は全国を横断するワイルドな旅に出ることになる。
back_translation: She cannot afford to lose the wealth she built with her self-centered Texas husband, so she makes a proposal to Joe (Matthew Perry), a process server, and the two embark on a wild journey across the country.

text: mary gilbert , head of the fbi internet investigations division , her team and her maladroit nephew are on the case .
translation: メリー・ギルバート、FBIのインターネット捜査部門の責任者、彼女のチームと彼女の不器用な甥がその事件を担当している。
back_translation: Merry Gilbert, head of the FBI's Internet Investigations Division, is handling the case with her team and her awkward nephew.

text: the fascination comes in the power of the huston performance , which seems so larger than life and yet so fragile , and in the way the ivan character accepts the news of his illness so quickly but still finds himself unable to react .
translation: 魅力はハストンのパフォーマンスの力にあり、それは非常に大きな存在でありながら、同時に非常に脆い。そして、イワンのキャラクターが自分の病気の知らせを迅速に受け入れる一方で、反応することができないという点にもある。
back_translation: The charm lies in Huston's powerful performance, which is a very large presence yet at the same time very fragile. Additionally, it is also about the point where Ivan's character quickly accepts the news of his illness but is unable to react.

text: a blind girl gets a cornea transplant so that she would be able to see again .
translation: 盲目の少女が角膜移植を受け、再び見ることができるようになります。
back_translation: A blind girl receives a corneal transplant and is able to see again.

text: an instance of an old dog not only learning but inventing a remarkable new trick .
translation: 古い犬が驚くべき新しい技を学ぶだけでなく、創造する例。
back_translation: An example of an old dog not only learning an amazing new trick but also creating one.

text: deep intelligence and a warm , enveloping affection breathe out of every frame .
translation: 深い知性と温かく包み込む愛情が、すべてのフレームから漂っています。
back_translation: A deep intelligence and a warm, enveloping affection exude from every frame.

text: following the gruesome murder of a young woman in her neighborhood , a self-determined woman living in new york city -- as if to test the limits of her own safety -- propels herself into an impossibly risky sexual liaison .
translation: 近所で若い女性が残虐に殺された後、ニューヨーク市に住む自立した女性は、自身の安全の限界を試すかのように、非常に危険な性的関係に身を投じる。
back_translation: After a young woman was brutally murdered in the neighborhood, an independent woman living in New York City plunges into extremely dangerous sexual relationships, as if testing the limits of her own safety.

text: ford is now on the run trying to clear his name from the murder with trey and his gang looking for his blood .
translation: フォードは今、トレイと彼のギャングが彼の血を求めている中、自分の名誉を回復しようと逃げています。
back_translation: Ford is currently on the run trying to restore his honor as Trey and his gang are after his blood.

text: manages to accomplish what few sequels can -- it equals the original and in some ways even betters it .
translation: 少数の続編が達成できることを成し遂げており、オリジナルと同等であり、いくつかの点ではそれを上回っています。
back_translation: A small number of sequels have achieved what they set out to do, being on par with the original and surpassing it in some aspects.

text: desperately unfunny when it tries to makes us laugh and desperately unsuspenseful when it tries to make us jump out of our seats .
translation: 私たちを笑わせようとする時に必死に面白くなく、私たちを驚かせようとする時には必死にスリルがない。
back_translation: When they try hard to make us laugh, they aren't funny at all, and when they try hard to surprise us, there's no thrill at all.

text: writer/director burr steers emphasizes the q in quirky , with mixed results .
translation: 作家/監督のバート・スティアーズは、ユニークさの「q」を強調し、様々な結果を生み出している。
back_translation: Writer/director Bart Stears emphasizes the uniqueness of "q" and produces various outcomes.

text: helpless and powerless in malaysia , munnabhai plays a smart one on them and all are deported back to mumbai where the don is the uncrowned king .
translation: マレーシアで無力で helpless な彼らを見て、ムンナバイは巧妙な手を使い、全員がムンバイに追放される。そこでドンは無冠の王である。
back_translation: Seeing them helpless in Malaysia, Munna Bhai uses clever means to have them all exiled to Mumbai. There, Don is the uncrowned king.

text: provide [ s ] nail-biting suspense and credible characters without relying on technology-of-the-moment technique or pretentious dialogue .
translation: 最新のテクニックや気取った対話に頼ることなく、緊張感のあるサスペンスと信頼できるキャラクターを提供してください。
back_translation: Please provide tension-filled suspense and relatable characters without relying on the latest techniques or pretentious dialogue.

text: i like all four of the lead actors a lot and they manage to squeeze a few laughs out of the material , but they 're treading water at best in this forgettable effort .
translation: 私は4人の主演俳優全員がとても好きで、彼らは素材からいくつかの笑いを引き出すことに成功していますが、この忘れられた作品ではせいぜい水面を漂っているだけです。
back_translation: I really like all four of the main actors, and they manage to bring out some laughs from the material, but in this forgotten work, they are at best just skimming the surface.

text: no way i can believe this load of junk .
translation: こんなクズを信じるわけがない。
back_translation: There's no way I would believe a scum like this.

text: a by-the-numbers patient/doctor pic that covers all the usual ground
translation: 典型的な患者と医師の光景で、すべての一般的な要素を網羅している。
back_translation: A typical scene of a patient and a doctor, covering all common elements.

text: feardotcom 's thrills are all cheap , but they mostly work .
translation: feardotcomのスリルはすべて安っぽいが、多くはうまく機能している。
back_translation: The thrills of feardotcom are all cheap, but many of them work well.

text: needless to say , the dramatics that follow are utter hooey .
translation: 言うまでもなく、その後の劇的な展開は全くの無意味です。
back_translation: Needless to say, the subsequent dramatic developments are completely meaningless.

text: exciting and direct , with ghost imagery that shows just enough to keep us on our toes .
translation: 刺激的で直接的であり、我々を緊張させるために必要なだけのゴーストイメージが描かれています。
back_translation: It portrays ghost images that are stimulating, direct, and just enough to make us feel tense.

text: monte cristo smartly emphasizes the well-wrought story and omits needless chase scenes and swordfights as the revenge unfolds .
translation: モンテ・クリストは、巧妙に練られたストーリーを強調し、復讐が展開される中で不要な追跡シーンや剣の戦いを省いています。
back_translation: The Count of Monte Cristo emphasizes a cleverly crafted story, omitting unnecessary chase scenes and sword fights as the revenge unfolds.

text: one key problem with these ardently christian storylines is that there is never any question of how things will turn out .
translation: これらの熱心なクリスチャンのストーリーラインには、物事がどのように展開するかについての疑問が決して存在しないという重要な問題があります。
back_translation: There is an important issue in these enthusiastic Christian storylines where there is never any doubt about how things will unfold.

text: susie resorts to these to become the most beautiful woman in the world .
translation: スージーはこれらに頼って、世界で最も美しい女性になる。
back_translation: Suzie relies on these to become the most beautiful woman in the world.

text: aside from the fact that the film idiotically uses the website feardotcom . com or the improperly hammy performance from poor stephen rea , the film gets added disdain for the fact that it is nearly impossible to look at or understand .
translation: 映画が愚かにもウェブサイトfeardotcom.comを使用していることや、かわいそうなスティーブン・リアの不適切な演技とは別に、この映画はほとんど見ることも理解することも不可能であるため、さらなる軽蔑を受けています。
back_translation: Aside from the fact that the movie foolishly uses the website feardotcom.com and the unfortunate inappropriate performance of Stephen Rea, this film receives further disdain because it is nearly impossible to watch or understand.

text: now he is messing with forces from beyond the grave .
translation: 彼は今、死を超えた力に手を出している。
back_translation: He is now reaching for a power that transcends death.

text: the movie does n't generate a lot of energy . it is dark , brooding and slow , and takes its central idea way too seriously .
translation: その映画はあまりエネルギーを生み出していません。暗く、陰鬱で、遅く、中心となるアイデアをあまりにも真剣に受け止めています。
back_translation: The movie doesn't generate much energy. It's dark, gloomy, slow, and takes its central idea too seriously.

text: bollywood/hollywood is a happy , carefree trifle of a movie that is easy to savour because it is so undemanding yet so rewarding .
translation: ボリウッド/ハリウッドは、心地よくて無邪気な映画で、要求が少なくそれでいてとても満足感が得られるため、楽しむのが簡単です。
back_translation: Bollywood/Hollywood movies are enjoyable because they are comfortable and innocent films that require little yet provide great satisfaction.

text: it is as uncompromising as it is nonjudgmental , and makes clear that a prostitute can be as lonely and needy as any of the clients .
translation: それは妥協のない非判断的なものであり、売春婦がどのクライアントとも同様に孤独で必要としていることを明確に示しています。
back_translation: It is a non-judgmental stance without compromise, clearly showing that prostitutes are equally lonely and in need of any client.

text: he meets god and is given all the powers of god .
translation: 彼は神に出会い、神のすべての力を与えられます。
back_translation: He meets God and is granted all of God's power.

text: poignant if familiar story of a young person suspended between two cultures .
translation: 二つの文化の間に宙ぶらりんになっている若者の心に響く、しかし親しみのある物語。
back_translation: A story that resonates with the hearts of young people who are caught between two cultures, yet is relatable and friendly.

text: 'sophisticated ' viewers who refuse to admit that they do n't like it will likely call it 'challenging ' to their fellow sophisticates .
translation: 「洗練された」視聴者は、自分がそれを好きでないことを認めようとせず、同じような洗練された人々に「挑戦的だ」と呼ぶ可能性が高い。
back_translation: The "refined" viewers are likely to refuse to admit that they don't like it and may call similar refined people "challenging."

text: `` i blame all men for war , `` [ the warden 's daughter ] tells her father . the movie is about as deep as that sentiment .
translation: 「私は戦争のためにすべての男性を責める」と[看守の娘]は父に言う。その映画の内容は、その感情と同じくらい浅い。
back_translation: "I blame all men for the war," says the [guard's daughter] to her father. The content of the film is as shallow as that feeling.

text: to what sweet end is the story of a reunion between mary and david , who were once passionate lovers - for two weeks , thirty-five years ago and have n't seen each other since .
translation: メアリーとデイビッドの再会の物語は、35年前の2週間、情熱的な恋人だった彼らが再び出会うことで、どのような甘い結末を迎えるのだろうか。彼らはそれ以来、一度も会ったことがない。
back_translation: The story of Mary and David's reunion unfolds as they meet again after 35 years, bringing to light the sweet conclusion of their passionate romance from two weeks ago. They have not seen each other since then.

text: he 's not happy just to run this fratricidal con , he also wants to cash in as much as he can of one hundred kilos of crystal meth that he stole from the rojas ( and the mexicans ) , seduce the girlfriend of one of his victims , and stay ahead of a cop who was a childhood friend .
translation: 彼はこの兄弟間の詐欺を行うだけでは満足せず、ロハス（とメキシコ人）から盗んだ100キロのクリスタルメスをできるだけ現金化しようとしており、自分の犠牲者の一人のガールフレンドを誘惑し、幼馴染の警察官の先を行こうとしている。
back_translation: He is not satisfied with just committing fraud among these brothers; he is trying to liquidate the 100 kilograms of crystal meth stolen from Lohas (and Mexicans) for as much cash as possible, seducing the girlfriend of one of his victims, and trying to stay one step ahead of his childhood friend, who is a police officer.

text: one by one , his friends are deserting his annual pilgrimage to the wisconsin state high school hockey tournament , forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his bizarre obsession .
translation: 友人たちが一人また一人とウィスコンシン州の高校ホッケー大会への彼の年に一度の巡礼を見捨てていき、彼は自分の奇妙な執着についての厳しい現実に直面せざるを得なくなっている。
back_translation: As his friends abandon their annual pilgrimage to the high school hockey tournament in Wisconsin one by one, he is forced to confront the harsh reality of his strange obsession.

text: using two separate filmmaking teams ( an all-white crew filming white residents and an all-black camera crew filming black residents ) , two towns of jasper captures very different racial views by townsfolk in jasper , texas , the location for a racially motivated murder of an african american in 1998 .
translation: 2つの別々の映画制作チーム（白人のみのクルーが白人住民を撮影し、黒人のカメラクルーが黒人住民を撮影する）を使用して、ジャスパー、テキサスの2つの町では、1998年にアフリカ系アメリカ人の人種による殺人事件が発生した場所で、町の住民による非常に異なる人種的見解が描かれています。
back_translation: Using two separate film production teams (a crew of only white individuals filming white residents and a black camera crew filming black residents), the two towns in Jasper, Texas, depict very different racial perspectives of the town's residents in the place where an African American was murdered in a racially motivated incident in 1998.

text: a whimsical if predictable time-travel fable marred by a willful single-mindedness .
translation: whimsy でありながら予測可能なタイムトラベルの寓話は、意図的な一面的さによって損なわれている。
back_translation: The whimsical yet predictable time travel fable is undermined by its intentional one-sidedness.

text: cold , pretentious , thoroughly dislikable study in sociopathy .
translation: 冷たく、気取った、完全に好かれない社会病質の研究。
back_translation: A study of cold, pretentious, completely unlikeable sociopathy.

text: he has yet to break out from under his mentor 's shadow until he finds a pair of love letters in the textbook that once belonged to one of his idols , a famous long dead victorian poet .
translation: 彼は、かつて彼のアイドルの一人である有名なヴィクトリア朝の詩人のものであった教科書の中で、愛の手紙の束を見つけるまで、メンターの影から抜け出すことができていません。
back_translation: He has been unable to break free from the shadow of his mentor until he found a bundle of love letters in a textbook that once belonged to a famous Victorian poet, one of his idols.

text: do n't let the subtitles fool you ; the movie only proves that hollywood no longer has a monopoly on mindless action .
translation: 字幕に惑わされないでください; この映画は、ハリウッドがもはや無思考のアクションを独占していないことを証明しているだけです。
back_translation: Don't be misled by the subtitles; this movie only proves that Hollywood no longer has a monopoly on thoughtless action.

text: centers on an american ex-soldier ( washington ) living out his days in naples , italy .
translation: アメリカの元兵士（ワシントン）がイタリアのナポリで余生を過ごすことを中心にしています。
back_translation: It focuses on an American former soldier (Washington) spending his twilight years in Naples, Italy.

text: 'ejemplo de una cinta en que no importa el talento de su reparto o lo interesante que pudo haber resultado su premisa , pues el resultado es francamente aburrido y , por momentos , deplorable . '
translation: 「キャストの才能や、面白い設定があったとしても結果は明らかに退屈で、時には悲惨であるという映画の例。」
back_translation: "Examples of movies where, even with talented cast and interesting settings, the result is clearly boring and sometimes disastrous."

text: nair does capture the complexity of a big family and its trials and tribulations . . .
translation: ナイアは大家族の複雑さとその試練や苦悩を捉えています。
back_translation: Naya captures the complexity of a big family along with its trials and tribulations.

text: if director michael dowse only superficially understands his characters , he does n't hold them in contempt .
translation: マイケル・ダウス監督がキャラクターを表面的にしか理解していないのなら、彼らを軽蔑しているわけではない。
back_translation: If director Michael Dowse only understands the characters superficially, it does not mean he holds them in contempt.

text: nete 's father does not die , his appetite comes back , the doctors begin to have doubts as to the prognosis , and nete has a problem .
translation: ネテの父は死なず、食欲が戻り、医者たちは予後について疑問を抱き始め、ネテは問題を抱えます。
back_translation: Nete's father did not die, his appetite returned, and the doctors began to question the prognosis, while Nete faced problems.

text: this follow-up boasts most of the felicities of the original .
translation: この続編は、原作のほとんどの魅力を誇っています。
back_translation: This sequel boasts most of the original's charm.

text: unspools like a highbrow , low-key , 102-minute infomercial , blending entrepreneurial zeal with the testimony of satisfied customers .
translation: 高尚で控えめな102分のインフォマーシャルのように展開し、起業家精神と満足した顧客の証言が融合しています。
back_translation: It unfolds like a noble and modest 102-minute infomercial, blending entrepreneurial spirit with testimonials from satisfied customers.

text: attal 's hang-ups surrounding infidelity are so old-fashioned and , dare i say , outdated , it 's a wonder that he could n't have brought something fresher to the proceedings simply by accident .
translation: アタルの浮気に関する悩みは非常に古臭く、あえて言わせてもらえば時代遅れであり、彼が偶然にも何か新しい視点を持ち込むことができなかったのは驚きです。
back_translation: Ataru's concerns about infidelity are very outdated, and if I may say so, they are out of touch with the times. It's surprising that he hasn't accidentally brought any new perspectives into the mix.

text: soon , the entire team is self-destructing , and bret could n't be happier .
translation: もうすぐ、チーム全体が自己崩壊し、ブレットはそれ以上幸せになれない。
back_translation: Soon, the entire team will self-destruct, and Brett won't be able to be any happier.

text: jarecki and gibney do find enough material to bring kissinger 's record into question and explain how the diplomat 's tweaked version of statecraft may have cost thousands and possibly millions of lives .
translation: ジャレッキーとギブニーは、キッシンジャーの業績に疑問を投げかけるのに十分な資料を見つけ、外交官の調整された国家戦略がどのようにして何千人、さらには何百万もの命を奪った可能性があるかを説明しています。
back_translation: Jarecki and Gibbons found sufficient material to question Kissinger's achievements, explaining how the coordinated national strategy of diplomats could have possibly claimed thousands, even millions of lives.

text: fearing also for the safety of her daughter , she decides that there 's only one way out of the marriage : kill him .
translation: 娘の安全をも心配しながら、彼女は結婚生活から抜け出す方法は一つしかないと決心する。それは、彼を殺すことだ。
back_translation: While worrying about her daughter's safety, she decides that there is only one way to escape her married life. That is to kill him.

text: t & # 252 ; rlich accidentally stumbles across some information about his origin and decides to go to klein ischgl in austria .
translation: トゥルリッヒは偶然、自分の出自に関する情報を見つけ、オーストリアのクラインイシュグルに行くことを決意します。
back_translation: Trulrich accidentally discovers information about his origins and decides to go to Kleinichl in Austria.

text: behind the glitz , hollywood is sordid and disgusting . quelle surprise !
translation: 華やかさの裏には、ハリウッドの陰惨で不快な一面があります。なんて驚きでしょう！
back_translation: Behind the glamour, there is a dark and unpleasant side to Hollywood. What a surprise!

text: the story drifts so inexorably into cliches about tortured ( and torturing ) artists and consuming but impossible love that you ca n't help but become more disappointed as each overwrought new sequence plods on .
translation: 物語は苦しんでいる（そして苦しめている）アーティストや、消費するが不可能な愛についてのクリシェに避けられないほど漂っていき、過剰な新しいシークエンスが進むにつれて、ますます失望せざるを得ません。
back_translation: The story inevitably drifts toward clichés about suffering (and inflicting suffering) artists and an impossible love to consume, and as the excessive new sequences unfold, it becomes increasingly unavoidable to feel disappointment.

text: rudy yellowshirt is an investigator with the police department and witnesses firsthand the painful legacy of indian existence .
translation: ルディ・イエローシャツは警察署の捜査官であり、インディアンの存在がもたらす痛ましい遺産を直接目の当たりにしています。
back_translation: Rudy Yellowshirt is a police investigator who directly witnesses the painful legacy brought about by the existence of Native Americans.

text: the waterlogged script plumbs uncharted depths of stupidity , incoherence and sub-sophomoric sexual banter .
translation: 水浸しの脚本は、愚かさ、一貫性のなさ、そして中学生未満の性的なたわ言の未知の深みを掘り下げている。
back_translation: The waterlogged script delves into the depths of foolishness, inconsistency, and prepubescent sexual nonsense.

text: anton jackson is an african-american man who seems harmless enough on the surface , but is a secret agent in the all-black brotherhood , an entity that levels the playing field against the all-white establishment .
translation: アントン・ジャクソンは一見無害に見えるアフリカ系アメリカ人男性ですが、全黒兄弟団の秘密エージェントであり、全白人の権力に対抗するための平等の場を作る存在です。
back_translation: Anton Jackson appears to be an innocent-looking African American man, but he is a secret agent for the Black Brotherhood, creating a space for equality to counter the power of all white people.

text: piccoli 's performance is amazing , yes , but the symbols of loss and denial and life-at-arm's-length in the film seem irritatingly transparent .
translation: ピッコリのパフォーマンスは素晴らしいですが、映画の中の喪失や否認、距離を置いた生活の象徴は、 irritably 見えます。
back_translation: Piccolo's performance is wonderful, but the symbolism of loss, denial, and living at a distance in the movie appears irritably.

text: a love triangle forms , with rachael , the least interested and keen to leave , but clues to her mothers whereabouts appear , as do her own problems which both rafe and matt wish to help with .
translation: ラケルを中心に愛の三角関係が形成され、彼女は最も興味が薄く去りたいと思っているが、母親の所在に関する手がかりや彼女自身の問題が現れる。ラフェとマットは彼女を助けたいと思っている。
back_translation: A love triangle forms centered around Raquel, who is the least interested and wants to leave, but clues about her mother's whereabouts and her own issues arise. Rafe and Matt want to help her.

text: hollywood ending is not show-stoppingly hilarious , but scathingly witty nonetheless .
translation: ハリウッドエンディングは目を見張るほどの面白さはないが、それでも辛辣にウィットに富んでいる。
back_translation: Hollywood Ending may not be astonishingly entertaining, but it is still sharply witty.

text: ploddy and his policeman rikhard set out to find the thieves - but it turns out to be both difficult and challenging !
translation: プロディと彼の警官リハードは泥棒を見つけるために出発しましたが、それは難しくて挑戦的なことが判明しました！
back_translation: Proddy and his police officer, Lehard, set off to find the thief, but it turned out to be a difficult and challenging task!

text: but too late or otherwise , love at first sight is exactly what happens .
translation: しかし遅すぎるか、あるいはそうでないか、まさに一目惚れが起こるのです。
back_translation: However, whether it is too late or not, love at first sight occurs.

text: the plan goes awry when trasha and her psychosis find themselves a paying gig and tables are turned , trashed and burned .
translation: 計画は、トラシャと彼女の精神病が報酬を得る仕事を見つけたときに狂い、状況は逆転し、台無しになり、燃やされる。
back_translation: The plan goes awry when Trasha finds a job where her mental illness is rewarded, the situation reverses, ruins everything, and burns down.

text: for every inspired bit of absurdity , there 's a lame piece of improvisational noodling .
translation: すべてのインスパイアされた不条理には、平凡な即興のメロディがある。
back_translation: Every inspired absurdity has a mundane improvised melody.

text: asia authors herself as anna battista , an italian superstar and aspiring directress who just happens to be her own worst enemy .
translation: アジアは自らをアンナ・バッティスタとして位置づける、イタリアのスーパースターであり、将来の監督志望者。しかし、彼女は自分自身の一番の敵でもある。
back_translation: Asia positions herself as Anna Battista, an Italian superstar and a future aspiring director. However, she is also her own worst enemy.

text: half of it is composed of snappy patter and pseudo-sophisticated cultural observations , while the remainder . . . would be more at home on a daytime television serial .
translation: その半分は軽快な口調と擬似洗練された文化的観察で構成されており、残りは・・・昼間のテレビドラマでより馴染みがあるだろう。
back_translation: Half of it consists of a lively tone and pseudo-refined cultural observations, while the rest... is likely more familiar to daytime soap operas.

text: some movies were made for the big screen , some for the small screen , and some , like ballistic : ecks vs . sever , were made for the palm screen .
translation: いくつかの映画は大画面のために制作され、いくつかは小画面のために制作され、そして「バリスティック：エックスvsセバー」のように、手のひらサイズの画面のために制作されたものもあります。
back_translation: Some movies are made for the big screen, some for the small screen, and then there are those like "Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever" that are made for the palm-sized screen.

text: berling and bM-iart . . . continue to impress , and isabelle huppert . . . again shows uncanny skill in getting under the skin of her characters .
translation: ベルリンとBM-iartは引き続き印象的で、イザベル・ユペールは再び彼女のキャラクターの内面に入り込む驚くべき技術を示しています。
back_translation: Berlin and BM-iart continue to be impressive, and Isabelle Huppert showcases her remarkable ability to delve into the inner world of her character once again.

text: without family and all on her own , she only can confide her troubles to simon ( ray walston ) .
translation: 家族がなく、全てを一人で抱え込んでいる彼女は、自分の悩みをサイモン（レイ・ウォルストン）にだけ打ち明けることができます。
back_translation: Having no family and carrying everything alone, she can only confide her troubles to Simon (Ray Winstone).

text: its inescapable absurdities are tantamount to insulting the intelligence of anyone who has n't been living under a rock ( since sept . 11 ) .
translation: その避けられない不条理は、（9月11日以降）岩の下に住んでいない誰かの知性を侮辱するに等しい。
back_translation: That inevitable absurdity is tantamount to insulting the intelligence of someone who does not live under a rock (after September 11).

text: this breezy caper movie becomes a soulful , incisive meditation on the way we were , and the way we are .
translation: この軽快なキャパームービーは、私たちがかつてどのようであったか、そして今どうであるかについての深い、鋭い瞑想に変わります。
back_translation: This lively caper movie transforms into a deep and sharp meditation on how we once were and how we are now.

text: somewhat blurred , but kinnear 's performance is razor sharp .
translation: ややぼやけているが、キニアの演技は鋭い。
back_translation: The performance of Kinia is sharp, although somewhat blurry.

text: the journey takes them from the inner city to a satanic black mass ceremony , and into the depths of their own souls , as they search for johann christoph haizmann , the antichrist .
translation: 彼らの旅は、インナーシティからサタニックな黒いミサの儀式へ、そして彼ら自身の魂の深淵へと続き、ヨハン・クリストフ・ハイズマン、反キリストを探し求めます。
back_translation: Their journey continues from the inner city to a satanic black mass ceremony, and then to the depths of their own souls, as they search for Johann Christoph Heisman, the Antichrist.

text: this seventh feature by chicago director covert uses the freedom of access afforded by the digital camera to emphasize the visceral quality of the story .
translation: シカゴの監督コバートによるこの第七作は、デジタルカメラによって得られたアクセスの自由を利用して、物語の肉体的な質感を強調しています。
back_translation: This seventh work by director Kobat from Chicago emphasizes the physical texture of the story by utilizing the freedom of access provided by digital cameras.

text: 'dragonfly ' dwells on crossing-over mumbo jumbo , manipulative sentimentality , and sappy dialogue .
translation: 「トンボ」は、クロスオーバーの迷信、操作的な感情主義、そして感傷的な対話に埋没しています。
back_translation: "Dragonflies" are buried in crossover superstitions, manipulative emotionalism, and sentimental dialogues.

text: his loving wife maya vows to help get him out of jail .
translation: 彼の愛する妻マヤは、彼を刑務所から助け出すと誓う。
back_translation: His beloved wife Maya vows to rescue him from prison.

text: fedot the shooter is sent by the czar to find some special food for the foreighn ambassador 's visit .
translation: フェドットという射手は、外国大使の訪問のために特別な食材を探すために皇帝によって派遣されます。
back_translation: A shooter named Fedot is dispatched by the emperor to seek special ingredients for the visit of a foreign ambassador.

text: after a failed marriage to ali macgraw , a cocaine bust and rumored involvement with the cotton club murder , he disappeared into near-obscurity .
translation: アリ・マッグローとの失敗した結婚、コカインの押収、そしてコットン・クラブの殺人事件への関与が噂される中、彼はほぼ無名の状態に姿を消した。
back_translation: He disappeared into near obscurity amidst rumors of his failed marriage to Ali MacGraw, a cocaine bust, and involvement in the Cotton Club murder case.

text: the scientist is sentenced to jail by the grand council of the galactic federation .
translation: その科学者は銀河連邦の大評議会によって刑務所に送られることになった。
back_translation: The scientist was sentenced to prison by the Galactic Federation's Grand Council.

text: when the head of the order dies , alex is sent to rome to investigate mysterious circumstances surrounding the death .
translation: 教団の長が死んだとき、アレックスはその死を取り巻く神秘的な状況を調査するためにローマに送られます。
back_translation: When the leader of the cult dies, Alex is sent to Rome to investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding the death.

text: it 's an exhilarating place to visit , this laboratory of laughter .
translation: 笑いの実験室、訪れるには刺激的な場所です。
back_translation: The laughter lab is an exciting place to visit.

text: mo is beautiful but bald , mei has excessive body hair ( that somehow resulted from a sexual assault ) , hung has a large red birthmark on her face , and pao has abnormally small eyes .
translation: モは美しいが禿げている、メイは体毛が過剰（それは何らかの性的暴力の結果である）、ハンは顔に大きな赤いあざがある、そしてパオは異常に小さな目を持っている。
back_translation: Mo is beautiful but bald, Mei has excessive body hair (which is a result of some form of sexual violence), Han has a large red bruise on his face, and Pao has abnormally small eyes.

text: though frida is easier to swallow than julie taymor 's preposterous titus , the eye candy here lacks considerable brio .
translation: フリーダはジュリー・テイモアの途方もない『タイタス』よりは飲み込みやすいが、ここでの目の保養はかなりの活気に欠けている。
back_translation: While "Frida" is easier to digest than Julie Taymor's extravagant "Titus," the visual appeal here lacks considerable vitality.

text: when a shoulder injury ended his minor league pitching career twelve years ago , jim morris resorted to the next best thing : coaching .
translation: 肩の怪我が彼のマイナーリーグでのピッチングキャリアを12年前に終わらせたとき、ジム・モリスは次善の策としてコーチングに頼りました。
back_translation: When Jim Morris's shoulder injury ended his pitching career in the minor leagues 12 years ago, he turned to coaching as a second option.

text: in the meantime , a grifter breaks into their apartments and rummages their personal belongings , thus unfolding hidden secrets .
translation: その間に、詐欺師が彼らのアパートに侵入し、個人の持ち物をくまなく漁ることで、隠された秘密が明らかになっていく。
back_translation: Meanwhile, a fraudster breaks into their apartment and thoroughly searches through their personal belongings, revealing hidden secrets.

text: zhuangzhuang creates delicate balance of style , text , and subtext that 's so simple and precise that anything discordant would topple the balance , but against all odds , nothing does .
translation: zhuangzhuangは、スタイル、テキスト、そしてサブテキストの微妙なバランスを創り出しています。それは非常にシンプルで正確なので、どんな不協和音もそのバランスを崩してしまいそうですが、あらゆる困難に対して、何も崩れることはありません。
back_translation: Zhuangzhuang creates a subtle balance of style, text, and subtext. It is so simple and precise that any dissonance could disrupt that balance, yet nothing crumbles in the face of any difficulty.

text: still rapturous after all these years , cinema paradiso stands as one of the great films about movie love .
translation: 年月が経ってもなお感動的な「シネマ・パラダイス」は、映画への愛についての偉大な作品の一つとして残っています。
back_translation: Even after many years, the touching "Cinema Paradiso" remains one of the great works about the love of film.

text: it 's been 10 years since the events of the second film .
translation: 第2作の出来事から10年が経ちました。
back_translation: Ten years have passed since the events of the second work.

text: shyamalan offers copious hints along the way -- myriad signs , if you will -- that beneath the familiar , funny surface is a far bigger , far more meaningful story than one in which little green men come to earth for harvesting purposes .
translation: シャマランは途中で豊富なヒントを提供しています。つまり、無数のサインがあり、親しみやすく面白い表面の下には、小さな緑の男たちが地球に収穫目的でやってくるという単純な物語以上に、はるかに大きく、はるかに意味深い物語があるのです。
back_translation: Shyamalan provides abundant hints along the way. In other words, there are countless signs, and beneath the approachable and entertaining surface, there is a much larger and more significant story than just the simple narrative of little green men coming to Earth for harvest purposes.

text: in the 1870s , jacobina , daughter of german immigrants to southern brazil , starts to break with both the catholic and lutheran churches to preach body healing through soul cleansing .
translation: 1870年代、南ブラジルに移住したドイツ移民の娘ヤコビーナは、カトリック教会とルター派教会の両方と決別し、魂の浄化を通じた身体の癒しを説き始めます。
back_translation: In the 1870s, Jacobiina, the daughter of German immigrants who moved to southern Brazil, broke with both the Catholic Church and the Lutheran Church and began preaching healing of the body through the purification of the soul.

text: i found the ring moderately absorbing , largely for its elegantly colorful look and sound .
translation: 私はそのリングが適度に魅力的だと感じました。主にそのエレガントな色合いと音のためです。
back_translation: I found the ring moderately appealing, mainly due to its elegant color and sound.

text: her family doctor is baffled ; his examination reveals her story to be true !
translation: 彼女の家族医は困惑している；彼の診察は彼女の話が真実であることを明らかにする！
back_translation: Her family doctor is perplexed; his examination reveals that her story is true!

text: a beautiful , entertaining two hours . you get the idea , though , that kapur intended the film to be more than that .
translation: 美しく、楽しさ満点の2時間です。しかし、カプールはこの映画にそれ以上の意図があることを感じさせます。
back_translation: It is a beautiful and wonderfully fun two hours. However, Kapoor makes you feel that there is more intention behind this film.

text: soon , against his own expectations and the scorn of his friends , landon finds himself falling in love with this outwardly plain girl who possesses a passion for life he never imagined possible .
translation: すぐに、彼自身の期待とは裏腹に、友人たちの軽蔑を受けながら、ランドンは思ってもみなかった情熱を持つ外見は地味な女の子に恋をすることになります。
back_translation: Soon, contrary to his own expectations, Landon will fall in love with a seemingly plain girl who possesses an unexpected passion, despite facing contempt from his friends.

text: the making of the dragon emphasizes and exaggerates all the overly dramatic moments , simplistic storylines and farcical elements that make up the films of the kung-fu genre .
translation: ドラゴンの制作は、カンフージャンルの映画を構成する過度にドラマチックな瞬間、単純なストーリーライン、そして滑稽な要素を強調し、誇張しています。
back_translation: The production of the dragon emphasizes and exaggerates overly dramatic moments that compose the kung fu genre film, simple storylines, and ridiculous elements.

text: johann christoph haizmann , who lived in the 1650s , was a painter and a deeply disturbed individual .
translation: 1650年代に生きたヨハン・クリストフ・ハイズマンは、画家であり、深く傷ついた人物でした。
back_translation: Johann Christoph Heisman, who lived in the 1650s, was a painter and a deeply troubled person.

text: it 's slow -- very , very slow . it 's not the ultimate depression-era gangster movie . that 's pure pr hype .
translation: 遅い -- 非常に、非常に遅い。これは究極の大恐慌時代のギャング映画ではない。それは純粋なPRの誇張だ。
back_translation: Slow -- very, very slow. This is not a gangster film from the ultimate Great Depression era. It's pure PR exaggeration.

text: a modest and acerbically clever escapade that relies more on wit than excitement .
translation: 控えめで辛辣に賢い冒険で、興奮よりも機知に頼っている。
back_translation: A modest and acerbically wise adventure that relies on wit rather than excitement.

text: depressingly thin and exhaustingly contrived . only masochistic moviegoers need apply .
translation: うんざりするほど薄っぺらで、疲れるほど作り込まれている。マゾヒスティックな映画ファンだけが応募してください。
back_translation: It's so shallow that it’s exhausting and so crafted that it's tiring. Only sadistic movie fans should apply.

text: it 's a weepy , nail-biting story line that 's all too familiar , although abbass portrays her character with strong conviction and carries the film gracefully .
translation: それは涙を誘う、緊張感あふれるストーリーラインで、あまりにも馴染み深いものですが、アッバスは彼女のキャラクターを強い信念で描き、映画を優雅に進めています。
back_translation: It is a tear-jerking, tension-filled storyline that feels very familiar, but Abbas portrays her character with strong conviction and gracefully advances the film.

text: a magnificent throwback to an almost vanished era of epic filmmaking by great filmmakers in thrall to their own passions , rather than to the studio bookkeepers .
translation: 偉大な映画制作者たちがスタジオの会計士ではなく、自らの情熱に魅了されていたほぼ失われた時代の壮大な回顧。
back_translation: A grand retrospective of an almost forgotten era when great filmmakers were captivated by their own passion rather than studio accountants.

text: a strong first act and absolutely , inescapably gorgeous , skyscraper-trapeze motion of the amazing spider-man .
translation: 強力な第一幕と、絶対に、逃れようのない美しさ、驚くべきスパイダーマンの超高層トラピーズの動き。
back_translation: A powerful first act, and an absolutely unavoidable beauty, with the amazing movements of Spider-Man's high-rise trapeze.

text: together , they must battle a band of the world 's most treacherous pirates , led by the cursed captain barbossa , in order to save elizabeth , the love of will 's life , as well as recover the lost treasure that jack seeks .
translation: 彼らは一緒に、呪われたキャプテン・バルボッサ率いる世界で最も危険な海賊団と戦わなければなりません。それはウィルの人生の愛、エリザベスを救い、ジャックが追い求める失われた宝を取り戻すためです。
back_translation: They must fight together against the most dangerous pirate crew in the world, led by the cursed Captain Barbossa. It is to save Will's one true love, Elizabeth, and to recover the lost treasure that Jack is seeking.

text: this unlikely pairing proves the rule that in love , there are no rules and the couple meet and fall deeply in love at first sight .
translation: このありえないカップルは、愛にはルールがないという法則を証明しており、二人は出会って一目で深く恋に落ちます。
back_translation: This unlikely couple proves the rule that there are no rules in love, as they meet and instantly fall deeply in love at first sight.

text: separated from his wife , louis will be given the opportunity to find out what is most important . . .
translation: 妻と別れたルイは、最も重要なものを見つける機会を得ることになる。
back_translation: Louis, who separated from his wife, will have the opportunity to find what is most important.

text: toledo awaits on the street for the exit of ana 's lover ( gustavo garz & # 243 ; n ) and begins a one-of-a-kind persecution-investigation that will last the whole night , to find out , before confronting him , who is that man and where did he meet ana .
translation: トレドは、アナの恋人（グスタボ・ガルソン）の出てくるのを街で待ち続け、全夜にわたる独特の追跡調査を始める。彼と対峙する前に、その男が誰で、アナとどこで出会ったのかを突き止めるために。
back_translation: Toledo continues to wait for Ana's boyfriend (Gustavo Garçon) to appear in the city and begins a unique investigation that lasts all night. Before confronting him, he seeks to find out who the man is and where Ana met him.

text: most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another and , no matter how broomfield dresses it up , it tends to speculation , conspiracy theories or , at best , circumstantial evidence .
translation: ほとんどの情報はすでに一つのフォーラムまたは別のフォーラムに現れており、ブロンフィールドがそれをどのように飾り立てようとも、推測や陰謀論、あるいはせいぜい状況証拠にとどまる傾向があります。
back_translation: Most of the information has already appeared in one forum or another, and regardless of how Bronsfield tries to embellish it, it tends to remain speculation, conspiracy theories, or, at best, circumstantial evidence.

text: life on the rez is no picnic : this picture shows you why .
translation: 予約地での生活は楽ではない。この写真がその理由を示している。
back_translation: Life in the reservation is not easy. This photo illustrates the reason.

text: in the cutthroat world of children 's television , rainbow randolph , the corrupt , costumed star of a popular children 's tv show , is fired over a bribery scandal and replaced by squeaky-clean smoochy , a puffy fuscia rhinoceros .
translation: 子供向けテレビの厳しい世界で、人気の子供向けテレビ番組の腐敗したコスチュームスター、レインボー・ランドルフは賄賂スキャンダルで解雇され、洗練されたスムーチーというフワフワのフューシャ色のサイに置き換えられる。
back_translation: In the tough world of children's television, popular kids' show costume star Rainbow Randolph is fired due to a bribery scandal and replaced by a sophisticated, fluffy fuchsia-colored character named Smoothie.

text: initially reluctant to help , daniel 's conscience eventually gets the better of him .
translation: 最初は助けることに消極的だったダニエルだが、最終的には彼の良心が勝ってしまう。
back_translation: At first, Daniel was reluctant to help, but in the end, his conscience prevails.

text: she further finds out her sister was working as a dominatrix at an unusual underground adult establishment in detroit called the playground .
translation: 彼女はさらに、妹がデトロイトの「プレイグラウンド」という異常な地下の大人の施設でドミナトリックスとして働いていたことを知ります。
back_translation: She further discovers that her sister had been working as a dominatrix at an unusual adult facility called "Playground" in Detroit.

text: calvin now has unbelievable basketball powers and has the chance to play for the nba .
translation: カルビンは今、信じられないバスケットボールの能力を持っていて、NBAでプレーするチャンスがあります。
back_translation: Calvin now has incredible basketball abilities and has a chance to play in the NBA.

text: petra and karl must work together in order to thwart petrov , a cold-blooded gangster , who will kill anyone who gets in his way .
translation: ペトラとカールは、冷酷なギャングスターであるペトロフを阻止するために協力しなければならない。彼は、自分の邪魔をする者は誰でも殺すだろう。
back_translation: Petra and Karl must work together to stop Petrov, a ruthless gangster. He will kill anyone who gets in his way.

text: with grit and determination molly guides the girls on an epic journey , one step ahead of the authorities , over 1 , 500 miles of australia 's outback in search of the rabbit-proof fence that bisects the continent and will lead them home .
translation: モリーは grit（根性）と determination（決意）を持って、少女たちを壮大な旅へと導きます。彼女たちは、当局の一歩先を行きながら、オーストラリアの奥地を1500マイル以上進み、州を分けるウサギ防止フェンスを探し、そのフェンスが彼女たちを故郷へと導くのです。
back_translation: Molly leads the girls on an epic journey with grit and determination. They travel over 1,500 miles through the Australian outback, staying one step ahead of the authorities, searching for the rabbit-proof fence that will guide them back home.

text: a series of escapades demonstrating the adage that what is good for the goose is also good for the gander , some of which occasionally amuses but none of which amounts to much of a story .
translation: ガチョウに良いものはガチョウにとっても良いということわざを示す一連の冒険で、時々は楽しませてくれるが、どれも大した物語にはならない。
back_translation: A series of adventures that illustrate the proverb "What is good for the goose is good for the gander," which sometimes provides entertainment, but none of them amount to anything remarkable.

text: five hours ago the `` t virus `` was `` accidentally `` released .
translation: 5時間前に「Tウイルス」が「偶然」に放出されました。
back_translation: The "T virus" was "accidentally" released 5 hours ago.

text: the french are rather good at this kind of thing , unlike the americans , who have a passion for musketeers , only to spoof them .
translation: フランス人はこういうことが得意ですが、アメリカ人はマスケット銃兵に熱中しながらも、それを茶化すだけです。
back_translation: The French excel at this kind of thing, while Americans, despite being enthusiastic about musketeers, only joke about it.

text: her scholarship and her dreams are on the line and jenny takes an emotional roller coaster ride on the path to work it out .
translation: 彼女の奨学金と夢が危機にさらされ、ジェニーはそれを解決するための道のりで感情のジェットコースターに乗る。
back_translation: With her scholarship and dreams at risk, Jenny rides an emotional rollercoaster on her journey to resolve the situation.

text: nicolas cage is n't the first actor to lead a group of talented friends astray , and this movie wo n't create a ruffle in what is already an erratic career .
translation: ニコラス・ケイジは、才能ある友人たちを道を外させる主役を務める最初の俳優ではなく、この映画は彼のすでに不安定なキャリアに波紋を生むことはないでしょう。
back_translation: Nicolas Cage is not the first actor to play the leading role in leading talented friends astray, and this movie is unlikely to create ripples in his already unstable career.

text: you 'll be left with the sensation of having just witnessed a great performance and , perhaps , give in to the urge to get on your feet and shake it .
translation: あなたは素晴らしいパフォーマンスを目の当たりにしたという感覚を抱き、もしかすると立ち上がって体を揺らしたくなる衝動に駆られるでしょう。
back_translation: You will feel a sense of witnessing a wonderful performance, and perhaps you will be compelled to stand up and sway your body.

text: between bedroom scenes , viewers may find themselves wishing they could roll over and take a nap .
translation: ベッドルームのシーンの間に、視聴者は横になって昼寝をしたいと思うかもしれません。
back_translation: In between the scenes of the bedroom, the viewer might want to lie down and take a nap.

text: as a hybrid teen thriller and murder mystery , murder by numbers fits the profile too closely .
translation: ハイブリッドティーンサスペンスとミステリーとして、『バイナリ殺人』はそのプロフィールに非常にぴったりです。
back_translation: As a hybrid teen suspense and mystery, "Binary Murder" fits its profile very well.

text: both , ghisu and rupi are in a situation ; where on one side is their love for kanna and on the other side is the conviction to fight for justice .
translation: 両方のギスとルピは、片方にはカンナへの愛があり、もう一方には正義のために戦うという信念がある状況にいます。
back_translation: Both Giss and Rupi are in a situation where one has love for Kanna and the other has a belief in fighting for justice.

text: hawke 's film , a boring , pretentious waste of nearly two hours , does n't tell you anything except that the chelsea hotel today is populated by whiny , pathetic , starving and untalented artistes .
translation: ホークの映画は、退屈で気取りのある約2時間のムダな時間であり、今日のチェルシーホテルには文句ばかり言う哀れで、飢えた才能のないアーティストたちがいること以外は何も教えてくれません。
back_translation: The Hawk movie is a tedious and pretentious waste of about two hours, offering nothing except the sight of pitiful, hungry, talentless artists complaining at today's Chelsea Hotel.

text: and the little red light from a laser rifle sight is proof that the caller is n't kidding .
translation: そしてレーザーライフルの照準器からの小さな赤い光は、呼び出し者が冗談ではないことの証拠です。
back_translation: And the small red light from the laser rifle's sight is proof that the caller is not joking.

text: there is the one where tourists come to test their luck in the casinos and there is the one where all the losers end up .
translation: 観光客がカジノで運を試しに来る場所と、すべての敗者が終わる場所があります。
back_translation: There is a place where tourists come to try their luck at the casino, and a place where all losers end up.

text: yet it was his little-known artistic pursuits before the war that honed his discerning eye .
translation: しかし、戦前の彼のあまり知られていない芸術的な追求が、彼の洞察力を磨いた。
back_translation: However, his lesser-known artistic pursuits before the war honed his insight.

text: she 's an artist , but has n't picked up a brush in a year .
translation: 彼女はアーティストですが、1年もの間ブラシを手に取っていません。
back_translation: She is an artist, but she hasn't picked up a brush for a year.

text: in 1650 , capt . jameson macaulay has decided to remarry and returns to his castle to take down his deceased wife 's portrait .
translation: 1650年、キャプテン・ジェームソン・マッカレーは再婚することを決意し、故妻の肖像画を取り下げるために城に戻ります。
back_translation: In 1650, Captain Jameson MacAulay resolved to remarry and returned to the castle to take down the portrait of his late wife.

text: `` catch me `` feels capable of charming the masses with star power , a pop-induced score and sentimental moments that have become a spielberg trademark .
translation: 「キャッチ・ミー」は、スターの魅力、ポップ感あふれるスコア、そしてスピルバーグの商標となった感情的な瞬間で大衆を魅了する力を持っている。
back_translation: "Catch Me" has the power to captivate the audience with the charm of stars, a score brimming with pop sensation, and emotional moments that have become Spielberg's trademark.

text: still , it might come true , if she would handle her life more genuinely .
translation: それでも、彼女がもっと真摯に自分の人生を扱えば、実現するかもしれません。
back_translation: Even so, if she handled her life more sincerely, it might become a reality.

text: fate steps in and throws the unlikely pair together for one night .
translation: 運命が介入し、ありえない二人を一晩のために引き合わせる。
back_translation: Fate intervenes and brings two unlikely people together for one night.

text: how do you make a movie with depth about a man who lacked any ? on the evidence before us , the answer is clear : not easily and , in the end , not well enough .
translation: 深みのある映画を、深みのない男についてどう作るか？目の前の証拠から判断すると、答えは明らかだ。簡単ではなく、結局のところ、十分にはうまくいかなかった。
back_translation: How do you make a profound film about a shallow man? Judging by the evidence in front of me, the answer is clear. It's not easy, and in the end, it didn't quite succeed.

text: tom green and an ivy league college should never appear together on a marquee , especially when the payoff is an unschooled comedy like stealing harvard , which fails to keep 80 minutes from seeming like 800 .
translation: トム・グリーンとアイビーリーグの大学は、特に「スティーリング・ハーヴァード」のような教育を受けていないコメディのために、マルqueeに一緒に登場するべきではありません。この映画は80分を800分のように感じさせることに失敗しています。
back_translation: Tom Green and Ivy League universities should not appear together in marquee, especially for comedy that is not educated like "Stealing Harvard." This movie fails to make 80 minutes feel like 800 minutes.

text: does n't deliver a great story , nor is the action as gripping as in past seagal films .
translation: 素晴らしいストーリーを提供するわけでもなく、アクションも過去のスティーブン・セガールの映画ほど引き込まれるものではありません。
back_translation: It doesn't provide a wonderful story, nor is the action as captivating as in past Steven Seagal films.

text: fascinated , she pursues him , bent on learning who he is and where he comes from .
translation: 魅了された彼女は、彼が誰でどこから来たのかを知るために彼を追いかける。
back_translation: Captivated by him, she chases after him to find out who he is and where he came from.

text: used to living in poverty , it seemed impossible for cass and cary to have a comfortable and bountiful life until doqa gracia comes to bring them into her home .
translation: 貧困に慣れていたキャスとケリーにとって、ドクア・グラシアが彼女の家に迎え入れてくれるまで、快適で豊かな生活を送ることは不可能に思えた。
back_translation: For Cass and Kelly, who were accustomed to poverty, it seemed impossible to lead a comfortable and prosperous life until Doqua Gracia welcomed them into her home.

text: the solid filmmaking and convincing characters makes this a high water mark for this genre .
translation: 確固たる映画製作と納得させるキャラクターが、このジャンルの標準を高めている。
back_translation: Solid filmmaking and convincing characters are raising the standard in this genre.

text: can he kill repeatedly and still come out the winner ?
translation: 彼は繰り返し殺してもそれでも勝者になることができるのか？
back_translation: Can he still be the victor even if he is killed repeatedly?

text: a stormy french adolescent drama about friendship , family , and sexual politics .
translation: 友情、家族、性の政治をテーマにした嵐のようなフランスの青年ドラマ。
back_translation: A stormy French youth drama themed around friendship, family, and the politics of sexuality.

text: on its own , it 's not very interesting . as a remake , it 's a pale imitation .
translation: それ自体ではあまり興味深くありません。リメイクとしては、影の薄い模倣です。
back_translation: It is not very interesting in itself. As a remake, it is a rather overshadowed imitation.

text: by occasion , the family plays a bizarre game : when someone rings a bell , everyone has to undress as quikly as possible , dive in the swimming pool , and grab the wooden fish in the pool .
translation: その時々に、家族は奇妙なゲームをします：誰かがベルを鳴らすと、皆はできるだけ早く服を脱ぎ、プールに飛び込んでプールの中の木の魚をつかまえなければなりません。
back_translation: At that time, the family plays a strange game: when someone rings the bell, everyone has to take off their clothes as quickly as possible and jump into the pool to catch the wooden fish in the water.

text: a compelling and thought-provoking drama on the armenian genocide after world war i and its toxic impact on the spirits and lives of some contemporary canadians .
translation: 第一次世界大戦後のアルメニア虐殺についての魅力的で思索を促すドラマであり、それが現代のカナダ人の心や生活に与えた有害な影響を描いています。
back_translation: It is an engaging and thought-provoking drama about the Armenian genocide after World War I, depicting the harmful effects it has had on the hearts and lives of contemporary Canadians.

text: what the movie lacks in action it more than makes up for in drama , suspense , revenge , and romance .
translation: この映画はアクションが不足しているが、ドラマ、サスペンス、復讐、そしてロマンスでそれを十分に補っている。
back_translation: This movie lacks action, but it makes up for it sufficiently with drama, suspense, revenge, and romance.

text: ever have one of those lifetimes where nothing seems to go right ?
translation: 何も上手くいかない人生を送ったことがありますか？
back_translation: Have you ever lived a life where nothing went well?

text: the paid-off local police and school security guards were supposed to make sure the school was empty after hours .
translation: 払った地元警察と学校の警備員は、営業時間後に学校が空であることを確認することになっていました。
back_translation: The local police and school security guards that were paid were supposed to ensure that the school was empty after hours.

text: a poetic drama about a young military driven boy named sean who recieves a video tape of a murder , only to discover that it 's a government operation that he has interfered with .
translation: 若い軍人志望の少年ショーンについての詩的なドラマ。彼は殺人のビデオテープを受け取るが、それが彼が干渉してしまった政府の作戦であることを発見する。
back_translation: A poetic drama about a young boy named Sean who aspires to be a soldier. He receives a video tape of a murder, only to discover that it is related to a government operation he had interfered with.

text: nothing in waking up in reno ever inspired me to think of its inhabitants as anything more than markers in a screenplay .
translation: レノで目覚めることには、その住人たちを映画の脚本の中のただのマーカー以上に考えさせるようなものは何もなかった。
back_translation: There was nothing in Reno that made you think of its residents as more than just markers in a movie script.

text: showing this beautiful city as seen through the eyes of it 's favorite son in his most frantic moments .
translation: この美しい街を、彼のお気に入りの息子の目を通して、彼の最も慌ただしい瞬間に見せています。
back_translation: This beautiful city is being shown through the eyes of his favorite son, capturing his most bustling moments.

text: with a `` spy kids `` sequel opening next week , why bother with a contemptible imitator starring a `` snl `` has-been acting like an 8-year-old channeling roberto benigni ?
translation: 「スパイキッズ」の続編が来週公開される中、ロベルト・ベニーニに扮する8歳の子供のように振る舞う「SNL」の過去のスターが出る見下すべき模倣作品に何の価値があるのでしょうか？
back_translation: What value is there in a contemptible imitation featuring former "SNL" stars acting like 8-year-old children pretending to be Roberto Benigni, as a sequel to "Spy Kids" is set to be released next week?

text: a small house stands on a hill overlooking the inland sea .
translation: 小さな家が内海を見下ろす丘の上に立っています。
back_translation: A small house stands on a hill overlooking the inland sea.

text: yes , ballistic is silly . unfortunately , it 's not silly fun unless you enjoy really bad movies .
translation: はい、バリスティックは馬鹿げています。残念ながら、本当に悪い映画を楽しむのでなければ、楽しめる馬鹿げたものではありません。
back_translation: Yes, ballistic is ridiculous. Unfortunately, it's not something enjoyable unless you truly enjoy really bad movies.

text: schaefer 's . . . determination to inject farcical raunch . . . drowns out the promise of the romantic angle .
translation: シェーファーの…馬鹿げた猥雑さを注入しようとする決意が…ロマンチックな要素の約束をかき消してしまう。
back_translation: Schaefer's determination to inject… ridiculous vulgarity… overshadows the promise of romantic elements.

text: on the right track to something that 's creepy and effective . . . it 's just going to take more than a man in a bullwinkle costume to get there .
translation: 不気味で効果的な何かに向かって正しい方向に進んでいる . . . そこにたどり着くには、バルウィンクルのコスチュームを着た男性以上のものが必要だ。
back_translation: I am moving in the right direction toward something eerie and effective... To get there, more than just a man in a Balwinkle costume is needed.

text: at some point , all this visual trickery stops being clever and devolves into flashy , vaguely silly overkill .
translation: ある時点で、この視覚的なトリックはもはや巧妙ではなく、派手で vaguely sillyな過剰な表現に堕ちてしまう。
back_translation: At a certain point, this visual trick no longer seems clever and falls into an extravagant and vaguely silly overexpression.

text: uncompromising in his work , sullivan is just as devoted to his private life as an upstanding husband and father of two young boys .
translation: 彼の仕事に妥協を許さないサリバンは、立派な夫であり二人の幼い息子の父として私生活にも同じくらい献身的です。
back_translation: Sullivan, who does not allow any compromise in his work, is just as dedicated in his personal life as a wonderful husband and the father of two young sons.

text: skillfully weaves both the elements of the plot and a powerfully evocative mood combining heated sexuality with a haunting sense of malaise .
translation: 巧みにプロットの要素と強く心に残るムードを織り交ぜ、激しいセクシュアリティと不安の感覚を組み合わせています。
back_translation: Skillfully intertwining elements of the plot with a strong, lasting mood, it combines a sense of intense sexuality with anxiety.

text: this harrowing journey into combat hell vividly captures the chaotic insanity and personal tragedies that are all too abundant when human hatred spews forth unchecked .
translation: この苦悶の旅は、無制限に噴出する人間の憎悪があるときにあふれ出る混沌とした狂気と個人的な悲劇を鮮やかに捉えています。
back_translation: This journey of anguish vividly captures the chaotic madness and personal tragedy that overflow when there is limitless human hatred erupting.

text: woo has as much right to make a huge action sequence as any director , but how long will filmmakers copy the `` saving private ryan `` battle scenes before realizing steven spielberg got it right the first time ?
translation: ウー監督はどの監督と同じく巨大なアクションシーンを作る権利を持っていますが、映画製作者たちはスティーブン・スピルバーグが最初に正しいやり方を示したことに気づくまで、どれくらいの間「プライベート・ライアン」の戦闘シーンを模倣し続けるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Director Woo has the right to create massive action scenes like any other director, but how long will filmmakers continue to imitate the battle scenes from "Saving Private Ryan" until they realize that Steven Spielberg was the first to show the correct way?

text: but this time , they 're gon na have to face both the police - and the mafia !
translation: しかし今度は、彼らは警察とマフィアの両方に立ち向かわなければならない！
back_translation: However, this time, they must confront both the police and the mafia!

text: when she arrives , mademoiselle c , with her never ending imagination , will accomplish a true revolution in the elementary school and especially in the group 6d .
translation: 彼女が到着すると、マドモワゼルCは果てしない想像力を持って、小学校、特にグループ6dにおいて真の革命を成し遂げるでしょう。
