back_translation: When she arrives, Mademoiselle C will achieve a true revolution in elementary school, particularly in Group 6d, with her boundless imagination.

text: but things unknowingly begin to turn sour when danielle 's disgruntled boyfriend begins investigating into `` gil harris ' `` past to uncover any dirt on him .
translation: しかし、ダニエルの不満を抱えたボーイフレンドが「ギル・ハリス」の過去を調査し、彼に関するあらゆる秘密を暴こうとすると、物事は知らず知らずのうちに悪い方に転がり始める。
back_translation: However, when Daniel's dissatisfied boyfriend investigates "Gil Harris's" past in an attempt to uncover all his secrets, things start to take a turn for the worse without anyone realizing it.

text: a biopic about crane 's life in the classic tradition but evolves into what has become of us all in the era of video .
translation: クラシックな伝統に基づいたクレーンの人生に関する伝記映画ですが、ビデオの時代に私たち全員が何になったのかに進化します。
back_translation: It is a biographical film about the life of a crane based on classic traditions, but it evolves into what we all have become in the age of video.

text: much as we might be interested in gratuitous sexualization , haneke has a different objective in mind -- namely the implications of our craving for fake stimulation .
translation: 私たちが無償の性的表現に興味を持つとしても、ハネケには別の目的がある。つまり、私たちの偽の刺激に対する欲求の含意である。
back_translation: Even if we have an interest in free sexual expression, Haneke has a different purpose. In other words, it is the implication of our desire for false stimulation.

text: so much about the film is loopy and ludicrous . . . that it could have been a hoot in a bad-movie way if the laborious pacing and endless exposition had been tightened .
translation: 映画の多くはループ状で、ばかげている... もしも冗長なペースと終わりのない説明が締められていれば、悪い映画の形で面白かったかもしれない。
back_translation: Many movies are looped and ridiculous... If only the redundant pacing and endless explanations had been wrapped up, it might have been interesting in the form of a bad movie.

text: what 's next ? the porky 's revenge : ultimate edition ?
translation: 次は何ですか？ポーキーの復讐：アルティメットエディションですか？
back_translation: What's next? Is it Porky's Revenge: Ultimate Edition?

text: it is compelling to be exposed to a film as bluntly honest and yet as paradoxically ordinary as last orders .
translation: 「ラストオーダーズ」のように、これほどまでに率直でありながら逆説的に普通である映画に触れることは非常に魅力的です。
back_translation: It is very captivating to encounter a film that is so straightforward yet paradoxically ordinary like "Last Orders."

text: a sugar-coated rocky whose valuable messages are forgotten 10 minutes after the last trombone honks .
translation: 最後のトロンボーンの音が鳴ってから10分後に忘れられる貴重なメッセージを持つ、砂糖でコーティングされた岩。
back_translation: A sugar-coated rock with a valuable message that will be forgotten 10 minutes after the last sound of the trombone.

text: he meets sunny , an afghan immigrant hot dog vendor , whose son is a would-be rapper , among others , and falls for laila , a fashion designer who still carries the expectations of her traditional parents .
translation: 彼はアフガニスタンからの移民のホットドッグ販売者であるサニーと出会い、彼の息子はラッパーになりたいと思っており、さらに他の人たちとも出会います。そして、伝統的な親の期待をまだ背負っているファッションデザイナーのレイラに恋をします。
back_translation: He meets Sunny, a hot dog vendor who is an immigrant from Afghanistan, and his son dreams of becoming a rapper, as well as encountering others. He also falls in love with Layla, a fashion designer who still bears the traditional expectations of her parents.

text: multiple , intersecting planes of experience , often mired in a sordid backstory of the american dream/empire ( featured voices include florida death row inmates , palestinian poets , and novelist kathy acker ) seek to produce new areas of resolution .
translation: 複数の交差する経験の面は、しばしばアメリカンドリーム/帝国の陰惨なバックストーリーにはまり込み（登場する声にはフロリダの死刑囚、パレスチナの詩人、そして小説家キャシー・アッカーが含まれます）、新たな解決の領域を生み出そうとしています。
back_translation: The intersecting aspects of multiple experiences often delve into the grim backstory of the American Dream/Empire (the voices that emerge include a death row inmate from Florida, a Palestinian poet, and the novelist Kathy Acker), trying to create new realms of resolution.

text: bullock does a good job here of working against her natural likability .
translation: ブルックはここで彼女の自然な好感度に逆らって良い仕事をしています。
back_translation: Brooke is doing a good job here, contrary to her natural likability.

text: a work of the utmost subtlety and perception , it marks the outstanding feature debut of writer-director eric byler , who understands the power of the implicit and the virtues of simplicity and economy .
translation: 極めて微妙で洞察に満ちた作品であり、明確な特徴を持つデビュー作である脚本家兼監督エリック・バイラーを示しています。彼は暗示の力と、シンプルさと経済性の美徳を理解しています。
back_translation: This is an extremely subtle and insightful work, showcasing the debut of screenwriter and director Eric Byler, who has clear characteristics. He understands the power of suggestion and the virtues of simplicity and economy.

text: and francis promises , that after the casino is built , he will have time for children .
translation: フランシスは、カジノが建設された後、子供たちのための時間ができると約束します。
back_translation: Francis promises that after the casino is built, he will have time for the children.

text: `` in life , we first organize large stones ( piedras ) such as love , friendship , family , and a career . ``
translation: 人生では、まず愛や友情、家族、キャリアといった大きな石（ぴえドラ）を整理します。
back_translation: In life, we first organize the big rocks, such as love, friendship, family, and career.

text: paravasu 's young brother arvasu ( milind soman ) is in love with a tribal girl , nittilai ( sonali kulkarni ) .
translation: パラバスの Younger Brother アルヴァス（ミリンド・ソマン）は、部族の女の子ニッティライ（ソナリ・クルカルニ）に恋をしています。
back_translation: The Younger Brother Alvas (Milind Soman) of Parabas is in love with a tribal girl named Nittilai (Sonali Kulkarni).

text: should be seen and absorbed , if only to recall that hollywood horror does , occasionally , get it more or less right .
translation: 見るべきであり、吸収すべきである。たとえそれがハリウッドのホラーが時々、ある程度正しく描くことを思い出すためだけであっても。
back_translation: It should be seen and absorbed, even if it is just to remember that Hollywood horror sometimes depicts things correctly to a certain extent.

text: the story of ussr 's first nuclear ballistic submarine , which suffered a malfunction in its nuclear reactor on its maiden voyage in the north atlantic in 1961 .
translation: 1961年に北大西洋での処女航海中に核反応炉の故障を経験した、ソビエト連邦の初の核弾道ミサイル潜水艦の物語。
back_translation: The story of the Soviet Union's first nuclear ballistic missile submarine, which experienced a nuclear reactor failure during its maiden voyage in the North Atlantic in 1961.

text: morvern callar confirms lynne ramsay as an important , original talent in international cinema .
translation: モーヴェルン・カラーは、リン・ラムジーが国際映画における重要で独創的な才能であることを確認しています。
back_translation: Movern Callar confirms that Lynne Ramsay is an important and original talent in international cinema.

text: he is the captain of a dysfunctional bowling team , he is a momma 's boy , but more importantly , he loves aida .
translation: 彼は機能不全のボウリングチームのキャプテンで、マザコンですが、それよりも重要なのは、彼がアイダを愛していることです。
back_translation: He is the captain of a dysfunctional bowling team and is a mama's boy, but more importantly, he loves Aida.

text: as the end of times approaches , an angel and a demon must team up to sort out the whole mess . . .
translation: 時の終わりが近づくにつれて、天使と悪魔は全ての混乱を解決するために協力しなければならない。。。
back_translation: As the end of time approaches, angels and demons must cooperate to resolve all chaos...

text: there are two distinct paths in life good vs . evil .
translation: 人生には善と悪の二つの異なる道があります。
back_translation: In life, there are two different paths: good and evil.

text: this movie centers around the new pok & # 233 ; mon celebi , a one-of-a-kind veggie-like bug whose only kin are celebi from other points in time .
translation: この映画は、新しいポケモンセレビィを中心に展開され、セレビィは時空の異なる他のセレビィしか親類のいない、唯一無二の野菜のような虫です。
back_translation: This movie revolves around the new Pokémon Celebi, which is a unique, vegetable-like bug that has no relatives except for other Celebi from different dimensions in time and space.

text: then the unthinkable happens : a nuclear bomb explodes in a u . s . city , and america is quick to blame the russians .
translation: その後、想像を絶する事態が発生する：アメリカの都市で核爆弾が爆発し、アメリカはすぐにロシアを非難する。
back_translation: Then, an unimaginable crisis occurs: a nuclear bomb explodes in an American city, and America immediately blames Russia.

text: but the latter is currently in a swedish prison cell .
translation: しかし、後者は現在スウェーデンの刑務所の独房にいます。
back_translation: However, the latter is currently in a solitary confinement cell in a Swedish prison.

text: swimming is n't a major film . nor does it try to be . but what , in the end , is a major film ? if it 's one that accomplishes what it sets out to do , then we ought to correct ourselves .
translation: 「スイミング」は大作映画ではないし、そうであろうともしていない。しかし、結局のところ、大作映画とは何だろう？もしそれが、目指すものを達成する映画であるならば、私たちは自分自身を正さなければならない。
back_translation: "Swimming" is not a blockbuster movie, nor does it strive to be one. But ultimately, what is a blockbuster movie? If it is a film that achieves what it aims for, then we must correct ourselves.

text: things turn nasty when the casino director ( alec baldwin ) tries to break up the romance .
translation: カジノのディレクター（アレック・ボールドウィン）がロマンスを妨げようとすると、物事は厄介な方向に進んでいく。
back_translation: When the casino director (Alec Baldwin) tries to interfere with the romance, things take a troublesome turn.

text: he decides that he must think of a plan that will hit the bank where it hurts the most - in its safe where all the money is kept .
translation: 彼は、銀行に最も痛手を与える計画を考えなければならないと決めた - すべてのお金が保管されている金庫で。
back_translation: He decided he had to come up with a plan that would deal the biggest blow to the bank - the vault where all the money is stored.

text: son of the bride manages to be affectionate without drawing too deeply from a well of sugar and schmaltz .
translation: 花嫁の息子は、甘さや感傷に寄りかかりすぎずに、愛情を示すことができる。
back_translation: The bride's son can show affection without relying too much on sweetness or sentimentality.

text: takes a clunky tv-movie approach to detailing a chapter in the life of the celebrated irish playwright , poet and drinker .
translation: 有名なアイルランドの劇作家、詩人、飲酒者の人生の一章を描くには、ぎこちないテレビ映画のアプローチを取ります。
back_translation: To depict a chapter in the life of a famous Irish playwright, poet, and drinker, we will take an awkward television movie approach.

text: a first-class , thoroughly involving b movie that effectively combines two surefire , beloved genres -- the prison flick and the fight film .
translation: 一流の、完全に没入感のあるB級映画で、確実に人気のある2つのジャンル - 刑務所映画と格闘映画 - を効果的に組み合わせています。
back_translation: A top-notch, fully immersive B-movie that effectively combines two guaranteed popular genres—prison films and martial arts films.

text: harvard man is a semi-throwback , a reminiscence without nostalgia or sentimentality .
translation: ハーバードマンはセミ・スロー・バックであり、ノスタルジーやセンチメンタリズムなしの回想です。
back_translation: The Harvard man is a semi-slow back, reflecting without nostalgia or sentimentality.

text: the script feels as if it started to explore the obvious voyeuristic potential of 'hypertime ' but then backed off when the producers saw the grosses for spy kids .
translation: スクリプトは「ハイパータイム」の明白な覗き見的な可能性を探求し始めたように感じますが、プロデューサーが「スパイキッズ」の興行収入を見たときに引き下がったようです。
back_translation: The script seems to have started exploring the obvious voyeuristic potential of "Hyper Time," but it feels like the producer backed down when they saw the box office numbers for "Spy Kids."

text: meanwhile , a farmer and his son set out on a personal mission to hunt the creeper down .
translation: その間に、農夫と彼の息子はそのクリーパーを追い詰めるために個人的な使命に出発しました。
back_translation: During that time, the farmer and his son set out on a personal mission to chase down the creeper.

text: director andrew niccol . . . demonstrates a wry understanding of the quirks of fame . his healthy sense of satire is light and fun . . . .
translation: 監督アンドリュー・ニコルは、名声の奇妙な特性を鋭く理解しています。彼の健全なサティアは軽やかで楽しいです。
back_translation: Director Andrew Niccol has a sharp understanding of the strange characteristics of fame. His healthy satire is light and enjoyable.

text: day in , day out , the same routine is repeated .
translation: 日々、同じルーチンが繰り返される。
back_translation: Every day, the same routine is repeated.

text: the first involves a band of five teens that escape from a drug rehabilitation center to cash in on a questionable promise of salvation from the psychopathic reverend salo jr . ( vincent lamberti ) .
translation: 最初の物語は、精神病的な牧師サロ・ジュニア（ヴィンセント・ランバーティ）からの疑わしい救いの約束を得るために、薬物リハビリセンターから脱出する5人のティーンエイジャーのグループに関するものです。
back_translation: The first story is about a group of five teenagers who escape from a drug rehabilitation center in search of a dubious promise of salvation from the psychotic pastor, Sal Junior (Vincent Lombardi).

text: in the outback and through the bush with his wife terri 's ever-present commentary ringing out over the countryside ( `` that was a close one , steve ! `` ) , the crocodile hunter is out to save the gorgeous croc and relocate him .
translation: アウトバックやブッシュを妻テリーの絶え間ないコメント（「危ないところだったね、スティーブ！」）が響き渡る中、ワニハンターは美しいワニを救い、移動させようとしている。
back_translation: Amid the constant comments of my wife, Terry ("That was a close call, Steve!"), in the outback and bush, the crocodile hunter is trying to rescue and relocate a beautiful crocodile.

text: however , the cold british guard ( bale ) is quick to end this visit , throwing bobby 's mother out !
translation: しかし、冷たいイギリスの警備員（ベイル）はこの訪問をすぐに終わらせ、ボビーの母親を追い出します！
back_translation: However, the cold British guard (Bale) quickly ends this visit and kicks Bobby's mother out!

text: with edgaar 's faithful servant , elmendorf , george sets out .
translation: エドガーの忠実なしもべ、エルメンドルフと共に、ジョージは出発します。
back_translation: With his loyal servant Elmerndorf, George sets off.

text: an abused woman ( lopez ) discovers that the dream man ( campbell ) she married was n't whom she thought he was .
translation: 虐待を受けた女性（ロペス）は、彼女が結婚した夢の男性（キャンベル）が自分が思っていた人物ではないことに気づく。
back_translation: The abused woman (Lopez) realizes that the dream man (Campbell) she married is not the person she thought he was.

text: the master preaches his self proclaimed spiritual wisdom and eventually selects the most dependable ( i . e .
translation: 師匠は自己宣言した霊的知恵を説き、最も信頼できる者を選びます（つまり）。
back_translation: The master expounds on the self-declared spiritual wisdom and chooses the most trustworthy person.

text: [ diaz ] can blunder into the crudest situations with such sweet innocence as to inspire giggles rather than groans .
translation: [ディアス]は、そんな甘い無邪気さで最も粗雑な状況に迷い込み、うめき声ではなく笑いを引き起こすことができる。
back_translation: [Dias] can wander into the most rough situations with such sweet innocence, evoking laughter rather than groans.

text: despite cramming in numerous clichM-is , mehta still manages to put a fresh and funny spin on the proceedings .
translation: 数多くのクリシェを詰め込んでいるにもかかわらず、メフタはそれでもなお、新鮮で面白いひねりを加えることに成功しています。
back_translation: Despite being packed with numerous clichés, Mehta still manages to add a fresh and interesting twist.

text: a simple tale of an unlikely friendship , but thanks to the gorgeous locales and exceptional lead performances , it has considerable charm .
translation: ありえない友情のシンプルな物語ですが、美しいロケーションと卓越した主演パフォーマンスのおかげで、 considerable charmがあります。
back_translation: It's a simple story of an unlikely friendship, but thanks to the beautiful locations and outstanding lead performances, it has considerable charm.

text: any film that does n't even in passing mention political prisoners , poverty and the boat loads of people who try to escape the country is less a documentary and more propaganda by way of a valentine sealed with a kiss .
translation: 政治囚や貧困、国を逃れようとする多くの人々について、ほんの少しでも言及しない映画は、ドキュメンタリーというよりも、キスで封印されたバレンタインのようなプロパガンダに過ぎない。
back_translation: A film that fails to mention even a little about political prisoners, poverty, and the many people trying to escape their country is nothing more than propaganda, akin to a Valentine sealed with a kiss, rather than a documentary.

text: like the chilled breath of oral storytelling frozen onto film .
translation: 口承物語の冷たい息が映像に凍りついたように。
back_translation: The cold breath of oral stories seems to have frozen in the image.

text: dr . cleave , who long wanted to possess stella is left to tell her story : 'one of the saddest i know ' .
translation: クリーブ博士は、長い間ステラを手に入れたいと思っていたが、彼女の物語を語ることになった。「私が知っている中で最も悲しい物語の一つだ。」
back_translation: Dr. Cleave had long desired to possess Stella, but he had to tell her story. "It is one of the saddest stories I know."

text: the amazing film work is so convincing that by movies ' end you 'll swear you are wet in some places and feel sand creeping in others .
translation: その素晴らしい映画の効果は非常に説得力があり、映画の終わりには、いくつかの場所では濡れていると感じ、他の場所では砂が這い入っているように感じることでしょう。
back_translation: The effect of that wonderful movie is so convincing that by the end of it, you may feel wet in some places and as if sand is crawling into others.

text: for those of an indulgent , slightly sunbaked and summery mind , sex and lucia may well prove diverting enough .
translation: 贅沢で少し日焼けした夏の心を持つ人々には、『セックスとルシア』は十分に楽しませてくれるかもしれません。
back_translation: For those with a luxurious and slightly sun-kissed summer spirit, "Sex and Lucia" may provide ample entertainment.

text: without september 11 , collateral damage would have been just another bad movie . now it 's a bad , embarrassing movie .
translation: 9月11日がなければ、コラテラル・ダメージはただの悪い映画だったでしょう。今では、それは悪くて恥ずかしい映画です。
back_translation: Without September 11th, Collateral Damage would have been just a bad movie. Now it is a bad and embarrassing movie.

text: the next day , cac & # 225 ; is attacked by two street kids who wanted some money , and thinks pqd is somehow involved .
translation: 翌日、カック・225はお金を欲しがっていた2人のストリートキッズに襲われ、PQDが何らかの形で関与していると思う。
back_translation: The next day, Kakk-225 was attacked by two street kids who were looking for money, and I think PQD is somehow involved.

text: together , they cross the border into vast reaches of canadian wilderness for an unforgettable four days `` full of terror , full of wonder . ``
translation: 彼らは一緒にカナダの広大な wilderness に越境し、忘れられない4日間を過ごします。「恐怖に満ち、驚きに満ちた。」
back_translation: They cross into the vast wilderness of Canada together and spend an unforgettable four days. "Filled with terror and wonder."

text: there 's a fine chemistry of contrasts between lau 's exuberance and the quiet , slow-burning intensity takashi sorimachi brings to his role .
translation: ラウの exuberance と高橋克典が役に持ち込む静かで緩やかに燃え上がる強さの対比の素晴らしい化学反応がある。
back_translation: There is a wonderful chemical reaction between Rau's exuberance and Katsunori Takahashi's quietly and slowly smoldering strength that he brings to his role.

text: less a study in madness or love than a study in schoolgirl obsession .
translation: 狂気や愛の研究というよりは、女子学生の執着の研究である。
back_translation: It is more a study of women's students' obsession than a study of madness or love.

text: jim , stifler and finch return in the last american pie movie .
translation: ジム、スティフラー、フィンチが最後のアメリカン・パイ映画に戻ってきます。
back_translation: Jim, Stifler, and Finch are returning for the last American Pie movie.

text: in the spirit of the season , i assign one bright shining star to roberto benigni 's pinocchio -- but i guarantee that no wise men will be following after it .
translation: この季節の精神を表して、ロベルト・ベニーニの「ピノッキオ」に一つの明るく輝く星を与えますが、それに従う賢者たちは誰もいないと保証します。
back_translation: To express the spirit of this season, I give a bright shining star to Roberto Benigni's "Pinocchio," but I guarantee that there are no wise men following it.

text: arteta directs one of the best ensemble casts of the year
translation: アルテタは今年の最高のアンサンブルキャストの一つを指揮しています。
back_translation: Arteta is directing one of the best ensemble casts of the year.

text: jamie lee curtis ( true lies ) and lindsay lohan ( the parent trap ) star in the remake of the 1976 disney classic freaky friday .
translation: ジェイミー・リー・カーチス（『トゥルー・ライズ』）とリンジー・ローハン（『ジョイ・ライド』）が、1976年のディズニーのクラシック『フリーキー・フライデー』のリメイクに出演します。
back_translation: Jamie Lee Curtis (from "True Lies") and Lindsay Lohan (from "Joy Ride") will star in the remake of Disney's classic "Freaky Friday" from 1976.

text: this temporary city is the 6th largest in nevada .
translation: この仮設都市はネバダ州で6番目に大きいです。
back_translation: This temporary city is the sixth largest in Nevada.

text: an observation and reflection on contemporary life in the uk from a director with unique eclectic vision , a poetical attempt at defining what it is to live in this country .
translation: 現代のイギリスの生活に関する観察と反省を、独自のエクレクティックなビジョンを持つ監督からのものとして、 この国で生きることが何であるかを定義しようとする詩的な試み。
back_translation: A poetic attempt to define what it means to live in this country, presented as observations and reflections on modern life in the UK from a director with a unique eclectic vision.

text: others , more attuned to the anarchist maxim that 'the urge to destroy is also a creative urge ' , or more willing to see with their own eyes , will find morrison 's iconoclastic uses of technology to be liberating .
translation: 他の人々は、「破壊の衝動は創造的な衝動でもある」というアナーキストの格言により調和し、自らの目で見ることをより望む場合、モリソンの技術の破壊的な使い方を解放的だと感じるでしょう。
back_translation: Others may feel that the destructive use of Morrison's technology is liberating, harmonizing with the anarchist maxim that "the impulse to destroy is also a creative impulse," if they desire to see with their own eyes.

text: for those willing to risk being made very uncomfortable , this instant cult classic announces the arrival of a distinctive new talent behind the camera .
translation: 非常に不快な思いをするリスクを冒すことをいとわない人々のために、この瞬間的なカルトクラシックは、カメラの背後に独特の新たな才能が到来したことを告げています。
back_translation: For those who are unafraid to take the risk of feeling very uncomfortable, this instant cult classic signals the arrival of a unique new talent behind the camera.

text: in the end , will extreme dating lead to true love ?
translation: 結局、極端なデートは真実の愛につながるのでしょうか？
back_translation: In the end, does extreme dating lead to true love?

text: tsai convincingly paints a specifically urban sense of disassociation here .
translation: ツァイはここで特に都市的な疎外感を convincingly 描写している。
back_translation: Tsai convincingly depicts urban alienation here.

text: the actors are simply too good , and the story too intriguing , for technical flaws to get in the way .
translation: 俳優たちはあまりにも素晴らしく、物語もあまりに魅力的なので、技術的な欠陥が障害になることはありません。
back_translation: The actors are so wonderful and the story is so captivating that the technical flaws do not become a hindrance.

text: as patients mysteriously disappear , and the body count mounts , even the exterminators , ratmaster general `` hans `` ( john paul young ) and his assistant , `` jim `` ( adam redmond ) are no contest for the awesome force of this hybrid rodent strain .
translation: 患者が神秘的に消え、死者数が増える中、駆除業者であるラットマスター・ジェネラル「ハンス」（ジョン・ポール・ヤング）と彼の助手「ジム」（アダム・レッドモンド）でさえ、このハイブリッドネズミ株の驚異的な力には敵わない。
back_translation: As patients mysteriously disappear and the death toll rises, exterminator Rat Master General "Hans" (John Paul Young) and his assistant "Jim" (Adam Redmond) find themselves unable to contend with the extraordinary power of this hybrid mouse strain.

text: this movie . . . does n't deserve the energy it takes to describe how bad it is .
translation: この映画は、どれほど悪いかを説明するためにかかるエネルギーを正当に受けるに値しない。
back_translation: This movie does not deserve the energy it takes to explain how bad it is.

text: the director knows how to apply textural gloss , but his portrait of sex-as-war is strictly sitcom .
translation: 監督はテクスチャーグロスの使い方を知っているが、彼の性を戦争として描いたポートレートは厳密にはシットコムである。
back_translation: The director knows how to use texture gloss, but his portrayal of gender as war is strictly a sitcom.

text: director hoffman , his writer and kline 's agent should serve detention
translation: ホフマン監督、彼の作家、そしてクラインのエージェントは留置されるべきです。
back_translation: Director Hoffman, his writer, and Klein's agent should be detained.

text: as he experiences each aberration , the artist enters an almost trance-like state , during which he paints what he sees .
translation: 彼はそれぞれの異常を体験する中で、アーティストはほぼトランス状態に入り、その間に彼が見たものを描きます。
back_translation: In experiencing each abnormality, the artist enters a near-trance state and depicts what he sees during that time.

text: like lisa gossels ' children of chabannes ( 2000 ) , which tells another little-known story about french villagers who saved 400 jewish children , shanghai ghetto is a celebration of humanity .
translation: リサ・ゴッセルズの「シャバンヌの子供たち」（2000年）のように、フランスの村人たちが400人のユダヤ人の子供たちを救ったというあまり知られていない物語を語る「上海ゲットー」は、人間性の祝福です。
back_translation: "The Shanghai Ghetto," which tells the lesser-known story of French villagers who saved 400 Jewish children, is a celebration of humanity, much like Lisa Gossels' "Children of the Shanghai Ghetto" (2000).

text: bella is the picture of health with boundless energy until a few days before she dies . this is absolutely and completely ridiculous and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered through the horrible pains of a death by cancer .
translation: ベラは、死の数日前まで無限のエネルギーを持った健康の象徴です。これは完全にありえないことであり、癌による死のひどい痛みに苦しんだすべての家族への侮辱です。
back_translation: Bella was a symbol of health with boundless energy until days before her death. This is completely unimaginable and an insult to all families who have suffered from the horrible pain of death due to cancer.

text: it 's about as convincing as any other arnie musclefest , but has a little too much resonance with real world events and ultimately comes off as insultingly simplistic .
translation: それは他のアーニーの筋肉映画と同じくらい説得力があるが、現実の出来事との共鳴が少し多すぎて、最終的には侮辱的に単純に感じられる。
back_translation: It is as compelling as other Ernie muscle movies, but it resonates a bit too much with real events, ultimately feeling insultingly simplistic.

text: panic room fits nicely within the trajectory of the elegant career arc fincher has already plotted .
translation: パニックルームは、フィンチャーがすでに描いた優雅なキャリアの軌跡に見事に収まります。
back_translation: The Panic Room fits beautifully into the elegant trajectory of Fincher's already established career.

text: the script covers huge , heavy topics in a bland , surfacey way that does n't offer any insight into why , for instance , good things happen to bad people .
translation: このスクリプトは、大きくて重いテーマを淡泊で表面的な方法で扱っており、たとえば良いことが悪い人に起こる理由についての洞察を提供していません。
back_translation: This script deals with large and heavy themes in a bland and superficial way, for example, it does not provide insights into the reasons why good things happen to bad people.

text: chance is a black comedy about how hard it is to find `` the one `` .
translation: チャンスは「運命の人」を見つけるのがいかに難しいかを描いたブラックコメディです。
back_translation: Chance is a black comedy that depicts how difficult it is to find "the one."

text: cancelling a trip to disney world with his son , he decides to bring the boy along .
translation: ディズニーワールドへの旅行をキャンセルした彼は、息子を連れて行くことに決めた。
back_translation: He decided to take his son instead of going on the trip to Disney World that he had canceled.

text: for devotees of french cinema , safe conduct is so rich with period minutiae it 's like dying and going to celluloid heaven .
translation: フランス映画の愛好者にとって、『安全な通行』は時代の細かな詳細が豊富で、まるで死んでフィルムの天国に行くようなものです。
back_translation: For fans of French cinema, "Safe Passage" is rich in the fine details of the era, almost like going to heaven in a film after death.

text: set in the summer of 1942 during wwii , the film traces the trajectory of simple people thrown into extraordinary lives , revealing the heart-warming flame of hope and humanity that endures , even in times of war and dispair .
translation: 1942年の夏、第二次世界大戦の時期に設定されたこの映画は、平凡な人々が非凡な人生に投げ込まれる様子を追い、戦争と絶望の時代にもかかわらず、耐え忍ぶ希望と人間性の心温まる灯火を明らかにしています。
back_translation: Set in the summer of 1942 during World War II, this film follows the experiences of ordinary people thrust into extraordinary lives, revealing a heartwarming flame of enduring hope and humanity despite the despair and turmoil of war.

text: one afternoon they discover the corpse of a young woman floating in the water .
translation: ある午後、彼らは水面に浮かぶ若い女性の死体を発見する。
back_translation: One afternoon, they discover the body of a young woman floating on the surface of the water.

text: it uses an old-time formula , it 's not terribly original and it 's rather messy -- but you just have to love the big , dumb , happy movie my big fat greek wedding .
translation: 古い時代のフォーミュラを使っていて、特にオリジナリティがあるわけではなく、かなりごちゃごちゃしていますが、私のビッグ・ファット・ギリシャン・ウェディングという大きくて愚かな幸せな映画を愛さずにはいられません。
back_translation: I'm using an old formula, and it’s not particularly original, and it's quite cluttered, but I can’t help but love my big, fat, Greek wedding, which is a big and foolishly happy movie.

text: a dutch girl is getting sick of always losing her boyfriends , so when she loses her newest `` gain `` she decides to follow max ( her friend ) to new york where he 's starting a carreer as an actor .
translation: オランダの女の子は、いつも彼氏を失うことにうんざりしているので、最新の「ゲイン」を失ったとき、彼女は友達のマックスがニューヨークで俳優としてのキャリアを始めるのを追いかけることに決める。
back_translation: The Dutch girl is always tired of losing her boyfriends, so when she lost her latest "gain," she decided to follow her friend Max as he begins his acting career in New York.

text: however , finch also has a dilemma when , after wise words from stifler , stifler 's mom and stifler 's dad ( played by tim allen ) decide to renew their vows , and get married again .
translation: しかし、フィンチは、スティフラーからの賢い言葉の後、スティフラーの母とスティフラーの父（ティム・アレンが演じる）が誓いを新たにし、再び結婚することを決めたときにジレンマを抱えます。
back_translation: However, Finch faces a dilemma when, after Stifler's wise words, Stifler's mother and Stifler's father (played by Tim Allen) decide to renew their vows and get married again.

text: when a group of teens win a contest to spend a night in michael myers ' childhood home to be broadcast live on the internet , they believe they are in for a little fun and some free publicity .
translation: 一群のティーンエイジャーがマイケル・マイヤーズの子供時代の家で一晩を過ごすコンテストに勝ち、インターネットで生放送されることになったとき、彼らはちょっとした楽しみと無料の宣伝を期待しています。
back_translation: When a group of teenagers wins a contest to spend a night at Michael Myers' childhood home, which will be streamed live on the internet, they are expecting a bit of fun and free publicity.

text: she spends the night with pqd , one of the musicians .
translation: 彼女はミュージシャンの一人であるpqdと一緒に夜を過ごします。
back_translation: She spends the night with a musician named pqd.

text: old people will love this movie , and i mean that in the nicest possible way : last orders will touch the heart of anyone old enough to have earned a 50-year friendship .
translation: 年配の方々はこの映画を気に入るでしょうし、それは最も好意的な意味で言っています。『ラストオーダーズ』は、50年の友情を築くのに十分な年齢の誰の心にも触れることでしょう。
back_translation: Older people will likely enjoy this movie, and I mean that in the most favorable way. "Last Orders" will touch the hearts of anyone old enough to have built a 50-year friendship.

text: when so many hollywood films actively discourage higher brain functions , you have to give changing lanes credit for giving you food for thought .
translation: 多くのハリウッド映画が高次の脳機能を積極的に妨げる中、チェンジング・レーンは考える材料を提供してくれる点で評価されるべきです。
back_translation: Among many Hollywood films that actively hinder higher brain functions, "Changing Lanes" should be appreciated for providing material for thought.

text: there 's enough here to keep the sequel rocking , providing you can leave the adult in you at the door .
translation: ここには続編を盛り上げるために十分な要素があり、あなたが大人の自分をドアの外に置いておけるならば。
back_translation: There are enough elements here to elevate the sequel, as long as you can leave your adult self outside the door.

text: merchant effectively translates naipaul 's lively mix of characters from the page to screen .
translation: 『商人』は、ナイポールの生き生きとしたキャラクターの混ざり具合をページからスクリーンへと効果的に翻訳します。
back_translation: "The Merchant" effectively translates the lively mix of Naipaul's characters from the page to the screen.

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .
translation: それは魅力的で恐ろしい物語であり、『ララミー・プロジェクト』は、こういったことが実際にアメリカで今も起きていることを思い出させてくれる価値のある作品です。
back_translation: It is a captivating and terrifying story, and "The Laramie Project" is a valuable work that reminds us that such things are still happening in America today.

text: gainey ) - would unearth a seedy world of drugs and violence , ultimately revealing a motley crew from la 's underbelly including ex-con david lind ( dylan mcdermott ) , nightclub impresario eddie nash ( eric bogosian ) , the most unlikely of american heroes - porn legend john holmes ( val kilmer ) - holmes ' estranged wife sharon ( lisa kudrow ) and his teenage lover dawn schiller ( kate bosworth ) . ``
translation: ゲイニーは、薬物と暴力の陰湿な世界を掘り起こし、最終的にはロサンゼルスの裏側から集まった色とりどりのクルーを明らかにすることになります。それには、元囚人のデビッド・リンド（ディラン・マクダーモット）、ナイトクラブの実業家エディ・ナッシュ（エリック・ボゴシアン）、アメリカの最もあり得ないヒーローであるポルノの伝説ジョン・ホームズ（バル・キルマー）、ホームズの疎遠の妻シャロン（リサ・クドロー）、そして彼の10代の恋人ドーン・シラー（ケイト・ボスワース）が含まれます。
back_translation: Geinny delves into the grim world of drugs and violence, ultimately revealing a colorful crew gathered from the underbelly of Los Angeles. This includes former prisoner David Lind (Dylan McDermott), nightclub entrepreneur Eddie Nash (Eric Bogosian), the most unlikely American hero, porn legend John Holmes (Val Kilmer), Holmes' estranged wife Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his teenage girlfriend Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth).

text: wallowing in self-pity for years , he decides to commit suicide .
translation: 長年自己憐憫に浸っていた彼は、自殺を決意する。
back_translation: After years of wallowing in self-pity, he resolves to commit suicide.

text: a comedy that swings and jostles to the rhythms of life .
translation: 人生のリズムに合わせて揺れ動き、ぶつかり合うコメディ。
back_translation: A comedy that sways in tune with the rhythm of life and clashes together.

text: when two thirteen-year-old boys fall deeply in love with her , they find themselves on a collision course with one another that could not only destroy their friendship , but take the tiny town of medda , alabama with them .
translation: 二人の13歳の少年が彼女に深く恋をすると、彼らはお互いに衝突する運命にあり、それが友情を破壊するだけでなく、アラバマ州メッダの小さな町も巻き込んでしまう可能性がある。
back_translation: When two 13-year-old boys fall deeply in love with the same girl, they are destined to clash with each other, which could not only destroy their friendship but also impact their small town of Medda, Alabama.

text: the main story involves an innocent teenage boy and a conniving teenage girl who meet on a beach one summer in southern brazil .
translation: 物語の主な内容は、南ブラジルのビーチで夏に出会った無邪気なティーンエイジャーの男の子と、ずる賢いティーンエイジャーの女の子についてです。
back_translation: The main content of the story is about an innocent teenage boy and a cunning teenage girl who meet during the summer on a beach in southern Brazil.

text: lucy walks away from him , deciding to take time to make this decision for herself .
translation: ルーシーは彼から離れ、自分のためにこの決断をする時間を取ることにした。
back_translation: Lucy decided to take some time away from him to make this decision for herself.

text: the film lapses too often into sugary sentiment and withholds delivery on the pell-mell pyrotechnics its punchy style promises .
translation: 映画はあまりにも頻繁に甘ったるい感傷に陥り、そのパンチの効いたスタイルが約束する混沌とした花火の盛り上がりを提供しない。
back_translation: The film falls into overly sentimental sweetness far too often, failing to deliver the chaotic climax of fireworks that its punchy style promises.

text: as his family is rounded up to be shipped off to the nazi labor camps , he escapes deportation and eludes capture by living in the ruins of warsaw .
translation: 彼の家族がナチスの強制労働収容所に送られるために連行される中、彼は deportation（追放）から逃れ、ワルシャワの廃墟に住むことで捕らえられるのを免れます。
back_translation: As his family is taken away to be sent to a Nazi forced labor camp, he escapes deportation by living in the ruins of Warsaw to avoid being captured.

text: it would seem that nothing is capable of distracting scotty johns from working on his much-anticipated second book .
translation: スコッティ・ジョンズは、彼の待望の2冊目の本に取り組むことから何も気を散らすことができないようです。
back_translation: It seems that nothing can distract Scottie Johns from working on his much-anticipated second book.

text: though shiri 's eruptions of violence , mayhem and gunplay are every bit as kinetic and dazzling as anything generated in hong kong or hollywood , the film 's primary focus is always on its characters .
translation: シリの暴力、混乱、 gunplay の噴火は、香港やハリウッドで生み出されるものと同じくらい動的で目を引くが、映画の主な焦点は常にキャラクターにある。
back_translation: The violence, chaos, and gunplay eruptions in Siri are just as dynamic and eye-catching as those created in Hong Kong or Hollywood, but the main focus of the film is always on the characters.

text: however , they must ge the migt baby product done before they can settle their personal affairs .
translation: しかし、彼らは個人的な事を整理する前に、ミグトのベビー製品を完成させなければなりません。
back_translation: However, they must complete the Miguto baby products before sorting out personal matters.

text: i liked the movie , but i know i would have liked it more if it had just gone that one step further . i 'm left slightly disappointed that it did n't .
translation: その映画は好きだったけれど、もう一歩進んでいたらもっと好きになったと思う。そうならなかったのが少し残念だ。
back_translation: I liked that movie, but I think I would have liked it even more if it had gone a step further. I'm a bit disappointed that it didn't.

text: secretary is not a movie about fetishism . it is a movie about passion .
translation: 「セクレタリー」はフェティシズムについての映画ではなく、情熱についての映画です。
back_translation: "Secretary" is not a movie about fetishism; it is a movie about passion.

text: set in the early 1970 's , this is the tale of a young man whose fiancee has been killed , but who finds himself falling for another woman even while he is still living with his fiancee 's grieving parents and being drawn into the legal battle to bring her killer to justice .
translation: 1970年代初頭を舞台にしたこの物語は、婚約者が殺された若者の物語であるが、彼は婚約者の悲しむ両親と共に暮らしながらも、別の女性に惹かれていく。そして、婚約者の殺人者を法的に追及する争いに巻き込まれていく。
back_translation: Set in the early 1970s, this story follows a young man whose fiancée has been murdered. While living with his fiancée’s grieving parents, he finds himself drawn to another woman. This leads him to become involved in a legal battle to pursue the murderer of his fiancée.

text: proof once again that if the filmmakers just follow the books , they ca n't go wrong . better effects , better acting and a hilarious kenneth branagh . an excellent sequel .
translation: 映画製作者が単に本を忠実に守るだけで、間違えることはないことを再度証明しています。より良い効果、より良い演技、そして面白いケネス・ブラナー。優れた続編です。
back_translation: The filmmaker proves once again that as long as they faithfully adhere to the book, they won't make mistakes. Better effects, better performances, and an entertaining Kenneth Branagh. An excellent sequel.

text: an intense relationship drama that takes the form of a mystery , the event centers around a series of unexplained deaths that occur among the gay community in new york 's fashionable chelsea district .
translation: 激しい関係のドラマで、ミステリーの形を取っています。この出来事は、ニューヨークのファッショナブルなチェルシー地区のゲイコミュニティの間で発生する一連の説明のつかない死に関するものです。
back_translation: It is a drama with intense relationships that takes the form of a mystery. This event revolves around a series of unexplained deaths that occur within the gay community in the fashionable Chelsea neighborhood of New York.

text: the plot grows thin soon , and you find yourself praying for a quick resolution .
translation: 物語はすぐに薄くなり、あなたは早い結末を祈るようになります。
back_translation: The story quickly becomes thin, and you find yourself hoping for a swift conclusion.

text: shade is set in the world of poker hustlers working the clubs and martini bars of los angeles .
translation: シェードは、ロサンゼルスのクラブやマティーニバーで働くポーカー詐欺師たちの世界を舞台にしています。
back_translation: Shade is set in the world of poker con artists working in clubs and martini bars in Los Angeles.

text: feels as if the inmates have actually taken over the asylum .
translation: まるで囚人たちが実際に精神病院を乗っ取ったかのように感じる。
back_translation: It feels as if the prisoners have actually taken over the mental hospital.

text: the huskies are beautiful , the border collie is funny and the overall feeling is genial and decent .
translation: ハスキーは美しく、ボーダーコリーは面白く、全体的な雰囲気は親しみやすくて立派です。
back_translation: Huskies are beautiful, Border Collies are interesting, and the overall atmosphere is friendly and magnificent.

text: what 's so striking about jolie 's performance is that she never lets her character become a caricature -- not even with that radioactive hair .
translation: ジョリーの演技で際立っているのは、彼女が自分のキャラクターをカリカチュアにすることを決して許さない点です - 放射能のような髪の毛でさえも。
back_translation: What stands out in Jolie's performance is that she never allows her character to become a caricature - even with hair that looks like it's from a radioactive source.

text: as reality bleeds into hallucination , rothko decides to take the man for a walk . . .
translation: 現実が幻覚に溶け込む中、ロスコは男を散歩に連れて行くことに決める。
back_translation: As reality blends into illusion, Rosco decides to take the man for a walk.

text: despite hoffman 's best efforts , wilson remains a silent , lumpish cipher ; his encounters reveal nothing about who he is or who he was before .
translation: ホフマンの最善の努力にもかかわらず、ウィルソンは沈黙した鈍重な暗号のままであり、彼の出会いは彼が誰なのか、また以前は誰だったのかについて何も明らかにしない。
back_translation: Despite Hoffman’s best efforts, Wilson remains a silent, dull cipher, and his encounters reveal nothing about who he is or who he was before.

text: a triumph , relentless and beautiful in its downbeat darkness .
translation: 勝利、絶え間なく、陰鬱な美しさを持っている。
back_translation: Victory possesses an unending, gloomy beauty.

text: one ( logue ) does it for the love of comics , while the other shop , run by a husband-and-wife team ( rapaport and lyonne ) are in it strictly for the money .
translation: 一方の店（ログ）は漫画愛からそれを行っているが、もう一方の店は（ラパポートとリヨンヌによって運営されており）お金のためだけにやっている。
back_translation: One shop (Log) operates out of a love for manga, while the other shop (run by Rapaport and Lyon) does it solely for the money.

text: the people want to lynch him and blueberry can only just prevent that .
translation: 人々は彼をリンチしようとしていて、ブルーベリーはそれをなんとか防ぐことができる。
back_translation: People are trying to lynch him, but Blueberry manages to prevent it somehow.

text: the film stars jim caviezel as dantes , a sailor who is falsely accused of treason by his best friend fernand ( guy pearce ) , who wants dantes ' girlfriend mercedes ( dagmara dominczyk ) for himself .
translation: この映画では、ジム・カヴィーゼルが船乗りダンテスを演じており、彼は親友フェルナンド（ガイ・ピアース）によって不当に反逆罪で告発される。フェルナンドはダンテスのガールフレンドであるメルセデス（ダグマラ・ドミンチク）を自分のものにしたいと考えている。
back_translation: In this movie, Jim Caviezel plays the sailor Dantes, who is falsely accused of treason by his best friend Fernando (Guy Pearce). Fernando wants to make Dantes' girlfriend Mercedes (Dagmara Domińczyk) his own.

text: dr . evil and mini-me have somehow escaped from a maximum security prison and the duo team up with goldmember .
translation: ドクター・イーブルとミニミーが、どういうわけか最高警備の刑務所から脱走し、この二人はゴールドメンバーと組む。
back_translation: Dr. Evil and Mini-Me somehow escape from the highest security prison, and the two of them team up with Goldmember.

text: the film 's snags and stumblings are more than compensated for by its wryly subversive tone .
translation: この映画の問題点やつまずきは、その皮肉に満ちた反体制的なトーンによって十分に補われています。
back_translation: The issues and missteps of this film are sufficiently compensated for by its ironic anti-establishment tone.

text: in the end , both come to new understanding of what is important and appear to be set in new ethical and moral directions .
translation: 結局のところ、両者は何が重要であるかについて新たな理解に至り、新しい倫理的および道徳的な方向性に設定されているようです。
back_translation: Ultimately, it seems that both parties have reached a new understanding of what is important and are setting a new ethical and moral direction.

text: a geo-political thriller where gerry anderson finds that sometimes , everybody really is out to get you .
translation: ジオポリティカルスリラーで、ゲリー・アンダーソンは時々、誰もが本当にあなたを狙っていることに気づく。
back_translation: In the geopolitical thriller, Gerry Anderson occasionally realizes that everyone is truly out to get you.

text: turns out to be a nifty swashbuckler whose plot easily could have been lifted from a number of douglas fairbanks silent pictures .
translation: 結局、彼は素晴らしい冒険者であり、そのプロットはダグラス・フェアバンクスのサイレント映画のいくつかから簡単に取り入れられた可能性がある。
back_translation: In the end, he is a wonderful adventurer, and the plot could easily have been drawn from some of Douglas Fairbanks' silent films.

text: although the dogs seemingly have it in for ted , he decides to keep the dogs and race them in the local race , the arctic challenge , spiting a mountain man ( played by james coburn ) who wants the dogs .
translation: 犬たちはテッドに対して敵意を持っているように見えますが、彼は犬たちを飼い続け、地元のレース「アークティックチャレンジ」でレースを行うことを決意します。これは犬を欲しがる山男（ジェームズ・コバーンが演じる）に対する仕返しです。
back_translation: The dogs seem to have hostility towards Ted, but he decides to continue keeping the dogs and racing in the local event "Arctic Challenge." This is revenge against the mountain man (played by James Coburn) who desires the dogs.

text: this insightful , oscar-nominated documentary , in which children on both sides of the ever-escalating conflict have their say away from watchful parental eyes , gives peace yet another chance .
translation: この洞察に満ちたオスカーにノミネートされたドキュメンタリーでは、絶え間なく激化する対立の両側にいる子供たちが、監視する親の目を離れて自らの意見を述べており、平和にもう一度チャンスを与えています。
back_translation: In this insightful Oscar-nominated documentary, children on both sides of the increasingly intensifying conflict express their opinions away from the watchful eyes of their parents, giving peace another chance.

text: watch as superfag rescues anthony , a naive , adorably cute guy whom superfag falls head over heals in love with . . . watch
translation: スーパーファグがアンソニーを救う様子を見てください。彼は無邪気で、とても可愛い男の子で、スーパーファグは彼に恋に落ちてしまいます。。。見てください。
back_translation: Watch as SuperFug saves Anthony. He is an innocent and very cute boy, and SuperFug falls in love with him... Watch it.

text: it uses the pain and violence of war as background material for color .
translation: それは戦争の痛みと暴力を色の背景素材として利用しています。
back_translation: It utilizes the pain and violence of war as a background material in color.

text: this daring film challenges most widely held notions about religious conviction while providing a complex portrait of an identity crisis that 's run amok and a good mind that 's jumped the tracks .
translation: この大胆な映画は、宗教的信念に関する一般的な考えを挑戦し、暴走したアイデンティティの危機と、踏み外した良心の複雑な肖像を提供します。
back_translation: This daring film challenges common beliefs about religious faith and offers a complex portrait of a runaway identity crisis and a strayed conscience.

text: when not wallowing in its characters ' frustrations , the movie is busy contriving false , sitcom-worthy solutions to their problems .
translation: キャラクターのフラストレーションに耽溺していないとき、この映画は彼らの問題に対する偽の、シットコムにふさわしい解決策を考え出すのに忙しい。
back_translation: When not indulging in the characters' frustrations, the film is busy coming up with fake, sitcom-appropriate solutions to their problems.

text: after witnessing a horrific and traumatic event , julia lund ( laura regan ) , a graduate student in psychology , gradually comes to the realization that everything which scared her as a child could be real .
translation: 恐ろしいトラウマ的な出来事を目撃した後、心理学の大学院生であるジュリア・ルンド（ローラ・リーガン）は、子供の頃に彼女を怖がらせたすべてのものが現実である可能性があることを徐々に理解していく。
back_translation: After witnessing a terrifying traumatic event, graduate psychology student Julia Lund (Laura Regan) gradually comes to understand that everything that scared her as a child could be a reality.

text: a keep-'em-guessing plot and an affectionate take on its screwed-up characters .
translation: 予測不可能なプロットと、複雑なキャラクターへの愛情ある解釈。
back_translation: An unpredictable plot and a loving interpretation of complex characters.

text: her hard fought for goal of a harmonic family life seems achieved .
translation: 彼女の努力して勝ち取った調和の取れた家族生活の目標は達成されたようです。
back_translation: It seems that her goal of achieving a harmonious family life, which she worked hard for, has been accomplished.

text: facing her past , culturally and emotionally , eve finds herself caught up in the independent movement of armenia , and the crisis of commitment with the man whom she falls in love .
translation: 過去に向き合う中で、文化的にも感情的にも、イブはアルメニアの独立運動に巻き込まれ、恋に落ちた男性とのコミットメントの危機に直面します。
back_translation: As she confronts the past, Eve becomes embroiled in the Armenian independence movement culturally and emotionally, facing a crisis of commitment with the man she has fallen in love with.

text: ami , having dropped out of college with twelve credits left , works at a flower shop , biding her time till she can get eric to understand what she knows deep down what she wants to do - be a mother .
translation: アミは、大学を途中で辞めて残り12単位を持ちながら、花屋で働いており、エリックに自分が心の奥底で望んでいること、つまり母親になりたいということを理解してもらうための時を待っています。
back_translation: Ami, having dropped out of university with 12 credits remaining, is working at a flower shop and is waiting for the right moment to make Eric understand what she truly desires deep down, which is to become a mother.

text: alarms for duvall 's throbbing sincerity and his elderly propensity for patting people while he talks .
translation: デュバルの揺るぎない誠実さと、話しながら人を優しく叩く高齢者の傾向に対する警鐘。
back_translation: Duval's unwavering integrity and a warning against the tendency of elderly people to gently admonish others while talking.

text: a serial killer named shin-hyun gives himself up to police .
translation: 連続殺人犯のシン・ヒョンが警察に自首する。
back_translation: The serial killer Shin Hyun turns himself in to the police.

text: the issue at hand is animal testing , which elle becomes concerned about when the parents of her dog ca n't attend the pet 's wedding because of it .
translation: 問題は動物実験であり、エルは犬の飼い主がそのせいでペットの結婚式に出席できないことに懸念を抱く。
back_translation: The issue is with animal testing, and El is concerned that dog owners cannot attend their pet's wedding because of it.

text: bob dobalina is an award-winning copywriter who really wants to be a screenwriter .
translation: ボブ・ドバリナは受賞歴のあるコピーライターで、本当に脚本家になりたいと考えています。
back_translation: Bob Dobalina is an award-winning copywriter who really wants to become a screenwriter.

text: but there is a political dilemma : if someone is arrested before he commits a murder , can the person be accused of the murder , which - because of the arrest - never took place ?
translation: しかし、政治的なジレンマがあります。もし誰かが殺人を犯す前に逮捕された場合、その人は逮捕のために実際には発生しなかった殺人で告発されることができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: However, there is a political dilemma. If someone is arrested before committing murder, can that person be charged for a murder that actually did not occur due to the arrest?

text: as the main character , the chosen one , oedekerk sets off to avenge the deaths of his parents at the hands of kung-fu legend master pain .
translation: 主人公である選ばれし者オーデカーが、武道伝説のマスター・ペインの手によって両親の死を復讐するために旅立ちます。
back_translation: The protagonist, the chosen one Audeca, sets off on a journey to avenge the death of his parents at the hands of the martial arts legend Master Pain.

text: perky , perfect carolyn and her alpha omega pi sisters plan to win sorority of the year by impressing the greek council with a killer charity : coaching mentally challenged athletes for the regional challenged games .
translation: 元気いっぱいで完璧なキャロラインと彼女のアルファ・オメガ・パイの姉妹たちは、地域挑戦者ゲームのためにメンタルにチャレンジを抱えるアスリートを指導する素晴らしいチャリティでギリシャ評議会を感心させ、今年のソロリティ賞を勝ち取ることを計画しています。
back_translation: The energetic and perfect Caroline and her Alpha Omega Pi sisters are impressing the Greek Council with their wonderful charity that mentors athletes facing mental challenges for the local challengers' games, and they plan to win this year's sorority award.

text: an unpleasant though sometimes effective psychological thriller that is noteworthy for being the film in which actress sandra bullock has gotten her act back together .
translation: 不快ではあるが時には効果的な心理スリラーであり、女優サンドラ・ブロックが自分を取り戻した作品として注目に値する。
back_translation: It is an uncomfortable yet sometimes effective psychological thriller, worth noting as a work in which actress Sandra Bullock has reclaimed herself.

text: while lying in the middle of those flowers he devotes to his yearning for love .
translation: 彼はその花々の真ん中で横たわり、愛への渇望を捧げている。
back_translation: He lies among the flowers, dedicating his longing for love.

text: this is the story of some of those who left .
translation: これは去った人々の中の一部の物語です。
back_translation: This is a story of some of the people who have passed away.

text: brings a rare , clinically specific sense of moral complexity and humanistic sympathy to the usual regimen of finger-pointing and exposure .
translation: 普段の指摘や暴露のレジメンに、稀有でクリニカルに特定された道徳的複雑さと人道的な同情をもたらします。
back_translation: It brings a rare and clinically specific moral complexity and humanitarian compassion to the usual regimen of criticism and exposure.

text: this amiable picture talks tough , but it 's all bluster -- in the end it 's as sweet as greenfingers . . .
translation: この愛らしい絵は強気のことを語っていますが、すべては大言壮語です――結局は緑の指のように甘いのです。。。
back_translation: This charming picture speaks of confidence, but it is all bluster—ultimately as sweet as green fingers...

text: so beautifully acted and directed , it 's clear that washington most certainly has a new career ahead of him if he so chooses .
translation: とても美しく演じられ、監督されており、ワシントンには選べば新しいキャリアが待っていることは明らかです。
back_translation: It is clear that it is beautifully performed and directed, and that a new career awaits Washington if he chooses.

text: imamura has said that warm water under a red bridge is a poem to the enduring strengths of women . it may also be the best sex comedy about environmental pollution ever made .
translation: 今村は、「赤い橋の下の温かい水は女性の持続的な力への詩である」と言っています。また、それは環境汚染についての最高のセックスコメディである可能性もあります。
back_translation: Imamura says, "The warm water under the red bridge is a poem about women's enduring power." It may also be the best sex comedy about environmental pollution.

text: a sailor ( derek luke ) prone to violent outbursts is sent to a naval psychiatrist ( washington ) for help .
translation: 暴力的な爆発に悩まされる船乗り（デレク・ルーク）は、助けを求めて海軍の精神科医（ワシントン）に送られる。
back_translation: A sailor (Derek Luke) tormented by violent explosions is sent to a naval psychiatrist (Washington) for help.

text: and some of these ghosts are down right unfriendly .
translation: そして、これらの幽霊の中には非常に不親切なものもいます。
back_translation: And among these ghosts, there are some that are very unkind.

text: after realizing what had happened and unsure what else to do he began capturing the events unfolding around him .
translation: 何が起こったのかを理解し、他に何をすべきかわからなくなった彼は、周囲で展開される出来事を撮影し始めた。
back_translation: Not knowing what else to do after trying to understand what had happened, he started filming the events unfolding around him.

text: using only a phone , a polaroid camera and his wits , he reclaims control over his life , transforming himself from pawn to puppet master in a wicked tale of revenge .
translation: 電話とポラロイドカメラ、そして彼の知恵だけを使って、彼は自分の人生を取り戻し、復讐の邪悪な物語の中で、自らを駒から操り人形の主へと変えていく。
back_translation: Using only a telephone, a Polaroid camera, and his own wits, he takes back his life and transforms himself from a pawn into the master puppeteer in an evil tale of revenge.

text: when the machine 's serviceman is particularly rude to him , he gets revenge by having his double-parked truck ticketed ; the serviceman runs out and leaves his cart behind .
translation: 機械の整備士が特に失礼な態度をとると、彼はその整備士の二重駐車されたトラックに駐車違反の切符を貼らせて復讐する。整備士は慌てて外に出て、カートを置き去りにする。
back_translation: When a mechanic behaves particularly rude, he exacts revenge by placing a parking ticket on the mechanic's truck, which is double-parked. The mechanic hurriedly rushes outside, leaving his cart behind.

text: a world in small , subtly acknowledging larger economic and cultural forces one moment , and in the next patiently observing the way a bowl of medicinal tea , seen turning in a microwave carousel , begins to describe its own slow epicycles .
translation: 小さな世界で、大きな経済や文化の力を微妙に認識しつつ、一瞬で電子レンジの回転台の中で回る薬用茶のボウルが、自らのゆっくりとした外円軌道を描き始める様子を根気よく観察する。
back_translation: In a small world, while subtly recognizing the power of a large economy and culture, one patiently observes the moment when a bowl of medicinal tea spins in the microwave, beginning to trace its slow outer circular path.

text: it has more than a few moments that are insightful enough to be fondly remembered in the endlessly challenging maze of moviegoing .
translation: 映画鑑賞という終わりのない迷路の中で、心に残るほど洞察に満ちた瞬間がいくつかあります。
back_translation: In the never-ending maze of movie watching, there are several moments filled with such insight that they linger in the heart.

text: a dull , somnambulant exercise in pretension whose pervasive quiet is broken by frequent outbursts of violence and noise .
translation: 鈍く、夢遊病者のような見せかけの運動で、その広がる静寂は頻繁な暴力と騒音の爆発によって破られる。
back_translation: With dull, almost somnambulistic movements, the spreading silence is frequently shattered by explosions of violence and noise.

text: attal pushes too hard to make this a comedy or serious drama . he seems to want both , but succeeds in making neither .
translation: アッタルはこれをコメディにもシリアスなドラマにもしたいようで、両方を望んでいるようだが、どちらもうまくいっていない。
back_translation: Attal seems to want to make this both a comedy and a serious drama, hoping for both, but neither is working well.

text: 'the chM-bteau is never quite able to overcome the cultural moat surrounding its ludicrous and contrived plot . '
translation: 「シャトーは、そのばかげた作り物のプロットを取り囲む文化的な堀を完全に overcome することができない。」
back_translation: "The castle cannot completely overcome the cultural moat that surrounds its ridiculous fabricated plot."

text: the slam-bang superheroics are kinetic enough to engross even the most antsy youngsters .
translation: 派手なヒーローアクションは、落ち着きのない若者たちをも夢中にさせるほどの動的な魅力を持っています。
back_translation: Flashy hero actions have a dynamic charm that captivates even restless young people.

text: an engrossing iranian film about two itinerant teachers and some lost and desolate people they encounter in a place where war has savaged the lives and liberties of the poor and the dispossessed .
translation: 戦争が貧しい人々や置かれた人々の生活と自由を侵す場所で出会う二人の旅する教師と、彼らが出会う失われた孤独な人々についての引き込まれるイラン映画。
back_translation: An engaging Iranian film about two traveling teachers who meet in a place where war infringes upon the lives and freedoms of poor and displaced people, and the lost lonely individuals they encounter.

text: magneto , having escaped from his plastic prison , forms an unlikely alliance with professor xavier to stop stryker .
translation: マグニートーはプラスチックの囚われから逃げ出し、ストライカーを止めるために教授Xと意外な同盟を結びます。
back_translation: Magneto escapes from his plastic captivity and forms an unexpected alliance with Professor X to stop Striker.

text: sanjana and aditya retreat to ooty to give a last chance to their crumbling marriage .
translation: サンジャナとアディティは、崩れかけた結婚に最後のチャンスを与えるためにウーティに retreat します。
back_translation: Sanjana and Aditi retreat to Utti to give their crumbling marriage one last chance.

text: what blood work lacks in speed and surprise it almost makes up for in doughty professionalism .
translation: 血液検査はスピードと驚きに欠けるが、そのぶん堂々たるプロフェッショナリズムでほぼ補っている。
back_translation: Blood tests lack speed and surprise, but they are nearly compensated for by their dignified professionalism.

text: their original calendars showed lovely scenes of the yorkshire dales .
translation: 彼らのオリジナルカレンダーには、ヨークシャーデールの美しい景色が描かれていました。
back_translation: Their original calendar featured beautiful landscapes of the Yorkshire Dales.

text: with utter certainty that druden is the one from butcher 's vision , inez plans their escape to richmond .
translation: ドリューデンが肉屋のビジョンに登場する者であると確信し、イネスはリッチモンドへの逃避行を計画する。
back_translation: Ines, convinced that Druden is one who appears in the butcher's vision, plans an escape to Richmond.

text: with the help of his trusty sidekick cousin anthony , the two venture on a wild adventure to discover the true meaning of christmas .
translation: 信頼できる相棒の従兄弟アンソニーと共に、二人はクリスマスの真の意味を発見するためのワイルドな冒険に出かけます。
back_translation: Together with his reliable partner, his cousin Anthony, they set out on a wild adventure to discover the true meaning of Christmas.

text: in the course of the investigation , he discovers that his own unresolved pain and failures as a father have deeply influenced joey 's life , and now his 18-month-old grandson may be fated to follow their self-destructive paths .
translation: 調査の過程で、彼は自分自身の未解決の痛みと父親としての失敗がジョーイの人生に深く影響を与えていることに気づき、今では彼の18ヶ月の孫が彼らの自己破壊的な道を辿る運命にあるかもしれないことを知る。
back_translation: During the course of the investigation, he realizes that his own unresolved pain and failures as a father have deeply affected Joey's life, and he now understands that his 18-month-old grandson may be destined to follow in their self-destructive path.

text: the splendid ensemble cast inhabits these unglamorous roles with quiet gusto .
translation: 素晴らしいアンサンブルキャストが、これらの地味な役割を静かな熱意で演じています。
back_translation: A wonderful ensemble cast is performing these understated roles with quiet passion.

text: we 're introduced to the duo 's lyrical and melodic craft when , for example , well-known actors recite giants lyrics , underscoring the dark words often coupled with bright tunes .
translation: 私たちは、たとえば有名な俳優が巨人の歌詞を朗読する際に、このデュオの歌詞とメロディの技術に紹介されます。それは、しばしば明るいメロディと結びつけられる暗い言葉を強調しています。
back_translation: We are introduced to the lyrical and melodic techniques of this duo when, for example, a famous actor recites the lyrics of "Giant." It emphasizes the dark words often associated with a bright melody.

text: greengrass has delivered an undoubted stylistic tour-de-force , and has managed elements such as sound and cinematography with skill
translation: グリーングラスは疑いもなくスタイリスティックな傑作を届け、音や撮影技術などの要素を巧みに扱いました。
back_translation: Green Grass undoubtedly delivers a stylistic masterpiece, skillfully handling elements such as sound and cinematography.

text: a young man named owen , who ca n't get over his would-be fiancee and now ex-girlfriend , chloe , who moved to los angeles to become a tv star , finally falls in love with nadine , the girl who would 've been their maid of honor .
translation: オーウェンという若者は、彼の婚約者になりたかった元彼女のクロエを忘れられず、クロエはロサンゼルスに移りテレビスターになろうとしている。最終的に、彼は彼らのメイド・オブ・オナーになったであろうナディーンに恋をする。
back_translation: A young man named Owen is unable to forget his ex-girlfriend Chloe, who wanted to be his fiancée, and Chloe is moving to Los Angeles to become a television star. In the end, he falls in love with Nadine, who would have been their maid of honor.

text: has little on its mind aside from scoring points with drag gags .
translation: ドラッグギャグでポイントを稼ぐこと以外は、あまり考えていない。
back_translation: I haven't thought much about anything other than earning points with drug gags.

text: [ breheny 's ] lensing of the new zealand and cook island locations captures both the beauty of the land and the people .
translation: [ブレヘニーの]ニュージーランドとクック諸島のロケーションのレンズは、土地と人々の美しさの両方を捉えています。
back_translation: The lens of [Brehenny's] locations in New Zealand and the Cook Islands captures the beauty of both the land and the people.

text: the movie has generic virtues , and despite a lot of involved talent , seems done by the numbers .
translation: その映画は一般的な美徳を持っており、多くの才能が関与しているにもかかわらず、手順通りに作られたように見えます。
back_translation: Despite having general virtues and involving many talents, the movie appears to have been made according to procedure.

text: what emerges is not only a portrait of some of the more colorful denizens of mayport , florida , but also a moving examination of the power of art to transform lives .
translation: 浮かび上がるのは、フロリダ州メイポートのより色彩豊かな住人たちの肖像だけでなく、人生を変える芸術の力についての感動的な考察でもあります。
back_translation: What emerges is not only a portrait of the more colorful residents of Mayport, Florida, but also an inspiring reflection on the transformative power of art in life.

text: slow and ponderous , but rohmer 's drama builds to an intense indoor drama about compassion , sacrifice , and christian love in the face of political corruption .
translation: 遅くて重苦しいですが、ローマーのドラマは政治的腐敗に直面した思いやり、犠牲、そしてキリスト教の愛についての激しい室内ドラマへと高まります。
back_translation: Although slow and heavy, the Roman drama escalates into an intense chamber drama about compassion, sacrifice, and Christian love in the face of political corruption.

text: it tells of his life as a bushranger in north-west victoria , where he lived all his life .
translation: 彼の人生について、彼が生涯を過ごした北西ビクトリアでのブッシュレンジャーとしての生活が語られています。
back_translation: His life is narrated in terms of his life as a bushranger in northwest Victoria, where he spent his entire life.

text: not all the fights , just enough to keep the audience , and the money coming back .
translation: すべての戦いではなく、観客を引きつけ、金を戻すために必要なだけ。
back_translation: Not for every battle, but only as much as necessary to attract the audience and bring in the money.

text: biography of brazilian actress odete lara , a sex symbol in theater , television , music , and cinema .
translation: ブラジルの女優オデテ・ララの伝記、彼女は演劇、テレビ、音楽、映画でのセックスシンボルとして知られています。
back_translation: The biography of Brazilian actress Odete Lara, known as a sex symbol in theater, television, music, and film.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of prejudice .
translation: 美しく構築され、残酷に正直な『プロミス』は、偏見の複雑さへの予期しない窓を提供します。
back_translation: "Beautifully crafted and brutally honest, 'Promise' offers an unexpected window into the complexities of prejudice."

text: theirs is a simple and heart-warming story , full of mirth that should charm all but the most cynical .
translation: 彼らの物語はシンプルで心温まるもので、ほぼすべての人を魅了する楽しさが満ちていますが、最も皮肉な人々は除きます。
back_translation: Their story is simple and heartwarming, filled with a charm that captivates almost everyone, except for the most cynical people.

text: this loud and thoroughly obnoxious comedy about a pair of squabbling working-class spouses is a deeply unpleasant experience .
translation: このうるさくて徹底的に不快なコメディは、口論を繰り広げる労働者階級の夫婦に関するもので、非常に不愉快な体験です。
back_translation: This noisy and thoroughly unpleasant comedy is about a working-class couple engaged in arguments, making it a very unpleasant experience.

text: whether you 're moved and love it , or bored or frustrated by the film , you 'll still feel something .
translation: あなたが感動して愛しているのか、退屈しているのか、映画にイライラしているのかに関わらず、何かを感じるでしょう。
back_translation: Whether you are moved and in love, bored, or frustrated with the movie, you will feel something.

text: ricki , a `` lesbian assassin `` , is sent to oversee gigli 's job and make sure he does n't screw it up .
translation: リッキーは「レズビアンの assassin」として、ジグリの仕事を監督し、彼が失敗しないようにするために送り込まれます。
back_translation: Ricky is sent as a "lesbian assassin" to oversee Zigri's work and ensure that he does not fail.

text: it does n't make for great cinema , but it is interesting to see where one 's imagination will lead when given the opportunity .
translation: 素晴らしい映画にはなりませんが、機会を与えられたときに人の想像がどこに導くのかを見るのは興味深いです。
back_translation: It may not be a wonderful movie, but it's interesting to see where human imagination leads when given the opportunity.

text: beginning with the fundamental principle that the exercise of violence against civilian populations is terror , regardless of whether the perpetrator is a well-organized band of muslim extremists , or the most powerful state in the world .
translation: 市民に対する暴力の行使は、加害者が組織化されたイスラム過激派であろうと、世界で最も強力な国家であろうと、テロであるという基本的な原則から始まります。
back_translation: The use of violence against citizens begins with the fundamental principle that it is considered terrorism, whether the perpetrator is an organized Islamic extremist or the most powerful state in the world.

text: the they also find themselves in a battle to hold on to their discovery before it falls into the hands of their rival , fergus wolfe .
translation: 彼らはまた、発見を保つための戦いに直面し、それがライバルのファーガス・ウルフの手に渡る前に守らなければなりません。
back_translation: They also face a battle to preserve their discovery and must protect it before it falls into the hands of their rival, Fergus Wolf.

text: jimmy wayne garrick is bitten by a stray dog one night on his way home and becomes obsessed with the idea that he is becoming a werewolf .
translation: ジミー・ウェイン・ギャリックは、帰宅途中のある夜、野良犬に噛まれ、狼男になるという考えに取り憑かれてしまう。
back_translation: Jimmy Wayne Garrick becomes obsessed with the idea of becoming a werewolf after being bitten by a stray dog one night on his way home.

text: yes , it 's as good as you remember . in fact , even better .
translation: はい、あなたが覚えている通り良いです。実際、さらに良くなっています。
back_translation: Yes, it's good as you remember. In fact, it's even better.

text: this chicago has hugely imaginative and successful casting to its great credit , as well as one terrific score and attitude to spare .
translation: この『シカゴ』は、その素晴らしいキャスティングによって非常に創造的で成功しており、素晴らしいスコアと余裕のある態度も持っています。
back_translation: This "Chicago" is very creative and successful due to its wonderful casting, and it also has a fantastic score and a relaxed attitude.

text: all the well-meaningness in the world ca n't erase the fact that the believer feels like a 12-step program for the jewish nazi .
translation: 世界中の善意があっても、信者がユダヤ人ナチのための12ステッププログラムのように感じる事実は消えない。
back_translation: Even with all the goodwill in the world, the fact that believers feel like a 12-step program for Jewish Nazis does not change.

text: in the summer of 1947 , a mysterious thirteen-year-old girl , accompanied by her mute mother , seemingly appears from nowhere .
translation: 1947年の夏、無口な母親とともに現れた謎の13歳の少女が、どこからともなく現れたように見えます。
back_translation: In the summer of 1947, a mysterious 13-year-old girl appeared alongside her taciturn mother, seeming to come out of nowhere.

text: he asks for the help of his arch-nemesis , dr . hannibal `` the cannibal `` lecter , so that he can be able to catch `` the tooth fairy `` and bring him to justice .
translation: 彼は宿敵であるハンニバル・レクター博士の助けを求め、彼が「トゥースフェアリー」を捕まえて正義に引き渡すことができるようにします。
back_translation: He seeks the help of his arch-enemy, Dr. Hannibal Lecter, so that he can capture the "Tooth Fairy" and bring him to justice.

text: francis , an exceptional artist whose imaginative forays into a fictional universe of good and evil fill his notebooks with comic-book imagery , creates a netherworld of superhero alter egos for the two boys .
translation: フランシスは、善と悪の架空の宇宙への想像力に満ちた探求を通じて、漫画のようなイメージでノートを埋め尽くす卓越したアーティストであり、二人の少年のためにスーパーヒーローの別の人格のネザー・ワールドを創造します。
back_translation: Francis is an outstanding artist who fills notebooks with comic-book-like images through an imaginative exploration of a fictional universe of good and evil, creating a netherworld of a superhero persona for two boys.

text: the lack of naturalness makes everything seem self-consciously poetic and forced . . . it 's a pity that [ nelson 's ] achievement does n't match his ambition .
translation: 自然さの欠如がすべてを自己意識的に詩的で強制的に見せてしまうのは残念だ…[ネルソンの]業績が彼の野心に見合っていないのは悲しいことだ。
back_translation: It's a pity that the lack of naturalness makes everything appear self-consciously poetic and forced... It's sad that [Nelson's] achievements don't match his ambitions.

text: the director has injected self-consciousness into the proceedings at every turn . the results are far more alienating than involving .
translation: 監督はあらゆる場面で自己意識を持ち込んでいます。その結果は、関与するよりもはるかに疎外的です。
back_translation: The director brings self-awareness into every scene. The result is far more alienating than engaging.

text: along the way , the two meet a male fugitive and bond with each other .
translation: その途中で、二人は男性の逃亡者に出会い、絆を深めます。
back_translation: Along the way, the two encounter a male fugitive and deepen their bond.

text: the quirky and recessive charms of co-stars martin donovan and mary-louise parker help overcome the problematic script .
translation: 共演者のマーティン・ドノバンとメアリー＝ルイーズ・パーカーの独特で控えめな魅力が、問題のある脚本を乗り越える手助けをしている。
back_translation: The unique and understated charm of co-stars Martin Donovan and Mary-Louise Parker helps to overcome the problematic script.

text: what began as an audio-visual recording of the nine months of director jacqueline liebman 's pregnancy as she and her boyfriend dealt with the fact that they were totally unprepared as parents .
translation: 監督ジャクリーン・リーブマンの妊娠9ヶ月を音声と映像で記録したものは、彼女と彼女のボーイフレンドが親として何の準備もできていなかったという事実に対処する様子から始まりました。
back_translation: The recording of director Jacqueline Liebman's nine-month pregnancy, captured through audio and video, began by addressing the fact that she and her boyfriend were completely unprepared for parenthood.

text: the actors do n't inhabit their roles -- they 're trapped by them , forced to change behavior in bizarre unjustified fashion and spout dialog that consists mostly of platitudes .
translation: 俳優たちは役を生きているわけではなく、それに囚われている。彼らは奇妙で不当な方法で行動を変えさせられ、主に陳腐なセリフを吐き出すことを余儀なくされている。
back_translation: Actors are not living their roles; they are imprisoned by them. They are made to change their behavior in strange and unjust ways, primarily being forced to utter clichéd lines.

text: it 's very thoughtful and it 's the kind of movie you have to discuss afterwards .
translation: 非常に思慮深い作品で、観た後に話し合うべき映画です。
back_translation: It is a very thoughtful work and a movie that should be discussed after watching.

text: like the excruciating end of days , collateral damage presents schwarzenegger as a tragic figure , but sympathy really belongs with any viewer forced to watch him try out so many complicated facial expressions .
translation: 苦痛に満ちた終末のように、コラテラル・ダメージはシュワルツェネッガーを悲劇的な人物として描いていますが、同情は本当に彼の複雑な表情を試みるのを見なければならない視聴者に帰するべきです。
back_translation: Like a painful apocalypse, collateral damage portrays Schwarzenegger as a tragic figure, but the sympathy should truly belong to the viewers who must witness his complex expressions.

text: just a string of stale gags , with no good inside dope , and no particular bite .
translation: 古くてつまらないギャグの連続で、内部情報も特に良くなく、特別なインパクトもない。
back_translation: A series of old and tiresome jokes, with particularly poor internal information and no special impact.

text: led by the brilliant and sadistic chester lamb , the invaders are surprised to discover sam and the kids from the detention room are still inside the school .
translation: 天才的でサディスティックなチェスター・ラムに率いられ、侵入者たちはサムと拘留室の子供たちがまだ学校の中にいることに驚く。
back_translation: Led by the genius and sadistic Chester Lam, the intruders are surprised to find that Sam and the children in the detention room are still inside the school.

text: a haunted , bountiful film that demands patience -- and rewards it .
translation: 幽霊の出る、豊かな映画で、忍耐を必要とし、それに報いてくれます。
back_translation: A rich film with ghosts that requires patience and rewards it.

text: scott was on his way to work shooting a documentary in midtown manhattan on september 11th .
translation: スコットは9月11日にミッドタウンマンハッタンでドキュメンタリーを撮影するために仕事に向かっていました。
back_translation: Scott was heading to work to film a documentary in Midtown Manhattan on September 11.

text: till the end of time , they will stay that way .
translation: 時間の終わりまで、彼らはそのままでいるでしょう。
back_translation: They will remain as they are until the end of time.

text: it is a dark time for the resistance and skynet is on the verge of going online , the events of the last movie has changed nothing and john must now battle a new terminator called the t-x .
translation: 抵抗軍にとって暗い時代であり、スカイネットはオンラインになる寸前です。前回の映画の出来事は何も変わらず、ジョンは新しいターミネーター「T-X」と戦わなければなりません。
back_translation: It is a dark time for the resistance, and Skynet is about to go online. Nothing has changed since the events of the last movie, and John must fight the new Terminator "T-X."

text: dr singh 's son ( anil kapoor ) stands by his father helping him raise funds for his fathers dream , with the sudden death of dr singh his son falls into a dilemma mainly because of the two ladies involved ( preity zinta & # 38 ; gracy singh ) and his father 's dream that is yet to be fulfilled .
translation: シン博士の息子（アニル・カプール）は、父の夢のために資金を集めるのを手伝っていますが、シン博士の突然の死により、息子はジレンマに陥ります。主に2人の女性（プリヤ・ザンタとグレイシー・シン）が関与しており、父の夢はまだ実現していません。
back_translation: Dr. Shin's son (Anil Kapoor) is helping to raise funds for his father's dream, but after the sudden death of Dr. Shin, the son finds himself in a dilemma. Two main women are involved (Priya Zanta and Gracie Shin), and his father's dream has not yet been realized.

text: they are the only men who are allowed to kill .
translation: 彼らは殺すことを許された唯一の男たちです。
back_translation: They are the only men allowed to kill.

text: after waking up in hell to find out that his mask has been stolen by a dream devil by the name of freddy kruger , he must take revenge .
translation: 地獄で目覚めると、自分のマスクがフレディ・クルーガーという夢の悪魔に盗まれていることに気づく。彼は復讐を果たさなければならない。
back_translation: When I wake up in hell, I realize that my mask has been stolen by Freddy Krueger, the dream demon. I must seek revenge.

text: [ allen 's ] best works understand why snobbery is a better satiric target than middle-america diversions could ever be .
translation: アレンの最高の作品は、スノッブが中流アメリカの気晴らしよりも優れた風刺ターゲットである理由を理解している。
back_translation: Allen's best work understands why snobs are a better target for satire than middle-class American pastimes.

text: thankfully , the film , which skirts that rapidly deteriorating line between fantasy and reality . . . takes a tongue-in-cheek attitude even as it pushes the croc hunter agenda .
translation: ありがたいことに、その映画はファンタジーと現実の急速に悪化する境界線を回避しつつも、クロコダイルハンターのアジェンダを押し進める中で、皮肉な態度をとっています。
back_translation: Fortunately, the film takes an ironic stance while pushing forward the agenda of the Crocodile Hunter, all the while skillfully avoiding the rapidly deteriorating boundaries between fantasy and reality.

text: [ the digital effects ] reminded me of terry gilliam 's rudimentary old monty python cartoons , in which he would cut out figures from drawings and photographs and paste them together .
translation: [デジタル効果]は、テリー・ギリアムの基本的な古いモンティ・パイソンのアニメーションを思い出させた。彼は絵や写真から切り抜いた人物を組み合わせて貼り付けていた。
back_translation: [Digital effects] reminded me of Terry Gilliam's classic old Monty Python animations. He used to combine and paste together cut-out figures from pictures and drawings.

text: while the script starts promisingly , it loses steam towards the middle and never really develops beyond attacking obvious target .
translation: スクリプトは promising に始まるが、中盤で momentum を失い、明白なターゲットを攻撃する以上の発展は決してしない。
back_translation: The script starts off promising but loses momentum in the middle and never develops beyond attacking an obvious target.

text: stuffed to the brim with ideas , american instigator michael moore 's film is a rambling examination of american gun culture that uses his usual modus operandi of crucifixion through juxtaposition .
translation: アイデアでいっぱいのアメリカの扇動者マイケル・ムーアの映画は、アメリカの銃文化をむさぼるように探求したもので、彼のいつもの手法である対比を通じた十字架のような検証を使用しています。
back_translation: Michael Moore's film, filled with ideas, explores America's gun culture voraciously, using his usual method of cross-examination through contrast.

text: making use of homemade steel helmets and chest plates to stop bullets , they committed a series of robberies from 1878-80 , when kelly was captured and hanged in melbourne .
translation: 自家製の鋼鉄のヘルメットと胸当てを使って弾丸を防ぎながら、彼らは1878年から1880年にかけて一連の強盗を犯し、ケリーはメルボルンで捕らえられ絞首刑にされました。
back_translation: Using homemade steel helmets and breastplates to protect themselves from bullets, they committed a series of robberies from 1878 to 1880, and Kelly was captured in Melbourne and hanged.

text: . . . pray does n't have a passion for the material . he nonetheless appreciates the art and reveals a music scene that transcends culture and race .
translation: ...彼は物質に対する情熱を持っていないが、それでもアートを評価し、文化や人種を超えた音楽シーンを明らかにする。
back_translation: ...He does not have a passion for material things, but he still appreciates art and reveals a music scene that transcends culture and race.

text: the last kiss , a crowd-pleaser in the deepest sense , mixes heartbreak and happiness together until you do n't even want to see them apart .
translation: 最後のキスは、深い意味で観客を魅了する作品で、心の痛みと幸せを融合させて、二人が離れるところを見たくなくなります。
back_translation: The last kiss is a work that captivates the audience with its deep meaning, blending the pain of the heart and happiness, making you not want to see the two part ways.

text: then there 's nicole , who gets her orgasmic intimacy watching chan every night .
translation: それから、ニコールがいて、彼女は毎晩チャンを見てオーガズミックな親密感を得ています。
back_translation: Then, there is Nicole, who watches Chan every night and experiences an orgasmic intimacy.
