text: an attorney ( ben affleck ) in a rush to make a court appointment to file legal papers involving a multi-million dollar trust accidentally collides with an alcoholic insurance salesman ( samuel jackson ) , who also is a rush for a court appointment involving the custody of his children .
translation: 弁護士（ベン・アフレック）は、数百万ドルの信託に関する法的書類を提出するために裁判所の予約に急いでいる中、子供の親権に関する裁判所の予約に急いでいるアルコール依存症の保険販売員（サミュエル・ジャクソン）と偶然衝突してしまう。
back_translation: The lawyer (Ben Affleck) is in a hurry to file legal documents related to a multi-million dollar trust when he accidentally collides with an alcohol-dependent insurance salesman (Samuel Jackson) who is rushing to a court appointment regarding child custody.

text: those outside show business will enjoy a close look at people they do n't really want to know .
translation: ショービジネスの外にいる人々は、実際には知りたくない人々を間近で見ることを楽しむでしょう。
back_translation: People outside of show business will enjoy seeing those they actually don't want to know, up close.

text: everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and naturalistic acting .
translation: 誰もが素晴らしい撮影技術と自然な演技を評価できるべきです。
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate wonderful filming techniques and natural acting.

text: originality ai n't on the menu , but there 's never a dull moment in the giant spider invasion comic chiller .
translation: オリジナリティはメニューに載っていないが、巨大なクモの侵略コメディ・スリラーでは決して退屈な瞬間はない。
back_translation: Although originality is not listed on the menu, there is never a boring moment in this giant spider invasion comedy-thriller.

text: unbeknownst to her , the real scoop is much more awesome then even she could write about , should she live to tell .
translation: 彼女が知らないうちに、実際のスcoopは彼女が書けるよりもずっと素晴らしいものであり、もし彼女がそれを語ることができればの話だ。
back_translation: Unbeknownst to her, the actual scoop is much more wonderful than she could write, and this is assuming she could even tell it.

text: jude law co stars as a hit man hired to kill sullivan .
translation: ジュード・ロウはサリバンを殺すために雇われたヒットマンの役を共演します。
back_translation: Jude Law will co-star as a hitman hired to kill Sullivan.

text: each brush stroke brings him inexorably closer to an unknown fate , a fate that is perhaps foretold in the very visions that fuel his work .
translation: それぞれの筆致は、彼を避けられない運命に近づけていく。その運命は、彼の作品を支えるビジョンの中で予言されているのかもしれない。
back_translation: Each brushstroke brings him closer to an unavoidable fate. That fate may be foretold within the vision that supports his works.

text: a filmmaker , fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of russian film pioneer dziga vertov , decides to get a camera eye to replace the real eye he lost as a child .
translation: 映画製作者は、カメラの力に魅了され、ロシアの映画の先駆者ディジガ・ヴェルトフの理論に取り憑かれ、子供の頃に失った本物の目を代わりにカメラの目で置き換えることを決意する。
back_translation: Filmmakers are captivated by the power of the camera, obsessed with the theories of Russian film pioneer Dziga Vertov, and resolve to replace the genuine eye lost in childhood with the eye of the camera.

text: she soon finds out it 's hard to get to know him , or even to get nearby him !
translation: 彼女はすぐに、彼を知るのが難しいこと、さらには彼の近くにいることさえも難しいことに気づきます！
back_translation: She quickly realizes that it's difficult to get to know him, and even being close to him is challenging!

text: a thriller with an edge -- which is to say that it does n't follow the stale , standard , connect-the-dots storyline which has become commonplace in movies that explore the seamy underbelly of the criminal world .
translation: 切れ味のあるスリラーであり、つまり、犯罪の暗い世界を探る映画で一般的になっている古臭く、標準的な「点をつなぐ」ストーリーラインには従っていないということです。
back_translation: It is a sharp thriller that does not follow the outdated and standard "connect the dots" storyline commonly found in films exploring the dark world of crime.

text: it can become even more complicated when the visit is a most unusual homestay with three single , american men with extremely diverse and . . . unique personalities .
translation: それは、非常に多様で…ユニークな個性を持った3人の独身のアメリカ人男性との、非常に珍しいホームステイの訪問であると、さらに複雑になる可能性があります。
back_translation: It could become even more complicated as it is a very rare homestay visit with three single American men who have very diverse and unique personalities.

text: the film 's almost unbearable portrait of sadness and grief transcends its specific story to speak to the ways in which need , history and presumption tangle , and sometimes destroy , blood ties .
translation: 映画のほとんど耐え難い悲しみと喪失の肖像は、特定の物語を超えて、必要、歴史、そして推測が絡まり、時には血縁関係を破壊する方法について語る。
back_translation: The almost unbearable portrait of sadness and loss in the film speaks to how necessity, history, and speculation intertwine beyond a specific story, and at times, how they can destroy familial ties.

text: her all-star cast including nina hartley , kylie ireland , brooke hunter and more , peek at their highest performance levels .
translation: ニナ・ハートレー、カイリー・アイルランド、ブルック・ハンターなどを含む彼女のオールスターキャストは、彼らの最高のパフォーマンスレベルを垣間見ることができます。
back_translation: Her all-star cast, including Nina Hartley, Kylie Ireland, and Brooke Hunter, allows us to catch a glimpse of their highest performance levels.

text: sean , an all go no quit , military driven high school student recieves a video tape of a brutal murder .
translation: ショーンは、決して諦めない軍人のような高校生で、残虐な殺人のビデオテープを受け取る。
back_translation: Sean is a high school student like a soldier who never gives up, and he receives a disturbing videotape of a brutal murder.

text: a retired army colonel and veteran of three wars , rescorla was killed in the september 11 , 2001 attack on the world trade center , during which he saved the lives of thousands of wtc employees at the cost of his own life .
translation: 退役軍人であり、三つの戦争に従軍したレスコーラ大佐は、2001年9月11日の世界貿易センター攻撃で亡くなりました。その際、彼は自らの命を犠牲にしながら、数千人のWTC職員の命を救いました。
back_translation: Colonel Lascor died in the September 11, 2001, attack on the World Trade Center. As a veteran who served in three wars, he sacrificed his own life while saving the lives of thousands of WTC employees.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .
translation: 脚本は非常に書き過ぎで、たくさんのセリフがあり、ほとんどが子供たちに与えられています。
back_translation: The script is very overwritten, with a lot of lines, mostly given to the children.

text: an unremarkable , modern action/comedy buddy movie whose only nod to nostalgia is in the title .
translation: 特に目立たない、現代的なアクション/コメディのバディムービーで、ノスタルジアへの唯一の言及はタイトルにある。
back_translation: It is an unremarkable, modern action/comedy buddy movie, with the only reference to nostalgia found in the title.

text: despite its old-hat set-up and predictable plot , empire still has enough moments to keep it entertaining .
translation: 昔ながらの設定と予測可能なプロットにもかかわらず、『エンパイア』にはまだ楽しませる瞬間が十分にある。
back_translation: Despite its old-fashioned setting and predictable plot, "Empire" still has plenty of moments that entertain.

text: its adult themes of familial separation and societal betrayal are head and shoulders above much of the director 's previous popcorn work .
translation: 家族の分離や社会的裏切りといった大人向けのテーマは、監督の以前の大衆向け作品を大きく凌駕しています。
back_translation: Themes such as family separation and social betrayal, aimed at adults, greatly surpass the director's previous mass-market works.

text: the movie is obviously a labour of love so howard appears to have had free rein to be as pretentious as he wanted .
translation: その映画は明らかに愛情のこもった作品であり、ハワードは好きなだけ気取った演出をする自由を与えられたようです。
back_translation: That movie is clearly a labor of love, and it seems that Howard was given the freedom to be as pretentious in his direction as he liked.

text: he has had no formal education , but on his own , he systematically studies western theories of industrial management and such classical chinese philosophies as confucianism , taoism , and suntzu .
translation: 彼は正式な教育を受けたことはないが、自分自身で西洋の産業管理理論や儒教、道教、孫子などの古典的な中国哲学を体系的に研究している。
back_translation: He has never received formal education, but he has systematically studied Western industrial management theories, Confucianism, Taoism, and classical Chinese philosophy such as Sun Tzu on his own.

text: the three leads produce adequate performances , but what 's missing from this material is any depth of feeling .
translation: 三人の主演者は十分な演技を見せていますが、今回の素材には感情の深みが欠けています。
back_translation: The three main performers showcase sufficient acting, but this material lacks emotional depth.

text: straight up : helicopters in action will take audiences on a series of aerial adventures .
translation: ストレートアップ：ヘリコプターのアクションは、観客を一連の空中冒険へと導きます。
back_translation: Straight Up: The helicopter action takes the audience on a series of aerial adventures.

text: shankman . . . and screenwriter karen janszen bungle their way through the narrative as if it were a series of bible parables and not an actual story .
translation: シャンクマンと脚本家カレン・ジャンゼンは、実際の物語ではなく、聖書のたとえ話のシリーズであるかのように、物語をぶち壊して進んでいく。
back_translation: Shankman and screenwriter Karen Janszen move forward as if the story is a series of biblical parables rather than an actual narrative.

text: visually imaginative , thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful , it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality .
translation: 視覚的に想像力豊かで、テーマ的に教訓的、そして徹底的に楽しいこの作品は、典型的な子供向け映画の感傷的な要素を一切感じさせることなく、無邪気から経験へと私たちをローラーコースターのような旅へと連れ出します。
back_translation: This work, visually imaginative, thematically instructive, and thoroughly enjoyable, takes us on a rollercoaster-like journey from innocence to experience without evoking any of the sentimental elements typical of children's films.

text: brilliantly captures the brightness of the light , the intensity of the colors and the omnipresence of mexican motifs that informed kahlo 's art .
translation: 光の明るさ、色の強さ、カフロの芸術に影響を与えたメキシコのモチーフの遍在を見事に捉えています。
back_translation: It beautifully captures the brightness of light, the intensity of color, and the prevalence of Mexican motifs that influenced the art of Kahlo.

text: after taking a look at the people around her and examining her life 's choices , lucy decides that it would be unfair to give up this baby just because she did n't do what she wanted to with her own life .
translation: 周りの人々を見て、自分の人生の選択を振り返ったルーシーは、自分の望んでいたことを実現できなかったからといって、この赤ちゃんを手放すのは不公平だと決心します。
back_translation: Looking at the people around her and reflecting on her life choices, Lucy decides that it would be unfair to give up this baby just because she couldn't achieve what she wanted.

text: director and co-writer hilary birmingham 's maiden featureM-^E is a strong , polished , professional indie effort that bodes well for bigger success .
translation: 監督兼共同脚本家のヒラリー・バーミンガムのデビュー作は、力強く洗練されたプロフェッショナルな独立系作品であり、今後のさらなる成功を期待させるものです。
back_translation: The debut work of director and co-screenwriter Hilary Birmingham is a powerful and sophisticated professional independent film that promises further success in the future.

text: like most of godard 's films , in praise of love makes you stay awake and lean forward .
translation: ゴダールの映画の多くと同様に、『愛の賛美』はあなたを目を覚まし、前のめりにさせます。
back_translation: Like many of Godard's films, "Praise of Love" wakes you up and makes you lean forward.

text: she 's aided by his faithful bodyguard , with whom she soon falls in love .
translation: 彼女は忠実なボディーガードの助けを受けており、彼とすぐに恋に落ちます。
back_translation: She receives help from her loyal bodyguard and soon falls in love with him.

text: in this playful and rollicking swashbuckler , drag king pirates take to the high seas on a quest to restore stolen treasures .
translation: この陽気で楽しい海賊物語では、ドラッグキングの海賊たちが、奪われた宝物を取り戻すために大海原に乗り出します。
back_translation: In this cheerful and fun pirate story, the drag queen pirates set sail across the high seas to reclaim their stolen treasure.

text: it follows and in some cases re-enacts the chronology of shepherd 's visit to a local bar , his kidnap and beating , the discovery of him tied to a fence , the vigil at the hospital , his death and funeral , and the trial of his killers .
translation: それは、ある場合には羊飼いの地元のバーへの訪問、彼の誘拐と暴行、フェンスに縛られている彼の発見、病院での見守り、彼の死と葬儀、そして彼の殺人者の裁判の年代記を追い、再現します。
back_translation: It chronicles the visit to a local bar by a shepherd in some cases, his abduction and assault, his discovery tied to a fence, the vigil at the hospital, his death and funeral, and the trial of his murderer.

text: taylor williams iii , a wealthy seventeen year old meets his dream `` lavender `` girl ( mandi carson , who comes from a lower-middle class ) for the very first time at mr . dodson 's business education class at seaport-greene high school .
translation: テイラー・ウィリアムズ三世は、裕福な17歳で、夢の「ラベンダー」ガール（下層中産階級出身のマンディ・カーソン）とシーポート・グリーン高等学校のダッドソン氏のビジネス教育クラスで初めて出会います。
back_translation: Taylor Williams III, a wealthy 17-year-old, first meets his dream "Lavender" girl (Mandy Carson, from a lower-middle-class background) in Mr. Dodson's business education class at Seaport Green High School.

text: a heady , biting , be-bop ride through nighttime manhattan , a loquacious videologue of the modern male and the lengths to which he 'll go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego .
translation: 頭がクラクラするような、刺激的なビバップの旅、夜のマンハッタンを通り抜ける、現代の男性についての多弁なビデオログと、彼が自らのエゴを守るためにどこまで行くかの長さ。
back_translation: A dizzying and exhilarating bebop journey, passing through the night of Manhattan, featuring an eloquent video log about a modern man and the lengths he will go to protect his own ego.

text: it looks good , but it is essentially empty .
translation: 見た目は良いですが、実質的には空っぽです。
back_translation: It looks good, but is essentially empty.

text: this includes never-before-seen images of tests of modified v-1s at point mugu naval air station , and the flight test program for regulus at edwards air force base in 1950 .
translation: これには、ポイントムーグ海軍航空基地での改良型V-1のテストの前例のない画像や、1950年にエドワーズ空軍基地でのレグラスの飛行テストプログラムが含まれています。
back_translation: This includes unprecedented images of the improved V-1 testing at Point Mugu Naval Air Station, as well as the Regulus flight test program at Edwards Air Force Base in 1950.

text: as dex prepares to do battle with herb , he must also deal with all the intricacies it takes to make a relationship work .
translation: デックスがハーブと戦う準備をする中、彼は関係を築くために必要なすべての複雑さにも対処しなければならない。
back_translation: As Dex prepares to fight Herb, he must also deal with all the complexities necessary to build relationships.

text: as shaky as the plot is , kaufman 's script is still memorable for some great one-liners .
translation: プロットは不安定ですが、カウフマンの脚本は素晴らしいワンライナーでまだ記憶に残ります。
back_translation: The plot is unstable, but Kaufman's script is still memorable with its wonderful one-liners.

text: in the end , the movie bogs down in insignificance , saying nothing about kennedy 's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it pretends to investigate .
translation: 結局、この映画は取るに足らないもので終わり、ケネディの暗殺について何も言わず、調査を pretendしている病理について何も明らかにしません。
back_translation: In the end, this movie concludes as insignificant, saying nothing about Kennedy's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology that pretends to investigate it.

text: one of the most depressing movie-going experiences i can think of is to sit through about 90 minutes of a so-called 'comedy ' and not laugh once .
translation: 私が思いつく中で最も憂鬱な映画鑑賞体験の一つは、いわゆる「コメディ」を約90分間見て、一度も笑わないことです。
back_translation: One of the most depressing movie-watching experiences I can think of is watching a so-called "comedy" for about 90 minutes without laughing once.

text: the cousins work nights at a local mall as security guards .
translation: いとこたちは地元のモールで夜間に警備員として働いています。
back_translation: My cousins work as security guards at the local mall at night.

text: armed with a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills , with marie by his side , bourne scours paris for clues about his identity and past life . . .
translation: お金の入ったバッグと謎の武道のスキルを持ち、マリーを伴って、ボーンは自分のアイデンティティと過去の生活に関する手がかりを求めてパリを探索します。。。
back_translation: With a bag full of money and mysterious martial arts skills, Bourne, accompanied by Marie, explores Paris in search of clues about his identity and past life...

text: with only a few weapons and time running out , they take shelter in an ancient house , inside which they will uncover the secrets of the `` house of the dead . ``
translation: 武器がわずかしかなく、時間も迫っている中で、彼らは古い家に身を隠し、そこで「死者の家」の秘密を明らかにすることになる。
back_translation: With only a few weapons and time running out, they hide in an old house, where they uncover the secrets of the "House of the Dead."

text: although the editing might have been tighter , hush ! sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of young people in modern japan .
translation: 編集がもう少し厳密であったならよかったかもしれませんが、『ハッシュ！』は現代日本における若者たちのしばしば無駄に思えるライフスタイルを共感を持って捉えています。
back_translation: It might have been better if the editing had been a little more rigorous, but "Hash!" empathetically captures the often seemingly futile lifestyles of young people in modern Japan.

text: chicago glorifies murder , glamorizes sex & death -- in other words it is just right for today 's unsunny times .
translation: シカゴは殺人を称賛し、性と死を美化する。言い換えれば、今日の晴れない時代にぴったりの作品だ。
back_translation: Chicago glorifies murder and romanticizes sex and death. In other words, it's a perfect work for today's dismal times.

text: at no point during k-19 : the widowmaker did this viewer feel enveloped in a story that , though meant to be universal in its themes of loyalty , courage and dedication to a common goal , never seems to leave the lot .
translation: K-19 : ザ・ウィドウメーカーの間、観客である私は、忠誠心、勇気、共通の目標への献身といった普遍的なテーマを持ちながらも、決して場外に出ないストーリーの中に包まれることはありませんでした。
back_translation: During K-19: The Widowmaker, I, as a member of the audience, was never enveloped in a story that, while containing universal themes such as loyalty, courage, and dedication to a common goal, never ventured outside the bounds.

text: i was hoping that it would be sleazy and fun , but it was neither .
translation: 私はそれがいやらしくて楽しいものになることを期待していましたが、どちらでもありませんでした。
back_translation: I was hoping it would be something naughty and fun, but it was neither.

text: the egyptian queen cleopatra bets against the roman emperor , julius caesar , that her people are still great , even if the times of the pharaohs has long passed .
translation: エジプトの女王クレオパトラは、ローマ帝国の皇帝ジュリアス・シーザーに賭けます。彼女の民は、ファラオの時代がとっくに過ぎ去った今でも偉大であると。
back_translation: Queen Cleopatra of Egypt bets on Julius Caesar, the emperor of the Roman Empire. Her people believe that even now, long after the era of the pharaohs has passed, she is still great.

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .
translation: それは exuberance（熱狂）と情熱でその魔法をかけ、映画の長さが楽しさの一部となる。
back_translation: It casts its magic with exuberance and passion, making the length of the movie part of the enjoyment.

text: series of 12 short movies from the start of the twentieth century , compiled by michel reilhac .
translation: 20世紀初頭の短編映画12作品のシリーズ、ミシェル・レイラクによって編纂されました。
back_translation: A series of 12 short films from the early 20th century, compiled by Michel Reilhac.

text: this bold and lyrical first feature from raja amari expands the pat notion that middle-aged women just wan na have fun into a rousing treatise of sensual empowerment .
translation: ラジャ・アマリのこの大胆で詩的な初の長編映画は、中年女性がただ楽しみたいという従来の考えを、官能的なエンパワーメントに関する感動的な論文へと広げています。
back_translation: Raja Amari's bold and poetic debut feature film expands the conventional notion that middle-aged women simply want to enjoy themselves into an emotional treatise on sensual empowerment.

text: atanarjuat , unfolding on a cold-blasted primeval arctic plain , has the quality of totem .
translation: アタナリュアットは、冷たい吹きさらしの原始的な北極の平原で展開され、トーテムの特性を持っています。
back_translation: The Atanaluyat unfolds in the cold, windswept primitive Arctic plains and possesses the characteristics of a totem.

text: . it 's a brilliant revision of the book and it offers a motivation for the invention that 's lacking in the first film version .
translation: それは本の素晴らしい改訂であり、第一作の映画版には欠けていた発明の動機を提供しています。
back_translation: It is a wonderful revision of the book and provides the motivation for the inventions that was lacking in the film adaptation of the first work.

text: the country bears has no scenes that will upset or frighten young viewers . unfortunately , there is almost nothing in this flat effort that will amuse or entertain them , either .
translation: 「カントリーベアーズ」には、若い視聴者を upset や frighten させるシーンはありません。しかし、残念ながら、この平凡な作品には彼らを楽しませたり、アメューズさせたりするものもほとんどありません。
back_translation: "There are no scenes in 'Country Bears' that would upset or frighten young viewers. However, unfortunately, this mediocre work also has very little to entertain or amuse them."

text: austin powers in goldmember is a cinematic car wreck , a catastrophic collision of tastelessness and gall that nevertheless will leave fans clamoring for another ride .
translation: オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバーは、映画的な車の事故であり、無味乾燥さと大胆さの壊滅的な衝突ですが、それにもかかわらずファンはもう一度の乗車を求めることでしょう。
back_translation: Austin Powers: Goldmember is a cinematic car crash, a devastating clash of blandness and audacity, yet fans will likely call for another ride.

text: as the strange thefts escalate , detective phil barbara ( gale harold ) is assigned to the case and is soon on chep and fran 's trail .
translation: 奇妙な盗難がエスカレートする中、探偵フィル・バーバラ（ゲイル・ハロルド）がこの事件を担当し、すぐにチェップとフランの追跡を始める。
back_translation: As strange thefts escalate, detective Phil Barber (Gale Harold) takes on the case and quickly begins the pursuit of Chep and Fran.

text: let 's hope -- shall we ? -- that the 'true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired `` was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: そう願いましょう -- どうですか？ -- 女王の男たちが「インスパイア」されたとされる「真実の物語」は、画面に繕われたものよりもずっと面白くて巧妙に演じられていたことを。
back_translation: Let's hope so -- what do you think? -- The "true story" that the queen's men are said to have been "inspired" by was much more interesting and cleverly performed than what was depicted on screen.

text: when they come through , will is left with a decision .
translation: 彼らが来るとき、ウィルは決断を残されます。
back_translation: When they come, Will is left with a decision.

text: imagine the cleanflicks version of 'love story , ' with ali macgraw 's profanities replaced by romance-novel platitudes .
translation: アリ・マクグローの不適切な言葉がロマンティックな小説の常套句に置き換えられた『ラブストーリー』のクリーンフリックス版を想像してみてください。
back_translation: Imagine a clean version of "Love Story" where Ali MacGraw's inappropriate words are replaced with clichés from romantic novels.

text: at first , it seems like a great place to hideout but soon they find themselves smack dab in the center of a family that gives a whole new definition to the word crazy and makes them think that maybe they 'd be better off with the mob .
translation: 最初は隠れ家として素晴らしい場所のように思えますが、すぐに彼らは狂気という言葉に新しい定義を与える家族の中心にいることを発見し、もしかしたらマフィアと一緒にいた方が良かったのかもしれないと思うようになります。
back_translation: At first, it seems like a wonderful place as a hideout, but soon they find themselves at the center of a family that redefines the word "madness," and they start to think that perhaps it would have been better to be with the mafia.

text: tom , a spaniard , is married to sylvie and lives a quiet but a bit boring life in the britanny countryside ( west of france ) .
translation: トムはスペイン人で、シルビーと結婚しており、フランス西部のブルターニュ地方で静かだけど少し退屈な生活を送っています。
back_translation: Tom is Spanish, married to Sylvie, and living a quiet but somewhat boring life in the Brittany region of western France.

text: as jake and sam bicker throughout their trek across majestic india , they find kabir , a museum curator who possesses an artifact which he claims can produce the musical tone required to open the door to the temple .
translation: ジェイクとサムが壮大なインドを横断している間、彼らは博物館のキュレーターであるカビールを見つけます。彼は寺の扉を開くために必要な音楽の音を生み出すことができると主張する遺物を持っています。
back_translation: While Jake and Sam are traversing the grand India, they encounter Kabir, a museum curator. He possesses an artifact that he claims can generate the sounds of music needed to open the temple doors.

text: yet , one rare pok & # 233 ; mon is n't safe without help from another - thus enters suicune , a . k . a . the north wind .
translation: しかし、1匹の希少なポケモンは他のポケモンの助けなしでは安全ではない - そこにスイクン、別名北の風が登場する。
back_translation: However, a rare Pokémon is not safe without the help of other Pokémon - that’s where Suicune, also known as the North Wind, comes in.

text: its plot and animation offer daytime tv serviceability , but little more .
translation: そのプロットとアニメーションは昼間のテレビサービスとしては機能しますが、それ以上のものはありません。
back_translation: The plot and animation function as daytime television service, but nothing more than that.

text: throughout the rest of the movie , the two never got along , whereas mitch is trying to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal who possesses a mythical `` big gun `` that has enough firepower to collapse a house , while trey just wants to be famous .
translation: 映画の残りの間、二人は全く仲良くならず、ミッチは神話的な「ビッグガン」を持つ犯罪者の行方を調査しようと努力している一方、トレイはただ有名になりたいと思っている。
back_translation: During the remainder of the movie, the two do not get along at all. Mitch is trying to investigate the whereabouts of the mythical criminal known as the "Big Gun," while Tray simply wants to become famous.

text: under the queen 's wrathful gaze , tops are bottomed , tranny sailors seduce pirate captains , kings are mothers and cross-dressing femmes pack a wallop .
translation: 女王の怒りの視線の下で、トップはボトムになり、トランスセイラーは海賊のキャプテンを誘惑し、王は母となり、クロスドレッシングの女性たちは力強さを発揮する。
back_translation: Under the queen's angry gaze, the top becomes the bottom, the trans sailor seduces the pirate captain, the king becomes a mother, and the cross-dressing women show their strength.

text: heidi , now living in tennessee - a married woman with kids - had always dreamt of a joyful reunion .
translation: テネシーに住むハイディは、子供のいる既婚女性で、いつも楽しい再会を夢見ていました。
back_translation: Heidi, who lives in Tennessee, is a married woman with children, and she always dreamed of a joyful reunion.

text: the importance of being earnest , so thick with wit it plays like a reading from bartlett 's familiar quotations
translation: 真剣であることの重要性、それは機知に満ちており、バートレットの名言集の朗読のように感じられる。
back_translation: The importance of being serious; it feels witty, like a reading from Bartlett's familiar quotations.

text: mayhem and comedy explode as several members find price attractive while price struggles for his sanity .
translation: 混乱とコメディが爆発し、数人のメンバーがプライスを魅力的だと感じる一方で、プライスは正気を保とうと奮闘します。
back_translation: Chaos and comedy explode, with some members finding Price attractive while Price struggles to maintain sanity.

text: as commander-in-chief of this film , bigelow demonstrates a breadth of vision and an attention to detail that propels her into the upper echelons of the directing world .
translation: この映画の最高責任者として、ビッグローは広い視野と細部への注意を示し、監督の世界の上位に彼女を押し上げています。
back_translation: As the top person in charge of this film, Biglow demonstrates a broad perspective and attention to detail, elevating her above the world of directors.

text: the acting , costumes , music , cinematography and sound are all astounding given the production 's austere locales .
translation: 演技、衣装、音楽、撮影、音響はすべて素晴らしく、制作の厳しいロケーションを考えると特に印象的です。
back_translation: The acting, costumes, music, cinematography, and sound are all wonderful, and it's particularly impressive considering the challenging locations of the production.

text: meanwhile , wolverine heads north to investigate his past .
translation: その間、ウルヴァリンは自分の過去を調査するために北へ向かいます。
back_translation: During that time, Wolverine heads north to investigate his past.

text: the daughter mary yearns for a home where the books do n't always get sold .
translation: 娘のメアリーは、本がいつも売れない家を求めている。
back_translation: My daughter Mary is always looking for a house that doesn't sell.

text: although rampant unemployment , alcoholism and domestic violence are the norm for many reservation inhabitants , rudy has largely escaped this cycle of despair .
translation: 多くの居留地の住民にとって失業率の高騰、アルコール依存症、家庭内暴力が一般的であるにもかかわらず、ルディは主にこの絶望のサイクルから逃れてきました。
back_translation: Despite the high unemployment rates, alcohol dependence, and domestic violence being common among many residents of the settlement, Rudy has primarily escaped this cycle of despair.

text: this is n't a terrible film by any means , but it 's also far from being a realized work .
translation: これは全くひどい映画ではありませんが、完成した作品からは程遠いものでもあります。
back_translation: This is not a terrible movie at all, but it is far from a completed work.

text: jordan is a mom who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: ジョーダンは、彼女のただ一人の子供を不正から守ろうとしている中で、真の信仰を求める生涯の旅をしている母親です。
back_translation: Jordan is a mother on a lifelong journey seeking true faith while trying to protect her only child from wrongful acts.

text: a flawed film but an admirable one that tries to immerse us in a world of artistic abandon and political madness and very nearly succeeds .
translation: 欠点のある映画だが、芸術の放逸と政治的狂気の世界に私たちを没入させようと試みており、ほぼ成功している賞賛に値する作品である。
back_translation: It is a flawed film, but it is a commendable work that attempts to immerse us in the world of artistic extravagance and political madness, and it almost succeeds.

text: `` cold mountain `` tells the story of a wounded confederate soldier named inman ( jude law ) who struggles on a perilous journey to get back home to cold mountain , n . c . as well as to ada ( nicole kidman ) , the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the civil war .
translation: 「コールド マウンテン」は、南部連合の傷を負った兵士インマン（ジュード・ロウ）が、ノースカロライナ州のコールド マウンテンへ帰るための危険な旅をしながら、南北戦争に出かける前に置いてきた女性アダ（ニコール・キッドマン）への思いを描いています。
back_translation: "Cold Mountain" tells the story of Inman (Jude Law), a soldier wounded in the Confederate army, as he embarks on a dangerous journey to return to Cold Mountain in North Carolina, reflecting on his feelings for Ada (Nicole Kidman), the woman he left behind before going off to the Civil War.

text: finally paula , who ran away from home and got pregnant , is now in a relationship she does n't want .
translation: 結局、家を逃げ出して妊娠したポーラは、今は望んでいない関係にあります。
back_translation: In the end, Paula, who escaped from home and got pregnant, is now in an unwanted relationship.

text: but all is not smooth in the rockies , as their relationship accelerates - cultural differences , family issues , former loves and life-altering challenges threaten to shake things up .
translation: しかし、ロッキー山脈ではすべてが順調ではなく、彼らの関係が進展する中で、文化の違いや家族の問題、昔の恋愛、人生を変えるような課題が状況を揺るがす脅威となっている。
back_translation: However, in the Rocky Mountains, not everything is going smoothly, and as their relationship develops, cultural differences, family issues, past romances, and life-changing challenges become threatening disruptions to the situation.

text: some of the most inventive silliness you are likely to witness in a movie theatre for some time .
translation: 映画館でしばらく目にすることになるであろう、最も創造的なくだらなさのいくつか。
back_translation: Some of the most creative nonsense that you will likely see in theaters for a while.

text: on the very day lizzy finds out she 's pregnant , she also finds herself the unwitting subject of a twisted television expos & # 233 ; perpetrated by the new world standard of unethical journalism : hardcore action news .
translation: リジーが妊娠していることを知ったその日、彼女はまた、新しい世界基準の非倫理的なジャーナリズムであるハードコアアクションニュースによって、意図せずに歪んだテレビの告発の対象となってしまう。
back_translation: On the day Lizzie discovered she was pregnant, she inadvertently became the subject of a distorted television exposé by Hardcore Action News, a new world standard of unethical journalism.

text: the movie is undone by a filmmaking methodology that 's just experimental enough to alienate the mainstream audience while ringing cliched to hardened indie-heads .
translation: その映画は、主流の観客を遠ざけるには十分に実験的でありながら、古典的すぎる方法論によって台無しになっています。
back_translation: The movie is experimental enough to alienate mainstream audiences, yet it is ruined by overly classical methodologies.

text: harks back to a time when movies had more to do with imagination than market research .
translation: 映画が市場調査よりも想像力にもっと関連していた時代を思い起こさせる。
back_translation: It reminds me of a time when movies were more related to imagination than market research.

text: `` ox `` anderson , much greener , is also getting the same new task : protect the navajo codetalkers ( ben yahzee and charles whitehorse , respectively ) .
translation: オックス・アンダーソンは、はるかに緑豊かで、同じ新しい任務を受けています：ナバホのコーデトーカー（ベン・ヤジーとチャールズ・ホワイトホース）を守ることです。
back_translation: Ox Anderson is tasked with a much greener and the same new mission: to protect the Navajo code talkers, Ben Yazzie and Charles Whitehorse.

text: but despite his looks of francis , he indeed is henry ( timothy bottoms ) , a man with a much better character than patricia ever could have dreamt of .
translation: しかしフランシスの見た目に反して、彼は確かにヘンリー（ティモシー・ボトムズ）であり、パトリシアが夢見たこともないようなはるかに優れた性格の持ち主である。
back_translation: However, contrary to Francis's appearance, he is certainly Henry (Timothy Bottoms) and possesses a far superior character than Patricia could have ever dreamed of.

text: holy mad maniac in a mask , splat-man ! good old-fashioned slash-and-hack is back !
translation: マスクをつけた神聖な狂人、スプラットマン！昔ながらのスラッシュ＆ハックが戻ってきた！
back_translation: The masked sacred madman, Splattman! The classic slash and hack is back!

text: a weaving trail of twists and turns that left people unsettled for two generations until investigative persistence aided by modern technology brings justice for a young mother and her family some 28 years later .
translation: ねじれと曲がりくねった織りなす道が、人々を不安にさせてから2世代続き、現代のテクノロジーによる調査の執念が28年後に若い母親とその家族に正義をもたらす。
back_translation: The twisted and winding paths have made people uneasy for two generations, and the determination for investigation through modern technology brings justice to a young mother and her family 28 years later.

text: clerick john preston ( bale ) is a top ranking government agent responsible for destroying those who resist the rules .
translation: クレリック・ジョン・プレストン（ベイル）は、ルールに抵抗する者たちを排除する責任を負うトップランクの政府エージェントです。
back_translation: Cleric John Preston (Bale) is a top-ranking government agent responsible for eliminating those who resist the rules.

text: then one night when he 's up in his mom 's loft , a dead famous comedian appears who tells pauly to kill himself cause he 'll go down as a comedic genius who died before his time .
translation: ある晩、彼が母親のロフトにいると、亡くなった有名なコメディアンが現れ、ポーリーに自殺するように言う。そうすれば、彼は時代を先取りしたコメディの天才として知られることになるだろうと。
back_translation: One night, while he was in his mother's loft, a deceased famous comedian appeared and told Paulie to commit suicide. He said that by doing so, Paulie would be known as a genius of comedy who was ahead of his time.

text: dantes is imprisoned on the island prison of chateau d'lf for 13 years , where he plots revenge against those who betrayed him .
translation: ダンテスは、彼を裏切った者たちへの復讐を企てながら、シャトー・ディフの島の監獄に13年間囚われています。
back_translation: Dantes is imprisoned in the Château d'If for 13 years, plotting his revenge against those who betrayed him.

text: a woman who is again able to reach out for love .
translation: 再び愛を求めることができる女性。
back_translation: A woman who can seek love again.

text: they have fallen on hard times and are now working jobs outside of show business to make ends meet .
translation: 彼らは困難な時期に直面しており、生活を支えるためにエンターテインメント業界の外で仕事をしています。
back_translation: They are facing difficult times and are working outside the entertainment industry to support their livelihood.

text: dejected , schmitz discovers robert stephens , a young , gay britney impersonator .
translation: 落ち込んだシュミッツは、若いゲイのブリトニーの偽者ロバート・スティーブンスを見つける。
back_translation: Downcast Schmitz finds the young gay impersonator Robert Stevens, who is pretending to be Britney.

text: where as many films of this nature linger on the hard , the ugly , the blood , or just the stylistic ; empire focuses on the thinking , the love , and even the light-heartedness , as well as the violence .
translation: この種の多くの映画がハード、醜い、血、または単にスタイルにこだわるのに対し、エンパイアは思考、愛、さらには軽妙さ、そして暴力に焦点を当てています。
back_translation: While many films of this kind focus on being hard, ugly, bloody, or simply stylish, Empire centers on thought, love, and even lightness, alongside violence.

text: she gets quite curious about this man , who is not like anyone she 's ever met before .
translation: 彼女は今まで出会ったことがないようなこの男性にとても好奇心を持ちます。
back_translation: She is very curious about this man, whom she has never encountered before.

text: all kinds of animals begin immigrating to the south , seeking more warm climates .
translation: あらゆる種類の動物が南に移動し、より温暖な気候を求め始めます。
back_translation: All kinds of animals begin to move south in search of a warmer climate.

text: there are many things that solid acting can do for a movie , but crafting something promising from a mediocre screenplay is not one of them .
translation: 優れた演技が映画に成し得ることは多々ありますが、平凡な脚本から期待できるものを作り出すことはその一つではありません。
back_translation: There are many things that excellent performances can achieve in a film, but creating something expected from a mediocre script is one of them.

text: it will make you think twice about what might be going on inside each trailer park you drive past -- even if it chiefly inspires you to drive a little faster .
translation: それは、あなたが通り過ぎる各トレーラーパークの内部で何が起こっているのかについて二度考えさせるでしょう -- たとえそれが主にあなたを少し早く運転させるインスピレーションを与えるとしても。
back_translation: It will make you think twice about what is happening inside each trailer park you pass by -- even if it mainly just inspires you to drive a little faster.

text: the hand that eluded him his entire life , the one that held the cigarettes , and the hand he will never hold again .
translation: 彼の人生の全てを逃れた手、タバコを持っていた手、そして彼が二度と持つことのない手。
back_translation: The hand that escaped everything in his life, the hand that held a cigarette, and the hand that he would never hold again.

text: shortly after the arrival of the rehab escapees , luck shoots and kills salo jr . and his wife .
translation: リハビリから逃げた者たちが到着した直後、ラッキーはサロ・ジュニアと彼の妻を撃って殺します。
back_translation: Immediately after those who fled from rehabilitation arrived, Lucky shot and killed Saro Junior and his wife.

text: a reasonably efficient mechanism , but it offers few surprises and finds its stars slumming in territory they should have avoided .
translation: 合理的に効率的なメカニズムだが、驚くべき点は少なく、スターたちが避けるべき領域でのスラム生活をしている。
back_translation: It is a rational and efficient mechanism, but there are few surprising aspects, and the stars are living in slums in areas they should avoid.

text: in dogville trier works extensively with light , sound , score and music to obtain and heighten dramatic atmosphere .
translation: 「ドッグヴィル」では、トリアーは光、音、スコア、音楽を駆使して劇的な雰囲気を得るとともに高めています。
back_translation: In "Dogville," Trier utilizes light, sound, score, and music to create and enhance a dramatic atmosphere.

text: by embracing the original series ' tacky elements and inserting just enough self-mockery to avoid smugness , the movie manages to fulfill basic expectations .
translation: オリジナルシリーズの「ダサい要素」を受け入れ、自己揶揄を適度に挿入することで、映画は基本的な期待を満たすことに成功しています。
back_translation: By embracing the "lame elements" of the original series and moderately inserting self-deprecating humor, the film succeeds in meeting basic expectations.

text: a young man ( keanu reeves ) plays a doctor caring for a man ( nicholson ) , who suffers a heart attack at the house of his young girlfriend 's mother ( keaton ) .
translation: 若い男性（キアヌ・リーブス）が、彼の若いガールフレンドの母親（ダイアン・キートン）の家で心臓発作を起こした男性（ジャック・ニコルソン）を手当てする医者を演じます。
back_translation: A young man (Keanu Reeves) plays a doctor who tends to a man (Jack Nicholson) who has a heart attack at the home of his young girlfriend's mother (Diane Keaton).

text: if you have an uneasy tummy , this movie is not for you !
translation: お腹の調子が悪いなら、この映画はあなたには向いていません！
back_translation: If your stomach isn't feeling well, this movie is not for you!

text: it 's about issues most adults have to face in marriage and i think that 's what i liked about it -- the real issues tucked between the silly and crude storyline .
translation: それは、ほとんどの大人が結婚生活で直面する問題についてであり、それが私が気に入った点だと思います。くだらないや下品なストーリーラインの間に隠れた本当の問題です。
back_translation: It is about the issues that most adults face in married life, and I think that's what I liked about it. It hides real problems among silly or vulgar storylines.

text: a diverse and astonishingly articulate cast of palestinian and israeli children .
translation: 多様で驚くほど表現力豊かなパレスチナ人とイスラエル人の子供たちのキャスト。
back_translation: A cast of diverse and astonishingly expressive Palestinian and Israeli children.

text: but , disaster strikes , when val goes temporarily blind , due to paranoia .
translation: しかし、妄想のせいでヴァルが一時的に失明したとき、災害が襲います。
back_translation: However, a disaster strikes when Val temporarily goes blind due to delusions.

text: after a number of failed attempts , they finally arrive by boat and stumble across a german radar station .
translation: いくつかの失敗を経て、彼らはついにボートで到着し、ドイツのレーダー局に出くわします。
back_translation: After going through several failures, they finally arrive by boat and encounter the German radar station.

text: patricia gets increasingly unhappy within the materialistic las vegas scene .
translation: パトリシアは物質主義的なラスベガスの雰囲気の中でますます不幸を感じる。
back_translation: Patricia increasingly feels unhappy in the materialistic atmosphere of Las Vegas.

text: mr . deeds is not really a film as much as it is a loose collection of not-so-funny gags , scattered moments of lazy humor .
translation: 「ミスター・デーズ」は、実際には映画というよりも、あまり面白くないギャグの緩いコレクションや、怠惰なユーモアの散発的な瞬間の集まりです。
back_translation: "Mr. Days" is actually more of a loose collection of not very funny gags or a gathering of sporadic moments of lazy humor, rather than a movie.

text: the more he digs , the more evidence he finds that the overdose may have been attempted murder .
translation: 彼が掘れば掘るほど、薬物過剰摂取が殺人未遂であった可能性を示す証拠が見つかる。
back_translation: The more he digs, the more evidence is found suggesting that the drug overdose may have been attempted murder.

text: in prospect bay , a remote outpost on the south australian coast , two communities , the goonyas ( whites ) and the nungas ( blacks ) , come together on the one field they have in common , the football field .
translation: プロスペクトベイは南オーストラリアの沿岸にある遠隔地で、ゴーニャ（白人）とヌンガ（黒人）の二つのコミュニティが共通の場であるサッカー場で集まっています。
back_translation: Prospect Bay is a remote area on the coast of South Australia where two communities, Gonya (white) and Nunga (black), gather at a common place, the soccer field.

text: [ toback 's ] fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard . . . blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: [トバックの] 派手なスプリットスクリーン、ノスタルジックな編集、ウィトゲンシュタインやキルケゴールへの大げさな言及への愛着は… きわめて刺激的な素材と不安定に混ざり合っています。
back_translation: The flashy split screen, nostalgic editing, and affection for exaggerated references to Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard… are incredibly stimulating materials that mix together in an unstable way.

text: this is human comedy at its most amusing , interesting and confirming .
translation: これは人間の喜劇の中で最も楽しく、興味深く、確認できるものです。
back_translation: This is the most enjoyable, interesting, and verifiable aspect of the human comedy.

text: based on a true story , sergeant peter king ( kenneth cranham ) of the army dental corps , too old to fight , and private leslie cuthbertson ( leo bill ) , a trainee dental mechanic in the corps , are thrown together by their passionate desire to see active service .
translation: 実際の出来事に基づいて、陸軍歯科隊のピーター・キング軍曹（ケネス・クランハム）は戦うには年を取りすぎており、歯科機械士の訓練中のレスリー・カスバートソン伍長（レオ・ビル）は、実戦に出るという熱い願望から一緒になります。
back_translation: Based on actual events, Army Dental Corps Sergeant Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) is too old to fight, while Dental Mechanic trainee Corporal Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill) teams up with him due to a strong desire to engage in combat.

text: . . . tara reid plays a college journalist , but she looks like the six-time winner of the miss hawaiian tropic pageant , so i do n't know what she 's doing in here . . .
translation: タラ・リードは大学のジャーナリストを演じていますが、彼女はハワイアン・トロピックのミスを6回受賞したように見えるので、ここにいる理由がわかりません。
back_translation: Tara Reid is playing a college journalist, but it seems she has won the Hawaiian Tropic Miss title six times, so I don't understand why she's here.

text: what he does n't know , however , is that syd has a tragic secret .
translation: しかし、彼が知らないのは、シドが悲惨な秘密を抱えているということです。
back_translation: However, what he doesn't know is that Sid harbors a tragic secret.

text: the fact is that the screen is most alive when it seems most likely that broomfield 's interviewees , or even himself , will not be for much longer .
translation: 事実は、画面が最も生き生きとしているのは、ブルームフィールドのインタビュー対象者、あるいは彼自身が、長くはないと考えられるときである。
back_translation: The fact is that the screen is most vibrant when the interviewees in Bloomfield's studies, or he himself, believe that the time left is not long.

text: mike sullivan ( tom hanks ) works as a hit man for crime boss john rooney ( paul newman ) sullivan views rooney as a father figure .
translation: マイク・サリバン（トム・ハンクス）は、犯罪ボスのジョン・ルーニー（ポール・ニューマン）のためにヒットマンとして働いており、サリバンはルーニーを父親のように見ています。
back_translation: Mike Sullivan (Tom Hanks) works as a hitman for crime boss John Rooney (Paul Newman), and Sullivan sees Rooney like a father.

text: well cast and well directed - a powerful drama with enough sardonic wit to keep it from being maudlin .
translation: うまくキャストされ、うまく演出された - 感傷的になりすぎない十分な皮肉を持った力強いドラマ。
back_translation: Well-cast and well-directed - a strong drama with enough irony that it doesn't become overly sentimental.

text: dogville is shot exclusively in studio with a minimum of props once again allowing the actors ' maximum freedom and full exposure inspired by televised theatre of the 70s .
translation: ドッグヴィルはスタジオで専ら撮影され、最小限の小道具で行われ、1970年代のテレビ劇からインスパイアを受けた俳優たちに最大限の自由と完全な露出を許している。
back_translation: Dogville is primarily filmed in a studio, with minimal props, allowing the actors, inspired by 1970s television dramas, maximum freedom and complete exposure.

text: both got stuck in a broken elevator , 17 level above ground .
translation: 二人は地上から17階上の壊れたエレベーターに閉じ込められました。
back_translation: The two were trapped in a broken elevator 17 floors above ground.

text: in addition to the overcooked , ham-fisted direction , which has all the actors reaching for the back row , the dialogue sounds like horrible poetry .
translation: 過剰に演出されていて、すべての俳優が後列を目指しているようなぎこちない演技に加えて、セリフはひどい詩のように聞こえます。
back_translation: The excessively staged performance, combined with the awkward acting as if all the actors are vying for the back row, makes the dialogue sound like terrible poetry.

text: daphne then must struggle with a snobby half-sister and with following the social obligations expected of her while maintaining her own identity .
translation: ダフネは、気取った異母妹との葛藤や、自己のアイデンティティを維持しながら、期待される社会的義務に従うことに苦しむ必要があります。
back_translation: Daphne must struggle with the conflict with her pretentious half-sister while trying to maintain her own identity and facing the pain of adhering to expected social obligations.

text: a picture that extols the virtues of comradeship and community in a spunky , spirited fashion .
translation: 仲間意識とコミュニティの美徳を元気で活気のある方法で称賛する絵。
back_translation: A painting that celebrates the virtues of camaraderie and community in a lively and energetic way.

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: ゴダールは、愛、歴史、記憶、抵抗、そして芸術の超越についてのこの予想外に感動的な瞑想よりも、純粋に美しい映画を作ったことがありません。
back_translation: Godard has never made a purely beautiful film that is more unexpectedly moving than this meditation on love, history, memory, resistance, and the transcendence of art.

text: set in 1986 when best friends harry ( olsen ) and lloyd ( richardson ) were teenagers , this is the madcap comic tale of their attempt to get out of the `` special needs `` department and into regular high school life .
translation: 1986年を舞台に、親友のハリー（オルセン）とロイド（リチャードソン）がティーンエイジャーだった頃、彼らが「特別支援」部門から抜け出して通常の高校生活を送ろうとする狂気のコメディー物語です。
back_translation: Set in 1986, this is a mad comedy story about best friends Harry (Olsen) and Lloyd (Richardson) when they were teenagers, trying to break out of the "special needs" department and live a normal high school life.

text: this is snappy , frothy screwball comedy awash in french understatement .
translation: これはフランス的な控えめさにあふれた、キレのある泡立ったスクリューボール・コメディです。
back_translation: This is a sparkling screwball comedy full of a French kind of restraint and sharpness.

text: cuts right through the b . s . giving a big middle-fingered `` shut up `` to those who talk up what is nothing more than two guys beating the hell outta one another .
translation: くだらないことを切り捨て、ただの二人の男がものすごい格闘をしているだけのことを大声で語る人たちに対して、中指を立てて「黙れ」と言っている。
back_translation: I'm flipping them the middle finger and telling them to "shut up" in response to people who loudly talk about nothing but two guys having an incredible fight.

text: their life , though unusual , is satisfying until one day , a man named barry kolker ( that her mother refers to at first as `` the goat man `` ) comes into their lives , and ingrid falls madly in love with him , only to have her heart broken , and her life ruined .
translation: 彼らの生活は珍しいものの満足していますが、ある日、バリー・コルカーという男（彼女の母親が最初に「ヤギ男」と呼ぶ）が彼らの生活に現れ、イングリッドは彼に狂ったように恋をするが、心が壊れ、人生が台無しになってしまいます。
back_translation: They are satisfied with their unusual lives, but one day a man named Barry Culker (whom her mother first calls "The Goat Man") appears in their lives, and Ingrid falls madly in love with him, only to have her heart broken and her life ruined.

text: romantic comedy and dogme 95 filmmaking may seem odd bedfellows , but they turn out to be delightfully compatible here .
translation: ロマンティックコメディとドグマ95映画制作は一見奇妙な組み合わせのように思えますが、ここでは見事に相性が良いことが分かります。
back_translation: Romantic comedy and Dogme 95 filmmaking may seem like a strange combination at first glance, but here it turns out to be a wonderful fit.

text: all in all , the count of monte cristo is okay , but it is surely no classic , like the novel upon which it is based .
translation: 総じて言えば、『モンテ・クリスト伯』は悪くはないですが、基にしている小説のようなクラシック作品ではありません。
back_translation: Generally speaking, "The Count of Monte Cristo" is not bad, but it is not a classic work like the novel it is based on.

text: now he must battle the courts to get his children back .
translation: 今、彼は子供たちを取り戻すために裁判所と戦わなければならない。
back_translation: Now, he must fight in court to regain his children.

text: an enjoyably half-wit remake of the venerable italian comedy big deal on madonna street .
translation: 楽しい半分バカなリメイク、老舗のイタリアンコメディ「マドンナ通りの大事件」。
back_translation: A fun and somewhat silly remake, the classic Italian comedy "The Great Incident on Madonna Street."

text: slim , otis , frank and alex ( three boys and a girl ) form a group of snowboard and skate young bank robbers .
translation: スリム、オーティス、フランク、アレックス（3人の男の子と1人の女の子）は、スノーボードとスケートをする若い銀行強盗のグループを作っています。
back_translation: Slim, Otis, Frank, and Alex (three boys and one girl) are forming a group of young bank robbers who snowboard and skate.

text: 'christian bale 's quinn [ is ] a leather clad grunge-pirate with a hairdo like gandalf in a wind-tunnel and a simply astounding cor-blimey-luv-a-duck cockney accent . '
translation: クリスチャン・ベールのクインは、風洞の中のガンダルフのような髪型をした革張りのグランジ海賊で、驚くべきコックニーアクセントを持つ。
back_translation: Christian Bale's Quinn is a leather-clad grunge pirate with a Gandalf-like hairstyle in a wind tunnel, and has an amazing Cockney accent.

text: this dramatically shaky contest of wills only reiterates the old hollywood saw : evil is interesting and good is boring .
translation: この劇的に揺れ動く意志の対決は、古いハリウッドの格言を繰り返すだけです：悪は興味深く、善は退屈だ。
back_translation: This dramatically wavering confrontation of wills simply reiterates the old Hollywood adage: evil is interesting, and good is boring.

text: a straight-shooting family film which awards animals the respect they 've rarely been given .
translation: 動物にこれまでほとんど与えられなかった尊敬を授ける、率直な家族映画。
back_translation: A candid family film that bestows respect on animals, which has been largely absent until now.

text: shot independently over a 24-hour period , the film is first a witness to the fall of the twin towers , as a line of fire and a buckle in the armature signal imminent collapse .
translation: 24時間にわたって独立して撮影されたこの映画は、最初にツインタワーの崩壊を目撃し、火の線とアームチュアのひずみが差し迫った崩壊を示しています。
back_translation: This film, independently shot over 24 hours, first witnesses the collapse of the Twin Towers, showing the line of fire and the distortion of the armature indicating an imminent collapse.

text: one minute , you think you 're watching a serious actioner ; the next , it 's as though clips from the pink panther strikes again and/or sailor moon have been spliced in .
translation: 1分後、あなたは真剣なアクション映画を見ていると思っている；次の瞬間、まるで「ピンク・パンサーの再襲撃」や「セーラームーン」のクリップが差し込まれたかのようだ。
back_translation: A minute later, you think you’re watching a serious action movie; the next moment, it’s as if clips from "The Pink Panther Strikes Again" or "Sailor Moon" have been inserted.

text: how would you feel if when you woke , the nightmare had just begun ?
translation: 目が覚めたときに悪夢が始まったばかりだったら、あなたはどんな気持ちになるでしょうか？
back_translation: How would you feel if the nightmare had just begun when you woke up?

text: oh come on . like you could n't smell this turkey rotting from miles away .
translation: おいおい、まるで何マイルも離れたところからこの七面鳥が腐っている匂いが嗅げなかったみたいだね。
back_translation: Hey, it's as if you couldn't smell the rotten turkey from miles away.

text: despite a well-placed sense of historical outrage , fence is n't one-sided .
translation: 歴史的な怒りの感覚がよく位置づけられているにもかかわらず、フェンスは一方的ではない。
back_translation: Despite the well-positioned sense of historical anger, the fence is not one-sided.

text: as a thoughtful and unflinching examination of an alternative lifestyle , sex with strangers is a success .
translation: 思慮深く揺るがない視点から代替ライフスタイルを検討した結果、見知らぬ人とのセックスは成功である。
back_translation: After considering alternative lifestyles from a thoughtful and unwavering perspective, sex with strangers is successful.

text: for 7 years he has watched over the holy fire , forsaking his wife , family and every earthly pleasure .
translation: 彼は7年間、聖なる火を見守り続け、妻や家族、そしてすべての地上の喜びを捨ててきました。
back_translation: He has watched over the sacred fire for seven years, sacrificing his wife, family, and all the joys of the earthly realm.

text: the urban landscapes are detailed down to the signs on the kiosks , and the color palette , with lots of somber blues and pinks , is dreamy and evocative .
translation: 都市の風景はキオスクの看板まで詳細に描かれており、色のパレットは暗い青やピンクが豊富で、夢のようで感情を呼び起こします。
back_translation: The cityscape is depicted in such detail that even the kiosk signs are included, with a color palette rich in dark blues and pinks, evoking a dreamlike quality and stirring emotions.

text: the story takes place over the course of a day , when the couples get together for an afternoon of dining , drinking , and hot tubbing .
translation: 物語は一日の間に起こり、カップルたちが午後に食事、飲酒、そしてジャグジーを楽しむために集まります。
back_translation: The story takes place over the course of a day, with couples gathering in the afternoon to enjoy meals, drinks, and a jacuzzi.

text: the author 's devotees will probably find it fascinating ; others may find it baffling .
translation: 著者の信奉者はおそらくそれを魅力的だと感じるでしょうが、他の人は困惑するかもしれません。
back_translation: The author's followers will likely find it fascinating, while others may be confused.

text: like the best war movies -- and like martial literature going back to the iliad -- it balances the dreadful , unassuageable cruelty of warfare and the valor and decency of those who fight .
translation: 最高の戦争映画のように、そして『イリアス』にまで遡る武道文学のように、それは戦争の恐ろしい、和らげようのない残虐性と、戦う者たちの勇気や品位のバランスを取っています。
back_translation: Like the greatest war films and the martial literature that dates back to the "Iliad," it balances the horrific, inescapable brutality of war with the courage and dignity of the fighters.

text: a little girl 's search for her biological mother who had abandoned her as a new born baby is brought out poignantly in 'kannathil muthamittal ' .
translation: 新生児の頃に彼女を見捨てた実の母親を探す小さな女の子の物語が、「カンナティル・ムタミッタル」で切実に描かれています。
back_translation: The story of a small girl searching for her biological mother who abandoned her as a newborn is poignantly depicted in "Kanathil Mutamittal."

text: he also meets yuki , a 9-year-old guitar prodigy , who could help dewey win a `` battle of the bands `` competition , which would solve his financial problems and put him back in the spotlight .
translation: 彼はまた、9歳のギタープロディジーであるユキと出会います。彼女はデューイが「バンドの戦い」コンペティションで勝つのを助けることができ、その結果、彼の財政問題を解決し、再び注目を浴びることができます。
back_translation: He also meets Yuki, a 9-year-old guitar prodigy. She is able to help Dewey win the "Battle of the Bands" competition, which in turn can solve his financial problems and bring him back into the spotlight.

text: ethan fernier is obsessed with the horror movies of b-movie director , winston korman .
translation: イーサン・ファーニエは、B級映画監督ウィンストン・コーマンのホラー映画に夢中です。
back_translation: Ethan Farnier is obsessed with the horror movies of B-movie director Winston Korman.

text: finnur , a 9 year old boy , finds his way to j & # 243 ; hanns world and they develop a special friendship .
translation: フィンヌルという9歳の少年が、J・#243;ハンの世界にたどり着き、特別な友情を育む。
back_translation: A 9-year-old boy named Finnur arrives in the world of J. #243; Han and nurtures a special friendship.

text: his father eventually becomes very ill and passes away , the future of rammoth lays in ancanar 's hands .
translation: 彼の父は最終的に非常に病気になり、亡くなる。ラモスの未来はアンカナールの手に委ねられる。
back_translation: His father eventually became very ill and passed away. Ramos's future was left in the hands of Ancanar.

text: eastwood is an icon of moviemaking , one of the best actors , directors and producers around , responsible for some excellent work . but even a hero can stumble sometimes .
translation: イーストウッドは映画制作のアイコンであり、最高の俳優、監督、プロデューサーの一人であり、素晴らしい作品を手掛けてきました。しかし、英雄も時にはつまずくことがあります。
back_translation: Eastwood is an icon of filmmaking and one of the greatest actors, directors, and producers, having created remarkable works. However, even heroes can stumble at times.

text: imprisoned and depressed pete 's letter gives eagle rekindled spirit .
translation: 投獄され、うつ病のピーターの手紙は、イーグルに新たな活力をもたらす。
back_translation: The letter from Peter, who is imprisoned and suffering from depression, brings new vitality to Eagle.

text: in this film , aussie david caesar channels the not-quite-dead career of guy ritchie .
translation: この映画では、オーストラリアのデビッド・シーザーがガイ・リッチーのほぼ死にかけたキャリアを引き継いでいます。
back_translation: In this film, Australian David Caesar takes over Guy Ritchie's nearly doomed career.

text: [ demme ] creates a film that is both traditional , in keeping with its source material , and new millennium hip .
translation: [デミ]は、原作に沿った伝統的な要素と新しいミレニアムのヒップな要素を兼ね備えた映画を作り上げました。
back_translation: [Demis] has created a film that combines traditional elements in line with the original work and trendy elements of the new millennium.

text: a sweet film about two gentle souls - there is a genuine caring between them that feels like watching old friends .
translation: 二人の優しい魂についての心温まる映画です - 彼らの間には本物の思いやりがあり、まるで古い友人を見ているような感覚があります。
back_translation: It's a heartwarming movie about two kind souls - there is genuine compassion between them, and it feels like watching old friends.

text: . . . either you 're willing to go with this claustrophobic concept or you 're not .
translation: …この閉所恐怖症的なコンセプトを受け入れるか、受け入れないか、どちらかです。
back_translation: ...It's a matter of whether to accept this claustrophobic concept or not.

text: the film starts in 1846 and ends in 1863 with the draft riots .
translation: 映画は1846年に始まり、1863年の徴兵暴動で終わります。
back_translation: The film begins in 1846 and ends with the draft riots in 1863.

text: a solid , psychological action film from hong kong .
translation: 香港からの堅実な心理的アクション映画。
back_translation: A solid psychological action movie from Hong Kong.

text: birthday girl is an amusing joy ride , with some surprisingly violent moments .
translation: バースデーガールは面白い楽しい体験で、意外に暴力的な瞬間もあります。
back_translation: The birthday girl has an interesting and fun experience, with surprisingly violent moments as well.

text: considering the harsh locations and demanding stunts , this must have been a difficult shoot , but the movie proves rough going for the audience as well .
translation: 厳しいロケーションと過酷なスタントを考えると、これは難しい撮影だったに違いありませんが、映画は観客にとっても厳しい体験を提供します。
back_translation: Considering the harsh locations and demanding stunts, this must have been a difficult shoot, but the film provides a tough experience for the audience as well.

text: parts of the film feel a bit too much like an infomercial for ram dass 's latest book aimed at the boomer demographic . but mostly it 's a work that , with humor , warmth , and intelligence , captures a life interestingly lived .
translation: 映画のいくつかの部分は、ボーマー層を対象としたラム・ダスの最新書籍のインフォマーシャルのように感じられる。しかし、全体的には、ユーモア、温かさ、知性をもって、興味深く生きられた人生を捉えた作品である。
back_translation: Some parts of the movie feel like an infomercial for Ram Dass's latest book aimed at the boomer generation. However, overall, it is a work that captures a life lived interestingly, with humor, warmth, and intelligence.

text: final report : good , yes ; great , no .
translation: 最終報告書 : 良い、はい；素晴らしい、いいえ。
back_translation: Final report: Good, yes; wonderful, no.

text: leggy zeta-jones is so hot in the 'all that jazz ' number , she 's flammable . and zellweger defines delicious .
translation: レギーなゼタ=ジョーンズは「オール・ザット・ジャズ」のナンバーでとてもセクシーで、彼女は燃えやすいです。そして、ゼルウィガーはデリシャスを定義しています。
back_translation: Reggie Zeta-Jones is very sexy in the number from "All That Jazz," and she is flammable. Meanwhile, Zellweger defines delicious.

text: despite some gulps the film is a fuzzy huggy .
translation: いくつかの間違いはあるものの、この映画はもふもふで抱きしめたくなるような作品です。
back_translation: Despite some mistakes, this movie is a fluffy and heartwarming piece that makes you want to hug it.

text: filmed in a california maximum security prison , the series is a look into the world of street and prison gangs , which ask is there a way out for these men who have dedicated their lives to gangs .
translation: カリフォルニアの最強警備の刑務所で撮影されたこのシリーズは、ストリートギャングと刑務所ギャングの世界を探求しており、ギャングに人生を捧げたこれらの男性たちに脱出の道はあるのかという問いを投げかけています。
back_translation: This series, filmed in California's highest-security prison, explores the world of street gangs and prison gangs, posing the question of whether there is a way out for these men who have dedicated their lives to gang life.

text: this is a film brimming with detail and nuance and one that speaks volumes about the ability of the human spirit to find solace in events that could easily crush it forever .
translation: これは細部とニュアンスに満ちた映画であり、簡単にそれを永遠に打ち砕いてしまうような出来事の中で、人間の精神が安らぎを見出す力について多くを語っています。
back_translation: This is a film rich in detail and nuance, and it speaks volumes about the human spirit's ability to find peace amid events that could easily shatter it forever.

text: what separates miyazaki 's animation from everyone else 's is the way he imagines his worlds .
translation: 宮崎駿のアニメーションが他の作品と異なるのは、彼が自分の世界を想像する方法です。
back_translation: What sets Hayao Miyazaki's animation apart from other works is the way he imagines his own world.

text: a movie that will surely be profane , politically charged music to the ears of cho 's fans .
translation: 確実に不敬で政治的に挑発的な音楽を、チョのファンに届ける映画。
back_translation: A movie that definitely delivers disrespectful and politically provocative music to Cho's fans.

text: nicks , seemingly uncertain what 's going to make people laugh , runs the gamut from stale parody to raunchy sex gags to formula romantic comedy .
translation: ニックスは、人々を笑わせるために何が効果的かわからないようで、古くさいパロディから下品なセックスギャグ、定番のロマンティックコメディまで多岐にわたります。
back_translation: It seems that Nick doesn't know what is effective for making people laugh, ranging from outdated parodies to vulgar sex jokes and classic romantic comedies.

text: the backyard follows several backyard wrestlers in different countries as they pursue their dream to become professional wrestlers .
translation: 裏庭は、異なる国のいくつかの裏庭レスラーがプロレスラーになる夢を追い求める様子を描いています。
back_translation: The backyard depicts the scene of several backyard wrestlers from different countries pursuing their dream of becoming professional wrestlers.

text: serious and conservative , jamie ( moore ) was as far from cool as she could possibly be , and did n't care .
translation: 真面目で保守的なジャミー（ムーア）は、クールからはほど遠い存在で、全く気にしていなかった。
back_translation: Serious and conservative Jamie (Moore) was far from being cool and didn't care at all.

text: this action-thriller/dark comedy is one of the most repellent things to pop up in a cinematic year already littered with celluloid garbage .
translation: このアクション・スリラー/ダークコメディは、すでにセルロイドのゴミで散らかった映画の年に現れた最も嫌悪感を抱かせる作品の一つです。
back_translation: This action-thriller/dark comedy is one of the most repugnant works to emerge in a year already littered with celluloid garbage.

text: feels like six different movies fighting each other for attention .
translation: まるで六つの異なる映画が注目を争っているように感じる。
back_translation: It feels as if six different movies are competing for attention.

text: after pulling off an amazing gold bullion heist from a heavily guarded palazzo in venice , italy , charlie and his gang -- inside man steve ( norton ) , computer genius lyle ( green ) , wheelman handsome rob ( statham ) , explosives expert left-ear ( mos def ) and veteran safecracker john bridger ( sutherland ) - ca n't believe when one of them turns out to be a double-crosser .
translation: イタリアのベネチアにある厳重警備のパラッツォから驚異的な金塊強盗を成功させたチャーリーと彼の仲間たち — 内通者スティーブ（ノートン）、コンピュータの天才ライル（グリーン）、運転手ハンサム・ロブ（ステイサム）、爆薬の専門家レフト・イヤー（モス・デフ）、ベテランのセーフクラッカージョン・ブリッジャー（サザーランド） — がその中の一人が裏切り者であることがわかり信じられない。
back_translation: Charlie and his crew, who successfully pulled off an astonishing gold heist from a heavily guarded palace in Venice, Italy — the insider Steve (Norton), computer genius Lyle (Green), driver Handsome Rob (Statham), explosives expert Left Ear (Mos Def), and veteran safecracker John Bridger (Sutherland) — are in disbelief when they discover that one of them is a traitor.

text: chilling , well-acted , and finely directed : david jacobson 's dahmer .
translation: 冷酷で、演技が素晴らしく、緻密に演出された：デヴィッド・ジェイコブソンの『ダーマー』。
back_translation: Cold, wonderfully acted, and meticulously directed: David Jacobson's "Dharma."

text: soon jonah embarks on an adventure that leads him into the belly of a whale , and to the heart of nineveh for a hilarious showdown .
translation: 間もなく、ヨナはクジラの腹の中やニネベの中心部へと導く冒険に乗り出し、面白い対決が繰り広げられます。
back_translation: Soon, Jonah embarks on an adventure that leads him into the belly of a whale and the heart of Nineveh, where interesting confrontations unfold.

text: this documentary by stacy peralta makes a convincing case on behalf of skateboarding , of all things , as a catalyst for this change , and for some delinquent youths in a derelict los angeles neighborhood as its agents .
translation: このステイシー・ペラルタによるドキュメンタリーは、スケートボードがこの変化の触媒として、荒廃したロサンゼルスの地域にいる不良少年たちをその担い手として、非常に説得力のあるケースを提示しています。
back_translation: This documentary by Stacey Peralta presents a compelling case for skateboarding as a catalyst for change, showcasing the delinquent boys in the devastated areas of Los Angeles as its bearers.

text: scotland looks wonderful , the fans are often funny fanatics , the showdown sure beats a bad day of golf .
translation: スコットランドは素晴らしいですね。ファンたちはしばしば面白い熱狂者で、対決は悪いゴルフの日よりも確実に楽しいです。
back_translation: Scotland is wonderful. The fans are often amusingly enthusiastic, and the match is definitely more enjoyable than a bad day of golf.

text: the face of the serpent is an action-thriller with strong political undertones of local government corruption .
translation: 「蛇の顔」は、地方政府の腐敗という強い政治的ニュアンスを持ったアクションスリラーです。
back_translation: "The Snake's Face" is an action thriller with a strong political nuance regarding local government corruption.

text: nayomi and lisa go to do the hit but everything goes terribly wrong .
translation: ナヨミとリサはヒットをしに行くが、すべてがひどく間違ってしまう。
back_translation: Nayomi and Lisa go to make a hit, but everything goes terribly wrong.

text: a pointed , often tender , examination of the pros and cons of unconditional love and familial duties .
translation: 無条件の愛と家族の義務の長所と短所を鋭く、しばしば優しく検証したもの。
back_translation: A sharp yet often gentle examination of the strengths and weaknesses of unconditional love and familial obligations.

text: a movie that 's full of deft , off-center observations about the world of filmmaking .
translation: 映画製作の世界に関する巧妙でオフセンターな観察が満載の映画。
back_translation: A film full of clever and off-center observations about the world of filmmaking.

text: so purely enjoyable that you might not even notice it 's a fairly straightforward remake of hollywood comedies such as father of the bride .
translation: 非常に楽しめるため、それが「花嫁の父」などのハリウッドコメディのかなりオーソドックスなリメイクであることに気づかないかもしれません。
back_translation: It can be so enjoyable that you might not realize it's a fairly orthodox remake of a Hollywood comedy like "Father of the Bride."

text: they all died 48 hours after logging on to a site named feardotcom . com .
translation: 彼らはすべて、feardotcom.comというサイトにログインしてから48時間後に亡くなりました。
back_translation: They all died 48 hours after logging into the site feardotcom.com.

text: during his tenure , he was responsible for such revolutionary films as the godfather , rosemary 's baby , love story , the odd couple , harold and maude and chinatown .
translation: 在任中、彼は「ゴッドファーザー」、「ローズマリーの赤ちゃん」、「ラブストーリー」、「カップルの奇妙な関係」、「ハロルドとマウド」、「チャイナタウン」といった革新的な映画を担当していました。
back_translation: During his tenure, he was responsible for innovative films such as "The Godfather," "Rosemary's Baby," "Love Story," "The Odd Couple," "Harold and Maude," and "Chinatown."

text: an impressively coordinated enterprise that lasts three hours , manages a large cast , and covers a period of 30-odd years while successfully unfolding as a series of scenes from the life of a single character .
translation: 三時間にわたり、広範なキャストを管理し、30年余りの期間をカバーしながら、ひとりのキャラクターの人生の一連のシーンとして成功裏に展開される、見事に調整された事業です。
back_translation: A brilliantly coordinated project that successfully unfolds as a series of scenes depicting the life of a single character, managing a large cast over three hours and covering a span of more than 30 years.

text: a comic tale about the end of the summer in ireland , 2001 , where 5 boys and 5 girls are out to end the summer with a bang before heading back to school to sit the final exams , only to be thwarted by comic mishappenings .
translation: 2001年のアイルランドでの夏の終わりに関するコミックな物語では、5人の少年と5人の少女が、最終試験に向けて学校に戻る前に夏を楽しく締めくくるために出かけるが、コミカルな出来事によって妨げられる。
back_translation: In a comedic story set at the end of summer in Ireland in 2001, five boys and five girls go out to wrap up their summer fun before returning to school for final exams, but they are interrupted by comical events.

text: a summary of the plot does n't quite do justice to the awfulness of the movie , for that comes through all too painfully in the execution .
translation: プロットの要約では映画のひどさを十分に伝えることはできず、それは演出においてあまりにも痛々しく伝わってくる。
back_translation: A summary of the plot cannot adequately convey the movie's awfulness, and it comes across painfully in the direction.

text: secrets of robert 's past start to emerge as he unleashes his awesome martial arts fighting abilities to defend himself and his wife .
translation: ロバートの過去の秘密が明らかになり始め、彼は自分と妻を守るために素晴らしい武道の戦闘能力を解き放ちます。
back_translation: Robert's past secrets begin to be revealed, and he unleashes his incredible martial arts combat skills to protect himself and his wife.

text: trouble comes when tom ex girlfriend reappears , asking for help , announcing him that she had a girl from him 9 years ago .
translation: 問題は、トムの元彼女が再び現れ、助けを求め、彼に9年前に自分の子供を産んだと告げたときに起こります。
back_translation: The problem arises when Tom's ex-girlfriend reappears, seeks help, and tells him that she had his child nine years ago.

text: they nevertherless feel responsible to protect the flag until monday 's ceremony .
translation: 彼らはそれでも月曜日の式典まで旗を守る責任を感じています。
back_translation: They still feel a responsibility to guard the flag until the ceremony on Monday.

text: when an older woman , mutt , an eccentric hustler with a heart , and her dog fort pass by , janey `` s solitude is forever changed .
translation: 年配の女性、ミュット、心優しい風変わりなハスラーと彼女の犬フォートが通り過ぎると、ジェイニーの孤独は永遠に変わる。
back_translation: As an older woman, Mutt, a kind-hearted quirky hustler, and her dog Fort pass by, Janie's loneliness is forever changed.

text: we become complicit in our own seduction : we willingly let bielinsky manipulate us .
translation: 私たちは自らの誘惑に加担することになる：私たちは喜んでビエリンクスキーに操られる。
back_translation: We will become complicit in our own temptations: we willingly allow ourselves to be manipulated by Bielinsky.

text: but freddy 's plans do n't go according to schedule when jason discovers that he has been manipulated , which really sends him over the egde .
translation: しかし、フレディの計画は予定通りには進まず、ジェイソンが自分が操られていたことを発見すると、彼は本当に怒り狂います。
back_translation: However, Freddy's plan does not go according to schedule, and when Jason discovers that he has been manipulated, he becomes truly enraged.

text: the film is probably worth seeing for the sheer spectacle of it all , for the sake of obtaining valuable information , and for finding more closure on a story that has always been missing several pieces .
translation: その映画は、全体の壮観を楽しむためや、貴重な情報を得るため、そして常に欠けていたいくつかのパーツを見つけるために、見る価値があるでしょう。
back_translation: That movie is worth watching to enjoy the overall spectacle, to gain valuable information, and to find some parts that have always been missing.

text: instead he hides out in a cave on goose creek , waging guerilla warfare against expansionism and the destruction of historic property with the help of his family , friends , and neighbors . . .
translation: 代わりに彼はグースクリークの洞窟に隠れ、家族、友人、近所の人々の助けを借りて、拡張主義と歴史的財産の破壊に対してゲリラ戦を繰り広げています。
back_translation: Instead, he is hiding in the Goose Creek cave, waging a guerrilla war against expansionism and the destruction of historical heritage with the help of family, friends, and neighbors.

text: this movie shows the intense life of this character ; not only focusing in the robberies , but also in the reasons that pushed him into acting the way he did .
translation: この映画は、このキャラクターの激しい人生を描いています。強盗だけでなく、彼がそのように行動するようになった理由にも焦点を当てています。
back_translation: This movie depicts the intense life of this character. It focuses not only on his acts of robbery but also on the reasons why he started to behave in that way.

text: before the gang returns , jack and erin 's connection intensifies and who ends up with the money is anyone 's guess .
translation: ギャングが戻る前に、ジャックとエリンのつながりが深まり、誰がそのお金を手に入れるのかは誰にもわからない。
back_translation: Before the gang returns, Jack and Erin's connection deepens, and no one knows who will end up with the money.

text: polanski has found the perfect material with which to address his own world war ii experience in his signature style .
translation: ポランスキーは、自身の第二次世界大戦の経験に取り組むための完璧な素材を見つけ、その特徴的なスタイルで表現しています。
back_translation: Polanski has found the perfect material to address his experience of World War II, expressing it in his distinctive style.

text: his religious devotion to the work is challenged however , when his best friend and personal mentor is run down by an irate motorist and knocked into a deep coma .
translation: 彼の仕事に対する宗教的な献身は、彼の親友であり個人的なメンターが怒った運転手にひかれ、深い昏睡状態に knocked down されるときに試される。
back_translation: His religious devotion to his work is tested when his close friend and personal mentor is knocked down by an angry driver and falls into a deep coma.

text: while dutifully pulling on heartstrings , directors dean deblois and chris sanders valiantly keep punching up the mix .
translation: 心に響くように懸命に引き込みながら、監督のディーン・デブロイスとクリス・サンダースは、見事にミックスを押し上げ続けます。
back_translation: With a heartfelt effort to resonate, directors Dean DeBlois and Chris Sanders continue to brilliantly elevate the mix.

text: it 's the extra layer that makes this one , the movie 's understanding of how disillusion and inner compromise can gradually separate a young artist from his divine spark .
translation: それはこの作品の追加の層であり、映画がどのように失望と内面的な妥協が徐々に若いアーティストを彼の神聖なひらめきから切り離すことができるかを理解している。
back_translation: It is an additional layer of this work, understanding how the film depicts how disappointment and inner compromises can gradually disconnect a young artist from his divine inspiration.

text: the plants are the only break in the grey monotony around her .
translation: 植物は彼女の周りの灰色の単調さの中で唯一の中断です。
back_translation: The plants are the only interruption in the gray monotony around her.

text: with the fbi and press in hot pursuit , she must make the hardest decision in her life .
translation: FBIと報道陣に追われる中、彼女は人生で最も難しい決断を下さなければならない。
back_translation: While being pursued by the FBI and the press, she must make the most difficult decision of her life.

text: the film truly does rescue [ the funk brothers ] from motown 's shadows . it 's about time .
translation: その映画は確かにファンク・ブラザーズをモータウンの影から救い出しています。もうその時が来たのです。
back_translation: That movie certainly brings the Funk Brothers out of the shadows of Motown. The time has come.

text: briar patch is a modern , southern gothic tale of true love and murder .
translation: ブライアーパッチは、現代の南部ゴシックの物語で、真実の愛と殺人を描いています。
back_translation: "Brriar Patch" is a modern Southern Gothic tale that depicts true love and murder.

text: a must for fans of british cinema , if only because so many titans of the industry are along for the ride .
translation: 英国映画のファンには必見であり、業界の多くの巨人たちが共に旅をしているからです。
back_translation: It is a must-see for fans of British cinema, as many giants of the industry are traveling together.

text: lazy , miserable and smug . this is one of the biggest disappointments of the year .
translation: 怠惰で、惨めで、自己満足の状態です。これは今年最大の失望の一つです。
back_translation: It is a state of laziness, misery, and self-satisfaction. This is one of the biggest disappointments of the year.

text: a supernatural mystery that does n't know whether it wants to be a suspenseful horror movie or a weepy melodrama . it ends up being neither , and fails at both endeavors .
translation: サスペンスホラー映画になりたいのか、感傷的なメロドラマになりたいのか分からない超自然的なミステリー。結果的にどちらにもなれず、両方の試みに失敗してしまう。
back_translation: A supernatural mystery that can't decide whether it wants to be a suspense horror film or a sentimental melodrama. In the end, it fails at both attempts and becomes neither.

text: my wife is an actress has its moments in looking at the comic effects of jealousy . in the end , though , it is only mildly amusing when it could have been so much more .
translation: 私の妻は女優で、嫉妬のコミックな効果を見る瞬間があります。結局のところ、それはほんの少し面白いだけで、もっと多くのものになり得たのに、残念です。
back_translation: My wife is an actress, and there are moments when I see the comic effect of jealousy. After all, it’s just a little funny, and it could have become something much more; it's a shame.

text: she faces exams , completion of her thesis , and a competitive interview process , all of which is compounded when a police detective , wade handler ( bratt ) , begins investigating the two year-old disappearance of her boyfriend , embry langan ( hunnam ) , a young man whose memory haunts and obsesses her .
translation: 彼女は試験、論文の完成、そして競争の激しい面接プロセスに直面していますが、警察の探偵ウェイド・ハンドラー（ブラット）が、彼女のボーイフレンド、エンブリー・ランガン（ハナー）が失踪してから2年が経った事件を調査し始めることで、状況はさらに複雑になります。彼は彼女を悩ませ、彼女を執拗に襲う若い男性の記憶です。
back_translation: She is facing exams, completing papers, and going through a highly competitive interview process, but the situation becomes even more complicated when police detective Wade Handler (Bratt) begins investigating the case of her boyfriend, Embrey Langan (Hannah), who has been missing for two years. He is a memory of a young man who haunts her and relentlessly assaults her.

text: the very definition of the 'small ' movie , but it is a good stepping stone for director sprecher .
translation: 「スモール」映画の正確な定義ですが、これは監督スプレッシャーにとって良い第一歩です。
back_translation: The exact definition of a "small" movie is a good first step for director Schrepper.

text: this movie in a single breath goes to the very heart of the russian experience .
translation: この映画は、一息でロシアの経験の真髄に迫ります。
