back_translation: This movie gets to the essence of the Russian experience in one breath.

text: even if it pushes its agenda too forcefully , this remains a film about something , one that attempts and often achieves a level of connection and concern .
translation: たとえ agenda を強引に押し進めても、これは何かについての映画であり、つながりと関心のレベルを試み、しばしば達成する映画です。
back_translation: Even if it forcefully pushes an agenda, this is a film about something, attempting to explore the levels of connection and interest, and often succeeding.

text: hoping to settle , once and for all , the issue of his virginity , nick begs roger to school him in the art of seducing women .
translation: 一度で終わらせるために彼の処女の問題を解決しようと、ニックはロジャーに女性を誘惑する技術を教えてくれるよう頼む。
back_translation: To solve his virginity problem once and for all, Nick asks Roger to teach him the techniques for seducing women.

text: the film follows fictional movie star gray evans through the disintegration of his marriage , his gradual mental breakdown , and his increasing obsession with a young film student who reminds gray of his own life before becoming famous .
translation: この映画は、架空の映画スターであるグレイ・エヴァンスが自分の結婚の崩壊、徐々に進行する精神的崩壊、そして自分が有名になる前の生活を思い出させる若い映画学生への執着の高まりを追っています。
back_translation: This film follows the increasing obsession of Gray Evans, a fictional movie star, with a young film student who reminds him of his life before he became famous, as well as his own crumbling marriage and gradually worsening mental breakdown.

text: like edward norton in american history x , ryan gosling ( murder by numbers ) delivers a magnetic performance .
translation: エドワード・ノートンが『アメリカン・ヒストリーX』で見せたように、ライアン・ゴズリング（『数字で殺す』）も非常に魅力的な演技を見せています。
back_translation: As Edward Norton demonstrated in "American History X," Ryan Gosling also delivers a highly captivating performance in "Drive."

text: a series of mysterious and bizarre death threats soon ushers in symptoms of paranoia , unwelcome fame , and eventually a severe case of writer 's block .
translation: 一連の神秘的で奇妙な死の脅迫が、すぐに偏執症の症状や好ましくない有名さ、そして最終的には重度の作家のブロックを引き起こします。
back_translation: A series of mysterious and strange death threats soon trigger symptoms of paranoia, unwanted notoriety, and ultimately severe writer's block.

text: definitely not the knee-slapper that i was told it would be , but enough hahas for me to grade as passable .
translation: 確かに、私が言われていたほどの大笑いではなかったですが、私が合格と評価するには十分な笑いがありました。
back_translation: Certainly, it wasn't as big of a laugh as I was told, but there was enough laughter for me to consider it a pass.

text: after letting his screenwriting software sit on his shelf for three years , he finally has the big idea that inspires him to load screenwriter 4 . 0 and get writing .
translation: 彼は自分の脚本作成ソフトウェアを3年間棚に置いた後、ついに彼をインスパイアする大きなアイデアを思いつき、Screenwriter 4.0を起動して書き始めることになりました。
back_translation: After setting aside his screenwriting software for three years, he finally came up with a big idea that inspired him, and he decided to launch Screenwriter 4.0 and start writing.

text: entwined with maggie 's search for hope , the film explores her interaction with her family and friends .
translation: 希望を求めるマギーの探求と絡み合いながら、この映画は彼女の家族や友人との交流を探ります。
back_translation: While intertwining with Maggie's search for hope, this film explores her interactions with family and friends.

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events . those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .
translation: 実際の出来事に触発されたフィクション作品として楽しむのが最良です。アイゼンシュテインの人生についての決定的な説明を求める人は、他の場所で探した方が良いでしょう。
back_translation: It is best to enjoy it as a work of fiction inspired by actual events. Those seeking a definitive account of Eisenstein's life would be better off looking elsewhere.

text: there 's only one thing his cousin did n't tell him . . .
translation: 彼のいとこが彼に言わなかった唯一のことがある...
back_translation: There is only one thing his cousin didn't tell him...

text: the behind the scenes series is more interesting than the resulting movie , but it 's still worth taking a look .
translation: 舞台裏のシリーズは出来上がった映画よりも興味深いですが、それでも見る価値はあります。
back_translation: The behind-the-scenes series is more interesting than the completed movie, but it's still worth watching.

text: the story focuses on an ambitious young executive , amanda , who inherits a lovely b & # 38 ; b on a remote island in maine when her grandmother dies .
translation: 物語は、祖母の死後、メイン州の孤島にある素敵なB＆Bを相続する野心的な若いエグゼクティブ、アマンダに焦点を当てています。
back_translation: The story focuses on Amanda, an ambitious young executive who inherits a lovely B&B on a remote island in Maine after her grandmother's death.

text: beautifully shot against the frozen winter landscapes of grenoble and geneva , the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller , until the tragedy beneath it all gradually reveals itself .
translation: 美しい冬の風景が広がるグルノーブルとジュネーブを背景に撮影されたこの映画は、熟練したスリラーの緊張感が高まる中で展開し、やがてその背後にある悲劇が徐々に明らかになっていきます。
back_translation: This film, set against the backdrop of the beautiful winter landscapes of Grenoble and Geneva, unfolds with the escalating tension of a skilled thriller, gradually revealing the tragedy behind it.

text: `` mr . deeds `` is suitable summer entertainment that offers escapism without requiring a great deal of thought .
translation: 「ミスター・ディーズ」は、大した考えを必要とせずに逃避を提供する、夏のエンターテインメントとして適しています。
back_translation: "Mr. D's" is suitable as summer entertainment that provides an escape without requiring much thought.

text: things get a little awkward when harry suffers a heart attack at the home of marin 's mother erica ( keaton ) .
translation: ハリーがマリンの母エリカ（キートン）の家で心臓発作を起こしたとき、状況は少し気まずくなります。
back_translation: The situation becomes a bit awkward when Harry has a heart attack at Marlin's mother Erika's (Keaton's) house.

text: they marry because that 's what you are supposed to do .
translation: 彼らは、それがすべきことだから結婚します。
back_translation: They are getting married because it's what they should do.

text: . . . skirts the edges of snide condescension only to then abruptly catch the viewer off-guard with lightning strikes of genuine emotion .
translation: . . .冷淡な軽蔑の縁をかすめながら、突然、視聴者を驚かせる真剣な感情の稲妻のような衝撃で。
back_translation: Skimming the edge of cold disdain, suddenly, with a shocking burst of serious emotion like a lightning strike that astonishes the audience.

text: fresh from a series of emotional traumas , allison is distrustful and not so easily rescued , though over a period of two days she comes to regard her idealization of dylan as a last opportunity for security and happiness .
translation: 一連の感情的なトラウマから回復したばかりのアリソンは、おそらく信頼できず、簡単には救われないが、2日の間に彼女はディランへの理想化を安全と幸福の最後の機会と見なすようになる。
back_translation: Recently recovered from a series of emotional traumas, Allison is likely untrusting and difficult to save, but within two days, she comes to see her idealization of Dylan as her last chance for safety and happiness.

text: sam decker ( dolph lundgren ) is giving up .
translation: サム・デッカー（ドルフ・ラングレン）はあきらめている。
back_translation: Sam Decker (Dolph Lundgren) has given up.

text: now a full time tattoo artist , he meets a young student named sienna ( de rossi ) who secretly works as a bar stripper .
translation: 今はフルタイムのタトゥーアーティストとして働いている彼は、シエナ（デ・ロッシ）という若い学生と出会う。シエナは秘密裏にバーストリッパーとして働いている。
back_translation: Now working as a full-time tattoo artist, he meets a young student named Siena (De'Rossi). Siena secretly works as a burlesque dancer.

text: williams has now proven that he can play creepy with the best of them .
translation: ウィリアムズは今や、最高の連中と一緒に不気味な演技ができることを証明しました。
back_translation: Williams has now proven that he can perform eerie acts alongside the best of them.

text: kudos to director doug liman for injecting textbook spy fare with slick intelligence and a truckload of tension .
translation: 教科書通りのスパイ映画に洗練された知性と大量の緊張感を注入したダグ・リーマン監督に拍手を送ります。
back_translation: Kudos to director Doug Liman for infusing a refined intelligence and a tremendous amount of tension into a textbook-style spy movie.

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: 無味のホテル、高速道路、駐車場で満たされ、自然や家族の温もりの一瞬を垣間見る中、時間を取ることは現代生活の迷路に閉じ込められたことへの控えめな絶望のうめきである。
back_translation: A hotel lacking in flavor, filled with highways and parking lots, where one catches glimpses of nature and the warmth of family, taking time becomes a modest groan of despair at being trapped in the maze of modern life.

text: leigh is one of the rare directors who feels acting is the heart and soul of cinema . he allows his cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue . this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: レイは、演技が映画の心と魂であると感じる珍しい監督の一人です。彼はキャストメンバーにストーリーや対話にクリエイティブな貢献をさせることを許します。この方法はほぼ失敗することがなく、ここでも素晴らしく機能しています。
back_translation: Ray is one of the rare directors who feels that acting is the heart and soul of a film. He allows the cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue. This approach rarely fails, and it works wonderfully here as well.

text: the kind of movie that comes along only occasionally , one so unconventional , gutsy and perfectly executed it takes your breath away .
translation: 時折しか出会えない、非常に型破りで勇気があり、完璧に実行された映画のようなもので、息を呑むほどのものです。
back_translation: It's something you can only encounter occasionally, incredibly unconventional and courageous, perfectly executed like a movie, and it's breathtaking.

text: it 's a fractured story about a naive , impulsive , but above all else passionate man , one who will do anything for his family , who will stop at nothing to live his dream .
translation: それは、家族のために何でもする、夢を実現するために妥協のない、無邪気で衝動的であり、何よりも情熱的な男についての破断された物語です。
back_translation: It is a broken story about a man who would do anything for his family, is uncompromising in realizing his dreams, and is innocent, impulsive, and above all, passionate.

text: for all its random chaos , divine secrets works because of the power of its convictions -- and its cast .
translation: すべてのランダムな混沌に対して、神秘的な秘密はその信念の力とキャストによって機能します。
back_translation: Against all random chaos, the mystical secrets operate through the power of belief and casting.

text: a boy named frank ( pidgeon ) and his sister caroline ( podbielska ) find themselves in attic town after investigating strange noises coming from the house top .
translation: フランク（ピジョン）という男の子と彼の妹キャロライン（ポドビエルスカ）は、家の屋根から聞こえる奇妙な音を調査した結果、屋根裏の町にたどり着きます。
back_translation: A boy named Frank (Pigeon) and his sister Caroline (Podbierska) end up in an attic town after investigating strange noises coming from the roof of their house.

text: it may . . . work as a jaunt down memory lane for teens and young adults who grew up on televised scooby-doo shows or reruns .
translation: それは、テレビで放送されたスクービー・ドゥーの番組や再放送で育ったティーンエイジャーや若者にとって、思い出の旅として機能するかもしれません。
back_translation: It may serve as a nostalgic journey for teenagers and young people who grew up watching Scooby-Doo shows and reruns on television.

text: she manages to test patricia in one of the biggest hotel-casinos , the caesars palace .
translation: 彼女は、最大のホテル・カジノの一つであるシーザーズ・パレスでパトリシアを試すことに成功します。
back_translation: She successfully tries Patricia at Caesars Palace, one of the largest hotel-casinos.

text: each spring in the little port town of beaufort , north carolina , landon carter remembers his senior year at beaufort high and jamie sullivan , the girl who changed his life .
translation: ノースカロライナ州の小さな港町ビューフォートでは、春になるたびにランドン・カーターはビューフォート高校での卒業年と、彼の人生を変えた女の子ジェイミー・サリバンを思い出します。
back_translation: In the small coastal town of Beaufort, North Carolina, every spring, Landon Carter remembers his graduation year from Beaufort High School and the girl who changed his life, Jamie Sullivan.

text: frank and steve came to atlantic city twenty years ago to make a big score .
translation: フランクとスティーブは20年前に大きな得をするためにアトランティックシティに来ました。
back_translation: Frank and Steve came to Atlantic City 20 years ago to make a big profit.

text: miyazaki is one of world cinema 's most wondrously gifted artists and storytellers .
translation: 宮崎は世界映画界で最も素晴らしい才能を持つアーティストであり、物語の語り手の一人です。
back_translation: Miyazaki is one of the most talented artists in the world of cinema and a storyteller.

text: he sabotages evan and gets the job of anchorman .
translation: 彼はエヴァンを妨害して、アンカーマンの職を得る。
back_translation: He sabotages Evan to get the anchor's job.

text: she is a wealthy and arrogant girl who is used to getting things done her way .
translation: 彼女は自分の思い通りに物事を進めることに慣れた裕福で傲慢な女の子です。
back_translation: She is a wealthy and arrogant girl who is used to having things go her way.

text: more prophetic words have never been spoken in a world where love , sex , race , and betrayal are more than skin deep .
translation: 愛、性、人種、裏切りが単なる表面以上のものである世界において、これまでに語られたことのない予言的な言葉がある。
back_translation: In a world where love, sex, race, and betrayal are more than just surface issues, there are prophetic words that have never been spoken before.

text: at times the guys taps into some powerful emotions , but this kind of material is more effective on stage . it 's not a motion picture ; it 's an utterly static picture .
translation: 時には彼らは強い感情に触れるが、この種の素材はステージ上での方が効果的だ。それは映画ではなく、まったく静止した絵である。
back_translation: Sometimes they touch strong emotions, but this type of material is more effective on stage. It's not a film, but a completely still picture.

text: when his daughter is kidnapped and held in exchange for priceless diamonds , the leader of a crew of highly skilled urban thieves ( dmx ) forges an unlikely alliance with a taiwanese intelligence officer ( jet li ) to rescue her .
translation: 彼の娘が誘拐され、貴重なダイヤモンドと引き換えに拘束されたとき、高度なスキルを持つ都市の泥棒のリーダー（DMX）は、彼女を救うために台湾の情報将校（ジェット・リー）と異色の同盟を結びます。
back_translation: When his daughter is kidnapped and held for a valuable diamond, a highly skilled urban thief leader (DMX) forms an unlikely alliance with a Taiwanese intelligence officer (Jet Li) to save her.

text: there 's also a local detective ( swank ) who is conducting her own personal investigation . . .
translation: 地元の刑事（スワンク）も自身の私的な調査を行っています。。。
back_translation: The local detective (Swank) is also conducting his own private investigation...

text: never again does n't quite rise above the conventions it attempts to deconstruct , but at its center are two gifted actors who are more than willing to take chances .
translation: 「ネバー・アゲイン」は試みる解体の conventions を超えることはありませんが、その中心にはリスクを取ることを厭わない2人の才能ある俳優がいます。
back_translation: "Never Again" does not go beyond the conventions of attempted deconstruction, but at its core are two talented actors who are unafraid to take risks.

text: hollywood comedian/actor pauly shore loses everything : his house , nobody in hollywood wants to represent him , he moves back home with his mom and is now parking cars at the comedy store .
translation: ハリウッドのコメディアン/俳優ポーリー・ショアがすべてを失う：彼の家、ハリウッドで誰も彼を代表したがらず、母親と一緒に実家に戻り、現在はコメディストアで車を駐車している。
back_translation: Hollywood comedian/actor Pauly Shore loses everything: his house, no one in Hollywood wants to represent him, he moves back to his family home with his mother, and now he is parking cars at the Comedy Store.

text: the sound of ma 's cello alone is reason not to miss naqoyqatsi .
translation: マのチェロの音だけでも、ナクォイカツィを見逃す理由にはなりません。
back_translation: Just the sound of the cello is no reason to miss Nakwoikatsui.

text: the master of disguise falls under the category of 'should have been a sketch on saturday night live . '
translation: 変装の達人は「サタデーナイトライブのスケッチにすべきだった」というカテゴリーに入ります。
back_translation: The master of disguise falls into the category of "should have been a sketch on Saturday Night Live."

text: muccino is honest in the emotional damage left by his immature men and passionate in his portraits of twentysomething commitment-phobes struggling against growing up .
translation: ムッチーノは、彼の未熟な男性たちが残した感情的な傷に対して正直であり、成長することに抵抗する20代のコミットメント恐怖症者たちの肖像に情熱を注いでいる。
back_translation: Muccino is honest about the emotional scars left by his immature men, and he pours his passion into portraying commitment-phobic individuals in their twenties who resist growth.

text: so unassuming and pure of heart , you ca n't help but warmly extend your arms and yell 'safe ! '
translation: とても控えめで純粋な心を持っているので、思わず温かく腕を広げて「安全！」と叫びたくなります。
back_translation: They have such a modest and pure heart that it makes you want to spontaneously open your arms wide and shout "Safe!"

text: in 1968 poland expelled the last remaining jews from what once used to be the largest jewish settlement in the world , effectively ending over thousand year long history .
translation: 1968年、ポーランドはかつて世界で最大のユダヤ人居住地であった場所から最後のユダヤ人を追放し、千年以上にわたる歴史に実質的な終止符を打ちました。
back_translation: In 1968, Poland expelled the last Jews from what was once the largest Jewish settlement in the world, effectively putting an end to over a thousand years of history.

text: this is a true documentry of art versus money-driven media conglomerates .
translation: これは、アートと金銭主導のメディアコングロマリットの対立に関する真のドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: This is a true documentary about the conflict between art and money-driven media conglomerates.

text: whether seen on a 10-inch television screen or at your local multiplex , the edge-of-your-seat , educational antics of steve irwin are priceless entertainment .
translation: 10インチのテレビ画面で見ようと、地元の映画館で見ようと、スティーブ・アーウィンのハラハラするような教育的な活躍は、貴重なエンターテインメントです。
back_translation: Whether watching on a 10-inch TV screen or in a local movie theater, Steve Irwin's thrilling and educational adventures are a valuable form of entertainment.

text: but there is one major problem -- oscar 's true love is his stepmother eve .
translation: しかし、大きな問題があります。オスカーの本当の愛は継母のイヴです。
back_translation: However, there is a big problem. Oscar's true love is his stepmother Eve.

text: mocking kung fu pictures when they were a staple of exploitation theater programming was witty . mocking them now is an exercise in pointlessness .
translation: かつて搾取劇場のプログラムの定番だったカンフー映画を嘲笑するのはウィットに富んでいた。しかし今それを嘲笑するのは無意味な行為の延長に過ぎない。
back_translation: It was witty to mock kung fu movies, which were once a staple of the exploitation theater's program. However, now ridiculing them is merely an extension of a meaningless act.

text: in flashbacks that parallel his investigation , we see alicia , a scholarship girl worried about her grades , gradually pulled into the social life of three rich and amoral young women , led by the blond hadley , a femme fatale .
translation: フラッシュバックの中で、彼の調査と平行して、奨学金を持つアリシアが成績を気にしながら、金髪のファム・ファタールであるハドリーを中心とする3人の裕福で常識のない若い女性たちの社交生活に徐々に引き込まれていく様子が描かれています。
back_translation: In the flashback, alongside his investigation, it depicts how Alicia, who has a scholarship, is gradually drawn into the social life of three wealthy and oblivious young women centered around Hadley, the blonde femme fatale, while being concerned about her grades.

text: an experience so engrossing it is like being buried in a new environment .
translation: 新しい環境に埋まっているような、非常に没入感のある体験。
back_translation: An experience that feels very immersive, as if you are buried in a new environment.

text: long before it 's over , you 'll be thinking of 51 ways to leave this loser .
translation: 終わる前に、あなたはこの負け犬を逃げる51の方法を考えているでしょう。
back_translation: Before it ends, you might be thinking of 51 ways to escape this loser.

text: now even that joy will be stripped away as his son prepares to place him in a nursing home .
translation: 今、その喜びさえも奪われようとしている。彼の息子が彼を介護施設に入れる準備をしているからだ。
back_translation: Now, even that joy is about to be taken away. It is because his son is preparing to put him in a nursing home.

text: this is darkest drama reminiscent of antonin artaud 's literary experiments in psychoanalysis .
translation: これはアントワネット・アルトーの精神分析における文学的実験を思い起こさせる、最も暗いドラマです。
back_translation: This is the darkest drama that evokes the literary experiments of Antonin Artaud in psychoanalysis.

text: an 83 minute document of a project which started in a muddle , seesawed back and forth between controlling interests multiple times , then found its sweet spot
translation: 83分のドキュメントは、混乱の中で始まり、何度も利害関係者の間で揺れ動いた後、最終的に最適なポイントを見つけました。
back_translation: The 83-minute documentary began in confusion and after swaying back and forth among stakeholders, ultimately found the optimal point.

text: while grieving along with her parents and drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family , he finds himself falling in love with another woman , against his own best intentions .
translation: 彼は、両親と共に悲しみを抱え、家族のために正義を求める地区検事が提起した法的問題に巻き込まれながら、意図に反して別の女性に恋をしてしまうのです。
back_translation: He, burdened with grief alongside his parents, falls in love with another woman against his intentions while being involved in legal issues raised by the district attorney seeking justice for the family.

text: with salvage crews ordered to clear the crash zone for the busy easter traffic , the locals undertook their own salvage operation , making it their best easter ever .
translation: 救助隊が混雑するイースターの交通のために墜落現場を清掃するよう命じられる中、地元の人々は独自の救助活動を行い、彼らの最高のイースターを過ごしました。
back_translation: As rescue teams were ordered to clear the crash site due to congested Easter traffic, local residents conducted their own rescue efforts and had their best Easter.

text: trivial where it should be profound , and hyper-cliched where it should be sincere .
translation: 深くあるべきところで陳腐であり、誠実であるべきところで過度にクリシェになっている。
back_translation: It is banal where it should be profound, and overly clichéd where it should be sincere.

text: watching living actors interact against the lush , studied inertia of the backdrops gives us the impression of history come to life , or statues magically transformed into living creatures .
translation: 生きた俳優が豊かで緻密に作られた背景の不動の中で相互作用するのを見ることで、私たちは歴史が生き返った印象や、像が魔法のように生きた生き物に変わる印象を受けます。
back_translation: By observing living actors interacting within a richly and intricately crafted backdrop, we get the impression that history comes to life, and that statues magically transform into living beings.

text: unable to remember his name or anything from his past life , he can not get a job or an apartment , so he starts living on the outskirts of the city and slowly starts putting his life back on track .
translation: 彼は自分の名前や過去の生活のことを思い出せず、仕事やアパートを見つけることができないため、街の外れに住むようになり、徐々に人生を軌道に戻し始めます。
back_translation: He couldn't remember his name or his past life, and since he couldn't find a job or an apartment, he started living on the outskirts of the city, gradually beginning to get his life back on track.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: 多くの人がこの七面鳥にこれほど多くの時間とエネルギーを注いでいるのは、なんだか悲しい。
back_translation: It's somewhat sad that so many people are spending so much time and energy on this turkey.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering . instead , it 'll only put you to sleep .
translation: この耐えがたい映画は、あなたに存在の苦しみについて考えさせるためのものです。しかし、実際にはあなたを眠らせるだけです。
back_translation: This unbearable movie is meant to make you think about the pain of existence. However, in reality, it just makes you fall asleep.

text: i basically went in expecting garbage , but color me surprised when it actually turned out to be quite funny !
translation: 最初はクソみたいなものだと思っていたけど、実際にはかなり面白いと分かって驚きました！
back_translation: I initially thought it was a piece of crap, but I was surprised to find out that it was actually quite interesting!

text: hoffman 's performance is authentic to the core of his being .
translation: ホフマンのパフォーマンスは彼の存在の本質に忠実です。
back_translation: Hoffman's performance is true to the essence of his being.

text: they , the teen learns , have discovered a spring that makes them immortal .
translation: 彼らが発見したのは、不老不死にする泉であることを、十代の彼は学ぶ。
back_translation: What he learns as a teenager is that they discovered a fountain that grants immortality.

text: nair and writer laura cahill dare to build a movie around some flawed but rather unexceptional women , emerging with a fine character study that 's short on plot but rich in the tiny revelations of real life .
translation: ナイアーと作家ローラ・キャヒルは、欠点のあるが特に際立った女性たちをテーマにした映画を作ることに挑み、プロットは薄いが、実生活の小さな啓示に満ちた素晴らしいキャラクター研究を生み出しました。
back_translation: Neyer and writer Laura Cahill challenged themselves to create a film centered around flawed but particularly remarkable women, resulting in a plot that may be thin but is filled with wonderful character studies rich in small revelations from real life.

text: with its young cast and an appealing balance of uplifting attitude and irreverent humor , drumline has the potential to be a sleeper hit .
translation: 若いキャストと、 uplifting attitude と irreverent humor の魅力的なバランスを持つドラミラインは、スリーパーヒットになる可能性があります。
back_translation: The drama line, featuring a young cast and an appealing balance of uplifting attitude and irreverent humor, has the potential to become a sleeper hit.

text: largely , this is a movie that also does it by the numbers .
translation: 大まかに言えば、これは数字通りに進行する映画です。
back_translation: In general, this is a film that progresses literally according to the numbers.

text: seduction strikes steve and tracy , and steve and sean 's lives may never be the same again .
translation: 誘惑がスティーブとトレーシーを襲い、スティーブとショーンの人生は二度と以前のようにはならないかもしれない。
back_translation: Temptation strikes Steve and Tracy, and Steve and Sean's lives may never be the same again.

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you . . .
translation: それはあなたを恐ろしいほど不気味にさせるという珍しい特質を持っています。。。
back_translation: It has the rare quality of making you terrifyingly eerie...

text: . . . a trashy little bit of fluff stuffed with enjoyable performances and a bewildering sense of self-importance
translation: ・・・楽しめるパフォーマンスと混乱するような自己重要感で詰め込まれた、安っぽい小さな作品。
back_translation: ...A cheap little piece packed with enjoyable performances and a confusing sense of self-importance.

text: in his flight he encounters sonya , a young bosnian mother desperately trying to return home to see her son .
translation: 彼の逃避行の中で、彼は息子に会うために帰国しようと必死な若いボスニアの母親ソニャに出会う。
back_translation: During his escape, he meets Sonja, a desperate young Bosnian mother who is trying to return home to see her son.

text: the movie is essentially a series of fleetingly interesting actors ' moments .
translation: その映画は本質的に、瞬間的に興味深い俳優たちの瞬間のシリーズです。
back_translation: The movie is essentially a series of moments featuring intriguing actors.

text: she 's saving herself for her very shallow boyfriend , victor johnson ( kip pardue ) , who 's left the states to backpack across europe .
translation: 彼女はとても浅はかな彼氏、ビクター・ジョンソン（キップ・パーデュー）のために自分を保存しています。彼はアメリカを離れ、ヨーロッパをバックパックで巡る旅に出ています。
back_translation: She is holding herself back for her very shallow boyfriend, Victor Johnson (Kip Pardue). He has left America and is on a backpacking trip across Europe.

text: set from his college student years , to his first victims , his capture , escape from prison ( twice ) , his final killing spree to his trial , conviction and execution .
translation: 大学生時代から、最初の犠牲者、逮捕、2度の脱獄、最後の殺人 spree、裁判、有罪判決、そして死刑に至るまで。
back_translation: From my university days, to the first victim, arrests, two prison breaks, the final murder spree, trial, conviction, and ultimately the death penalty.

text: if you want a movie time trip , the 1960 version is a far smoother ride .
translation: もしタイムトリップの映画を楽しみたいなら、1960年版ははるかにスムーズな体験です。
back_translation: If you want to enjoy a time travel movie, the 1960 version offers a much smoother experience.

text: with a story inspired by the tumultuous surroundings of los angeles , where feelings of marginalization loom for every dreamer with a burst bubble , the dogwalker has a few characters and ideas , but it never manages to put them on the same path .
translation: ロサンゼルスの tumultuous な環境に触発された物語の中で、破裂した夢を持つすべての夢想者にとって疎外感が漂う中、ドッグウォーカーは数人のキャラクターとアイデアを持っていますが、それらを同じ道に導くことは決してできません。
back_translation: In a story inspired by the tumultuous environment of Los Angeles, amidst a sense of alienation for every dreamer with shattered dreams, the dog walker has several characters and ideas, but they can never lead them down the same path.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: 始まりは緊張感のある政治的かつ心理的スリラーですが、炸裂するタイムボムや他のハリウッドアクションのクリシェによって台無しにされます。
back_translation: It starts as a tense political and psychological thriller, but is ruined by exploding time bombs and other Hollywood action clichés.

text: if you are into splatter movies , then you will probably have a reasonably good time with the salton sea .
translation: もしあなたがスプラッタームービーが好きなら、『ソルトン・シー』を見てそれなりに楽しめるでしょう。
back_translation: If you like splatter movies, you'll probably enjoy watching "Salthan Sea" to a certain extent.

text: high in the mountains of macedonia a team of young film makers are making a documentary about katerina vandeva - a descendant of an ancient and very famous family .
translation: マケドニアの高山で、一群の若い映画製作者たちが、古代の非常に有名な家系の末裔であるカテリナ・ヴァンデバについてのドキュメンタリーを制作しています。
back_translation: In the highlands of Macedonia, a group of young filmmakers is creating a documentary about Katerina Vandeba, a descendant of a very famous ancient lineage.

text: by the end of the girl 's journey there is only one question to be answered : what is real and what is her imagination ?
translation: 少女の旅の終わりには、答えなければならないのはただ一つの問いです。それは、何が現実で何が彼女の想像なのかということです。
back_translation: At the end of the girl's journey, there is only one question that must be answered: what is reality and what is her imagination?

text: it comes the closest to any movie experience i 've had in re-creating the aftermath of unexplained suicide .
translation: それは、説明のつかない自殺のその後を再現する映画体験の中で、私が今までに味わった中で最も近いものです。
back_translation: It is the closest thing I have ever experienced to a cinematic experience that recreates the aftermath of an inexplicable suicide.

text: laugh-out-loud lines , adorably ditsy but heartfelt performances , and sparkling , bittersweet dialogue that cuts to the chase of the modern girl 's dilemma .
translation: 大声で笑えるセリフ、愛らしくおっちょこちょいだけど心のこもったパフォーマンス、そして現代の女の子のジレンマにズバッと切り込むきらめくようなビターでスウィートな対話。
back_translation: Lines that make you laugh out loud, an endearingly clumsy yet heartfelt performance, and sparkling bittersweet dialogue that sharply addresses the dilemmas of modern girls.

text: see clockstoppers if you have nothing better to do with 94 minutes . but be warned , you too may feel time has decided to stand still . or that the battery on your watch has died .
translation: 「もし94分間何もすることがないなら、『CLOCKSTOPPERS』を見てみてください。ただし注意してください、あなたも時間が止まったように感じるか、時計のバッテリーが切れたと感じるかもしれません。」
back_translation: "If you have nothing to do for 94 minutes, give 'CLOCKSTOPPERS' a try. But be careful, you might feel like time has stopped or that the clock battery has died."

text: twenty years later , e . t . is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: 20年後、E.T.は今でも映画の重要な作品です。
back_translation: Twenty years later, E.T. is still an important film work.

text: the girls have unwittingly botched up a diamond delivery to the middle east .
translation: 少女たちは知らず知らずのうちに中東へのダイヤモンド配達を台無しにしてしまった。
back_translation: The girls unintentionally ruined the diamond delivery to the Middle East.

text: ( wendigo is ) why we go to the cinema : to be fed through the eye , the heart , the mind .
translation: （ウィンディゴとは）なぜ私たちが映画館に行くのか：目、心、そして精神を通して満たされるため。
back_translation: (What is Wendigo) Why do we go to the cinema: to be fulfilled through our eyes, minds, and spirits.

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits . . . but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: 代替医療には明らかに利点がありますが、アーユルヴェーダはこの分野にとって何の助けにもなりません。
back_translation: Alternative medicine clearly has its benefits, but Ayurveda does not contribute anything to this field.

text: he goes to a small room downtown , where he finds some rich asian teenager punks who are slumming it in their own little kick pad .
translation: 彼はダウンタウンの小さな部屋に行き、そこで自分たちの小さなキックパッドで遊んでいる裕福なアジア人のティーンエイジャーのパンクたちを見つける。
back_translation: He goes to a small room in downtown and finds wealthy Asian teenage punks playing with their little kick pads there.

text: an eloquent , reflective and beautifully acted meditation on both the profoundly devastating events of one year ago and the slow , painful healing process that has followed in their wake .
translation: 一年前の深く壊滅的な出来事と、その後に続く緩やかで痛ましい癒しの過程についての、雄弁で思索的で美しく演じられた瞑想。
back_translation: A meditative reflection that is eloquent, contemplative, and beautifully presented, about a deeply devastating event from a year ago and the subsequent gradual and painful process of healing.

text: anna changes her mind : when some rich , ignorant american couple wondering about if they should buy the house asks for the swimming pool ( while the mediterranean is half a mile away ) , she simply doubles the charge , and finally puts the `` for sale `` plate into the garbage can .
translation: アンナは心変わりする。裕福で無知なアメリカのカップルが家を買うべきか悩んでいるとき、地中海が半マイル離れているにもかかわらずプールについて尋ねると、彼女は単純に料金を倍にし、最後には「売り出し中」のプレートをゴミ箱に捨てる。
back_translation: Anna has a change of heart. When a wealthy and ignorant American couple is debating whether to buy a house, she simply doubles the price when they inquire about the pool, which is half a mile away from the Mediterranean, and in the end, throws the "For Sale" sign into the trash.

text: this is one of mr . chabrol 's subtlest works , but also one of his most uncanny .
translation: これはシャブロル氏の最も微妙な作品の一つであり、しかし同時に彼の最も不気味な作品の一つでもあります。
back_translation: This is one of Mr. Chabrol's most subtle works, yet at the same time, it is also one of his most eerie works.

text: in his determination to lighten the heavy subject matter , silberling also , to a certain extent , trivializes the movie with too many nervous gags and pratfalls .
translation: シルバーリングは重いテーマを軽くするための決意の中で、あまりにも多くの神経質なギャグやドジを使うことで、映画をある程度軽薄にしてしまっています。
back_translation: The silver ring somewhat undermines the weighty theme by using too many nervous gags and blunders, making the film feel somewhat frivolous.

text: it 's the most nimble epic you 're likely to see .
translation: それはあなたが目にする可能性のある最も軽快な叙事詩です。
back_translation: It is the most lively epic you are likely to encounter.

text: after the fellowship has broken , merry and pippin , taken by orcs , make new allies in the ents , while legolas , gimli and aragorn make allies in the people of rohan , and all of them must launch an assault on isengard .
translation: fellowshipが壊れた後、メリーとピピンはオークに捕らえられ、エントたちと新しい同盟を結ぶ。一方、レゴラス、ギムリ、アラゴルンはローハンの人々と同盟を結び、彼ら全員がアイゼンガルドに攻撃を仕掛けなければならない。
back_translation: After the fellowship was broken, Merry and Pippin were captured by orcs and formed a new alliance with the Ents. Meanwhile, Legolas, Gimli, and Aragorn allied with the people of Rohan, and they all had to launch an attack on Isengard.

text: this charmless nonsense ensues amid clanging film references that make jay and silent bob 's excellent adventure seem understated .
translation: この魅力のないナンセンスは、ジェイとサイレントボブの素晴らしい冒険が控えめに思えるような轟音の映画参照が続く中で繰り広げられる。
back_translation: This unappealing nonsense unfolds amid a series of loud movie references that make Jay and Silent Bob's fantastic adventure seem almost modest.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped . for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: コメディとして宣伝されている映画にしては、「スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ」は期待したほど面白くありません。コメディとして宣伝されている映画にしては、「スウィート・ホーム・アラバマ」は期待したほど面白くありません。
back_translation: For a movie marketed as a comedy, "Sweet Home Alabama" is not as funny as I expected.

text: who is murdered & # 38 ; who is the murderer . . .
translation: 誰が殺され、誰が殺人者なのか。。。
back_translation: Who has been killed, and who is the murderer...?

text: but genevieve is anticipating exactly that type of response from starla and soon turns everyone , including starla 's friends and family , against her by playing the poor victim and making it appear that starla 's the aggressor .
translation: しかし、ジュヌビエーブはスターラからちょうどそのような反応を期待しており、すぐに全員を、スターラの友人や家族も含めて、彼女に対して敵に回させ、可哀想な被害者のふりをすることでスターラが攻撃者であるかのように見せかける。
back_translation: However, Geneviève was just expecting such a reaction from Starla, and soon made everyone, including Starla's friends and family, turn against her, making it seem like Starla was the attacker by pretending to be a pitiful victim.

text: aaliyah rarely dampens her diva persona enough to spark genuine chemistry with townsend . when she speaks , her creepy egyptian demigod voice is as computer processed and overproduced as it was in her music .
translation: アリーヤは、タウンゼントとの本物の化学反応を引き起こすために、彼女のディーバなペルソナをあまり和らげることはない。彼女が話すとき、その不気味なエジプトの半神の声は、彼女の音楽と同様にコンピュータ処理され、過剰にプロデュースされている。
back_translation: Aaliyah hardly tones down her diva persona to create a genuine chemistry with Townsend. When she speaks, that eerie, demigod-like voice reminiscent of Egypt is as digitally processed and overly produced as her music.

text: while staking out his next assignment -- the innocent girlfriend of his notorious boss -- contract killer malik reflects on the dark path he 's chosen but can not escape .
translation: 次の任務である悪名高いボスの無垢なガールフレンドを見張っている間、契約殺し屋マリクは自分が選んだ暗い道について反省するが、その道から逃れることはできない。
back_translation: While keeping an eye on the infamous boss's innocent girlfriend during his next mission, the contract killer Malik reflects on the dark path he has chosen, but cannot escape from it.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction . same guy with both hats . big mistake .
translation: 素晴らしい脚本がひどい監督によって台無しにされた。同じ人が両方の帽子をかぶっている。大きな間違いだ。
back_translation: A wonderful script has been ruined by a terrible director. The same person is wearing both hats. It's a big mistake.

text: rumours of haunting , paired with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that took place five years before , have kept the truth of holy angel 's last days buried with the innocent victims .
translation: 幽霊の噂と、5年前に起きた痛ましい悲劇を忘れたいという願望が、聖なる天使の最後の日々の真実を無実の犠牲者たちと共に埋もれさせている。
back_translation: The rumors of ghosts and the desire to forget the tragic events that occurred five years ago are burying the truth of the last days of the holy angels along with the innocent victims.

text: in the process , he comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: プロセスの中で、彼はコミックアーティストとして成功するためには、自身が出身のコミュニティと関わり、その経験を世に出し、作品に反映させる必要があることを理解していく。
back_translation: In the process, he comes to understand that in order to succeed as a comic artist, he needs to engage with the community he comes from, share his experiences with the world, and reflect them in his work.

text: the funny thing is , i did n't mind all this contrived nonsense a bit .
translation: 面白いことに、私はこの作り事のような無駄なことを全く気にしませんでした。
back_translation: Interestingly, I didn't care at all about this pointless thing that felt like a fabrication.

text: `` 13 conversations about one thing `` is an intelligent flick that examines many different ideas from happiness to guilt in an intriguing bit of storytelling .
translation: 「13の会話は一つのテーマについて」は、幸せから罪悪感までの多くの異なるアイデアを探求する興味深いストーリーテリングの知的な映画です。
back_translation: "13 Conversations About One Thing" is an intellectually engaging film that explores many different ideas, from happiness to guilt, through intriguing storytelling.

text: although attorney matt murdock is blind , his other four senses function with superhuman sharpness .
translation: 盲目の弁護士マット・マードックは、他の四つの感覚が超人的な鋭さで機能しています。
back_translation: Blind lawyer Matt Murdock has the other four senses functioning with superhuman sharpness.

text: soon , disease spread , robbing people 's abilities to speak ; the endless rain killing all other forms of communication with its acidic torrent .
translation: 間もなく、病気が広まり、人々の話す能力を奪い取ります；酸性の豪雨が他のすべてのコミュニケーションの形態を殺してしまいます。
back_translation: Soon, a disease will spread, robbing people of their ability to speak; acid rain will kill all other forms of communication.

text: maggie 's daughter is kidnapped , forcing father and estranged daughter to work together to get her back .
translation: マギーの娘が誘拐され、父親と疎遠になっていた娘が協力して彼女を取り戻すことを余儀なくされる。
back_translation: Maggie's daughter is kidnapped, and the daughter, who has become estranged from her father, is forced to cooperate in order to get her back.

text: it 's as if de palma spent an hour setting a fancy table and then served up kraft macaroni and cheese .
translation: まるでデ・パルマが素晴らしいテーブルを1時間かけて整えたのに、その後クラフトのマカロニチーズを出したかのようだ。
back_translation: It's as if De Palma spent an hour beautifully setting the table, only to serve Kraft mac and cheese afterward.

text: mature , graceful documentary on conservative christian parents with homosexual children .
translation: 成熟した優雅なドキュメンタリーで、同性愛の子どもを持つ保守的なクリスチャンの親たちを取り上げています。
back_translation: A mature and graceful documentary that features conservative Christian parents with LGBTQ children.

text: barry convinces us he 's a dangerous , secretly unhinged guy who could easily have killed a president because it made him feel powerful .
translation: バリーは、自分が危険で、密かに精神的に不安定な人間であり、権力を感じるために大統領を簡単に殺せたかもしれないと私たちを納得させます。
back_translation: Barry convincingly shows us that he is a dangerous and secretly mentally unstable person who could easily kill the president to feel a sense of power.

text: he is extremely strict at work and believes in pushing his workers to the limit .
translation: 彼は仕事において非常に厳格で、従業員を限界まで追い込むことを信じています。
back_translation: He is very strict in his work and believes in pushing employees to their limits.

text: staggers between flaccid satire and what is supposed to be madcap farce .
translation: 弛緩した風刺と狂気じみたファルスの間をよろめく。
back_translation: Wobbling between relaxed satire and maniacal farce.

text: the story is risen out of the conflicts between the white anglo-saxon `` natives `` and the irish immigrants coming into the five points .
translation: この物語は、ホワイト・アングロサクソンの「ネイティブ」と五ポイントにやってくるアイルランド移民との対立から生まれました。
back_translation: This story emerged from the conflict between the "natives" of White Anglo-Saxon descent and Irish immigrants arriving at Five Points.

text: . . . the one thing this wild film has that other imax films do n't : chimps , lots of chimps , all blown up to the size of a house . that 's fun for kids of any age .
translation: …このワイルドな映画が他のIMAX映画にない唯一のものは、チンパンジー、たくさんのチンパンジーで、すべて家のサイズに拡大されていることです。それはどの年齢の子供にとっても楽しめるものです。
back_translation: The only thing that sets this wild movie apart from other IMAX films is the chimpanzees—lots of them—each shown at home-sized scale. It's something that can be enjoyed by children of any age.

text: the classic tale of 'peter pan ' continues in disney 's sequel 'return to never land ' .
translation: ディズニーの続編「ネバーランドに戻る」で、クラシックな物語「ピーターパン」が続きます。
back_translation: In the Disney sequel "Return to Neverland," the classic story of "Peter Pan" continues.

text: a byzantine melodrama that stimulates the higher brain functions as well as the libido .
translation: 高次の脳機能とリビドーを刺激するビザンチン風メロドラマ。
back_translation: A Byzantine-style melodrama that stimulates higher brain functions and libido.

text: can those memories be strong enough to make them find their own ways , back in each others arms again ?
translation: その思い出は、彼らが再びお互いの腕の中に戻るための道を見つけるのに十分強いのでしょうか？
back_translation: Is that memory strong enough for them to find a way to return to each other's arms once again?

text: when tony takes her on a private cruise from greece to italy , amber is unimpressed at this impromptu no-frills vacation , and takes out her anger on the ship 's first mate , giuseppe ( adriano giannini ) .
translation: トニーがアンバーをギリシャからイタリアへのプライベートクルーズに連れて行くと、アンバーはこの即興の質素な休暇に感心せず、船の一等航海士ジュゼッペ（アドリアーノ・ジャンニーニ）に怒りをぶつける。
back_translation: When Tony takes Amber on a private cruise from Greece to Italy, Amber is unimpressed by this impromptu modest vacation and vents her anger at the ship's first mate, Giuseppe (Adriano Giannini).

text: exhibits the shallow sensationalism characteristic of soap opera . . . more salacious telenovela than serious drama .
translation: 昼ドラ特有の浅いセンセーショナリズムを示している……真剣なドラマというよりも、より扇情的なテレノベラ。
back_translation: It shows the shallow sensationalism characteristic of daytime dramas... more of an emotional telenovela than a serious drama.

text: warren schmidt ( nicholson ) is forced to deal with an ambiguous future as he enters retirement .
translation: ウォーレン・シュミット（ニコルソン）は、退職を迎えるにあたり、あいまいな未来に対処しなければならなくなります。
back_translation: Warren Schmidt (Nicholson) has to confront an uncertain future as he approaches retirement.

text: the story captures the dilemma of gifted musicians turning music into a professional career without losing artistic integrity and soul .
translation: この物語は、音楽の才能を持つミュージシャンが、芸術的な誠実さや魂を失うことなく音楽をプロのキャリアにするというジレンマを描いています。
back_translation: This story depicts the dilemma of a musician with musical talent who aims to turn their music into a professional career without losing artistic integrity or soul.

text: their brother was killed by a drug overdose a few years earlier and the gang is determined to keep drugs off their block .
translation: 彼らの兄は数年前に薬物過剰摂取で亡くなり、ギャングは自分たちの地域から薬物を排除する決意をしています。
back_translation: Their brother died a few years ago from a drug overdose, and the gang is determined to eliminate drugs from their neighborhood.

text: suffers from the lack of a compelling or comprehensible narrative . still , as a visual treat , the film is almost unsurpassed .
translation: 魅力的で理解できる物語が欠けているため苦しんでいる。しかし、視覚的な楽しみとしては、この映画はほぼ比類がない。
back_translation: The film suffers from a lack of an engaging and coherent story. However, as a visual spectacle, it is nearly unparalleled.

text: what jones needs , however , is not to be cured - but to be accepted for what and who he is .
translation: ジョーンズが必要としているのは、治療されることではなく、自分が何者であるかを受け入れてもらうことです。
back_translation: What Jones needs is not to be cured, but to be accepted for who he is.

text: the story has its redundancies , and the young actors , not very experienced , are sometimes inexpressive .
translation: 物語には冗長な部分があり、経験の少ない若い俳優たちは時々表現力に欠けています。
back_translation: The story has redundant parts, and the inexperienced young actors sometimes lack expressiveness.

text: between new york and california is the wasteland known as the plague zone .
translation: ニューヨークとカリフォルニアの間には、疫病地帯と呼ばれる荒地があります。
back_translation: Between New York and California, there is a wasteland known as the plague zone.

text: if you can push on through the slow spots , you 'll be rewarded with some fine acting .
translation: 遅い部分を乗り越えられれば、素晴らしい演技に出会えるでしょう。
back_translation: If you can overcome the slow parts, you will encounter a wonderful performance.

text: it 's at this point that he buys a pirate record whose magical powers bring him the success he 's longed for .
translation: この時点で彼は、彼が長い間望んでいた成功をもたらす魔法の力を持つ海賊版のレコードを買います。
back_translation: At this point, he buys a pirated record that has the magical power to bring him the success he has long desired.

text: when julius caesar gets wind of the project succeeding , he has the building site attacked by his troops in order to win the bet and not lose his face .
translation: ジュリアス・シーザーがプロジェクトの成功を知ると、彼はベットに勝ち、面子を失わないために部隊を派遣して建設現場を攻撃させる。
back_translation: When Julius Caesar learns of the project's success, he dispatches troops to attack the construction site in order to win the bet and not lose face.

text: you feel like you 're the one moving at 80 mph , not the street lugers .
translation: あなたは、ストリートルージャーではなく、自分が時速80マイルで動いているように感じます。
back_translation: You feel like you're moving at 80 miles per hour, not like a street loser.

text: the film is old-fashioned , occasionally charming and as subtle as boldface .
translation: この映画は古風で、時々魅力的で、太字と同じくらい微妙です。
back_translation: This movie is old-fashioned, occasionally charming, and as subtle as bold text.

text: but mathayus ends up getting much more than he bargained for .
translation: しかし、マタユスは思っていた以上のものを手に入れることになります。
back_translation: However, Matayus ends up obtaining more than he had anticipated.

text: offers a quieter version of the midlife-crisis roller coaster .
translation: ミッドライフクライシスのジェットコースターの静かなバージョンを提供します。
back_translation: I offer a calm version of the roller coaster of a midlife crisis.

text: as she learns more about her ex 's infidelity , she wonders if bogdan 's lifestyle may be preferable to the manipulative starkness of her ex that ultimately lead to his murder .
translation: 彼女は元パートナーの不貞についてもっと知るにつれ、ボグダンのライフスタイルが、最終的に彼の殺害につながった彼女の元パートナーの操作的な厳しさよりも好ましいのではないかと考える。
back_translation: As she learns more about her former partner's infidelity, she begins to think that Bogdan's lifestyle is preferable to the manipulative harshness of her former partner, which ultimately led to his death.

text: forgotten in the nearby camp of maslakh ( slaughterhouse ) 150 , 000 displaced afghans hardly survive .
translation: マスラフ（屠殺場）の近くのキャンプで忘れ去られた15万人の避難民アフガンは、ほとんど生き残ることができません。
back_translation: The 150,000 Afghan refugees forgotten in the camp near Masraf (the slaughterhouse) can hardly survive.

text: i suspect that you 'll be as bored watching morvern callar as the characters are in it . if you go , pack your knitting needles .
translation: モーヴァーン・カラを見るのは、登場人物たちが退屈しているのと同じくらい退屈だと思います。観に行くなら、編み物の針を持って行くといいでしょう。
back_translation: I think watching "Mauverne Cara" is as boring as the characters themselves are. If you're going to see it, you might as well bring some knitting needles with you.

text: bursting through the constraints of its source , this is one adapted- from-television movie that actually looks as if it belongs on the big screen .
translation: その出所の制約を打破して、この映画は実際に大画面にふさわしいように見えるテレビ映画の一つです。
back_translation: Breaking the constraints of its origin, this film is one that actually seems worthy of the big screen despite being a television movie.

text: a film about a young man finding god that is accessible and touching to the marrow .
translation: 神を見つける若者についての、心に響き、感動的な映画。
back_translation: A touching and heartwarming movie about a young man searching for God.

text: it 's gripping entertainment in a popular vein -- the police procedural -- that nevertheless follows no preconceived formulas .
translation: 人気のあるジャンルである警察小説の中で魅力的なエンターテインメントですが、あらかじめ決められた公式には従っていません。
back_translation: It is an attractive form of entertainment within the popular genre of police novels, but it does not adhere to a predetermined formula.

text: anything but a feel-good movie in its particulars , read my lips nonetheless communicates a liberating message as refreshing as it is peculiar .
translation: 具体的には気分が良くなるような映画ではないが、「リード・マイ・リップス」は、それでも独特でありながら爽快な解放感を伝えている。
back_translation: Specifically, it is not a movie that makes you feel good, but "Read My Lips" still conveys a unique and refreshing sense of liberation.

text: in its treatment of the dehumanizing and ego-destroying process of unemployment , time out offers an exploration that is more accurate than anything i have seen in an american film .
translation: 失業という非人間化され、自己を破壊するプロセスの描写において、『タイム・アウト』は、私がアメリカの映画で見た中で最も正確な探求を提供している。
back_translation: In its depiction of unemployment as a dehumanizing and self-destructive process, "Time Out" offers the most accurate exploration I have seen in American cinema.

text: rehearsals are frequently more fascinating than the results . last dance , whatever its flaws , fulfills one facet of its mission in making me want to find out whether , in this case , that 's true .
translation: リハーサルは結果よりもしばしば魅力的です。最後のダンスは、欠点があっても、私がこの場合にそれが真実であるかどうかを知りたいと思わせるという使命の一面を果たしています。
back_translation: Rehearsals are often more captivating than the results. The final dance, despite its flaws, serves to make me want to know whether this is true in this case.

text: they get on from the word go , but now dad needs a liver transplant and ludvig and harald set about raising the wherewithal .
translation: 彼らは最初から仲が良いが、今、父は肝臓移植が必要で、ルドヴィグとハラルドは資金を集めることに取り掛かる。
back_translation: They have always had a good relationship, but now their father needs a liver transplant, and Ludvig and Harald start to raise funds.

text: after a dream of a horrific car crash , kimberly helps save several people and causes another rift in death 's design , but this time its different , since alex walked off the plane death 's design did not only affect the survivors of flight 180 , but every single person they 've come in contact with , now how will they stop it ?
translation: 恐ろしい車の衝突の夢の後、キンバリーは何人かの人々を救助し、死のデザインに別の亀裂を引き起こしますが、今回は異なります。アレックスが飛行機を降りたため、死のデザインはフライト180の生存者だけでなく、彼らが接触したすべての人々にも影響を与えました。彼らはそれをどうやって止めるのでしょうか？
back_translation: After a terrifying dream of a car crash, Kimberly rescues some people and triggers another crack in the design of death, but this time it’s different. Because Alex got off the plane, the design of death affects not only the survivors of Flight 180 but also everyone they came into contact with. How will they stop it?

text: one of the greatest romantic comedies of the past decade .
translation: 過去10年の中で最も偉大なロマンティックコメディの一つ。
back_translation: One of the greatest romantic comedies of the past decade.

text: aida ( yvette freemen ) is the overworked er nurse treating frankie 's fractures .
translation: アイダ（イヴェット・フリーマン）は、フランキーの骨折を治療している忙しいER看護師です。
back_translation: Aida (Yvette Freeman) is a busy ER nurse treating Frankie's broken bone.

text: i was sent a copyof this film to review on dvd . for free . i still want my money back .
translation: この映画のDVDレビュー用のコピーを無料で送られましたが、それでも返金してほしいです。
back_translation: I received a copy for the DVD review of this movie for free, but I still want a refund.

text: but the record industry has passed them by^ & # 197 ; so has the general public whose musical tastes are continually changing .
translation: しかし、レコード業界は彼らを置いてきぼりにし、一般の人々も音楽の好みが常に変化しています。
back_translation: However, the record industry has left them behind, and the general public's taste in music is constantly changing.

text: ever see one of those comedies that just seem like a bad idea from frame one ?
translation: 最初のフレームから悪いアイデアのように見えるコメディ映画を見たことがありますか？
back_translation: Have you ever seen a comedy movie that seemed like a bad idea from the very first frame?

text: mib ii is a movie that makes it possible for the viewer to doze off for a few minutes or make several runs to the concession stand and/or restroom and not feel as if he or she has missed anything . that 's because relatively nothing happens .
translation: MIB IIは、観客が数分間うとうとしたり、複数回コンセッションスタンドやトイレに行ったりしても、何かを逃したとは感じさせない映画です。それは、比較的何も起こらないからです。
back_translation: MIB II is a movie that makes the audience feel like they haven't missed anything even if they doze off for a few minutes or go to the concession stand or restrooms multiple times. This is because relatively little happens in the film.

text: although commentary on nachtwey is provided . . . it 's the image that really tells the tale .
translation: ナハトウェイに関するコメントは提供されていますが、実際に物語を語るのはそのイメージです。
back_translation: Comments about Nachtwey are provided, but it is the images that truly tell the story.

text: though there are many tense scenes in trapped , they prove more distressing than suspenseful .
translation: 『トラップド』には緊張感のあるシーンが多いが、それらはサスペンスよりもむしろ苦痛を感じさせるものになっている。
back_translation: "Trapped" has many tense scenes, but they evoke more of a sense of pain rather than suspense.

text: it 's plotless , shapeless -- and yet , it must be admitted , not entirely humorless . indeed , the more outrageous bits achieve a shock-you-into-laughter intensity of almost dadaist proportions .
translation: プロットも形もないけれど、全くユーモアがないわけではないことは認めざるを得ない。実際、より過激な部分は、ほとんどダダ的な大きさの衝撃で笑わせる強度を持っている。
back_translation: Although it has neither a plot nor a form, I can't deny that it isn't completely devoid of humor. In fact, the more extreme parts possess a strength that makes one laugh with a shock of almost Dadaist magnitude.

text: in his way , meets prosit , a german villain on a persistant mission to find pots of gold in the superstition montains .
translation: 彼の道で、彼はスーパースティション山脈で金の鉢を見つけるための執拗な使命を持ったドイツの悪党プロジットに出会う。
back_translation: On his way, he meets a German villain named Projitt, who has an obsessive mission to find a golden bowl in the Superstition Mountains.

text: when they goes to the fence to get them , they discover that someone stole them .
translation: 彼らがフェンスに行ってそれを取りに行くと、誰かがそれを盗んだことがわかります。
back_translation: When they go to the fence to retrieve it, they realize that someone has stolen it.

text: in verifying information , she interviews the narrator and becomes his lover .
translation: 情報を確認するために、彼女は語り手にインタビューをし、彼の愛人になります。
back_translation: To verify the information, she interviews the narrator and becomes his lover.

text: a friendship without a future is the only friendship possible for these two men .
translation: 未来のない友情は、この二人の男にとって唯一可能な友情である。
back_translation: A friendship without a future is the only possible friendship for these two men.

text: when not solving murders in tinseltown , detective joe gavilan and his rookie partner kasey calden both moonlight in other fields : gavilan sells real estate ( poorly ) , and calden aspires to become an actor ( brando , namely ) .
translation: ティンセルタウンで殺人事件を解決していないとき、探偵ジョー・ガビランと彼のルーキーのパートナーケイジー・カルデンはそれぞれ別の仕事を掛け持ちしています。ガビランは不動産を売っています（下手ですが）、そしてカルデンは俳優になることを目指しています（特にブランド）。
back_translation: When not solving murder cases in Tinseltown, detective Joe Gavilan and his rookie partner K.C. Calden are each juggling different jobs. Gavilan is selling real estate (not very well), and Calden is aiming to become an actor (especially in commercials).

text: i certainly found its depiction of a family affected by grief far more believable and effective than the strident dish-breaking , breast-beating of in the bedroom .
translation: 私は、家庭が悲しみに影響される様子の描写が、寝室での物を壊したり、胸を打ち鳴らしたりする力強い表現よりもはるかに信じられ、効果的だと感じました。
back_translation: I felt that the depiction of how a family is affected by sorrow is far more believable and effective than the powerful expressions of breaking things in the bedroom or beating one's chest.

text: lightly reflective and consistently entertaining , lucky break is an easy-to-take diversion .
translation: 軽く反射するようで、常に楽しい「ラッキーブレイク」は、気軽に楽しめる気晴らしです。
back_translation: "Lucky Break," which seems to reflect lightly and is always enjoyable, is a casual diversion that can be enjoyed easily.

text: overall , it 's a wacky and inspired little film that works effortlessly at delivering genuine , acerbic laughs .
translation: 全体として、これは奇妙で着想に富んだ小さな映画であり、本物の辛辣な笑いを容易に提供することに成功しています。
back_translation: Overall, this is a strange and imaginative little film that succeeds in easily delivering genuine, biting humor.

text: `` an entire film about researchers quietly reading dusty old letters . ``
translation: 古びた手紙を静かに読む研究者たちについての映画全体。
back_translation: A film about researchers quietly reading old letters.

text: his half-sister 's threats to pay back the enormous debts with the mafia has put a lot of pressure at his marriage .
translation: 彼の義理の姉がマフィアで膨大な借金を返済するという脅しをかけたことで、彼の結婚に大きなプレッシャーがかかっています。
back_translation: His sister-in-law, who is in the mafia, has threatened him to repay her huge debts, putting a lot of pressure on his marriage.

text: despite an impressive roster of stars and direction from kathryn bigelow , the weight of water is oppressively heavy .
translation: 印象的なスターのキャストとキャサリン・ビグローの監督にもかかわらず、「ウエイト・オブ・ウォーター」は圧倒的に重い作品です。
back_translation: Despite the impressive star cast and direction by Kathryn Bigelow, "The Weight of Water" is an overwhelmingly heavy work.

text: charlie is heartbroken when his girlfriend of three years , mallory , breaks up with him .
translation: チャーリーは、3年間付き合っていた彼女のマロリーに振られて心を痛めています。
back_translation: Charlie is heartbroken after being dumped by his girlfriend Mallory, with whom he had been in a relationship for three years.

text: the first mistake , i suspect , is casting shatner as a legendary professor and kunis as a brilliant college student -- where 's pauly shore as the rocket scientist ?
translation: 最初のミスは、シャトナーを伝説的な教授として、キュニスを優秀な大学生としてキャスティングしたことではないかと思います -- ロケット科学者としてポーリー・ショアはどこにいるのでしょうか？
back_translation: I think the first mistake was casting Shatner as a legendary professor and Kunis as an outstanding college student -- where is Pauly Shore as the rocket scientist?

text: now all they have to do is pick the right guy .
translation: 今、彼らがしなければならないのは、正しい男を選ぶことだけです。
back_translation: What they have to do now is simply choose the right man.

text: when dwindling membership and increasing overheads makes a local bowling club and prime candidate for a takeover , it 's all hands on deck to save the club , in what turns into an epic battle where young meets old , greed meets good and people rise to the occasion in extraordinary circumstances .
translation: 会員の減少と経費の増加が地元のボウリングクラブを買収の候補にする中、クラブを救うために全員が力を合わせることになります。そこには、若者と老年者の対立、欲望と善の衝突、そして人々が非凡な状況で立ち上がる壮大な戦いが繰り広げられます。
back_translation: As the decrease in membership and increase in expenses make the local bowling club a candidate for acquisition, everyone comes together to save the club. There, a grand struggle unfolds featuring the conflict between youth and the elderly, the clash between desire and goodness, and people rising to the occasion in extraordinary circumstances.

text: this sets off an irrevocable chain of events that lead to aravasu losing his love , paravasu desecrating the great sacrifice , the creation of a demon and the deaths of yavakri and raibhya .
translation: これはアラヴァスが愛を失い、パラヴァスが偉大な犠牲を冒涜し、悪魔が創造され、ヤヴァクリとライブヤが死に至る不可逆的な一連の出来事を引き起こす。
back_translation: This triggers an irreversible series of events in which Aravas loses love, Paravas profanes a great sacrifice, demons are created, and Yavakuri and Raibeya come to their death.

text: two brothers , leon and bobby are members of the street gang in brooklyn known as the deuces .
translation: 2人の兄弟、レオンとボビーは、ブルックリンで「デューシーズ」として知られるストリートギャングのメンバーです。
back_translation: Two brothers, Leon and Bobby, are members of a street gang known as "Dewsees" in Brooklyn.

text: bennie may not be who she seems , and there may be a chink in banks 's tough-guy armor .
translation: ベニーは見かけ通りではないかもしれず、バンクスのタフガイの鎧に亀裂があるかもしれません。
back_translation: Benny may not be what he seems, and Banks' tough-guy armor might have cracks in it.

text: director roger michell does so many of the little things right that it 's difficult not to cuss him out severely for bungling the big stuff .
translation: 監督のロジャー・ミッシェルは、小さなことを多く正しく行うので、大きなことを失敗したことに対してひどく彼を罵倒するのが難しい。
back_translation: Director Roger Michell does many small things correctly, so it's hard to severely criticize him for the big mistakes he makes.

text: the film is told in flashbacks with a female reporter interviewing gale .
translation: その映画はフラッシュバックを通じて語られ、女性記者がゲイルにインタビューを行います。
back_translation: The movie is told through flashbacks, with a female reporter interviewing Gale.

text: on her last day alive , she develops an unusual relationship with kevin , a bisexual hustler specializing in `` freaks . ``
translation: 彼女の最後の日、彼女は「フリーク」を専門とするバイセクシャルのハスラー、ケビンとの異常な関係を築く。
back_translation: On her last day, she forms an unusual relationship with Kevin, a bisexual hustler who specializes in "freaks."

text: enter the beautiful and mysterious secret agent petra schmitt .
translation: 美しく神秘的な秘密エージェント、ペトラ・シュミットが登場します。
back_translation: The beautiful and mysterious secret agent, Petra Schmidt, makes her appearance.

text: ' . . . both hokey and super-cool , and definitely not in a hurry , so sit back , relax and have a few laughs while the little ones get a fuzzy treat . '
translation: 「…両方ともちょっと滑稽で超クールで、絶対に急いではいないので、リラックスして座り直し、少し笑いながら、小さな子供たちがふわふわのおやつを楽しむのを見守ってください。」
back_translation: "...both are a bit ridiculous and super cool, definitely not in a hurry, so sit back and relax, while smiling a little, watching the little children enjoy their fluffy snacks."

text: does not go far enough in its humor or stock ideas to stand out as particularly memorable or even all that funny .
translation: ユーモアや既成のアイデアが十分に踏み込んでおらず、特に記憶に残るものやそれほど面白くもない。
back_translation: The humor and conventional ideas do not delve deeply enough, making it particularly unmemorable and not very funny.

text: most new movies have a bright sheen . some , like ballistic , arrive stillborn . . . looking like the beaten , well-worn video box cover of seven years into the future .
translation: ほとんどの新しい映画は明るい光沢を持っています。一部の映画、例えば「バリスティック」は、生まれた時から死んでいるように感じます。…未来の7年後の擦り切れた、よく使われたビデオボックスのカバーのように見えるのです。
back_translation: Most new movies have a bright sheen. Some movies, like "Ballistic," feel like they've been dead since their inception. They look like a worn-out, well-used video box cover from seven years in the future.

text: speaking in terms of spectacle , craft , romance and humor , it 's the movie to beat this summer .
translation: スペクタクル、技術、ロマンス、ユーモアの観点から言えば、この夏に打ち負かすべき映画です。
back_translation: From the perspective of spectacle, technology, romance, and humor, this is the movie to beat this summer.

text: a compassionate , moving portrait of an american ( and an america ) always reaching for something just outside his grasp .
translation: 常に手の届かない何かを求め続けるアメリカ人（とアメリカ）の、思いやりに満ちた感動的な肖像。
back_translation: A compassionate and moving portrait of Americans (and America) who continuously seek something just out of reach.

text: despite its faults , this is a fascinating look at a subculture .
translation: 欠点があるにもかかわらず、これはサブカルチャーに対する魅力的な視点です。
back_translation: Despite its shortcomings, this is an appealing perspective on subculture.

text: the early and middle passages are surprising in how much they engage and even touch us . this is not a classical dramatic animated feature , nor a hip , contemporary , in-jokey one . it 's sort of in-between , and it works .
translation: 初期と中盤のパッセージは、私たちにどれほど関与し、感動を与えるかという点で驚くべきものです。これは古典的なドラマティックなアニメーション映画でもなく、流行に敏感な現代的なジョーク満載の作品でもありません。それはその中間に位置しており、機能しています。
back_translation: The early and mid passages are remarkable in how much they engage and move us. It is neither a classic dramatic animated film nor a trendy modern work full of jokes. It occupies a space in between and works effectively.

text: son of the bride is slight fare , but it does have it poignancies , and it is well-acted and sweet without being cloying .
translation: 花嫁の息子は少々薄味ですが、感動的な要素があり、過度にならずに素晴らしく演じられ、甘さも持っています。
back_translation: The bride's son is somewhat mild in flavor, but it has emotional elements, is performed wonderfully without being excessive, and has a sweetness to it.

text: in its dry and forceful way , it delivers the same message as jiri menzel 's closely watched trains and danis tanovic 's no man 's land .
translation: その乾燥した力強い方法で、それはイジリ・メンゼルの『注目の列車』やダニス・タノビッチの『ノー・マンズ・ランド』と同じメッセージを伝えています。
back_translation: In that dry yet vigorous manner, it conveys the same message as Iggy Menzel's "Attention Train" and Danis Tanovic's "No Man's Land."

text: each story is built on a potentially interesting idea , but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting , while the third feels limited by its short running time .
translation: 各ストーリーは潜在的に興味深いアイデアに基づいていますが、最初の二つは素人のような書き方と演技によって台無しになっており、三つ目は短い上映時間によって制約を受けているように感じます。
back_translation: Each story is based on potentially interesting ideas, but the first two are ruined by amateurish writing and acting, while the third feels constrained by its short runtime.

text: nothing short of a respectful testament to the ingenious creative drive of the outsider .
translation: 外部者の巧妙な創造力に対する敬意を表する証と言っても過言ではありません。
back_translation: It is not an exaggeration to say that it is a testament to the respect for the clever creativity of outsiders.

text: though in some ways similar to catherine breillat 's fat girl , rain is the far superior film .
translation: カトリーヌ・ブレイヤの『太った女の子』に似ている点もあるが、『レイン』は遥かに優れた映画である。
back_translation: While there are similarities to Catherine Breillat's "Fat Girl," "Rain" is a far superior film.

text: tonight there 's a dancing competition at the hottest salsa restaurant in copenhagen .
translation: 今夜、コペンハーゲンで最も人気のあるサルサレストランでダンスコンペティションがあります。
back_translation: Tonight, there is a dance competition at the most popular salsa restaurant in Copenhagen.

text: the film thrusts the inchoate but already eldritch christian right propaganda machine into national media circles .
translation: その映画は、未成熟でありながらすでに不気味なクリスチャン・ライトのプロパガンダ機構を全国メディアのサークルに押し込む。
back_translation: The film pushes the immature yet already eerie Christian right propaganda machine into the national media circles.

text: in a generation of individuals , they struggle to choose love .
translation: 愛を選ぶことに苦しむ世代の人々。
back_translation: People of a generation struggling to choose love.

text: driven by romantic illusion to join the french foreign legion , simon learns what it truly means to be a hero .
translation: ロマンチックな幻想に駆られてフランス外人部隊に入隊したサイモンは、真のヒーローであることの意味を学ぶ。
back_translation: Driven by romantic illusions, Simon joins the French Foreign Legion and learns the meaning of being a true hero.

text: this movie is maddening . it conveys a simple message in a visual style that is willfully overwrought .
translation: この映画は狂気じみている。視覚的なスタイルが意図的に過剰で、シンプルなメッセージを伝えている。
back_translation: This movie is insane. Its visual style is intentionally excessive, conveying a simple message.

text: until one night max had a dream , where he dreamt that his mother died in a car crash .
translation: ある晩、マックスは夢を見ました。彼は母親が車の事故で亡くなる夢を見たのです。
back_translation: One night, Max had a dream. He dreamed that his mother had died in a car accident.

text: as he spirals into a series of hallucinations , the line between his sister 's death and ellen 's disappearance blurs .
translation: 彼が一連の幻覚に陥るにつれて、彼の姉の死とエレンの失踪の境界がぼやけていく。
back_translation: As he falls into a series of hallucinations, the boundary between his sister's death and Ellen's disappearance becomes blurred.

text: a surprisingly good-natured throwback to the '80s heyday of the body-switching genre .
translation: 驚くほど好意的な、1980年代のボディスイッチジャンルの全盛期への回帰。
back_translation: A surprisingly positive return to the heyday of the body-swap genre of the 1980s.

text: sometimes charming , sometimes infuriating , this argentinean 'dramedy ' succeeds mainly on the shoulders of its actors .
translation: 時には魅力的で、時には苛立たせるこのアルゼンチンの「ドラマコメディ」は、主にその俳優たちの力によって成功しています。
back_translation: This Argentine "dramedy," which is sometimes charming and sometimes frustrating, primarily succeeds due to the talent of its actors.

text: a generic international version of a typical american horror film .
translation: 典型的なアメリカのホラー映画の一般的な国際版。
back_translation: A typical international version of an American horror movie.

text: what begins as a seemingly brainless , bubbly romantic comedy becomes a cliche-drenched melodrama by mid-film and , by film 's end , a feminist action fantasy .
translation: 一見、脳みそがないような、陽気なロマンティックコメディとして始まるものが、中盤でクリシェに満ちたメロドラマになり、映画の終わりにはフェミニストアクションファンタジーになります。
back_translation: What starts off as a seemingly light-hearted romantic comedy that appears brainless turns into a cliched melodrama in the middle, and by the end of the movie, it evolves into a feminist action fantasy.

text: beyond borders is an epic tale of the turbulent romance between two star-crossed lovers set against the backdrop of the world 's most dangerous hot spots .
translation: 「境界を越えて」は、世界で最も危険なホットスポットを背景に、運命に翻弄される二人の恋人たちの激動のロマンスを描いた壮大な物語です。
back_translation: "Beyond the Borders" is an epic story that depicts the turbulent romance of two lovers whose fates are intertwined against the backdrop of the world's most dangerous hotspots.

text: a budget affair that exposes the generally sad existence of the bedouins while providing a precious twinkle of insight into their lives .
translation: ベドウィンの一般的に悲しい存在を暴露しつつ、彼らの生活に対する貴重な洞察を提供する、予算制限のある作品。
back_translation: A budget-limited work that exposes the generally sad existence of the Bedouins while providing valuable insights into their way of life.

text: learn about competitions such as k- ! , the world 's most popular martial arts competition .
translation: K-1などの競技について学ぶこと、これは世界で最も人気のある武道競技です。
back_translation: Learning about competitions like K-1, this is one of the most popular martial arts competitions in the world.

text: ultimately , anime moves far beyond the realm of simple cartoons , encompassing a sensuous melange of complex storytelling , cutting edge imagery , music and fashion .
translation: 最終的に、アニメは単純なアニメーションの領域を超え、複雑なストーリーテリング、最先端のビジュアル、音楽、ファッションが混ざり合った官能的なメランジュを包含しています。
back_translation: Ultimately, anime transcends the realm of simple animation, encompassing a sensual mélange of complex storytelling, cutting-edge visuals, music, and fashion.

text: amold & oacute ; var is a master of emotional texture , peeling away layer upon layer of the feelings . . . until he reaches benigno 's troubled psyche and marco 's benevolent soul .
translation: アモルド・バールは感情の質感の達人であり、感情の層を一つ一つ剥がしていきます。…彼がベニーノの苦悩する心とマルコの慈悲深い魂に到達するまで。
back_translation: Amoldo Baal is a master of the texture of emotions, peeling away each layer of feeling... until he reaches the tormented heart of Benino and the compassionate soul of Marco.

text: while it 's genuinely cool to hear characters talk about early rap records ( sugar hill gang , etc . ) , the constant referencing of hip-hop arcana can alienate even the savviest audiences .
translation: キャラクターが初期のラップレコード（シュガーヒルギャングなど）について話すのは本当にクールですが、ヒップホップの奥深い知識が頻繁に引用されると、最も精通した観 audience さえも疎外してしまうことがあります。
back_translation: It's really cool when characters talk about early rap records (like Sugarhill Gang), but when deep knowledge of hip-hop is frequently referenced, it can alienate even the most knowledgeable audience.

text: what better message than 'love thyself ' could young women of any size receive ?
translation: 「自分を愛しなさい」というメッセージよりも、どんなサイズの若い女性が受け取るべきより良いメッセージはありますか？
back_translation: Is there a better message that young women of any size should receive than "Love yourself"?

text: if the film fails to fulfill its own ambitious goals , it nonetheless sustains interest during the long build-up of expository material .
translation: もし映画が自身の野心的な目標を達成できなくても、長い説明的な素材の積み重ねの間、なお興味を引き続ける。
back_translation: Even if the movie fails to achieve its ambitious goals, it still keeps the interest alive throughout the long accumulation of explanatory material.

text: a model of what films like this should be like .
translation: このような映画のモデル。
back_translation: A model for such a movie.

text: every single scene conveys a significant and concise narrative development , yet does so in an unassuming , patient fashion that emphasizes detail .
translation: すべてのシーンは重要で簡潔な物語の展開を伝えており、控えめで忍耐強い方法でそれを行い、細部を強調しています。
back_translation: Every scene conveys an important and concise development of the story, doing so in a modest and patient manner while emphasizing the details.

text: but still , the killings do not stop with his death .
translation: しかし、彼の死と共に殺人は止まることはありません。
back_translation: However, murder will not stop with his death.

text: a solid piece of journalistic work that draws a picture of a man for whom political expedience became a deadly foreign policy .
translation: 政治的便宜主義が致命的な外交政策となった男の姿を描いた、確かなジャーナリズムの作品。
back_translation: A work of solid journalism depicting the man whose political expediency became a fatal foreign policy.

text: the script is a tired one , with few moments of joy rising above the stale material .
translation: 脚本は疲れ切ったもので、古臭い素材の中で喜びが浮かび上がる瞬間はほとんどありません。
back_translation: The script is exhausted, and there are hardly any moments of joy that rise above the old, worn-out material.

text: a hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel story of youth culture .
translation: 催眠的なサイバー賛美歌と青春文化の残酷な物語。
back_translation: A hypnotic cyber hymn and a cruel tale of youth culture.

text: gus sits on the sofa and talks about being the world 's oldest pothead , who started smoking in 1936 .
translation: ガスはソファに座り、1936年にタバコを吸い始めた世界で最も古いヘビースモーカーであることについて話しています。
back_translation: Gas is sitting on the sofa and talking about being the world's oldest heavy smoker, having started smoking in 1936.

text: former caa power broker , michael ovitz is probably very sorry he ever decided to do that vanity fair interview .
translation: 元CAAの権力者、マイケル・オビッツは、自分があのヴァニティフェアのインタビューを受けることに決めたことを非常に後悔しているだろう。
back_translation: The former CAA power player, Michael Ovitz, must deeply regret his decision to give that Vanity Fair interview.

text: for the past seven years mel bishop , a cold-blooded old west outlaw , had rotted away in a filthy mexican prison .
translation: 過去7年間、冷酷な西部の無法者メル・ビショップは、汚れたメキシコの監獄で朽ち果てていた。
back_translation: For the past seven years, the ruthless western outlaw Mel Bishop had been rotting away in a filthy Mexican prison.

text: not a bad choice here , assuming that . . . the air-conditioning in the theater is working properly .
translation: 悪くない選択です、前提として…劇場のエアコンが正常に作動していることを。
back_translation: It's not a bad choice, provided that... the theater's air conditioning is functioning normally.

text: using fossilized dna , a scientist resurrects one of nature 's most fearsome predators , a sabretooth tiger .
translation: 化石化したDNAを使用して、科学者は自然界で最も恐ろしい捕食者の一つであるサーベルタイガーを復活させます。
back_translation: Using fossilized DNA, scientists are bringing back the saber-toothed tiger, one of the most fearsome predators in the natural world.

text: with a little help from the well connected and seductive daughter of a columbian gangster , he becomes a drug kingpin with a nationwide monopoly on drug running .
translation: コロンビアのギャングのよくつながった魅力的な娘の少しの助けを借りて、彼は全国的な麻薬密輸の独占を持つ麻薬王になる。
back_translation: With a little help from a well-connected and charming girl from a Colombian gang, he becomes a drug kingpin with a nationwide monopoly on drug trafficking.

text: leela is a true reflection of how the south asian-american community is beginning to emerge , blend , and influence the mainstream american culture in its own exquisite ways .
translation: リーラは、南アジア系アメリカ人コミュニティがどのように成長し、融合し、主流のアメリカ文化に独自の素晴らしい方法で影響を与え始めているかを真に反映しています。
back_translation: Leela truly reflects how the South Asian American community is growing, integrating, and beginning to influence mainstream American culture in its own wonderful ways.

text: he is a gentle , philosophical guy , and she works on the checkout at a supermarket .
translation: 彼は穏やかで哲学的な男で、彼女はスーパーマーケットのレジで働いています。
back_translation: He is a calm and philosophical man, and she works at the checkout in a supermarket.

text: it trusts the story it sets out to tell .
translation: それは語ろうとする物語を信じています。
back_translation: It believes in the story that wants to be told.

text: thus when he surprisingly gets an email from american film producer alex brubeck who writes that he had liked the script and would like to meet him personally , tam & # 225 ; s sees all his dreams come true .
translation: そのため、彼がアメリカの映画プロデューサー、アレックス・ブルベックから驚くべきことにメールを受け取り、その中で彼がスクリプトを気に入ったこと、そして彼と個人的に会いたいと言っているのを知ったとき、タムの夢はすべて叶ったように思える。
back_translation: For that reason, when he surprisingly received an email from American film producer Alex Blubek, in which he expressed that he liked the script and wanted to meet him in person, it seemed like all of Tam's dreams had come true.

text: just as he begins to suspect the movie is ruining his love life , his world is turned inside-out by a girl who just might be the modern equivalent of annie hall herself .
translation: 彼が映画が自分の恋愛生活を台無しにしているのではないかと疑い始めた頃、彼の世界は、まさにアニー・ホールの現代版とも言える女の子によってひっくり返される。
back_translation: Just when he started to suspect that movies were ruining his love life, his world is turned upside down by a girl who can be called a modern version of Annie Hall.

text: at this , he loses his temper and gets physical with the employee .
translation: これに対し、彼は怒りを爆発させ、従業員に対して暴力的になる。
back_translation: In response to this, he erupts in anger and becomes violent towards the employees.
