text: for this sort of thing to work , we need agile performers , but the proficient , dull sorvino has no light touch , and rodan is out of his league .
translation: このようなことを成功させるためには、機敏なパフォーマーが必要ですが、熟練した鈍いソルヴィーノには繊細さがなく、ロダンは自分のレベルを超えています。
back_translation: To achieve such a thing, agile performers are needed, but the skilled yet dull Solvyn lacks finesse, and Rodin is beyond his own level.

text: if you open yourself up to mr . reggio 's theory of this imagery as the movie 's set . . . it can impart an almost visceral sense of dislocation and change .
translation: もしあなたがレッジオ氏のこのイメージの理論に心を開くなら、映画のセットとしてのそれは、ほとんど肉体的な不安定さと変化の感覚を伝えることができます。
back_translation: If you are open to Mr. Reggio's theory of this imagery, it can convey a sense of almost physical instability and change as a movie set.

text: because the flag is dirty , the teacher asks them to take it home and to wash it .
translation: 旗が汚れているので、先生は彼らにそれを家に持ち帰って洗うように言います。
back_translation: The teacher tells them to take the flag home and wash it because it is dirty.

text: far from perfect , but its heart is in the right place . . . innocent and well-meaning .
translation: 完璧からは遠いけれど、その心は正しい場所にある……無邪気で善意に満ちている。
back_translation: Though far from perfection, the heart is in the right place... innocent and full of goodwill.

text: the girl he wanted to run away with and share the rest of his life .
translation: 彼が一緒に逃げて残りの人生を共有したいと思っていた女の子。
back_translation: The girl he wanted to run away with and share the rest of his life.

text: . . . a hollow joke told by a cinematic gymnast having too much fun embellishing the misanthropic tale to actually engage it .
translation: …人間嫌いの物語を実際に扱うことなく、楽しさを加えている映画の体操選手によって語られる空虚なジョーク。
back_translation: A hollow joke told by a gymnast in a movie that adds fun without actually addressing the story of a misanthrope.

text: 'estupendamente actuada , sumamente emotiva y profundamente humana , es una experiencia fM-mlmica imposible de olvidar '
translation: 「素晴らしい演技で、非常に感情的で、深く人間的な、忘れることのできない映画体験です。」
back_translation: "It is a wonderful performance, highly emotional, profoundly human, and an unforgettable movie experience."

text: it 's a thin notion , repetitively stretched out to feature length , awash in self-consciously flashy camera effects , droning house music and flat , flat dialogue .
translation: それは薄い概念で、特徴的な長さに繰り返し引き伸ばされ、自意識過剰な派手なカメラ効果、延々と続くハウスミュージック、平坦で平坦な対話に浸っています。
back_translation: It is a thin concept, repeatedly stretched to a distinctive length, immersed in overly self-conscious flashy camera effects, endlessly flowing house music, and flat, monotonous dialogue.

text: chaotic , self-indulgent and remarkably ugly to look at , it 's . . . like a series of pretentiously awful student films strung together into one feature-length horror .
translation: 混沌としていて、自分勝手で、見た目が驚くほど醜いそれは……まるで pretentiously awful な学生映画の一連がつながってひとつの長編ホラーになったようなものです。
back_translation: It is chaotic, selfish, and astonishingly ugly in appearance... as if a series of pretentiously awful student films had come together to form a single feature horror film.

text: the film is about the relationships rather than about the outcome . and it sees those relationships , including that between the son and his wife , and the wife and the father , and between the two brothers , with incredible subtlety and acumen .
translation: この映画は結果よりも関係についてのものであり、息子と妻の関係、妻と父の関係、そして兄弟の関係を驚くほどの繊細さと鋭さで描写しています。
back_translation: This movie is about relationships rather than results, depicting the relationships between the son and his wife, the wife and her father, and the relationships among siblings with astonishing delicacy and sharpness.

text: sacrifices the value of its wealth of archival foot-age with its less-than-objective stance .
translation: その客観性に欠けた立場によって、アーカイブ映像の財産の価値を犠牲にしてしまいます。
back_translation: The lack of objectivity in that position sacrifices the value of the archive footage.

text: so relentlessly wholesome it made me want to swipe something .
translation: とても容赦なく心温まるので、何かをスワイプしたくなりました。
back_translation: It's so mercilessly heartwarming that I wanted to swipe something.

text: will certainly appeal to asian cult cinema fans and asiaphiles interested to see what all the fuss is about .
translation: アジアのカルト映画ファンや、何がそんなに話題になっているのか興味があるアジア好きの人々には間違いなく魅力的です。
back_translation: It is undoubtedly attractive to fans of Asian cult films and to those who are interested in what is generating so much buzz among Asia enthusiasts.

text: resurrection has the dubious distinction of being a really bad imitation of the really bad blair witch project .
translation: 「レザレクション」は、本当に悪い『ブレア・ウィッチ・プロジェクト』の本当に悪い模倣であるという疑わしい特徴を持っています。
back_translation: "Resurrection" has suspicious characteristics that suggest it is a really bad imitation of "The Blair Witch Project."

text: despite their many differences , they form a loving , long term relationship .
translation: 多くの違いがあるにもかかわらず、彼らは愛情深い長期的な関係を築いています。
back_translation: Despite many differences, they build a loving long-term relationship.

text: paulie , a pot smoking proctologist who has a list of pre-requisites for dating which reads like `` war and peace . ``
translation: ポーリーは、マリファナを吸う肛門科医で、デートのための前提条件リストは「戦争と平和」のように長い。
back_translation: Pauly is a proctologist who smokes marijuana, and his list of prerequisites for dating is as long as "War and Peace."

text: touted as an unofficial sequel to his 1989 hit sex , lies , and videotape , this arty film-within-a-film ( which was shot in just 18 days ) revolves around seven people with little in common whose lives collide .
translation: 1989年のヒット作「セックスと嘘とビデオテープ」の非公式の続編として宣伝されているこのアート系のフィルム・イン・フィルム（たった18日で撮影された）は、共通点の少ない7人の人々の生活が交錯する物語です。
back_translation: This art film-in-film, promoted as an unofficial sequel to the hit work "Sex, Lies, and Videotape" from 1989 (shot in just 18 days), tells the story of the intertwined lives of seven people who have little in common.

text: beary , a young bear raised by a human family in a world where humans and talking bears coexist , attempts to trace his roots .
translation: 人間と話すクマが共存する世界で、人間の家族に育てられた若いクマ、ベアリーは、自らのルーツをたどろうとします。
back_translation: In a world where talking bears coexist with humans, a young bear named Barely, raised by a human family, seeks to trace his own roots.

text: filmmakers have to dig deep to sink this low . fortunately for all involved , this movie is likely to disappear as quickly as an ice cube thrown into a pot of boiling water .
translation: 映画製作者は、ここまで落ちるために深く掘らなければなりません。関係者全員にとって幸運なことに、この映画は沸騰したお湯の鍋に投げ込まれた氷のように、すぐに消えてしまう可能性が高いです。
back_translation: Filmmakers must dig deep to fall this low. Fortunately for everyone involved, this movie is likely to disappear quickly, like ice thrown into a pot of boiling water.

text: an inexperienced director , mehta has much to learn .
translation: 未熟な監督であるメフタは、学ぶべきことがたくさんあります。
back_translation: The inexperienced director, Mehta, has a lot to learn.

text: this indie drama resonantly demonstrates how a person 's worth is weighed in a town where you 're only as good as your last game .
translation: このインディー・ドラマは、人の価値が「最後の試合」でどれほど評価されるかを響かせるように示しています。
back_translation: This indie drama illustrates how much a person's worth is evaluated in the "final match."

text: shahrul is a mechanic who also takes part in illegal bike racing .
translation: シャフルは整備士であり、違法なバイクレースにも参加しています。
back_translation: Shuffle is a mechanic and also participates in illegal motorcycle races.

text: two young gentlemen ( rupert everett & # 38 ; colin firth ) living in 1890s england use the same pseudonym ( `` earnest `` ) on the sly , which is fine until they both fall in love with women using that name , which leads to a comedy of mistaken identities . . .
translation: 1890年代のイギリスに住む二人の若い紳士（ルパート・エヴェレットとコリン・ファース）は、こっそりと同じ偽名（「アーネスト」）を使いますが、それは彼らがその名前を使っている女性たちに恋をするまでの話です。このことが、間違ったアイデンティティのコメディを引き起こします。
back_translation: Two young gentlemen (Rupert Everett and Colin Firth) living in England in the 1890s secretly use the same alias ("Ernest"), but this becomes a story until they fall in love with the women they are using that name with. This leads to a comedy of mistaken identities.

text: take a friend ( invisible or real ) to see this one . . . it 's laugh out loud funny
translation: 友達（目に見えないものでも本物でも）を連れてこれを見に行こう…大笑いできるほど面白いよ。
back_translation: Let's take a friend (whether they are visible or real) and go see this… it's so funny that you'll laugh out loud.

text: measured against practically any like-themed film other than its oscar-sweeping franchise predecessor the silence of the lambs , red dragon rates as an exceptional thriller .
translation: 『レッド・ドラゴン』は、アカデミー賞を獲得した前作『羊たちの沈黙』を除けば、実質的にほぼすべての同様のテーマの映画と比較しても、卓越したスリラーとして評価されます。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is regarded as an outstanding thriller, especially when compared to nearly all similar themed films, excluding its predecessor "The Silence of the Lambs," which won an Academy Award.

text: elegantly produced and expressively performed , the six musical numbers crystallize key plot moments into minutely detailed wonders of dreamlike ecstasy .
translation: 優雅に制作され、表現豊かに演奏された6つの音楽ナンバーは、主要なプロットの瞬間を夢のような歓喜の細部まで詳細に凝縮しています。
back_translation: The six music numbers, crafted elegantly and performed expressively, condense the key moments of the plot into dreamlike details of joy.

text: offers big , fat , dumb laughs that may make you hate yourself for giving in . ah , what the hell .
translation: 大きくて、太くて、馬鹿な笑いを提供しており、それに屈してしまった自分を嫌いになるかもしれない。ああ、もうどうでもいい。
back_translation: I might come to hate myself for succumbing to the big, thick, silly laughter it offers. Ah, I don’t care anymore.

text: the vistas are sweeping and the acting is far from painful .
translation: 景色は壮大で、演技は決して苦痛ではありません。
back_translation: The scenery is magnificent, and the performance is never painful.

text: however when sex and greed rear-up between the good crims and the bad cops , the consequences are both bizarre and fatal .
translation: しかし、良い犯罪者と悪い警察の間で性と欲望が顔を出すと、その結果は奇妙で致命的なものになる。
back_translation: However, when sex and desire surface between good criminals and bad police, the outcome becomes strange and deadly.

text: everyday prisoners are led out in chain gangs to work the swamps and untamed bayous , festered with poisonous snakes and alligators .
translation: 毎日、囚人たちは鎖に繋がれて沼地や手つかずのバイユーで働くために連れ出されます。そこには毒蛇やワニが潜んでいます。
back_translation: Every day, the prisoners are taken out, chained, to work in the swamps and untouched bayous. There, venomous snakes and alligators lurk.

text: by turns pretentious , fascinating , ludicrous , provocative and vainglorious .
translation: 順番に気取った、魅力的な、ばかげた、挑発的な、そして虚栄心に満ちた。
back_translation: Stylish in turn, charming, ridiculous, provocative, and filled with vanity.

text: this appears to be only the beginning of a string of suicides around the country .
translation: これは、国内での自殺の連鎖の始まりに過ぎないようです。
back_translation: It seems that this is only the beginning of a chain of suicides within the country.

text: a moving and weighty depiction of one family 's attempts to heal after the death of a child .
translation: 一つの家族が子供の死後に癒しを求める様子を描いた、感動的で重みのある作品。
back_translation: A moving and profound work that depicts a family seeking healing after the death of a child.

text: angela gheorghiu as famous prima donna floria tosca , roberto alagna as her lover mario cavaradossi , and ruggero as the villainous , lecherous police chief scarpia , all sing beautifully and act adequately .
translation: アンジェラ・ゲオルギウが有名なプリマ・ドンナ、フローリア・トスカを演じ、ロベルト・アラーニャが彼女の愛人マリオ・カヴァラドッシ役、ルッジェーロが悪役で好色な警察署長スカルピアを演じるが、皆美しく歌い、そこそこに演技をしている。
back_translation: Angela Gheorghiu plays the famous prima donna Floria Tosca, with Roberto Alagna as her lover Mario Cavaradossi, and Ruggiero portraying the villainous and lascivious police chief Scarpia. All of them sing beautifully and perform reasonably well.

text: `` red dragon `` is entertaining . an obvious copy of one of the best films ever made , how could it not be ? but it is entertaining on an inferior level . it is a popcorn film , not a must-own , or even a must-see .
translation: 「レッドドラゴン」は面白いです。一流の映画の明らかなコピーですが、どうして面白くないわけがありません。しかし、それは劣ったレベルでのエンターテインメントです。ポップコーン映画であり、必見でも必携でもありません。
back_translation: "Red Dragon" is interesting. It is clearly a copy of a top-tier film, but there's no reason it shouldn't be entertaining. However, it is entertainment at a lower level. It's a popcorn movie and neither a must-see nor a must-have.

text: swims in mediocrity , sticking its head up for a breath of fresh air now and then .
translation: 平凡の中で泳ぎ、時々新鮮な空気を吸うために頭を出す。
back_translation: Swim in the ordinary and occasionally lift your head to take a breath of fresh air.

text: a fairly harmless but ultimately lifeless feature-length afterschool special .
translation: かなり無害だけれども、結局は命のない長編アフタースクールスペシャル。
back_translation: It’s quite harmless, but in the end, it’s a long after-school special without any life.

text: worth watching for dong jie 's performance -- and for the way it documents a culture in the throes of rapid change .
translation: 董洁のパフォーマンスと急速に変化する文化を記録した方法を見る価値があります。
back_translation: It is worth looking at the way Dong Jie’s performance and the rapidly changing culture are documented.

text: he is going to sweden , and invites lilja to come along and start a new life .
translation: 彼はスウェーデンに行くつもりで、リリヤを誘って一緒に新しい生活を始めるように言っています。
back_translation: He plans to go to Sweden and is telling Lilia to join him in starting a new life together.

text: russian ark is a new treasure of the hermitage .
translation: ロシアン・アークはエルミタージュ美術館の新しい宝物です。
back_translation: The Russian Ark is a new treasure of the Hermitage Museum.

text: he and joey have been painfully estranged ever since vincent divorced his wife and left the decaying boardwalks of long beach , long island for the anonymity of manhattan and a successful career with the nypd .
translation: 彼とジョーイは、ヴィンセントが妻と離婚し、ロングアイランドのロングビーチの朽ちかけたボードウォークを離れてマンハッタンの匿名性とNY市警での成功したキャリアを追求して以来、痛ましいほど疎遠になっています。
back_translation: He and Joey have painfully drifted apart since Vincent divorced his wife and left the decaying boardwalk of Long Beach on Long Island to pursue the anonymity of Manhattan and a successful career with the NYPD.

text: the humor is n't as sharp , the effects not as innovative , nor the story as imaginative as in the original . but it could have been worse .
translation: ユーモアはそれほど鋭くなく、エフェクトも革新的ではなく、ストーリーもオリジナルほど想像力に富んではいない。しかし、もっとひどくなることもあり得た。
back_translation: The humor isn't very sharp, the effects aren't innovative, and the story isn't as imaginative as the original. However, it could have been worse.

text: nothing short of a masterpiece -- and a challenging one .
translation: まさに傑作であり、挑戦的な作品です。
back_translation: It is truly a masterpiece and a challenging work.

text: the real charm of this trifle is the deadpan comic face of its star , jean reno , who resembles sly stallone in a hot sake half-sleep .
translation: このトライフルの本当の魅力は、主演のジャン・レノの無表情なコメディ顔にあります。彼は、寝ぼけた状態のスライ・スタローンに似ています。
back_translation: The true charm of this trifle lies in the expressionless comedic face of the lead, Jean Reno. He resembles a groggy Sylvester Stallone.

text: her daughter siri , whom , in this way , she turns into her virtual twin , learns as a child that she is the world 's first cloned human being .
translation: 彼女の娘シリは、このようにして彼女のバーチャルツインに変わり、子供の頃に自分が世界初のクローン人間であることを学びます。
back_translation: Her daughter Siri becomes her virtual twin in this way and learns that she is the world's first cloned human since childhood.

text: watch as superfag with the help of his zany superfriends , taco chick and salsa girl , the incredible dyke , the bionic old lady , supermomma , disco diva , the wonder trannies and many more , fight against the evil fiend , professor peckerhead who attempts to rid the world of homosexuality forever !
translation: スーパーファグが、彼のユニークなスーパーフレンズであるタコチックやサルサガール、すごいダイク、バイオニックおばあさん、スーパーママ、ディスコディーバ、ワンダートランスたちと共に、悪党プロフェッサーペッカーヘッドと戦い、世界から永遠に同性愛を排除しようとする様子を見てください！
back_translation: Watch as Super Fug battles the villain Professor Peckerhead alongside his unique super friends: Octocick, Salsa Girl, Amazing Dyke, Bionic Grandma, Super Mama, Disco Diva, and Wonder Trance, as they try to eliminate homosexuality from the world forever!

text: a document about a unique political and artistic moment , the film traces the links between the two most important latin american filmmaking movements of the late '60s the brazilian cinema n & # 244 ; vo and the cuban cine revolucionario .
translation: 独特な政治的および芸術的瞬間に関する文書であり、映画は1960年代後半の2つの最も重要なラテンアメリカの映画製作運動であるブラジルのシネマ・ノーヴォとキューバのシネ・レボルシオナリオとの関連を追跡します。
back_translation: This document is about unique political and artistic moments, tracing the connections between the films of Brazil's Cinema Novo and Cuba's Cine Revolucionario, the two most important Latin American filmmaking movements of the late 1960s.

text: the filmmakers try to balance pointed , often incisive satire and unabashed sweetness , with results that are sometimes bracing , sometimes baffling and quite often , and in unexpected ways , touching .
translation: 映画製作者たちは、鋭くしばしば鋭い風刺とあからさまな甘さをうまくバランスさせようと試みており、その結果は時にはスリリングで、時には混乱を招き、しばしば、そして予想外の方法で感動を与えるものとなっています。
back_translation: Filmmakers have been attempting to skillfully balance sharp, often incisive satire with overt sweetness, resulting in experiences that can be thrilling at times, confusing at others, and often, in unexpected ways, deeply moving.

text: stephen stalls his interrogators with stories of his affair with toni , while she risks her freedom by seducing an employee in the d . a . 's
translation: スティーブンはトーニとの不倫の話で尋問者を引き延ばしますが、彼女は検察の従業員を誘惑することで自由を危険にさらします。
back_translation: Steven prolongs the interrogation with stories of his affair with Toni, but she jeopardizes her freedom by seducing an employee of the prosecution.

text: as a woman who can let go of her need to be in control .
translation: コントロールする必要を手放すことができる女性として。
back_translation: As a woman who can let go of the need to control.

text: tonight at hamilton high , the lesson is survival .
translation: 今夜、ハミルトン高校での授業はサバイバルです。
back_translation: Tonight, the class at Hamilton High School is survival.

text: as directed by dani kouyate of burkina faso , sia lacks visual flair . but kouyate elicits strong performances from his cast , and he delivers a powerful commentary on how governments lie , no matter who runs them .
translation: ブルキナファソのダニ・クヤテによって指導された『シア』は、ビジュアルの華やかさに欠ける。しかし、クヤテはキャストから強いパフォーマンスを引き出し、どの政権が運営しても政府がどのように嘘をつくかについて強力なコメントを届けている。
back_translation: "Sia," directed by Dani Kouyaté from Burkina Faso, lacks visual splendor. However, Kouyaté draws strong performances from the cast and delivers a powerful commentary on how governments lie, regardless of which regime is in power.

text: a movie that will touch the hearts of both children and adults , as well as bring audiences to the edge of their seats .
translation: 子供と大人の心を打ち、観客をハラハラさせる映画。
back_translation: A movie that touches the hearts of both children and adults, keeping the audience on the edge of their seats.

text: after a wild session of lovemaking , dawn goes for a walk .
translation: 激しい恋愛のセッションの後、夜明けは散歩に出かける。
back_translation: After a passionate love session, dawn heads out for a walk.

text: but then nora is revealed and tactics need to be changed .
translation: しかし、その後ノラが明らかになり、戦術を変更する必要があります。
back_translation: However, after that, Nora became clear, and it was necessary to change the strategy.

text: one of the best films i have ever seen , constantly pulling the rug from underneath us , seeing things from new sides , plunging deeper , getting more intense .
translation: 私が今まで見た中で最高の映画の一つで、常に私たちの足元から rug を引きずり、物事を新しい視点から見ることで、さらに深く掘り下げ、より強烈になっていきます。
back_translation: One of the best movies I have ever seen, constantly pulling the rug out from under us and digging deeper by viewing things from a new perspective, becoming even more intense.

text: a graceful , contemplative film that gradually and artfully draws us into a world where the personal and the political get fatally intertwined .
translation: 優雅で熟考的な映画であり、個人と政治が致命的に絡み合う世界へと徐々に、かつ巧みに私たちを引き込んでいきます。
back_translation: It is an elegant and contemplative film that gradually and skillfully draws us into a world where the personal and political are inextricably intertwined.

text: staked-out in his one-bedroom apartment with his kidnap victim , brian ( justin bartha ) , gigli soon realizes that what he thought would be a routine assignment soon becomes a tumultuous task .
translation: 彼の一室のアパートに監禁された誘拐被害者ブライアン（ジャスティン・バーサ）と共に、ジーリは自分が思っていた通常の任務が、すぐに波乱に満ちた仕事になることに気づく。
back_translation: Kidnapping victim Brian (Justin Bartha), who is confined in his one-room apartment, realizes with Giri that what he thought was a routine mission will quickly turn into a tumultuous job.

text: this is the decades-long story of the relationship between a prominent high school football coach ( harris ) in a small south carolina town and the illiterate , mentally-challenged man nicknamed radio ( gooding ) whom he mentors , who before that had always been the target of jokes and teasing by the community .
translation: これは、南カリフォルニアの小さな町で著名な高校フットボールコーチ（ハリス）と、彼が指導する無学で知的障害のある「ラジオ」というあだ名の男性（グッディング）との、数十年にわたる関係の物語です。彼はそれ以前はいつも地域社会からジョークやからかいの標的にされていました。
back_translation: This is the story of a decades-long relationship between a renowned high school football coach (Harris) in a small town in Southern California and a man nicknamed "Radio" (Gooding), who he coaches and who has an intellectual disability. Before this, he was always the target of jokes and mockery from the community.

text: the dea finally convinces the chinese military that robert may be of more help to them outside jail by leading them to the real smugglers .
translation: DEAはついに中国軍を納得させ、ロバートが刑務所の外で本当の密輸業者を導くことによって彼らにもっと役立つかもしれないと示しました。
back_translation: The DEA has finally convinced the Chinese military that Robert may be able to help them more by leading the real smugglers outside of prison.

text: this will go on so long as there are moviegoers anxious to see strange young guys doing strange guy things .
translation: このようなことは、奇妙な若者たちが奇妙なことをするのを見たい映画ファンがいる限り続くでしょう。
back_translation: As long as there are movie fans who want to see strange young people doing strange things, this kind of thing will continue.

text: more than the last time around , it has elements that might help divert those bigger people who find themselves unavoidably in attendance .
translation: 前回よりも多くの要素が含まれており、避けられない形で参加する大きな人々を引き離すのに役立つかもしれません。
back_translation: It may help to separate the large groups of people who inevitably participate, by including more elements than before.

text: plays like a toddler running along a lumpy field , stumbling every few feet but always getting back up and eventually reaching his destination , unharmed and happy .
translation: 芝生のでこぼこを走り回る幼児のように、数歩ごとにつまずきながらも、いつも立ち上がり、最終的には無傷で幸せに目的地に到達する。
back_translation: Like a toddler running around on a bumpy lawn, stumbling every few steps but always getting back up, ultimately reaching their destination unharmed and happy.

text: they feel they are at the end of their rope and know they need a big stash of cash to make their musical dreams a reality .
translation: 彼らは自分たちの限界に達していると感じており、音楽の夢を現実にするためには大きな現金の蓄えが必要だと知っています。
back_translation: They feel they have reached their limits and know that a large cash reserve is needed to make their musical dreams a reality.

text: four friends - one summer - an italian-american neighborhood in yonkers , ny .
translation: 四人の友達 - 一つの夏 - ニューヨーク州ヨンカーズのイタリア系アメリカ人の近所。
back_translation: Four Friends - One Summer - An Italian-American neighborhood in Yonkers, New York.

text: after chance brings them together they create , 'searching for mr right . com , `` a web site to locate husbands for marie and liz .
translation: 偶然が彼らを結びつけた後、彼らは「マリーとリズのための夫を探す.com」というウェブサイトを作成します。
back_translation: After fate brought them together, they created a website called "Find a Husband for Marie and Liz.com".

text: it desperately wants to be a wacky , screwball comedy , but the most screwy thing here is how so many talented people were convinced to waste their time .
translation: それは必死に奇妙で、スクリューボールコメディになろうとしているが、ここで最もおかしなことは、多くの才能ある人々がどうして時間を無駄にすることを納得させられたのかということだ。
back_translation: It is desperately strange, trying to become a screwball comedy, but the funniest thing here is why so many talented people were convinced to waste their time.

text: what the film lacks in general focus it makes up for in compassion , as corcuera manages to find the seeds of hope in the form of collective action .
translation: 映画が一般的な焦点を欠いているものの、コルケラは集団行動という形で希望の種を見出すことで、思いやりで補っています。
back_translation: Although the film lacks a general focus, Corkera compensates for this with compassion by finding seeds of hope in the form of collective action.

text: vesa , a 16-year old bulgarian girl , can not speak .
translation: ベサは16歳のブルガリアの女の子で、話すことができません。
back_translation: Besa is a 16-year-old girl from Bulgaria who cannot speak.

text: this dark bittersweet drama focuses on roberta , a 350-lb secretary who loses her job and learns she is dying on the same day .
translation: この暗いほろ苦いドラマは、350ポンドの秘書ロベルタに焦点を当てており、彼女は仕事を失い、同じ日に余命宣告を受ける。
back_translation: This dark and bittersweet drama focuses on Roberta, a 350-pound secretary who loses her job and receives a terminal diagnosis on the same day.

text: `` mudbloods `` ( people of muggle families ) are `` petrified `` by an evil monster lurking in the grounds .
translation: マグルの家族出身の「マッドブラッド」は、敷地内に潜む邪悪なモンスターによって「石化」されています。
back_translation: The "Mad Blood" from a Muggle family is "petrified" by an evil monster lurking on the premises.

text: this is the film training day wanted to be .
translation: これは映画「トレーニングデイ」が目指していたものです。
back_translation: This is what the movie "Training Day" aimed for.

text: rodney boland is a professional hit man who `` services `` politicians and their wealthy backers .
translation: ロドニー・ボランドは、政治家やその裕福な支援者に「サービス」を提供するプロのヒットマンです。
back_translation: Rodney Boland is a professional hitman who provides "services" to politicians and their wealthy supporters.

text: suspiciously , word of the device got out to the underworld and both parents were brutally killed in front of the girls ' eyes by criminals eager to get their hands on the invention .
translation: 疑わしくも、その装置の噂が裏社会に広まり、発明を手に入れようとする犯罪者によって、両親は少女たちの目の前で残酷に殺されました。
back_translation: Doubtful as it may seem, rumors of the device spread through the underworld, and the parents were brutally killed before the girls' eyes by criminals trying to obtain the invention.

text: the draw [ for `` big bad love `` ] is a solid performance by arliss howard .
translation: 「ビッグ・バッド・ラブ」の演技はアーリス・ハワードによる素晴らしいパフォーマンスです。
back_translation: The performance in "Big Bad Love" is a wonderful portrayal by Arliss Howard.

text: will god let her fall or give her a new path ?
translation: 神は彼女を落ちさせるのか、それとも新しい道を与えるのか？
back_translation: Does God let her fall, or does He give her a new path?

text: while it has n't always been smooth sailing , they 've ridden out the rough spots with humor , passion , and wisdom , redefining and reinventing their own version of `` family values . ``
translation: 順風満帆ではなかったが、彼らはユーモア、情熱、知恵で困難を乗り越え、「家族の価値観」の独自のバージョンを再定義し、再創造してきた。
back_translation: Although it wasn't a smooth sailing, they overcame difficulties with humor, passion, and wisdom, redefining and recreating their own version of "family values."

text: without [ de niro ] , city by the sea would slip under the waves . he drags it back , single-handed .
translation: デ・ニーロがいなければ、『シティ・バイ・ザ・シー』は波に飲まれてしまうだろう。彼はそれを一人で引き戻す。
back_translation: Without De Niro, "City by the Sea" would be swept away by the waves. He pulls it back all on his own.

text: jack ( samuel l . jackson ) finds himself being held hostage while the criminals decide what to do with him , and the leader 's beautiful girlfriend , erin ( milla jovovich ) , is left alone to watch jack .
translation: ジャック（サミュエル・L・ジャクソン）は、人質として拘束され、犯人たちが彼をどうするか決めている間、リーダーの美しい彼女、エリン（ミラ・ジョヴォヴィッチ）が一人でジャックの監視を任されています。
back_translation: Jack (Samuel L. Jackson) is held hostage, and while the criminals are deciding what to do with him, the leader's beautiful girlfriend, Erin (Milla Jovovich), is left to watch over Jack alone.

text: the film is a contrivance , as artificial as the video games japanese teens play in a nightclub sequence , but it 's an enjoyable one .
translation: この映画は仕組まれたものであり、日本の若者たちがナイトクラブのシーンでプレイするビデオゲームと同じくらい人工的ですが、楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: This movie is contrived and as artificial as the video games played by Japanese youth in the nightclub scene, but it is an enjoyable work.

text: this is scorsese 's finest work , and one of the best films of 2002 .
translation: これはスコセッシの最高の作品であり、2002年の最良の映画の一つです。
back_translation: This is Scorsese's best work and one of the best films of 2002.

text: having transplanted herself to hawaii with no one 's blessing but her own , anne marie finds all she needs in the adrenaline-charged surf scene . . .
translation: 自分自身の承諾しか得ずにハワイに移住したアン・マリーは、アドレナリンに満ちたサーフシーンに必要なものをすべて見出す。
back_translation: Anne Marie, who moved to Hawaii with only her own consent, finds everything she needs in the adrenaline-filled surf scene.

text: patricia mistakes a truck drivers destination and strands in las vegas .
translation: パトリシアはトラックドライバーの目的地を間違え、ラスベガスに取り残されてしまいます。
back_translation: Patricia mistakenly gives the truck driver the wrong destination and ends up stranded in Las Vegas.

text: as `` daddy day care `` starts to catch on , it launches them into a highly comedic rivalry with chapman academy 's tough-as-nails director ( anjelica huston ) . . . who has driven all previous competitors out of business .
translation: 「ダディ daycare」が人気を集めるにつれて、彼らはチャップマンアカデミーの厳格なディレクター（アンジェリカ・ヒューストン）との非常にコメディックな競争に突入します…彼女は今までのすべての競合他社をビジネスから追い出してきました。
back_translation: As "Daddy Daycare" gathers popularity, they enter into a very comedic competition with the strict director of Chapman Academy (Angelica Huston)... she has driven all previous competitors out of business.

text: while insomnia is in many ways a conventional , even predictable remake , nolan 's penetrating undercurrent of cerebral and cinemantic flair lends ( it ) stimulating depth .
translation: 不眠症は多くの点で従来通りで、予測可能なリメイクですが、ノーランの鋭い知的で映画的なセンスがそれに刺激的な深みを与えています。
back_translation: Insomnia is a predictable remake that remains conventional in many ways, but Nolan's sharp intellectual and cinematic sensibility gives it an exciting depth.

text: because of his shame , bobby undergoes a type of 'splitting ' where a decrepit , ghoulish version of him is separated from his healthy self .
translation: ボビーは彼の恥ずかしさのために、彼の健康な自分から古びた恐ろしいバージョンが切り離される「分裂」というタイプを経験する。
back_translation: Bobby experiences a type of "splitting," where the outdated and terrible version of himself is separated from his healthy self due to his embarrassment.

text: april burns ( holmes ) invites her family to thanksgiving dinner at her teeny apartment on new york 's lower east side .
translation: エイプリル・バーンズ（ホームズ）は、ニューヨークのロウアーイーストサイドにある彼女の小さなアパートで家族を感謝祭のディナーに招待します。
back_translation: April Burns (Holmes) invites her family to Thanksgiving dinner at her small apartment on the Lower East Side of New York.

text: dogville may regret it ever began to bare its teeth . . .
translation: ドッグビルは、自らの牙を剥き出しにしたことを後悔するかもしれない。。。
back_translation: Dogville may regret having bared its fangs...

text: but all four are having trouble dealing with it , and steve has a job offer in san francisco .
translation: しかし、四人ともそれに対処するのに苦労しており、スティーブはサンフランシスコでの仕事のオファーを受けています。
back_translation: However, all four of them are struggling to deal with it, and Steve has received a job offer in San Francisco.

text: the life story of the late graham chapman , legendary founding member of monty python .
translation: 故グラハム・チャップマンの人生物語、モンティ・パイソンの伝説的創設メンバー。
back_translation: The life story of the late Graham Chapman, a legendary founding member of Monty Python.

text: forget other scary movies with freaky internet sites , dastardly murderers , ghosts on boats , spooky videotapes , they are n't half as scary as a gothic good old horror film about monsters that live under the bed
translation: 恐ろしいインターネットサイトや、悪党の殺人者、ボートにいる幽霊、不気味なビデオテープなどの他の怖い映画は忘れてしまいなさい。ベッドの下に住むモンスターについてのゴシックな古典ホラー映画ほど怖いものはありません。
back_translation: Forget about terrifying internet sites, murderous villains, ghosts on boats, and creepy videotapes. Nothing is as scary as a gothic classic horror film about the monster that lives under the bed.

text: ralph 's the kind of guy the nerds stole lunch money from .
translation: ラルフは、オタクたちがランチのお金を奪ったようなタイプの男だ。
back_translation: Ralph is the kind of guy who seems like he stole lunch money from nerds.

text: the rare movie that 's as crisp and to the point as the novel on which it 's based .
translation: 小説に基づいたその珍しい映画は、鋭く要点を突いている。
back_translation: The rare film based on the novel strikes sharply at the main points.

text: confuses its message with an ultimate desire to please , and contorting itself into an idea of expectation is the last thing any of these three actresses , nor their characters , deserve .
translation: そのメッセージは、最終的に喜ばせることへの欲望と混同されており、期待の概念に自らを歪めることは、これらの3人の女優や彼女たちのキャラクターが受けるべき最後のことです。
back_translation: That message is ultimately confused with the desire to please, and distorting oneself with the concept of expectation is the last thing these three actresses or their characters should have to endure.

text: martian children are captivated by terran television shows which talk about our ole pal , kris kringle .
translation: 火星の子供たちは、私たちの親友クリス・クリングルについて話す地球のテレビ番組に魅了されています。
back_translation: The children of Mars are fascinated by a television program from Earth that talks about our good friend Chris Kringle.

text: i 'm not sure all about lily chou-chou made sense in my head , but it made sense in my heart .
translation: リリィ・シュシュのすべてが私の頭の中で意味を成しているわけではありませんが、心の中では意味を持っていました。
back_translation: Not everything about Lily Shi is making sense in my head, but it has significance in my heart.

text: the directing and story are disjointed , flaws that have to be laid squarely on taylor 's doorstep . but the actors make this worth a peek .
translation: 演出とストーリーはバラバラであり、その欠点は明らかにテイラーの責任です。しかし、俳優たちのおかげで見る価値はあります。
back_translation: The direction and story are disjointed, and the shortcomings are clearly the fault of Taylor. However, thanks to the actors, it is worth watching.

text: salvagers discover the antonia graza , an italian luxury liner with a dark secret .
translation: サルベージ業者がダークな秘密を抱えたイタリアの高級客船「アントニア・グラザ」を発見する。
back_translation: Salvage operators discover the luxurious Italian cruise ship "Antonia Graza," which holds dark secrets.

text: the only way to be victorious is one must destroy the other .
translation: 勝利を収める唯一の方法は、他者を破壊することだ。
back_translation: The only way to achieve victory is to destroy others.

text: the pursuit eventually takes us back to l . a . , where secrets begin to get exposed . . . .
translation: その追跡は最終的に私たちをL.A.に戻し、秘密が明らかになり始めます……。
back_translation: That pursuit ultimately brings us back to L.A., where secrets begin to be revealed...

text: the stripped-down approach does give the film a certain timeless quality , but the measured pace and lack of dramatic inflection can also seem tedious .
translation: シンプルなアプローチは映画にある種の時代を超えた質感を与えますが、落ち着いたペースとドラマ的な抑揚の欠如は退屈に感じられることもあります。
back_translation: The simple approach gives the film a kind of timeless quality, but the lack of a steady pace and dramatic nuances can sometimes make it feel boring.

text: at the end of the worst day of his life , bruce angrily ridicules and rages against god and god responds .
translation: 人生最悪の日の終わりに、ブルースは神を激しく嘲り怒りをぶつけ、神は応えてくる。
back_translation: At the end of the worst day of his life, Bruce fiercely mocks God and vents his anger, and God responds.

text: the film shows the surreal side of routines that seem simple and ordinary .
translation: その映画は、一見シンプルで普通に見えるルーチンの超現実的な側面を描いています。
back_translation: The movie depicts the surreal aspects of a routine that appears simple and ordinary at first glance.

text: works both as an engaging drama and an incisive look at the difficulties facing native americans .
translation: ネイティブアメリカンが直面する困難を鋭く描きながら、魅力的なドラマとしても機能しています。
back_translation: It sharply depicts the difficulties faced by Native Americans while also functioning as an engaging drama.

text: johnson has , in his first film , set himself a task he is not nearly up to .
translation: ジョンソンは、彼の初めての映画で、自分に対して十分ではない課題を設定した。
back_translation: Johnson set challenges for himself in his first film that were not sufficient.

text: a compelling motion picture that illustrates an american tragedy .
translation: アメリカの悲劇を描いた魅力的な映画。
back_translation: An captivating movie that portrays the tragedy of America.

text: what puzzles me is the lack of emphasis on music in britney spears ' first movie .
translation: 私が不思議に思うのは、ブリトニー・スピアーズの最初の映画における音楽への強調の欠如です。
back_translation: What I find strange is the lack of emphasis on music in Britney Spears' first movie.

text: it is then an intimate view of the smoldering monochromatic site and the surrounding solitary streets , the ashen outskirts of new york 's financial center , desolate and strewn with debris , the epicenter , a steel moonscape of dresdenesque remains .
translation: それは、燃えるようなモノクロの場所と周囲の孤立した通り、ニューヨークの金融センターの灰色がかった郊外、荒れ果てたゴミだらけの状態、中心点であるドレスデンのような残骸の鉄の月面を親密に捉えています。
back_translation: It closely captures the burning monochrome places and the isolated streets around them, the grayish suburbs of New York's financial center, a state of desolation filled with litter, and the debris of a lunar landscape, reminiscent of Dresden at its focal point.

text: it 's her millionaire boss , george wade ( hugh grant ) .
translation: 彼女のミリオネアの上司、ジョージ・ウェイド（ヒュー・グラント）です。
back_translation: Her millionaire boss, George Wade (Hugh Grant).

text: no number of fantastic sets , extras , costumes and spectacular locales can disguise the emptiness at the center of the story .
translation: 素晴らしいセット、エキストラ、衣装、そして壮大なロケーションの数がいくらあっても、物語の中心にある空虚さを隠すことはできません。
back_translation: No matter how many wonderful sets, extras, costumes, and magnificent locations there are, they cannot hide the emptiness at the center of the story.

text: it caused a rift between the families and even though devdas tried to convince his father , only antagonism came his way .
translation: それは家族の間に亀裂を生じさせ、デヴダスが父を説得しようとしたにもかかわらず、彼のもとにはただ敵意しか訪れなかった。
back_translation: This caused a rift within the family, and despite Devdas trying to persuade his father, he was met only with hostility.

text: but when a tragedy strikes anakin 's life , he begins slipping away from the light side of the force , and perhaps from the force itself .
translation: しかし、アナキンの人生に悲劇が襲うと、彼はフォースの光の側から離れ始め、そしておそらくフォースそのものからも離れていきます。
back_translation: However, when tragedy strikes Anakin's life, he begins to drift away from the light side of the Force, and perhaps even from the Force itself.

text: lasker 's canny , meditative script distances sex and love , as byron and luther . . . realize they ca n't get no satisfaction without the latter .
translation: ラスカーの巧妙で瞑想的な脚本は、バイロンやルターのように、セックスと愛を距離を置いて描きます…彼らは後者なしでは満足を得られないことに気づきます。
back_translation: Lasker's clever and meditative script depicts sex and love at a distance, much like Byron or Luther... they realize that they cannot find satisfaction without the latter.

text: regardless , he promises to watch over his little brother as their parents head off to a party for the night .
translation: それにもかかわらず、彼は両親が夜のパーティーに出かける間、弟の面倒を見ると約束します。
back_translation: Nevertheless, he promises to take care of his younger brother while his parents go out to the night party.

text: now , years later matt goes away for weekend with his new girlfriend dawn .
translation: 数年後、マットは新しい彼女ドーンと週末を過ごしに出かける。
back_translation: A few years later, Matt goes out for the weekend with his new girlfriend Dawn.

text: they end up paying ray , the local `` playboy , `` $ 5 , 000 to date her .
translation: 彼らは地元の「プレイボーイ」レイに彼女とデートするために5,000ドルを支払うことになります。
back_translation: They will pay $5,000 to local "Playboy" Ray to go on a date with her.

text: max and his men torture jose and threaten to kill him if he does n't turn it over .
translation: マックスと彼の仲間たちはホセを拷問し、彼がそれを渡さなければ殺すと脅迫します。
back_translation: Max and his companions torture Jose and threaten to kill him if he doesn't hand it over.

text: in these modern times where phrases like `` two income families `` are the norm , is it wrong for a woman to want to stay home and raise a family ?
translation: 現代では「二馬力家庭」といったフレーズが一般的である中、女性が自宅にいて家族を育てたいと思うのは間違っているのでしょうか？
back_translation: In modern times, with phrases like "dual-income family" being common, is it wrong for women to want to stay at home and raise their families?

text: a comedy about misfits in which a veterinarian becomes involved with a client , whose wife has begun acting like a dog .
translation: 犬のように振る舞い始めた妻を持つクライアントと関わる獣医師を描いた、仲間外れたちのコメディ。
back_translation: A comedy about a veterinarian dealing with a client whose wife has started to behave like a dog.

text: meanwhile , frodo and sam force gollum to guide them through mordor , trusting him with their lives .
translation: その間、フロドとサムはゴクリにモルドールを案内させるよう強要し、彼に自分たちの命を託します。
back_translation: During that time, Frodo and Sam force Gollum to guide them to Mordor, entrusting their lives to him.

text: the film also features the hawaii-born superstars of professional sumo : konishiki , jesse `` takamiyama `` kuhaulua , and akebono ( the first non-japanese to reach the exalted rank of yokozuna , or grand champion ) .
translation: この映画には、プロ相撲のハワイ出身のスーパースターたち、コニシキ、ジェシー「タカミヤマ」クハウルア、そしてアケボノ（初の非日本人で横綱の崇高な地位に達した選手）が登場します。
back_translation: This movie features pro sumo superstars from Hawaii, including Konishiki, Jesse "Takamiyama" Kuhaulua, and Akebono (the first non-Japanese wrestler to reach the prestigious rank of yokozuna).

text: as burke teaches him the ropes and the rules of the game , james quickly rises through the ranks and falls for layla ( moynahan ) , one of his fellow recruits .
translation: バークが彼に仕事の仕方とルールを教える中で、ジェームズは急速に昇進し、同僚の新入社員レイラ（モイニハン）に恋をする。
back_translation: As Burke teaches him how to work and the rules, James quickly rises through the ranks and falls in love with his colleague, the new employee Layla (Moynihan).

text: to avenge the lives of loved ones he has lost , robert must hunt down , pursue and find each of the tong members .
translation: 愛する人々の命を奪われた復讐を果たすために、ロバートはトンのメンバー一人一人を追い詰め、見つけ出さなければならない。
back_translation: To achieve revenge for the lives taken from his loved ones, Robert must track down and confront each member of the Ton.

text: by the early '80s , the golden boy of hollywood was losing his luster .
translation: 80年代初頭までには、ハリウッドの黄金の少年はその輝きを失いつつありました。
back_translation: By the early 1980s, Hollywood's golden boy was beginning to lose his shine.

text: only to find that once their friendship is threatened by a traumatic circumstance , they are reunited by having to support and love each other to realise their eternal bond .
translation: 友情がトラウマ的な状況によって脅かされると、彼らはお互いを支え合い、愛し合うことで永遠の絆を実感し、再び結びつくことになります。
back_translation: When friendship is threatened by traumatic situations, they support and love each other, realizing their eternal bond and reconnecting once again.

text: like mike is n't interested in recycling old cliches . it wants to tweak them with a taste of tangy new humor .
translation: ライク・マイクは古いクリシェのリサイクルには興味がありません。新鮮でピリッとしたユーモアでそれらを微調整したいのです。
back_translation: Like Mike is not interested in recycling old clichés. He wants to refine them with fresh and sharp humor.

text: after she rejects him for a fellow social climber , summer g spends ten years building a hip hop empire , then moves to the hamptons where he finds the object of his affections .
translation: 彼女が社会的野心家の同僚を選んだ後、サマー・Gは10年間ヒップホップ帝国を築き、ハンプトンズに移り住み、彼が愛する人を見つける。
back_translation: After choosing a colleague who is a social climber, Summer G built a hip-hop empire for 10 years, moved to the Hamptons, and found the person he loves.

text: the exposition does pay off , if you can stay awake that long . there 's little gripping in the film until the second hour .
translation: 展開には報われる部分があり、そこまで起きていられればですが、映画の前半はほとんど引き込まれるものがありません。
back_translation: There are rewarding aspects to the development, if you can stay awake until then, but the first half of the movie has almost nothing to draw you in.

text: on the way back from the bargain , mary nearly runs over a caped , winged figure , jerks the wheel and skids into the sidewalk .
translation: バーゲンからの帰り道、メアリーはマントをまとった翼のある人物をほとんど轢きそうになり、ハンドルを急に切って歩道にバランスを崩してしまった。
back_translation: On her way back from the bargain sale, Mary nearly hit a winged figure draped in a cloak and suddenly swerved the steering wheel, losing her balance on the sidewalk.

text: forget the psychology 101 study of romantic obsession and just watch the procession of costumes in castles and this wo n't seem like such a bore .
translation: 恋愛の obsession に関する心理学101の研究を忘れて、城でのコスチュームの行列を見てみてください。そうすれば、そんなに退屈には思えないでしょう。
back_translation: Forget about the psychology 101 study on love obsession and check out the costume parade at the castle. Then it won't seem so boring.

text: but after sigmund freud 's note ( above ) on the nefarious nature of females , the doctors hatched the theory of counter-transference to explain their feelings .
translation: しかし、ジークムント・フロイトの（上記の）女性の悪質な性質に関するメモの後、医師たちは自分たちの感情を説明するために逆転移の理論を考え出しました。
back_translation: However, after Sigmund Freud's (above-mentioned) notes on the malicious nature of women, doctors invented the theory of countertransference to explain their own emotions.

text: but when she recruits a new lodger for the downstairs flat , daniel finds himself falling for robert , the hot southern boy who 's moved to the big city .
translation: しかし、彼女が地下のアパートの新しい入居者を募集すると、ダニエルは大都市に引っ越してきた魅力的な南部の少年ロバートに恋をしてしまいます。
back_translation: However, when she starts looking for new tenants for the underground apartment, Daniel falls in love with Robert, an attractive Southern boy who has moved to the big city.

text: three different scenarios , intercut , all using the same words but with very different meanings .
translation: 異なる三つのシナリオ、カットインしながら、同じ言葉を使うが、全く異なる意味を持つ。
back_translation: Three different scenarios where the same words are used, but they have completely different meanings while cutting in.

text: in trying to be daring and original , it comes off as only occasionally satirical and never fresh .
translation: 挑戦的で独創的になろうとするあまり、時折風刺的であるものの、決して新鮮には映らない。
back_translation: In striving to be challenging and creative, it can sometimes come off as satirical, but it never appears fresh.

text: they follow leads , informants turn up dead , nick 's wife is unhappy he 's back on the street , henry 's protective of the dead cop 's wife .
translation: 彼らは手がかりを追い、情報提供者は死体で見つかり、ニックの妻は彼が再び街に戻ったことに不満を持ち、ヘンリーは亡くなった警官の妻を守ろうとしている。
back_translation: They are following clues, the informant is found dead, Nick's wife is unhappy that he has returned to the city, and Henry is trying to protect the wife of the deceased officer.

text: zero , who , like many hong kong youngsters , has a handful of unsteady jobs .
translation: ゼロは、多くの香港の若者たちと同様に、不安定な仕事をいくつか持っています。
back_translation: Zero has several unstable jobs, like many young people in Hong Kong.

text: elaborate special effects take centre screen , so that the human story is pushed to one side .
translation: 特別な効果が中心に表示されるため、人間の物語が脇に追いやられています。
back_translation: Because special effects are prominently displayed, human stories are being pushed to the side.

text: on this morning , johnny wakes to his mother 's accusations that he has botched a simple scam , leaving them without enough money to payoff their inside man .
translation: 今朝、ジョニーは母親の彼が簡単な詐欺を失敗したという非難で目を覚まし、内部の協力者に支払うための十分なお金が残っていないことを知る。
back_translation: This morning, Johnny woke up to his mother's accusation that her boyfriend had failed an easy scam, and learned that there wasn't enough money left to pay the internal accomplices.

text: the film is small in scope , yet perfectly formed .
translation: その映画は規模は小さいが、完璧に作られている。
back_translation: The movie may have a small scale, but it is perfectly made.

text: directed in a flashy , empty sub-music video style by a director so self-possessed he actually adds a period to his first name
translation: 派手で空虚なサブ音楽ビデオスタイルで演出された、自己主張が強い監督によって、彼は実際に名前の最後にピリオドを付けるほどです。
back_translation: Directed by a very assertive director in a flashy and hollow sub-music video style, he even goes as far as putting a period at the end of his name.

text: well-acted , well-directed and , for all its moodiness , not too pretentious .
translation: よく演技され、よく演出されていて、そのムードのわりにあまり気取りがない。
back_translation: Well acted and well directed, yet surprisingly unpretentious for its mood.

text: basically a static series of semi-improvised ( and semi-coherent ) raps between the stars .
translation: 基本的には、星々の間で行われる半即興（および半整合性のある）ラップの静的なシリーズです。
back_translation: Basically, it's a static series of half-improvised (and semi-coherent) rap between the stars.

text: the complex computer shuts down the base to prevent infection .
translation: 複雑なコンピュータは感染を防ぐために基地をシャットダウンします。
back_translation: Complex computers shut down their bases to prevent infection.

text: her son has difficulty in understanding why his father was killed and today lies in one of the 124 tombs of jewish prisoners in a cemetery on the banks of the indian ocean .
translation: 彼女の息子は、なぜ父親が殺されたのかを理解するのに苦労しており、今日、インド洋の岸にある墓地の124のユダヤ人 prisoners の墓の一つに横たわっています。
back_translation: Her son is struggling to understand why his father was killed, and today he lies in one of the 124 Jewish prisoners' graves in a cemetery on the shores of the Indian Ocean.

text: just to add more complication to this already complicated plot , two thieves decide to steal the case and lead a miami police team and two fbi agents on a wild goose chase that ends inside the airport terminal .
translation: すでに複雑なプロットにさらなる複雑さを加えるために、2人の泥棒がケースを盗むことを決め、マイアミの警察チームと2人のFBIエージェントを空港ターミナル内での無駄な追跡に導く。
back_translation: To add further complexity to an already intricate plot, two thieves decide to steal a case, leading the Miami police team and two FBI agents into a futile chase within the airport terminal.

text: sum `` is jack ryan 's `` do-over . `` give credit to everyone from robinson down to the key grip that this bold move works . especially give credit to affleck .
translation: 「ジャック・ライアンの「やり直し」。ロビンソンからキーグリップまで、すべての人にクレジットを与えて、この大胆な動きが成功したことを称賛します。特にアフレックに感謝を。
back_translation: "Jack Ryan's 'do-over'. Giving credit to everyone from the Robinsons to the key grip, I commend this bold move for its success. Special thanks to Affleck."

text: but fate and their youthful dreams still have tricks to play . . .
translation: しかし運命と彼らの若い夢はまだトリックを仕掛けることがある . . .
back_translation: However, fate and their young dreams can still play tricks...

text: however , the babies turned out to be both women .
translation: しかし、赤ちゃんたちは両方とも女性であることが分かりました。
back_translation: However, it was found that both babies are female.

text: four friends sruggling with life meet in the maine woods for their annual hunting trip .
translation: 人生に悩む4人の友人たちが、年に一度の狩猟旅行のためにメイン州の森で出会う。
back_translation: Four friends struggling with life meet in the forests of Maine for their annual hunting trip.

text: majid majidi interviews peasants , soldiers , youngsters , women , elderly and gives a special attention to the children 's extraordinary resilience as they are confronted with the emotional and physical turmoil of war .
translation: マジッド・マジディは農民、兵士、若者、女性、高齢者にインタビューを行い、戦争の感情的および肉体的混乱に直面する子供たちの特別な回復力に特に注目しています。
back_translation: Majid Majidi interviews farmers, soldiers, young people, women, and the elderly, paying special attention to the unique resilience of children facing the emotional and physical turmoil of war.

text: hilarity ensues as the local developer battles to stop them while the sheriff starts to fall for the family 's only daughter .
translation: 地元の開発者が彼らを止めようと奮闘する中、保安官は家族の唯一の娘に恋をし始め、笑いの渦が巻き起こる。
back_translation: As local developers struggle to stop them, the sheriff begins to fall in love with the only daughter of a family, sparking a whirlwind of laughter.

text: jacquot 's rendering of puccini 's tale of devotion and double-cross is more than just a filmed opera . in his first stab at the form , jacquot takes a slightly anarchic approach that works only sporadically .
translation: ジャクオのプッチーニの献身と裏切りの物語の演出は、単なる映像化されたオペラ以上のものです。彼のこのジャンルへの初めての試みでは、ジャクオはやや無政府的なアプローチを取り、それは時折しか効果的ではありません。
back_translation: The direction of Giacomo's story of devotion and betrayal in Puccini is more than just a filmed opera. In his first attempt in this genre, Giacomo adopts a somewhat anarchic approach, which is occasionally not very effective.

text: meanwhile , chris 's radio horoscopes seem oddly personal , and the street musicians outside uwe 's restaurant keep getting more numerous .
translation: その間、クリスのラジオの星占いは奇妙に個人的なものに思え、ウーヴェのレストランの外にいるストリートミュージシャンはますます増えていく。
back_translation: During that time, Chris's radio horoscope seemed strangely personal, and the street musicians outside Uwe's restaurant were increasingly growing in number.

text: when marisa 's true identity is revealed , the two find that they are worlds apart , even though the distance separating them is just a subway ride between manhattan and the bronx .
translation: マリサの真の正体が明らかになると、二人は世界がまるで異なる存在であることを知る。たとえ二人を隔てる距離がマンハッタンとブロンクスの間の地下鉄の一区間であっても。
back_translation: When Marisa's true identity is revealed, the two come to understand that the world is an entirely different existence. Even if the distance separating them is just one subway line between Manhattan and the Bronx.

text: not only that , cho cho is an expert in martial arts .
translation: それだけでなく、チョーチョは武道の専門家です。
back_translation: Not only that, but Cho-Cho is a martial arts expert.

text: the irwins emerge unscathed , but the fictional footage is unconvincing and criminally badly acted .
translation: アーウィン家は無事に現れますが、フィクションの映像は説得力に欠け、演技がひどく下手です。
back_translation: The Irwin family appears safely, but the fictional footage lacks persuasion and the acting is terribly poor.

text: the third , roger corman , flees to the alien countryside where he decides to begin a violent quest to find out the truth behind his mission .
translation: 第3のロジャー・コーマンは、異星の田舎に逃げ込み、自身の任務の背後にある真実を探るための暴力的な冒険を始めることを決意します。
back_translation: The third Roger Corman decides to escape to an alien countryside and begins a violent adventure to uncover the truth behind his mission.

text: but there are some surprises on the way . . .
translation: しかし、道中にはいくつかの驚きがあります。。。
back_translation: However, there are several surprises along the way...

text: graffiti removal : the act of removing tags and graffiti by painting over them .
translation: 落書き除去：タグや落書きを塗りつぶして取り除く行為。
back_translation: Graffiti removal: The act of covering up and removing tags and graffiti.

text: the film was immensely enjoyable thanks to great performances by both steve buscemi and rosario dawson . . .
translation: この映画は、スティーブ・ブシェミとロザリオ・ドーソンの素晴らしい演技のおかげで非常に楽しかった。
back_translation: This movie was very enjoyable thanks to the wonderful performances of Steve Buscemi and Rosario Dawson.

text: like leafing through an album of photos accompanied by the sketchiest of captions .
translation: 曖昧なキャプションがついたアルバムの写真をめくるような感じ。
back_translation: It feels like turning through album photos with vague captions.

text: bret packard is the best baseball player in the world .
translation: ブレット・パッカードは世界で最高の野球選手です。
back_translation: Brett Packard is the best baseball player in the world.

text: the iditarod lasts for days - this just felt like it did .
translation: アイディタロッドは数日間続きますが、これはそのように感じました。
back_translation: The Iditarod lasts for several days, but it felt that way.

text: at the shelter which offers only a two to three month respite from the streets , counselor tony perez ( jack forcinito ) tries to provide guidance to steve and his roommates mike ( demetrius navarro ) and andy ( esteban powell ) .
translation: シェルターでは、ストリートからの2〜3ヶ月の一時的な避難所しか提供されていない中、カウンセラーのトニー・ペレス（ジャック・フォルシニート）がスティーブとルームメイトのマイク（デメトリウス・ナバロ）およびアンディ（エステバン・パウエル）に指導を試みている。
back_translation: In the shelter, where only temporary refuge for 2 to 3 months from the street is provided, counselor Tony Perez (Jack Falchini) is attempting to guide Steve and his roommates Mike (Demetrius Navarro) and Andy (Esteban Powell).

text: oscar wilde 's masterpiece , the importance of being earnest , may be the best play of the 19th century . it 's so good that its relentless , polished wit can withstand not only inept school productions , but even oliver parker 's movie adaptation .
translation: オスカー・ワイルドの傑作『真面目が肝心』は、19世紀の最高の戯曲かもしれません。それはあまりにも優れており、その容赦ない洗練された機知は、不器用な学校の制作だけでなく、オリバー・パーカーの映画化でさえも耐えることができます。
back_translation: Oscar Wilde's masterpiece "The Importance of Being Earnest" may be the greatest play of the 19th century. It is so exceptional that its relentless and sophisticated wit can withstand not only the clumsy productions of schools but even Oliver Parker's film adaptation.

text: but billy 's not into him ^ & # 214 ; he 's in love with sonny , a musician into sm .
translation: でもビリーは彼に興味がない。彼はソニーに恋をしていて、ソニーはSMに興味がある音楽家だ。
back_translation: But Billy is not interested in him. He is in love with Sonny, who is a musician interested in SM.

text: together with john connor , it must stop the rise of the machines or all humanity will fall .
translation: ジョン・コナーと共に、機械の台頭を止めなければ人類全体が滅びてしまう。
back_translation: Together with John Connor, we must stop the rise of the machines; otherwise, humanity as a whole will perish.

text: combines improbable melodrama ( gored bullfighters , comatose ballerinas ) with subtly kinky bedside vigils and sensational denouements , and yet at the end , we are undeniably touched .
translation: 想像を超えたメロドラマ（刺された闘牛士、昏睡状態のバレリーナ）を微妙にエッチなベッドサイドの看護や sensational な結末と組み合わせているが、結局私たちは否応なく感動させられる。
back_translation: Combining a melodrama beyond imagination (a stabbed bullfighter, a comatose ballerina) with slightly risqué bedside nursing and a sensational ending, we are ultimately moved against our will.

text: a hitchcockian thriller in the spirit of 'rope ' and agatha christie 's 'ten little indians ' that begs the question can murder , if done well , be considered art ?
translation: 「ロープ」とアガサ・クリスティの「少ないインディアン」にインスパイアされたヒッチコック風のスリラーで、上手く行われた殺人は芸術とみなされることができるのかという問いを投げかける。
back_translation: A Hitchcockian thriller inspired by "Rope" and Agatha Christie's "The Least Indiant," it raises the question of whether a well-executed murder can be considered an art form.

text: with david carradine , theo van gogh , kate clarke and henry jaglom - featuring a soundtrack by grammy nominated composer willie wisely , who also plays the lead character , willie vincent .
translation: デイビッド・キャラダイン、テオ・バン・ゴッホ、ケイト・クラーク、ヘンリー・ジャグロムが出演し、グラミー賞にノミネートされた作曲家ウィリー・ワイズリーによるサウンドトラックをフィーチャーしており、彼自身が主役のウィリー・ビンセントを演じています。
back_translation: David Carradine, Theo van Gogh, Kate Clark, and Henry Jaglom star in the film featuring a soundtrack by Grammy-nominated composer Willie Wisely, who also plays the lead role of Willie Vincent.

text: ultimately , it ponders the reasons we need stories so much .
translation: 結局のところ、私たちが物語をこんなにも必要とする理由について考えさせられます。
back_translation: Ultimately, it makes us reflect on the reasons why we need stories so much.

text: the deeper john digs , the clearer the mothman 's purpose arises - only to leave his life in immediate danger , as it seems .
translation: ジョンが掘れば掘るほど、モスマンの目的が明らかになるが、それは彼の命を危険にさらすだけのようだ。
back_translation: The more John digs, the clearer Mothman's purpose becomes, but it seems to only put his life in danger.

text: the only question . . . is to determine how well the schmaltz is manufactured -- to assess the quality of the manipulative engineering . average , at best , i 'm afraid .
translation: 唯一の質問は…シュマルツがどれほど良く製造されているかを判断することです。操作的なエンジニアリングの質を評価することです。残念ながら、せいぜい平均的です。
back_translation: The only question is... how well is Schmalz manufactured? It is about evaluating the quality of the operational engineering. Unfortunately, at best it is average.

text: an homage to the early 1960s sex comedies that starred rock hudson and doris day .
translation: ロック・ハドソンとドリス・デイが主演した1960年代初頭のセックスコメディへのオマージュ。
back_translation: An homage to the sex comedies of the early 1960s starring Rock Hudson and Doris Day.

text: when mr . hundert tells us in his narration that 'this is a story without surprises , ' we nod in agreement .
translation: ハンダート氏が「これは驚きのない物語だ」と語ると、私たちはうなずいて同意します。
back_translation: Mr. Handart says, "This is a story without surprises," and we nod in agreement.

text: furthermore , he seeks to investigate and confront the powerful elite political and corporate interests fanning this culture for their own unscrupulous gain .
translation: さらに、彼はこの文化を自らの不正な利益のために煽っている強力なエリートの政治的および企業的利益を調査し、対 confront しようとしています。
back_translation: Furthermore, he is investigating and attempting to confront the political and corporate interests of powerful elites who are inciting this culture for their own illegal gains.

text: ken russell would love this . in one scene , we get a stab at soccer hooliganism , a double-barreled rip-off of quentin tarantino 's climactic shootout M-^W and meat loaf explodes .
translation: ケン・ラッセルはこれを気に入るだろう。あるシーンでは、サッカーフーリガニズムを一瞥し、クエンティン・タランティーノのクライマックスの発砲シーンを二重にパクり、ミート・ローフが爆発する。
back_translation: Ken Russell would probably like this. In one scene, it glances at soccer hooliganism, double-copies Quentin Tarantino's climax shooting scene, and Meat Loaf explodes.

text: you can see the would-be surprises coming a mile away , and the execution of these twists is delivered with a hammer . thumbs down .
translation: 予想される驚きが見え見えで、これらのひねりの実行は鈍い手法で行われています。手厳しい評価です。
back_translation: The expected surprises are glaringly obvious, and the execution of these twists is done with a blunt approach. This is a harsh evaluation.

text: director charles stone iii applies more detail to the film 's music than to the story line ; what 's best about drumline is its energy .
translation: チャールズ・ストーンIII監督は、ストーリーラインよりも映画の音楽により多くの詳細を注いでいる。ドラミラインの最も素晴らしい点はそのエネルギーだ。
back_translation: Director Charles Stone III pays more attention to the film's music than to the storyline. The most remarkable aspect of the drama line is its energy.

text: always excitable and volatile , jie becomes reckless and dangerous when he has the gun in his hand .
translation: 常に興奮しやすく気まぐれなジエは、手に銃を持つと無謀で危険になります。
back_translation: The always excitable and capricious Jie becomes reckless and dangerous when holding a gun.

text: mark hamill plays coroner who begins to doubt that it is a suicide .
translation: マーク・ハミルは、自殺であることに疑念を抱く検死官を演じています。
back_translation: Mark Hamill plays a coroner who has doubts about a suicide.

text: a refreshing change from the usual whoopee-cushion effort aimed at the youth market .
translation: 若者市場を狙った通常のウフフクッションの努力からのさわやかな変化。
back_translation: A refreshing change from the usual efforts of Ufufu cushions targeting the youth market.

text: fans of plympton 's shorts may marginally enjoy the film , but it is doubtful this listless feature will win him any new viewers .
translation: プライムトンの短編のファンはわずかにこの映画を楽しむかもしれませんが、この活気のない長編が新しい視聴者を獲得することは疑わしいです。
back_translation: Fans of the short stories by Primton may slightly enjoy this film, but it is doubtful that this lackluster feature will attract new viewers.

text: she 's a brilliant lawyer with a sharp , strategic mind .
translation: 彼女は鋭い戦略的思考を持つ素晴らしい弁護士です。
back_translation: She is a wonderful lawyer with sharp strategic thinking.

text: occasionally funny and consistently odd , and it works reasonably well as a star vehicle for zhao .
translation: 時折面白く、常に奇妙で、チャオのスター車両としては reasonably よく機能している。
back_translation: Sometimes interesting, always strange, and functioning reasonably well as a star vehicle for Chao.

text: have you ever met that certain someone that made your heart drop the moment you met ?
translation: あなたが出会った瞬間に心がドキッとした特別な人に会ったことがありますか？
back_translation: Have you ever met a special person who made your heart skip a beat the moment you encountered them?

text: however , just as velma 's star fell , so does roxie 's , when go-to-hell kitty arrives at the jail on a multiple murder charge , the press forget roxie and now she and velma are in the same boat .
translation: しかし、ヴェルマの星が落ちるように、ロキシーの星も落ちる。地獄に行く猫が複数の殺人容疑で刑務所に現れると、報道はロキシーを忘れ、彼女とヴェルマは同じ状況に陥る。
back_translation: However, just as Verma's star falls, Roxy's star also falls. When a cat going to hell appears in prison on multiple murder charges, the media forgets about Roxy, and she and Verma find themselves in the same situation.

text: `` the motorcycle diaries `` is based on the journals of che geuvara , leader of the cuban revolution .
translation: 「モーターサイクル・ダイアリーズ」は、キューバ革命の指導者チェ・ゲバラの日記を基にしています。
back_translation: "The Motorcycle Diaries" is based on the diaries of Che Guevara, the leader of the Cuban Revolution.

text: after 20 years of exile in paris , gustavo returns to his native city s & # 227 ; o paulo .
translation: 20年間のパリの亡命の後、グスタボは故郷のサンパウロに帰ります。
back_translation: After 20 years of exile in Paris, Gustavo returns to his hometown of São Paulo.

text: their world comes crashing down after one of the girls is murdered by a blackmail victim .
translation: 彼女たちの世界は、黒mailの被害者によって一人の少女が殺された後、崩壊します。
back_translation: Their world collapses after a girl is murdered by a victim of blackmail.

text: hey , at least the title of this film lets you know exactly where it 's heading .
translation: こんにちは、この映画のタイトルは、どこに向かっているのかを正確に教えてくれますね。
back_translation: Hello, this movie title accurately tells you where it's headed.

text: we see the action of the book as we see kaufman struggle to adapt it into a movie .
translation: 私たちは、カウフマンがその本を映画に adaptするために奮闘する様子を見ながら、物語のアクションを見ています。
back_translation: We are watching the action of the story as Kaufman struggles to adapt his book into a movie.

text: daddy & # 38 ; papa explores the growing phenomenon of gay fatherhood and its impact on american culture .
translation: 「ダディとパパ」は、ゲイの父親たちの増加する現象と、そのアメリカ文化への影響を探求します。
back_translation: "Daddy and Papa" explores the increasing phenomenon of gay fathers and its impact on American culture.

text: yeah , she 's been hanging with some pretty freaky people and she 's tired of their crazy scene and wants out .
translation: そう、彼女はかなり変わった人たちと一緒にいて、そのクレイジーなシーンに疲れていて、抜け出したいと思っている。
back_translation: Yes, she is with some pretty eccentric people, and she is tired of that crazy scene and wants to get out.

text: when they reach la , lucy ( britney spears ) falls in love with ben and against her father 's wishes , she stays and she goes to the audition .
translation: 彼らがLAに到着すると、ルーシー（ブリトニー・スピアーズ）はベンに恋をし、彼女の父親の願いに反して留まり、オーディションに参加します。
back_translation: When they arrive in LA, Lucy (Britney Spears) falls in love with Ben and stays against her father's wishes to participate in auditions.

text: the main theme of this feature- 90 minute film , the exploitation of art for political ideology , is expressed by the personal and ideological conflicts between three artists and their mentors .
translation: この90分の映画の主題である政治的イデオロギーのための芸術の搾取は、3人のアーティストとそのメンターとの間の個人的およびイデオロギー的な対立によって表現されています。
back_translation: The theme of this 90-minute movie, which is the exploitation of art for political ideology, is expressed through the personal and ideological conflicts between three artists and their mentor.

text: chris jones ( malik yoba ) is a strong , independent , black man who finds himself lost on a desolate road .
translation: クリス・ジョーンズ（マリク・ヨバ）は、荒れ果てた道で迷った強く独立した黒人男性です。
back_translation: Chris Jones (Malik Yoba) is a strong, independent Black man who is lost on a desolate road.

text: as any creature-feature fan knows , when you cross toxic chemicals with a bunch of exotic creatures , you get a lot of running around , screaming and death . on that score , the film certainly does n't disappoint .
translation: クリーチャー・フィーチャーのファンなら誰でも知っているように、有毒な化学物質とエキゾチックな生物を組み合わせると、逃げ回ったり、叫んだり、死んだりすることが多くなります。この点に関して、映画は確かに期待を裏切りません。
back_translation: As any fan of creature features knows, combining toxic chemicals with exotic creatures often leads to running away, screaming, and dying. In this regard, the movie certainly does not disappoint.

text: these camps were surrounded by barb wire and guard towers .
translation: これらのキャンプは有刺鉄線と警備塔に囲まれていました。
back_translation: These camps were surrounded by barbed wire and guard towers.

text: celebrates family in a way that 's deeply felt by the director and screenwriter/subject and no doubt will be shared by viewers of any ethnicity .
translation: 監督と脚本家/主題によって深く感じられる形で家族を祝福しており、間違いなくどの民族の視聴者にも共有されるでしょう。
back_translation: The director and screenwriter deeply celebrate family in a way that can be felt, and it will undoubtedly resonate with viewers from any ethnicity.

text: stay clear of reminding yourself that it 's a `` true story `` and you 're likely to have one helluva time at the movies .
translation: 「これは「実話」であることを思い出すのは避けて、映画鑑賞を思い切り楽しんでください。」
back_translation: "Please avoid remembering that this is a 'true story' and enjoy the movie to the fullest."

text: tsai has a well-deserved reputation as one of the cinema world 's great visual stylists , and in this film , every shot enhances the excellent performances .
translation: ツァイは映画界の偉大なビジュアルスタイリストの一人としての評価を受けており、この映画ではすべてのショットが素晴らしい演技を引き立てています。
back_translation: Tsai is recognized as one of the great visual stylists in the film industry, and in this movie, every shot enhances the wonderful performances.

text: miller is playing so free with emotions , and the fact that children are hostages to fortune , that he makes the audience hostage to his swaggering affectation of seriousness .
translation: ミラーは感情を自由に表現しており、子供たちが運命の人質であるという事実から、彼は観客を自信満々な真剣さの虚飾に囚われさせています。
back_translation: Mirror freely expresses emotions, and from the fact that the children are hostages of fate, he captivates the audience with a façade of confident seriousness.

text: mi yun and kang have difficulty working with each other , as their personalities and working methods are constantly in conflict .
translation: ミユンとカンは、お互いの性格や働き方が常に対立しているため、一緒に働くのが難しい。
back_translation: Miyun and Kan find it difficult to work together because their personalities and work styles are always in conflict.

text: nicholson 's understated performance is wonderful . as warren he stumbles in search of all the emotions and life experiences he 's neglected over the years .
translation: ニコルソンの控えめな演技は素晴らしい。ウォーレンとして、彼は何年も無視してきたすべての感情や人生経験を求めてつまずく。
back_translation: Nicholson's understated performance is wonderful. As Warren, he stumbles upon all the emotions and life experiences he has ignored for years.

text: they come to get afang & # 38 ; xiang , because they were once involved in a war , and they have to testifie .
translation: 彼らはアファンとシアンを連れ去るために来た。なぜなら彼らはかつて戦争に関与しており、証言しなければならないからだ。
back_translation: They have come to take Afan and Sian, because they were once involved in the war and must testify.

text: this director 's cut -- which adds 51 minutes -- takes a great film and turns it into a mundane soap opera .
translation: このディレクターズカットは51分を追加し、素晴らしい映画を平凡なメロドラマに変えてしまいます。
back_translation: This director's cut adds 51 minutes, transforming a wonderful film into an ordinary melodrama.

text: the result is good gossip , entertainingly delivered , yet with a distinctly musty odour , its expiry date long gone .
translation: 結果は良いゴシップで、面白おかしく伝えられているが、明らかに昔の香りを帯びていて、その賞味期限はとっくに過ぎている。
back_translation: The result is good gossip, communicated in an entertaining way, but it clearly has a scent of the past, and its expiration date has long passed.

text: the son of the bride 's humour is born out of an engaging storyline , which also is n't embarrassed to make you reach for the tissues . this movie is to be cherished .
translation: 花嫁の息子のユーモアは、引き込まれるストーリーラインから生まれており、ティッシュを手にしないといけない場面も恥ずかしがりません。この映画は大切にされるべきです。
back_translation: The humor of the bride's son comes from an engaging storyline, and he isn't shy about moments that require a tissue. This movie deserves to be cherished.

text: frailty is n't as gory or explicit . but in its child-centered , claustrophobic context , it can be just as frightening and disturbing -- even punishing .
translation: 脆弱さはそれほど血なまぐさいわけではありませんが、子ども中心の閉塞感のある文脈では、同じくらい恐ろしいし、不安を与えることができます－さらには罰のように感じることもあります。
back_translation: Vulnerability is not necessarily as bloody, but in a context that is centered around children and feels constricted, it can be equally terrifying and can cause anxiety—sometimes even feeling like a punishment.

text: a wedding with stifler orchestrating the correlating social event . . .
translation: スティフラーが関連する社会的イベントを orchestrate する結婚式 . . .
back_translation: A wedding orchestrated by Stifler that involves social events...

text: the problem is he 's trying to be everything he 's not .
translation: 問題は、彼が自分がなりたくないものになろうとしていることです。
back_translation: The problem is that he is trying to become something he does not want to be.

text: together they travel to england and meet up with chon lin to kill rathbone and get the imperial seal back .
translation: 彼らは一緒にイギリスに旅し、チョンリンと会ってラズボーンを殺し、帝国の印章を取り戻します。
back_translation: They travel to the UK together, meet Chonglin, kill Rasbourne, and retrieve the imperial seal.

text: the determination of pinochet 's victims to seek justice , and their often heartbreaking testimony , spoken directly into director patricio guzman 's camera , pack a powerful emotional wallop .
translation: ピノチェトの犠牲者たちの正義を求める決意と、監督パトリシオ・グスマンのカメラに直接語られる彼らの切実な証言は、強力な感情の衝撃をもたらします。
back_translation: The determination of the victims of Pinochet seeking justice, along with their urgent testimonies spoken directly to director Patricio Guzmán's camera, brings a powerful emotional impact.

text: in this high-school coming of age romantic comedy and with 2 months of summer vacation ahead of them , fresh graduates kiki ( charlene choi ) and kammy ( gillian chung ) swear to look for their first boyfriends and bring them to show their schoolmates at the high school reunion .
translation: この高校の成長を描いたロマンティックコメディでは、夏休みが2ヶ月残っている中、卒業したばかりのキキ（シャーリーン・チョイ）とカミー（ジリアン・チョン）が初めての彼氏を探し、同窓会で同級生に紹介することを誓います。
back_translation: In this romantic comedy depicting the growth of a high school, with two months left of summer vacation, recently graduated Kiki (Shirleen Choi) and Kami (Gillian Chung) vow to find their first boyfriends and introduce them to their classmates at a reunion.

text: feels less like a cousin to blade runner than like a bottom-feeder sequel in the escape from new york series .
translation: ブレードランナーのいとこというよりも、『ニューヨーク1997』シリーズの底辺続編のように感じます。
back_translation: It feels more like a low-end sequel to the 'Escape from New York' series than a cousin to Blade Runner.

text: the movie 's gloomy atmosphere is fascinating , though , even if the movie itself does n't stand a ghost of a chance .
translation: 映画の陰鬱な雰囲気は魅力的ですが、映画自体はまったく成功する見込みがありません。
back_translation: The film's gloomy atmosphere is captivating, but the film itself has no chance of succeeding at all.

text: a bittersweet drama about the limbo of grief and how truth-telling can open the door to liberation .
translation: 喪失の中間状態と、真実を語ることが解放への扉を開く方法についてのほろ苦いドラマです。
back_translation: It is a bittersweet drama about the intermediate state of loss and how speaking the truth opens the door to liberation.

text: this film is difficult to watch for the inhumanity it depicts , but important to see for its factual elements and the reminder of both the difficulty and importance of maintaining one 's humanity .
translation: この映画は描かれている非人道性のために観るのが難しいですが、事実の要素や人間性を維持することの困難さと重要性を思い出させるために見ることが重要です。
back_translation: This movie is difficult to watch due to the depicted inhumanity, but it is important to watch it to remind ourselves of the difficulties and significance of maintaining elements of truth and humanity.

text: hunted by the police and the various mafia groups , they work their way up to the source of this incredible plot to find out who is manipulating them .
translation: 警察や様々なマフィアグループに追われながら、彼らはこの信じられない陰謀の背後にいる者を見つけ出すため、その源へとたどり着こうとします。
back_translation: While being pursued by the police and various mafia groups, they attempt to trace the source in order to uncover those behind this incredible conspiracy.

text: bears is even worse than i imagined a movie ever could be .
translation: 「ベアーズ」は、私が映画がこれ以上悪くなるとは想像もしなかったほど悪い。
back_translation: "Bears" is so bad that I never imagined movies could get any worse.

text: dr . akash sinha is a respected neuro surgeon , who too is no less devoted to his professional than his father .
translation: アカシュ・シンハ医師は尊敬される神経外科医であり、彼もまた父親と同様に自分の職業に devoted です。
back_translation: Dr. Akash Singha is a respected neurosurgeon, and he is devoted to his profession just like his father.

text: for anyone who cares about the future of america , it 's required viewing .
translation: アメリカの未来を気にする人にとっては、必見です。
back_translation: For those concerned about the future of America, this is a must-see.

text: he used to love mitchell allen ( thomas ian nicholas ) before mitchell dumped him for candice ( clare kramer ) .
translation: 彼はミッチェル・アレン（トーマス・イアン・ニコラス）を以前は愛していましたが、ミッチェルはキャンディス（クレア・クレイマー）のために彼を振りました。
back_translation: He used to love Mitchell Allen (Thomas Ian Nicholas), but Mitchell dumped him for Candice (Claire Kramer).

text: overwhelmed and excited about the big studio adventure ahead of him , alex moves into an apartment with two other up-n'-comings .
translation: 圧倒され、これからの大きなスタジオの冒険にワクワクしているアレックスは、2人の未来ある仲間とアパートに引っ越します。
back_translation: Feeling overwhelmed and excited about the upcoming big adventure in the studio, Alex moves into an apartment with two promising companions.

text: funny and , at times , poignant , the film from director george hickenlooper all takes place in pasadena , `` a city where people still read . ``
translation: 面白く、時には胸に響くこの映画は、監督ジョージ・ヒッケンルーパーによって制作され、パサデナで展開されます。「人々がまだ読書をする街」で。
back_translation: This interesting and sometimes poignant movie is directed by George Hickenlooper and takes place in Pasadena, "a town where people still read."

text: far-fetched premise , convoluted plot , and thematic mumbo jumbo about destiny and redemptive love .
translation: 突飛な前提、複雑なプロット、運命と贖罪の愛に関するテーマ的なナンセンス。
back_translation: Outlandish premises, complex plots, and thematic nonsense concerning love, fate, and atonement.

text: using everything from closely mic-ed subjects to infrared video standing by yourself gets uncomfortably close to its subjects as they get drunk and high , squander money , rip-off their parents , and get in trouble with pretty much everyone in their paths as a conduit to simply having a good time .
translation: 近接マイクで録音された被写体から赤外線ビデオまで、自分一人で立っていると、被写体が酔っ払ったり、ドラッグを使ったり、お金を浪費したり、親をだまして、ほぼすべての人とトラブルになったりする様子が不快なほど近くで映し出され、単に楽しむための手段となっています。
back_translation: From subjects recorded with a close-up microphone to infrared video, when standing alone, the way subjects get drunk, use drugs, squander money, deceive their parents, and get into trouble with just about everyone is uncomfortably captured up close, turning it into merely a means of entertainment.

text: before long , the bay boy of bowls is turning the sedate and very english pastime upside down with hysterical results .
translation: まもなく、ボウルの湾の少年が落ち着いた非常にイギリスらしい余暇をひっくり返し、 hysterical な結果を引き起こしています。
back_translation: Soon, the boy from Bowls Bay is overturning a very British leisure activity and causing hysterical results.

text: poignant and moving , a walk to remember is an inspirational love story , capturing the innocence and idealism of that first encounter .
translation: 感動的で心に響く『あの日の歩み』は、初めての出会いの純真さと理想主義を捉えた、インスピレーションに満ちたラブストーリーです。
