back_translation: The touching and heartfelt "The Journey of That Day" is an inspiration-filled love story that captures the purity and idealism of first encounters.

text: mitchell misses the bus and starts walking to school .
translation: ミッチェルはバスを逃して、学校に歩いて行き始める。
back_translation: Mitchell misses the bus and starts walking to school.

text: the experiment is supposed to be transported to a prison asteroid , yet manages to escape captain gantu , who was supposed to deliver him there .
translation: 実験は刑務所の小惑星に運ばれるはずだったが、そこに彼を運ぶ予定だったガントゥ船長から逃げることに成功する。
back_translation: The experiment was supposed to be taken to an asteroid prison, but he managed to escape from Captain Gantu, who was scheduled to transport him there.

text: but santa 's got problems ( he 's even mysteriously losing weight ) and things quickly go south when he finds out that his son , charlie , has landed on this year 's `` naughty `` list .
translation: しかし、サンタは問題を抱えており（彼は神秘的に体重を減らしている）、彼の息子チャーリーが今年の「悪い子リスト」に載っていることを知ったとき、事態は急速に悪化します。
back_translation: However, Santa is facing problems (he is mysteriously losing weight), and when he finds out that his son Charlie is on this year's "bad boy list," things quickly go downhill.

text: like being invited to a classy dinner soiree and not knowing anyone . you leave the same way you came -- a few tasty morsels under your belt , but no new friends .
translation: 上品なディナーソワレに招待されて、誰とも知らないままです。あなたは来た時と同じように去ります -- いくつかの美味しい一口を食べたものの、新しい友達はできません。
back_translation: You are invited to an elegant dinner soirée, without knowing anyone. You leave just as you arrived -- having eaten some delicious bites, but without making any new friends.

text: while the costumes hint at changes beneath the surface , it is abbass ' performance , as she vacillates flawlessly between muted hausfrau and shining hoofer , that reveals the depths of her transformation .
translation: 衣装が表面下の変化をほのめかす一方で、アバスの演技は、地味な主婦から輝くフーパーへと完璧に揺れ動くことで、彼女の変容の深さを明らかにしています。
back_translation: While the costume hints at changes beneath the surface, Abass's performance perfectly sways from a subdued housewife to a radiant Hooper, revealing the depth of her transformation.

text: the only threat mastermind thief charlie croker ( wahlberg ) never saw coming was a member of his own crew .
translation: ただ一人、天才泥棒チャーリー・クローカー（ウォールバーグ）が予期しなかった脅威は、彼自身のクルーの一員だった。
back_translation: The only unexpected threat for the genius thief Charlie Croker (Wahlberg) was a member of his own crew.

text: the correspondence between spielrein , freud and jung discovered that day in the geneva basement has become essential to understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis ^ & # 214 ; and the virtually insurmountable challenges facing women who sought to contribute in any role other than that of patient .
translation: その日、ジュネーブの地下室で発見されたシュピールライン、フロイト、ユングの間の関係は、精神分析の進化を理解する上で不可欠なものとなり、患者以外の役割で貢献を求めた女性が直面したほぼ克服不可能な課題を明らかにしました。
back_translation: On that day, the relationship between Spielrein, Freud, and Jung discovered in a basement in Geneva became essential for understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis, revealing the nearly insurmountable challenges faced by women who sought to contribute in roles other than that of a patient.

text: the doctor delivers the news that this has been a false pregnancy , one in which the embryo never develops .
translation: 医者は、これは偽妊娠であり、胚が決して発達しなかったことを知らせる。
back_translation: The doctor informs that this is a false pregnancy and that the embryo never developed.

text: eagle is facing his own living hell 3 , 000 miles away in new jersey .
translation: イーグルはニュージャージーで3000マイル離れた自分の生き地獄に直面しています。
back_translation: The eagle is facing its living hell 3000 miles away in New Jersey.

text: while there , the elder man falls in love with the mom ( keaton ) .
translation: その間、年配の男性は母親（キーリーン）に恋をします。
back_translation: During that time, the older man falls in love with his mother (Keely).

text: vir , a young man from a rural village , learns on his wedding day that the people whom he thought were his parents ar n't .
translation: 田舎の村に住む若者ヴィールは、結婚式の日に自分が思っていた両親が実の両親ではないことを知る。
back_translation: A young man named Veer, who lives in a rural village, discovers on the day of his wedding that the parents he thought were his biological parents are not his real parents.

text: with rare birds , as with the shipping news before it , an attempt is made to transplant a hollywood star into newfoundland 's wild soil -- and the rock once again resists the intrusion .
translation: 珍しい鳥たちと同様に、その前の航海ニュースと同じように、ハリウッドのスターをニューファンドランドの野生の土壌に移植しようとする試みが行われるが、岩は再びその侵入に抵抗する。
back_translation: Like the rare birds, and similar to the previous sailing news, attempts are being made to transplant Hollywood stars into the wild soil of Newfoundland, but the rocks resist this invasion once again.

text: abandoned and filled with a mysterious past , holy angel school for girls is about to reveal its secrets of betrayal , jealousy , and vengeance .
translation: 放棄され、神秘的な過去に満ちた女子聖天使学校は、裏切り、嫉妬、復讐の秘密を明らかにしようとしています。
back_translation: The abandoned girls' heavenly angel school, filled with a mysterious past, seeks to uncover secrets of betrayal, jealousy, and revenge.

text: the message becomes the savior for `` the country bears , `` an equal parts silly and sweet tale that wears its great big ol ' heart on its grizzly-sized sleeve .
translation: そのメッセージは「カントリーベアーズ」の救世主となる。これは、愚かさと甘さが同じくらい組み合わさった物語であり、その大きな心をクマのような袖に見せている。
back_translation: That message will be the savior of the "Country Bears." This is a story that combines foolishness and sweetness in equal measure, showcasing its big heart in a bear-like sleeve.

text: simon calms his prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; that genuine happiness only comes from the inside .
translation: サイモンは彼の弟子に、真の幸せは内面からだけ来るということを教えます。
back_translation: Simon teaches his disciples that true happiness comes only from within.

text: sandra bullock and hugh grant make a great team , but this predictable romantic comedy should get a pink slip .
translation: サンドラ・ブロックとヒュー・グラントは素晴らしいチームですが、この予測可能なロマンティックコメディは解雇されるべきです。
back_translation: Sandra Bullock and Hugh Grant make a wonderful team, but this predictable romantic comedy should be fired.

text: probes in a light-hearted way the romantic problems of individuals for whom the yearning for passion spells discontent .
translation: 情熱への憧れが不満を招く個々のロマンティックな問題を軽いノリで探ります。
back_translation: We will explore the individual romantic issues that arise from a longing for passion, approached with a light-hearted touch.

text: a girl at a southern baptist high school finds that her pregnancy makes her an outcast .
translation: 南部バプティストの高校に通う少女は、妊娠が原因で仲間外れにされていることに気づく。
back_translation: A girl attending a Southern Baptist high school realizes she is being ostracized due to her pregnancy.

text: at the age of 25 , tiz is considered a survivor .
translation: 25歳で、ティズはサバイバーと見なされています。
back_translation: At 25 years old, Tiz is considered a survivor.

text: but katherine holds her back , not to let interfere anything with her successful career .
translation: しかし、キャサリンは彼女を引き留め、成功したキャリアに干渉させないようにしています。
back_translation: However, Catherine is holding her back and ensuring that her successful career is not interfered with.

text: the story of trouble every day . . . is so sketchy it amounts to little more than preliminary notes for a science-fiction horror film , and the movie 's fragmentary narrative style makes piecing the story together frustrating difficult .
translation: 「トラブル・エブリデイ」の物語は非常に曖昧で、サイエンスフィクションホラー映画のための予備的なメモに過ぎないと言えます。また、映画の断片的な語り口は物語を繋ぎ合わせるのを非常に難しくしているため、イライラさせられます。
back_translation: The story of "Trouble Every Day" is extremely ambiguous and could be said to be nothing more than preliminary notes for a science fiction horror film. Additionally, the fragmented narrative style of the film makes it very difficult to piece the story together, which can be quite frustrating.

text: with wit and empathy to spare , waydowntown acknowledges the silent screams of workaday inertia but stops short of indulging its characters ' striving solipsism .
translation: ウィットと共感にあふれた「ウェイダウンタウン」は、日常の慣性による無言の叫びを認めつつも、キャラクターたちの自己中心的な努力を indulgingすることはありません。
back_translation: "Waydowntown," filled with wit and empathy, acknowledges the silent screams caused by the inertia of everyday life, yet it does not indulge the self-centered efforts of the characters.

text: tom is a charismatic late-night radio talk show host , whose unconventional upbringing has made him a little too quick to fall in love and marry , resulting in three divorces before the age of 40 .
translation: トムは魅力的な深夜ラジオトークショーのホストで、彼の非伝統的な育ち方が影響し、愛に落ちやすく結婚するのが少し早すぎた結果、40歳になる前に3回の離婚を経験しています。
back_translation: Tom is a charismatic host of a late-night radio talk show, and his non-traditional upbringing has influenced him to easily fall in love, resulting in marrying a bit too early and experiencing three divorces before turning 40.

text: philippa is arrested and questioned about her ( supposedly terroristic ) motives .
translation: フィリッパは逮捕され、彼女の（いわゆるテロ的な）動機について質問される。
back_translation: Philippa is arrested and questioned about her (so-called terrorist) motives.

text: he wanted to make a difference - but nothing does at downview high .
translation: 彼は変化をもたらしたいと思っていたが、ダウンビュー高校では何も変わらない。
back_translation: He wanted to bring about change, but nothing changes at Downview High School.

text: what might 've been an exhilarating exploration of an odd love triangle becomes a sprawl of uncoordinated vectors .
translation: 奇妙なラブトライアングルの刺激的な探求が、調和のないベクトルの広がりに変わってしまうかもしれない。
back_translation: The exciting exploration of a strange love triangle may turn into an unfolding of discordant vectors.

text: this may be burns 's strongest film since the brothers mcmullen .
translation: これはバーンズの「マクマレン兄弟」以来の最も強力な映画かもしれません。
back_translation: This may be the most powerful film since Burns' "The McMullen Brothers."

text: the parts are better than the whole ( bizarre , funny , tragic - like love in new york ) .
translation: 部分は全体よりも優れている （奇妙で、面白く、悲劇的 - ニューヨークの愛のように）。
back_translation: The part is superior to the whole (strange, interesting, tragic - like love in New York).

text: [ davis ] has a bright , chipper style that keeps things moving , while never quite managing to connect her wish-fulfilling characters to the human race .
translation: [デイビス]は明るく元気なスタイルで物事を進めるが、彼女の願望をかなえるキャラクターを人間社会に結びつけることにはなかなか成功していない。
back_translation: Davis has a bright and cheerful style of doing things, but she has not been very successful in connecting her character that fulfills her desires with human society.

text: the cast , collectively a successful example of the lovable-loser protagonist , shows deft comic timing .
translation: キャストは、愛すべき負け犬の主人公の成功した例として、巧みなコメディのタイミングを見せています。
back_translation: The cast showcases the successful example of the lovable underdog protagonist, demonstrating excellent comedic timing.

text: leela is a film based on the south asian-american experience .
translation: リーラは南アジア系アメリカ人の経験に基づいた映画です。
back_translation: Leela is a film based on the experiences of South Asian Americans.

text: as he tries to re-discover the family that he abandoned long ago , he is forced to confront the anxieties in his memories - the family he betrayed and abandoned at the expense of his own happiness .
translation: 彼は長い間放置していた家族を再発見しようとする中で、自身の幸福を犠牲にして裏切り、見捨てた家族についての記憶の中の不安と向き合わざるを得なくなる。
back_translation: In an attempt to rediscover the family he had long neglected, he is forced to confront the anxiety of memories about the family he betrayed and abandoned, sacrificing his own happiness in the process.

text: enough trivializes an important crisis , reduces it to an almost comic embarrassment .
translation: 重要な危機を軽視し、それをほとんどコメディのような恥ずかしい状況にまで落とし込んでしまう。
back_translation: Minimizing a significant crisis and reducing it to an almost comedic, embarrassing situation.

text: may not have generated many sparks , but with his affection for astoria and its people he has given his tale a warm glow .
translation: 多くの火花を生み出さなかったかもしれませんが、アストリアとその人々への彼の愛情によって、彼の物語には温かな輝きが与えられています。
back_translation: Although it may not have produced many sparks, his affection for Astoria and its people gives his story a warm glow.

text: narc is a no-bull throwback to 1970s action films . it zips along with b-movie verve while adding the rich details and go-for-broke acting that heralds something special .
translation: ナークは1970年代のアクション映画へのノー・バルクの回帰です。B級映画の活気を持ちながら、特別な何かを予感させる豊かな細部と全力を尽くした演技を加えて、サクサク進みます。
back_translation: Nark is a return to the action films of the 1970s with a no-bulk approach. It moves swiftly while carrying the vitality of B-movies, enhanced by rich details that hint at something special and committed performances.

text: as tricky and satisfying as any of david mamet 's airless cinematic shell games .
translation: デイヴィッド・マメットの空気のないシネマティックなシャル・ゲームと同じくらい巧妙で満足感のある。
back_translation: As clever and satisfying as David Mamet's airless cinematic "Shall We" games.

text: from the choppy editing to the annoying score to 'special effects ' by way of replacing objects in a character 's hands below the camera line , `` besotted `` is misbegotten
translation: ちらばった編集から煩わしいスコア、カメラライン下でキャラクターの手にある物体を置き換えることでの「特別な効果」まで、``べソッティッド``は間違って生まれた作品だ。
back_translation: From scattered edits to annoying scores, and even "special effects" by replacing objects in the character's hands under the camera line, "Besotted" is a work born out of mistakes.

text: the pink house is a fast-paced , youthful comedy that has been called a sweeter , more intellectual animal house .
translation: ピンクハウスは、より知的なアニマルハウスと呼ばれる、スピード感あふれる若々しいコメディです。
back_translation: Pink House is a lively and youthful comedy called "More Intellectual Animal House."

text: shy tonho dreams of being successful , but misses his family and brazil .
translation: シャイ・トンホは成功する夢を抱いていますが、家族とブラジルを恋しく思っています。
back_translation: Shai Tonho has dreams of success, but he longs for his family and Brazil.

text: with a single clue to their whereabouts and nothing to lose , he leaves to find 'his people ' .
translation: 彼は「自分の人々」を見つけるために、彼らの居場所に関する唯一の手がかりを持ち、失うものは何もないまま出発した。
back_translation: He set out with only one clue about their whereabouts to find his "people," with nothing to lose.

text: in the end , egoyan 's enormous talent and mychael danna 's intense score keep ararat interesting and emotional .
translation: 最終的に、エゴヤンの巨大な才能とミカエル・ダナの強烈なスコアが『アララト』を興味深く、感情的なものにしています。
back_translation: Ultimately, Egoyan's immense talent and Mikhail Dana's powerful score make "Ararat" intriguing and emotional.

text: an afterschool special without the courage of its convictions .
translation: その信念に対する勇気を欠いた放課後特別番組。
back_translation: A special after-school program lacking the courage for that conviction.

text: despite the authenticity of the trappings , the film is overblown in its plotting , hackneyed in its dialogue and anachronistic in its style .
translation: 装飾品の真実性にもかかわらず、映画はプロットが大げさで、対話が陳腐で、スタイルが時代遅れです。
back_translation: Despite the authenticity of the decorations, the movie has an exaggerated plot, trite dialogue, and outdated style.

text: despite a quieter middle section , involving aragorn 's dreams of arwen , this is even better than the fellowship . there are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart away .
translation: アラゴルンのアルウェンの夢を含む静かな中盤にもかかわらず、これはフェローシップよりもさらに優れています。あなたの心を奪う映画の完璧なシーンがあります。
back_translation: Despite the quiet midpoint that includes Aragorn's dream of Arwen, this is even better than the Fellowship. There are perfect scenes in the film that capture your heart.

text: you really have to wonder how on earth anyone , anywhere could have thought they 'd make audiences guffaw with a script as utterly diabolical as this .
translation: 本当に誰が、どこで、この完全に悪魔的な脚本で観客を大笑いさせられると思ったのか、不思議に思わざるを得ません。
back_translation: I can't help but wonder who really thought that this completely devilish script could make the audience laugh out loud, and where they came up with that idea.

text: the vitality of the actors keeps the intensity of the film high , even as the strafings blend together .
translation: 俳優たちの活力が映像の強度を高く保っており、機銃掃射が一体化していく中でもその迫力は失われません。
back_translation: The actors' vitality keeps the intensity of the visuals high, and even as the machine-gun fire becomes integrated, that power does not diminish.

text: during that time , evelyn and her brothers suffer the abuses of living in orphanages while desmond struggles to secure finances .
translation: その時、エヴリンと彼女の兄弟たちは孤児院での虐待に苦しみ、デズモンドは資金を確保するために奮闘しています。
back_translation: At that time, Evelyn and her siblings were suffering from abuse at the orphanage, and Desmond was struggling to secure funding.

text: the discovery of this new world is described parallel to other stories of emancipation , such as that of three young prostitutes , of an aged couple going nowhere and man 's n landing on the moon .
translation: この新しい世界の発見は、三人の若い売春婦、行く先のない老夫婦、そして人間の月面着陸といった他の解放の物語と平行して描かれています。
back_translation: The discovery of this new world is depicted alongside the stories of three young prostitutes, an elderly couple with nowhere to go, and the human moon landing, among other tales of liberation.

text: an occasionally funny , but overall limp , fish-out-of-water story .
translation: 時折面白いが、全体的には弱い、場違いの魚の物語。
back_translation: An occasionally interesting but overall weak story about an out-of-place fish.

text: the period -- swinging london in the time of the mods and the rockers -- gets the once-over once again in gangster no . 1 , but falls apart long before the end .
translation: その時代──モッズとロッカーズの時代のスウィンギング・ロンドン──は『ギャングスター No.1』で再び掘り下げられますが、終わる前にすでに崩れ落ちてしまいます。
back_translation: That era—the swinging London of mods and rockers—will be explored again in "Gangster No. 1," but it will have already collapsed before it ends.

text: ben affleck as jack ryan , tom clancy 's intrepid hero ? ridiculous . what 's next ? d . j . qualls as indiana jones ? or tom green as han solo ?
translation: ベン・アフレックがジャック・ライアンとして出演するなんて、トム・クランシーの勇敢なヒーローとして？馬鹿げている。次は何？D.J.クォールズがインディ・ジョーンズ？それともトム・グリーンがハン・ソロ？
back_translation: Ben Affleck playing Jack Ryan, as Tom Clancy's brave hero? Ridiculous. What's next? D.J. Qualls as Indiana Jones? Or Tom Green as Han Solo?

text: in the world of skin deep , not all suspects are created equal .
translation: スキンディープの世界では、すべての容疑者が同じではありません。
back_translation: In the world of Skin Deep, not all suspects are the same.

text: their reporting becomes more compelling when they gather the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two of their peers throw a four-year-old out of a 14th story window .
translation: 彼らの報告は、同級生二人が四歳の子供を14階の窓から投げ落としたことを目撃した真実を語る勇気を持つとき、より魅力的になります。
back_translation: Their report becomes more compelling when they have the courage to speak the truth about witnessing two classmates throw a four-year-old child out of a 14th-floor window.

text: hellbent on vengence , jason renews his bloodbath in pursuit of personally slaughtering krueger , and anyone else in his path .
translation: 復讐に固執するジェイソンは、クルーガーとその道にいる誰もを個人的に slaughter するために血の大虐殺を再開する。
back_translation: Obsessed with revenge, Jason resumes a bloody massacre to personally slaughter Kruger and anyone in his path.

text: gradually , will and marcus become friends , and as will teaches marcus how to be a cool kid , marcus helps will to finally grow up .
translation: 徐々に、ウィルとマーカスは友達になり、ウィルがマーカスにクールな子供になる方法を教える一方で、マーカスはウィルがようやく大人になる手助けをします。
back_translation: Gradually, Will and Marcus become friends, with Will teaching Marcus how to be a cool kid, while Marcus helps Will finally grow up.

text: documentary-style drama showing the events that lead up to the tragic incident on january 30 , 1972 in the northern ireland town of derry when a protest march led by civil rights activist ivan cooper was fired upon by british troops , killing 13 protesters and wounding 14 more .
translation: 1972年1月30日、北アイルランドのダリーで起きた悲劇的な事件に至る経緯を描いたドキュメンタリー風のドラマ。市民権活動家アイバン・クーパーが指導した抗議行進がイギリス軍によって発砲され、13人の抗議者が死亡し、さらに14人が負傷した。
back_translation: A documentary-style drama depicting the events leading up to the tragic incident that occurred on January 30, 1972, in Derry, Northern Ireland. A protest march led by civil rights activist Ivan Cooper was fired upon by the British Army, resulting in the deaths of 13 protesters and injuries to an additional 14 individuals.

text: but even with the two-wrongs-make-a-right chemistry between jolie and burns . . . this otherwise appealing picture loses its soul to screenwriting for dummies conformity .
translation: しかし、ジョリーとバーンズの間の「二つの間違いが一つの正解を生む」という化学反応があっても、この魅力的な作品は、素人向けの法則に従った脚本によってその魂を失ってしまいます。
back_translation: However, even if there is a chemical reaction between Jolie and Barnes where "two mistakes create one correct answer," this captivating work loses its soul due to a script that follows amateur rules.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: その理解において、しばしば面白い方法で、国の変化する構成によって裏付けられた物語を語ります。
back_translation: In that understanding, it often tells stories backed by the changing composition of the country in interesting ways.

text: though the dutchman is white , he has been found to be a reincarnated king in the west african nation of ghana - his wife 's homeland .
translation: オランダ人は白人であるが、彼は西アフリカの国ガーナ、妻の故郷で生まれ変わった王であることが判明した。
back_translation: The Dutch man is white, but it was discovered that he is a reincarnated king from Ghana, the home country of his wife.

text: how inept is serving sara ? it makes even elizabeth hurley seem graceless and ugly .
translation: サービング・サラはどれほど無能なのか？それはエリザベス・ハーレーさえも優雅さを欠き、醜く見せる。
back_translation: How incompetent is Serving Sara? It makes even Elizabeth Hurley lack elegance and appear ugly.

text: money 's tight , relationships are tough and all around us , media and advertising constantly bombard us with competing messages .
translation: お金は厳しく、人間関係は難しく、私たちの周りではメディアや広告が絶えず対立するメッセージで私たちを bombard しています。
back_translation: Money is tight, relationships are difficult, and we are constantly bombarded by conflicting messages from media and advertising around us.

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .
translation: 信じがたいことかもしれませんが、地球上での驚くほど似たティーンドラマは、より良い映画でした。
back_translation: It may be hard to believe, but the surprisingly similar teen drama on Earth was a better movie.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this ! this is an interesting movie ! `` but the film itself is ultimately quite unengaging .
translation: 奇妙なキャラクターや奇妙な状況、そしてずれた対話を私たちに投げかけてきますが、まるで「これを見て！これは面白い映画だ！」と言っているかのようです。しかし、映画自体は結局あまり魅力的ではありません。
back_translation: It throws strange characters, bizarre situations, and off-kilter dialogues at us, as if saying, "Look at this! This is an interesting movie!" However, the movie itself ultimately isn't very engaging.

text: those 24-and-unders looking for their own caddyshack to adopt as a generational signpost may have to keep on looking .
translation: 自分の世代の指標として採用できるキャディシャックを探している24歳以下の人々は、引き続き探し続ける必要があるかもしれません。
back_translation: People under 24 who are looking for a Caddyshack that can serve as a benchmark for their generation may need to continue their search.

text: first kammy meets the 40-year-old danny ( dave wong ) and falls head over heels .
translation: まず、カミーは40歳のダニー（デイブ・ウォン）と出会い、一目惚れします。
back_translation: First, Kami meets 40-year-old Danny (Dave Wong) and falls in love at first sight.

text: when investigative reporter , chase somete and her team are on a trail of uncovering this organized fight ring , suk is torn between protecting the only family he knows , and defending the person who can bring him down .
translation: 調査報道記者のチェイス・ソメーテと彼女のチームがこの組織的なファイトリングを暴こうとしているとき、スックは彼が知っている唯一の家族を守ることと、彼を追い詰めることができる人物を守ることの間で葛藤しています。
back_translation: As investigative reporter Chase Somate and her team try to expose this organized fighting ring, Sukk is torn between protecting the only family he knows and protecting the person who could bring him down.

text: you might say tykwer has done all that heaven allows , if you wanted to make as anti-kieslowski a pun as possible . suffice to say its total promise is left slightly unfulfilled .
translation: タイクワーが「天が許す限り」をしたと言えるかもしれませんが、キェシロフスキに対する言葉遊びを最大限にするならば。言うまでもなく、その全体の約束は少し未達のままです。
back_translation: It may be said that Taikuwa "did as far as heaven allows," but if we are to maximize the wordplay regarding Kieslowski, it goes without saying that the overall promise remains somewhat unfulfilled.

text: when the young and highly repressive king pentheus discovers that his own mother agave has given herself over to this upstart god of wine and erotic joy , he declares a state of war , despite the very stern warnings of cadmus , the former king and the famed prophet teiresias .
translation: 若くして非常に抑圧的な王ペンテウスは、母アガヴェがこの新興の酒と官能の神に身を委ねたことを知ると、元王であり著名な予言者であるカドモスやテイレシアスの非常に厳しい警告にもかかわらず、戦争状態を宣言する。
back_translation: The young and highly repressive king Pentheus, upon discovering that his mother Agave had surrendered herself to this newly emerging god of wine and sensuality, declared a state of war despite the very stern warnings from Cadmus, the former king and renowned prophet, and Teiresias.

text: a plan to start a parisian salon with a distinctively democratic air brings conflict with her new surroundings and an unusual ally in a country girl raised by pigs .
translation: パリのサロンを民主的な雰囲気で始める計画は、彼女の新しい環境との対立を引き起こし、豚に育てられた田舎娘という異例の味方を得ることになります。
back_translation: The plan to start a salon in Paris with a democratic atmosphere causes a conflict with her new environment and leads her to gain an unusual ally in the form of a country girl raised among pigs.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: ボルは多くのクイックカッティングとぼやけたステッププリンティングを使って盛り上げようとしていますが、間抜けな対話や時々不十分な演技がその効果を台無しにしています。
back_translation: Bole is trying to generate excitement with a lot of quick cutting and blurred step printing, but silly dialogue and occasionally inadequate acting spoil the effect.

text: just like any other elevator in any old building .
translation: 古い建物の他のエレベーターと同じように。
back_translation: Like other elevators in old buildings.

text: `` issaquena `` chronicles the decay of a wealthy mississippi delta family in the 1930 's .
translation: 「イサキーナ」は、1930年代のミシシッピデルタの裕福な一家の衰退を描いています。
back_translation: "Izakiina" depicts the decline of a wealthy family in the Mississippi Delta during the 1930s.

text: then one night she surprises her husband frank ( dennis quaid ) having sex with another man , and her tidy world starts spinning out of control .
translation: ある晩、彼女は夫フランク（デニス・クエイド）が別の男性とセックスをしているのを見つけ、彼女の整った世界は制御を失い始める。
back_translation: One night, she finds her husband Frank (Dennis Quaid) having sex with another man, and her orderly world starts to spiral out of control.

text: haynes has so fanatically fetishized every bizarre old-movie idiosyncrasy with such monastic devotion you 're not sure if you should applaud or look into having him committed .
translation: ヘインズは、奇妙な古い映画の特異性を熱心にフェティシズム化し、まるで修道士のような献身を持っているため、拍手を送るべきなのか、彼を入院させるべきなのか判断がつかない。
back_translation: It is hard to decide whether to applaud Haynes for his enthusiastic fetishization of the peculiarities of strange old films or to have him hospitalized due to his monk-like devotion.

text: i 'm not a fan of the phrase 'life affirming ' because it usually means 'schmaltzy , ' but real women have curves truly is life affirming .
translation: 「人生を肯定する」というフレーズはあまり好きではありません。なぜなら、一般的に「感傷的な」という意味になってしまうからですが、「本当の女性は曲線を持っている」というのは本当に人生を肯定するものです。
back_translation: I don't really like the phrase "to affirm life." This is because it generally ends up meaning "sentimental." However, saying "real women have curves" is truly an affirmation of life.

text: with the help of an angry young filmmaker , a russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry , and a seven-foot tall tow truck driver from quebec , he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .
translation: 怒れる若き映画製作者の助けを借りて、地元の映画産業に進出を希望するロシアのサウンドレコーディストと、ケベック出身の身長7フィートの牽引車ドライバーと共に、彼は…の滑稽な調査に乗り出す。
back_translation: With the help of an angry young filmmaker, a Russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry, and a 7-foot tall tow truck driver from Quebec, he embarks on a ridiculous investigation.

text: but when it comes down to it , the one thing stopping you from living your dreams is you .
translation: しかし、結局のところ、あなたが夢を実現するのを妨げている唯一のものはあなた自身です。
back_translation: However, in the end, the only thing that is preventing you from realizing your dreams is yourself.

text: pray 's film works well and will appeal even to those who are n't too familiar with turntablism .
translation: 「pray」の映画はうまくいき、ターンテーブリズムにあまり詳しくない人々にも魅力的であることを願います。
back_translation: I hope the movie "Pray" does well and is appealing even to people who are not very familiar with turntablism.

text: when a regular fashion show goes horribly wrong , they are sucked into the nasty but irresistible underworld of bombay .
translation: 通常のファッションショーがひどく失敗したとき、彼らはボンベイの嫌なけれども抗えないアンダーワールドに引き込まれます。
back_translation: When a regular fashion show fails miserably, they get drawn into the unpleasant yet irresistible underworld of Bombay.

text: they start an in-depth investigation of a doctor chu , who is shin-hyun 's psychiatrist .
translation: 彼らはシンヒョンの精神科医であるチュ医師の徹底的な調査を始めます。
back_translation: They begin a thorough investigation of Dr. Chu, the psychiatrist of Shin Hyun.

text: with spy kids 2 : the island of lost dreams , the spy kids franchise establishes itself as a durable part of the movie landscape : a james bond series for kids .
translation: 『スパイキッズ2: 失われた夢の島』で、スパイキッズシリーズは映画の風景の中で耐久性のある一部としての地位を確立しました。子供向けのジェームズ・ボンドシリーズです。
back_translation: In "Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams," the Spy Kids series established its position as a durable part of the cinematic landscape, akin to a children's version of James Bond.

text: for the first time in years , de niro digs deep emotionally , perhaps because he 's been stirred by the powerful work of his co-stars .
translation: 何年ぶりかで、デ・ニーロは感情的に深く掘り下げています。おそらく、彼の共演者たちの力強い演技に心を動かされたからでしょう。
back_translation: After several years, De Niro is emotionally delving deep. Perhaps he was moved by the powerful performances of his co-stars.

text: the sweetest thing , a romantic comedy with outrageous tendencies , may be a mess in a lot of ways . but it does have one saving grace . a lot of its gags and observations reflect a woman 's point-of-view .
translation: 「スウィートなこと」は、突飛な傾向を持つロマンティックコメディで、多くの面で混乱しているかもしれません。しかし、一つの救いの特徴があります。それは、ギャグや観察の多くが女性の視点を反映していることです。
back_translation: "Sweet Things" is a romantic comedy with a quirky tendency that may be confusing in many ways. However, it has one redeeming feature: many of the gags and observations reflect a female perspective.

text: adopting the name `` spider-man `` , peter first uses his newfound powers to make money , but after his uncle is murdered at the hands of a criminal peter failed to stop , he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his uncle .
translation: 「スパイダーマン」という名前を使うことにしたピーターは、最初は新たに得た力でお金を稼ごうとしますが、彼が止められなかった犯罪者の手によって叔父が殺された後、叔父を殺した悪と戦うためにその力を使うことを誓います。
back_translation: Peter decides to use the name "Spider-Man," and at first, he tries to make money with his newly acquired powers, but after his uncle is killed by a criminal he couldn't stop, he vows to use those powers to fight against the evil that killed his uncle.

text: he is still famous , although still disliked by snape , malfoy , and the rest of the slytherins .
translation: 彼はまだ有名ですが、スネイプやマルフォイ、そして他のスリザリン生からはまだ嫌われています。
back_translation: He is still famous, but he is still disliked by Snape, Malfoy, and other Slytherin students.

text: sandra bullock , despite downplaying her good looks , carries a little too much ain't- she-cute baggage into her lead role as a troubled and determined homicide cop to quite pull off the heavy stuff .
translation: サンドラ・ブロックは、自身の美貌を過小評価しているにもかかわらず、悩みながらも決意を持った殺人事件の刑事としての主役に、ちょっとした「可愛いでしょ？」の重荷を背負い込みすぎているため、重い内容をうまく演じきれていない。
back_translation: Despite underestimating her own beauty, Sandra Bullock is carrying a bit too much of the burden of "Isn't she cute?" in her role as a determined detective in a murder case, which makes it difficult for her to fully embody the serious content.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: もしオスカーに「最悪だと思ったけど意外と良かった映画」のカテゴリーがあったら、男たちは「呪われた女王」とその名誉を争っているかもしれません。
back_translation: If there were a category for "movies that seemed terrible but turned out to be surprisingly good" at the Oscars, the men might be vying for the title with "The Cursed Queen."

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: 親密で社会的に包括的であろうとするも、3時間の上映時間でどちらの試みにも正当性を欠いている、数十年にわたる歴史的な大作の一つです。
back_translation: Despite attempting to be intimate and socially inclusive, it lacks justification for either endeavor within its 3-hour running time, making it one of the historical epics that has been developed over several decades.

text: every moment crackles with tension , and by the end of the flick , you 're on the edge of your seat .
translation: 毎瞬間が緊張感で満ちており、映画の終わりには、あなたは席の端に座っているような気分になります。
back_translation: Every moment is filled with tension, and by the end of the movie, you feel like you are sitting on the edge of your seat.

text: combining historical documentation , personal stories , and interviews with noted experts and legislators , this documentary honors the dildo 's fight for legitimacy and its many admirers .
translation: 歴史的な文書、個人的な物語、著名な専門家や立法者とのインタビューを組み合わせたこのドキュメンタリーは、ディルドの正当性のための闘いとその多くの支持者に敬意を表しています。
back_translation: This documentary, combining historical documents, personal stories, and interviews with notable experts and lawmakers, pays tribute to the fight for the legitimacy of dildos and its many supporters.

text: the film is to be produced by jules , melina 's husband .
translation: その映画はジュールズ、メリーナの夫によって制作される。
back_translation: The movie is produced by Jules, Merina's husband.

text: provides an intriguing look at how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary china .
translation: 新しい経済が現代の中国における階級の境界をどのように再構築したかについての魅力的な視点を提供しています。
back_translation: It provides an intriguing perspective on how the new economy has redefined class boundaries in contemporary China.

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: 驚きのない、最大限の快適さと親しみを重視した映画。
back_translation: A film that prioritizes maximum comfort and familiarity without surprises.

text: in other words , it 's just another sports drama/character study . yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness . plus , like i already mentioned . . . it 's robert duvall ! c'mon !
translation: つまり、これはただのスポーツドラマ/キャラクター研究です。しかし、これは新しさの不足を心で補っています。それに、私がすでに言ったように…ロバート・デュヴァルです！さあ！
back_translation: In other words, this is just a sports drama/character study. However, it compensates for the lack of novelty with heart. And as I already mentioned... Robert Duvall! Come on!

text: he has the wrong blood type to be able to donate one of his kidneys , so he arranges a trade with a group of organ dealers : one of his kidneys , and 10 million won , in return for their finding a kidney for his sister .
translation: 彼は腎臓を寄付できる血液型ではないので、臓器密売人のグループと取引をすることを決めた：彼の腎臓と1000万ウォンを交換条件に、彼の妹のために腎臓を見つけてもらう。
back_translation: He decided to deal with a group of organ traffickers because he does not have a compatible blood type to donate a kidney: in exchange for his kidney and 10 million won, he wanted them to find a kidney for his sister.

text: these people , most of whom were american citizens , were taken from their homes and sent to `` relocation `` camps in desolate , isloated areas .
translation: これらの人々のほとんどはアメリカ市民であり、彼らは自宅から連れ去られ、荒れた孤立した地域にある「再配置」キャンプに送られました。
back_translation: Most of these people are American citizens, and they were taken from their homes and sent to "relocation" camps in rough, isolated areas.

text: a bit too derivative to stand on its own as the psychological thriller it purports to be .
translation: それが主張する心理スリラーとして独自に立つには少し模倣が過ぎる。
back_translation: To stand independently as a psychological thriller, it mimics a bit too much.

text: in the throes of falling for one another , they are soon forced to deal with the bitter realities of their lives prior to that chance encounter .
translation: お互いに惹かれ合う中で、彼らはすぐにその偶然の出会いの前にあった自分たちの厳しい現実に対処しなければならなくなる。
back_translation: As they are drawn to each other, they soon have to confront the harsh reality that existed before their chance meeting.

text: while soderbergh succeeds in recapturing the themes and mood of tarkovsky 's version , he also brings with them a cold , emotionless sheen , a detached air that defeats his efforts to truly engage us .
translation: ソダーバーグはタルコフスキー版のテーマや雰囲気を再現することに成功していますが、同時に冷たく無情な光沢や、私たちを本当に引き込む努力を妨げる冷淡な空気も持ち込んでいます。
back_translation: Soderbergh successfully recreates the themes and atmosphere of Tarkovsky's version, but at the same time, he introduces a cold, unfeeling sheen and a detached air that hinders our true engagement.

text: its purpose is to use the precog ( nitive ) potential of three genetically altered humans to prevent murders .
translation: その目的は、三人の遺伝子改変された人間の予知能力を利用して、殺人を防ぐことです。
back_translation: The goal is to use the precognitive abilities of three genetically modified humans to prevent murder.

text: every so often a movie comes along that confirms one 's worse fears about civilization as we know it . the new guy is one of them .
translation: 時折、文明についての最悪の恐れを確認させる映画が登場する。その新作が「ザ・ニュー・ガイ」だ。
back_translation: Occasionally, movies emerge that reaffirm our worst fears about civilization. The latest release is "The New Guy."

text: director kevin bray excels in breaking glass and marking off the `` miami vice `` checklist of power boats , latin music and dog tracks . he does n't , however , deliver nearly enough of the show 's trademark style and flash .
translation: 監督ケビン・ブレイは、ガラスを割り、『マイアミ・バイス』のパワーボート、ラテン音楽、ドッグトラックのチェックリストを満たすことに優れています。しかし、番組の特徴であるスタイルと派手さはほとんど提供できていません。
back_translation: Director Kevin Bray excels at breaking glass and checking off items like power boats from "Miami Vice," Latin music, and dog tracks. However, he barely delivers the style and flair that the show is known for.

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .
translation: 日本以外で最も熱心なファンが多く、主にファンタジーへのフェティシズムを持つ内向的な若い男性であるアニメとは異なり、『メトロポリス』は決して絶望的に幼稚には見えない。
back_translation: Unlike anime, which has a large number of enthusiastic fans outside Japan, primarily consisting of introverted young men with a fetishism for fantasy, "Metropolis" never appears hopelessly childish.

text: guzman 's powerful and sometimes triumphant documentary is not only an excellent overview of the affair , but serves as the perfect finale to the monumental trilogy about the coup and its aftermath .
translation: グズマンの力強く時には勝利を収めたドキュメンタリーは、この事件の優れた概観であるだけでなく、クーデターとその余波についての巨大な三部作の完璧なフィナーレとして機能します。
back_translation: Guzmán's powerful, occasionally victorious documentary serves not only as an excellent overview of the incident but also functions as the perfect finale to a monumental trilogy about the coup and its aftermath.

text: none of this is meaningful or memorable , but frosting is n't , either , and you would n't turn down a big bowl of that , would you ?
translation: これはどれも意味がなく、記憶に残るものではありませんが、フロスティングもそうです。あなたは大きなボウルのフロスティングを断ることはないでしょう？
back_translation: None of this is meaningful or memorable, and neither is frosting. You wouldn't turn down a big bowl of frosting, would you?

text: torn between the divine and the carnal , the righteous and the unjust , father amaro must summon his strength to choose which life he will lead .
translation: 神聖なものと肉欲の間、正義と不正の間で引き裂かれたアマロ神父は、どの人生を選ぶべきか、その力を奮い起こさなければならない。
back_translation: Father Amaro, torn between the sacred and the sensual, between justice and injustice, must summon his strength to choose which life he should lead.

text: over the next few days , united by nothing more than their common suffering , the two young women form an unlikely friendship to cope with the tragic events that threaten to overwhelm them .
translation: 今後数日間、共通の苦しみだけで結ばれた2人の若い女性は、彼女たちを圧倒しようとする悲劇的な出来事に対処するために、意外な友情を築く。
back_translation: In the coming days, two young women, united only by their shared suffering, will form an unexpected friendship as they confront a tragic event that threatens to overwhelm them.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: ビゲロウは核危機のシークエンスを均等に扱っているが、サスペンスを構築すべきところでドラマを引き延ばしてしまい、最後に早く進むべきシーンを引き延ばしすぎている。
back_translation: Bigelow treats the nuclear crisis sequence evenly, but where suspense should be built, she ends up stretching the drama, and ultimately stretches out scenes that should advance quickly.

text: i 'm not exactly sure what this movie thinks it is about .
translation: この映画が何についてだと思っているのか、正直よくわかりません。
back_translation: I honestly don't really understand what I think this movie is about.

text: this is the kind of movie that used to be right at home at the saturday matinee , and it still is .
translation: これは、昔土曜日の昼の上映にぴったりの映画で、今でもそうです。
back_translation: This is a movie that was perfect for Saturday afternoon screenings in the past, and it still is today.

text: femme fatale is not the director 's best work ever , but it is as good as we 've seen him be in much too long a time .
translation: ファム・ファタールは監督の最高の作品ではありませんが、我々が彼の作品を見てからとても長い間見た中では、同じくらい良いものです。
back_translation: " femme fatale may not be the director's best work, but it's as good as anything we've seen in a very long time since we started watching his films."

text: if you grew up on scooby -- you 'll love this movie . matthew lillard is born to play shaggy !
translation: スクービーが好きで育ったなら、この映画は気に入るでしょう。マシュー・リラードはシャギーを演じるために生まれてきたようです！
back_translation: If you grew up loving Scooby-Doo, you will probably enjoy this movie. Matthew Lillard seems like he was born to play Shaggy!

text: throwing caution to the wind with an invitation to the hedonist in us all , nair has constructed this motion picture in such a way that even the most cynical curmudgeon with find himself or herself smiling at one time or another .
translation: 風を気にせず、私たちの中の享楽主義者への招待状として、ナイアはこの映画を構築し、最も皮肉な頑固者でさえ、いつかは微笑むことになるようにしています。
back_translation: Without worrying about the wind, Naya constructs this film as an invitation to the hedonist within us, aiming to make even the most ironic and stubborn smile someday.

text: during the course of a single day all three will be faced with the difficult choice of choosing which path they will go down in life .
translation: 一日のうちに、彼ら三人は人生でどの道を選ぶかという難しい選択に直面することになります。
back_translation: Throughout the day, the three of them will face a difficult choice about which path to choose in life.

text: equilibrium the movie , as opposed to the manifesto , is really , really stupid .
translation: 映画「エクイリブリウム」は、マニフェストとは対照的に、本当に、本当に馬鹿らしい。
back_translation: The movie "Equilibrium" is really, really silly, in contrast to the manifesto.

text: a limp eddie murphy vehicle that even he seems embarrassed to be part of .
translation: エディ・マーフィが参加していることすら恥ずかしいと思っているような、だらしない作品。
back_translation: A disgraceful work that seems to make even Eddie Murphy ashamed to be involved.

text: it 's hard to tell with all the crashing and banging where the salesmanship ends and the movie begins .
translation: ドンシャリとぶつかり合う音の中では、販売術がどこで終わり、映画がどこで始まるのかを見分けるのは難しい。
back_translation: In the clash of sounds, it's difficult to discern where the salesmanship ends and the movie begins.

text: amidst the la-freaks , hollywood wannabes , and outrageous gym culture of los angeles , the now determined bodybuilder struggles to preserve an integrity of the mind , body , and spirit that is so apparently void in this strange new land .
translation: ロサンゼルスのLAフリーク、ハリウッドの志望者、そして過激なジム文化の中で、決意を固めたボディビルダーは、この奇妙な新しい土地に明らかに欠けている心、体、精神の整合性を守るために奮闘している。
back_translation: In Los Angeles, with its LA freaks, aspiring Hollywood stars, and the extreme gym culture, determined bodybuilders are struggling to maintain the integrity of mind, body, and spirit that is clearly lacking in this peculiar new land.

text: sitting through the last reel ( spoiler alert ! ) is significantly less charming than listening to a four-year-old with a taste for exaggeration recount his halloween trip to the haunted house .
translation: 最後のリールを観るのは（ネタバレ注意！）誇張を好む4歳児がハロウィンの幽霊屋敷の旅行を話すのを聞くよりもずっと魅力がない。
back_translation: Watching the last reel is far less appealing than listening to a dramatic 4-year-old talk about a Halloween haunted house trip (spoiler alert!).

text: with a little money , they set out on the road with a guy named ben .
translation: 少しのお金を持って、彼らはベンという名の男と一緒に出発しました。
back_translation: With a little money, they set off together with a man named Ben.

text: an absorbing trip into the minds and motivations of people under stress as well as a keen , unsentimental look at variations on the theme of motherhood .
translation: ストレス下にある人々の心と思惑への没入的な旅であり、母性のテーマのバリエーションを鋭く、感情に流されることなく観察した作品です。
back_translation: It is an immersive journey into the hearts and thoughts of people under stress, showcasing a sharp, unflinching observation of the variations on the theme of motherhood.

text: while this one gets off with a good natured warning , future lizard endeavors will need to adhere more closely to the laws of laughter
translation: これは軽い注意で始まりますが、今後のトカゲの試みは笑いの法則にもっと厳密に従う必要があります。
back_translation: This starts with a light reminder, but future lizard attempts need to adhere more strictly to the rules of humor.

text: but someone else has also returned to campus , and with a darker and altogether bloodier purpose in mind .
translation: しかし、他の誰かもキャンパスに戻っており、より暗く、まったく血なまぐさい目的を抱いている。
back_translation: However, someone else has also returned to the campus, with darker and entirely bloodthirsty intentions.

text: after listening to looser friends talk about what silvester stallone would do in his situation , the postal worker decides to buy a ticket to china and follow his love to her home .
translation: ルーザーの友人たちがシルベスター・スタローンなら自分の状況で何をするかについて話すのを聞いた後、その郵便配達員は中国へのチケットを買い、愛する人の家に追いかけることに決めた。
back_translation: After hearing his loser friends talk about what Sylvester Stallone would do in his situation, the mail carrier decided to buy a ticket to China and chase after his loved one.

text: there 's a disturbing 'great white hope ' undertone to the other side of heaven that subtly undermines its message of christian love and compassion .
translation: 「天のもう一方には、キリスト教の愛と慈悲のメッセージを微妙に損なう、騒々しい「大白い希望」の undertone がある。」
back_translation: "On the other side of heaven, there is a noisy undertone of the 'great white hope' that subtly undermines the message of love and mercy of Christianity."

text: one of the more intelligent children 's movies to hit theaters this year .
translation: 今年劇場に登場したもっとも知的な子供向け映画の一つです。
back_translation: One of the most intelligent children's movies that premiered in theaters this year.

text: the acting by the over-25s lacks spark , with csokas particularly unconnected .
translation: 25歳以上の俳優の演技は魅力に欠けており、特にソコスはつながりが感じられません。
back_translation: Actors over the age of 25 lack charm in their performances, and especially Sokos feels disconnected.

text: when the apocalypse arrives , it takes the form of a bio-chemical virus , contaminating the cities , mountains , and shorelines .
translation: 黙示録が訪れるとき、それはバイオ化学ウイルスの形を取り、都市、山々、海岸線を汚染します。
back_translation: When the apocalypse arrives, it takes the form of a biochemical virus, contaminating cities, mountains, and coastlines.

text: his life is a whirl of seedy bars , seedier girlfriends and a wife two towns away .
translation: 彼の人生は、いかがわしいバー、さらにいかがわしいガールフレンド、そして2町離れたところにいる妻の渦に巻き込まれている。
back_translation: His life is caught up in a whirlwind of a seedy bar, an even seedier girlfriend, and a wife who lives two towns away.

text: the movie 's quiet affirmation of neighborhood values gives it an honest , lived-in glow .
translation: 映画の静かな地域の価値観の肯定は、それに誠実で生き生きとした輝きを与えている。
back_translation: The affirmation of the values of a quiet region in the film gives it an earnest and vibrant brilliance.

text: able to provide insight into a fascinating part of theater history .
translation: 劇場の歴史の魅力的な部分について洞察を提供することができます。
back_translation: I can provide insights into the fascinating aspects of the history of theater.

text: it 's not as awful as some of the recent hollywood trip tripe . . . but it 's far from a groundbreaking endeavor .
translation: 最近のハリウッドのひどい作品ほど悪くはないが、画期的な試みからは程遠い。
back_translation: Recent terrible Hollywood productions are not as bad, but they are far from groundbreaking attempts.

text: god responds to his challenge and allows bruce to take on his powers to prove himself .
translation: 神は彼の挑戦に応じ、ブルースが自分自身を証明するために彼の力を引き受けることを許可します。
back_translation: God responds to his challenge and allows Bruce to take on his powers in order to prove himself.

text: the threat implied in the title pokM-imon 4ever is terrifying M-^V like locusts in a horde these things will keep coming .
translation: タイトル「ポケモン 4ever」に含まれる脅威は恐ろしい。まるで蝗害のように、これらのものは次々とやってくるだろう。
back_translation: The threats included in the title "Pokémon 4ever" are terrifying. Like a locust plague, these things will come one after another.

text: audiences are advised to sit near the back and squint to avoid noticing some truly egregious lip-non-synching , but otherwise the production is suitably elegant .
translation: 観客には、後方に座り、ひどい口パクの不一致を気にしないように目を細めることが推奨されていますが、その他の点では、制作は適切にエレガントです。
back_translation: Audience members are advised to sit in the back and squint their eyes to ignore the terrible lip-sync mismatch, but in other respects, the production is appropriately elegant.

text: girlfriends are bad , wives are worse and babies are the kiss of death in this bitter italian comedy .
translation: 彼女は悪く、妻はさらに悪い、赤ちゃんはこの厳しいイタリアのコメディにおける死のキスである。
back_translation: She is bad, the wife is even worse, and the baby is the kiss of death in this harsh Italian comedy.

text: this is a labor of love , and while it may not be slick , it is an endearing look at one man 's selflessness and one team 's determination .
translation: これは愛の労働であり、洗練されていないかもしれませんが、一人の男の自己犠牲と一つのチームの決意を愛おしく捉えた作品です。
back_translation: This is a labor of love, and while it may not be refined, it is a work that affectionately captures one man's self-sacrifice and a team's determination.

text: we do get the distinct impression that this franchise is drawing to a close .
translation: このフランチャイズは終息に向かっているという明確な印象を受けます。
back_translation: I have the clear impression that this franchise is heading towards its end.

text: it is a testament of quiet endurance , of common concern , of reconciled survival .
translation: それは静かな忍耐の証であり、共通の関心の証であり、和解した生存の証です。
back_translation: It is a testament to quiet perseverance, a testament to shared interests, and a testament to reconciled existence.

text: `` tattered angel `` is a story of pain and triumph .
translation: 「ボロボロの天使」は苦痛と勝利の物語です。
back_translation: "The Tattered Angel" is a story of pain and triumph.

text: in california , texas , and several other states , conservative politicians successfully waged legislative campaigns to outlaw and prohibit the sale , ownership or use of vibrators and dildos while simultaneously criminalizing other 'deviant ' sexual practices .
translation: カリフォルニア州、テキサス州、およびその他の州では、保守的な政治家たちが、バイブレーターやディルドの販売、所有、使用を禁止するための立法キャンペーンを成功裏に展開しつつ、同時に他の「逸脱した」性的行為を犯罪化しました。
back_translation: In California, Texas, and other states, conservative politicians have successfully launched legislative campaigns to prohibit the sale, possession, and use of vibrators and dildos while simultaneously criminalizing other "deviant" sexual activities.

text: `` punch-drunk love `` is a little like a chocolate milk moustache . . .
translation: 「パンチドランク・ラブ」はまるでチョコレートミルクの口ひげのようです。。。
back_translation: "Punch-Drunk Love" is just like a chocolate milk mustache...

text: whether noam chomsky , the mit linguist and political philosopher , is the most important intellectual alive , as the new york times once famously called him , is open for debate .
translation: ノーム・チョムスキー、MITの言語学者で政治哲学者が、ニューヨークタイムズがかつて彼を「最も重要な知識人」と呼んだように、彼が現在生きている中で最も重要な知識人であるかどうかは議論の余地がある。
back_translation: Noam Chomsky, the MIT linguist and political philosopher, is debatable whether he is currently the most important intellectual, as the New York Times once referred to him as "the most important intellectual."

text: carrying this wafer-thin movie on his nimble shoulders , chan wades through putrid writing , direction and timing with a smile that says , 'if i stay positive , maybe i can channel one of my greatest pictures , drunken master . '
translation: この薄っぺらな映画を彼の軽快な肩で支えながら、チャンは腐ったような脚本、演出、タイミングを笑顔で乗り越え、「前向きでいれば、もしかしたら私の最高の作品の一つである酔拳を引き出せるかもしれない」と言っているかのようです。
back_translation: While supporting this shallow movie with his lighthearted shoulders, Chan smiles through the rotten script, direction, and timing, as if saying, "If I stay positive, maybe I can bring out one of my best works, Drunken Master."

text: syd does accept him and befriends him and shows him how to live .
translation: シドは彼を受け入れ、友達になり、生活の仕方を教えます。
back_translation: Sid accepts him, becomes friends with him, and teaches him how to live.

text: a man ( phillipe ) awakens in a hospital not recalling the last two years as he begins to find out things from his past he discovers his ability to move from the year 2002 to the year 1999 .
translation: ある男（フィリップ）が病院で目覚め、過去2年間の記憶がないまま、自分の過去のことを探り始める。彼は2002年から1999年へ移動する能力を発見する。
back_translation: A man named Philip wakes up in a hospital and starts searching for his past without any memories of the last two years. He discovers the ability to move from 2002 to 1999.

text: the ragtag crew battle their way to galveston , with the mob and authorities in close pursuit , and an uncertain destiny awaiting them .
translation: 寄せ集めのクルーは、マフィアと当局が迫る中でガルベストンへ向けて戦い抜き、彼らを待ち受ける不確かな運命に直面する。
back_translation: The ragtag crew fights their way to Galveston, facing the looming threats of the mafia and the authorities, as they confront an uncertain fate that awaits them.

text: as soon as they blow yakavetta away , it is revealed that the macmanus father and sons have been hiding out deep in the glens and valleys of ireland for three years .
translation: 彼らがヤカヴェッタを吹き飛ばすとすぐに、マクマナスの父と息子たちがアイルランドの深い谷や峡谷に3年間隠れていたことが明らかになる。
back_translation: As soon as they blow away Yacavetta, it becomes clear that McManus and his sons had been hiding in deep valleys and gorges of Ireland for three years.

text: few films have captured the chaos of an urban conflagration with such fury , and audience members will leave feeling as shaken as nesbitt 's cooper looks when the bullets stop flying .
translation: 少ない映画が、都市の炎上の混乱をこれほどの激しさで捉えたものはなく、観客は弾丸が飛び交うのが止まったとき、ネスビットのクーパーが見せるように動揺した気持ちで劇場を後にするだろう。
back_translation: Few films have captured the chaos of a city in flames with such intensity, and when the bullets stop flying, the audience will leave the theater, feeling disturbed, as shown by Nesbitt's Cooper.

text: all ends well , sort of , but the frenzied comic moments never click .
translation: すべてはうまくいくが、ちょっとだけ、しかし狂乱のコメディの瞬間は決してうまくいかない。
back_translation: Everything will go well, but just a little, yet the moments of chaotic comedy never go well.

text: nicely combines the enigmatic features of 'memento ' with the hallucinatory drug culture of 'requiem for a dream . '
translation: 「メメント」の神秘的な特徴と「レクイエム・フォー・ドリーム」の幻覚的なドラッグカルチャーをうまく組み合わせている。
back_translation: It successfully combines the mysterious features of "Memento" with the psychedelic drug culture of "Requiem for a Dream."

text: i ca n't say this enough : this movie is about an adult male dressed in pink jammies .
translation: この映画はピンクのパジャマを着た大人の男性についてです。
back_translation: This movie is about an adult man wearing pink pajamas.

text: carlton `` niche `` james ( cory barlog ) tries desperatly to meet women .
translation: カールトン「ニッチ」ジェームズ（コリー・バーログ）は、女性と出会おうと必死です。
back_translation: Carlton "Niche" James (Corey Barlog) is desperate to meet women.

text: hosts of hooded penitents parade through the ancient , narrow streets of the old town in time-honoured ritual .
translation: フードをかぶった懺悔者たちが、古い町の狭い通りを時代を超えた儀式の中を練り歩いている。
back_translation: The hooded penitents are marching through the narrow streets of the old town in a timeless ritual.

text: it 's all about love is a fresh take on modern love and future life as two lovers struggle in a conspiracy of epic proportions .
translation: 愛がすべてというのは、壮大な陰謀に苦しむ二人の恋人を通して、現代の愛と未来の生活についての新しい視点を提供します。
back_translation: "Love is everything" offers a new perspective on modern love and future living through the struggles of two lovers caught in a grand conspiracy.

text: paro 's world crashed knowing that her devdas would be gone and she lit a diya , for it signified the fast coming back of her loved one .
translation: パロの世界は、彼女のデヴダスが去ることを知って崩壊した。彼女はディヤを灯した。それは彼女の愛する人の速やかな帰還を示していた。
back_translation: The world of Paro collapsed when she knew that her Devdas was leaving. She lit a diya. It signified the swift return of her beloved.

text: in the small town , local cop connie struggles with many sightings of a mothlike creature taller than a man being reported , while john believes that an explanation for his wife 's fate can be found .
translation: 小さな町で、地元の警官コニーは、人間よりも背の高い蛾のような生き物の目撃情報に苦しんでいます。一方、ジョンは妻の運命の説明が見つかると信じています。
back_translation: In a small town, the local police officer Connie is struggling with reports of sightings of a creature resembling a moth that is taller than humans. Meanwhile, John believes he will find an explanation for his wife's fate.

text: the desperate miauczynski personalizes our own fears and obsessions , which have become so visible recently .
translation: 絶望的なミアウチンスキーは、最近ますます目に見えるようになった私たち自身の恐れや執着を具現化しています。
back_translation: Desperate Miauchinski is embodying our own fears and obsessions, which have increasingly become visible recently.

text: is truth stranger than fiction ? in [ screenwriter ] charlie kaufman 's world , truth and fiction are equally strange , and his for the taking .
translation: 真実はフィクションより奇妙なのか？[脚本家]チャーリー・カウフマンの世界では、真実とフィクションは同じくらい奇妙であり、彼の手に入るものだ。
back_translation: Is truth stranger than fiction? In the world of screenwriter Charlie Kaufman, truth and fiction are equally strange and are at his disposal.

text: a love triangle about young people trying to communicate in world where communication is about to change forever .
translation: 若者たちが、永遠に変わろうとしているコミュニケーションの世界でコミュニケーションを試みる愛の三角関係。
back_translation: A love triangle in a world of communication that is forever changing, where young people attempt to communicate.

text: but when the teenager decides to invite a 12-year-old boy who is running away from home , maud is near illegality .
translation: しかし、10代の若者が家出中の12歳の少年を招待することに決めたとき、モードは違法行為に近づいています。
back_translation: However, when a teenager decides to invite a 12-year-old boy who is running away from home, the situation is bordering on illegal activity.

text: it is as if he has suddenly discovered his love of fatherhood .
translation: まるで彼が突然父親であることの愛を発見したかのようです。
back_translation: It's as if he has suddenly discovered the love of being a father.

text: initial strangeness inexorably gives way to rote sentimentality and mystical tenderness becomes narrative expedience .
translation: 初期の奇妙さは避けがたく型にはまった感傷に取って代わり、神秘的な優しさは物語の便宜に変わる。
back_translation: The initial strangeness inevitably gives way to a conventional sentimentality, and the mysterious tenderness transforms into a convenience for the story.

text: i 'd be lying if i said my ribcage did n't ache by the end of kung pow .
translation: 「カン・パウ」の終わりまでに肋骨が痛まなかったと言ったら嘘になります。
back_translation: It would be a lie to say that my ribs didn't hurt by the end of "Kan-Pau."

text: if this dud had been made in the '70s , it would have been called the hills have antlers and played for about three weeks in drive-ins .
translation: もしこの作品が70年代に作られていたら、「丘には角が生えている」と呼ばれ、ドライブインで約3週間上映されていただろう。
back_translation: If this work had been created in the 70s, it would have been called "The Hills Have Horns" and would have been screened at a drive-in for about three weeks.

text: the transfer to the imax screen diminishes none of the film 's drama , which was always much more about human emotions than technology .
translation: IMAXスクリーンへの移行は、映画のドラマを損なうものではなく、常に技術よりも人間の感情に関するものでした。
back_translation: The transition to IMAX screens was never about undermining the drama of films, but rather always related to human emotions over technology.

text: a major achievement and something to get excited about .
translation: 重要な成果であり、ワクワクすることです。
back_translation: It is an important achievement and something to be excited about.

text: yeh kaisi mohabbat ( ykm ) is a romantic thriller .
translation: 「イェー キャイシ モハバット (YKM) は、ロマンティックスリラーです。」
back_translation: "Yee Kaisi Mohabbat (YKM) is a romantic thriller."

text: they also talk about their professional and personal experiences , and describe the places they visit .
translation: 彼らはまた、自分の職業的および個人的な経験について話し、訪れる場所を描写します。
back_translation: They also talk about their professional and personal experiences and describe the places they visit.

text: the main characters are simply named the husband , the wife and the kidnapper , emphasizing the disappointingly generic nature of the entire effort .
translation: 主要なキャラクターは夫、妻、誘拐犯と単純に名付けられており、全体の努力のがっかりするほど一般的な性質を強調しています。
back_translation: The main characters are simply named Husband, Wife, and Kidnapper, emphasizing the disappointingly common nature of the overall effort.

text: seeking a microscopic camera that could be incorporated into his artificial eye so he could secretly film whatever he sees , the filmmaker explores the futuristic technology that could make this possible , while revisiting chapters of his own past .
translation: 彼は自分の人工眼に組み込むことができる微視的カメラを求めており、それによって自分が見るものを秘密裏に撮影できるようにしたいと考えています。映像制作者は、この可能性を実現するための未来的な技術を探求しつつ、自らの過去の章に再訪します。
back_translation: He is seeking a microscopic camera that he can incorporate into his artificial eye, with the intention of secretly capturing what he sees. The filmmaker explores futuristic technology to make this possibility a reality while revisiting chapters of his past.

text: the whole crew has come to depend on his realizing it .
translation: クルー全員が彼がそれに気づくことに依存している。
back_translation: The entire crew depends on him noticing it.

text: if this movie leaves you cool , it also leaves you intriguingly contemplative .
translation: この映画はあなたをクールにさせるだけでなく、興味深く考えさせるものでもあります。
back_translation: This movie not only makes you cool, but also makes you think interestingly.

text: no matter how hard you run from the past , it has a way of catching up with you .
translation: 過去からどんなに一生懸命逃げても、過去は必ず追いついてくるものです。
back_translation: No matter how hard you try to run away from the past, it will always catch up to you.

text: . . . there 's a choppy , surface-effect feeling to the whole enterprise .
translation: ...全体の活動には、ぎこちない表面的な感じがある。
back_translation: ...The overall activity has a clumsy and superficial feeling.

text: everything is set for the perfect weekend , until one of the guests stumbles across an old history of the house with the power to unleash the horrors of scotland 's past .
translation: 完璧な週末の準備は整っているが、ゲストの一人が家の古い歴史を偶然見つけてしまい、スコットランドの過去の恐怖を解き放つ力を持っていた。
back_translation: The preparations for the perfect weekend are in place, but one of the guests accidentally discovers the old history of the house, which has the power to unleash the horrors of Scotland's past.

text: her father invented the world panorama for use by the authorities , but was turned down .
translation: 彼女の父親は、当局のために世界パノラマを発明しましたが、却下されました。
back_translation: Her father invented a world panorama for the authorities, but it was rejected.

text: hey arnold ! the movie is what happens when you blow up small potatoes to 10 times their natural size , and it ai n't pretty .
translation: ヘイ・アーノルド！ザ・ムービーは、ポテトを自然の大きさの10倍に膨らませるとどうなるかということで、あまり美しくはない。
back_translation: Hey Arnold! The Movie is not very pretty when it explores what happens if you inflate a potato to ten times its natural size.

text: it 's pretty linear and only makeup-deep , but bogdanovich ties it together with efficiency and an affection for the period .
translation: それはかなり直線的で表面的なものですが、ボグダノヴィッチは効率的に、そしてその時代に対する愛情を持ってそれをまとめています。
back_translation: It is fairly linear and superficial, but Bogdanovich efficiently brings it together with a love for the era.

text: throughout the day 's move , their two very different groups of friends tangle in conflicts and romance while august tries to figure out who he really wants before it 's too late .
translation: 一日の動きの中で、彼らの2つの非常に異なる友人グループが対立やロマンスに絡み合い、オーガストは手遅れになる前に本当に欲しいものを見極めようとします。
back_translation: In the course of a day, their two very different groups of friends become entwined in conflict and romance, and August tries to figure out what he truly wants before it's too late.

text: `` frida `` is a good film that has some brilliant moments of artistry throughout .
translation: 「フリーダ」は、全体を通して素晴らしい芸術的瞬間がいくつかある良い映画です。
back_translation: "Frida" is a good movie with several wonderful artistic moments throughout.

text: a domestic melodrama with weak dialogue and biopic cliches .
translation: 弱い対話と伝記 clichés のある国内メロドラマ。
back_translation: A domestic melodrama with weak dialogues and biographical clichés.

text: claire is a terrific role for someone like judd , who really ought to be playing villains .
translation: クレアは、実際に悪役を演じるべきジュードのような人にとって素晴らしい役です。
back_translation: Clara is a wonderful role for someone like Jude, who should actually portray a villain.

text: ice age posits a heretofore unfathomable question : is it possible for computer-generated characters to go through the motions ?
translation: アイスエイジは、今まで考えられなかった質問を提起します：コンピューター生成のキャラクターが動作を行うことは可能でしょうか？
back_translation: Ice Age raises questions that have never been considered before: Is it possible for computer-generated characters to take actions?

text: a time machine , a journey back to your childhood , when cares melted away in the dark theater , and films had the ability to mesmerize , astonish and entertain .
translation: タイムマシン、子供時代への旅。気持ちが暗い劇場で溶け去り、映画が魅了し、驚かせ、楽しませる力を持っていた頃。
back_translation: A time machine, a journey to childhood. When feelings would dissolve in a dark theater, and the movies had the power to enchant, amaze, and entertain.

text: he is reluctant to help at first because he is wearing his friend kumin 's shoes and does n't want it to be dirty .
translation: 彼は最初、友達のクミンの靴を履いているため、汚れたくないと思って手伝うのをためらっています。
back_translation: At first, he hesitates to help because he is wearing his friend Kumin's shoes and doesn't want to get them dirty.

text: the irony is that this film 's cast is uniformly superb ; their performances could have -- should have -- been allowed to stand on their own .
translation: 皮肉なことに、この映画のキャストは全員素晴らしく、彼らの演技は独立して評価されるべきだったのに。
back_translation: Ironically, the cast of this movie is all fantastic, and their performances should have been evaluated independently.

text: an uncomfortable movie , suffocating and sometimes almost senseless , the grey zone does have a center , though a morbid one .
translation: 不快な映画であり、息苦しく、時にはほとんど意味をなさないが、「グレーゾーン」には中心がある。ただし、それは病的なものだ。
back_translation: It is an unpleasant movie, suffocating, and at times makes almost no sense, but there is a core to "Gray Zone." However, it is pathological.

text: when a stranger stumbles in to their camp disoriented mumbling things about lights in the sky the four friends put in a struggle with a psychotic army colonel and a being that has taken control of one of their minds .
translation: 見知らぬ人がキャンプに迷い込み、空の光についてつぶやいていると、4人の友人たちは精神的に狂った軍の大佐と、彼らの一人の心を支配している存在との闘いに巻き込まれる。
back_translation: Strangers wandering into a campsite are muttering about the light in the sky, and the four friends become embroiled in a battle with a mentally unstable colonel and the entity that is controlling the mind of one of them.

text: the biggest problem i have ( other than the very sluggish pace ) is we never really see her esther blossom as an actress , even though her talent is supposed to be growing .
translation: 私が抱えている最大の問題は（非常にゆっくりしたペースを除けば）、彼女が女優として成長する姿を本当に見ることができないことです。彼女の才能が成長しているはずなのに。
back_translation: The biggest problem I have is that, aside from the very slow pace, I really can't see her growing as an actress. Her talent should be developing.

text: the remaining friends must now rescue the captives , while desperately trying to avoid the long arm of the law .
translation: 残された友人たちは、捕らわれた人々を救出しなければなりませんが、法の長い手から必死に逃げようとしています。
back_translation: The remaining friends must rescue the captured people while desperately trying to escape the long arm of the law.

text: it is intensely personal and yet -- unlike quills -- deftly shows us the temper of the times .
translation: それは非常に個人的でありながら、羽根ペンとは異なり、巧みに時代の気風を私たちに示しています。
back_translation: It is very personal, yet unlike a quill pen, it skillfully shows us the spirit of the times.

text: 'bloody magic ' is the story of zack , an eleven year old school boy , who 's family is visited by three debt collectors .
translation: 「ブラッディ・マジック」は、家族が三人の借金取りに訪問される11歳の男子学生ザックの物語です。
back_translation: "Bloody Magic" is the story of an 11-year-old boy named Zach, whose family is visited by three debt collectors.

text: an overstylized , purM-ied mM-ilange of sex , psychology , drugs and philosophy . sometimes entertaining , sometimes indulgent -- but never less than pure wankery .
translation: 過剰にスタイライズされた、セックス、心理学、ドラッグ、哲学の混合物。時には楽しませてくれるが、時には自己満足に過ぎない - しかし純粋に無意味なものではない。
back_translation: An excessively stylized mixture of sex, psychology, drugs, and philosophy. Sometimes entertaining, but at times merely self-indulgent - yet not purely meaningless.

text: he follows them into a cave with a mysterious blue light and it turns out he is following h . g . wells , who , in turn , is on a time travel chase of dr . noah , a brilliant scientist who has gone mad with the intentions on destroying the world .
translation: 彼は神秘的な青い光の洞窟に彼らを追いかけ、実際には彼が追っているのはH.G.ウェルズであり、ウェルズは狂気に陥った優秀な科学者ドクター・ノアを追う時間旅行の冒険をしていることがわかります。
back_translation: He chases them into a mysterious blue light cave, and it turns out that he is actually pursuing H.G. Wells, who is on a time travel adventure chasing the outstanding but mad scientist Dr. Noah.

text: based on nicole valery-grossu 's european best seller autobiographic novel `` bless you , prison `` , the film is a true story , with real events and characters .
translation: ニコール・ヴァレリー＝グロスのヨーロッパのベストセラー自伝的小説「あなたを祝福します、刑務所」に基づいており、この映画は実際の出来事とキャラクターに基づく真実の物語です。
back_translation: Based on Nicole Valéry-Gross's European bestseller autobiographical novel "Bless You, Prison," this film is a true story based on actual events and characters.

text: in the year 2009 , a new drug known as blood heat is developed .
translation: 2009年には、「ブラッドヒート」として知られる新しい薬が開発されました。
back_translation: In 2009, a new drug known as "Blood Heat" was developed.

text: partnered with the sassy , stunning sistah girl , our hero must first undergo the ultimate attitude adjustment and trade in his 'fro and platforms for tennis sweaters and penny loafers .
translation: おしゃれで魅力的な姉妹と提携した私たちのヒーローは、まず究極の態度調整を行い、アフロとプラットフォームシューズをテニスセーターとペニーローファーに交換しなければなりません。
back_translation: Our hero, in collaboration with stylish and attractive sisters, must first undergo the ultimate attitude adjustment, exchanging their afro and platform shoes for a tennis sweater and penny loafers.

text: no earth-shattering accomplishment , but an unusually smart movie that the whole family can go to without a single person getting bored or talked down to .
translation: 地球を揺るがすような業績ではないが、家族全員が退屈せず、誰も見下されることなく楽しめる、非常に賢い映画である。
back_translation: It's not a groundbreaking achievement that shakes the Earth, but it's a very clever movie that everyone in the family can enjoy without getting bored or feeling looked down upon.

text: it 's fun , but the code-talk will fly right over everyone 's head
translation: 楽しいけれど、コードの話はみんなの頭の上を飛んでいってしまうだろう。
back_translation: It's fun, but the talk about code will probably go over everyone's heads.

text: a bored secretary in the holiday firm funtime inc spends her time looking after the plants around her .
translation: ホリデーファームのファンタイム社で退屈な秘書は、周りの植物の世話をすることで時間を過ごしています。
back_translation: A bored secretary at Funtime Company in Holiday Farm spends her time taking care of the plants around her.

text: handsome and sincere but slightly awkward in its combination of entertainment and evangelical boosterism .
translation: ハンサムで誠実ですが、エンターテインメントと伝道的な推進主義の組み合わせに少し不器用さがあります。
back_translation: He is handsome and sincere, but there is a bit of awkwardness in the combination of entertainment and evangelical promotion.

text: a film that perfectly distills the relationship between pop music and teens searching for identity .
translation: ポップ音楽とアイデンティティを探すティーンエイジャーの関係を完璧に凝縮した映画。
back_translation: A movie that perfectly captures the relationship between pop music and teenagers searching for their identity.

text: but after he 's done his `` day job `` matt takes on a secret identity as `` the man without fear , `` daredevil , the masked avenger that patrols the neighborhood of hell 's kitchen and new york city to combat the injustice that he can not tackle in the courtroom .
translation: しかし、彼が「日中の仕事」を終えた後、マットは「恐れを知らない男」という秘密の身份を持ち、デアデビルとして、ヘルズキッチンやニューヨーク市の近隣をパトロールし、法廷では対処できない不正に立ち向かう masked avenger になります。
back_translation: However, after he finishes his "day job," Matt has a secret identity as the "fearless man," becoming Daredevil and patrolling Hell's Kitchen and the neighborhoods of New York City, confronting injustices that the courtroom cannot handle as a masked avenger.

text: set in 1960 's sydney , this is the story of an australian gangster whose booming business , buoyed by the influx of u . s . soldiers in town for r & # 38 ; r during their tours in vietnam , attracts the attention of first the chicago mafia , and then their east coast competitors .
translation: 1960年代のシドニーを舞台に、アメリカ兵の休暇での訪問によって盛り上がるビジネスを持つオーストラリアのギャングスターの物語です。このビジネスはまずシカゴのマフィアの注目を集め、次に彼らの東海岸の競争相手の目にも留まります。
back_translation: The story is set in Sydney in the 1960s and follows an Australian gangster who has a thriving business due to the visits of American soldiers on leave. This business first attracts the attention of the Chicago mafia and then catches the eyes of their competitors on the East Coast.

text: prey for rock & # 38 ; roll is the story of jacki and her all-girl rock and roll band , clam dandy , who are trying to make it in the la club scene of the late 1980 's .
translation: 「プレイ・フォー・ロック＆ロール」は、ジャッキーと彼女のオールガール・ロックバンド「クラム・ダンディ」が1980年代後半のロサンゼルスのクラブシーンで成功を収めようとする物語です。
back_translation: "Play for Rock & Roll" is a story about Jackie and her all-girl rock band "Crumb Dandy" trying to achieve success in the Los Angeles club scene in the late 1980s.

text: meanwhile , a sith lord orchestrates events between the forces of good and evil , all the while waiting to play the final move that will ensure him control of the galaxy .
translation: その間、シスのロードは善と悪の勢力の間でイベントを orchestrateしながら、銀河の支配を確実にする最終手を打つのを待っています。
back_translation: During that time, the Sith Lord is waiting to make a final move to ensure their dominance over the galaxy while orchestrating events between the forces of good and evil.

text: nick , a district attorney investigating the most recent case , a suspicious apparent suicide , and her interviews with friends and family of the deceased trigger extensive and intricately interwoven flashbacks that reveal surprising facts about the man 's life and death .
translation: ニック、最近の事件を調査している地区検事であり、疑わしい見せかけの自殺事件に関するもので、故人の友人や家族とのインタビューが、驚くべき事実を明らかにする驚くほど複雑に絡み合ったフラッシュバックを引き起こす。
back_translation: Nick is a district attorney investigating a recent case involving a suspicious-looking suicide. Interviews with the deceased's friends and family trigger remarkably complex flashbacks that reveal astonishing truths.

text: there 's a wickedly subversive bent to the best parts of birthday girl .
translation: バースデーガールの最良の部分には、悪意のある反体制的な傾向があります。
back_translation: The best part of the birthday girl has a malicious anti-establishment tendency.

text: in their own words , and not a moment too soon - 'broadway ' tells the stories of our theatrical legends , how they came to new york , and how they created this legendary century in american theatre .
translation: 彼ら自身の言葉で、そして遅すぎることはない - 「ブロードウェイ」は、私たちの劇的な伝説の物語を語り、彼らがどのようにニューヨークにやって来たのか、そしてアメリカ演劇のこの伝説的な世紀をどのように築いたのかを伝えています。
back_translation: In their own words, and it's never too late - "Broadway" tells the story of our dramatic legends, how they came to New York, and how they built this legendary century of American theater.

text: schnieder bounces around with limp wrists , wearing tight tummy tops and hip huggers , twirling his hair on his finger and assuming that 's enough to sustain laughs . . .
translation: シュナイダーは手首をだらんとさせながら跳ね回り、ぴったりしたお腹が見えるトップスとヒップハガーを身に着け、指で髪をくるくる回しながら、それだけで笑いを取れると思っている。
back_translation: Schneider bounces around with her wrists hanging limply, wearing a tight top that reveals her belly and hip-hugger pants, twirling her hair with her fingers, believing that’s enough to make people laugh.

text: nicholas , his sister and mother venture to london to seek help from their uncle ralph , but ralph 's only intentions are to separate the family and exploit them .
translation: ニコラス、彼の妹と母は叔父ラルフから助けを求めるためにロンドンに向かいますが、ラルフの唯一の目的は家族を引き裂き、彼らを搾取することです。
back_translation: Nicholas, along with his sister and mother, heads to London to seek help from Uncle Ralph, but Ralph's sole purpose is to tear the family apart and exploit them.

text: then , grace lets us in on the secret of their marriage , and how she is able to keep communication front and center in their relationship .
translation: それでは、グレースが彼らの結婚の秘密を明かし、どのように彼女が彼らの関係においてコミュニケーションを中心に保っているのかを教えてくれます。
back_translation: Then, Grace will reveal the secret of their marriage and explain how she keeps communication at the center of their relationship.

text: by the time you reach the finale , you 're likely wondering why you 've been watching all this strutting and posturing .
translation: フィナーレに達する頃には、なぜ自分がこれほどまでの見せびらかしや振る舞いを見ていたのか疑問に思うことでしょう。
back_translation: By the time you reach the finale, you will probably wonder why you were witnessing such exhibitionism and behavior.

text: bret has an idea that will push them both across lines they 'd never seriously considered crossing .
translation: ブレットは、彼ら二人を今まで真剣に考えたことのない境界線を越えさせるアイデアを持っている。
back_translation: Brett has an idea that will push the two of them across a boundary they have never seriously considered before.

text: with some encouragement from tom ( paul bettany ) , the self-appointed town spokesman , the little community agrees to hide her and in return , grace agrees to work for them .
translation: トム（ポール・ベタニー）からの少しの励ましを受けて、自称町の広報役である彼は、小さなコミュニティが彼女をかくまうことに同意し、その代わりにグレースは彼らのために働くことに同意します。
