back_translation: After receiving a bit of encouragement from Tom (Paul Bettany), who calls himself the town’s spokesperson, a small community agrees to shelter her, and in return, Grace agrees to work for them.

text: ramu stands in and repeats the wisdom of sharonna , freeing the mind of the posh guests and attracting lexi to him .
translation: ラムはシャロナの知恵を繰り返し、上品なゲストたちの心を解放し、レクシーを彼のもとに引き寄せる。
back_translation: Ram repeats Shalona's wisdom, freeing the hearts of the elegant guests and drawing Lexie to him.

text: neil burger here succeeded in . . . making the mystery of four decades back the springboard for a more immediate mystery in the present .
translation: ニール・バーガーは、40年前の謎を現在のより直接的な謎の踏み台にすることに成功しました。
back_translation: Neil Berger has succeeded in turning a mystery from 40 years ago into a stepping stone for a more direct mystery today.

text: director yu seems far more interested in gross-out humor than in showing us well-thought stunts or a car chase that we have n't seen 10 , 000 times .
translation: ユウ監督は、私たちが1万回見たことのないような、よく考えられたスタントやカーチェイスを見せるよりも、むしろグロテスクなユーモアに興味を持っているようです。
back_translation: Director Yu seems to be more interested in grotesque humor rather than showing well-thought-out stunts and car chases that we have never seen a thousand times before.

text: patricia confides to her good-hearted maid maria ( theresa saldana ) , that she is convinced that her husband already waits for her in 'shangri-la ' , the fabulous get-away-paradise where she will fulfill her infinite happiness of a family .
translation: パトリシアは心優しいメイドのマリア（テレサ・サルダナ）に、自分の夫がすでに「シャングリ・ラ」で彼女を待っていると確信していると打ち明けます。そこは彼女が家族との無限の幸せを実現する素晴らしい逃避行の楽園です。
back_translation: Patricia confides in the kind-hearted maid Maria (Teresa Saldana) that she is certain her husband is already waiting for her at "Shangri-La." It is a wonderful paradise for her to realize infinite happiness with her family during their escape.

text: what full frontal lacks in thematic coherence it largely makes up for as loosey-goosey , experimental entertainment . still , i 'm not quite sure what the point isM-^E
translation: フルフロンタルはテーマの一貫性に欠けていますが、ゆるい雰囲気の実験的なエンターテインメントとしては大いに補っています。それでも、私はいまだにその意義がよくわかりません。
back_translation: Full Frontal lacks consistency in its theme, but it greatly compensates for that as an experimental entertainment with a relaxed atmosphere. Still, I still don't fully understand its significance.

text: the jokes are sophomoric , stereotypes are sprinkled everywhere and the acting ranges from bad to bodacious .
translation: ジョークは幼稚で、ステレオタイプがあちこちに散らばっており、演技は悪いから素晴らしいまでさまざまです。
back_translation: The jokes are childish, the stereotypes are scattered everywhere, and the acting ranges from bad to wonderfully awful.

text: the crew of the enterprise ( picard and company ) find themselves on planet romulus and eventually discover a threat to the earth .
translation: エンタープライズのクルー（ピカードと仲間たち）はロミュラス星に到着し、最終的に地球に対する脅威を発見します。
back_translation: The Enterprise crew (Picard and his companions) arrives at the planet Romulus and eventually discovers a threat to Earth.

text: he has been hired by an american known only as `` wall street `` ( see rule two ) to make a delivery , but when frank stops along route , he notices his `` package `` is moving .
translation: 彼は「ウォール街」という名前のアメリカ人に雇われて配達をすることになったが、フランクが途中で止まると、自分の「荷物」が動いていることに気づく。
back_translation: He was hired by an American named "Wall Street" to make deliveries, but when Frank stopped along the way, he realized that his "cargo" was moving.

text: the only thing that matters for him is break dancing .
translation: 彼にとって重要なのはブレイクダンスだけです。
back_translation: What is important to him is only breakdancing.

text: heaven is a haunting dramatization of a couple 's moral ascension .
translation: 「天国」はカップルの道徳的な昇進を描いた hauntingなドラマです。
back_translation: "Heaven" is a haunting drama that portrays the moral ascent of a couple.

text: the united states of america is notorious for its astronomical number of people killed by firearms for a developed nation without a civil war .
translation: アメリカ合衆国は、内戦なしに発展した国としては火器によって殺された人々の天文学的な数で悪名高いです。
back_translation: The United States is notoriously known for the astronomical number of people killed by firearms as a country that developed without a civil war.

text: the film is n't especially dynamic , but it brims with insightful , poignant memories from survivors .
translation: この映画は特にダイナミックではありませんが、生存者たちの洞察に満ち、心に残る思い出で溢れています。
back_translation: This movie is not especially dynamic, but it is filled with insights from the survivors and leaves behind memorable thoughts.

text: the film culminates with the band 's arrival on the u . s . stage at wolf trap national park .
translation: 映画はバンドがウルフトラップ国立公園のアメリカのステージに到着するところでクライマックスを迎えます。
back_translation: The movie reaches its climax as the band arrives at the American stage of Wolf Trap National Park.

text: astrid magnussen is a 12 year old girl , living in california .
translation: アストリッド・マグヌッセンはカリフォルニアに住む12歳の女の子です。
back_translation: Astrid Magnusson is a 12-year-old girl who lives in California.

text: intriguing and beautiful film , but those of you who read the book are likely to be disappointed .
translation: 魅力的で美しい映画ですが、本を読んだ人は失望する可能性が高いです。
back_translation: It's an attractive and beautiful movie, but those who have read the book are likely to be disappointed.

text: the story follows unpredictable twists and turns until it climaxes with a madcap finale .
translation: 物語は予測不可能な展開を辿り、狂乱のフィナーレでクライマックスを迎えます。
back_translation: The story takes an unpredictable turn and reaches its climax with a frenzy of finales.

text: a depressingly retrograde , 'post-feminist ' romantic comedy that takes an astonishingly condescending attitude toward women .
translation: 悲惨なまでに後退的な「ポストフェミニスト」ロマンティックコメディで、女性に対して驚くほど見下した態度を取っています。
back_translation: It is a tragically regressive "post-feminist" romantic comedy that has an astonishingly condescending attitude towards women.

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the excitingly undermedicated bitch goddess trasha enters the frame , cutting kyle off from his friends and their vacuous and unencumbered world of beer and porn .
translation: アメリカ、ゼッド、そしてカイルは良い友達だったが、刺激的に薬が効いていないビッチ女神トラシャが現れると、カイルは友達や彼らの空虚で束縛のないビールとポルノの世界から切り離されてしまう。
back_translation: America, Zedd, and Kyle were good friends, but when the exciting drug-free bitch goddess Trasha appears, Kyle becomes detached from his friends and their empty, unbound world of beer and pornography.

text: a vivid , spicy footnote to history , and a movie that grips and holds you in rapt attention from start to finish .
translation: 鮮やかでスパイシーな歴史の脚注、そして始まりから終わりまであなたをしっかりと引きつけて離さない映画。
back_translation: A vivid and spicy footnote in history, a film that captivates and holds you tightly from beginning to end.

text: a painting brought to life , the tracker is an enigmatic visual essay set on a vast australian landscape .
translation: 命を与えられた絵画、「トラッカー」は広大なオーストラリアの風景を舞台にした神秘的なビジュアルエッセイです。
back_translation: The painting "Tracker," which has been given life, is a mystical visual essay set against the vast landscapes of Australia.

text: an inept , tedious spoof of '70s kung fu pictures , it contains almost enough chuckles for a three-minute sketch , and no more .
translation: 無能で退屈な70年代のカンフー映画のスプーフィーな作品で、3分間のスケッチに足るほどの笑いをほとんど含んでいるが、それ以上はない。
back_translation: A spoof of the incompetent and boring kung fu movies of the 70s, it contains just enough laughs for a three-minute sketch, but nothing more.

text: dek and shirley live together with 12 year-old marlene , her daughter by the sexy delinquent jimmy , who skeddadled years ago and has n't been heard from since .
translation: デックとシャーリーは、12歳のマリーンと一緒に暮らしています。マリーンは、魅力的な非行少年ジミーの娘で、彼は数年前に姿を消して以来、音沙汰がありません。
back_translation: Deck and Shirley live with their 12-year-old daughter, Marine. Marine is the daughter of the charming delinquent Jimmy, who has been missing without a trace since he disappeared a few years ago.

text: the stars may be college kids , but the subject matter is as adult as you can get : the temptations of the flesh are unleashed by a slightly crazed , overtly determined young woman and a one-night swim turns into an ocean of trouble .
translation: 星たちは大学生かもしれませんが、テーマは非常に大人向けです：少し狂った、過剰に決意した若い女性によって肉体の誘惑が解き放たれ、一夜の泳ぎが問題の海へと変わります。
back_translation: The stars may be college students, but the theme is very much for adults: the temptation of the body unleashed by a slightly insane, overly determined young woman transforms a night of swimming into a sea of problems.

text: maggie finds that life can take many unexpected turns as she discovers mateo has risked a dangerous trip at sea and he has made it to miami .
translation: マギーは、人生が多くの予期しない展開を迎えることがあると感じ、マテオが危険な海の旅を冒険し、マイアミにたどり着いたことを発見します。
back_translation: Maggie feels that life can sometimes take many unexpected turns and discovers that Mateo has embarked on a dangerous sea journey and has arrived in Miami.

text: the movie is the strangest experience : a matter-of-fact thing that swallows you whole .
translation: その映画は最も奇妙な体験です：ありのままのもので、あなたを丸ごと飲み込んでしまうものです。
back_translation: That movie is the strangest experience: it is all-consuming and takes you in just as you are.

text: what jackson has accomplished here is amazing on a technical level .
translation: ジャクソンがここで達成したことは、技術的なレベルで驚くべきことです。
back_translation: What Jackson has achieved here is remarkable on a technical level.

text: by the end , only one thing is certain - justice is simply a toss of the coin .
translation: 結局のところ、唯一確かなことは、正義はただのコインの裏表に過ぎないということです。
back_translation: Ultimately, the only certain thing is that justice is just the flip side of a coin.

text: just when we think we have a grasp on each character 's inner-motives , more characters get sucked into the fray altering everyone 's dynamic and the course of april 's `` perfect `` shower .
translation: 私たちが各キャラクターの内なる動機を理解したと思った矢先、さらに多くのキャラクターが入り込み、誰もが相互作用し、エイプリルの「完璧な」シャワーの進行が変わってしまいます。
back_translation: Just when we thought we understood the inner motivations of each character, even more characters come in, interactions happen among everyone, and April's "perfect" shower plan gets derailed.

text: dares to look conventional hollywood wisdom in the eye and refuses to blink
translation: 従来的なハリウッドの知恵に目を向け、まぶたを瞬きせずに拒む勇気がある。
back_translation: There is the courage to turn to conventional Hollywood wisdom and refuse without blinking.

text: off the hook is overlong and not well-acted , but credit writer-producer-director adam watstein with finishing it at all .
translation: 『オフ・ザ・フック』は長すぎて演技があまり良くありませんが、脚本・製作・監督のアダム・ワトスタインが完成させたことには評価すべきです。
back_translation: "Off the Hook" is too long and the acting is not very good, but credit should be given to Adam Watsstein for completing the screenplay, production, and direction.

text: this comic gem is as delightful as it is derivative .
translation: この漫画の宝石は、派生的であると同時に魅力的です。
back_translation: The jewels of this manga are both derivative and captivating.

text: [ w ] hile long on amiable monkeys and worthy environmentalism , jane goodall 's wild chimpanzees is short on the thrills the oversize medium demands .
translation: アミーableなサルや価値ある環境主義に満ちている一方で、ジェーン・グッドールの「ワイルド・チンパンジー」は、過大なメディアが要求するスリルに対して物足りなさがあります。
back_translation: While filled with amiable monkeys and valuable environmentalism, Jane Goodall's "Wild Chimpanzees" falls short of the thrills demanded by excessive media.

text: epic myth becomes burning truth on the mountain of fire .
translation: 叙事的神話が火の山で燃える真実になる。
back_translation: The narrative myth becomes a truth that burns on the mountain of fire.

text: during a climbing trip to kullen in sweden , charlotte is inches from falling to her death . teis
translation: スウェーデンのクレンでのクライミング旅行中、シャーロットは死に至る危険に直面している。
back_translation: During a climbing trip in Kullen, Sweden, Charlotte is facing a life-threatening danger.

text: she ignores him and climbs the town water tower regularly .
translation: 彼女は彼を無視して、定期的に町の水塔に登る。
back_translation: She ignores him and climbs the town's water tower regularly.

text: soon after , the old man reappears on the shore and is greeted by his wife , who has been waiting for his arrival .
translation: その後すぐに、老夫は岸に再び現れ、彼の到着を待っていた妻に迎えられました。
back_translation: Soon after that, the old man reappeared on the shore, welcomed by his wife who was waiting for his arrival.

text: grace 's only salvation appears to be by the guidance of her paternal grandfather reverend salo sr . ( the amazing kreskin ) .
translation: グレースの唯一の救いは、彼女の父方の祖父である牧師サロ・シニア（驚異のクレスキン）の導きによるもののようです。
back_translation: Grace's only salvation seems to come from the guidance of her paternal grandfather, Pastor Sal Senior (the Amazing Kreskin).

text: coppola 's directorial debut is an incredibly layered and stylistic film that , despite a fairly slow paced , almost humdrum approach to character development , still manages at least a decent attempt at meaningful cinema .
translation: コッポラの監督デビュー作は非常に多層的でスタイリッシュな映画であり、キャラクターの発展に対してかなり遅いペースでほとんど平凡なアプローチをとっているにもかかわらず、少なくとも意味のある映画作りに対して decent な試みを続けています。
back_translation: Coppola's directorial debut is a highly layered and stylish film, and despite taking a rather slow and almost mundane approach to character development, it still makes a decent attempt at meaningful filmmaking.

text: a morality tale whose thought-provoking potential is hampered by a made-for-tv look , rigid performances and an asinine 'twist ' that brazenly rips off the sixth sense .
translation: 考えさせられる潜在能力を持つ道徳的な物語だが、テレビ映画のような見た目、硬い演技、そしてあからさまに『シックス・センス』を剽窃した馬鹿げた「ツイスト」により、その魅力が損なわれている。
back_translation: It is a thought-provoking moral story with potential, but its appeal is diminished by a television movie aesthetic, stiff acting, and a ridiculous "twist" that clearly plagiarizes "The Sixth Sense."

text: smith 's approach is never to tease , except gently and in that way that makes us consider our own eccentricities and how they are expressed through our homes .
translation: スミスのアプローチは、からかうことは決してせず、むしろ優しく、私たち自身の奇抜さとそれがどのように私たちの家を通じて表現されるかを考えさせる方法である。
back_translation: Smith's approach never mocks; rather, it kindly encourages us to reflect on our own eccentricities and how they are expressed through our homes.

text: a chaotic panorama that 's too busy flying a lot of metaphoric flags .
translation: メタファーの旗がたくさん乱れ飛ぶ、混沌としたパノラマ。
back_translation: A chaotic panorama where many flags of metaphor flutter wildly.

text: a disfigured man , known as the phantom who loves to strike fear in the minds of the paris opera house staff , comes to a young singer , christine daae , and tutors her voice .
translation: 顔に傷を負った男、ファントムとして知られ、パリのオペラ座のスタッフに恐怖を植え付けることを好む彼は、若い歌手クリスティーヌ・ダーエに接近し、彼女の声を教えます。
back_translation: A man with a scarred face, known as the Phantom, prefers to instill fear in the staff of the Paris Opera House. He approaches a young singer named Christine Daaé and teaches her to sing.

text: she comes from nothing and finally gets everything , but . . .
translation: 彼女は無から来て、ついに全てを手に入れるが、しかし…
back_translation: She comes from nothing and eventually acquires everything, but…

text: not all of the stories work and the ones that do are thin and scattered , but the film works well enough to make it worth watching .
translation: すべてのストーリーがうまくいくわけではなく、うまくいくものは薄く散らばっていますが、映画は十分に機能していて見る価値があります。
back_translation: Not all stories work out well, and those that do are few and far between, but the movie is sufficiently engaging and worth watching.

text: a young boy has been possessed so as to capture a young , beautiful girl .
translation: 若い男の子は、美しい若い女の子を捕まえるために取り憑かれています。
back_translation: A young boy is obsessed with catching a beautiful young girl.

text: in 1977 , during anita bryant 's crusade , an anti-gay book alan wrote years before gets published without his consent .
translation: 1977年、アニタ・ブライアントの活動中に、アランが数年前に書いた反ゲイの本が、彼の同意なしに出版される。
back_translation: In 1977, during Anita Bryant's activism, a book against gay rights that Alan had written a few years earlier was published without his consent.

text: what makes this latest version of the four feathers the best so far are the beautiful desert locations ( in morocco ) , and the superb action sequences .
translation: この最新の「四羽の羽根」がこれまでで最高の理由は、美しいモロッコの砂漠のロケーションと素晴らしいアクションシーンです。
back_translation: The reason this latest "Four Feathers" is the best yet is the beautiful location in the Moroccan desert and the wonderful action scenes.

text: davis has filled out his cast with appealing fresh faces .
translation: デイビスは魅力的な新しい顔を揃えてキャストを組みました。
back_translation: Davis assembled a cast with an appealing new lineup of faces.

text: rock 's got the kind of sly charm and non- self-conscious sincerity that could fit into any action hero archetype imaginable , even the old-school ones .
translation: ロックは、想像できるどんなアクションヒーローの archetype にも合う、こっそりとした魅力と自己意識のない誠実さを持っています。古典的なものも含めてです。
back_translation: Rock possesses a subtle charm and an unselfconscious sincerity that fit any conceivable archetype of an action hero, including the classics.

text: more impressionistic than analytical , a grin without a cat is a grand immersion .
translation: 分析的というよりも印象的で、猫のいない笑顔は壮大な没入感を与える。
back_translation: Rather than being analytical, it is impressive, and the absence of cats gives a grand sense of immersion.

text: it may not be the most immediate or attention-grabbing work , but there 's certainly something satisfying in its thoughtfulness .
translation: それは最も直感的で注意を引く作品ではないかもしれませんが、その思慮深さには確かに満足感があります。
back_translation: It may not be the most intuitive or attention-grabbing work, but there is certainly a sense of satisfaction in its thoughtfulness.

text: a breezy , diverting , conventional , well-acted tale of two men locked in an ongoing game of cat-and-cat .
translation: 風通しの良い、気を紛らわせる、従来通りの、演技が優れた二人の男が続けている猫と猫のゲームに閉じ込められた物語。
back_translation: A story trapped in a game of cat and cat, featuring two men with excellent acting skills in a well-ventilated, distracting, and conventional setting.

text: not quite as miraculous as its dreamworks makers would have you believe , but it more than adequately fills the eyes and stirs the emotions .
translation: 夢の作品を作るドリームワークスの制作者が信じさせようとするほどの奇跡的なものではありませんが、それでも十分に目を引き、感情を揺さぶります。
back_translation: It's not as miraculous as something that the creators of DreamWorks would try to make you believe, but it is still captivating enough to grab your attention and stir your emotions.

text: unlike the rest , she did n't vanish forever from history .
translation: 他の人とは違って、彼女は歴史から永遠に消え去ることはなかった。
back_translation: Unlike others, she never vanished from history forever.

text: spousal abuse is a major problem in contemporary society , but the film reduces this domestic tragedy to florid melodrama .
translation: 配偶者虐待は現代社会における重大な問題ですが、その映画はこの家庭内の悲劇を派手なメロドラマに還元しています。
back_translation: Domestic violence is a serious issue in modern society, but the film reduces this domestic tragedy to a flashy melodrama.

text: a deftly entertaining film , smartly played and smartly directed .
translation: 巧みに楽しませる映画で、スマートに演じられ、スマートに監督されています。
back_translation: A cleverly entertaining movie that is performed smartly and directed smartly.

text: dan tort , a troubled genius attempts to build a magnetic engine while running from the deamons of his past , and trying to stay a couple steps ahead of the government and corperate kings .
translation: ダン・トートは、過去の悪夢から逃れながら、磁気エンジンを開発しようとする悩める天才であり、政府や企業の王たちを一歩先に行こうと奮闘しています。
back_translation: Dan Tott is a troubled genius trying to develop a magnetic engine while escaping from past nightmares, struggling to stay a step ahead of the kings of government and corporations.

text: all her father gus wants is for her to get married to a nice greek boy .
translation: 彼女の父ギャスが望んでいるのは、彼女が素敵なギリシャ人の男と結婚することだけです。
back_translation: What her father, Gias, wants is for her to marry a nice Greek man.

text: it tends to remind one of a really solid woody allen film , with its excellent use of new york locales and sharp writing
translation: 本作は、ニューヨークのロケーションや鋭い脚本の優れた使い方で、非常に確かなウディ・アレン映画を思い出させる傾向があります。
back_translation: This work tends to evoke a very solid Woody Allen film with its excellent use of New York locations and sharp writing.

text: documentary and drama carry spielrein 's life into the cross-hairs of warring ideologies ( communism , national socialism ) .
translation: ドキュメンタリーとドラマは、シュピールラインの人生を対立するイデオロギー（共産主義、国家社会主義）の狙いの中に引き込んでいます。
back_translation: Documentaries and dramas draw Spielrein's life into the conflicting ideologies of communism and National Socialism.

text: a live-action cartoon , a fast-moving and cheerfully simplistic 88 minutes of exaggerated action put together with the preteen boy in mind .
translation: 実写版のカートゥーンで、速いテンポで陽気に単純化された88分間の誇張されたアクションが、10代前半の男の子を意識して作られています。
back_translation: The live-action version of the cartoon features exaggerated action in a fast-paced and cheerfully simplified 88-minute format, designed with pre-teen boys in mind.

text: as sebastien does his research over the next several days he begins to discover more about himself than he ever anticipated .
translation: セバスチャンは今後数日間にわたり研究を進める中で、自分自身について予想以上のことを発見し始める。
back_translation: Sebastian begins to discover more about himself than he anticipated as he continues his research over the next few days.

text: sadly , 'garth ' has n't progressed as nicely as 'wayne . '
translation: 残念ながら、ガースはウェインほど順調に進展していません。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Garth is not progressing as smoothly as Wayne.

text: the kind of film that grows on you upon reflection
translation: 考えを巡らせるうちにしっかりと心に響く映画の種類
back_translation: A type of movie that resonates deeply in your heart while pondering thoughts.

text: egoyan 's work often elegantly considers various levels of reality and uses shifting points of view , but here he has constructed a film so labyrinthine that it defeats his larger purpose .
translation: エゴヤンの作品は多様な現実のレベルを優雅に考察し、視点の変化を利用することが多いが、ここでは彼の大きな目的を達成するにはあまりにも迷路のように複雑な映画を構築してしまった。
back_translation: Egoyan's works elegantly explore diverse levels of reality and often utilize changes in perspective, but here he has constructed a film that is too labyrinthine and complex to achieve his broader aims.

text: laggard drama wending its way to an uninspired philosophical epiphany .
translation: 遅れたドラマが、無気力な哲学的啓示に向かって進んでいる。
back_translation: The delayed drama is moving toward a listless philosophical revelation.

text: there , he befriends a 13 year old boy left behind years before by his mother .
translation: そこで、彼は母親に何年も前に置き去りにされた13歳の少年と友達になります。
back_translation: So, he becomes friends with a 13-year-old boy who was left behind by his mother years ago.

text: he 's survived only by holding onto his dream of revenge against matty , the man he believes betrayed him .
translation: 彼は、自分を裏切ったと信じるマッティに対する復讐の夢を抱き続けることでしか生き残れなかった。
back_translation: He could only survive by continuing to harbor dreams of revenge against Matty, whom he believed had betrayed him.

text: the film `` eternally aliens `` is a 24 min .
translation: 映画「エターナリー・エイリアンズ」は24分です。
back_translation: The movie "Eternally Aliens" is 24 minutes long.

text: they lie in bed but all his advances are instantly rejected by a progressively more nervous ana .
translation: 彼らはベッドに横たわっているが、彼のすべてのアプローチは次第に緊張していくアナによって即座に拒絶されている。
back_translation: They are lying in bed, but all of his approaches are immediately rejected by Anna, who is gradually becoming more tense.

text: plays like a series of vignettes -- clips of a film that are still looking for a common through-line .
translation: シリーズのような小品の集まりであり、共通のテーマをまだ探している映画のクリップです。
back_translation: It is a collection of small pieces like a series, with clips from films that are still searching for a common theme.

text: connie sumner has a loving husband , a beautiful home , and a wonderful son , but she wants more .
translation: コニー・サムナーは愛する夫、美しい家、素晴らしい息子を持っていますが、もっと多くを求めています。
back_translation: Connie Sumner has a loving husband, a beautiful home, and a wonderful son, but she is seeking more.

text: a soap-opera quality twist in the last 20 minutes . . . almost puts the kibosh on what is otherwise a sumptuous work of b-movie imagination .
translation: 最後の20分でソープオペラのようなひねりがあり…それは、他の部分が豪華なB級映画の想像力であるにもかかわらず、ほぼ台無しにしてしまいます。
back_translation: In the last 20 minutes, there is a twist reminiscent of a soap opera... and despite the other parts being the imaginative flair of a lavish B-movie, it almost ruins everything.

text: simon is an angel who shows jordan a clear oath .
translation: サイモンはジョーダンに明確な誓いを示す天使です。
back_translation: Simon is an angel who shows clear vows to Jordan.

text: pan nalin 's exposition is beautiful and mysterious , and the interviews that follow , with the practitioners of this ancient indian practice , are as subtle and as enigmatic .
translation: パナルリンのエクスポジションは美しく神秘的であり、続くインタビューはこの古代インドの実践者とのもので、同様に微妙で謎めいています。
back_translation: The exposition of Panarlin is beautiful and mysterious, and the subsequent interview with this ancient Indian practitioner is equally subtle and enigmatic.

text: the film contains colour home movie footage of the film 's production which where shot by charles ' brother sydney .
translation: その映画には、チャールズの兄であるシドニーが撮影した映画の制作のカラーホームムービー映像が含まれています。
back_translation: The movie includes color home movie footage of the production of a film shot by Charles' brother, Sidney.

text: blau ( trevor griffiths ) needs a favor for old times ' sake .
translation: ブラウ（トレバー・グリフィス）は、昔のためにお願いがある。
back_translation: Brau (Trevor Griffiths) has a request for the past.

text: his intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran walter burke ( al pacino ) who squires him through the agency 's difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks .
translation: 彼の知性と型破りな態度は、ベテランのウォルター・バーク（アル・パチーノ）の注目を集め、彼は彼をエージェンシーの厳しいトレーニングコースに導き、急速に昇進するのを助けます。
back_translation: His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of veteran Walter Burke (Al Pacino), who guides him through the agency's rigorous training course and helps him rise through the ranks rapidly.

text: they live in a poor village in the soviet union , fantisizing about a better life .
translation: 彼らはソビエト連邦の貧しい村に住んでおり、より良い生活を夢見ています。
back_translation: They live in a poor village in the Soviet Union and dream of a better life.

text: he meets up with the country bears , a long-since broken-up band , a parody of bands like the eagles .
translation: 彼はカントリーベアーズと会います。彼らは以前は活動していたバンドで、イーグルスのようなバンドのパロディです。
back_translation: He will meet the Country Bears. They are a band that used to be active, and they are a parody of bands like the Eagles.

text: although forcibly baptized , the sisters are chased through christendom until they arrive in venice .
translation: 強制的に洗礼を受けたにもかかわらず、姉妹たちはキリスト教世界を追われ、ベネチアにたどり着きます。
back_translation: Despite having been baptized forcibly, the sisters were driven out of the Christian world and made their way to Venice.

text: ultimately , the band must find its strength in the music that is their passion and the thread that holds them together , inspiring them to prevail .
translation: 最終的に、バンドは彼らの情熱である音楽に強さを見出し、それが彼らをつなぐ糸となり、勝利へと導くのです。
back_translation: Ultimately, the band finds strength in their passion for music, which becomes the thread that connects them and leads them to victory.

text: this is the sort of burly action flick where one coincidence pummels another , narrative necessity is a drunken roundhouse , and whatever passes for logic is a factor of the last plot device left standing .
translation: これは、一つの偶然がもう一つの偶然を打ちのめすような、タフなアクション映画で、物語の必要性は酔っぱらった回し蹴りのようで、論理として成立するものは最後に残ったプロットデバイスの要因に過ぎない。
back_translation: This is a tough action movie where one coincidence overwhelms another, and the necessity of the story is like a drunken roundhouse kick, with what remains logically valid being merely the factors of the final plot device.

text: visually exciting sci-fi film which suffers from a lackluster screenplay .
translation: 視覚的に興奮させるSF映画ですが、平凡な脚本に悩まされています。
back_translation: It is a visually exciting sci-fi movie, but it suffers from a mediocre script.

text: standing by yourself tracks the movements and daily machinations of a group of outcast friends in their strip-mall new york state hometown .
translation: 「スタンディング・バイ・ユアセルフ」は、ニューヨーク州のストリップモールにある故郷で、アウトキャストの友人たちの動きや日常的なやり取りを追っています。
back_translation: "Standing By Yourself" follows the movements and daily interactions of outcast friends in their hometown, located in a strip mall in New York State.

text: together they find out , much to their horror , that all the housewives are strangely blissful , and somehow . . .
translation: 一緒に彼らは、愕然とすることに、すべての主婦たちが奇妙に幸せであることを発見し、どこかで…
back_translation: Together, they were shocked to discover that all the housewives were strangely happy somewhere...

text: a charming trifle . . . a welcome return to jocular form .
translation: 魅力的な小品 . . . 陽気な形に戻ってきたことが歓迎される。
back_translation: Charming small pieces... It's welcomed that it has returned to a cheerful form.

text: those with a modicum of patience will find in these characters ' foibles a timeless and unique perspective .
translation: ほんの少しの忍耐を持つ人々は、これらのキャラクターの欠点において時代を超えたユニークな視点を見出すでしょう。
back_translation: People with a little patience will find a timeless and unique perspective in the flaws of these characters.

text: nsa agent gibbons ( samuel l . jackson ) forces xxx to cooperate with the government to infiltrate an underground russian crime ring and avoid going to prison .
translation: NSAエージェントのギボンズ（サミュエル・L・ジャクソン）は、XXXに政府と協力してロシアの地下犯罪組織に潜入し、刑務所行きを避けるよう強制します。
back_translation: NSA agent Gibbons (Samuel L. Jackson) is forced to infiltrate a Russian underground crime organization in cooperation with the government to avoid going to prison.

text: the film has too many spots where it 's on slippery footing , but is acceptable entertainment for the entire family and one that 's especially fit for the kiddies .
translation: 映画には滑りやすい場面が多すぎますが、家族全員にとって受け入れられるエンターテイメントであり、特に子供たちに適した作品です。
back_translation: There are too many slippery scenes in the movie, but it is an entertaining piece that is acceptable for the whole family, especially suitable for children.

text: there is a refreshing absence of cynicism in stuart little 2 -- quite a rarity , even in the family film market . eventually , it wins you over .
translation: 『スチュワート・リトル2』には、シニシズムがまったくないさわやかな雰囲気があります — これは家族映画市場でも珍しいことです。結局のところ、それはあなたを魅了します。
back_translation: "Stuart Little 2" has a refreshing atmosphere devoid of cynicism — which is rare in the family film market. After all, it captivates you.

text: a well-rounded tribute to a man whose achievements -- and complexities -- reached far beyond the end zone .
translation: エンドゾーンを超えた成果と複雑さを持つ男に捧げる、バランスの取れた素晴らしい賛辞。
back_translation: A balanced and wonderful tribute dedicated to a man with achievements and complexities that go beyond the end zone.

text: pretty new temp irene ca n't help falling for graham 's spontaneous charm .
translation: 新しい臨時職員アイリーンは、グレアムの自発的な魅力に恋をせずにはいられません。
back_translation: The new temporary employee Eileen can't help but fall in love with Graham's spontaneous charm.

text: reaching to break the wishbone , thomas thinks of his ultimate dream - to see the sexy neighbor naked .
translation: ウィッシュボーンを引き抜こうとするトーマスは、究極の夢を思い描いている - セクシーな隣人の裸を見ることだ。
back_translation: Thomas, who is trying to pull out the wishbone, is envisioning the ultimate dream - seeing his sexy neighbor naked.

text: insomnia is involving . still , i thought it could have been more .
translation: 不眠症は関与しています。しかし、私はもっとあったかもしれないと思いました。
back_translation: Insomnia is involved. However, I thought there might have been more.

text: a slick , well-oiled machine , exquisitely polished and upholstered .
translation: 洗練された、よく機能する機械、精巧に磨かれ、張り地が施されています。
back_translation: A sophisticated, well-functioning machine, intricately polished with upholstery applied.

text: i like my christmas movies with more elves and snow and less pimps and ho 's .
translation: 私はクリスマス映画にはもっとエルフと雪があって、あまり売春夫や売春婦が出ないほうが好きです。
back_translation: I prefer Christmas movies to have more elves and snow, and fewer pimps and prostitutes.

text: while working a car insurance scam , toni cutter , a female con artist , accidentally turns a routine collision into a fatality and exposes her lawyer and lover , stephen tally , to felony murder charges from the district attorney .
translation: 自動車保険の詐欺を行っている最中、女性詐欺師トニ・カッターは、日常的な衝突を事故死に変えてしまい、弁護士で恋人のスティーブン・タリーを地方検察官から重罪殺人の容疑にさらす。
back_translation: While committing automobile insurance fraud, female con artist Toni Cutter transforms a routine collision into a fatal accident, putting her lawyer and lover, Steven Tully, under investigation for serious charges of murder by the district attorney.

text: on his journey he befriends slacker jimmy the fin ( peter sarsgaard ) and becomes involved in rescuing his neighbor colette ( debra kara unger ) from her own demons .
translation: 彼の旅の中で、彼は怠け者のジミー・ザ・フィン（ピーター・サースガード）と友達になり、自分の悪魔から隣人のコレット（デブラ・カラ・アンガー）を救い出すことに関わる。
back_translation: During his journey, he befriends the lazy Jimmy the Fin (Peter Sarsgaard) and gets involved in saving his neighbor Colette (Debra Kara Unger) from his demons.

text: mostly honest , this somber picture reveals itself slowly , intelligently , artfully .
translation: 主に正直で、この厳粛な絵はゆっくりと、知的に、芸術的に明らかになっていきます。
back_translation: Mainly honest, this solemn painting gradually reveals itself in an intellectual and artistic manner.

text: japan 's premier stylist of sex and blood hits audiences with what may be his most demented film to date .
translation: 日本のセックスと血の一流スタイリストが、これまでで最も狂気じみた作品かもしれない映画で観客を打ち震わせます。
back_translation: A top stylist from Japan, specializing in sex and blood, may shake audiences with what could be the most insane work yet.

text: payne has created a beautiful canvas , and nicholson proves once again that he 's the best brush in the business .
translation: ペインは美しいキャンバスを作成し、ニコルソンは再び彼が業界で最高のブラシであることを証明しました。
back_translation: Pain created a beautiful canvas, and Nicholson proved once again that he is the best brush in the industry.

text: suffering from his flashbacks , vince does n't realize that ellen has also disappeared from the cemetery , right before his eyes .
translation: フラッシュバックに苦しむヴィンスは、目の前でエレンが墓地から消えたことに気づいていない。
back_translation: Vince, suffering from flashbacks, does not realize that Ellen has disappeared from the cemetery right in front of him.

text: the farmer whom the barn belongs to is distraught and ca n't cope from the intruder 's power of articulations .
translation: その納屋の所有者である農夫は動揺しており、侵入者の表現力に対処できない。
back_translation: The farmer, who owns the barn, is upset and unable to cope with the intruder's expressiveness.

text: an unorthodox little film noir organized crime story that includes one of the strangest love stories you will ever see .
translation: 型破りな小さなフィルムノワールの組織犯罪物語で、あなたが見たことのない最も奇妙なラブストーリーの一つが含まれています。
back_translation: It features an unconventional small film noir story of organized crime, including one of the strangest love stories you have ever seen.

text: carmen and juni cortez team up with two other spy kids , gary and gerti giggles , and together they must save the world from the hands of an evil scientist named romero ( buscemi ) .
translation: カーメンとジュニ・コルテスは、他の2人のスパイキッズ、ゲイリーとガーティ・ギグルズとチームを組み、悪の科学者ロメロ（ブスケミ）の手から世界を救わなければなりません。
back_translation: Carmen and Juni Cortez must team up with two other Spy Kids, Gary and Gerti Giggles, to save the world from the evil scientist Romero (Buscemi).

text: freddy krueger ( robert englund ) is desparate to kill , but he ca n't since the parents of elm street have been doping their kids up with dream suppressants .
translation: フレディ・クルーガー（ロバート・イングランド）は殺すことに必死ですが、エルム街の親たちが子供たちを夢抑制薬で麻痺させているため、彼はそれができません。
back_translation: Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund) is desperate to kill, but he can't because the parents of Elm Street are paralyzing their children with dream suppression drugs.

text: after ten years of being ignored by record producers , jacki and the band find hope in one producer who promises to see them play and consider them for a contract .
translation: 10年間レコードプロデューサーに無視され続けたジャッキーとバンドは、彼らの演奏を観に来て契約を検討すると約束するあるプロデューサーに希望を見出します。
back_translation: Jackie and the band, who had been ignored by record producers for ten years, find hope in a producer who promises to come watch their performance and consider signing them.

text: scotland , pa . is a strangely drab romp . some studio pizazz might have helped .
translation: スコットランド、PAは奇妙に地味な冒険です。スタジオの華やかさがあれば助けになったかもしれません。
back_translation: Scotland, PA is a strangely mundane adventure. Perhaps having the glamour of a studio would have helped.

text: sharing a cabin together , each finds out a little bit about themselves over the course of 10 days .
translation: 一緒にキャビンを共有することで、10日間の過程でそれぞれが自分自身について少しずつ発見していく。
back_translation: By sharing a cabin together, each person discovers a little bit about themselves over the course of ten days.

text: more entertaining than much of the big-studio schlock out there .
translation: 大手スタジオのつまらない作品よりもずっと面白い。
back_translation: It's much more interesting than the boring works of major studios.

text: she has two men in her life : wealthy divorcee ray porter ( steve martin ) and struggling musician jeremy .
translation: 彼女には二人の男性がいます：裕福な離婚者レイ・ポーター（スティーブ・マーティン）と苦労している音楽家ジェレミーです。
back_translation: She has two men in her life: the wealthy divorcee Ray Porter (Steve Martin) and the struggling musician Jeremy.

text: what does n't this film have that an impressionable kid could n't stand to hear ?
translation: この映画には、感受性の強い子供が聞きたくないことが何が含まれていないのですか？
back_translation: What is not included in this movie that sensitive children do not want to hear?

text: bound and determined to end their contentious relationship once and for all , melanie sneaks back home to alabama to confront her past , only to discover that you can take the girl out of the south , but you can never take the south out of the girl .
translation: 彼女の対立する関係を完全に終わらせる決意を固めたメラニーは、過去に向き合うためにアラバマにこっそり帰るが、南部から女の子を引き離すことはできても、女の子から南部を引き離すことはできないことを発見する。
back_translation: Determined to completely end her conflicting relationship, Melanie secretly returns to Alabama to confront her past, only to discover that while she can separate the girl from the South, she cannot separate the South from the girl.

text: this is n't exactly profound cinema , but it 's good-natured and sometimes quite funny .
translation: これは特に深い映画ではありませんが、良い雰囲気で時にはとても面白いです。
back_translation: This is not a particularly deep movie, but it has a good atmosphere and is very entertaining at times.

text: my big fat greek wedding is that rare animal known as 'a perfect family film , ' because it 's about family .
translation: 私のビッグファット・ギリシャ婚は、家族についての映画であるため、「完璧なファミリーフィルム」と呼ばれる珍しい存在です。
back_translation: My Big Fat Greek Wedding is a rare film that is called the "perfect family film" because it is about family.

text: soderbergh skims the fat from the 1972 film . what 's left is a rich stew of longing .
translation: ソダーバーグは1972年の映画から余計な部分を取り除きます。残ったのは、切望の豊かなシチューです。
back_translation: Soderbergh removes the unnecessary parts from the 1972 movie. What remains is a rich stew of longing.

text: all prints of this film should be sent to and buried on pluto .
translation: この映画のすべてのプリントは冥王星に送られ、埋められるべきだ。
back_translation: All prints of this movie should be sent to Pluto and buried.

text: nearly surreal , dabbling in french , this is no simple movie , and you 'll be taking a risk if you choose to see it . i enjoyed the ride ( bumps and all ) , creamy depth , and ultimate theme .
translation: ほぼ超現実的で、フランス語に手を出している、これは単純な映画ではなく、見ることを選べばリスクを伴います。私はその旅を楽しみました（アップダウンも含めて）、クリーミーな深みと究極のテーマがありました。
back_translation: It is almost surreal, delving into the French language; this is not a simple movie, and choosing to watch it comes with risks. I enjoyed that journey (ups and downs included), as it had creamy depths and ultimate themes.

text: a psychologically rich and suspenseful moral thriller with a stellar performance by al pacino .
translation: 心理的に豊かで、サスペンスに満ちた道徳的スリラーで、アル・パチーノの素晴らしい演技が光る。
back_translation: A psychologically rich and suspense-filled moral thriller that showcases Al Pacino's brilliant performance.

text: his big brother george has also made a new friend , will , so stuart is feeing lonely .
translation: 彼の大きな兄ジョージは新しい友達ウィルを作ったので、スチュアートは寂しい気持ちを抱えています。
back_translation: Stuart feels lonely because his older brother George has made a new friend named Will.

text: a selection of scenes in search of a movie .
translation: 映画を探しているシーンのセレクション。
back_translation: A selection of scenes from movies that are looking for.

text: lan yu is at times too restrained , yet there are moments it captures the erotics of intimacy in a way that makes most american love stories look downright unfree .
translation: 蘭雨は時にはあまりにも抑制が効いているが、一方で親密さのエロティシズムを捉える瞬間があり、それはほとんどのアメリカのラブストーリーを非常に自由でないものに見せる。
back_translation: Lan Yu sometimes exhibits an excessive restraint, but on the other hand, it captures moments of intimacy and eroticism, which makes most American love stories seem very uninhibited.

text: but peter is reclusive and awkward when he does n't have his camera in between himself and his subjects .
translation: しかし、ピーターはカメラが自分と被写体の間にないと、引っ込み思案で不器用になります。
back_translation: However, Peter becomes shy and awkward when the camera is not between him and the subject.

text: calvin and his friends , who all live an in orphanage , find old shoes with the faded letters mj connected to a powerline .
translation: カルビンと彼の友達は、孤児院に住んでいるが、電線に接続された旧い靴を見つけ、そこには色あせた文字「mj」が書かれている。
back_translation: Calvin and his friends live in an orphanage, but they find an old shoe connected to a power line, and it has the faded letters "mj" written on it.

text: raja also manages to go to malaysia with them .
translation: ラジャは彼らと一緒にマレーシアに行くことにも成功します。
back_translation: Raja successfully goes to Malaysia with them.

text: the misery of these people becomes just another voyeuristic spectacle , to be consumed and forgotten .
translation: これらの人々の苦悩は、消費され忘れられるただの好奇心の満足として、ただの他人の視線の対象となってしまう。
back_translation: The suffering of these people becomes merely a satisfaction of curiosity that is consumed and forgotten, turning them into just an object of other people's gaze.

text: gigli , a lowly and inept hitman , is assigned a job by the mob to kidnap a mentally retarded brother of a california district attorney .
translation: ギグリは、無能で低身分なヒットマンで、マフィアからカリフォルニア州の地方検事の知的障害のある兄を誘拐する仕事を任される。
back_translation: Giggly is an incompetent and low-status hitman who is tasked by the mafia with kidnapping the intellectually disabled brother of a district attorney in California.

text: an intricate tale of guilt , grief and dark serendipity . . . so deft it 's hard not to gasp with delight as the plot 's pieces slide into place and its machinery begins humming .
translation: 罪悪感、悲しみ、そして暗い幸運の入り組んだ物語…。プロットのパーツが整い、その機構がうなり始める様子には、思わず驚嘆せずにはいられないほど見事です。
back_translation: A complex story of guilt, sadness, and dark fortune... The way the pieces of the plot come together and the mechanism starts to hum is so impressive that one can't help but be in awe.

text: rather than the large chunk of change that many people would expect , ted instead receives his mother 's pack of rowdy sled dogs and her property .
translation: 多くの人が期待する大金の代わりに、テッドは母親の騒がしいそり犬たちのパックと彼女の財産を受け取る。
back_translation: Instead of the large sum of money that many people expect, Ted receives his mother's noisy pack of sled dogs and her estate.

text: it may be a prize winner , but teacher is a bomb .
translation: それは賞を受賞しているかもしれませんが、先生は素晴らしいです。
back_translation: It may have won an award, but the teacher is wonderful.

text: depending on what you read witnesses say his penis was from 12 to 14 inches long .
translation: 読んだものによれば、証人たちは彼のペニスは12インチから14インチの長さだと言っています。
back_translation: According to what I've read, the witnesses say that his penis is between 12 and 14 inches long.

text: first and foremost . . . the reason to go see `` blue crush `` is the phenomenal , water-born cinematography by david hennings .
translation: 第一に、映画「ブルークラッシュ」を観る理由は、デビッド・ヘニングスによる素晴らしい水中撮影技術です。
back_translation: First of all, the reason to watch the movie "Blue Crush" is the amazing underwater filming techniques by David Henning.

text: the project 's filmmakers forgot to include anything even halfway scary as they poorly rejigger fatal attraction into a high school setting .
translation: プロジェクトの映画製作者たちは、致命的な魅力を高校の設定にうまくアレンジすることに失敗し、半分でも怖いものを何も含めるのを忘れました。
back_translation: The filmmakers of the project failed to successfully arrange the deadly charm in a high school setting and forgot to include anything that is even half scary.

text: a dark comedy that goes for sick and demented humor simply to do so . the movie is without intent .
translation: 病んだユーモアや歪んだ風刺を追求するダークコメディ。意図のない映画。
back_translation: A dark comedy that pursues sick humor and twisted satire. A film without intention.

text: the spark of special anime magic here is unmistakable and hard to resist .
translation: ここには特別なアニメ魔法のスパークがあり、それは明白で抵抗しがたいものです。
back_translation: There is a special spark of anime magic here, and it is evident and irresistible.

text: but cousin roberto is n't the tough guy they 'd expected .
translation: しかし、いとこのロベルトは彼らが期待していたような tough guy ではありません。
back_translation: However, cousin Roberto is not the tough guy they expected.

text: it 's still a comic book , but maguire makes it a comic book with soul .
translation: それはまだコミックブックですが、マグワイアはそれを魂のあるコミックブックにしています。
back_translation: It's still a comic book, but Maguire makes it a soulful comic book.

text: a rollicking ride , with jaw-dropping action sequences , striking villains , a gorgeous color palette , astounding technology , stirring music and a boffo last hour that leads up to a strangely sinister happy ending .
translation: 賑やかな乗り物で、目を見張るアクションシーン、印象的な悪役、美しい色彩、驚くべき技術、感動を呼ぶ音楽、そして不気味なハッピーエンドに繋がる素晴らしいラスト1時間があります。
back_translation: There is a lively vehicle, eye-catching action scenes, an impressive villain, beautiful colors, astonishing technology, moving music, and a wonderful final hour that leads to a eerie happy ending.

text: harry potter and the chamber of secrets is deja vu all over again , and while that is a cliche , nothing could be more appropriate . it 's likely that whatever you thought of the first production -- pro or con -- you 'll likely think of this one .
translation: ハリー・ポッターと秘密の部屋は再び既視感を覚えるものであり、それがクリシェであることは否定できませんが、適切さはこれ以上のものはありません。最初の作品についてのあなたの考え（賛否にかかわらず）が、この作品にも当てはまる可能性が高いです。
back_translation: "Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets" evokes déjà vu once again, and while it's undeniable that it's a cliché, the appropriateness is unmatched. Your thoughts on the first work (regardless of whether they are positive or negative) likely apply here as well.

text: [ jaglom ] creates an engaging insider 's world of enthusiastically entertaining characters and absorbing situations .
translation: [ジャグロム]は、熱心に楽しませるキャラクターと魅力的な状況の内部世界を魅力的に創造します。
back_translation: [Jaglom] creatively constructs an engaging internal world filled with enthusiastic characters and captivating situations.

text: has enough wit , energy and geniality to please not only the fanatical adherents on either side , but also people who know nothing about the subject and think they 're not interested .
translation: 十分な機知、エネルギー、そして親しみやすさを持っているので、熱心な支持者だけでなく、テーマについて何も知らず興味がないと思っている人々さえも喜ばせることができます。
back_translation: With sufficient wit, energy, and approachability, you can please not only enthusiastic supporters but also those who know nothing about the topic and believe they have no interest in it.

text: a sentimental hybrid that could benefit from the spice of specificity .
translation: 特有のスパイスによって利益を得ることができる感傷的なハイブリッド。
back_translation: A sentimental hybrid that can profit from unique spices.

text: the teamster 's union goes on strike against overnite transportation , a nationwide freight company that has resisted unionization .
translation: チームスター組合が、組合化に抵抗している全国規模の貨物会社オーバーナイトトランスポーテーションに対してストライキを行います。
back_translation: The Teamsters union will go on strike against the nationwide freight company Overnight Transportation, which is resisting unionization.

text: before he can do anything about it , though , jed is seduced by jackson 's lesbian artist friend .
translation: 彼がそれについて何かをする前に、ジェドはジャクソンのレズビアンアーティストの友人に誘惑される。
back_translation: Before he could do anything about it, Jed is seduced by Jackson's lesbian artist friend.

text: one of the year 's most weirdly engaging and unpredictable character pieces .
translation: 今年の最も奇妙に魅力的で予測不可能なキャラクター作品の一つ。
back_translation: One of the most strangely captivating and unpredictable character works of this year.

text: in steps reese , a sweet , charming co-worker smitten with kali .
translation: ステップにおいて、カリに夢中になっている甘くて魅力的な同僚リース。
back_translation: In the step, sweet and charming colleague Reese is captivated by curry.

text: when an ira cell forces him to hear last confession from a suspected informer , will he let them execute the terrorist ?
translation: IRAの細胞が彼に疑わしい情報提供者から最後の告解を聞かせるとき、彼はテロリストの処刑を許可するのでしょうか？
back_translation: When the IRA cell listens to his last confession from a dubious informant, will he allow the execution of the terrorist?

text: the film is reasonably entertaining , though it begins to drag two-thirds through , when the melodramatic aspects start to overtake the comedy .
translation: 映画はそこそこ楽しめるが、三分の二を過ぎると引き延ばし感が出てきて、メロドラマ的な要素がコメディを圧倒し始める。
back_translation: The movie is somewhat enjoyable, but after two-thirds of it, a feeling of being stretched out emerges, and the melodramatic elements begin to overwhelm the comedy.

text: remove spider-man the movie from its red herring surroundings and it 's apparent that this is one summer film that satisfies .
translation: スパイダーマンという映画をその赤いヘリングの周囲から取り除くと、これは満足できる夏の映画であることが明らかです。
back_translation: If you remove the movie Spider-Man from around that red herring, it becomes clear that this is a satisfying summer film.

text: the actors are forced to grapple with hazy motivations that never come into focus .
translation: 俳優たちは、決して明確にならない曖昧な動機に苦しむことを強いられています。
back_translation: Actors are forced to suffer from ambiguous motives that never become clear.

text: in addition , various genres of musicians have joined in today showing worldwide support , thus contributing to bruce 's objective , 'sure it 's nice to be famous , but i 'm more interested in obtaining a telepathic following ' .
translation: さらに、さまざまなジャンルのミュージシャンが今日、世界的なサポートを示し、ブルースの目的に貢献しています。「もちろん有名であることは素晴らしいですが、私はテレパシー的なフォロワーを得ることにもっと興味があります」と言っています。
back_translation: Furthermore, musicians from various genres are showing global support today and contributing to the purpose of blues. "Of course, being famous is great, but I'm more interested in gaining telepathic followers," he says.

text: exactly what you 'd expect from a guy named kaos .
translation: カオスという名前の guy から期待できる通りのことです。
back_translation: It's just what you would expect from a guy named Chaos.

text: a fantastically vital movie that manages to invest real humor , sensuality , and sympathy into a story about two adolescent boys .
translation: 二人の少年についての物語に、本物のユーモア、官能性、そして共感を見事に投資した素晴らしく重要な映画。
back_translation: A wonderfully significant film that brilliantly invests real humor, sensuality, and empathy in the story of two boys.

text: gary oldman plays as a dwarf brother to a normal-sized matthew mcconaughey .
translation: ゲイリー・オールドマンは、普通のサイズのマシュー・マコノヒーの兄弟を小人として演じています。
back_translation: Gary Oldman plays the role of Matthew McConaughey's brother as a dwarf.

text: but even more important than that , it is an emotional story of a character who learns to value relationships , life balance and spiritual purpose , over self-involvement and financial gain .
translation: しかし、それよりもさらに重要なのは、自己中心的な利益や経済的な利益よりも、人間関係、生活のバランス、そして精神的な目的を重んじるように学ぶキャラクターの感情的な物語です。
back_translation: However, even more important is the emotional story of a character who learns to value relationships, life balance, and spiritual purpose over self-centered interests and financial gain.

text: anna is followed everywhere she goes by a creepy pale assailant with a knife .
translation: アンナは行く先々で、ナイフを持った不気味な青白い攻撃者に追いかけられています。
back_translation: Anna is being chased by a creepy, pale attacker with a knife wherever she goes.

text: the sequel plays out like a flimsy excuse to give blade fans another look at wesley snipes ' iconic hero doing battle with dozens of bad guys -- at once .
translation: 続編は、ブレイドのファンにウェズリー・スナイプスの象徴的なヒーローが一度に多数の悪党と戦う姿を再び見せるための薄っぺらい口実のように展開する。
back_translation: The sequel unfolds like a thin excuse to once again show Blade fans Wesley Snipes' iconic hero battling multiple villains at once.

text: if you 're over 25 , have an iq over 90 , and have a driver 's license , you should be able to find better entertainment .
translation: もしあなたが25歳以上で、IQが90以上で、運転免許を持っているなら、もっと良い娯楽を見つけられるはずです。
back_translation: If you are over 25 years old, have an IQ of 90 or higher, and possess a driver's license, you should be able to find better entertainment.

text: diana , who secretly returns jose 's affection , comes to his rescue , but is taken hostage .
translation: ダイアナは密かにホセの愛情に応え、彼を救うために現れるが、囚われの身になってしまう。
back_translation: Diana secretly responds to Jose's affection and appears to save him, but ends up becoming a captive herself.

text: this 90-minute dud could pass for mike tyson 's e ! true hollywood story .
translation: この90分の駄作は、マイク・タイソンの「E！ トゥルー・ハリウッド・ストーリー」として通用するかもしれません。
back_translation: This 90-minute disaster might work as Mike Tyson's "E! True Hollywood Story."

text: in the middle of loneliness , and after realizing that filmmaking is more than just filming , he decides to start over again .
translation: 孤独の中で、映画製作が単なる撮影以上のものであることに気づいた彼は、また最初からやり直すことを決意する。
back_translation: In the midst of solitude, he realized that filmmaking is more than just shooting, and he decided to start all over again.

text: any chekhov is better than no chekhov , but it would be a shame if this was your introduction to one of the greatest plays of the last 100 years .
translation: チェーホフの作品はないよりはましですが、これが過去100年間の偉大な戯曲の一つへのあなたの初めての出会いであったら、残念なことです。
back_translation: Chekhov's works are better than nothing, but if this was your first encounter with one of the great plays of the past 100 years, that is unfortunate.

text: national lampoon 's van wilder could be the worst thing to come out of national lampoon since class reunion
translation: ナショナル・ランプーンの『バン・ワイルダー』は、クラスリユニオン以来、ナショナル・ランプーンから出てきた最悪の作品かもしれません。
back_translation: National Lampoon's "Van Wilder" may be the worst work to come from National Lampoon since the class reunion.

text: this is the kind of movie where the big scene is a man shot out of a cannon into a vat of ice cream .
translation: これは、大きなシーンが男性が大砲でアイスクリームの vat に撃ち出される映画の種類です。
back_translation: This is the kind of movie where a man is shot out of a cannon into a vat of ice cream.

text: just entertaining enough not to hate , too mediocre to love .
translation: 嫌うには十分に楽しませてくれるが、愛するには平凡すぎる。
back_translation: It is enjoyable enough to dislike, but it is too ordinary to love.

text: this film is not a love letter for the slain rappers , it 's a taunt -a call for justice for two crimes from which many of us have not yet recovered .
translation: この映画は殺されたラッパーたちへのラブレターではなく、挑発のメッセージであり、私たちの多くがまだ回復していない二つの犯罪に対する正義の呼びかけです。
back_translation: This movie is not a love letter to the murdered rappers, but a provocative message and a call for justice regarding two crimes that many of us have yet to recover from.

text: this results in more deaths , until the ultimate realization that your thoughts and actions are more important than the color of your skin .
translation: これにより、最終的にあなたの思考や行動が肌の色よりも重要であるという実 realization に至るまで、さらなる死が生じます。
back_translation: As a result, further deaths will occur until you ultimately reach the realization that your thoughts and actions are more important than the color of your skin.

text: nicole goes through the ordeal of communist prisons , conflicts and risky activities , and manages to provide a heartening example for the other inmates .
translation: ニコールは共産主義の監獄での苦難、紛争、危険な活動を経て、他の受刑者たちにとって励みとなる手本を示すことに成功します。
back_translation: Nicole succeeds in setting an example that inspires other inmates, having gone through the suffering, conflicts, and dangerous activities in a communist prison.

text: a stupid , derivative horror film that substitutes extreme gore for suspense .
translation: 極端な残酷さをサスペンスの代わりに使用した、愚かで派生的なホラー映画。
back_translation: A foolish and derivative horror movie that uses extreme cruelty in place of suspense.

text: but he 's found a way to allow him to escape .
translation: しかし彼は自分が逃れる方法を見つけた。
back_translation: However, he found a way to escape.

text: there , a competition to create 'something ' made of at least 50 % duct tape , will garner the third prize winner exactly $ 10 , 000 .
translation: そこでは、少なくとも50％のダクトテープで作られた「何か」を作る競技があり、第三位の受賞者にはちょうど10,000ドルが贈られます。
back_translation: There is a competition there to create "something" made of at least 50% duct tape, and the third place winner receives exactly $10,000.

text: when a vindictive inspector from the board of education invades their paradise , promising to shut them down , the members of this eccentric and highly dysfunctional family somehow find a way to pull together and win the day .
translation: 教育委員会の復讐心に満ちた監査官が彼らの楽園に侵入し、閉鎖することを約束すると、この風変わりで非常に機能不全の家族のメンバーは、何とか協力して成功を収める方法を見つける。
back_translation: As a vengeful auditor from the education board invades their paradise and promises to shut it down, the members of this quirky and highly dysfunctional family find a way to somehow cooperate and achieve success.

text: his songs were once well thought of , but the music business clearly has changed .
translation: 彼の曲はかつて高く評価されていましたが、音楽ビジネスは明らかに変わりました。
back_translation: His music was once highly regarded, but the music business has clearly changed.

text: the plot plummets into a comedy graveyard before janice comes racing to the rescue in the final reel .
translation: プロットはコメディの墓場に落ち込んでしまい、最終幕でジャニスが救出に駆けつける。
back_translation: The plot falls into the graveyard of comedy, and in the final act, Janice rushes in to save the day.

text: the lover literally searches the ends of the earth , the possessed child follows in the hopes that the lover will lead him to his quarry .
translation: 愛する者は文字通り地の果てを探し、取り憑かれた子供は愛する者が獲物へと導いてくれることを期待してついていく。
back_translation: The one who loves literally searches the ends of the earth, while the possessed child follows, hoping that the one they love will lead them to their prey.

text: one monday a pretty girl gets on the bus and sits in front of him .
translation: ある月曜日、美しい女の子がバスに乗り込み、彼の前に座ります。
back_translation: One Monday, a beautiful girl gets on the bus and sits in front of him.

text: boasts enough funny dialogue and sharp characterizations to be mildly amusing .
translation: 十分に面白い対話と鋭いキャラクター描写を誇っており、軽く楽しませてくれます。
back_translation: It boasts sufficiently interesting dialogue and sharp character portrayals, providing light entertainment.

text: the type of dumbed-down exercise in stereotypes that gives the [ teen comedy ] genre a bad name .
translation: ステレオタイプを簡略化した運動の種類で、[ティーンコメディ]ジャンルに悪名を与える。
back_translation: A type of simplified movement that gives a bad reputation to the [teen comedy] genre.

text: finch must stop their wedding , but stifler refuses to tell him the date and locaction of the wedding .
translation: フィンチは結婚式を止めなければならないが、スティフラーは結婚式の日付と場所を教えることを拒否している。
back_translation: Finch must stop the wedding, but Stifler refuses to tell him the date and location of the wedding.

text: it 's up to [ watts ] to lend credibility to this strange scenario , and her presence succeeds in making us believe .
translation: この奇妙なシナリオに信憑性を持たせるのは[ワット]次第で、彼女の存在は私たちを信じさせることに成功しています。
back_translation: The credibility of this strange scenario depends on [Wat], and her presence has succeeded in making us believe.

text: there is only one drawback , the sorceress and the priestess are sisters .
translation: 唯一の欠点は、魔女と巫女が姉妹であることです。
back_translation: The only flaw is that the witch and the priestess are sisters.

text: if it seems like a minor miracle that its septuagenarian star is young enough to be the nonagenarian filmmaker 's son , more incredible still are the clear-eyed boldness and quiet irony with which actor and director take on life 's urgent questions .
translation: もし、70代のスターが90代の映画製作者の息子として若いことがささやかな奇跡のように思えるなら、俳優と監督が人生の切迫した問題に取り組む際の明晰な大胆さと静かな皮肉はさらに驚くべきものである。
back_translation: If it seems like a small miracle that a star in their 70s is the son of a filmmaker in their 90s, then the actor's and director's clear boldness and quiet irony in addressing the pressing issues of life are even more remarkable.

text: thinking the young man is dead , a curious fisherman with a scalpel finds two bullets in his back and a miniature laser device in his hip .
translation: 若者が死んだと思った好奇心旺盛な釣り人は、スカルペルを使って彼の背中に二発の弾丸と腰にミニチュアレーザー装置を見つける。
back_translation: The curious fisherman, who thought the young man was dead, found two bullets in his back and a miniature laser device at his waist using a scalpel.

text: the story starts with a bit more in depth on the court house scene which ended the last film .
translation: 物語は、前作の終わりを迎えた裁判所のシーンをさらに詳しく描くところから始まります。
back_translation: The story begins by depicting the court scene at the end of the previous installment in more detail.

text: a lyrical , bittersweet film about what could be termed a by-product of battle .
translation: 戦闘の副産物と呼ぶことができる、叙情的でほろ苦い映画。
back_translation: A lyrical and bittersweet film that can be called a byproduct of combat.

text: while `` real women have curves `` suffers from an obvious and simplistic screenplay , it 's a bright looking , well-acted charmer .
translation: 「リアルウーマンはカーブを持っている」は明白で単純な脚本に悩まされていますが、見た目が明るく、演技も良い魅力的な作品です。
back_translation: "Real Women Have Curves" suffers from an obvious and simple script, but it is an appealing work with a bright appearance and good performances.

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: 細心の注意を払って制作され、イライラするほどに行儀の良い映画で、カーロの生涯の重要な出来事を税理士のような義務的な精度で次々と示している。
back_translation: A film made with the utmost care, frustratingly well-behaved, presenting the significant events of Carlo's life one after another with a precision resembling that of a tax accountant.

text: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of his story and knows how to take time revealing them . strange occurrences build in the mind of the viewer and take on extreme urgency .
translation: 物語の中心に埋められた秘密を持ち、それを明らかにする時間の使い方を知っている映画製作者の作品。奇妙な出来事が視聴者の心に蓄積し、極端な切迫感を持つようになる。
back_translation: A filmmaker's work that carries a secret embedded at the heart of the story and knows how to reveal it over time. Strange events accumulate in the viewer's mind, creating an extreme sense of urgency.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: その豪華な形式主義と知的厳格さにもかかわらず、この映画は形を変える危険、政治的陰謀、災難との遭遇によって、あなたをハラハラさせることに成功しています。
back_translation: Despite its lavish formalism and intellectual rigor, this film succeeds in keeping you on edge with the dangers of transformation, political conspiracies, and encounters with disaster.

text: years later murdock has grown into a man and becomes a respected criminal attorney .
translation: 数年後、マードックは成長し、尊敬される犯罪弁護士になった。
back_translation: Several years later, Murdoch grew up to become a respected criminal lawyer.

text: icon-bashing has never been as amusing as it is in michael rubbo 's documentary much ado about something .
translation: アイコンを壊すことは、マイケル・ラボのドキュメンタリー「何かについての大騒ぎ」でこれほど面白かったことはありません。
back_translation: Destroying icons has never been this interesting than in Michael Labo's documentary "A Fuss About Something."

text: too bland and fustily tasteful to be truly prurient .
translation: あまりにも味気なく、古臭いセンスで、本当に好色とは言えない。
back_translation: It is so bland and old-fashioned that it can't really be called erotic.

text: only a supremely flexible talent like kinnear could whittle away at crane 's nuances and come up with thespian gold .
translation: キニアのように非常に柔軟な才能を持つ者だけが、クレーンのニュアンスを削ぎ落とし、演劇の金を生み出すことができる。
back_translation: Only those with a highly flexible talent like Kinya can strip away the nuances of the crane and create the gold of theater.

text: never quite transcends jokester status . . . and the punchline does n't live up to barry 's dead-eyed , perfectly chilled delivery .
translation: 決してジョークを言う人の地位を超えることはなく。。。そしてパンチラインはバリーの死んだ瞳で完璧に冷静な演技には見合わない。
back_translation: You will never surpass the status of someone who tells jokes... and the punchline does not fit Barry's perfectly calm performance with his dead eyes.

text: rocha 's years of exile in cuba ( 1971-72 ) , coincided with a period of great cultural ferment and debate about the roles of the arts in the social and political revolutions of latin america and the third world .
translation: ロチャのキューバでの亡命期間（1971年-72年）は、ラテンアメリカと第三世界の社会的・政治的革命における芸術の役割についての大きな文化的混乱と議論の時期と重なっていました。
back_translation: The period of Rocha's exile in Cuba (1971-72) coincided with a time of significant cultural upheaval and debate regarding the role of art in the social and political revolutions of Latin America and the Third World.

text: a dim-witted and lazy spin-off of the animal planet documentary series , crocodile hunter is entertainment opportunism at its most glaring .
translation: 動物プラネットのドキュメンタリーシリーズの間抜けで怠け者のスピンオフである「クロコダイルハンター」は、エンターテイメントの機会主義が最も顕著に現れています。
back_translation: "Crocodile Hunter," a spin-off of the Animal Planet documentary series, showcases the most blatant opportunism in entertainment.

text: unfortunately , stiles has bought off a crooked sheriff who intends to make the trip very difficult for red . . .
translation: 残念ながら、スタイルズは腐敗した保安官を買収しており、レッドにとってその旅を非常に困難にしようとしています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Styles has bribed a corrupt sheriff, making the journey very difficult for Red.

text: the sweetest thing is expressly for idiots who do n't care what kind of sewage they shovel into their mental gullets to simulate sustenance .
translation: 最も甘いものは、自分の精神の喉にどんな下水を掻き込んでもそれを栄養と見なす馬鹿者のために特別に作られたものです。
back_translation: The sweetest things are specially made for fools who consider anything they pour down the throat of their mind, no matter how foul, as nourishment.

text: this overproduced and generally disappointing effort is n't likely to rouse the rush hour crowd .
translation: この過剰生産された一般的に失望のいっぽうな作品は、ラッシュアワーの群衆を盛り上げることはないだろう。
back_translation: This overly produced and generally disappointing work is unlikely to excite the crowd during rush hour.

text: she 's helped along in that process by betsy wright ( pamela gordon ) , a misanthropic dog-walker in need of help with her business and struggling with her own dark past .
translation: 彼女は、そのプロセスを進めるために、ビジネスを手伝う必要があるミサントロープの犬の散歩係、ベッツィ・ライト（パメラ・ゴードン）に助けられ、彼女自身の暗い過去に苦しんでいます。
back_translation: She is struggling with her own dark past while being helped by Betsy Wright (Pamela Gordon), a misanthropic dog walker who needs to assist the business in moving forward.

text: a subtle , humorous , illuminating study of politics , power and social mobility .
translation: 政治、権力、社会的流動性に関する微妙でユーモラスで啓発的な研究。
back_translation: A subtle, humorous, and enlightening study on politics, power, and social mobility.

text: an alcoholic former schoolteacher hired as security finds himself a reluctant mentor to mouse , the impressionable boy ward of the pimp dewey .
translation: アルコール依存症の元学校教師が警備として雇われ、売春宿のデューイの印象ableな少年ワードであるマウスの不本意なメンターとなる。
back_translation: A former school teacher with alcohol dependence is hired as security and becomes the reluctant mentor to Mouse, a boy with a memorable impression from the brothel Dewey.

text: miyazaki has provided another triumph , and , in the midst of the quality fall-off of disney 's in-house animated projects , a reason for animation-lovers to rejoice .
translation: 宮崎はまた別の成功を収め、ディズニーの社内アニメーションプロジェクトの質が低下する中、アニメーション愛好家にとって喜ぶ理由を提供しました。
back_translation: Miyazaki achieved another success and provided a reason for animation enthusiasts to rejoice as the quality of Disney's in-house animation projects declined.

text: one night , tobias knifes his father in the back , and escape to switzerland .
translation: ある晩、トバイアスは父親の背中をナイフで刺し、スイスへ逃げる。
back_translation: One night, Tobias stabs his father in the back with a knife and flees to Switzerland.

text: he discovers that his friend has gone into business , and is successfully breeding black chickens .
translation: 彼は友人がビジネスを始めて、黒い鶏を成功裏に繁殖させていることを発見します。
back_translation: He discovers that his friend has started a business and is successfully breeding black chickens.

text: scherfig , who has had a successful career in tv , tackles more than she can handle .
translation: テレビで成功したキャリアを持つシャーフィグは、自分が扱える以上のことに取り組んでいます。
back_translation: Sharfig, who has a successful career on television, is taking on more than he can handle.

text: on the granger movie gauge of 1 to 10 , the powerpuff girls is a fast , frenetic , funny , even punny 6 -- aimed specifically at a grade-school audience .
translation: グレンジャー映画評価で1から10の中で、パワーパフガールズは速く、緊迫感があり、面白く、さらには言葉遊びもある6点です。具体的には小学生向けに作られています。
back_translation: In the Granger movie rating from 1 to 10, The Powerpuff Girls scores a 6 for being fast, tense, entertaining, and even having wordplay. Specifically, it is made for elementary school students.

text: there are touching moments in etoiles , but for the most part this is a dull , dour documentary on what ought to be a joyful or at least fascinating subject .
translation: エトワールには感動的な瞬間もありますが、全体としては喜ばしい、あるいは少なくとも魅力的なテーマであるはずのものに対して、退屈で陰気なドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: While there are touching moments in "Etoile," overall, it is a boring and gloomy documentary with a subject that should be joyful or at least captivating.

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .
translation: 最もひどい行為が行われた後でも残されるものは、まるでそれがあなたの血流にまで入り込んでしまったかのような圧倒的な悲しみです。
back_translation: What remains even after the worst acts have been committed is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has seeped into your very bloodstream.

text: the story is about a man , bruce hickman , and his relationship with another man , frank , the thing that they have in common is the relation with a deaf person .
translation: この物語は、ブルース・ヒックマンという男と、彼と親しい関係にあるもう一人の男フランクについてです。彼らの共通点は、聴覚障害者との関係です。
back_translation: This story is about a man named Bruce Hickman and another man, Frank, who has a close relationship with him. Their commonality is their connection with hearing impaired individuals.

text: allen 's underestimated charm delivers more goodies than lumps of coal .
translation: アレンの見落とされた魅力は、石炭の塊よりも多くの素晴らしいものを届ける。
back_translation: Allen's overlooked charm delivers more wonderful things than a lump of coal.

text: for oscar , diane is somewhat of a distraction , as his continued pursuit of eve leads to an unexpected resolution .
translation: オスカーにとって、ダイアンはやや気を散らす存在であり、彼のイブへの追求は予想外の結末を迎えます。
back_translation: For Oscar, Diane is somewhat of a distraction, and his pursuit of Eve reaches an unexpected conclusion.

text: this is a winning ensemble comedy that shows canadians can put gentle laughs and equally gentle sentiments on the button , just as easily as their counterparts anywhere else in the world .
translation: これはカナダ人が優しい笑いと同じく穏やかな感情を的確に表現できることを示す、勝利を収めたアンサンブルコメディです。
back_translation: This is a winning ensemble comedy that demonstrates how Canadians can accurately express gentle emotions, just like their warm laughter.

text: a week later , jash contacts the police , asking not for a ransom but for retired police inspector mo to be his police contact .
translation: 1週間後、ジャッシュは警察に連絡し、身代金ではなく、退職した警察捜査官モを彼の警察の連絡先にしてほしいとお願いした。
back_translation: A week later, Jash contacted the police and asked them to make a retired police investigator his contact instead of the ransom.

text: the production values are up there . the use of cgi and digital ink-and-paint make the thing look really slick . the voices are fine as well . the problem , it is with most of these things , is the script .
translation: 制作のクオリティは非常に高いです。CGIやデジタルインク＆ペイントの使用により、非常に洗練された外観になっています。声も良いです。しかし、ほとんどの作品に共通する問題は脚本です。
back_translation: The quality of the production is very high. The use of CGI and digital ink & paint gives it a very polished appearance. The voice acting is also good. However, a common problem in most works is the script.

text: this is a romantic comedy about a girl named christina who , one day , meets a guy in a bar .
translation: これは、クリスティーナという女の子がある日、バーで男の子に出会うロマンティック・コメディです。
back_translation: This is a romantic comedy about a girl named Christina who meets a boy at a bar one day.

text: a psychological thriller that does n't really hold up if you think about it too much , but is nonetheless highly entertaining in a low-budget , david lynch-ian way .
translation: 考えすぎるとあまり成立しない心理的スリラーですが、それでも低予算のデビッド・リンチ風に非常に楽しめる作品です。
back_translation: It's a psychological thriller that doesn't quite hold up if you think too much about it, but it's still a very enjoyable low-budget work in the style of David Lynch.

text: e . t . works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: E.T.は、その驚くべき原則によって機能しています。14歳のロバート・マクノートン、6歳のドリュー・バリモア、10歳のヘンリー・トーマスが、遠い惑星からの賢く、老成した訪問者の存在を私たちに納得させます。
back_translation: E.T. operates on its remarkable principles. 14-year-old Robert MacNaughton, 6-year-old Drew Barrymore, and 10-year-old Henry Thomas convince us of the presence of a wise, mature visitor from a distant planet.

text: `` 13 conversations `` holds its goodwill close , but is relatively slow to come to the point .
translation: 「13の会話」はその善意を大切に保ちながらも、比較的核心に迫るのが遅い。
back_translation: "Conversation 13" is relatively slow to get to the core while still valuing that good intention.

text: cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material , showing impressive control , both visually and in the writing .
translation: シダーはこのデリケートな素材に対して非常にオープンマインドなアプローチを取り、視覚的にも文体的にも印象的なコントロールを示しています。
back_translation: Cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this delicate material and demonstrates impressive control both visually and stylistically.

text: he dwells in a world of external night -- but the blackness is filled with sounds and scents , tastes and textures that most can not perceive .
translation: 彼は外部の夜の世界に住んでいるが、その暗闇はほとんどの人が感じ取れない音や香り、味や質感で満たされている。
back_translation: He lives in the external world of night, but that darkness is filled with sounds, scents, tastes, and textures that most people cannot perceive.

text: three stories of undying love from acclaimed japanese filmmaker takeshi kitano .
translation: 著名な日本の映画監督ビートたけしによる3つの不滅の愛の物語。
back_translation: Three immortal love stories by the famous Japanese film director Beat Takeshi.

text: an incredibly clever and superbly paced caper filled with scams within scams within scams .
translation: スキャンプの中にスキャンプがあり、さらにスキャンプが詰まった、非常に巧妙で見事に進行するカペル。
back_translation: Inside the scamp, there is a scamp, and further packed with scamps, a very clever and brilliantly unfolding capel.

text: reign of fire may well be the most grim dragon movie ever made -- and it 's all the more effective for the filmmakers ' decision to play it straight .
translation: 「レイン・オブ・ファイア」は、これまでに制作された中で最も陰鬱なドラゴン映画かもしれません。そして、監督たちが真剣に取り組んだ決定が、その効果をさらに高めています。
back_translation: "Reign of Fire" may be the most somber dragon movie ever made. Furthermore, the serious decisions made by the directors enhance its impact.

text: during the year 2000 geyrhalter and his teams travelled to a different destination each month , looking for places untouched by the millennium hysteria .
translation: 2000年、ゲイルハルターと彼のチームは毎月異なる目的地を訪れ、ミレニアムの興奮に触れられていない場所を探しました。
back_translation: In 2000, Gale Halter and his team traveled to different destinations every month, searching for places that had not experienced the excitement of the millennium.

text: fans of waiting for guffman , american movie and rushmore have found a new favorite in this hilarious mockumentary .
translation: 「ウェイティング・フォー・ガフマン」、「アメリカン・ムービー」と「ラッシュモア」のファンたちは、この面白いモキュメンタリーに新しいお気に入りを見つけました。
back_translation: Fans of "Waiting for Guffman," "American Movie," and "Rushmore" found a new favorite in this entertaining mockumentary.

text: it 's funny and human and really pretty damned wonderful , all at once .
translation: それは面白くて人間らしくて、本当に素晴らしい、すべてが一緒に。
back_translation: It's interesting, human-like, and truly wonderful, all together.

text: the two engage in a spirited and acerbic dialogue - meanwhile accomplishing nothing .
translation: 二人は活発で辛辣な対話を交わすが、その一方で何も達成していない。
back_translation: The two engage in a lively and sharp dialogue, but on the other hand, they achieve nothing.

text: but things are not always what they may look like .
translation: しかし、物事は見た目通りではないことが多い。
back_translation: However, things are often not as they appear.

text: dr . david gale , an advocate of eliminating the death penalty , is falsely accused of rape and murder .
translation: 死刑廃止を支持するデイビッド・ゲイル博士は、強姦と殺人の誤った告発を受ける。
back_translation: Dr. David Gale, who supports the abolition of the death penalty, is falsely accused of rape and murder.

text: thornton stars as a man who is free after serving 19 years for killing a teenager during an attempted robbery .
translation: ソーントンは、強盗未遂中にティーンエイジャーを殺害したために19年間服役した後に自由になった男を演じています。
back_translation: Thornton plays a man who was released after serving 19 years for killing a teenager during a robbery attempt.

text: his attention settles on alicia browning ( busy philipps ) , a darkly troubled outsider who , as the only person present throughout the entire incident , is both the key witness and a possible suspect .
translation: 彼の注意はアリシア・ブラウニング（ビジー・フィリップス）に向けられる。彼女は暗い悩みを抱えたアウトサイダーであり、事件全体を通して唯一その場にいた人物でもあり、重要な証人であり、可能性として容疑者でもある。
back_translation: His attention is directed towards Alicia Browning (Busy Phillips). She is an outsider who carries dark troubles, and she is the only person present throughout the entire incident, making her an important witness and potentially a suspect.

text: 2 . a cranny , hollow , or crevice , as in a rock .
translation: 岩の中の隙間、空洞、または裂け目。
back_translation: A gap, cavity, or crack in a rock.

text: johnny lever ( paaji ) is a millionaire sardarji who believes in distributing & # 38 ; spending lavishly his wealth on his friends .
translation: ジョニー・レバー（パージ）は、友人に自分の富を分配し、豪華に使うことを信じる百万長者のサルダールジです。
back_translation: Johnny Lever (Purge) is a millionaire Sardarji who believes in sharing his wealth with friends and spending lavishly.

text: engaging peter is the story of peter , a struggling documentary filmmaker who has resorted to shooting weddings for rent money .
translation: 「Engaging Peter」は、資金を得るために結婚式の撮影に頼らざるを得なくなった、苦境に立たされているドキュメンタリー映画監督ピーターの物語です。
back_translation: "Engaging Peter" is the story of Peter, a documentary filmmaker who finds himself in a difficult situation, having to rely on wedding photography to make ends meet.

text: if you keep a list of films you want to see one way or another , you would be doing yourself a service by keeping this film high up on that list .
translation: この映画をそのリストの上位に保つことで、自分自身に良いサービスをしていることになります。
back_translation: By keeping this movie at the top of that list, you are doing yourself a good service.

text: the battle results in an incident that sees one of the men re-evaluate his values in life .
