translation: 戦闘は、1人の男が人生の価値観を再評価する事件を引き起こします。
back_translation: The battle triggers an incident that makes a man reevaluate the value of his life.

text: this film is adapted from the play the fire and the rain by one of india 's foremost playwrights , girish karnad .
translation: この映画は、インドの著名な劇作家ギリッシュ・カーナードの戯曲「火と雨」に基づいています。
back_translation: This movie is based on the play "Fire and Rain" by the renowned Indian playwright Girish Karnad.

text: the film 's images give a backbone to the company and provide an emotional edge to its ultimate demise .
translation: その映画の映像は会社に骨格を与え、その最終的な demise に感情的なエッジを提供します。
back_translation: The visuals of that movie give the company structure and provide an emotional edge to its eventual demise.

text: it 's all entertaining enough , but do n't look for any hefty anti-establishment message in what is essentially a whip-crack of a buddy movie that ends with a whimper .
translation: すべては十分に楽しめるが、基本的には友達映画の鞭のような作品で、しんみりと終わるので、重い反体制メッセージを期待してはいけない。
back_translation: Everything is enjoyable enough, but it is fundamentally a film about friendship that ends on a somber note, so don't expect a heavy anti-establishment message.

text: though the characters are sometimes forced into madcap situations for the sake of adding yuks , the film works best when the protagonists are just being themselves
translation: キャラクターが笑いを生むために時折無茶な状況に追い込まれることもありますが、映画は主人公たちがただ自分らしく振る舞っているときが最も効果的です。
back_translation: There are times when the characters are put in absurd situations to generate laughter, but the movie is most effective when the protagonists are just being themselves.

text: however after roxie has undergone the 'casting couch ' treatment , and fred has had his wicked way with her , he reveals that he has no more connections in showbusiness than she does .
translation: しかし、ロクシーが「キャスティングカウチ」の扱いを受け、フレッドが彼女に悪事を働いた後、彼は自分が彼女と同じくらいショービジネスに人脈がないことを明らかにします。
back_translation: However, after Roxy is treated like a "casting couch" and Fred wrongs her, he reveals that he has just as little connections in show business as she does.

text: along the way , they get tips from various experts , which include performances from george kennedy , tippi hedren , erick avari , and stephen furst .
translation: 途中で、彼らはさまざまな専門家からのヒントを得ます。これには、ジョージ・ケネディ、ティッピ・ヘドレン、エリック・アヴァリ、スティーブン・ファーストのパフォーマンスが含まれます。
back_translation: Along the way, they receive hints from various experts. This includes performances by George Kennedy, Tippi Hedren, Eric Avari, and Stephen First.

text: it 's young guns meets goodfellas in this easily skippable hayseeds-vs . -greaseballs mob action-comedy .
translation: これは「ユース・ガンズ」と「グッドフェローズ」が出会う、簡単にスキップできるヘイシード対グリースボールのマフィアアクションコメディです。
back_translation: This is a mafia action comedy that can be easily skipped, where "Youth Gangs" meets "Goodfellas," featuring Hayseed versus Greaseball.

text: that a high-profile movie with big-name actors could inspire such philosophical reflection is impressive .
translation: 有名な俳優が出演する高評価の映画がそのような哲学的な反省を引き起こすことは素晴らしいことです。
back_translation: It's wonderful that a highly rated movie featuring a famous actor can provoke such philosophical reflection.

text: as he chases the elusive bounty hunter , jango ( and his cloned son boba ) leads obi wan to geonosis , where he meets count dooku and finds a startling revelation about the former jedi .
translation: 彼が捉えがたい賞金稼ぎを追いかける中、ジャンゴ（そして彼のクローンの息子ボバ）はオビ＝ワンをジェオノーシスに導き、そこで彼はドゥークー伯爵に出会い、元ジェダイについての驚くべき真実を発見する。
back_translation: While he chases elusive bounty hunters, Django (and his clone son Boba) leads Obi-Wan to Geonosis, where he encounters Count Dooku and uncovers astonishing truths about the former Jedi.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: 審査員が2002年のサンダンス映画祭でスターホフマンの兄弟ゴーディにウォルドー・ソルト脚本賞を授与したのは、実際に成功させることよりも、何か異なることを試みたことを称賛しているのだろう。
back_translation: The judges awarded the Waldo Salt Screenwriting Award to Gordy, brother of Hoffman, at the 2002 Sundance Film Festival, likely to praise the attempt at trying something different rather than actual success.

text: daily prison life is not drab but full of unexpected happenings like a story .
translation: 日常の刑務所生活は地味ではなく、物語のような予期しない出来事に満ちています。
back_translation: Everyday life in prison is not dull; it is filled with unexpected events like a story.

text: he tries to recapture the past , and make some sense of his life , that of his friends and family , and the present state of his native country .
translation: 彼は過去を取り戻そうとし、彼自身や友人、家族の人生、そして故郷の現状を理解しようとしています。
back_translation: He is trying to reclaim the past and understand the lives of himself, his friends, and family, as well as the current situation of his hometown.

text: rare is the 'urban comedy ' that even attempts the insight and honesty of this disarming indie .
translation: この魅力的なインディー作品の洞察と誠実さにさえ挑戦する「アーバンコメディ」は珍しい。
back_translation: It is rare for an "urban comedy" to challenge even the insights and sincerity of this captivating indie work.

text: rarely has a film 's title served such dire warning .
translation: 映画のタイトルがこんなにも深刻な警告を発したことはめったにない。
back_translation: It is rare for a movie title to issue such a serious warning.

text: dialogue-heavy and too cerebral for its own good -- or , at any rate , too cerebral for its racy subject matter .
translation: 対話が多く、それ自体にとらわれすぎているか、少なくともその刺激的なテーマに対しては頭脳的すぎる。
back_translation: The dialogue is abundant, but it is either too caught up in itself or, at the very least, too cerebral regarding its stimulating themes.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: デビッド・レターマンとザ・オニオンが証明しているように、最悪の悲劇はユーモアの肥沃な源になり得るが、ローレンスはそれを展開する方法をつかむことができていない。
back_translation: As David Letterman and The Onion have demonstrated, the worst tragedies can become a fertile source of humor, but Lawrence has not been able to grasp how to unfold that.

text: wins my vote for 'the 2002 enemy of cinema ' award .
translation: 2002年の映画の敵賞に私の票を獲得します。
back_translation: I will cast my vote for the enemy award in the 2002 movie.

text: the plan goes by smoothly , but troubles comes when ray actually falls in love with eva .
translation: 計画は順調に進むが、レイが実際にエヴァに恋をしてしまうとトラブルが起こる。
back_translation: The plan is progressing smoothly, but trouble arises when Rei actually falls in love with Eva.

text: starving artist gus bishop ca n't even give away his paintings .
translation: 飢えた芸術家ガス・ビショップは、自分の絵をさえも無償で配ることができない。
back_translation: The starving artist Gus Bishop cannot even give away his paintings for free.

text: arcangel gets a message from his brother telling that their father is very sick .
translation: アルカンヘルは兄から、父親が非常に病気だというメッセージを受け取る。
back_translation: Alcanhel receives a message from his brother that their father is very ill.

text: after collateral damage , you might imagine that most every aggrieved father clichM-i has been unturned . but no .
translation: collateral damage の後、ほとんどすべての傷ついた父親のクリシェは覆されていると想像するかもしれませんが、そうではありません。
back_translation: After collateral damage, you might imagine that almost all clichés about wounded fathers are overturned, but that is not the case.

text: a unique and irreverent look at new york 's cubicle filled sweatshops .
translation: ニューヨークのキュービクルに満ちた汗を流す作業場を独自の視点と軽蔑をもって描く。
back_translation: It depicts a workplace filled with cubicles in New York, portrayed with a unique perspective and disdain.

text: and lastly there 's dinka , a fellow barber who is madly in love with terri but does n't get the time of day .
translation: 最後に、ディンカがいます。彼は理髪師仲間で、テリに狂おしいほど恋をしていますが、まったく相手にされていません。
back_translation: Finally, there is Dinka. He is a fellow barber who is madly in love with Terry, but she doesn’t pay him any attention at all.

text: through it all , carlos comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: すべてを通して、カルロスはコミックアーティストとして成功するためには、自分の出身コミュニティと関わり、その経験を世界に持ち出し、自分の作品に反映させる必要があることを理解します。
back_translation: Throughout everything, Carlos understands that in order to succeed as a comic artist, he needs to engage with his community of origin, bring those experiences to the world, and reflect them in his work.

text: it 's difficult to imagine that a more confused , less interesting and more sloppily made film could possibly come down the road in 2002 .
translation: 2002年にこれよりも混乱していて、興味がなく、手抜きで作られた映画が現れるとは想像しにくい。
back_translation: It's hard to imagine that a movie more chaotic, uninteresting, and poorly made than this would appear in 2002.

text: the result reverberates on the screen with a deadly force and fury more intense than anything mr . scorsese has yet achieved on the meanest and most beloved streets he could imagine or recall .
translation: その結果は、スコセッシ監督が思い描くことができる最も厳しい愛される街並みの中で達成したどの作品よりも、 deadly な力と怒りでスクリーンに響き渡る。
back_translation: The result resonates on screen with a deadly power and fury more than any other work achieved in the loving yet harsh cityscape that director Scorsese can envision.

text: uses sharp humor and insight into human nature to examine class conflict , adolescent yearning , the roots of friendship and sexual identity .
translation: 鋭いユーモアと人間本性への洞察を用いて、階級対立、思春期の渇望、友情のルーツ、そして性的アイデンティティを考察します。
back_translation: It explores class conflict, the yearning of adolescence, the roots of friendship, and sexual identity using sharp humor and insights into human nature.

text: in doing so , he learns that the conventional answers of easy availability of guns , violent national history , violent entertainment and even poverty are inadequate to explain this violence when other cultures share those same factors without the equivalent carnage .
translation: そうすることで、彼は銃の容易な入手、暴力的な国家の歴史、暴力的なエンターテイメント、さらには貧困といった従来の回答が、この暴力を説明するには不十分であることを学びます。他の文化が同じ要因を共有しても、それに見合う大量殺戮がないからです。
back_translation: By doing so, he learns that traditional explanations such as easy access to guns, the history of violent states, violent entertainment, and even poverty are insufficient to explain this violence. Even if other cultures share the same factors, they do not experience the corresponding mass killings.

text: nine queens is exactly the sort of film hollywood is always re-making and utterly ruining in the process . see it in this incarnation .
translation: ナイン・クイーンズは、ハリウッドがいつもリメイクして完全に台無しにするタイプの映画です。この形で見ることをお勧めします。
back_translation: Nine Queens is the type of movie that Hollywood always remakes and completely ruins. I recommend watching it in this form.

text: by turns gripping , amusing , tender and heart-wrenching , laissez-passer has all the earmarks of french cinema at its best .
translation: 変化に富んだ魅力的で面白く、優しく、心を揺さぶる「レセぱせ」は、フランス映画の最高の特徴をすべて備えています。
back_translation: "Les sous-doués" is rich in variety, captivating, interesting, gentle, and emotionally stirring, embodying all the best characteristics of French cinema.

text: it 's a shame the marvelous first 101 minutes have to be combined with the misconceived final 5 .
translation: 素晴らしい最初の101分と誤解された最後の5分が組み合わさるのは残念です。
back_translation: It's a shame that the wonderful first 101 minutes are combined with the misunderstood last 5 minutes.

text: when a movie is as down-and-out funny as austin powers in goldmember , it 's easy to overlook the missed opportunities and fizzled jokes littering the barrage of hilarity .
translation: 「オースティン・パワーズ ゴールドメンバー」のように非常に面白い映画では、迫り来る笑いの嵐の中で見逃された機会や失敗したジョークを見落としがちです。
back_translation: In a very funny movie like "Austin Powers: Goldmember," it's easy to overlook missed opportunities and failed jokes amidst the impending storm of laughter.

text: with the help of his roommate , joe and his roommate 's girlfriend , bess , peter begins to explore more about himself and his values only to be crushed by those who love him .
translation: ルームメイトのジョーとジョーのガールフレンドのベスの助けを借りて、ピーターは自分自身と自分の価値観についてもっと探求し始めるが、彼を愛する人々によって打ちひしがれてしまう。
back_translation: With the help of his roommate Joe and Joe's girlfriend Beth, Peter begins to explore himself and his values more, but he is overwhelmed by the people who love him.

text: the story , touching though it is , does not quite have enough emotional resonance or variety of incident to sustain a feature , and even at 85 minutes it feels a bit long .
translation: 物語は感動的ではありますが、劇場用作品を支えるには感情的な響きや出来事のバラエティが少し不足しており、85分という長さでも少し長く感じます。
back_translation: The story is touching, but it lacks a bit of emotional resonance and variety of events to support a theatrical work, and it feels a bit long even at 85 minutes.

text: luckily , this would n't be sabina 's final contribution to psychoanalysis .
translation: 幸運なことに、これがサビーナの精神分析への最後の貢献ではない。
back_translation: Fortunately, this is not Sabina's last contribution to psychoanalysis.

text: when in their thirties , they lose their father and inherit his second-hand bookshop .
translation: 彼らは30代のときに父を失い、彼の中古書店を相続します。
back_translation: They lost their father in their thirties and inherited his used bookstore.

text: when rebecca went away to college john thought webcams would help them keep in touch .
translation: レベッカが大学に行ったとき、ジョンはウェブカメラが彼らが連絡を取り続けるのに役立つだろうと思った。
back_translation: When Rebecca went to college, John thought that the webcam would help them stay in touch.

text: they literally bump heads one night , and become best friends .
translation: 彼らはある晩に文字通り頭をぶつけ合い、親友になります。
back_translation: They literally bump heads one night and become close friends.

text: painted with broad strokes but with a palette of rich , colorful details .
translation: 広いタッチで描かれていますが、豊かでカラフルな詳細のパレットを持っています。
back_translation: It is drawn with broad strokes, but it has a rich and colorful palette of details.

text: while playing , young t & # 252 ; rlich falls unconscious onto a duck nest and is carried away forever by the small river .
translation: 遊んでいる間に、若いティー＆ # 252 ; リッヒが意識を失い、アヒルの巣の上に倒れ込み、小さな川に永遠に運ばれていく。
back_translation: While playing, the young Tiliq lost consciousness and collapsed on the duck's nest, being carried away forever by the small river.

text: in the meantime , she has had a little love affair with a young man from the village , found a girlfriend from her childhood days , swum in the sea , and found a way to live in peace with her melancholic memories .
translation: その間、彼女は村の若者との小さな恋愛をし、子供の頃の友達を見つけ、海で泳ぎ、悲しい思い出と平和に共存する方法を見つけました。
back_translation: During that time, she had a small romance with a young man from the village, found childhood friends, swam in the sea, and learned how to coexist peacefully with her sad memories.

text: however he 's cauught by the mexican secret police and is forced to infiltrate a gruop political activist in the movement of 68 .
translation: しかし、彼はメキシコの秘密警察に捕らえられ、68年の運動の政治活動家グループに潜入することを強いられます。
back_translation: However, he is captured by the Mexican secret police and is forced to infiltrate a group of political activists from the movement of '68.

text: mr . deeds is sure to give you a lot of laughs in this simple , sweet and romantic comedy .
translation: 「ミスター・ディーズ」は、このシンプルで可愛らしく、ロマンチックなコメディであなたをたくさん笑わせてくれること間違いありません。
back_translation: "Mr. Deeds" is sure to make you laugh a lot with its simplicity, cuteness, and romantic comedy.

text: truth to tell , if you 've seen more than half-a-dozen horror films , there 's nothing here you have n't seen before .
translation: 正直に言うと、もしあなたが6本以上のホラー映画を見たことがあるなら、ここにはあなたが以前に見たことがないものはありません。
back_translation: To be honest, if you have seen more than six horror movies, there is nothing here that you haven't seen before.

text: without the dark spookiness of crystal lake camp , the horror concept completely loses its creepy menace .
translation: クリスタルレイクキャンプの暗く不気味な雰囲気がなければ、ホラーのコンセプトは完全に不気味な脅威を失ってしまいます。
back_translation: Without the dark and eerie atmosphere of Crystal Lake Camp, the horror concept would completely lose its unsettling threat.

text: cruise 's character has the tables turned on him when he is accused of a future crime and must find out what brought it about and stop it before it can happen in the year 2054 , a so-called `` pre-crime division `` is working around washington , dc .
translation: クルーズのキャラクターは未来の犯罪を犯したと非難され、2054年に何がその原因をもたらしたのかを見つけ出し、それが起こる前に防がなければならなくなります。いわゆる「プレ犯罪部門」がワシントンDC周辺で活動しています。
back_translation: Cruise's character is accused of committing a future crime and must find out what led to it in 2054 and prevent it before it happens. The so-called "Pre-Crime Division" operates around Washington, D.C.

text: ricky is an ex-con with two strikes against him and is desperately trying to stay straight .
translation: リッキーは前科が二度あり、必死に真っ当な生活をしようとしている元受刑者です。
back_translation: Ricky is a former inmate with two criminal records who is desperately trying to live an honest life.

text: worthless , from its pseudo-rock-video opening to the idiocy of its last frames .
translation: 価値のない、擬似ロックビデオのオープニングから最後のフレームの愚かさまで。
back_translation: From the worthlessness of a pseudo music video to the foolishness of its opening to the final frame.

text: unfortunatly fate was not on his side because problems on location caused the film to go bankrupt within 12 days of shooting .
translation: 残念ながら運命は彼の味方ではなく、撮影開始から12日で現場の問題により映画は倒産してしまいました。
back_translation: Unfortunately, fate was not on his side, and after 12 days from the start of filming, the movie went bankrupt due to issues on set.

text: so she writes it using info from people who talk about him and writes an unflattering piece , which does n't make him happy .
translation: 彼女は彼について話す人々の情報を使ってそれを書き、彼を不快にさせる不名誉な記事を書きます。
back_translation: She uses information from people who talk about him to write it and creates a disgraceful article that makes him uncomfortable.

text: nothing short of wonderful with its ten-year-old female protagonist and its steadfast refusal to set up a dualistic battle between good and evil .
translation: 素晴らしいことこの上ない、十歳の女性主人公と善と悪の二元的な戦いを設定しようとしない頑なな姿勢を持っています。
back_translation: It is absolutely wonderful; there is a stubborn attitude that does not attempt to set up a binary struggle between good and evil with a ten-year-old female protagonist.

text: guru gulab leaves india for america and comes to stay in the neighbourhood of dr . anmol acharya ( aftab shivdasani ) .
translation: グル・グラブはインドを離れアメリカに向かい、ドクター・アンモル・アチャリア（アフタブ・シヴダサーニ）の近所に住むことになります。
back_translation: Gulu Grub leaves India and heads to America, where he will live near Dr. Anmol Acharya (Aftab Shivdasani).

text: shaky close-ups of turkey-on-rolls , stubbly chins , liver spots , red noses and the filmmakers new bobbed do draw easy chuckles but lead nowhere .
translation: 揺れるクローズアップのターキーサンドイッチ、ざらざらしたあご、肝斑、赤い鼻、そして映画製作者の新しいボブカットは簡単な笑いを引き起こすが、どこにも結びつかない。
back_translation: The swaying close-up of the turkey sandwich, the rough jawline, liver spots, the red nose, and the filmmaker's new bob cut evoke easy laughter, but they don't connect anywhere.

text: now the job is n't the payoff , it 's about payback .
translation: 今や仕事は報酬ではなく、返済についてのものだ。
back_translation: Now work is about repayment rather than reward.

text: a sparkling cosmopolitan comedy that plays fast and loose with sacred cows of family values .
translation: 家庭の価値観の神聖な存在に速やかに気軽にアプローチする、きらめくコズモポリタンコメディ。
back_translation: A sparkling cosmopolitan comedy that easily and swiftly approaches the sacred existence of family values.

text: national lampoon 's van wilder was better than we expected ; a 'not a total waste of money ' kind of dateflick for those just hitting pre-collegiate years .
translation: ナショナル・ランプーンの『ヴァン・ワイルダー』は予想以上に良かった ; 大学に入る前の年齢層には「まったくの無駄遣いではない」タイプのデートムービーです。
back_translation: National Lampoon's "Van Wilder" was better than expected; for the age group before entering college, it's a type of date movie that is "not a complete waste."

text: mitch is left for dead in the desert -- or so they think -- rescued and nursed back to health by a gorgeous women named , angela rose ( nicole austin ) .
translation: ミッチは砂漠で死にかけていると思われていたが、美しい女性アンジェラ・ローズ（ニコル・オースティン）によって救出され、回復させられた。
back_translation: Mitch was thought to be dying in the desert, but he was rescued and restored by the beautiful woman Angela Rose (Nicole Austin).

text: a feature documentary offering a gripping portrait of the esgenoopetitj mi'gmaq first nation during the summer of 2000 as the canadian government appears to wage war on the community for exercising their inherent and court-affirmed fishing rights .
translation: 2000年夏、カナダ政府が固有の裁判で確認された漁業権を行使するコミュニティに対して戦争を仕掛けているように見える中、エスゲノーペティジ・ミグマク第一民族の感動的な肖像を提供する長編ドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: In the summer of 2000, amidst the appearance of the Canadian government waging war against communities exercising fishing rights confirmed by specific court rulings, this feature-length documentary offers an emotional portrait of the Eskasoni Mi'kmaq First Nation.

text: even if the ride 's a little bumpy , with a final lap that 's all too suspiciously smooth , you got ta give director roger michell , best known for the superfluous notting hill , credit for trying .
translation: たとえ乗り心地が少し不安定でも、最終ラップがあまりにも怪しく滑らかであっても、監督ロジャー・ミッシェルには、過剰なまでに素晴らしい「ノッティングヒル」で最も知られている彼に、挑戦を受けたことに対して評価を与えなければなりません。
back_translation: Even if the ride is a little unstable, and even if the final lap is suspiciously smooth, we have to give credit to director Roger Michell, who is best known for the excessively wonderful "Notting Hill," for the challenge he faced.

text: when images of nicholas 's absent father start to appear to him , the boy is understandably frightened .
translation: ニコラスの不在の父親の画像が彼に現れ始めたとき、少年は理解できるほど恐れを感じる。
back_translation: When images of Nicholas's absent father began to appear to him, the boy felt a fear that he could understand.

text: so , shaun goes to great lengths with a little help from his girlfriend ashley and his drugged-out loser brother lance to get into stanford any way they see fit .
translation: しょうがないので、ショーンは彼のガールフレンドのアシュリーと麻薬中毒の無能な兄ランスの少しの助けを借りて、スタンフォード大学に入学するためにあらゆる手段を講じます。
back_translation: Feeling helpless, Sean takes all possible measures to enroll at Stanford University with a little help from his girlfriend Ashley and his drug-addicted, incapable brother Lance.

text: told just proficiently enough to trounce its overly comfortable trappings .
translation: 心地よい環境を打破するために、十分に熟練していると告げられた。
back_translation: I was told that I am sufficiently skilled to break through a comfortable environment.

text: though intrepid in exploring an attraction that crosses sexual identity , ozpetek falls short in showing us antonia 's true emotions . . . but at the very least , his secret life will leave you thinking .
translation: セクシュアルアイデンティティを超える魅力を探求する勇敢さはあるものの、オズペテックはアントニアの真の感情を見せることにおいて不足しています。しかし、彼女の秘密の生活は少なくともあなたに考えさせるでしょう。
back_translation: While there is a bravery in exploring the allure that transcends sexual identity, Ozpetek falls short in revealing Antonia's true emotions. However, her secret life will at least make you ponder.

text: the two leads are almost good enough to camouflage the dopey plot , but so much naturalistic small talk , delivered in almost muffled exchanges , eventually has a lulling effect .
translation: 二人の主役は、愚かなプロットをかろうじて隠すほど良いが、非常に自然な身の上話がほとんど muffled なやり取りで提供されるため、最終的には心地よい影響を与える。
back_translation: The two main characters are good enough to barely conceal a foolish plot, but the very natural background story is provided through almost muffled exchanges, ultimately leaving a pleasant impact.

text: raunchy though [ cho 's ] material is , it embraces all comers , regardless of gender , sexuality , race or ethnicity . and it 's never been sharper -- or funnier -- than it is here .
translation: 過激ではあるが、[choの] マテリアルは性別、性的指向、人種、民族に関係なく、すべての人を受け入れる。そして、ここでのそれはこれまでになく鋭く、また面白い。
back_translation: It is extreme, but [cho's] material embraces everyone, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, or ethnicity. And here, it is sharper and more interesting than ever before.

text: sincere energy gives this soul-searcher something magic to find - if even along the beaten path .
translation: 誠実なエネルギーは、この自己探求者に魔法のような何かを見つける機会を与えます - たとえそれが踏まれた道の上であっても。
back_translation: Sincere energy gives this seeker of self the opportunity to find something magical - even if it is on a well-trodden path.

text: a friendly vacation for four old friends - two couples from college - turns ugly . . . then
translation: 大学時代の友人四人、二組のカップルの楽しい休暇が醜く展開する。。。その後
back_translation: Four friends from university, two couples, have a fun vacation that takes a turn for the ugly... After that.

text: . . . a pretentious and ultimately empty examination of a sick and evil woman .
translation: ...病んだ悪しき女性に対する気取った、そして最終的には空虚な検証。
back_translation: ...A pretentious and ultimately hollow examination of a sickly, wicked woman.

text: going to the website may be just as fun ( and scary ) as going to the film .
translation: ウェブサイトに行くことは、映画に行くことと同じくらい楽しい（そして怖い）かもしれません。
back_translation: Going to a website might be just as fun (and scary) as going to the movies.

text: the movie stays afloat thanks to its hallucinatory production design .
translation: 映画はその幻想的なプロダクションデザインのおかげで浮かび上がっている。
back_translation: The film stands out thanks to its fantastical production design.

text: so , alexi starts to bribe members of the different teams to cause more trouble than necessary on the field , and the viewers love it .
translation: そこで、アレクシはさまざまなチームのメンバーに賄賂を贈り、必要以上にフィールドでトラブルを引き起こすことを始めます。そして、視聴者はそれを大好きです。
back_translation: So, Alexei begins to bribe members of various teams and start unnecessarily causing trouble on the field. And the viewers love it.

text: has all the right elements but completely fails to gel together .
translation: すべての要素は揃っているが、まったくまとまりがない。
back_translation: All the elements are in place, but there is no coherence at all.

text: he has been with his girlfriend for 9 months too long .
translation: 彼は彼女と9ヶ月も長く付き合っている。
back_translation: He has been dating her for nine months.

text: in a town of good intentions , memorbale characters and nothing much to do , the truth has a way of catching up with you .
translation: 善意に満ちた町で、記憶に残るキャラクターたちと特にすることがない中、真実はあなたを追い詰める方法を持っています。
back_translation: In a town full of goodwill, with nothing particularly to do with memorable characters, the truth has a way of closing in on you.

text: . . . [ the film ] works , due mostly to the tongue-in-cheek attitude of the screenplay .
translation: …[その映画]は、主に脚本の皮肉な態度のおかげでうまくいっている。
back_translation: The film succeeds largely due to the ironic attitude of the screenplay.

text: spielrein was a young russian-jewish woman of 18 when she arrived in august 1904 at the burgh & # 246 ; lzli clinic in zurich where carl gustav jung had set up shop .
translation: シュピールラインは、1904年8月にチューリッヒのブルッヒ＆バーリクリニックに到着した18歳の若いロシア系ユダヤ人女性でした。そこではカール・グスタフ・ユングが活動を始めていました。
back_translation: Spielrein was an 18-year-old young Russian-Jewish woman who arrived at the Bruyère & Blüchli Clinic in Zurich in August 1904. There, Carl Gustav Jung was beginning his work.

text: tackles the difficult subject of grief and loss with such life-embracing spirit that the theme does n't drag an audience down .
translation: 悲しみと喪失という難しいテーマに対して、生きることを抱きしめるような精神で取り組んでいるため、そのテーマは観客を落ち込ませることはありません。
back_translation: Because we approach the difficult themes of sadness and loss with a spirit that embraces life, those themes do not depress the audience.

text: this may be the first cartoon ever to look as if it were being shown on the projection television screen of a sports bar .
translation: これはおそらく、スポーツバーのプロジェクションテレビ画面で放映されているかのように見える初めてのカートゥーンかもしれません。
back_translation: This may be the first cartoon that looks as if it is being broadcast on a projection television screen in a sports bar.

text: missing since 1962 and floating adrift , the antonia graza is not uninhabited .
translation: 1962年以来行方不明で漂流しているアントニア・グラザには人が住んでいないわけではない。
back_translation: Antonia Glaza, missing and adrift since 1962, is not uninhabited.

text: to the film 's credit , the acting is fresh and unselfconscious , and munch is a marvel of reality versus sappy sentiment .
translation: 映画の評価として、演技は新鮮で無自覚であり、マンクは現実と情緒的な感情の素晴らしさを見せています。
back_translation: As a film evaluation, the performances are fresh and unaware, and "Mank" showcases the greatness of reality and emotional feelings.

text: rajput then gets together a team of three blind men vishwas prajapati ( akshay kumar ) , arjun verma ( arjun rampal ) and ilias ( paresh rawal ) who will help him obtain his vengeance and make a heap of money at the same time .
translation: ラージプートは、復讐を果たし同時に巨額の金を得るために、三人の盲目の男ヴィシュワス・プラジャパティ（アクシャイ・クマール）、アルジュン・ヴェルマ（アルジュン・ランパール）、そしてイリアス（パレッシュ・ラーワル）を集めます。
back_translation: Rajput gathers three blind men, Vishwas Prajapati (Akshay Kumar), Arjun Verma (Arjun Rampal), and Ilyas (Paresh Rawal), to achieve revenge and at the same time acquire a huge sum of money.

text: . . . turns so unforgivably trite in its last 10 minutes that anyone without a fortified sweet tooth will likely go into sugar shock .
translation: ...最後の10分で信じられないほど陳腐になり、強い甘党でない人はおそらく砂糖ショックに陥るでしょう。
back_translation: ...In the last 10 minutes, it becomes unbelievably clichéd, and those who are not strong fans of sweets will probably fall into a sugar shock.

text: a chained to a rock finnish sniper-kamikadze wille managed to set himself free .
translation: 岩に繋がれたフィンランドの狙撃手カミカゼ・ウィルが自らを解放することに成功した。
back_translation: The Finnish sniper Kamikaze Will, who was tied to a rock, has successfully liberated himself.

text: it has the ability to offend and put off everyone , but it holds you with its outrageousness .
translation: それは誰にでも不快感を与えたり、気を失わせたりする能力を持っていますが、その過激さであなたを引きつけます。
back_translation: It has the ability to cause discomfort or even make anyone lose consciousness, but it attracts you with its extremeness.

text: this holds particularly true for blacky , a white teen who is more interested in books than sport , and his best friend , dumby , the aboriginal star of the team .
translation: これは特に白人のティーンエイジャーであるブラックキーに当てはまり、彼はスポーツよりも本に興味があり、そして彼の親友であるダンビー、チームの先住民スターメンバーにも当てはまります。
back_translation: This especially applies to Blackie, a white teenager who is more interested in books than sports, and to his best friend Danby, who is also a core member of the team.

text: one of those exceedingly rare films in which the talk alone is enough to keep us involved .
translation: 会話だけで私たちを引き込ませる、極めて珍しい映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the very rare films that captivates us solely through conversation.

text: this is a very good film , and it heralds an emerging directorial talent .
translation: これは非常に良い映画で、新たに登場する監督の才能を予感させます。
back_translation: This is a very good movie that hints at the emerging talent of the new director.

text: fans of behan 's work and of irish movies in general will be rewarded by borstal boy .
translation: ビハンの作品やアイルランドの映画を愛するファンは、『ボースタル・ボーイ』によって報われるでしょう。
back_translation: Fans who love Bihan's works and Irish films will be rewarded by "Bostral Boy."

text: boon hock comes from a low-income family and needs to balance school and helping out at the food stall .
translation: ブーン・ホックは低所得の家庭に出身で、学校と屋台での手伝いを両立させる必要があります。
back_translation: Boon Hock comes from a low-income family and needs to balance helping out at school and at a food stall.

text: ultimately . . . the movie is too heady for children , and too preachy for adults .
translation: 結局のところ、その映画は子供には難しすぎて、大人には説教じみている。
back_translation: In the end, the movie is too difficult for children and too preachy for adults.

text: the pace of the film is very slow ( for obvious reasons ) and that too becomes off-putting .
translation: 映画のペースは非常に遅い（明らかな理由から）ため、それもまた不快になります。
back_translation: The pace of the movie is very slow (for obvious reasons), which also makes it uncomfortable.

text: by turns whimsical and absurdist , babek payami 's secret ballot is a slight but likable iranian film with the flavor of a shaggy-dog story conceived by samuel beckett and directed by jim jarmusch .
translation: バベク・パヤミの「秘密投票」は、気まぐれで不条理な要素が交錯する、サミュエル・ベケットが考案しジム・ジャームッシュが監督したシャギー・ドッグ・ストーリーの風味を持つ、わずかだが魅力的なイラン映画です。
back_translation: Babak Payami's "Secret Vote" is a slight yet captivating Iranian film that has a flavor reminiscent of a shaggy dog story, interweaving whimsical and absurd elements, conceived by Samuel Beckett and directed by Jim Jarmusch.

text: reminds viewers of how beautiful and sexy a pregnant woman can be .
translation: 妊娠中の女性がどれほど美しくセクシーであるかを視聴者に思い出させる。
back_translation: Reminds viewers how beautiful and sexy pregnant women are.

text: veteran actor serrault and rising newcomer seigner . . . pitch their performances perfectly , skilfully underplaying to match carion 's understated direction .
translation: ベテラン俳優のセリョーと新進のセニエールが、それぞれの演技を完璧に調和させ、カリオンの控えめな演出に合わせて巧みに控えめに演じています。
back_translation: Veteran actor Seryo and rising star Senier are perfectly harmonizing their performances, skillfully playing modestly in line with Karyon's understated direction.

text: meanwhile , una makes herself being fired in the supermarket .
translation: その間に、ウナはスーパーマーケットで解雇されるように振る舞った。
back_translation: During that time, Una acted in a way that would get her fired from the supermarket.

text: if you saw benigni 's pinocchio at a public park , you 'd grab your kids and run and then probably call the police .
translation: もし公共の公園でベニーニの『ピノキオ』を見たら、あなたは子供を連れて逃げて、そしておそらく警察に電話するでしょう。
back_translation: If you saw Benigni's "Pinocchio" in a public park, you would likely take your child and run away, and then probably call the police.

text: a lean , surprisingly artful programmer , closer in spirit to something like don siegel 's riot in cell block 11 than to typical boxing fare .
translation: ほっそりとした、意外にも芸術的なプログラマーで、典型的なボクシング作品よりもドン・シーゲルの「独房11の暴動」に近い精神を持っている。
back_translation: A slender, surprisingly artistic programmer who possesses a spirit closer to Don Siegel's "The Riot in Cell Block 11" than to typical boxing works.

text: but seemingly coming to her rescue is isabelle ( tina krause ) , a mysterious and voluptuous woman who offers her food and shelter .
translation: しかし、彼女を救おうとして現れるのは、神秘的で豊満な女性イザベル（ティナ・クラウス）であり、彼女に食事と住まいを提供します。
back_translation: However, the one who appears to save her is the mysterious and voluptuous woman Isabel (Tina Klaus), who offers her food and shelter.

text: captivates and shows how a skillful filmmaker can impart a message without bludgeoning the audience over the head .
translation: 魅了し、巧妙な映画製作者がどのように観客を強引に叩くことなくメッセージを伝えることができるかを示しています。
back_translation: It shows how captivating and clever filmmakers can convey messages without forcefully battering the audience.

text: this documentary captures the life story of legendary hollywood producer and studio chief robert evans .
translation: このドキュメンタリーは、伝説のハリウッドプロデューサーでありスタジオ長であるロバート・エヴァンスの人生を描いています。
back_translation: This documentary portrays the life of legendary Hollywood producer and studio head Robert Evans.

text: those who do n't entirely 'get ' godard 's distinctive discourse will still come away with a sense of his reserved but existential poignancy .
translation: ゴダールの独特な言説を完全に理解できない人でも、彼の控えめでありながら存在主義的な切なさを感じ取ることができるだろう。
back_translation: Even those who cannot fully understand Godard's unique discourse can still sense his understated yet existential melancholy.

text: one of those joyous films that leaps over national boundaries and celebrates universal human nature .
translation: 国境を越え、普遍的な人間性を祝う喜びに満ちた映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is a joyful movie that crosses borders and celebrates universal humanity.

text: [ reynolds ] takes a classic story , casts attractive and talented actors and uses a magnificent landscape to create a feature film that is wickedly fun to watch .
translation: [レイノルズ]はクラシックな物語を取り上げ、魅力的で才能ある俳優をキャスティングし、素晴らしい風景を使用して、観るのが非常に楽しい長編映画を作り上げています。
back_translation: [Reynolds] takes on classic stories, casts captivating and talented actors, and uses stunning landscapes to create feature films that are a joy to watch.

text: daphne , a free-spirited american 19-year-old ( amanda bynes ) raised by her equally free-spirited mother goes to england to establish a relationship with her father ( colin firth ) , who turns out to be a prominent political figure heavily involved in social customs .
translation: ダフネは、同じく自由奔放な母親に育てられた19歳のアメリカ人（アマンダ・バインズ）で、父親（コリン・ファース）との関係を築くためにイギリスに行く。彼女の父親は、社会慣習に深く関わる著名な政治家であることが判明する。
back_translation: Daphne is a 19-year-old American (played by Amanda Bynes) raised by a similarly free-spirited mother, who goes to England to build a relationship with her father (Colin Firth). It turns out that her father is a prominent politician deeply involved in social customs.

text: the santa clause 2 `` goes down as easy as an eggnog on christmas eve .
translation: サンタクロース2はクリスマスイブにエッグノッグを飲むように簡単に楽しめます。
back_translation: Santa Claus 2 can be easily enjoyed while drinking eggnog on Christmas Eve.

text: much like robin williams , death to smoochy has already reached its expiration date .
translation: ロビン・ウィリアムズのように、『デス・トゥ・スムーチー』はすでにその消費期限を迎えています。
back_translation: Like Robin Williams, "Death to Smoochy" has already reached its expiration date.

text: as elegantly crafted as it often is , anderson 's movie is essentially a one-trick pony that , hampered by an undeveloped script , ultimately pulls up lame .
translation: 優雅に作られていることが多いとはいえ、アンダーソンの映画は本質的には一発屋であり、未発達の脚本に妨げられて最終的には失敗に終わる。
back_translation: Although they are often elegantly made, Anderson's films are fundamentally one-hit wonders, ultimately failing due to underdeveloped scripts.

text: a little girl steals from the jar , containing her poor family 's meager savings .
translation: 小さな女の子が、貧しい家族のわずかな貯金が入った壺から盗みます。
back_translation: A small girl steals from a jar that contains the little savings of a poor family.

text: as they struggle to get out of the country and fight to stay alive , they find a special love and compassion from which emerges their ultimate moral and spiritual redemption .
translation: 彼らが国から脱出しようと苦しみ、生き延びるために戦う中で、特別な愛と配慮を見つけ、その中から究極の道徳的・精神的な救済が生まれます。
back_translation: As they struggle to escape the country and fight to survive, they find special love and care, from which ultimate moral and spiritual salvation is born.

text: greg puts up with martha 's harsh criticism in exchange for a place to lay-low until he can evade the police and repair his delicate relationship with his young daughter , chelsea .
translation: グレッグは、警察から逃げるまでの間、若い娘チェルシーとの微妙な関係を修復するために、マルタの厳しい批判を我慢して、ひっそりと過ごす場所を提供してもらっている。
back_translation: Greg is being provided with a secluded place to quietly endure Malta's harsh criticism while trying to repair his delicate relationship with the young girl Chelsea until he can escape from the police.

text: but will 's drive for the brass ring hits a last-minute obstacle when his mistress suddenly vanishes - with the capital for his latest plans for expansion .
translation: しかし、彼の愛人が突然姿を消し、最新の拡張計画の資金と共に消えてしまうことで、彼が目指していた成功への最後の障害が立ちはだかります。
back_translation: However, his mistress suddenly disappears, taking the funds for the latest expansion plan with her, presenting the final obstacle to the success he had been aiming for.

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished . the actors try hard but come off too amateurish and awkward .
translation: この好感の持てる映画がもっと完成度が高くないのは残念です。俳優たちは一生懸命ですが、あまりにも素人っぽくて不器用に見えます。
back_translation: It's a shame that this likable movie isn't more polished. The actors try hard, but they come off as too amateurish and clumsy.

text: handsome , charming and undeniably self-absorbed , he treats her more like a nanny than a harvard law grad and can barely choose a tie without her help .
translation: ハンサムで魅力的だが、疑いようなく自己中心的な彼は、彼女をハーバード法学部卒業生というよりもむしろベビーシッターのように扱い、彼女の助けなしではネクタイを選ぶことすらほとんどできない。
back_translation: He is handsome and charming, but undeniably self-centered, treating her more like a babysitter than a Harvard Law School graduate, barely able to choose a tie without her help.

text: slowly , patricia regains her joy of life although living in complete isolation .
translation: パトリシアは、完全に孤立した生活を送っているにもかかわらず、少しずつ人生の喜びを取り戻していきます。
back_translation: Patricia, despite living a completely isolated life, gradually begins to rediscover the joys of life.

text: like the best of godard 's movies . . . it is visually ravishing , penetrating , impenetrable .
translation: ゴダールの映画の中でも最高のもののように、それは視覚的に魅力的で、深く、理解しがたい。
back_translation: Like the best of Godard's films, it is visually captivating, profound, and difficult to understand.

text: on a purely pictorial level , this is one of the best-looking imax movies ever .
translation: 純粋にビジュアルの観点から見ると、これは史上最高の見た目のIMAX映画の一つです。
back_translation: From a purely visual perspective, this is one of the best-looking IMAX movies of all time.

text: now she ca n't perform the song , and aksel realizes he must take action !
translation: 彼女は今、その歌を演奏できず、アクセルは行動を起こさなければならないことに気づく！
back_translation: She realizes that she can't play that song now, and Axel must take action!

text: when you resurrect a dead man , hard copy should come a-knocking , no ?
translation: 死者を蘇らせるとき、ハードコピーがノックしてくるべきではないですか？
back_translation: When resurrecting the dead, shouldn't the hard copy come knocking?

text: a pathetic exploitation film that tries to seem sincere , and just seems worse for the effort .
translation: 見えないほどに誠実になろうとする惨めな搾取映画で、努力の結果、ただ単に悪化しているように見える。
back_translation: In this miserable exploitation film that tries to be sincere to an invisible degree, it seems that the results of effort are simply leading to worsening circumstances.

text: the result puts a human face on derrida , and makes one of the great minds of our times interesting and accessible to people who normally could n't care less .
translation: その結果はデリダに人間的な顔を与え、普段はほとんど関心を持たない人々にとって、私たちの時代の偉大な思想家の一人を興味深く、身近な存在にしています。
back_translation: As a result, it gives Derrida a human face and makes him an interesting and relatable figure for those who usually have little interest in one of the great thinkers of our time.

text: the making of the dragon is a comedic satire ( not a spoof ) of the kung-fu film genre .
translation: ドラゴンの制作は、カンフー映画ジャンルのコメディー風刺です（パロディではありません）。
back_translation: The production of Dragon is a comedic satire of the kung fu movie genre (not a parody).

text: jones ' desire was to document the creative work of yhf 's production , he seems to have found a bit more , including band members departing and a conflict with reprise record company .
translation: ジョーンズの望みはYHFの制作の創造的な仕事を記録することでしたが、彼はバンドメンバーの脱退やリプライズレコード会社との対立など、もう少し多くのことを見つけたようです。
back_translation: Jones's wish was to document the creative work of the YHF production, but it seems he discovered a bit more, such as the departure of band members and conflicts with the Reprise record label.

text: the longer version may be truer to tornatore 's tripartite vision -- and less simply cloying and calculated -- but ultimately it 's also less coherent and emotionally satisfying .
translation: 長いバージョンはトルナトーレの三部構成のビジョンにより忠実であり、単に甘ったるく計算されたものではなくなるかもしれませんが、最終的にはそれはより一貫性に欠け、感情的にも満足感が薄れます。
back_translation: The longer version may be more faithful to Tornatore's three-part vision, and it might not just be a sugary calculation, but ultimately, it lacks consistency and emotional satisfaction.

text: when a movie asks you to feel sorry for mick jagger 's sex life , it already has one strike against it .
translation: 映画がミック・ジャガーの性生活に同情するように求めてきた時点で、それは既に一つのストライクを抱えている。
back_translation: At the moment the movie starts to seek sympathy for Mick Jagger's sex life, it already has one strike against it.

text: how much you are moved by the emotional tumult of [ franM-gois and michM-hle 's ] relationship depends a lot on how interesting and likable you find them .
translation: [フランソワとミシェルの] 関係における感情の混乱にどれだけ感動するかは、彼らがどれほど面白くて好感が持てるかに大きく依存します。
back_translation: The extent to which one is moved by the emotional turmoil in the relationship between François and Michel greatly depends on how interesting and likable they are.

text: three astronauts crash land on an earth-like planet after returning from a 7-year long expedition to ganymede .
translation: 3人の宇宙飛行士がガニメデへの7年間の探検から戻った後に、地球に似た惑星に不時着する。
back_translation: Three astronauts make an emergency landing on a planet similar to Earth after returning from a seven-year exploration of Ganymede.

text: louis is a struggling painter whose life is turned upside down when his wish comes true and he becomes trapped in his own paintings .
translation: ルイは苦労している画家で、彼の願いが叶い、自分の絵の中に閉じ込められてしまうことで、彼の人生は一変します。
back_translation: Louis is a struggling painter, and when his wish comes true and he is trapped within his own painting, his life changes dramatically.

text: poor ben bratt could n't find stardom if mapquest emailed him point-to-point driving directions .
translation: かわいそうなベン・ブラットは、マップクエストが彼にポイント・トゥ・ポイントの運転指示をメールしても、スターになれないだろう。
back_translation: Poor Ben Bratt will never be a star, even if MapQuest emails him point-to-point driving directions.

text: the movie 's major and most devastating flaw is its reliance on formula , though , and it 's quite enough to lessen the overall impact the movie could have had .
translation: その映画の主な、そして最も壊滅的な欠点は、そのフォーミュラに依存していることであり、それは映画が持ち得た全体的な影響を十分に減少させるものです。
back_translation: The main and most devastating flaw of the movie is its reliance on a formula, which significantly diminishes the overall impact the film could have had.

text: the discoveries made by bob cornuke and larry williams will shock the world and rewrite history .
translation: ボブ・コルニュークとラリー・ウィリアムズによって成し遂げられた発見は、世界を驚かせ、歴史を書き換えるでしょう。
back_translation: The discovery made by Bob Cornuke and Larry Williams will amaze the world and rewrite history.

text: merchant has n't directed this movie so much as produced it -- like sausage .
translation: 商人はこの映画を監督したというよりは、制作したと言える - ソーセージのように。
back_translation: The merchant is more accurately described as having produced this film rather than directed it - like a sausage.

text: an engaging documentary about people who live in unusual homes .
translation: 珍しい家に住む人々についての魅力的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An intriguing documentary about people living in unusual houses.

text: ' . . . young , savvy cinematic sensibility framed by the limitations of a conservative , unrelenting culture . '
translation: 「...若く、鋭い映画的感性が保守的で厳格な文化の制限に縛られている。」
back_translation: "...young and sharp cinematic sensibility is bound by the constraints of a conservative and strict culture."

text: it takes us finally to the comedy clubs that for so many years we saw only at the beginning and end of seinfeld .
translation: 私たちをついに、セインフェルドの始まりと終わりにしか見なかったコメディクラブに連れて行ってくれます。
back_translation: You finally take us to the comedy club that we have only seen at the beginning and end of Seinfeld.

text: jimmy tong ( chan ) is just a lowly chauffeur for millionaire clark devlin ( isaacs ) , until devlin has an accident that puts him in the hospital .
translation: ジミー・トン（チャン）は、ミリオネアのクラーク・デヴリン（アイザックス）のただの低賃金の運転手ですが、デヴリンが事故に遭い、入院することになります。
back_translation: Jimmy Tong (Chan) is just a low-paid driver for millionaire Clark Devlin (Isaacs), but Devlin gets into an accident and ends up in the hospital.

text: is life a series of uncontrollable events that are laid out for us or is it truly what we make of it ?
translation: 人生は私たちのために展開される制御できない出来事の連続なのか、それとも本当に私たち自身が作り出すものなのか？
back_translation: Is life a series of uncontrollable events unfolding for us, or is it something that we truly create ourselves?

text: it is psychedelic , hypnotic , exhilarating and horrifying , and sometimes all at once .
translation: それはサイケデリックで、催眠的で、 exhilarateし、恐ろしいものであり、時にはすべて同時に感じられます。
back_translation: It is psychedelic, hypnotic, exhilarating, and terrifying, and sometimes it can be felt all at once.

text: herzog , a man of detail became enraptured with his subject and was unable to use his editing shears .
translation: ハーツォークは、細部にこだわる男であり、彼の対象に夢中になり、編集鋏を使うことができなくなった。
back_translation: Hartzok is a man who is particular about details, becoming so obsessed with his subjects that he can no longer use his editing scissors.

text: vikrant wrongly implicates guru gulab in a very serious crime , which forces him to flee out of the india .
translation: ヴィクラントはグル・グラブを非常に深刻な犯罪に誤って巻き込むことになり、彼はインドから逃げ出さざるを得なくなります。
back_translation: Vikrant accidentally gets involved in a very serious crime involving Gurugrab, and he is forced to flee from India.

text: with the help of a fellow believer ( hugh mclean ) , and despite several obstacles in the way , he sets out on this mission to fulfill his goal .
translation: 信者の仲間（ヒュー・マクリーン）の助けを借り、いくつかの障害にもかかわらず、彼はこの使命に出て目標を達成しようとする。
back_translation: With the help of a fellow believer (Hugh McLean), he embarks on this mission and tries to achieve his goals despite facing several obstacles.

text: unlike cinderella though , ella must depend on herself and her intelligence to get her through her troubles and find lucinda in order for her `` curse `` to be broken !
translation: シンデレラとは異なり、エラは自分自身とその知恵に頼って問題を乗り越え、ルシンダを見つけて「呪い」を解く必要があります！
back_translation: Unlike Cinderella, Ella must rely on herself and her wisdom to overcome challenges and find Lucinda to break the "curse"!

text: but one day everything changes when a dog named lucky enters his life .
translation: しかし、ある日、ラッキーという犬が彼の人生に入ると、すべてが変わります。
back_translation: However, one day, a dog named Lucky enters his life, and everything changes.

text: when his mom named him after warren beatty . . .
translation: 彼の母親がウォーレン・ビーティにちなんで彼に名前を付けたとき . . .
back_translation: When his mother named him after Warren Beatty...

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ? it 's dark and tragic , and lets the business of the greedy talent agents get in the way of saying something meaningful about facing death
translation: 誰がこれを楽しむかは言いづらいですが、トルストイのファンはいるのでしょうか？これは暗くて悲劇的で、貪欲なタレントエージェントのビジネスが、死に直面することについての意味のあることを言う妨げになっています。
back_translation: It's hard to say who would enjoy this, but are there fans of Tolstoy? This is dark and tragic, and the business of greedy talent agents is hindering any meaningful statements about facing death.

text: time of fear is a taut psychological thriller thrusting an fbi agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a demented killer .
translation: 『恐怖の時』は、FBI捜査官と悲しみに暮れる父親を狂気の殺人者の暗い世界に引き込む緊迫した心理スリラーです。
back_translation: "The Time of Fear" is a tense psychological thriller that draws an FBI agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a mad killer.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: 映画の奇妙な展開にもかかわらず、ホフマンは痛みを伴う微妙な表現や、予期しないダークコメディの瞬間、そしてキャラクターの引き込まれる人間性で私たちを魅了し続けます。
back_translation: Despite the film's strange developments, Hoffman continues to captivate us with his nuanced expressions of pain, unexpected moments of dark comedy, and the engaging humanity of the characters.

text: `` bums in the mist `` will expose you to a world where alcohol is king and sloth is a virtue ; buddy george will discover , bums who are able to find love and professional success all while maintaining their `` mondern frontiersman `` lifestyle ; bums who 's natural gifts enable them to move down the ladder of success at an astronomical rate ( or whatever the opposite of astronomical is ) and who 's penchant for violence impact every aspect of their lives .
translation: ``霧の中のホームレス``は、アルコールが王で、怠惰が美徳とされる世界をあなたにさらけ出します。バディ・ジョージは、現代のフロンティアマンのライフスタイルを維持しながら愛と職業的成功を見つけることのできるホームレスたちを発見します。彼らの自然の才能が、成功の階段を驚異的な速さ（またはその逆の速さ）で下ることを可能にし、暴力への傾向が彼らの生活のあらゆる側面に影響を与えています。
back_translation: "Homeless in the Fog" exposes a world where alcohol is king and laziness is considered a virtue. Buddy George discovers homeless individuals who are able to find love and professional success while maintaining a modern frontiersman's lifestyle. Their natural talents allow them to descend the ladder of success at an astonishing (or astonishingly slow) pace, and their propensity for violence affects every aspect of their lives.

text: little does he know , he is investigating some of the biggest events of the star wars saga , as he finds out that there is a connection between the assassination attempts and a separtists movement led by a former jedi ( christopher lee ) against the republic .
translation: 彼は知らないが、彼はスター・ウォーズサーガの中で最も大きな出来事のいくつかを調査している。彼は暗殺未遂事件と、共和国に対抗する元ジェダイ（クリストファー・リー）が率いる分離主義者運動との関連を発見する。
back_translation: He doesn't know it, but he is investigating some of the biggest events in the Star Wars saga. He discovers a connection between an assassination attempt and the separatist movement led by a former Jedi (Christopher Lee) opposing the Republic.

text: however , nicholas can not keep the creature hidden forever and must eventually face his own feelings .
translation: しかし、ニコラスはその生き物を永遠に隠し続けることはできず、最終的には自分の感情と向き合わなければならない。
back_translation: However, Nicholas cannot keep the creature hidden forever and must ultimately confront his own feelings.

text: it takes you on a personal journey through one family 's history , one man 's self-destructive grief and a love that transcends time and death .
translation: それは、1つの家族の歴史を通じた個人的な旅、1人の男の自己破壊的な悲しみ、そして時を超え死をも越える愛を描いています。
back_translation: It描It depicts a personal journey through the history of one family, the self-destructive sorrow of one man, and a love that transcends time and even death.

text: short stories revolving around a bar and a hotel in recife , unveil a mosaic of exotic characters living in the brazilian underground : a butcher married with an evangelical woman , a necrophile in love with a bar owner , a transvestite , and many others .
translation: レシーフェのバーとホテルを舞台にした短編小説は、ブラジルのアンダーグラウンドに住むエキゾチックなキャラクターたちのモザイクを明らかにします。そこには、福音派の女性と結婚した肉屋、バーのオーナーに恋する死体愛好者、トランスジェンダーの人、そしてその他多くの人々が登場します。
back_translation: The short story set in a bar and hotel in Recife reveals a mosaic of exotic characters living in Brazil's underground. It features a butcher married to an evangelical woman, a necrophiliac in love with a bar owner, a transgender person, and many others.

text: compared to sorority boys . . . this is high comedic art .
translation: ソロリティボーイズと比べると…これは高いコメディアートです。
back_translation: Compared to Sorority Boys... this is high comedy art.

text: character development is conveyed primarily through the combatants actions and the choices they make as they progress across their combat route .
translation: キャラクターの成長は、戦闘員の行動や、戦闘ルートを進む中で彼らが下す選択を通じて主に伝えられます。
back_translation: Character growth is primarily conveyed through the actions of the fighters and the choices they make as they progress along the combat route.

text: a broad stylistic combination of cinema verit & # 233 ; and magic realism , the film follows emile 's life as he tries to reconnect with his last remaining relation nada .
translation: シネマ・ヴェリテとマジックリアリズムの幅広いスタイルの組み合わせで、この映画はエミールの人生を追い、彼が最後に残った親戚ナダと再びつながろうとする様子を描いています。
back_translation: With a broad combination of cinema verité and magical realism styles, this film follows Emil's life and depicts his efforts to reconnect with his last remaining relative, Nada.

text: he is haunted by the ghost of his deceased brother paul who guides him toward his salvation .
translation: 彼は亡くなった兄ポールの幽霊に取り憑かれており、彼は救いへと導いてくれます。
back_translation: He is possessed by the ghost of his deceased brother Paul, who leads him to salvation.

text: since all her architects are either busy otherwise or too conservative in style , this ambivalent honour falls to numerobis .
translation: 彼女の建築家たちは皆、他のことで忙しいか、またはスタイルがあまりにも保守的であるため、この曖昧な名誉がヌメロビスに降りかかることになった。
back_translation: All her architects were either busy with other things, or their style was too conservative, which led to this ambiguous honor falling upon Numeurobis.

text: a film that clearly means to preach exclusively to the converted .
translation: 明らかに改心した人々のみに訴えることを意図した映画。
back_translation: A movie intended to appeal only to those who have clearly reformed.

text: evokes the 19th century with a subtlety that is an object lesson in period filmmaking .
translation: 19世紀を呼び起こす微妙さは、時代映画制作の模範となる。
back_translation: The subtlety that evokes the 19th century serves as a model for period film production.

text: with billy badly wounded , hotly pursued by a determined sheriff , the gang makes an unexpected and unwelcome visit .
translation: ビリーが重傷を負い、決意を持った保安官に必死に追われる中、ギャングが予期せぬ歓迎されない訪問をする。
back_translation: While Billy is gravely injured and desperately pursued by a determined sheriff, the gang makes an unwelcome, unexpected visit.

text: when jason sees a movie preview of his story , he and best friend kaylee ( amanda bynes ) go to los angeles to make wolf confess to using jason 's story as well as to clear jason 's name and to get him out of having to attend summer school .
translation: ジェイソンが自分の物語の映画予告を見たとき、彼と親友のケイリー（アマンダ・バインズ）はロサンゼルスに行き、ウルフがジェイソンの物語を使ったことを告白させ、ジェイソンの名誉を清め、夏季学校に通わなくて済むようにします。
back_translation: When Jason watched the movie trailer for his own story, he and his best friend Kaylee (Amanda Bynes) went to Los Angeles to get Wolf to confess he used Jason's story, to clear Jason's name and to avoid having to attend summer school.

text: she must finally step out of her rarefied world and confront the assumptions on which she 's built her whole life .
translation: 彼女はついに彼女の特別な世界から一歩踏み出し、自分の人生全体を築いてきた前提を confront する必要があります。
back_translation: She finally needs to step out of her special world and confront the premise on which she has built her entire life.

text: a genuinely funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience -- in a heartwarming , nonjudgmental kind of way -- to consider what we value in our daily lives .
translation: 本当に面白いアンサンブルコメディで、観客に対して心温まる非判断的な方法で、私たちの日常生活で何を大切にしているのかを考えさせる作品です。
back_translation: It is a truly funny ensemble comedy that makes the audience reflect in a heartwarming and non-judgmental way on what is important in our everyday lives.

text: unfortunately things do n't go as planned , and when the kids ' van breaks down at an old slaughterhouse , they are hunted down one by one . . .
translation: 残念ながら物事は計画通りに進まず、子供たちのバンが古い屠殺場で故障すると、彼らは一人ずつ追い詰められていくのです。
back_translation: Unfortunately, things do not go as planned, and when the children's van breaks down at an old slaughterhouse, they find themselves being cornered one by one.

text: in the end , each must deal with the mysterious and , perhaps , scandalous reason their affair suddenly ended .
translation: 結局、各自は自分の不倫が突然終わった神秘的で、ひょっとするとスキャンダラスな理由に対処しなければならない。
back_translation: In the end, each person must deal with the mysterious, and perhaps scandalous, reasons behind the sudden end of their own affair.

text: the teen must decide whether to become immortal and stay with a tuck she 's fallen in love with .
translation: そのティーンは、不死になって彼女が恋に落ちたタックと一緒にいるべきかどうか決断しなければなりません。
back_translation: The teen must decide whether to be with Tack, the one she fell in love with, after becoming immortal.

text: the performances are so leaden , michael rymer 's direction is so bloodless and the dialogue is so corny that the audience laughs out loud .
translation: 演技はまったく重く、マイケル・ライマーの演出は無感情で、セリフは非常に陳腐なため、観客は大笑いします。
back_translation: The acting is completely heavy, Michael Reimer's direction is emotionless, and the dialogue is very clichéd, leading the audience to laugh out loud.

text: movies like this are selling the old european candor , the old wink of 'bold ' revelation . but in 2002 , such revelations wilt .
translation: このような映画は、古いヨーロッパの率直さや「大胆な」啓示の古いウィンクを売り込んでいます。しかし、2002年には、そのような啓示はしぼんでしまいます。
back_translation: Such films sell the old European straightforwardness and an old wink at "bold" revelations. However, by 2002, such revelations have withered away.

text: otis wants to relive the old days , mark does n't .
translation: オーティスは昔の日々をもう一度味わいたいが、マークはそう思っていない。
back_translation: Otis wants to relive the old days, but Mark does not think the same.

text: one of the finest , most humane and important holocaust movies ever made .
translation: 最も優れた、人間性に満ち、重要なホロコースト映画の一つです。
back_translation: One of the greatest, most humane, and significant Holocaust films.

text: a young korean war veteran returns home to find his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man .
translation: 若い韓国戦争の退役軍人が帰宅すると、両親が亡くなり、妻が別の男のために去ってしまったことに気づく。
back_translation: When a young Korean War veteran returns home, he realizes that his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man.

text: fontaine indulges her signature style , creating a carefully measured film -- the kind whose impact slowly sneaks up on its audience and haunts them long after leaving the theatre .
translation: フォンテーヌは彼女の signature スタイルを楽しませ、慎重に計算された映画を作り上げます。その影響は、徐々に観客に忍び寄り、劇場を出た後も長く彼らを悩ませるようなものです。
back_translation: Fontaine delights in her signature style and creates carefully calculated films. The impact of her work gradually creeps up on the audience, lingering long after they leave the theater.

text: living with the fosters is a darkly funny and dangerously subtle comedy about one family 's paranoid preparation for the year 2000 crisis and beyond .
translation: フォスター家と共に暮らすことは、2000年問題とその先に向けた一家の偏執的な準備についてのダークな笑いと危険に満ちた微妙なコメディです。
back_translation: Living with the Foster family is a darkly comedic and perilous exploration of the family's obsessive preparations for the year 2000 and beyond.

text: his odyssey finally leads him onto a theatre stage .
translation: 彼の冒険はついに彼を劇場のステージへと導く。
back_translation: His adventure finally leads him to the stage of the theater.

text: on his way he gets again and again into situations of obsessive self-uncovering .
translation: 彼は道中、再三にわたり、強迫的な自己発見の状況に陥る。
back_translation: Throughout the journey, he repeatedly finds himself in situations of compulsive self-discovery.

text: the connected stories of breitbart and hanussen are actually fascinating , but the filmmaking in invincible is such that the movie does not do them justice .
translation: ブレイトバートとハヌッセンのつながる物語は実際に魅力的ですが、『インビンシブル』の映画製作はそれらを十分に表現できていません。
back_translation: The interconnected story of Breibart and Hanussen is indeed fascinating, but the filmmaking of "Invincible" does not adequately express them.

text: dex and eric are ordinary , twenty-something guys dealing with work , relationships and friends .
translation: デックスとエリックは、仕事や人間関係、友人との関わりに悩む、普通の20代の男たちです。
back_translation: Dex and Eric are ordinary men in their twenties struggling with work, relationships, and interactions with friends.

text: novak manages to capture a cruelly hilarious vein of black comedy in the situation with his cast of non-actors and a gritty , no-budget approach .
translation: ノバックは、彼の素人キャストと、厳しいノーバジェットのアプローチによって、状況において残酷に面白いブラックコメディの感覚を捉えることに成功している。
back_translation: Novak successfully captures a sense of cruelly funny black comedy in the situation through his amateur cast and a strict no-budget approach.

text: malone does have a gift for generating nightmarish images that will be hard to burn out of your brain . but the movie 's narrative hook is way too muddled to be an effectively chilling guilty pleasure .
translation: マロンは脳から消し去るのが難しい悪夢のようなイメージを生み出す才能を持っています。しかし、映画の物語のフックはあまりにも混乱しているため、効果的にゾッとさせる罪悪感を伴う楽しみにはなっていません。
back_translation: Marron has the talent to create nightmarish images that are difficult to erase from the mind. However, the hook of the film's story is so convoluted that it does not effectively provide a pleasurable thrill accompanied by a sense of guilt.

text: subconscious art : a product of artistic merit that was created without conscious artistic intentions .
translation: 無意識の芸術：意識的な芸術的意図なしに創造された、芸術的価値のある作品。
back_translation: Unconscious art: works of artistic value created without conscious artistic intent.

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer . otherwise , maybe .
translation: もしあなたが彼女のターゲットオーディエンスの一部であれば、あなたは応援するでしょう。それ以外の場合は、たぶん。
back_translation: If you are part of her target audience, you would support her. Otherwise, maybe not.

text: however , when one of the lads accidentally shags a punter ( steven berkoff ) to death , they are forced to look for 'work ' elsewhere .
translation: しかし、若者の一人が偶然に客（スティーブン・バーカフ）を死ぬまで襲ってしまったため、彼らは他の場所で「仕事」を探さざるを得なくなる。
back_translation: However, one of the young people accidentally attacked a customer (Steven Barkoff) until he died, so they had no choice but to look for "work" elsewhere.

text: the film provides some great insight into the neurotic mindset of all comics -- even those who have reached the absolute top of the game .
translation: この映画は、全てのコメディアンの神経質なマインドセットについて素晴らしい洞察を提供しています—ゲームの絶対的な頂点に達した者たちでさえ。
back_translation: This movie provides excellent insight into the nervous mindset of all comedians—even those who have reached the absolute pinnacle of their game.

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .
translation: 腐敗した、善意のある、しかし恥知らずに操作的な映画制作の完璧な例。
back_translation: A perfect example of corrupt, well-intentioned, yet shamelessly manipulative filmmaking.

text: discarded and forgotten , pete williams is living out his days in an old soldiers home in galveston , texas .
translation: 捨てられ忘れられたピーター・ウィリアムズは、テキサス州ガルベストンの古い軍人ホームで余生を過ごしています。
back_translation: Peter Williams, who was abandoned and forgotten, is spending his old age in an old veterans' home in Galveston, Texas.

text: while some will object to the idea of a vietnam picture with such a rah-rah , patriotic tone , soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective : dramatizing the human cost of the conflict that came to define a generation .
translation: 一部の人々は、そんな高揚した愛国的なトーンのベトナムの映画に反対するかもしれませんが、『兵士たち』は最終的にその主要な戦略的目的を達成します。それは、世代を定義した紛争の人間的コストをドラマティックに表現することです。
back_translation: Some people may oppose such an elevated patriotic tone in Vietnamese films, but "Soldiers" ultimately achieves its main strategic objective. It dramatically expresses the human cost of the conflict that defined a generation.

text: for anni they are not enemies , but just men .
translation: 彼らは敵ではなく、ただの人間です。
back_translation: They are not enemies; they are just human beings.

text: are they illusions , visions from the past , ghosts - or is it reality ?
translation: それは錯覚なのか、過去の幻影なのか、幽霊なのか、それとも現実なのか？
back_translation: Is it an illusion, a phantom of the past, a ghost, or is it reality?

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .
translation: 時には、それが模倣するブルックハイマー風のアメリカのアクション映画よりも意味がわからないことがあります。
back_translation: Sometimes, it can be more nonsensical than a Broccoliheimer-style American action movie it is trying to imitate.

text: M-^Eit was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the filmM-^Eit was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? `` ending .
translation: それは映画を最終的に打ち負かしたのはテーマではなく、不満足で矛盾した「ちょっと待って、何か見逃した？」という結末でした。
back_translation: What ultimately defeated the movie was not the theme, but the unsatisfying and contradictory ending that left you thinking, "Wait, did I miss something?"

text: the l . a . dogwalking scene provides a colorful backdrop for the story of ellie moore ( diane gaidry ) , damaged goods on the run from her latest abusive boyfriend and on the verge of transformation .
translation: ロサンゼルスの犬の散歩シーンは、最新の虐待的なボーイフレンドから逃げるダメージを抱えたエリー・ムーア（ダイアン・ガイドリー）の物語に色彩豊かな背景を提供しています。彼女は変わろうとしているところです。
back_translation: The dog-walking scene in Los Angeles provides a colorful backdrop for the story of Ellie Moore (Diane Guidry), who is dealing with the damage of escaping from her latest abusive boyfriend. She is in the process of trying to change.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: 50代の恋人たちはあまりにも幼稚で魅力がなく、気にする価値がない。
back_translation: Couples in their 50s are too immature and unappealing, not worth caring about.

text: reluctantly , busy katherine allows patricia to audition and , at once , recognizes her incredible talent .
translation: いやいやながらも、忙しいキャサリンはパトリシアにオーディションを受けさせ、すぐに彼女の驚くべき才能を認識します。
back_translation: Reluctantly, busy Catherine has Patricia audition, and soon recognizes her remarkable talent.

text: one of the best examples of how to treat a subject , you 're not fully aware is being examined , much like a photo of yourself you did n't know was being taken .
translation: 自分が無意識に観察されている主題への扱い方の一つの優れた例は、知らないうちに撮られた自分の写真のようなものです。
back_translation: A great example of how to handle the subject of being observed unconsciously is something like a photo of yourself taken without your knowledge.

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: この反動的なスリラーの粗野さは、その前提のばかばかしさにしか匹敵しない。
back_translation: The coarseness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the absurdity of its premise.

text: jones has crafted a natty narrative that , enhanced by erin nordstrom 's editing , is filled with payoffs .
translation: ジョーンズは、エリン・ノードストロムの編集によって強化された素晴らしい物語を作り上げており、そこには多くの成果が詰まっています。
back_translation: Jones has created a wonderful story enhanced by the editing of Erin Nordstrom, packed with many achievements.

text: vividly conveys the shadow side of the 30-year friendship between two english women .
translation: 2人のイギリス人女性の30年の友情の影の面を鮮やかに伝えています。
back_translation: It vividly conveys the shadowy aspects of a 30-year friendship between two British women.

text: . . . fifty minutes of tedious adolescent melodramatics followed by thirty-five minutes of inflated nonsense .
translation: 退屈な思春期のメロドラマが50分続き、その後に膨れ上がったナンセンスが35分続く。
back_translation: A boring teenage melodrama lasts for 50 minutes, followed by 35 minutes of inflated nonsense.

text: the rebellion against sauron is building up and will be led by gandalf the white ( sir ian mckellen ) , who was thought to be dead after the balrog captured him .
translation: サウロンに対する反乱が高まっており、死んだと思われていたバルログに捕まったガンダルフ・ザ・ホワイト（イアン・マッケラン）が指導することになります。
back_translation: Rebellion against Sauron is escalating, and Gandalf the White (Ian McKellen), who was thought to be dead, will lead the charge after being captured by the Balrog.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained . consider this review life-affirming .
translation: 君がスキップする続編は、2時間の時間を得ることになる。 このレビューは人生を肯定するものと考えていい。
back_translation: The sequel you skip will grant you two hours of time. This review can be considered as affirming life.

text: that the chuck norris `` grenade gag `` occurs about 7 times during windtalkers is a good indication of how serious-minded the film is .
translation: チャック・ノリスの「グレネードギャグ」が『ウインドトーカーズ』で約7回繰り返されることは、この映画がどれほど真剣に作られているかの良い指標です。
back_translation: The fact that Chuck Norris's "grenade gag" is repeated about seven times in "Windtalkers" is a good indicator of how seriously this movie was made.

text: together they discover that a corporation funds and is profitting from the plantation-like work environment they are forced to work under .
translation: 彼らは一緒に、企業が資金提供をし、彼らが強いられているプランテーションのような労働環境から利益を得ていることを発見します。
back_translation: They discover that companies are funding them and profiting from labor conditions akin to plantations that they are forced into.

text: in the 1880 's , chon wang ( jackie chan ) 's father and keeper of the imperial seal has been murdered by parliament and royal family member rathbone ( aidan gillen ) , ( who steals the imperial seal ) with chon wang 's sister , chon lin ( fann wong ) witnessing the murder .
translation: 1880年代、チョン・ワン（ジャッキー・チェン）の父で皇帝印の管理者が、議会と王室のメンバーであるラスボーン（エイダン・ギレン）によって殺され、チョン・ワンの妹であるチョン・リン（ファン・ウォン）がその殺人を目撃します。
back_translation: In the 1880s, Chong Wang (Jackie Chan), whose father was the administrator of the imperial seal, is killed by Rasborn (Aidan Gillen), a member of the parliament and the royal family, while Chong Wang's sister, Chong Lin (Fang Wong), witnesses the murder.

text: the events of the film are just so weird that i honestly never knew what the hell was coming next .
translation: 映画の出来事は本当に奇妙で、正直言って次に何が来るのか全く予想できませんでした。
back_translation: The events of the movie were truly strange, and to be honest, I had no idea what was coming next.

text: the film is shot in multiple formats from 35mm ( the majority ) to the newer digital format of digi-beta , with a short , eerily beautiful dream segment shot in super-8 .
translation: この映画は、ほとんどが35mmで撮影されており、新しいデジタルフォーマットのデジベータも使用され、スーパ−8で撮影された短く不気味に美しい夢のセグメントがあります。
back_translation: This film is mostly shot in 35mm, also using the new digital format DigiBeta, and features short, eerily beautiful dream segments filmed in Super 8.

text: soon , however , they are regretting their decision and wishing christmas would hurry up and finish until a surprise christmas `` miracle `` , could there still be hope for christmas , and the websters ?
translation: しかしすぐに、彼らは自分たちの決定を後悔し、クリスマスが早く終わってほしいと願います。そこにサプライズのクリスマスの「奇跡」が訪れます。クリスマスとウェブスター家にはまだ希望があるのでしょうか？
back_translation: However, they soon regret their decision and wish for Christmas to end quickly. That's when a surprise Christmas "miracle" arrives. Is there still hope for Christmas and the Webster family?

text: gino and settimo try to repay roberto 's hospitality by chasing off a debt collector who wants his property , but their strong arm tactics alarm him and he realises they are n't the pr consultants they claimed to be liquor store night clerk jose ( freddie ganno ) has two dreams : winning the state lottery and winning the heart of a lovely young shoe store salesperson , diana ( christi adams ) .
translation: ジノとセッティモは、ロベルトの厚意に報いるために、彼の財産を狙う債権者を追い払おうとするが、その力任せの手法にロベルトは驚き、彼らが主張していたPRコンサルタントではないことに気づく。酒屋の夜勤の店員ホセ（フレディ・ガンノ）は2つの夢を抱いている。州の宝くじに当選することと、素敵な若い靴屋の販売員ダイアナ（クリスティ・アダムス）の心をつかむことだ。
back_translation: Gino and Settimo try to drive away the creditors who are targeting Roberto's property to repay his kindness, but Roberto is surprised by their forceful methods and realizes they are not the PR consultants they claimed to be. José (Freddy Ganno), the night clerk at the liquor store, has two dreams: to win the state lottery and to win the heart of a charming young shoe salesperson named Diana (Christy Adams).

text: at night he is daredevil , a masked vigilante stalking the dark streets of the city , a relentless avenger of justice .
translation: 夜になると、彼はデアデビルとなり、マスクを着けた義務を果たす者として、都市の暗い通りを徘徊し、容赦ない正義の復讐者となる。
back_translation: At night, he becomes Daredevil, wandering the dark streets of the city as a masked enforcer, a relentless avenger of justice.

text: pauly then fakes his own death , and the media goes crazy .
translation: ポーリーはその後、自らの死を偽装し、メディアは大騒ぎになる。
back_translation: Polly then fakes her own death, and the media goes into a frenzy.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park . the acting is n't much better .
translation: マコイストを除いて、選手たちはピッチの上で全くわかっていません。演技もそれほど良くありません。
back_translation: Except for McOyst, the players completely don't understand on the pitch. Their performance is not that great either.

text: but jim 's team , knowing their coach is a great ball player , makes a deal with him : if they win the district championship , they want jim to try out for a major-league organization .
translation: しかし、ジムのチームは、コーチが素晴らしい野球選手であることを知っていて、彼と取引をします。もし彼らが地区選手権に勝ったら、ジムにメジャーリーグのチームに試合を受けてほしいと言うのです。
back_translation: However, the gym's team knows that the coach is a great baseball player, and they make a deal with him. If they win the district championship, they ask him to arrange for a game with a Major League team.

text: watching beanie and his gang put together his slasher video from spare parts and borrowed materials is as much fun as it must have been for them to make it .
translation: ビーニーと彼の仲間たちが余りの部品と借りた材料でスラッシャー動画を作る様子を見るのは、彼らがそれを作るのが楽しかったのと同じくらい楽しい。
back_translation: Watching Beanie and his friends make a slasher video with leftover parts and borrowed materials is just as enjoyable as it is for them to create it.

text: chock full of ethnic flavor , whimsy , doubt , faith , joy and wonder , mary and joe is a delightful surprise , as the old story is brought into the present with startling freshness and power .
translation: 民族的な風味、遊び心、疑念、信仰、喜び、驚きがぎっしり詰まった『メアリーとジョー』は、古い物語が驚くほど新鮮で力強く現代に甦るという素晴らしい驚きです。
back_translation: "Mary and Joe," packed with ethnic flavor, playfulness, doubt, faith, joy, and surprise, is a wonderful surprise in which an old story revives astonishingly fresh and powerful in the modern era.

text: unfortunately , the bomb goes off unplanned and kills four innocent people .
translation: 残念ながら、爆弾が計画外に爆発し、4人の無実の人々が亡くなりました。
back_translation: Unfortunately, a bomb exploded unexpectedly, resulting in the deaths of four innocent people.

text: that rare film whose real-life basis is , in fact , so interesting that no embellishment is needed .
translation: その実生活に基づいている非常に珍しい映画は、実際にはあまりにも興味深いため、装飾は必要ありません。
back_translation: This very rare film, based on real life, is so interesting that no embellishment is necessary.

text: he 's confused , he 's hurt , and he does n't know what to do .
translation: 彼は混乱していて、傷ついていて、何をすべきかわからない。
back_translation: He is confused, hurt, and doesn't know what to do.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: 全体的な感情、広いアイデア、そして具体的な物語や明確な答えよりも開かれた質問により関心を持つソダーバーグの『ソラリス』は、美しく、巧妙にミニマリストな映画的トーンの詩です。
back_translation: Soderbergh's "Solaris," which is more interested in open questions than in overarching emotions, broad ideas, specific stories, or clear answers, is a beautifully and cleverly minimalist cinematic tone poem.

text: while everybody else sweats and frets , jim 's dad is cool while giving advice and getting ready for one of the best days of his life .
translation: 皆が汗をかき、心配している中、ジムのお父さんはアドバイスをしながら、人生の中で最高の日の一つに向けて準備をしているときも冷静です。
back_translation: While everyone is sweating and worried, Jim's dad remains calm, giving advice as he prepares for one of the best days of his life.

text: once convicted , he ends up on death row in texas himself , telling his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks .
translation: 有罪判決を受けると、彼はテキサスで死刑囚として暮らし、自分の物語を一連のフラッシュバックを通じて記者に語ることになる。
back_translation: After receiving a guilty verdict, he will live as a death row inmate in Texas and tell his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks.

text: russian ark moves beyond a simple technical exercise and into the realm of greatness . it 's a masterpiece on every level .
translation: 「ロシアン・アーク」は単なる技術的演習を超え、偉大な領域に進みます。あらゆるレベルでの傑作です。
back_translation: "Russian Ark" goes beyond a mere technical exercise and enters the realm of greatness. It is a masterpiece at every level.

text: the pianist is a fine valedictory work for polanski , made richer by his own experiences , making his other movies somehow richer in the bargain .
translation: 『ピアニスト』はポランスキーにとって素晴らしい卒業作品であり、彼自身の経験によって豊かになり、彼の他の映画もそれによっていくらか豊かになっている。
back_translation: "The Pianist" is a wonderful graduation work for Polanski, enriched by his own experiences, and it has also enriched some of his other films to some extent.

text: in the latino neighborhood of new york city 's washington heights , two sons of immigrants one dominican , one irish wrestle with ambition and identity , only to discover that sometimes pursuing one 's dreams comes at a heavy cost .
translation: ニューヨーク市のワシントンハイツのラテン系コミュニティで、ドミニカ系とアイルランド系の移民の二人の息子が野心とアイデンティティに苦しみ、夢を追い求めることが時には大きな代償を伴うことを発見する。
back_translation: In the Latinx community of Washington Heights in New York City, two sons of Dominican and Irish immigrants struggle with ambition and identity, discovering that pursuing their dreams often comes with a great cost.

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
