translation: 楽しいし、ふわふわしていて、賢く、義母に恋をするティーンエイジャーの映画としては驚くほど攻撃的でないです。
back_translation: It's surprisingly not aggressive for a movie about a fun, fluffy, and smart teenager falling in love with their stepmother.

text: too bad maggio could n't come up with a better script .
translation: マッジオがもっと良い脚本を思いつけなかったのは残念です。
back_translation: It's a shame that Maggio couldn't come up with a better script.

text: the tragic real life story of a serial killer who stalked his victims in the early 1970 's in small town america .
translation: 1970年代初頭のアメリカの小さな町で、犠牲者を追い詰めた連続殺人犯の悲劇的な実話。
back_translation: A tragic true story of a serial killer who preyed on victims in a small American town in the early 1970s.

text: its message has merit and , in the hands of a brutally honest individual like prophet jack , might have made a point or two regarding life .
translation: そのメッセージには価値があり、非常に率直な人物である預言者ジャックの手にかかれば、人生に関していくつかのポイントを提示したかもしれません。
back_translation: The message is valuable, and in the hands of the very candid prophet Jack, it might have presented some points regarding life.

text: five hundred years before columbus ( 996 a . d . ) , a young norwegian viking with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet discovers america while on a quest to bring his loved one to 'the top of the world ' .
translation: コロンブスの500年前（西暦996年）、心はライオンのように、魂は詩人のような若いノルウェーのバイキングが、愛する人を「世界の頂上」に連れて行くための冒険の途中でアメリカを発見する。
back_translation: Five hundred years before Columbus (in the year 996), a young Norwegian Viking with a heart like a lion and a soul like a poet discovers America on his adventure to take his beloved to the "top of the world."

text: over 80 of the world 's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating account of the martial arts phenomenon and its increasing global popularity .
translation: 世界の80人以上の偉大な武道家たちが、武道の現象とその世界的な人気の高まりについて、技術を示し、哲学を議論する魅力的な記録です。
back_translation: This is a fascinating record of over 80 great martial artists from around the world demonstrating techniques and discussing the philosophy behind the phenomenon of martial arts and its growing global popularity.

text: an entertaining but unspectacular film . pretty goofy at times - but the slick and gleefully self-indulgent violence will not disappoint the action fan .
translation: 退屈ではないが特に目立つわけでもない面白い映画。時にはかなりおかしいが、洗練されていて喜んで自分中心の暴力はアクションファンを失望させることはない。
back_translation: An interesting movie that is not boring but also not particularly standout. It can be quite funny at times, but it is sophisticated and its self-centered violence is unlikely to disappoint action fans.

text: based on actual accounts , the untold is the story of harlan knowles ( lance henriksen ) , billionaire and president of bio-comp industries who heads up a team of experts in a quest to locate a company plane that disappeared over the remote forests of the pacific northwest .
translation: 実際のアカウントに基づいて、未だ語られていないのは、億万長者でバイオコンプ産業の社長ハーラン・ノールズ（ランス・ヘンリクセン）の物語です。彼は太平洋北西部の秘境の森の上空で行方不明になった会社の飛行機を見つけるために専門家のチームを率いています。
back_translation: Based on an actual account, what has yet to be told is the story of billionaire and biotech industry president Harlan Knowles (played by Lance Henriksen). He leads a team of experts to find a company plane that went missing over the secluded forests of the Pacific Northwest.

text: the character of zigzag is not sufficiently developed to support a film constructed around him .
translation: ジグザグのキャラクターは、彼を中心に構築された映画を支えるためには十分に発展していない。
back_translation: The zigzag character has not developed sufficiently to support a movie built around him.

text: as a good old-fashioned adventure for kids , spirit : stallion of the cimarron is a winner .
translation: 子供向けの昔ながらの冒険映画として、『スピリット：シマロンの雄馬』は成功作です。
back_translation: As a traditional adventure movie for children, "Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron" is a successful work.

text: two men ( eddie murphy and jeff garlin ) get laid off in product development at a large food company and are forced to become stay-at-home fathers and take their sons out of the exclusive chapman academy .
translation: 二人の男（エディ・マーフィとジェフ・ガーリン）が大手食品会社の製品開発部門で解雇され、専業主夫になり、息子たちを名門のチャップマンアカデミーから退学させざるを得なくなります。
back_translation: Two men (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) are laid off from the product development department of a major food company, become stay-at-home dads, and are forced to withdraw their sons from the prestigious Chapman Academy.

text: henry romero discovers , samantha already knows ( firsthand ) of the evils young men do .
translation: ヘンリー・ロメロは、サマンサが若者たちのする悪事をすでに（直接的に）知っていることを発見する。
back_translation: Henry Romero discovers that Samantha already knows about the wrongdoing of the young people (directly).

text: harry , a world-weary career criminal masquerading as a priest , takes to the road with escaped convict nate and his jailbait girlfriend angel .
translation: ハリーは、司祭のふりをした疲れ切ったキャリア犯罪者で、逃亡した受刑者ネイトと彼の未成年のガールフレンドアンジェルと共に旅に出る。
back_translation: Harry, posing as a weary career criminal disguised as a priest, sets out on a journey with the escaped inmate Nate and his underage girlfriend Angel.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors . . .
translation: はがきのように撮影され、才能ある俳優たちの中で最悪の部分を引き出すような酔っ払った自己満足で過剰に演技された。。。
back_translation: It was shot like a postcard, overly acted in a drunken self-indulgence that brought out the worst in talented actors...

text: he has to walk through some of the worst areas in l . a .
translation: 彼はロサンゼルスの最悪の地域のいくつかを歩かなければならない。
back_translation: He has to walk through some of the worst areas in Los Angeles.

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: 世界の報道陣の勇気と献身に対する感動的な賛辞。彼らは、出来事を後の世に記録するだけでなく、私たちが作り上げた世界を明確に見る手助けをするために、喜んで戦争の悪夢に足を踏み入れます。
back_translation: An emotional tribute to the courage and dedication of the world's journalists. They willingly step into the nightmarish realities of war, not only to document events for future generations but also to help us clearly see the world we have created.

text: rewarding for its brash originality and daring in etching a portrait of a man who refuses to take life 's disappointments lying down .
translation: 生活の失望にただ無抵抗でいることを拒む男の肖像を描く際の、その大胆な独自性と勇気に対して評価されている。
back_translation: He is praised for his bold originality and courage in depicting the portrait of a man who refuses to passively accept the disappointments of life.

text: as blunt as it is in depicting child abuse , el bola is a movie steeped in an ambiguity that lends its conflicts a symbolic resonance .
translation: 子供の虐待を描く際に直接的である一方で、『エル・ボラ』はその対立に象徴的な響きを与える曖昧さに満ちた映画です。
back_translation: While being direct in depicting child abuse, "El Bola" is a film filled with ambiguity that gives a symbolic resonance to the conflict.

text: only through tremendous will and uncanny luck did he once again rise as the kid who stays in the picture .
translation: 彼は信じられないほどの意志と幸運によって、再び「その場にいる子供」として立ち上がった。
back_translation: With incredible willpower and luck, he stood up again as "the child who is there."

text: their relationship has seen better days and jessica acquiring a clapped-out 1984 skoda does n't make things easier .
translation: 彼らの関係は以前よりも悪化しており、ジェシカが1984年製の古びたスコダを手に入れたことで状況はさらに悪化している。
back_translation: Their relationship has deteriorated more than before, and the situation has worsened further with Jessica acquiring an old 1984 Skoda.

text: uma thurman stars in quentin tarantino 's fourth film venture , kill bill .
translation: ユマ・サーマンはクエンティン・タランティーノの4作目の映画『キル・ビル』に出演しています。
back_translation: Uma Thurman appears in Quentin Tarantino's fourth film, "Kill Bill."

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .
translation: ソロンツは妥協のないビジョンを持ったアーティストであることは間違いありませんが、そのビジョンは、道徳的に破綻しているとは言えないまでも、非常に単調に感じ始めています。
back_translation: There is no doubt that Sorontz is an artist with an uncompromising vision, but that vision has begun to feel very monotonous, even if it cannot be said to be morally bankrupt.

text: a classic romance always involves a certain formula : boy meets girl , boy loses girl , boy gets girl . beijing bicycle is a romance , except the love interest is a bicycle and not a girl .
translation: クラシックな恋愛物語には常に特定の公式が含まれています：男が女に出会い、男が女を失い、男が女を手に入れる。『北京バイシクル』は恋愛物語ですが、恋の対象は女ではなく自転車です。
back_translation: A classic love story always includes a specific formula: the man meets the woman, the man loses the woman, and the man wins the woman back. "Beijing Bicycle" is a love story, but the object of love is not a woman, but a bicycle.

text: there 's no denying the physically spectacular qualities of the film . . . or the emotional integrity of the performances .
translation: 映画の肉体的に素晴らしい特質や、演技の感情的な整合性を否定することはできません。
back_translation: It cannot be denied that the film has physically outstanding qualities and emotional coherence in acting.

text: at its heart and most importantly , spirited away concerns a little girl learning to honour her friends and her family by valuing herself .
translation: 本質的に、そして最も重要なことは、『千と千尋の神隠し』が、自分自身を大切にすることで友達や家族を尊重することを学ぶ小さな女の子を描いているということです。
back_translation: Essentially, and most importantly, "Spirited Away" depicts a little girl learning to respect her friends and family by valuing herself.

text: in betsy , she finds a dark mirror of herself - a lonely , angry , complex woman whose own troubled past proves disturbingly close to her own .
translation: ベッツィの中で、彼女は自分自身の暗い鏡を見つけます - 孤独で、怒りを抱え、複雑な女性。その troubledな過去は、彼女自身の過去と驚くほど近いことが証明されます。
back_translation: Within Betsy, she finds her own dark mirror - lonely, filled with anger, and a complex woman. Her troubled past proves to be astonishingly close to her own past.

text: he falls for hunky diner owner matt , who falls just as hard back .
translation: 彼はハンサムなダイナーのオーナー、マットに恋をし、マットも同じように彼に恋をする。
back_translation: He falls in love with Matt, the handsome diner owner, and Matt falls in love with him in the same way.

text: with no job possibilities on the horizon , the two dads open their own day care facility , `` daddy day care `` , and employ some fairly unconventional and sidesplitting methods of caring for children .
translation: 仕事の可能性が見込めない中、二人の父親は自分たちのデイケア施設「ダディデイケア」を開設し、子供たちの世話をするためにかなり型破りで爆笑必至の方法を採用する。
back_translation: In a situation where job possibilities seem slim, two fathers open their own daycare facility, "Daddy Daycare," employing quite unconventional and guaranteed hilarious methods to take care of the children.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .
translation: スクービー・ドゥーは、古いファンのためのレトロリフィットなキャンプ的な回想のエクササイズになりたいのか、シリィなニコロデオン風の子供向け映画になりたいのかわからない。
back_translation: I don't know if Scooby-Doo wants to be a retro-fitted, campy exercise in nostalgia for older fans or a silly, Nickelodeon-style movie for kids.

text: the process of figuring out the moment the movie re-imagines the battle of the bulge with a bare-chested guardsman and a pike is more than worth the price of admission .
translation: 映画が裸の胸を持つ衛兵と槍でバルジの戦いを再想像する瞬間を見つけるプロセスは、入場料以上の価値があります。
back_translation: The process of finding moments in the film that reimagine the Battle of the Bulge with a guard bearing a bare chest and a spear is worth more than the admission price.

text: ricki ( jennifer lopez ) , a gorgeous , free-spirited female gangster is sent to assist gigli with the kidnapping because his boss does not think that gigli is up to the job .
translation: リッキー（ジェニファー・ロペス）は、美しく自由な心を持つ女ギャングで、ボスがギグリを信用していないため、誘拐の手伝いをするために送られる。
back_translation: Ricky (Jennifer Lopez) is a beautiful, free-spirited female gang member who is sent to assist in a kidnapping because her boss does not trust Gigli.

text: turin , italy : philippa paccard , deeply disappointed by the police 's lax investigation following her husband 's drug death , places a bomb in the dealer 's cover office .
translation: イタリア・トリノ：フィリッパ・パッカールは、夫の薬物死に続く警察の怠慢な捜査に深く失望し、ディーラーの隠れ家に爆弾を仕掛ける。
back_translation: Turin, Italy: Filippa Pakkar is deeply disappointed with the police's negligent investigation following her husband's drug death, and she plants a bomb at a dealer's hideout.

text: with a court martial to keep visser and the germans distracted , mcnamara orchestrates a cunning scheme to escape and destroy a nearby munitions plant , enlisting the unwitting help of young lt . tommy hart .
translation: 軍事法廷でビッサーとドイツ人たちを気を散らせるために、マクナマラは巧妙な計画を立て、近くの弾薬工場を破壊して脱出を図ります。その際、無意識のうちに若き中尉トミー・ハートの助けを借ります。
back_translation: To distract Bisser and the Germans at the military tribunal, McNamara devises a clever plan to destroy a nearby munitions factory and attempt an escape. In doing so, he unwittingly enlists the help of young Lieutenant Tommy Hart.

text: you would n't want to live waydowntown , but it is a hilarious place to visit .
translation: あなたはダウンタウンの奥深くに住みたいと思わないでしょうが、訪れるにはとても面白い場所です。
back_translation: You may not want to live deep in downtown, but it's a very interesting place to visit.

text: they invite a group of prostitutes , among them irma whose fianc & # 233 ; has just been executed by the germans .
translation: 彼らは売春婦のグループを招待し、その中にはフィアンセがドイツ人によって処刑されたイルマがいる。
back_translation: They invited a group of prostitutes, among whom is Irma, whose fiancé was executed by Germans.

text: visits spy-movie territory like a novel you ca n't put down , examines a footnote to history seldom brought to light on the screen , and keeps you guessing from first frame to last .
translation: 読むのがやめられない小説のようにスパイ映画の領域を探り、スクリーンではほとんど明るみに出ることのない歴史の脚注を検証し、最初のフレームから最後まであなたを想像させ続けます。
back_translation: Like a novel that you can't stop reading, it explores the realm of spy films, examining the historical footnotes that hardly come to light on screen and keeps you imagining from the first frame to the last.

text: it 's not difficult to spot the culprit early-on in this predictable thriller .
translation: この予測可能なスリラーでは、早い段階で犯人を見つけるのは難しくない。
back_translation: In this predictable thriller, it is not difficult to find the culprit early on.

text: max , a self-declared sugarholic , might be just what stan needs , and he , the answer to her addictions .
translation: マックスは自己宣言した砂糖中毒者で、スタンにとって必要な存在かもしれない。そして彼は彼女の中毒に対する答えでもある。
back_translation: Max is a self-declared sugar addict and may be a necessary presence for Stan. And he is also the answer to her addiction.

text: before she drowns , the baby is rescued by manny and sid .
translation: 赤ちゃんは溺れる前に、マニーとシドによって救出されます。
back_translation: The baby is rescued by Manny and Sid before drowning.

text: ultimately , it is harold who timidly suggests participating in the upcoming duct tape festival in minneapolis-st .
translation: 結局、ミネアポリスのダクトテープフェスティバルに参加することを控えめに提案するのはハロルドです。
back_translation: Ultimately, it is Harold who modestly suggests participating in the duct tape festival in Minneapolis.

text: and if she 's lucky , she may find love along the way .
translation: もし彼女が運が良ければ、途中で愛を見つけるかもしれません。
back_translation: If she's lucky, she might find love along the way.

text: completely shocked , she ca n't take life anymore as all her dreams fall apart .
translation: 完全にショックを受け、彼女はすべての夢が崩れ去る中で、もう人生に耐えられない。
back_translation: Completely shocked, she can no longer endure life as all her dreams crumble away.

text: greta is a sharp , spunky editor who is rotten with ambition .
translation: グレタは鋭い、元気な編集者で、野心に満ちています。
back_translation: Greta is a sharp, energetic editor, full of ambition.

text: an odd , haphazard , and inconsequential romantic comedy .
translation: 奇妙で、不規則で、重要性のないロマンチックコメディ。
back_translation: A strange, irregular, and insignificant romantic comedy.

text: not just unlikable . disturbing . disgusting . without any redeeming value whatsoever .
translation: 好感が持てないだけでなく、不快で、嫌悪感を抱かせ、全く救いのない価値しか持っていない。
back_translation: Not only is it unlikable, but it is also unpleasant, evokes feelings of disgust, and holds no redeeming value at all.

text: using previously unseen video footage , the film shows rocha all jerky and with florid rhetoric urging his cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the age ; outlining his vision of a unified third world ; and expounding on the differences and peculiarities of latin americans and the means by which their revolutionary aims might be achieved .
translation: 以前に見たことのない映像を使用して、この映画はロチャがぎこちなく、派手なレトリックでキューバの仲間たちにこの時代の新しい政治的および文化的課題を受け入れるように促す様子を示しています；彼の統一された第三世界のビジョンを説明し；ラテンアメリカの違いや特異性、そして彼らの革命的な目標がどのように達成されるかについて論じています。
back_translation: Using footage previously unseen, this film shows Rocha awkwardly urging his Cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the era with flamboyant rhetoric; explaining his unified vision for the Third World; and discussing the differences and specificities of Latin America and how their revolutionary goals will be achieved.

text: broomfield seems to uncover a massive scoop here , revealing the multitude of people involved and the possible motivations behind the killings of his titular subjects .
translation: ブルームフィールドはここで巨大なスクープを明らかにし、彼の題材となる人物たちの殺害に関与した多数の人々やその背後にある可能性のある動機を明らかにしています。
back_translation: Bloomfield reveals a huge scoop here, uncovering numerous people involved in the murders of his subjects and the possible motives behind them.

text: in her confusion and grief , she finds consolation in the friendship of their african-american gardener , raymond ( dennis haysbert ) - a socially taboo relationship that leads to the further disintegration of life as she knew it .
translation: 彼女は混乱と悲しみの中で、アフリカ系アメリカ人の庭師レイモンド（デニス・ヘイズバート）との友情に慰めを見出す。これは社会的に禁じられた関係であり、彼女の知っていた生活のさらなる崩壊につながる。
back_translation: She finds comfort in her friendship with Raymond, an African American gardener (played by Dennis Haysbert), amid confusion and sadness. This is a socially forbidden relationship, leading to further collapse of the life she once knew.

text: they are told the story of the chamber of secrets .
translation: 彼らは秘密の部屋の物語を聞かされる。
back_translation: They are told the story of the secret room.

text: documentary about runaway and homeless lesbian , gay , and transsexual youth .
translation: 逃げ出したホームレスのレズビアン、ゲイ、トランスセクシャルの若者に関するドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: A documentary about homeless lesbian, gay, and transgender youth who have run away.

text: the ingenious construction ( adapted by david hare from michael cunningham 's novel ) constantly flows forwards and back , weaving themes among three strands which allow us to view events as if through a prism
translation: デイヴィッド・ヘアによってマイケル・カニンガムの小説を基にしたこの巧妙な構成は、常に前後に流れ、三つの要素の間でテーマを織り交ぜることで、私たちが出来事をプリズムを通して見るかのようにします。
back_translation: This cleverly constructed piece, based on Michael Cunningham's novel by David Hare, flows back and forth while intertwining themes among the three elements, making it seem as if we are viewing events through a prism.

text: figuring it will be a good way to make money fellow convict emmanuel 'mendy ' ripstein ( peter falk ) sets up a prison boxing match between the two men to decide who is the real undisputed champ .
translation: お金を稼ぐ良い方法だと考えた仲間の受刑者エマニュエル「メンディ」リプスタイン（ピーター・フォーク）は、2人の間で本当の無敗チャンピオンを決めるために刑務所のボクシングマッチを設定します。
back_translation: Emmanuel "Mendy" Lipstein (Peter Falk), a fellow inmate who thinks it’s a good way to make money, sets up a boxing match in prison to determine the true undefeated champion between the two.

text: starry-eyed forest ranger , jackie , rescues the hunk of her dreams from a cliff side motorcycle accident .
translation: 星にあふれた森林レンジャー、ジャッキーは、崖の側でのバイク事故から彼女の夢のイケメンを救出します。
back_translation: Star-filled forest ranger Jackie saves her dream handsome guy from a bike accident on the cliffside.

text: inside the breathtaking structure , they discover wondrous artifacts of an advanced , but long dead , civilization .
translation: 息をのむような構造物の内部で、彼らは進んだが長い間消え去った文明の素晴らしい遺物を発見する。
back_translation: Inside the breathtaking structure, they discover magnificent relics of a long-lost civilization.

text: while 'manhunter ' takes the prize for stylishness , 'dragon ' is much scarier and more emotionally involving .
translation: 「マンハンター」はスタイリッシュさで賞を受けますが、「ドラゴン」は遥かに怖く、感情的に関与させます。
back_translation: "Manhunter" receives awards for its stylishness, but "Dragon" is far scarier and engages emotionally.

text: definitely funny stuff , but it 's more of the 'laughing at ' variety than the 'laughing with . '
translation: 確かに面白いものですが、どちらかというと「笑う対象」としてのものであって、「一緒に笑う」というものではありません。
back_translation: It is certainly interesting, but rather, it is something to laugh at rather than something to laugh along with.

text: when raj arrives in india , he is struck by tina 's beauty but equally as struck to pooja 's personality .
translation: ラジがインドに到着したとき、彼はティナの美しさに驚かされますが、プージャの性格にも同様に驚かされます。
back_translation: When Raj arrives in India, he is amazed by Tina's beauty, but he is equally surprised by Pooja's personality.

text: set in 1898 sudan , this fifth film to be adapted from the a . e . w .
translation: 1898年のスーダンを舞台にしたこの作品は、A.E.W.から適応された第5作目です。
back_translation: Set in Sudan in 1898, this work is the fifth adaptation from A.E.W.

text: escapes the precious trappings of most romantic comedies , infusing into the story very real , complicated emotions .
translation: ほとんどのロマンティックコメディの貴重な装飾から逃れ、物語に非常にリアルで複雑な感情を吹き込んでいる。
back_translation: Escaping from the precious embellishments of most romantic comedies, it infuses the story with very real and complex emotions.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw worse stunt editing or cheaper action movie production values than in extreme ops .
translation: エクストリーム・オプスで見た最悪のスタント編集や安っぽいアクション映画の制作価値を最後に見たのはいつだったか覚えていません。
back_translation: I can't remember the last time I saw the worst stunt editing or the production value of a cheap action movie in Extreme Ops.

text: they 've all got midlife crises : clownish beav has love problems ; the intellectual shrink , henry , is slowly succumbing to the siren song of suicide ; pete is losing a war with beer ; jonesy has had weird premonitions ever since he got hit by a car .
translation: 彼らは皆、中年の危機を抱えている：道化師のビーバーは愛の問題を抱え、知的な精神科医ヘンリーは自殺の誘惑に徐々に屈していき、ピーターはビールとの戦いに敗れていき、ジョンジーは車に轢かれて以来、奇妙な予知を抱えるようになった。
back_translation: They are all dealing with a midlife crisis: the clown Beaver struggles with love issues, the intellectual psychiatrist Henry gradually succumbs to the temptation of suicide, Peter is losing his battle with beer, and Jonzy has begun to experience strange premonitions since being hit by a car.

text: betting xxx can succeed where other conventional spies have failed , gibbons sends xxx to enter this world of crime undetected , using his natural athletic prowess and a whole lot of attitude .
translation: ギボンズは、他の従来のスパイが失敗したところで成功できると賭け、自然な運動能力と多くの態度を使って、xxxがこの犯罪の世界に気づかれずに入るようにします。
back_translation: Gibbons bets that he can succeed where other traditional spies have failed, using his natural athleticism and various attitudes to help xxx enter the world of crime unnoticed.

text: has the rare capability to soothe and break your heart with a single stroke .
translation: 一瞬で心を癒し、打ちひしがせるという稀な能力を持っています。
back_translation: It has a rare ability to heal the heart in an instant and to crush it.

text: truly an intellectual , igby is a modern day holden caulfield , and the world he lives in is far removed from the high standards of expectation he holds for it .
translation: 本当に知的で、イグビーは現代のホールデン・コールフィールドであり、彼が住む世界は彼が持つ高い期待基準とは大きくかけ離れています。
back_translation: Truly intelligent, Igby is the modern Holden Caulfield, and the world he lives in is far removed from the high standards of expectation that he holds.

text: directing with a sure and measured hand , [ haneke ] steers clear of the sensational and offers instead an unflinching and objective look at a decidedly perverse pathology .
translation: 確かな手腕で指導し、[ハネケ]はセンセーショナルなものを避け、明らかに倒錯した病理をためらうことなく客観的に見つめる。
back_translation: With a sure hand, [Haneke] avoids sensationalism and objectively gazes at the clearly perverse pathology without hesitation.

text: frank spens his days paying for his past sins and steve wants to be dean martin in `` oceans 11 `` .
translation: フランクは過去の罪を償うために日々を過ごしており、スティーブは「オーシャンズ11」でディーン・マーチンになりたいと思っています。
back_translation: Frank spends his days atoning for past sins, and Steve wants to become Dean Martin in "Ocean's 11."

text: collateral damage is , despite its alleged provocation post-9/11 , an antique , in the end . as are its star , its attitude and its obliviousness .
translation: collateral damageは、9/11後の主張された誘惑にもかかわらず、結局は古いものです。スターや態度、無頓着さも同様です。
back_translation: Collateral damage, despite the claimed allure after 9/11, ultimately feels old. The same goes for stars, attitudes, and indifference.

text: here 's yet another cool crime movie that actually manages to bring something new into the mix .
translation: またここに、実際に新しい要素を加えることに成功したクールな犯罪映画があります。
back_translation: Once again, there is a cool crime movie that has successfully added new elements.

text: the story takes place in rural vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwis .
translation: 物語は、州都を背景にしたバーモントの田舎で展開され、そこで市民連合法、銃規制、飲酒運転について議論されています。
back_translation: The story unfolds in the rural areas of Vermont against the backdrop of the state capital, where discussions are taking place about citizen's rights, gun control, and drunk driving.

text: it 's up to an undercover fbi agent to stop him before it 's too late .
translation: FBIの undercover エージェントが、手遅れになる前に彼を止める責任がある。
back_translation: The FBI undercover agent has the responsibility to stop him before it's too late.

text: s1m0ne 's satire is not subtle , but it is effective . it 's a quirky , off-beat project . . . .
translation: s1m0neのサティラは微妙ではありませんが、効果的です。これは、風変わりで少し変わったプロジェクトです……。
back_translation: The satire in s1m0ne is not subtle but effective. This is a quirky and somewhat unusual project...

text: but craig wants to be boyfriends , while gary has other issues .
translation: しかし、クレイグは付き合いたいと思っていますが、ゲイリーには他に問題があります。
back_translation: However, Craig wants to date, but Gary has other issues.

text: to portray modern women the way director davis has done is just unthinkable .
translation: 現代の女性をデイビス監督が描いたように表現することは、考えられないことです。
back_translation: It is unthinkable to express modern women in the way that Director Davis portrayed them.

text: what he finds is a pocket of life that seems to be in another era , where prejudice and intolerance are accepted , where the small minds of angry men call the shots and where one woman attempts to save him and fails .
translation: 彼が見つけるのは、別の時代に存在するような生命のポケットであり、そこで偏見や不寛容が受け入れられ、怒れる男たちの狭い視野が物事を決定し、そして一人の女性が彼を救おうと試みるが失敗する場所である。
back_translation: What he discovers is a pocket of life that seems to exist in another era, where prejudice and intolerance are accepted, the narrow views of angry men decide matters, and a woman attempts to save him but fails.

text: so she invites niko to finish his erotic tale over a drink at her apartment !
translation: 彼女はニコを招待して、彼の官能的な物語を彼女のアパートで飲みながら終わらせることにした！
back_translation: She invited Nico over and decided to finish his sensual story while drinking at her apartment!

text: `` the dangerous lives of altar boys `` has flaws , but it also has humor and heart and very talented young actors
translation: 「聖職者の少年たちの危険な生活」には欠点はありますが、ユーモアやハートがあり、とても才能のある若い俳優たちが出演しています。
back_translation: "The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys" has its shortcomings, but it features humor and heart, and showcases very talented young actors.

text: not knowing that the others have also been invited , they show up and discover an amusement park that affects young visitors in very strange ways .
translation: 他の人たちも招待されていることを知らずに、彼らは現れて、若い訪問者に非常に奇妙な影響を与える遊園地を発見します。
back_translation: Unaware that other people have been invited, they show up and discover an amusement park that has a very strange effect on the young visitors.

text: in a big corner office in hell , satan is throwing up his hands in surrender , is firing his r & d people , and has decided he will just screen the master of disguise 24/7 .
translation: 地獄の大きな隅のオフィスで、サタンは降参の手を上げており、研究開発のスタッフを解雇し、彼はただ「マスター・オブ・ディスガイズ」を24時間上映することに決めた。
back_translation: In a large corner office of Hell, Satan raised his hand in surrender, fired the research and development staff, and decided to just play "Master of Disguise" on a loop for 24 hours.

text: matt lee has to stay a few steps ahead of his own police force and everyone he 's trusted in order to find out the truth .
translation: マット・リーは真実を見つけるために、自分の警察部隊や彼が信頼しているすべての人々の数歩先を行かなければならない。
back_translation: Matt Lee must stay several steps ahead of his police force and everyone he trusts in order to find the truth.

text: his sister nicole is 15 , and dealing with her impending womanhood ; middle brother mike is the `` normal `` one , but in some ways the most childish - his latest conquest is nadine , who runs the dog kennel at his security guard job .
translation: 彼の妹ニコールは15歳で、彼女の来るべき女性らしさに対処しています。真ん中の兄マイクは「普通の」兄ですが、ある意味では最も子供っぽいです。彼の最新の獲物は、警備の仕事で犬のケンネルを運営しているナディーンです。
back_translation: His 15-year-old sister Nicole is dealing with her impending womanhood. The middle brother Mike is a "normal" brother, but in some ways, he is the most childish. His latest target is Nadine, who runs a dog kennel for a security job.

text: there 's a solid woman- finding-herself story somewhere in here , but you 'd have to dig pretty deep to uncover it .
translation: ここには自己発見の物語が確かに存在しますが、それを見つけるためにはかなり深く掘り下げる必要があります。
back_translation: There is indeed a story of self-discovery here, but you need to dig quite deep to find it.

text: she meets noble , an endearing bundle of tragic flaws , and sparks fly between these two lost but likeable souls .
translation: 彼女はノーブルに出会い、彼は悲劇的な欠点を持った魅力的な存在で、失われたけれど好ましい二人の魂の間に火花が散る。
back_translation: She meets Noble, who is an attractive presence with a tragic flaw, and sparks fly between the two lost yet likable souls.

text: there 's no getting around the fact that this is revenge of the nerds revisited -- again .
translation: これは再び「リベンジ・オブ・ザ・ナード」の再訪であるという事実を回避することはできません。
back_translation: It is impossible to avoid the fact that this is a revisitation of "Revenge of the Nerds."

text: this story is a heartbreaking look into the addiction of smoking and its consequences to the loved ones of the smoker .
translation: この物語は、喫煙の中毒とその喫煙者の愛する人々への影響についての胸が痛むような視点です。
back_translation: This story offers a heartbreaking perspective on the addiction to smoking and its impact on the loved ones of smokers.

text: but now , hogwarts students are strangely being turned into stone .
translation: しかし今、ホグワーツの生徒たちが奇妙に石化しています。
back_translation: However, now the students of Hogwarts are strangely petrified.

text: 'tracks ' chronicles their descent with a striking visual portrayal of a boy who made a mistake , paid the consequences and got back on 'track . '
translation: 「トラック」は、間違いを犯し、その結果に苦しんだ少年が再び「軌道」に戻る様子を鮮やかに描写しています。
back_translation: The "truck" vividly depicts a boy who made mistakes and suffers from the consequences, as he returns to his "track" once again.

text: but melanie 's past holds many secrets , including jake , the redneck husband she married in high school , who refuses to divorce her .
translation: しかし、メラニーの過去には多くの秘密があり、高校で結婚した田舎者の夫ジェイクが含まれています。彼は彼女と離婚することを拒否しています。
back_translation: However, Melanie has many secrets from her past, including her husband Jake, a country boy she married in high school. He refuses to divorce her.

text: real women have curves does n't offer any easy answers .
translation: リアルな女性はカーブを持っているが、簡単な答えは提供しない。
back_translation: Real women have curves, but they do not offer simple answers.

text: parker updates the setting in an attempt to make the film relevant today , without fully understanding what it was that made the story relevant in the first place .
translation: パーカーは物語が元々なぜ重要だったのかを十分に理解せずに、映画を今日の視点に合わせるために設定を更新します。
back_translation: Parker updates the setting to align the movie with today's perspective without fully understanding why the story was originally important.

text: atlantic city serenade is about the price we pay for the choices we make in the quest for power over our own inner demons .
translation: アトランティックシティのセレナーデは、内なる悪魔に対する権力を求める過程で私たちが選んだ選択の代償についてのものです。
back_translation: The Serenade of Atlantic City is about the cost of the choices we make in the pursuit of power against our inner demons.

text: the phantom , feeling betrayed , kidnaps christine and brings her to his lair where he plans to make her his eternal bride .
translation: ファントムは裏切られた気持ちでクリスティーヌを誘拐し、彼女を自分の隠れ家に連れて行き、彼女を永遠の花嫁にしようと計画します。
back_translation: The Phantom, feeling betrayed, kidnaps Christine and takes her to his lair, planning to make her his eternal bride.

text: there 's the plot , and a maddeningly insistent and repetitive piano score that made me want to scream .
translation: 物語があり、狂ったように執拗で繰り返されるピアノのスコアがあり、私を叫ばせたくなるほどでした。
back_translation: There was a story, and a piano score that was obsessively and madly repeated, making me want to scream.

text: a continually fascinating exploration of the physical and psychological pain and pleasure of a bizarre relationship .
translation: 奇妙な関係における身体的および心理的な痛みと快楽の継続的に魅力的な探求。
back_translation: A continually fascinating exploration of physical and psychological pain and pleasure in a strange relationship.

text: i enjoyed `` formula 51 `` in a guilty kind of way
translation: 「フォーミュラ51」をちょっと罪悪感を感じながら楽しんだ。
back_translation: I enjoyed "Formula 51" with a bit of a guilty conscience.

text: however , instead of bringing the prime minister down , ali is embraced by the nation as the voice of youth and 'realness ' , making the prime minister and his government more popular than ever .
translation: しかし、首相を失脚させる代わりに、アリは若者や「リアルさ」の声として国民に受け入れられ、首相とその政府はこれまで以上に人気を得ることになります。
back_translation: However, instead of deposing the Prime Minister, Ali is accepted by the public as a voice for the youth and "realness," leading the Prime Minister and his government to gain more popularity than ever before.

text: a young man lingers in the family home of his fiancee , after her accidental death .
translation: 若い男は婚約者の accidental death 后に彼女の実家に留まっている。
back_translation: The young man is staying at his fiancée's family home after her accidental death.

text: spider-man is about growing strange hairs , getting a more mature body , and finding it necessary to hide new secretions from the parental units .
translation: スパイダーマンは、奇妙な毛が生え、より成熟した体になり、親からの新しい分泌物を隠す必要があることについての物語です。
back_translation: Spider-Man is a story about strange hair growing, becoming a more mature body, and the need to hide new secretions from parents.

text: when sai gwai ( turtle , in the english version ) starts working for lmf corporation with his cousin lun , he immediately meets the four `` pork chops `` ( cantonese slang for ugly women ) : mo , mei , hung and pao .
translation: サイ・グワイ（英語版ではカメ）が従兄弟のルンと共にLMFコーポレーションで働き始めると、すぐに「ポークチョップ」（広東語のスラングで醜い女性を指す）であるモ、メイ、ハン、パオの4人に出会います。
back_translation: When Sai Gwai (known as "Kame" in the English version) starts working at LMF Corporation with his cousin Lung, he quickly meets four women known as "Pork Chop" (a Cantonese slang term for unattractive women): Mo, Mei, Han, and Pao.

text: in order to arrive at a possible explanation , michael moore takes on a deeper examination of america 's culture of fear , bigotry and violence in a nation with widespread gun ownership .
translation: ミハエル・ムーアは、広範な銃所持がある国における恐怖、偏見、暴力の文化をより深く検証することで、可能な説明にたどり着こうとしています。
back_translation: Michael Moore is trying to reach possible explanations by delving deeper into the culture of fear, prejudice, and violence in a country with widespread gun ownership.

text: she is intrigued by his knowledge of shakespeare , manner of living and the fifteen perfectly organized bags beneath his bench .
translation: 彼女は彼のシェイクスピアの知識、生活様式、そして彼のベンチの下にある15個の完璧に整理されたバッグに興味を持っています。
back_translation: She is interested in his knowledge of Shakespeare, his lifestyle, and the 15 perfectly organized bags under his bench.

text: shortly hereafter she encounters dieter , a charming young man .
translation: その後まもなく、彼女は魅力的な若者ディーターに出会います。
back_translation: Soon after that, she meets the charming young man, Dieter.

text: to the degree that ivans xtc . works , it 's thanks to huston 's revelatory performance .
translation: イヴァンのXTCがどの程度機能しているかは、ハスティンの啓示的なパフォーマンスのおかげです。
back_translation: The extent to which Ivan's XTC is functioning is thanks to Huston's revelatory performance.

text: meanwhile , obi-wan kenobi continues to train the young jedi anakin skywalker , who fears that the jedi code will forbid his growing romance with amidala . . .
translation: その間、オビ＝ワン・ケノービは若きジェダイ、アナキン・スカイウォーカーを訓練し続けている。アナキンは、ジェダイの掟がアミダラとの高まるロマンスを禁じるのではないかと恐れている。
back_translation: During that time, Obi-Wan Kenobi continues to train the young Jedi, Anakin Skywalker. Anakin fears that the Jedi Order's rules may prohibit his growing romance with Padmé Amidala.

text: one of the very best movies ever made about the life of moviemaking .
translation: 映画制作の人生について作られた最高の映画の一つ。
back_translation: One of the greatest films made about the life of film production.

text: a somewhat soapish but nonetheless beautifully acted excoriation of religious piousness and blind allegiance to faith as a socially constructed institution .
translation: ややばかげた部分もあるが、それにもかかわらず美しく演じられた宗教的な敬虔さと信仰への盲目的な忠誠心を社会的に構築された制度として非難する作品。
back_translation: Although there are somewhat absurd parts, it is a work that criticizes religious piety and blind loyalty to faith, beautifully performed as socially constructed institutions.

text: a comedy about bending the rules to reach your goal , bend it like beckham explores the world of women 's football , from kick-abouts in the park to freekicks in the final .
translation: 目標を達成するためにルールを曲げることについてのコメディ、「ベッカムのように曲げろ」は、パークでのキックから決勝でのフリーキックまで、女子サッカーの世界を探ります。
back_translation: The comedy "Bend It Like Beckham" explores the world of women's soccer, from kicks in the park to free kicks in the finals, through the lens of bending the rules to achieve goals.

text: the first hour alone is worth the admission price .
translation: 最初の1時間だけで入場料の価値があります。
back_translation: It's worth the admission fee for just the first hour.

text: her recent divorce has left her with terminal writer 's block and extremely depressed , and her best friend , patti , is beginning to think she might never recover .
translation: 彼女の最近の離婚は、彼女を終末的な作家のブロックと非常にうつ病に陥れ、彼女の親友のパティは、彼女が決して回復できないのではないかと考え始めている。
back_translation: Her recent divorce has plunged her into a severe writer's block and deep depression, leading her best friend Patty to begin to worry that she may never recover.

text: mirabelle falls in love with the glamorous ray , and her life takes a magical turn , but eventually she realizes that she must empower herself and make a choice between them .
translation: ミラベルは魅力的なレイに恋をし、彼女の人生は魔法のような方向へ進みますが、最終的には自分を強くし、彼らの間で選択をしなければならないことに気づきます。
back_translation: Mirabelle falls in love with the charming Ray, and her life takes a magical turn, but ultimately she realizes that she must strengthen herself and make a choice between them.

text: if people accept it , the crime rate is going to drop drastically , but it never will be known if there might not be too many people imprisoned , some or even all of them innocent .
translation: もし人々がそれを受け入れれば、犯罪率は劇的に減少するでしょうが、無実の人々が多く、あるいは全てが無実であるかもしれないという点では、誰にも知り得ないでしょう。
back_translation: If people accept it, the crime rate will dramatically decrease, but no one can know for sure that many or perhaps all are innocent.

text: her husband was the love of her life and she does not expect to find another .
translation: 彼女の夫は彼女の人生の愛であり、彼女はもう一人を見つけることはないと思っています。
back_translation: Her husband is the love of her life, and she believes she will never find another.

text: the sort of movie that gives tastelessness a bad rap .
translation: 悪趣味に悪評を与えるタイプの映画。
back_translation: A type of film that gives bad reviews for bad taste.

text: in his latest effort , storytelling , solondz has finally made a movie that is n't just offensive -- it also happens to be good .
translation: 彼の最新作『ストーリーテリング』で、ソロンドズはついにただ単に攻撃的ではない映画を作っただけでなく、良い作品にもなっています。
back_translation: In his latest work "Storytelling," Solondz has finally created not just an aggressively charged film, but a good one as well.

text: the acting is uniformly excellent , with kyra sedgwick and fairuza balk in particular deserving to be singled out for praise .
translation: 演技は一貫して素晴らしく、特にキラ・セジウィックとフェイルーザ・バルクは称賛に値します。
back_translation: The performances are consistently excellent, especially Kira Sedgwick and Fairuza Balk, who are deserving of praise.

text: proves mainly that south korean filmmakers can make undemanding action movies with all the alacrity of their hollywood counterparts .
translation: 主に韓国の映画制作者がハリウッドの同業者と同じように気軽にアクション映画を制作できることを証明しています。
back_translation: It proves that Korean filmmakers can casually produce action films just like their Hollywood counterparts.

text: [ griffith ] adds another intriguing character to her formidable body of work .
translation: [グリフィス]は彼女の強力な作品群にもう一つ魅力的なキャラクターを加えます。
back_translation: [Griffith] adds another captivating character to her powerful body of work.

text: the film does a solid job of slowly , steadily building up to the climactic burst of violence .
translation: この映画は、徐々に、着実にクライマックスの暴力的な爆発に向けて盛り上げていく良い仕事をしています。
back_translation: This movie does a good job of steadily building up to the violent explosion of the climax.

text: on a concert tour in india , they marry at a secret and romantic ceremony without any press attention .
translation: インドのコンサートツアー中、彼らは報道の注目を受けずに秘密のロマンチックな式で結婚します。
back_translation: During their concert tour in India, they get married in a secret romantic ceremony without attracting media attention.

text: both grant and hoult carry the movie because they are believable as people -- flawed , assured of the wrong things , and scared to admit how much they may really need the company of others .
translation: グラントとハウルトは、欠点を抱えつつも自信を持ち、間違ったことを確信し、他者の存在をどれほど求めているかを認めることを恐れている人物として信じられるため、この映画を牽引しています。
back_translation: Grant and Howell drive this movie as characters who, despite their flaws, carry confidence, are convinced of their wrongness, and fear acknowledging how much they seek the presence of others.

text: captures a more realistic depiction of the effects of death on a family .
translation: 死が家族に与える影響のより現実的な描写を捉えています。
back_translation: It captures a more realistic depiction of the impact of death on family.

text: if kaufman kept cameron diaz a prisoner in a cage with her ape , in his latest , he 'd have them mate .
translation: もしカウフマンがキャメロン・ディアスを彼女の猿と一緒に檻の中に囚人として閉じ込めたら、彼は最新作で彼らを交配させるだろう。
back_translation: If Kaufman locked Cameron Diaz in a cage with her monkey as a prisoner, he would make them mate in his latest work.

text: a highly spirited , imaginative kid 's movie that broaches neo-augustinian theology : is god stuck in heaven because he 's afraid of his best-known creation ?
translation: 非常に元気で想像力豊かな子供向け映画で、ネオアウグスティヌス神学に触れています：神は彼の最も知られた創造物を恐れているために天国に閉じ込められているのでしょうか？
back_translation: It is a very lively and imaginative children's movie that touches upon Neo-Augustinian theology: Is God trapped in heaven because He fears His most well-known creation?

text: all this takes a strange turn when a mysterious patient ( satan , he calls himself ) the hospital seeking help .
translation: このすべては、ある謎の患者（彼は自分をサタンと呼ぶ）が助けを求めて病院に訪れたときに奇妙な展開を迎えます。
back_translation: All of this takes a strange turn when a mysterious patient (who calls himself Satan) seeks help and visits the hospital.

text: ling min becomes the manager of haier factory when the factory is almost bankrupted .
translation: リン・ミンは工場がほぼ破産状態のときにハイアール工場のマネージャーになります。
back_translation: Lin Min becomes the manager of the Haier factory when the factory is nearly bankrupt.

text: while most films these days are about nothing , this film seems to be about everything that 's plaguing the human spirit in a relentlessly globalizing world .
translation: 最近の映画のほとんどは何もないことについてですが、この映画は絶え間なくグローバル化が進む世界で人間の精神を悩ませているすべてのことについてのようです。
back_translation: Most recent movies seem to be about nothing, but this film appears to be about everything that troubles the human spirit in a world that is constantly being globalized.

text: dennis , nicknamed `` spider `` by his mother has been institutionalized with acute schizophrenia for some 20 years .
translation: デニスは、母親から「スパイダー」と呼ばれ、約20年間急性精神分裂病で入院しています。
back_translation: Dennis has been called "Spider" by his mother and has been hospitalized for about 20 years with acute schizophrenia.

text: jack must then put his life in the hands of a series of characters that he just can not seem to trust - for good reason , they lead him to a fate that jack could never have suspected - a tongue-in-check send-up of a classic urban myth .
translation: ジャックは、自分を信用できない一連のキャラクターの手に自分の命を委ねなければならなくなる。彼らはジャックが決して予想できなかった運命へと導いていく。これは、古典的な都市伝説を茶化した作品である。
back_translation: Jack must entrust his life to a series of characters he cannot trust. They lead him to a fate he could have never anticipated. This is a work that mocks classic urban legends.

text: ramsay is clearly extraordinarily talented , and based on three short films and two features , here 's betting her third feature will be something to behold .
translation: ラムゼイは明らかに非常に才能がある。短編映画3本と長編映画2本を基に、彼女の3作目の長編映画は見ものになるだろうと賭けよう。
back_translation: Ramsey is clearly very talented. Based on three short films and two feature films, I would bet that her third feature film will be something to see.

text: compassionately explores the seemingly irreconcilable situation between conservative christian parents and their estranged gay and lesbian children .
translation: 愛情を持って、保守的なクリスチャンの親と疎遠になったゲイやレズビアンの子どもたちの間の、互いに和解できないように見える状況を探求しています。
back_translation: I am exploring the seemingly irreconcilable situations between gay and lesbian children who have become estranged from their conservative Christian parents with love.

text: this sets off a minor battle between the two for control of the fish supply .
translation: これが二人の間で魚の供給をめぐる小競り合いを引き起こします。
back_translation: This will lead to a small skirmish between the two over the supply of fish.

text: if you 're not totally weirded- out by the notion of cinema as community-therapy spectacle , quitting hits home with disorienting force .
translation: もし映画をコミュニティ・セラピーのスペクタクルとして捉えることに全く違和感を覚えないのであれば、「クイッティング」は不安を抱かせる強い印象を与えます。
back_translation: If you feel no discomfort in seeing movies as a spectacle of community therapy, then "Quitting" leaves a strong impression that evokes anxiety.

text: the films stars roark critchlow ( days of our lives , friends , mr . deeds ) as the would be husband who has to come clean about a few things from his past and risk losing the love of his life .
translation: 映画は、ローク・クリッチロー（『日々の生活』、『フレンズ』、『ミスター・ディーズ』）が主演し、過去のいくつかのことを告白しなければならない新郎候補が、愛する人を失うリスクを抱える物語です。
back_translation: The movie stars Luke Krichlow (from "Daily Life," "Friends," and "Mr. Deeds") and tells the story of a groom-to-be who must confess some things from his past, risking the loss of his loved one.

text: normally , rohmer 's talky films fascinate me , but when he moves his setting to the past , and relies on a historical text , he loses the richness of characterization that makes his films so memorable .
translation: 通常、ロメールの対話中心の映画には魅了されるが、彼が舞台を過去に移し、歴史的なテキストに頼ると、彼の映画をこれほど記憶に残るものにしているキャラクターの豊かさを失ってしまう。
back_translation: Typically, I am captivated by Rohmer's dialogue-centered films, but when he shifts the setting to the past and relies on historical texts, he loses the richness of the characters that make his films so memorable.

text: scores by marshaling facts that speak for themselves . and they do n't speak kindly .
translation: 自らを語る事実を整理することで得られるスコア。 しかし、それらは優しく語りません。
back_translation: A score obtained by organizing the facts that speak for oneself. However, they do not tell a gentle story.

text: nolan bravely treads where few american films dare to delve -- into the world of ambivalence and ambiguity . . .
translation: ノーランは少数のアメリカ映画が踏み込むことを恐れる場所、すなわち曖昧さと曖昧さの世界に勇敢に足を踏み入れる。
back_translation: Nolan bravely steps into a place where a few American films fear to tread, that is, the world of ambiguity and uncertainty.

text: 'the nugget ' is a tale about a group of three roadworkers who stumble upon the world 's biggest nugget , and become instant millionaires - or so they think .
translation: 「ナゲット」は、3人の道路工が世界最大のナゲットを偶然見つけ、一瞬にして億万長者になると思い込む物語です。
back_translation: "Nugget" is a story about three road workers who accidentally find the world's largest nugget and come to believe that they instantly become billionaires.

text: bluer than the atlantic and more biologically detailed than an autopsy , the movie . . . is , also , frequently hilarious .
translation: 大西洋よりも青く、解剖よりも生物学的に詳細なこの映画は、しばしば非常に面白いです。
back_translation: This movie, bluer than the Atlantic and more biologically detailed than dissection, is often very interesting.

text: the story of ned kelly , who formed the notorious kelly gang with his brother dan and two other men .
translation: ネッド・ケリーの物語は、彼が兄ダンと他の二人の男と共に悪名高いケリーギャングを結成したことに関するものです。
back_translation: The story of Ned Kelly is about how he formed the infamous Kelly Gang with his brother Dan and two other men.

text: the idea of 49-year-old roberto benigni playing the wooden boy pinocchio is scary enough . the reality of the new live-action pinocchio he directed , cowrote and starred in borders on the grotesque .
translation: 49歳のロベルト・ベニーニが木の少年ピノキオを演じるというアイデアは十分に怖い。彼が監督・共作・主演した新しい実写版ピノキオの現実は、 grotesque（グロテスク）な境界線に近い。
back_translation: The idea of 49-year-old Roberto Benigni playing the wooden boy Pinocchio is already quite frightening. The reality of his new live-action version of Pinocchio, which he directed and co-wrote, approaches grotesque boundaries.

text: hoffman 's unfettered performance beautifully captures wilson 's sad , manic quality .
translation: ホフマンの自由な演技はウィルソンの悲しげで狂気じみた特徴を美しく捉えています。
back_translation: Hoffman's free performance beautifully captures Wilson's sad and somewhat insane characteristics.

text: de oliveira creates an emotionally rich , poetically plump and visually fulsome , but never showy , film whose bittersweet themes are reinforced and brilliantly personified by michel piccoli .
translation: デ・オリベイラは、感情豊かで詩的に豊満かつ視覚的に充実した、しかし決して派手ではない映画を作り、そのほろ苦いテーマはミシェル・ピッコリによって見事に具現化されています。
back_translation: De Oliveira creates films that are rich in emotions, poetically lush, and visually fulfilling, yet never flashy, with their bittersweet themes beautifully embodied by Michel Piccoli.

text: the title helpfully offers the most succinct review of it you 'll read anywhere .
translation: タイトルは、あなたがどこでも読むことになる最も簡潔なレビューを提供してくれます。

text: with an estimate of over 10 , 000 sexual conquests .
translation: 10,000以上の性的征服の推定があります。

text: enigma is well-made , but it 's just too dry and too placid .
translation: エニグマはよく作られていますが、あまりにも乾燥していて穏やかすぎます。
back_translation: The enigma is well crafted, but it is too dry and too gentle.

text: he 's a rockabilly star who 's a legend both because of his great hits and because he gave up music very young when his brother was killed .
translation: 彼はロカビリーのスターであり、彼の名曲によってだけでなく、兄が亡くなったときに若い頃に音楽を諦めたことによっても伝説となっています。
back_translation: He is a rockabilly star, and he has become a legend not only because of his famous songs, but also because he gave up music in his youth when his brother passed away.

text: what 's the most positive thing that can be said about the new rob schneider vehicle ? well , it 's not as pathetic as the animal .

text: the 'fun and games ' in which louis and hilary involve soledad are a lacerating look at their twisted relationship .

text: frustrated with the official investigation and haunted by the thought that the man responsible for murdering his family might never be brought to justice , brewer takes matters into his own hands and tracks his quarry ultimately to colombia .
translation: 公式の調査に不満を抱き、家族を殺した責任者が決して裁かれないかもしれないという考えに悩まされているブリューワーは、自ら手を下すことに決め、獲物を追跡して最終的にコロンビアに辿り着く。
back_translation: Brewer, who is troubled by the thought that those responsible for the official investigation might never be held accountable for his family's murder, decides to take matters into his own hands, tracking down his targets and eventually reaching Colombia.

text: too timid to bring a sense of closure to an ugly chapter of the twentieth century .
translation: 20世紀の醜い章に終止符を打つことをためらう。
back_translation: I hesitate to put an end to the ugly chapter of the 20th century.

text: here 's my advice , kev . start reading your scripts before signing that dotted line .
translation: ケヴ、私のアドバイスはこれだ。サインする前に、脚本を読み始めなさい。

text: the film has the courage of its convictions and excellent performances on its side .
translation: その映画は信念の勇気を持ち、優れたパフォーマンスが味方についている。

text: as immaculate as stuart little 2 is , it could be a lot better if it were , well , more adventurous .

text: more successful at relating history than in creating an emotionally complex , dramatically satisfying heroine

back_translation: While it has succeeded in relating history, it has not succeeded in creating an emotionally complex and dramatically satisfying heroine.

text: what it lacks in originality it makes up for in intelligence and b-grade stylishness .
translation: 独自性に欠けている部分を、知性とB級のスタイリッシュさで補っています。

text: essentially , noyce just wants to tell a good story , which he does .

text: it shows that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think and will forgive any shoddy product as long as there 's a little girl-on-girl action .
translation: それは、いくつかのスタジオが人々が考える能力を失ったと確信しており、少しの女の子同士のアクションさえあれば、どんな粗悪な製品でも許されると信じていることを示しています。
back_translation: This indicates that some studios are convinced that people have lost their ability to think, and that they believe any poorly made product will be forgiven as long as there is a bit of action between girls.

text: will only satisfy those who ca n't tell the difference between the good , the bad and the ugly .
translation: 良いもの、悪いもの、醜いものの区別ができない人だけを満足させるでしょう。
back_translation: It will only satisfy those who cannot distinguish between good, bad, and ugly.

text: though it was made with careful attention to detail and is well-acted by james spader and maggie gyllenhaal , i felt disrespected .
translation: 細部にわたって慎重に作られ、ジェームズ・スパイダーとマギー・ギレンホールによる演技も素晴らしいものでしたが、私は不快感を感じました。
back_translation: It was carefully crafted down to the details, and the performances by James Spader and Maggie Gyllenhaal were also outstanding, but I felt discomfort.

text: when she was a little child she was given up for adoption and now she is ready to discover the story of her life .

text: charlotte sometimes is a brilliant movie . it is about irrational , unexplainable life and it seems so real because it does not attempt to filter out the complexity .
translation: シャーロット・サムタイムズは素晴らしい映画です。これは非合理的で説明できない人生についてのもので、複雑さを排除しようとしないため、非常にリアルに感じられます。
back_translation: Charlotte Sometimes is a wonderful movie. It is about an irrational and inexplicable life, and it feels very real because it does not try to eliminate complexity.

text: a man brutally beats his girlfriend to death and tosses her remains into a local river . . .
translation: 男が彼女を残忍に殴り殺し、その遺体を地元の川に投げ捨てる。。。

text: or so he thinks until the blackmailer pulls a u-turn on rodney .

text: the movie takes place in mexico , 2002 ( based on a story from the 1800 's ) .

text: gigli abducts the brother from his mental hospital and holds him hostage in his apartment .

text: filled with alexandre desplat 's haunting and sublime music , the movie completely transfixes the audience .
translation: アレクサンドル・デスプラの心を惹きつける素晴らしい音楽に満ちたこの映画は、観客を完全に魅了します。

text: why would anyone cast the magnificent jackie chan in a movie full of stunt doubles and special effects ?
translation: なぜ誰がスタントダブルや特別効果でいっぱいの映画に素晴らしいジャッキー・チェンをキャスティングするのでしょうか？
back_translation: Why would anyone cast the amazing Jackie Chan in a movie full of stunt doubles and special effects?

text: it 's a beautiful experience , nearly perfect with a fragile flowing fluid score .
translation: それは美しい体験で、壊れやすい流れるようなスコアと共にほぼ完璧です。

text: theology aside , why put someone who ultimately does n't learn at the center of a kids ' story ?
translation: 神学を置いておいて、なぜ最終的に学ばない人を子供の物語の中心に置くのでしょうか？

text: from the creative mind of pulizter winner dave barry , comes a film following a chain of events inspired by the arrival of a mysterious suitcase in miami .
translation: ピューリッツァー賞受賞者デイブ・バリーの創造的な発想から生まれた映画は、マイアミに届いた謎のスーツケースに触発された一連の出来事を追ったものです。

text: `` notebook `` follows a young couple ( mcadams and gosling ) who meet in their teens and are reunited after world war ii .
translation: 「ノートブック」は、10代で出会った若いカップル（マクアダムスとゴズリング）が第二次世界大戦後に再会する物語です。

text: where tom green stages his gags as assaults on america 's knee-jerk moral sanctimony , jackass lacks aspirations of social upheaval .
translation: トム・グリーンがアメリカの反射的な道徳の聖性に対する攻撃としてギャグを展開するのに対し、「ジャッカス」は社会の変革を目指してはいない。
back_translation: While Tom Green develops gags as an attack on the sanctity of America's reflexive morals, "Jackass" does not aim for social change.

text: andrew moves to a small town way up north to isolate himself from the rest of the world .

text: a hilarious film for anyone who remembers lying as a kid -- and anyone who wants to see a movie that 's just plain fun .
translation: 子供の頃に嘘をついていたことを覚えている人にも、ただ楽しい映画を見たい人にもおすすめの爆笑映画。
back_translation: A hilarious movie recommended for those who remember telling lies as a child and for those who just want to watch a fun movie.

text: a mobster 's wife is forced to confront her dark side when her young child is kidnapped and held for ransom .
translation: マフィアの妻は、幼い子供が誘拐されて人質に取られたとき、自分の暗い一面と向き合わざるを得なくなる。

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .

back_translation: Writer Dan Schneider and director Shawn Levy use volume and primary colors instead of humor and sharpness.

text: never rising above routine episodic storytelling , white oleander nonetheless retains something of its source novel 's ravaged emotional surface and cool , observant manner .
translation: 『ホワイト・オリンダー』は決して日常的なエピソードの語りを超えることはないが、それでも元の小説の荒れた感情の表面と冷静な観察力を多少なりとも保持している。
back_translation: "White Oleander" never transcends the storytelling of everyday episodes, yet it still retains some of the raw emotional surface and calm observational prowess of the original novel.

text: and this particular scheme requires a large amount of time-travel , and kidnapping austin powers ' father , england 's master spy , nigel powers .
translation: そして、この特定の計画には多くのタイムトラベルが必要であり、オースティン・パワーズの父、イングランドのマスター・スパイ、ナイジェル・パワーズを誘拐する必要があります。
back_translation: And this particular plan requires a lot of time travel, and it is necessary to kidnap Austin Powers' father, Nigel Powers, the master spy of England.

translation: 一度下降のスパイラルが現れると、オートフォーカスは典型的なジャンキーオペラとして現れます。。。

text: it is most remarkable not because of its epic scope , but because of the startling intimacy it achieves despite that breadth .
translation: それは壮大なスケールのためではなく、その幅広さにもかかわらず達成される驚くべき親密さのために最も注目に値します。
back_translation: It is most noteworthy not for its grand scale, but for the remarkable intimacy achieved despite its breadth.

text: fine acting but there is no sense of connecting the dots , just dots .
translation: 素晴らしい演技ですが、点をつなげる感覚はなく、ただの点です。
back_translation: It’s a wonderful performance, but there’s no sense of connecting the dots; they are just individual points.

translation: 続くロードトリップは、すでに満ち overflowing した映画にさらに多くのスラップスティックとロッカールームのユーモアを詰め込んでいます。

text: a gorgeously strange movie , heaven is deeply concerned with morality , but it refuses to spell things out for viewers .
translation: 美しく奇妙な映画『ヘブン』は道徳に深く関心を持っているが、観客に明示することを拒んでいる。

text: a player in a famous orchestra finds sexual experiences with a russian opera singer , which he enjoys much because his wife has just left due to the fact that he has purchased a porno movie .
translation: 有名なオーケストラのプレイヤーは、ロシアのオペラ歌手との性的経験を見つけます。彼はそれを非常に楽しんでいます。なぜなら、妻がポルノ映画を購入したために彼を離れたばかりだからです。
back_translation: A famous orchestra player finds sexual experiences with a Russian opera singer. He enjoys it very much because his wife just left him for buying porn films.

text: woody allen 's latest is an ambling , broad comedy about all there is to love -- and hate -- about the movie biz .
translation: ウディ・アレンの最新作は、映画業界に対する愛と憎しみのすべてを描いた、のんびりとした幅広いコメディです。

text: she is the supply teacher of the 6d , the worst group of st-c & # 233 ; cile elementary school .
translation: 彼女は、最悪のグループである6dの補欠教師です。st-c & # 233 ; cile小学校の。

text: two sisters aged six years , no sooner see their remaining parent buried when they are torn apart .
translation: 6歳の二人の姉妹は、残された親の葬儀を見た途端に引き離されてしまいます。

text: [ drumline ] is entertaining for what it does , and admirable for what it does n't do .
translation: [ドラムライン]は、その行うことにおいて楽しませてくれ、行わないことにおいて称賛に値する。

text: woody allen can write and deliver a one liner as well as anybody . but i had a lot of problems with this movie .

text: he 's a middle aged hermit who likes to talk and has an answer to everything .
translation: 彼は中年の隠者で、話すのが好きで、すべてに答えを持っています。

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .
translation: ユーモアの欠如に悩んでいるにもかかわらず、『ロッキー』の作者であるその男は、こんなに穴だらけの船で沈むべきではない。

text: a non-britney person might survive a screening with little harm done , except maybe for the last 15 minutes , which are as maudlin as any after-school special you can imagine .
translation: ブリトニーでない人は、ほとんど害を受けることなく上映を生き延びるかもしれませんが、最後の15分は想像できる限りの感傷的なアフタースクール特番のようです。

text: meanwhile , on jesse & # 180 ; s trail is the saint of the killers , a holy cowboy assassin with the mission of kill custer .
translation: その間、ジェシー・ピンクマンの跡を追うのは、カスタムを殺す使命を持つ聖なるカウボーイの暗殺者、殺しの聖者である。
back_translation: In the meantime, pursuing Jesse Pinkman is a holy assassin with the mission to kill custom, the Killing Saint.

text: . . . this is n't even a movie we can enjoy as mild escapism ; it is one in which fear and frustration are provoked to intolerable levels .
translation: ...これは穏やかな気分転換として楽しめる映画ですらなく、恐怖とフラストレーションが耐え難いレベルまで引き起こされる作品です。
back_translation: This is not even a movie that can be enjoyed as a gentle diversion; it is a work that evokes fear and frustration to an unbearable level.

text: the screenplay comes across , rather unintentionally , as hip-hop scooby-doo .
translation: その脚本は、意図せずにヒップホップのスカビードゥーのように感じられる。
back_translation: The script unintentionally feels like hip-hop Scooby-Doo.

text: into their midst come a hotshot american , van zan ( matthew mcconaughey ) , who says he has a way to kill the beasts and save mankind - a way quinn 's never seen done .
translation: その中に登場したのは、アメリカのホットショット、ヴァン・ザン（マシュー・マコノヒー）で、彼は人類を救い獣を殺す方法があると言う。それはクインが今まで見たことがない方法だ。
back_translation: Among them appeared the American hotshot, Van Zand (Matthew McConaughey), who claims to have a way to save humanity and kill the beasts. It is a method that Quinn has never seen before.

text: the quest is hope and the passions that drive us in this search .
translation: 探求は希望であり、この探求を駆り立てる情熱です。

text: ultimately she discovers that what appears on the surface to be true quite often is not .
translation: 結局、彼女は表面的に真実に見えるものが、しばしばそうではないことを発見します。

text: leela is the story of leela , an aware , liberal woman who struggles with the true meaning of independence .
translation: リラは、真の独立の意味に苦しむ、意識的でリベラルな女性リラの物語です。

text: robert harmon 's less-is-more approach delivers real bump-in -the-night chills -- his greatest triumph is keeping the creepy crawlies hidden in the film 's thick shadows .
translation: ロバート・ハーモンの「少ないことはもっと多くのこと」というアプローチは、実際に夜中のひやりとした恐怖を提供します。彼の最大の勝利は、映画の濃い影の中に不気味な存在を隠しておくことです。
back_translation: Robert Harmon's approach of "less is more" actually delivers a chilling fear in the dead of night. His greatest triumph is hiding an eerie presence within the film's deep shadows.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other . something for everyone .
translation: ラビュートは、伝統的な物語と現代的な物語を見事にバランスさせており、どちらか一方が他方を圧倒することはありません。誰にでも楽しめる要素があります。
back_translation: Labiute beautifully balances traditional and modern stories, ensuring that neither one overwhelms the other. It contains elements that anyone can enjoy.

text: however , his son is a celibate priest who has never had any success with women . . . , ever .
translation: しかし、彼の息子は独身の神父で、女性と成功したことは一度もありません。。。
back_translation: However, his son is a single priest and has never succeeded with a woman.

text: well , bruce nolan , played by jim carrey , gets that chance after he freaks out on live tv , is fired and is offered a new job by an unknown place .
translation: さて、ジム・キャリーが演じるブルース・ノーランは、ライブテレビでパニックを起こした後、その機会を得て解雇され、未知の場所から新しい仕事を提案されます。
back_translation: Now, Bruce Nolan, played by Jim Carrey, panics during a live television broadcast, gets fired after that incident, and is offered a new job from an unknown source.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: バーンズの五作目のビールに浸した映画は、脚本や演出から濡れた演技に至るまで、ほとんどすべての面で投げやりに感じられる。
back_translation: The fifth film soaked in beer by Burns feels careless in nearly every aspect, from the script and direction to the wet performances.

text: contributors include : director mimi leder , editor anne v . coates , producer gail katz and director claudia weill .
translation: 寄与者には、監督ミミ・リーダー、編集者アン・V・コーツ、プロデューサーゲイル・カッツ、監督クラウディア・ワイルが含まれます。
back_translation: Contributors include director Mimi Leder, editor Anne V. Coates, producer Gale Katz, and director Claudia Weil.

text: takes a look at an old world , passionless arrangement in a way that is at once so biting and so brutally honest that you chuckle first , then shudder .
translation: 古い世界の情熱のない配置を見つめると、それは一度に非常に辛辣で非常に brutal honest で、最初は笑い、次にぞっとする。
back_translation: Staring at the passionless arrangement of the old world, it is at once very caustic and very brutal honest, causing one to first laugh and then feel a chill.

text: but what exactly is good and waht exactly is evil ?
translation: では、善とは正確に何で、悪とは正確に何でしょうか？
back_translation: So, what exactly is good, and what exactly is evil?

text: . . . [ a ] strained comedy that jettisons all opportunities for rock to make his mark by serving up the usual chaotic nonsense .
translation: . . . [a] 力が入ったコメディで、ロックが自分の印を残す機会をすべて放棄し、いつもの混沌としたナンセンスを提供している。
back_translation: ... a comedy with a strong effort, where the rock abandons all opportunities to leave its mark, providing the usual chaotic nonsense.

text: this is a harrowing movie about how parents know where all the buttons are , and how to push them .
translation: これは、親がすべてのボタンの場所を知っていて、それを押す方法を知っていることについての心を痛める映画です。
back_translation: This is a heartbreaking movie about parents knowing the location of all the buttons and how to press them.

text: at once emotional and richly analytical , the cosby-seinfeld encounter alone confirms the serious weight behind this superficially loose , larky documentary .
translation: 感情的でありながら豊かに分析的なこのドキュメンタリーは、一見軽薄に見える中にも真剣な重みを持っていることを、コスビーとサインフェルドの出会いだけで確認できます。
back_translation: This documentary, emotional yet richly analytical, can be confirmed to have serious weight beneath its seemingly superficial surface through the encounter between Cosby and Seinfeld.

text: a fast-moving , fluidly told tale , eugene jarecki 's documentary certainly will likely inflame kissinger 's ardent cronies . and yet , as one-sided as its story is , the movie also manages a measured disposition .
translation: 急速に進行し、流れるように語られる物語であるユージン・ジャレッキーのドキュメンタリーは、確かにキッシンジャーの熱烈な仲間たちを怒らせる可能性が高い。しかし、その物語が一方的であるにもかかわらず、映画はバランスの取れた態度をもたらしている。
back_translation: Eugene Jarecki's documentary, told in a rapidly unfolding and fluid narrative, is sure to anger the fervent supporters of Kissinger. However, despite the one-sidedness of the story, the film brings a balanced perspective.

text: along the way , the filmmakers try to learn from these relationship veterans , while navigating their own fledgling polyamorous relationships .
translation: その過程で、映画製作者たちはこれらの関係のベテランから学ぼうとしながら、自分たちの未熟なポリアモリーの関係を模索します。
back_translation: In that process, the filmmakers try to learn from these experienced individuals in relationships while exploring their own inexperienced polyamorous relationships.

text: would anyone believe mary and joe 's claim to abstinence ?
translation: メリーとジョーの禁欲の主張を誰も信じるだろうか？
back_translation: Would anyone believe Merry and Joe's claim of abstinence?

text: until it goes off the rails in its final 10 or 15 minutes , wendigo , larry fessenden 's spooky new thriller , is a refreshingly smart and newfangled variation on several themes derived from far less sophisticated and knowing horror films .
translation: 最終的に10分または15分の間に脱線するまで、ウェンディゴはラリー・フェッセンデンの新しいスリラーであり、洗練されていないホラー映画から派生したいくつかのテーマに基づく、リフレッシュできるほどスマートで新しいバリエーションです。
back_translation: Ultimately, within 10 or 15 minutes until it goes off track, Wendigo is a refreshing and smart new variation based on some themes derived from Larry Fessenden's new thriller and unrefined horror films.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it . if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: もし映画の神々から銀のトレーで手渡された概念があるとすれば、それがこれです。もしそんなに信頼できる概念が実行において台無しにされた例があるとすれば、それがこれです。
back_translation: If there were a concept handed down on a silver tray by the gods of cinema, it would be this. If there is an example of such a reliable concept being ruined in execution, it would be this.

text: as self-aware movies go , who is cletis tout ? is clever enough , though thin writing proves its undoing .
translation: 自己認識を持つ映画として言えば、クレイティス・タウトとは誰なのか？賢い部分はあるが、薄っぺらな脚本がその破綻をもたらしている。
back_translation: When it comes to films with self-awareness, who is Claytis Taut? While there are intelligent aspects, the shallow script leads to its downfall.

text: saigon , 1952 , a beautiful , exotic , and mysterious city caught in the grips of the vietnamese war of liberation from the french colonial powers .
translation: サイゴン、1952年。美しく、エキゾチックで、神秘的な都市がフランス植民地勢力からの解放戦争の渦中にある。
back_translation: Saigon, 1952. A beautiful, exotic, and mysterious city caught in the turmoil of the war for liberation from French colonial forces.

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels ( hey , do n't shoot the messenger ) .
translation: まあ、ジェイソンはマンハッタンに行ってしまったし、うん、2455年の宇宙ステーションは必然的な続編のアイデアから外していいんじゃないかな（ねえ、メッセンジャーを責めないで）。
back_translation: Well, Jason went to Manhattan, and yeah, I guess we can rule out the idea of a space station in 2455 as a necessary sequel (hey, don't blame the messenger).

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in [ this ] meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: 若さの無分別な衝動が、作家兼監督のアン＝ソフィー・ビロのこの道に迷った無意味なフレンチ・アメージング映画で、全開かつ苛立たしい形で示されています。
back_translation: The reckless impulses of youth are vividly and frustratingly showcased in this aimless French Amazing film by writer-director Anne-Sophie Biro.

text: eva is an accidental witness of the death of a young girl , even more : she 's got it all on tape .
translation: エヴァは若い女の子の死を偶然目撃し、さらにそれを全てテープに録音してしまった。
back_translation: Eva accidentally witnessed the death of a young girl and even recorded it all on tape.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: ドラゴンフライのどちらの半分が悪いのか分からない：何も起こっていない部分か、何かが起こっているが、それが愚かしい部分か。
back_translation: I don't know which half of the dragonfly is bad: the part where nothing is happening, or the part where something is happening but it's foolish.

text: and while bruce is getting everything he wants , he has been ignoring his girlfriend , grace and loses her .
translation: そして、ブルースが望むすべてを手に入れている間、彼は彼女のグレースを無視しており、彼女を失ってしまいます。
back_translation: And while Bruce is getting everything he desires, he ignores her grace and ends up losing her.

text: the acting is amateurish , the cinematography is atrocious , the direction is clumsy , the writing is insipid and the violence is at once luridly graphic and laughably unconvincing .
translation: 演技は素人っぽく、撮影はひどく、演出は不器用で、脚本は味気なく、暴力は一方で vividly graphic でありながら、笑ってしまうほど説得力がありません。
back_translation: The acting is amateurish, the filming is terrible, the direction is clumsy, the script is bland, and while the violence is vividly graphic, it is so unconvincing that it makes you laugh.

text: oblivious of all the differences of status and background , a bond that would never break grew between them .
translation: 地位や背景の違いに気づかないまま、彼らの間には決して壊れることのない絆が育まれた。
back_translation: Without realizing the differences in status and background, an unbreakable bond was forged among them.

text: from spiritual rebirth to bruising defeat , vincent 's odyssey resonates in a profound way , comparable to the classic films of jean renoir .
translation: 精神的な再生から痛烈な敗北まで、ヴァンサンのオデッセイは、ジャン・レノワールのクラシック映画に匹敵する深い共鳴を持っています。
back_translation: From spiritual rebirth to crushing defeat, Vincent's odyssey resonates deeply, comparable to the classic films of Jean Renoir.

text: in this debut short , meeper valiantly tries to warn the patrons of the ale-e-inn ( an intergalactic watering hole with its own constellation of stars ) of impending danger , only to find himself face-to-face with the most fearsome creatures in the galaxy .
translation: このデビュー短編で、ミーパーは勇敢にもアレイイン（独自の星座を持つ銀河間の水飲み場）の客に迫る危険を警告しようと試みるが、銀河で最も恐ろしい生物たちと対面する羽目になる。
back_translation: In this debut short story, Meepa bravely attempts to warn the patrons of the Aleyn (a galaxy-wide watering hole with its own constellations) about the dangers approaching them, only to find themselves face-to-face with the most terrifying creatures in the galaxy.

text: friday after next has the same problem that next friday did -- it 's called where 's chris tucker when you need him ?
translation: 次の金曜日の次の金曜日は、次の金曜日と同じ問題を抱えています。それは「クリス・タッカーはどこにいるのか？」と呼ばれています。
back_translation: The Friday after next Friday has the same problem as next Friday. It is called "Where is Chris Tucker?"

text: the director 's twitchy sketchbook style and adroit perspective shifts grow wearisome amid leaden pacing and indifferent craftsmanship ( most notably wretched sound design ) .
translation: 監督の神経質なスケッチブックスタイルと巧妙な視点の移動は、重苦しいペースと無関心な技術（特にひどい音響デザイン）に囲まれて疲れを感じさせる。
back_translation: The director's neurotic sketchbook style and clever shifts in perspective are surrounded by a heavy pace and indifferent technique (particularly poor sound design), creating a sense of fatigue.

text: that 's why handsome and his three best friends sammy , victor and the cribsheet genius applebee have banded together and found ways to cheat on their tests all through their school years .
translation: それが理由で、ハンサムと彼の親友のサミー、ビクター、そしてカンニングシートの天才アップルビーは団結し、学校生活を通じてテストでカンニングする方法を見つけました。
back_translation: For that reason, handsome and his best friends Sammy, Victor, and the genius of cheat sheets, Appleby, united and found ways to cheat on tests throughout their school life.

text: beautifully filmed and well acted . . . but admittedly problematic in its narrative specifics .
translation: 美しく撮影され、演技も素晴らしいが…物語の具体的な内容には問題があることは認めざるを得ない。
back_translation: It is beautifully shot and the acting is excellent, but I must admit that there are issues with the specific content of the story.

text: lindberg demonstrates a remarkable sense of place , a keen understanding that emotions are boiled into a concentrate , not diluted , in the rural setting .
translation: リンドバーグは、田舎の風景において感情が薄められるのではなく、濃縮されるという卓越した場所感覚と鋭い理解を示しています。
back_translation: Lindbergh demonstrates an exceptional sense of place and keen understanding that emotions are not diluted in rural landscapes, but rather concentrated.

text: i cry for i spy -- or i would if this latest and laziest imaginable of all vintage-tv spinoffs were capable of engendering an emotional response of any kind .
translation: 私は泣いています、スパイのために -- もしこの最新かつ最も怠惰なビンテージテレビのスピンオフが、いかなる感情的反応を生み出すことができるなら、ですが。
back_translation: I am crying for the spy -- if this latest and laziest vintage television spin-off can evoke any emotional response, that is.

text: four outlandish but faithful men , a moslem , a hindu , a jew and a christian coincidently meet up a mountain , at an altitude of 3000 metres .
translation: 奇抜だが忠実な4人の男、ムスリム、ヒンドゥー教徒、ユダヤ人、そしてクリスチャンが、偶然3000メートルの山で出会った。
back_translation: Four unusual but faithful men, a Muslim, a Hindu, a Jew, and a Christian, happened to meet on a 3000-meter mountain.

text: but on the wedding day , they also sign a divorce agreement which is effective one year after their marriage .
translation: しかし、結婚式の日に、彼らは結婚から1年後に発効する離婚契約にも署名します。
back_translation: However, on the day of the wedding, they also sign a divorce agreement that will take effect one year after the marriage.

text: the film falls short on tension , eloquence , spiritual challenge -- things that have made the original new testament stories so compelling for 20 centuries .
translation: この映画は、緊張感、雄弁さ、精神的挑戦といった、オリジナルの新約聖書の物語が20世紀にわたって魅力的であり続けた要素において不足しています。
back_translation: This movie lacks the elements of tension, eloquence, and spiritual challenge that have made the original New Testament stories compelling for centuries.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: その開放感や小さな驚きを楽しんでください。
back_translation: Enjoy that sense of liberation and small surprises.

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: 宮崎駿の非止まり映像はとても素晴らしく、彼の想像力は非常に生き生きとしているため、『となりのトトロ』に対する唯一の不満は、休息の時間やタイムアウトがないということだけです。
back_translation: Hayao Miyazaki's non-stop animation is truly wonderful, and his imagination is very vivid, so the only complaint I have about "My Neighbor Totoro" is that there are no pauses or timeouts.

text: it 's the end of the world as metaphor for how we scuttle relationships , and it 's a remarkably apt one .
translation: それは人間関係をどのように損なうかの比喩として「世界の終わり」であり、非常に的確な表現です。
back_translation: It is a metaphor for how it can damage human relationships, and it is a very apt expression of "the end of the world."

text: this film was made by and for those folks who collect the serial killer cards and are fascinated by the mere suggestion of serial killers . for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: この映画は、連続殺人犯のカードを集め、連続殺人犯の単なる示唆に魅了される人々のために作られました。私たちのような他の人にとっては、ダーマーの2時間を過ごすことは、ほとんど罰と同じです。
back_translation: This movie is made for people who collect cards of serial killers and are fascinated by the mere implications of serial killers. For others like us, spending two hours with Dahmer feels almost like a punishment.

text: from stag beetle to swastika narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images the historionaut , a history machine , produces an incessant stream of remembered , contemporary and future images .
translation: ノコギリクワガタからスワスティカへと、画像を操作し使用する無限の可能性を詳細に、関連付けたモンタージュで語ります。歴史ナビゲーター、歴史機械は、記憶された現代の未来の画像の絶え間ない流れを生み出します。
