back_translation: From the stag beetle to the swastika, we discuss in detail the infinite possibilities of manipulating and using images through a related montage. The history navigator, the history machine, generates an unceasing flow of remembered modern future images.

text: by the time it ends in a rush of sequins , flashbulbs , blaring brass and back-stabbing babes , it has said plenty about how show business has infiltrated every corner of society -- and not always for the better .
translation: それがスパンコールの急激な輝き、フラッシュ写真、鳴り響く金管楽器、そして裏切り者の女性たちに急き立てられて終わる頃までには、ショービジネスが社会のあらゆる隅々に浸透していることについて多くを語っている－そして必ずしも良い方向に向かっているわけではない。
back_translation: By the time it ends with the sudden brilliance of sequins, flash photography, the resounding brass instruments, and the urging of the treacherous women, it speaks volumes about how show business has permeated every corner of society—and not necessarily in a good direction.

text: the film succeeds as an homage to human spirit in the most shattering of circumstances .
translation: その映画は、最も壊滅的な状況における人間の精神へのオマージュとして成功している。
back_translation: The film succeeds as a tribute to the human spirit in the most devastating circumstances.

text: arcangel and his son travel to hometown , the familiy house looks abandoned , only isabel , a misterious old woman , is there .
translation: アルカンヘルと彼の息子は故郷に旅行し、家族の家は廃墟のように見え、そこには神秘的な老女イサベルだけがいた。
back_translation: Arkangel and his son traveled to their hometown, where their family home looked like a ruin, and only the mysterious old woman Isabel was there.

text: smart science fiction for grown-ups , with only a few false steps along the way .
translation: 大人向けのスマートなサイエンスフィクションで、途中にほんのいくつかの誤りがあるだけです。
back_translation: It's a smart science fiction for adults, with only a few minor errors along the way.

text: i 'll go out on a limb . it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year . it 's just merely very bad .
translation: 私はリスクを冒して言いますが、これは今年の最悪の映画の一つではありません。ただ単に非常に悪いだけです。
back_translation: I will risk saying that this is not one of the worst movies of the year. It's just very bad.

text: disney has always been hit-or-miss when bringing beloved kids ' books to the screen . . . tuck everlasting is a little of both .
translation: ディズニーは、愛される子供の本を画面に持ってくる際、常に当たり外れがあります…『タック・エバーラスティング』はその両方の要素があります。
back_translation: Disney always has hits and misses when bringing beloved children's books to the screen... "Tuck Everlasting" contains both elements.

text: . . . its stupidities wind up sticking in one 's mind a lot more than the cool bits .
translation: …その愚かさは、かっこいい部分よりもずっと心に残る。
back_translation: ...that foolishness remains in my heart much more than the cool parts.

text: in a world besieged by world war ii , wendy , now grown up , tries to give her own children hope by telling them of her magical experiences with peter pan in never land .
translation: 第二次世界大戦に包囲された世界で、成長したウェンディは、自身の子供たちにネバーランドでピーターパンとの魔法の体験を語ることで希望を与えようとします。
back_translation: In a world besieged by World War II, grown-up Wendy tries to give hope to her children by telling them magical experiences with Peter Pan in Neverland.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: 脚本はスマートでダークです - 小さな恩恵に感謝します。
back_translation: The script is smart and dark - I appreciate the small blessings.

text: a love story played out against a backdrop of political and religious upheaval .
translation: 政治的および宗教的動乱を背景に繰り広げられるラブストーリー。
back_translation: A love story unfolding against the backdrop of political and religious turmoil.

text: an internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the dna of a junkie .
translation: インターネットテロリストがジャンキーのDNAに基づいてコンピュータソースコードを作成する。
back_translation: Internet terrorists create computer source code based on the DNA of junkies.

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: それは同時に滑稽であり、必死に見てしまうほどの愚かさを持っています。
back_translation: It is both ridiculous and possesses a foolishness that makes you desperately want to watch it.

text: retired fbi profiler terry mccaleb ( eastwood ) , who has recently had a heart transplant , is hired by graciela rivers ( de jesus ) , to investigate the death of her sister , gloria , who happens to have given mccaleb his heart .
translation: 退役したFBIプロファイラーのテリー・マカレブ（イーストウッド）は、心臓移植を受けたばかりで、グラシエラ・リヴァース（デ・ヘスス）から雇われて、彼女の妹グロリアの死を調査することになります。実はグロリアはマカレブに心臓を提供した人物です。
back_translation: Retired FBI profiler Terry McCaleb (Eastwood), who has just undergone a heart transplant, is hired by Graciela Rivers (De Jesus) to investigate the death of her sister Gloria. In fact, Gloria is the person who donated her heart to McCaleb.

text: sassy postgrad elle woods ( witherspoon ) is all about animal rights .
translation: サassyな大学院生エル・ウッズ（リース・ウィザースプーン）は動物の権利にすべてを捧げています。
back_translation: Sassy graduate student Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon) dedicates everything to animal rights.

text: centuries of tradition place this holy mountain in the sinai peninsula of egypt , but compelling evidence will show that this hallowed ground , where moses was told to take the shoes of his feet before the burning bush , may actually be in the barren deserts of northwestern saudi arabia .
translation: 数世紀にわたる伝統は、この聖なる山をエジプトのシナイ半島に位置づけていますが、モーセが燃える茨の前で靴を脱ぐように言われたこの神聖な場所は、実際にはサウジアラビアの北西部の荒れた砂漠にある可能性があるという説得力のある証拠があります。
back_translation: For centuries, tradition has placed this sacred mountain in the Sinai Peninsula of Egypt, but there is compelling evidence that this holy site, where Moses was told to take off his sandals in front of the burning bush, may actually be located in the rugged desert of northwestern Saudi Arabia.

text: its valuable message makes it a must-see for children and teenagers , and even more so for those callous adults who have become casually corrupt in their efforts to simply get through life .
translation: その貴重なメッセージは、子供やティーンエイジャーにとって必見であり、人生を簡単に乗り越えようとする中で無関心に堕落してしまった冷酷な大人たちにとっては、なおさらです。
back_translation: That valuable message is essential for children and teenagers, and even more so for cold-hearted adults who have fallen into indifference while trying to navigate life easily.

text: it seems like i have been waiting my whole life for this movie and now i ca n't wait for the sequel .
translation: この映画のために人生を全て待っていたような気がしていて、今は続編が待ちきれません。
back_translation: I feel like I've been waiting my whole life for this movie, and now I can't wait for the sequel.

text: this is n't just the cliffsnotes version of nicholas nickleby , it 's the cliffsnotes with pages missing .
translation: これはニコラス・ニクルビーのクリフノート版だけではなく、ページが欠けているクリフノート版です。
back_translation: This is not only a Cliff Notes version of Nicholas Nickleby, but also a version with missing pages.

text: years later , at the inauguration of the 'paradise-casino ' , patricia announces to a stunned crowd and a flabbergasted katherine that she immediately retires from showbusiness .
translation: 数年後、「パラダイス・カジノ」の開業式で、パトリシアは驚いた群衆と呆然としたキャサリンに、彼女はすぐにショービジネスを引退することを発表します。
back_translation: A few years later, at the opening ceremony of "Paradise Casino," Patricia announces to the astonished crowd and the bewildered Catherine that she will be retiring from show business immediately.

text: a hip ride into hyper-time , clockstoppers is a lively and enjoyable adventure for all ages at any time .
translation: 「ハイパータイムへのヒップライド、クロックストッパーズは、年齢を問わずいつでも楽しめる活気に満ちた冒険です。」
back_translation: "The Hip Ride to Hyper Time, Clock Stoppers is a vibrant adventure that can be enjoyed at any age."

text: an entertaining and poignantly bittersweet take-down of a good man 's midlife crisis .
translation: 良い男の中年危機に対する楽しげで切なくも甘美な反撃。
back_translation: A cheerful yet bittersweet and beautiful counterattack against a good man's midlife crisis.

text: ultimately this is a frustrating patchwork : an uneasy marriage of louis begley 's source novel ( about schmidt ) and an old payne screenplay .
translation: 結局、これはフラストレーションを感じるつぎはぎの作品です：ルイ・べグレーの原作小説（アバウト・シュミット）と古いペインの脚本が不格好に結びついています。
back_translation: In the end, this is a patchwork piece that feels frustrating: the original novel by Louis Begley (About Schmidt) and the old screenplay by Payne are awkwardly intertwined.

text: sort of an existential version of a seinfeld episode .
translation: サインフェルドのエピソードのような存在主義的なバージョン。
back_translation: An existential version like an episode of Seinfeld.

text: the camera cuts back and forth between gus and grace : he talks about what a great driver he is , she says he 's a lousy driver .
translation: カメラはガスとグレースの間を行き来し、彼は自分が素晴らしいドライバーであると話し、彼女は彼が下手なドライバーだと言います。
back_translation: The camera moves back and forth between Gus and Grace, as he talks about being a great driver, and she says that he is a bad driver.

text: there has to be a few advantages to never growing old . like being able to hit on a 15-year old when you 're over 100 .
translation: 老けないことにはいくつかの利点があるに違いない。例えば、100歳を超えても15歳の子にアプローチできることなど。
back_translation: There must be several advantages to not aging. For example, being able to approach a 15-year-old even after turning 100.

text: a london website designer ops out of her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a nice boyfriend when she forms a dangerously obsessive bond with a handsome , mysterious mountaineer , who turns out to have some secrets .
translation: ロンドンのウェブデザイナーは、素敵な彼氏との快適で普通の関係から離れ、魅力的で神秘的な登山家との危険なまでに執着する関係を築く。しかし、その登山家にはいくつかの秘密があることが判明する。
back_translation: A web designer in London leaves her comfortable and regular relationship with her lovely boyfriend to build a dangerously obsessive relationship with an alluring and mysterious mountaineer. However, it turns out that the mountaineer has some secrets.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: 魅力的で面白く、美しく作られた輸入作品であるだけでなく、セリフが非常に少なく、読むのもアクションを追うのも比較的容易です。
back_translation: It is not only an attractive, interesting, and beautifully crafted imported work, but it also has very few lines of dialogue, making it relatively easy to read and follow the action.

text: they will try to find hanareh , a singer with a magic voice who crossed the border and may now be in danger in the iraqi kurdistan .
translation: 彼らは、国境を越えた魔法のような声を持つ歌手ハナレを見つけようとし、彼女が現在イラクのクルディスタンで危険にさらされている可能性がある。
back_translation: They are trying to find the singer Hanare, who has a magical voice that transcends borders, as she may currently be in danger in Iraqi Kurdistan.

text: nearly manages to be what `` blow `` could n't - a perpetual night party that generates a sick fascination to the bitter end .
translation: ほぼ「ブロウ」ができなかったものになる - 苦い結末まで病的な魅力を生み出す永遠の夜のパーティ。
back_translation: Almost unable to "blow" - a night of eternal partying that creates a pathological allure leading to a bitter ending.

text: the project of pre-crime , at the time being in a state of trial run , is going to be voted about in the near future .
translation: 事前犯罪プロジェクトは、現在試験運用中であり、近い将来に投票が行われる予定です。
back_translation: The pre-crime project is currently in trial operation and is scheduled to hold a vote in the near future.

text: fontaine 's direction , especially her agreeably startling use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera , creates sheerly cinematic appeal .
translation: フォンテーヌの演出、特に彼女の心地よく驚くべきクローズアップの使い方や、動くカメラに対する彼女の優雅さは、純粋に映画的な魅力を生み出している。
back_translation: Fontaine's direction, especially her pleasantly surprising use of close-ups and her elegance with the moving camera, creates a purely cinematic charm.

text: it 's a race against the clock as jay must convince kay -- who not only has no memory of his time spent with the agency , but is also the only person alive who has the expertise to save the galaxy -- to reunite with the mib before earth is destroyed completely .
translation: 時間との競争だ。ジェイは、エージェンシーで過ごした時間をまったく覚えていないだけでなく、銀河を救う専門知識を持つ唯一の生存者でもあるケイを説得しなければならない。地球が完全に壊滅する前に、MIBと再会させるために。
back_translation: It’s a race against time. Jay not only doesn't remember any of the time he spent at the agency, but he also has to persuade Kay, the only survivor with the expertise to save the galaxy, to reunite with MIB before Earth is completely destroyed.

text: marly has given her career as an aquatic weeki wachee mermaid up and her marriage to steve is over .
translation: マーリーは水中ウィキワッチーマーメイドとしてのキャリアを終え、スティーブとの結婚も終わりました。
back_translation: Marley has ended her career as an underwater wiki-watching mermaid and her marriage to Steve is also over.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara `` has n't much more to serve than silly fluff . nor is it a romantic comedy .
translation: ペリーは良いキャラクターで興味深いですが、「サラをサーブする」は、馬鹿げた軽薄さ以上のものを提供していません。また、ロマンティックコメディでもありません。
back_translation: Perry is a good character and interesting, but "Serving Sarah" offers nothing more than silly frivolity. It's also not a romantic comedy.

text: the result of a weekend affair he had back at the height of his fame produced olivia , a newpaper delivery girl for the south wales echo .
translation: 彼が名声の絶頂にあった頃の週末の浮気の結果として、オリビアという南ウェールズ・エコーの新聞配達少女が生まれた。
back_translation: As a result of a weekend affair during the height of his fame, a girl named Olivia was born, who was a newspaper delivery girl for the South Wales Echo.

text: everyone around graham has their reasons why he should or should n't fully recover . . .
translation: グラハムの周りの誰もが、彼が完全に回復すべき理由や、回復すべきでない理由を持っている。
back_translation: Everyone around Graham has their own reasons for why he should fully recover or why he should not recover.

text: after confidential ( and shameful ) information was released by british authorities , this amazing story of survival was finally confirmed .
translation: 英国当局によって機密（および恥ずべき）情報が公開された後、この驚くべき生存の物語がついに確認されました。
back_translation: After confidential (and embarrassing) information was disclosed by the British authorities, this remarkable survival story has finally been confirmed.

text: hope looms on the horizon though : he 's closing in fast on his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in north conway .
translation: 希望が地平線に迫っています：彼はノースコンウェイで四つ星レストランを開く夢に急速に近づいています。
back_translation: Hope is approaching the horizon: He is rapidly getting closer to his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in North Conway.

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: ジョン・ウォーターズやトッド・ソロンズの作品に触発された、長く曲がりくねったスケッチのようなもので、完全に発展したストーリーではありません。
back_translation: It is like a long, winding sketch inspired by the works of John Waters and Todd Solondz, and it does not have a fully developed story.

text: using his family 's old mob connections , tony has mapped out every detail for a very special evening .
translation: トニーは家族の古いマフィアのコネを利用して、特別な夜のためのすべての詳細を計画しました。
back_translation: Tony utilized his family's old mafia connections to plan every detail for the special night.

text: although no pastry is violated , this nasty comedy pokes fun at the same easy targets as other rowdy raunch-fests -- farts , boobs , unmentionables -- without much success .
translation: pastry は侵害されていないが、この下品なコメディは、他の騒々しい下ネタの作品と同様に、成功することなく、同じ簡単な標的であるおなら、胸部、言及できないものを笑い飛ばしている。
back_translation: While the pastry is not infringed upon, this vulgar comedy, like other noisy works of raunchy humor, fails to succeed by making fun of the same easy targets: flatulence, breasts, and things that cannot be mentioned.

text: it is only natural for `` the shu `` to flourish under the care of corrupt and powerful men like battista .
translation: 「シュウ」がバティスタのような腐敗した権力者の手の下で栄えるのは自然なことです。
back_translation: It is natural for "Shuu" to thrive under the control of a corrupt ruler like Batista.

text: she trails the couch through a quirky landscape populated by hasidim in brooklyn , holocaust survivors and ex-communists in hungary , and , finally , the next generation of formerly-hasidic jews on the margins of their communities in new york and israel .
translation: 彼女は、ブルックリンのハシディーム、ホロコーストの生存者、ハンガリーの元共産主義者たちが住む風変わりな風景を通りながらソファを引きずって進み、最後にはニューヨークとイスラエルのコミュニティの周辺にいる元ハシディックのユダヤ人たちの次世代にたどり着きます。
back_translation: She drags a sofa through the quirky landscape inhabited by the Hasidim of Brooklyn, Holocaust survivors, and former communists from Hungary, eventually arriving at the next generation of former Hasidic Jews in the communities of New York and Israel.

text: in cinemania , hollywood 's biggest fans become the true stars .
translation: シネマニアでは、ハリウッドの最大のファンが真のスターになります。
back_translation: In cinema mania, the biggest fans of Hollywood become true stars.

text: through his addiction to these ardent visions , he becomes more reclusive .
translation: 彼はこれらの熱烈なビジョンに対する依存を通じて、ますます孤立するようになる。
back_translation: He will become increasingly isolated through his reliance on these fervent visions.

text: . . . best seen as speculative history , as much an exploration of the paranoid impulse as a creative sequel to the warren report .
translation: ・・・最良の形であれば、推測的歴史として見られるべきであり、偏執的衝動の探求としても、ウォーレン報告書の創造的な続編としてもあります。
back_translation: ...if it is in its best form, it should be seen as a speculative history, a pursuit of paranoid impulses, and also as a creative sequel to the Warren Report.

text: in building a home-made bomb and setting off a plan that fails miserably , her status changes from young widow to that of a criminal in custody .
translation: 自家製爆弾を製作し、ひどく失敗する計画を実行することで、彼女の立場は若い未亡人から拘束された犯罪者へと変わる。
back_translation: By executing a plan to make homemade bombs and failing disastrously, her position shifts from that of a young widow to that of a restrained criminal.

text: searching for validity , recognition , and truth , he befriends a quirky computer genius and a kickboxing goddess , who all help one another realize what they have been missing from their lives .
translation: 有効性、認識、真実を求めて、彼は風変わりなコンピュータ天才とキックボクシングの女神と友達になります。彼らは互いに助け合い、自分たちの人生から何が欠けていたのかを理解する手助けをします。
back_translation: In search of effectiveness, recognition, and truth, he befriends an eccentric computer genius and a kickboxing goddess. They help each other and assist in understanding what has been lacking in their lives.

text: set in an american town in the rocky mountains in the 1930s .
translation: 1930年代のロッキー山脈のアメリカの町を舞台にしています。
back_translation: It is set in an American town in the Rocky Mountains during the 1930s.

text: when a humans camp is attacked by tigers , a woman takes her baby and jumps on a river .
translation: 人間のキャンプがトラに襲われたとき、女性は赤ちゃんを抱えて川に飛び込む。
back_translation: When a human camp was attacked by a tiger, a woman jumped into the river holding her baby.

text: mother and daughter hide in the `` panic room , `` a secret room designed for just such a purpose , but still end up fighting for their lives . . .
translation: 母と娘は「パニックルーム」、そのために設計された秘密の部屋に隠れますが、それでも命をかけて戦わなければなりません。。。
back_translation: A mother and daughter hide in a "panic room," a secret room designed for that purpose, but they still have to fight for their lives...

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : 'scooby ' do n't .
translation: 熱心でない限り、最良のアドバイスは「スクービーしないこと」です。
back_translation: Unless you are enthusiastic, the best advice is "not to scooby."

text: it takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of robert forster , anne meara , eugene levy , and reginald veljohnson all in the same movie .
translation: ロバート・フォースター、アン・ミーラ、ユージン・レビー、そしてレジナルド・ヴェルジョンソンの才能を同じ映画で無駄にするには、奇妙な種類の怠惰が必要だ。
back_translation: It takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of Robert Forster, Anne Meara, Eugene Levy, and Reginald VelJohnson in the same movie.

text: french director helene angel 's dark but deftly handled fable about familial violence has a terrifying , fairy-tale atmosphere that 's in perfect keeping with its unique point of view .
translation: フランスの監督エレーヌ・アンジェルによる、家族の暴力についての暗くも巧みに扱われた寓話は、その独自の視点と完璧に調和した恐ろしいおとぎ話の雰囲気を持っています。
back_translation: A dark yet skillfully handled fable about domestic violence by French director Hélène Angel possesses a unique perspective and an atmosphere of a horrifying fairy tale that is perfectly in harmony.

text: rainone 's love affair with singing sensation kelly mcguire whom he discovered and his near demise by the hands of his own prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; vincent riccola is the juice that fuels this roller coaster ride through two debauchery-filled decades of greed , sex , drugs and rock and roll .
translation: レインワンの歌唱のセンスを持つケリー・マクギルと彼の発見した愛の関係、そして彼自身の弟子であるヴァンセント・リコラの手による近い死は、欲望、セックス、ドラッグ、ロックンロールに満ちた2つの10年にわたるこのジェットコースターのような旅を駆動するエネルギーです。
back_translation: Kelly McGill, with his singing talent akin to Rain One, his love affair discovered, and the close death orchestrated by his own disciple Vincent Ricola, drives this rollercoaster journey filled with desire, sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll over two decades.

text: when billy becomes suspicious , all hell breaks loose .
translation: ビリーが疑いを持つと、すべてがめちゃくちゃになる。
back_translation: When Billy becomes suspicious, everything falls apart.

text: he holds her prisoner while awaiting the surgery , but she escapes and hides out until she raises enough money to flee to the u . s . when she arrives in new york , she is placed in a detention center .
translation: 彼は手術を待っている間、彼女を囚人として保持しますが、彼女は脱出し、アメリカに逃げるための十分な金を集めるまで隠れています。ニューヨークに到着すると、彼女は拘置所に収容されます。
back_translation: He keeps her as a prisoner while waiting for surgery, but she escapes and hides until she gathers enough money to flee to America. Upon arriving in New York, she is taken into custody.

text: a penetrating , potent exploration of sanctimony , self-awareness , self-hatred and self-determination .
translation: 堅固で力強い聖なる気取り、自己認識、自己嫌悪、自己決定の探求。
back_translation: A solid and powerful sacred attitude, the pursuit of self-awareness, self-hatred, and self-determination.

text: a big time drug dealer victor rosa ( john leguizamo ) is looking to get out of the game and sees his chance with a big deal with a new friend who happens to be a wall st . stockbroker .
translation: 大物麻薬密売人ビクター・ローザ（ジョン・レグイザモ）は、ゲームから抜け出そうとしており、偶然ウォール街の株式仲買人である新しい友人との大きな取引でチャンスを見つけます。
back_translation: Big-time drug dealer Victor Rosa (John Leguizamo) is trying to escape the game and accidentally finds an opportunity with a major deal involving his new friend, a Wall Street stockbroker.

text: clashing their swords in fiece mortal combat , will and jack attempt to recapture the black pearl ship , save the british navy , and relinquish a fortune in forbidden treasure thereby lifting the curse of the pirates of the caribbean .
translation: 激しい死闘で剣を交え、ウィルとジャックはブラック・パール号を奪還し、イギリス海軍を救い、禁じられた宝の財産を放棄することで、カリブの海賊の呪いを解こうと奮闘する。
back_translation: In a fierce battle, Will and Jack engage in a sword fight, striving to reclaim the Black Pearl, save the British Navy, and lift the curse of the Caribbean pirates by renouncing the treasure of the forbidden wealth.

text: besides being performers , they are also political activists - in aids awareness , anti-gay violence , the sex workers movement and the struggle against the extreme right and racism .
translation: パフォーマーであるだけでなく、彼らはエイズ啓発、反ゲイ暴力、売春婦の運動、極右や人種差別に対する闘いにおいても政治活動家です。
back_translation: Not only are they performers, but they are also political activists in AIDS awareness, anti-gay violence, the advocacy for sex workers, and the fight against the far-right and racism.

text: desperate for a grandchild , she 's eager to see him married and spends much of her time planning introductions to suitable chinese girls for daniel .
translation: 孫が欲しくてたまらず、彼女はダニエルを適した中国人の女の子たちに紹介する計画を立てることに多くの時間を費やし、彼の結婚を心待ちにしています。
back_translation: Desperate to have a grandchild, she spends a lot of time planning to introduce Daniel to suitable Chinese girls and eagerly awaits his marriage.

text: suddenly , patricia becomes suspicious that this arrogant man ca n't be her beloved husband .
translation: 突然、パトリシアはこの傲慢な男が彼女の愛する夫ではないのではないかと疑い始めた。
back_translation: Suddenly, Patricia began to suspect that this arrogant man might not be her beloved husband.

text: charlotte and teis , partners for some years , are going to climb a mountain , literally and metaphorically .
translation: シャーロットとテイスは、数年間のパートナーであり、文字通りと比喩的に山を登ろうとしています。
back_translation: Charlotte and Tace have been partners for several years, literally and metaphorically trying to climb mountains.

text: jimmy ( thomas ) is a highly educated barber with a superiority complex who ca n't stand isaac ( garity ) , the new , white barber who just wants a shot at cutting some hair .
translation: ジミー（トーマス）は優越感を抱く高学歴のバーバーで、髪を切りたいだけの新しい白人バーバー、アイザック（ガリティ）が大嫌いです。
back_translation: Jimmy (Thomas) is an elitist, highly educated barber who has a strong dislike for the new white barber, Isaac (Garity), who just wants to get a haircut.

text: could matty finish a porn movie before his legs get broken by tokyo tony ?
translation: マティは東京トニーに足を折られる前にポルノ映画を終わらせることができるのだろうか？
back_translation: Will Mattie be able to finish the porn movie before Tokyo Tony breaks his leg?

text: but just when james starts to question his role and his cat-and-mouse relationship with his mentor , burke taps him for a special assignment to root out a mole .
translation: しかし、ジェームズが自分の役割やメンターとのネズミと猫のような関係に疑問を抱き始めたとき、バークが彼にモルを見つけ出す特別任務を与えます。
back_translation: However, when James began to question his role and the mouse-and-cat relationship with his mentor, Burke assigned him a special mission to find the mole.

text: a light-hearted french film about the spiritual quest of a fashion model seeking peace of mind while in a love affair with a veterinarian who is a non-practicing jew .
translation: 心の平和を求めるファッションモデルの精神的な旅を描いた軽やかなフランス映画。彼女はユダヤ教徒で実践はしていない獣医との恋愛関係にある。
back_translation: A lighthearted French film depicting the spiritual journey of a fashion model seeking peace of mind. She is in a romantic relationship with a Jewish veterinarian who does not practice.

text: . . . a visually pleasing , imaginative entertainment for the family audience .
translation: 視覚的に魅力的で、家族向けの想像力豊かなエンターテインメント。
back_translation: Visually appealing and imaginative entertainment for families.

text: for the next 2 1/2 years , these outrageous drag performers created 20 shows with titles like `` a crab on uranus means you 're loved `` and `` tinsel tarts in a hot coma , `` and were featured in four underground films .
translation: 次の2年半で、これらの非常識なドラッグパフォーマーたちは「あなたの天王星にいるカニはあなたが愛されていることを意味する」や「ホットコーマの中のティンセルタルト」といったタイトルの20本のショーを作り、4本の地下映画にも出演しました。
back_translation: In the next two and a half years, these outrageous drag performers created 20 shows with titles like "The Crab in Your Uranus Means You Are Loved" and "Tinsel Tart in a Hot Coma," and also appeared in four underground films.

text: alternately hilarious and sad , aggravating and soulful , scathing and joyous . it 's a masterpeice .
translation: 交互に面白く、悲しく、苛立たしく、心に響き、辛辣で喜ばしい。それは傑作だ。
back_translation: Alternately interesting, sad, frustrating, resonant, biting, and delightful. It is a masterpiece.

text: highlighted by a gritty style and an excellent cast , it 's better than one might expect when you look at the list of movies starring ice-t in a major role .
translation: 粗いスタイルと素晴らしいキャストによって際立っており、アイス-Tが主要な役で出演している映画のリストを見ると、期待以上の出来となっています。
back_translation: It stands out with its rough style and fantastic cast, and looking at the list of movies featuring Ice-T in a major role, it exceeds expectations.

text: the kind of movie that leaves vague impressions and a nasty aftertaste but little clear memory of its operational mechanics .
translation: あいまいな印象と嫌な後味を残すが、その運営メカニズムについての明確な記憶はほとんど残らないような映画。
back_translation: A film that leaves an ambiguous impression and an unpleasant aftertaste, but leaves almost no clear memory of its operational mechanisms.

text: gives an intriguing twist to the french coming-of-age genre .
translation: フランスの成長物語のジャンルに興味深いひねりを加えています。
back_translation: It adds an interesting twist to the genre of growth stories in France.

text: the film follows three tracks : banks 's slow recruitment of bennie , the set-up for the hit at a swank resort in mexico , and the fbi 's close pursuit of banks , whom they want alive in hopes he 'll rat out his bosses .
translation: この映画は三つのストーリーラインを追っています：バンクスのベニーに対するゆっくりとした勧誘、高級リゾート地メキシコでの暗殺の準備、そしてバンクスを生け捕りにし彼がボスを裏切ることを期待しているＦＢＩによる厳しい追跡です。
back_translation: This movie follows three storylines: a slow recruitment of Benny by Banks, the preparation for an assassination in an upscale resort in Mexico, and the intense pursuit by the FBI, which hopes to capture Banks alive and expects him to betray his boss.

text: this angst-ridden territory was covered earlier and much better in ordinary people .
translation: この苦悩に満ちた領域は『普通の人々』で以前に、そしてずっと良く扱われています。
back_translation: This realm filled with anguish was previously and much better addressed in "Ordinary People."

text: it has become apparent that the franchise 's best years are long past .
translation: フランチャイズの最盛期はすでに過ぎ去ったことが明らかになってきています。
back_translation: It has become clear that the peak of the franchise era has already passed.

text: within the five walls of the boxes , the rhythmic and dynamic movements become a fascinating visual experience .
translation: 箱の五つの壁の中で、リズミカルでダイナミックな動きが魅力的な視覚体験となります。
back_translation: Within the five walls of the box, rhythmic and dynamic movements create an appealing visual experience.

text: as for joe , he is bent on revenge for the beating he took , and soon he has a new prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; brad ( rick schroder ) who is just as good if not better then johnny .
translation: ジョーは、自分が受けた暴行に対する復讐に固執しており、すぐに新しい弟子のブラッド（リック・シュローダー）を得ます。彼はジョニーと同じくらい、あるいはそれ以上に優れた存在です。
back_translation: Joe is obsessed with revenge for the assault he endured and soon acquires a new disciple, Brad (Rick Schroder). He is as good as, if not better than Johnny.

text: however , when a friend confronts him with a very dark and horrifying scam for some quick dough and good times , he declines , but never the less he soon finds himself entangled in a web of sex , drugs and christmas carols .
translation: しかし、友人が彼に非常に暗く恐ろしい詐欺を持ちかけて短期間でお金を得ようとすると、彼は断るが、それにもかかわらず、彼はすぐにセックス、麻薬、そしてクリスマスキャロルの網に絡まってしまう。
back_translation: However, when a friend presents him with a very dark and terrible scam to make money in a short time, he refuses, yet he soon finds himself entangled in a web of sex, drugs, and Christmas carols.

text: do n't expect any surprises in this checklist of teamwork cliches . . .
translation: このチームワークのクリンチフレーズのチェックリストには、驚きは期待しないでください。。。
back_translation: Please do not expect surprises in this checklist of teamwork clinches...

text: stuart 's poor-me persona needs a whole bunch of snowball 's cynicism to cut through the sugar coating . but once the falcon arrives in the skies above manhattan , the adventure is on red alert .
translation: スチュアートの「かわいそうな僕」な人格は、甘い表現を切り抜けるために、スノーボールの皮肉がたくさん必要です。しかし、一旦ファルコンがマンハッタンの空に現れると、冒険は赤信号が点灯します。
back_translation: Stuart's "poor me" personality requires a lot of sarcasm from Snowball to navigate through the sweet expressions. However, once Falcon appears in the skies over Manhattan, the adventure hits a red light.

text: mark hamill , sally struthers , brad hunt , angela featherstone and missy crider round out the cast .
translation: マーク・ハミル、サリー・ストラザーズ、ブラッド・ハント、アンジェラ・フェザーストーン、ミス・クライダーがキャストを結成しています。
back_translation: Mark Hamill, Sally Struthers, Brad Hunt, Angela Featherstone, and Miss Ryder have formed the cast.

text: after an attempt is made on his life by unknown gunmen , whom he kills them all using martal arts skills he did n't know he had , he learns that all of his dreams of a past life are real and that for the past three years he was raised by the couple after finding him in a river , half-dead with five bullet wounds in him .
translation: 未知の銃撃者による命の狙撃を受けた後、彼は自分が知らなかった武道のスキルを使って全員を殺します。彼は、過去の人生の夢がすべて現実であることを知り、過去3年間、カップルに育てられたことを学びます。彼は川で見つけられたとき、半死の状態で5つの弾痕を持っていました。
back_translation: After being targeted by an unknown shooter, he uses martial arts skills he never knew he had to kill everyone. He learns that all the dreams from his past life are reality and that he has been raised by a couple for the past three years. When he is found by the river, he is in a semi-dead state with five bullet wounds.

text: jordan must decide if simon 's answers are good or evil as the paths become intertwined & # 38 ; the lives of the four friends are jeopardized as one falls victim to cociety 's views and the other three bond together to carry out a friends promise .
translation: ジョーダンは、サイモンの答えが善か悪かを決めなければならない。道が交差し、4人の友人の命が危険にさらされる中、1人が社会の見方の犠牲となり、残りの3人は友人の約束を果たすために結束する。
back_translation: Jordan must decide whether Simon's answer is good or bad. As the paths intersect and the lives of four friends are put in danger, one becomes a victim of society's perspective, while the remaining three unite to fulfill their friend's promise.

text: one sunday , while all the town , including his wife and son , are piously praying mass , a miracle occurs .
translation: ある日曜日、町の全員が、彼の妻や息子を含めて、一生懸命にミサの祈りを捧げているとき、奇跡が起こります。
back_translation: One Sunday, while everyone in the town, including his wife and son, was fervently offering prayers during Mass, a miracle occurred.

text: for all its brooding quality , ash wednesday is suspenseful and ultimately unpredictable , with a sterling ensemble cast .
translation: 陰鬱な雰囲気にもかかわらず、『灰の水曜日』は緊張感に満ち、最終的には予測不可能で、素晴らしいキャストが揃っています。
back_translation: Despite its gloomy atmosphere, "Ash Wednesday" is filled with tension, ultimately unpredictable, and features a wonderful cast.

text: quite funny for the type of movie it is . . .
translation: その映画の種類にしては非常に面白い。
back_translation: It's very interesting for that type of movie.

text: now , when angered , he turns into a massive green behemoth with the mind of a child .
translation: 今、怒ると、彼は子供のような心を持った巨大な緑の獣に変身します。
back_translation: When he gets angry now, he transforms into a gigantic green beast with the heart of a child.

text: roy & # 38 ; candy and lonnie earl & # 38 ; darlene are two married couples who thought they knew one another , until they decided to take their dream vacation together .
translation: ロイとキャンディ、そしてロニー・アールとダーリーンは、お互いをよく知っていると思っていた2組の夫婦ですが、一緒に夢のバケーションを取ることに決めました。
back_translation: Roy and Candy, along with Ronnie Earl and Darlene, thought they knew each other well as two couples, but they decided to take a dream vacation together.

text: godard has pared down his extravagances into a densely concentrated , resonant simplicity .
translation: ゴダールは彼の装飾的な要素を、濃密で共鳴するシンプルさに削ぎ落とした。
back_translation: Godard stripped his decorative elements down to a dense and resonant simplicity.

text: especially when you would much rather want to be one of the cool muslim boys who wears those golden necklages and say cool stuff in arabian .
translation: 特に、金色のネックレスを身につけてアラビア語でかっこいいことを言う、クールなムスリムの男の一人でありたいと思うとき。
back_translation: Especially when I want to be one of those cool Muslim men who wear a gold necklace and say something cool in Arabic.

text: welcome to peoplemovin . com , a leader in america 's transient workforce , more commonly known as temporary employment .
translation: welcome to peoplemovin.com、アメリカの移動労働力、一般的には一時雇用として知られている分野のリーダーです。
back_translation: Welcome to peoplemovin.com, a leader in America's mobile workforce, commonly known as temporary employment.

text: people were fleeing away from the air raids on kandahar , herat and others cities and villages .
translation: 人々はカンダハール、ヘラート、その他の都市や村での空爆から逃げていました。
back_translation: People were fleeing from airstrikes in Kandahar, Herat, and other cities and villages.

text: . . . a cheap , ludicrous attempt at serious horror .
translation: 安っぽく、ばかげた真剣なホラーの試み。
back_translation: A cheap and ridiculous attempt at serious horror.

text: an essentially awkward version of the lightweight female empowerment picture we 've been watching for decades
translation: 基本的に、私たちが数十年にわたって見てきた軽妙な女性のエンパワーメント映画のぎこちないバージョンです。
back_translation: Basically, it's an awkward version of the light-hearted women empowerment films we have seen for decades.

text: the hard-to-predict and absolutely essential chemistry between the down-to-earth bullock and the nonchalant grant proves to be sensational , and everything meshes in this elegant entertainment .
translation: 地に足のついたブルックと無頓着なグラントの間の予測不可能で絶対に不可欠な化学反応は感動的であり、このエレガントなエンターテインメントの中ですべてが見事に調和しています。
back_translation: The unpredictable and absolutely essential chemistry between grounded Brooke and indifferent Grant is moving, and everything harmoniously aligns within this elegant entertainment.

text: the movie 's seams may show . . . but pellington gives `` mothman `` an irresistibly uncanny ambience that goes a long way toward keeping the picture compelling .
translation: 映画のつなぎ目は見えるかもしれませんが、ペリングトンは「モスマン」に抵抗できないほど不気味な雰囲気を与え、作品を魅力的に保つのに大いに貢献しています。
back_translation: The seams of the movie may be visible, but Pellington gives "The Mothman" an eerily captivating atmosphere that greatly contributes to keeping the work engaging.

text: for diane , oscar fills a void in her life .
translation: ダイアンにとって、オスカーは彼女の人生における空白を満たしてくれます。
back_translation: For Diane, Oscar fills the void in her life.

text: four characters are carried over , the first sergeant , the clerk , the mess sergent , and the misfit .
translation: 四人のキャラクターが登場します。軍曹、事務員、炊事班長、そして落ちこぼれです。
back_translation: Four characters appear: a sergeant, an office worker, a cook leader, and a dropout.

text: what starts as an innocent game of bar trivia soon escalates into an all out war - dex & # 38 ; eric vs . herb .
translation: 無邪気なバーのトリビアゲームが、すぐにデックスとエリック対ハーブの全面戦争に発展する。
back_translation: A playful trivia game at the bar quickly escalates into an all-out war between Dex and Eric against Herb.

text: an often watchable , though goofy and lurid , blast of a costume drama set in the late 15th century .
translation: 15世紀後半を舞台にした、しばしば見応えがありながらも、 goofy で露骨な衣装ドラマの楽しい一撃。
back_translation: A fun spectacle set in the late 15th century, often impressive yet goofy with its overt costumes.

text: murderous maids pulls no punches in its depiction of the lives of the papin sister and the events that led to their notorious rise to infamy . . .
translation: 殺人メイドは、パピン姉妹の生活と彼女たちが悪名高い名声を得るに至った出来事を描く際に手加減をしない。
back_translation: The Murderous Maid does not hold back when depicting the lives of the Pappin sisters and the events that led them to gain their notorious fame.

text: john quincy archibald 's son michael collapses while playing baseball as a result of a heart failure .
translation: ジョン・クインシー・アーチバルドの息子マイケルが心不全のため野球をしている最中に倒れました。
back_translation: Michael, the son of John Quincy Archibald, collapsed during a baseball game due to heart failure.

text: even when foreign directors . . . borrow stuff from hollywood , they invariably shake up the formula and make it more interesting .
translation: 外国の監督がハリウッドから素材を借りるときでも、彼らは必ずそのフォーミュラをひっくり返し、より興味深いものにする。
back_translation: Even when foreign directors borrow material from Hollywood, they always turn that formula upside down and make it more interesting.

text: the story follows ancanar , the sole heir to the rammoth valley and the last in the line of telganan .
translation: 物語は、ラモスバレーの唯一の相続人であり、テルガナンの血筋の最後の一人であるアンカナールに続きます。
back_translation: The story follows Ankanal, the sole heir of Ramos Valley and the last descendant of the Telganan bloodline.

text: when the popular , restless landon carter is forced to participate in the school drama production he falls in love with jamie sullivan , the daughter of the town 's minister .
translation: 人気があり、落ち着きのないランドン・カーターは、学校の演劇制作に参加することを余儀なくされ、町の牧師の娘ジェイミー・サリバンに恋をします。
back_translation: The popular and restless Landon Carter is forced to participate in the school's theater production and falls in love with Jamie Sullivan, the pastor's daughter in town.

text: during the process of the post-crash discussion , the attorney accidentally drops the papers he needs to present in court .
translation: 事故後の議論の過程で、弁護士は裁判で提示する必要がある書類をうっかり落としてしまった。
back_translation: During the discussion process after the accident, the lawyer accidentally overlooked some documents that needed to be presented in court.

text: joanna , a good-for-nothing girl who miserably failed in her attempt to win any television game show and contest , is hired by nino as his personal secretary , believing that she could be her lucky charm .
translation: ジョアンナは、テレビのゲームショーやコンテストで惨めに失敗した無能な少女で、ニーノに個人秘書として雇われ、彼女が彼のラッキーチャームになれると信じられています。
back_translation: Joanna is an incompetent girl who has miserably failed on television game shows and contests, and she is employed by Nino as a personal secretary, believing that she can become his lucky charm.

text: the additional storyline is interesting and entertaining , but it does n't have the same magical quality as the beginning of the story . i like the new footage and still love the old stuff .
translation: 追加のストーリーラインは興味深くて面白いですが、物語の始まりと同じような魔法のような魅力はありません。新しい映像が好きで、古いものもまだ愛しています。
back_translation: The additional storyline is intriguing and interesting, but it doesn't have the same magical charm as the beginning of the story. I like the new visuals, and I still love the old ones as well.

text: he is locked up in a chinese prison where he is guilty until proven innocent .
translation: 彼は中国の刑務所に閉じ込められており、無実が証明されるまで有罪と見なされています。
back_translation: He is locked up in a Chinese prison and is considered guilty until his innocence is proven.

text: the regulus submarines were the forerunners of these weapons , and proved the concept that stabilized the cold war .
translation: レグルス潜水艦はこれらの兵器の先駆けであり、冷戦を安定させたコンセプトを証明しました。
back_translation: The Regulus submarine was a pioneer of these weapons and demonstrated a concept that stabilized the Cold War.

text: a young want-to-be actress ( justine lichtman ) is attracted to her boy friend 's ( james bowman ) friend ( musashi alexander ) , but her roomamte ( jordan cael ) picks up on vibes ( mistakenly ) that he is gay .
translation: 若い女優志望のジャスティン・リヒトマンは、ボーイフレンドのジェームズ・ボウマンの友人である武蔵・アレクサンダーに惹かれているが、彼女のルームメイトであるジョーダン・ケイルは（誤って）彼がゲイだという雰囲気を感じ取る。
back_translation: Young aspiring actress Justin Lichtman is attracted to Musashi Alexander, who is a friend of her boyfriend James Bowman, but her roommate Jordan Kale mistakenly picks up on the vibe that he is gay.

text: shadyac , who belongs with the damned for perpetrating patch adams , trots out every ghost trick from the sixth sense to the mothman prophecies .
translation: シャディアックは、パッチ・アダムスを実行したことで呪われた者たちに属し、シックス・センスからモスマンの予言までのすべてのゴースト・トリックを引きずり出している。
back_translation: Shadiak belongs to those cursed for executing Patch Adams, dragging out all ghost tricks from the Sixth Sense to the prophecies of Mothman.

text: before long , a large canada goose covered entirely with duct tape is attached to the possum van , and red and the boys set out on their pilgrimage to save the lodge .
translation: しばらくすると、ダクトテープで完全に覆われた大きなカナダグースがオポッサムバンに取り付けられ、レッドと仲間たちはロッジを救うための巡礼の旅に出発した。
back_translation: After a while, a large Canada Goose completely covered in duct tape was attached to the opossum van, and Red and his friends set off on a pilgrimage to save the lodge.

text: but at one point finch and stifler put their differences aside and hold a huge party for jim , the night before his wedding .
translation: しかし、ある時、フィンチとスティフラーはこれまでの対立を忘れ、ジムの結婚式の前夜に大きなパーティーを開くことにします。
back_translation: However, at one point, Finch and Stifler decide to put their past conflicts aside and throw a big party on the eve of Jim's wedding.

text: the sisters of st john of god have maintained a presence in the kimberley for nearly 100 years .
translation: 聖ヨハネ神の姉妹たちは、キンバリーでほぼ100年間にわたり存在を維持しています。
back_translation: The Sisters of St. John have maintained their presence in Kimberly for almost 100 years.

text: siti accepts the challenge , as this will help the popularity and rating of her show `` cable news international `` to increase .
translation: シティはこの挑戦を受け入れます。これは、彼女の番組「ケーブルニュースインターナショナル」の人気と評価が向上するのに役立つからです。
back_translation: City will accept this challenge. This is because it will help improve the popularity and ratings of her show "Cable News International."

text: everything had been going along smoothly until the gang entered their final year of high school and the stakes were upped by the school 's principal , mrs . stark .
translation: すべて順調に進んでいたが、ギャングが高校の最終年を迎え、校長のスターク夫人によって状況が厳しくなった。
back_translation: Everything was going smoothly, but the gang reached their final year of high school, and the situation became strict under Principal Mrs. Stark.

text: frankly , it 's kind of insulting , both to men and women . and it 's not that funny -- which is just generally insulting .
translation: 正直なところ、それは男女双方に対して侮辱的ですし、そんなに面白くもありません。これは一般的に侮辱的です。
back_translation: To be honest, it's insulting to both men and women, and it isn't that funny either. This is generally insulting.

text: the eccentric stories of a free spirited couple , the husband 's brother , a basket ball game , a bookie named dutch , two sinister , corrupt twins conniving over a faberge ' egg for their wife 's anniversary , a business is business hit-man , and an ex-con that has nothing to do with this story .
translation: 自由な精神を持つカップルの風変わりな物語、夫の兄弟、バスケットボールの試合、ダッチという名前のブッキー、妻の記念日のためにファベルジェの卵を巡って画策する二人の悪賢い腐敗した双子、ビジネスはビジネスのヒットマン、そしてこの物語とは何の関係もない元受刑者。
back_translation: A quirky story about a free-spirited couple, the husband's brother, a basketball game, a bookie named Dutch, two cunning corrupt twins scheming over a Fabergé egg for the wife's anniversary, a hitman for business business, and an ex-convict with no connection to the story.

text: hilarious musical comedy though stymied by accents thick as mud .
translation: 泥のように濃いアクセントに妨げられながらも、非常に面白いミュージカルコメディ。
back_translation: A very interesting musical comedy, hindered by a thick accent like mud.

text: he pays the price for his sleepless night , however , the next morning when his father awakens him into a whole nude world .
translation: 彼は徹夜の代償を払うが、翌朝、父親が彼を全裸の世界へと目覚めさせる。
back_translation: He pays the price for staying up all night, but the next morning, his father awakens him to a world of nudity.

text: the true story about robyn davidson who tamed four wild camels and with her dog , trekked from alice springs to the indian ocean , a trip no-one had ever made .
translation: ロビン・ダビッドソンが4頭の野生のラクダを飼いならし、彼女の犬と共にアリススプリングスからインド洋までの旅をした真実の物語で、誰もが行ったことのない旅です。
back_translation: A true story of Robin Davidson taming four wild camels and traveling from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean with her dog, on a journey that no one had ever taken.

text: this is the final straw for roxie , and her constant anger at rejection explodes .
translation: これはロクシーにとっての最後のひと押しであり、彼女の拒絶に対する常なる怒りが爆発する。
back_translation: This is the final push for Roxy, and her persistent anger at being rejected explodes.

text: the sentimental script has problems , but the actors pick up the slack .
translation: 感情的な脚本には問題がありますが、俳優たちがその不足を補っています。
back_translation: There are problems with the emotional script, but the actors are compensating for that deficit.

text: it 's `` best in show `` meets `` strictly ballroom `` via `` kids in the hall `` .
translation: それは「ベスト・イン・ショー」と「ストリクトリー・バラ・ルーム」が「キッズ・イン・ザ・ホール」を通じて出会ったものです。
back_translation: It is what "Best in Show" and "Strictly Ballroom" encountered through "Kids in the Hall."

text: most of the storylines feel like time fillers between surf shots . the movie is n't horrible , but you can see mediocre cresting on the next wave .
translation: 物語の大部分はサーフィンのショットの合間の時間つぶしのように感じます。映画はひどくはありませんが、次の波の上で平凡な盛り上がりが見えます。
back_translation: Most of the story feels like a filler between surfing shots. The movie isn't terrible, but you can see the mundane buildup over the next wave.

text: the `` actress `` becomes an overnight sensation , with a major singing career as well , and everyone thinks she 's a real person .
translation: その「女優」は一夜にしてセンセーションとなり、主要な歌手としてのキャリアも築き、誰もが彼女を本物の人間だと思っています。
back_translation: That "actress" became a sensation overnight, built a career as a major singer, and everyone thinks of her as a real human being.

text: the aftermath of a high school shooting leaves deanna cartwright ( erika christensen ) seriously wounded and nine others dead , including the perpetrator .
translation: 高校の銃撃事件の結果、ディアナ・カートライト（エリカ・クリステンセン）は重傷を負い、加害者を含む9人が死亡します。
back_translation: As a result of the high school shooting, Diana Cartwright (Erika Christensen) is seriously injured, and nine people, including the perpetrator, are killed.

text: he and his girlfriend , a terrorist seeking to change how the poor are treated in korea , kidnap his former boss 's daughter .
translation: 彼と彼のガールフレンドは、韓国で貧しい人々がどのように扱われるかを変えようとするテロリストであり、彼の元上司の娘を誘拐します。
back_translation: He and his girlfriend are terrorists trying to change how poor people are treated in Korea, and they kidnap the daughter of his former boss.

text: sean bateman ( james van der beek ) is the younger brother of psychotic wall street broker patrick bateman .
translation: ショーン・ベイトマン（ジェームズ・バン・ダービーク）は、精神的に不安定なウォール街のブローカー、パトリック・ベイトマンの弟です。
back_translation: Sean Bateman (James Van Der Beek) is the brother of Patrick Bateman, a mentally unstable Wall Street broker.

text: writer/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: ライター・監督のウォルター・ヒルはここで彼のハイパーマスキュリンな要素の中にあり、他の多くの手によっては完全に忘れ去られてしまうであろうパルプ的な概念に、再び本物の活力やアートを注ぎ込むことができています。
back_translation: Writer and director Walter Hill is here infusing genuine vitality and art into a pulp-like concept that would likely be completely forgotten in the hands of many others, all while embracing his hyper-masculine elements.

text: she becomes part of anita 's world , but events do not run smoothly .
translation: 彼女はアニータの世界の一部になるが、出来事はうまく進まない。
back_translation: She becomes a part of Anita's world, but things do not go well.

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: 欠点に敏感でありながらも、しばしば重厚な啓示や華やかな対話、過去や選ばれなかった道への郷愁で覆い尽くされています。
back_translation: While being sensitive to flaws, it is often overshadowed by profound revelations, dazzling dialogues, and nostalgia for the past or the roads not taken.

text: at times a bit melodramatic and even a little dated ( depending upon where you live ) , ignorant fairies is still quite good-natured and not a bad way to spend an hour or two .
translation: 時には少しメロドラマチックで、住んでいる場所によっては少し古めかしく感じることもあるが、無知なフェアリーはそれでもかなり良い気質を持っており、1時間か2時間を過ごすには悪くない方法だ。
back_translation: Sometimes it's a bit melodramatic, and depending on where you live, it can feel a bit outdated, but the ignorant fairy still has a pretty good temperament, and it's not a bad way to spend an hour or two.

text: full of unforgiving irony and quiet realism , a song for martin stands as a powerful and moving achievement .
translation: 冷酷な皮肉と静かなリアリズムに満ちた「マーチンのための歌」は、力強く感動的な成果として位置づけられています。
back_translation: "The Song for Martin," filled with cold irony and quiet realism, is positioned as a powerful and moving achievement.

text: a dazzling thing to behold -- as long as you 're wearing the somewhat cumbersome 3d goggles the theater provides .
translation: 眩しい光景を楽しむことができる──ただし、劇場が提供するやや煩わしい3Dゴーグルを着用している限りにおいて。
back_translation: You can enjoy a dazzling spectacle—only as long as you wear the somewhat cumbersome 3D goggles provided by the theater.

text: this romantic thriller is steeped in the atmosphere of wartime england , and ably captures the speech patterns , moral codes and ideals of the 1940s .
translation: このロマンティック・スリラーは戦時イングランドの雰囲気に浸っており、1940年代の話し方、道徳規範、理想を見事に捉えています。
back_translation: This romantic thriller immerses itself in the atmosphere of wartime England, beautifully capturing the speech, moral standards, and ideals of the 1940s.

text: a macabre and very stylized swedish fillm about a modern city where all the religious and civic virtues that hold society in place are in tatters .
translation: 宗教的および市民的な美徳が崩壊し、社会を支えるものが破綻した現代の都市を舞台にした、陰惨で非常にスタイライズされたスウェーデン映画。
back_translation: A grim and highly stylized Swedish film set in a modern city where religious and civic virtues have collapsed, and the foundations supporting society have crumbled.

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .
translation: 「ウェイドダウンタウン」は重要な映画ではないかもしれませんし、良い映画でもないかもしれませんが、現在進行中の熱いオスカーシーズンと衝突して、気分転換になる良い選択を提供してくれます。
back_translation: "Wade Downtown" may not be an important movie, nor may it be a good one, but it offers a nice change of pace amidst the ongoing hot Oscar season.

text: a dull , inconsistent , dishonest female bonding picture .
translation: 退屈で、一貫性のない、不誠実な女性の絆を描いた作品。
back_translation: A work that depicts the bond of a boring, inconsistent, and insincere woman.

text: a long-winded and stagy session of romantic contrivances that never really gels like the shrewd feminist fairy tale it could have been .
translation: 長ったらしく演出が大げさなロマンティックな工夫のセッションで、賢いフェミニストの童話のようには本当にまとまりがない。
back_translation: In a lengthy session with overly exaggerated romantic contrivances, it truly lacks cohesion like a fairy tale for wise feminists.

text: certain to be distasteful to children and adults alike , eight crazy nights is a total misfire .
translation: 子供にも大人にも不快なことが確実な「エイト・クレイジー・ナイツ」は、完全に失敗作です。
back_translation: "Eight Crazy Nights," which is certain to be unpleasant for both children and adults, is a complete failure.

text: despite these annoyances , the capable clayburgh and tambor really do a great job of anchoring the characters in the emotional realities of middle age .
translation: これらの煩わしさにもかかわらず、優れたクレイバーグとタンバは、本当にキャラクターを中年の感情的な現実に anchoring する素晴らしい仕事をしています。
back_translation: Despite these annoyances, the excellent Kleberg and Tamba do a wonderful job of truly anchoring the characters in the emotional realities of middle age.

text: max plays it cool as he infiltrates beno 's palace stronghold in the steamy jungle of the yucatan .
translation: マックスはユカタンの蒸し暑いジャングルにあるベノの宮殿の要塞に infiltrate しながらクールに振る舞っている。
back_translation: Max is keeping cool while infiltrating the fortress of Benow in the steamy jungles of Yucatan.

text: ai n't no mountain high enough to keep the funk brothers from getting to you .
translation: ファンク・ブラザーズがあなたに届けるのを妨げるほど高い山はありません。
back_translation: There is no mountain too high that can prevent the Funk Brothers from delivering to you.

text: they come across each other again and want to make their fathers ' wish come true , so they arrange for yoyo and cheung to meet in london .
translation: 彼らは再び出会い、父親の願いを叶えたいと思っているので、ヨーヨーとチョンがロンドンで会うように手配します。
back_translation: They will meet again, and they want to fulfill their father's wish, so they will arrange for Yoyo and Chong to meet in London.

text: now he thinks he is seeing things that are n't there and if things do n't improve , she will take their only son and leave .
translation: 今、彼は存在しないものを見ていると思っていて、もし状況が改善しなければ、彼女は彼らの唯一の息子を連れて去るつもりだ。
back_translation: Right now, he believes he is seeing something that doesn't exist, and if the situation doesn’t improve, she plans to leave with their only son.

text: a postal worker has some lunch in a chinese restaurant and falls in love with the waitress , who happens to be chinese .
translation: 郵便配達員が中華レストランでランチを食べていると、ウェイトレスに恋をします。そのウェイトレスは中国人です。
back_translation: A postal worker falls in love with a waitress while eating lunch at a Chinese restaurant. The waitress is Chinese.

text: see rare footage of some of the world 's greatest kickboxers such as benny `` the jet `` urquidez , don `` the dragon wilson and bill `` superfoot `` wallace .
translation: 世界で最も偉大なキックボクサーの中でも、ベニー「ザ・ジェット」ウルキデス、ドン「ザ・ドラゴン」ウィルソン、ビル「スーパーフット」ウォレスなどの珍しい映像をご覧ください。
back_translation: Watch rare footage of some of the greatest kickboxers in the world, such as Benny "The Jet" Urquidez, Don "The Dragon" Wilson, and Bill "Superfoot" Wallace.

text: a gripping documentary about james nachtwey , a new yorker who 's a longtime and much-honored chronicler of the world 's misery .
translation: 世界の悲惨さを長年にわたり、数々の栄誉を受けてきたニューヨーカー、ジェームス・ナクトウェイに関する感動的なドキュメンタリー。
back_translation: An inspirational documentary about New Yorker James Nachtwey, who has received numerous honors over the years for his portrayal of the world's misery.

text: third time 's the charm . . . yeah , baby !
translation: 三度目の正直。。。うん、ベイビー！
back_translation: Third time's the charm... Yeah, baby!

text: often moving and explores the discomfort inherent in the contacts between the american 'hosts ' and their 'guests . '
translation: しばしば心を動かし、アメリカの「ホスト」とその「ゲスト」との接触に内在する不快感を探求します。
back_translation: It often moves the heart and explores the discomfort inherent in the interactions between the American "host" and their "guest."

text: she challenges isabel 's authority and is prepared to break her family ties and sacrifice her faith for love .
translation: 彼女はイザベルの権威に挑戦し、愛のために家族の絆を断ち、信仰を犠牲にする覚悟を持っている。
back_translation: She challenges Isabel's authority, is willing to sever family ties for love, and is prepared to sacrifice her faith.

text: good performances and a realistic , non-exploitive approach make paid in full worth seeing .
translation: 優れた演技と現実的で搾取的ではないアプローチが、『ペイド・イン・フル』を観る価値のある作品にしています。
back_translation: The excellent performances and the realistic, non-exploitative approach make "Paid in Full" a worthwhile film to watch.

text: the movie , so briskly alert in details , is generic in its guiding ideas .
translation: 映画は、細部において非常に活気があるが、その指導的なアイデアは一般的である。
back_translation: The movie is very vibrant in its details, but its guiding ideas are rather generic.

text: a belgian gem on the twilight existence of four sisters of a certain age drawn together reluctantly by the need to care for one of their number .
translation: ある年齢の四人の姉妹が、うちの一人をケアする必要性から不本意ながら引き寄せられる、ベルギーの宝石のような作品。
back_translation: A gem of a work from Belgium, about four sisters of a certain age who are reluctantly drawn together by the need to care for one of them.

text: jedi knights obi-wan kenobi and anakin skywalker discover there is more than meets the eye behind an assassination attempt on naboo senator padm & # 233 ; amidala 's life .
translation: ジェダイの騎士オビ＝ワン・ケノービとアナキン・スカイウォーカーは、ナブーの上院議員パドメ・アミダラの命を狙った暗殺未遂の背後には、表面上の出来事以上のものがあることを発見します。
back_translation: Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker discover that there is more to the assassination attempt on Naboo Senator Padmé Amidala's life than meets the eye.

text: the cooler is bernie lootz ( william h . macy ) , and the cooler is a love story about the changing fortunes of this down-at-heels loser who has made a career out of spreading his virulent bad luck on the floor of las vegas ' aging shangri-la casino .
translation: クーラーはバーニー・ルーツ（ウィリアム・H・メイシー）で、クーラーはラズヴェガスの老朽化したシャングリラカジノの床で、自身の厳しい悪運を広めることを職業にしたこの落ちぶれた敗者の運命の変化についてのラブストーリーです。
back_translation: The Cooler is a love story about the fate of a down-and-out loser, Bernie Loots (William H. Macy), who makes a living spreading his own tough bad luck on the floor of a rundown Shangri-La Casino in Las Vegas.

text: the master rescues melinda ( jennie dallery ) , a gang-banger on the run ; blake ( jeff sauber ) , a failed young artist ; and ariel ( shannon morris ) , teen hooker ; and brings them to his shelter along with other social rejects .
translation: マスターは逃亡中のギャングのメンバー、メリンダ（ジェニー・ダラリー）、失敗した若いアーティストのブレイク（ジェフ・サウバー）、ティーンエイジャーの売春婦アリエル（シャノン・モリス）を救い、他の社会的な疎外者たちと共に自分のシェルターに連れて行きます。
back_translation: The master rescues Melinda (Jenny Dahlerle), a member of a gang on the run, Blake (Jeff Sauver), a failed young artist, and Ariel (Shannon Morris), a teenage prostitute, and takes them along with other social outcasts to his shelter.

text: has its moments -- and almost as many subplots .
translation: 瞬間があり、ほぼ同じ数のサブプロットもあります。
back_translation: There are moments, and there are almost the same number of subplots.

text: america 's best player is being pulled in to the ultimate cyber-terror .
translation: アメリカの最高のプレイヤーが究極のサイバー・テロに引き込まれています。
back_translation: The best players in America are being drawn into the ultimate cyber-terror.

text: a strong enough effort to be worthy of faint praise .
translation: 微かな賛美に値するほどの強い努力。
back_translation: A strong effort worthy of faint praise.

text: on the day a young photographer is moving out of his place to live with his girlfriend , he meets the stunning girl moving in and falls in love with her at first sight .
translation: 若い写真家が彼女と一緒に住むために引っ越す日、彼は引っ越してくる美しい女の子に出会い、一目惚れする。
back_translation: On the day a young photographer moves in to live with his girlfriend, he meets a beautiful girl who is moving in, and falls in love at first sight.

text: you see , what makes lucky no ordinary dog is his ability to talk .
translation: ご覧の通り、ラッキーが普通の犬ではないのは、話すことができる能力です。
back_translation: As you can see, Lucky is not an ordinary dog because he has the ability to talk.

text: a mix of gritty realism , crisp storytelling and radiant compassion that effortlessly draws you in .
translation: 生々しいリアリズム、明晰なストーリーテリング、そして輝くような慈愛の混ざり合いがあなたを自然に引き込んでいきます。
back_translation: The vivid realism, clear storytelling, and the blend of shining compassion will naturally draw you in.

text: heart problems force boston cop pally lamarr to retire ; he 's in a funk and his wife charlotte sends him packing .
translation: 心臓の問題がボストン警察官パリー・ラマーを退職に追い込み、彼はどん底に沈んでおり、妻のシャーロットは彼を追い出す。
back_translation: Heart problems have forced Boston police officer Perry Lamar into retirement, and he is sinking into despair while his wife Charlotte is kicking him out.

text: if you 're like me , a sucker for a good old fashion romance and someone who shamelessly loves to eat , then mostly martha offers all the perfect ingredients to more than satisfy your appetite .
translation: もしあなたが私のように、古き良き恋愛に目がない人で、恥ずかしげもなく食べることが大好きな人なら、モーストリー・マーサはあなたの食欲を満たすための完璧な素材をすべて提供してくれます。
back_translation: If you are someone like me who is fond of the good old-fashioned romance and unashamedly loves to eat, Mostly Martha provides all the perfect ingredients to satisfy your appetite.

text: jesse custer , a texas preacher , is imbued by the power of an entity called genesis , part angel and part demon , who give him the power of the word , the ability to make anybody do anything he says .
translation: テキサスの牧師ジェシー・カスターは、天使と悪魔の両方の要素を持つ存在「ジェネシス」の力を宿し、彼に「言葉の力」を与えます。それは、彼が言うことを誰にでもさせる能力です。
back_translation: Texas pastor Jesse Caster bears the power of "Genesis," an entity that possesses both angelic and demonic elements, granting him the "power of words." This gives him the ability to make anyone do whatever he says.

text: perhaps even the slc high command found writer-director mitch davis 's wall of kitsch hard going .
translation: おそらく、SLCの高官たちさえも、脚本家兼監督であるミッチ・デイブスのキッチュの壁を受け入れるのは難しかったのかもしれません。
back_translation: Perhaps even the senior officials at SLC found it difficult to accept the kitsch wall created by writer-director Mitch Daves.

text: cathy , a young and innocent freshman , had a crush on senior hunk , nick , the campus ' basketball star .
translation: キャシーは、若くて無邪気な一年生で、キャンパスのバスケットボールスターであるシニアのハンク、ニックに恋をしていた。
back_translation: Kathy, a young and innocent freshman, was in love with Hank, the senior basketball star on campus.

text: fails in making this character understandable , in getting under her skin , in exploring motivation . . . well before the end , the film grows as dull as its characters , about whose fate it is hard to care .
translation: このキャラクターを理解可能にすること、彼女の内面に入り込むこと、動機を探ることに失敗しており……終わる前から、映画はそのキャラクターと同じくらい退屈になり、彼らの運命について気にかけるのが難しくなる。
back_translation: The film fails to make this character understandable, to delve into her inner self, and to explore her motivations... and even before it ends, it becomes as tedious as the character, making it hard to care about their fate.

text: a boring masquerade ball where normally good actors , even kingsley , are made to look bad .
translation: 退屈な仮面舞踏会で、通常は優れた俳優たち、キングスリーさえも、悪く見えるようにされている。
back_translation: At a boring masquerade ball, even usually great actors, including Kingsley, are made to look bad.

text: salvation comes in the form of their american landlord simon cotton ( henry thomas ) and his brother neil ( marc blucas ) .
translation: 救いは、彼らのアメリカの地主サイモン・コットン（ヘンリー・トーマス）と彼の兄弟ニール（マーク・ブラカス）という形でやってくる。
back_translation: Salvation comes in the form of their American landlord Simon Cotton (Henry Thomas) and his brother Neil (Mark Blukas).

text: the actors must indeed be good to recite some of this laughable dialogue with a straight face .
translation: 俳優たちは、本当にこの笑える台詞を真顔で演じるために優れているに違いありません。
back_translation: The actors must be excellent at delivering this funny line with a serious expression.

text: newcomer helmer kevin donovan is hamstrung by a badly handled screenplay of what is really an amusing concept M-^V a high-tech tux that transforms its wearer into a superman .
translation: 新進監督のケビン・ドノバンは、本当に面白いコンセプトである高性能タキシードが着用者をスーパーマンに変身させるという内容の脚本が下手に扱われているため、苦しんでいます。
back_translation: Emerging director Kevin Donovan is struggling because the script, which features the truly interesting concept of a high-performance tuxedo transforming its wearer into Superman, is being poorly handled.

text: wimps out by going for that pg-13 rating , so the more graphic violence is mostly off-screen and the sexuality is muted .
translation: PG-13評価を得るために弱気になり、よりグラフィックな暴力が主に画面外で描かれ、セクシャリティが抑えられています。
back_translation: To achieve a PG-13 rating, the content has become more timid, with graphic violence depicted mostly off-screen and sexuality toned down.

text: as they make their way to the city from suburban pennsylvania , april must endure a comedy of errors - like finding out her oven does n't work - in order to pull off the big event .
translation: ペンシルベニアの郊外から街へ向かう途中、エイプリルは大イベントを成功させるために、オーブンが使えないことを知るような一連のドタバタ劇を耐えなければならない。
back_translation: On her way from the suburbs of Pennsylvania to the city, April must endure a series of mishaps that make her realize she won't be able to use the oven in order to successfully pull off the big event.

text: ofrece una buena oportunidad de cultura ( aunque sea condensada ) que bien vale la pena aprovechar .
translation: 貴重な文化の機会を提供しており（たとえ凝縮されたものであっても）、活用する価値があります。
back_translation: It provides valuable cultural opportunities (even if condensed), and it is worth utilizing.

text: on new year 's eve , 1969 , a flamboyant ragtag troupe of genderbending hippies took the stage of san francisco 's palace theater and the cockettes were born .
translation: 1969年の大晦日、派手な衣装をまとった性別を超えたヒッピーたちの寄せ集めがサンフランシスコのパレスシアターのステージに立ち、コケットが誕生しました。
back_translation: On New Year's Eve of 1969, a collection of flamboyantly dressed, gender-bending hippies took the stage of the Palace Theatre in San Francisco, giving birth to the Coquettes.

text: when he wakes up the morning after his bachelor party in bed with a strange woman ( stiles ) , a man ( lee ) presumes he must have cheated on his fiancee .
translation: 彼は独身パーティーの翌朝、見知らぬ女性（スタイルズ）とベッドで目を覚ますと、男性（リー）は彼が婚約者を裏切ったに違いないと推測する。
back_translation: The morning after the bachelor party, he wakes up in bed with an unfamiliar woman (Styles), and the man (Lee) infers that he must have betrayed his fiancée.

text: people on the site work monotonously , in a fervor , then dazed , trance-like .
translation: サイトの人々は単調に働き、熱心に、次にぼんやりとして、トランスのようになります。
back_translation: People on the site work monotonously, diligently, then become vague and enter a trance-like state.

text: typifies the pros and cons of the films that india churns out .
translation: インドが生み出す映画の長所と短所を典型的に示しています。
back_translation: It typically illustrates the strengths and weaknesses of the films produced in India.

text: the story goes that she ca n't go in the light , and if you wake up and see her , she 'll kill you .
translation: 物語では、彼女は光の中に入ることができず、もしあなたが目を覚まし彼女を見てしまうと、彼女はあなたを殺してしまうと言われています。
back_translation: In the story, it is said that she cannot enter the light, and if you wake up and see her, she will kill you.

text: in old-fashioned screenwriting parlance , ms . shreve 's novel proved too difficult a text to 'lick , ' despite the efforts of a first-rate cast .
translation: 昔ながらの脚本用語で言えば、シュリーブさんの小説は一流のキャストの努力にもかかわらず、「処理する」にはあまりにも難しい作品であった。
back_translation: In traditional scriptwriting terms, Mr. Shreve's novel was a work that was too difficult to "handle," despite the efforts of a top-notch cast.

text: yes , mibii is rote work and predictable , but with a philosophical visual coming right at the end that extravagantly redeems it .
translation: はい、Mibiiは rote work（反復作業）で予測可能ですが、最後に壮大にそれを贖う哲学的なビジュアルがあります。
back_translation: Yes, Mibii is predictable in rote work, but in the end, there is a grand philosophical visual that redeems it.

text: this may not have the dramatic gut-wrenching impact of other holocaust films , but it 's a compelling story , mainly because of the way it 's told by the people who were there .
translation: これは他のホロコースト映画のような劇的で心を揺さぶる影響を持たないかもしれませんが、主にそこにいた人々によって語られる方法のおかげで、説得力のある物語です。
back_translation: This may not have the dramatic and moving impact of other Holocaust films, but thanks to the way it is told mainly by the people who were there, it is a compelling story.

text: las horas es una de las obras que con mayor apasionamiento reflexiona acerca del hecho de vivir . . .
translation: 『時間』は、生きるという事実について最も情熱的に考察している作品の一つです。
back_translation: "Time" is one of the works that passionately explores the reality of living.

text: it is one of the last true medieval maximum-security penal farms in the country .
translation: それは国内で最後の真の中世型の厳重警備の刑務農場の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of the last true medieval-style maximum-security prison farms in the country.

text: there are few things more frustrating to a film buff than seeing an otherwise good movie marred beyond redemption by a disastrous ending .
translation: 映画ファンにとって、良い映画が disastrousな結末によって救いようのないほど台無しにされることほど、イライラすることはない。
back_translation: For movie fans, there is nothing more frustrating than a good film being utterly ruined by a disastrous ending.

text: forced to exist between living and dead , and only revealing their skeleton forms in the moonlight , the pirates intend to use elizabeth 's blood and necklace ( a part of their curse ) to return to their normal state .
translation: 生きている者と死んでいる者の間に存在を強いられ、月明かりの中で彼らの骨の形を明らかにする海賊たちは、エリザベスの血とネックレス（彼らの呪いの一部）を使って元の状態に戻るつもりです。
back_translation: The pirates, forced to exist between the living and the dead, intend to return to their original state using Elizabeth's blood and necklace (a part of their curse), illuminating the shapes of their bones in the moonlight.

text: this is a fudged opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission with no signs of life .
translation: これは巨大な規模の不正な機会です——生命の兆候のない月のミッションです。
back_translation: This is an enormous scale of fraudulent opportunity— a mission to the moon with no signs of life.

text: the subject of this documentary is private life in the big city , apartments as a last stronghold of individuality , in addition to emphasizing the fact that to live together in one and the same place does not ensure that a community will be formed .
translation: このドキュメンタリーの主題は、大都市における私生活であり、アパートは個性の最後の砦として位置づけられています。さらに、同じ場所で共に生活することが必ずしもコミュニティが形成されることを保証しないという事実が強調されています。
back_translation: The theme of this documentary is personal life in big cities, and apartments are positioned as the last bastion of individuality. Furthermore, it emphasizes the fact that living together in the same place does not necessarily guarantee the formation of a community.

text: a sexy , surprising romance . . . idemoto and kim make a gorgeous pair . . . their scenes brim with sexual possibility and emotional danger .
translation: セクシーで驚くべきロマンス。。イデモトとキムは素晴らしいカップルです。。彼らのシーンは性的な可能性と感情的な危険に満ちています。
back_translation: A sexy and astonishing romance... IdeMoto and Kim are a wonderful couple... Their scenes are filled with sexual tension and emotional danger.

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .
translation: ソルヴィーノはプリンセスを傲慢で漫画的に見せ、映画は可哀想なヘルモクラテスとレオンティーヌが彼らの芽生えた愛について pathetic に比較する時だけ本当に生き生きとします。
back_translation: Sorvino presents the princess as arrogant and cartoonish, and the film only truly comes alive when it pathetically compares the blossoming love between the unfortunate Hermocrates and Leontine.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film 'refreshing , ' but it is . 'drumline ' shows a level of young , black manhood that is funny , touching , smart and complicated .
translation: おそらく「リフレッシング」と呼ぶのはクリシェでしょうが、確かにそうです。「ドラムライン」は、面白く、感動的で、賢く、複雑な若い黒人の男らしさを示しています。
back_translation: It may be a cliché to call it "refreshing," but it is indeed so. "Drumline" showcases interesting, moving, intelligent, and complex young Black masculinity.

text: the women clash as plans go awry , tragedy strikes , and hearts get broken .
translation: 女性たちは計画が狂い、悲劇が襲い、心が壊れる中で対立します。
back_translation: Women clash amid their plans falling apart, tragedy striking, and their hearts breaking.

text: it 's one of those baseball pictures where the hero is stoic , the wife is patient , the kids are as cute as all get-out and the odds against success are long enough to intimidate , but short enough to make a dream seem possible .
translation: それは、主人公が静かで、妻が忍耐強く、子供たちがとてもかわいく、成功の可能性は長すぎて恐れさせるくらいだけれど、夢が可能に思える短さでもある野球映画の一つです。
back_translation: It is one of those baseball movies where the protagonist is quiet, the wife is patient, the children are very adorable, the potential for success is long enough to be frightening, yet the dream feels achievable in its brevity.

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired . the performances are all solid ; it merely lacks originality to make it a great movie .
translation: 物語にはいくつかの良いひねりがありますが、結末や一部のバックストーリーは少し疲れています。演技はすべてしっかりしていますが、優れた映画にするための独創性に欠けています。
back_translation: The story has several good twists, but the ending and some of the backstory feel a bit tired. The performances are all solid, but it lacks the originality to make it a great film.

text: ahas , son from a poor family , in his inner struggles , joins the troop of his classmates and heads for the front .
translation: 貧しい家族の息子であるアハスは、内面的な葛藤の中でクラスメートの部隊に参加し、前線に向かいます。
back_translation: Ahas, the son of a poor family, joins his classmates' unit amidst inner turmoil and heads to the front lines.

text: the 70-year-old godard has become , to judge from in praise of love , the sort of bitter old crank who sits behind his light meter and harangues the supposed injustices of the artistic world-at-large without doing all that much to correct them .
translation: 70歳のゴダールは、「愛の賛美」に基づいて判断する限り、光量計の後ろに座り、芸術界全体の想定される不正について長々と愚痴をこぼす、一種の厭世的な頑固者になってしまったようだが、実際にはそれを正すためにあまり行動していない。
back_translation: At 70 years old, Godard seems to have become a sort of cynical stubborn person who sits behind the light meter and complains at length about the supposed injustices in the entire art world, judging by "Praise of Love," but in reality, he has not taken much action to correct it.

text: the pianist [ is ] a supremely hopeful cautionary tale of war 's madness remembered that we , today , can prevent its tragic waste of life . here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: ピアニストは、戦争の狂気を思い出させる極めて希望に満ちた警告の物語であり、私たちが今日、その悲劇的な命の浪費を防ぐことができることを示しています。これは、個人の人生、尊厳、そして音楽を取り戻すための闘争に対する神聖な記念碑です。
back_translation: The pianist is a story of an extremely hopeful warning that reminds us of the madness of war and shows that we can prevent such tragic waste of life today. It is a sacred monument to the struggle to reclaim individual lives, dignity, and music.

text: a cold-hearted judge finds out when a seemingly crazy young couple break into his house and take him captive .
translation: 冷酷な裁判官は、見た目は狂った若いカップルが彼の家に押し入り、彼を囚えたときに真実を知る。
back_translation: The cold-hearted judge learns the truth when a seemingly insane young couple breaks into his house and captures him.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw a movie where i wanted so badly for the protagonist to fail .
translation: 最後に、主人公が失敗することをこんなに強く望んだ映画を見たのはいつだったか、思い出せません。
back_translation: I can't remember the last time I watched a movie that made me wish so strongly for the protagonist to fail.

text: as a technical exercise that redefines moviemaking , it is astonishing .
translation: 映画制作を再定義する技術的な演習として、驚くべきものです。
back_translation: It is an astonishing technical exercise that redefines film production.

text: eul-boon kim 's soulful portrayal of the illiterate , deaf-mute grandmother illuminates the dignity of her demeanor and the sad resignation in her eyes .
translation: キム・ウルブンの心に響く演技は、無学で聴覚障害のある祖母の尊厳ある態度と、彼女の目に宿る悲しい諦めを照らし出しています。
back_translation: Kim Ulbun's performance resonates deeply, highlighting the dignified attitude of his illiterate grandmother with hearing impairment and the sad resignation reflected in her eyes.

text: there is one surefire way to get a nomination for a best-foreign-film oscar : make a movie about whimsical folk who learn a nonchallenging , life-affirming lesson while walking around a foreign city with stunning architecture .
translation: 外国映画賞のノミネートを確実に得る方法が一つあります。それは、素晴らしい建築の外国の都市を歩きながら、軽やかな生活の教訓を学ぶ風変わりな人々についての映画を作ることです。
back_translation: There is a certain way to ensure a nomination for a foreign film award. That is to make a movie about quirky individuals who learn light-hearted life lessons while walking through foreign cities with beautiful architecture.

text: also , anthony is black and victoria is white , which does n't sit well with michael , anthony 's best friend since childhood and a surrogate older brother .
translation: また、アンソニーは黒人で、ビクトリアは白人であり、これは幼馴染であり代理の兄でもあるマイケルにはあまり受け入れられません。
back_translation: Also, Anthony is Black, and Victoria is White, which is not very well accepted by Michael, who is a childhood friend and also a surrogate brother.

text: a mix of velocity and idiocy , this ruinous remake lacks the brawn -- and the brains -- of the 1970s original .
translation: 速さと愚かさの混ざり合いで、この破滅的なリメイクは1970年代のオリジナルの力強さと知恵に欠けている。
back_translation: This disastrous remake, a mix of speed and foolishness, lacks the strength and wisdom of the original from the 1970s.

text: a young rebell oversteps the boarder between stage and life on the trail of francois villon .
translation: 若き反逆者がフランソワ・ヴィヨンの跡を追い、舞台と生活の境界を超える。
back_translation: The young rebel follows in the footsteps of François Villon, transcending the boundaries between stage and life.

text: events go from tragic to dangerous as racism , paranoia , and a secret mistress come into play .
translation: 事件は悲劇から危険な状況へと進展し、差別、偏執病、そして秘密の愛人が絡んできます。
back_translation: The incident progresses from tragedy to a dangerous situation, involving discrimination, paranoia, and a secret lover.

text: yet , beneath an upbeat appearance , she is struggling desperately with the emotional and physical scars left by the attack .
translation: しかし、明るい外見の裏では、彼女は襲撃によって残された感情的および身体的な傷と必死に戦っています。
back_translation: However, behind her bright appearance, she is desperately struggling with the emotional and physical scars left by the assault.

text: each of the five patients realise their dreams individually , but ultimately they decide to choose for each other and the familiarity of their own place .
translation: 5人の患者それぞれが個々に夢を実現しますが、最終的には互いのために選び、自分たちの慣れ親しんだ場所を選ぶことにします。
back_translation: Each of the five patients realizes their individual dreams, but ultimately they choose for one another and decide to embrace the familiar place they know.

text: from naboo to tatooine , it grows into love for her .
translation: ナブーからタトゥイーンへ、彼女への愛が育まれていく。
back_translation: From Naboo to Tatooine, love for her grows.
