text: he is to build the palace and be covered in gold , if not , his fate is to be eaten by crocodiles .
translation: 彼は宮殿を建てて金で覆われるべきであり、そうでなければ彼の運命はワニに食べられることです。
back_translation: He should build a palace covered in gold, or else his fate is to be eaten by a crocodile.

text: if this is the danish idea of a good time , prospective tourists might want to consider a different destination -- some jolly country embroiled in a bloody civil war , perhaps .
translation: もしこれがデンマークの良い時間の概念であるなら、見込み客は別の旅行先を考慮した方が良いかもしれません -- おそらくは血なまぐさい内戦に巻き込まれている陽気な国など。
back_translation: If this is the concept of a good time in Denmark, the prospective traveler might want to consider another destination – perhaps a cheerful country embroiled in a bloody civil war.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied . not even solondz 's thirst for controversy , sketchy characters and immature provocations can fully succeed at cheapening it .
translation: 物語には価値があることは否定できません。ソロンツの論争への渇望や、あいまいなキャラクター、未熟な挑発でさえ、それを安っぽくすることには完全には成功しません。
back_translation: It cannot be denied that stories have value. The longing for controversy, ambiguous characters, and immature provocations do not entirely succeed in making it cheap.

text: the kind of movie that seduces you into becoming putty in its manipulative card-sharking hands and making you enjoy being taken in by its shameless contrivance .
translation: あなたをその巧妙な手口に取り込ませ、恥知らずな仕掛けに喜んで騙されるようにさせる映画の一種。
back_translation: A type of movie that ensnares you with its clever tricks and makes you willingly fall for its shameless schemes.

text: when a cia agent is killed during a nuclear arms purchase , his partner oakes ( anthony hopkins ) , recruits his twin brother , jake hayes ( chris rock ) .
translation: CIAエージェントが核兵器の購入中に殺されると、彼のパートナーであるオークス（アンソニー・ホプキンス）は、彼の双子の兄弟であるジェイク・ヘイズ（クリス・ロック）をリクルートします。
back_translation: When a CIA agent is killed while trying to purchase nuclear weapons, his partner, Oakes (Anthony Hopkins), recruits his twin brother, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock).

text: . . . plays like somebody spliced random moments of a chris rock routine into what is otherwise a cliche-riddled but self-serious spy thriller .
translation: …クリス・ロックのルーチンのランダムな瞬間をスプライスしたように映る、 clichés だらけだけれども真剣なスパイスリラーに。
back_translation: It looks like a serious spice thriller full of clichés, spliced together like random moments from Chris Rock's routine.

text: christians sensitive to a reductionist view of their lord as a luv-spreading dr . feelgood or omnipotent slacker will feel vastly more affronted than secularists , who might even praise god for delivering such an instant camp classic .
translation: キリスト教徒は、自分たちの主を愛を広めるドクター・フィールグッドや全能な怠け者として減少主義的に見ることに対して非常に敏感であり、世俗主義者よりもはるかに不快感を感じるでしょう。世俗主義者は、このような即席のキャンプクラシックを提供してくれた神を称賛するかもしれません。
back_translation: Christians are very sensitive to viewing their Lord in a reductionist way as either Doctor Feelgood spreading love or as an omnipotent slacker, and they would feel much more discomfort than secularists. Secularists might praise the God who has provided such impromptu camp classics.

text: drank water from a spring that was actually a fountain of youth .
translation: 実は若返りの泉である湧き水から水を飲んだ。
back_translation: Actually, I drank water from a spring that is a fountain of youth.

text: the truth is that the truth about charlie gets increasingly tiresome .
translation: 真実は、チャーリーについての真実がますます疲れるものであるということです。
back_translation: The truth is that the truth about Charlie is becoming increasingly exhausting.

text: however , she got more than what she bargained for when she realised she could even see ghosts .
translation: しかし、彼女は幽霊まで見ることができると気づいたとき、思っていた以上のことを手に入れました。
back_translation: However, when she realized that she could even see ghosts, she gained more than she had expected.

text: the trials of henry kissinger is a remarkable piece of filmmaking M-^E because you get it .
translation: 「ヘンリー・キッシンジャーの試練」は、あなたがそれを理解できるため、素晴らしい映画制作の作品です。
back_translation: "The Trials of Henry Kissinger" is a magnificent piece of filmmaking so that you can understand it.

text: pacino , connery , de nero , schwarzenegger - together on film - for the first time . . .
translation: パチーノ、コネリー、デニーロ、シュワルツェネッガー - 映画で初めて共演する。。。
back_translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger - They will appear together in a movie for the first time...

text: . . . begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: ...高い音から始まり、それを美しく保ちます。
back_translation: ...It starts with a high pitch and maintains it beautifully.

text: it is a journey that will take both carol and charlie to the edge of reality and force carol to face up to her terrifying destiny .
translation: それはキャロルとチャーリーを現実の最前線へと導き、キャロルに彼女の恐ろしい運命と向き合わせる旅です。
back_translation: It is a journey that leads Carol and Charlie to the forefront of reality, confronting Carol with her terrible fate.

text: a twisted collision of `` barney `` `` the fisher king `` and `` serpico . ``
translation: 「バーニー」、「フィッシャー・キング」、「セルピコ」のねじれた衝突。
back_translation: "Twisted collisions of 'Barney', 'The Fisher King', and 'Serpico'."

text: with films like 'mouna ragam ' , 'alaipayuthe ' and now 'kannathil muthamittal ' , maniratnam yet again proves that he is at his best when tackling human emotions and relationships .
translation: 「ムーナ・ラガム」、「アライパユッテ」、「カンナティル・ムッタミッタル」といった映画を通じて、マニラトナムは再び人間の感情や人間関係に取り組むときが最も優れていることを証明しています。
back_translation: Through films like "Mouna Ragam," "Alaipayuthey," and "Kannathil Muthamittal," Maniratnam proves that he is at his best when he tackles human emotions and relationships once again.

text: what a pity . . . that the material is so second-rate .
translation: 残念ながら、素材がとても二流です。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the material is very second-rate.

text: she is a very sweet girl , and they get along quite well with her .
translation: 彼女はとても優しい女の子で、彼らは彼女ととても仲良くやっています。
back_translation: She is a very kind girl, and they get along very well with her.

text: annie , an alluring lady , catches the eye of old widower leoncio .
translation: 魅力的な女性アンニが、老いた未亡人レオンシオの目を引きつける。
back_translation: The attractive woman Anni captivates the attention of the elderly widow Leoncio.

text: `` sumo east and west `` is a feature documentary about americans in the ancient japanese sport of sumo wrestling .
translation: 「相撲東と西」は、古代日本の相撲レスリングにおけるアメリカ人についての特集ドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: "Sumo East and West" is a documentary featuring Americans in ancient Japanese sumo wrestling.

text: all the pieces in the mystery are finally starting to fit together , and the case seems almost resolved .
translation: ミステリーのすべての要素がついに結びつき始めており、事件はほぼ解決したようです。
back_translation: All the elements of the mystery are finally starting to come together, and it seems that the case is almost solved.

text: this is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father despite the difficult conditions they have to live in .
translation: これは、厳しい状況にある中で、小さな女の子と彼女の父親の温かな関係についての物語です。
back_translation: This is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father in a difficult situation.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: 良い気分を広めるのではなく、二人の動機は各施設を襲うことであり、8歳の子供と出会うことでクリスマスの本当の意味を教えられるという戦略が複雑化します。
back_translation: Rather than spreading good feelings, the motivation of the two is to attack each facility, and the strategy becomes complicated as they encounter an 8-year-old child who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: one thursday evening , their disagreements reach a fever pitch - anna is incensed that her mother does n't support her musical aspirations and tess , a widow about to remarry , ca n't see why anna wo n't give her fiance ( mark harmon ) a break .
translation: ある木曜日の晩、彼らの意見の不一致は最高潮に達する。アンナは母親が自分の音楽の夢を支持しないことに激怒し、再婚しようとしている未亡人のテスは、なぜアンナがフィアンセのマーク・ハーモンに対して思いやりを示さないのか理解できない。
back_translation: On a Thursday evening, their disagreement reaches its peak. Anna is furious that her mother does not support her musical dreams, while Tess, the widow trying to remarry, cannot understand why Anna does not show any compassion towards her fiancé, Mark Harmon.

text: as an added twist robert discovers upon meeting wong dai , that the evil man himself has been manipulating our protagonist in order to have him kill wong dai 's own tong members and thus , secure the ill gotten gains of wong dai 's empire of crime for himself .
translation: ロバートはウォン・ダイと出会った際に、新たな展開として、悪党である彼が主人公を操り、ウォン・ダイ自身のトンメンバーを殺させようとしていたことを発見する。こうして、ウォン・ダイの犯罪帝国から得た不正な利益を自分のものにしようとしていたのだ。
back_translation: When Robert met Wong Dai, he discovered that as a new development, the villain was manipulating the protagonist to have Wong Dai himself kill his fellow gang members. In this way, he was trying to seize the illicit profits gained from Wong Dai's criminal empire for himself.

text: the problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them . . .
translation: 問題は、謎の住人たちが殺人狂であり、彼ら全員を殺そうとしていることです……。
back_translation: The problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are psychopathic killers, and they are trying to kill all of us...

text: writer/director dante tomaselli merges two disturbing storylines into this visually arresting chiller .
translation: 作家・監督のダンテ・トマセリは、視覚的に魅力的なこのホラー作品に2つの不気味なストーリーを融合させています。
back_translation: Writer and director Dante Tomaselli combines two eerie stories in this visually captivating horror work.

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours ( and , for that matter , shrek ) .
translation: 監督のトム・デイが『ミッドナイト・ラン』や『48時間』、さらには『シュレック』の断片をつなぎ合わせていれば、給与やスタントカーにかかる小さな財産を節約できたかもしれません。
back_translation: Director Tom Day might have saved a small fortune on salaries and stunt cars if he had stitched together fragments of "Midnight Run," "48 Hours," and even "Shrek."

text: during the heist , the kids overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , and a nasty head of security to get to a bank vault suspended 100-feet above ground .
translation: 強盗中、子供たちは地上100フィートの高さに吊るされた銀行の金庫にたどり着くために、高度なセキュリティシステム、警備犬、そして厳しいセキュリティ責任者を克服します。
back_translation: During the robbery, the children overcome advanced security systems, guard dogs, and strict security officers to reach the bank vault suspended 100 feet above the ground.

text: director rob marshall went out gunning to make a great one .
translation: ロブ・マーシャル監督は素晴らしい作品を作るために意気込んで出て行った。
back_translation: Director Rob Marshall set out with enthusiasm to create a wonderful作品.

text: a 19th century insane asylum is memorialized by a captivating montage of inventories , histories , and brain surgeries .
translation: 19世紀の精神病院は、魅力的なモンタージュである目録、歴史、そして脳手術によって記念されています。
back_translation: 19th-century mental hospitals are commemorated through an intriguing montage of catalogs, history, and brain surgery.

text: will anyone who is n't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it has n't gone straight to video ?
translation: ファンゴリアの購読者でない人は、これが直接ビデオにならなかったことに興奮するのでしょうか？
back_translation: Are those who are not subscribers of Fangoria excited that this did not become a direct video?

text: having given permission to male nurse greg focker to marry his daughter , ex-cia man jack byrnes and his wife travel to detroit to greg 's parents , who this time around are mr . and mrs . focker , who are as different from them as can be .
translation: 娘の結婚をメイルナースのグレッグ・フォッカーに許可した元CIAの男ジャック・バーンズとその妻は、グレッグの両親であるフォッカー夫妻のもとへデトロイトに向かいます。彼らは、彼らとはまったく異なる人物です。
back_translation: Jack Byrnes, a former CIA man who granted permission for his daughter to marry Greg Focker, and his wife head to Detroit to meet Greg's parents, the Fockers. They are completely different kinds of people.

text: ray finds himself feeling cursed , trapped , and miserable as a parade of `` injured `` clients constantly pressure him for their money , most of which is not deserved .
translation: レイは、自分が呪われているかのように感じ、閉じ込められ、惨めな気持ちになる。絶え間なく“ケガをした”クライアントたちが彼にお金を要求し、そのほとんどは彼らにふさわしくないものであるためだ。
back_translation: Ray feels as if he is cursed, trapped, and consumed by misery. This is because he is constantly being demanded money by “injured” clients, most of which is undeserved by them.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .
translation: 悪い男の必要性を理解している人がいるのは新鮮です；ディーゼルは、その筋肉質な体つきと冷静で落ち着いた話し方で、まさにその役割にぴったりです。
back_translation: It's refreshing to see someone who understands the necessity of a bad man; Diesel, with his muscular build and calm demeanor, is perfect for that role.

text: a top secret military project hires prestigious university students to assist create a cell altering machine called the 'gammasphere ' .
translation: 極秘の軍事プロジェクトが、細胞を変化させる機械「ガンマスフィア」を作成するために権威ある大学の学生を雇います。
back_translation: A top-secret military project hires students from prestigious universities to create a machine called "Gamma Sphere" that alters cells.

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: その映画は、粗い部分や特定の場所でだれる傾向があるにもかかわらず、皮肉めいていて引き込まれるものです。
back_translation: The movie is engaging and ironic, despite its rough patches and tendency to drag in certain places.

text: isabelle huppert excels as the enigmatic mika and anna mouglalis is a stunning new young talent in one of chabrol 's most intense psychological mysteries .
translation: イザベル・ユペールは謎めいたミカを見事に演じ、アンナ・ムグラリスはシャブロルの最も強烈な心理ミステリーの一つで驚くべき新しい若手才能を発揮しています。
back_translation: Isabelle Huppert superbly portrays the enigmatic Mika, while Anna Mouglalis showcases an astonishing new young talent in one of Chabrol's most intense psychological mysteries.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true . this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: 映画は伝説で始まり、真実でなければ信じることができないほど突飛な物語で終わります。これがディズニー映画の素材です。
back_translation: Movies start with legends and end with wildly unbelievable stories that can't be believed unless they are true. This is the essence of Disney movies.

text: . . . pays tribute to heroes the way julia roberts hands out awards -- with phony humility barely camouflaging grotesque narcissism .
translation: . . . ヒーローに敬意を表するのは、ジュリア・ロバーツが賞を贈るのと同じように、偽りの謙虚さが醜い自己愛をかろうじて隠している。
back_translation: ...Showing respect to heroes is like Julia Roberts presenting an award; false humility barely conceals ugly self-love.

text: but slowly , their teenage-son alan ( kristian horn ) got suspicious that henry is n't his father .
translation: しかし、少しずつ彼らのティーンエイジャーの息子アラン（クリスティアン・ホーン）は、ヘンリーが自分の父親ではないのではないかと疑い始めた。
back_translation: However, little by little, their teenage son Alan (Christian Horn) began to suspect that Henry might not be his biological father.

text: in their love for each other and their ability to move on , the women are , in a way , lovely and amazing .
translation: お互いへの愛と前に進む力において、女性たちはある意味で素晴らしく、魅力的です。
back_translation: In terms of love for each other and the power to move forward, women are wonderful and attractive in a certain sense.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c . walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .
translation: この穏和なファルスは、作家の一人であるジョン・C・ウォルシュが監督しており、古くなった印象を与えるほど陳腐です。
back_translation: This gentle farce is directed by one of the writers, John C. Walsh, and is so clichéd that it gives an impression of being outdated.

text: there follow three months of exhausting interrogation and isolation .
translation: そこから3か月間の疲労困憊な尋問と孤立が続く。
back_translation: The exhausting interrogation and isolation continue for three months from there.

text: finally , the unequal lovers end up as fugitives from justice - but for how long ?
translation: ついに、不平等な恋人たちは正義からの逃亡者となる。しかし、どれくらいの間だろうか？
back_translation: Finally, the unequal lovers become fugitives from justice. But how long will it last?

text: for once the kids do n't let sam down - and they 're not likely to forget the lessons they 've learned .
translation: 一度だけ、子供たちはサムを裏切らず、彼らが学んだ教訓を忘れることはないだろう。
back_translation: Once, the children did not betray Sam, and they will never forget the lesson they learned.

text: an entertaining , if somewhat standardized , action movie .
translation: 多少標準化された、しかし面白いアクション映画。
back_translation: Somewhat standardized, but an interesting action movie.

text: the only thing that can help him is a very expensive operation , an operation their family can in no way afford .
translation: 彼を助けることができる唯一の方法は非常に高額な手術ですが、その手術は家族にとって到底負担できるものではありません。
back_translation: The only way to help him is through a very expensive surgery, but that surgery is far beyond what the family can afford.

text: this rough but extraordinary film presents a haunting picture of life in kurdistan .
translation: この粗削りだが並外れた映画は、クルディスタンの生活について心に残る描写を提供しています。
back_translation: This rough yet exceptional film provides a poignant depiction of life in Kurdistan.

text: things never seem to be the way they really are .
translation: 物事は決して実際のようには見えない。
back_translation: Things never appear as they actually are.

text: april 's shower demands you to ask how far would you go for true love and if you have the strength to live in your truth .
translation: 4月のシャワーは、真実の愛のためにどれだけの距離を行くか、そして自分の真実に生きる力があるかを問いかけます。
back_translation: The April showers ask how far one is willing to go for true love, and whether one has the power to live their own truth.

text: it has a dashing and resourceful hero ; a lisping , reptilian villain ; big fights ; big hair ; lavish period scenery ; and a story just complicated enough to let you bask in your own cleverness as you figure it out .
translation: 魅力的で機知に富んだヒーロー、舌足らずで爬虫類のような悪役、大きな戦闘、大きな髪、豪華な時代の風景、そして自分の賢さを味わいながら物語を解き明かすのにちょうど良い複雑さを持ったストーリーがあります。
back_translation: There is a story that features a charming and witty hero, a lisping and reptilian villain, grand battles, big hair, opulent landscapes of an era, and just the right complexity to savor one's cleverness while unraveling the narrative.

text: this may not be great moviemaking . . . but it 's vastly enjoyable in a low-down , scandal-mongering way .
translation: この映画作りは素晴らしいものではないかもしれませんが、低俗でスキャンダル満載な方法で非常に楽しめます。
back_translation: This movie-making may not be wonderful, but it can be very enjoyable in a sleazy and scandalous way.

text: haris seems to be an all-american guy except that he creates strange installations of hanging ropes , and suffers from terrible visions- of himself as a child in afghanistan in traditional dress , of smoke and bombs , of his dead parents and the russian soldier who shot them during the soviet invasion .
translation: ハリスは一見、アメリカ人らしい男性のようだが、奇妙な吊るされたロープのインスタレーションを作り、アフガニスタンの子供時代の自分、煙と爆発、亡き両親、ソビエト侵攻中に彼らを撃ったロシア兵の恐ろしいビジョンに悩まされている。
back_translation: Harris appears to be an American-like man at first glance, but he creates a strange installation of hanging ropes and is haunted by terrifying visions of his childhood in Afghanistan, smoke and explosions, his deceased parents, and the Russian soldiers who shot them during the Soviet invasion.

text: the trouble is , its filmmakers run out of clever ideas and visual gags about halfway through .
translation: 問題は、その映画の製作者が途中で巧妙なアイデアや視覚的ギャグが尽きてしまったことです。
back_translation: The problem is that the filmmakers ran out of clever ideas and visual gags halfway through the movie.

text: jack black will play dewey finn , a depressed musician that was recently fired from his band .
translation: ジャック・ブラックは、最近バンドをクビになった落ち込んだミュージシャン、デューイ・フィンを演じます。
back_translation: Jack Black plays Dewey Finn, a down-and-out musician who was recently kicked out of his band.

text: more of an intriguing curiosity than a gripping thriller .
translation: gripping thriller よりも、むしろ興味をそそる好奇心。
back_translation: Rather than a gripping thriller, it's more an intriguing curiosity.

text: unfortunately for them , sarah 's parents send sarah 's ex-boyfriend peter prentis ( played by christian kane ) to break up the happy marriage .
translation: 残念ながら、サラの両親はサラの元彼ピーター・プレンティス（クリスチャン・ケインが演じる）を送り、幸せな結婚を壊そうとします。
back_translation: Unfortunately, Sara's parents send her ex-boyfriend Peter Prentiss (played by Christian Kane) to try to ruin her happy marriage.

text: there 's none of the happily-ever -after spangle of monsoon wedding in late marriage -- and that 's part of what makes dover kosashvili 's outstanding feature debut so potent .
translation: 遅い結婚には、モンスーンウェディングのような幸せな結末の煌めきはなく、それがドーヴァー・コサシュビリの傑出した監督デビューを非常に強力なものにしている要素の一部です。
back_translation: Late marriages lack the sparkle of a happy ending like that of a monsoon wedding, and this is part of what makes Dover Kosashvili's outstanding directorial debut so powerful.

text: there 's an uneasy balance between the comedy and the drama that does n't really fire on all levels , but it works on a few of them .
translation: コメディとドラマの間には不安定なバランスがあり、すべてのレベルでうまく機能しているわけではありませんが、いくつかの面では機能しています。
back_translation: There is an unstable balance between comedy and drama, and it doesn't work well at every level, but in some ways, it does work.

text: . it 's a testament to the film 's considerable charm that it succeeds in entertaining , despite playing out like a feature-length sitcom replete with stereotypical familial quandaries . there 's a sheer unbridled delight in the way the story unfurls . . .
translation: 映画のかなりの魅力の証明として、ステレオタイプな家族の問題で満ちた長編シットコムのように進行しているにもかかわらず、楽しませることに成功しています。物語が展開する様子には、純粋な自由な喜びがあります…
back_translation: As proof of the considerable charm of the movie, it manages to entertain despite progressing like a long-form sitcom filled with stereotypical family issues. There is a pure, carefree joy in the way the story unfolds...

text: these two stories are simultaneously linked to the work and life of virginia woolf , who 's writing the novel mentioned before .
translation: これらの2つの物語は、以前に言及された小説を執筆しているヴァージニア・ウルフの仕事と人生に同時に関連しています。
back_translation: These two stories are simultaneously related to the work and life of Virginia Woolf, who is writing the previously mentioned novel.

text: about a boy will warm your heart without making you feel guilty about it .
translation: 「少年について」は、罪悪感を抱かせることなく心を温かくしてくれます。
back_translation: "About the Boy" warms the heart without making you feel guilty.

text: elegant and eloquent [ meditation ] on death and that most elusive of passions , love .
translation: 死と、最も捉えがたい情熱である愛についての優雅で雄弁な瞑想。
back_translation: An elegant and eloquent meditation on death and love, the most elusive passion.

text: it deals with a whole lot of fun , romance and suspense .
translation: それはたくさんの楽しさ、ロマンス、サスペンスに関わっています。
back_translation: It involves a lot of fun, romance, and suspense.

text: and slowly but surely , the dim-witted duo begin to realise this .
translation: そして、ゆっくりしかし確実に、頭の鈍い二人組はこれに気づき始める。
back_translation: And, slowly but surely, the dull-witted duo begins to notice this.

text: a disappointment for a movie that should have been the ultimate imax trip .
translation: 究極のIMAX体験であるべき映画にとっての失望。
back_translation: A disappointment for a movie that should be the ultimate IMAX experience.

text: the film is an homage to power , strength and individualism .
translation: その映画は力、強さ、そして個人主義へのオマージュです。
back_translation: That movie is a tribute to power, strength, and individualism.

text: paid in full is remarkably engaging despite being noticeably derivative of goodfellas and at least a half dozen other trouble-in-the-ghetto flicks .
translation: 「ペイド・イン・フル」は、「グッドフェラズ」やその他のハーフダズン以上のゲットーのトラブル映画に明らかに影響を受けているにもかかわらず、非常に魅力的です。
back_translation: "Paid in Full," despite being clearly influenced by "Goodfellas" and several other ghetto trouble films, is extremely captivating.

text: a fascinating literary mystery story with multiple strands about the controversy of who really wrote shakespeare 's plays .
translation: シェイクスピアの劇の真の著者についての論争をテーマにした、複数のストランドを持つ魅力的な文学ミステリー物語。
back_translation: An intriguing literary mystery story with multiple strands centered around the debate over the true authorship of Shakespeare's plays.

text: it 's easy for a filmmaker to blow up the world -- but what shyamalan does is much riskier . he tries to blow our minds .
translation: 映画製作者が世界を破壊するのは簡単ですが、シャマランがすることははるかにリスクが高いです。彼は私たちの心を揺さぶろうとしています。
back_translation: It's easy for filmmakers to destroy the world, but what Shyamalan does is far riskier. He is trying to shake our minds.

text: almost everything about the film is unsettling , from the preposterous hairpiece worn by lai 's villainous father to the endless action sequences .
translation: 映画のほとんどすべてが不安を引き起こすものであり、賈の悪役の父親が着けている無茶なウィッグから終わりのないアクションシーンまで。
back_translation: Almost all movies evoke anxiety, from the outrageous wig worn by the villain's father to the endless action scenes.

text: these were the first boats to perform deterrent patrols in the history of the navy , and they did it during some of the most crucial moments of the cold war including the 1962 cuban missile crisis .
translation: これらは海軍の歴史の中で抑止パトロールを実施した最初の船であり、1962年のキューバミサイル危機を含む冷戦の最も重要な瞬間のいくつかでそれを行いました。
back_translation: These were the first ships to carry out deterrent patrols in the history of the navy, and they did so during some of the most significant moments of the Cold War, including the Cuban Missile Crisis of 1962.

text: comes . . . uncomfortably close to coasting in the treads of the bicycle thief .
translation: 自転車泥棒の足跡に不快に近づく。
back_translation: Approaching the unpleasant footsteps of a bicycle thief.

text: upon discovering her infidelity , roxie 's husband amos refuses to take the blame for the murder and roxie is sent to jail , pending hanging .
translation: 不倫が発覚した後、ロクシーの夫エイモスは、殺人の責任を負うことを拒否し、ロクシーは絞首刑を待つために刑務所に送られます。
back_translation: After the affair was discovered, Roxy's husband Amos refused to take responsibility for the murder, and Roxy was sent to prison to await her execution.

text: ong chooses to present ah na 's life as a slight , weightless fairy tale , whose most unpleasant details seem to melt away in the face of the character 's blank-faced optimism .
translation: オンはアナの人生を、キャラクターの無表情な楽観主義の前では最も不快な詳細が溶けて消えてしまう、軽やかで重さのないおとぎ話として描くことを選んでいます。
back_translation: On chooses to depict Anna's life as a light and weightless fairy tale, where the most uncomfortable details melt away in front of the character's expressionless optimism.

text: there 's plenty of style in guillermo del toro 's sequel to the 1998 hit but why do we need 117 minutes to tell a tale that simply ca n't sustain more than 90 minutes .
translation: ギレルモ・デル・トロの1998年のヒット作の続編にはスタイルが豊富ですが、なぜ90分以上も持続できない物語を117分もかけて語る必要があるのでしょうか。
back_translation: The sequel to Guillermo del Toro's hit from 1998 is rich in styles, but why does it need 117 minutes to tell a story that cannot last more than 90 minutes?

text: when stevie meets neil on the day he comes to deliver her brand new kitchen , it 's already too late for love at first sight .
translation: スティービーがニールに出会うのは、彼が彼女の新しいキッチンを届けに来た日であり、すでに一目惚れには遅すぎる。
back_translation: The day Stevie meets Neil is when he comes to deliver her new kitchen, and it is already too late for love at first sight.

text: an endlessly fascinating , landmark movie that is as bold as anything the cinema has seen in years .
translation: 無限に魅力的で、ここ数年の映画界で見られた中でも大胆な画期的映画です。
back_translation: It is infinitely captivating and a bold, groundbreaking film seen in the film industry in recent years.

text: the movie just has too much on its plate to really stay afloat for its just under ninety minute running time .
translation: その映画は、約90分の上映時間の中で本当に持ちこたえるには、多すぎるものを抱えている。
back_translation: That movie has too much to hold up within its approximately 90-minute runtime.

text: 35-year old magnus edkvist hates class reunions as much as anyone and usually skip them .
translation: 35歳のマグナス・エドクヴィストは、誰よりも同窓会を嫌い、通常は欠席します。
back_translation: 35-year-old Magnus Edqvist hates reunions more than anyone else and usually skips them.

text: while their first few meetings are innocent enough , the obsessive and seductive madison wants more - much more .
translation: 最初の数回の出会いは無邪気ですが、執着的で誘惑的なマディソンはもっと多くを望んでいます - はるかに多くを。
back_translation: The initial encounters are innocent, but the possessive and seductive Madison desires much more - far more.

text: flawed but riveting , it wo n't be everyone 's cocktail of choice , but if you can suspend disbelief long enough , you 'll get a whopping good wallop without the hangover .
translation: 欠点はあるが魅力的で、誰にでも好まれるカクテルではないかもしれませんが、もし十分に現実を忘れることができれば、二日酔いなしで素晴らしい刺激を得られるでしょう。
back_translation: It may not be a cocktail that is universally liked, as it has its flaws, but if you can sufficiently forget reality, you can enjoy a wonderful thrill without a hangover.

text: feels like a cold old man going through the motions .
translation: まるで冷たい老人がただ作業をこなしているように感じる。
back_translation: It feels as if a cold old man is merely performing tasks.

text: like the series , the movie is funny , smart , visually inventive , and most of all , alive .
translation: シリーズと同様に、この映画も面白く、賢く、視覚的に独創的で、最も重要なのは生き生きとしている。
back_translation: Like the series, this movie is interesting, clever, visually creative, and most importantly, vibrant.

text: while cherish does n't completely survive its tonal transformation from dark comedy to suspense thriller , it 's got just enough charm and appealing character quirks to forgive that still serious problem .
translation: 「チェリッシュ」はダークコメディからサスペンススリラーへのトーンの変化を完全には乗り越えられていませんが、それでも十分な魅力と魅力的なキャラクターの quirks があり、その深刻な問題を許すことができます。
back_translation: "Cherish" does not fully overcome the tonal shift from dark comedy to suspense thriller, but it still has enough charm and engaging character quirks to allow for its serious issues.

text: when in doubt , the film ratchets up the stirring soundtrack , throws in a fish-out-of-water gag and lets the cliched dialogue rip . or else a doggie winks .
translation: 疑わしい時には、映画は感動的なサウンドトラックを強調し、水に落ちた魚のギャグを投げ込み、ありきたりな対話を繰り広げます。それか、犬がウインクします。
back_translation: In questionable moments, the film highlights an emotional soundtrack, throws in a gag about a fish out of water, and unfolds clichéd dialogue. Or a dog winks.

text: its story is delicate and moving , and the film is a wholly commendable effort , if not quite as successful as majidi 's previous works .
translation: その物語は繊細で感動的であり、映画は完全に称賛に値する努力ですが、マジディの以前の作品ほど成功しているわけではありません。
back_translation: The story is delicate and emotional, and the film is certainly a commendable effort, but it is not as successful as Majidi's previous works.

text: tension mounts , and as the cops arrive , morgan is growing impatient .
translation: 緊張が高まり、警察が到着すると、モーガンはイライラしてきている。
back_translation: As tension rises and the police arrive, Morgan is becoming frustrated.

text: cabin fever sets in , and the border between fact and fantasy begins to distort .
translation: キャビンフィーバーが始まり、現実と幻想の境界線が歪み始める。
back_translation: Cabin fever begins, and the boundary between reality and fantasy starts to blur.

text: benito -- for years a fixture in the church as well as the community -- welcomes father amaro into a new life of unseen challenges .
translation: ベニートは、教会やコミュニティの fixtures として何年も過ごし、アマロ神父を見えない挑戦の新しい生活に迎え入れます。
back_translation: Benito has spent many years as a fixture in the church and community, welcoming Father Amaro into a new life of unseen challenges.

text: it 's that rare family movie -- genuine and sweet without relying on animation or dumb humor .
translation: それは珍しい家族向けの映画で、アニメーションや愚かなユーモアに頼らず、本物で甘美です。
back_translation: It is a rare family movie that is genuine and sweet without relying on animation or silly humor.

text: in a time when a woman 's place was in the home , young emily ventures out and falls in love with a young soldier , eventually carrying his baby out of wedlock .
translation: 女性の役割が家庭にあった時代に、若きエミリーは外に出て若い兵士に恋をし、最終的に結婚せずに彼の赤ちゃんを妊娠する。
back_translation: In an era when women's roles were confined to the home, young Emily ventured outside, fell in love with a young soldier, and ultimately became pregnant with his baby without getting married.

text: he has no idea how he has journeyed the 400 miles in less than two hours .
translation: 彼は400マイルを2時間以内でどうやって旅したのか全く分からない。
back_translation: I have no idea how he traveled 400 miles in under two hours.

text: because of his horribly unforgivable sins , freddy krueger ( robert englund ) is stuck in hell eternally .
translation: 彼の恐ろしい許しがたい罪のために、フレディ・クルーガー（ロバート・イングランド）は永遠に地獄に閉じ込められています。
back_translation: Due to his horrifying and unforgivable sins, Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund) is forever trapped in hell.

text: in the dark silence of the sea during world war ii , the submarine u . s . s .
translation: 第二次世界大戦中の海の暗い静寂の中、潜水艦U.S.S.
back_translation: In the dark silence of the sea during World War II, the submarine U.S.S.

text: not for everyone , but for those with whom it will connect , it 's a nice departure from standard moviegoing fare .
translation: 誰にでも合うわけではありませんが、これが響く人々にとっては、標準的な映画鑑賞とは一味違った素敵な体験です。
back_translation: It may not resonate with everyone, but for those it speaks to, it offers a wonderful experience that is different from standard movie watching.

text: city by the sea is a gritty police thriller with all the dysfunctional family dynamics one could wish for . but how it washed out despite all of that is the project 's prime mystery .
translation: 海の街は、求められるすべての機能不全の家族ダイナミクスを備えた grittyな警察スリラーです。しかし、それにもかかわらずどうやって失敗してしまったのかが、プロジェクトの最大の謎です。
back_translation: The seaside town is a gritty police thriller equipped with all the dysfunctional family dynamics that are expected. However, the greatest mystery of the project is how it managed to fail despite that.

text: for a film about action , ultimate x is the gabbiest giant-screen movie ever , bogging down in a barrage of hype .
translation: アクション映画について、アルティメットXはこれまでで最もおしゃべりな巨大スクリーン映画であり、過剰な宣伝にうんざりさせられています。
back_translation: Regarding action movies, Ultimate X is the most talkative giant screen film to date, and I am fed up with the excessive promotion.

text: loonies is a touching comedy about five psychiatric patients who are forced to exchange their familiar surroundings for an old-fashioned , impersonal institution .
translation: 「ルーニーズ」は、五人の精神科患者が慣れ親しんだ環境を離れ、古風で非人間的な施設に移されるという感動的なコメディです。
back_translation: "The Lunatics" is an inspiring comedy about five psychiatric patients who leave their familiar environment and are moved to an old-fashioned and inhumane facility.

text: django is a character that decides to fight against his luck because he does n't accept the poverty he 's destined for .
translation: ジャンゴは、自分が運命づけられた貧困を受け入れず、運命に立ち向かうことを決意したキャラクターです。
back_translation: Django is a character who refuses to accept the poverty that he is destined for and is determined to confront his fate.

text: they fool around for a while , but forget to get each other 's names down at the end of the night .
translation: 彼らはしばらく遊び回りますが、夜の終わりにお互いの名前を記録するのを忘れてしまいます。
back_translation: They play around for a while, but at the end of the night, they forget to note each other's names.

text: en un ca & # 243 ; tico principio del siglo xxi , oleadas de cr & # 237 ; menes saturan los informativos , y decenas de sectas tratan de captar la fe de la cada vez m & # 225 ; s esc & # 233 ; ptica poblaci & # 243 ; n .
translation: 21世紀初頭のカリブ海地域では、犯罪の波がニュースを saturate し、ますます懐疑的な人々をターゲットにする数十のセクトが信仰を獲得しようとしています。
back_translation: In the early 21st century Caribbean, waves of crime saturate the news, and dozens of sects attempting to gain followers target increasingly skeptical people.

text: 'lovely and amazing , ' unhappily , is neither . . . excessively strained and contrived .
translation: 「素敵で驚くべきもの、」残念ながら、それはどちらでもなく...過度にこじつけられたものです。
back_translation: "Wonderful and astonishing," unfortunately, it is neither... it is something overly forced.

text: they grew up sharing a special relationship , in which they existed only to each other .
translation: 彼らは特別な関係を共有して成長し、お互いだけの存在でした。
back_translation: They shared a special relationship and grew together, being each other's only presence.

text: story of annette kellerman , the international swimming vaudeville and silent screen star whose life story inspired the mgm classic million dollar mermaid starring esther williams , which featured lavish busby berkeley scenes .
translation: アネット・ケラーマンの物語、国際的な水泳バウドビルおよびサイレントスクリーンのスターであり、彼女の人生物語はエスター・ウィリアムス主演のMGMクラシック『ミリオンダラー・マーメイド』にインスパイアされ、この映画には贅沢なバズビー・バークレーのシーンが含まれています。
back_translation: The story of Annette Kellerman, an international swimming beauty and silent screen star, inspired the MGM classic "Million Dollar Mermaid" starring Esther Williams, which features lavish Busby Berkeley scenes.

text: broomfield reminds us that beneath the hype , the celebrity , the high life , the conspiracies and the mystery there were once a couple of bright young men -- promising , talented , charismatic and tragically doomed .
translation: ブルームフィールドは、誇大広告、セレブリティ、高級な生活、陰謀、そしてミステリーの裏にはかつて才能ある明るい若者が二人いたことを思い出させる。彼らは期待され、魅力的で、悲劇的に運命づけられていた。
back_translation: Bloomfield serves as a reminder that behind the glitz of hype, celebrity, luxury living, conspiracies, and mysteries, there were once two bright, talented young individuals. They were anticipated, captivating, and tragically destined.

text: an interesting psychological thriller that , more often than not , actually works .
translation: 興味深い心理スリラーで、ほとんどの場合、実際に成功しています。
back_translation: An intriguing psychological thriller that mostly succeeds.

text: in order to make something of himself , dean assumes another identity and manages to enter high society .
translation: 自分を何者かにするために、ディーンは別のアイデンティティを持ち、高級社会に入り込むことに成功します。
back_translation: In order to become someone, Dean succeeds in adopting a different identity and infiltrating high society.

text: the widow falls for the brit , who pretends to be in the fishing business but is actually a professional gambler .
translation: 未亡人はイギリス人に心を奪われるが、彼は漁業に従事しているふりをしているが、実際にはプロのギャンブラーである。
back_translation: The widow is captivated by a British man who pretends to be engaged in fishing, but in reality, he is a professional gambler.

text: in this action comedy feature film , 'superbob ' utilizes his highflying karate mastery and investigative techniques to tackle the ruthless big yard .
translation: このアクションコメディ映画「スーパーボブ」では、スーパーボブが高い空中での空手の腕前と調査技術を駆使して、冷酷なビッグヤードに立ち向かいます。
back_translation: In this action-comedy film "SuperBob," SuperBob uses his high-flying karate skills and investigative techniques to confront the ruthless Big Yard.

text: by presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world , pumpkin dares us to say why either is impossible -- which forces us to confront what 's possible and what we might do to make it so .
translation: 不可能な世界の中で不可能な恋愛を描くことで、パンプキンは私たちに両者のどちらが不可能かを問う勇気を与えます。これにより、私たちは何が可能であるか、そしてそれを実現するために私たちができることを直面させられます。
back_translation: By depicting an impossible romance in an impossible world, Pumpkin gives us the courage to question which of the two is truly impossible. This forces us to confront what is possible and what we can do to make it a reality.

text: proves that a movie about goodness is not the same thing as a good movie .
translation: 善についての映画が良い映画と同じではないことを証明しています。
back_translation: It proves that a movie about goodness is not the same as a good movie.

text: she does n't want christina to suffer as she has , so sam goes to the edge to try to save the life of this lost girl - whether she wants to be saved or not .
translation: 彼女はクリスティーナが自分のように苦しむのを望んでいないので、サムはこの失われた少女の命を救うために全力を尽くします - 彼女が救われたいかどうかに関わらず。
back_translation: Sam does his best to save the life of this lost girl - regardless of whether she wants to be saved - because she doesn't want Christina to suffer like she has.

text: a movie that will wear you out and make you misty even when you do n't want to be .
translation: あなたを疲れさせ、望んでいないときでも感傷的にさせる映画。
back_translation: A movie that tires you out and makes you sentimental even when you don't want to.

text: a smug and convoluted action-comedy that does n't allow an earnest moment to pass without reminding audiences that it 's only a movie .
translation: 自己満足で複雑なアクションコメディで、真剣な瞬間が過ぎ去ることを許さず、観客にこれはただの映画だと常に思い出させる。
back_translation: A self-satisfying and complex action comedy that does not allow serious moments to pass and constantly reminds the audience that this is just a movie.

text: beautifully crafted and cooly unsettling . . . recreates the atmosphere of the crime expertly .
translation: 美しく作り上げられ、冷ややかに不安を誘う…犯罪の雰囲気を巧みに再現している。
back_translation: Beautifully crafted, it chillingly evokes anxiety... skillfully recreating the atmosphere of crime.

text: apparently writer-director attal thought he need only cast himself and his movie-star wife sitting around in their drawers to justify a film .
translation: 明らかに、脚本家兼監督のアッタルは、自分自身と映画スターの妻を下着姿で座らせるだけで映画を正当化できると考えていたようです。
back_translation: Clearly, writer and director Attal seemed to think that he could justify the film simply by having himself and his movie star wife sitting in their underwear.

text: on the bright side , it contains jesse ventura 's best work since the xfl .
translation: 良い点は、これはXFL以来のジェシー・ベンチュラのベスト作品を含んでいることです。
back_translation: The good point is that this includes Jesse Ventura's best work since XFL.

text: the verdict : two bodies and hardly a laugh between them .
translation: 評決: 二つの体とほとんど笑いがない。
back_translation: Verdict: Two bodies and almost no laughter.

text: . . . with the gifted pearce on hand to keep things on semi-stable ground dramatically , this retooled machine is ultimately effective enough at achieving the modest , crowd-pleasing goals it sets for itself .
translation: . . . 才能あるピアスが参加していることで、ドラマ的に状況をセミ安定に保ちつつ、この改良された機械は最終的には自身が設定した控えめで観客に喜ばれる目標を達成するのに十分な効果を持っています。
back_translation: . . . With the participation of talented peers, the situation is maintained semi-stably in a dramatic way, and this improved machine ultimately has enough effectiveness to achieve the modest and audience-pleasing goals it has set for itself.

text: like its bizarre heroine , it irrigates our souls .
translation: その奇妙なヒロインのように、それは私たちの魂を潤します。
back_translation: Like that strange heroine, it nourishes our souls.

text: read my lips is to be viewed and treasured for its extraordinary intelligence and originality as well as its lyrical variations on the game of love .
translation: 「リップスサービス」は、その並外れた知性と独創性、そして愛のゲームに関する詩的なバリエーションのために鑑賞され、重宝されるべきです。
back_translation: "Lips Service" should be appreciated and valued for its exceptional intelligence and creativity, as well as for its poetic variations on the game of love.

text: unaware of the events to come , they quickly discovered that dabbling with the element of time may have dire consequences .
translation: 来るべき出来事に気づかないまま、彼らは時間という要素に手を出すことが深刻な結果をもたらすかもしれないことをすぐに発見した。
back_translation: Unaware of the impending events, they soon discovered that manipulating the element of time could lead to serious consequences.

text: a perfectly acceptable , perfectly bland , competently acted but by no means scary horror movie .
translation: 完全に受け入れられる、完全に平凡で、十分に演技されたが、決して怖くないホラームービー。
back_translation: A completely acceptable, perfectly mundane, and sufficiently acted horror movie that is never scary.

text: knowing his end is near , he puts out the call to his old comrade , john `` eagle eye `` pennell .
translation: 彼は自らの終わりが近いことを知り、古い仲間であるジョン「イーグルアイ」ペネルに呼びかける。
back_translation: He knows that his end is near and calls out to his old friend John "Eagle Eye" Penner.

text: a happy young couple , sarah and tom ( brittany murphy and ashton kutcher ) marry against the wishes of sarah 's friends and family and go to europe for their honeymoon .
translation: 若い幸せなカップル、サラとトム（ブリタニー・マーフィーとアシュトン・カッチャー）は、サラの友人や家族の反対を押し切って結婚し、ヨーロッパへ新婚旅行に出かける。
back_translation: A young, happy couple, Sarah and Tom (Brittany Murphy and Ashton Kutcher), marry against the objections of Sarah's friends and family and head to Europe for their honeymoon.

text: overall , this is a juicy movie but certainly not a trashy one .
translation: 全体的に見て、この映画は魅力的ですが、決して低俗なものではありません。
back_translation: Overall, this movie is captivating, but it is by no means vulgar.

text: the change in political leaders sparks paranoia among american cia officials , so cia director bill cabot recruits a young analyst to supply insight and advice on the situation .
translation: 政治指導者の交代がアメリカのCIA関係者の間に偏執病を引き起こすため、CIA長官ビル・キャボットは状況に関する洞察とアドバイスを提供するために若いアナリストを採用する。
back_translation: The change of political leaders causes paranoia among CIA personnel, prompting CIA Director Bill Cabot to hire a young analyst to provide insights and advice on the situation.

text: though excessively tiresome , the uncertainty principle , as verbally pretentious as the title may be , has its handful of redeeming features , as long as you discount its ability to bore .
translation: 非常に退屈ではありますが、タイトルがあまりに口先だけのように思える不確定性原理には、退屈さを除けばいくつかの救いのある特徴があります。
back_translation: Although it is very boring, the uncertainty principle, which seems to be all talk and no substance, has some redeeming features if you set aside the boredom.

text: the plot is plastered with one hollywood cliche after another , most of which involve precocious kids getting the better of obnoxious adults .
translation: プロットは、一つまた一つとハリウッドのクリシェで覆われており、そのほとんどが生意気な子供たちがうるさい大人たちをやり込める内容です。
back_translation: The plot is covered with one Hollywood cliché after another, most of which involves cheeky children outsmarting noisy adults.

text: one day a mysterious young man enters her world .
translation: ある日、神秘的な若者が彼女の世界に入ってくる。
back_translation: One day, a mysterious young man enters her world.

text: nomad explores the futility of insulating oneself from the sometimes painful reality of human interaction .
translation: ノマドは、人間関係の時には痛みを伴う現実から自分を隔離することの虚しさを探求しています。
back_translation: The nomad explores the emptiness of isolating oneself from the painful reality of human relationships.

text: extreme oops - oops , ops , no matter how you spell it , it 's still a mistake to go see it .
translation: 極端なミス - ミス、オプス、どう綴っても、それを見に行くのは依然として間違いです。
back_translation: Extreme mistake - Mistake, ops, no matter how you spell it, going to see it is still wrong.

text: what they do n't know , however , is that they 're filming near the secret hideout of slobodan pavle , a serbian war criminal .
translation: 彼らが知らないのは、彼らがセルビアの戦争犯罪者スロボダン・パヴレの秘密の隠れ家の近くで撮影しているということです。
back_translation: What they don't know is that they are filming near the secret hideout of the Serbian war criminal Slobodan Pavle.

text: frances decides to take a break and she buys a villa in the beautiful tuscan countryside and decides to begin anew .
translation: フランシスは休憩を取ることに決め、美しいトスカーナの田園地帯に別荘を購入し、新たに始めることにしました。
back_translation: Francis decided to take a break, purchased a villa in the beautiful Tuscan countryside, and decided to start anew.

text: everyone is sick with start-up fever ; dreaming of the power and freedom of starting their own internet company .
translation: 誰もがスタートアップ熱にかかっており、自分のインターネット会社を始める力と自由を夢見ています。
back_translation: Everyone is caught up in startup fever, dreaming of the power and freedom to start their own internet company.

text: with this relation the characters will discover lot of things about their past .
translation: この関係を通じて、キャラクターたちは自分たちの過去について多くのことを発見するでしょう。
back_translation: Through this relationship, the characters will discover many things about their past.

text: chalk it up as the worst kind of hubristic folly .
translation: それを最もひどい傲慢な愚行として記録する。
back_translation: I will record it as the most terrible act of arrogant folly.

text: this is a shrewd and effective film from a director who understands how to create and sustain a mood .
translation: これは、雰囲気を作り出し、持続させる方法を理解している監督による、賢明で効果的な映画です。
back_translation: This is a wise and effective film by a director who understands how to create and sustain an atmosphere.

text: a spiritual exploration of sorts , offering a message of hope that resonates .
translation: ある種の精神的探求であり、共鳴する希望のメッセージを提供します。
back_translation: It is a kind of mental exploration that offers a resonating message of hope.

text: just when it seems martha 's influence may be having a favorable effect on greg 's attitude , his old ways win out .
translation: ちょうどマルサの影響がグレッグの態度に好影響を与えているように見えた時、彼の古い癖が勝ってしまう。
back_translation: Just when it seemed that the influence of Marusa was positively affecting Greg's attitude, his old habits took over.

text: this is the sort of low-grade dreck that usually goes straight to video -- with a lousy script , inept direction , pathetic acting , poorly dubbed dialogue and murky cinematography , complete with visible boom mikes .
translation: これは通常ビデオに直行するような低級な駄作です。ひどい脚本、無能な演出、情けない演技、劣悪な吹き替えのセリフ、そして視界に入るブームマイクがある曖昧な cinematography で構成されています。
back_translation: This is a low-quality piece of work that is more suited for direct-to-video. It has a terrible script, incompetent direction, pitiful acting, poor dubbing dialogue, and vague cinematography with visible boom mics.

text: though a touch too arthouse 101 in its poetic symbolism , heaven proves to be a good match of the sensibilities of two directors .
translation: 詩的な象徴性において少しアートハウス101すぎるところはあるが、『ヘブン』は二人の監督の感性の良い組み合わせであることが証明されている。
back_translation: While it leans a bit towards art house 101 in its poetic symbolism, "Heaven" proves to be a well-combined expression of the sensibilities of the two directors.

text: schaeffer has to find some hook on which to hang his persistently useless movies , and it might as well be the resuscitation of the middle-aged character .
translation: シェイファーは、彼の一向に役に立たない映画を引っ掛けるためのフックを見つけなければならず、それは中年キャラクターの蘇生でも良いかもしれない。
back_translation: Schaefer has to find a hook to catch his utterly useless movie, and it could be the revival of a middle-aged character.

text: he leaves the city while searching for expression and finds a place to hide that he uses as his stage .
translation: 彼は表現を求めて街を離れ、舞台として使う隠れ場所を見つける。
back_translation: He leaves the city in search of expression and finds a hidden place to use as a stage.

text: ' [ the cockettes ] provides a window into a subculture hell-bent on expressing itself in every way imaginable . '
translation: 「[ザ・コケットtes]は、想像できるすべての方法で自己表現をしようと必死になっているサブカルチャーへの窓を提供します。」
back_translation: "[The Coquettes] provides a window to a subculture that is desperately trying to express itself in every imaginable way."

text: he returns to chris who then sends him with the money he got from the drugs , to an old racist drunk gunrunner named harry , to buy a gun .
translation: 彼はクリスに戻り、クリスは薬から得たお金を持たせて、老いぼれの人種差別者で酔っ払いの銃密売人ハリーの元へ行かせて、銃を買わせる。
back_translation: He returned to Chris, who gave him the money he obtained from the drugs, and sent him to buy a gun from Harry, the old racist drunk and gun dealer.

text: one day , butcher lee ( karen allen ) , inez 's trusted friend and an amateur mystic of sorts , reveals a vision that inez 's one true love is close by .
translation: ある日、肉屋のリー（カレン・アレン）は、イネスの信頼できる友人であり、素人の神秘家のような存在で、イネスの唯一の真実の愛が近くにいるというビジョンを明らかにします。
back_translation: One day, Lee, the butcher (Karen Allen), reveals a vision that Ines's only true love is nearby, being a reliable friend and somewhat of an amateur mystic.

text: in their late twenties and tired of partying their way around the world , danish marie and irish sophie come ashore in northern scotland .
translation: 彼女たちは20代後半で、世界中をパーティーで過ごすことに疲れたデンマーク出身のマリーとアイルランド出身のソフィーが、スコットランド北部の海岸に上陸します。
back_translation: Marie from Denmark and Sophie from Ireland, both in their late twenties, land on the northern coast of Scotland after getting tired of spending time partying around the world.

text: in the burial society , sheldon kasner , an unlikely criminal who works as a bank loan manager , infiltrates the mysterious world of the chevrah kadisha ( the jewish society that prepares bodies for burial according to ancient ritual ) in order to steal a body and fake his own death after mobsters come after him looking for two million dollars that he is accused of having stolen .
translation: 埋葬協会の中で、シェルドン・カズナーという予想外の犯罪者が、銀行のローンマネージャーとして働きながら、古代の儀式に従って遺体を埋葬するユダヤ教の社会「ヘブラー・カディシャ」の神秘的な世界に infiltrate し、2百万ドルを盗んだとしてマフィアに追われる中、自らの死を偽造するために遺体を盗もうとします。
back_translation: Within the Burial Society, an unexpected criminal named Sheldon Kuzner, who works as a bank loan manager, infiltrates the mysterious world of the Jewish society "Chevra Kaddisha," which buries bodies according to ancient rituals. While being pursued by the mafia for stealing two million dollars, he attempts to steal a corpse to fake his own death.

text: jude law plays a leading role as inman , a wounded confederate soldier who is on a perilous journey home to his mountain community , hoping to reunite with his prewar sweetheart , ada , played by nicole kidman .
translation: ジュード・ロウは、傷ついた南部連合兵士インマンの主要な役を演じています。彼は故郷の山のコミュニティへ帰る危険な旅をしながら、ニコール・キッドマンが演じる前の恋人アダと再会することを望んでいます。
back_translation: Jude Law plays the main role of the wounded Confederate soldier Inman. As he undertakes a dangerous journey back to his hometown community in the mountains, he hopes to reunite with his former lover Ada, played by Nicole Kidman.

text: the film is based on the true story of telecommunications genius walter l . shaw sr . and his son walter t . shaw jr . , the confessed `` dinner time burglar . ``
translation: この映画は、通信の天才ウォルター・L・ショー・シニアと、彼の息子ウォルター・T・ショー・ジュニアの実際の物語に基づいており、彼は自らを「ディナータイム・バーバー」と告白した人物です。
back_translation: This movie is based on the true story of communication genius Walter L. Shaw Sr. and his son Walter T. Shaw Jr., who confessed to being the person known as the "dinnertime barber."

text: while holm is terrific as both men and hjejle quite appealing , the film fails to make the most out of the intriguing premise .
translation: ホルムは素晴らしい演技を見せ、ヘイレも非常に魅力的ですが、映画は興味深い前提を最大限に活かすことができていません。
back_translation: Holm delivers a wonderful performance, and Hayle is also very charming, but the film fails to make the most of its intriguing premise.

text: but how can graham really fall in love with her when he sees each time as the first time ?
translation: しかし、グレームは毎回を初めてのように見るとき、彼女に本当に恋をすることができるのだろうか？
back_translation: However, when Graham looks at her as if it were the first time every time, can he really fall in love with her?

text: he also tries to cope with the recent death of his 6 year old son jacob , whose presence can still be felt in the house .
translation: 彼はまた、家の中で今でも感じられる6歳の息子ジェイコブの最近の死に対処しようとしています。
back_translation: He is also trying to cope with the recent death of his 6-year-old son, Jacob, which is still felt in the house.

text: aspires to the cracked lunacy of the adventures of buckaroo banzai , but thanks to an astonishingly witless script ends up more like the adventures of ford fairlane .
translation: バッカーロー・バンザイの冒険のひび割れた狂気を目指しているが、驚くほど頭の悪い脚本のおかげで、フォード・フェアレーンの冒険に近い結果になってしまった。
back_translation: It aims for the cracked madness of "Bacano! Banzai's Adventure," but thanks to an astonishingly stupid script, it ended up resembling the adventures of Ford Fairlane.

text: [ a ] n utterly charming and hilarious film that reminded me of the best of the disney comedies from the 60s .
translation: 魅力的でユーモラスな映画で、1960年代のディズニーコメディの最高峰を思い出させる作品です。
back_translation: A charming and humorous film that reminds us of the pinnacle of Disney comedies from the 1960s.

text: amerika , zed and kyle are good friends until the wicked witch trasha comes along and takes kyle away .
translation: アメリカ、ゼッド、そしてカイルは良い友達でしたが、邪悪な魔女トラシャが現れてカイルを連れ去ってしまいました。
back_translation: America, Zed, and Kyle were good friends, but an evil witch named Trasha appeared and kidnapped Kyle.

text: they share their drugs and bodies , and beg or steal whatever they have to in order to get by .
translation: 彼らは薬や体を分け合い、暮らすために必要なものを得るために乞食や盗みを行う。
back_translation: They share drugs and bodies, begging and stealing to obtain what is necessary to live.

text: when he unexpectedly leaves for a week to go skiing with his wife , lillian is dragged out on the town by her best friend , andrea .
translation: 彼が妻と一緒にスキーに出かけるために予告なしに一週間離れると、リリアンは親友のアンドレアに引きずり出されて街に出かける。
back_translation: When he unexpectedly leaves for a week to go skiing with his wife, Lilian is dragged out into the city by her best friend Andrea.

text: is office work really as alienating as 'bartleby ' so effectively makes it ?
translation: オフィスの仕事は「バートルビー」が効果的に示すように、本当にそれほど疎外的ですか？
back_translation: Is office work really that alienating, as effectively shown in "Bartleby"?

text: a low-key labor of love that strikes a very resonant chord .
translation: 控えめな愛情のこもった労働で、非常に共鳴する響きを持っています。
back_translation: It has a very resonant echo of modest, affectionate labor.

text: one of the theives betrays his companions and swipes the gold for himself .
translation: 盗賊の一人が仲間を裏切り、自分のために金を奪う。
back_translation: One of the thieves betrays his comrades and steals gold for himself.

text: hawke draws out the best from his large cast in beautifully articulated portrayals that are subtle and so expressive they can sustain the poetic flights in burdette 's dialogue .
translation: ホークは、その豊富なキャストから最良のものを引き出し、微妙で非常に表現力豊かな描写で、バーデットの対話における詩的な飛躍を支えることができます。
back_translation: Hawk draws the best from its rich cast and can support the poetic leaps in Burdett's dialogue with subtle and highly expressive depictions.

text: while maintaining the appearance of clinical objectivity , this sad , occasionally horrifying but often inspiring film is among wiseman 's warmest .
translation: 臨床的な客観性を保ちながら、この悲しい時には恐ろしいこともあるが、しばしば感動的なこの映画は、ワイズマンの作品の中でも最も温かいものの一つである。
back_translation: While maintaining clinical objectivity, this film, which can be terrible at times during this sad period, is often moving and is one of the warmest works among Wiseman's films.

text: the action sequences are fun and reminiscent of combat scenes from the star wars series .
translation: アクションシーンは楽しく、スター・ウォーズシリーズの戦闘シーンを思い出させます。
back_translation: The action scenes are enjoyable and reminiscent of the battle scenes from the Star Wars series.

text: a cheerful enough but imminently forgettable rip-off of [ besson 's ] earlier work .
translation: 十分に陽気だが、すぐに忘れ去られるような、[ベッソン]の以前の作品の盗作。
back_translation: A cheerful work that is easily forgotten, a plagiarism of [Besson]'s previous作品.

text: an impossible romance , but we root for the patronized iranian lad .
translation: 不可能なロマンスですが、私たちは保護されたイランの少年を応援します。
back_translation: It's an impossible romance, but we support the protected Iranian boy.

text: neither revelatory nor truly edgy -- merely crassly flamboyant and comedically labored .
translation: 啓示的でもなく、本当にエッジが効いているわけでもなく、単に下品に派手で、ユーモラスに無理をしているだけだ。
back_translation: It is neither revelatory nor truly edgy; it is simply vulgar and flashy, forcing humor uncomfortably.

text: despite guidance from the blue fairy , and the love of his father , gepetto , a wooden puppet 's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another .
translation: 青い妖精の導きと父ゲペットの愛にもかかわらず、木製の人形の好奇心旺盛な精神は彼を次々と壮大な冒険へと導きます。
back_translation: Despite the guidance of the blue fairy and the love of his father Geppetto, the curious spirit of the wooden puppet leads him on grand adventures one after another.

text: yet this highly traditional world is facing profound changes due to the postwar influx of foreign images and ideas in japanese culture .
translation: しかし、この非常に伝統的な世界は、戦後の外国のイメージやアイデアの流入により深刻な変化に直面しています。
back_translation: However, this very traditional world is facing serious changes due to the influx of foreign images and ideas after the war.

text: a young man in his early early 20 's discovers his first love is getting married so he drops everything to travel across california and stop her , with no money and no car , where he discovers life , love and secrets from his past .
translation: 20代前半の若者が初恋の相手が結婚することを知り、全てを投げ打ってカリフォルニアを横断し彼女を止めようとします。お金も車もない中で、彼は人生、愛、そして自分の過去の秘密に出会います。
back_translation: A young person in their early twenties learns that their first love is getting married and decides to drop everything to cross California to stop her. Without money or a car, he encounters life, love, and the secrets of his past.

text: styled after vh1 's `` behind the music , `` this mockumentary profiles the rise and fall of an internet startup , called icevan . com .
translation: VH1の「Behind the Music」を模したこのモキュメンタリーは、インターネットスタートアップ「icevan.com」の興隆と衰退を描いています。
back_translation: This mockumentary, inspired by VH1's "Behind the Music," depicts the rise and fall of the internet startup "icevan.com."

text: the only upside to all of this unpleasantness is , given its labor day weekend upload , feardotcom should log a minimal number of hits .
translation: このすべての不快さの唯一の利点は、労働者の日の週末にアップロードされたことから、feardotcomが最小限のヒット数を記録するはずであるということです。
back_translation: The only advantage to all this discomfort is that, having been uploaded over the Labor Day weekend, feardotcom should record minimal hits.

text: an incredibly irritating comedy about thoroughly vacuous people . . . manages to embody the worst excesses of nouvelle vague without any of its sense of fun or energy .
translation: 完全に空虚な人々についての信じられないほどイライラするコメディ…楽しさやエネルギーを感じさせることなく、ヌーベルヴァーグの最悪の過剰さを具現化している。
back_translation: Incredibly frustrating comedy about completely empty people... embodying the worst excesses of the Nouvelle Vague without evoking any sense of fun or energy.

text: he lives in a motor garage with his six friends .
translation: 彼は6人の友達と一緒にモーターガレージに住んでいます。
back_translation: He lives in a motor garage with six friends.

text: the embodiment of the very message it so modestly conveys -- it 's the accomplished little guy we fervently root for .
translation: それが謙虚に伝えるメッセージそのものの具現化であり、私たちが心から応援する有能な小さなキャラクターです。
back_translation: That is the embodiment of the message conveyed with humility, and it is a capable little character that we wholeheartedly support.

text: if you act in an inverse way , you will not have the room for larger stones .
translation: 逆に行動すると、大きな石を置くスペースがなくなります。
back_translation: If you act in the opposite way, there will be no space left to place a large stone.

text: offers 102 minutes of breezy , occasionally very funny entertainment .
translation: 102分の軽快で、時折非常に面白いエンターテイメントを提供します。
back_translation: It offers a brisk 102 minutes of entertainment that is occasionally very amusing.

text: perhaps no greater example yet exists of the beauty achievable when one is a master of the digital aesthetic .
translation: デジタル美学の達人であるときに達成可能な美の素晴らしさの例は、これまでにないかもしれません。
back_translation: An example of the extraordinary beauty that can be achieved when one masters digital aesthetics may be unprecedented.

text: `` it 's like those monster vampire high school kind of movies , only here the monsters are jesus-freak teenagers , `` says michael stipe , the former r . e . m .
translation: 「それはあのモンスター吸血鬼の高校の映画のようなもので、ここではモンスターがイエス信者のティーンエイジャーだ」とマイケル・スタイプ、元R.E.M.が言います。
back_translation: "It's like that high school movie about monster vampires, except here the monsters are teenage believers in Jesus," says Michael Stipe, former lead singer of R.E.M.

text: ultimately , quinn rescues tasha from the hands of another assassin and takes her into his protection .
translation: 最終的に、クインはタシャを別の暗殺者の手から救い出し、彼女を自分の保護下に置きます。
back_translation: In the end, Quinn saves Tasha from another assassin and places her under his protection.

text: a sweet-tempered comedy that forgoes the knee-jerk misogyny that passes for humor in so many teenage comedies .
translation: 甘い気立てのコメディであり、多くのティーンエイジャー向けコメディでユーモアとされる反射的な女性嫌悪を避けています。
back_translation: It is a sweet-natured comedy that avoids the reflexive misogyny often found in many teen comedies.

text: he enlists the support of other prisoners including crips , bloods and a very powerful jamaican mobster and is able to expand his drug empire .
translation: 彼はクリップス、ブラッズ、そして非常に強力なジャマイカのマフィアのサポートを得て、彼の薬物帝国を拡大することができる。
back_translation: With the support of the Crips, Bloods, and a very powerful Jamaican mafia, he is able to expand his drug empire.

text: belongs in the too-hot-for-tv direct-to-video/dvd category , and this is why i have given it a one-star rating .
translation: テレビでは放送できないほどの直接ビデオ/DVDカテゴリに属しており、これが私が一つ星の評価を与えた理由です。
back_translation: It belongs to the direct video/DVD category that cannot be broadcast on television, which is why I gave it a one-star rating.

text: as 'chick flicks ' go , this one is pretty miserable , resorting to string-pulling rather than legitimate character development and intelligent plotting .
translation: 「チック・フリック」としては、これはかなり悲惨で、正当なキャラクターの発展や知的なプロットではなく、単なる操りに頼っています。
back_translation: "As a chick flick, this is quite tragic, relying simply on manipulation rather than genuine character development or an intellectual plot."

text: solondz may well be the only one laughing at his own joke
translation: ソロンドツは自分のジョークを笑っているのはおそらく彼だけかもしれません。
back_translation: Sorondotsu may be the only one laughing at his own jokes.

text: kosminsky . . . puts enough salt into the wounds of the tortured and self-conscious material to make it sting .
translation: コスミンスキーは、苦しむ自己意識のある素材に十分な塩を塗り込み、痛みを伴わせる。
back_translation: Kosminsky thoroughly salts the material with a suffering self-awareness, inflicting pain.

text: almost nothing else -- raunchy and graphic as it may be in presentation -- is one-sided , outwardly sexist or mean-spirited . and in a sense , that 's a liability .
translation: ほとんど他に何も -- プレゼンテーションが猥雑でグラフィックであっても -- 一方的で、外向的に性差別的または意地悪ではありません。そして、ある意味では、それが欠点です。
back_translation: Almost nothing else -- even if the presentation is crude and graphic -- is one-sided or outwardly sexist or mean-spirited. And in a way, that is a drawback.

text: potter begins his second year at hogwarts school of wizardry , but is warned by a mysterious creature that danger awaits him at the school .
translation: ポッターはホグワーツ魔法学校での2年目を迎えますが、神秘的な生き物から学校で危険が待ち受けていると警告されます。
back_translation: Potter is entering his second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but he is warned by a mysterious creature that danger awaits at the school.

text: a corrupt cia agent ( johnny depp ) who at that time , demands retribution from his worst enemy to carry out the drug lord 's uprising against the government .
translation: 腐敗したCIAエージェント（ジョニー・デップ）は、その時、政府に対する麻薬王の反乱を実行するために、最悪の敵から報復を要求します。
back_translation: A corrupt CIA agent (Johnny Depp) then demands revenge from his worst enemy in order to carry out the drug lord's rebellion against the government.

text: automatically pegs itself for the straight-to-video sci-fi rental shelf .
translation: 自動的にストレート・トゥ・ビデオのSFレンタル棚に自分を固定します。
back_translation: I automatically lock myself into the straight-to-video sci-fi rental shelf.

text: somehow ms . griffiths and mr . pryce bring off this wild welsh whimsy .
translation: どういうわけか、グリフィスさんとプライスさんはこのワイルドなウェールズの奇想を実現しています。
back_translation: For some reason, Mr. Griffiths and Mr. Price are realizing this wild Welsh fantasy.

text: the three roommates have proudly scammed their way through the last four years of college and now , during the final exams , these big-men-on-campus are about to be busted by the most unlikely dude in school .
translation: 三人のルームメイトは、プライドを持って過去4年間の大学生活を騙し通してきた。そして今、期末試験の最中に、キャンパスの最も意外な男によって彼らは捕まろうとしている。
back_translation: The three roommates have been bluffing their way through their college lives for the past four years with pride. Now, in the midst of final exams, they are about to get caught by the most unexpected man on campus.

text: all the amped-up tony hawk-style stunts and thrashing rap-metal ca n't disguise the fact that , really , we 've been here , done that .
translation: すべてのエネルギッシュなトニー・ホークスタイルのスタントや激しいラップメタルは、実際に私たちはここにいて、これをやったことがあるという事実を隠すことはできません。
back_translation: All the energetic Tony Hawk-style stunts and intense rap metal cannot disguise the fact that we are actually here and have done this.

text: bielinsky 's script is slick and fiendishly clever , with seemingly a twist a minute .
translation: ビエリンキーの脚本は洗練されていて非常に巧妙で、まるで毎分ひねりがあるかのようです。
back_translation: Biellinsky's script is sophisticated and extremely clever, almost as if there is a twist every minute.

text: an l . a . artist ( mark ruffalo ) with everything seemingly going for him suddenly finds a change in his life when an art curator cancels his upcoming one-man show .
translation: ロサンゼルスのアーティスト（マーク・ラファロ）は、すべてが順調に見える中、アートキュレーターが彼の次の個展をキャンセルしたことで人生に変化が訪れる。
back_translation: An artist in Los Angeles (Mark Ruffalo) sees a change in his life when an art curator cancels his next solo exhibition, despite everything seeming to go well.

text: [ siegal ] proves that you do n't have to be a just out of film school gen-x'er to make a resonant and entertaining movie about young adults .
translation: [シーガル]は、若い大人についての共鳴し、楽しませる映画を作るのに、映画学校を出たばかりのジェネレーションXである必要はないことを証明しています。
back_translation: [Seagull] proves that you don't have to be a freshly graduated member of Generation X from film school to create a resonant and entertaining film about young adults.

text: opens at a funeral , ends on the protagonist 's death bed and does n't get much livelier in the three hours in between .
translation: 葬式で始まり、主人公の死の床で終わり、その間の三時間もあまり活気はありません。
back_translation: It begins with a funeral and ends with the protagonist on their deathbed, and the three hours in between are not very lively either.

text: called `` an elegant documentary `` by sundance and `` eloquent and deeply moving `` by the la times , toyo miyatake : infinite shades of gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer 's search for truth and beauty in a world of impermanence .
translation: 「エレガントなドキュメンタリー」とサンダンスに称され、「雄弁で深く感動的」とロサンゼルス・タイムズに評された「宮武豊：無限の灰色のニュアンス」は、この写真家が無常の世界における真実と美を追い求める洞察に満ちた肖像です。
back_translation: "Toyo Miyatake: Infinite Shades of Gray," praised by Sundance as an "elegant documentary" and described by the Los Angeles Times as "eloquent and deeply moving," is an insightful portrait of this photographer's pursuit of truth and beauty in a transient world.

text: it is far from the worst , thanks to the topical issues it raises , the performances of stewart and hardy , and that essential feature -- a decent full-on space battle .
translation: それは最悪からは遠く、提起される重要な問題、スチュワートとハーディの performances、そして不可欠な要素である本格的な宇宙戦闘のおかげである。
back_translation: It is far from the worst, thanks to the important issues raised, the performances of Stewart and Hardy, and the essential element of authentic space combat.

text: can martin regain his better self - and not lose paula ?
translation: マーチンはより良い自分を取り戻し、ポーラを失わずに済むだろうか？
back_translation: Will Martin be able to regain a better version of himself without losing Paula?

text: according to eric and ami 's passive-aggressive mother who refuses to accept that her daughter is an adult ( jessica walters ) , that answer is `` yes `` .
translation: エリックとエイミーの受動的攻撃的な母親（ジェシカ・ウォルターズ）は、娘が大人であることを受け入れようとしない。そのため、その答えは「はい」である。
back_translation: Eric and Amy's passive-aggressive mother (Jessica Walters) struggles to accept that her daughter is an adult. Therefore, the answer is "yes."

text: successful filmmakers were asked how they balanced a family and a career .
translation: 成功した映画製作者たちは、どのように家族とキャリアを両立させているのか尋ねられました。
back_translation: Successful filmmakers were asked how they balance family and career.

text: a plodding look at the french revolution through the eyes of aristocrats .
translation: 貴族の視点から見たフランス革命の鈍重な考察。
back_translation: A sluggish examination of the French Revolution from the perspective of the nobility.

text: a determined , ennui-hobbled slog that really does n't have much to say beyond the news flash that loneliness can make people act weird .
translation: 決意に満ちた、退屈に足を引っ張られた苦闘であり、孤独が人々を奇妙な行動に駆り立てるというニュース速報以上のことはあまり言っていません。
back_translation: It is a struggle filled with determination, hindered by boredom, and it says little more than a breaking news alert about how loneliness drives people to strange behaviors.

text: on their last night of high school life , six best friends vow to spend their spring break together .
translation: 高校生活最後の夜、六人の親友たちは春休みを一緒に過ごすことを誓った。
back_translation: On the last night of their high school life, the six close friends vowed to spend spring break together.

text: the farcical elements seemed too pat and familiar to hold my interest , yet its diverting grim message is a good one .
translation: 滑稽な要素はあまりにも単純でお馴染みすぎて私の興味を引くことはできませんでしたが、その気を引くような厳しいメッセージは良いものです。
back_translation: The comical elements were too simple and familiar to capture my interest, but the compelling and serious message was a good one.

text: wildly incompetent but brilliantly named half past dead -- or for seagal pessimists : totally past his prime .
translation: 手に負えないほど無能だが、見事に名付けられた「半分死んでいる」 — あるいは、セガールに悲観的な人のためには「完全にピークを過ぎた」とも言える。
back_translation: Incapable to the point of being unmanageable, but aptly named "half dead" — or, for those who are pessimistic about Seagal, it could also be said that he is "completely past his peak."

text: even if the world does n't see things the way [ michael moore ] does , his questions are worth asking . M-^E and bowling for columbine benefits from his iconoclastic zeal .
translation: たとえ世界がマイケル・ムーアの見方を理解しなくても、彼の問いかけは価値があります。『マイケル・ムーアの世界侵略』や『コロンバイン』は、彼の偶像破壊的な熱意から恩恵を受けています。
back_translation: Even if the world does not understand Michael Moore's perspective, his questions are valuable. "Michael Moore's World Invasion" and "Columbine" benefit from his iconoclastic enthusiasm.

text: the smug , oily demeanor that donovan adopts throughout the stupidly named pipe dream is just repulsive .
translation: ドノバンが愚かな名前の「パイプドリーム」を通して見せる smug で油っぽい態度は、本当に嫌悪感を抱かせる。
back_translation: Donovan's smug and slick attitude displayed through the foolishly named "Pipe Dream" is truly off-putting.

text: k-19 : the widowmaker is derivative , overlong , and bombastic -- yet surprisingly entertaining .
translation: K-19：ウィドウメーカーは派生的で、長すぎて、誇張されているが、それでも驚くほど楽しませてくれる。
back_translation: K-19: The Widowmaker is derivative, overly long, and exaggerated, yet it still manages to be surprisingly entertaining.

text: through dream manipulations and guilt , he 's able to convince hockey-masked psychopath jason which both freddy and jason sense as the perfect opportunity for a slice-and-dice job .
translation: 夢の操作と罪悪感を通じて、彼はホッケーマスクのサイコパス、ジェイソンを納得させることができ、フレディとジェイソンはこれをスライス＆ダイスの絶好のチャンスと感じる。
back_translation: Through manipulation of dreams and guilt, he is able to convince the hockey mask-wearing psychopath, Jason, and Freddy and Jason see this as a perfect opportunity for a slice and dice.

text: this was just after the offensive against the taliban forces had started .
translation: これはタリバン軍に対する攻撃が始まった直後のことだった。
back_translation: This was right after the attack on the Taliban forces began.

text: soon , she begins to receive strange phone calls from jennifer , her dead best friend , who has supposedly come back from the dead to avenge her death .
translation: すぐに、彼女は亡くなった親友ジェニファーからの奇妙な電話を受け始めます。ジェニファーは彼女の死を復讐するために死から戻ってきたとされています。
back_translation: Soon, she begins receiving strange phone calls from her deceased best friend Jennifer. It is said that Jennifer has come back from the dead to take revenge for her death.

text: a simmering psychological drama in which the bursts of sudden violence are all the more startling for the slow buildup that has preceded them .
translation: ゆっくりとした盛り上がりの後に突発的な暴力の爆発が起こる、しみじみとした心理ドラマ。
back_translation: A poignant psychological drama in which a gradual buildup leads to an explosive outburst of sudden violence.

text: a boy 's introduction to acts of abuse , killing and suicide all take place inside an abandoned playground .
translation: 少年の虐待、殺人、自殺への導入は、すべて廃墟となった遊び場の中で行われる。
back_translation: The introduction to the abuse, murder, and suicide of the少年 takes place in an abandoned playground.

text: the ringwraiths return in an even more frightening form .
translation: ナズグールはさらに恐ろしい姿で帰ってきます。
back_translation: The Nazgul return in an even more terrifying form.

text: the beautiful fugitive , grace ( nicole kidman ) , arrives in the isolated township of dogville on the run from a team of gangsters .
translation: 美しい逃亡者グレース（ニコール・キッドマン）は、ギャングのチームから逃げる途中で孤立した町ドッグビルに到着します。
back_translation: The beautiful fugitive Grace (Nicole Kidman) arrives in the isolated town of Dogville while on the run from a gang.

text: at first shocked into disbelief , amudha then expresses her determination to search out for her biological mother .
translation: 最初は信じられない衝撃を受けたアムダは、その後、自分の実母を探し出す決意を表明します。
back_translation: Initially shocked and unable to believe it, Amuda later declares her determination to search for her biological mother.

text: even if britney spears is really cute , her movie is really bad .
translation: ブリトニー・スピアーズは本当に可愛いけれど、彼女の映画は本当にひどい。
back_translation: Britney Spears is really cute, but her movies are really terrible.

text: . . . plenty of warmth to go around , with music and laughter and the love of family .
translation: 周りにはたくさんの温もりがあり、音楽と笑い、そして家族の愛があります。
back_translation: There is a lot of warmth around, filled with music, laughter, and the love of family.

text: the movie wavers between hallmark card sentimentality and goofy , life-affirming moments straight out of a cellular phone commercial .
translation: 映画は、ハルマークカードの感傷と、携帯電話のコマーシャルから直に出てきたような、愉快で人生を肯定する瞬間の間を揺れ動いています。
back_translation: The movie oscillates between the sentimentality of a Hallmark card and moments of joy and affirmation of life that seem to have come straight out of a mobile phone commercial.

text: mark me down as a non-believer in werewolf films that are not serious and rely on stupidity as a substitute for humor .
translation: 私は真面目でなく、愚かさをユーモアの代わりに使うウェアウルフ映画には信じない者としてマークしてください。
back_translation: Mark me as someone who doesn't believe in werewolf movies that use foolishness instead of humor and are not serious.

text: it is von sydow who gives intacto its gravity , resonance , soul .
translation: インタクトに重み、共鳴、魂を与えるのはフォン・シドーである。
back_translation: It is Von Sidow who gives weight, resonance, and soul to the interaction.

text: perceiving his resignation as cowardice , his friends and fiancee give him four white feathers , the symbol of cowardice , but little do they know he 's actually going undercover and plans to redeem his honor .
translation: 彼の resign を臆病さと見なす友人たちと婚約者は、臆病の象徴である4枚の白い羽を彼に贈るが、彼が実際には潜入捜査を行っており、名誉を取り戻す計画を立てていることを彼らは知らない。
back_translation: His friends and fiancée, considering his resignation as a sign of cowardice, gift him four white feathers as a symbol of cowardice, but they are unaware that he is actually conducting an undercover investigation and planning to restore his honor.

text: the fatal accident was actually choreographed by henrietta , a kervorkian wannabe , and dara and noble become henrietta 's unwitting pawns .
translation: その致命的な事故は実際にはヘンリエッタによって仕組まれたものであり、彼女はケルヴォルキアンになりたいと思っている。ダラとノーブルはヘンリエッタの知らぬ間の駒となる。
back_translation: The fatal accident was actually orchestrated by Henrietta, who wants to become Kevorkian. Dara and Noble become pawns unaware of Henrietta's plans.

text: the 57-minute , color documentary feature film , wedding advice : speak now or forever hold your peace , explores contemporary american ambivalence about weddings and marriage .
translation: 57分のカラー記録映画「結婚のアドバイス：今話すか、永遠に沈黙するか」は、現代アメリカにおける結婚式と結婚に対する曖昧な感情を探ります。
back_translation: The 57-minute color documentary film "Marriage Advice: Speak Now or Forever Hold Your Peace" explores the ambiguous feelings surrounding weddings and marriage in modern America.

text: australia : land beyond time is an enjoyable big movie primarily because australia is a weirdly beautiful place .
translation: オーストラリア：時を超えた土地は、オーストラリアが奇妙に美しい場所であるため、楽しい大作映画です。
back_translation: Australia: A Timeless Land is a fun epic film because Australia is a strangely beautiful place.

text: some body smacks of exhibitionism more than it does cathartic truth telling .
