translation: ある身体は、カタルシス的な真実の告白よりもむしろ、露出狂の臭いがする。
back_translation: A certain body smells more of an exhibitionist than of a cathartic confession of truth.

text: later on , when frode is safely tucked in bed , something is stirring in the closet , because that little monster puppet is no ordinary puppet .
translation: その後、フローデが安全にベッドにくるまっていると、クローゼットの中で何かが動いている。なぜなら、その小さなモンスターの人形は普通の人形ではないからだ。
back_translation: Later, as Floode was safely wrapped up in bed, something moved inside the closet. This was because the little monster doll was not an ordinary doll.

text: another story follows the relationship between a stepfather ( neeson ) and his young stepson .
translation: 別の物語は、継父（ニーソン）と彼の若い義理の息子との関係を描いています。
back_translation: Another story depicts the relationship between the stepfather (Neeson) and his young stepson.

text: colson comes to live with them , an injection of danger in the form of a strange , silent houseguest with haunted eyes and odd habits .
translation: コルソンは彼らと一緒に住むことになり、幽霊のような目と奇妙な習慣を持つ静かな家guestという形で危険の波紋が広がる。
back_translation: Corson ends up living with them, and in the form of a quiet houseguest with ghostly eyes and strange habits, the waves of danger begin to spread.

text: a young man shares his mantra and imagines innocent beauty as he reflects upon his lonely , mundane existence .
translation: 若い男性が自らのマントラを共有し、孤独で平凡な日々を振り返りながら無垢な美しさを思い描く。
back_translation: A young man shares his mantra while reflecting on his lonely and ordinary days, envisioning innocent beauty.

text: smart and alert , thirteen conversations about one thing is a small gem .
translation: スマートで鋭敏な「13の会話」は小さな宝石です。
back_translation: "The smart and sharp '13 Conversations' is a little gem."

text: they 're just a couple of cops in copmovieland , these two , but in narc , they find new routes through a familiar neighborhood .
translation: 彼らはコップムービーの世界ではただの警官のカップルですが、「ナルク」ではおなじみの近所で新しいルートを見つけます。
back_translation: In the world of Cop Movies, they are just a couple of police officers, but in "Nark," they discover a new route in their familiar neighborhood.

text: the rich performances by friel -- and especially williams , an american actress who becomes fully english -- round out the square edges .
translation: フリエルの豊かな演技と、特にアメリカの女優ウィリアムズが完全にイギリスのキャラクターになることで、四角いエッジが滑らかになります。
back_translation: With Friel's rich performance, and especially with American actress Williams completely becoming an English character, the square edges become smooth.

text: they decide that the path to true love is to purposely set each other up on `` extreme dates `` with the objects of their affections .
translation: 彼らはお互いの愛する人との「エクストリームデート」に敢えて設定し合うことが真実の愛への道だと決めます。
back_translation: They decide that daringly setting each other up on "extreme dates" with their loved ones is the path to true love.

text: purpo $ e is the story of young internet entrepreneur , john elias .
translation: purpo$eは、若きインターネット起業家ジョン・エリアスの物語です。
back_translation: Purpose is the story of a young internet entrepreneur, John Elias.

text: while tattoo borrows heavily from both seven and the silence of the lambs , it manages to maintain both a level of sophisticated intrigue and human-scale characters that suck the audience in .
translation: タトゥーは『セブン』と『羊たちの沈黙』から多くを借りているが、洗練された興味深さと人間的な規模のキャラクターを維持し、観客を引き込むことに成功している。
back_translation: The tattoo borrows heavily from "Se7en" and "The Silence of the Lambs," but manages to maintain a refined intrigue and human-scale characters, successfully drawing in the audience.

text: not just any dress , this is a 1930s parisian ball gown , and the two women 's respective desires for it are played out to a comical through bitter end .
translation: ただのドレスではなく、これは1930年代のパリの舞踏会用ドレスです。2人の女性のそれぞれの欲望が、コミカルでありながらも苦々しい結末に向かって展開されます。
back_translation: This is not just a dress; it is a ball gown from the 1930s Paris. The desires of the two women unfold towards a comedic yet bitter ending.

text: even the finest chef ca n't make a hotdog into anything more than a hotdog , and robert de niro ca n't make this movie anything more than a trashy cop buddy comedy .
translation: たとえ最高のシェフでもホットドッグをホットドッグ以上のものにはできず、ロバート・デ・ニーロもこの映画をだらしない刑事コンビコメディ以上のものにはできない。
back_translation: Even the best chef can't turn a hot dog into something more than a hot dog, and Robert De Niro can't make this movie more than a sloppy detective buddy comedy.

text: the hilarity belies the poignancy of truth and love and the laughter is punctuated with honesty , tenderness and pain .
translation: その楽しさは真実と愛の切なさを隠しており、笑いは誠実さ、優しさ、そして痛みで彩られています。
back_translation: The joy hides the poignant truths of love, and laughter is colored by sincerity, kindness, and pain.

text: she works at a pet clinic and lives alone with her only `` true friend `` ; a doll her mother gave her when she was a little girl .
translation: 彼女はペットクリニックで働いていて、幼い頃に母親からもらった唯一の「真の友人」である人形と一緒に一人で暮らしています。
back_translation: She works at a pet clinic and lives alone with the only "true friend" she received from her mother when she was young, which is a doll.

text: exquisitely nuanced in mood tics and dialogue , this chamber drama is superbly acted by the deeply appealing veteran bouquet and the chilling but quite human berling .
translation: 細やかなムードのティックや対話において非常に繊細で、この室内劇は深く魅力的なベテラン俳優のブーケと、冷酷ながらもかなり人間的なバーリングによって素晴らしく演じられています。
back_translation: The intricate nuances of the tick and dialogue are extremely delicate, and this indoor play is wonderfully performed by the deeply engaging veteran actor Bouquete and the ruthless yet quite human Barling.

text: in all , the film examines a destructive relationship that struggles with even the simplest decisions .
translation: 全体として、この映画は最も単純な決定にさえ苦しむ破壊的な関係を考察しています。
back_translation: Overall, this film explores destructive relationships that struggle even with the simplest decisions.

text: imperfect ? yes , but also intriguing and honorable , a worthwhile addition to a distinguished film legacy .
translation: 不完全ですか？はい、しかし同時に魅力的で尊敬すべきものであり、著名な映画の遺産にとって価値のある追加です。
back_translation: Is it imperfect? Yes, but at the same time, it is captivating and admirable, and it is a valuable addition to the legacy of notable films.

text: the year 2002 has conjured up more coming-of-age stories than seem possible , but take care of my cat emerges as the very best of them .
translation: 2002年はこれまでに考えられる以上の多くの成長物語を生み出しましたが、「私の猫をお願いいたします」がその中でも最高の作品として浮かび上がります。
back_translation: The year 2002 produced many growth stories beyond what could have been imagined, but "Please Take Care of My Cat" stands out as one of the best among them.

text: harry , it turns out , is a parsel-tongue .
translation: ハリーは、実はパーセル・タングであることが判明しました。
back_translation: It was revealed that Harry is actually Purcell Tang.

text: john connor ( nick stahl ) is living in the streets as a hacker .
translation: ジョン・コナー（ニック・スタール）は、ハッカーとして路上生活をしています。
back_translation: John Connor (played by Nick Stahl) is living on the streets as a hacker.

text: looking at the posters for blue crush , which show bosworth , rodriguez and lake posing with bikinis and surfboards , i expected another mindless surfing movie . blue crush is anything but .
translation: ブルー・クラッシュのポスターを見て、ボズワース、ロドリゲス、レイクがビキニとサーフボードを持ってポーズをとっているのを見たとき、私はまた無意味なサーフィン映画だと思っていました。しかし、ブルー・クラッシュはそれとは全く異なります。
back_translation: When I saw the poster for Blue Crush, with Bosworth, Rodriguez, and Lake posing with bikinis and surfboards, I thought it was just another meaningless surfing movie. However, Blue Crush is completely different.

text: ever since her new neighbor , mr . mackenheim , the former ruler of a distant alien planet , moved in , all the cats in the neighborhood have been disappearing .
translation: 新しい隣人であるマッケンハイムさん、遠くの異星の惑星の元支配者が引っ越してきて以来、近所の猫たちがすべて消えてしまっています。
back_translation: Since our new neighbor, Mr. McKenheim, the former ruler of a distant alien planet, moved in, all the cats in the neighborhood have disappeared.

text: oh yes , and there are no rules in the game .
translation: ああ、そうですね。そして、ゲームにはルールがありません。
back_translation: Ah, I see. And there are no rules in the game.

text: to lena , vaughn represents the life she is running away from .
translation: レナにとって、ボーンは彼女が逃げようとしている人生を象徴しています。
back_translation: For Lena, the bone symbolizes the life she is trying to escape.

text: five men and women race against time ( and sometimes their own knack for self-sabotage ) to save the consummate southern , rowdy group house from the academic upper crust and a vindictive sorority .
translation: 五人の男女が、完璧な南部の騒がしいグループハウスを学問的エリート層と復讐心を持ったソロリティから守るために、時間（そして時には自分自身の自己破壊の才能）と競い合います。
back_translation: Five men and women compete against time (and sometimes their own self-destructive tendencies) to protect their perfect southern noisy group house from academic elites and a vengeful sorority.

text: about schmidt is a curious slice of americana . . . the characters are so clearly drawn and the dialogue so rich , you are immediately hooked .
translation: 『アバウト・シュミット』はアメリカを表現した興味深い作品です。キャラクターは非常に明確に描かれ、対話は非常に豊かで、あなたはすぐに引き込まれます。
back_translation: "About Schmidt" is an interesting work that represents America. The characters are depicted very clearly, and the dialogue is very rich, drawing you in immediately.

text: 10 minutes into the film you 'll be white-knuckled and unable to look away .
translation: 映画が始まって10分も経つと、あなたは手に汗握り、目を離せなくなるでしょう。
back_translation: Once the movie begins, you will be gripping your hands and unable to take your eyes off it within just 10 minutes.

text: many of benjamins ' elements feel like they 've been patched in from an episode of miami vice .
translation: ベンジャミンの多くの要素は、まるで「マイアミ・バイス」のエピソードから接ぎ木されたかのように感じられます。
back_translation: Many elements of Benjamin feel as if they were grafted from an episode of "Miami Vice."

text: narrated by james ellroy , stan brakhage , and dr . roy menninger .
translation: ジェームズ・エルロイ、スタン・ブラッケージ、ロイ・メニンジャー博士によって語られています。
back_translation: It is narrated by James Ellroy, Stan Brakhage, and Dr. Roy Menninger.

text: the characters ' connect in a maze of situations , underpinning the idea that 'geography is destiny ' and that each of us has our own 'republic ' , where lives intersect .
translation: キャラクターたちは状況の迷路でつながり、「地理は運命である」という考えを支え合い、私たち一人一人にはそれぞれの「共和国」があり、そこで人生が交差することを示しています。
back_translation: The characters are connected in a maze of situations, supporting the idea that "geography is destiny," and showing that each of us has our own "republic" where our lives intersect.

text: agency owner/president , claire upton , has put together a 6 minute training video designed to help you gain job satisfaction as a contingent employee .
translation: エージェンシーのオーナー兼社長、クレア・アップトンが、契約社員としての仕事の満足度を高めるために設計された6分間のトレーニングビデオを作成しました。
back_translation: Claire Upton, the owner and president of the agency, created a 6-minute training video designed to enhance job satisfaction for contract employees.

text: watching trouble every day , at least if you do n't know what 's coming , is like biting into what looks like a juicy , delicious plum on a hot summer day and coming away with your mouth full of rotten pulp and living worms .
translation: 毎日困難を見守ることは、少なくとも何が来るか分からなければ、暑い夏の日に見た目はジューシーで美味しそうなプラムをかじり、腐った果肉と生きたミミズで口いっぱいになるようなものです。
back_translation: Watching difficulties every day is like biting into a juicy, delicious-looking plum on a hot summer day, only to find it filled with rotten flesh and live worms, at least if you don't know what's coming.

text: `` the bride `` was once part of a group of world class female assassins , until the group leader , `` bill `` and the other assassins turn against her .
translation: 「花嫁」はかつて世界クラスの女性暗殺者たちのグループの一員でしたが、グループのリーダーである「ビル」と他の暗殺者たちが彼女に対抗してきました。
back_translation: "The Bride" was once a member of a group of world-class female assassins, but the group's leader, "Bill," and the other assassins have been opposing her.

text: drumline is a movie that treats its characters and audience with respect ; it ca n't be accused of being a dumbed-down teen comedy .
translation: ドラミラインはキャラクターと観客を尊重して扱う映画であり、単純化されたティーンコメディとして非難されることはありません。
back_translation: Doraemon: Nobita's New Dinosaur is a film that respects its characters and audience, and it is not criticized as a simplified teen comedy.

text: there 's lots of cool stuff packed into espn 's ultimate x .
translation: ESPNのアルティメットXにはたくさんのクールなものが詰まっています。
back_translation: ESPN's Ultimate X is packed with a lot of cool things.

text: the film takes place over the course of a day as anthony , victoria , michael and his wife , sarah , spend the afternoon dining , drinking , and soaking in the hot tub .
translation: この映画は、一日を通して、アンソニー、ビクトリア、マイケル、その妻サラが午後を食事、飲酒、そして温泉でくつろぐ様子を描いています。
back_translation: This movie depicts a day in the life of Anthony, Victoria, Michael, and his wife Sarah as they enjoy meals, drinks, and relax at a hot spring in the afternoon.

text: in a classic homage to chinese martial arts films , he is involved in intense hand to hand combat including sword fighting , guns , car chases , and other ingenious forms of fighting to mame and kill these tong members .
translation: 中国の武道映画への古典的なオマージュとして、彼は激しい徒手格闘や剣の戦い、銃撃戦、車の追跡、そしてこれらのトンのメンバーを傷つけて殺すための他の巧妙な戦闘方法に関与しています。
back_translation: As a classic homage to Chinese martial arts films, he engages in intense hand-to-hand combat, sword fights, gun battles, car chases, and other clever methods of combat to injure and kill members of these tons.

text: it finds its moviegoing pleasures in the tiny events that could make a person who has lived her life half-asleep suddenly wake up and take notice .
translation: それは、半分眠ったままの人生を送ってきた人が突然目を覚まし、気づくことができる小さな出来事に、映画鑑賞の喜びを見出します。
back_translation: It finds joy in watching movies through small events that allow a person who has been living half-asleep to suddenly wake up and become aware.

text: enough to ensure adrien 's family 's future and to give werner one last opportunity to face death head on . . .
translation: アドリアンの家族の未来を確保し、ヴェルナーに最後の機会を与えるために、死と向き合うための十分な...。
back_translation: To secure Adrian's family's future and give Werner one last chance, enough to face death...

text: there 's no doubting that this is a highly ambitious and personal project for egoyan , but it 's also one that , next to his best work , feels clumsy and convoluted .
translation: これはエゴヤンにとって非常に野心的で個人的なプロジェクトであることに疑いはありませんが、彼の最高の作品と比べると、ぎこちなく複雑に感じられます。
back_translation: There is no doubt that this is a very ambitious and personal project for Egoyan, but compared to his best works, it feels awkwardly complex.

text: the saturation bombing of reggio 's images and glass ' evocative music . . . ultimately leaves viewers with the task of divining meaning .
translation: レッジオの画像とガラスの evocative music の飽和爆撃は、最終的に視聴者に意味を見出すという課題を残します。
back_translation: The saturated bombardment of images and glass in Reggio's evocative music ultimately leaves the audience with the challenge of finding meaning.

text: no worse than a lot of the crap we 've been offered this summer , and slightly better than men in black 2 as far as slapdash extraterrestrial comedies go .
translation: 今夏に提供された多くのクソよりも悪くなく、スラップダッシュな異星人コメディとしては「メン・イン・ブラック2」よりも少し良い程度です。
back_translation: It's not worse than a lot of the crap offered this summer, and it's a little better than "Men in Black 2" as a slapdash alien comedy.

text: matt was drunk and as he reached for the car radio , he struck the girl as she crossed the road .
translation: マットは酔っていて、車のラジオに手を伸ばしたときに、彼女が道を横切ると彼女にぶつかりました。
back_translation: Matt, while drunk, reached for the car radio and hit her as she crossed the street.

text: even if you feel like you 've seen this movie a thousand times before , it is kind of enjoyable thanks mainly to belushi 's easy-going likableness .
translation: たとえこの映画を何度も見たような気がしても、ベリューシの気さくで好感の持てるキャラクターのおかげで、それなりに楽しめる。
back_translation: Even if it feels like I've seen this movie many times, thanks to Berius' friendly and likable character, I can still enjoy it to some extent.

text: haris embarks on a journey through the world of afghan-americans to learn more about their culture , and there he finds both humor and tragedy .
translation: ハリスはアフガン系アメリカ人の世界を旅し、彼らの文化についてもっと学びます。そこで彼はユーモアと悲劇の両方を見つけます。
back_translation: Harris travels through the world of Afghan-Americans and learns more about their culture. There, he finds both humor and tragedy.

text: at this far away place he bares his inside .
translation: この遠く離れた場所で彼は自分の内面をさらけ出す。
back_translation: In this distant place, he reveals his inner self.

text: what lee does so marvelously compelling is present brown as a catalyst for the struggle of black manhood in restrictive and chaotic america . . . sketchy but nevertheless gripping portrait of jim brown , a celebrated wonder in the spotlight
translation: リーが素晴らしく魅力的に行うことは、制約のある混沌としたアメリカの中での黒人男性の闘争の触媒としてブラウンを提示することです。。。人気者であり、そのスポットライトの中で称賛されたジム・ブラウンの、あいまいではあるもののそれでも人を惹きつける肖像。
back_translation: What Lee does remarkably and魅力的に is to present Brown as a catalyst for the struggle of Black men in the constrained chaos of America... the ambiguous yet still captivating portrait of Jim Brown, who is a popular figure and celebrated in the spotlight.

text: a close acquaintance overhears their conversation , and , promised a fee , reports the win to max ( david winburn ) , smooth-talking but deadly leader of a hoodlum gang , who sends his beautiful paramour , cindy ( kelly taylor ) , to seduce jose , if necessary , to get her hands on the winning ticket .
translation: 親しい知人が彼らの会話を聞き、報酬を約束して、マックス（デビッド・ウィンバーン）に勝利を報告する。彼は口が上手だが危険なギャングのリーダーであり、必要であれば勝ち券を手に入れるためにホットな愛人シンディ（ケリー・テイラー）を送り込み、ホセを誘惑させる。
back_translation: An intimate acquaintance listens to their conversation, promises a reward, and reports the victory to Max (David Winburn). He is a smooth talker but a dangerous gang leader, and if necessary, he sends his hot mistress Cindy (Kelly Taylor) to obtain winning tickets and seduce Jose.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre . the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .
translation: 「イナフ」は悪い映画ではなく、普通です。演技がとても大げさで、その効果は自己風刺のように感じられます。
back_translation: "Inaful" is not a bad movie; it's average. The acting is very exaggerated, and its effect feels like self-parody.

text: although estela bravo 's documentary is cloyingly hagiographic in its portrait of cuban leader fidel castro , it 's still a guilty pleasure to watch .
translation: エステラ・ブラーボのドキュメンタリーはキューバの指導者フィデル・カストロを美化しすぎているが、それでも見ることに罪悪感を感じる快楽がある。
back_translation: The documentary about Estela Bravo glorifies the Cuban leader Fidel Castro too much, but it still offers a guilty pleasure in watching it.

text: without resorting to hyperbole , i can state that kissing jessica stein may be the best same-sex romance i have seen .
translation: 誇張することなく、ジェシカ・スタインにキスすることは、私が見た中で最も素晴らしい同性間のロマンスかもしれないと言えます。
back_translation: Without exaggeration, kissing Jessica Stein may be the most wonderful same-sex romance I have ever seen.

text: the film has a few cute ideas and several modest chuckles but it is n't exactly kiddie-friendlyM-^E alas , santa is more ho-hum than ho-ho-ho and the snowman ( who never gets to play that flute ) has all the charm of a meltdown .
translation: この映画にはいくつかのかわいらしいアイデアといくつかの控えめな笑いがありますが、子供向けとは言えません。残念ながら、サンタは「ホホホ」というよりは「ハハハ」に近く、雪だるま（フルートを吹くことができない）は、溶けかけの魅力しかありません。
back_translation: This movie has some charming ideas and a few modest laughs, but it's hard to say it's for children. Unfortunately, Santa is more of a "Ha ha ha" than a "Ho ho ho," and the snowman (who can't play the flute) only has a melting charm.

text: what begins as a friendly 'extreme ' week long camping trip goes from a warm 'big chill ' into a chilling 'deliverance ' as old wounds unsurface , passions rise and personalities unravel .
translation: 友好的な「エクストリーム」な1週間のキャンプ旅行が、心温まる「ビッグ・チル」から、古い傷が浮かび上がり、情熱が高まり、個性が崩壊する冷たい「デリバランス」へと変わっていく。
back_translation: A friendly "extreme" week of camping transforms from a heartwarming "big chill" into a cold "deliberance" where old wounds resurface, passions rise, and personalities crumble.

text: but the break turns into a nightmare when sanjana starts hearing screams .
translation: しかし、休暇はサンジャナが悲鳴を聞き始めると悪夢に変わる。
back_translation: However, the vacation turns into a nightmare when Sanjana starts to hear the screams.

text: little do they know but help is on the way and this friday will get freaky !
translation: 彼らは知らないが、助けが来ていて、今週の金曜日はファンキーになるだろう！
back_translation: They don't know, but help is coming, and this Friday is going to be funky!

text: a charming and funny story of clashing cultures and a clashing mother/daughter relationship .
translation: 魅力的でユーモラスな文化の衝突と母娘関係の衝突を描いた物語。
back_translation: A story that depicts the charming and humorous clash of cultures and the conflict between a mother and daughter relationship.

text: years later , on a hunting trip in the maine woods , they are overtaken by a blizzard , a vicious storm in which something much more ominous moves .
translation: 数年後、メイン州の森での狩猟旅行中、彼らは吹雪に襲われます。それは、もっと不気味な何かが動いている凶 brutalな嵐です。
back_translation: A few years later, while on a hunting trip in the woods of Maine, they are caught in a snowstorm. It is a brutal storm, with something more sinister moving in the shadows.

text: he can not explain her intermittent crying and disturbed reactions .
translation: 彼は彼女の断続的な泣きや動揺した反応を説明できません。
back_translation: He cannot explain her intermittent crying and distressed reactions.

text: the assasins force walter to drive their escape car .
translation: 暗殺者たちはウォルターに脱出用の車を運転させる。
back_translation: The assassins make Walter drive the getaway car.

text: the characters are so generic and the plot so bland that even as rogue cia assassins working for chris cooper 's agency boss close in on the resourceful amnesiac , we do n't feel much for damon/bourne or his predicament .
translation: キャラクターはとても一般的で、プロットも退屈なため、クリス・クーパーのエージェンシーのボスが迫ってくるルーズCIA暗殺者たちが、巧妙な記憶喪失者に近づいても、私たちはデイモン/ボーンや彼の predicament にあまり感情を抱きません。
back_translation: The characters are very generic, and the plot is boring, so even when Chris Cooper's agency boss is confronted by the lurking CIA assassins and gets close to the clever amnesiac, we don't feel much for Damon/Bourne or his predicament.

text: now the monk must look for a new scrollkeeper .
translation: 今、僧侶は新しい巻物の保管者を探さなければなりません。
back_translation: Now, the monk must search for a new keeper of the scroll.

text: purpo $ e is a story about business in the new millenium , and a world shifted away from quality to quantity .
translation: 「パーパス」は、新しいミレニアムのビジネスに関する物語であり、質から量へとシフトした世界についてのものです。
back_translation: "Purpose" is a story about business in the new millennium and is about a world that has shifted from quality to quantity.

text: it is not long before the doctor realizes that his underworld patient is in love with his own sister , so he decides to take her to malaysia and get her married off .
translation: 医者は、彼の裏社会の患者が自分の妹を愛していることをすぐに理解し、彼女をマレーシアに連れて行き、結婚させることに決めます。
back_translation: The doctor quickly realizes that his underworld patient loves his sister, and decides to take her to Malaysia and arrange their marriage.

text: despite all evidence to the contrary , this clunker has somehow managed to pose as an actual feature movie , the kind that charges full admission and gets hyped on tv and purports to amuse small children and ostensible adults .
translation: すべての逆証拠にもかかわらず、このクランカーは実際の劇場映画であるかのように振る舞うことに成功してしまった。とはいえ、全額入場料を請求し、テレビで宣伝され、小さな子供や表面的な大人を楽しませることを主張している。
back_translation: Despite all the counter-evidence, this clunker has managed to behave as if it were a real theatrical movie. Nevertheless, it charges the full admission price, is promoted on television, and claims to entertain small children and superficial adults.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .
translation: 私たちはこれまでにいろいろな形でそれを見たことがありますが、監督のホフマンは、ケビン・クラインの大きな助けを借りて、この世界最高の教師の最新の転生に私たちが関心を持つようにしています。
back_translation: We have seen it in various forms so far, but director Hoffman, with the great help of Kevin Kline, is making us interested in the latest reincarnation of the world's greatest teacher.

text: along comes sonja , who wants to know how the horny tale he 's now working on will end .
translation: その時、ソニャが現れ、彼が今取り組んでいる官能的な物語がどのように終わるのかを知りたがっています。
back_translation: At that moment, Sonya appeared, eager to know how the sensual story he is currently working on will end.

text: this is the story of a deaf mute who is laid off , and his sister , who requires a kidney transplant .
translation: これは、解雇された聾唖者と、腎臓移植を必要とする彼の妹の物語です。
back_translation: This is the story of a deaf-mute who was fired and his sister who needs a kidney transplant.

text: frank capra played this story straight . but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate 'comedy ' scenes .
translation: フランク・キャプラはこの物語を真剣に演じました。しかし、2002年の映画はそれを本当に信じておらず、非常に不適切な「コメディ」シーンで雰囲気を壊しています。
back_translation: Frank Capra took this story seriously. However, the 2002 film does not truly believe in it and ruins the atmosphere with very inappropriate "comedy" scenes.

text: change up is a documentary that follows the lives of best friends , rafael `` pepey `` rodriguez , and alex sosa , two hard throwing pitchers from the economically poor , but baseball rich island of the dominican republic .
translation: 「チェンジアップ」は、経済的には貧しいが野球が盛んなドミニカ共和国の島で、助け合う親友、ラファエル「ペペイ」ロドリゲスとアレックス・ソサという2人の剛球投手の生活を追ったドキュメンタリーです。
back_translation: "Change Up" is a documentary that follows the lives of two hard-throwing pitchers, Rafael "Pepe" Rodriguez and Alex Sosa, who are best friends helping each other, living on the island of the Dominican Republic where baseball is thriving but economically struggling.

text: nearly a decade after skynet sent back the t-1000 , john connor faces a female terminator , the t-x , with power over all machines .
translation: スカイネットがT-1000を送り出してからほぼ10年後、ジョン・コナーはすべての機械を制御する能力を持つ女性型ターミネーターT-Xに直面します。
back_translation: Almost 10 years after Skynet sent out the T-1000, John Connor faces a female Terminator T-X, which has the ability to control all machines.

text: how can neil and stevie get out of their mistaken marriages and into each others arms ?
translation: ニールとスティービーはどうやって間違った結婚から抜け出し、お互いの腕の中に入ることができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: How do Neil and Stevie manage to break free from their wrong marriages and find themselves in each other's arms?

text: harboring a secret , john guides angela to a shocking realization that will uncover the past .
translation: 秘密を抱えているジョンは、アンジェラを過去を明らかにする衝撃の真実へと導きます。
back_translation: Carrying a secret, John leads Angela to a shocking truth that reveals the past.

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .
translation: シャトーには非常に面白いジョークが一つと、いくつかのまずまずなジョークがありますが、結局のところ、これはやや面白く、時には退屈で、最終的には重要性のない映画に過ぎません。
back_translation: The château has one very interesting joke and a few decent ones, but in the end, it's somewhat amusing, sometimes boring, and ultimately just an unimportant film.

text: dude schmitz , an independent filmmaker , attempting to secure funds for his second feature , blows an opportunity at what promises to be a lucrative interview with pop sensation britney spears .
translation: 独立系映画製作者のデュード・シュミッツは、彼の第二作の資金を確保しようと試みているが、ポップのセンセーションであるブリトニー・スピアーズとの lucrative なインタビューのチャンスを逃してしまう。
back_translation: Independent filmmaker Dude Schmitz is trying to secure funding for his second film but misses out on a lucrative interview opportunity with pop sensation Britney Spears.

text: dealing with the aftermath of the 'accident ' brings out the best and the worst in them .
translation: 「事故」の後処理は、彼らの中で最良と最悪を引き出します。
back_translation: The aftermath of an "accident" brings out the best and the worst in them.

text: daringly perceptive , taut , piercing and feisty , biggie and tupac is undeniably subversive and involving in its bold presentation .
translation: 大胆に鋭く、緊張感があり、鋭い視点と活気に満ちたビギーとトゥパックは、その大胆な表現において否定できないほど掘り下げられ、引き込まれる作品となっています。
back_translation: Boldly sharp, tense, and filled with vibrant perspectives, Biggie and Tupac are undeniably immersed in their bold expressions, creating captivating works.

text: they spend their afternoons discussing theater and lucy 's role as antigone in a school loneliness of the city more bearable .
translation: 彼らは午後を過ごし、劇場とルーシーの学校でのアンティゴネとしての役割について議論し、都市の孤独を少しでも和らげる。
back_translation: They spend the afternoon discussing their roles as Antigone in the theater and Lucy's school, trying to alleviate the city's loneliness even just a little.

text: but again , her guardian angel reactivates her will to live .
translation: しかし再び、彼女の守護天使が彼女の生きたいという意志を再活性化させる。
back_translation: However, once again, her guardian angel reactivates her will to live.

text: the film is divided into three stories , each associated with one of the three main ideologies of the 20th century : fascism , communism & # 38 ; liberalism .
translation: その映画は三つの物語に分かれており、それぞれは20世紀の三つの主要なイデオロギー、ファシズム、共産主義、リベラリズムに関連しています。
back_translation: The movie is divided into three stories, each related to three major ideologies of the 20th century: fascism, communism, and liberalism.

text: a magnificent conjuring act , an eerie historical mirage evoked in a single sweeping wave of the hand by alexander sokurov .
translation: アレクサンダー・ソクーロフによって一つの動きで呼び起こされる、壮大な奇術のパフォーマンス、神秘的な歴史の幻影。
back_translation: A grand performance of magic, evoked in a single movement by Alexander Sokurov, a phantom of mysterious history.

text: her loving parents feel helpless as they watch their daughter suffer .
translation: 彼女の愛する両親は、娘が苦しんでいるのを見て無力感を感じている。
back_translation: Her beloved parents feel helpless seeing their daughter suffer.

text: a wonderfully speculative character study that made up for its rather slow beginning by drawing me into the picture .
translation: 素晴らしく推測的なキャラクター研究で、やや遅い始まりを補い、私を物語に引き込んでくれました。
back_translation: A wonderfully suggestive character study that made up for a somewhat slow start and drew me into the story.

text: kyle goes back to darkness falls to face his past , and the woman in the porceline mask ( aka the tooth fairy ) chance barron , a has-been `` cock-rock `` front-man , has wasted nearly eight years of his life working a dead-end job at softwipe incorporated , the world 's second largest manufacturer/distributor of double-plied toliet paper , but things change drastically for mr . barron when he receives a mysterious watch which counts down the number of days he has left to live .
translation: カイルは過去と向き合うためにダークネスフォールズに戻り、陶器のマスクを被った女性（別名トゥースフェアリー）チャンス・バロンは、かつての「コックロック」フロントマンで、ソフトワイプ社という世界第2位の二重層トイレットペーパー製造・販売会社で八年間無駄に過ごしたが、彼の人生は変わる。彼は、残りの人生の日数をカウントダウンする神秘的な時計を受け取る。
back_translation: Kyle returns to Darkness Falls to confront his past, and the woman in the ceramic mask (also known as the Tooth Fairy), Chance Baron, who was once the frontman of "Cockrock" and spent eight wasted years at Soft Wipe Co., the world's second-largest producer and distributor of double-layer toilet paper, sees his life change. He receives a mysterious clock that counts down the days remaining in his life.

text: the second chapter of the harry potter series is even more magical than the first and simply the best family film of the year .
translation: ハリー・ポッターシリーズの第2章は、第1章よりもさらに魔法のようであり、今年の最高のファミリー映画です。
back_translation: Chapter 2 of the Harry Potter series is even more magical than Chapter 1 and is this year's best family movie.

text: behind the snow games and lovable siberian huskies ( plus one sheep dog ) , the picture hosts a parka-wrapped dose of heart .
translation: 雪のゲームと愛らしいシベリアンハスキー（1匹のシープドッグも含む）の背後に、この写真はパーカーで包まれた心のひとしずくをもたらします。
back_translation: Behind the game of snow and the adorable Siberian Husky (including one sheepdog), this photo brings a drop of warmth wrapped in a parka.

text: singer patricia paradise ( dee wallace stone ) has everything : beauty , fame , success , money . . .
translation: 歌手パトリシア・パラダイス（ディー・ウォーレス・ストーン）は、すべてを持っている：美しさ、名声、成功、お金。
back_translation: Singer Patricia Paradise (Dee Wallace Stone) has it all: beauty, fame, success, and money.

text: what if jesus were born in the year 2002 to a young jewish couple in new york city , instead of bethlehem two millennia ago ?
translation: もしイエスが2002年にニューヨークの若いユダヤ人カップルに生まれていたら、二千年前のベツレヘムではなく、どんなことが起こったでしょうか？
back_translation: What would have happened if Jesus had been born to a young Jewish couple in New York in 2002, instead of Bethlehem two thousand years ago?

text: exploits [ headbanger ] stereotypes in good fun , while adding a bit of heart and unsettling subject matter .
translation: 「ヘドバンガー」のステレオタイプを楽しく活用しつつ、少しの心情と不気味なテーマを加えています。
back_translation: While enjoyably making use of the stereotype of "headbangers," it adds a touch of emotion and a creepy theme.

text: leading his army of women into the surrounding mountain glens , dionysus casts a spell on the city 's females , who abandon their husbands and fathers in order to engage in forbidden revels .
translation: 彼は女性たちの軍を率いて周囲の山の谷へと進み、ディオニュソスは街の女性たちに呪文をかける。彼女たちは禁断の宴にふけるために、夫や父親を捨ててしまう。
back_translation: He leads the army of women into the valleys of the surrounding mountains, and Dionysus casts a spell on the women of the city. They abandon their husbands and fathers to indulge in forbidden revelry.

text: the fictional characters become part of the creators world as they appear on the subway with them , imagination becomes reality .
translation: 創造されたキャラクターたちは、地下鉄に現れたことで創造者の世界の一部となり、想像が現実となる。
back_translation: The characters that were created have become a part of the creator's world by appearing in the subway, turning imagination into reality.

text: carefully crafted , notably in its deft dramatic structuring , and has become timely in a way its maker could never have anticipated .
translation: 注意深く作られ、特に巧妙なドラマの構造において、製作者が予期しえなかった方法でタイムリーになった。
back_translation: Carefully crafted, it became timely in ways that the creators could not have anticipated, especially within its cleverly structured drama.

text: a comedic short about a man flying through mexico who despite not speaking the language meets a pretty girl only to juggle his attention between her and the world 's worst case of 'montezuma 's revenge ' .
translation: メキシコを飛んでいる男のコメディ短編。彼は言葉を話せないにもかかわらず、美しい女の子と出会う。しかし、彼は彼女と「モンテズマの復讐」の世界最低のケースとの間で注意を juggling しなければならない。
back_translation: A comedic short story about a man flying over Mexico. Despite being unable to speak, he meets a beautiful girl. However, he must juggle between her and the world's worst case of "Montezuma's Revenge."

text: for all its violence , the movie is remarkably dull with only caine making much of an impression .
translation: その暴力にもかかわらず、その映画は驚くほど退屈で、ケインだけが印象を残している。
back_translation: Despite the violence, the movie is surprisingly dull, and only Kane leaves an impression.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: オリジナルの映画をほぼシーンごとに追っているのに、ユーモアや活気、楽しさをほとんど完全に失ってしまっている。
back_translation: Even though it follows the original movie almost scene by scene, it has almost completely lost its humor, liveliness, and fun.

text: after an ultimatum from his girlfriend tara ( alison eastwood ) , johnny finally commits to a `` real `` job in the construction business , but is soon miserable there .
translation: 彼女タラ（アリソン・イーストウッド）からの最後通告の後、ジョニーはついに建設業で「本当の」仕事に就くが、すぐにそこにいることが miserable になってしまう。
back_translation: After receiving an ultimatum from his girlfriend Tara (Alison Eastwood), Johnny finally gets a "real" job in construction, but it soon becomes miserable to be there.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: オーストラリアの作品よりも確かにより自然主義的であるが、アマリの映画はリリアの旅のドラマを構築する点で不足している。
back_translation: While it is certainly more naturalistic than Australian works, Amari's film falls short in constructing the drama of Lilia's journey.

text: despite dire warnings from his uncle , dean is seduced by the book 's knowledge .
translation: 叔父の厳しい警告にもかかわらず、ディーンはその本の知識に魅了される。
back_translation: Despite his uncle's stern warning, Dean is captivated by the knowledge in the book.

text: keith bennets ( mark thompson ) mother passed away a year ago , and he feels like he has moved on with his life , until one morning his mothers jewellery shows up on keiths bathroom sink .
translation: キース・ベネット（マーク・トンプソン）の母は一年前に亡くなり、彼は自分の生活を進めたように感じていた。しかし、ある朝、キースの浴室のシンクに母のジュエリーが現れる。
back_translation: Keith Bennett (Mark Thompson) felt that he had moved on with his life after his mother passed away a year ago. However, one morning, his mother's jewelry appears in the bathroom sink.

text: despite the predictable parent vs . child coming-of-age theme , first-class , natural acting and a look at `` the real americans `` make this a charmer .
translation: 予測可能な親と子の成長のテーマにもかかわらず、一流の自然な演技と「本物のアメリカ人」への視点がこの作品を魅力的にしている。
back_translation: Despite the predictable theme of parent and child growth, the top-notch natural performances and perspective on "real Americans" make this work captivating.

text: as it abruptly crosscuts among the five friends , it fails to lend the characters ' individual stories enough dramatic resonance to make us care about them .
translation: 突然、5人の友人の間を行き来するため、キャラクターの個々の物語に十分なドラマティックな響きを与えず、私たちが彼らに関心を持つことができなくなっています。
back_translation: Suddenly, as we move back and forth among the five friends, their individual stories lack enough dramatic resonance, making it difficult for us to care about them.

text: a film so terrifying - even the monsters are frightened !
translation: 恐ろしすぎる映画 - モンスターさえも怯えている！
back_translation: A terrifying movie - even the monsters are scared!

text: romy dispenses orders like a drill sergeant as they scramble southwest to round up the last two surviving members of eagle 's wwii , b-17 bomber crew .
translation: ロミーは、彼らが南西に急行している間、最後の2人の生存者であるイーグルの第二次世界大戦B-17爆撃機クルーのメンバーを集めるように、まるで軍曹のように命令を出す。
back_translation: Romy commands, almost like a sergeant, to gather the last two surviving members of the Eagle's World War II B-17 bomber crew while they rush southwest.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: せいぜい、クレティス・タウトはより良い映画体験を求めてビデオショップへの旅行を促すかもしれません。
back_translation: At best, Cretis Tout might encourage a trip to the video store for a better movie experience.

text: for a movie about the power of poetry and passion , there is precious little of either .
translation: 詩と情熱の力についての映画なのに、そのどちらもほとんど感じられない。
back_translation: It's a film about the power of poetry and passion, yet one can hardly feel either.

text: he also shies away from the shallow young women that he and his friends micke and mario meet at bars .
translation: 彼はバーで彼と友人のミッケとマリオが出会う浅はかな若い女性たちからも遠ざかります。
back_translation: He keeps himself away from the shallow young women that he and his friends Micke and Mario meet at the bar.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between a runaway american teenage boy and a brazilian teenage girl who meet in the drug and gang controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: 物語は、リオデジャネイロの麻薬とギャングが支配するスラムで出会った、アメリカの逃避行中のティーンエイジャーの少年とブラジルのティーンエイジャーの少女の間に形成される関係を背景にしています。
back_translation: The story is set against the backdrop of the relationship that forms between an American teenage boy on the run and a Brazilian teenage girl, who meet in a slum ruled by drug lords and gangs in Rio de Janeiro.

text: you will emerge with a clearer view of how the gears of justice grind on and the death report comes to share airtime alongside the farm report .
translation: あなたは、正義の歯車がどのように回り、死者の報告が農業報告とともに放送されるかについて、より明確な視点を持つことができるでしょう。
back_translation: You will be able to have a clearer perspective on how the wheels of justice turn and how reports of the deceased are broadcast along with agricultural reports.

text: occupied france 1944 : in the castle , their local headquarters , the german officers decide to organize a party .
translation: 占領フランス1944：城で、彼らの地域司令部で、ドイツの将校たちはパーティーを開催することを決定する。
back_translation: Occupied France 1944: At the castle, in their regional headquarters, the German officers decide to hold a party.

text: but the memories of their time together lingers inside their hearts .
translation: しかし、彼らの一緒に過ごした時間の思い出は彼らの心の中に残り続けます。
back_translation: However, the memories of the time they spent together will remain in their hearts.

text: kids who are into this thornberry stuff will probably be in wedgie heaven . anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: このソーンベリーのことが好きな子供たちは、おそらくウェッジの天国にいるでしょう。それ以外の理由でこの映画を見に行こうと思っている人には、ここに警告を与えます。
back_translation: Children who like this thornberry are probably in heaven for wedges. For those who are thinking of going to see this movie for other reasons, here’s a warning.

text: however , after an inexplicable letter arrives , any signs of normalcy in his life begin to fade .
translation: しかし、説明のつかない手紙が届いた後、彼の生活の中の正常な兆候は次第に消えていく。
back_translation: However, after receiving an unexplained letter, the normal signs in his life gradually start to disappear.

text: jonathan ecks ( antonio banderas ) , an fbi agent , realizes that he must join with his lifelong enemy , agent sever ( lucy liu ) , a rogue dia agent with whom he is in mortal combat , in order to defeat a common enemy .
translation: ジョナサン・エックス（アントニオ・バンデラス）は、FBI捜査官であり、生涯の敵であるエージェント・セバー（ルーシー・リュー）と手を組まなければならないことに気づく。彼女は反乱者のDIAエージェントであり、彼は命懸けの戦いを繰り広げている。共通の敵を打ち負かすために。
back_translation: Jonathan X (Antonio Banderas) realizes he must team up with his lifelong enemy, Agent Sever (Lucy Liu), who is a rogue DIA agent, as he engages in a life-and-death battle. To defeat a common enemy.

text: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a manner that i 'm not sure could be a single iota worse . . . a soulless hunk of exploitative garbage .
translation: 完全に創造力が枯れ果てており、どのようにしてもこれ以上悪化することはないだろうという方法で実行された……魂のない搾取的なゴミの塊。
back_translation: Completely devoid of creativity, executed in such a way that it couldn't possibly get any worse... a soulless, exploitative heap of trash.

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: アニメーションがますますコンピュータやクールさを強調する中で、これは伝統と温かさを支持する立場を取った映画です。
back_translation: As animation increasingly emphasizes computers and coolness, this is a film that takes a stance in favor of tradition and warmth.

text: the characters , cast in impossibly contrived situations , are totally estranged from reality .
translation: キャラクターたちは、ありえないほどねじれた状況に置かれ、現実から完全に疎外されています。
back_translation: The characters are placed in a situation that is incredibly twisted, completely alienated from reality.

text: in the end , white oleander is n't an adaptation of a novel . it 's a flashy , star-splashed reduction .
translation: 結局のところ、『ホワイト・オリンダー』は小説の適応ではなく、派手で星の輝く縮小版です。
back_translation: In the end, "White Oleander" is not an adaptation of the novel, but rather a flashy, star-studded縮小版.

text: guaranteed to move anyone who ever shook , rattled , or rolled .
translation: 揺れたり、振動したり、転がったりしたことがある誰もが必ず感動する。
back_translation: Anyone who has ever experienced shaking, vibration, or rolling will definitely be moved.

text: will tom be able to persuade his naturally cautious and terminally confused fianc & # 233 ; e to work through all the damage and chaos ?
translation: トムは、自然に用心深く、常に混乱している婚約者を納得させて、すべての損害と混乱を乗り越えることができるのでしょうか？
back_translation: Can Tom, being naturally cautious, convince his perpetually confused fiancé to overcome all the damages and chaos?

text: when fran , ( paige turco ) walks into the prop house where he lives looking for unusual objects , chep immediately develops a crush .
translation: フラン（ペイジ・ターコ）が彼が住んでいる小道具の家に入って、珍しい物を探していると、チェップはすぐに彼女に恋をします。
back_translation: Fran (Paige Turco) enters the prop house where she lives and is searching for something rare, and Chep instantly falls in love with her.

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it . we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: 悪い会社について最初に問うべきことは、なぜアンソニー・ホプキンスがそこにいるのかということです。彼が市場での不調や高額な離婚を抱えていたと仮定します。お金以外の理由で、この著名な俳優がこれほどまでに落ちぶれる理由は考えられません。
back_translation: The first thing to ask about a bad company is why Anthony Hopkins is there. Assuming he was struggling in the market or facing an expensive divorce, it's hard to think of a reason, other than money, for this renowned actor to fall so low.

text: upon arriving in los reyes , the ambitious father amaro meets amelia , a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious devotion soon becomes helplessly entangles in a growing attraction to the new priest .
translation: ロス・レジェスに到着した野心的なアマロ神父は、宗教的な献身を持つ美しい16歳の少女アメリアと出会うが、その献身は新しい神父への高まる魅力に次第に無力に絡みついていく。
back_translation: The ambitious Father Amaro arrives in Los Reyes and encounters a beautiful 16-year-old girl named Amelia, who has a deep religious devotion; however, that devotion gradually becomes entangled and powerless in the face of her growing attraction to the new priest.

text: a gratingly unfunny groaner littered with zero-dimensional , unlikable characters and hackneyed , threadbare comic setups .
translation: ひたすら面白くない冗談が散乱した、次元のない魅力のないキャラクターとありふれた陳腐なコメディのセッティングで溢れた作品。
back_translation: A work filled with utterly unfunny jokes, devoid of dimension and charm, featuring cliché characters and a trivial, ordinary comedic setting.

text: as the geological fracture deepens and widens , the european community begins to disassociate itself from the calamity , and panic ensues among tourists and residents attempting to escape .
translation: 地質的な亀裂が深まり広がるにつれて、欧州共同体はその惨事から距離を置き始め、逃げようとする観光客や住民の間にパニックが広がる。
back_translation: As the geological fissures deepen and spread, the European Community begins to distance itself from the disaster, and panic spreads among fleeing tourists and residents.

text: unfortunately , the experience of actually watching the movie is less compelling than the circumstances of its making .
translation: 残念ながら、実際に映画を観る経験は、その制作過程の状況よりも魅力に欠けます。
back_translation: Unfortunately, the experience of actually watching a movie is less appealing than the circumstances of its production process.

text: set against the bright lights of manhattan , a tale which takes a comic , urbane look at the modern male ego at war in the singles scene trenches .
translation: マンハッタンの明るい光をバックに、シングルシーンの塹壕で戦う現代の男性のエゴを、コメディックで洗練された視点から描いた物語。
back_translation: A story that portrays the modern male ego fighting in the trenches of single scenes against the bright lights of Manhattan, from a comedic and sophisticated perspective.

text: but before he is able to set out on his expedition , the professor , along with the tablet , are taken hostage by a group of mercenaries , led by the vicious philipe gallo .
translation: しかし、彼が遠征に出発する前に、教授はタブレットと共に、残忍なフィリップ・ガロが率いる傭兵のグループに人質に取られてしまう。
back_translation: However, before he departs on the expedition, the professor is taken hostage by a group of mercenaries led by the brutal Philip Gallo, along with the tablet.

text: the movie mixes the personal life of the ancestors of this man as well as historical moments for m & # 233 ; xico such as the reform war , the mexican revolution , etc . arc & # 225 ; ngel ca n't sleep .
translation: その映画は、この男性の先祖の私生活と、改革戦争やメキシコ革命などのメキシコの歴史的瞬間を混ぜ合わせています。アルカンヘルは眠れません。
back_translation: The movie blends the private life of this man's ancestors with significant historical moments in Mexico, such as the Reform War and the Mexican Revolution. Arcángel cannot sleep.

text: pronounced cured , she became a psychoanalyst herself and , within eight years , was practising alongside the founding fathers .
translation: 治療された彼女は自ら精神分析医になり、8年以内に創始者たちと並んで実践していました。
back_translation: Having been treated, she became a psychoanalyst herself and was practicing alongside the founders within eight years.

text: this causes duncan 's father ( jenkins ) further grief , who does n't understand his son 's unusual mourning rituals .
translation: これによりダンカンの父（ジェンキンス）はさらなる悲しみを抱え、息子の異常な悲嘆の儀式を理解できません。
back_translation: As a result, Duncan's father (Jenkins) carries further sorrow and cannot understand his son's unusual ritual of grief.

text: the ill-conceived modern-day ending falls flat where it should deliver a moral punch .
translation: 考えの浅い現代的な結末は、道徳的なパンチを与えるべきところで失敗している。
back_translation: The shallow modern conclusion fails to deliver the moral punch where it should.

text: the tenement is a four story anthology that in which each of its characters live within the same building and walk a fine line between good and evil .
translation: 「テナメント」は四階建てのアンソロジーで、登場人物たちが同じ建物に住み、善と悪の微妙な境界を歩んでいます。
back_translation: "Tenament" is a four-story anthology where the characters live in the same building, walking the fine line between good and evil.

text: dr . singh ( amitabh bachchan ) a senior doctor raise funds to fulfil his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital .
translation: ドクター・シン（アミターブ・バッチャン）は、最新鋭の病院を持つという夢を実現するために資金を集める高名な医師です。
back_translation: Dr. Shin (Amitabh Bachchan) is a renowned doctor who raises funds to realize his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital.

text: henry bean 's thoughtful screenplay provides no easy answers , but offers a compelling investigation of faith versus intellect
translation: ヘンリー・ビーンの思慮深い脚本は簡単な答えを提供せず、信仰と知性の対立に関する魅力的な調査を提示しています。
back_translation: Henry Bean's thoughtful screenplay does not provide easy answers and presents an intriguing exploration of the conflict between faith and intellect.

text: it 's not that kung pow is n't funny some of the time -- it just is n't any funnier than bad martial arts movies are all by themselves , without all oedekerk 's impish augmentation .
translation: 「カンフー・パンダ」が時々面白くないわけではないが、オーデカーケルのいじわるな追加なしで、悪い武道映画自体が持つ面白さと同じくらいしか面白くないだけだ。
back_translation: "Kung Fu Panda" is not sometimes unfunny, but it is only as entertaining as a bad martial arts movie can be, without the mean-spirited additions from the director.

text: has the kitsch appeal of a farm implement on a restaurant wall , or an andy warhol mao poster : interesting , but not for its original purpose .
translation: 農具がレストランの壁に飾られているようなキッチ appeal や、アンディ・ウォーホルの毛沢東のポスターのように、興味深いがその本来の目的のためではない。
back_translation: The kitchen has an appeal like farm tools decorated on the restaurant walls, or like Andy Warhol's poster of Mao Zedong, interesting but not for its original purpose.

text: without getting grand or preachy , the sprechers use an unconventional approach to coax us into asking ourselves fundamental questions .
translation: 大きく構えたり説教をすることなく、スプレッシャーズは私たちに根本的な問いを自分自身に投げかけるように促す独自のアプローチを用いています。
back_translation: Without adopting a grand stance or preaching, the Spreshers employ a unique approach that encourages us to pose fundamental questions to ourselves.

text: battling his own demons he realizes he is just like the rest of us : good and evil .
translation: 自分の悪魔と戦う中で、彼は自分が私たちと同じように善と悪の両方を持っていることに気づく。
back_translation: In battling his own demons, he realizes that he possesses both good and evil, just like the rest of us.

text: ben is a perfectionist and overachiever whose tunnel vision leads to nothing less than graduating at the top of his class .
translation: ベンは完璧主義者であり、過剰達成者で、そのトンネルビジョンは彼をクラスのトップで卒業すること以外の何物にも導きません。
back_translation: Ben is a perfectionist and an overachiever, and his tunnel vision leads him to nothing other than graduating at the top of his class.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: その映画は、その文学的に才能があり悪名高い主題をただの汚い老人以上のものとして描くことに失敗している。
back_translation: The movie fails to portray its literary talent and infamous subject matter as something more than just a filthy old man.

text: while gertie is able to manipulate ollie with the finesse of an adult , she is ultimately daddy 's little girl .
translation: ゲルティは大人のような巧妙さでオリーを操ることができるが、彼女は結局パパの愛娘である。
back_translation: Gertie can manipulate Ollie with a cleverness akin to that of an adult, but she is ultimately daddy's beloved daughter.

text: it makes me feel weird / thinking about all the bad things in the world / like puppies with broken legs / and butterflies that die / and movies starring pop queens
translation: 世界の悪いことを考えると weird な気持ちになります / 骨折した子犬や / 死んでしまう蝶々 / ポップクイーンが主演する映画のように
back_translation: Thinking about the bad things in the world makes me feel weird / a puppy with a broken leg / butterflies that die / like a movie starring a pop queen.

text: [ a ] superbly controlled , passionate adaptation of graham greene 's 1955 novel .
translation: グレアム・グリーンの1955年の小説の素晴らしくコントロールされた情熱的な適応。
back_translation: A wonderfully controlled and passionate adaptation of Graham Greene's 1955 novel.

text: his attempt at becoming a lefty leads to an interesting turn of events which suggest that he may be at the start of a never-ending cycle .
translation: 彼が左利きになろうとする試みは、興味深い展開につながり、彼が終わりのないサイクルの始まりにいる可能性を示唆しています。
back_translation: His attempt to become left-handed leads to an intriguing development, suggesting that he may be at the beginning of an endless cycle.

text: marisa ventura ( lopez ) is a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of new york city , who works as a maid in a first-class manhattan hotel .
translation: マリサ・ベンチュラ（ロペス）は、ニューヨーク市の区で生まれ育ったシングルマザーで、マンハッタンの一流ホテルでメイドとして働いています。
back_translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) is a single mother who was born and raised in a neighborhood of New York City, and she works as a maid in a top hotel in Manhattan.

text: meanwhile , on a distant planet , alien authorities have captured the most dangerous of all criminals and are sending him via rocket to a prison planet .
translation: その間、遠い惑星では、エイリアンの当局が最も危険な犯罪者を捕らえ、ロケットで刑務所の惑星へ送っています。
back_translation: In the meantime, on a distant planet, alien authorities are capturing the most dangerous criminals and sending them to a prison planet by rocket.

text: for escape he paints the visions that haunt him , while eleanor sends all of his hard earned money to a seedy tele-evangelist .
translation: 逃避のために、彼は自分を悩ませる幻影を描き、エレノアは彼がせっかく稼いだお金を卑劣なテレビ伝道者に送っている。
back_translation: To escape, he conjured up illusions that tormented him, and Eleanor was sending the hard-earned money he had to a despicable television evangelist.

text: in harlem , martin blaze , a writer for vibe , thinks he 's a loser since his fianc & # 233 ; e cheated on him .
translation: ハーレムで、バイブのライターであるマーティン・ブレイズは、婚約者に裏切られたため、自分は負け犬だと思っています。
back_translation: In a harem, Martin Blaze, a writer for Vibrate, thinks of himself as a loser because he was betrayed by his fiancée.

text: no movement , no yuks , not much of anything .
translation: 動きもなく、歓声もなく、ほとんど何もない。
back_translation: There is no movement, no cheers, and almost nothing at all.

text: a by-the-numbers effort that wo n't do much to enhance the franchise .
translation: フランチャイズを強化するにはあまり役立たない、数字通りの努力。
back_translation: Efforts that are not very helpful for strengthening franchises, as per the numbers.

text: an enchanting spectacular for potter fans anxious to ride the hogwarts express toward a new year of magic and mischief .
translation: ホグワーツ・エクスプレスに乗って新しい魔法といたずらの年を迎えることに期待を膨らませたポッターファンのための魅力的なスペクタクル。
back_translation: An enchanting spectacle for Potter fans who are looking forward to a new year of magic and mischief aboard the Hogwarts Express.

text: new arrival alden pyle ( brendan fraser ) , an idealistic american aid worker , befriends london times correspondent thomas fowler ( michael caine ) .
translation: 新たに到着したオルデン・パイル（ブレンダン・フレイザー）は、理想主義的なアメリカの援助労働者で、ロンドン・タイムズの特派員トーマス・ファウラー（マイケル・ケイン）と友達になります。
back_translation: The newly arrived Alden Pyle (Brendan Fraser) is an idealistic American aid worker who becomes friends with Thomas Fowler (Michael Caine), a correspondent for the London Times.

text: there are things to like about murder by numbers -- but , in the end , the disparate elements do n't gel .
translation: 「数字による殺人」には好きな部分があるが、結局、異なる要素がまとまりを欠いている。
back_translation: I have my favorite parts of "Murder by Numbers," but in the end, the different elements lack cohesion.

text: lando , after knowing the situation , attempted to kill roman .
translation: ランドは状況を知った後、ローマンを殺そうとしました。
back_translation: After learning the situation, Rand tried to kill Roman.

text: it 's rare to find a film to which the adjective 'gentle ' applies , but the word perfectly describes pauline & paulette .
translation: 「穏やか」という形容詞が当てはまる映画を見つけるのは珍しいが、この言葉は「ポーリーヌとポーレット」に完璧に当てはまる。
back_translation: It is rare to find a movie that fits the adjective "gentle," but this word perfectly describes "Pauline and Paulette."

text: seeking a mental escape , simone begins to tune into what 's happening with the other couples around her .
translation: メンタルエスケープを求めて、シモーヌは周囲の他のカップルたちに何が起こっているのかに耳を傾け始める。
back_translation: Seeking a mental escape, Simone begins to listen to what is happening with the other couples around her.

text: vera 's technical prowess ends up selling his film short ; he smoothes over hard truths even as he uncovers them .
translation: ヴェラの技術的な腕前は彼の映画を過小評価させてしまう；彼は真実を明らかにしながらも、それを整える。
back_translation: Vera's technical prowess underestimates his films; he reveals the truth while also arranging it.

text: filmmaker rick mckay documents actor/illusionist james beaman 's transformation from an attractive young actor to the legendary icon marlene dietrich .
translation: 映画製作者リック・マッケイは、俳優・マジシャンのジェームス・ビーマンが魅力的な若い俳優から伝説的なアイコンであるマレーネ・ディートリヒへと変貌する様子を記録しています。
back_translation: Filmmaker Rick McKay captures the transformation of actor and magician James Beaman from a charming young actor into the legendary icon Marlene Dietrich.

text: a take on the classic tale 'the boy who cried wolf ' , 'big fat liar ' is about a 14-year-old boy named jason shephard ( frankie muniz ) who lies for the fun of it .
translation: クラシックな話「オオカミが来た！」をアレンジした「ビッグ・ファット・ライアー」は、14歳の少年ジェイソン・シェパード（フランキー・ムニス）が楽しみのために嘘をつく物語です。
back_translation: The classic tale "The Wolf Is Coming!" is reimagined as "Big Fat Liar," a story about 14-year-old boy Jason Shepherd (Frankie Muniz) who tells lies for fun.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: カンガルー・ジャックのような映画がアメリカの冬の映画スクリーンに登場しようとしている中、代わりに「ザ・アワーズ」のような映画があるのは喜びです。
back_translation: As movies like Kangaroo Jack are making their way to American winter movie screens, it is a delight to have films like The Hours instead.

text: shot on wide screen digibeta , sendak with his night kitchen theater partner , arthur yorinks and pilobolus artistic directors robby barnett , michael tracy , and jonathan wolken shows us the tenacity and wit that drive the creative process when serious artists work together .
translation: ワイドスクリーンのデジベータで撮影されたこの作品では、センダックと彼のナイトキッチンシアターのパートナーであるアーサー・ヨリンクス、そしてピロボラスのアートディレクターであるロビー・バーネット、マイケル・トレイシー、ジョナサン・ウォルケンが、真剣なアーティストたちが共に働くときに、創造的プロセスを推進する粘り強さとウィットを私たちに示しています。
back_translation: This work, filmed in widescreen DigiBeta, showcases the perseverance and wit that serious artists demonstrate when they work together, featuring Sendak and his Night Kitchen Theater partner Arthur Yorinks, as well as Robby Barnett, Michael Tracy, and Jonathan Wolken from Pilobolus.

text: uneven but ultimately appealing satire of the dreck we call white man 's rap music . some good performances and an often goofy script make for a generally good time .
translation: 不均衡ではあるが最終的には魅力的な白人男性のラップ音楽に対する辛辣な風刺。いくつかの良いパフォーマンスとしばしば愉快な脚本が一般的に楽しい時間を作り出している。
back_translation: A sharp satire of ultimately appealing white male rap music, though imbalanced. Some good performances and often amusing script create an overall enjoyable experience.

text: wes craven 's presence is felt ; not the craven of 'a nightmare on elm street ' or 'the hills have eyes , ' but the sad schlock merchant of 'deadly friend . '
translation: ウェス・クレイヴンの存在感は感じられる；「エルム街の悪夢」や「ヒルズ・ハブ・アイズ」のクレイヴンではなく、「デッドリー・フレンド」の悲しいショック商人の存在だ。
back_translation: The presence of Wes Craven can be felt; it is not the Craven from "A Nightmare on Elm Street" or "The Hills Have Eyes," but rather the presence of the sad shock merchant from "Deadly Friend."

text: a splendid entertainment , young in spirit but accomplished in all aspects with the fullness of spirit and sense of ease that comes only with experience .
translation: 素晴らしいエンターテイメントであり、精神的には若々しいものの、すべての面で洗練されています。経験によってのみ得られる充実した精神と安らぎの感覚を持っています。
back_translation: It is a wonderful entertainment, mentally youthful, yet sophisticated in every aspect. It has a sense of fulfillment and tranquility that can only be gained through experience.

text: evil czar and his no-less-evil sidekick general with the help of the local witch yaga try to eliminate fedot by giving him more and more complex quests and to take marusya to tsar 's palace .
translation: 邪悪な皇帝と彼の同じく邪悪な副官である将軍は、地元の魔女ヤーガの助けを借りて、フェドットを排除しようとします。彼らはフェドットにますます複雑なクエストを与え、マルーシャを皇帝の宮殿に連れて行こうとします。
back_translation: The evil emperor and his equally evil general, who is his aide, try to eliminate Fedot with the help of the local witch Yaga. They give Fedot increasingly complicated quests in an attempt to lead Marusha to the emperor's palace.

text: before they can begin repairing and towing the ghost ship towards harbor , the crew encounters a series of bizarre ocurrences , and the group becomes trapped inside the ship .
translation: 修理と幽霊船を港に向けて引き寄せる作業を始める前に、乗組員は一連の奇妙な出来事に遭遇し、グループは船内に閉じ込められてしまいます。
back_translation: Before starting the work of repairing and pulling the ghost ship towards the port, the crew encounters a series of strange events and the group becomes trapped inside the ship.

text: kimberly corman , 19 , was just taking a trip with her friends . .
translation: キンバリー・コーマン、19歳は、友達と一緒に旅行をしていました。
back_translation: Nineteen-year-old Kimberly Coleman was traveling with her friends.

text: her harrowing story ends in victory , but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who remain in detention today .
translation: 彼女の辛い物語は勝利で終わりますが、彼女は今日も拘留されている何千人もの亡命希望者を忘れてはいません。
back_translation: Her painful story ends in victory, but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who are still detained today.

text: the best way to describe it is as a cross between paul thomas anderson 's magnolia and david lynch 's mulholland dr .
translation: それを最もよく表現する方法は、ポール・トーマス・アンダーソンの「マグノリア」とデビッド・リンチの「マルホランド・ドライブ」の間の交差点のようなものです。
back_translation: The best way to express it is like an intersection between Paul Thomas Anderson's "Magnolia" and David Lynch's "Mulholland Drive."

text: in 1959 , berry gordy jr . gathered the best musicians from detroit 's thriving jazz and blues scene to begin cutting songs for his new record company .
translation: 1959年、ベリー・ゴーディ・ジュニアはデトロイトの活気あるジャズとブルースのシーンから最高のミュージシャンを集めて、新しいレコード会社のために曲の制作を始めました。
back_translation: In 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. gathered the best musicians from Detroit's vibrant jazz and blues scene to start producing songs for a new record company.

text: maggie is a young cuban-american freelance writer who takes an eye opening trip back to her roots and meets a young enchanting native , mateo .
translation: マギーは若いキューバ系アメリカ人のフリーランスライターで、ルーツを探る目を見開く旅をし、魅力的な若者マテオと出会います。
back_translation: Maggie is a young Cuban-American freelance writer who embarks on an eye-opening journey to explore her roots and meets an intriguing young man named Mateo.

text: haneke keeps us at arm 's length . guided more by intellect than heart , his story flattens instead of sharpens .
translation: ハネケは私たちを距離を置いて見守る。心よりも知性に導かれ、彼の物語は鋭さを増すのではなく、むしろ平坦になる。
back_translation: Haneke observes us from a distance. Guided more by intellect than by emotion, his stories become flatter rather than sharper.

text: so vivid a portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love and crushed by betrayal that it conjures up the intoxicating fumes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted rembrandt .
translation: 情熱と愛に飲み込まれ、裏切りに打ちひしがれた女性の鮮やかな肖像は、まるで新たに描かれたレンブラントの魅惑的な香りと感情の幽霊を呼び起こすようです。
back_translation: The vivid portrait of a woman consumed by passion and love, crushed by betrayal, seems to evoke the enchanting aroma and emotional ghosts of a newly painted Rembrandt.

text: in singapore , that means that at the age of 12 , the government has decided that they are not as academically inclined as their peers .
translation: シンガポールでは、12歳の時点で政府は彼らが仲間と比べて学業的な傾向がそれほど高くないと判断したことを意味します。
back_translation: In Singapore, this means that by the age of 12, the government has determined that they do not have significantly high academic tendencies compared to their peers.

text: all while jolynn is persued by a masculine , toothpick chewing sheriff .
translation: その間、ジョイリンはマッチョで、つまようじを噛んでいる保安官に追われている。
back_translation: In the meantime, Joylin is being chased by a muscular sheriff who is biting on a toothpick.

text: [ the film ] tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: [その映画]は、人間関係のテーマを非常に直接的で感情的に正直な方法で扱っているため、最後には、その映画が根本的に深く悲観的なのか、それとも静かに希望を持っているのかを判断することが不可能になる。
back_translation: The movie deals with the theme of human relationships in a very direct and emotionally honest way, making it impossible to determine in the end whether the film is fundamentally deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful.

text: krueger is able to disguise himself as pamela voorhees , and instructs jason to start murdering on elm street upon his resurrection , therefore restoring freddy 's power as well .
translation: クルーガーはパメラ・ボーリーズに変装することができ、ジェイソンに復活後にエルム街で殺人を始めるよう指示することで、フレディの力も回復させる。
back_translation: Kruger is able to disguise himself as Pamela Voorhees and instructs Jason to start killing in Elm Street after his resurrection, thus restoring Freddy's power as well.

text: unfortunately , the evil tall man ( angus scrimm ) controls that area .
translation: 残念ながら、邪悪な背の高い男（アングス・スクリム）がその地域を支配しています。
back_translation: Unfortunately, an evil tall man (Angus Scrimm) is ruling over that area.

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .
translation: シンプルな前提を取り上げ、それを予想外の高みに引き上げる。
back_translation: Take a simple premise and elevate it to an unexpected height.

text: ruby acts out these scenes in real life with the men and shares her spoils with her sisters .
translation: ルビーはこれらのシーンを現実で男性と演じ、得た成果を姉妹たちと分かち合います。
back_translation: Ruby performs these scenes with men in real life and shares the results with her sisters.

text: we get some truly unique character studies and a cross-section of americana that hollywood could n't possibly fictionalize and be believed .
translation: 私たちは、ハリウッドがフィクションにすることができず、信じられないようなアメリカの断面を含む、真にユニークなキャラクターの研究を得ています。
back_translation: We obtain a truly unique character study that includes an unbelievable aspect of America that Hollywood cannot fictionalize.

text: in this refreshingly shameless celebration of money and expensive stuff , director kevin bray grabs every retro action-film clichM-i .
translation: この新鮮で恥知らずなお金と高価なものの祝典で、監督のケビン・ブレイは、あらゆるレトロアクション映画のクリシェを掴み取ります。
back_translation: In this fresh and shameless celebration of money and expensive things, director Kevin Bray grabs all the clichés of retro action films.

text: the result is a chronicle of the shift from a world organized by the principles of nature to one dominated by technology , the synthetic and the virtual .
translation: その結果は、自然の原則によって組織された世界から、技術、合成物、そしてバーチャルによって支配される世界への移行の年代記です。
back_translation: The result is a chronicle of the transition from a world organized by the principles of nature to a world dominated by technology, synthetic materials, and the virtual.

text: as they each play out their own con , the line between rescuer and executioner , betrayer and martyr become blurred and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive .
translation: それぞれが自分の詐欺を展開する中で、救助者と処刑者、裏切り者と殉教者の境界が曖昧になり、生き残るためには互いに信頼し合うことを学ばなければならない。
back_translation: As each develops their own deception, the boundaries between saviors and executioners, traitors and martyrs become blurred, and in order to survive, they must learn to trust one another.

text: over a fourteen year period they were the heartbeat on every hit from motown 's detroit era .
translation: 14年間にわたり、彼らはモータウンのデトロイト時代のすべてのヒット曲の心臓部でした。
back_translation: For 14 years, they were the heartbeat of all the hit songs from Motown's Detroit era.

text: leoncio 's son robert and daughter marites disapprove of their father 's single-handed decision , leading to a conflict that causes the old man 's fatal heart attack .
translation: レオンシオの息子ロバートと娘マリテスは、父親の独断的な決定に反対し、それが老父の致命的な心臓発作を引き起こす争いに繋がる。
back_translation: Leoncio's son Robert and daughter Marites oppose their father's dictatorial decisions, leading to a conflict that triggers a fatal heart attack for the elderly father.

text: this epic film , eschewing dialogue and conventional narrative logic , tells a gripping tale of biological drama through a highly improbable series of evocative images , superb acting and editing , and haunting music .
translation: この壮大な映画は、ダイアログや従来の物語論理を避け、非常にありえない一連の印象的な映像、素晴らしい演技と編集、そして響く音楽を通して生物学的ドラマの魅力的な物語を語ります。
back_translation: This grand film tells a captivating story of biological drama through a highly improbable series of impressive visuals, wonderful performances and editing, and resonant music, avoiding dialogue and conventional narrative logic.

text: if you sometimes like to go to the movies to have fun , wasabi is a good place to start .
translation: もし時々映画を見に行って楽しむのが好きなら、わさびは始めるのに良い場所です。
back_translation: If you enjoy going to the movies and having fun from time to time, Wasabi is a good place to start.

text: when she fails to find the `` perfect man `` that will make her happy , she decides to construct him herself , using parts from different people .
translation: 彼女は自分を幸せにしてくれる「完璧な男」を見つけられないと、さまざまな人々のパーツを使って自分で彼を作ることに決めました。
back_translation: She decided to create the "perfect man" for herself by using parts from various people when she couldn't find one who made her happy.

text: but sue , angry and feeling abandoned by lynn , decides to carry out the killing herself .
translation: しかし、スーはリンに怒りと見捨てられた気持ちを抱え、自ら殺人を実行することを決意します。
back_translation: However, Sue is filled with anger and a sense of being abandoned by Lynn, and she resolves to carry out the murder herself.

text: emma 's a succesful sale agent for a home security company , due in part to being the police chief 's daughter .
translation: エマはホームセキュリティ会社の成功した販売代理人であり、その一因として警察署長の娘であることが挙げられます。
back_translation: Emma is a successful sales representative for a home security company, and one reason for her success is that she is the daughter of the police chief.

text: culkin , who 's in virtually every scene , shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies like a shield .
translation: カーカンはほぼすべてのシーンに登場し、皮肉な嘘を盾のように使う若者として輝いています。
back_translation: Karkan shines as a young person who appears in almost every scene, using ironic lies like a shield.

text: not only better than its predecessor , it may rate as the most magical and most fun family fare of this or any recent holiday season .
translation: 前作よりも優れているだけでなく、今シーズンや最近のホリデーシーズンで最も魔法のようで楽しいファミリー向けの作品として評価されるかもしれません。
back_translation: Not only is it superior to the previous work, but it may also be regarded as the most magical and enjoyable family-oriented piece of this season and the recent holiday season.

text: just one more collection of penis , breast and flatulence gags in search of a story . or a profit . or some damn thing .
translation: もう一つ、物語を探しているか、利益を得るための陰茎、胸部、そしておならのギャグのコレクション。あるいは何かしらのもの。
back_translation: I'm looking for another story or a collection of jokes about penises, breasts, and farts for profit. Or something like that.

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: この奇妙で詩的なロードムービーは、ポップ音楽の衝撃によって彩られ、モートンの常に見守る視線の中でほぼ展開します。そして、この旅がこれほど魅惑的なものであるのは、女優への賛辞であり、彼女の独創的な監督への賛辞でもあります。
back_translation: This strange and poetic road movie unfolds almost entirely under the watchful gaze of Morton, colored by the impact of pop music. The reason this journey is so captivating is that it is a tribute to the actress and a tribute to her original direction.

text: if you 're a crocodile hunter fan , you 'll enjoy at least the `` real `` portions of the film . if you 're looking for a story , do n't bother .
translation: あなたがクロコダイルハンターのファンなら、映画の「リアル」な部分は楽しめるでしょう。ストーリーを求めているなら、気にしないでください。
back_translation: If you're a fan of Crocodile Hunter, you'll enjoy the "real" parts of the movie. If you're looking for a story, don't bother.

text: true love is right around the corner as long as he does n't lose sight of what he 's looking for .
translation: 真実の愛はすぐそこにあります。彼が探しているものを見失わなければ。
back_translation: True love is right there. As long as he doesn't lose sight of what he's looking for.

text: after several fruitless attempts to sell the car , shirley dumps johnny , who has hopelessly fallen in love with her .
translation: 果たしていくつかの無駄な試みの後、シャーリーはジョニーを振り捨てる。ジョニーは彼女に絶望的に恋に落ちてしまっていた。
back_translation: After several futile attempts, Shirley finally dismisses Johnny. Johnny had fallen desperately in love with her.

text: dr . kanna & # 38 ; rupi are childhood lovers and made for each other .
translation: ドクター・カンナとルピは幼馴染の恋人で、お互いにぴったりの存在です。
back_translation: Dr. Kanna and Rupi are childhood friends and lovers, and they are perfect for each other.

text: there is something in full frontal , i guess , about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for people who make movies and watch them , but like most movie riddles , it works only if you have an interest in the characters you see .
translation: フルフロンタルには、アーティフィスや演技、そしてそれが映画を制作し観る人々にとって現実をどのように歪めるかについて何かがありますが、ほとんどの映画の謎と同様、見るキャラクターに興味がある場合にのみ機能します。
back_translation: Full Frontal has something to say about artifice and performance, and how it distorts reality for those who create and watch films, but like most film mysteries, it only works when the viewer is interested in the characters on screen.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: 完璧なフォースターから常に面白いミーラやレビーまで、ゲームを支えるキャストを武器にして、「マイク」と同様にシュートを決め、名に恥じない活躍を見せます。
back_translation: From perfect four-star characters to always interesting Mira and Levi, we utilize the supporting cast of the game as a weapon, scoring goals just like "Mike" and showcasing performances worthy of the name.

text: forced to move back to his old job at a pizza parlor and into a rundown tenement where a number of oddballs wander the hall including a lonely middle aged woman ( mary coleston ) who makes spam casseroles for all the bachelors , a daffy prostitute ( krystina carson ) , and a spanish don juan ( manual cabra ) who wanders the halls in his bathrobe .
translation: 古いピザ店に戻らざるを得なくなり、数人の変わり者が廊下を歩くボロボロのアパートに住むことになった。その中には、全ての独身男性のためにスパムのキャセロールを作る孤独な中年女性（メアリー・コルストン）、おかしな売春婦（クリスティーナ・カーソン）、そしてバスローブを着て廊下を彷徨うスペインのドンファン（マニュエル・カブラ）がいる。
back_translation: I had no choice but to return to an old pizza shop and ended up living in a rundown apartment where a few oddballs walked the halls. Among them were a lonely middle-aged woman (Mary Colston) who made Spam casserole for all the single men, a peculiar prostitute (Christina Carson), and a Spanish Don Juan (Manuel Cabra) who wandered the hallway in a bathrobe.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie . unfortunately , we 'd prefer a simple misfire .
translation: 私たちは「カンフー・パンダ」が誤って作られたと非難することはできません。なぜなら、それはまさに望んでいるものだからです： atrociously、mind-numbingly、言葉では表現しきれないほどの悪い映画です。残念ながら、私たちは単純な失敗を好むでしょう。
back_translation: We cannot criticize "Kung Fu Panda" for being made incorrectly because that is exactly what we wanted: an atrociously, mind-numbingly, indescribably bad movie. Unfortunately, we would prefer a simple failure.

text: hardly an objective documentary , but it 's great cinematic polemic . . . love moore or loathe him , you 've got to admire . . . the intensity with which he 's willing to express his convictions .
translation: 客観的なドキュメンタリーとは言えませんが、素晴らしい映画的論争です。ムーアを愛しても嫌っても、彼が自分の信念を表現する際の情熱には感心せざるを得ません。
back_translation: It can't be called an objective documentary, but it's a wonderful cinematic debate. Whether you love or hate Moore, you can't help but admire his passion when expressing his beliefs.

text: lauren ambrose comes alive under the attention from two strangers in town - with honest performances and realistic interaction between the characters , this is a coming-of-age story with a twist .
translation: ローラ・アンブローズは、町にいる二人の見知らぬ人からの注目を受けて生き生きとします。キャラクター間の誠実な演技と現実的な交流を通じて、これはひねりのある成長物語です。
back_translation: Laura Ambrose comes alive under the attention of two strangers in town. Through sincere performances between the characters and realistic interactions, this is a twist-filled coming-of-age story.

text: these four will collide in a titanic battle to determine the fate of the world .
translation: この四人は世界の運命を決定するために壮大な戦いで衝突する。
back_translation: These four will collide in a grand battle to determine the fate of the world.

text: ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film .
translation: どこにでもいるヤーヤたちは、その欠点を許し、映画を愛するだろう。
back_translation: The everyday Yaya's will forgive those flaws and love the movie.

text: baaba andoh fled ghana in fear for her life , when her long-lost father tried to force her to undergo female genital mutilation .
translation: バーバ・アンドーは、失われた父親が彼女に女性器切除を強要しようとしたとき、命の危険を感じてガーナから逃れました。
back_translation: Barba Ando fled from Ghana when she felt her life was in danger as her lost father attempted to force her into female genital mutilation.

text: it 's also clear from the start that the transporter is running purely on adrenaline , and once the initial high wears off , the film 's shortcomings start to shine through .
translation: 最初から明らかなように、運び屋は純粋にアドレナリンで走っており、最初の高揚感が薄れると、映画の欠点が浮き彫りになってきます。
back_translation: As is clear from the beginning, the courier runs purely on adrenaline, and once the initial rush fades, the flaws of the movie become apparent.

text: she marches coldly through her day , ignoring him , going about her business .
translation: 彼女は冷たく一日を歩き、彼を無視し、自分の仕事をこなしている。
back_translation: She walks through the day coldly, ignoring him and taking care of her own work.

text: from classrooms to dorm rooms , it 's hard to keep it together when you ca n't even find the door .
translation: 教室から寮の部屋まで、ドアすら見つけられないときに、物事を保つのは難しい。
back_translation: It's difficult to keep things together when you can't even find the door from the classroom to the dormitory room.

text: diane lane works nothing short of a minor miracle in unfaithful .
translation: ダイアン・レインは『アンフェイスフル』で小さな奇跡を成し遂げている。
back_translation: Diane Lane accomplishes a small miracle in "Unfaithful."

text: will graham must risk his family 's security and his own safety to track down this one last murderer - the epitome of all evil - the red dragon .
translation: ウィル・グレアムは、この最後の殺人者 - すべての悪の象徴 - レッドドラゴンを追跡するために、家族の安全と自分の安全を危険にさらさなければならない。
