back_translation: Will Graham must jeopardize the safety of his family and himself to track down this final murderer - the embodiment of all evil - the Red Dragon.

text: spider-man is in the same category as x-men - occasionally brilliant but mostly average , showing signs of potential for the sequels , but not giving us much this time around .
translation: スパイダーマンはX-Menと同じカテゴリーに属しており、時折素晴らしいが基本的には平均的で、続編に対する可能性の兆しを見せているものの、今回はあまり多くを提供していません。
back_translation: Spider-Man belongs to the same category as the X-Men; it is occasionally wonderful but fundamentally average, showing signs of potential for sequels, though it doesn't offer much this time.

text: skagerrak is the story of being hit by happiness when you least expect it .
translation: スカゲラックは、予期しない時に幸せに打たれる物語です。
back_translation: Skagerrak is a story that strikes happiness at unexpected times.

text: ben stiller and jack black star as tim and nick , best friends , neighbors and co-workers , whose equal footing is suddenly tripped up when one of nick 's harebrained get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds : vapoorizer , a spray that literally makes dog poop , or any other kind for that matter , evaporate into thin air -- to where exactly is anyone 's guess .
translation: ベン・スティラーとジャック・ブラックは、ティムとニックとして主演します。彼らは親友で隣人であり同僚ですが、ニックのむちゃくちゃな一攫千金計画の一つが実際に成功したことで、彼らの平等な関係が突然揺らいでしまいます。それは「ヴェイポライザー」というスプレーで、犬の糞やその他のものを文字通り薄い空気に蒸発させるのです——具体的にどこへ蒸発するのかは誰にも分かりません。
back_translation: Ben Stiller and Jack Black star as Tim and Nick. They are best friends, neighbors, and colleagues, but their equal relationship is suddenly shaken when one of Nick's outrageous get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds. It's a spray called "Vaporizer" that literally evaporates dog poop and other things into thin air—specifically, no one knows where it evaporates to.

text: after a really wild night jim and the gang wake up in an abandoned warehouse in a small town in the middle of no where , of which they have never heard of .
translation: 本当に荒れた夜の後、ジムと仲間たちは、聞いたこともないど真ん中の小さな町の廃工場で目を覚ます。
back_translation: After a truly turbulent night, Jim and his friends wake up in an abandoned factory in a small town they have never heard of.

text: isabel and clara are growing up in a time of terror .
translation: イザベルとクララは恐怖の時代に成長しています。
back_translation: Isabel and Clara are growing up in an age of terror.

text: an astonishing feat for a major star let alone a 27 year old from pickum , south carolina who only two years ago was sleeping in a cardboard box in the back alleys of detroit with her mother , connie , and her uncle clutch , while playing guitar on the streets for spare change .
translation: 驚くべき偉業であり、南カロライナ州ピカム出身の27歳の主要なスターにとってはなおさらのことです。たった2年前、彼女は母親のコンニーと叔父のクラッチと共にデトロイトの裏路地で段ボール箱に寝ていたのです。そして、わずかな小銭を稼ぐためにストリートでギターを弾いていました。
back_translation: It is an incredible achievement, especially for the 27-year-old major star from Pickens, South Carolina. Just two years ago, she was sleeping in a cardboard box in a Detroit alley with her mother Connie and her uncle Clutch. She was playing guitar on the street to earn a little spare change.

text: renata is a young high-class girl and ulises is a poor guy .
translation: レナータは若い上流階級の女の子で、ウリセスは貧しい男の子です。
back_translation: Renata is a young upper-class girl, and Ulysses is a poor boy.

text: detective kuroda tries to find the answer , which is n't as simple as one could hope .
translation: 黒田探偵は答えを見つけようとしますが、それは思っているほど簡単ではありません。
back_translation: Detective Kuroda tries to find the answer, but it's not as easy as he thought.

text: like any warhol/morrissey relic , arnon goldfinger 's the komediant rediscovers chapters in new york 's cultural past .
translation: ウォーホルやモリッシーの遺物のように、アーノン・ゴールドフィンガーの『コメディアン』はニューヨークの文化的過去の章を再発見する。
back_translation: Like the relics of Warhol and Morrissey, Arnon Goldfinger's "The Comedian" rediscovers a chapter of New York's cultural past.

text: she has been programmed to eliminate other cybernetic organisms .
translation: 彼女は他のサイボーグ生物を排除するようにプログラムされています。
back_translation: She is programmed to eliminate other cyborg beings.

text: debrauwer handles the story with such feeling and understanding that you quickly come to , not just like , but love these characters .
translation: デブロウワーはこの物語を非常に感情豊かに、理解を持って描いているので、あなたはすぐにこれらのキャラクターを好きになるだけでなく、愛するようになります。
back_translation: Debrouwer vividly and empathetically portrays this story, so you will not only quickly come to like these characters but also grow to love them.

text: if an oscar category existed for ensemble acting , the hours would unquestionably earn it . watching a trio of actors at the top of their game is a delight .
translation: もしオスカーのカテゴリーにアンサンブル演技が存在していたら、『ハウス』は間違いなく受賞するでしょう。最高のパフォーマンスを見せる三人の俳優を観るのは喜びです。
back_translation: If there had been a category for ensemble acting at the Oscars, "House" would definitely win. It is a joy to see the three actors delivering their best performances.

text: the mafia 's paul vitti ( de niro ) is back in prison and will need some serious counseling when he gets out .
translation: マフィアのポール・ヴィッティ（デ・ニーロ）は再び刑務所に戻り、出所した際には真剣なカウンセリングが必要になるでしょう。
back_translation: Mafia member Paul Vitti (De Niro returns to prison once again, and when he is released, he will need serious counseling.

text: it shows us a slice of life that 's very different from our own and yet instantly recognizable .
translation: 私たちの生活とは非常に異なるが、それでも瞬時に認識できる生活の一片を示している。
back_translation: It shows a glimpse of life that is very different from ours, yet can be recognized instantly.

text: in an alternate space and time , a mythological being called the guardian is charged with manipulating and protecting dark matter .
translation: 別の空間と時間において、守護者と呼ばれる神話的存在が暗黒物質を操り、保護する任務を担っています。
back_translation: In a different space and time, a mythical being known as the Guardian is tasked with manipulating and protecting dark matter.

text: vince 's flood of memories about sara 's disappearance is brought on when he happens upon 10-year-old ellen , one of julie 's students .
translation: ヴィンスのサラの失踪に関する記憶の洪水は、ジュリーの生徒である10歳のエレンに出会ったときに引き起こされる。
back_translation: The flood of memories regarding Vince's Sara's disappearance is triggered when he meets 10-year-old Ellen, a student of Julie's.

text: in the first trip in november 2001 , majidi visited the refugee camp of makaki in a taliban controlled area and mile 46 , another small camp situated in a northern alliance held area .
translation: 2001年11月の最初の旅行で、マジディはタリバンが支配する地域にあるマカキの難民キャンプと、北部同盟が占拠する地域にある別の小さなキャンプ、マイル46を訪れました。
back_translation: In November 2001, during his first trip, Majidi visited a refugee camp for Makaki in an area controlled by the Taliban, as well as another small camp, Mile 46, located in an area occupied by the Northern Alliance.

text: told in one fluid shot , a tale which floats like a dreamlike journey through the majestic spaces of the hermitage in st . petersburg , engaging real and imagined characters from russian and european history .
translation: サンクトペテルブルクのエルミタージュ美術館の壮大な空間を夢のような旅のように漂う物語を、一つの流れるようなショットで語られ、ロシアおよびヨーロッパの歴史からの実在のキャラクターと想像上のキャラクターを引き合わせています。
back_translation: The story of the magnificent space of the Hermitage Museum in St. Petersburg is narrated in a flowing shot like a dreamlike journey, bringing together real characters from Russian and European history with imagined characters.

text: this slender plot feels especially thin stretched over the nearly 80-minute running time .
translation: この細長いプロットは、ほぼ80分の上映時間にわたって引き延ばされているため、特に薄く感じられます。
back_translation: This elongated plot feels particularly thin as it is stretched over nearly 80 minutes of runtime.

text: jirM-m hubac 's script is a gem . his characters are engaging , intimate and the dialogue is realistic and greatly moving . the scope of the silberstein family is large and we grow attached to their lives , full of strength , warmth and vitality . .
translation: jirM-m hubacの脚本は素晴らしいです。彼のキャラクターは魅力的で親密感があり、対話は現実的で非常に感動的です。シルバースタイン家の範囲は広く、私たちは彼らの力強さ、温かさ、活力に満ちた生活に愛着を持ちます。
back_translation: The script of jirM-m hubac is wonderful. His character is charming and intimate, and the dialogue is realistic and very moving. The Silverstein family's range is broad, and we are fond of their strong, warm, and vibrant lives.

text: what would have otherwise been a routine nostalgic coming-of-ager takes on a new , innovative form .
translation: それ以外は、ただの懐かしい青春物語となるはずだったものが、新しく革新的な形を取る。
back_translation: Aside from that, what was supposed to be just a nostalgic coming-of-age story takes on a new and innovative form.

text: often overwrought and at times positively irritating , the film turns into an engrossing thriller almost in spite of itself .
translation: しばしば過剰で、時には非常にイライラさせるが、その映画はほとんど自分自身を無視して、引き込まれるスリラーに変わる。
back_translation: Often excessive and sometimes very irritating, the movie nearly transforms into an engaging thriller that almost ignores itself.

text: good , -- * interviews with dp neihouse and astronaut susan helms *
translation: 良い、-- * DPネイハウスと宇宙飛行士スーザン・ヘルムズへのインタビュー *
back_translation: Good, -- * Interview with DP Neihouse and astronaut Susan Helms *

text: the leaping story line , shaped by director peter kosminsky into sharp slivers and cutting impressions , shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and striking character traits .
translation: ジャンプするストーリーラインは、監督ピーター・コズミンスキーによって鋭い断片や強烈な印象に形作られ、少数の印象的なイメージや際立ったキャラクターの特性に凝縮された豊かなディテールの兆しをすべて示しています。
back_translation: The storyline of "Jump" is shaped by director Peter Kosminsky into sharp fragments and intense impressions, condensing rich details into a few striking images and distinctive character traits.

text: he has just graduated college , he has a beautiful girlfriend , jane , and a publisher has picked up his first novel .
translation: 彼は大学を卒業したばかりで、素敵な彼女、ジェーンがいて、出版社が彼の初めての小説を出版しました。
back_translation: He has just graduated from university, has a lovely girlfriend named Jane, and a publisher has published his first novel.

text: . . . the movie is just a plain old monster .
translation: ...その映画はただの古典的なモンスターです。
back_translation: ...that movie is just a classic monster.

text: an apparent gynaecologist dr . nightingale hastily marries a pregnant patient , modesta and takes her home to his mysterious manor to meet mother .
translation: 明らかに産婦人科医であるナイチンゲール博士は、妊娠中の患者モデスタと急いで結婚し、彼女を母親に会わせるために自らの神秘的な邸宅に連れて帰ります。
back_translation: Clearly, Dr. Nightingale, who is an obstetrician, hurriedly marries his pregnant patient Modesta and takes her back to his mysterious mansion to meet his mother.

text: the film is a travesty of the genre and even as spoof takes itself too seriously .
translation: その映画はジャンルの冒涜であり、パロディとしても自分自身をあまりにも真剣に受け止めている。
back_translation: The movie is a blasphemy of the genre and takes itself too seriously as a parody.

text: in the end , all you can do is admire the ensemble players and wonder what the point of it is .
translation: 結局、できることはアンサンブルの演者を賞賛し、その意味について考えることだけです。
back_translation: In the end, all we can do is praise the performers of the ensemble and reflect on its significance.

text: a bounty hunter is on the trail of a conman who skipped bail .
translation: 保釈をすっぽかした詐欺師の後を追う賞金稼ぎ。
back_translation: A bounty hunter chasing after a con artist who skipped bail.

text: they 've known each other since they met as children , when both discovered hip-hop for the first time .
translation: 彼らは子供の頃に出会ったときから互いを知っており、その時初めてヒップホップを発見しました。
back_translation: They have known each other since they met in childhood, and that was when they discovered hip hop for the first time.

text: in its chicken heart , crush goes to absurd lengths to duck the very issues it raises .
translation: 「チキンハート」において、クラッシュは自ら提起する問題から逃れるために、非常に absurd な手段を講じます。
back_translation: In "Chicken Heart," Crash takes extremely absurd measures to escape from the problems he himself raises.

text: dong does n't demonize the conservative christians he talks to , but he does n't have to . . .
translation: ドンは、話をする保守的なクリスチャンを悪魔化する必要はないが、そうする必要もない。
back_translation: Don doesn't need to demonize conservative Christians who talk, but he also doesn't have to.

text: when she decides to cancel her only holiday with tor and go on a self-development course with per instead , the passive bystander tor realises he 's going to have to stand up and be a man .
translation: 彼女がトールとの唯一の休暇をキャンセルし、代わりにペルとの自己啓発コースに参加することを決めたとき、受動的な傍観者であるトールは、自分が立ち上がって男らしくなければならないことに気づく。
back_translation: When she decided to cancel her only vacation with Thor and instead participate in a self-improvement course with Pearl, the passive bystander Thor realized that he had to step up and be more manly.

text: five years later `` the bride `` awakens from the coma the assassins left her in and heads out to seek bloody revenge .
translation: 5年後、「花嫁」は暗殺者に残された昏睡から目覚め、血の復讐を求めて出て行く。
back_translation: Five years later, the "bride" awakens from a coma left by an assassin and sets out seeking bloody revenge.

text: this is a happy throwback to the time when cartoons were cinema 's most idiosyncratic form instead of one of its most predictable .
translation: これは、アニメーションが映画の最も予測可能な形式の一つではなく、最も風変わりな形式であった時代を懐かしむ幸せな思い出です。
back_translation: This is a happy memory reminiscing about a time when animation was not one of the most predictable forms of film, but rather one of the most unconventional forms.

text: because of her finn is finally able to accept himself .
translation: 彼女のおかげで、フィンはついに自分自身を受け入れることができるようになった。
back_translation: Thanks to her, Finn was finally able to accept himself.

text: . . . plays like a badly edited , 91-minute trailer ( and ) the director ca n't seem to get a coherent rhythm going . in fact , it does n't even seem like she tried .
translation: ...まるで悪く編集された91分の予告編のようで、監督は一貫したリズムを作り出すことができていない。実際、彼女は試みすらしていないように見える。
back_translation: ...it feels like a poorly edited 91-minute trailer, and the director seems unable to create a consistent rhythm. In fact, it seems she hasn't even attempted to do so.

text: he then dedicates himself to making sure the video tape is released to the public .
translation: 彼はその後、ビデオテープが一般に公開されるように尽力します。
back_translation: He will then work hard to ensure that the video tape is made public.

text: what drives a young african-american man to become a member of the republican party and to run for a united states congressional seat in a district in south georgia with a disturbing racist history ?
translation: 若いアフリカ系アメリカ人男性が、南ジョージア州の人種差別的な歴史を持つ地区で共和党の党員になり、アメリカ合衆国議会の議席に立候補する理由は何でしょうか？
back_translation: What could be the reasons for a young African American man to become a Republican party member and run for a seat in the United States Congress in an area of South Georgia with a history of racism?

text: pratfalls aside , barbershop gets its greatest play from the timeless spectacle of people really talking to each other .
translation: 失敗はさておき、バーバーショップは人々が本当に話し合うという時代を超えた光景から最大の魅力を得ています。
back_translation: Putting failure aside, barbershops derive their greatest appeal from being timeless places where people truly engage in conversation.

text: in the near future a young biker leaves his crumbling life in rural ireland to join a strange 'metal circus ' as it tours the cities of europe .
translation: 近い将来、若いバイカーが崩れかけたアイルランドの生活を離れ、ヨーロッパの都市を巡る奇妙な「メタルサーカス」に参加します。
back_translation: In the near future, a young biker leaves the crumbling life of Ireland to participate in a strange "metal circus" traveling through European cities.

text: although they have fallen into a habitual rivalry based on a cause long forgotten , the pair unite when the multinational fast-food outlet `` burgies `` unveils a new store directly opposite the twin fish & # 38 ; chips shops .
translation: 彼らは長い間忘れられた原因に基づいて習慣的な競争に陥っているが、マルチナショナルファーストフード店「バーギーズ」が双子のフィッシュ＆チップス店の真向かいに新しい店舗をオープンするとき、二人は団結する。
back_translation: They have fallen into habitual competition based on a long-forgotten reason, but when the multinational fast-food chain "Burgies" opens a new store directly across from the twin fish and chip shops, the two unite.

text: it is the weekend and the lottery office is closed .
translation: 週末で、宝くじの事務所は閉まっています。
back_translation: The lottery office is closed on the weekend.

text: . . . a joke at once flaky and resonant , lightweight and bizarrely original .
translation: ...軽妙でありながら共鳴し、軽やかでありながら奇妙にオリジナルなジョーク。
back_translation: ...lighthearted yet resonant, playful yet strangely original jokes.

text: as an actor 's showcase , hart 's war has much to recommend it , even if the top-billed willis is not the most impressive player . as a story of dramatic enlightenment , the screenplay by billy ray and terry george leaves something to be desired .
translation: 俳優のショーケースとして、ハートの戦争には推薦すべき点が多いが、主演のウィリスが最も印象的な演技者ではない。ドラマ的な啓発の物語としては、ビリー・レイとテリー・ジョージの脚本には物足りなさがある。
back_translation: As a showcase for actors, "Hearts of War" has many points to recommend, but the lead, Willis, is not the most impressive performer. As a story of dramatic enlightenment, the screenplay by Billy Ray and Terry George lacks depth.

text: the time constraints of his job prevent him from spending time with his family and friends .
translation: 彼の仕事の時間的制約が、彼を家族や友人と過ごす時間から遠ざけています。
back_translation: His work schedule constraints keep him away from spending time with family and friends.

text: although their friendship raises some eyebrows at first , radio 's growth under the coach 's guidance ultimately inspires the local townsfolk , from 1964 when he first starts helping the hanna yellow jackets football team , through a 38+ career with the school that continues today ( 2002 ) , including tenures as the head cheerleader , assistant coach and team manager .
translation: 最初は彼らの友情が疑問を呼ぶものの、ラジオのコーチの指導の下での成長は最終的に地元の町の人々に感動を与えます。1964年にハンナ・イエロージャケット・フットボールチームを手助けし始めてから、2002年まで続く38年以上のキャリアを通じて、ヘッドチアリーダーやアシスタントコーチ、チームマネージャーとしての在任を含みます。
back_translation: Although their friendship initially raises doubts, their growth under the guidance of the radio coach ultimately moves the local townspeople. Since starting to assist the Hannah Yellowjacket football team in 1964, it includes a career spanning over 38 years, continuing until 2002, with tenures as head cheerleader, assistant coach, and team manager.

text: sweet home alabama certainly wo n't be remembered as one of [ witherspoon 's ] better films .
translation: スウィート・ホーム・アラバマは、確かに[ウィザースプーンの]より良い映画の一つとして記憶されることはないだろう。
back_translation: Sweet Home Alabama will certainly not be remembered as one of the better films than [the one with Witherspoon].

text: there is n't one moment in the film that surprises or delights .
translation: 映画には驚きや喜びを与える瞬間が一つもありません。
back_translation: The movie has not a single moment that brings surprise or joy.

text: overall very good for what it 's trying to do .
translation: 全体的に、試みていることに対して非常に良いです。
back_translation: Overall, it's very good for what you're trying to do.

text: david is a painter with painter 's block who takes a job as a waiter to get some inspiration .
translation: デイビッドは絵画のブロックに悩む画家で、インスピレーションを得るためにウェイターの仕事を始めます。
back_translation: David is a painter struggling with a block in his artwork, and he starts working as a waiter to gain inspiration.

text: this is not an easy film . but it could be , by its art and heart , a necessary one .
translation: これは簡単な映画ではありません。しかし、その芸術と心によって、必要な映画になるかもしれません。
back_translation: This is not an easy movie. However, through its art and heart, it might become a necessary film.

text: the uneven movie does have its charms and its funny moments but not quite enough of them .
translation: 不均衡な映画には魅力や面白い瞬間がありますが、それらが十分ではありません。
back_translation: Uneven movies have their charm and interesting moments, but they are not enough.

text: he spends most of his time throwing parties and `` fund raisers `` .
translation: 彼はほとんどの時間をパーティーや「資金集め」に費やしています。
back_translation: He spends most of his time at parties and "fundraising."

text: oliver parker brings the wit 's [ oscar wilde ] work to the screen in a solidly rendered creation .
translation: オリバー・パーカーは、オスカー・ワイルドの作品を画面に持ち込み、しっかりとした演出で創り上げています。
back_translation: Oliver Parker brings Oscar Wilde's works to the screen with solid direction.

text: a clichM-id and shallow cautionary tale about the hard-partying lives of gay men .
translation: ありきたりで浅薄な警告物語で、パーティ三昧のゲイ男性たちの生活についてです。
back_translation: It's a cliché and shallow cautionary tale about the lives of gay men who indulge in parties.

text: when a powerful developer named mr . scheck wants to knock down all the stores and houses in arnold 's neighborhood to build a huge `` mall-plex `` , it looks likes the neighborhood is doomed to disappear .
translation: 強力な開発者であるシュチェック氏がアーノルドの neighborhood にある店や家をすべて壊し、大規模な「モール・プレックス」を建設しようとしているとき、その neighborhood は消えてしまう運命にあるように見えます。
back_translation: It seems that the neighborhood is destined to disappear as Mr. Shchek, a powerful developer, is planning to demolish all the shops and houses in Arnold's neighborhood to construct a large-scale "mall-plex."

text: gosling creates a staggeringly compelling character , a young man whose sharp intellect is at the very root of his contradictory , self-hating , self-destructive ways .
translation: ゴズリングは驚くほど魅力的なキャラクターを生み出しており、その若い男の鋭い知性は彼の矛盾した自己嫌悪的で自己破壊的な方法の根源にあります。
back_translation: Gosling creates an incredibly captivating character, and the sharp intelligence of this young man is at the root of his contradictory self-loathing and self-destructive ways.

text: when the king meets the god in a face-to-face confrontation , the result takes on a horrible logic all its own .
translation: 王が神と対面する時、その結果は独自の恐ろしい論理を帯びる。
back_translation: When a king faces God, the outcome takes on a unique and terrifying logic.

text: in converging with angels , a world-weary sex worker ( dylan thomas ) impulsively takes in a drunk , fragile young woman who is in distress ( allison campbell ) , hoping to force some measure of redemption in a life that is financially comfortable , but morally and spiritually bankrupt .
translation: 「天使との交わり」では、疲れ果てたセックスワーカー（ディラン・トーマス）が、困難に直面している酔っ払った脆弱な若い女性（アリソン・キャンベル）を衝動的に受け入れ、金銭的には安定しているが道徳的および精神的には破綻している人生の中で、ある程度の贖罪を強いることを望んでいます。
back_translation: In "Communion with Angels," a weary sex worker (Dylan Thomas) impulsively takes in a vulnerable young woman (Alison Campbell) who is facing difficulties while intoxicated, hoping to impose a certain degree of atonement in a life that is financially stable but morally and spiritually bankrupt.

text: the movie eventually snaps under the strain of its plot contrivances and its need to reassure .
translation: 映画は最終的にプロットのご都合主義と観客を安心させる必要に押しつぶされてしまう。
back_translation: In the end, movies are crushed by the convenience of the plot and the need to comfort the audience.

text: the plot involves an innocent poor boy , who is a happy go lucky , always trying to live a stylish life .
translation: 物語は、無邪気で貧しい少年が、いつも楽しくスタイリッシュな生活をしようとする様子を描いています。
back_translation: The story portrays an innocent and poor boy who always tries to live a fun and stylish life.

text: as the national media become more sedate and incurious , this country desperately needs a gadfly like moore . indeed , we need more like him .
translation: 国のメディアがより穏やかで好奇心を失っていく中、この国はモアのような嫌われ者を切に必要としています。実際、私たちは彼のような人をもっと必要としています。
back_translation: As the country's media becomes more docile and loses its curiosity, this country desperately needs someone like Moa, who is disliked. In fact, we need more people like him.

text: god appears in human form ( freeman ) and , endowing bruce with divine powers , challenges bruce to take on the big job to see if he can do it any better .
translation: 神は人間の形（フリーマン）で現れ、ブルースに神の力を授け、彼がそれをより良くできるかどうかを試すために、大きな仕事を引き受けるよう挑戦します。
back_translation: God appears in human form (Freeman) and challenges Bruce to take on a great task, bestowing divine power upon him to see if he can handle it better.

text: the story of a normal family in which come out the dreams of those who have lost their possibilities and of those who want to realize them .
translation: 通常の家族の物語で、その中に可能性を失った人々の夢や実現したいと願う人々の夢が浮かび上がる。
back_translation: It is a story of an ordinary family, in which the dreams of those who have lost their possibilities and those who wish to realize their dreams emerge.

text: would be an unendurable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial new yorker if 26-year-old reese witherspoon were not on hand to inject her pure fantasy character , melanie carmichael , with a massive infusion of old-fashioned hollywood magic .
translation: もし26歳のリース・ウィザースプーンが、彼女の純粋なファンタジーキャラクターであるメラニー・カーマイケルを古き良きハリウッドの魔法で大いに活気づけていなければ、この超田舎者のニューヨーカーにとっては耐え難い視聴体験になるだろう。
back_translation: If 26-year-old Reese Witherspoon hadn't brought her pure fantasy character Melanie Carmichael to life with the magic of old Hollywood, it would have been an unbearable viewing experience for this super country New Yorker.

text: enter sonia kapoor , the daughter of the 10th richest man in the world .
translation: ソニア・カプール、世界で10番目に裕福な男の娘が登場。
back_translation: Sonia Kapoor, the daughter of the 10th richest man in the world, makes an appearance.

text: turns out to be much more complex than the originally released gem .
translation: 元々リリースされた宝石よりもはるかに複雑であることが判明した。
back_translation: It turned out to be much more complex than the gems originally released.

text: mary goes to live with her beautician cousin in a crowded apartment , and begins to lose heart .
translation: メアリーは混雑したアパートで美容師のいとこと暮らし始め、次第に心が折れ始める。
back_translation: Mary begins to live with her cousin, a hairdresser, in a crowded apartment and gradually starts to feel disheartened.

text: is the story of eight very different people who go on a catalogue modeling trip from sophisticated los angeles to the remote mountains of california .
translation: これは、洗練されたロサンゼルスからカリフォルニアの遠隔地の山々へカタログモデルの旅に出る、非常に異なる八人の人々の物語です。
back_translation: This is the story of eight very different people embarking on a journey from the sophisticated Los Angeles to the remote mountains of California as catalog models.

text: turturro is fabulously funny and over the top as a 'very sneaky ' butler who excels in the art of impossible disappearing/reappearing acts
translation: タルトゥーロは非常に滑稽でオーバーザトップな「とてもぬすっとな」執事を演じており、あり得ない消失/再登場の技術に秀でています。
back_translation: Tartuffe plays a very comical and over-the-top "very sneaky" butler, excelling in improbable disappearance/reappearance techniques.

text: the career of a disillusioned producer , who is desperate for a hit , is endangered when his star walks off the film set .
translation: ヒットを渇望する幻滅したプロデューサーのキャリアは、彼のスターが映画のセットを出て行くときに危機に瀕する。
back_translation: A disillusioned producer who yearns for a hit finds his career in crisis as his star leaves the movie set.

text: peralta 's mythmaking could have used some informed , adult hindsight .
translation: ペラルタの神話作りには、もう少し情報に基づいた大人の見識が必要だったかもしれない。
back_translation: Peralta's myth-making may have required a bit more information-based adult insight.

text: this case made history in the new jersey judicial system and these teenagers ( who , at the time , were between the ages of 14 and 16 ) were the first in the state to be tried and convicted as adults .
translation: この事件はニュージャージーの司法制度において歴史を作り、この当時14歳から16歳の間だったこれらのティーンエイジャーは、州で初めて成人として起訴され、有罪判決を受けた。
back_translation: This incident created history in New Jersey's judicial system, as these teenagers, who were between 14 and 16 years old at the time, were the first in the state to be prosecuted and convicted as adults.

text: at times he seems to share nicholas 's fascination , but then appears more interested in making inroads with the girls at school .
translation: 時々、彼はニコラスの魅力を共有しているように見えますが、学校の女の子たちと関係を築くことにより興味を持っているようです。
back_translation: Sometimes, it seems he shares Nicholas's charm, but he appears to be more interested in building relationships with the girls at school.

text: this is one case where you can actually believe the hype -- the lord of the rings : the two towers is indeed even better than its predecessor .
translation: これは実際に期待に応えることができるケースである ― 『ロード・オブ・ザ・リング 二つの塔』は前作よりもさらに素晴らしいです。
back_translation: This is a case that can truly meet expectations - "The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers" is even more wonderful than the previous installment.

text: yet , just beneath the surface , there is an insecurity and fear they can not face .
translation: しかし、表面下には彼らが直面できない不安と恐れがあります。
back_translation: However, beneath the surface, there are anxieties and fears they cannot face.

text: does n't come close to justifying the hype that surrounded its debut at the sundance film festival two years ago .
translation: ２年前のサンダンス映画祭でのデビューを巡る期待を正当化するには至りません。
back_translation: It has not lived up to the expectations surrounding its debut at the Sundance Film Festival two years ago.

text: the imax screen enhances the personal touch of manual animation .
translation: IMAXスクリーンは、手動アニメーションのパーソナルなタッチを強化します。
back_translation: The IMAX screen enhances the personal touch of manual animation.

text: beers , who , when she 's given the right lines , can charm the paint off the wall . . . [ but ] the script goes wrong at several key junctures .
translation: ビールは、彼女が正しいセリフを与えられれば、壁のペンキをも魅了することができるが、[しかし] 脚本は重要なポイントでいくつか間違っている。
back_translation: Beer can charm even the paint on the wall if she is given the right lines, but the script has several mistakes at important points.

text: it 's a fun movie with lots of colorful characters , lots of bizarre plot meanderings and quite a few memorable lines and sequences .
translation: カラフルなキャラクターがたくさん登場し、奇妙なプロットが展開され、記憶に残るセリフやシーンが多数ある楽しい映画です。
back_translation: It's a fun movie that features a lot of colorful characters, unfolds a strange plot, and has many memorable lines and scenes.

text: the twist that ends the movie is the one with the most emotional resonance , but twists are getting irritating , and this is the kind of material where the filmmakers should be very careful about raising eyebrows .
translation: 映画の最後の展開は最も感情的な共鳴を持っていますが、ねじれがイライラさせるようになってきており、これは映画製作者が眉をひそめさせることに非常に注意を払うべき素材です。
back_translation: The final development of the movie has the most emotional resonance, but the twists are becoming frustrating, which is material that filmmakers should pay very close attention to in order to avoid raising eyebrows.

text: she and her daughter try to escape ( such as to her previous boyfriend played by futterman ) , but he pursues relentlessly .
translation: 彼女と彼女の娘は逃げようとする（以前の彼氏であるファッターマンに向かって）、しかし彼は執拗に追いかける。
back_translation: She and her daughter try to escape (toward her ex-boyfriend, Fatherman), but he persistently chases after them.

text: expect the same-old , lame-old slasher nonsense , just with different scenery .
translation: いつもの退屈なスラッシャーのナンセンスを期待してください、ただ舞台が違うだけです。
back_translation: Expect the usual boring slasher nonsense, just with a different setting.

text: mcconaughey 's fun to watch , the dragons are okay , not much fire in the script .
translation: マシュー・マコノヒーは見るのが楽しいが、ドラゴンはまぁまぁで、脚本にあまり火がない。
back_translation: Matthew McConaughey is enjoyable to watch, but the dragons are okay, and the script lacks much spark.

text: based on the edgar allen poe short story , `` the facts in the case of m . valdemar , `` comedy revolves around a doctor who convinces a dying man 's family to allow him to put the man in a trance as he takes his final breaths .
translation: エドガー・アラン・ポーの短編小説「M.ヴァルデマールの事件の真相」に基づいて、コメディは、死にゆく男の家族を納得させて、その男が最期の息を引き取る際にトランス状態にすることを許可させる医者を中心に展開します。
back_translation: Based on Edgar Allan Poe's short story "The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar," the comedy revolves around a doctor who persuades the dying man's family to allow him to put the man into a trance as he takes his last breath.

text: black picket fence is director 's sergio goes ' poignant portrait of the bleak realities of life in the public housing projects of brooklyn 's east new york , one of the inner city 's most dangerous and violent neighborhoods .
translation: 「ブラック・ピケット・フェンス」は、監督のセルジオが「ブルックリンのイーストニューヨークにある公営住宅プロジェクトの厳しい現実を描いた感動的なポートレート」と語る作品で、内陸都市の最も危険で暴力的な地域の一つです。
back_translation: "Black Picket Fences" is a work that director Sergio describes as "an emotional portrait depicting the harsh reality of public housing projects in East New York, Brooklyn," and it portrays one of the most dangerous and violent areas of inland cities.

text: in 1949 , laura brown , a pregnant housewife , is planning a party for her husband , but she ca n't stop reading the novel 'mrs .
translation: 1949年、妊娠中の主婦ローラ・ブラウンは、夫のためにパーティーを計画していますが、小説『ミセス』を読むのをやめられません。
back_translation: In 1949, pregnant housewife Laura Brown is planning a party for her husband, but she can't stop reading the novel "Mrs."

text: although mainstream filmmakers are fond of their white saviors , most audiences of color are not .
translation: 主流の映画製作者は白人の救世主が好きですが、ほとんどの有色人種の観客はそうではありません。
back_translation: Mainstream filmmakers love white saviors, but most audiences of color do not.

text: nukui is perhaps her most devoted fan , and today he wants to prove it . . .
translation: ぬくいはおそらく彼女の最も熱心なファンであり、今日はそれを証明したいと思っています。
back_translation: Nukui is probably her most enthusiastic fan, and today they want to prove that.

text: a little more intensity and a little less charm would have saved this film a world of hurt .
translation: もう少し強度があり、もう少し魅力が少なければ、この映画は多くの苦痛を免れたかもしれません。
back_translation: If it had a little more intensity and a little less charm, this movie might have avoided a lot of pain.

text: it briefly flirts with player masochism , but the point of real interest -M-^V audience sadism -- is evaded completely .
translation: それはプレイヤーのマゾヒズムに軽く触れるが、実際に興味深い点である観客のサディズム -M-^V は完全に回避されている。
back_translation: It lightly touches on the player's masochism, but the audience's sadism -M-^V, which is actually an interesting point, is completely avoided.

text: she hires karl to find her missing sister and karl soon finds himself drawn into a world of half-truths and lies as his simple missing-person case develops into a murder case that quickly becomes international in scope .
translation: 彼女はカールを雇い、行方不明になった妹を見つけようとします。カールはすぐに、簡単な行方不明者の事件が国際的な規模で急速に発展する殺人事件へと変わる中で、半分の真実と嘘の世界に引き込まれていきます。
back_translation: She hires Carl to try to find her missing sister. Carl soon gets drawn into a world of half-truths and lies as a simple missing person case rapidly evolves into an internationally-scaled murder investigation.

text: she feels left out from her father 's new family , she 's had an abortion , she 's tried to commit suicide , and she hates life in the city .
translation: 彼女は父親の新しい家族から取り残されたと感じており、中絶を経験し、自殺を試み、そして都市生活が嫌いです。
back_translation: She feels left out by her father's new family, has experienced abortion, attempted suicide, and hates urban life.

text: the advantage of a postapocalyptic setting is that it can be made on the cheap . any rock pile will do for a set . reign of fire has the disadvantage of also looking cheap .
translation: ポストアポカリプスの設定の利点は、安価に作成できることです。セットにはどんな石の山でも使えます。しかし、『レイン・オブ・ファイア』は見た目が安っぽく見えるという欠点があります。
back_translation: The advantage of a post-apocalyptic setting is that it can be created cheaply. You can use any pile of stones for the set. However, "Reign of Fire" has the drawback of looking cheap.

text: . . . too sappy for its own good .
translation: 自分のために甘すぎる。
back_translation: It's too sweet for me.

text: several uninteresting , unlikeable people do bad things to and with each other in `` unfaithful . `` why anyone who is not a character in this movie should care is beyond me .
translation: 「不倫」では、いくつかの興味を引かない、好かれない人々が互いに悪いことをする。なぜこの映画のキャラクターでない誰かが気にかけるべきなのか、私には理解できない。
back_translation: In "Adultery," a few uninteresting and disliked people do bad things to each other. I cannot understand why someone who is not a character in this movie should care.

text: during the tuxedo 's 90 minutes of screen time , there is n't one true 'chan moment ' .
translation: タキシードの90分のスクリーンタイムの間に、真の「チャンの瞬間」は一度もありません。
back_translation: During the 90 minutes of screen time in the tuxedo, there is not a single true "Chan moment."

text: `` one look at a girl in tight pants and big tits and you turn stupid ? `` umM-^E . . is n't that the basis for the entire plot ?
translation: 女の子のタイトなパンツと大きな胸を一目見るだけで頭が働かなくなるの？それって全体のプロットの基盤じゃないの？
back_translation: Does seeing a girl in tight pants and with big breasts make your mind go blank? Isn't that the foundation of the overall plot?

text: after finding the plane and its crew torn to shreds , the group tries to piece together clues about what could be responsible for the carnage .
translation: 飛行機とその乗員が切り刻まれているのを発見した後、グループは殺戮の原因となる可能性のある手がかりを集めようと試みる。
back_translation: After discovering that the airplane and its crew have been mutilated, the group attempts to gather clues that could be the cause of the massacre.

text: filmmakers david weissman and bill weber benefit enormously from the cockettes ' camera craziness -- not only did they film performances , but they did the same at home .
translation: 映画製作者のデイビッド・ワイスマンとビル・ウェバーは、コケッツのカメラの狂気から非常に大きな恩恵を受けています。彼らはパフォーマンスを撮影しただけでなく、自宅でも同じことを行いました。
back_translation: Filmmakers David Weissman and Bill Weber have greatly benefited from the madness of Kochetkov's camera. They not only filmed the performances but also did the same at home.

text: unlike the nauseating fictions peddled by such 'have-yourself-a-happy-little-holocaust ' movies as life is beautiful and jakob the liar , the grey zone is honest enough to deny the possibility of hope in auschwitz .
translation: 「ライフ・イズ・ビューティフル」や「ジャコブ・ザ・ライアー」などの‘ハッピー・リトル・ホロコースト’映画が売り込む吐き気を催す虚構とは異なり、「グレーゾーン」はアウシュビッツにおける希望の可能性を否定する正直さを持っています。
back_translation: Unlike the nauseating fictions peddled by "Life is Beautiful" and "Jacob the Liar," which are referred to as 'happy little holocaust' films, "The Grey Zone" possesses an honesty that denies the possibility of hope in Auschwitz.

text: while mitchell is there , his mother shows up to get the gun .
translation: ミッチェルがそこにいる間、彼の母親が銃を取りに現れる。
back_translation: While Mitchell is there, his mother shows up to get the gun.

text: that is the question that plagues steve richards ( john stamos ) and eric meyer ( daniel london ) in the comedy `` grownups . ``
translation: それはコメディ「グローナップス」において、スティーブ・リチャーズ（ジョン・ステイモス）とエリック・メイヤー（ダニエル・ロンドン）を悩ませる問いです。
back_translation: This is a question that troubles Steve Richards (John Stamos) and Eric Meyer (Daniel London) in the comedy "Grown Ups."

text: he was married to former adult star < a href= `` /name ? holmes , % 20laurie `` > laurie
translation: 彼は元アダルトスターのロリーと結婚していました。
back_translation: He was married to former adult star Lori.

text: fearing that bobby is drifting away from him , nicholas takes a chance and kisses him .
translation: ボビーが自分から離れていくことを恐れたニコラスは、一か八かの思いで彼にキスをする。
back_translation: Nicholas, fearing that Bobby would drift away from him, decided to take a risk and kissed him.

text: every joke is repeated at least four times . every joke is repeated at least four times . every joke is repeated at least -- annoying , is n't it ?
translation: すべてのジョークは少なくとも4回繰り返される。すべてのジョークは少なくとも4回繰り返される。すべてのジョークは少なくとも---うんざりするよね？
back_translation: All jokes are repeated at least four times. All jokes are repeated at least four times. All jokes are at least---isn't it annoying?

text: tartakovsky 's team has some freakish powers of visual charm , but the five writers slip into the modern rut of narrative banality .
translation: タルタコフスキーのチームは視覚的な魅力において驚異的な力を持っていますが、5人の作家は現代の平凡な物語のパターンにはまり込んでいます。
back_translation: Tarkovsky's team has an astonishing power in visual appeal, but the five writers are caught in the pattern of modern mundane stories.

text: the strength of the film lies in its two central performances by sven wollter as the stricken composer and viveka seldahl as his desperate violinist wife .
translation: この映画の強みは、病にかかっている作曲家を演じるスヴェン・ウォルターと、彼の絶望的なバイオリニストの妻を演じるヴィヴェカ・セルダールの2つの中心的な演技にあります。
back_translation: The strength of this film lies in the two central performances by Sven Walter, who plays a composer suffering from illness, and Viveca Serdahl, who portrays his despairing violinist wife.

text: this moving documentary tells the story of thomas and his relationship with blalock , one that ushered in advances in surgery that are still in existence today .
translation: この感動的なドキュメンタリーは、トーマスとブラロックとの関係の物語を語っており、これは今日でも存在する外科手術の進歩をもたらしました。
back_translation: This moving documentary tells the story of the relationship between Thomas and Blalock, which led to advances in surgical procedures that still exist today.

text: a science-fiction pastiche so lacking in originality that if you stripped away its inspirations there would be precious little left .
translation: 独創性に欠けすぎたサイエンスフィクションのパスティーシュであり、インスピレーションを取り除くとほとんど何も残らない。
back_translation: It is a pastiche of science fiction that lacks originality, and almost nothing remains when you take away the inspiration.

text: both overstuffed and undernourished . . . the film ca n't be called a solid success , although there 's plenty of evidence here to indicate clooney might have better luck next time .
translation: 過剰に詰め込まれ、栄養不足のこの映画は、完全な成功とは言えませんが、次回はクルーニーがより良い運に恵まれるかもしれないという証拠はここにたくさんあります。
back_translation: This movie, which is overcrowded and lacking in nutrition, cannot be said to be a complete success, but there is plenty of evidence here that Clooney may be blessed with better luck next time.

text: there are n't enough jedi to defend the republic against the threat , so chancellor palpatine enlists the aid of jango fett , who promises that his army of clones will handle the situation .
translation: 共和国を守るためのジェダイが不足しているため、パルパティーン議長はジャンゴ・フェットの助けを求め、彼は自分のクローン軍が状況を処理することを約束します。
back_translation: Due to a shortage of Jedi to protect the Republic, Chancellor Palpatine seeks the help of Jango Fett, who promises that his clone army will handle the situation.

text: the plan 's to use the school auto shop to prep two police cars , stash the drugs in secret compartments and drive away safely .
translation: 計画は、学校の自動車工房を使って2台のパトカーを準備し、薬物を秘密の compartments に隠して安全に逃げることです。
back_translation: The plan is to prepare two patrol cars using the school's automotive workshop and to hide drugs in secret compartments for a safe escape.

text: `` underground poets railroad `` is equal parts concert film of performances at universities , churches , fire stations and national monuments across the country ; road trip documentary ; and , ultimately , a tribute to the 12 black firefighters who gave their lives on september 11 .
translation: 「アンダーグラウンド・ポエッツ・レイルロード」は、全国の大学、教会、消防署、国立記念碑でのパフォーマンスのコンサート映画であり、ロードトリップのドキュメンタリーであり、最終的には9月11日に命を落とした12人の黒人消防士へのトリビュートです。
back_translation: "The Underground Poets Railroad" is a concert film featuring performances at universities, churches, fire stations, and national monuments across the country, a road trip documentary, and ultimately a tribute to the 12 Black firefighters who lost their lives on September 11.

text: it 's a lovely film with lovely performances by buy and accorsi .
translation: 素敵な映画で、バイとアッコルシの素晴らしい演技が光ります。
back_translation: It's a wonderful movie, with the outstanding performances of Bai and Akkorushi shining brightly.

text: there 's some good material in their story about a retail clerk wanting more out of life , but the movie too often spins its wheels with familiar situations and repetitive scenes .
translation: 彼らの物語には、生活にもっと多くを求める小売店の店員についての良い素材があるが、映画はあまりにも頻繁におなじみの状況や繰り返しのシーンで時間を浪費している。
back_translation: Their story has good material about a retail store clerk who seeks more from life, but the movie wastes too much time on familiar situations and repetitive scenes.

text: in his own mental state , he sees his wife alive and beautiful .
translation: 彼自身の精神状態では、彼は妻が生き生きとして美しいのを見る。
back_translation: In his own state of mind, he sees his wife as vibrant and beautiful.

text: twenty-two year old steve is on top of the world .
translation: 22歳のスティーブは世界の頂点にいます。
back_translation: 22-year-old Steve is at the top of the world.

text: set in hollywood , `` coming clean `` is a 12 character ensemble romantic comedy about an engagement party gone wrong .
translation: ハリウッドを舞台にした「カミング・クリーン」は、誕生パーティーが台無しになる12人のキャラクターが登場するロマンティック・コメディです。
back_translation: "Coming Clean," set in Hollywood, is a romantic comedy featuring 12 characters whose birthday party gets ruined.

text: an uncluttered , resonant gem that relays its universal points without lectures or confrontations .
translation: 整理された、共鳴する宝石が、講義や対立なしにその普遍的なポイントを伝える。
back_translation: Organized, resonant gems convey their universal points without lectures or conflicts.

text: when a male friend commits suicide , he leaves all of his belongings to his friends .
translation: 男性の友人が自殺したとき、彼は自分の持ち物をすべて友人に残します。
back_translation: When a male friend commits suicide, he leaves all of his belongings to his friend.

text: renM-ie zellweger , catherine zeta-jones , richard gere , queen latifah and even sad-faced ol ' john c . reilly will have you singin ' and dancin ' in the aisles .
translation: レン・ミー・イン・ゼルウィガー、キャサリン・ゼタ＝ジョーンズ、リチャード・ギア、クイーン・ラティファ、そして悲しげな顔の古いジョン・C・ライリーまでもが、あなたを通路で歌い踊らせるでしょう。
back_translation: Renée Zellweger, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Richard Gere, Queen Latifah, and even the sad-faced old John C. Reilly will have you singing and dancing in the aisle.

text: this movie attempts to reconstruct the bankruptcy of the banco ambrosiano bank and its liaisons with the vatican and the masonry through the story of its president roberto calvi , notoriously found dead under the blackfriars bridge in london in june 1982 .
translation: この映画は、1982年6月にロンドンのブラックフライヤーズ橋の下で死体で発見されたその社長ロベルト・カルヴィの物語を通じて、バンコ・アンブロジアーノ銀行の破産とバチカンおよびフリーメイソンとの関係を再構築しようとしています。
back_translation: This film attempts to reconstruct the story of the bankruptcy of Banco Ambrosiano and its relationship with the Vatican and Freemasonry through the story of its president, Roberto Calvi, who was found dead under Blackfriars Bridge in London in June 1982.

text: . . . although this idea is `` new `` the results are tired .
translation: …このアイデアは「新しい」とは言えども、その結果は古びている。
back_translation: Although this idea can be said to be "new," the results are outdated.

text: set in a 1986 harlem that does n't look much like anywhere in new york .
translation: 1986年のハーレムを舞台にしており、ニューヨークのどこにも似ていない様子です。
back_translation: Set in the year 1986, it has a scene that resembles nowhere in New York.

text: there are two distince paths in life good vs . evil .
translation: 人生には善と悪という二つの明確な道があります。
back_translation: In life, there are two distinct paths: good and evil.

text: but events spiral out of control , and before the summer ends she will experience frustrated desire , first love , and a broken heart .
translation: しかし、事態は制御を失い、夏が終わる前に彼女は挫折した欲望、初恋、そして失恋を経験することになる。
back_translation: However, the situation spirals out of control, and before summer ends, she will experience frustrated desires, first loves, and heartbreak.

text: in a strange way , egoyan has done too much . he 's worked too hard on this movie .
translation: 奇妙な方法で、エゴヤンはやりすぎた。彼はこの映画にあまりにも一生懸命取り組んできた。
back_translation: In a strange way, Egoyan overdid it. He has worked too hard on this movie.

text: a retired boston pd detective is n't buying the news report of a local girl accidentally drowning . . .
translation: 引退したボストンPDの刑事は、地元の少女が事故で溺れたというニュース報道を信じていない。
back_translation: The retired Boston PD detective does not believe the news report about a local girl who drowned in an accident.

text: it is dawn on the morning of the vernal equinox .
translation: 春分の日の朝の夜明けです。
back_translation: It's the dawn of the spring equinox day.

text: whenever the victim watches it , the phone rings , telling them they have only one week to live .
translation: 被害者がそれを見るたびに、電話が鳴り、彼らにはあと一週間しか生きられないことを告げます。
back_translation: Every time the victim sees it, the phone rings and tells them they have only one week left to live.

text: their daughter rachel cleans in a home for elderly people , and their son rory is unemployed and aggressive .
translation: 彼らの娘レイチェルは高齢者のための施設で掃除をしており、息子ロリーは無職で攻撃的です。
back_translation: Their daughter Rachel works cleaning in a facility for the elderly, while their son Rory is unemployed and aggressive.

text: what was once original has been co-opted so frequently that it now seems pedestrian .
translation: かつてオリジナルであったものがあまりにも頻繁に取り入れられたため、今では平凡に見える。
back_translation: What was once original now seems ordinary because it has been incorporated so often.

text: although mainstream american movies tend to exploit the familiar , every once in a while a film arrives from the margin that gives viewers a chance to learn , to grow , to travel .
translation: 主流のアメリカ映画はよく知られたものを利用する傾向がありますが、時折、視聴者に学び、成長し、旅をする機会を与える作品が周縁から現れることがあります。
back_translation: Mainstream American films often tend to rely on well-known material, but occasionally, works arise from the periphery that offer viewers the opportunity to learn, grow, and embark on a journey.

text: the story of j whose goal is to be world master at playing nintendo .
translation: ニンテンドーのプレイで世界のマスターになることを目指すJの物語。
back_translation: The story of J aiming to become a master of the world through Nintendo play.

text: not only a reminder of how they used to make movies , but also how they sometimes still can be made .
translation: 映画の作り方を思い出させるだけでなく、時にはまだそのように作ることができることも示しています。
back_translation: Not only does it remind us of how to make movies, but it also shows that sometimes it is still possible to create them that way.

text: no amount of nostalgia for carvey 's glory days can disguise the fact that the new film is a lame kiddie flick and that carvey 's considerable talents are wasted in it .
translation: カーヴィーの栄光の日々へのどんな懐かしさも、新しい映画がつまらない子供向けの作品であり、カーヴィーのかなりの才能が無駄にされているという事実をごまかすことはできない。
back_translation: No matter how nostalgic the glory days of Kirby may be, it cannot mask the fact that the new movie is a boring children's production that wastes a considerable talent of Kirby.

text: this idyllic existence is upset by the arrival in the village of anita rutter and her dysfunctional family .
translation: この理想的な生活は、アニタ・ラッターと彼女の機能不全の家族が村に到着することで乱されます。
back_translation: This ideal life is disrupted by the arrival of Anita Latter and her dysfunctional family in the village.

text: the film is so packed with subplots involving the various silbersteins that it feels more like the pilot episode of a tv series than a feature film .
translation: その映画は、さまざまなシルバースタインに関するサブプロットが詰め込まれていて、長編映画というよりテレビシリーズのパイロットエピソードのように感じられます。
back_translation: That movie is packed with various subplots about Silverstein, making it feel more like a pilot episode for a TV series rather than a feature film.

text: the ensuing battle was one of the most savage in u . s . history .
translation: その後の戦闘は、アメリカの歴史の中で最も凄惨な戦闘の一つであった。
back_translation: The subsequent battle was one of the most brutal battles in American history.

text: miracles , signs and wonders accompany them along with a massive media hunt to track down this `` miracle man . ``
translation: 奇跡、印、そして不思議が彼らに伴い、この「奇跡の男」を追跡するための大規模なメディアハントが行われています。
back_translation: Miracles, signs, and wonders accompany them, and a massive media hunt is underway to track down this "miraculous man."

text: an engineer creates the ultimate weapon in a battle against aliens , only to be suspected as an alien himself .
translation: エンジニアは宇宙人との戦いで究極の武器を作り出すが、逆に自分が宇宙人だと疑われる。
back_translation: The engineer creates the ultimate weapon for the battle against aliens but is instead suspected of being an alien himself.

text: the world around him seemingly comes to a stop ; everything and everybody becomes frozen in time .
translation: 彼の周りの世界は、まるで止まったかのように見え; すべてとすべての人が時間の中で凍りついてしまう。
back_translation: The world around him looked as if it had stopped; everything and everyone seemed frozen in time.

text: frustrated and angered by a system that does n't seem to work , sam hands in his resignation .
translation: 機能していないように思えるシステムに苛立ちと怒りを感じたサムは、辞表を提出する。
back_translation: Feeling frustration and anger towards a system that seemed to be nonfunctional, Sam submitted his resignation.

text: and what makes lucky invaluable is his ability to teach mudd how to write again .
translation: ラッキーの価値が計り知れないのは、彼がマッドに再び書く方法を教える能力を持っているからです。
back_translation: The value of Lucky is immeasurable because he has the ability to teach Mad how to write again.

text: when the film reaches its dramatic climax , a varied cast of characters must all figure out a way to bridge the chasm between their dreams and reality .
translation: 映画が劇的なクライマックスに達する時、様々なキャラクターたちは皆、自分たちの夢と現実のギャップを埋める方法を見つけなければなりません。
back_translation: As the movie reaches its dramatic climax, various characters must all find a way to bridge the gap between their dreams and reality.

text: he falls in love with a village girl , ayu , who has just arrived in the city after being betrayed by her boyfriend .
translation: 彼は街に到着したばかりの村の娘、アユに恋をします。彼女はボーイフレンドに裏切られたばかりです。
back_translation: He falls in love with Ayu, a village girl who has just arrived in the city. She has just been betrayed by her boyfriend.

text: this bold and cathartic drama deserves to be experienced by those who cherish intimate dramas about individuals struggling against all odds to practice love , compassion , and forgiveness .
translation: この大胆でカタルシスをもたらすドラマは、愛、思いやり、そして許しを実践するためにあらゆる逆境と戦う個人についての親密なドラマを大切にする人々に体験されるべきです。
back_translation: This bold and cathartic drama should be experienced by those who cherish an intimate portrayal of individuals fighting against all adversities to practice love, compassion, and forgiveness.

text: turning a great movie into a pretty good one is still a step in the wrong direction . . . and the ring will never be more than a pretty good movie .
translation: 素晴らしい映画をまあまあ良い映画にすることは、やはり間違った方向への一歩です…そして『リング』は決してそれ以上のまあまあ良い映画にはなりません。
back_translation: Turning a wonderful movie into just a mediocre one is indeed a step in the wrong direction... and "The Ring" will never become anything more than just a mediocre movie.

text: when boys fly pulls no punches in exposing this world - men are shown overdosing and engaging in risky behavior - but at the same time , it also shows the sense of community and vitality the parties bring to the men who attend .
translation: 「ボーイズ・フライ」は、この世界を厳しく描写しています。男性たちはオーバードーズをし、危険な行動に出る様子が描かれていますが、その一方で、パーティーが参加する男性たちに与えるコミュニティの感覚や活力も示しています。
back_translation: "Boys Fly" depicts this world harshly. It shows men overdosing and engaging in dangerous behaviors, but at the same time, it also illustrates the sense of community and vitality that the parties provide to the participating men.

text: the art direction is often exquisite , and the anthropomorphic animal characters are beautifully realized through clever makeup design , leaving one to hope that the eventual dvd release will offer subtitles and the original italian-language soundtrack .
translation: アートディレクションはしばしば見事であり、擬人化された動物キャラクターは巧妙なメイクデザインによって美しく表現されています。そのため、最終的なDVDリリースには字幕とオリジナルのイタリア語のサウンドトラックが付属することを期待せざるを得ません。
back_translation: The art direction is often stunning, and the anthropomorphized animal characters are beautifully expressed through clever makeup design. Therefore, one cannot help but hope that the final DVD release will include subtitles and the original Italian soundtrack.

text: when the skittish emma finds blood on her pillow why does she still stay behind ?
translation: 臆病なエマが枕に血を見つけたとき、なぜ彼女はまだそこに留まるのですか？
back_translation: Why does timid Emma still stay there when she finds blood on the pillow?

text: offers a fascinating look into the world of upper-echelon comics .
translation: 上位レベルのコミックの世界を魅力的に覗かせてくれます。
back_translation: It gives a fascinating glimpse into the world of high-level comics.

text: but when his reputation is challenged by an aggressive racer with a fast ride , he ca n't back down .
translation: しかし、彼の評判が速いバイクを持つ積極的なレーサーによって挑戦されると、彼は引き下がることができない。
back_translation: However, when his reputation is challenged by an aggressive racer with a fast bike, he cannot back down.

text: the director sees the strengths of alagna and gheorghiu and plays them for every cinematic moment .
translation: 監督はアラーニャとゲオルギウの強みを見出し、すべての映画的瞬間でそれを生かしています。
back_translation: The director recognizes the strengths of Alanya and Georgiu and utilizes them in every cinematic moment.

text: a spiffy animated feature about an unruly adolescent boy who is yearning for adventure and a chance to prove his worth .
translation: 冒険を求め、自分の価値を証明する機会を渇望する反抗的な少年についての素晴らしいアニメーション映画です。
back_translation: It's a wonderful animated film about a rebellious boy who craves adventure and longs for the opportunity to prove his worth.

text: he must use his amateur military skills to beat them to the finish line , and get the tape out in the open .
translation: 彼はアマチュアの軍事スキルを使って、彼らよりも早くフィニッシュラインに到達し、テープを公に出さなければならない。
back_translation: He must use his amateur military skills to reach the finish line ahead of them and publicly break the tape.

text: arthur herk , a corrupt business owner , wants to get his hands on the case .
translation: アーサー・ハークという腐敗したビジネスオーナーは、その事件に手を伸ばしたいと考えている。
back_translation: A corrupt business owner named Arthur Hark is looking to get involved in the incident.

text: this cinema verite speculation on the assassination of john f . kennedy may have been inspired by blair witch , but it takes its techniques into such fresh territory that the film never feels derivative .
translation: このシネマ・ヴェリテのジョン・F・ケネディ暗殺に関する考察は「ブレア・ウィッチ」に触発されたかもしれませんが、その技術は非常に新しい領域に踏み込んでいるため、この映画は決して模倣とは感じさせません。
back_translation: This cinema vérité exploration of the assassination of John F. Kennedy may have been inspired by "The Blair Witch," but the technique ventures into very new territory, making this film never feel like a mere imitation.

text: renee zellweger is amazing and richard gere brings a life to the screen that he has n't in several years .
translation: ルネー・ゼルウィガーは素晴らしく、リチャード・ギアは数年ぶりにスクリーンに命を吹き込んでいます。
back_translation: Renée Zellweger is wonderful, and Richard Gere brings life to the screen after several years.

text: if your senses have n't been dulled by slasher films and gorefests , if you 're a connoisseur of psychological horror , this is your ticket .
translation: もしあなたの感覚がスラッシャー映画やゴアフェストによって鈍くされていないのなら、心理ホラーの愛好者であるなら、これはあなたのチケットです。
back_translation: If your senses haven't been dulled by slasher films or gore fests, and you're a fan of psychological horror, then this is your ticket.

text: durval and celia are charmed by the child at first , but soon they see some sad news about celia and kiki on tv that will change the whole situation .
translation: ダーヴァルとセリアは最初は子どもに魅了されますが、すぐにテレビでセリアとキキに関する悲しいニュースを見ることになり、状況は一変します。
back_translation: Darval and Celia are initially captivated by the children, but soon they find themselves watching sad news about Celia and Kiki on television, and the situation changes dramatically.

text: this remake gets all there is to get out of a peculiar premise with promise : al pacino loathing robin williams .
translation: このリメイクは、アル・パチーノがロビン・ウィリアムズを嫌悪するという独特の前提から得られるすべてを引き出しています。
back_translation: This remake draws from everything that comes from its unique premise of Al Pacino's aversion to Robin Williams.

text: a gang of robbers , lead by career criminal charlie croker , create the largest traffic jam in los angeles history , giving them time to pull off a theft of gold bullion .
translation: キャリア犯罪者チャーリー・クローカー率いる強盗団がロサンゼルス史上最大の交通渋滞を引き起こし、それを利用して金塊を盗む。
back_translation: A career criminal named Charlie Croker leads a robbery gang that causes the largest traffic jam in Los Angeles history, using it as an opportunity to steal gold bullion.

text: the film documents the band responding to the twists and turns of the recording industry , rehearsing for their tour , preparing for their debut concert at the grand ole opry , charting the course for their career with their managers , and living every-day life on the farm where they reside in rural tennessee .
translation: この映画は、バンドが音楽業界の浮き沈みに対応し、ツアーのリハーサルを行い、グランドオールオプリでのデビューコンサートに向けて準備し、マネージャーと共にキャリアの方向性を決め、テネシーの田舎にある農場での日常生活を送る様子を記録しています。
back_translation: This movie documents a band's response to the ups and downs of the music industry, their rehearsal for a tour, preparation for their debut concert at the Grand Ole Opry, decision-making about the direction of their career with their manager, and their daily life on a farm in rural Tennessee.

text: once again , director chris columbus takes a hat-in-hand approach to rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours .
translation: 再び、クリス・コロンバス監督は、創造性を抑え込み、映画がほぼ3時間もだらだらと続くような頭を下げたアプローチを取っています。
back_translation: Once again, director Chris Columbus takes an approach that suppresses creativity, resulting in a film that meanders for almost three hours.

text: yanks tanks is a first look at the phenomenon of classic american cars in cuba .
translation: ヤンクス・タンクスは、キューバにおけるクラシックアメリカ車の現象を初めて見せるものです。
back_translation: Yankees Tanks is the first to showcase the phenomenon of classic American cars in Cuba.

text: they are five cinderellas in search of prince charming and a new chance in life .
translation: 彼女たちは新しい人生のチャンスと王子様を求める5人のシンデレラです。
back_translation: They are five Cinderellas seeking a new chance at life and a prince.

text: getting nowhere , jen 's mysterious grandma intercedes and casts a spell .
translation: うまくいかない状況で、ジェンの謎めいたおばあさんが介入し、呪文を唱えます。
back_translation: In a difficult situation, Jen's mysterious grandmother intervenes and recites a spell.

text: this is one of the outstanding thrillers of recent years .
translation: これは最近の注目すべきスリラーの一つです。
back_translation: This is one of the notable thrillers recently.

text: captures all the longing , anguish and ache , the confusing sexual messages and the wish to be a part of that elusive adult world .
translation: すべての切望、苦悩、痛み、混乱した性的メッセージ、そしてその逃れがたい大人の世界の一部になりたいという願望を捉えています。
back_translation: It captures all the longing, suffering, pain, confused sexual messages, and the desire to become a part of that inescapable adult world.

text: in their fortuitous encounter , forged by fire , he makes peace with the past and she takes control of her destiny .
translation: 彼らの偶然の出会いは火によって鍛えられ、彼は過去と和解し、彼女は自分の運命を掌握する。
back_translation: Their chance encounter is forged by fire, he reconciles with his past, and she takes control of her destiny.

text: one of the friends is a dress designer and provides him the artist 's clothes and imported cars are provided to him to enjoy life .
translation: 友人の一人はドレスデザイナーで、彼にアーティストの衣服や輸入車を提供し、彼が人生を楽しむためのサポートをしています。
back_translation: One of my friends is a dress designer, and I provide him with clothes for artists and imported cars to support him in enjoying life.

text: embracing the afghan women 's cause as a primary commitment , iara lee 's short film not only spotlights the despair on both sides of the afghan-pakistan border , but also captures the hope and dignity that still define afghan men , women and children .
translation: アフガニスタン女性の大義を主要なコミットメントとして受け入れるアイアラ・リーの短編映画は、アフガニスタンとパキスタンの国境の両側にある絶望を浮き彫りにするだけでなく、未だにアフガニスタンの男性、女性、子供たちを特徴づける希望と尊厳を捉えています。
back_translation: A short film by Ayara Lee, accepting the cause of Afghan women as a primary commitment, not only highlights the despair on both sides of the Afghanistan-Pakistan border but also captures the hope and dignity that still characterize Afghan men, women, and children.

text: too many improbabilities and rose-colored situations temper what could 've been an impacting film .
translation: あまりにも多くのありえない出来事と甘美な状況が、影響力のある映画になり得たものを和らげています。
back_translation: Too many unbelievable events and sweet situations are softening what could have been an influential film.

text: painful , horrifying and oppressively tragic , this film should not be missed .
translation: 痛烈で、恐ろしく、圧倒的に悲劇的なこの映画は、見逃すべきではありません。
back_translation: This film, which is poignant, terrifying, and overwhelmingly tragic, should not be missed.

text: together they set off from minneapolis to duluth on what they think will be a redemptive and romantic road trip to the north shore .
translation: 彼らはミネアポリスからダルースへ、北岸への贖いとロマンのあるロードトリップになると思って出発しました。
back_translation: They set out thinking it would be a road trip filled with redemption and romance from Minneapolis to Duluth, heading to the North Shore.

text: the delicious trimmingsM-^Earrive early and stay late , filling nearly every minuteM-^Ewith a lighthearted glow , some impudent snickers , and a glorious dose of humankind 's liberating ability to triumph over a scrooge or two .
translation: おいしいトリミングは早めに到着し、遅くまで滞在し、ほぼ毎分を軽やかな輝きと少しの生意気な笑い、そして人類がスカージ二人を克服する解放的な力の素晴らしい量で満たします。
back_translation: Delicious trimming arrives early, stays late, and fills almost every minute with a light glow, a little cheeky laughter, and a wonderful amount of liberating power that helps humanity overcome the two scourges.

text: the drama is played out with such aching beauty and truth that it brings tears to your eyes .
translation: そのドラマは、痛々しい美しさと真実をもって展開され、あなたの目に涙をもたらします。
back_translation: The drama unfolds with a painful beauty and truth, bringing tears to your eyes.

text: their marriage turns into a downward spiral where she works at a local strip club and starts having an affair with her husbands best friend , freddy .
translation: 彼らの結婚は下向きのスパイラルに変わり、彼女は地元のストリップクラブで働き始め、夫の親友フレディと不倫をするようになる。
back_translation: Their marriage spiraled downward, and she began working at a local strip club, eventually having an affair with her husband's best friend, Freddy.

text: there are many definitions of 'time waster ' but this movie must surely be one of them .
translation: 「時間の無駄」という定義はいくつもありますが、この映画は間違いなくその一つでしょう。
back_translation: There are many definitions of "a waste of time," but this movie is undoubtedly one of them.

text: sensing that he has become but another mark for his mother to con , johnny flees with her money .
translation: 母親に騙されるだけの標的になったと感じたジョニーは、彼女のお金を持って逃げる。
back_translation: Feeling like he has become just a target to be deceived by his mother, Johnny takes her money and runs away.

text: in its combination of religion , love story and exotic locales , `` heaven `` is a bit reminiscent of james michener 's `` hawaii , `` although this is a somewhat simpler , more personal tale .
translation: 宗教、恋愛物語、エキゾチックな場所の組み合わせにおいて、「ヘブン」はジェームス・ミッチナーの「ハワイ」を少し彷彿とさせますが、これはもう少しシンプルで個人的な物語です。
back_translation: In the combination of religion, love story, and exotic locations, "Heaven" evokes a slight resemblance to James Michener's "Hawaii," but this is a slightly simpler and more personal story.

text: with exquisite craftsmanship . . . olivier assayas has fashioned an absorbing look at provincial bourgeois french society .
translation: 精巧な職人技によって、オリヴィエ・アサヤスは地方のブルジョワフランス社会の魅力的な姿を形作りました。
back_translation: Through exquisite craftsmanship, Olivier Assayas has shaped an enchanting portrayal of provincial bourgeois French society.

text: there starts a dangerous game where the two teenagers that graham is protecting will be implied .
translation: グレアムが守っている二人のティーンエイジャーが暗示される危険なゲームが始まります。
back_translation: A dangerous game is implied to begin involving the two teenagers that Graham is protecting.

text: a british officer sees the drummer chasing his canteen and mistakes him as a deserter running away through the woods .
translation: あるイギリスの将校が、ドラムを叩いている兵士が自分の水筒を追いかけているのを見て、彼を森の中を逃げる脱藩者と間違えた。
back_translation: A British officer saw a soldier drumming and mistook him for a runaway fleeing into the woods, chasing after his own water bottle.

text: part contemporary investigation and part historical inquiry , documentary follows the quest of one journalist in search of justice .
translation: 現代の調査の一部と歴史的探求の一部を兼ね備えたドキュメンタリーは、一人のジャーナリストが正義を求める旅を追っています。
back_translation: A documentary that combines elements of modern investigation and historical inquiry follows a journalist on a journey seeking justice.

text: desperate to help his son , scott heads back home , leaving a substitute claus to watch over things at the pole .
translation: 息子を助けたいと必死になったスコットは、家に戻るために出発し、ポーランドで物事を見守るためのサブスティテューショナル・クラウスを残します。
back_translation: Desperate to save his son, Scott sets off to return home, leaving a substitute Klaus to keep an eye on things in Poland.

text: the film tells the parallel , conflicting trajectory of five women : anita , isabel , adela , leire , and maricarmen .
translation: この映画は、5人の女性、アニータ、イサベル、アデラ、レイレ、そしてマリカルメンの平行していて対立する軌跡を描いています。
back_translation: This film portrays the parallel and conflicting journeys of five women: Anita, Isabel, Adela, Leire, and Maricarmen.

text: fragmented , elliptical and overplotted to the point of being hard to track . still , it 's worth hanging in for the finish . . . [ when ] soderbergh pulls off a delicious trick , a gesture of pure , tender , unabashed movie love that makes up for everything .
translation: 断片的で楕円形で、追跡するのが難しいほど重なり合っています。それでも、最後まで頑張る価値はあります…[その時] ソダーバーグが素晴らしいトリックを披露し、すべてを補って余りある純粋で優しい、素直な映画愛のジェスチャーを見せます。
back_translation: It's fragmented and elliptical, overlapping to the point of being difficult to track. Still, it's worth the effort until the end... [At that moment] Soderbergh showcases a wonderful trick, revealing a gesture of pure, gentle, and straightforward love for cinema that more than makes up for everything.

text: often shocking but ultimately worthwhile exploration of motherhood and desperate mothers .
translation: しばしば衝撃的ですが、最終的には母親と必死の母たちの探求として価値のあるものです。
back_translation: It is often shocking, but ultimately it is a valuable pursuit of desperate mothers and mothers seeking their own.

text: two brothers choose the opposite sides in a civil war of a small country .
translation: 二人の兄弟は小さな国の内戦で正反対の側を選ぶ。
back_translation: The two brothers choose opposite sides in a civil war of a small country.

text: no amount of good intentions is able to overcome the triviality of the story .
translation: どんなに良い意図があっても、その物語の些細さを克服することはできません。
back_translation: No matter how good the intentions are, one cannot overcome the triviality of that story.

text: kok pin , boon hock and terry are classmates in `` em3 `` stream .
translation: コック・ピン、ブーン・ホック、そしてテリーは「EM3」ストリームのクラスメートです。
back_translation: Cock Pin, Boon Hock, and Terry are classmates in the "EM3" stream.

text: unaware she is the object of his affection , frankie is in for a big surprise when she shows up after work with mervin ( keith david ) on her arm .
translation: フランキーは彼の愛情の対象であることに気づかず、仕事の後にマーヴィン（キース・デイヴィッド）を連れて現れると、大きな驚きを味わうことになる。
back_translation: Frankie is unaware that he is the object of someone's affection, and when he shows up with Marvin (Keith David) after work, he experiences a great surprise.

text: lead by billy clemens , the gang includes maggie and virginia caulder , two beautiful sisters who have a penchant for disguise as well as gun handling .
translation: ビリー・クレメンスが率いるギャングには、2人の美しい姉妹マギーとバージニア・コールダーがいて、変装と銃の扱いに対する嗜好があります。
back_translation: The gang led by Billy Clemens includes two beautiful sisters, Maggie and Virginia Calder, who have a preference for disguise and handling firearms.

text: alenka indulges in the belief that her lover is dead in order to account for his absence .
translation: アレンカは、愛人の不在を説明するために彼が死んだという信念にふけっています。
back_translation: Alenka is immersed in the belief that her lover has died in order to explain his absence.

text: complicating matters further is the fact that commitment-shy dex unexpectedly meets marcia , the girl of his dreams .
translation: 問題をさらに複雑にしているのは、コミットメントをためらうデックスが夢の girl マーシャに予期せず出会うという事実です。
back_translation: What complicates the problem further is the fact that Dex, who is hesitant about commitment, unexpectedly encounters the girl of his dreams, Marsha.

text: so when a jamaican family move in next door and build a cricket net in the back garden , david is in seventh heaven .
translation: ジャマイカの家族が隣に引っ越してきて、裏庭にクリケットネットを作ると、デイビッドは大喜びです。
back_translation: David is overjoyed when a Jamaican family moves in next door and sets up a cricket net in their backyard.

text: he forgets most things after only a few minutes .
translation: 彼は数分後にほとんどのことを忘れてしまいます。
back_translation: He forgets almost everything after a few minutes.
